a  partly submerged glacier cave on Perito Moreno Glacier .
The ice facade  is  approximately 60  m  high
Ice formations in the Titlis glacier cave
A glacier cave is a cave  formed  within the ice of a glacier  .
Glacier caves are often called ice caves , but this term is properly  प्रयुक्त  to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round ice  .
In physics , circular motion is  a  movement  of  an object along the circumference of a circle or rotation along a circular path .
It can be uniform , with constant angular rate  of  rotation ( and  निरंतर  speed ) , or non-uniform  साथ  a changing rate of rotation .
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional body involves circular motion of its parts .
The equations of motion describe the movement of the center of mass of a body .
Examples of circular motion include  :  an artificial  उपग्रह  orbiting the Earth at constant height ,  a  stone which is tied to  a  rope and is  होने  swung in circles , a car turning through  a  curve in  a  race track , an electron moving  लम्बवत  to a uniform magnetic field , and  a  gear turning inside a mechanism .
Since the object 's  गति  vector is constantly changing direction , the moving object is undergoing acceleration by  a   अभिकेन्द्रीय   फ़ोर्स  in the direction of the center of rotation .
Without this acceleration , the object would move in a  सीधा  line , according to Newton 's  कानून  of motion .
Apollo Creed is a fictional character from the Rocky films , initially portrayed  as  the  undisputed  Heavyweight Champion of the  संसार  .
He was played by Carl Weathers .
Creed had multiple nicknames  ,  including The Master of Disaster , The  किंग  of Sting , The Dancing Destroyer , The Prince of Punch ,  the  One and Only  और  The Count of Monte Fisto  .
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed 's name is a wordplay on  the   रसूलों  ' Creed , a statement of belief used in Christian churches .
All of Apollo 's championship fights were scheduled for the 15  गोलाकार  distance .
चैंपियनशिप  fights  किया  not convert from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987 .
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red , white , and blue  trunks  ; Creed was the first man to wear them ( latterly worn by Rocky Balboa in the 3rd and 4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine '' Gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he  पहना  red  और  white , as seen in Rocky II .
Balboa  's  signature colors were black and gold—colors he used in the  नवीनतम  movie .
In the United States  ,  the title  of  federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the  संयुक्त  States and confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II  of  the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States , whose existence and some aspects of whose  क्षेत्राधिकार   हैं  beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter ,  अधिनियमों  of  कॉंग्रेस  have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions  of  the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court  may  be categorized as a federal judge ;  ऐसे  positions include the Chief  इंसाफ  and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court , Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals , and district judges of  the  United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus far are referred  to  sometimes  as   ``  Article III judges '' because they exercise the  न्यायिक  power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government  by  Article III of the U.S.  संविधान  .
In addition , judges of the Court of International Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III .
Other judges serving in the  संघीय  courts , including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges , are  भी  sometimes referred to as  ``  federal judges '' ; however , they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate , and their power  गर्भाशयी   इससे   आलेख  I instead .
See Article I  और  Article III tribunals .
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a small pocket-sized semi-automatic pistol designed by  beretta  in Italy .
Production began in late 1984 , solely in  the  Beretta U.S.A. facility in  accokeek  , Maryland .
It is a further development of the Beretta Model 20 , whose production ended in  1985  .
परिवर्तनीय  Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to VUL )  is  a type of life  बीमे  that builds a cash value  .
In a VUL , the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of separate accounts ,  समान  to mutual funds  ,   और  the choice of which of  the  available separate accounts to  उपयोग  is entirely up to the contract owner .
The 'variable  '  component in the name  refers  to this ability to invest in separate accounts whose values vary—they vary because  वे  are invested in  भण्डार  and/or bond markets .
The 'universal ' component in the name refers to the flexibility the owner has in  बनाना  premium payments  .
The premiums can vary from  nothing  in a given month  up  to maximums defined by the Internal Revenue Code for life  बीमे  .
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life  बीमे  that has fixed premium payments that typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise  an  Automatic Premium Loan feature ,  or  surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ) .
Variable universal life is  a  type of permanent  जीवन  insurance , because the death benefit will  be  paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy .
With most if not all VULs , unlike  पूरे   जीवन  ,  वहीँ  is no endowment age ( the age at which the cash value equals the death benefit amount ,  जिससे  for whole life is typically 100 ) .
This is yet another key advantage of VUL over Whole  जीवन  .
With a typical whole life policy  ,  the  मौत  benefit is limited to the face amount specified in the policy  ,  and at endowment age , the face amount  is  all that is paid out .
Thus with either death or endowment , the insurance company keeps any cash value built up over the years  .
However , some participating whole life policies offer riders which specify that any dividends paid on  the  policy be  प्रयुक्त  to purchase `` paid up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over  समय  .
If investments made in the  पृथक  accounts out-perform the  सामान्य  account of the insurance company , a higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life .
The combination over the years of no endowment age , continually  increasing  death benefit , and if a high  rate-of-return  is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy , this could result in higher value to the owner or beneficiary than that of a  पूरे   जीवन  policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums .
The outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the  क्लासिक  wood stove adapted for set-up outdoors while still transferring the heat to interior buildings .
A mound of  लड़की  Scout cookies .
This mound contains 74 boxes of cookies
Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by Girl Scouts of the USA ( GSUSA ) as one  of  its major fundraisers for local Scout  इकाई  .
Members of the GSUSA have  महरूम  selling cookies since 1917 to raise funds  .
Girls who  participate  can earn prizes for  उनके  efforts .
There are also unit incentives if  the  unit as a whole does well .
As  of  2007  ,  sales  यहूद  estimated at about 200 million boxes per year .
University Hall
Purdue University , located in West Lafayette , Indiana , is the flagship university of the six-campus Purdue University system .
Purdue  थी  founded on May 6 , 1869 , as a  land-grant  university when the Indiana General Assembly , taking  लाभ  of the Morrill Act ,  स्वीकृत  a donation of land and money  इससे  Lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish  a  college of science , technology , and agriculture  in   उसके   नाम   .
the  first classes were held on  सितंबर  16 , 1874 , with six instructors  और  39 students .
Today  ,  Purdue is a  सदस्य   of  the Big Ten Conference , and is a well known  world-class  research institution .
Purdue enrolls  the  second largest student  देह   of  any university in Indiana  as  well as the fourth largest international student  जनसांख्यिकी  of any university in the United  राज्य  .
Purdue offers both undergraduate and  ग्रैजुएट  programs in over  211  major areas of study , and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula .
The university has also  महरूम  highly influential in America 's history of aviation , having established the  पहला  college credit offered in flight training  ,   the  first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation  ,  and the first  विश्वविद्यालयों  airport ( Purdue University Airport ) .
Purdue 's aviation technology program remains one of the most competitive  aviation-specific  programs in the world .
In  the  mid-20th century , Purdue 's aviation program expanded to encompass advanced spaceflight  प्रौद्योगिकी  giving rise to Purdue 's  उपनाम  , Cradle of Astronauts .
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to  become  astronauts , including Gus Grissom ( one of  the  original Mercury Seven astronauts  )  , Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on the moon )  ,  and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ) .
A sebaceous cyst (  )  is a term that loosely refers to either  epidermoid  cysts ( also known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts  (  also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ) .
Because  an  epidermoid  गाँठ  originates in the epidermis and a  पिलर  cyst originates  इससे  hair follicles , by definition , neither type of cyst  is  strictly a sebaceous cyst .
The  नाम  is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty , white , semi-solid material in both of these cyst entities  is  not sebum , but keratin  .
Furthermore  ,  under  the   सूक्ष्मदर्शी  neither entity contains sebaceous glands .
In practice , however , the  शर्तें  are often used interchangeably .
``  सच्चा  '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and  हैं  known as steatocystomas or  ,  if multiple , as steatocystoma multiplex .
Modern pointe shoes  .
The edge of the toe pad , which is inserted between the foot and toe box for cushioning ,  can   be  seen  on   the  right foot .
A pointe shoe is a type of shoe worn by ballet dancers when performing  pointe  work .
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like and have evolved to enable dancers to dance en pointe (  on  the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time  .
They are normally worn by female dancers ,  हालांकि   पुरूष  dancers may wear  उन्हें  for unorthodox roles such as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella , Bottom in A  midsummer  Night 's Dream , or men performing as women in dance companies  ऐसे  as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva .
They are manufactured in a variety of colors , most  commonly  in shades of light  गुलाबी  .
This tablespoon has a capacity  of  about 15  ml  .
Measuring Spoons
In the US and parts  of   कनाडा  , a tablespoon is the largest  प्रकार  of spoon used for eating from a bowl .
In  the   uk  , Europe  और  most Commonwealth countries , a tablespoon  is  a type  of  large spoon usually used for serving .
In countries  जहाँ  a tablespoon is a serving spoon ,  the   निकटतम  equivalent to the US tablespoon is  either  the  मिठाई  spoon or the soup spoon .
a  tablespoonful , nominally the capacity of  एक  tablespoon , is commonly used as a measure of volume in cooking .
It is abbreviated as T , tb , tbs , tbsp , tblsp , or tblspn .
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by law and is subject to considerable variation .
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is  लगभग  15 mL ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges from 7  ml  to 14 mL .
In Australia one tablespoon (  मापन   ईकाई  ) is 20 mL .
Harry Potter is a  श्रेणी  of seven fantasy novels written by the British author  J.  K. Rowling .
the  books chronicle the adventures of a wizard , Harry Potter , and his friends Ronald Weasley and Hermione Granger , all of  जिसको  are students at Hogwarts School of  चुड़ैल  and Wizardry .
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort  ,  whose aims are to become immortal , conquer the wizarding world , subjugate non-magical  लोगों   ,  and destroy all those who stand in  उसके  way , especially  हैरी  Potter .
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone on 30 June 1997 , the books  have  gained immense popularity , critical acclaim and  वाणिज्यिक  success worldwide .
The series has also had some share of criticism , including concern for the increasingly  अंधेरा  tone .
, the book series has sold about 450 million copies  ,  making it the best-selling book series in history , and has been translated  into  67 languages .
The  पिछला  four books consecutively set records  as   the  fastest-selling books in history .
A series of many genres , including fantasy and coming of age ( with elements of mystery , thriller , adventure  ,  and romance ) , it  रै  many  सांस्कृतिक  meanings and references .
According to Rowling , the main theme  is  death .
There are also many other themes in  the  series , such as prejudice and corruption .
The initial major publishers  of  the books were Bloomsbury in the United Kingdom and Scholastic Press in the United States .
The books have since been published by many publishers  विश्वव्यापी  .
The books ,  साथ  the seventh book split  into  two parts  ,  have been made into an eight-part film series by Warner Bros. Pictures , the highest-grossing  फिल्मी  series  of  all time .
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise , making the Harry Potter brand  लायक  in excess of $ 15 billion .
Also due  to  the success of the books and films , Harry Potter has  महरूम  used for a theme park , The Wizarding World of  हैरी  Potter in Universal Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure .
RS-68 being tested at NASA 's Stennis Space Center .
The nearly transparent exhaust is due to this engine 's  exhaust  being mostly superheated steam  (  water vapor from its propellants  ,  hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking 5C rocket engine
A rocket engine , or simply `` rocket '' , is a jet engine that uses only stored propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet .
Rocket engines are reaction engines and  obtain  thrust in accordance with Newton 's third law  .
Since they need no external material to form their jet , rocket engines can be used for spacecraft propulsion as well as terrestrial uses , such as missiles .
Most rocket engines are internal  दहन  engines , although non-combusting forms also exist .
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities , are by far the  lightest  , but are the  तनिक  propellant efficient of all types of jet engines .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' is a song by American recording artist Britney Spears .
It served as Spears 's debut single and title track from her debut studio album , ...  baby  One  अधिक  Time  (  1999 ) .
Written by  अधिकतम  Martin and produced by Martin and Rami , `` ... Baby One More Time '' was released  on  September 30 , 1998 , by Jive Records .
After recording and sending  a  demo tape with an unused song from Toni Braxton  ,  Spears signed a  multi-album  deal with Jive .
``  ...  Baby One More Time ''  is  a teen pop and  dance-pop   सोंग  that refers to a girl who regrets breaking up  साथ   उसके  boyfriend .
The song received generally  अनुकूल  reviews from critics , who praised its composition .
`` ... Baby One  अधिक  Time '' attained global success , reaching number one in every country it charted .
It also received numerous certifications around the world , and is one of the best-selling singles of  सब  time , with  over   10  million copies sold .
An accompanying music video  ,  directed  by  Nigel Dick , portrays  स्पीयर्स  as a student  इससे  a Catholic high school , who starts to daydream that she is singing and dancing around the school , while watching her love interest from afar .
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` (  2008  )  ,   जहाँ  Spears 's fictional daughter is dressed  साथ  a similar  schoolgirl  outfit while wearing pink ribbons in her hair .
in  2010 , the music video for `` ... Baby One More Time '' was voted the third most influential video in  the  history of pop music , in a poll held by  jam  ! .
Spears  रै  performed `` ... Baby One More Time  ''  in a number of live appearances  और  in all of her concert tours .
it  was the encore of the ... Baby One More Time Tour ( 1999 ) and Dream Within a Dream Tour (  2001  ) ; Spears  भी  performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops ! ...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ) , The Onyx Hotel Tour  (  2004 ) , The M+M 's Tour (  2007   )  , The Circus Starring Britney  स्पीयर्स  ( 2009  )  , and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 )  .
`` ...  baby  One  अधिक   समय  ''  थी   मनोनीत  for a Grammy  पुरस्कार  for Best Female  पॉप   गायन  Performance , and has been included in lists  by  Blender , Rolling Stone and VH1 .
It has been noted for redefining the sound  of  late 1990s music .
Spears has named `` ... Baby One  अधिक  Time ''  as   एक   of  her favorite songs from her career .
It was also the final song to  be  played on the BBC 's music programme Top of the Pops .
Cholera is an infection in the small  आंत  caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae .
The main symptoms  हैं  watery diarrhea and vomiting .
Transmission  occurs  primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated  by  the feces ( waste product ) of an infected person  ,   सहित  one with no apparent symptoms .
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can  सीसे  to  रैपिड  dehydration and electrolyte imbalance , and death in some cases .
The primary treatment is oral rehydration  चिकित्सा  , typically with oral rehydration solution , to replace  जल  and  इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स  .
If this  is  not tolerated or does not  provide  improvement fast enough , intravenous fluids can also be  प्रयुक्त  .
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with  कठोर  disease to shorten its duration and severity .
Worldwide , it affects 3–5 million people and  कल्याणकारी  100,000–130,000 deaths a year .
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to  be  studied by epidemiological  विधि  .
The Picture of Dorian Gray  is  the only published novel by Oscar Wilde , appearing  as  the lead story  in  Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20  जून  1890 , printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine .
the   पत्रिका  's editors feared the story was indecent as submitted , so they censored roughly 500 words , without Wilde 's knowledge , before publication .
But  भी  with  कि  , the story was still greeted with outrage by British reviewers , some of whom suggested that Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds , leading Wilde to defend the  अनोखा  aggressively in letters to the British press .
Wilde later revised the story for book  प्रकाशन  , making substantial alterations ,  हटाना  controversial passages , adding new chapters and including an aphoristic Preface  जिससे  has since become famous in its own right .
The amended version was published by Ward , Lock and Company in April 1891 .
कुछ  scholars believe that Wilde would today have wanted us to read the version he originally  सुपुर्द  to Lippincott 's .
The novel tells of  a  young man named Dorian Gray ,  the  subject of a  पेंटिंग  by artist Basil Hallward .
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated with him , believing his beauty is  जिम्मेदार  for a new mode in his art  .
डोरियन  meets Lord Henry Wotton , a friend of Basil  's  , and becomes enthralled by Lord Henry 's world view  .
Espousing a  नई  hedonism ,  रब  Henry suggests the  तभी  things worth pursuing  in  life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses .
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade , Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell his soul  to  ensure the portrait Basil has painted would age rather than he  .
डोरियन  's wish is fulfilled , and when he subsequently pursues  a  life of debauchery , the portrait serves as a reminder of the  प्रभाव  each act has upon  उसके  soul , with each sin displayed as  a  disfigurement of his form , or  through  a sign of aging .
The Picture of Dorian Gray  is  considered a work of classic Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme .
Sári Gábor  (  born 6 February 1917 ) , known  as  Zsa Zsa Gabor ( ) , is a Hungarian -born American actress who acted in supporting roles in movies , on Broadway  ,  and occasionally on television .
Gabor was also a socialite  .
She began her stage career in Vienna at age 15 , and was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936 .
वो  emigrated to the United States in 1941 and  became  a sought-after actress with `` European flair and style '' ,  साथ  a personality that `` exuded charm and grace '' .
Her first movie role was as  supporting  actress in Lovely to Look At  .
She later acted in  we  're Not Married !
and played one of her few  अग्रणी  roles in Moulin Rouge ( 1952  )  , directed by John Huston , who described her as a `` creditable ''  अभिनेत्री  .
Besides her film and television appearances  ,  she is best known for having nine husbands , including  होटल  magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders .
She once stated , `` Men have always liked  me  and I have always liked men .
लकिन  I  जैसे  a mannish man , a man who knows  कैसा  to talk to and treat a woman – not just a man with muscles . ''
Bruce Lee (  परंपरागत  : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan  ;  27 November 1940  –  20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese  अमरीकी  martial artist , actor , martial  कला  instructor , philosopher , and filmmaker .
The founder of Jeet Kune Do , Lee was  the  son of Cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen .
he   is  widely considered by commentators , critics , media and other martial artists to be one of the  सबसे   influential  martial artists of all time , and a pop culture icon of the 20th century .
he  is often credited  साथ  helping  to  change the way Asians were presented in American films .
Lee was born in Chinatown , San Francisco on 27 November 1940 to parents from Hong Kong and  थी  raised in Kowloon with his family until his  लेट  teens .
He was introduced to the film industry by his father and appeared in several films as a child actor .
ली  moved to the United States at the age of 18 to receive his higher education , and it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts .
His Hong Kong and Hollywood  -उपजd  films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts film to a new level of popularity and acclaim , sparking a surge of interest  in  Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s .
the  direction and tone of his films changed and influenced  martial  arts and martial arts films in Hong  काँग  and the rest of the world .
He  is  noted  लिये  his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist  of  Fury  (  1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon  (  1972 )  ,  directed and written by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 )  ,  both directed by Robert Clouse .
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world , particularly among the  चाइनीज  , as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films  .
He initially trained in Wing Chun , but later rejected well-defined martial art styles , favouring instead the use  of  techniques from various sources , in the spirit of his personal  martial  arts philosophy , which  he  dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist )  .
Lee held dual citizenship of Hong Kong and the United States .
he  died in Kowloon Tong on 20 July 1973 at age  32  .
Chronic obstructive  pulmonary  disease ( COPD ) , also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ) , chronic obstructive airway disease (  coad  )  ,  chronic airflow limitation ( CAL  )  and  दीर्घकालिक  obstructive respiratory disease ( CORD )  ,  is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis  or  emphysema  ,  a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time .
This limits airflow to and  इससे  the lungs , causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ) .
In clinical practice , COPD is defined by its characteristically low airflow on lung function tests .
In contrast to asthma  ,  this limitation is poorly reversible and usually gets progressively  बदतर  over time .
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas , most commonly from tobacco smoking ,  जिससे  triggers an  असामान्य  inflammatory response in the  फेफड़ों  .
The  निदान  of COPD requires lung function tests .
Important management strategies are smoking cessation , vaccinations , rehabilitation , and drug therapy ( often using inhalers ) .
Some patients go on to require long-term oxygen therapy or lung transplantation  .
Worldwide  ,  COPD ranked as the sixth  अग्रणी  cause of death in 1990 .
It is projected to become  the  fourth leading cause of death worldwide by 2030 , due to an increase in smoking rates and  जनसांख्यिकी   परिवर्तन  in many  देशों  .
copd  is the  तीसरा   अग्रणी  cause of death in the U.S. , and the economic burden of COPD in  the  U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity  .
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank ( , ? , ; 12 June 1929early March  1945  ) is one of the most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust .
Her diary has been  the  basis for several plays and  films  .
Born  in  the city of Frankfurt am Main in Weimar Germany , she lived most of her life in or near Amsterdam  ,  in the Netherlands .
Born a German national , Frank lost her citizenship in  1941  .
वो  gained international fame posthumously after her  डायरी  was  प्रकाशित  .
It documents her experiences hiding during the German  occupation  of the Netherlands in World War II .
The Frank family moved from Germany to Amsterdam in 1933 , the year the Nazis gained control  over   जर्मनी  .
by  the beginning  of  1940 , they were trapped in Amsterdam by the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands .
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in  जुलाई  1942 , the family went into  छुपाना  in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father , Otto Frank 's , office building .
After  दो  years , the group was betrayed and transported to concentration camps .
Anne Frank and her sister , Margot , were eventually transferred to the  bergen-belsen  concentration camp , where  वे  died of  सन्निपात  in March 1945 .
Otto Frank , the only survivor of the family , returned to Amsterdam after the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved , and his efforts led to its publication in 1947 .
It  थी  translated  इससे  its original Dutch and first published in English in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl .
It has since been translated into many languages .
The diary , which was given to Anne on her 13th birthday , chronicles her life from 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944  .
Kurt 's signature
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994 ) was an American musician and artist ,  बेहतरीन  known as  the  lead singer , guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band  निर्वाण   .
Cobain formed  निर्वाण  with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen  ,  Washington in 1985  और  established it as part of the Seattle music scene , having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in  1989  .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the  बैंड  found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from  इसके  second album Nevermind ( 1991 ) .
Following the success of Nevermind  ,  Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation  x  , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and frustrated  ,  believing his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted  by   the  public , with his personal issues often subject to media attention .
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During  the  last years of his life , Cobain  struggled  with heroin addiction , illness and  अवसाद  .
He also had difficulty  coping  with his fame and public image , and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and  उसके  wife , musician Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle , the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by  a  self-inflicted shotgun wound to the  सिर  .
The circumstances of his death at  आयु  27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana ,  साथ  Cobain as a songwriter , has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide  .

The radial engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders point  outward  from a central crankshaft like the spokes of  a  wheel .
It resembles a stylized star when  viewed  from the front , and is called a  ``  star engine '' (  जर्मनी  Sternmotor ) in some languages .
The radial configuration was very  commonly  used in aircraft  इंजन  before turbine engines became predominant .
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom , created by Susan Harris  ,  that originally aired on NBC  इससे  September 13 , 1985 , to May 9 , 1992 .
Starring Bea Arthur ,  बेट्टी   श्वेत  , Rue  mcclanahan  and Estelle Getty , the show centers on four older women sharing a home in Miami  ,  Florida  .
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions , in association with Touchstone Television , and Paul Junger Witt , Tony Thomas ,  और  Harris served as the original executive producers .
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout most  of  its run and won  अनेक  awards , including the Primetime  एमी  Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice .
It also won three Golden Globe Awards for Best  टेलीविज़न  Series – Musical or Comedy .
All four stars each received an Emmy Award throughout the  श्रेणी   '  run and had multiple nominations .
The series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated programs for six out  of   इसके  seven seasons .
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil and gas exploration and production in depths of more than 500 feet .
By this definition  ,   वहीँ   हैं  approximately 600 deepwater wells  in  the Gulf of  मैक्सिको  .
It  रै  been economically infeasible for many years , but with rising oil prices  ,  more companies are investing in this area  .
Major companies working in this sector include Diamond  offshore  , TransOcean , and Baker Hughes .
वहीँ  are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling  rigs  : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships .
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform .
Recent industry analysis has estimated that the total expenditure in the global deepwater infrastructure market  होगा  reach $ 145bn in 2011 .
“Not all oil is accessible on  जमीन  or in shallow water .
You can find some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.” ... Using sonic equipment , oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely  to  produce oil .
Then they use a mobile offshore drilling  ईकाई  ( MODU ) to dig the initial well .
कुछ  units are converted into production rigs , meaning they switch from drilling for oil to  capturing  oil once it 's found .
Most of the time  ,  the  आयल   कम्पनी  will replace  the  MODU with  a  more permanent oil production rig to capture  oil.”  ...  the   मोदू  's job is to drill  bas  into  the  ocean 's floor to find oil deposits .
The part  of  the drill that extends below the deck and through the water  is  called the riser .
The riser allows for drilling fluids to  मूव   between  the floor and the rig .
Engineers lower a drill string -- a series of pipes designed to drill down to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater drilling is happening despite accidents in offshore fields ... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing  11  workers and spilling millions of  गैलन  of oil into the Gulf of  मैक्सिको  while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters .
“ ...  despite  the risks  ,   the  deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such  खुदाई   ,  analyst say  ,  is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
अमेरिका  needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the high risks that come with deepwater  खुदाई  in order for Americans to continue to carry on their  रोज  lives .
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf oil production would expand from its  2011  level of 1.3 million barrels a day  ,  still nearly a quarter of total domestic production , to 2 million  barrels  a day by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects the environment in  दोनो  negative and positive ways .
हालांकि  Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it is still a hazardous possible outcome .
Oil spills result in  आयल  sinking to the bottom of the ocean smothering plant life leaving fish without food and shelter to survive .
On the other hand deepwater drilling effects the environment in a positive ways too .
In time once the deepwater oil well is not in use  anymore   पौधे  will grow on and around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in .
deepwater  drilling also lets  us  see the depths of the ocean floor that are hardly ever seen .
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take  फ़ोटो  of rare  मछली  that are in there natural habitat  ,  giving scientist a look at  पशु  they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ) .  ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States President Bill  क्लिंटन   admitted   to   having  had an `` improper  संबंध  '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's impeachment )  became  known as  the  Lewinsky scandal .
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra , , ( December 12 , 1915 – May 14 , 1998 ) was an American singer and film  कर्ता  .
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey , Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo artist from the early to mid-1940s after  होने   हस्ताक्षरित  to Columbia Records in 1943 .
Being the idol of the `` bobby  soxers  `` , he released his first album , The Voice of Frank Sinatra in  1946  .
His professional career  था  stalled by the 1950s , but it was reborn in 1953 after he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity .
He signed with Capitol  रिकॉर्ड   in  1953 and released several  critically  lauded albums ( such  as  In the Wee Small Hours , Songs for Swingin '  प्रेमियों  ! , Come Fly with  me  , Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ) .
Sinatra left  कैपिटल  to found his own record  लेबल  , Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success  साथ  albums such  as   ring-a-ding-ding  ! , Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim  )  , toured internationally , was a founding member of the  चूहा  Pack  और  fraternized with celebrities  और  statesmen , including  जॉन  F. Kennedy .
Sinatra turned 50 in  1965  , recorded the retrospective September of My Years , starred in the Emmy -winning television special Frank Sinatra : A Man and His Music , and scored  हिट्स  with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way  ``  .
With sales of his  म्यूज़िक  dwindling and after appearing in  अनेक   poorly  received films , Sinatra retired for the first time in 1971 .
Two years later  ,  however , he  आए  out  of  retirement and in 1973 recorded several albums , scoring a Top 40  hit  with `` ( Theme  इससे  ) New York , New  यॉर्क  ``  in  1980 .
Using  उसके   लास  Vegas shows as a home base ,  he  toured both within the United States and internationally , until a  छोटी  time before his death in 1998  .
Sinatra also forged  a  highly successful career as a film actor .
After  जीतना   बेहतरीन  Supporting Actor  in  1953 , he also  garnered  a nomination for Best Actor for The Man with the  सुनहरी  Arm , and critical  acclaim  for his performance in The Manchurian Candidate .
He also  स्ट्रक्चर  in such musicals as High Society ,  pal  Joey , Guys  और  Dolls and On the Town .
Sinatra was honored at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 and was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985  और  the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997 .
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards , including the Grammy  trustees   पुरस्कार   ,   ग्रैमी  Legend Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award .
Sinatra is also one  of  world’s best-selling artists of  सब  time , having sold more than 150 million copies worldwide .
Typical cornhole board
Cornhole , also known as bean bag toss , corn toss , baggo or bags , is a  लॉन   खेल  in which players take turns throwing corn hole  बैग   at   a  raised platform with a hole in the far end .
A bag in the hole scores 3 points , while one on the platform scores 1 point .
Play continues until a team or player reaches the score of 21 .
The American Gold  त्रिभुज  is an official gold bullion coin of the United States .
Authorized under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985 , it was  पहला  released by  the  United States Mint in  1986  .
Bikram  योग  is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury  synthesized   इससे  traditional hatha  योग  techniques and popularized beginning in the early 1970s .
All Bikram Yoga classes run  लिये  90 minutes and consist of the same series of  26  postures and  2  breathing exercises .
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a room heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 % , .
Christopher Michael  massey  ( born 26 January 1990 )  is  an American actor , comedian and rapper best known for starring as Michael Barret in Nickelodeon television series  zoey  101 .
Massey  रै  received many awards  और  nomination including a Young Artist  पुरस्कार  and Emmy Awards nominations .
He is also known for appearing in several commercials in the  जल्दी  2000s .
A conventional teaspoon made of stainless steel .
A teaspoon is an  मद  of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument  ,  as well as a unit of  मापन   of  volume in some countries and  कस्टम   .
A fern is any one or more of a group of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the botanical  समूह  known as Pteridophyta .
Unlike mosses , they have xylem and phloem  (  making  उन्हें  vascular plants ) .
They have stems ,  पत्ते  , and roots like other vascular plants .
Ferns reproduce via spores and have neither seeds  nor  flowers .
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns , but ferns as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) include horsetails , whisk  ferns  , marattioid ferns , and ophioglossoid ferns .
The term pteridophyte  भी  refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular plants ( see classification section below ) .
Ferns first appear in the fossil record 360  लाख  years ago in the Carboniferous but many of the current  परिवारों  and species did not appear until roughly 145 million years ago in  the  early  cretaceous  ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ) .
Ferns are not of major economic importance , but some are grown or gathered for food , as ornamental plants , for remediating contaminated soils , and have been the subject of research for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air .
Some are significant weeds .
They also play a role in mythology , medicine , and art .
Flat roofs in Israel
Flat roof in Los Angeles
A flat roof is a type of covering for  a  building .
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof , a flat roof is horizontal or nearly horizontal  .
The  ढलान  of a roof is properly  ज्ञात  as its pitch : Roofs which are nearly flat are known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases , so the pitch is  कहा  to increase ) .
Any sheet of  सामग्री  used to cover a flat or  low-pitched  roof is usually  ज्ञात  as a membrane and the primary purpose  of  these membranes is  to  waterproof the roof area .
Materials that cover flat roofs typically  allow   the  water  to  run off from a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system .
Water from some flat roofs such as  on  garden sheds sometimes flows freely off the edge of  a  roof , though gutter systems are of advantage in keeping both walls and foundations dry .
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water directly onto the ground , or better  ,  into a specially made soakaway .
Gutters on larger roofs  प्रायः   सीसे  water into the rainwater drainage system of any built up area .
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect water in a pool , usually for aesthetic purposes , or for rainwater buffering .
Flat  roofs   मौजूद   सब  over the world and  प्रत्येक  area  रै  its own tradition or preference for materials used .
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and freezing  is  unlikely to occur ,  अनेक  flat  roofs  are simply built of  चिनाई  or concrete and this is  शुभ  at keeping out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to build where timber is not readily available .
In areas where the roof could become saturated by rain and  लीक  ,  or  where water soaked into  the  brickwork  could  freeze  to  ice and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the  mortar/brickwork/concrete  by  the   विस्तार   of  ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable .
Traditionally most flat roofs in the western world make use  of  tar or more usually tar paper applied  over   छत  decking to keep a building watertight  .
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in  बजरी  to keep the sun  's  heat , UV rays and weather off it and helps protect  it  from cracking or blistering and degradation .
Roof decking is  प्रायः  of plywood  ,  chipboard or OSB  फलक  ( OSB =  उन्मुख  Strand Board , also known as Sterling board ) of  around  18mm thickness .
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a  hot  liquid , heated in a tar kettle , or as sheets of  तारकोल  impregnated 'paper ' glued down  और  sealed  साथ  at joints by hot tar - once it has cooled , the gravel is spread evenly over it .
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of maintenance where people or events cause  the  gravel to be moved or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing , thus  exposing  it to weather and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually  जल  gets in .
Tarpaper is  प्रायः  a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in tar  .
As gravel  can  not protect tarpaper surfaces  जहाँ  they rise vertically from the roof such as on parapet walls or upstands ,  tarpaper  variants are produced with fine gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of manufacture  ऐसे  that a permanent layer of gravel is  stuck  to it in order to give it ongoing protection .
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the workmanship and training  of  those applying it to produce more or less  कामयाब  results .
In  कुछ  micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the  लागत  of materials purchase and cost of laying them , however the cost of modern membranes such as EPDM has come down over recent years to make them more and more affordable .
There are now more firms  supplying  modern alternatives and there  is  generally a growing awareness of their performance and availability .
If a  लीक  does occur on a flat roof then  क्षति  often goes unnoticed for long periods of time during which water penetrates and soaks the decking and any insulation and/or structure beneath  it  .
This  can  lead to expensive  क्षति  from the rot which often develops and if left can weaken the roof structure .
There are also various health risks to people and animals breathing the mould spores :  the  severity of  इस  health risk remains a debated  पाइंट  .
One  प्रॉब्लम  with maintaining flat roofs is that if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a  आधुनिक  membrane ) it can travel a long way  पहले  causing visible  क्षति  or leaking into a building where it can be seen .
Thus it is not easy to see where it is leaking in order to repair it .
एकबार  underlying  छत  decking is soaked it often sags causing a further collection or puddling of water in that area and the problem worsens .
a  CD-ROM ( )  is  a  pre-pressed  compact disc which contains  आंकड़ा  .
The name is an acronym which stands for `` Compact Disc Read-only memory `` .
Computers can read CD-ROMs , but can not write on them  .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software  ,  including  वीडियो  games and multimedia applications , though any data can be stored ( up to  the  capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called  उन्नत  CDs , hold both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being  निभाई   on   a  CD player , while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO  9660  format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the format of CD-ROMs  .
One of  a  set  of  color-bound books  कि  contain the technical specifications  लिये  all CD formats , the Yellow Book , created by Sony and Philips , was the first extension of Compact  डिस्क  Digital Audio .
It adapted the format to hold  कोई  form of data  .
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ) , ( born  31  July 1965 )  ,  pen name  J.  K. Rowling , is a British novelist  ,  best known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series .
The Potter books have gained worldwide attention , won multiple awards , and sold  अधिक  than 400 million copies  .
They have become the best-selling book series  in  history , and been the basis for a series of films which has become  the  highest-grossing film series  in  history .
Rowling had overall approval on the scripts as well as  maintaining  creative control by serving as a producer  on  the final instalment .
Born  in  Yate , Gloucestershire , Rowling was working as a researcher and bilingual secretary for Amnesty International when she conceived the idea for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London  in   1990  .
The seven-year period  कि   followed  entailed the death of her mother , divorce from her first husband and poverty until Rowling finished the first novel in  the  series , Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's  स्टोन  ( 1997 ) .
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the last , Harry Potter and  the  Deathly Hallows ( 2007  )  —as well as 3 supplements to the series .
In 2012 , Rowling parted with her agency and resumed writing in the form of  a  tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership ,  हकदार  The Casual Vacancy .
Rowling  रै  said she is currently working on  दो   books—one   aimed  for  वयस्कों  , the other for children younger than the Harry Potter audience  ,  and she expects the  latter   to  be published first  .
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` life story , in which she progressed from living on state benefits to multi-millionaire status  भीतर  five years .
She is the United  किंगडम  's best-selling author since records  began  , with sales in excess of £238m .
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $ 798 million )  ,  ranking her as the twelfth richest  स्त्री  in the United Kingdom .
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007 , and TIME magazine named her as a runner-up for its  2007  Person of  the  Year , noting the social , moral , and political inspiration she has  दिए  her fans .
In October 2010 , Rowling was named the ``  सबसे  Influential  स्त्री  in Britain '' by leading magazine editors .
She  रै  become a notable philanthropist , supporting such  धर्मार्थ  as Comic Relief ,  एक  Parent Families , Multiple Sclerosis Society of  ग्रेट  Britain and  lumos  ( formerly the Children 's  ऊँची  Level Group  )  .
Auburndale is a city in Polk County , Florida ,  संयुक्त  States .
The population was 11,032 at the 2000 census .
According to  the  U.S Census estimates of 2005 , the city had a population of 12,381 .
It is part of the Lakeland – Winter Haven Metropolitan Statistical Area .
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit during Expedition 7 of the International Space Station .
the  eye ,  eyewall  , and surrounding rainbands , characteristics of tropical cyclones , are clearly visible  in  this view from space .
A tropical cyclone is  a  storm system characterized by a low-pressure center  घिरी  by a spiral arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy  बरसात  .
Tropical cyclones strengthen when  जल  evaporated from the ocean is released as the saturated air rises  ,  resulting in condensation of water vapor contained in the moist  एयर  .
वे  are fueled by a different heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters ,  यूरोपीय  windstorms , and polar lows .
the   characteristic  that separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is that at any height  in  the atmosphere  ,  the center of a tropical cyclone  होगा  be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems .
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin  of  these systems , which usually form in tropical  regions  of  the  globe ,  और  to their formation in  मेरीटाइम  tropical air masses .
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms  '   cyclonic  nature , with counterclockwise wind flow in the Northern Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow  in  the Southern Hemisphere  .
The opposite direction of the wind flow is a result of the Coriolis  फ़ोर्स  .
Depending on its location and strength  ,   a  tropical cyclone  is  referred to by names such as hurricane ( , ) , typhoon ( ) , tropical storm , cyclonic storm , tropical depression , and simply cyclone .
While tropical cyclones can produce extremely  शक्तिशाली  winds and torrential rain , they  हैं  also able to produce high waves , damaging  तूफ़ान  surge , and tornadoes  .
They develop over large bodies of warm water  ,  and  खोना  their strength  if  they move over land  due  to increased surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source .
This is why coastal regions can receive significant damage from a tropical cyclone ,  जबकि  inland  regions  are relatively safe from receiving strong winds  .
Heavy rains , however , can produce significant flooding  अंतर्देशीय  , and storm surges can produce extensive coastal flooding up to from the coastline .
Although their effects on human populations can be devastating , tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions .
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it  toward  temperate  latitudes  , which makes them an important part of the global atmospheric circulation mechanism .
As a result ,  तीव्र  cyclones help to  maintain  equilibrium in the Earth 's  क्षोभमण्डल   ,  and to maintain a relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide  .
अनेक  tropical cyclones develop when the atmospheric conditions around a  कमजोर  disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable .
The background environment is modulated by climatological cycles and patterns such as the Madden-Julian oscillation , El Niño-Southern Oscillation , and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation .
Others  रूप  when other  प्रकार  of cyclones acquire tropical  विशेषताएँ  .
Tropical systems are then moved by steering winds in the troposphere ; if  the  conditions remain favorable , the tropical disturbance intensifies , and can even develop an eye .
On the  अन्य  end of  the  spectrum , if the conditions around the system deteriorate or the tropical cyclone makes landfall , the system weakens and eventually dissipates .
It is not possible to  artificially   induce   the   dissipation  of these systems with current  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch , ; December 9 ,  1916  ) is an American stage and film actor , film producer  और  author  .
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ) , Champion ( 1949 ) , Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ) , The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ) , 20,000  लीग   अंतर्गत   the  Sea ( 1954 ) , Lust for Life ( 1956 ) , Paths of Glory (  1957  ) , Gunfight at the O.K .  corral  ( 1957 ) , The Vikings ( 1958 ) , Spartacus ( 1960 ) , Lonely Are the Brave ( 1962 ) ,  सात  Days in May (  1964  ) , The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough  यारों  ( 1986 ) .
He is No.17 on the  अमरीकी  Film Institute 's list of the greatest male  अमरीकी  screen legends of all time , making him the highest-ranked  जीना   व्यक्ति  on the list .
In 1996 , he received the Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years as a creative and moral force in  the  motion picture community . ''
He is one of the last surviving actors from Hollywood 's `` golden age '' .
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger  (   born  May  6  , 1945 )  is  an American rock and roll singer-songwriter , guitarist and pianist .
As a locally successful Detroit-area  कलाकार  , he performed and recorded as Bob Seger and the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s .
By the  जल्दी  1970s , he had dropped the `` System '' from  उसके  recordings and continued to strive  लिये  broader success with other various bands .
In  1973  , he put  साथ  The Silver Bullet Band , a group of Detroit-area musicians  ,   साथ  whom he became most successful  on  the national level with the album Live Bullet  ,  recorded live with the Silver Bullet Band  in  1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit  ,   मिशिगन  .
In 1976  ,  he achieved a national breakout with the studio album  रात्रि   चालें  .
On his studio albums , he also worked  extensively  with the Alabama-based Muscle Shoals Rhythm Section , which appeared  on  several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums .
A roots rocker with  a  classic raspy , shouting voice , Seger wrote and recorded songs  कि  dealt with love , women  ,  blue-collar themes and  थी  an exemplar of heartland rock .
seger  has recorded many hits , including ``  रात्रि  Moves , '' `` Turn the  पेज  , '' `` We 've Got Tonight , '' `` Against the  हवा  , '' and Shakedown  कि  was  लिखा  for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like a Rock , '' and also co-wrote  the  Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight . ''
His iconic recording of  ``  Old Time Rock  और  Roll `` was named one of the Songs of the Century in 2001 .
With a career spanning five decades , Seger continues to perform and record today .
Seger was inducted into the  चट्टान  and Roll Hall of Fame in 2004 and the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012 .
रिचर्ड  Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913  –  April 22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States , serving from 1969 to 1974 , when  he  became the only president to resign  the  office .
Nixon had previously served  as  a Republican U.S.  प्रतिनिधि  and senator from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
निक्सन  was born in Yorba Linda , California .
He graduated from Whittier College  in  1934  और  Duke University School of Law in 1937 , returning to California to practice law .
He and his wife , Pat Nixon ,  स्थानांतरित  to  वॉशिंगटन  to work for the federal  सरकारी  in 1942 .
He subsequently served in the United States Navy during World War II .
Nixon was elected in California to  the  House of Representatives  in  1946 and to the Senate in  1950  .
उसके   pursuit  of the  alger   hiss  case  स्थापित  his  प्रतिष्ठा  as a leading anti-communist , and  elevated  him to national prominence  .
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower , the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952  चुनाव  .
Nixon served for eight years as vice president .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960 , narrowly  खोने  to John F.  कैनेडी  , and lost a  रेस  for Governor of California in 1962 .
In 1968  ,   he   भागा  again for the  प्रेसिडेंसी  and was elected .
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War , he subsequently  ended  U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to the People  's  Republic of  चीन  in 1972 opened  राजनयिक  relations between the two nations , and he initiated détente and  the   anti-ballistic   मिसाइल  Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
domestically  , his administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states .
Among  अन्य  things , he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs , imposed wage and price controls , enforced desegregation of some Southern schools , and established the Environmental Protection  एजेंसी  .
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with  अपोलो  11 , he scaled back manned space exploration .
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term  देखी  an Arab oil embargo ,  the   इस्तीफा  of his vice president , Spiro Agnew  ,  and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by  सदस्यों  of the administration .
the  scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support  ,  and on August 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office .
After his  इस्तीफा  ,  he  controversially received a pardon issued by his successor , Gerald Ford .
In retirement , Nixon 's work as an elder statesman , authoring several books and undertaking many foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image .
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18 , 1994 , and died four days later  at  the age  of  81 .
{ {  infobox  Senator
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused bitter  contention  between President Grant and Sen. Sumner .
Brady 1869 ] ]
sen.  Sumner , opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would  सीसे  to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of Haiti , became  कायल  that corruption  lay  behind the treaty , and that men close to the president shared in the corruption .
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee , Sen. Sumner initially withheld his opinion on the treaty on January 18 , 1870 .
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from Assistant Secretary  of  State , Bancroft Davis , that U.S . Naval ships were being used to protect President Báez .
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen.  sumner’s  suggestion and quite  संभवतः  to save the party from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment , the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session .
President  ग्रान्ट  persisted and sent messages to  कॉंग्रेस   in  favor of annexation on  कूच   14  , 1870 , and May 31 , 1870 .
In closed session , Sen. Sumner spoke out  विरूद्ध  the treaty ; warnng that there would be difficulty with the foreign nationals , noting the chronic rebellion that  took  place on the island , and the risk that the independence of Haiti , recognized by the United States  in  1862 , would be lost  .
Sumner stated that Grant 's  उपयोग  of the  u.S.  Navy as a protectorate  थी  a violation of International law and unconstitutional .
Finally , on June 30 , 1870 the treaty was voted on by the Senate and failed to gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty  ड्योढ़ी  .
The following day  ,  President Grant , feeling  गद्दारी  by Sen. Sumner , retaliated by ordering  the  dismissal  of  Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley , Ambassador to Britain .
By autumn , Sumner 's personal hostility to  the  president  थी  public knowledge , and  he  blamed the Secretary of State  लिये  failing to have resigned , rather than let Grant have his way  .
The two men , friends until then , cooled into bitter enemies .
In December , 1870 , still fearful that Grant meant to acquire  सेंटो  Domingo somehow ,  sumner  gave a fiercely critical speech accusing the president of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct .
Already , President Grant , supported by his Secretary  of  State Hamilton Fish , had initiated a campaign to depose  sumner  from  the  chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee  .
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '' ,  in  addition to having  रोका  Grant 's Dominican Republic  सन्धि  attempt , Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act ,  अवरोधित  Grant 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury , and been a constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go .
Grant  resented  Sumner 's superiority of manner , as well .
Told once that Sumner did not believe in the  बाइबल  , the president is supposed to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it . ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner  increased  , Sumner’s health began to decline .
जब  the  42nd  U.S. Congress convened on March  4  ,  1871  , Senators affiliated with President Grant , known as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate  विदेशी  Relations Committee chairmanship .
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics  )  is a form of applied ethics or professional ethics that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that arise in a business environment .
It  applies  to  सब  aspects of business  conduct  and is relevant  to  the conduct of individuals and entire organizations .
Business ethics  रै  both normative and descriptive dimensions .
As a corporate  अभ्यास  and a career specialization , the field is primarily normative .
Academics attempting to understand  कारोबार  behavior employ descriptive methods .
The range and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns .
Interest in business  आचार  accelerated dramatically during the  1980s  and 1990s , both within major corporations and within academia .
For example , today  सबसे   प्रमुख  corporations promote their commitment to non-economic values under headings such as ethics codes and social responsibility charters .
Adam Smith  कहा  , `` People of  the  same  व्यापार   seldom  meet  साथ  , even for merriment and diversion , but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public , or in some  contrivance  to  उठाएँ  prices . ''
Governments use laws  और   regulations  to  पाइंट  business behavior in what they perceive to be beneficial directions .
Ethics implicitly regulates  क्षेत्रों  and details of behavior that lie beyond governmental control .
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they operate accelerated the development of formal ethics regimes .
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or skin caused by heat , electricity , chemicals , friction , or radiation .
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as superficial or first degree )  or  extend into the deeper skin but do not  involve   the  full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree  )  .
Rarely all layers of the  स्किन  or deeper tissues , such as muscle or bone can be injured  in   जिससे  case the  बर्न  is either full thickness ( third  उपाधि  ) or fourth degree .
The  उपचार  required depends on the  गंभीरता  of the burn .
Superficial burns maybe managed with  छोटी  more than simple pain killers  जबकि  major burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized burn centers .
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it  may  result  in   कम  body temperature .
Partial thickness burns  may   आवश्यकता  cleaning with soap and water followed by dressings  .
Blisters should typically be left unbroken .
Full thickness burns usually require  सर्जिकल  treatments  ऐसे  as skin grafting and  extensive  burns often require large amount of  intravenous  fluids .
The most common complications of burns are related to infection .
While large burns  can  be fatal  ,  modern treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes , especially in children and young adults .
Globally about 11 million  लोगों  seek medical treatment and 300,000 people die from  burns  .
In  the  United States , of those admitted to a burn center , approximately 4 % die from their injuries .
The long term  निष्कर्ष  is primarily related to the size of burn and the age of the person effected .
The Atlantic  समंदर  , not including Arctic and Antarctic regions
इस  video was taken  by  the  क्रू  of Expedition 29 on board the ISS .
The pass starts from just north-east of  the  Island of Newfoundland over  the  North Atlantic  समंदर  to central Africa , over South Sudan .
The Atlantic Ocean is  the  second-largest of the world 's oceanic divisions .
With a total area of about , it covers approximately 20 percent of the  धरती  's surface and about 29  प्रतिशत  of its water surface area .
The first part of its name refers to  एटलस  of Greek mythology , making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas '' .
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is  in  The  histories  of Herodotus around 450 BC ( Hdt . 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek  :  Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English  :  Sea of Atlas ) .
The term Ethiopic Ocean , derived from Ethiopia , was applied to the southern Atlantic as late as the mid-19th century .
पहले  Europeans discovered  अन्य  oceans , the  पद   ``  ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters  परे  the Strait of Gibraltar that we now know as the Atlantic .
The early Greeks believed this ocean  to  be a gigantic  नदी   encircling  the world .
The  अटलांटिक  Ocean occupies an  elongated  , S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east , and the Americas to the west .
As one component of the  interconnected  global ocean , it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes considered a sea of the Atlantic ) , to the Pacific Ocean in the  दक्षिणपश्चिम  ,  the  Indian Ocean in the southeast , and the  दक्षिणी  Ocean in the south  .
( Other definitions describe the  अटलांटिक  as extending southward to Antarctica . )
The equator subdivides  it  into the North Atlantic Ocean and South Atlantic Ocean .
Due to their long-term persistence , and the need  लिये   a  unique identifier in issuing forecasts and warnings , tropical cyclones and  उपोष्ण  cyclones are given names according to  नीति  (  देखिए  Tropical cyclone naming ) .
The following are lists from which these tropical and subtropical cyclone  names  are  निकला  .
White light is dispersed by  a  prism into the colors of the optical spectrum .
The visible spectrum  is   the  portion of the electromagnetic spectrum that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye .
Electromagnetic radiation in this range of wavelengths is called visible  लाइट  or  बस  light .
A typical human eye will respond to wavelengths from about 390  to  700 nm .
In terms of frequency  ,  this corresponds to a  बैंड  in  the  vicinity of 430–790 THz  .
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm (  540  THz ) , in the green region  of  the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ) .
The  वर्णक्रम  does not , however , contain all the colors that the human eyes  और  brain can distinguish .
Unsaturated colors such as  गुलाबी   ,  or purple variations such as magenta , are absent , for example , because  वे  can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths .
Colors containing only one  wavelength  are also called pure colors .
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window `` , the  प्रदेश  of  the  electromagnetic spectrum which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere .
An example of this phenomenon is that clean air scatters blue  लाइट  more  than  red wavelengths , and so the midday  आसमान  appears blue .
The optical window is also called the  दृश्य  window because it overlaps the human visible response spectrum .
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the human vision , as well  as  the Medium Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may  अनुभव  them .
Many species can see light with  बारंबारता  outside the `` visible spectrum , ''  जिससे  is defined in terms of human vision .
Bees and many other insects  can  detect ultraviolet light , which helps them find nectar in flowers .
Plant species that depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to their appearance in ultraviolet light , rather than how colorful they  appear  to humans .
Birds , too , can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ) , and  कुछ  have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range .
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet  दायरा  , however  ,  can not see red light or any other reddish wavelengths .
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at about 590nm , just before the orange wavelengths start .
Birds , however  ,  can see some  रेड  wavelengths , but not as many as humans .
Zebras ( or ) are several species of African equids  (  horse family ) united by their  distinctive  black and white stripes .
Their  धारियाँ  come in different patterns , unique to each individual .
They are generally social animals that live in small harems to large herds .
Unlike their closest relatives , horses and asses , zebras have never been truly domesticated .
There are three species of zebras : the plains zebra  ,  the Grévy 's zebra and the  पहाड़  zebra .
The plains zebra and the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus Hippotigris , but Grévy  's  zebra  is  the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus .
The latter resembles an ass , to which it is closely  सम्बन्धित  , while the former two are more horse-like .
All three  belong  to the genus Equus , along with other living  equids  .
The unique stripes of zebras make them one of the animals most familiar to people .
They occur in a variety of habitats , such as grasslands , savannas , woodlands , thorny scrublands , mountains , and coastal hills  .
However , various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on zebra populations ,  in  particular  शिकार   लिये   खालें  and habitat destruction  .
Grévy 's  जेब्रा  and the mountain zebra are endangered  .
While plains zebras are much more  plentiful  , one subspecies , the quagga , became extinct in the late 19th century – though there is  फिलहाल  a plan , called the Quagga Project , that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically similar to the quagga in a process called breeding back .
Barry White , born Barry Eugene  कार्टर   (  – ) , was an American composer and singer-songwriter .
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image ,  श्वेत  's greatest success came  in  the 1970s as a solo singer  और  with the Love Unlimited Orchestra , crafting many enduring soul , funk , and disco songs such as his two biggest hits , ``  तुम  're the First , the Last , My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your  प्रेम  , Babe . ''
Along with Isaac Hayes , White  is  considered by Allmusic.com  as  a pioneer of disco music in the  जल्दी  1970s .
During  the  course  of  his career in the music business  ,  White achieved 106 gold albums worldwide  ,  41  of  which also attained platinum status .
White had  20  gold and 10 platinum singles , with worldwide sales in excess of 100 million , according to critics Ed Hogan and Wade Kergan .
His  प्रभाव  included Rev . James Cleveland , Ray Charles , Aretha Franklin plus Motown artists The Supremes  ,  The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye .
Angelina Jolie ( , born Angelina Jolie Voight ; June 4 , 1975 )  is  an American actress , film director , and screenwriter .
She has received an Academy Award ,  दो  Screen Actors Guild Awards , and three  सुनहरी  Globe Awards , and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes  in  2009 and 2011 .
Jolie promotes humanitarian  कल्याणकारी  , and  is  noted for her work with refugees as a Special  envoy  and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ) .
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman  ,  a  शीर्षक  for which she has received substantial media attention .
Jolie  बना  her screen  डेब्यू  as a child alongside her father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ) , but her film career began in earnest a decade later  साथ  the low-budget production  साइबोर्ग  2 ( 1993  )  .
Her first leading role in a major film was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ) .
She starred in the critically acclaimed  biographical  television  films  George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 )  ,  and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl , Interrupted ( 1999  )  .
Jolie achieved wide fame  बाद  her portrayal of video game heroine  लारा  Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb Raider (  2001  ) , and established herself  among  the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle  of  Life  (  2003 ) .
She continued her action  स्टार  career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and  चाही  ( 2008 ) —her  biggest  non-animated commercial successes to date—and received further critical  acclaim  for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ) ,  जिससे  earned her a nomination for an Academy  पुरस्कार  for Best Actress .
Jolie made her directorial debut  साथ  the wartime drama In the Land of Blood and Honey ( 2011 )  .
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob  थॉर्नटन   ,  Jolie now lives with actor Brad Pitt , in a relationship notable for  fervent  media  ध्यान  .
Jolie and Pitt  have  three biological children and three adopted children  .
A natural arch produced  by  the erosion of differentially weathered rock  in  Jebel Kharaz , Jordan
अपरदन  is the process by which soil and  चट्टान  are removed  इससे  the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes such as wind or water flow , and then transported and deposited  in  other locations .
जबकि  erosion is a natural  प्रक्रम  , human activities have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which  अपरदन  is occurring  globally  .
Excessive erosion causes problems such as  मरुस्थलीकरण  , decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation , sedimentation of waterways , and ecological collapse due to loss  of  the nutrient rich upper soil layers .
Water and wind erosion are now the  दो  primary causes of land degradation ; combined , they are responsible  लिये  84 % of degraded acreage  ,  making excessive erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems  .
Industrial agriculture , deforestation , roads , anthropogenic climate  बदलें   और  urban sprawl  हैं  amongst the most significant human activities in regard to  उनके  effect on stimulating erosion .
However ,  वहीँ  are many available alternative land use practices that can curtail or limit erosion , such as terrace -building , no-till agriculture  ,  and revegetation of denuded soils .
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series which ran on MTV from December 3 ,  2009  to  दिसम्बर  20 , 2012 in  the  United States .
The  श्रेणी  follows the lives of eight housemates spending their summer  at  the  जर्सी  Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey .
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast winter  to  Miami Beach  ,  with Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore .
The  चौथी  season  ,  filmed in Italy ,  premiered   on  August 4 ,  2011  .
The show returned for a fifth season , at Seaside  हाइट्स  on January 5 , 2012 .
The fifth season finale aired on March 15 , 2012 .
On  कूच  19 , 2012 , MTV confirmed that the series would return for their sixth season .
On  अगस्त  30 , 2012 , MTV announced that the series will end after the sixth season  ,  which premiered on October 4 .
The series finale aired on December 20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy  regarding  the use of the words ``  guido  / Guidette , '' portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes , and scrutiny from locals  क्युकी  the cast members were not residents of  the  area .
The series garnered record ratings for MTV ,  बनाना  it the  संजाल  's most viewed series telecast ever .
The series  '  cast have  भी  been credited with introducing unique lexicon and phrases  into   अमरीकी   लोकप्रिय  culture .
the  University of Chicago  और  the University of Oklahoma are among the educational institutions that have had classes or conferences about the show .
In  2010  , the cast of Jersey Shore was named on Barbara  walters  ' 10 Most Fascinating People  सूची   ,  and  the  series  रै  since  महरूम  exported to  दर्जनों  of countries worldwide .
वहीँ  are several remakes of  the  show in  अन्य  countries  ,  with two set in the United Kingdom ; the well known Geordie Shore , set in Newcastle upon Tyne , England .
the  other is The Valleys , the Welsh  समतुल्य  , which is  फिल्माया  and  नियत  in Cardiff .
The only other official remake of the show is  gandía  Shore , set in Gandía , Spain .
