United States territory is any extent of  प्रदेश  under the jurisdiction of the federal government of the United States , including all waters ( around islands or continental  tracts  ) and all U.S . Naval vessels .
the  United States has traditionally  proclaimed  the sovereign rights for exploring , exploiting , conserving , and managing its territory  .
This extent of territory is all the area belonging  to  ,  और   अंतर्गत  the dominion of , the United States  संघीय  government ( which includes tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative and  अन्य  purposes .
The United States total  territory  includes  a  subset of political divisions  .
The U.S.  सरकारी  is a government with delegated powers under the United States Constitution  .
``  the   शक्तियां  not delegated to the  संयुक्त  States by the  संविधान  , nor prohibited by it to the States , are reserved to the States respectively , or to the people  ''  by  the  Tenth Amendment .
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated  as  T3 ) is a 2003 science fiction action film directed by Jonathan Mostow and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger , Nick Stahl , Claire  danes  and Kristanna Loken .
It is the second sequel to The Terminator ( 1984 ) .
After  स्काईनेट  fails  to   मार  Sarah Connor before  उसके  son is born and to kill John himself as a child , it sends back another Terminator , the T-X , in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible .
This includes John 's future wife , but not John himself as his whereabouts are unknown to Skynet .
John 's life is placed  in  danger when the T-X accidentally finds him .
A cord of wood
The cord is a unit of measure of  शुष्क  volume used in Canada  और  the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood .
A cord is  the   राशि  of wood that , when `` ranked and well stowed '' ( arranged so pieces are aligned , parallel , touching  और  compact ) , occupies a volume of .
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile  ऊँची  , long , and deep ; or  कोई  other arrangement of linear measurements that yields the same volume .
the  name cord probably comes from the use of  a  cord or string to measure  it   .
The , is an 8-bit handheld video game  यंत्र  developed and manufactured  by  Nintendo  .
It  थी   released  in Japan on , in North America  in  , and in Europe on .
It is the first handheld console in the  खेल   लड़के  line  ,   और  was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the same staff who had designed the Game & Watch series as well as several popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
Redesigned versions were released  in  1996 and 1998 , in the form  of  Game Boy Pocket , and Game Boy Light ( Japan only  )  ,  क्रमशः  .
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system  following  the Game & Watch series introduced in  ,  and it combined features  इससे  both the Nintendo Entertainment System and Game & Watch .
It was originally bundled with the puzzle game Tetris .
As part of the fourth generation  of  gaming  ,  the Game Boy competed with the Sega  खेल  Gear , Atari Lynx , and the TurboExpress .
Despite these other technologically superior handheld consoles , the Game Boy was a tremendous  कामयाबी  .
the  Game Boy and its successor , the Game Boy Color , have both combined sold  118.69   लाख  units worldwide  .
Upon its release in the United  राज्य  , it sold its entire shipment of one million units within  सप्ताह   .
The World Trade Center is a complex of buildings  अंतर्गत  construction in Lower Manhattan , New York City , United States , replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings with  the  same name on the same site .
The original World Trade Center featured landmark twin  मीनारें   ,  which opened on April 4 , 1973 and were destroyed in the September 11 attacks of  2001  , along with 7 World Trade Center .
The other buildings in the complex were damaged in the attacks , and their ruins were eventually demolished .
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and  a  memorial to those killed in the attacks  .
,  तभी  one skyscraper has been completed ; the other four are expected to be completed before 2020  .
One  संसार  Trade Center will  be  the lead building for the new complex , reaching more than 100 stories at its completion .
It became the tallest building in New York City on April 30 , 2012 , and is expected to  be  finished by 2013 .
A sixth tower is awaiting confirmation .
At  the  time of their completion , the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2 World Trade  बीच  ( the South Tower ) , known collectively as the `` Twin Towers '' , were the tallest  इमारतें  in the world .
the  other buildings included 3 WTC ( the Marriott World Trade Center ) , 4 WTC , 5  wtc   ,  6 WTC ,  और  7 WTC .
All of these buildings were built between 1975 and 1985 .
The cost for the construction  थी  $  400  million ( $ in dollars ) .
The complex was located in the heart of New York City 's downtown financial district and contained 13.4  लाख  square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space .
The World Trade Center experienced a fire on  ,  1975  ,  a bombing on , 1993 and a robbery on , 1998  .
in  1998 , the Port Authority decided to privatize the World Trade Center , leasing the buildings to a private company to manage , and awarded the lease  to  Silverstein  गुण  in .
on  the morning of September 11 , 2001 , Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the  जटिल  , one into each tower ,  in  a coordinated terrorist attack .
After burning for 56  मिनट्स  , the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed , followed a half-hour later by  the  North Tower  (  1  )  , with the attacks on the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753 deaths .
Falling debris from the  मीनारें   ,  combined with fires  कि  the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings , led to  the  partial or complete collapse of all the other buildings in  the  complex and caused  अनर्थकारी  damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding  क्षेत्रफल   .
The process of cleanup and recovery at the World  व्यापार  Center  साईट  took eight months .
Over the following years , plans for a rebuilt World Trade Center took form .
The first new  भवन  at the site was 7 World  व्यापार  Center , which opened in .
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ) , established in to  oversee  the rebuilding process , organized competitions to select  a  site plan and memorial design .
Memory Foundations , designed by Daniel Libeskind  ,  was selected as the master plan , but this went through substantial changes in  डिज़ाइन  .
The new World  व्यापार  Center complex will include One World Trade Center , three other high-rise office towers , and the National September 11 Memorial & Museum .
San Gabriel Mountains
San Bernardino Mountains , with Mt . San Gorgonio in  the  foreground and Big Bear Lake in the background  .
The Transverse Ranges are a  समूह  of mountain ranges of southern California , in the Pacific  coast  Ranges physiographic region in North America .
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern  समाप्त  of the California Coast Ranges and lie between Santa Barbara and San Diego  काउंटी  .
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to their East-West  अभिविन्यास  ,  बनाना   उन्हें  transverse to the general North-South orientation of most  of  California 's coastal  kyu  .
Periodic table with electron shells
An electron shell may be thought of as  an  orbit followed  by  electrons around an atom 's nucleus .
the  closest shell to the nucleus  is  called the  ``  1 shell '' ( also called `` K  शेल  ''  )  , followed by the ``  2  shell '' ( or `` L shell ''  )  , then the ``  3  shell '' ( or ``  m   शेल   ''  ) , and so on farther and farther from the nucleus .
The shell  अक्षर  K , L , M , ... , used in the X-ray notation  ,  are alphabetical .
Each shell can contain only a fixed number of electrons : The 1st shell can  थाम  up  to  two  electrons  , the  2nd  shell can hold up to eight electrons , the  3rd   शेल  can hold up to 18 , and 4th shell  can  hold up to 32 and so on .
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus  ,  an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely  भर  by other electrons  .
However , this is not a strict requirement  :  Atoms may have two or  भी  three incomplete outer shells .
( See Madelung rule for  अधिक  details . )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in these  शेल  see electron configuration  .
The electrons in the  outermost  occupied shell ( or shells ) determine the chemical properties of the atom ; it is called the valence shell .
Each shell consists of one or more  subshells  , and each subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals  .
Vickie Lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ; November  28  , 1967 – February 8 , 2007 ) , known  by   उसके  moniker Anna Nicole  स्मिथ  , was an American model , actress , and television personality  .
Smith first gained popularity in Playboy  ,  becoming the 1993 Playmate of  the   साल  .
She modeled for  कपडे  companies , including Guess jeans and Lane Bryant  .
Smith dropped out of high school and was  शादीशुदा  in 1985 .
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul , J. Howard Marshall , 62 years  उसके  senior , resulted in speculation that she married the  octogenarian  for his money , which she denied .
following  Marshall  's  death , Smith began a lengthy legal battle over a share of his  एस्टेट  .
Her case , Marshall v. Marshall , reached the U.S. Supreme Court  on  a question of federal jurisdiction ,  और  again on a question of bankruptcy court  प्राधिकार  ( now called Stern  v.   मार्शल  ) .
Smith died  on  February 8 , 2007 in a Hollywood , Florida hotel room  as  a result of an overdose of prescription  दवाएँ  .
Within  the  final six months  of  her life , Smith was the focus of a renewed press coverage  surrounding  the death  of  her son  ,  Daniel , and the paternity and custody battle  over  her newborn  बेटी  , Dannielynn .
The is one denomination of Japanese yen .
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` new script `` , and were also minted from 1949-1958 using ``  old-script  '' Japanese characters .
Five-yen coins date to 1870 (  जब  , due to the much higher value  of  the yen  ,  they were minted in gold ) .
The front of the coin depicts  a  rice plant growing out of the water , with `` five yen '' written in kanji ; the back is stamped with `` Japan ''  और  the year of  समस्या  , also in kanji , separated by sprouts of a tree .
The three graphic elements of the coin represent agriculture and fisheries , the key elements of the Japanese  first-sector  economy .
Around a hole , there is a gear  कि   represents  industry .
It is the only Japanese  सिक्का  in circulation to lack Arabic numerals on either face .
TLC is  an  American girl group whose repertoire spanned R & B , hip hop , soul , funk , and new jack swing .
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins , rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas , the  समूह  found unprecedented success  in  the 1990s while also enduring a  श्रेणी  of spats with the law , each other ,  और  the group 's record label .
Initially , TLC achieved  वाणिज्यिक  success following the release of  उनके  debut album Ooooooohhh ...
On  the  TLC  टिप  , which sold 6 million copies worldwide .
However ,  it  was their second album ,  crazysexycool  , that catapulted the group to superstar status .
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female group , and eventually sold 23  लाख  copies worldwide .
Five  सालो  later , the group released their third album FanMail , which became the group 's first album to debut at number one and sold more than 11  लाख  copies worldwide .
The subsequent tour  following  FanMails release became the highest grossing tour of all  समय  by a female band .
In 2002 , Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes died in a car accident in Honduras .
Seven months later  ,  T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's  चौथी  album 3D , which sold  2  million copies worldwide , it featured unreleased vocals from Left Eye  .
Billboard magazine ranked TLC as one of the greatest  musical  trios .
Between 1992 and  2003  , the band accumulated ten top ten singles , four number one singles , four multi-platinum albums , and four Grammy Awards .
At the end of 1999 , TLC was ranked as the seventh most  कामयाब  act of the 1990s  by  Billboard .
In 2008 , the group was inducted into  the  All Time Hot  100  Artist Hall  of  Fame by  the  same magazine  ,  at 56th place .
That  साल  it was  भी  listed as the # 25 R & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding  25  years .
TLC has sold  अधिक  than  65  million records worldwide and they are ranked as the second  बेहतरीन  selling female group of all time , and the best selling female R &  b  group  of  all  समय  .
in  2012 , TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's  100  Greatest Women in Music , being ranked the number  एक  all girl group  on  that list  .
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney  तस्वीरें  .
The 37th film in  the  Walt Disney Animated Classics , it is  आधारित  on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice Burroughs , and is the only major motion picture  संस्करण  of the story  टार्ज़न  property to be animated .
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay  by  Tab Murphy  ,  Bob Tzudiker , and Noni White , Tarzan features  the   आवाज़ें  of Tony Goldwyn , Minnie Driver , Glenn Close  ,  and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed , Lance  henriksen  , Wayne Knight , and Nigel Hawthorne .
It was the last bona fide hit before the Disney slump of the early  2000s  grossing $ 171,091,819  domestically  and $ 448,191,819 worldwide , outgrossing its  पूर्ववर्तियों  Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the time of its release , its production budget of $ 130 million made it the most expensive animated film ever made , until topped by  डिज़्नी  's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002 .
It was also the  पहला   डिज़्नी  animated  विशेषता  to open at # 1 since Pocahontas .
This was the last major box office  कामयाबी  of the Disney Renaissance .
Oil Platform P-51 off the Brazilian coast is a semi-submersible platform .
Oil platform Mittelplate in the North sea
An oil platform , ( offshore platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a  विशाल  structure with facilities to drill wells , to extract  और   प्रक्रम  oil  और   प्राकृतिक  gas  ,  and to temporarily store product until it  can  be  brought  to shore for refining and marketing .
In many cases , the platform contains facilities to house the  workforce  as well .
Depending on the circumstances , the platform may be fixed to the ocean  मंजिल  , may consist of an artificial island , or may float .
Remote subsea wells may also be connected to a platform by flow lines and by umbilical connections .
These subsea solutions may consist of one  or  more subsea wells , or of  एक  or  अधिक  manifold centres for multiple wells .
Slaughter is the killing of animals , usually that of domestic livestock for food .
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle , water buffalo ( for beef and veal )  ,  sheep , goats ( for lamb and mutton ) , pigs ( for pork ) , horses ( for horse meat  )  , and fowl ,  largely  chickens , turkeys , and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ) .
The White House , the president 's  आधिकारिक  residence and  बीच  of the administration
Under the United  राज्य  Constitution , the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole , the presidency is the highest  राजनैतिक  office in the United States by influence and recognition .
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces  .
The president is indirectly elected to  a  four-year term  by  an Electoral College (  or  by the House of Representatives should the  चुनावी  College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ) .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to  the  United States Constitution in 1951 , no person may  be   निर्वाचित  President more than twice , and no one who has served more than two years of a  पद  to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death , resignation , or removal from office  of  an incumbent President , the  वाइस  President assumes the office .
The President must be at least 35 years of  आयु  and a `` natural  born  '' citizen of the  संयुक्त  States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn  into  office as president following the ratification of  the  United  राज्य  Constitution , which took effect  on  March 4 , 1789  .
For American  नेताओ  before this  अनुसमर्थन  , see President of  the  Continental Congress .
The list  करता  not include any Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United  राज्य  Constitution .
वहीँ  have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both  the   22nd  and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as  अध्यक्ष   ,  four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and  फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt ) , four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A.  गारफ़ील्ड  ,  विलियम  McKinley , and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first  अध्यक्ष  , was inaugurated in  1789  after a unanimous  vote  of the Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days  in  1841 , and Franklin  D.  Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
he  is the only president to  serve   अधिक  than two terms , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry Truman ,  थी  passed to limit the number of times an individual can be  निर्वाचित   अध्यक्ष  .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president ,  थी  the first  to  be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was  the  first elected after women gained voting rights in 1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams , Rutherford B. Hayes , Benjamin Harrison and George W.  बुश  – who lost the  लोकप्रिय  vote but assumed office .
जॉन  F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman  कैथोलिक  faith ,  और  the  वर्तमान  president , Barack  ओबामा  , is the first president of African descent  .

A suppressor , sound suppressor , or sound  मॉडरेटर  , is  a  device attached to or part of the barrel of  a  firearm which reduces the amount of noise  ,   और  usually the amount of muzzle flash , generated by firing the weapon .
a  suppressor can be used both with a firearm and with compressed air gun .
Though it is sometimes referred to as a  silencer  , this term is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the sound of a projectile , especially  एक  moving  तेज़  than the speed of sound  ,  through  the  air can not be eliminated .
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e . greater than 300 meters ) can lessen , or retard  ,  the report at the moment of  प्रभाव  , and create the impression of silence near the target .
the  noise heard near the muzzle as a  प्रक्षेप्य  leaves the barrel  ,  though subdued , is not silent at all .
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of firing by slowing the escaping propellant gas and  sometimes  by  reducing  the velocity of the bullet .
Early suppressors were created around  the   शुरूआत  of  the   20th  century by several inventors  .
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim , Hiram Percy 's father , and the inventor of the Maxim Machine Gun )  ,  is credited with inventing and selling  the  first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ) .
Maxim gave his device the trademarked  नाम  Maxim Silencer .
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm  suppressor  by  कहावत  in  the   जल्दी  20th century , using many  of  the same techniques to provide quieter-running engines (  in  many European countries automobile mufflers  हैं  still  पुकारा  silencers ) .
The word silencer  in  reference to gun  suppressor  remains in widespread use , although it  रै  since  गिरे  out of favor with some  ,   विशेषकर  among the firearms industry , being replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor , because a `` sound suppressor ''  करता  not `` silence '' any weapon , rather it eliminates muzzle  फ्लैश  and reduces the sonic  दबाव  of a firearm discharging .
Common usage and U.S. legislative language favor the historically earlier term , silencer .
In U.S. law , the terms `` firearm muffler '' and `` firearm  silencer  '' are synonymous .
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the United States Office of Strategic Services  ,  who favored the newly designed High Standard HDM .22 Long Rifle  पिस्टल  during  संसार  War II .
oss  Director William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan  demonstrated  the  पिस्टल  for President Franklin  D.  Roosevelt at the White House .
According to OSS research chief Stanley  लोवेल  , Donovan ( an old and trusted friend of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office  ,  where Roosevelt was dictating  a  letter .
While Roosevelt finished his message ,  डोनोवन  turned his back and fired ten  गोलियाँ   into  a  sandbag  he  था  brought with him , announced what  he  had done and handed the smoking gun to the  astonished  president .
The British SOE  (  Special Operations Executive )  welrod   हत्या  pistol with an integral suppressor  थी  also used  by  the American OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War .
Beatrice `` Bea  ''  Arthur ( May 13 , 1922 – April 25 ,  2009  ) was an American actress , comedienne , and singer whose career spanned seven decades .
Arthur achieved fame as  the  character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms All in the Family and Maude  ,  and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls , winning  एमी   पुरस्कार   लिये  both roles .
A stage actress both before and after her  टेलीविज़न  success , she won the Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in  a  Musical for her performance as Vera Charles in the original cast of  mame  ( 1966 ) .
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the  tekken  video game series  ,  produced by Digital Frontier  और  distributed by Asmik Ace Entertainment in association with Bandai  entertainment   .
The  फिल्मी  premiered in North  अमेरिका   by  Bandai Entertainment on July 26 , 2011 , and in Australia  on  July 27 , 2011 in a special exclusive  one-off  screening .
It was released on September 3 , 2011  in  Japan .
The film was released on Blu-ray Disc  on   नवम्बर  22 , 2011 for USA ,  और  December 1 ,  2011   लिये  Japan .
This film was also released on DVD on November 22  ,  2011 ( 2D Version only ) .
The film was additionally included  साथ  the PlayStation 3 game , Tekken Hybrid , and the Nintendo 3DS title , Tekken 3D : Prime Edition .
For a discussion of nonprofit , voluntary neighborhood advocacy groups , see neighborhood association .
In the United States  ,   a  homeowner association is a corporation formed  by  a real estate developer for the purpose of  विपणन  , managing , and  selling  of homes and lots in a residential subdivision .
It grants the developer privileged  मतदान  rights in governing  the   संघ  , while allowing the developer to  निकास   वित्तीय  and legal responsibility of the organization , typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners  बाद  selling off a predetermined number of lots  .
सदस्यता  in the homeowners association by a residential buyer is typically a condition of purchase ; a buyer is n't given  an  option to reject it .
Most  homeowner  associations are incorporated , and are subject to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations .
State  oversight   of  homeowner associations is minimal , and  मुख्यतः  takes the form of laws  जिससे  are inconsistent from state to state .
Some states , such as Florida and California , have a large body of homeowner association law , and some states  ,  such as Massachusetts , have virtually  no  homeowner association law .
The fastest growing form of housing in the United  राज्य  today  is  common-interest developments ( CIDs  )  , a category that includes planned-unit developments of single-family homes  ,  condominiums , and cooperative  अपार्टमेंट  .
Since  1964  , homeowner associations have become  increasingly  common  in  the USA .
The Community Associations Institute  व्यापार  association estimated that HOAs governed 24.8 million American homes and 62 million residents in 2010 .
a   prize-winning  lilac-and-white  silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig  जिससे  have been developed since its domestication ca  .  5000 BC  .
Breeds vary widely in appearance and purpose , ranging from show breeds with  long  ,  बहती  hair to those in use as model organisms by science .
From ca .  1200  AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532 , selective breeding by indigenous  दक्षिण  American peoples resulted in many varieties of domestic Guinea pigs , which  रूप  the basis for some  of   the  modern domestic breeds .
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept  as  agricultural stock for  खाना   ,  and efforts  at  improving the Guinea pig as a food source continue to  the  modern era .
With the export of Guinea pigs  to  Europe in the 15th century , the  लक्ष्य  in breeding  shifted  to focus on the development of appealing pets .
to  this end , various competitive  प्रजनन  organizations were founded by fanciers .
The American Cavy Breeders Association , an adjunct to the American Rabbit  प्रजनक  Association , is the governing body in the United States and Canada .
The British Cavy Council governs  cavy   क्लब  in the United Kingdom .
Similar organizations exist in Australia ( Australian National Cavy Council ) and New Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club ) .
Each club publishes its  अपना  Standard of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible for showing .
New  breeds  continue to emerge in  the   21st  century .
Though  वहीँ  are many breeds of Guinea pig ,  तभी  a few breeds are commonly found on the show table  as  pets .
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found undesirable by breeders or  यहूद  bred to be pleasant pets  regardless  of how well they meet the breed  मानक  of perfection .
The short hair , Abyssinian , Peruvian and Sheltie  (  aka Silkie ) breeds are those most frequently seen as pets , and  the  former three are the core  breeds  in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs .
In addition to their standard form , nearly all breeds come in a Satin variant .
Satins  ,  due to their hollow  बाल  shafts , possess coats of a special gloss and shine  .
However , there is growing evidence that the genes responsible for the Satin coat  भी  can cause severe bone problems ,  सहित  Osteodystrophy and Paget 's  बीमारी   .
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by  कुछ  cavy breeders '  एसोसिएशन  because  of  animal  welfare  reasons .
All cavy breeds have some shared general standards : the  सिर   प्रोफ़ाइल  should be rounded , with large eyes and large ,  चिकना  ears .
The body should be strong and of  कॉम्पैक्ट  build .
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly defined and thorough from root to tip  .
These standards are best met  by  long  स्थापित  , commonly bred breeds , as their  प्रजनक  have had enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities .
The coat colour ideal  of  good definition and thoroughness  is  rarely met by other than the smooth coated  breeds   ,  which have  था   खूब  established , separate breeding lines for different colours .
State schools  (  also known as public schools or government schools  )  generally refer to  प्राथमिक  or secondary schools mandated for or offered to all children without charge paid for , in whole or in part  ,  by taxation .
The term may  भी  refer to institutions  of  post-secondary education  वित्तपोषित  , in whole or in part , and overseen by government .
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules whose  अनुक्रम  is  नियंत्रित  by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules .
This  is  required by  सब  living cells and associated viruses .
The ribosome ( from  ribonucleic  acid and the  यूनानी  soma , meaning `` body '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine , found within all living cells , that serves as the primary site of  biological  protein synthesis ( translation ) .
Ribosomes link amino acids together  in  the order specified  by  messenger RNA ( mRNA  )  molecules .
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads the mRNA , while the large subunit  joins  amino acids to form  a  polypeptide chain .
Each subunit  is  composed of  एक  or more ribosomal RNA ( rRNA ) molecules and a variety of proteins .
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may be copied many times  into  messenger RNA ( mRNA ) chains of a similar sequence .
Ribosomes can bind  to  an  mrna   कड़ी   और  use it as a template for determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein .
Amino acids  हैं  selected , collected and carried to  the  ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ) ,  जिससे  enter one part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain .
The attached amino acids are then linked together by another part of the ribosome  .
Once the protein is  उत्पादित  , it can then 'fold ' to produce  a  specific functional three-dimensional structure .
A  राइबोसोम  is made from complexes of RNAs  और  proteins and is therefore a ribonucleoprotein  .
Each ribosome  is  divided into two subunits  :  the smaller subunit binds to the mRNA  पैटर्न  , while the larger subunit binds to the tRNA and the amino  acids  .
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA molecule , these two subunits  विभाजित  apart .
Ribosomes  हैं  ribozymes , because  the  catalytic peptidyl transferase activity that links amino acids  साथ  is performed by the  ribosomal  RNA .
Ribosomes  इससे  bacteria , archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size , sequence , structure , and the ratio of protein to RNA .
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to kill bacteria by inhibiting their ribosomes , while leaving human ribosomes unaffected .
In bacteria and archaea  ,  more than one ribosome may move along a single mRNA chain  at  one time , each `` reading '' its sequence and producing a corresponding protein  अणु  .
The  ribosomes  in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble many features of those in bacteria  ,  reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria .
Albert Claude , Christian de Duve , and George Emil Palade were  jointly  awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine , in  1974  , for the discovery of  the  ribosomes .
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was awarded to Venkatraman Ramakrishnan , Thomas A.  steitz  and Ada  E.  Yonath for determining  the  detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome .
The  सरलीकृत  internal structure of a chloroplast
Overview of the Calvin cycle and  कार्बन  fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis  हैं  chemical reactions  कि  convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose  .
These reactions occur in the stroma , the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of  the  thylakoid membranes .
ये  reactions take the  light-dependent  reactions and perform further chemical processes on them .
There are three  phases  to the light-independent reactions , collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation , reduction reactions  ,  and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name , this process occurs only when light is  उपलब्धियाँ  .
Plants  do  not carry out the Calvin cycle by night .
They , instead , release sucrose into  the  phloem from their starch  reserves  .
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis (  c3  carbon fixation , C4  कार्बन  fixation , and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism  )  ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles  प्रत्येक  night  और  release it by day  in  order to  मेक  this process work .
In mathematics , a square number or perfect square is an integer that  is  the square of an integer ;  in  other words , it is the product of  कुछ  integer with itself .
For example , 9 is a square number , since it can be written as .
The usual notation for the formula for the  वर्गाकार  of a number is not the product , but the equivalent exponentiation  ,  usually pronounced as ``  वर्गाकार  '' .
The name square number comes from the name of the shape ; see below .
Square numbers are  non-negative  .
Another way of saying  कि  a  (   non-negative  ) number is a square number , is that its square roots are again integers .
For example ,  =  ±3 ,  so  9 is a square number .
A positive integer that has no perfect square divisors except 1 is called  square-free  .
For  a  non-negative integer , the th square  क्रमांक  is , with being the zeroth square .
The concept of square can be extended to some other number systems .
If rational numbers are  शामिल   ,  then a square is the ratio of two square integers , and , conversely , the ratio of two square integers is a square ( e.g. , 4/9 = ( 2/3 )  2  ) .
Starting with 1 , there are square numbers  up  to and including , where  the  expression represents the floor of the number  .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political history of the United  राज्य  that reflected a  भाव  of national purpose and a desire for  एकता  among  अमेरिकी  in the aftermath  of  the Napoleonic Wars .
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan disputes between it and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party  प्रणाली  .
President James Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan affiliation in making his nominations , with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics .
The period  is  so closely associated with Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825  )   और  his administrative goals that his name and the era are virtually synonymous  .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in American politics with the  समाप्त  of the Federalist Party as America began to develop after the War of 1812 .
While America was experiencing growth and prosperity after the war with Britain , this era  भी  marks the first instance of  आर्थिक  troubles in the growing  संयुक्त  States .
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay , protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of  the  United States  जटिल  the tension  between  the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis .
While  the  term “Era of Good Feelings” is  प्रायः  viewed with irony because of the political turmoil , economic factors caused animosity between  the  North and South .
The designation of the period by historians as  एक  of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism , as the history of the era was one in which the political atmosphere  थी   strained   और  divisive , especially among factions within the  मुनरो  administration and the Republican Party .
the  phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell , in  the  Boston Federalist newspaper , Columbian Centinel , on July  12  , 1817 , following Monroe 's visit to Boston , Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America .
Mariel  मार्गरेट  `` Mia '' Hamm  (  born March  17  , 1972 ) is a retired American professional soccer player .
Hamm played many years as a forward for  the  United States women 's national soccer team and was a founding  सदस्य  of the Washington Freedom .
Hamm scored 158 international goals ,  अधिक  than any other player , male or female , in the history of soccer and is the third  सबसे  capped female player  in  soccer  इतिहास  behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone , appearing  in  275 international matches .
hamm  was named the women  's  FIFA  संसार  Player of  the  Year  the  first two times that  पुरस्कार  was given ( in 2001 and 2002 ) ,  और  is listed as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players (  as  chosen by Pelé ) .
She was  inducted  into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama  खेल  Hall of  कीर्ति  and Texas Sports Hall of  कीर्ति  .
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer  और   जीवन  and  appeared  in the HBO documentary Dare to  सपना  : The Story of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team .
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon called Hamm , `` Perhaps  the  most important athlete of the last 15 years . ''
Hamm takes a corner kick .
The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team based in Harrison , New Jersey , representing  the  New York metropolitan area .
the  team competes  in  the Eastern Conference of  प्रमुख  League Soccer ( MLS )  .
It is  एक  of the ten charter clubs of MLS , having competed in  the  league since its inception  .
The  टोली  was a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ) , but has gone through several name changes .
The  टोली  was  originally  known as the New York/New Jersey MetroStars through 1997 .
From the 1998  ऋतु  through the  2005  season  ,  the team was known  as  the MetroStars .
On March 9 , 2006 , the team was sold  to  Red Bull GmbH , leading to the team 's current name .
वे  are the only original MLS franchise not to have won any significant trophy ( including regular season , playoffs , and  नॉकआउट  competition ) since inception .
The team 's best result in  the  MLS was the MLS Cup final in 2008 .
In  the   us  Open Cup , the MetroStars reached three semifinals ( 1997 , 1998 , 2000 ) , before reaching their first  फाइनल  in 2003 , losing 1–0 to the Chicago  आग  .
On August  26  , 2000 , the Metros ' Clint  mathis  set an MLS record by scoring five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn .
Some well-known players that have played for  the   टोली  include Giovanni Savarese , Tim Howard  ,  Tony Meola , Tab Ramos , Alexi Lalas , Clint Mathis , Jozy  altidore  , Michael Bradley  ,  Claudio Reyna  ,  Eddie Pope  ,   रॉबर्टो   donadoni  , Lothar Matthäus  ,  Adolfo Valencia ,  youri  Djorkaeff , Amado Guevara , Juan Pablo Ángel , Thierry Henry , Juninho  pernambucano  , Jan Gunnar Solli , Rafael Márquez , and Tim  काहिल  .
The team has also had well-known coaches ,  सहित  Carlos Queiroz , Carlos Alberto Parreira , Bora Milutinović ,  bob  Bradley , Mo Johnston , Bruce Arena and Hans Backe .
Confucianism , Taoism , and Buddhism are one , a painting in  the  litang style portraying three men  हँस  by a river stream ,  12th  century , Song Dynasty .
Estimating the number  of  Buddhists in the world , or in many countries  ,  is difficult due to definitional issues as  खूब  as practical problems of enumeration .
To begin with ,  the  religious beliefs , practices  ,  and  पहचान  of  ईस्ट  Asians ( who comprise the  बहुमत  of the  संसार  's Buddhists by  कोई  measure ) often blend Buddhism with other  परंपराओं  including Confucianism , the Chinese folk religion , Daoism , Shinto , and Korean shamanism .
सबसे  followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations ,  or  observe  a  definite ritual of adherence such as taking Refuge , making it difficult to accurately estimate the  क्रमांक  of practitioners .
An additional  चुनौती  is the hostility of several national governments  (  often Communist ones such as China or North Korea ) to religion  generally  or to Buddhism specifically  .
Government  नीतियों   in   ये  countries may encourage the  under-reporting  or non-reporting of religious adherence , resulting in official totals that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries .
Estimate of the worldwide Buddhist population range from 350 million to over one billion , but cluster nearer to  the  first figure .
adherents.com  ( as of 2012 )  suggests  a figure of 397 million  .
By major branches , the  संख्याएँ  are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism , including  ईस्ट  Asian Buddhism , with  no  fewer than 185 million adherents , and possibly several times that many ( again , depending on definitional issues ) .
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in China , South Korea , Japan , Taiwan  ,  Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 ) Theravada  buddhism  , with no fewer than 125 million adherents .
This is the predominant form of  buddhism   practiced  in Cambodia , Thailand , Laos , Sri Lanka , and Burma .
( 3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism , with approximately 20 million adherents .
This  रूप  predominates in the  वृहद  Tibetan and Mongolian  regions  , as well as in the Himalayas .
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan , and various territories within what is now western China , Vajrayana is traditional to certain regions of Russia  (  e.g . Kalmykia , Buryatia ) , India ( e.g . Ladakh , Sikkim )  ,  and Nepal ( e.g . Khumbu ) .
Vajrayana ,  भी  known as Tibetan Buddhism , is often conflated with Tantric Buddhism , but this is  imprecise  , as Shingon and other forms of East Asian Buddhism also practice tantra  .
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka , Thailand , Cambodia , Laos , Burma , Bhutan , and Mongolia ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities .
Depending on how one calculates Chinese and other East Asian adherents , this figure might expand  to   शामिल  several more  देशों  .
In addition , Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia  और  Bhutan , and receives  prominent  mention  in  the  constitutions  of Thailand and Sri Lanka .
In  उत्तरी  India  और  Nepal ,  the  land where Buddhism was born , the religion severely declined during the first millennium .
Whether this decline was due to the Islamic conquest of  उत्तरी  India , or to other factors  ,  remains controversial .
See  the   आलेख  Decline of Buddhism in India .
James Butler Hickok ( May  27  , 1837 – August 2 ,  1876  ) , better known  as   जंगली  Bill Hickok , was a folk hero  of  the American Old West .
His skills as a gunfighter and scout , along with his  प्रतिष्ठा  as a lawman  ,   provided  the basis for his fame , although some of his  reported  exploits are fictionalized .
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois ,  hickok  went west at age 18  as  a fugitive from justice , first working as a stagecoach  ड्राइवर  , before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska .
He fought for the Union Army during the American Civil War , and gained publicity after the  युद्ध  as a scout , marksman , actor  ,  and professional gambler .
Between his  law-enforcement  duties and gambling ,  जिससे  easily overlapped , Hickok  थी  involved in several notable shootouts .
He was shot and killed  जबकि  playing poker in the  nuttal  & Mann 's Saloon in Deadwood , Dakota Territory ( now South  डकोटा   )  .
Artist  's  conception of the Curiosity rover vaporizing rock on Mars  .
The rover landed on Mars in August 2012 .
A Mars  रोवर  is an automated motor vehicle which propels itself across the  सतह  of the planet Mars after  लैंडिंग  .
Rovers have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory , they  can  be directed to interesting features , they can place themselves  in  sunny positions to weather winter months and they  can  advance the knowledge of how to perform very  रिमोट  robotic vehicle control .
There have been four  कामयाब  robotically operated Mars rovers .
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed  the  Mars Pathfinder mission and its now inactive Sojourner rover .
It currently manages the Mars Exploration Rover mission 's active  अवसर  rover and inactive Spirit  ,  and , as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission , the Curiosity rover .
A financial audit , or more accurately , an audit of financial statements  ,   is  the verification of  the  financial statements of a legal entity ,  साथ  a view to express an audit  राय  .
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance , but not absolute assurance , that  the   वित्तीय  statements are presented fairly , in all material respects , and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework .
The purpose of an audit is  provide  and objective independent  परिक्षा   of  the financial statements , which increases the value and credibility of the financial statements produced by management , thus  बढ़ाएँ  user confidence in the financial statement , reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost  of  capital of the preparer of the  वित्तीय  statements .
वित्तीय  audits are  typically  performed by firms of practicing accountants who are experts in financial reporting .
The financial audit  is  one of many assurance functions provided by accounting firms .
Many  संगठन  separately employ or hire internal auditors , who do  नहीं  attest  to  financial reports but focus  मुख्यतः  on the internal controls  of  the organization .
External auditors may choose to place limited reliance on the work of internal  auditors  .
Auditing  promotes  transparency  और  accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an organization , therefore would likely to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings .
Internationally , the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA ) issued  by  the International Auditing and Assurance  मानकों  Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the benchmark  लिये  audit process .
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors  to  follow  the  ISA or a local variation  of  the ISA .
Dollar  सिक्के  have been minted in the United States in gold , silver , and base metal versions  .
The term silver dollar is often  प्रयुक्त  for  कोई  large white metal  सिक्का  issued by  the  United States with a face value of one dollar , although purists insist that a dollar is  नहीं  silver unless it contains some of that metal  .
Silver dollars  ,  the first dollar coin  समस्या  , were minted beginning in 1794 .
Gold dollars and gold-colored dollars have also been produced by  the  United  राज्य  .
The Sacagawea  और  Presidential dollars are often referred to as `` golden dollars '' .
In modern times , dollar coins  have  not been very popular in the United States .
Despite efforts by the government  to  promote their use ,  सबसे   अमेरिकी  currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins .
In  सीधा  and level flight lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ) .
in  a  banked  turn of  60°  , lift equals double the weight ( L=2W )  .
the  pilot  अनुभवों  2g and a doubled weight .
The steeper the bank , the greater the g-forces .
This  top-fuel  dragster can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 seconds .
This is a  आड़ा  acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary case the Pythagorean theorem yields  a  g force of 5.4 g .
g-force ( with  g  from gravitational ) is a term for accelerations  लगा  as weight and measurable by accelerometers .
It is not a force , per se , but a force per unit mass .
चूंकि   ऐसे  a force is perceived as a weight , any g-force can be described as a `` weight per unit mass ''  (  see the synonym specific weight ) .
The g-force acceleration  अधिनियमों  as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass , and ( save for certain electromagnetic force influences ) is the cause of an  ऑब्जेक्ट   's  acceleration in relation to free-fall .
This acceleration experienced by an object is due to the vector sum  of  non-gravitational forces acting  on  an object free to move .
The accelerations  कि  are not produced  by  gravity are termed proper accelerations , and it is only these that are measured in g-force units .
वे  cause stresses and  strains  on objects .
क्युकी  of these strains , large g-forces may be destructive .
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force , even though g-forces are expressed in multiples  of   the  acceleration of a standard  गम्भीरता  .
Thus , the  मानक  gravitational acceleration at  the  Earth 's  सतह  produces g-force only indirectly  ,   as  a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces .
The 1 g-force on  an  object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical force exerted in the  upward  direction by the ground , keeping the object from going into free-fall .
the  upward force from the ground ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating relative to  the  free-fall  कंडीशन  , which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth  's  center .
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only  ,  feel no g-force .
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely  गिरना  elevator  गिरना  toward the Earth 's center ( in vacuum ) , or ( to good approximation )  शर्तें  inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit .
These are examples of coordinate acceleration ( a change in velocity  )  without a sensation of weight .
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ) , however it is produced , is synonymous with weightlessness .
In the absence of  गुरुत्वाकर्षक  fields , or in directions at right angles to them , proper and coordinate accelerations are  the   वही  , and any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration .
An example here is a rocket  in  free space ,  in  which simple changes in velocity are produced by the engines , and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers .
An augur holding a lituus , the curved wand often  प्रयुक्त   as  a symbol of augury on  रोमन  coins
The augur was a priest  और  official  in  the classical world  ,  especially ancient  रोम  and Etruria .
His main role  थी   to  interpret the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds : whether they are flying  in  groups or alone , what noises they  मेक  as they fly , direction of flight and what kind of birds they are .
इस  was known as `` taking the  auspices  . ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to any major undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of war , commerce , and religion .
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who does not know that this city was  संस्थापित  only after taking the auspices , that everything in war and in peace , at  घर  and  विदेश  , was done only after taking the  auspices  ? ''
Farmington Hills is an  affluent  community in southeastern Michigan .
It  is  the second largest city in Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan .
Its population was 79,740 at the 2010 census .
It is part of the  upscale  northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit  और   is  also  पूर्वोत्तर   of  downtown Ann Arbor .
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest cities in  the  United States , as well as in  the   राज्य  of Michigan .
In 2010 ,  the  area ranked as the 30th safest city in America .
Although the two cities have separate services and addresses  ,  Farmington and Farmington Hills are  प्रायः  thought of as the same community .
Features of the community include a  recently   संवर  downtown , boutiques  ,  a vintage cinema , numerous restaurants  ,  exotic car dealerships , art galleries , and  पब्लिक   पार्क  including Heritage Park .
There are several historical sites including the Longacre House and the  राज्यपाल  Warner Mansion .
Both cities  हैं  served by Farmington Public  स्कूलों  .
Farmington Hills serves as a major business center for the greater Detroit area .
Present-day impression of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town seal ( matrix ) of Náchod from 1570
A  मुहर  is a device  लिये  making an impression in wax , clay , paper , or some other medium , including an embossment on  पेपर   ,  and  is   भी   the  impression thus made .
the  original purpose was to authenticate a document , a wrapper for one such as a  आधुनिक  envelope , or the cover of a container or package  पकड़कर  valuables or other objects .
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould , with  the  final image represented on the device for making the  छाप  by a mirror-image design , incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio .
The seal-making device is  भी  referred  to  as the seal  मेट्रिक्स  or  die  ; the imprint it  creates  as the seal impression ( or , more rarely , the sealing ) .
If the impression is made  purely  as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the high parts of the matrix touch , the seal is known as  a  dry seal ; in all other  मामले  a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used , usually in another color than the paper .
For legal purposes , the definition of a seal may be extended  to  include rubber stamps , or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S  .  ``  )  .
In the United  राज्य  , the word `` seal  ''   is  sometimes assigned to a  facsimile  of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ) , which may be  प्रयुक्त   in  a variety of contexts  सहित  architectural settings , on flags ,  or  on official letterheads .
Thus , for example , the Great Seal  of   the  United States , among  अन्य  uses , appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of  the  seals of the  u.S.  states appear on their  संबंधित  state flags .
In Europe , although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as  खूब  as on seals , the seal design in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem .
The study of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics .
groundhog  Day ( Pennsylvania German : Grundsaudaag , Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on  फ़रवरी  2 .
According to folklore , if it is cloudy  जब  a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day , then spring will come early ;  if  it is sunny , the groundhog  होगा  supposedly  देखिए  its shadow and retreat back into its burrow , and the winter weather will continue for six more weeks .
Modern customs of the holiday involve celebrations where early morning festivals are held to watch  the  groundhog  उभरते  from its burrow  .
In southeastern  पेन्सिलवेनिया  , Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday with fersommlinge ,  सोशल  events in which food is  परोसा  , speeches are made , and  एक  or more g'spiel ( plays or skits  )  are  performed  for entertainment .
The  पेन्सिलवेनिया  German dialect is the only language spoken at the  इवेंट  , and  those  who speak English pay a penalty , usually in the  रूप   of  a nickel , dime , or quarter per word spoken ,  साथ  the money put into a bowl  in  the center of the table .
The largest Groundhog Day celebration  is  held in Punxsutawney , Pennsylvania .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized and popular tradition , received widespread attention as a result of the 1993  फिल्मी  Groundhog Day , which was set in Punxsutawney , PA (  हालांकि  filmed primarily in Woodstock  ,  IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil .
High resolution image of  tampa  Bay region
The Tampa Bay  क्षेत्रफल  has a humid subtropical climate ( Koppen Cfa ) , with warm and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and drier winters with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years .
The area experiences a significant summer wet season , as nearly two-thirds of the annual precipitation falls in  the  months of June through September .
The area is listed by the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) as being in hardiness zone 10 , which is about the northern limit of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown .
highs  usually range  between  65 and 95 °F ( 18 and 35 °C ) year round .
Though known for hot summers , Tampa 's  आधिकारिक  high has never reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C )  .
St. Petersburg 's  all-time  record high is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C )  .
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico , and much of the city of Tampa lies on  a   छोटी  peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay .
This proximity to large bodies of water both moderates temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere .
In general , the local communities farthest from the coast have larger temperature ranges  ,  both  दौरान   a  single day and throughout the seasons of the year .
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum ,  प्रर्दशित   विभिन्न  properties across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range  of   सब   संभावित  frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an  ऑब्जेक्ट  has a different meaning , and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object  .
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum extends  इससे  below the low frequencies used for modern  रेडियो  communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of  the  size of an atom .
The  सीमा  for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself , while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity  of  the Planck length , although in  principle  the spectrum is infinite and continuous  .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions , as ways to study and characterize matter .
In addition , radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other  उपयोग  for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic  विकिरण  for more  अनुप्रयोग  ) .
लेजेंड
फ्रैंकलिन  Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his initials , FDR , was the 32nd  अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century , leading the United States during a time  of  worldwide economic  अवसाद  and  कुल  war .
A dominant  नेता  of  the  Democratic Party and  the  only American  अध्यक्ष   निर्वाचित  to more than two terms , he built a New Deal  गठबन्धन  that  realigned  American politics after 1932 , as his domestic  नीतियों  defined American liberalism for the middle third of  the  20th century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as  उसके  campaign  थीम  ,  fdr  defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932 ,  at  the depth of the  ग्रेट  Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over  पोलियो  , FDR  's  unfailing  आशावाद  and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely with  अंग्रेजों  Prime Minister Winston  चर्चिल   और   सोवियत  General Secretary Joseph Stalin in  अग्रणी  the Allies  विरूद्ध   जर्मनी  and  जापानी  in World  युद्ध  II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs  designed  to produce relief ( government jobs for the  बेरोजगार  )  ,   रिकवरी  ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of  वॉल  Street , banks and transportation  )   .
the  economy improved  rapidly  from 1933 to  1937  , but then relapsed into a deep recession  .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition  कि  formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing  कोई   considerable  legislation ; it abolished many of  the  relief programs when unemployment diminished  दौरान  World War II .
सबसे  of the regulations on business were ended  परिचय  1975–85 , except for the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities  और   एक्सचेंज  Commission , which  स्टिल   exists  .
Along with several smaller programs  ,  major surviving programs include  the  Federal Deposit Insurance  निगम   ,  which was created in 1933 , and Social  सुरक्षा  , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War  ii  loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of China  और  the aggression of  नाजी  Germany , FDR gave strong  राजनयिक  and financial support to  चीन  and Great Britain , while remaining officially  न्यूट्रल  .
उसके  goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941  ,  Roosevelt , with Congressional approval , provided  lend-lease  aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With  बहुत  strong  नेशनल  support  ,   he  made war on Japan and Germany  बाद  the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on  दिसम्बर  7 , 1941 , calling it a  ``  date which will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the  अलाइड   युद्ध  effort .
As an active military leader , Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two  fronts  that ended in the defeat of the  अक्ष  Powers and  the  development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment  of  100,000 Japanese American civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief programs largely ended , and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in war centers , and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or  volunteered  for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the twelve years  of  his presidency , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System .
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions ,  बिग  city machines , white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He also influenced the later creation of the United  राष्ट्र  and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by  विद्वानों  as one of the top three U.S. Presidents , along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A  उदार  Democrat , Roosevelt defined his ideological position as `` a little left of center . ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is used to  refer  to a committee  बना  up of members of both chambers of a bicameral legislature .
In  अन्य  contexts , it refers to a committee with members from  अधिक  than one organization  .
The regulation  of  prostitution in the United States is not among  the  enumerated powers of the  संघीय  government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution , it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to  परमिट   ,  prohibit , or otherwise regulate commercial sex , except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part  of  interstate commerce with laws  जैसे  the Mann Act .
In most states  ,  prostitution is considered  a  misdemeanor in the category of public order crime ,  a  crime that disrupts the order of a  जातियाँ  .
It was  at  one  समय  considered to be a vagrancy crime .
Currently , Nevada is the only state to allow  वेश्यालय  prostitution , the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes .
Only 8 counties currently contain active brothels .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area )  ,  Washoe County ( which contains  रेनो  ) , Carson City , Douglas County , and Lincoln County .
The other  काउंटी  theoretically allow brothel prostitution , but some of these counties currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering ,  ''  and living off of the proceeds of  a  prostitute remain illegal under Nevada law , as elsewhere in the country .
As with other countries , prostitution in the United States  can  be divided into three broad categories : street prostitution , brothel prostitution , and  अनुरक्षण   वेश्यावृति  .
The national flag of the United States of America , often simply referred to as the American  ध्वज  , consists of thirteen equal  आड़ा  stripes of red (  शीर्ष  and bottom ) alternating with white , with a  ब्लू  rectangle  in  the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small , white , five-pointed stars arranged in nine  ऑफसेट   आड़ा  rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with  पंक्ति  of  पाँच   सितारों  .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50  राज्य  of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence  इससे  the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the  पहला  states in the Union .
Nicknames for the flag include the `` Stars and Stripes '' , `` Old Glory `` ,  और   ``  The Star-Spangled Banner . ''
India is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight  राज्य   और  seven union territories .
The states and territories  हैं  further subdivided into districts  और  so on .
Congressional  जिले  for the 113th  संयुक्त  States Congress
2010  जनसांख्यिकी  change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts , starting in 2013 , as a result of the 2010 census .
2000 Census change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts , from 2003 to 2013 , as  a  result of the 2000 census  .
This is a complete list of congressional  जिले  for representation in the United States  हाउस  of Representatives .
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of districts  हैं  determined after each census , although in some  मामले  states have changed the boundaries more than once per census .
This list includes the 435 current and over 200 obsolete districts .
For example , since the 2000 census , Nebraska  रै  had three districts , but it  प्रयुक्त  to have as many  as  six .
In the first decade of the  twenty-first  century , Texas had 32 districts , but has since added four due to reapportionment  as  a result of the 2010 census  .
अन्य  states have lost districts since the number of congressional seats has  महरूम  set at 435 by  statute   .
Also  शामिल   यहाँ  are non-voting delegations : six current and four obsolete  .
The  सीमाएँ  of districts often shift  साथ  each redistricting .
Over time , the region and demographics represented in a district can change substantially .
furthermore  , districts sometimes retain  the  same boundaries while changing their district numbers .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 )  is  an American singer  ,  songwriter , record producer , actress , and philanthropist .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola , Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one  singles  on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following her  विवाह  to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions (  1991  ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) , and Merry Christmas ( 1994 )  ,  Carey was  स्थापित  as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single  ``  One Sweet Day `` , a duet with Boyz II Men , spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in  u.S.  chart history .
During the recording of the album  ,  Carey  began  to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into  हिप  hop .
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ) , at which time Carey had separated from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 , and signed a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records .
Before the release of her first  विशेषता  film Glitter ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was  hospitalized  for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception ,  वो  was bought out  of  her recording contract for $ 50  लाख  , which led to a decline in her career  .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002 , and after an unsuccessful period  ,  returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second  सिंगल  `` We Belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s , and was later named `` Song of the Decade ''  by   बिलबोर्ड  .
Carey  एकबार  again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in (  2009  )  ;  she was awarded the `` Breakthrough  प्रदर्शन  Award '' at the Palm  स्रोतों   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a  करियर  spanning over two decades  ,  Carey  रै  sold  अधिक  than 200  लाख  records worldwide , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as the  संसार  's best-selling recording  कलाकार  of the 1990s at the  संसार  Music Awards .
Carey was also named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in  2000  .
According to  the  Recording Industry Association  of   अमेरिका  , she is the third best-selling female artist in the United States , with 63.5 million certified albums .
साथ   the  release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ) , Carey  gained  her eighteenth number one single in the United States , more than any other solo artist .
In 2012 , Carey was ranked second on  vh1  's list of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music '' .
aside  from her commercial  accomplishments  , Carey has won five Grammy Awards , 17 World Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme  ''  by the Guinness World Records , she is famed for her five-octave vocal range ,  शक्ति  ,  melismatic  style and signature use of the whistle register .
Stratocumulus stratiformis  cumulogenitus
in  meteorology , a cloud is a visible mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in  the  atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body .
These suspended particles are  भी  known as aerosols .
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere are studied in the cloud physics branch of meteorology .
Two processes , possibly acting together , can lead to air becoming saturated ; cooling  the  air or adding water vapor to the air .
In general , precipitation will fall to the surface ; an exception is virga , which evaporates before reaching  the  surface .
The international cloud classification system is based on  the  fact clouds in their most basic forms can show free-convective upward growth like cumulus , appear in non-convective layered sheets  ऐसे  as stratus , or take the form of thin fibrous wisps , as  in  the case of cirrus .
Prefixes  हैं  used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in  ये  basic forms or to specify middle or high altitude ranges .
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection  कि  form mostly in uneven layers , cumulo- for complex highly-convective storm clouds , nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to  भारी  precipitation  ,  alto- for middle  बादल  ,  और  cirro- for high  बादल  ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure .
Whether or not a cloud  is  low , middle , or high level depends on  कैसा  far above the ground its base forms .
Cloud types with significant  लंबवत  extent can form in the low or middle altitude ranges depending on the moisture content of  the  air .
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names  due  to the  लोकप्रिय  adaptation of Luke Howard 's  बादल  categorization system , which began to spread in popularity during December 1802 .
Synoptic surface weather  observations  use code numbers to record  और   रपट  the types of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled observation time  आधारित  on the height and physical appearance of  the  clouds .
जबकि  a majority of  बादल   रूप  in Earth 's troposphere , there are occasions when  बादल  in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed .
These three  प्रमुख  layers  of  the atmosphere where clouds may be seen are collectively known as the  homosphere  .
Above this lies  the  thermosphere and exosphere ,  जिससे  together make up the heterosphere that marks the transition to outer space .
Clouds have been observed  on  other planets and  moons  within the Solar System , but , due to  उनके  different temperature characteristics  ,  they are composed of other substances such  as  methane  ,  ammonia , and sulfuric acid .
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas within the Houston–Sugar  land–baytown   महानगर   क्षेत्रफल  .
As of  the  2010 census , the population  थी  291,309 .
Its county seat is Galveston .
League City is the largest city in Galveston  काउंटी  in terms of population ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005  it  surpassed Galveston as  the  county 's  largest  city  .
Galveston County was founded in 1838 .
