A steam engine is a heat engine that performs mechanical work using steam as its  working  fluid .
Using boiling water to produce mechanical motion  goes  back about 2,000  सालो  , but early  डिवाइस  were  नहीं  practical .
Since the late 1700s steam engines have become a major  सोर्स   of   mechanical  power .
the  first applications were removing water  इससे  mines .
In 1781 James  वाट  patented a steam engine that  उत्पादित  continuous rotative motion .
These 10 hp engines  सक्रिय  a wide range of manufacturing machinery to be powered .
The engines  could  be sited anywhere that water and coal or wood fuel could be obtained .
By 1883 , engines that could provide 10,000 hp  था  become feasible .
Steam engines could also be applied  to  vehicles such as traction engines and the railway locomotives  जिससे  are commonly just called steam engines outside America .
the  stationary steam engine was a key component of the  औद्योगिक  Revolution , allowing factories to locate where water  शक्ति   थी  unavailable .
Today steam turbines generate about 90 % of the electric power in the United States using a variety of heat sources .
Steam engines are external combustion engines , where the working fluid is separate from the combustion products .
Non-combustion heat sources such as solar power  ,  nuclear power or  geothermal  energy may be used .
The ideal thermodynamic cycle used to analyze  इस   प्रक्रम  is called the  rankine  cycle .
In  the   साईकिल  , water  is  heated into steam  in  a boiler until it reaches a high pressure .
When  विस्तारित  through pistons or turbines , mechanical work is done .
The reduced-pressure steam is then condensed and pumped back into the boiler .
In general usage , the term steam  इंजन  can refer to either the integrated steam  पौधे  ( including  बायलरों  etc . ) such as railway steam locomotives and portable engines ,  or  may refer to the piston or turbine machinery alone  ,  as in the beam engine and stationary steam engine .
specialized  devices such as steam  hammers  and steam pile drivers are dependent  on  steam supplied from a separate boiler .
A mill engine from  stott  Park  bobbin  Mill , Cumbria , England
a  steam locomotive in Germany .This class of engine was built in 1942 – 1950 and operated commercially until 1988  .
`` Move Bitch '' (  संपादित  version  titled   ``  Move B***h  ''  or  बस   ``  Move '' ) is the third official single from rapper Ludacris  '  album Word of Mouf .
The single features Mystikal and I-20 .
The  सिंगल   पहुँचे  # 10 on the Billboard Hot  100  making it Ludacris  's  first top  टेन  hit  on  the chart , it also reached # 3 on Hot Rap Tracks  और  # 3 on  hot  R  &  B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks .
Puerto Rican reggaeton duo  maicol   &  Manuel sampled the song  on  ``  होय  Me Levanté '' on their 2002 release  yakaleo  .
The song is also featured in episode 2 , Series One of British teen comedy/drama Skins .
The song was also used  by  World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Montel Vontavious Porter during his short stint in Ring of Honor .
It was  भी  used for April Hunter in various  स्वतंत्र  circuits .
It was featured in the movie ATL starring T.I . , and '  hancock  , ' although in the latter ,  the  clean version was used .
A snippet of the song is played during traffic reports on many radio stations , usually carrying an urban/hip-hop  स्वरूप  .
Retired NBA star and now ESPN analyst Jalen Rose is featured in the music  वीडियो  .
The song has been covered by rock band Start Trouble  ,  on their album Every Solution  रै  Its Problem .
It was featured on British sitcom The Inbetweeners when the characters Jay and Neil took Will on a 'pussy patrol  '  in Jay 's  रेड  Nissan Micra .
It was sampled by Girl Talk on the first  track  of his album All Day , `` Oh No '' .
Elizabeth  ii  ( Elizabeth  एलेक्जेंड्रा  Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is  the   संवैधानिक  monarch of 16 sovereign states ,  ज्ञात  as the Commonwealth  realms  , and their territories  और  dependencies , and head of the 54-member  राष्ट्रमंडल  of Nations .
She is  परम्  Governor of the Church of England and ,  in  some of  उसके  realms , carries the title of Defender of  the  Faith as part of her full title .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head  of  the Commonwealth and queen regnant  of   सात   स्वतंत्र  Commonwealth countries :  the  United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New  जीलैंड   ,  South Africa  ,  Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992 , the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and  कुछ  realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint  लूसिया  , Saint Vincent and  the  Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda  और  Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign  of  years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth  थी   born   in  London and educated  privately  at home .
Her father acceded  to  the throne  as  George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his  bhai  Edward VIII , from which time she was the heir presumptive .
She began to undertake public duties during  the  Second World War , in which  वो  served  in  the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 , she married Prince Philip , Duke  of  Edinburgh , with whom she  रै   चार  children : Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward  .
Her coronation service took place in  1953  and was the  पहला   to  be  televised  .
The  महारानी  's  अनेक  historic visits and meetings include a state  विज़िट  to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms , such as devolution in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and the patriation of  the   कनाडाई  constitution .
Times  of  personal significance have included the births and marriages  of  her children , the births of her grandchildren , the investiture of the  प्रिंस  of Wales , and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver , Golden , and Diamond  jubilees  in 1977 , 2002 , and 2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included  the   परेशानियों  in Northern Ireland , the Falklands War , wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan  .
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which  शामिल  the death  of  her  पिता   at  56 , the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle ,  रब  Mountbatten  ,  the breakdown of her  children  's  विवाह   in  1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis )  ,  the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced severe  दबायें  criticism of the royal family and republican  sentiments  , but  support  for the  साम्राज्य  and her personal popularity remain high .
Christianity is the largest  धर्म  listed by Australians in  the  national census .
In  the  2011  जनसांख्यिकी  , 61.1 %  of   australians  were listed as Christian .
Australia has no official state religion and the Australian Constitution protects freedom of religion .
The presence of Christianity in Australia began with the arrival of the  पहला  Fleet of British convicts in 1788 .
The religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the national population at the time of the Federation  of  Australia in 1901 .
The Anglican  गिरिजाघर  of Australia ( formerly known as the Church of England in Australia )  remained  the largest denomination until 1986 , when it was surpassed  by  the Roman Catholic  गिरिजाघर  in Australia .
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance  among  some sections of the population have diversified  the   जनसांख्यिकी  of religion in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011 , the largest denominations were either Roman  कैथोलिक  ( 25 % ) or  anglican  ( 17 % ) , with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia .
post-war  immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches like the Greek  परंपरागत  Archdiocese of Australia  और  there are large and growing Pentecostal groups , such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church .
The  त्यौहार  of Easter and Christmas  हैं  public holidays in Australia  .
Around  a  quarter of students  attend  church schools and Christian organisations are leading  non-government  providers of health and welfare services through organisations like  कैथोलिक  Health Australia , Anglicare , UnitingCare Australia ,  the  Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society .
Historically significant Australian Christians have included Rev Dr John Dunmore  लैंग  , Saint Mary MacKillop , Catherine Helen Spence  ,  Pastor David Unaipon , the Reverend John Flynn  और  Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls .
High  प्रोफ़ाइल  contemporary Australian Christians include  :  Tim Costello Baptist minister  और  current CEO of World Vision  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Frank Brennan , Jesuit human rights lawyer , Cardinal George Pell , Catholic Archbishop of Sydney , Phillip Aspinall the current Anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane , Kevin Rudd , former Labor Prime Minister , and Tony Abbott , leader for the Federal Opposition  उदार   पार्टी  .
Charter creating Collegiate School ,  जिससे  became Yale College , October 9 , 1701
Yale University is  a  private Ivy League research university located in New Haven , Connecticut .
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of  कनेक्टिकट  , the university is the third-oldest institution of higher education in  the  United States .
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '' , the institution  traces  its  जड़ें  to 17th-century clergymen who sought to  स्थापित  a college to train clergy and political leaders for the colony .
In 1718 , the College  थी  renamed `` Yale College '' to honor  a  gift from Elihu Yale , a governor of the British East India Company .
In 1861 , the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first U.S.  संस्था  to award the PhD . Yale became a founding member of the Association of American Universities in 1900 .
Yale  कॉलेज  was  रूपांतरित  , beginning in the 1930s , through the establishment of residential  कॉलेजों  : 12 now exist and two more  हैं   नियोजित  .
Yale employs over  1,100  faculty to teach and advise about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and professional students  .
Almost  सब  tenured professors teach undergraduate courses , more than 2,000 of which are offered annually .
The University 's assets include  an  endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion  ,  the second-largest of any academic institution  in  the world .
Yale 's system  of  more than two dozen libraries holds 12.5  लाख  volumes .
49 Nobel Laureates have been  संबद्ध  with the University as students , faculty , and staff .
Yale has produced many notable alumni , including  पाँच  U.S. Presidents , 19 U.S.  परम्  Court Justices , and several foreign heads of state .
At the graduate level , Yale Law School , Yale School of Art , and  yale  School of Drama are consistently ranked  the  top programs in their field .
Yale Law School is the most selective law school in the United States .
Yale students compete intercollegiately as  the  Yale Bulldogs in the NCAA Division I Ivy League  .
The oldest intercollegiate athletic event in the United States  is  the Yale-Harvard regatta .
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush  ''  or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub from the family Asteraceae , which grows in arid and semi-arid conditions  ,   throughout  a range of  ठंडा   मरुस्थल  , steppe ,  और  mountain  habitats  in the  intermountain  West of North America .
The vernacular name  ``  sagebrush ''  is  also used for several related members  of  the genus Artemisia , such as California Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ) .
Big Sagebrush and  अन्य  Artemisia species are the dominant plants across large portions of the Great Basin , covering some 422,000 square miles in 11 western U.S. & Canadian states .
It is the state flower of Nevada .
Sagebrush provides food and habitat for a  किस्में  of species , such as sage grouse , pronghorn antelope ,  धूसर  vireo , pygmy rabbit , and mule deer .
Big  sagebrush  was used as  an  herbal  आयुर्विज्ञान  by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North America—especially for preventing infection in wounds , stopping internal  bleeding  , and treating headaches  और   जुकाम  .
Chemically , the  क्रियाशील  medicinal constituents include camphor , terpenoids , and tannins .
Several major threats  मौजूद  to sage brush ecosystems ,  सहित  human settlements ,  परिवर्तन  to agricultural land ,  पशुधन  grazing , invasive plant  प्रजाति  , wildfires , and climate change .
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email  सेवा  offered by the American search  इंजन  company Yahoo !
it  was launched in 1997 ,  और  , according to comScore , Yahoo ! Mail  is  the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million  उपयोक्ता  as of December 2012 .
Currently , Yahoo ! offers three versions of  याहू  ! Mail .
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail Classic '' continues the availability of the original interface introduced in  1997  .
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax interface , drag-and-drop features  ,  improved search functionality , keyboard shortcuts , address auto-complete , tabs  ,  and other updated features .
In October 2010  ,  Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! Mail , which included  सुधार  to  the  design , performance , search functionality , and Facebook integration .
In May 2011 , beta testing  लिये  the new version stopped , and it became the default interface for  याहू   !  Mail .
In early 2008 , Yahoo ! began  offering  unlimited mail storage to its users in response to heated competition in the free web-mail market segment .
On June  27  , 2009 , Yahoo  !  Messenger was  एकीकृत  with Yahoo ! Mail .
Tacoma ( , ) is a mid-sized urban port city and the county seat of Pierce County , Washington , United States .
The city is on Washington 's  puget  Sound , southwest of Seattle , northeast of the state capital , Olympia ,  और  northwest of Mount Rainier  नेशनल   पार्क  .
The population was 198,397 , according  to  the 2010 census .
Tacoma is the  second-largest  city in the Puget Sound area and the third largest in the state .
Tacoma also serves as the  बीच  of business activity for the South Sound region  ,  which has a population of around 1 million people  .
Tacoma adopted its name after the nearby Mount Rainier , originally called  माउंट  Tahoma .
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the  क्षेत्रफल   थी  chosen to be the  पश्चिमी  terminus of the Northern Pacific Railroad in the late 19th century .
The decision of the railroad was influenced by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbor ,  शुरुआत   खाड़ी  .
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's  motto   became  `` When rails meet sails . ''
Today Commencement Bay serves  the  Port of Tacoma ,  a  center of international trade on the Pacific Coast and Washington state 's largest port .
Like most  सेंट्रल  cities ,  टकोमा  suffered a  prolonged  decline in the mid-20th century as a result  of  suburbanization and divestment  .
Since the 1990s , developments in the downtown core include the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Washington Tacoma ; Tacoma Link , the first modern electric light rail service in  the  state ; the state 's highest  घनत्व  of art and history museums ; and a  लौटी  urban waterfront , the Thea  foss  Waterway .
साथ  a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad workers  of  the  19th  century , to the  longshoremen  of the 20th century , to the Labor Ready workers  of  today — Tacoma has long  महरूम  known for its rough , gritty image .
A song about Tacoma , `` Thrice All American '' ,  by  American singer-songwriter and former resident Neko Case , describes it as `` a dusty old jewel in the South Puget  ध्वनि  / where the factories churn / and the  timber  's all cut down '' .
Tacoma-Pierce County  रै  been named one of the most livable areas in the country .
Tacoma was also recently listed as the 19th most walkable city in the country .
In contrast , the city is also ranked as the most stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey .
In 2006  ,  women 's magazine Self named Tacoma  the  `` Most Sexually Healthy City '' in the United States .
In 2012 ,  the  Advocate gave Tacoma the title of ``  gayest   नगर  in America '' , in part because of the large diversity of public  कार्यालयों  held , and Washington State passing  a  bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to  निकाह  .
Tacoma is famous for the 1940 collapse of the Tacoma Narrows Bridge .
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego metropolitan area ,  the  seventh  largest  city in Southern California ,  the  fourteenth largest city in  the  State of California , and the 77th-largest city in the United  राज्य  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 243,916 as of the 2010 census .
स्तिथ  just from downtown San Diego and from the Mexican border in the South Bay region of the  महानगर  area , the city is at the center of one of the richest  आर्थिक  and culturally diverse zones in the  संयुक्त  States .
Chula Vista  is  so named because of its scenic location  between  the San Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills .
संस्थापित  in  the  early 19th  सदी  , fast population growth has recently been observed in the city .
As the second largest city in  सैन  Diego County , Chula Vista has quickly  become  a destination popular to many tourists .
Located in the city is  एक   of  America 's few year-round United States Olympic Training  centers  and popular tourist destinations include Cricket Wireless Amphitheater , the Chula Vista marina , and the Chula Vista  प्रकृति  Center .
metes  and bounds is a system or method of describing land , real property ( in contrast to personal property ) or real estate .
The system has been used in England for many centuries , and is still used there in  the   परिभाषा  of general  सीमाएँ   .
By custom , it was applied in the original Thirteen Colonies  कि  became the United States , and in many other land jurisdictions  आधारित  on English common law .
Typically the system uses physical features of the local geography , along with directions and distances ,  to  define and  describe  the boundaries of a parcel of land .
the  boundaries are described in a running prose  स्टाइल  , working around the parcel in sequence , from a point of beginning , returning back to the same  पाइंट  ; compare with the oral  अनुष्ठान  of beating the bounds .
It may include references to  अन्य  adjoining  parcels  ( and their owners ) , and it , in  फेरे  , could also be referred to in later surveys .
At the time the description is compiled , it may have been marked on  the  ground with  स्थाई  monuments placed where there were no  उपयुक्त  natural monuments .
The term `` metes ''  refers  to a boundary defined by the measurement of each straight run , specified  by  a distance between the  टर्मिनल  points , and an orientation or direction .
A direction may be  a  simple compass bearing , or a precise orientation determined by accurate survey methods .
The term  ``  bounds ''  refers  to a more general boundary description ,  ऐसे  as along a certain watercourse , a stone wall , an adjoining public road way , or an existing building  .
The system is  प्रायः  used to define larger pieces of  प्रॉपर्टी  ( e.g . farms ) , and political subdivisions ( e.g . town boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or would  be  far too expensive , or previously designated boundaries can  be  incorporated into the description .
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist  और   गणितज्ञ  who is widely regarded as  एक  of the  सबसे  influential  वैज्ञानिकों  of all time and as a  कुंजी  figure in the scientific revolution .
His book Philosophiæ  naturalis  Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical  सिद्धान्त  of Natural Philosophy '' ) , first published in 1687 , laid the foundations for most of classical mechanics .
Newton also made seminal contributions  to  optics and shares  क्रेडिट  with Gottfried Leibniz for the invention  of  the  infinitesimal  calculus .
न्यूटन  's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation that dominated scientists ' view of the physical universe for the  अगला  three centuries  .
It also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the Earth and that of celestial bodies could be described by  the  same principles .
by  deriving  कॅप्लर  's laws of planetary motion from his mathematical description of gravity , Newton removed the last doubts about the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos .
Newton built the first practical reflecting telescope and developed a theory of colour based on the observation that a prism decomposes white  लाइट  into the many colours of the visible spectrum .
he  also formulated an empirical  विधि  of cooling and  पढ़ाई  the speed of sound .
In addition to his work on the calculus , as a mathematician Newton  contributed  to the study of power series ,  generalised  the binomial theorem to non-integer exponents , and developed Newton 's method for approximating the  जड़ें  of a function .
न्यूटन  was a fellow of Trinity College and the second Lucasian Professor of Mathematics  at  the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Cambridge .
He was  a   devout   लकिन  unorthodox Christian  और  , unusually for  a  member of  the  Cambridge faculty , he refused to take holy orders in the Church of England  ,  perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine  of  trinitarianism .
In addition to his work  on  the mathematical sciences , Newton also dedicated much of his time to the study of alchemy and biblical chronology , but  सबसे  of his work in those areas remained unpublished until long  बाद  his death .
In his later life , Newton became president of the Royal Society .
He also served the British government as Warden and Master of the Royal Mint .
Prof. Walter Lewin explains Newton 's law of  gravitation  in MIT course 8.01
Satellites and projectiles all obey Newton  's   विधि   of   gravitation
Newton 's law of  सार्वभौमिक  gravitation  राज्य  that every point mass in the universe attracts every other point mass with a force that is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between  उन्हें   .
( Separately it was shown that large spherically symmetrical masses attract and are attracted as if  सब  their mass were concentrated at their  centers  . )
This is a general  शारीरिक  law derived from empirical observations by what Newton called induction .
it  is  a  part of classical mechanics and was formulated in Newton  's  work Philosophiæ  naturalis  Principia Mathematica  (  `` the Principia '' ) , first published  on  5 July 1687 .
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal Society , Robert Hooke made a  अर्जी  that Newton had obtained  the  inverse square law  इससे  him – see History section below . )
In modern language , the law  राज्य  the following:
Assuming SI units , F  is  measured  in  newtons ( N ) , m1 and m2 in  गामा  ( kg )  ,  r in meters ( m ) , and the  निरंतर  G is approximately equal to .
The value of the constant G was first accurately determined  इससे  the results of the Cavendish experiment conducted by  the   अंग्रेजों  scientist Henry Cavendish  in  1798 , although Cavendish did not himself  गणना  a numerical value for G .
This experiment was also the first test  of  Newton 's theory of gravitation between masses in the  प्रयोगशाला  .
It  took  place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia and 71 years after  न्यूटन  's death , so none  of  Newton 's calculations could use the value of G ; instead he  could  only calculate a force relative to  another  force .
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of electrical forces , which  is  used to calculate the magnitude of electrical force between  दो  charged bodies .
Both are  inverse-square  laws , in which force is inversely proportional to the square of the distance between the bodies .
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses , and the electrostatic constant in  प्लेस  of the gravitational constant .
न्यूटन  's law has since been superseded by Einstein 's theory of general relativity , but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity .
Relativity is required only when there is a need for extreme precision , or when dealing with gravitation for extremely  विशाल  and dense objects  .
White and  रेड  flags , representing Iraqi and American deaths , sit in  the  grass quadrangle of The  घाटी  Library on the  corvallis  , Oregon  ,  campus of  ऑरेगॉन  State University .
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( not related to Iraq Body Count project ) , the flags aim to ``  उठाएँ  awareness of the human cost  of  the Iraq War . ''
( May 2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of Iraq , and continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq , as well as the activities of the various armed groups operating in the country ) have come in many forms , and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly .
The table below summarizes various estimates of the Iraqi casualty figures .
For troops in  the  U.S.-led multinational coalition , the death toll is carefully tracked and updated daily , and  the  names and photographs of those killed in action as well  as   in  accidents  have  been published  widely  .
A total of 4,486 U.S. soldiers were killed in Iraq  between  2003 and 2012  .
regarding  the Iraqis , however ,  सूचना   on  both military and civilian casualties is  दोनो  less precise and less consistent .
Estimates of casualty levels are available from reporters on the scene , from officials of involved organizations , and from groups  कि  summarize information on  incidents  reported in the news media .
The word `` casualties `` in its most general sense includes  the  injured as well as the dead .
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely  ,  partly because it is not obvious  कया  should  be  counted :  चाहिए  only those  चोटों  serious enough  to  put a soldier out of  आयोग  be included  ?
Do illnesses or  चोटों  caused by accidents count , or should the  फ़ोकस  be  प्रतिबंधित  to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using  अलग  definitions may  arrive  at very  अलग  numbers , and sometimes  the   precise   परिभाषा  is not clearly  निर्दिष्ट  .
asalto  al coche ( Robbery of the coach ) , by Francisco  de  Goya
A highwayman  थी  a thief and brigand who preyed on travellers .
इस  type  of  outlaw usually travelled  और  robbed by horse , as compared to a  footpad   जो  travelled and robbed on  पैर  .
Mounted robbers were widely considered to be socially superior to footpads .
Such robbers operated in Great Britain and Ireland from the Elizabethan era until the early  19th  century .
The word highwayman is first known to be used in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms  शामिल  `` knights  of  the road '' and ``  सज्जनों  of the road . ''
Two terms  लागू  to 19th-century North American highwaymen were road agents in some instances for mountain bandits while in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based  ruffians  .
In  the  same time period in Australia ,  वे  were  ज्ञात  as bushrangers .
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson , Jr. ( born August 14 , 1959 ) is a  रिटायर्ड   अमरीकी  professional basketball  खिलाड़ी   जो   निभाई  point guard for the  लॉस  Angeles Lakers  of  the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) .
After winning championships in high school and college , Johnson was selected first overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers .
he  won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in his  रुकी  season , and won four more championships with the Lakers during the 1980s .
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV , but returned to play in the  1992  All-Star Game , winning the All-Star MVP Award .
बाद  protests from his fellow players , he retired again for four years , but returned in 1996 , at age 36 , to play 32 games for the  लेकर्स  before retiring for the third and final  समय  .
Johnson 's career achievements include three  एनबीए  MVP  पुरस्कार  , nine NBA Finals appearances , twelve All-Star games  ,  and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations .
He led the league in regular-season assists four times , and is the NBA 's all-time leader in average assists per  खेल  , at 11.2 .
Johnson was  a  member of the `` Dream Team `` , the  u.S.  basketball  टोली  that won the  ओलम्पिक  gold medal in 1992 .
बाद  leaving the NBA in 1992 , Johnson formed  the  Magic Johnson  all-stars  , a barnstorming team that travelled around the  संसार  playing exhibition games .
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA  इतिहास  in  1996  , and enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2002 .
He was rated the  महानतम  NBA point guard of all time by ESPN in 2007 .
His friendship and rivalry with Boston  सेल्टिक्स  star Larry Bird  ,  whom he faced in  the  1979 NCAA finals  और  three NBA championship series , were well documented .
Since his retirement , Johnson  रै   महरूम  an advocate for  hiV/  AIDS  रोकथाम  and safe sex , as well as an entrepreneur , philanthropist , broadcaster and motivational speaker .
Johnson was a part-owner of the  लेकर्स  for several years , and was part  of  a group that purchased the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012 .
allium   कोशिकाएं   in  different phases of the cell cycle
The cells of eukaryotes ( left  )  and prokaryotes ( right )
The cell is the basic structural , functional and biological unit of  सब   ज्ञात  living organisms .
It is  the  smallest unit of life that is  वर्गीकृत  as  a  living thing ( except virus , which  consists  only from DNA/RNA covered  by   प्रोटीन  and lipids ) , and is often called the building  ब्लाक  of life .
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane , which contains many biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids .
Organisms  can  be classified as unicellular ( consisting of a single cell  ;  including most bacteria ) or multicellular ( including plants and animals ) .
While  the  number of cells in plants and animals varies from species to species , Humans contain about 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells .
Most plant and animal cells are between 1 and 100  micrometres  and therefore are visible  तभी  under the microscope .
The cell was discovered by Robert Hooke in 1665 .
The cell theory ,  पहला  developed in 1839  by  Matthias  jakob  Schleiden  और   theodor  Schwann , states  कि   सब  organisms are composed of one or more cells , that all cells come from preexisting cells , that vital functions of an organism occur within cells , and that  सब  cells contain the hereditary information necessary  लिये  regulating cell  कृत्यों   और   लिये  transmitting information to the next generation of cells .
Cells emerged on planet Earth  at  least 4.0–4.3 billion years ago .
The word cell comes from the Latin  गर्भगृह  , meaning `` small room '' .
The descriptive  पद  for the smallest  जीना  biological structure was coined by Robert Hooke in a book he published in 1665 when he compared  the  cork cells he saw through his microscope to the small  कक्ष  monks  जिया  in .
Grecian Formula is a men 's hair coloring product in the United States .
Canada  और  Europe previously banned the product because of  इसके  use of lead acetate .
A motor scooter 's front with an impractical number and variety of headlamps , added  लिये  decorative purposes
A headlamp  is  a lamp  संलग्न  to the front of a vehicle to light the road ahead .
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile  आयु  , spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety  प्रशासन  states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark , despite only 25 % of traffic  यात्राएं  during  अंधेरा  .
While  it  is common for the term headlight to be used interchangeably  in   अनौपचारिक  discussion , headlamp is the term for the device itself  ,  while  हेडलाइट  properly refers to the  बीम   of  light produced and distributed  by  the  यंत्र  .
Other  वाहनों  , such as trains and aircraft , are required to have headlamps  .
Bicycle headlamps are often  प्रयुक्त  on  साइकिल  ,  और  are required in some  jurisdictions  .
They can be powered by a battery or a small  विद्युत  generator on the wheel .
Additionally  ऑटोमोटिव  night vision systems work to supplement headlamps .
Women 's  अधिकारों  are the rights and entitlements  claimed  for women and girls of many societies worldwide .
In some  स्थान   ये  rights are institutionalized or supported by law , local custom , and behaviour , whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions of human rights through claims of an inherent historical and  परंपरागत  bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of  मेन  and boys .
मुद्दे  commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include , though are not limited  to  , the right : to bodily integrity  और   स्वायत्तता  ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to fair wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ;  to   serve  in the  सैन्य   or  be conscripted ; to enter  into   विधिक  contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious  अधिकारों  .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( , (  born  November 13 , 1955 ) is an American comedienne  ,  actress , singer-songwriter ,  राजनैतिक  activist , author and talk show host .
Goldberg  बना  her film debut in The Color  जामुनी  ( 1985 ) , playing Celie , a  mistreated  black woman in the Deep South .
She received a nomination for the Academy Award  लिये  Best Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film .
In 1990 , she played Oda Mae Brown , a wacky psychic  helping  a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save  उसके  lover ( Demi Moore  )  in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won  उसके  a second Golden Globe  और  an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ;  इस  made Goldberg  तभी  the second  ब्लैक  woman in the history of  the  Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel  जो  won for Gone With  the  Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 , The Player , Made in America , How Stella Got Her Groove Back , Girl ,  बाधित  and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The  अगला  Generation , as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash , and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee , as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The  शेर  King .
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television  .
वो  was co-producer of the popular game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004 .
She has been the moderator  of  the daytime talk show The View since 2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two Daytime  emmys  , two Golden Globes , a Tony ( for  उत्पादन  , not acting ) ,  और  an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg  रै  a British Academy Film  पुरस्कार  , four  लोगों  's Choice Awards  ,  and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is one of the few entertainers who have  जीती  an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar , and  टोनी  Award .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; )  is  an `` unincorporated  not-for-profit  association ''  जिससे  operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs , of which  सात  are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New York City , the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the world , and one of the major professional sports leagues in  the   संयुक्त  States and Canada .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest professional sports trophy in North America , is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season .
The  लीग  was organized  on  November 26 , 1917 , in Montreal , Quebec , Canada , after the suspension  of  operations of its predecessor  संगठन  ,  the  National Hockey Association ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started with four teams and , through a  श्रेणी  of expansions , contractions , and relocations , the league is now composed of 30 active franchises .
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was  कनाडा  , although  the  league has now been  binational  since 1924  जब  it  विस्तारित   into  the United States .
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season  ,  the league resumed  खेल  under a new  सामूहिक  bargaining agreement  कि  included a salary cap .
In  2009  ,  the  NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships , attendance , and  टेलीविज़न  audiences .
The NHL draws many highly  skilled  players from all over the world and currently has players from about  20  different countries .
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL , over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and European players  have  increased both  क्युकी  of the NHL 's continued expansion from  छह  to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European  खिलाड़ी  .
Maggots feeding on carrion .
A  maggot  is  the  larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran flies , such as houseflies , cheese flies , and blowflies , rather than larvae of the Nematocera , such as mosquitoes and Crane flies .
`` Maggot ''  is  not a technical term and should not be taken as such ; in many standard textbooks of entomology  it  does  नहीं  appear in  the  index  at  all .
In many  non-technical  texts the term is used for insect larvae  in  general  .
Other sources have coined  उनके  own definitions ; for example  :  ``  ...
The term applies to a grub when all trace of limbs has disappeared ... '' and `` ... Applied to the footless larvae of Dipters . ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide  महत्व  in ecology and medicine ; among other roles , various species are prominent in recycling carrion and garbage  ,  attacking crops and  foodstuffs  , spreading microbial infections , and causing myiasis .
Herod ( , Hordos , Greek : ,  hērōdēs  ) , also known as Herod the Great ( 73/74 BCE – 4  bce   in  Jericho ) , was a Roman client king  of  Judea .
His epithet of `` the Great  ''   is  widely disputed  as  he is described as `` a  madman  who murdered his  अपना  family and a great many rabbis `` .
He is also known for his  colossal  building projects in Jerusalem and elsewhere , including his expansion of the Second Temple in Jerusalem  (  sometimes referred to  as  Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at  caesarea  Maritima .
Important details of his biography are gleaned from  the  works of the 1st century  ce  Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius .
The Romans  बना  Herod 's  बेटे  , Herod Archelaus , ethnarch of Judea , Samaria , and Idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6  ce  , referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea .
Archelaus was judged incompetent by the Roman  सम्राट  Augustus who then combined Samaria ,  judea  proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age  41  .
Herod 's other son Herod Antipas was tetrarch of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE  .
ABO blood group antigens present on  रेड  blood cells and IgM antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most  महत्वपूर्ण  blood type system ( or blood group system ) in  इंसान  blood transfusion .
the  associated anti-A  और  anti-B antibodies are usually IgM antibodies , which are usually produced in the first years of life  by  sensitization to  पर्यावरणीय  substances such as  खाना  , bacteria  ,  and  वाइरस  .
ABO blood types are also present in some other animals  ,  for example apes such as chimpanzees , bonobos , and gorillas .

Northville is an affluent city located in and divided by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan .
The area is a suburb of Metropolitan Detroit .
The population was 5,970 at the 2010 census .
Most of the city is  in  Oakland County , and is surrounded by the  नगर  of Novi .
The Wayne County portion is surrounded by Northville Township .
Northville is served by Northville Public Schools .
The city is located northeast of Ann Arbor and northwest of Detroit .

She has appeared in numerous  स्टेज  plays and musicals , feature films , and many television programs .
She  is  known for her  प्रदर्शन   of  `` The Ladies Who Lunch '' in Stephen Sondheim  's  1970 musical Company , her 2001 one-woman show ,  ऐलेन   stritch  at  स्वतंत्रता  , and recently  लिये  her role as Jack Donaghy 's mother  colleen  on NBC 's 30 Rock .
She  रै  been nominated  लिये  the Tony Award five times in various categories .
stritch  is also a three-time Emmy Award winner .
Misfits is a  अंग्रेजों   विज्ञान  fiction comedy-drama television show about  a  group of young offenders sentenced to work  in  a community service programme , where they  obtain  supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm .
the  series opened in 2009 and is currently ongoing .
Antonia Thomas , Iwan Rheon ,  लॉरेन  Socha ,  नाथन  Stewart-Jarrett , and Robert Sheehan are introduced as Alisha  डैनियल्स  , Simon Bellamy , Kelly Bailey , Curtis Donovan , and Nathan Young respectively .
Sheehan left  बाद  the second series , replaced in the third by Joseph Gilgun  as  Rudy Wade  .
After the fourth series was announced Rheon , Thomas and Socha had left their roles and  होता  be replaced by new characters Karla Crome , Nathan McMullen and Matt Stokoe , as Jess  ,  Finn  और   एलेक्स  respectively .
Midway through the fourth series , Stewart-Jarrett left while Natasha O'Keeffe joined the  डाल  as Abbey Smith .
On 19 March 2013 , Channel 4 announced at a press event that  वे   have   नवीनीकृत  Misfits for  a  fifth and final series containing 8 episodes .
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10 , 1969 ) is a former American football quarterback who spent the majority  of   उसके  career with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football  लीग  ( NFL ) .
He was a 20-year veteran of the  एनएफएल  , having played  क्वार्टरबैक  for the Atlanta Falcons ( 1991 ) , Green  खाड़ी  Packers ( 1992 – 2007 ) ,  नई  York Jets ( 2008 ) and  मिनेसोटा  Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ) .
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw for over 70,000 yards , over 500 touchdowns , over 300 interceptions , over 6,000 completions , and over  10,000  pass  कोशिशें   .
Favre started at the quarterback position for the University of Southern Mississippi for four years before being selected in  the  second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ) .
He  थी  traded to Green Bay on February 10 , 1992 ,  लिये  the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL Draft .
Favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in the fourth game of the  1992  season , stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski , and started  प्रत्येक  game through the 2007  ऋतु  .
He  थी  traded to the New York Jets and started at quarterback for the 2008 season before signing with  the  Vikings  on  August 18 , 2009 as their starting quarterback .
he  made an NFL record 297 consecutive starts ( 321 including playoffs ) .
he  is the only player to win the AP Most Valuable Player three consecutive times  (  1995–97 ) .
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995  ,  1996 , 1997 , 2002 , 2003 , 2004 , 2007 , 2009 ) , five NFC Championship  खेल  ( 1995 , 1996 ,  1997  , 2007 , 2009 )  ,  and two Super Bowl appearances ( Super  कटोरी  XXXI , Super Bowl XXXII ) , winning one ( Super  कटोरी  XXXI ) .
He holds many  एनएफएल  records , including  सबसे  career touchdown passes , most career passing  गज  , most career pass completions , most career pass attempts  ,  most career interceptions thrown  ,  most consecutive starts by a player , most consecutive starts by a quarterback , most  करियर   victories  as a  starting  quarterback , most sacked  ,   और  most fumbles .
He is also referred to by his nickname `` The Gunslinger '' .

The  संसार  Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or  w3  , commonly known as the web )  ,  is a system of interlinked  हाइपरटेक्स्ट  documents accessed via the Internet .
With  a  web browser , one can view web pages that may contain text , images , videos , and other multimedia , and navigate between them via hyperlinks .
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE , British engineer , computer scientist  और  at that time employee of the CERN , Sir  टिम  Berners-Lee  ,  now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote a proposal  in  March 1989 for what would eventually  become  the World Wide  वेब  .
At  cern  ,  a  European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France  और   स्विट्ज़रलैंड  , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of  नोड  in which  the  user can browse at will '' , and they  सरेआम  introduced the project in December of the same year .
Wayne Lyman  मोर्स  ( October 20 , 1900July 22 , 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from Oregon , United States , known for his proclivity for opposing his parties '  नेतृत्व  , and specifically for his opposition  to  the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds  .
Born in Madison  ,  Wisconsin  ,  and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University  of  Minnesota Law School  ,  Morse moved to Oregon in 1930 and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law .
During World War II he  थी  elected to  the   संयुक्त  States Senate as a Republican  ;   he  became  an  Independent after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in  1952  .
While an independent  ,  he set a record for performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate .
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955 , and was reelected twice while a member  of  that party .
Morse made a brief run for the Democratic Party 's presidential nomination in 1960 .
A few years later ,  मोर्स  was one of only two Senators who opposed the Gulf  of  Tonkin Resolution , which authorized the president to take  सैन्य  action in Vietnam without a  घोषणा  of war .
He continued to speak out against the war  in  the ensuing years , and lost his 1968 bid for reelection to Bob Packwood , who  criticized  his strong opposition  to  the war .
Morse made two more bids for reelection to the Senate before  उसके  death in 1974  .
in  parliamentary procedure , a motion to table has two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States , to table usually means the  to  lay [ the topic ]  on  the table  or  to move for postponement of consideration ; a proposal  to  suspend consideration of a  स्थगित  motion .
much  less often , it means a motion to `` put on the table '' : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) , a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world .
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom , to table  अर्थात्  to move to place [ the topic ] upon the table ( or to move to place on the table  )  : a proposal to  शुरू   विचार  ( or reconsideration )  of  a proposal .
Both the American and the British dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to lay [ the  टॉपिक  ] on the  तालिका  or to cause [ the topic ] to lie on the table .
The  अंतर  is the idea of what  the  table is for ,  कि  of a shelf off to  the   पक्ष   ,  or an active work bench .
The British meaning has the sense of the table as being an active work bench , with the  टॉपिक  being the center of attention , considered and discussed by all until it  can  be resolved , at which point it is taken off the 'table ' .
The American sense is that the table is like that of a shelf , archive , or long-term storage device , where the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there .
Toy Story 3  is  a 2010 American 3D computer animated comedy-drama  थाना  film , and the third installment in the Toy Story series .
It was produced by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed  by  Walt Disney Pictures .
Directed by Lee Unkrich , the film was released worldwide from June through October in Disney Digital 3-D , RealD ,  और  IMAX 3D .
खिलौना  Story 3 was also the first film  to  be released theatrically with Dolby Surround 7.1 sound  .
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt ,  जबकि  Unkrich wrote the story along with John Lasseter and Andrew Stanton , respectively director and  co-writer   of  the  दो   पहला  films .
The plot focuses on the toys Woody , Buzz Lightyear , and their friends dealing with an uncertain future as their owner , Andy , prepares to leave for college .
Actors Tom Hanks , Tim Allen  ,  Joan Cusack , Don Rickles , Estelle Harris , John Ratzenberger , Wallace  shawn  ,  जेफ़  Pidgeon , Jodi Benson , R. Lee Ermey , John Morris , and Laurie Metcalf reprised their voice-over roles  इससे  the previous  films  .
जिम  Varney , who played Slinky Dog in the first two films  ,  and Joe Ranft , who portrayed Lenny and Wheezy ,  दोनो  died before production began  on   खिलौना  Story 3 .
The  भूमिका  of Slinky Dog was taken  over  by Blake Clark ( a friend of Varney ) , while Ranft 's characters and various  अन्य  were written out of the story .
New characters include performances by Ned Beatty , Timothy Dalton , Kristen Schaal , Bonnie Hunt , Whoopi Goldberg , Jeff Garlin  ,   रिचर्ड  Kind , and Michael Keaton .
The feature  broke  Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North American gross for an animated  फिल्मी  unadjusted for inflation , and  a  big opening with  an  unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189  .
It is also the  highest-grossing  opening weekend for a Pixar film , as well as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a film to have opened in the month of June .
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010 , both in  the  United States and Canada , and worldwide .
In early August , it became Pixar  's  highest-grossing film at the  उत्तर  American box office ( surpassing Finding Nemo ) , and the highest-grossing animated film of all time worldwide ( surpassing Shrek 2  )  ; later that  माह  , Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide .
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing film  of  all time  .
Toy Story 3 was nominated for five Academy Awards , including Best Picture , Best Adapted Screenplay , and Best Sound Editing .
It was the third animated  फिल्मी  ( after Beauty  और  the Beast and  up  ) to be nominated for Academy Award for Best Picture .
It won the awards for Best Animated Feature and Best Original Song  .
जॉन  Levell Starks ( born  अगस्त   10  , 1965 )  is  an American retired professional basketball shooting guard .
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190 pounds during his NBA playing career  .
हालांकि  he was not drafted in the 1988  एनबीए  Draft after attending four colleges in his native Oklahoma , including Oklahoma State University , he gained fame while playing for the New York Knicks of  the  National Basketball Association in the 1990s  .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory  कार्ड  format for use in portable devices , such as mobile phones , digital  कैमरे  , GPS navigation devices , and tablet computers .
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD  कार्ड  Association ( SDA ) .
sd  technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of product categories and more than 8,000 models  .
The Secure Digital format  शामिल  four card families available  in  three different form factors .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity  (  SDSC ) , the High-Capacity ( SDHC ) , the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ) , and the SDIO  ,  which combines  input/output  functions with  आंकड़ा  storage .
The three form factors are the original size , the `` mini '' size , and  the   ``  micro '' size (  देखिए  illustration ) .
There are  अनेक  combinations of  रूप  factors and  यंत्र  families .
Electrically passive adapters  allow  the use of a smaller card in a  मेजबान  device built to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of  the  specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards , but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A  नए  card may offer greater capacity than the host device can handle .
A newer card may use a file system the host  यंत्र  can not navigate .
Use  of   an   sdio  card requires the host  यंत्र  be designed  लिये   the  input/output functions the card provides .
The organization of  the  card was changed starting with the SDHC family .
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB before the SDA had standardized a method of doing so .
the  SDA uses  अनेक  trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and  assure  users of compatibility .
Hugh John Mungo Grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a British actor and film  निर्माता  .
He has received a Golden Globe  ,  a BAFTA , and an Honorary César .
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25 theatrical releases worldwide  .
Grant achieved  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  stardom after appearing in Richard Curtis 's successful Four Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ) .
He used this breakthrough  भूमिका  as a frequent cinematic persona during the 1990s , delivering comic performances in mainstream films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting  हिल  ( 1999 ) .
By  the   फेरे  of the 21st  सदी  , he had established himself as a leading man skilled with a satirical comic talent .
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ) , About A Boy ( 2002  )  , Love Actually  (  2003 ) , and American Dreamz ( 2006 ) .
He later played against type with multiple cameo roles in the epic  नाटक  film Cloud Atlas  (   2012  ) .
Within  the   फिल्मी  industry , Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches his roles like a character actor , and attempts to make his acting appear  spontaneous  .
Hallmarks of his  कॉमिक  skills include a nonchalant touch of irony / sarcasm and studied physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions .
The entertainment media 's  कवरेज  of Grant 's life off the big screen has often  निष्प्रभ  his work as  a  thespian .
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the profession of acting , and in his disdain towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media .
In a career  spanning  30  सालो  , Grant has repeatedly claimed that acting is not a true calling  लकिन  just a job he fell into .
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 AD ) was  an  imperial dynasty  of  China ,  preceded  by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD  )  .
It was founded by the rebel  नेता  Liu Bang , known posthumously as  सम्राट  Gaozu of Han .
It was  briefly  interrupted by the  xin   राजवंश  ( 9–23 AD  )  of  the  former regent Wang Mang .
This interregnum separates the Han into two periods : the Western Han ( 206 BC – 9 AD ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD )  .
Spanning  over  four centuries , the period of the Han Dynasty is considered a golden age in  चाइनीज  history .
To this day ,  चीन  's  बहुमत  ethnic group refers to itself  as  the `` Han people '' and the  चाइनीज  script is referred to as  ``  Han characters `` .
The Han Empire was divided into areas directly controlled  by  the central government , known as commanderies  ,  and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms .
ये  kingdoms  धीरे  lost all vestiges of their independence , particularly following the Rebellion of the Seven States .
The Xiongnu , a nomadic confederation which dominated the eastern Eurasian Steppe , defeated  the  Han army in battle in 200  bc  .
Following the defeat , a political marriage alliance was negotiated in  जिससे  the Han became the  de  facto  अवर  partner .
When , despite the treaty  ,  the Xiongnu  जारी  to raid  हान  borders , Emperor Wu of Han (  r.  141–87 BC )  शुभारम्भ  several military campaigns against them .
The ultimate Han victory in these  युद्धों  eventually forced the  xiongnu  to accept vassal status as Han tributaries .
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the vast trade network known as the Silk Road , which  पहुँचे  as far as the Mediterranean world .
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into two competing nations , the  दक्षिणी  and Northern  xiongnu  , and forced the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River  .
Despite these victories , the territories north of Han 's borders were quickly overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation .
After  92  AD , the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court politics  ,  engaging in violent  शक्ति  struggles between  the  various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers , causing the Han 's  परम  downfall .
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist religious societies which instigated  the  Yellow  पगड़ी  Rebellion and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion .
Following the death of  सम्राट  Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ) , the  राजमहल  eunuchs  suffered  wholesale massacre by military officers , allowing members of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords and divide the empire .
When Cao Pi , King of Wei , usurped the throne from Emperor  xian  , the Han Dynasty ceased  to  exist .
The Han Dynasty was an age  of  economic prosperity and saw a significant growth of the money economy first established during the  झोऊ  Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ) .
The coinage issued by the central government mint in 119  bc  remained the standard coinage of  चीन  until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ) .
To pay  लिये  its military campaigns and the  उपनिवेश  of newly conquered frontier  territories  , the government  राष्ट्रीयकृत  the private salt and  आयरन  industries in 117 BC .
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period , and the lost  आय  was recouped through heavily taxing private entrepreneurs .
The emperor  थी   at  the  शिखर  of Han society .
He  presided   over  the Han government but shared  शक्ति  with both the nobility and appointed ministers who came largely from the scholarly gentry class  .
From the reign of Emperor Wu onward , the Chinese court officially sponsored Confucianism in education and court  राजनीती  , synthesized  साथ  the cosmology of later scholars such as  डांग  Zhongshu .
इस  policy endured until the fall of the  चिंग  Dynasty in 1911 AD .
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances , including papermaking , the  nautical  steering rudder , the use of negative numbers  in  mathematics , the raised-relief map , the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for  खगोलशास्त्र   ,  and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum .
Tourette  सिंड्रोम  ( also called  tourette  's syndrome , Tourette 's disorder , Gilles de la Tourette syndrome , GTS or  ,  more commonly , simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset  in  childhood , characterized by multiple physical  (  motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic .
These tics characteristically wax and wane , can be suppressed temporarily , and are preceded by a  premonitory  urge .
Tourette 's  is  defined as part of a spectrum  of  tic disorders ,  जिससे  includes transient and chronic tics .
Tourette 's was  एकबार  considered a rare and bizarre syndrome ,  सबसे   प्रायः  associated with the exclamation of obscene words or  socially  inappropriate and derogatory remarks ( coprolalia ) , but this symptom is present in only a small minority of people with Tourette 's .
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition  ,  but it  is  not always correctly identified because most  मामले  are mild and the severity of tics decreases  लिये  most children as they pass through adolescence .
Between  0.4  % and 3.8 %  of  children ages 5 to  18  may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of transient and chronic tics in school-age  children   is  higher , with  the  more common tics of eye blinking , coughing , throat clearing , sniffing  ,  and facial movements  .
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity , and Tourette 's does not adversely affect  प्रज्ञा  or life expectancy .
Genetic and environmental factors play a role in  the  etiology of Tourette 's , but the exact causes are unknown .
In  सबसे  cases , medication is unnecessary .
There is no effective treatment for every case of tics , but certain medications and therapies can help  जब   उनके   उपयोग  is warranted .
Education is  an  important part of any treatment plan , and explanation and  reassurance  alone  हैं  often sufficient treatment .
Comorbid conditions  (  co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) such as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients seen in  tertiary  specialty clinics  .
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment to the individual than the tics that are the hallmark of  tourette  's , hence  it  is important to correctly identify comorbid  शर्तें  and treat them .
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf  of  his resident , Georges Albert Édouard Brutus  गाइल्स  de la Tourette (  1859–1904  ) , a French physician and neurologist , who published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885 .
Sunbeam badge .
Sunbeam was a marque registered by John Marston Co. Ltd of Wolverhampton , England , in 1888 .
The company first  बना  bicycles , then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th century until about 1936 , and applied the  marque   to  all three forms of transportation .
The company also manufactured aero engines in the First World War and 647 aircraft during the Second World War .
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a Grand Prix  रेस  , and set a number of land speed records .
The company went  into  receivership in 1935 and was purchased  by  the Rootes  समूह   ,  which continued  to  use the  सनबीम  marque  .
Fox News Channel ( FNC ) , also known as Fox News , is a cable news channel owned  by  the Fox Entertainment Group , a subsidiary of News Corporation  .
as  of April 2009  ,  the  चैनल  was available to 102 million households in the United States and to viewers internationally ,  प्रसारण  primarily from its New York studios .
The channel was  निर्मित  by Australian-American media mogul Rupert  मर्डोक  , who hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO .
It launched on October 7 , 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers .
It grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become the dominant cable news network in the  संयुक्त  States .
Critics have  stated  that Fox News Channel promotes conservative political positions and biased reporting .
Commentators , news anchors , and reporters at Fox News Channel have  responded  that  न्यूज  reporting and political commentary operate independently  of  each other  ,  and have denied any  पूर्वाग्रह  in news reporting .
the  mandibular  पहला  molar or six-year  molar  is the tooth located distally  (  away from the midline of the face )  इससे  both the mandibular second premolars of the mouth but mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars .
It is located on the mandibular ( lower ) arch of the mouth  ,  and generally opposes the  ऊर्ध्वहनु   (  upper ) first  molars  and the  ऊर्ध्वहनु  2nd  premolar  in normal  क्लास  I  occlusion  .
The function of this molar is  समान  to that of all molars in regard to grinding being the principal action during mastication ,  commonly  known as chewing .
वहीँ  are usually five well-developed cusps on  mandibular  first molars : two on the buccal ( side nearest the  गाल  ) , two lingual ( side nearest the tongue )  ,  and one distal .
There are great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the permanent mandibular  molars   ,  even though their function  हैं  similar .
The permanent mandibular molars are not considered to have any  दांत  that precede it .
Despite being named molars , the deciduous molars are followed by permanent premolars .
In the universal system of  संकेतन  , the deciduous  mandibular   पहला  molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase .
The right deciduous  mandibular  first molar is known as `` S  ''  , and the left  एक  is known as `` L '' .
The international notation has a different system of notation .
Thus ,  the  right deciduous mandibular first molar is  ज्ञात  as `` 84 '' , and the left one is known as `` 74 ''  .
in  the universal system of notation , the permanent mandibular first molars are designated by a number .
The right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 30 '' , and the left  एक  is  ज्ञात  as `` 19  ''  .
The Palmer notation uses a number in conjunction with a symbol designating in which quadrant the tooth is found .
For this tooth , the left and right  पहला   molars  would have the same number , `` 6  ''  , but the right one would have the symbol , `` ┐ '' , over it ,  जबकि  the left one would have , `` ┌ '' .
The international notation has a different numbering system  than  the previous two , and the right permanent mandibular first molar is  ज्ञात  as `` 46 '' , and the left one is known as `` 36 '' .
Mandibular primary  पहला  molars usually have four pulp horns .
The first molar is usually the  पहला  permanent tooth to erupt and has adult  undertones  .
Anatomy :  the  mandibular first molar has five cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB  ,   toward   midline  and cheek )  ,  mesiolingual ( ML  ,  toward midline and tongue ) , distolingual  (  DL , away from midline and towards tongue ) , distobuccal ( DB , away from midline and toward cheek ) ,  और  distal ( D , away from midline ) , listed  in  order of decreasing size .
Listed in order of decreasing height they  हैं  : ML , DL , DF , MF , and D. An eighth  cusp  was  मिला  in a primary second lower molar in an Argentinean child .
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view )  ,  the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( five sided ) in shape and tapers  toward  the  lingual  ,  साथ  the sides being the buccal surface , the mesial  सतह  , the lingual surface ,  distal  surface , and the distobuccal surface .
The occlusal surface has  चार  grooves .
The  सेंट्रल  groove is not straight but runs down the center of the tooth  mesially  to  distally  and  contains  four pits ( mesial , central  ,  central , and distal  )  .
The distobuccal groove runs from  the  distal pit in  the  central groove  distobuccally   separating  the distal and distobuccal cusps  .
The lingual groove runs from the more distal of the  सेंट्रल  pits in the central groove toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual  और  distolingual cusps .
The buccal groove runs from the more mesial of the  सेंट्रल   गड्ढों   in  the central groove toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal  और  distobuccal  पुलिन  ending in the buccal pit .
the  portion of the central groove between the central pits is  termed  the Lewis offset and is mandatory to account for the locations of the buccal and lingual grooves ( buccal groove being more mesial than the lingual groove while  वे  are parallel ) .
From the buccal  (  buccal view ) , two roots are present .
The distal root is generally straighter , although both often have a slight distal curvature .
The heights of contour on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent  दांत  and are located  at   the  junction of the occlusal and middle thirds of the crown .
The Florida Legislature is the two houses  कि  act as the state  विधानमंडल  of the U.S. state of Florida .
The Florida Constitution states that  ``  The legislative power of the state shall be vested in a legislature of the State of Florida , '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives .
The legislature  is  seated at the Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee .
stained  glass  चित्रण  of Daniel interceding with Arioch  ,  the king 's guard .
Arioch had been charged  साथ  killing all the wise men after they were not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's  सपना  .
Daniel 2 is the second chapter of the Book of Daniel in  the  Hebrew Bible .
The chapter 's source text is  predominantly  written in Aramaic .
According to the text , Nebuchadnezzar is the king of Babylon who is troubled by his dreams .
He demands an interpretation for his dreams or will have his  रहस्यवादी  interpreters executed .
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom to interpret  the  king 's dreams and praises God with a short psalm .
परमेश्वर  gives Daniel a vision in the night to  खुलासा  the king 's dream .
Able to satisfy the king , Daniel is promoted over the whole  प्रांत   of  Babylon .
One Comcast Center , the headquarters of Comcast in Philadelphia  ,  PA .
The old Comcast  लोगो  from 1969  to  1999 , when it was replaced with the crescent logo .
The Comcast Corporation is an American provider of entertainment , information and  संचार  products and services .
It is the largest cable operator , one of the biggest mass media , home Internet service provider , and third largest home telephone service provider in the United States , providing cable television , broadband Internet ,  टेलीफोन  service and in  कुछ  areas home security ( including burglar alarms , surveillance cameras , fire alarm systems and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District  of  Columbia .
The company is headquartered in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania .
In 2011 , Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media  संगुटिका  NBCUniversal from GE in January 2011 , and began the process  of  purchasing the remaining 49 % on February 12 , 2013 , at a cost of $  16.7   अरब  .
It completed the purchase on March 19 , 2013 .
comcast  also has significant holding in several cable networks (  सहित  E !
Entertainment Television ,  स्टाइल  Network , G4 , the Golf Channel and NBC Sports  संजाल  ) , distribution ( ThePlatform  )  , and related businesses .
comcast  has been the subject of criticism for activities including its  stance  on net neutrality , as  खूब  as poor  परिणाम  on customer satisfaction surveys .
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of sharp spines , or quills , that defend and camouflage them from predators .
They are indigenous  to  the Americas , southern Asia , and Africa .
Porcupines  हैं  the third largest of the rodents , behind the capybara and the beaver .
Most porcupines are  परिचय  long , with an long tail .
Weighing , they are rounded , large  और  slow .
Porcupines  आइये  in various shades of brown ,  धूसर  , and the unusual white .
Porcupines ' spiny protection  resembles  that of the unrelated erinaceomorph  hedgehogs  and monotreme echidnas  .
The common porcupine is a  herbivore  .
it  eats leaves , herbs  ,  twigs and green plants like skunk cabbage  और   क्लोवर  and in the winter  it  may eat bark  .
the   उत्तर  American porcupine often climbs trees to  ढूँढें   खाना  .
the  African porcupine is not  a  climber and forages on the ground .
It is mostly nocturnal , but will sometimes forage for food in the day .
porcupines  have become a pest in Kenya  और  are  खाया   as  a delicacy .
The name porcupine comes from Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ) .
A regional  अमरीकी  name for the animal is quill pig .
