Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2 , 1844 – October 10 , 1929 ) was a black Canadian-American inventor and engineer ,  जो  was notable for his 57 U.S. patents ,  सबसे  to do  साथ   चिकनाई  of steam engines .
Born free in Canada , he returned as a five-year-old child with his family to the United States in 1847 , where he lived for the rest of his life  और   became  a US citizen .
Honda FCX Clarity , a hydrogen fuel cell demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
A  हाइड्रोजन  vehicle is a vehicle  कि  uses hydrogen as its onboard fuel for motive power .
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen  fueled  space rockets , as well as automobiles and other transportation vehicles .
The power plants of such vehicles convert the chemical energy of hydrogen to mechanical energy either by burning hydrogen in  an  internal combustion engine , or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run  इलेक्ट्रिक  motors .
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling transportation is a key element of a proposed  हाइड्रोजन  economy .
Hydrogen  ईंधन  does not occur naturally on Earth and thus is not an  उर्जा  source ; rather it is an energy carrier .
It is most frequently made from methane  or  other  चट्टान  fuels , but it can be produced using sources  (  such as wind , solar , or nuclear ) that are intermittent , too diffuse or too cumbersome to  सीधे  propel vehicles .
एकीकृत  wind-to-hydrogen plants , using electrolysis of water , are exploring technologies to deliver costs low enough , and quantities great enough , to compete with traditional  उर्जा   स्त्रोत  .
Many companies are working to develop technologies that might efficiently exploit the potential of  हाइड्रोजन  energy for mobile uses .
The attraction of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that , if  हाइड्रोजन  is prepared without using  चट्टान  fuel inputs  ,  vehicle propulsion would not contribute to carbon  डाइऑक्साइड   emissions  .
the  drawbacks of hydrogen use  हैं  high capital cost , low energy content per unit volume , high tankage weights ,  बहुत  high storage vessel pressures , the storage , transportation and filling of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in vehicles , the large investment in infrastructure that would be required to fuel vehicles  ,  and the  inefficiency  of  उत्पादन  processes .
Sacramento is  the  capital city  of  the  u.S.  state of California and  the  seat of  सरकारी  of Sacramento County .
it  is located at  the  confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the northern portion  of  California 's expansive Central Valley .
साथ  an estimated 2011 population of 477,891 , it is the sixth-largest city in California and the 35th largest city in the United States .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic  बीच  of the Sacramento metropolitan area  जिससे  includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the  चौथी   largest  in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area , San Francisco Bay  क्षेत्रफल  , and  the  San Diego metropolitan area , as well as the 25th largest in the United States .
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America 's most ethnically and  racially  integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter , Sr. , his son  जॉन  Sutter , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to  the  protection of Sutter 's Fort ,  जिससे  was established by Sutter in 1839 .
दौरान  the California Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major distribution point , a commercial  और  agricultural center , and a terminus for wagon  रेल  , stagecoaches  ,  riverboats , the  टेलीग्राफ  , the Pony Express , and  the  First Transcontinental Railroad .
California State University , Sacramento , more commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State , is  the  largest local university .
It  is  one of the twenty-three  campuses  of the California State University system .
Drexel University Sacramento is located in Downtown  ,  Sacramento .
University of the  प्रशांत  's McGeorge School  of  Law is located in the Oak Park neighborhood  .
In addition , the University of California , Davis is located in nearby Davis , west of the capital .
The UC Davis Medical Center  ,  a world-renowned  शोध  hospital , is  स्तिथ  in the city of  sacramento  .
The Apple Store is a chain of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc. , dealing in computers and consumer electronics .
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers ,  तन्त्र  , iPods  ,  iPads , iPhones , third-party accessories , and other consumer electronics  ऐसे  as Apple TV .
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and workshops and a Studio for training with Apple products ; all stores offer a Genius  बार  for technical support  और  repairs ,  as  well  as  free workshops available to the public .
अंतर्गत  the leadership of Ron Johnson , the former Senior Vice President  of  Retail Operations , the Apple Stores have , according to an article in the New York Times  ,  been responsible  लिये   ``  [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled  साथ  gadgets  ''  .
, Apple has 405  स्टोर्स  worldwide , with global sales of billion in merchandise  in  2011 , and they  सीसे  the United States  खुदरा  market in terms  of  sales per unit area .
Steven  पॉल  `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24 , 1955 – October 5 , 2011  )  was an American entrepreneur  और   आविष्कारक  , best known  as  the co-founder , chairman ,  और  CEO of  ठहराना  Inc .
Through Apple , he was widely  पहचाना   as  a charismatic pioneer  of  the personal  कंप्यूटर  revolution and for his  influential  career in the computer and consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  fields , transforming `` one industry after another , from computers and smartphones to music and  फिल्मों  ... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a member of the board  of  directors of  the  Walt Disney Company in 2006 ,  जब  Disney acquired  पिक्चर्स  .
Jobs was among the  पहला  to see  the  commercial potential of Xerox PARC 's  चूहा  -driven graphical user interface , which  led   to  the creation of the Apple Lisa  और  , one year later , the Macintosh .
he   भी  played a role in introducing the LaserWriter , one of the first  widely  available  लेज़र  printers , to the market .
बाद  a power struggle with the board of directors in 1985 ,  कार्य   बाएँ  Apple and founded NeXT ,  a  computer platform development  कम्पनी  specializing in the higher-education and business markets .
In 1986 , he acquired the computer graphics division of Lucasfilm , which was  spun  off as Pixar .
He was credited in Toy Story ( 1995 ) as an  कार्यपालिका  producer .
He  परोसा  as CEO and majority shareholder  जबतक  Disney 's purchase of Pixar in  2006  .
In 1996 , after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system , Copland , Gil Amelio turned to NeXT Computer , and the NeXTSTEP platform became the  न्यास  for the Mac OS X .
Jobs returned to Apple as an  सलाहकार  , and  took  control of the company as an interim CEO .
Jobs  brought  Apple from near bankruptcy to profitability by 1998 .
As  the  new CEO of  the  company , Jobs oversaw the development of  the  iMac , iTunes ,  ipod  , iPhone , and iPad , and  on  the services side , the company 's Apple Retail Stores , iTunes Store and the App Store .
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial returns  ,  and propelled Apple to become the  संसार  's most valuable  सरेआम  traded company  in  2011  .
The  reinvigoration  of the  कम्पनी  is regarded by many commentators as one of the  महानतम  turnarounds in business history .
In 2003 , Jobs was diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor .
Though it was initially treated , he reported a hormone  असंतुलन  , underwent a liver transplant in 2009 , and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined .
On medical leave for most of 2011 , Jobs resigned in August that year , and was elected  अध्यक्ष   of  the Board .
He died of respiratory  गिरफ़्तार  related  to  his metastatic tumor on October 5  ,  2011 .
कार्य  received a number of honors and public recognition for his influence in the  प्रौद्योगिकी  and music industries .
He has been referred to as  ``  legendary '' , a `` futurist ''  or   बस  `` visionary '' , and has been described as the `` Father of the Digital Revolution '' , a `` master of innovation '' , and a `` design perfectionist '' .

Roman numerals , the numeric  प्रणाली  in ancient Rome , uses combinations of letters  इससे  the Latin alphabet to signify values .
The numbers  1  to  10  can be expressed in Roman numerals as follows:
और  .
The Roman numeral system is a cousin of Etruscan numerals .
Use of Roman numerals continued after the decline of the Roman Empire .
From the 14th century on , Roman numerals began  to  be replaced in most contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic  numerals  ; however this process was gradual , and the use of Roman numerals in some minor applications continues to this day .
Effective Nuclear Charge Diagram
The effective nuclear charge ( often  symbolize  as or  Z*  ) is the net positive charge experienced by an electron  in  a multi-electron atom .
The  पद   ``  effective '' is used because the  shielding   प्रभाव  of negatively charged electrons prevents higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full  नाभिकीय  charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons .
The effective nuclear charge experienced by the outer shell electron  is   भी  called the  कोर  charge .
It is possible to determine the strength of the nuclear charge by  looking   at  the oxidation number of the atom .

The Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर  National System of Interstate and Defense Highways ( commonly known as the Interstate Highway System , Interstate Freeway System , Interstate System , or simply the Interstate  )  is a  संजाल  of freeways that  फ़ॉर्म  a part of the National Highway System of the United  राज्य  .
The system is named for  अध्यक्ष  Dwight D. Eisenhower , who championed its formation .
Construction  थी  authorized by the Federal Aid Highway  अधिनियम  of 1956 , and the original portion was completed 35 years later  .
The network  रै  since been  विस्तारित  , and , it had a total length  of   ,  making it the world 's  दूसरी  longest after China 's . , about one-quarter  of  all vehicle miles driven in the country use the Interstate system .
The cost  of  construction has been estimated at $ 425 billion ( in 2006  डॉलर  ) , making it the `` largest public works program since the  पिरामिडों  ``  .
The system has contributed in shaping the United States into a world economic superpower  और  a highly industrialized  स्वदेश  .
.eu is the country code top-level domain  (   cctld  ) for  the  European Union ( EU ) .
Launched on 7 December 2005 , the domain is available for organisations in and residents of EU member states .
The TLD is administered by EURid  ,  a consortium originally  consisting  of the national ccTLD registry operators  of  Belgium ,  स्वीडन  , and Italy , joined  बाद  by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic .
Trademark owners were able to submit registrations through a sunrise  काल   ,  in  an  effort to prevent cybersquatting .
Full registration started on 7 April 2006 .
Meister means master in  जर्मनी  ( as in  निपुण  craftsman , or as an honorific title such as  meister  Eckhart )  .
The word is akin to maestro .
In sports , Meister is  प्रयुक्त  for the current national , European or world champion ( Deutscher Meister , *Europameister , Weltmeister ) .
Many modern day German police forces use the title Meister .
During the Second World  युद्ध  , Meister was  the  highest enlisted rank of the Ordnungspolizei .
Meister has been borrowed  into   अंग्रेज़ी  slang ,  जहाँ  it is used in compound nouns .
A person referred to as “Meister” is one who has extensive theoretical knowledge and practical skills in his profession  ,  business , or some other kind of work or activity .
For  उदाहरण   ,  a “puzzle-meister” would be someone  अत्यधिक   skilled   at  solving puzzles .
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for example , “stubble-meister” for someone with a short , neat beard or “crier-meister” for someone who often cries ) .
mighty  Morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about teenagers with super-powers , based on the 16th installment of the Japanese Super Sentai franchise , Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger .
Both the show and its related merchandise saw unbridled overnight success  ,  becoming a staple of 1990s pop culture in mere months .
Under the original name , `` Mighty Morphin Power Rangers '' the series ran from 1993 to 1995 and  शाखित  the feature film Mighty  morphin  Power Rangers :  the  Movie .
The  दूसरी  and third seasons of the show drew on footage and elements from the Super Sentai series Gosei Sentai Dairanger and Ninja Sentai Kakuranger respectively , though the Zyuranger costumes were still used  लिये  the five main Rangers and several regular villains .
तभी  the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume ( worn by the  श्वेत  Ranger ) were retained from Dairanger for the second season , while only the mecha from Kakuranger were featured  in  the third  ऋतु  .
However the Kakuranger costumes were later used for the title characters  of  the mini-series , Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers .
The series was produced  by  MMPR Productions , distributed by Saban Entertainment , and  aired  on Fox Kids .
The show 's merchandise was  उत्पादित  and distributed by Bandai Entertainment .
in  1996  ,  the series was rebranded as the Power Rangers franchise ;  renaming  the  श्रेणी  every year  बाद  , and using costumes , props , and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series , as well as changing  the  cast and storyline .
While an  overarching  storyline  होता  continue until  शक्ति  Rangers Lost Galaxy , subsequent series after MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense .
In 2010 , a re-version of Mighty Morphin  शक्ति  Rangers  ,  with a new logo , comic book-referenced graphics  ,  and extra alternative special  प्रभाव  , was broadcast on ABC Kids , and Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series  .
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19 , 1809 – October 7 , 1849 ) was an American author , poet , editor and literary  आलोचक  , considered part of the American Romantic Movement  .
Best known for his tales of mystery and the macabre , Poe was one of the earliest American practitioners of the short story and is generally considered the inventor of the detective  fiction   विधा  .
He is further credited with contributing to the emerging genre  of  science fiction .
He was the first well-known American writer to try to  earn  a living  through  writing alone , resulting in a financially difficult life and career .
He was born as Edgar Poe  in  Boston , Massachusetts ; he was orphaned young when his mother died shortly after his father abandoned the family  .
पो  was  लिया   in  by John and  frances  Allan , of Richmond , Virginia , but they never formally adopted him .
He attended the University of Virginia for one semester but left due  to  lack of money .
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an officer 's cadet at West Point , Poe parted ways with the Allans  .
उसके  publishing career began humbly , with an anonymous  संग्रहण   of  poems , Tamerlane and Other Poems ( 1827 ) , credited  तभी  to `` a Bostonian '' .
Poe  switched  his focus to prose and spent the next several years working  लिये  literary journals and periodicals , becoming known for  उसके  own style of literary criticism .
His  कार्य  forced him to move among several cities , including Baltimore , Philadelphia , and New York City .
In  बाल्टीमोर  in  1835  , he married Virginia Clemm , his 13-year-old cousin .
In January 1845 Poe published his poem  ,  `` The Raven `` , to instant success .
His  बीवी  died of tuberculosis two years after its publication .
he  began planning to produce  उसके  own journal , The Penn ( later renamed The Stylus ) ,  हालांकि  he died before  it  could be produced .
On October 7 , 1849 , at age 40 , Poe died in Baltimore ; the cause of his  मौत  is unknown and has been variously attributed  to   दारू  ,  दिमाग  congestion , cholera , drugs ,  दिल  disease , rabies , suicide , tuberculosis , and other agents .
पो  and his works influenced literature in the United States and around the world , as  खूब  as in specialized fields , such as cosmology and cryptography .
Poe and his work appear  throughout   लोकप्रिय  culture in literature  ,  music , films , and television .
A number of his homes are dedicated museums today .
The Mystery Writers of America present an annual award known  as  the Edgar Award for distinguished work in the mystery genre .
Lions are obligate carnivores ; they  आवश्यकता  up to seven  गामा  ( 15 lbs ) of meat per day .
A major component of their diet is the  flesh   of  large mammals , like this African buffalo .
A carnivore (  )  meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin , caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and vorare meaning 'to devour  '  ) is an organism that derives its energy and nutrient  आवश्यकताएँ  from a diet  consisting  mainly or  exclusively  of animal tissue , whether through predation or scavenging .
पशु  that depend solely on animal flesh for their nutrient requirements are considered carnivores while those that also consume non-animal  खाना  are considered carnivores .
Omnivores also consume both animal and non-animal food , and apart from the more general definition , there is no clearly defined ratio of plant to animal material that would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore  .
A carnivore that sits at  the  top of the foodchain  is  an  apex  predator .
पौधे   कि  capture and digest insects are called carnivorous plants .
Similarly , fungi that  कैप्चर  microscopic animals are often called carnivorous fungi .
The FIFA World  कप  , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested by the  वरिष्ठ   मेन  's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport  's  global governing body  .
The championship  रै  been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930 , except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War .
The current champions are Spain , who won the 2010 tournament  .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams  स्पर्धा  for the title at venues within the  मेजबान  nation ( s ) over a period of about a month  ;  this phase is  प्रायः  called the World Cup Finals .
A  योग्यता  phase , which currently takes place over the preceding three years , is used to  determine  which teams qualify  लिये  the tournament together with the  मेजबान  nation ( s ) .
The 19  संसार  Cup tournaments have been won by eight different national teams .
Brazil have won five times , and they are the only team to have played  in  every  टूर्नामेंट  .
The other World Cup winners  हैं  Italy  ,  with four titles  ;  Germany  ,  with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay  ,  with  दो  titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with  एक  title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The  अगला  three World Cups will be hosted  by  Brazil in 2014 , Russia in 2018 , and Qatar in  2022  .
Heroes is an American science fiction television drama series created by Tim Kring that appeared on  एनबीसी  for four  सीज़न  from September 25  ,   2006  through February 8 , 2010  .
the  series tells the stories of ordinary people who discover superhuman abilities , and  कैसा  these abilities take effect in the  वर्ण  ' lives .
The series emulates  the  aesthetic style and storytelling of American comic books , using multi-episode story arcs that build upon a larger , more encompassing arc .
The series was produced by Tailwind Productions in association with  सार्वभौमिक  Media Studios .
It was filmed primarily in Los Angeles , California .
Four complete seasons aired , ending on February  8  , 2010 .
The critically  acclaimed  first season had a run  of  23 episodes and garnered an average of 14.3 million viewers in the United  राज्य  , receiving  the  highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years .
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1 million  दर्शक  in the U.S. , and marked NBC 's sole series among the top 20 ranked programs in total viewership for the 2007–2008 season .
Heroes has earned a number of awards and  nominations  , including Primetime Emmy Awards , Golden Globes , People 's Choice Awards and British Academy Television Awards .
An online extension of the series , Heroes 360 Experience , later rebranded as Heroes Evolutions , was created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology .
Other official  नायक  media include magazines , action figures , tie-in and interactive websites  ,  a mobile game , a novel , clothing and other merchandise .
In the fall of 2008 ,  एनबीसी   डिजिटल  Entertainment released a series of online content  लिये  the summer ,  सहित  more original web content , wireless iTV interactivity , graphic novels  उपलब्धियाँ  for  मोबाईल  viewing and webisodes .
NBC announced Heroes cancellation on May  14  , 2010 .
afterward  , the network  माना  making a  टेलीविज़न  special event to conclude the series ; however , on September  9  , 2010 , NBC announced the decision to stop  कोई  further development of the Heroes franchise .
Tim Kring then  सुझाया  that the broad premise  of  Heroes storylines allowed for the  मताधिकार  to return for fans , but he  किया  not  बताएँ  when or in  कया  media  स्वरूप  .
On April 17 , 2013 , TV Line reported that MSN was in talks to revive the series with a new cast .
John Pierpont `` J. P . ''
Morgan ( April 17 , 1837 –  कूच  31 , 1913 ) was an American  फाइनेंसर  ,  बैंकर  , philanthropist and art collector  जो   वर्चस्व  corporate finance and industrial  consolidation  during his time  .
in  1892  मॉर्गन  arranged the merger of Edison General Electric and Thomson-Houston Electric Company to form General Electric .
बाद  financing the creation of the Federal Steel  कम्पनी  , he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel Company and several other steel and iron businesses , including Consolidated Steel and Wire Company owned by William Edenborn  ,  to form the United States Steel Corporation .
Morgan died in Rome , Italy , in his sleep in  1913  at the  आयु  of  75  , leaving his fortune  और  business to his son ,  जॉन  Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan , Jr. , and  bequeathing  his mansion and large book collections to The Morgan Library &  संग्रहालय   in  New York .
At the height of  मॉर्गन  's career during  the  early 1900s , he and  उसके  partners had financial investments in many large corporations and were accused by critics of controlling the nation 's high finance  .
He directed the banking  गठबन्धन  that stopped the Panic  of  1907 .
He was the leading financier  of  the Progressive Era  ,  and his dedication to efficiency and  modernization  helped transform American business .
This is  a  list  of   एपीसोड  of  the  television series .
The episodes were directed by Shigeru Ueda  और   उत्पादित  by the Yggdrasil Executive Committee which included Xebec and Genco .
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo and revolves around Rin Asōgi , an immortal private  अन्वेषक  , as she explores the secrets of modern  और  near-future world and the supernatural events that surround the  fictional  society of immortals like herself .
There  हैं  large time gaps in the internal chronology between the first  पाँच   एपीसोड  , ranging from  एक  to thirty years .
the   छह  episodes  यहूद   ब्रॉडकास्ट  monthly on AT-X channel in Japan ,  between  February 3 and July 6 , 2008 .
Each episode is 45  मिनट्स  long .
Two  टुकड़े  of theme music are  प्रयुक्त  for the episodes : the opening theme `` Alsatia '' and the ending theme ``  कारण  Disarray '' .
Both  यहूद  composed and performed  by  the Japanese metal band Galneryus  .
The series was produced to commemorate the tenth  वर्षगांठ  of the AT-X network it originally aired on .
Aerial photo of FLETC , where  us  digital forensics standards were developed in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science )  is  a branch of forensic science encompassing the recovery and investigation of material found in digital devices , often in relation to  कंप्यूटर   अपराधों  .
The term digital forensics was originally used as a synonym for computer forensics but  रै  expanded to cover  छानबीन  of all devices capable of  storing  digital data .
साथ  roots in the personal computing revolution  of  the late 1970s and  जल्दी  '80s , the discipline evolved  in  a haphazard manner during the 1990s , and it was not until the  जल्दी   21st  century that national policies emerged .
डिजिटल  forensics investigations have a variety of applications .
The most common is  to  support or refute a hypothesis before criminal or civil ( as part of the electronic discovery process ) courts .
Forensics may also feature in the private sector  ;   ऐसे  as during internal corporate  investigations  or intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into the nature and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ) .
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into  अनेक  sub-branches , relating to the type of digital devices involved ; computer forensics , network forensics , forensic data analysis  और  mobile device forensics .
The typical forensic process encompasses the  seizure  , forensic imaging ( acquisition ) and analysis of digital media and the production of a report into collected evidence .
As well as identifying  सीधा   प्रमाण  of  a  crime  ,  digital forensics can be used to attribute evidence to specific  संदिग्धों  , confirm alibis or statements , determine  intent  , identify sources ( for example ,  in  copyright cases ) , or authenticate documents .
Investigations are much broader in  पैमाना  than other areas of forensic analysis ( where the usual aim is to provide answers to a series of simpler questions ) often involving complex time-lines or hypotheses .
A comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by some color spaces .
A color model is an abstract mathematical model describing the way  रंगों  can  be  represented as tuples  of  numbers , typically as three or four values or color components ( e.g . RGB and CMYK are color models  )  .
However , a color model with no associated mapping function to an absolute color space is a more or less arbitrary color system with no connection to any globally understood system of color interpretation .
Adding a certain  मानचित्रण   फलन  between the color model  और   a  certain  सन्दर्भ  color space results in a definite `` footprint '' within the reference color space .
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut , and , in combination with the color model  ,  defines a  नई  color space .
For example , Adobe RGB and sRGB are two different absolute color spaces ,  दोनो  based on  the  RGB model .
In the most  जेनेरिक  sense  of  the definition above , color spaces can be defined without the use of a color model .
These spaces , such as Pantone ,  हैं  in effect a given set of names or numbers which are  पारिभाषित  by the existence of  a  corresponding set of physical color swatches .
This article focuses  on  the mathematical model concept .
Labor Day is an American federal holiday observed  on  the first Monday in September , that  मनाता  the economic and social contributions  of  workers .
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) and an insurer , where the insurer promises to  अदा  a designated beneficiary  a   योग  of money ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person .
Depending on the contract , other events such as terminal illness or critical illness may  भी  trigger payment .
the  policy  होल्डर  typically pays a premium  ,  either regularly or as a lump sum .
Other expenses ( such as funeral expenses ) are also sometimes included in  the   लाभ  .
Life policies are legal contracts and the terms of the contract describe the limitations of the insured  कार्यक्रम  .
Specific exclusions are often written into the contract  to  limit the liability of the insurer  ;  common examples are claims relating to suicide , fraud , war , riot and civil commotion  .
Life-based contracts tend to fall into two major categories:
सुरक्षा  policies – designed to provide a benefit in the event  of  specified event , typically a lump sum  भुगतान  .
A common form of this design  is  term insurance .
Investment policies – where the main objective  is  to  सुकर  the  विकास   of  capital by  नियमित  or single premiums .
Common forms ( in the  us  ) are whole  जीवन  , universal life and variable life policies .

Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born  may  2 , 1962 in Yorba Linda , Orange  काउंटी  , California ) is an American actress  ,  also credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture .
Kapture began  उसके  career in films , most of which were not huge commercial successes .
She  गई  on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver , 1st & Ten , and  as  a contestant on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained international exposure  साथ   उसके   पहला  major television role as Sergeant Rita Lee Lance in the television series  रेशा  Stalkings  .
Kapture 's role as Rita , the other half of the two ``  sams  '' for almost 5 years , cemented  उसके  popularity .
Paired with Rob Estes who played Sergeant Chris Lorenzo , Kapture  gained  global recognition along with her costar since  the  show was broadcast in several countries  .
Sergeant Lance  आखिरकार  became Lieutenant Lance by the time Kapture  बाएँ  the series in 1995 to have her first child  मैडिसन  .
During her  समय  with  the  series , Kapture briefly  सत  in  the  director 's chair , for two episodes .
She was interviewed for the Silk Stalkings Season 1 DVD which was  वितरित  by Anchor Bay Entertainment  और  released in  सितंबर  2004 .
After a  छोटी  hiatus from  the  screen following her exit from Silk Stalkings , Kapture returned in 1997 to the small screen and USA Network .
She  निभाई  lead roles in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies , Perfect Crime ( based on  a  true story , also called Hide and Seek  :  The Joanne  जेन्सेन  Story ) , which also starred Jasmine Guy and  उसके  Bodyguard .
She later starred in a  few  other independent  फिल्मी  projects and theatre productions and had several television  अतिथि  appearances  .
Kapture also had a recurring role on Baywatch as Alexis Ryker .
She played Anita Hodges on The  यंग  and the  बेचैन  from 2002 through 2004 , where she was credited as Mitzi Kapture Donahue , and  स्ट्रक्चर  in the made-for-TV movie Night  of  Terror which premiered March 26 , 2006 on Lifetime Network .
Her latest  is  a supporting role in God 's Ears , released in 2007 .
Kapture is the official celebrity  प्रवक्ता   लिये  the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society .
The Xbox  360  is the second video game console developed by and produced for Microsoft  और  the successor to the Xbox .
the   एक्सबॉक्स  360 competes with Sony  's  PlayStation 3 and Nintendo  's  Wii as part of the seventh  पीढी  of video  खेल  consoles .
As of September  30  , 2012  ,  70  लाख  Xbox 360 consoles have been sold worldwide .
The Xbox 360 was officially  अनावरण  on  एमटीवी   on  May 12 ,  2005  , with detailed launch and game information divulged later that month at the Electronic Entertainment Expo  (  E3 ) .
The console sold out completely upon release  in  all regions except in Japan .
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are  इसके  integrated  एक्सबॉक्स  Live service  कि  allows players  to  compete online ; download arcade games , game demos ,  trailers  , TV shows ,  म्यूज़िक  and movies ; and its Windows Media Center multimedia capabilities .
The Xbox Live  भी   offers  access to various ( often region-specific ) third-party media streaming applications .
At their E3 presentation  on  June 14 , 2010 , Microsoft announced a redesigned Xbox 360 that would ship on the same day .
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model and features integrated 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi , TOSLINK S/PDIF optical audio  आउटपुट  ,  पाँच   usb   2.0  ports ( compared to the three from older versions ) and  a  special AUX port .
Older models of the Xbox 360 have since been discontinued .
The first new console to  be  released features a 250 GB hard  ड्राइव  , while a later , less expensive SKU features 4 GB internal storage .
Backpack may also refer to a 2001 novel by Emily Barr
A modern backpack
स्विस  army backpack ca . 1960
एकीकृत  bearer frame .
A backpack ( also called rucksack , knapsack , packsack , pack ) is , in its simplest form , a cloth sack carried on one 's back and secured with two straps that go over the shoulders , but there  can  be exceptions  .
Lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on only one  कंधे  strap .
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or carrying any sort of equipment , because of the limited capacity to carry heavy weights  लिये  long periods of time in the hands  .
Large  backpacks  , used to carry loads over  10  kg (  22  lbs ) , usually offload the largest  भाग   (  up to about 90 % ) of their weight onto padded hip belts ,  leaving  the shoulder  straps  mainly for stabilising the load .
इस  improves the potential to carry heavy loads , as the hips are stronger than the shoulders , and also increases agility and balance , since  the  load rides nearer the  wearer  's own center of mass  .
In ancient  टाइम्स  , the  backpack  was used as a means to carry the  शिकारी  's larger game and other types of prey and as  a  way of easier transport for other materials .
In the cases  of  larger hunts , the  hunters  would dismember their prey and distribute the pieces of the animal  around  , each  एक  packing the meat into many wrappings and then into bags which they placed on to their backs .
The bag itself was made up of different animal hide and  स्किन  ( depending  on  what sorts  of  animals  यहूद  in the  क्षेत्रफल  ) and sewn together by the intestines of said animals ,  जिससे   यहूद  woven together tightly to make  a  sturdy thread-like material .
Mexico  (   ;  ; ) , officially the United Mexican States ( ) ,  is  a federal  संवैधानिक  republic in North America .
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the south and west by the Pacific Ocean ; on the  southeast  by  ग्वाटेमाला  , Belize , and  the  Caribbean Sea ; and on the east by the Gulf  of  Mexico .
covering  almost two million square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ) , Mexico is the fifth largest country  in  the Americas by total area and the 13th largest independent nation in the world .
With an estimated population of over 113 million , it is the  संसार  's eleventh most populous country  और   the  most populous Spanish-speaking country .
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one states and a Federal District , the  पूंजी  city .
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into  उन्नत   सभ्यताओं  such as the  olmec  , the Toltec , the Teotihuacan , the Zapotec , the Maya and the Aztec before first  सम्पर्क  with Europeans .
In 1521 , Spain conquered and colonized the territory from its base in  méxico-tenochtitlan  , which was administered as the Viceroyalty of New Spain  .
This territory would eventually become Mexico following recognition of the colony 's independence in 1821 .
The  post-independence  period was characterized by economic instability , the Mexican-American  युद्ध  and territorial cession to the United States , a civil war , two empires and a domestic  तानाशाही  .
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910 ,  जिससे  culminated with  the  promulgation of the 1917 Constitution and  the  emergence of the country 's  वर्तमान  political system .
Elections  आयोजित  in July 2000 marked the first time that an opposition party won the presidency  इससे  the Institutional Revolutionary Party .
Since 2006 the country has been in the midst of a drug war which has  caused  60,000 deaths .
Mexico has one of  the  world 's largest  economies  , and is considered both a regional power and middle power .
In addition , Mexico was the first Latin American member of the Organisation for  आर्थिक  Co-operation and Development OECD  (  since 1994 ) , and considered an upper-middle income country by the World Bank .
Mexico is considered a newly industrialized country and an emerging  शक्ति  .
It has the fourteenth  largest  nominal GDP and the eleventh largest GDP by purchasing  शक्ति  parity .
The economy is strongly linked to those of its North  अमरीकी  Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) partners , especially the United  राज्य  of America .
Mexico ranks sixth in  the  world and first in the Americas  by   क्रमांक  of UNESCO World Heritage Sites with 31 , and in 2007 was the tenth  सबसे  visited country in the world with 21.4 million international arrivals  प्रति  year  .
Babe Ruth holds the MLB  करियर  slugging percentage record  (  .690 ) .
In  बेसबॉल  statistics ,  slugging  percentage ( abbreviated SLG ) is  a  popular measure of the  शक्ति   of  a hitter .
It is calculated as total bases  विभाजित  by at bats :
where AB  is  the number  of  at-bats for a given player ,  और  1B , 2B , 3B , and HR are the number of singles , doubles , triples , and home runs , respectively .
Walks are specifically excluded  इससे  this calculation .
For example , in 1920 , Babe Ruth  निभाई  his first season for the New York Yankees .
in  458 at bats , Ruth had 172 hits , comprising 73 singles , 36 doubles , 9 triples , and 54 home runs , which brings the total base count to ( 73  ×  1 )  +  ( 36 × 2 ) + (  9  × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388 .
His total number of bases ( 388 ) divided by his total at-bats ( 458 ) is .847 , his slugging percentage for the season .
The next year he slugged .846 , and these records went unbroken until 2001 , when Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases in 476 at-bats , bringing  उसके  slugging percentage to .863 , unmatched since .
is a role-playing video game  विकसित  and published by Square ( now Square Enix ) for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in  1995  .
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team ''  :  Hironobu Sakaguchi , the creator of Square 's Final Fantasy series ; Yuji Horii , a  freelance   पंक्तियां  and creator  of  Enix 's popular Dragon Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama , a freelance manga artist famed for his work with  ड्रैगन  Quest and Dragon  बॉल   .
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game , Masato Kato wrote most of  the  plot , while composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored most of the game before falling ill and deferring remaining tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu .
The game 's story follows a group of adventurers who  सफर  through  समय  to prevent a global  प्रलय  .
Square re-released a  ported  version by  tose  in Japan  लिये  Sony 's PlayStation in 1999 , later repackaged with a  फाइनल  Fantasy IV port as Final Fantasy Chronicles in 2001 for the North American market  .
A slightly enhanced Chrono Trigger was released for the Nintendo DS on November 25 , 2008 , in North America and Japan , and went on sale in Australia on February 3 , 2009 and in Europe on February 6 , 2009 .
The game was never released  in  PAL territories before the Nintendo DS version .
Chrono Trigger was a critical and commercial success upon release and is  माना  today to be one of the greatest video games of all time .
निन्टेंडो  Power magazine described aspects of Chrono  ट्रिगर  as revolutionary , including its multiple endings , plot-related sidequests focusing  on  character  विकास   ,  unique battle system , and detailed graphics  .
Chrono Trigger  थी  the third best-selling  खेल  of 1995 ,  और  the game 's SNES and PlayStation iterations  have  shipped 2.65 million  नक़ल   as  of March 2003 .
The version  लिये  the Nintendo DS sold 790,000 copies as of March 2009  .
Chrono Trigger was also ported to mobile phones  ,  Virtual Console , the PlayStation  संजाल  ( only in the USA ) , iOS devices , and Android devices .
Goat  चीज
Goat cheese , or chèvre ( from the French word for goat )  ,  is cheese made out of the milk of goats .
Hyperthermia is elevated body  तापमान  due to failed thermoregulation that occurs when a body produces or absorbs more heat than it  dissipates  .
Extreme temperature elevation then becomes a medical emergency requiring immediate  उपचार  to prevent disability or death .
The most common causes include heat stroke and adverse reactions to drugs .
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive heat , or combination of heat and humidity , that overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms  .
the  latter is a relatively rare  पक्ष  effect of many drugs  ,  particularly those that affect the central  बेचैन  system .
Malignant hyperthermia is a  विरल  complication of some types of general anesthesia  .
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical  डिवाइस  and may  be  used in  the  treatment of some kinds of cancer and other conditions , most commonly in conjunction  साथ  radiotherapy .
Hyperthermia differs  इससे   ज्वर  in that  the  body 's  तापमान  set point remains unchanged .
The opposite  is  hypothermia , which  occurs   जब  the temperature drops below that required to maintain normal metabolism .
Belize , is a  देश  located on the northeastern coast of Central America .
It  is  the only country in the area  जहाँ   अंग्रेज़ी  is the official language , although  kriol  and Spanish are more commonly spoken .
Belize is bordered  on  the north by Mexico , to the south and west by Guatemala and to the east by the  caribbean   समुद्र  .
Its mainland is  परिचय  long and wide .
With of land and a population of only 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census ) , Belize possesses the lowest population density in Central  अमेरिका  .
The country 's population growth rate  of  3.15 % ( 2012 est . ) is the  दूसरी  highest in the region and one  of  the  उच्चतम  in the western hemisphere .
Belize 's abundance of terrestrial and marine species , and its diversity of ecosystems give it  a  key place within  the  globally significant Mesoamerican  biological  Corridor .
Belize has a diverse society , comprising many cultures and  भाषाएं  .
It is the only nation in the  प्रदेश  with a British colonial heritage , but as a part of the  पश्चिमी   caribbean  Zone , it also  साझा  a common heritage with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean countries .
in  general , Belize is considered to  be  a Central American and Caribbean nation  साथ  strong ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America .
Belize is a  सदस्य  of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) , the Community  of  Latin  अमरीकी  and Caribbean States ( CELAC ) , and Central American Integration System ( SICA ) .
Belize  is  known for its  सितंबर  Celebrations , and is the birthplace of chewing gum and Punta  चट्टान  .
The `` Betsy Ross '' flag
A `` Betsy Ross ''  ध्वज  flying outside San Francisco City  हॉल
The  बेट्सी   रॉस  flag is an early  डिज़ाइन  of the flag of the United States , popularly attributed  to  Betsy Ross , using the common motifs of alternating red-and-white striped field with  five-pointed  stars in a blue canton .
The flag was designed during the American Revolution and features 13  सितारों  to represent the original 13 colonies .
The distinctive feature  of   the  Ross flag is  the  arrangement of the stars in a circle  .
Although the Betsy Ross story is accepted  by  most Americans , some flag historians and revisionists do not accept the Betsy Ross design as the first American  ध्वज  .
According  to  the traditional account ,  the  original flag was made in June 1776 , when a  छोटी  committee—including George Washington ,  रॉबर्ट  Morris and relative George Ross —visited Betsy and discussed  the  need for a new American flag .
Betsy accepted the job to  manufacture   the  flag , altering the committee 's design by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars  .
While the Betsy Ross legend is questionable , the flag design is known to have been in  उपयोग  by 1777 ; Alfred B . Street described it at the surrender of  सामान्य  Burgoyne and understood the circle of stars  to  represent  समता  among the American states .
It is one  of  the oldest versions of  u.S.  flags known to exist ; while  it  is not the oldest surviving flag artifact in cloth form , its likeness appears on older physical relics ,  namely   ,   the  contemporary battlefield paintings by  जॉन  Trumbull  और  Charles Willson Peale .
They depict the circular star arrangement  होने  flown from ship masts and many other places , and thus provide the first known historical documentation of the flag 's appearance  .
The seal of the U.S. Department  of   दिग्गजों  Affairs uses the Betsy Ross flag to represent service to all veterans from  the  American Revolution to the present  दिन   .
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star US flags has  महरूम  featured in many popular artworks (  sometimes  inaccurately , as in Washington Crossing the Delaware ) and films , such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna .
The flag continues to be one of the most popular symbols of the American  क्रान्ति  .
A purr is a sound made by all  प्रजाति  of felids and is a part of cat communication .
It varies between cats  (  for example by loudness and tone ) , and from species to species  ,  but can  be  characterized as a tonal buzzing .
The term  ``  purring '' has been used liberally in literature ,  और   it  has been claimed that viverrids ( civet , mongoose ,  genet  ) , bears , badgers ,  hyaenas  ( et cetera ) purr .
Other animals that have been said to purr are rabbits , squirrels , guinea  सूअर  ,  tapirs  , ring-tailed lemurs , elephants , raccoons and gorillas while eating .
However , using a strict definition of purring that continuous sound production must alternate between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream ( and usually  go  on for minutes ) , Peters ( 2002 ) ,  in  an exhaustive review of the scientific literature , reached the conclusion  कि  until then only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) and two species of genets , Genetta tigrina , and most likely also Genetta genetta , had been documented to purr .
the  platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus  )  is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , including Tasmania .
Together with the  चार  species of echidna , it is  एक  of the five extant  प्रजाति  of monotremes , the  तभी  mammals that  lay   अंडे  instead of giving birth .
It is the  एकमात्र  living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ) , though a number  of  related species have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed , beaver -tailed ,  otter  -footed mammal baffled European naturalists when they first encountered it ,  साथ  some considering it an elaborate fraud .
It  is  one of the few venomous mammals  ,  the male  platypus  having a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans  .
The  अद्वितीय  features of the platypus make it  an  important subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable and iconic symbol  of   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ;  it  has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its  20-cent  coin .
The platypus is the  एनिमल  emblem of the state of New South Wales .
जबतक  the early 20th century , it was hunted for its fur  ,  but it is now protected throughout its range .
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of  प्रदूषण  , it is not under any immediate  threat  .
St. Elizabeth is  a  village in Miller County , Missouri , United  राज्य  .
The population was 336 at the  2010  census .
wilton  is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in Sacramento County ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United  राज्य  .
It is part of  the  Sacramento – Arden-Arcade – Roseville Metropolitan Statistical Area .
The population was 5,363 at the 2010 census , up from  4,551  at the 2000 census .
In human-computer interaction , cut and paste and copy and paste are  सम्बन्धित  commands that offer a user-interface interaction technique for transferring text , data ,  फाइलें  or objects from a source to a  गंतव्य  .
Most ubiquitously , users require the ability to cut and paste sections of plain text .
The cut command removes the selected data from its original position  ,  while the copy command creates a duplicate ; in both  मामले  the selected data is placed in a clipboard  .
The data in the clipboard is later  inserted  in the position where the paste command is issued .
The command names are an interface metaphor based on the physical procedure used  in   पाण्डुलिपि  editing to create a page  लेआउट  .
This interaction technique has close associations with  सम्बन्धित  techniques in graphical user interfaces that  उपयोग  pointing devices such  as  a computer mouse  (  by drag and drop , for  उदाहरण  ) .
Economic order  मात्रा  is the order  मात्रा  that minimizes total inventory holding  लागत  and ordering costs .
It is one of the oldest classical production scheduling models .
The framework used to determine this order quantity is also known as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula  .
The model was developed by Ford W. Harris in 1913 , but R. H. Wilson , a consultant who applied it extensively , is given credit for his in-depth analysis .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3 , 1954 – August 27 , 1990 ) was an American guitarist , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
Often referred to by his initials SRV , Vaughan is best known as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble .
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist  टॉमी  Shannon , they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s .
With a career  spanning  seven years , Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold .
He was born  और  raised in  डलास  , Texas  ,  and for a short period of  समय  lived in Graham , Texas  .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan ,  vaughan  started playing the guitar at  आयु  seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he dropped out  of  high school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career , joining groups  ऐसे   as  Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed Triple Threat Revue , a band that eventually evolved into Double Trouble and regularly performed around Austin  .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at  the  Montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland , catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on  उसके  upcoming studio album Let 's Dance , while  browne  offered the  बैंड  free use of his personal studio  in  Los Angeles to record  an  album .
In March 1983 ,  vaughan  and Double Trouble were  हस्ताक्षरित  to  एपिक   रिकॉर्ड  by veteran record producer John  हैमंड  Sr. and  released  their debut album , Texas Flood in June of that year .
After successful touring  ,  the group released the albums , Could n't  स्टैंड   the  Weather ( 1984 ) and Soul  to  Soul  (  1985  )  , the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his  करियर  had  progressed  successfully , Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in  अटलांटा  , Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned  to  touring with the band .
In June 1989 , In  कदम  was released and earned  उन्हें  a Grammy Award for Best  समकालीन   ब्लूज़  Performance .
On August 27 , 1990 , Vaughan  थी  killed in a helicopter crash following  a   प्रदर्शन  in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet  तीव्र   स्टाइल  was derived from a variety of musical genres .
He was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King , Freddie King  ,  Otis  फटाफट  , and Muddy  waters  , and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic scales .
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing , ranking at  #  6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest  guitarists  '' in 2011 .
He was  मरणोपरांत  inducted into the  ब्लूज़  Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to come from the state of Texas  .

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants  ,  and vending machines in  प्रत्येक  country except Cuba  और  North Korea .
It  is  produced  by  The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta  ,  Georgia , and is  प्रायः  referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944  )  .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was  invented   in  the late 19th  सदी  by John  pemberton  , Coca-Cola was  खरीदा  out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler  ,  whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance  of  the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the  कम्पनी  , produce finished product in cans  और  bottles from the  concentrate  in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell , distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises  ,   जिससे  is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in  उत्तर  America and western Europe  .
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate  लिये  soda fountains to major restaurants and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company  रै  , on occasion  ,  introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name  .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero  ,   coca-cola  Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011 , Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand .
Barry Louis Larkin ( born April  28  , 1964 ) is a retired Major League Baseball player .
Larkin played shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds from  1986  to 2004  और  was one of the pivotal players on  the  1990 Reds ' World Series championship team .
Larkin was elected to the National Baseball Hall of Fame in January  2012  and was inducted on July 22 .
Larkin is considered one of the  शीर्ष  players of his era , winning nine Silver  slugger  awards and three Gold Glove awards  .
he   थी  selected to the Major  लीग   all-star  Game twelve times , and was elected the 1995 National  लीग  Most  मूल्यवान  Player .
Brasília ( ) is the federal capital of Brazil and the  सीट  of government  of  the Federal District .
Administratively , the city is located in the  संघीय  District which  is  in the Central-West  प्रदेश  .
Physically , it is located in  the  Brazilian Highlands .
It has a population of about 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate , making it the  चौथी  largest  नगर  in Brazil .
However , as a metropolitan area , it ranks lower at sixth in population .
Brasília is the largest city in the world that did not exist at the beginning of the 20th century .
Brasília has the fifth largest GDP among Latin American cities  और  the third in Brazil  .
At around R  $   62,000  Brazilian reais ( equal to approximately $  30,900  US  डॉलर  or €23,000  euros  ) , the city 's per capita income is the highest among Brazil 's largest cities .
As the national capital , Brasília is the seat of all  तीन  branches of the federal  सरकारी  of Brazil .
The  नगर  also hosts the headquarters of many Brazilian companies .
Planning policies such as the location of residential  इमारतें  around expansive urban areas ,  as  well as building the city  around  large avenues and dividing it into sectors , have sparked a  बहस  and reflection on life in big cities in the 20th century  .
The city 's design divides it into numbered blocks  as  well as  सेक्टर  for specified activities , such as the Hotel Sector , the Banking Sector or the Embassy Sector  .
Brasília hosts 124 foreign embassies .
the  city was planned and developed in 1956 with Lúcio Costa as the principal  शहरी  planner , Oscar Niemeyer as the principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape designer .
Brasilia is in  the  Unesco 's World Hertitage List due to its architecture .
On April 22 , 1960  ,  it formally became Brazil 's national capital .
Viewed from above , the  प्रमुख  portion  of  the city  resembles  an airplane  or  a butterfly .
the  city is commonly referred to as  पूंजी  Federal  ,  or simply  bsb  .
Residents  of  Brasília are known as brasilienses  or  candangos ( the latter referring to those not born in the city but who migrated there after it was established ) .
In local usage , the word `` Brasília '' usually  refers  only to the First Administrative Region ( RA I ) within the Federal District ( Distrito Federal ) ,  जहाँ  the most important government buildings are located  .
Brasília has a  अद्वितीय  status in Brazil , as it is an administrative division rather than a legal municipality like nearly all cities in Brazil .
Nationally , the term is almost always used synonymously with the Federal  ज़िला  , which constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit , analogous to a state .
अनेक  `` satellite  शहरों   ''  exist which are also part of the Federal District .
Brasília International Airport is the main airport in Brasília , connecting the capital to all major Brazilian cities and many international destinations .
It  is  the third most important airport in Brazil , in terms of passengers  और   वायुयान  movements .
Personifications of Germany , France , Russia ,  austria-hungary  , and the United Kingdom  attempting  to keep the lid  on  the simmering cauldron of imperialist and nationalist tensions in the Balkans  to  prevent a general European war .
They were successful in 1912  और  1913 but  किया  not succeed in in 1914 .
The causes of World War I , which began in central Europe in  लेट  July 1914 and finished in 1918 , included many  कारकों  , such as the conflicts and hostility of the four  दशकों  leading up to the war .
Militarism  ,  alliances , imperialism , and nationalism played  प्रमुख  roles in the conflict as well .
The immediate origins of the war  ,  however , lay in the decisions taken by statesmen  और  generals during the Crisis of 1914 , casus belli for which was the assassination of  archduke  Franz Ferdinand ( the Archduke  of  Austria Hungary ) and his wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip , an irredentist Serb .
the  crisis came after a long and difficult series of diplomatic clashes  between  the Great Powers ( Italy , France , Germany , the British Empire , the  austria-hungarian  Empire and Russia ) over European and colonial issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high .
In turn these diplomatic  clashes  can be traced to changes in the balance  of  power in Europe since 1867  .
The more  तात्कालिक  cause  लिये  the war  थी  tensions  over  territory in the Balkans .
Austria-Hungary competed with Serbia and Russia for territory and influence in the region  और  they pulled the  बाकी  of the Great Powers  into  the conflict through their various alliances and treaties .
Although the chain of events unleashed  by  the assassination triggered the war , the war  's  origins go deeper , involving national politics , cultures , economics , and a complex web of alliances and counterbalances that had developed between  the  various European powers since 1870 .
कुछ  of the most important long term  or  structural causes are :  the  growth of nationalism across Europe , unresolved territorial disputes , an intricate system of alliances , the perceived breakdown  of  the balance of power in Europe  ,   convoluted  and fragmented governance , the arms races of the previous decades , previous  सैन्य  planning , imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth , power and prestige , and  आर्थिक  and military rivalry in industry  और   व्यापार  – e.g. , the Pig War between Austria and Serbia .
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic  संकट  that preceded the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g. ,  the  German belief that the United Kingdom would remain neutral ) and  देरी   और   misunderstandings  in diplomatic communications  .
The various categories  of  explanation for World  युद्ध  I correspond to  अलग  historians ' overall methods .
Most historians and popular commentators include  कल्याणकारी  from more than one category of  स्पष्टीकरण  to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war .
The deepest distinction among these accounts is between stories that  देखिए  it as the inevitable and predictable outcome of certain factors , and those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake .
In attributing causes for  the  war , historians and academics had to deal with  an  unprecedented flood of memoirs and official documents  ,  released as each country involved tried to  avoid  blame for starting the war .
Early releases of  सूचना  by governments , particularly those released for use by the `` Commission on the  जिम्मेदारी  of the  लेखक  of the War ''  यहूद  shown to be incomplete and biased  .
In  जोड  some documents ,  विशेषकर   राजनयिक   केबल  between Russia and France , were found to  have  been doctored .
Even in  बाद   दशकों   however  , when much more information had been released , historians from the same culture have been shown to come to differing  conclusions   on  the causes of the war .
जॉनसन  's new chart of national emblems , published c. 1868 .
The large  ध्वज  shown in the corners  हैं  the 37-star flag of the United States ( flown  1867-1877  ) , the  royal  Standard of the United Kingdom , the Russian Imperial Standard  ,  and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle  .
विभिन्न  other  ध्वज  flown by ships are  दिखाया   .
The Flag of Cuba is  labelled  `` Cuban ( so called ) ``  .
The Chinese dragon on the  ध्वज  of China  थी  drawn mistakenly as a  पश्चिमी  dragon .
A national flag is a flag that symbolizes a country .
The flag is flown  by  the government , but usually can  भी  be flown by citizens of the country  .
Both  पब्लिक  and  निजी  buildings such as schools and courthouses may fly the national flag .
In some countries , the national flags are only flown from non-military buildings on  निश्चित  flag days .
There are three distinct types of  नेशनल  flag for use on land , and three for use at sea , though many countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes all  )  of these types  of  flag .
The American Civil  युद्ध  ( ACW ) ,  भी  known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming  )  , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the  ``  North  ''  )  और  several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States  of  America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां  did not intervene .
After four years of bloody  कॉम्बैट  that  बाएँ  over 600,000 soldiers dead  और  destroyed much  of  the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished  ,  and the difficult Reconstruction process of  restoring  national unity and guaranteeing rights to  the   freed   स्लेव  began .
in  the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by  अब्राहम  Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into  संयुक्त  States  '  territories .
Lincoln won , but  पहले  his inauguration on March  4  , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
outgoing   लोकतांत्रिक  President James  बुकानन  and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would  नहीं  initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by  the  Confederacy .
A Peace Conference  विफल  to find a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
The  confederates  assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
lincoln  called  लिये  each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four more  स्लेव  states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border  राज्य  and established  a  naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn  1862  Confederate campaign into Maryland  (  a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam  ,  dissuading British intervention .
lincoln  issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा  , which made ending  गुलामी  a war goal  .
To the west , by  गर्मियाँ  1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy  ,  then  much  of  उनके  western armies , and the Union  at  Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg  .
पश्चिमी  successes led  to  Ulysses S.  ग्रान्ट  command of all Union armies in 1864  .
In  the  Western Theater , William T.  शरमन  drove east to capture Atlanta and marched  to  the sea  ,  destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the  overland  Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending  confederate  army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on  अप्रैल  9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest  सच्चा  industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced weapons  यहूद  employed extensively .
The  mobilization  of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food  आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war  in  American history ,  resulting  in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates  the  death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years  बूढ़ा  ,  और  30 percent  of  all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Norrie disease is a genetic disorder that primarily affects the eye and almost always  लीड  to blindness .
In addition to the congenital ocular  लक्षण  , some patients suffer from a  प्रगतिशील  hearing loss starting mostly in their 2nd decade  of  life , while another  portion   may  be mentally challenged .
Patients with  norrie  disease may develop cataracts , leukocoria ( a  कंडीशन  where  the  pupils  appear  white when  लाइट  is shone on  उन्हें  ) , along with other developmental issues in the eye , such as shrinking of the globe and the wasting  दूर  of the iris .
Around  30–50  % of them will also have developmental delay/ mental retardation , psychotic-like features , incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities .
Most patients are born with normal hearing ; however , the onset of hearing loss is very common in early adolescence .
परिचय   15  %  of  the patients are estimated to develop all the features  of  the disease .
The disease affects almost only male infants  at  birth or soon after birth , because the  बीमारी   is  inherited X-linked recessive .
Only in very rare cases , females have been  diagnosed  with Norrie disease as well .
The exact incidence number is unknown  ;  only a  few  hundred cases have been  reported  so far .
It is a very rare disorder that is not associated with any specific ethnic or racial groups .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered into  voluntarily  by two or more parties ,  प्रत्येक  of whom intends  to  create one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements of a contract are ``  प्रस्ताव  '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity who exchange `` consideration ''  to  create  ``  mutuality of obligation . ''
Proof of some or  सब  of these elements may be done in writing , though contracts  may  be made entirely orally or by conduct .
The remedy for breach of contract can be  ``  damages '' in the form  of  compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction .
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the  ``  benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages , which are greater than mere  रिलायंस  damages ,  as  in promissory estoppel .
The parties may be natural  व्यक्तियों   or  juristic persons  .
A contract is  a  legally enforceable promise or undertaking that something will or will  नहीं  occur .
The word promise can be used  as  a legal synonym for contract  ,  although care is required as a promise may not have the full standing of a contract , as when it is an agreement without  विचार  .
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another , including differences in  आम  law compared to civil  विधि  , the impact of received law , particularly from England in common law countries  ,  and of  विधि  codified in regional legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example , there are  40   प्रासंगिक  acts which impact  on  the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / national ) level , and an additional 26 acts at  the  level of  the  state  of   nsw  .
In addition there  हैं  6  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  instruments or conventions  जिससे  are applicable for international dealings ,  ऐसे  as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
ASP.NET is a server-side Web application framework designed for Web  विकास  to produce dynamic Web pages .
It  थी  developed by Microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic web sites , web applications and web services .
It was first released in  जनवरी  2002 with version 1.0 of the .NET Framework , and  is  the  successor  to Microsoft 's Active Server Pages ( ASP )  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
ASP.NET is built  on  the Common Language Runtime (  clr  ) , allowing programmers to write ASP.NET code  using  any supported .NET language .
The ASP.NET SOAP  एक्सटेंशन   फ्रेमवर्क  allows ASP.NET components to process SOAP messages .
lysergic  acid diethylamide  ,  abbreviated LSD or LSD-25 , also known as lysergide ( INN  )  and  colloquially  as acid , is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline family , well  ज्ञात  for its psychological effects which can include altered thinking processes , closed  और  open eye visuals , synesthesia , an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences , as well as for its key role  in  1960s counterculture .
it  is used mainly as an entheogen , recreational  ड्रग  , and  as  an agent in psychedelic therapy .
LSD is non-addictive , is not known  to  cause brain damage , and has  अत्यधिक  low toxicity  सापेक्ष  to dose .
However , adverse psychiatric reactions such  as  anxiety , paranoia , and delusions are  संभावित  .
LSD was first synthesized  by  Albert Hofmann in 1938 from ergotamine , a chemical derived by Arthur Stoll from  ergot  , a grain fungus that typically grows on rye .
The short form `` LSD '' comes from its early  कोड   नाम  LSD-25 , which is an abbreviation for the German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed  by  a sequential number .
LSD is sensitive to oxygen , ultraviolet light , and chlorine , especially in solution , though its potency may last  लिये  years if it  is  stored away from light and moisture at low temperature .
In pure form it is a colorless , odorless , tasteless solid .
LSD  is  typically delivered orally , usually on a substrate  ऐसे  as absorbent  blotter  paper , a sugar cube , or gelatin .
In its liquid  रूप  , it can also be administered  by  intramuscular or intravenous injection  .
LSD is very potent , with 20–30 μg ( micrograms )  होने  the threshold dose .
New  प्रयोग  with LSD started in 2009 for the first time in 40  सालो  .
Introduced by Sandoz Laboratories ,  साथ  trade-name Delysid  ,  as a drug with various psychiatric uses in 1947 , LSD quickly became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show  ग्रेट  promise  .
In the 1950s , officials at the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA )  विचार  the drug  might  be applicable to mind control and  रासायनिक  warfare  ;  the agency 's  mkultra  research program  propagated  the drug among young servicemen and students .
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth culture in the Western world during the 1960s led to a political firestorm that resulted in its prohibition  .
Currently  ,  a number of organizations—including the Beckley Foundation ,  मानचित्र  , Heffter Research Institute and the Albert  hofmann  Foundation—exist to fund , encourage and coordinate research  into  the medicinal and spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics .
The United States Navy 's Sea , Air , Land Teams , commonly known as the Navy SEALs , are the U.S. Navy 's principal special operations force and a part of the  नवल  Special Warfare Command  और  United States Special Operations Command .
`` SEAL ''  is  always capitalized  in  reference to members of the Naval Special Warfare community .
The acronym is  निकला  from their capacity  to  operate at sea , in  the   एयर  , and on  जमीन  .
SEALs are male members of the United States  नेवी  .
An exchange program with the Coast  गार्ड   ,  which graduated three Coast Guardsmen as SEALs , was suspended in 2011 .
the  CIA 's highly  गुपचुप  Special Activities  प्रभाग  ( SAD ) and more specifically its elite Special Operations Group ( SOG ) recruits operators from the SEAL Teams .
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA operations  go  back to the famed MACV-SOG during the Vietnam War .
This cooperation still exists today and is seen in the wars in  इराकी  and Afghanistan ,  और  in the  ढूंढना  and killing of Osama bin Laden in  पाकिस्तानी  .
World population estimates  इससे  1800 to 2100 , based on UN  2010   projections  ( red  ,  orange , green ) and  us  Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ) .
Actual recorded  जनसांख्यिकी  figures are in  ब्लू  .
According  to  the highest estimate , the  संसार  population may rise  to  16 billion by  2100  ; according to the lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
the  world population is the total  क्रमांक  of living humans  on  Earth .
As  of  today  ,   it  is estimated to number billion by the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
The USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a  पृथक  estimate  by  the United Nations Population Fund , it reached  इस  milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the Black Death in  1350  , when it stood at around  370  million .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8  %  per year – were  देखी   briefly  during the 1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at  2.2  % in 1963 , and had declined to 1.1  %  by 2011 .
कुल  annual births were highest in the  लेट  1980s at about 138 million  ,  and are  अभी  expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level  of  134  लाख  , while deaths  क्रमांक  56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040  .
Current projections show a  जारी  increase in population in the  निकट  future  (  but a steady decline in the population growth rate ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term  estimates  predict further  विकास  , stagnation , or even overall decline  in   the   वैश्विक  population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further  संसार  population growth , citing  the  growing pressures  on  the environment , global food supplies , and energy  संसाधन   .
Memphis is a city in the southwestern corner of the U.S. state of Tennessee , and  the  county  सीट  of Shelby County .
The city is located on the 4th Chickasaw Bluff , south of the confluence of the Wolf and Mississippi rivers .
Memphis had a  जनसांख्यिकी  of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the state of Tennessee , the largest city on the Mississippi River , the third largest in the Southeastern United States  ,  and the 20th largest in the  संयुक्त  States .
The greater Memphis metropolitan area , including adjacent counties in Mississippi and Arkansas , had a 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,316,100  .
This makes Memphis  the  second  largest  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  in Tennessee , surpassed only by metropolitan Nashville , which has  overtaken   मेम्फिस  in recent years .
Memphis is the  youngest  of Tennessee 's major cities .
A resident of Memphis  is  referred to as a Memphian  ,  and the Memphis region is known , particularly to media outlets , as  ``  Memphis & The Mid-South `` .

France produces around three quarters of its electricity by nuclear power .

Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30 , 2011 ,  कि  Germany’s 17 nuclear  शक्ति  stations  होगा   be  shut down  by  2022 , in a policy  reversal  following Japan 's  फुकुशिमा  Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors are  अंतर्गत  construction in 15 countries .
Nuclear power stations operate in thirty countries .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors  यहूद   अपेक्षित  to become operational per year , although according to the World Nuclear Association , of the 17 civilian reactors  नियोजित   to  become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As of  जून  2011  ,  Germany and Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia  ,  Austria , Denmark , Greece ,  आयरलैंड  , Italy , Latvia , Liechtenstein ,  ध्वज  , Malaysia  ,  Malta  ,  New Zealand  ,  Norway and  पुर्तगाल  remain opposed to nuclear power .
Skeletal muscles  होमो  sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the human anatomy .
There are  लगभग  642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one  भाग  of a pair  of  identical bilateral muscles ,  मिला  on both sides , resulting in approximately 320  pairs  of muscles , as presented in this article .
nevertheless  , the exact number is difficult to  define  because different sources  समूह  muscles differently , e.g  .  regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or  as  several  मांसपेशियां   .
Examples range from 640 to 850  .
the  muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of groups which include muscles relating  to  the head and neck , muscles of the torso or  ट्रंक  , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers to the action  of  each muscle from the standard anatomical position .
In other positions , other actions may be performed .
