The Seminole Wars , also known as the Florida Wars , were three conflicts in Florida between the Seminole — the collective name given to the amalgamation of various groups  of  native Americans and Black people who settled in  फ्लोरिडा  in the early 18th century — and the United States Army  .
The  पहला  Seminole War  थी  from 1814 to  1819  ( although sources differ ) , the Second Seminole War from 1835 to 1842 , and  the  Third Seminole War from 1855 to 1858 .
The first conflict with the Seminoles arose out of tensions  relating  to  सामान्य  Andrew Jackson 's attack  और  destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816 .
Jackson also attacked the Spanish at Pensacola .
Ultimately , the Spanish Crown ceded the colony to United States rule .

it  was  पहला  settled in 1774 and named in honor of Chief Joseph Orono  of  the Penobscot Nation .
It is home to  the  University of Maine .
The population was 10,362 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .

Luxor Las Vegas is a hotel and  कसीनो  on the Las Vegas Strip  in  Paradise , Nevada  .
The 30-story hotel , owned and operated by MGM Resorts International , has a casino with over 2,000 slot machines and 87 table games .
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation , it has a new , highly modernized , and contemporary design and contains a total of 4,400 rooms , including 442 suites , lining the interior walls of a pyramid style tower and within twin  22-story  ziggurat towers that were built as later additions .
the  hotel is named after the city of  लक्सर  ( ancient  thebes   )  in  मिश्र  .
Luxor is the second largest  होटल  in Las Vegas ( the  largest  being the MGM Grand )  और  the eighth largest in the world  .
As of 2010 , the Luxor has a 4 Key rating from the Green Key Eco-Rating Program , which evaluates `` sustainable '' hotel operations .
A pilot experiment , also  पुकारा  a pilot study , is a small scale preliminary study conducted in order to evaluate feasibility , time , cost , adverse events , and effect size ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior  to  performance of a full-scale research project .
Pilot studies  ,  therefore , may not be appropriate for case studies .
The Los Angeles Fire  विभाग  ( LAFD  )  is the agency that provides fire  सुरक्षा  and emergency medical services for the city of Los Angeles .
It may be unofficially referred to  as  the  लॉस  Angeles City Fire Department to distinguish it from the Los Angeles County Fire Department .
The acre is a unit of  क्षेत्रफल  used in the imperial and U.S. customary systems .
An acre is  परिचय  40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller  than  an American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United States ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Burma and the United Kingdom ( as  of  2010  ,  the acre is  no  longer officially used in the United Kingdom , though is still used in real estate descriptions ) .
It is still used , to some extent  ,  in Canada .
The international symbol of the acre is ac , and is defined as 1/640  of  a square mile  .
The most commonly used  एकड़  today is the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  acre .
In the United States both the international acre and the slightly different US survey acre are in use .
The most common use of the acre is  to  measure tracts of land .
One international acre is defined as 4046.8564224 square  मीटर  .
During the Middle Ages , an acre was the amount of land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen .

Broca 's and Wernicke 's Areas
Language processing refers to the way human  beings  use words to communicate ideas and feelings ,  और  how such communications are processed and understood .
Thus it is how the brain  creates  and understands language .
Most recent  theories  consider that this process is carried out entirely by and inside the brain .
This is considered one of the most characteristic abilities of the human species - perhaps the most characteristic .
However very little is known about it and there is huge  पैमाना  for research on it .
Most of the knowledge acquired to  तिथि  on  the  subject has  आइये  from patients who have suffered some type of significant head injury , whether external ( wounds , bullets ) or  आतंरिक  ( strokes , tumors ,  अपक्षयी  diseases ) .
Studies have shown that most of the language processing functions are carried out in the cerebral cortex  .
The essential function of the cortical language areas is symbolic representation .
Even though language  exists  in different forms , all of them are based on symbolic representation .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4  is  a mid-engined grand touring car , designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super Sport  संस्करण  of the Veyron is  the  fastest street-legal production car in the world , with a top speed of .
The original  संस्करण   रै  a top speed of .
It was named Car of  the   दशक  ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best Car Driven All Year award in 2005 .
on  6  अप्रैल  2013 , Bugatti set  the  record for the fastest roadster in the world with the Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse , reaching on average a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was  hartmut  Warkuss , and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen , with much of the  अभियान्त्रिकी  work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A number of special variants  have  been produced .
in   दिसम्बर  2010 , Bugatti began offering prospective buyers the  क्षमता  to customize exterior and interiors colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque  's  official  जालस्थल  .
DVD  is   an  optical disc storage format ,  invented  and  विकसित   by  Philips , Sony , Toshiba , and Panasonic in 1995  .
DVDs offer higher storage capacity than compact discs while having the same  आयाम  .
Pre-recorded DVDs are  mass-produced  using molding machines that physically stamp data onto the DVD .
Such discs are known as DVD- ROM , because  आंकड़ा  can only be read and not written nor erased .
Blank  recordable  DVD  discs  ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using  a  DVD recorder and then function as a DVD-ROM . Rewritable DVDs ( DVD-RW , DVD+RW , and DVD-RAM ) can be recorded and erased multiple times .
DVDs are used in DVD-Video consumer digital video format and in DVD-Audio consumer digital audio format , as well as for authoring AVCHD discs .
DVDs containing other  प्रकार  of information may  be  referred to as DVD data discs .
What Chilli  wants  is an American reality  श्रेणी  on  vh1  starring Chilli  ,  one-third of the Grammy  पुरस्कार  -winning R & B  तिकड़ी  TLC .
The show chronicles Chilli 's quest to find love with the help of Tionna T. Smalls , an  लेखक  and  संबंध  coach .
The series  premiered  on April 11 , 2010 , and  रै  since been renewed  लिये  a  दूसरी  season .
The second season premiered on Sunday , January  2  , 2011 .
Peter Gene  hernandez  ( born October 8  ,  1985 ) , known by his stage name Bruno Mars , is an American singer-songwriter and record producer .
Raised in  होनोलूलू  , Hawaii ,  by  a  परिवार  of  संगीतकारों  , Mars began making music  at  a  यंग  age and performed in various musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood .
He graduated from high school and then moved to Los Angeles ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , to  pursue   a  musical career .
Mars produced songs for other artists ,  joining  production team The  smeezingtons  .
Mars had an unsuccessful stint with  motown  Records , but then signed with Atlantic in  2009  .
He became recognized as a  सोलो  artist after lending his vocals and co-writing the hooks for the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B , and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy .
He also co-wrote the hits `` Right Round `` by Flo Rida featuring Ke $ ha , and `` Wavin  '  Flag `` by K'naan .
In October 2010 , he released  उसके  debut  एल्बम  , Doo-Wops & Hooligans .
Anchored by the worldwide  number-one  singles `` Just the Way You  हैं  ``  और  `` Grenade `` , the album peaked at number three on  the  Billboard 200 .
Mars  थी  nominated for seven Grammys at the 53rd Grammy Awards  ,  winning Best Male  पॉप  Vocal Performance for `` Just the Way You Are '' .
उसके  second studio album , Unorthodox Jukebox , was released on  दिसम्बर  11  ,  2012 .
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide variety of styles  और  influences , and  contains  elements of  अनेक  musical genres .
He has worked with an assortment of artists from  विभिन्न  genres .
As a child ,  he  was highly influenced by artists such as Little Richard  ,  Elvis Presley and Michael Jackson and would often impersonate these artists from a young age .
Mars also  incorporates  reggae - and Motown  -inspired  sounds into his work .
Worldwide , Mars became the best-selling digital artist  in  2011 .
He had three singles in the top ten ,  सहित  first  प्लेस  with `` Just the Way You Are '' , which sold  12.5  million copies .
Mars won  बेहतरीन  International Male Solo Artist at the 2012 BRIT  पुरस्कार   .
Bruno Mars has sold 6 million albums and 40  लाख  singles worldwide as a singer .
Althought as a song-writer , producer and singer his total single download sales surpass  100  million worldwide .

Greek mythology is the body of myths and teachings that belong to the ancient Greeks , concerning their gods and heroes , the nature of the world , and the origins and significance of  उनके  own cult and ritual practices  .
It was a part of the  धर्म  in ancient Greece and is part of  धर्म  in modern  यूनानियों  and around the world , known as Hellenismos .
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt  to  throw light on the religious and political institutions of Ancient Greece and its civilization , and to gain understanding of the nature  of  myth-making itself .
Greek mythology  is  explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives , and implicitly in Greek representational arts , such as vase-paintings and votive gifts .
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world ,  और   विवरण   the  lives and adventures of a wide variety  of  gods , goddesses , heroes , heroines , and  पौराणिक  creatures .
These accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic tradition ; today the Greek myths are  ज्ञात  primarily from Greek literature .
The  oldest  known Greek literary sources ,  होमर  's epic poems Iliad  और  Odyssey , focus on events surrounding the Trojan War .
Two  कविताएं  by Homer 's near  समकालीन  Hesiod , the Theogony and the Works and Days , contain accounts of the genesis of the  संसार  , the succession of divine rulers , the succession of  इंसान  ages , the origin of human woes , and the origin of sacrificial practices .
Myths are  भी  preserved in the Homeric Hymns , in fragments  of   एपिक  poems of the Epic  साईकिल   ,  in lyric poems , in the works of the tragedians of the fifth century BC  ,  in writings of scholars and  कवियों  of the Hellenistic Age , and in texts from the time of  the  Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias .
Archaeological findings provide a  प्रिंसिपल  source of detail about Greek mythology , with gods and  नायक  featured prominently in the decoration of many artifacts  .
Geometric designs on pottery of  the  eighth century BC depict scenes from the Trojan cycle as well as the adventures  of  Heracles .
In the succeeding Archaic , Classical  ,  and Hellenistic  अवधि  , Homeric and various other mythological scenes appear , supplementing the existing literary evidence  .
Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the culture , arts , and literature of Western civilization and remains part  of  Western heritage and language .
Poets and artists from  प्राचीन  times to  the  present have derived inspiration  इससे  Greek mythology and have discovered contemporary  significance  and relevance in  the  themes .

Mouth & MacNeal was a pop duo from the Netherlands .

The Boise State Broncos football program represents Boise  राज्य  University in college  फ़ुटबॉल  and compete in  the  Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS  )  of Division I as a member of the Mountain West Conference .
They are currently led by head coach Chris Petersen and play their home games at Bronco Stadium .
The franc ( sign : Fr . or SFr . ; German : Franken , French  और  Romansh : franc , Italian : franco ;  कोड  : CHF ) is the currency  और  legal tender of Switzerland and Liechtenstein  ;  it is also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione d'Italia .
Although not formally legal tender in the German exclave Büsingen ( the sole legal currency is the euro  )  ,  it  is in wide daily use  वहीँ   .
The Swiss National Bank issues banknotes and the federal mint Swissmint issues coins .
the  Swiss  फ़्रैंक  is the only version of the franc still issued in Europe .
The smaller denomination , a  hundredth  of a franc , is  a  Rappen ( Rp . ) in German , centime ( c. ) in French , centesimo ( ct. )  in  Italian , and rap ( rp . ) in Romansh  .
The ISO code of the currency used by banks and financial institutions  is  CHF , although `` Fr  .  '' is used by most businesses and  विज्ञापनदाता  ; some use SFr . ; the Latinate  ``  CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica .
Given the different languages used  in  Switzerland  ,   लैटिन  is used for language-neutral inscriptions on  the  coins .
Sir  चार्ल्स  Spencer `` Charlie '' Chaplin  ,  ( 16 April 188925 December 1977 ) was a British comic actor and filmmaker who rose to  कीर्ति  in the silent era .
Chaplin became a worldwide icon through his screen persona  ``  the Tramp `` and is considered one of the most important figures of the film industry .
His career  spanned  more than  75  years , from a child in the Victorian era to close to his death at  the  age of 88 , and encompassed both adulation and  विवाद  .
Raised in London , Chaplin 's childhood was defined by poverty and hardship .
He was sent  to   a  workhouse twice before the age of  नौ  ; his  पिता  was absent , and his mother was committed to  a  mental asylum .
Chaplin began performing from a young age , touring music halls and later  working  as a stage actor and comedian .
At 19 he  थी  signed to the prestigious Fred Karno company , which took him  to  America .
चैपलिन   थी  scouted by the film industry , and  बना   उसके   पहला  appearances in 1914 with Keystone Studios .
He  जल्द  developed the Tramp persona and formed a large fan  आधार  .
Chaplin  निर्देशित  his films from an early stage , and continued  to  hone his craft as he moved to  the  Essanay , Mutual , and First National corporations .
by   1918   ,  he was one of the most famous men in the world .
In 1919 , Chaplin co-founded the distribution company United Artists , giving him complete control over his films .
His first feature-length picture was The  बच्चा  ( 1921  )  , followed by A Woman of  पेरिस  ( 1923 ) , The Gold  फटाफट  ( 1925 ) , and The Circus (  1928  ) .
He refused to move  to  sound films in the 1930s , instead producing City Lights (  1931  )  और  Modern  टाइम्स  ( 1936  )  without dialogue .
चैपलिन  became increasingly political and his next film , The Great Dictator  (  1940 ) , satirised Adolf Hitler .
The 1940s was a decade marked with controversy  लिये  Chaplin , and his popularity declined rapidly .
He  थी  accused of communist sympathies , while his involvement  in  a paternity suit and marriages to much younger women were considered scandalous .
An FBI investigation was opened on Chaplin , and he was eventually forced to leave the United States and settle in Switzerland .
He abandoned the Tramp for his later films , which include Monsieur Verdoux  (  1947 ) , Limelight ( 1952 ) , A King in New York (  1957  ) , and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ) .
Chaplin wrote , directed , produced  ,  edited , scored , and starred in most of his films .
He was a perfectionist ,  और  his financial independence meant he often spent years on the development and production of a picture .
His films are characterised by slapstick combined with pathos , and often feature the Tramp struggling  विरूद्ध   adversity   .
Many  contain  social and political themes , as well as autobiographical elements .
in  1972  ,  as part of a renewed appreciation for his work , Chaplin received an Honorary Academy Award for `` the incalculable effect he has  था  in making motion pictures the art form  of  this century '' .
he   continues   to  be held in high regard , with The Gold Rush , City Lights , Modern Times , and The Great  तानाशाह  often ranked among the greatest films of all time .
Planned Parenthood Federation of  अमेरिका   (  PPFA )  ,  commonly shortened to Planned Parenthood , is the U.S. affiliate of  the  International Planned Parenthood Federation  (  IPPF ) and one of its larger members .
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing  reproductive  health and maternal and child health services .
the  Planned Parenthood Action Fund , Inc. ( PPAF ) is a  सम्बन्धित  organization which lobbies for pro-choice  विधान  , comprehensive sex education , and access to  सस्ती   स्वास्थ्य   परवाह  in the  संयुक्त  States .
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive health services , including cancer screening , HIV screening and  counseling  , contraception , and abortion .
Contraception accounts for 35 % of PPFA 's total  सेवाएं  and abortions account for 3 % ;  ppfa  conducts roughly 300,000 abortions  प्रत्येक  year , among 3 million people served .
The  संगठन   रै  its roots  in  Brooklyn , New York , where Margaret Sanger  खोली   the  country 's first birth-control clinic .
Sanger  संस्थापित  the American  जनम  Control League in 1921 ,  जिससे  in 1942 became part  of   the  Planned Parenthood Federation of America .
Since then , Planned Parenthood has grown to have over 820 clinic locations  in  the U.S. ,  साथ  a total budget of US $ 1 billion .
PPFA provides an array of services to over  तीन  million people in the United States  ,  and supports services for over one million clients outside the United States .
Mens rea is Latin for `` guilty mind  ''  .
In criminal law ,  it  is viewed as one of the necessary elements of some crimes .
The  मानक  common  विधि  test of criminal  देयता  is usually expressed in the Latin phrase , actus non facit reum nisi mens  बैठना   rea   ,  which means `` the act is not culpable unless the mind is guilty '' .
Thus , in jurisdictions with due process , there must be an  actus  reus , or `` guilty act , '' accompanied by  कुछ  level of mens rea to constitute the  अपराधों  with which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ) .
As a  सामान्य  rule , criminal  देयता  does not attach to a person who acted with the absence of mental fault .
The exception is strict liability crimes .
In civil law , it is usually not necessary to prove a subjective mental element to establish liability for breach of contract or tort , for example .
However , if a tort is intentionally committed  or  a contract is  intentionally  breached , such intent may increase  the  scope of liability as well as the measure of damages  देय  to the plaintiff .
Therefore , mens rea refers to  the  mental element of the offence that accompanies the actus reus .
In some jurisdictions , the terms mens rea and actus reus have  महरूम  replaced by alternative terminology .
In Australia , for example , the elements of  the  federal offences are now designated as `` fault elements '' or `` mental elements '' (  पुरुषों   rea  ) and `` physical elements '' or `` external  तत्व  '' ( actus reus ) .
This terminology was adopted to replace the obscurity of the Latin terms with simple  और  accurate phrasing .
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27 ,  1822  – July 23 , 1885 ) was the 18th President  of  the United States  (  1869–1877 ) following  उसके  highly successful role as a war general in the second half  of  the Civil War .
Under Grant , the Union Army defeated the Confederate military ; having effectively ended the war and secession with the surrender of Robert E. Lee 's army at Appomattox .
As president he led the Radical Republicans in their effort to eliminate all  vestiges  of Confederate nationalism and slavery  .
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the South and  having  desired to protect African American citizenship , President Grant  effectively  destroyed the Ku Klux Klan in 1871  .
ग्रान्ट  was the first President to establish Civil Service reform having  निर्मित  a two-year federally  वित्तपोषित  Civil Service Commission in 1871 .
In terms of foreign policy , Grant revealed an `` unexpected capacity for deliberation and  परामर्श  '' that promoted  the  national interest .
His reputation was marred by his repeated defense  of  corrupt appointees , and  by  America 's first industrial age economic depression ( called the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) that dominated his second term .
Although his Republican  पार्टी  split in 1872 with reformers denouncing him , Grant was easily reelected .
by  1875 the conservative white Southern opposition regained control of every state in the South and as he left the White House in March 1877 his policies were being undone .
A career soldier , he graduated from the United  राज्य  Military Academy at  वेस्ट  Point and served in the Mexican–American War .
When the Civil War began in 1861 , Grant  प्रशिक्षित   संघ  volunteer regiments in Illinois  .
in   1862  , as a general he fought a series of battles and was promoted to major general after  forcing  the surrender of a large  confederate  army and gaining control of Kentucky  और   सबसे   of  Tennessee .
he   तब  led Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh , earning a  प्रतिष्ठा   as  an aggressive commander .
In July 1863 , after a long , complex campaign , Grant defeated five uncoordinated Confederate armies (  capturing  one of them )  और  seized Vicksburg .
This famous victory gave the  संघ  full control of  the   मिसिसिपी  River , split off  the  western Confederacy , and opened the way for more Union triumphs .
After another win at the Battle of Chattanooga in late 1863 ,  अध्यक्ष  Abraham Lincoln made  उसे  lieutenant general  और  commander of all  of  the Union Armies .
As  commanding  general of the army , Grant  confronted   रॉबर्ट  E. Lee in a series of very bloody  लड़ाइयों  in 1864 known as the Overland Campaign that ended  साथ  the bottling up  of  Lee at Petersburg , outside the  confederate  capital of Richmond  .
During the siege ,  ग्रान्ट  coordinated  a  series of devastating  अभियान  launched by William Tecumseh Sherman , Philip Sheridan , and George Thomas .
Finally breaking through Lee 's trenches , the Union Army captured Richmond in April 1865 .
Lee surrendered  उसके  depleted forces to Grant at Appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed .
Although pro-Confederate historians attacked Grant as a ruthless butcher who won by brute force , most historians  have  hailed  उसके  military genius .
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President  stabilized  the nation after the American Civil War and during the turbulent Reconstruction period that followed  .
As president  ,  he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws and fighting Ku Klux Klan violence .
ग्रान्ट  won passage of the Fifteenth Amendment ; giving constitutional protection for African-American voting rights .
He used the army to  निर्माण  the  रिपब्लिकन  Party in the South , based on black voters , Northern newcomers ( `` Carpetbaggers `` ) and native white supporters (  ``  Scalawags . '' )
as  a result , African Americans were represented in the U.S. Congress for the first time in American history in 1870 .
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by having broken the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress , the creation of the  फलक  of Indian Commissioners to make reform recommendations , and  उसके  enlistment  of  Quaker Protestants who controlled mid western  भारतीय   एजेंसियों  , that effectively curbed Congressional patronage .
ग्रान्ट  remained determined in keeping Indians from being exterminated from white settler encroachment or by the U.S. military .
Grant 's reputation as president by 1875 was at an all-time  ऊँची  for his previous veto of  the  Inflation  विधेयक  , the  ड्योढ़ी  of the Resumption of Specie Act ,  और  Secretary  bristow  's  कामयाब  raids  कि  shut  bas  the Whiskey Ring .
Grant 's foreign  नीति  ,  led   by  Secretary of State Hamilton  मछली  ,  implemented  International Arbitration , settled the Alabama Claims with Britain  और  avoided war with Spain over the Virginius Affair .
A jukebox is a partially automated music-playing device , usually a coin-operated machine , that will play a patron 's selection from self-contained media .
The classic jukebox has buttons with letters and numbers on them that , when entered in  संयोजन   ,  are used to  खेल  a specific selection .
A drug test is a technical analysis of a biological specimen – for example urine , hair , blood , sweat , or oral  द्रव  / saliva – to determine the presence or absence of specified parent drugs or their metabolites  .
Major uses of drug testing are to detect the presence of performance enhancing steroids in sport or  लिये  drugs prohibited by laws , such as cannabis , cocaine and heroin .
A `` 10-panel urine screen '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( including Methamphetamine )
Barbiturates
Benzodiazepines
Cannabinoids ( THC )
Cocaine
Methadone
methaqualone
Opiates (  codeine  , Morphine  ,  Heroin , Oxycodone , Hydrocodone , etc . )
Phencyclidine ( PCP )
propoxyphene
Saturn V rocket , used for the American manned lunar landing missions
Space exploration is the  डिस्कवरी  and exploration of outer space by means of space technology .
Physical exploration of space  is  conducted both by human spaceflights and by robotic spacecraft  .
While the observation of objects in space , known as astronomy , predates reliable recorded history , it was the  विकास  of large and relatively efficient rockets during  the  early 20th century  कि   अनुमत  physical space exploration to  become  a reality .
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing scientific research , uniting different  राष्ट्र  , ensuring the future survival of humanity and developing military and strategic advantages against other countries  .
Various criticisms  of  space exploration are sometimes made .
Space exploration has often been used as  a  proxy competition for  geopolitical  rivalries such as the Cold War .
the  early era of space  खोजी  was driven by a  ``  Space Race `` between the Soviet Union and the United States , the launch of the first  man-made  object to orbit the  धरती  , the USSR 's Sputnik 1 , on 4 October 1957 , and the first Moon landing by the American Apollo 11  शिल्प   on  20 July 1969 are often taken  as  the boundaries for this initial  काल  .
The Soviet space program achieved many of  the  first milestones , including the first  जीना  being in orbit in 1957 , the first human spaceflight ( Yuri Gagarin aboard Vostok 1  )  in 1961 ,  the  first spacewalk ( by Aleksei Leonov ) on 18 March 1965 , the  पहला   स्वचालित  landing on another  celestial  body in 1966 , and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971 .
After  the  first 20 years of exploration , focus shifted from one-off flights to renewable hardware , such as the Space Shuttle program , and from competition to cooperation as with the International Space  स्टेशन  ( ISS )  .
With the substantial completion of the  iss  following STS-133 in March 2011 , plans for space  खोजी  by the  यूएसए  remain in flux .
Constellation , a Bush Administration program for a return to  the  Moon by 2020 was judged  inadequately  funded  और  unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009 .
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to focus  on  the development of the capability for crewed missions beyond low earth orbit ( LEO ) , envisioning extending the operation of the ISS beyond 2020 , transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews  इससे  NASA to the private sector  ,  and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO  ,  such as  earth/moon  L1 , the Moon , Earth/Sun L2 ,  near-earth   क्षुद्रग्रह  , and Phobos or Mars orbit  .
As of March 2011 , the US Senate and  हाउस  of Representatives are still working towards a compromise NASA funding bill ,  जिससे  will probably terminate Constellation and fund development of a  भारी  lift  लॉन्च  vehicle ( HLLV ) .
in   the  2000s ,  the  People  's   गणतंत्र   of  China initiated a successful  मानवयुक्त  spaceflight program , while the European Union ,  जापानी  ,  और   इण्डिया  have also  नियोजित  future manned space missions .
चीन  , Russia , Japan , and India have advocated manned missions to the Moon during the 21st century  ,  while the European Union has advocated manned missions  to  both the  चंद्रमा  and Mars during the  21st  century .
From the 1990s onwards , private interests began promoting space tourism and then private space  खोजी  of the Moon (  देखिए  Google Lunar X Prize ) .
John Calvin Coolidge , Jr. ( July 4 , 1872January 5 , 1933 ) was the 30th  अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1923–1929 ) .
A Republican  वकील  from Vermont  ,  Coolidge worked his  रास्ता   up  the ladder of  मैसाचुसेट्स  state politics , eventually becoming governor of that state .
His conduct during the Boston Police Strike of 1919 thrust him into the national  स्पॉटलाइट   और  gave him a reputation as a man of decisive action  .
Soon after , he was elected as the 29th Vice President  in  1920 and succeeded to the Presidency upon the sudden  मौत  of Warren G. Harding in 1923 .
Elected in his own right in 1924 , he gained a reputation as a small-government conservative , and also as a man who said very little .
Coolidge restored public confidence in the  श्वेत  House after  the  scandals of his predecessor 's administration , and left office with considerable popularity .
As a  कूलिज  biographer put it , `` He embodied the spirit and hopes of the middle class , could interpret their longings and express their opinions .
That he  किया  represent the genius of  the  average is the  सबसे  convincing proof of his strength . ''
Some later criticized Coolidge as part  of  a general criticism of  laissez-faire  government .
His  प्रतिष्ठा   underwent  a renaissance during the Ronald  reagan  Administration , but the ultimate assessment of his presidency is still  विभाजित   between  those who approve  of  his reduction of the size of government programs and  those  who believe the federal government should be more involved in  regulating  and controlling the economy .
एस्प्रेसो   is  a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly  खौलते  water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans  .
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than  कॉफी  brewed by  अन्य   विधि  , a higher concentration of suspended and dissolved solids , and crema ( meaning cream , but being a reference to the foam with a creamy texture that  फ़ॉर्म  as a result of the  दबाव  ) .
As  a  result of the pressurized brewing process the flavors and chemicals in a typical cup of  एस्प्रेसो  are very concentrated .
Espresso is the  आधार  for other drinks , such as a latte  ,  cappuccino , macchiato , mocha , or americano .
Espresso has more caffeine per unit volume than most beverages ,  लकिन  the usual  सेवारत  size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of espresso  रै  80 to 150 mg of caffeine , little  कम  than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee .
Brian Keith Kelly ( born October 25 , 1961 )  is  an American football  कोच  and former player .
He is currently the head  फ़ुटबॉल  coach for the Notre Dame Fighting Irish , a position he  रै  held since December 2009 .
Kelly was previously head coach at Grand Valley State University ( 1991–2003 ) , Central Michigan University ( 2004–2006 ) , and University of  सिनसिनाटी  (  2006–2009   )  .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered  into  voluntarily by two or more parties , each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements  of  a contract are `` offer ''  और  `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity who exchange `` consideration '' to create ``  mutuality  of obligation . ''
Proof  of  some or all of these elements may  be  done in writing  ,  though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct .
The remedy for breach of contract  can  be `` damages  ''  in  the   रूप  of compensation  of   धन  or specific performance  enforced  through an injunction .
Both of these remedies award the party at loss  the  `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages , which are greater than mere reliance damages , as in promissory estoppel .
The parties  may  be natural  व्यक्तियों  or juristic persons  .
A  अनुबंध  is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking that something  होगा  or will not occur .
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract ,  हालांकि  care is required as a promise  may   नहीं  have the full standing of a contract , as when it is an  अनुबंध  without consideration .
Contract law varies  greatly  from one jurisdiction to another , including differences  in  common law compared to civil law , the impact of  प्राप्त  law  ,  particularly from England in common law countries , and  of  law codified in regional legislation  .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example , there are 40 relevant acts which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / national ) level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state  of  NSW .
In addition there  हैं  6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for international  dealings  , such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
Sidney Patrick Crosby ,  ons  ( born August 7 , 1987 ) is a  कनाडाई  professional ice  हॉकी  player who is captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins of the National  हॉकी  League ( NHL  )  .
crosby   थी  drafted first overall by the Penguins out of the Quebec Major Junior Hockey League  (  QMJHL ) .
During his two-year  प्रमुख  junior career with the Rimouski Océanic , he earned back-to-back CHL Player of the  साल  awards and led his club to the 2005  मेमोरियल  Cup final .
Nicknamed `` The Next One `` , he was one of the most highly regarded draft picks in hockey history , leading many to refer to  the  2005 Draft Lottery as the `` Sidney Crosby Sweepstakes '' .
In his  पहला  NHL season , Crosby finished sixth in league scoring with 102 points (  39  goals , 63 assists ) and was a runner-up for the  calder  Memorial Trophy ( won by Alexander Ovechkin ) .
By his second season , he led the NHL with 120  अंक  ( 36 goals , 84 assists ) to  कैप्चर  the  आर्ट  Ross Trophy , becoming the youngest player and the only teenager to win  a  scoring title in any major  उत्तर  American sports league .
That same season , Crosby also  जीती  the Hart Memorial  ट्रॉफी  as the Professional Hockey Writers  संघ  's choice for most valuable player and the  लेस्टर  B. Pearson  पुरस्कार  as  the  NHL Players Association 's choice for most outstanding player , becoming the seventh player in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year .
crosby   प्रारंभ   the   2007–08  season with the team 's captaincy and subsequently led them to  the  2008 Stanley Cup Finals ,  जहाँ  they were defeated by the Detroit Red Wings in six games .
the  Penguins returned to the Finals  विरूद्ध  Detroit the  following  year and won in seven games ; Crosby became the youngest captain in NHL  इतिहास  to  जीत   the   स्टेनली  Cup .
In the 2009–10 season , Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals , tying him with Steven Stamkos for the Rocket Richard  ट्रॉफी   as  the league-leader ; with 58 assists  ,  he totaled 109 points , second in the NHL .
During the  off-season  , Crosby received  the  Mark Messier Leadership Award .
In 2010–11 , Crosby sustained a concussion as a result  of  hits to  the  head in back-to-back games .
The injury left him sidelined for ten and a half months .
However , after playing eight games in the  2011–12  season , Crosby 's concussion-like symptoms returned in December 2011 , and he did not return  जबतक  mid-March 2012 .
Internationally , Crosby has  represented   कनाडा   in  numerous tournaments for the country 's junior and men 's teams .
After competing in the 2003 U-18 Junior World  कप  , he represented Canada in  back-to-back   iihf  World U20 Championships , winning silver in 2004 and gold in 2005 .
at  the 2006 IIHF World Championship , he led the tournament in scoring , while also earning Top Forward and All-Star Team honours .
Four years later , Crosby was named to  टोली  Canada for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver  .
playing  the United States in the gold medal game  ,  he scored the game-winning goal in overtime .
A United States cent , also known as a penny .
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version ``  put  my two cents in '' is an  संयुक्त  States ( US ) idiomatic expression , taken from the original English idiom expression : to  put  in ``  my  two pennies worth '' or `` my  tuppence  worth .  ''
It is used to preface the tentative stating of one’s opinion  .
By deprecating  the  opinion to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents , a very  छोटी  amount – the user of the phrase hopes to lessen the impact of a  संभवतः   बयान   ,  showing politeness and humility .
However , it is also sometimes used with irony when expressing a  strongly  felt opinion .
The phrase is also used out of habit to  preface   uncontentious  opinions .

The Chinese Civil War was a civil war in China fought between forces loyal to the government of the Republic of China led by the Kuomintang ( KMT ) and forces of the Communist Party of China ( CPC )  .
the  war began in April 1927  ,  amidst the Northern Expedition , and essentially ended when major active battles ceased in 1950 .
The conflict  आखिरकार  resulted in two de facto states , the Republic of China (  आरओसी  ) in Taiwan and the People 's Republic of China ( PRC ) in mainland China , both claiming to be the legitimate government of China .
the  war represented an ideological split ( Left vs . Right ) between the Communist CPC , and the  kmt  's brand of Nationalism .
The civil war continued intermittently until late 1937 , when the  दो  parties  formed  a  दूसरी  United Front  to  counter  a  Japanese invasion .
China 's full-scale civil  युद्ध  resumed in 1946 , a year after  the  end of  hostilities  with Japan .
After four more years ,  1950  saw the cessation  of   प्रमुख   सैन्य  hostilities—with the newly founded People  's  Republic of China controlling mainland China ( including Hainan ) , and the Republic of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy , Matsu and several outlying islands .
The Kuomintang defeat  is  attributed to several factors : Corruption - Chiang wrote in his diary on June 1948 that the KMT had failed , not because of external  दुश्मनों  but because  of  rot from within .
Strong initial support from  the  U.S. diminished , and then  ,  stopped .
( Partly because of KMT corruption  और  anti-democratic regime  ,  and partly  क्युकी  of the uncertain U.S. foreign policy towards Communism between  1945  and 1950  )  ; Communist  जमीन  reform policy promised poor  peasants  farmland from their landlords .
This ensured  pla   लोकप्रिय  support .
After the surrender of Japan at the end of World War II , Soviet forces turned over their captured Japanese weapons to the CPC and allowed the CPC to take control  of  territory in  मंचूरिया  .
To this  दिन  , no armistice  or  peace treaty has ever been signed , and  it  is debated as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended .
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by military threats and political and economic  दबाव  , particularly over  ताईवान  's political status ,  साथ  both governments officially adhering to  a  `` One-China policy . ''
The  पीआरसी  still actively  दावा  Taiwan as part of its territory and continues to threaten the ROC with a military invasion if the ROC officially declares independence by changing its name to  और  gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan .
The ROC mutually claims mainland China , and they both continue the fight  over   राजनयिक  recognition .
Today , the  युद्ध  as such occurs on the political and economic fronts  in  the  रूप  of cross-Strait relations ; however , the two separate de facto states have close  आर्थिक  ties .
The One Hundred Twelfth United  राज्य  Congress was the meeting of  the  legislative branch of the United States federal government , from January 3 , 2011 until January 3 , 2013 .
It convened in Washington  ,  D.C. on January 3 , 2011 ,  और  ended on January 3 , 2013 , 17 days before the end of the presidential term to which Barack Obama was elected in  2008  .
Senators elected to regular terms in 2006 completed those terms in this Congress .
This Congress included  the  last  हाउस  of Representatives elected from congressional  जिले  that were  apportioned   आधारित   on  the 2000 census .
In the 2010 midterm elections , the Republican Party won the majority in the House of Representatives .
While the Democrats kept their Senate majority ,  it  was reduced from the  पिछला  Congress .
This was the first Congress  in  which the House and Senate were controlled by different  पार्टियों  since the  107th  Congress ( 2001–2003 ) , and  the  first Congress to begin that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ) .
In this Congress , the House of Representatives had the largest number of  रिपब्लिकन  members ,  242  , since  the  80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ) .
It was also the first Congress since 1947  in  which no  सदस्य  of  the  Kennedy family served , as well as  the  most politically polarized Congress since Reconstruction , with record low approval ratings .
Wealth in the United States is commonly measured in terms of net worth , which is the sum  of  all assets , including home equity , minus  सब  liabilities .
The total net worth of US households and nonprofit organizations 1945–2009 , unadjusted for inflation or population change .
For example , a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house , $ 5,000 in mutual funds ,  $  30,000 in cars , $ 20,000 worth of stock  in  their own company , and a $ 45,000 IRA would have assets totaling $ 900,000 .
Assuming that this  household  would have  a   $  250,000 mortgage , $ 40,000 in car loans , and $ 10,000  in  credit card debt , its debts  होता   कुल  $ 300,000 .
Subtracting the debts from the worth of this household 's assets (  900,000  - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000  )  , this household would have a net  लायक  of $ 600,000 .
Net worth  can  vary with fluctuations in value of the underlying assets .
The wealth —more specifically , the median net worth—of  households  in the United States is  varied  with relation to race ,  शिक्षा  , geographic location and gender .
As one would expect , households with greater income feature the highest net worths , though high income can not be taken as  an  always accurate indicator of net worth .
Overall the number of wealthier  households  is on the  वृद्धि  ,  साथ  baby boomers hitting the  highs  of their careers .
In addition , wealth is unevenly distributed  ,   साथ  the  wealthiest  25 %  of   us  households owning 87  %  of the wealth in the United States , which was $ 54.2 trillion in  2009  .
Including human capital such as  कौशल   ,  the United Nations estimated the total wealth of the United States in 2008  to  be $ 118 trillion .
This article deals with Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR )  बल्कि  than the rhizotomy procedures  लिये  pain relief ; for those procedures , which have begun  to  take the name `` rhizotomy  ''   in  certain instances , see facet rhizotomy and similar .
A rhizotomy  (  ) is a  पद  chiefly referring to a  neurosurgical  procedure  कि  selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in  the  spinal cord , most  प्रायः  to relieve the symptoms of neuromuscular conditions such as spastic diplegia and other  फ़ॉर्म  of  spastic  cerebral palsy .
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has been the main use of  rhizotomy  for neurosurgeons specialising in spastic CP since the 1980s ; in this surgery , the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated  और  then targeted  और  destroyed .
The sensory nerve roots ,  जहाँ  spasticity is  स्तिथ  , are first  अलग  from the motor ones , and the nerve fibres to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation .
The ones producing spasticity are then selectively lesioned with tiny electrical pulses .
In spasticity , rhizotomy precisely targets and destroys the damaged  nerves  that don’t receive  गामा  amino butyric acid , which is the core problem for people with  spastic  cerebral palsy .
These over-firing , non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity during the EMG testing phase in SDR and are thus considered  to  be the source of the  रोगी  's hypertonia ;  वे  are eliminated with the electrical pulses once identified , while the remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact  और  untouched .
This means that the  spasticity  is permanently dissolved , and that this is done without affecting nervous system  संवेदनशीलता  or function in other  क्षेत्रों  , because the  तभी  nerves destroyed are the  over-firing  ones responsible for the muscle tightness  .
The  शर्तें  rhizotomy and neurotomy are also increasingly becoming interchangeable in the treatment  of  chronic  वापस  pain from degenerative disc disease  .
This is a procedure called a facet rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure but is instead done on an outpatient basis using  a  simple probe to apply radiofrequency waves to the impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body  .
ऐसे  radio frequency nerve lesioning  परिणाम  in five to eight or  अधिक  months of pain  राहत  before the nerve regenerates and  another  round of the procedure  needs  to be performed .
A facet rhizotomy is just one of  अनेक  different forms  of  radiofrequency ablation , and its use of the `` rhizotomy '' name should not be  उलझन  with the SDR procedure .
Migrant workers in California , 1935
The term  migrant  worker has different official  meanings  and connotations in different parts of the world .
The United  राष्ट्र  ' definition is  व्यापक  , including any people  working  outside of  उनके  home country .
The  पद  can also be used to describe someone who migrates within a country , possibly their own , in order to pursue work such as  मौसमी  work .
Photograph of Lil Wayne with teardrop tattoos below  उसके  eyes .
The teardrop tattoo or tear tattoo is a symbolic tattoo that is placed underneath the eye .
it  has no fixed meaning but almost all meanings ( see below ) have  कुछ  connection to  थाना  .
U.S. Route 75 is a  north–south  U.S. Highway .
The  राजमार्ग  's northern terminus is in Kittson County ,  मिनेसोटा  , at  the   कनाडाई   किनारा  , where  it  once  जारी  as Manitoba Highway 75 on the other side of the now-closed border crossing .
Its southern terminus is at Interstate 30 and Interstate 45 in Dallas , Texas , where it is known as North  सेंट्रल  Expressway .
U.S. 75  थी  a border-to-border route , from Canada  to  the Gulf  of  Mexico at Galveston , Texas  .
However  ,   the  entire segment south of Dallas , Texas  रै   महरूम  decommissioned in favor of Interstate 45 , a cutoff section of town-to-town surface road having become State Highway  75  .
Lower Ninth  वार्ड  is a neighborhood of the city of New Orleans .
As the name  implies  , it  is  part of the Ninth Ward of New  ऑरलियन्स  .
The Lower Ninth Ward is often  विचार  of as the entire area within New  ऑरलियन्स  downriver of the Industrial Canal ; however  ,  the City Planning Commission divides this area into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy  क्रॉस  ( 3  )  neighborhoods .
The term `` Lower '' refers to its location  दूर  towards the mouth  of  the Mississippi River  ,  `` down '' or `` below '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology .
But the 9th Ward , like all  wards  in  नई  Orleans , is a voting district .
The 9th Ward was  added  as a voting district in 1852 .
The `` lower  ''  9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1  ,  2 , 4 , and 7  जिससे  make up the Holy Cross Area and Ward 9 Districts 3  ,  5 , 6 , and  8  .
Higher voting  ज़िला  numbers in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver side of the Industrial Canal .
The area came to national attention for its devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005 .
