Red and orange  tinted  Moon , as seen  इससे  Earth during a  चंद्र  eclipse , where the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is  the  only natural satellite of the Earth , and the fifth largest satellite in the Solar  प्रणाली  .
it  is the largest natural satellite of a planet in the Solar System relative to  the  size of its primary , having 27 %  the  diameter and 60 % the density of  धरती  , resulting in its mass .
The Moon is the second  densest   उपग्रह  after Io , a satellite of Jupiter .
The Moon is in  तुल्यकालिक  rotation with Earth , always showing the  वही  face with its near side marked by dark volcanic  मरिया  that fill  between  the bright ancient crustal highlands and the  prominent  impact craters .
It is the brightest object in the sky after the Sun , although  इसके  surface is actually  बहुत  dark , with a reflectance similar to that of  कोयले  .
Its prominence in the sky and its regular cycle of phases have , since ancient times  ,  made the Moon an important cultural influence on  भाषा  ,  पंचांग  , art and  mythology  .
The Moon  's  gravitational influence produces the ocean tides and the minute lengthening of  the  day .
The Moon 's current orbital distance , about thirty times the diameter of the Earth  ,  causes  it  to appear almost the same  आकार  in the sky as the Sun , allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in total solar eclipses .
This matching of apparent visual size is a coincidence  .
The Moon 's linear distance from the Earth is currently increasing at a rate  of  3.82±0.07cm per year , but this  रेट  is not constant .
the  Moon  is  thought to have formed nearly 4.5 billion years ago , not long after the Earth .
Although there have been several hypotheses for its  उत्पत्ति  in the past , the current most widely accepted explanation is that the Moon formed from the debris left over after a  दानव  impact between Earth and a Mars -sized body .
The Moon is the only celestial body other than Earth on which humans have set foot .
The Soviet  संघ  's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in  1959  ; the United States '  नासा  Apollo program achieved the only manned missions to date , beginning with the first manned lunar orbiting  मिशन  by Apollo 8 in 1968 , and six manned lunar landings between  1969  and 1972 , with the first being Apollo 11 .
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar rocks , which  have   महरूम  used to develop a geological understanding  of  the Moon 's origins ,  the  formation of  इसके  internal structure , and its subsequent history  .
After the Apollo 17 mission  in  1972 , the Moon has been visited only by  unmanned  spacecraft , notably by the final  सोवियत  Lunokhod rover .
Since 2004  ,  Japan , China , India , the United States , and the European Space Agency have each sent lunar orbiters .
These  spacecraft  have contributed to confirming the discovery of lunar water ice in permanently shadowed craters at the poles and bound into the lunar regolith .
Future manned missions to the  चंद्रमा  have  महरूम   नियोजित  ,  सहित  government as well as privately funded efforts .
The  चंद्रमा  remains  ,  under the Outer Space  सन्धि   ,  free to all nations to explore for peaceful purposes .
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ;  फ़रवरी  6 , 1911 – June  5  , 2004 ) was the  40th   अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1981–1989 ) .
Prior to that , he was the 33rd Governor of California ( 1967–1975 ) , and a radio  ,  film and television actor .
Born in Tampico , Illinois ,  और  raised in Dixon , Reagan was educated  at  Eureka College , earning a Bachelor of Arts degree in economics  और  sociology .
After graduating , Reagan moved first  to  Iowa to work  as  a radio broadcaster and then , in 1937 , to Los Angeles where he began a career as an actor , first in films and later television  .
Some of his most notable films include Knute Rockne , All  अमरीकी  ( 1940  )   ,  Kings Row ( 1942 )  ,  and Bedtime for Bonzo (  1951  ) .
Reagan served  as  President of the Screen Actors Guild and later as a spokesman for  सामान्य  Electric ( GE ) ; his start  in  politics occurred during his work for GE .
Originally a member of the Democratic Party , his positions began shifting rightward in the 1950s  ,  and he switched to the Republican Party in 1962 .
बाद  delivering a rousing speech in  support  of Barry Goldwater 's presidential candidacy in 1964 , he was persuaded to seek the California  governorship  , winning two years later and again in 1970 .
He was defeated in his run for the Republican presidential nomination in 1968  और  in 1976 , but won both the nomination and general election in 1980 , defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter  .
As president , Reagan  implemented  sweeping new political and economic initiatives .
His supply-side economic policies , dubbed  ``  Reaganomics `` , advocated reducing tax  दरों  to spur economic growth , controlling the money supply to reduce inflation , deregulation of the economy , and reducing government spending .
In  उसके   पहला  term he  बच  an assassination attempt , took a hard line against labor unions , announced a new War on Drugs  ,  and ordered an invasion of Grenada .
He was re-elected in  a   भूस्खलन  in 1984 ,  proclaiming   कि   it  was `` Morning  in  America `` .
His second term was primarily marked  by  foreign matters , such as the ending of the Cold War , the 1986 bombing of Libya  ,  and  the  revelation of the Iran-Contra affair .
Publicly  describing  the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire  ``  , he supported anti-communist movements worldwide and spent his first term forgoing the strategy of  détente  by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR .
Reagan  negotiated  with Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev , culminating in the INF Treaty and the decrease of both countries '  नाभिकीय  arsenals .
reagan  left office in 1989 .
In 1994 ,  the  former president disclosed  कि  he had been diagnosed with Alzheimer 's disease earlier in the year ; he died ten years later at the age of  93  .
A conservative icon  ,  he ranks highly  in  public opinion  पोल  of U.S. Presidents and is credited for generating an ideological renaissance on the American political right .
Complete  नियत  of scrolls  ,  constituting the entire Tanakh .
The Tanakh ( , or ; also Tenakh , Tenak , Tanach ) is a name used  in  Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew  बाइबल  .
The Tanakh is also known as the  masoretic  Text or the Miqra .
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text  's  three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '' , also known as  the  Five  किताबे  of Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) , meaning `` that which is read ''  ,  is  an  alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh .
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each generation , called the Oral Torah .
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a Kawasaki 600 cc  क्लास  sport  मोटरसाइकिल  .
It was introduced in 1995 , and has been constantly updated throughout the years in  जवाब  to new  उत्पाद  from Honda , Suzuki , and  यामाहा  .
The ZX series is what was known as  the  Ninja line of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s and still  carries  the name today .
Assassination attempts and plots on Presidents of the United States have been numerous : more than 20 attempts to kill sitting and former presidents , as  खूब  as the Presidents-elect , are known .
Four sitting presidents have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th  अध्यक्ष  ) , James A. Garfield ( the 20th President ) , William McKinley ( the 25th President  )  and John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ) .
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations :  पूर्व  President Theodore Roosevelt ( the  26th  President ) , and President  रोनाल्ड  Reagan ( the 40th President ) .
Although the historian J.W  .  Clarke has suggested  कि  most American  assassinations  were politically motivated actions , carried out  by  rational men  ,  not all such attacks have been  undertaken  for political reasons .
Some attackers had  questionable  mental stability ,  और  a few  यहूद  judged legally  उन्मादी  .
Since  the  Vice President of the United States has for more than a century been elected from the same  राजनैतिक  party as the President , the assassination of the President is unlikely to  परिणाम  in major policy changes .
This may explain why political groups  typically  do not make such attacks  .
Where the  रेड  Fern Grows is a novel  लिखा  by Wilson Rawls in 1961 about  a  boy who buys and trains two Redbone Coonhound hunting dogs  .
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in West South Central United States .
ओक्लाहोमा  is the 20th most extensive and the 28th  सबसे  populous of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma , meaning `` red people '' ,  और   it  is known informally by its nickname , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory  और  Indian Territory on November 16 , 1907 ,  ओक्लाहोमा  was  the  46th state to enter the union .
Its residents are known as Oklahomans  or  , informally `` Okies '' , and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma  नगर  .
A major producer of natural gas , oil , and agriculture  ,  Oklahoma relies on an economic base of aviation , energy  ,   दूरसंचार   ,   और  biotechnology  .
It has one  of  the  तीव्रतम  growing economies in the nation , ranking among the top states in per capita income  विकास  and gross domestic  उत्पाद   विकास  .
ओक्लाहोमा  City and Tulsa serve  as  Oklahoma 's primary  आर्थिक   anchors  ,  साथ  nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within  उनके  metropolitan statistical areas .
With small mountain ranges , prairie , mesas , and eastern forests , most of Oklahoma lies in the Great Plains and the  u.s  . Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe  मौसम  .
In addition to  having  a prevalence of English  ,  German , Scottish  ,  Irish and Native American ancestry , more  than  25 Native American languages  हैं  spoken in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is  स्तिथ  on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and historically served as a route for cattle drives , a destination for southern  settlers  , and  a  government-sanctioned territory for  देशी  Americans .
Redwall , by Brian Jacques , is a series of children 's fantasy  novels  .
it  is the title of the first book of the  श्रेणी   ,  published  in  1986 , as well  as  the name of the Abbey featured in the book and the name of an animated TV series based on three of the novels ( Redwall , Mattimeo  ,  and Martin the Warrior ) , which first aired in 1999 .
The books are primarily aimed at older children , but have fans of all ages .
There have been twenty-two  novels   और  two picture books published .
The twenty-second ,  और  final , novel , The  दुष्ट  Crew , was  मरणोपरांत  released on  may   3   ,  2011 .
Natural Gas is usually measured by volume in the  संयुक्त  States and is stated in cubic feet .
A cubic foot of gas is the amount of gas needed to fill a volume of one cubic foot under set  शर्तें  of pressure and temperature.To measure larger  amounts  of natural gas ,  a  `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic  फीट  , and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet .
To provide greater accuracy in comparing fuels , energy content is measured in terms  of  `` British Thermal Units ( BTU 's  )  .  ''
A BTU  is  the  राशि  of heat required to  उठाएँ  one pound  of  water ( approximately a pint ) , one degree Fahrenheit at or  बंद  to its point of maximum density .
One British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- SI unit of heat energy equal  to  100,000  अंग्रेजों  thermal units (  btu  ) .
it  is approximately the energy equivalent of burning 100 cubic feet ( often referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas  .
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not energy content ,  a  therm factor is used by ( Natural ) gas companies to convert the volume of gas used to  इसके  heat equivalent , and thus calculate  the  actual energy use .
The therm factor is usually in the units therms/CCF .
It will vary with the mix of hydrocarbons  in  the  प्राकृतिक  gas .
Natural gas with a higher than average concentration  of   इथेन  ,  प्रोपेन  or butane will have a higher therm factor .
impurities  , such as carbon dioxide or nitrogen , lower the therm  फ़ैक्टर  .
The volume of the gas is calculated as if measured at standard temperature and pressure ( STP ) .
The heat content of natural gas is solely dependent on the composition of the gas , and is independent of temperature and pressure .
एक  therm is equal to about 105.5  megajoules  , 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours .
One therm can also be provided by about of natural gas .
The therm sometimes has been  उलझन  with the thermie ( see  नीचे  ) .
The names of both units come from the Greek  शब्द  for heat  .
A thermie ( th )  is  a  मीट्रिक  unit of heat energy ,  भाग   of  the meter-tonne-second system  sometimes  used  by  European  इंजीनियर्स  .
The thermie is equal to  the  amount  of  energy required to raise the temperature  of  1  टन  of  जल  by 1  °c  .
The thermie  is  equivalent  to  1,000 kilocalories ,  4.1868  megajoules or 3968.3 BTU .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or  बस  the Civil War (  देखिए   नामकरण   )  , was a civil war fought from  1861  to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several  दक्षिणी   स्लेव  states that  घोषित  their secession and  formed  the Confederate States of  अमेरिका  ( the `` Confederacy '' or  the  `` South ''  )  .
The war had its origin in the  समस्या  of slavery , especially the extension of slavery  into  the western territories  .
Foreign powers did  नहीं  intervene .
After four years of bloody combat  कि  left over 600,000 soldiers  मुर्दे   और  destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the  confederacy  collapsed , slavery was abolished  ,  and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to  the  freed slaves began .
in  the  1860  presidential  चुनाव  , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln  जीती  , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven  cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James  बुकानन  and the incoming Republicans  अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's  inaugural  address declared his administration would not initiate civil  युद्ध  .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that  यूरोपीय  countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that  वे  would intervene ; none did and none recognized  the  new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April  12  , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a  कुंजी  fort held  by  Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to  provide   सैनिकों  to retake  the  fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to  ग्यारह  .
The Union soon controlled the  किनारा  states and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a  संघ   राज्य  ) ended  साथ  Confederate retreat at the Battle  of  Antietam , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war  लक्ष्य  .
To the west , by summer  1862  the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then  much  of  उनके  western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split  the  Confederacy in two at the  मिसिसिपी  River .
in  1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of  gettysburg  .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove  ईस्ट  to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the  confederacy  from all  दिशानिर्देश  , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond  ,  the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial  युद्धों  .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships  ,  and mass-produced weapons were employed  extensively  .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines ,  shipyards  , banks , transportation  और  food  आपूर्तियाँ   सब  foreshadowed  संसार  War I .
It remains  the  deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian  हताहत  .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten  प्रतिशत  of all Northern  males   20–45  years old , and 30 percent  of  all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28 , 1949 )  is  a former U.S. track and field athlete ,  प्रेरक  speaker , socialite  ,  television personality and businessman .
He won  the  gold medal for  decathlon  in the Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics .
Following his Olympic win and the related recognition , he married Kris  कार्दशियन  , and his  पेशेवर  career evolved into being a television  हस्ती  .
By 1981 , he had starred in several made-for-TV  फिल्मों  and was  erik  Estrada 's replacement on the top  रेटेड  TV series CHiPs .
He has six children : Burt , Casey , Brandon , Brody , Kendall and Kylie .
Since his 1991 marriage  to  Kris Jenner , he  is  the stepfather to Kourtney , Kim , Khloe and Rob  कार्दशियन  .
Since 2007 , he has appeared with his blended family on  keeping  Up with the Kardashians .
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a Gram-negative ,  rod-shaped  bacterium that is commonly found in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ) .
Most E. coli strains  हैं  harmless , but some  serotypes  can cause  गंभीर  food poisoning in humans , and are occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination .
The harmless  strains  are part of the normal flora of the gut , and can benefit their  होस्ट  by producing vitamin K2 , and by preventing the establishment  of   रोगजनक  bacteria within the intestine .
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about 0.1 % of gut flora , and fecal–oral transmission is the major  रूट  through which pathogenic  strains  of the bacterium cause disease .
Cells are able to survive outside the body for a limited amount of time , which makes them ideal indicator organisms to test environmental  नमूने  for fecal contamination .
वहीँ  is  ,  however , a growing body of research that has examined environmentally persistent E. coli which can survive for extended periods outside of the host .
The bacterium can also be grown  easily  and inexpensively in a laboratory setting  ,  and has been intensively investigated for  over  60 years  .
E.  coli is the most widely studied prokaryotic model organism , and an important species in the fields of biotechnology and microbiology , where it has served as the  मेजबान  organism for the majority of work with recombinant  डीएनए   .
Area code 217 is the  उत्तर  American telephone area code for much of western and central Illinois .
The 217 area includes Illinois ' capital , Springfield , plus Champaign , Urbana , Decatur ,  danville  ,  क्विंसी  , and Rantoul .
217 was one of the original area codes ,  जिससे   यहूद  created in 1947 .
The only significant  बदलें  in  217  's boundaries was in 1957 , when its northern portion was combined  साथ  part of area code 815 to  रूप  area code 309  .
Image of the largest  अंटार्कटिक  ozone hole ever recorded ( September 2006 ) , over the Southern pole
Layers of the atmosphere ( not to  स्केल  )
Ozone depletion describes two distinct but related phenomena observed since  the  late 1970s : a steady decline of  परिचय  4 % per decade in the total volume of ozone in Earth 's  stratosphere  ( the ozone layer )  ,  and  a  much larger springtime decrease  in  stratospheric ozone over  धरती  's polar regions  .
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ozone hole  .
In addition to these well-known  stratospheric  phenomena , there are also springtime polar tropospheric ozone  depletion  events  .
The details of polar ozone hole formation differ  इससे  that of  mid-latitude  thinning , but the  सबसे  important process in both is  catalytic   विनाश  of ozone by atomic halogens .
The main source of these halogen  अणु  in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs , freons , halons ) .
These compounds are transported into the stratosphere after  होने  emitted at the surface .
Both types of  ओज़ोन  depletion were observed to increase as emissions of  halo-carbons  increased .
CFCs  और   अन्य   contributory  substances are referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ) .
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm )  of  ultraviolet  लाइट  ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's atmosphere , observed and projected decreases in ozone have generated worldwide concern leading to adoption  of  the  मॉन्ट्रियल  Protocol  कि  bans the production of CFCs , halons , and other ozone-depleting chemicals such  as   कार्बन  tetrachloride and trichloroethane .
It is suspected that a variety of biological consequences such as increases in skin cancer ,  cataracts  ,  क्षति  to plants , and reduction of plankton populations in the ocean 's photic zone may result from the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion .
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a brief introductory statement of the  संविधान  's fundamental purposes and  guiding  principles .
it  states in general terms , and  न्यायालयों  have referred to it as reliable evidence of , the Founding  fathers  ' intentions regarding  the  Constitution  's  meaning and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As  the  phrase , `` we  the  people '' suggests that the new government originates  इससे  the people of the United States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that vast population concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in  the   divide  between republicanism and social democracy  .
Czechoslovakian  शॉट  putter Plihan at the 1957 East German Indoor Athletics Championships
The shot put  (  pronounced ) is a track and field  इवेंट  involving ``  फेंकना   ''  / '' putting '' ( throwing in a pushing motion ) a heavy spherical  ऑब्जेक्ट   —the  shot—as far as possible .
The shot put competition  लिये  men  रै  been a part of the modern Olympics since their revival in 1896 , women 's competition began in 1948 .
Map of  the  United Nations ( UN ) member states , with their territories ( including dependent territories ) recognized by the UN in blue
There  हैं  United Nations ( UN )  सदस्य   राज्य  ,  और   प्रत्येक  of them is a member of the United Nations General Assembly .
The criteria for admission of new members are set out in  the  United Nations Charter , Chapter II , Article  4:
A recommendation for admission  इससे  the  सुरक्षा  Council requires affirmative votes from at least  नौ  of the council 's fifteen members , with none of the five permanent members voting against .
The Security  परिषद  's recommendation must then be subsequently approved in the  सामान्य  Assembly by  a  two-thirds majority vote .
In  principle   ,  only sovereign states can become UN members , and currently all UN members are sovereign states (  हालांकि  a few members were not sovereign when they joined the UN ) .
Because a state can only  be  admitted  to  the UN  by  the approval of the Security Council and the General Assembly , a number of states that  may  be considered sovereign states according to the  montevideo  Convention criteria are not members because the UN  करता  not consider them to possess sovereignty , mainly  due   to  the lack  of  international  मान्यता  or opposition  इससे  certain members .
In addition to the member states  ,  the UN also invites non-member states ( currently  दो  : the Holy See and Palestine ) , intergovernmental organizations  ,  and other international organizations and entities whose  statehood  or sovereignty are  नहीं  precisely defined , to become  observers  at the General Assembly , allowing them to participate and speak , but not vote , in General Assembly meetings .
The Eiffel Tower ( , ) is an iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars  in  Paris ,  नामित  after the engineer Gustave Eiffel ,  जिनकी  company designed and built the tower  .
Erected in 1889 as the  प्रवेश  arch to the 1889 World 's Fair , it has become both a  वैश्विक  cultural icon of France and  एक  of the most recognizable structures in the world .
The tower is  the  tallest structure in  पेरिस  and the most-visited paid monument in the world ; 7.1 million people ascended it in  2011  .
the   तीसरा  level observatory 's upper platform is  at  the highest  accessible   to  public in the European Union and the highest in Europe as long as the platform of the Ostankino Tower ,  at  , remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000 .
The tower received its 250 millionth visitor in  2010  .
The tower stands tall , about  the  same  ऊँचाई  as  an  81-storey building .
During its construction , the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the title of the  tallest   man-made  structure in the world , a title it held for 41 years , until the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930 .
Because of the addition , in 1957 , of the antenna atop the  एफिल  Tower , it is now  taller  than the Chrysler Building .
Not including broadcast  एन्टेना   ,  it is the  second-tallest  structure  in  France , after the Millau  viaduct  .
The tower has  तीन  levels for visitors .
Tickets can be purchased to ascend , by stairs or lift ( elevator ) , to the first and  दूसरी   स्तर  .
The walk from ground level to the first level is over 300 steps , as is the walk from the first to  the  second level .
The third and highest level is accessible only by lift—stairs do exist but are usually closed to the public  .
The first and second levels have restaurants .
the  tower has become the most prominent symbol of both Paris and France , often in the establishing shot of films  नियत  in the city .
Kenneth Wayne `` Ken '' Jennings III ( born May 23 , 1974 ) is an American game show contestant and author .
Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest winning streak  on  the U.S. syndicated game show Jeopardy !
and as being  the  all-time leading money winner  on  American game shows .
in  2004 , Jennings won 74 Jeopardy !
games before he  थी  defeated by challenger Nancy Zerg on his 75th appearance .
His total earnings on Jeopardy !
are  $  3,172,700 , consisting  of  $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins , a $ 2,000 second-place prize in his 75th appearance , a $  500,000  second-place prize  in  the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of  champions  , as  खूब  as half of a $ 300,000 prize in the IBM Challenge .
During his first run of Jeopardy !
appearances , Jennings earned  the  record for the highest American game show winnings .
His total was surpassed by Brad Rutter , who defeated  जेनिंग्स  in the finals of the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions ( first aired on May 25  ,  2005 ) , adding $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings .
Jennings regained the record after appearing on several other game shows , culminating in an appearance on Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader ?
( first aired on October 10 ,  2008  )  ,  though Rutter retains the  jeopardy  !
record .
After his success on Jeopardy ! , Jennings wrote about his experience and explored American trivia history and culture in his book  brainiac  : Adventures in the Curious , Competitive , Compulsive World of Trivia  buffs  , published in 2006 .
The Canadian Football League or CFL ( ' [ LCF ] in French ) is a professional sports league located in Canada .
The CFL is the highest level of competition in Canadian football , a form of gridiron football closely related to  अमरीकी  football .
इसके  eight current teams , which are located in eight  पृथक   शहरों  , are divided into two divisions of four teams each — the East Division and the West Division .
The league  's  19-week regular season runs from  लेट  June to  जल्दी   नवम्बर  ; each team plays 18 games  साथ  one bye week .
Following the  नियमित  season , the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the  चौथी  place team in one division has a  बेहतर  record than the  तीसरा  place team in the other division , when the team with the better record makes the playoffs and `` crosses over '' to the  अन्य  division 's playoff ) compete in the league  's  three-week divisional playoffs , which culminate in the late-November Grey Cup championship , the country 's largest annual sports and television event .
The CFL was officially founded on January 19 , 1958 , making it the second  oldest  gridiron football league in North America still in operation , although all  इसके   टीमों  long predate the modern formation of the league .
It  is  the highest level of play  in  Canadian football , the most  लोकप्रिय  football league in Canada , and the second-most popular major sports league in Canada , after the National Hockey League .
Although ice hockey is  कनाडा  's most popular sport , the CFL has increased the popularity of  कनाडाई  football  in  Quebec and Western  कनाडा  .
Canadian football is  भी  played at amateur levels ( i.e . youth , high school ,  cjfl  , QJFL , CIS and senior leagues such as the  अलबर्टा  Football League ) .
The 2010s  होगा  be a significant decade for the CFL in terms of growth , as teams have renovated , expanded stadiums , or plan  to  build entirely new stadiums .
The  मॉन्ट्रियल  Alouettes accomplished this first , adding 5,000 seats to Percival Molson Memorial  स्टेडियम  in time for the 2010  cfl  season  .
The Edmonton Eskimos and Calgary Stampeders also renovated their respective stadiums and facilities  लिये  the 2010 season .
In 2011 , the BC Lions played  अंतर्गत   a  new ,  retractable  roof in BC Place after spending one and  a  half seasons at Empire Field .
Then the Winnipeg Blue Bombers will play in an entirely new stadium at  the  University of Manitoba ,  अनुसूचित  to open in time for  the  2013 season .
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats , Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new Ottawa franchise are  भी  looking at new or extensively-renovated  स्टेडियम  in the  following  years  .
There are also hopes of expanding the league to Atlantic Canada ( ideally basing a  टोली  in either the more populated Halifax  ,  or the more centralized Moncton ) , as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton .
According to sports historian Douglas Brei  ,  the Canadian Football League holds the distinction of being the only professional sports league  in  North America , major or minor league , in which each existing franchise has  जीती  at least one league title while in their current location .
Each antibody binds to a specific antigen ; an interaction similar to a lock and key .
An antibody ( Ab ) , also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ) , is a  विशाल  Y-shaped protein produced by B-cells that is used by the immune system to identify and neutralize foreign objects such as bacteria  और  viruses .
The antibody recognizes  a  unique part of the foreign target  ,  called an antigen .
Each  टिप  of the ``  y  '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a structure analogous to a lock )  कि  is specific for one particular epitope (  similarly  analogous to a key ) on an  प्रतिजन  , allowing these two structures to bind together with precision .
Using  इस   बाइंडिंग  mechanism , an antibody can tag a microbe or an  संक्रमित  cell  लिये  attack by other parts of the immune  प्रणाली  , or  can  neutralize its target directly ( for example , by blocking a part of a microbe that is essential for its invasion and survival ) .
The production of antibodies is the main function of the humoral immune  प्रणाली  .
Antibodies are secreted  by  a type of white blood cell called a  प्लाज्मा  cell .
Antibodies can occur in  दो   शारीरिक  forms , a soluble form that is secreted from the cell , and a membrane -bound form that is attached to the surface  of  a B cell  और  is  referred  to as the B cell receptor ( BCR ) .
The BCR is  तभी  found on the surface of B cells and facilitates the activation of these cells and their subsequent differentiation into either  एंटीबॉडी  factories  पुकारा  plasma cells  ,  or memory B cells that will survive in the body  और  remember that same antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure .
In most cases , interaction of the B cell with  a  T helper cell is necessary to produce full activation of the B cell and , therefore , antibody generation following  प्रतिजन  binding .
घुलनशील  antibodies are released  into  the blood and tissue fluids , as well as many secretions to continue to survey for invading microorganisms .
antibodies  are glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the terms  एंटीबॉडी  and immunoglobulin are often used interchangeably .
Antibodies are typically made  of  basic structural units—each with two large heavy chains and two small light chains  .
There are several different types of antibody heavy chains , and several different kinds of antibodies , which are grouped into different isotypes based on which heavy chain they possess .
Five different antibody isotypes are  ज्ञात  in mammals , which perform different roles , and  सहायता  direct  the  appropriate immune  जवाब  for  प्रत्येक  different type of foreign object they encounter .
Though the general structure of all antibodies is  बहुत  similar ,  a  small region  at  the tip of the protein is extremely variable , allowing millions of antibodies with slightly different tip structures , or antigen binding sites , to exist .
इस  region is known as the hypervariable region .
Each of these  विसंगतियाँ   can  bind to a different antigen .
This enormous diversity of antibodies allows the immune system to recognize an equally wide variety of antigens .
The large and diverse population of antibodies  is  generated by random combinations of a set of gene segments that encode  अलग  antigen binding sites ( or  paratopes  ) , followed by random mutations in this area of the antibody gene , which create further diversity .
Antibody genes also re-organize in a process called class switching that changes the base of the heavy chain to another , creating a  अलग  isotype of the antibody that  retains  the  प्रतिजन  specific variable region .
This allows a  सिंगल  antibody to be used by several different parts of the immune system  .
The  प्रतीक  used by the Zodiac Killer to sign his correspondence
The Zodiac Killer was a serial killer who operated  in  Northern California in the late 1960s and early 1970s  .
The killer 's identity remains unknown .
The Zodiac murdered  पीड़ितों  in Benicia , Vallejo , Lake Berryessa , and San Francisco between December 1968 and October 1969  .
चार  men and three women between the  आयु   of   16  and 29 were  targeted  .
The killer originated the name `` Zodiac ''  in  a series  of  taunting letters  भेजा  to  the  local Bay Area press .
These letters included four cryptograms ( or ciphers ) .
Of the four cryptograms sent ,  तभी  one  रै  been definitively solved .
Suspects have been named by law enforcement and amateur investigators , but no conclusive evidence has surfaced .
In April 2004 , the San Francisco Police Department  चिह्नित  the  मामला   ``  inactive '' , yet re-opened the  मामला  at some point prior to March 2007 .
The case also remains open in the city of Vallejo , as well as in Napa County and Solano County .
The California Department of Justice has maintained an open case file on the Zodiac murders since 1969 .
Jennings is a small city in and the parish seat of Jefferson Davis Parish , Louisiana , United  राज्य  , near Lake Charles .
The population was 10,383  at  the 2010 census  ,  a small decline from the  2000  tabulation .
the  city is 68 percent white  .
Jennings  is  the principal city of the Jennings Micropolitan Statistical Area , which includes all of  जेफरसन  Davis  मोहल्ला  .
It is  भी  part of the larger Lake Charles-Jennings Combined Statistical Area .
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to ``  nanotech  '' ) is the manipulation of matter on an atomic  और   आणविक  scale .
The earliest , widespread description of nanotechnology referred to the particular  technological  goal of precisely manipulating atoms and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products , also now referred  to  as molecular nanotechnology .
A more  generalized  description  of  nanotechnology was  subsequently  established by the National Nanotechnology Initiative , which defines nanotechnology as the manipulation of matter with at least one dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers .
This definition  reflects  the fact that quantum  mechanical  effects  हैं  important at this quantum-realm scale ,  और  so the definition shifted from a particular technological  लक्ष्य  to a research category inclusive of all types of research and technologies that deal with  the  special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold .
It is  इसलिए  common to see the plural form `` nanotechnologies ''  as   खूब  as `` nanoscale  technologies  '' to refer to the broad range of research and applications whose common trait is size .
Because  of  the variety of  संभावित  applications ( including industrial and military ) , governments have invested billions of dollars in nanotechnology  शोध  .
Through its National Nanotechnology  पहल  , the  यूएसए  has invested 3.7 billion dollars .
The  यूरोपीय  Union has invested 1.2 billion and  जापानी  750 million dollars .
nanotechnology   as  defined by size is naturally very broad , including  फ़ील्ड   of  science as diverse as surface  विज्ञान  , organic chemistry , molecular biology  ,  semiconductor physics , microfabrication , etc .
The associated research and applications are equally diverse , ranging from extensions of conventional device  भौतिकी   to  completely  नई  approaches based upon molecular self-assembly , from developing new materials with dimensions on  the  nanoscale to direct control of  पदार्थ  on the atomic scale .
Scientists currently debate the future implications of nanotechnology .
nanotechnology  may be able to create many new materials and devices  साथ  a vast range of applications ,  ऐसे  as in medicine , electronics , biomaterials and energy production .
On the other hand , nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as any  नई  technology , including concerns  परिचय  the toxicity and environmental impact of nanomaterials  ,  and  उनके  potential effects on  वैश्विक  economics , as well as speculation  परिचय  various doomsday  scenarios  .
These concerns have led  to  a debate among advocacy  समूह  and governments on whether special regulation  of  nanotechnology is warranted .
Map of the  पूर्वी  Bloc
The term Eastern Bloc or Communist Bloc refers to the former communist states of Central  और  Eastern Europe  ,  generally the Soviet Union  और  the countries of the Warsaw Pact .
The terms Communist Bloc and Soviet Bloc  यहूद  also used to denote groupings  of  states aligned with the Soviet Union , although these terms might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe .
The New Jersey gubernatorial election of 2009  took  place on November  3  , 2009 .
Democratic Governor Jon Corzine was running  लिये  a second term and was being challenged by Republican Chris Christie , Independent Christopher Daggett and nine others , in  जोड  to  अनेक  write-in candidates .
Christie won the election , with about 48.5 percent of the  vote  , to 44.9  प्रतिशत  for Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett .
Christie won the largest margin for a first term Republican since 1969  .
Christie assumed office  on  January 19 , 2010 .
This was the first election to fill the newly created office of Lieutenant Governor .
The candidates for governor and lieutenant governor were joined together as a single choice , so  कि  voters did not have the opportunity to  विभाजित  the ticket .
Kim Guadagno , Christie 's running mate , became New Jersey 's first lieutenant governor following her inauguration .
Health care  in   the  United States is provided by many distinct organizations .
Health care facilities are largely owned and operated by private sector businesses  .
Health insurance for public sector employees is primarily provided  by  the government .
60-65 % of healthcare provision  और  spending comes from programs such as Medicare , Medicaid , TRICARE , the Children  's  Health Insurance Program , and the Veterans Health Administration .
Most of the  जनसांख्यिकी  under 65 is insured by their or a family member  's  employer ,  कुछ  buy health  बीमे  on their own ,  और  the remainder are uninsured .
Of 17 high-income  देशों  studied by the National Institutes of Health  in  2013 , the United States was at or near the bottom in infant mortality , heart and lung disease , sexually transmitted infections , adolescent  pregnancies  , injuries , homicides , and rates of disability .
Together ,  ऐसे  issues place  the  U.S. at the bottom of the list for life expectancy .
On average , a U.S. male  can  be expected to live almost four  कम  years than  those  in the  top-ranked  country .
according  to the World Health Organization ( WHO ) , the United States  खर्च  more on health  परवाह  per capita ( $ 7,146 ) , and more on health care as percentage of its GDP ( 15.2 % ) ,  than   कोई  other  स्वदेश  in 2008 .
The Commonwealth Fund ranked  the  United States last in the quality of health care among similar countries , and notes  u.S.  care costs the most .
The U.S. Census Bureau reported  कि  49.9 million residents , 16.3 % of the population , were  uninsured  in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million  निवासियों  ,  16.1  %  of  the population , in 2009 ) .
A  2004  Institute of Medicine ( IOM ) report said :  ``  The United States is among the few industrialized nations in the world that does  नहीं  guarantee access to health care for its population . ''
A 2004  oecd   रपट  said : `` With the exception  of  Mexico , Turkey , and the United States , all OECD countries had  हासिल  universal or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured  )  coverage of their populations by 1990 . ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of health insurance causes roughly 48,000 unnecessary deaths every year in the United States .
In 2007 , 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed high medical  खर्च  .
A 2013 study found that about 25 % of all senior citizens declare bankruptcy due  to  medical  खर्च  , and 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence .
On March 23 , 2010 , the Patient Protection and Affordable  परवाह  Act ( PPACA ) became law , providing  लिये  major changes in health  बीमे  .
In physiology , body water is the water content of the human body .
A  significant  fraction of the human body is water .
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of Medical Physiology states that ``  the  total  राशि  of water in a man of average weight ( 70 kilograms  )  is approximately 40  लीटर  , averaging 57 percent  of  his total body weight .
In a newborn infant , this may be as high as 75 percent of the body weight , but it progressively decreases from birth to old age , most of the decrease occurring during the first 10 years of life .
Also  ,  obesity decreases the  प्रतिशत  of water  in  the body , sometimes to as low as 45 percent ''  .
These figures are statistical averages , so are illustrative  ,  and  जैसे  all biostatistics , will vary with things like type of population , age and number  of  people sampled ,  और  methodology .
So there is not , and can not be , a figure that is exactly the same for all people , for this or any other physiological measure .
लिये  example , Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & Physiology for Nurses gives a figure of 60 % for the proportion of body-weight attributable to water  ,   जिससे  approximates Guyton 's 57 % .
In diseased states  जहाँ  body water is affected , the compartment or compartments that have changed can give clues to the nature of the problem .
Body water is regulated by hormones , including anti-diuretic hormone ( ADH ) , aldosterone and  अलिंदी  natriuretic  पेप्टाइड  .
Per  netter  's Atlas of Human Physiology  ,  body water is broken down into the following compartments:
Intracellular fluid (  2/3  of body water ) .
Per Guyton , in a body containing 40 litres of fluid , about  25   लीटर  is intracellular , which amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ) , close enough to the 2/3 rule of thumb .
Jackson 's texts states 70 % of  देह  fluid is intracellular .
Extracellular  द्रव  ( 1/3 of body  जल  )  .
Per Guyton 's illustration , for  a  40 litre body , about 15 litres is extracellular , which amounts to 37.5 % Again , this is close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here .
Plasma ( 1/5  of  extracellular fluid ) .
Per Guyton 's illustration  ,  of  the  15 litres of extracellular fluid , plasma volume averages 3 litres .
This amounts to 20 % , the same as per Netter 's Atlas .
Interstitial fluid ( 4/5 of extracellular fluid )
Transcellular fluid ( a.k.a . `` third space , '' normally ignored in  calculations  )
Contained inside organs , such as the gastrointestinal , cerebrospinal , peritoneal ,  और   ocular   fluids  .
Self-esteem is a term used in psychology to reflect a person 's  overall  emotional evaluation of his or her own worth .
it  is a judgement of oneself as  खूब  as an attitude toward the self .
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for example  ,  `` I am competent , '' `` I am worthy '' ) and emotions such as  triumph  , despair , pride and shame .
Smith and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is what we think about the self ; self-esteem , is the positive or negative  evaluations  of the self , as in how  we  feel about  it   .  ''
Self-esteem is also known as the evaluative dimension  of  the self that includes feelings of worthiness ,  prides  and discouragement .
One 's self-esteem is also closely associated with self-consciousness .
Self-esteem is a  disposition  that a person has which represents their judgements of their own worthiness .
in   the  mid-1960s , Morris Rosenberg and social-learning theorists defined self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness  .
Nathaniel Branden in 1969 defined self-esteem as `` the experience of being competent to cope  साथ  the basic challenges of life  और  being worthy of happiness  .  ''
According to Branden , self-esteem is the sum of  self-confidence  ( a feeling of personal capacity ) and self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth  )  .
It exists as  a  consequence  of  the implicit judgement that  प्रत्येक  person has of their ability to face life 's challenges , to understand and solve problems , and their right to  achieve  happiness , and be given respect .
As a social psychological construct , self-esteem is attractive because researchers have conceptualized it as an  influential  predictor of  प्रासंगिक  outcomes , such as academic  उपलब्धि  ( Marsh  1990  ) or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al . 1998 ) .
in   जोड  , self-esteem has also been treated as  an  important outcome due to its close relation with psychological  well-being  ( Marsh 1989 ) .
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example , `` I believe I am a good writer and I feel happy about that '' ) or a global extent (  लिये   उदाहरण  , `` I believe I am  a  bad person , and feel bad about myself in general '' ) .
psychologists  usually regard  self-esteem  as an enduring personality  characteristic  (  ``  trait '' self-esteem ) , though normal , short-term variations ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist .
Synonyms or near-synonyms  of  self-esteem include : self-worth , self-regard , self-respect  ,  and self-integrity .
A Masonic Lodge , often termed a Private Lodge or Constituent Lodge , is the basic organisational unit of Freemasonry .
Every new  आवास  must be warranted or chartered  by  a Grand Lodge , but is subject  to  its direction only in enforcing the published Constitution of the jurisdiction .
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the  संसार  's first  ज्ञात  Grand Lodge in London ( today called the United Grand Lodge  of  England ) have the unique privilege to  operate  as time immemorial i.e . without such warrant  ;  only one other lodge operates without a warrant  -  this is the Grand Stewards '  आवास  in London , although it is not also  हकदार  to the `` time immemorial  ''  title .
A Freemason is generally entitled to  विज़िट  any Lodge , in any jurisdiction  (   i.e  .  अंतर्गत  any Grand Lodge ) in amity with his own  .
In some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to Master Masons  (  that is , Freemasons who have attained the Order 's third degree ) .
He is first usually required to check  ,  and certify , the regularity of the relationship of the Lodge - and  be   समर्थ   to  satisfy that Lodge  of  his regularity of membership .
Freemasons gather together as a Lodge to work the three basic  डिग्री  of Entered Apprentice , Fellowcraft  और  Master Mason .
Pilkington Group Limited is a multinational glass manufacturing company headquartered in  st   हेलेन्स  , United Kingdom and  a   wholly  owned subsidiary of the Japan-based NSG Group .
Prior to its  अधिग्रहण  by  एनएसजी  in 2006 it was an independent company listed  on  the  लंदन  Stock Exchange and for a  समय  was a constituent of the FTSE 100  अनुक्रमणिका  .
A quotation is  the  repetition of one expression as part of another one , particularly when the quoted expression is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to  इसके  original source ,  और  it  is  indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation  marks  .
A quotation can also refer to the repeated use of units of any other form of expression , especially  भाग  of artistic works : elements of a painting  ,  scenes from a movie or sections from a musical composition .
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was  a  common year starting  on  Monday ( link  होगा  display the full calendar  )  of the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar .
Black pepper  (  Piper nigrum  )  is  a  flowering vine in  the  family Piperaceae , cultivated for its fruit , which is usually dried and used as a spice  और   seasoning  .
The fruit , known as a  peppercorn  when dried , is approximately in diameter , dark red when fully mature ,  और  , like  सब  drupes , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from them , may be described simply as pepper , or more precisely  as  black pepper ( cooked and  सूखी  unripe  फल  ) , green pepper  (  dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper (  सूखी  ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to south India ,  और  is  extensively  cultivated there and elsewhere in  तीव्र  regions .
Currently Vietnam  is  the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper , producing 34 %  of  the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper  रै  been used since antiquity for both its flavour and as a medicine .
Black pepper is  the  world 's most traded spice .
It is one of the most common spices added to European cuisine and its descendants .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine , not to be confused with the capsaicin  कि  gives fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in  the  modern world , often  युग्म  with salt  .
Fire  hydrant  in Charlottesville , Virginia , USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug  in  the  संयुक्त  States or as a johnny pump in New York  नगर  ) ,  is   an  active fire  सुरक्षा  measure , and a source of water provided in most urban , suburban and rural areas with  नगरपालिका  water service to enable  अग्निशमन  to tap  into  the municipal water supply to assist in extinguishing a fire .
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an insurance discount since firefighters  चाहिए  be able to more rapidly extinguish a fire on the insured property .
The  अवधारणा  of fire plugs dates to at least the 17th century .
This was a time when firefighters responding  to  a call would  खुदाई  down to the wooden water mains and hastily bore a hole to secure water  to  fight fires  .
The water would fill  the  hole creating a temporary  खूब  , and be transported from the well to the fire  by  bucket brigades or , later , by hand-pumped fire engines .
The holes were then plugged with stoppers , normally redwood , which over time came to be known as fire plugs .
The location of the plug would often be recorded  or  marked so that it could  be  reused in future fires .
This is the source of the  colloquial   पद  fire plug still used for fire hydrants today .
After the Great Fire of London  in  1666  ,   the  city installed water mains with holes drilled at intervals  ,  equipped with  उठते   ,  allowing an access point to the wooden fire  plugs  from street level .
The  आविष्कार  of a  post-  or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally credited to Frederick Graff Sr. , Chief Engineer of the Philadelphia Water Works around the year 1801 .
It had a combination hose/faucet outlet and was of `` wet barrel '' design with the valve in the top .
It is  कहा  that Graff held the first patent for a fire hydrant , but this can not be verified because the patent office in Washington D.C. caught on fire  in  1836 destroying  अनेक  patent records from that period in the process .
The President  of  the Republic of South Africa is  the  head of state and head of government under South Africa 's Constitution .
From  1961  to 1994 , the head of state was called the State  अध्यक्ष  .
The President is  निर्वाचित  by members of the National Assembly ,  the  lower house of Parliament , and is  प्रायः  the leader of the largest party , which has  महरूम  the African National  कॉंग्रेस  since the first non-racial elections were held on 27  अप्रैल  1994 .
The role was originally founded to  be  distinct from the now defunct role of prime minister , but the two roles were merged in the 1983 constitution which specified a four-year term of office .
The 1993 and later constitutions limits the president 's time in office to two five-year terms .
The first President to be elected under the new constitution was Nelson Mandela , and  the  incumbent president is Jacob  zuma  .
Under the interim Constitution ( valid from 1994 to 1996 ) , there was a Government of National Unity  ,  in which an MP from the largest opposition party was entitled  to  a position as Deputy  अध्यक्ष  .
Along with Thabo Mbeki , the last State President ,  f.w  . De Klerk also served as Deputy President , in his  क्षमता  as the  नेता  of the National Party which was the second-largest party  in  the  नई  Parliament .
But De Klerk later resigned and went into opposition with his party .
A voluntary coalition government continues to exist under the new constitution ( adopted in 1996 ) , although  वहीँ  have been no appointments of opposition politicians to  the  post of deputy president  .
Special  शिक्षा  or special needs education is the education of students with special needs in a way that addresses the students ' individual differences and needs .
Ideally , this process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching procedures , adapted equipment and materials , accessible settings , and  अन्य  interventions designed to help learners with special needs achieve a higher level of personal self-sufficiency and success in school and community than would be available if the student  यहूद  only given access to  a  typical  कक्षा  education .
Common special needs  शामिल  challenges with learning , communication challenges , emotional and  behavioral  disorders ,  शारीरिक  disabilities , and developmental  विकार  .
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from additional  शैक्षणिक  services such as different approaches to teaching , use of technology , a specifically adapted teaching area , or resource room .
Intellectual giftedness is a  अंतर  in learning and can also benefit from specialized teaching techniques or different educational  कार्यक्रम  , but the term `` special education '' is generally used to specifically indicate instruction of students whose special needs reduce their ability to learn independently or in an ordinary classroom , and gifted education is handled separately .
In most developed  देशों  , educators are modifying teaching methods and environments so that  the  maximum number of students  हैं  served in general education environments .
Special education in developed countries is  प्रायः  regarded less as  a  `` place '' and more as `` a range of services , available in every school . ''
Integration can reduce  सोशल  stigmas and improve academic achievement for many students  .
The opposite of special education is general education .
General education is the standard curriculum presented with standard teaching  विधि  and without additional supports .
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12 , 1930 , as Schwartz György ) is a Hungarian-American business magnate , investor , and philanthropist .
He is the chairman of Soros Fund Management .
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes .
He is known as ``  the  Man Who Broke the Bank of England `` because of his in investment profits during the 1992 Black Wednesday UK currency crisis .
Between 1979 and 2011  ,  Soros gave away over $ 8 billion to human rights , public  स्वास्थ्य  , and  शिक्षा  causes  .
He  निभाई  a significant role in the peaceful  परिवर्तन  from communism to  पूंजीवाद  in Hungary ( 1984–89 ) and provided one of Europe 's largest higher education  endowments  to Central European University in Budapest .
Soros is also the chairman of the Open Society Institute .
An actor portraying Alexander Graham Bell speaking into an early model telephone .
The invention of the telephone is the culmination of work done by many individuals , the history of  जिससे  involves a collection of claims and counterclaims .
The development of the modern electrical telephone involved an array of lawsuits founded upon the patent claims of several individuals  और  numerous companies .
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898 , from conception of the idea of an electric voice-transmission device , to failed attempts to use `` make-and-break '' current , to successful experiments with electromagnetic telephones by Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson , and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th century .
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA ,  m.f.a  . ) is a  ग्रैजुएट  degree typically requiring  2–3  years of  postgraduate   पढ़ाई  beyond the bachelor 's degree ( BFA  )  , although the term of study will vary by country or by university .
The MFA is  a  creative degree usually awarded  as  a terminal  उपाधि  in visual arts , creative writing , filmmaking , dance , or theatre  और  other performing arts .
Coursework is primarily  of  an applied or performing nature with the program often culminating in a major work or performance .
निपुण   of  Fine Arts programs  have  generally required a bachelor 's degree prior to admission , but many do not require that  the  undergraduate major  be  the same as the MFA field of study .
The most important admissions requirement has often been a sample portfolio or a performance audition  .
the  Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of Arts in that the MFA , while an academic program , centers around practice in the particular field ,  whereas  programs leading to the MA usually center on the scholarly , academic , or critical study of the field .
Additionally , in the United States , an MFA  is  recognized  as  a terminal degree for  practitioners  of Visual Art , Design , Dance ,  थिएटर  , Film/Video , New Media , and Creative Writing - meaning that it is  माना   to  be the highest degree in  इसके  field , and  is  used as a minimum qualification to be able to apply to become a  full-time  Professor teaching  at  the University level in these  disciplines   .
There are exceptions  to  this standard in the  कला  , notably in the case  of   म्यूज़िक  performance , where the MFA is not seen as a terminal degree in the context of the more standardized DMA degree .
It is also critical to note that  in  the interest of extending the connection between creative production and continued academic research , some universities have established practice-based Ph.D programs in fields such as creative writing , visual arts  ,  new media , design and  थिएटर  .
While this has had an  प्रभाव  in  रचनात्मक   लिखने  , and to a lesser extent in design and new media ,  the   influx  of graduates from practice-based  phd  programs has not  appreciably  changed the standard for the MFA as the terminal degree in most  कला  disciplines yet .
This is an ongoing contentious topic , and is the frequent subject of academic panels , especially at the annual College Art Association conference .
the  CAA 2008 guidelines regarding the MFA strongly re-affirms that  the  PhD is not required as a  टर्मिनल  degree in the visual arts .
the  atomic bombings of the cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki in Japan were conducted by the United States during the final stages of World War II in 1945  .
The two events are the only use of nuclear weapons  in  war to date  .
Following a firebombing campaign that destroyed  अनेक  Japanese cities , the Allies prepared for a costly invasion of Japan .
The war in  यूरोपीय  ended  जब  Nazi Germany signed its instrument of surrender on 8 May , but the Pacific War continued .
Together with the United Kingdom  और  the Republic of China , the United  राज्य  called  लिये  a surrender of Japan in the Potsdam Declaration on 26 July 1945 , threatening Japan with `` prompt and utter destruction  ''  .
The Japanese  सरकारी  ignored this ultimatum , and the United States deployed two nuclear weapons developed by  the   मैनहटन   प्रोजेक्ट  .
American airmen dropped Little Boy on the  नगर  of Hiroshima on 6 August 1945 , followed  by  Fat Man over Nagasaki on 9 August .
Within the  पहला   दो   to  four months of the bombings , the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000 people in Hiroshima and 60,000–80,000 in Nagasaki  ,  with roughly  हाफ  of the deaths in each city occurring  on  the first day .
the  Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated that , of the people who died on the day of the explosion , 60 % died from flash or flame  burns  , 30 %  इससे  falling debris  और  10  %  from other causes .
During the following months , large numbers died from the effect of burns , radiation sickness , and other injuries , compounded by illness .
In a US estimate of the total immediate and short term cause of death , 15–20 % died from radiation sickness , 20–30 % from burns , and 50–60 % from other injuries , compounded by  बीमारी  .
In both cities , most of the  मुर्दे  were civilians , although Hiroshima had a sizeable garrison .
On 15 August , six days after the bombing of Nagasaki , Japan announced its surrender to the Allies , signing  the  Instrument of Surrender on 2 September , officially ending World War II .
The bombings led , in part , to post-war Japan 's adopting Three Non-Nuclear Principles , forbidding the nation from  नाभिकीय  armament .
The role of the bombings in  जापानी  's surrender and their ethical justification are still  debated  .
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ) , commonly known as Mahatma  गांधी  , was the  preeminent  leader of Indian nationalism  in  British-ruled India .
Employing non-violent civil disobedience  ,   गांधी  led India to independence and inspired movements for non-violence , civil rights and freedom  आरपार  the world .
The son of a senior government official , Gandhi was born and raised in a  हिन्दू  Bania community  in  coastal Gujarat ,  और   प्रशिक्षित  in law  in  London .
Gandhi became famous by fighting for the civil rights of Muslim and Hindu  इंडियंस  in South Africa , using new techniques of non-violent civil disobedience that  he  developed .
Returning to India in 1915 , he set about organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes .
A lifelong opponent of ``  सांप्रदायिकता  `` ( i.e . basing  राजनीती   on  religion )  he  reached out widely to  सब  religious groups .
he   became   a   नेता  of Muslims protesting the declining  औकात  of the Caliphate .
Assuming leadership of the Indian National Congress in 1921 ,  गांधी  led nationwide campaigns for easing poverty , expanding women 's rights , building religious and ethnic  सौहार्द  , ending untouchability ,  increasing  economic self-reliance , and above all for achieving  स्वराज  —the independence of India from British domination .
Gandhi  led  Indians in protesting the national salt tax with  the  Dandi Salt March in 1930 , and later in demanding the British to immediately  छोड़ो  India in  1942  , during World War II .
He was imprisoned  लिये  that and for  numerous  other  राजनैतिक  offenses over the years .
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence and truth in all situations , and advocated that others do the same .
He saw the villages as the core of the  सच्चा  India and promoted self-sufficiency ;  he  did not support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru .
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient residential community and wore the traditional Indian dhoti and shawl , woven with yarn he had hand spun on a charkha .
His  मुख्य  political  दुश्मन  in Britain  थी  Winston Churchill , who ridiculed him as a  ``  half-naked fakir  .  ''
He was a  समर्पित  vegetarian , and undertook long fasts as means of both self-purification  और  political mobilization .
In his last year , unhappy at the partition of India  ,  Gandhi worked to stop the carnage between Muslims , Hindus and Sikhs that raged in the border area between India and Pakistan .
He  थी  assassinated on 30 January 1948 by Nathuram Godse who thought Gandhi was too sympathetic to India 's Muslims .
30 January is observed as Martyrs ' Day in India .
The honorific Mahatma  (  `` Great Soul '' ) was applied to him by 1914 .
In India he was also called Bapu ( `` Father '' )  .
he  is known in India as the Father of the Nation ;  उसके  birthday , 2 October , is commemorated there  as  Gandhi Jayanti , a national holiday , and world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence .
Gandhi 's philosophy was not theoretical but one of pragmatism ,  कि  is , practicing his principles in the moment .
Asked to  दे   a  message to  the  people , he would respond , `` My life is my message . ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23 , ca . 1904 – May 10 ,  1977  ) , born Lucille  fay  LeSueur , was an American actress in film , television and theatre .
Starting as a dancer in  traveling  theatrical companies before  debuting  on Broadway , Crawford was signed to a motion picture contract by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925 .
Initially frustrated  by  the size and quality of her parts , Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity  और  became nationally known  as  a flapper by the end of the 1920s .
In the 1930s , Crawford 's fame rivaled  ,  and later outlasted , MGM colleagues  norma  Shearer and Greta Garbo .
Crawford often played hardworking young women who find romance and financial  कामयाबी  .
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were  खूब  received by Depression -era audiences and were popular with women .
Crawford became one of Hollywood  's  most prominent movie  सितारों  and one of the highest paid women in the United States  ,  but her  films  began losing money and by the end of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office  ज़हर  '' .
After  an  absence of nearly  दो  years from the screen , Crawford staged a comeback by starring in Mildred Pierce ( 1945 ) ,  लिये  which she won the Academy Award for  बेहतरीन  Actress .
In 1955 , she became involved with the  pepsi-cola  Company  through   उसके  marriage to company Chairman Alfred Steele .
After his death  in  1959 ,  क्रॉफर्ड  was elected to  भरण  his  रिक्ति  on the board of directors but was forcibly retired in 1973 .
She continued acting in film and television regularly through the 1960s , when her performances became fewer ;  बाद  the release of the British horror film  trog   in  1970 , Crawford retired from the screen  .
Following a public appearance in 1974 , after which unflattering photographs were  प्रकाशित  , Crawford  withdrew  from public life and became increasingly reclusive until her death  in  1977 .
Crawford  शादीशुदा   चार  times .
Her first three  विवाह  ended in divorce ; the last ended with the death of husband Alfred Steele .
She adopted  पाँच  children , one of whom was reclaimed by his birth mother  .
क्रॉफर्ड  's relationships with her two  पुरानी  children , Christina and Christopher , were acrimonious .
Crawford disinherited the two  और  , after Crawford 's death , Christina wrote  a  `` tell-all ''  संस्मरण  , Mommie Dearest , in which she alleged a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional  गाली  perpetrated by Crawford .
She was voted the  दसवाँ  greatest female star in the history of American cinema by the American Film Institute .
