Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a  मुश्किल  or soft cover used to protect  unoccupied  passenger seats in a convertible or roadster , or the cargo bed in a pickup truck .
Hard tonneau  कवर   खोलें  by a hinging  or  folding mechanism while soft  कवर  open by rolling up  .
The tonneau cover  is  used to  छिपाते  cargo .
When the cover is pulled out , it keeps items out of  the  sun and provides extra security by  keeping  personal items out of sight , as well as shielding the driver from view .
Twitter is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send and read  text-based  messages  of   up   to  140 characters , known as `` tweets '' .
Twitter was  निर्मित  in March 2006 by Jack  dorsey  and by July , the social  नेटवर्किंग  site was launched .
The service rapidly gained worldwide popularity , with over 500 million registered users as of 2012 , generating over 340 million tweets daily and handling over  1.6  billion search queries per day .
Since its launch , Twitter has become one of the ten most visited websites on the Internet , and has been described as `` the SMS of the Internet . ''
Unregistered users can read tweets , while registered users can post tweets through the website  इंटरफ़ेस  , SMS , or a range of apps for mobile devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco , with additional servers and offices in New  यॉर्क  City  ,  Boston , and San Antonio .
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film , co-produced and directed by Todd Phillips and written by Jon Lucas and  स्कॉट  Moore .
It is the first film  of  The Hangover franchise .The film stars  ब्राडली  Cooper , Ed Helms , Zach Galifianakis , Heather Graham , Justin Bartha , and Jeffrey Tambor .
The Hangover tells the story of Phil Wenneck , Stu Price  और  Alan Garner , who travel to Las Vegas for a bachelor party to celebrate their friend Doug  billings  ' impending marriage .
However , Phil  ,  Stu and Alan have no  मेमोरी  of the previous night 's events and must find Doug  पहले  the wedding can take place .
Lucas and Moore wrote the script after executive producer Chris Bender 's friend disappeared and had a large bill  बाद  being sent to a strip  क्लबों  .
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 million , Philips and Jeremy Garelick rewrote the script to include a tiger as well as a subplot involving a baby and a police cruiser , and also including  boxer  Mike Tyson .
फिल्मांकन  took place in Nevada for 15 days , and during filming , the three main actors ( Cooper , Helms and Galifianakis ) formed a friendship .
The Hangover was released on June 5 , 2009 , becoming a critical and commercial success .
it  became the  tenth-highest-grossing   फिल्मी  of 2009 , with a worldwide gross of over US $  467  million .
Critics praised the film 's comedic approach but criticized it for its vulgarity .
The film won the  सुनहरी  Globe Award for  बेहतरीन  Motion Picture –  musical  or Comedy , and received multiple other accolades .
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the world  ,  as well as the second highest-grossing R-rated comedy  कभी  in the United States , surpassing a record previously held by Beverly Hills Cop  लिये  almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012 .
Out of all R-rated films  ,  it is the third highest-grossing ever in the U.S. , behind only  the  Passion  of  the Christ and The Matrix Reloaded .
A sequel , The Hangover Part II , was released in 2011 , and a third and final film , The Hangover Part  iii  , is set  लिये  release in 2013 .
Events involving meiosis , showing chromosomal crossover
Meiosis  (  ) is a  खास  type of cell division necessary for sexual reproduction in eukaryotes .
The cells produced by  meiosis  are gametes  or  spores .
In many organisms , including all animals and land plants ( but not some other  समूह  such as  fungi  ) , gametes are called sperm and egg cells .
Whilst the process  of  meiosis bears a number  of  similarities  साथ   the  'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis  ,  it differs in two  महत्वपूर्ण  respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which  shuffles   the   जीनों  producing a different genetic combination in each gamete , compared with the co-existence of each of the  दो  separate pairs of each chromosome ( one received from each parent ) in  प्रत्येक  cell which results  इससे  mitosis .
the outcome of meiosis is  potentially  four ( genetically unique ) haploid cells  ,  compared  साथ  the two  (  genetically identical )  द्विगुणित  cells produced from mitosis .
Meiosis begins with one diploid cell containing two copies of each chromosome  —one  from the organism  's  mother and one from its father .
The cell divides twice , potentially producing up to four haploid cells containing  एक  copy of each chromosome .
( `` Potentially '' because in some cases , such as the formation of  oocytes  in mammals , only  एक   of  the possible four  अगुणित  cells survives . )
In  पशु  the haploid cell  resulting  from meiosis is a male or  मादा   gamete  .
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete cells is  a  unique mixture of maternal and paternal DNA , resulting in offspring that are genetically distinct from either parent .
This gives rise to genetic diversity in  sexually  reproducing populations .
This genetic diversity can provide the  विभिन्नता  of physical and behavioural attributes  (  phenotypes ) upon which natural selection can act ,  लकिन  , as described below in Section 6 ,  उत्पत्ति  and function of meiosis , the genetic diversity may be largely a  by-product  of the homologous recombination that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis .
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis , specific genes are more highly transcribed  ,  and these are called the meiome , the term used in functional genomics for the meiotic transcriptome .
Meiosis is a key  विशेषता  for  सब  sexually reproducing eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing , synapse  और  recombination occur .
in  addition to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mRNA ( the  meiome  )  ,  however , there are also  pervasive  translational controls ( e.g  .  selective usage of preformed mRNA ) , regulating the ultimate meiotic  stage-specific  protein expression of genes during meiosis .
Thus , both the  meiome   और  translational controls determine  the  broad restructuring of meiotic cells  needed  to carry  आउट  meiosis .
Prior to the meiosis process the cell  's  chromosomes are duplicated by a round of DNA replication , creating from the maternal and paternal versions of  प्रत्येक  chromosome ( homologs ) two exact copies , sister chromatids , attached at the centromere region .
In the beginning of meiosis the maternal and paternal homologs pair to each other .
Then they typically exchange parts by homologous  recombination   अग्रणी  to  crossovers  of DNA between the  मातृ  and paternal versions  of  the chromosome .
Spindle fibers bind to the centromeres of each pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator .
Then the fibers pull the recombined homologs to opposite  डंडे  of the cell .
As  the  chromosomes move away from the center the cell divides into  दो  daughter cells , each containing a haploid number of chromosomes composed of two chromatids .
After the recombined maternal and paternal homologs  have  separated into the  दो  daughter cells , a  दूसरी  round of cell division occurs .
There meiosis ends  as  the two sister chromatids  बनाना  up  प्रत्येक  homolog are separated  और   मूव  into one of the four  resulting  gamete cells .
upon  fertilization , for example when a  शुक्राणु  enters an egg cell , two gamete cells produced by  meiosis  fuse  .
The gamete from the mother  और  the gamete from the father each  योगदान  one half of the set of chromosomes that make up the new offspring 's genome .
Meiosis uses many of the same mechanisms as  समसूत्रण  , a  प्रकार  of cell division used by eukaryotes  जैसे  plants and animals to split one cell into two identical  बेटी  cells .
In all plants and in many  protists   meiosis  results in the  गठन  of spores : haploid cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize  लड़  , the sweet science or in Greek pygmachia ) is a martial  आर्ट  and combat sport in which two people engage in a contest of  शक्ति  , speed , reflexes ,  सहनशीलता  and will by throwing punches with gloved hands .
Amateur boxing is an Olympic and Commonwealth sport and is a common fixture in most of the major international games -  it  also has its own World Championships .
Boxing is supervised by a referee  over  a  श्रेणी  of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds .
The result is  decided  when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a referee , is disqualified for breaking a rule , resigns by throwing  in  a towel , or is  सुनाया  the winner  or  loser based on the judges ' scorecards at  the  end  of  the contest .
The birth hour of boxing  as  a sport may be its acceptance  by  the ancient Greeks  as  an Olympic  खेल  as early as 688 BC .
Boxing  विकसित  from  16th-  and 18th-century prizefights , largely in  ग्रेट  Britain , to the forerunner of  आधुनिक  boxing  in  the mid-19th century , again initially in Great  ब्रिटेन  and later in the United States .
In  2004  , ESPN  क्रमित  boxing as the most difficult sport in the world .
Agreement or concord happens when a word changes form depending on the other words to which it relates .
It is an  उदाहरण  of inflection , and usually involves making the value of  कुछ  grammatical category ( such as gender or person ) `` agree '' between  अलग   शब्द   or  parts of the sentence .
For example , in Standard English , one may say I am or he is , but not `` I is '' or `` he am '' .
This  is  because the grammar of the language requires that the verb and  इसके  subject agree in person .
The pronouns I and he  हैं  first and third person respectively , as are the verb forms am and is  .
The verb form must be  चयनित  so that it has the same  व्यक्ति  as the subject .
The agreement  आधारित  on overt grammatical categories as above is formal agreement  ,   in   कंट्रास्ट  to notional agreement  ,  which is based  on  meaning .
For instance  ,  the phrase The United States is treated as singular for purposes of agreement , even though  it  is formally plural .
This is a list of  स्थान  below mean sea level that are on land  .
Places in  tunnels  , mines , basements , dug holes (  भी  with open sky ) , under water , under  बर्फ  , or existing temporarily as a result of ebbing of sea tide etc . are not included .
All figures are in meters below sea level:
Debbie Macomber (  born  October 22 , 1948  in  Yakima ,  वॉशिंगटन  ) is a best-selling  अमरीकी  author of over 150 romance novels and contemporary women 's fiction .
Over 140 million copies of her books are in print throughout the world , and four have become made-for-TV-movies .
Macomber was the inaugural winner  of  the fan-voted  quill  Award for romance in 2005 and has  महरूम  awarded both a Romance Writers of America RITA and a lifetime achievement  पुरस्कार  by  the  Romance  लेखक  of America .
Catonsville is a census-designated place  (   cdp   )  in Baltimore County , Maryland , United States .
The population was 41,567  at  the 2010 census .
The community lies to the west  of   बाल्टीमोर  along the city 's border  .
Catonsville is the  घर  of  the  University of Maryland , Baltimore County ( UMBC ) , a public research  विश्वविद्यालयों  with over 12,000 students .
A lawyer , according to Black 's Law Dictionary , is `` a person learned  in   the  law  ;  as an attorney , counsel  or  solicitor ; a person who is practicing law . ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct established by the sovereign government of a society to correct wrongs , maintain the stability of  राजनैतिक  and  सोशल  authority , and deliver justice  .
Working as a lawyer involves the practical  अनुप्रयोग  of abstract legal theories and  ज्ञान  to solve specific individualized problems , or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e. , hire ) lawyers to perform legal services .
The role of  the  lawyer varies significantly across  विधिक  jurisdictions , and so  it  can be treated here in only  the  most general terms .
Vector Marketing is the  घरेलू  sales arm of  cutco  Corporation , an Olean ,  नई  York based cutlery manufacturer .
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a United States federal law requiring covered employers to provide employees job-protected and unpaid leave for qualified medical and family reasons .
Qualified  चिकित्सा  and family reasons include : personal or family illness  ,  family military leave , pregnancy , adoption , or the foster care placement of a child .
The  fmla   is  administered by the Wage and Hour  प्रभाग  of the United States Department of Labor .
The bill was a major part of President Bill Clinton 's agenda  in  his first term  .
President Clinton signed the bill  into  law on February 5 ,  1993  ( ; 29 U.S.C . sec . 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) and it took  प्रभाव  on August 5 , 1993 , six months later .
The FMLA was intended `` to balance the demands of the workplace with the needs  of  families .  ''
The Act allows eligible employees to take up to 12 work weeks of  unpaid  leave during any 12-month period to attend to the serious health condition of the employee , parent , spouse or child , or for pregnancy or care of a newborn child , or for adoption or foster care of a child .
In order to  be   योग्य  for FMLA leave , an employee must have been at the business at  तनिक  12  महीने  , and worked at least  1,250  hours over the past 12 months , and work at  a  location where the company employs 50 or more  कर्मचारी  within  75  miles .
The FMLA covers both public- and private-sector  कर्मचारी  , but certain categories of  कर्मचारी  are excluded , including elected officials and their personal staff members .
The Vietnam War ( ) was a Cold War -era military  विरोध   कि  occurred in Vietnam , Laos , and Cambodia from 1 November 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975 .
This war followed  the  First Indochina War and was fought between North Vietnam , supported by its  कम्युनिस्ट   allies   ,  and the government of  दक्षिण  Vietnam  ,  supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries .
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National  मुक्ति  Front , or NLF ) , a lightly  हथियारबंद  South Vietnamese communist common front directed by the North ,  largely   लड़ा  a guerrilla war against anti-communist  शक्तियां   in   the  region .
the  Vietnam People 's  फौज  ( North Vietnamese Army ) engaged in a more conventional war , at times committing large units into  बैटल  .
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on  एयर  superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct search and destroy operations ,  involving  ground forces , artillery  ,  and airstrikes  .
The U.S. government viewed involvement  in  the war as a way to prevent a communist takeover of South  वियतनाम  as part of their wider  रणनीति  of containment  .
The  उत्तर  Vietnamese government and Viet Cong were fighting to reunify Vietnam under communist rule .
वे  viewed the conflict  as   a  colonial war , fought  initially  against France  ,  backed by the U.S. , and later against South Vietnam , which it regarded  as  a U.S. puppet state .
American military advisors  arrived  in what was then  फ्रेंच  Indochina beginning in 1950 .
u.S.  involvement escalated in the early 1960s , with troop levels tripling  in  1961 and tripling again in 1962 .
U.S. combat units were deployed beginning in 1965 .
Operations spanned international borders , with Laos  और  Cambodia heavily bombed .
American involvement in the war peaked in 1968 , at the time of the Tet Offensive .
After this ,  u.S.  ground forces were gradually withdrawn as part of a policy known as Vietnamization .
Despite the Paris Peace Accords , signed by all parties in January 1973 , fighting continued .
U.S. military involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as  a  result of the Case–Church Amendment passed by the  u.S.  Congress  .
The capture of Saigon by the Vietnam People 's Army in April 1975 marked the end of the  युद्ध  , and  उत्तर  and South Vietnam  यहूद  reunified the following  साल  .
the   युद्ध  exacted a huge human cost in terms of fatalities ( see Vietnam War casualties )  .
Estimates of the number of Vietnamese soldiers and civilians killed vary  इससे  800,000 to 3.1 million .
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians  ,  20,000–200,000 Laotians , and 58,220 U.S. service members also died in the conflict .
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian Islands of Alaska photographed from the International Space Station , May 2006 .
Ash plumes reached a height of  19  km during the climactic eruption at  माउंट  Pinatubo  ,  Philippines  in  1991 .
A volcano is an opening , or rupture , in a planet 's surface or crust , which allows hot magma , volcanic ash and gases to escape from the magma chamber below the  सतह  .
Volcanoes are generally found where tectonic plates are diverging or converging .
A mid-oceanic ridge , for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge , has examples of volcanoes caused  by   अपसारी  tectonic plates pulling apart ; the Pacific Ring of Fire has examples of volcanoes caused by convergent tectonic plates coming together .
By contrast , volcanoes are usually not created where two tectonic  प्लेटों  slide past one another .
Volcanoes can also form where there is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's crust in the interiors of plates , e.g. , in the East African Rift  ,  the Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the  रिओ  Grande Rift in North America .
This type of  volcanism  falls under  the   छतरियाँ  of ``  थाली  hypothesis '' volcanism .
Volcanism away from  थाली  boundaries has also been explained as mantle plumes .
These so-called `` hotspots `` , for example Hawaii , are  postulated  to arise  इससे  upwelling  diapirs  with magma from the core–mantle  boundary   ,  3,000  km  deep in the  धरती  .
erupting  volcanoes  can  pose many hazards , not only in the immediate vicinity of the eruption .
Volcanic ash can be a threat to aircraft  ,  in particular those with jet engines where ash particles can be melted by the high operating temperature  .
Large eruptions can affect temperature as ash and droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the sun and cool the Earth 's lower atmosphere or troposphere ; however , they also absorb heat  radiated  up from the Earth , thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically ,  so-called  volcanic  सर्दियों  have caused  अनर्थकारी  famines .
A  गहन  pothole on New York City 's Second Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a kettle and known in parts of  the  Western United States as a chuckhole )  is  a type of disruption in the surface of a  roadway  where a portion of the road material has broken away ,  leaving  a hole .
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC ,  भी   ज्ञात  as hypernephroma  )  is a kidney cancer that originates in the lining of  the   proximal  convoluted tubule , the very small tubes in the kidney  कि  transport GF ( glomerular filtrate ) from the glomerulus to the  descending  limb of the nephron .
RCC is the most common type of kidney cancer in adults , responsible for approximately 80 % of cases .
It is also known to be the most lethal  of  all the genitourinary tumors .
Initial treatment is most commonly a radical or partial nephrectomy and remains the mainstay of curative treatment .
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma , the 5-year survival rate is 60-70 % , but this is lowered considerably where metastases have spread .
It is  अपेक्षाकृत  resistant to  विकिरण  therapy and chemotherapy , although some cases respond to immunotherapy .
targeted  cancer therapies such as sunitinib , temsirolimus , bevacizumab , interferon-alpha , and  sorafenib  have improved the outlook for RCC .
Estée Lauder Companies , Inc. is a  निर्माता  and marketer of prestige  skincare   ,  makeup , fragrance and hair care  उत्पाद   .
The company has its headquarters in Midtown Manhattan , New York City .
The peritoneum ( )  is  the serous membrane that forms the lining of the abdominal cavity or the coelom —it covers most of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in  amniotes  and some invertebrates ( annelids , for instance ) .
It is composed of a layer of mesothelium supported by a thin layer of connective tissue .
The peritoneum both supports the abdominal organs and serves as a conduit for their blood  और  lymph vessels and  nerves  .
The abdominal cavity ( the  स्पेस  bounded by the  vertebrae  , abdominal muscles , diaphragm and pelvic floor ) should not be confused with the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity , but wrapped in peritoneum ) .
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called ``  intraperitoneal  '' ( e.g .  the  stomach )  ,  the structures in the abdominal  गुहा  that  हैं  located behind the intraperitoneal space are called `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g . the kidneys )  ,  and those structures below the intraperitoneal space  हैं  called `` subperitoneal '' or  ``  infraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the bladder ) .
Modern 2.5 '' SSD used in consumer laptops and desktop computers .
DDR SDRAM based SSD .
Max and .
PCI attached IO Accelerator SSD
PCI-E , DRAM , and NAND  आधारित  SSD .
It uses an external power supply to make the DRAM non-volatile .
A solid-state drive  (  SSD ) ( also known  as  a solid-state disk or electronic disk  ,  though it contains no actual `` disk '' of any kind ) is a  आंकड़ा  storage device  using  integrated circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently .
SSD technology  उपयोग  electronic interfaces compatible  साथ  traditional block input/output ( I/O ) hard disk drives .
ssds  have no moving  mechanical  components , which distinguish them from traditional electromechanical magnetic disks such as hard disk drives ( HDDs ) or floppy disks , which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads .
Compared with electromechanical disks , SSDs are typically less susceptible to physical shock , much quieter , have lower access time  ,  and less  विलंबता  .
However , while the price of SSDs  रै  continued to decline in 2012 , SSDs are still about 7 to 8 times more expensive per unit of storage than HDDs .
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces developed for hard  डिस्क   ड्राइव  , thus permitting simple replacement in  आम  applications .
, most SSDs use  nand-based  flash memory , which retains data without power  .
For applications requiring fast access , but not necessarily data persistence after power loss , SSDs may  be  constructed from random-access memory ( RAM ) .
Such devices  may  employ separate power sources  ,  such  as  batteries , to maintain data after power  घाटा  .
संकर  drives or solid state  संकर  drives (  sshd  ) combine the features of SSDs and HDDs in  the   वही  unit  ,  containing a large hard disk drive and an SSD cache to improve performance of frequently accessed data .
These devices may  प्रस्ताव  near-SSD performance for many applications .
Salmon roe (  बाएँ  ) and sturgeon  caviar  ( right ) served  साथ   माँ  of pearl caviar spoons to avoid tainting the taste of the caviar .
Ossetra caviar , salmon creme fraiche , potato shallot croquette , basil oil , egg whites and yolks
Caviar , according to the  खाना  and Agriculture Organization , is a product made from  salt-cured  fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family .
The roe  can  be `` fresh  ''  (  non-pasteurized  ) or pasteurized , with pasteurization reducing its culinary and economic value .
Traditionally the term caviar refers only to roe from  जंगली  sturgeon in the Caspian and Black Seas ( Beluga , Ossetra  और  Sevruga caviars  )  .
depending  on the country , caviar may also be used to describe the  roe  of other fish such as salmon ,  steelhead  , trout , lumpfish , whitefish , and other species of sturgeon .
Caviar is considered  a  luxury delicacy and is eaten as a  गार्निश  or a  स्प्रेड  .
In 2012 , caviar  बेची  for $ 2,500 per pound , or  $  3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo .
The SEC Network is  a  television syndication network featuring  सजीव  broadcasts  of  college football and  बास्केट  events from the Southeastern Conference .
It is owned  और   संचालित   by  ESPN Plus and is shown in more than 50 percent of households in the United States , mostly Southeastern United States markets .
The SEC Network typically airs in  the  noon eastern slot that was former home to the Raycom Sports SEC  खेल  of the week .
Games are shown locally  on  broadcast stations , regional sports networks  ,  as well  as  on ESPN GamePlan  ,  ESPN Full Court , and ESPN3.com .
The SEC Network is also available in Canada via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV .
The SEC Network uses the same on-screen graphics currently used by ESPN on ABC , a version of ESPN 's graphics package .
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because most of its affiliates do not Letterbox  उनके  Standard Definition feeds , while ESPN 's television networks have allowed their  ग्राफिक्स  to abandon the title safe , but letterbox for SD  दर्शक  .
Starting with the SEC 2012  बास्केट  season , SEC Network 's graphics  have   महरूम  converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format .
This is also being used for the 2013  बास्केट  season , but  था  still adapted the former 4:3-safe graphics format for the 2012 SEC football season .
The 1990s , pronounced and  भी  known as `` the  nineteen-nineties  '' or abbreviated as ``  the  Nineties '' or `` the '90s '' , was a decade that began on January 1 , 1990 , and ended on December  31  , 1999 .
It was the 10th and last decade  of  the 20th century and the 100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium .
The decade is best known for the end  of  the Cold War  at  the beginning of the decade and the expansion and commercialization of the Internet during the second half of the decade .
In  much  of the West  the  1990s  is  remembered as a period  of  unprecedented  सलाम  and  समृद्धि  ,  हालांकि  many parts of the so-called Third World faced various problems including genocide , AIDS and new  or  continuing ethnic tensions and civil wars .
Culturally speaking the decade was  characterized  by the  वृद्धि  of multiculturalism and  वैकल्पिक  media  .
Movements such as grunge , the rave scene and hip hop spread around the world to young people during the decade , aided by  then-new   प्रौद्योगिकी  such as cable television and the Internet .
A combination of  कारकों  , including the mass mobilization of capital markets through neoliberalism , the beginning of the widespread proliferation of new media such as the Internet , and the  विच्छेद  of the Soviet Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of economic and political power  आरपार  the world , and within  देशों  .
Income inequality among countries in  the  world rose sharply between the 1980s  और  the  mid-1990s  , before levelling off and then  गिरना  after 2000 .
नई  ethnic conflicts  उभरा  in Africa , the Balkans and the Caucasus , the former  दो   जिससे  led to the Rwandan genocide and Bosnian genocide  ,  respectively .
The  संयुक्त  States began its current military occupation of the Middle  ईस्ट  during the summer of 1990 with Desert Shield after it cut off a large portion of  the  world 's petroleum supply  .
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab world remained elusive , though the Irish Troubles came to a standstill in 1998 with the Good Friday Agreement after 30 years of  हिंसा  .
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a species  of  canid native  to  the  wilderness  and remote  क्षेत्रों  of North America , Eurasia  ,  and North Africa .
It  is  the largest member of its family , with males averaging , and females .
It is  समान  in general appearance and proportions to a  जर्मनी   गड़रिये   ,  or sled dog , but has a larger head , narrower chest , longer legs , straighter  टेल  and bigger  पंजे  .
Its winter  फर  is long and bushy , and predominantly a  mottled  gray in colour , although nearly pure white  ,  red , or brown to black also  occur  .
Within the genus Canis , the  धूसर  wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its smaller cousins (  the  coyote and golden jackal ) , as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to hunting  विशाल   शिकार  , its more gregarious nature and its highly advanced expressive behavior .
It  is  a social animal , travelling in nuclear families consisting of a mated pair , accompanied by the pair 's adult offspring .
The gray wolf is typically an apex  परभक्षी   throughout  its range , with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it .
It feeds primarily on large  ungulates  ,  हालांकि   it  also eats smaller animals , livestock  ,  carrion , and garbage  .
the  gray wolf is one of the world 's most well researched animals , with probably more books written about  it  than any other wildlife species .
It has a long history  of  association with humans , having been despised and hunted in most agricultural communities due to its attacks on livestock , while  conversely  being respected by some Native American tribes .
It is the sole  पूर्वज  of the dog , which was first domesticated in the Middle  ईस्ट   .
Although the fear  of  wolves is prevalent  in  many human societies , the majority of recorded attacks on people have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies .
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and  मारे  people , mainly children ,  लकिन  this is unusual , as wolves are relatively few ,  सजीव  away from people , and have been taught to  भय  humans by hunters  और   गड़रिये  .
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to , though its still relatively widespread  दायरा  and stable population means that the species is not threatened at a global level , and is therefore classified by the IUCN as Least Concern .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization , characterised by an autocratic form of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which preceded it ,  था  been destabilized through a series of civil wars .
Several events marked the  परिवर्तन  from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's  नियुक्ति  as perpetual dictator (  44  BC ) ; the Battle  of  Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the  रोमन  Senate (  27  BC ) .
the  first two centuries of the  साम्राज्य  were a period  of   unprecedented  stability and prosperity known as the  pax  Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest  expanse  during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ) .
In  the   3rd  century , the Empire underwent a  संकट   कि  threatened its existence , but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
Christians rose  to  power in the 4th century , during which time a  प्रणाली  of dual  नियम  was developed  in  the Latin West and Greek East .
After the  पतन  of central government in the West in the 5th century ,  the  eastern  हाफ  continued as what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of  the  Empire 's vast extent and long endurance ,  the  institutions and  संस्कृति   of  Rome  था  a profound and lasting influence on the development of language  ,  religion , architecture , philosophy ,  विधि  , and forms of government in the territory it governed , particularly Europe ,  और  by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world .
Education in  the  United States is mainly provided by the public sector , with control and funding coming  इससे  three levels  :  local  ,  state , and federal , in that order .
Child education is  अनिवार्य  , and there are also a large number and  चौड़ी  variety  of  higher education institutions throughout the country that one can choose to attend , both  सरेआम  and privately administered .
Public education is universally available .
School curricula , funding  ,  teaching , employment , and other policies are set through locally elected school boards with jurisdiction  over  school districts with many directives from state legislatures .
School districts are  प्रायः  separate from other local jurisdictions , with independent officials and budgets .
Educational standards and standardized testing decisions are usually made by state governments  .
The ages for compulsory education vary  by  state .
It begins from ages five to eight and  ends  from ages fourteen to eighteen .
Compulsory education requirements can generally  be  satisfied by educating children in public schools , state-certified private  स्कूलों  , or an approved home school program .
In most  पब्लिक  and private schools  ,  education is divided into three levels :  elementary  school  ,  middle  स्कूल  ( sometimes called junior high school ) , and  ऊँची  school ( sometimes referred to as secondary education )  .
In almost all schools at these levels , children are divided by age  समूह  into grades , ranging from kindergarten ( followed by first grade ) for the youngest children in elementary school , up to  बारहवीं   ग्रेड  , the final year of high school .
The exact age range of students in these  ग्रेड  levels varies slightly from area to area .
Post-secondary education  ,  better known  as  `` college `` in the United States  ,  is generally  governed  separately from the elementary and high school system , and is described  in  a separate section below .
Government supported , free public schools  लिये  all started being  स्थापित  after the revolution , and  विस्तारित  in the 19th century  ,  as the results of  प्रयत्न  of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington .
By 1870 , all  राज्य  had free elementary schools , albeit only in urban centers .
As  the  20th century drew nearer , states started passing laws  to  make schooling compulsory , and by 1910 , 72 percent of children  attended  school .
Private  स्कूलों  continued to spread during this time , as well as colleges and—in the rural centers— land grant  कॉलेजों  .
The year of 1910 also saw the first  सच्चा  high schools .
During the rest of  the  20th  सदी  , educational efforts centered on reducing the inequality of the schooling system .
The  लैंडमार्क  Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of  शिक्षा  made the desegregation of elementary and high schools a national priority , while the Pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access  to  college .
Special education was made into federal law in 1975  .
The  elementary  and Secondary Education Act of  1965  made standardized  परीक्षण  a requirement , and in 1983 , a commission was established to evaluate their results and propose a course of action .
The resulting  no  Child Left Behind  अधिनियम   of  2001 was controversial and its goals proved  to  be unrealistic .
A commission established in 2006 evaluated higher  शिक्षा  , but its recommendations have yet to  be  fully implemented .
Paul Bragg ( February 6  ,  1895  –  December 7 , 1976 ) , nutritionist , was a pioneer in America’s wellness movement .
Health spending per capita , in $ US PPP-adjusted , with the US and Canada compared amongst other first world nations .
Comparison of the health care systems in Canada and the United States are often made by government , public health  और  public policy analysts .
The  दो  countries had similar health care systems before  कनाडा  reformed its system in the 1960s and 1970s .
The United States spends much more money on health  परवाह  than Canada , on  दोनो  a per-capita  आधार  and as  a  percentage of GDP .
in  2006 , per-capita spending for health care in Canada was US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S. , US $ 6,714 .
The U.S. spent 15.3 % of GDP on health care in that year ; Canada spent 10.0 % .
In 2006 , 70 % of  स्वास्थ्य  care spending in Canada was  financed  by government , versus 46 % in the United States .
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on health care was 23 % higher than Canadian government spending , and U.S.  सरकारी  expenditure on health care  थी  just under 83 % of total Canadian spending ( public and private ) though these  आंकडे  do n't take into account  जनसांख्यिकी  differences  .
Studies have come to different conclusions about the result of this disparity in spending .
a  2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed  चिकित्सा  journal  मिला  that `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared for in Canada versus the United  राज्य  , but differences are not consistent . ''
Life expectancy is  longer   in  Canada , and its infant mortality rate is lower  than   कि   of  the U.S. , but there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences .
One commonly cited  तुलना   ,  the 2000 World Health  संगठन  's ratings of ``  overall  health service performance '' , which used a `` composite measure  of   उपलब्धि  in the  स्तर  of health , the distribution of health , the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '' , ranked Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations .
This study rated the US `` responsiveness '' , or quality of service for individuals receiving treatment , as 1st , compared with 7th for Canada .
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US , simply comparing the life expectancy of two groups with different racial makeup and different obesity rates is likely not an effective  रास्ता  of determining  जिससे  healthcare system is superior .
The WHO 's study methods were criticized by  कुछ  analyses .
Although there is a measure of consensus that life-expectancy and infant mortality mark the most reliable ways to compare nation-wide health care , assuming the population makeup is  समान  ,  a  recent report by the  congressional   शोध  Service carefully summarizes some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons .
The sound source has now broken through the sound speed barrier , and is traveling at 1.4 times the speed of  ध्वनि   ,  ( Mach 1.4 ) .
चूंकि  the source  is  moving faster ( with a speed ) than the sound waves it creates , it actually leads the advancing wavefront  .
The sound source will pass by a stationary observer ( with a speed ) before the observer actually hears the sound it creates .
As a result , an observer  in  front of the source will detect
and an observer behind  the   सोर्स  .
A sonic boom produced by an aircraft moving at M=2.92 , calculated  इससे  the cone angle of 20 degrees .
An observer hears the boom when the shock wave , on the edges of the cone ,  crosses  his or her location .
Mach cone  कोण
A sonic boom  is  the sound associated with the shock waves created  by  an object traveling through the air faster than the speed of sound .
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of sound  उर्जा  , sounding much like an explosion .
The crack of a supersonic bullet passing overhead is an example of a sonic boom in miniature  .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk show hosted by Jay Leno that initially aired  इससे  May 25 , 1992 to May 29 , 2009  ,  and resumed  उत्पादन  on March 1 , 2010 .
The fourth incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise made  इसके  debut on May 25 , 1992 , three days following Johnny Carson 's retirement as  मेजबान  of the program .
the  program originates from  एनबीसी   studios  in Burbank , California , and is broadcast Monday through Friday at 11:35 PM in the Eastern and Pacific time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain  समय  ) .
Unlike  कार्सन  or his predecessor  जोकर  Paar , Leno only once utilized a guest  मेजबान  ,  preferring  to  मेजबान  the series by himself .
on  April  26  , 1999  ,  the  दिखाएँ  began broadcasting  in  1080i HDTV  ,  becoming the first  अमरीकी  nightly talk show to be shot in high definition .
The show is shot in 16:9 aspect ratio  .
The series , which followed the same basic format as that  of  his predecessors ( an opening monologue followed by comedy routines , interviews and performances ) , ran until May 29 , 2009 , after which Leno was succeeded  by  Conan O'Brien .
NBC signed Leno to a new deal for a nightly talk show in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot  .
The primetime series , titled  the  Jay Leno Show , debuted on September 14 ,  2009  , following a similar format to the Leno incarnation of Tonight .
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program , which premiered June 1 , 2009 , nor The Jay Leno Show generated the ratings that NBC had expected .
The network decided to move a  सघन  30-minute version of Leno 's show to O'Brien 's time slot , and  o'brien   's  Tonight Show  a  half-hour later .
This  निर्णय   मिले   साथ  opposition from O'Brien , whose stint  on  The Tonight Show ended January 22 , 2010  ,  after which he began his own  बात  show on TBS  .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began its second and current incarnation ,  the  sixth of the franchise , on March 1 , 2010 .
RFID chip next to a grain of rice .
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated  in  consumer products , and implanted in pets , for identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is  the  wireless non-contact  उपयोग  of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data , for the purposes  of  automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
The tags contain electronically stored information .
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else have no  बैटरी  but collect energy from the interrogating EM field , and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic  विकिरण  at high frequencies )  .
Battery powered tags may operate at  सैंकड़ों  of meters  .
Unlike  a  bar code ,  the  tag does not necessarily need to be within line of sight of the reader , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are used in many industries  .
An RFID  टैग  attached to an automobile during production can be used  to   track  its progress through the assembly line .
Pharmaceuticals can  be  tracked through warehouses .
Livestock and pets may have tags injected , allowing  धनात्मक  identification of  the  animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing ,  possessions  , or even  implanted  within people , the possibility of reading personally-linked information without  सहमति  has raised privacy concerns .
id  , ego and super-ego are the three parts  of  the psychic apparatus  पारिभाषित  in Sigmund Freud 's structural model of the  psyche  ; they are  the  three theoretical  constructs  in terms of whose  कार्यकलाप  and interaction mental life is described .
According to this model of the psyche ,  the   id  is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays  the  critical and moralizing role ; and the ego is the organized ,  यथार्थवादी  part that mediates between the desires of the id and the super-ego .
The super-ego  can  stop  तुम  from  doing  certain things that your id  may  want you to do .
Even though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus  ,  the id , ego and  super-ego  are functions of the mind rather than parts of the brain and do not  correspond   one-to-one  with actual somatic structures of  the  kind dealt with by neuroscience .
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage  in   the  development of Freud 's thought :  the   ``  structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' and ``  topographical  model  ''  ) was first discussed  in  his 1920 essay `` Beyond the Pleasure Principle `` and  थी  formalized and elaborated upon three years later in  उसके  `` The Ego and the Id `` .
Freud  's  proposal was  बहकावे  by the ambiguity of the term `` unconscious  ``  and its many conflicting uses .
Air Force  rotc  emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer  प्रशिक्षण  Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the United States Air Force  ,  the other two being the United States  एयर  Force Academy ( USAFA  )  and Air Force Officer Training School  (  OTS ) .
A subordinate command of the Air University within the Air Education and Training Command ( AETC ) , AFROTC is  लकीर   अंतर्गत  the Jeanne  M.   holm  Center for Officer Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB , Alabama .
The Holm Center , formerly known as the Air Force Officer Accession and Training  स्कूलों  ( AFOATS ) ,  retains  direct  जिम्मेदारी  for both AFROTC and OTS .
AFROTC is the largest and oldest  सोर्स  of commissioned officers for the U.S. Air Force  .
AFROTC 's  stated  mission is to produce  विशेषता  leaders for the U.S. Air Force .
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and university campuses  साथ  984 additional institutions of higher learning participating in cross-town  समझौतों  that allow their students to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university .
according  to AFOATS HQ , in  2006  , AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF  दूसरी  Lieutenants ,  साथ  AFROTC enrollment ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to  10,231  in 1993  ,  and around 13,000 enrolled today .
AFROTC units at colleges and universities  हैं  called  ``  detachments , '' and are typically headed by an active duty USAF officer in the rank of colonel or lieutenant colonel who functions as both the Detachment Commander for USAF purposes  और  with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution  's  academic community .
Most colleges and universities will designate the AFROTC detachment  as  the  विभाग  of Aerospace Studies .
The PAS is assisted by three  to  four Assistant Professors of Aerospace Studies ( APAS ) , all active duty USAF officers  in  the ranks of major or  कप्तान  .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned  अधिकारी  will typically provide military administrative support and are often augmented by one to two civilian staff support employees of the academic institution .
Within AFROTC detachments ,  the   विद्यार्थी  ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are organized into wings , groups , squadrons , and flights , mirroring the USAF functional wing structure  .
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC )  consisting  of the first two years of training  ,  and the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last two years of  प्रशिक्षण  .
The AFROTC program is also divided into two training functions : the Academic Classroom Program ( Aerospace Studies classes ) and Cadet Activities ( i.e. , Leadership Laboratory ,  शारीरिक  Training , and other training ) .
पेपर  density ( also known as basis weight and grammage )  is  a  पद   प्रयुक्त  in the pulp and paper industry and  भी  for fabric industry to denote a measure of mass of the product per unit of area for a type of fabric ,  पेपर  or paperboard .
The term `` density  ''  is not used in its  परंपरागत  sense of mass per  ईकाई   आवाज़  .
``   पेपर  density '' , rather , is a measure of the area density .
Paper products that let little or no light pass through ( e.g . poster board )  हैं  considered dense or heavy .
Paper products  कि   allow  some light  to  pass through ( e.g . tissue paper )  हैं  considered lightweight .
In the pulp  और  paper industry  ,  it is  आम  to set a  वाणिज्यिक  paper machine to produce paper to a target paper  घनत्व  .
Paper density can also be used to  फर्क  paper from paperboard  as  the latter usually  रै  a grammage greater than 134 g/m2 .
Two ways of expressing paper density are commonly  उपयोगd:
Expressed in grams per square meter ( g/m2 ) , paper density is also known as grammage .
This is the measure  प्रयुक्त  in most parts of  the  world .
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as weight ) per number of sheets , it is known as basis weight .
The convention used in the United States and a few other countries  using  US paper sizes is pounds of a ream of 500 ( or in some  मामले  1000  )  sheets of a given  (  raw , still uncut ) basis size .
Japanese paper is expressed  as  the weight in kg of 1000 sheets .
Candace Nicole Parker ( born April 19 ,  1986  ) is an American basketball player for the WNBA 's Los Angeles  स्पार्क्स  and  ummc  Ekaterinburg of Russia .
वो  is the younger sister of NBA player Anthony Parker .
She attended the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of   टेनेसी  and was drafted by the  स्पार्क्स   in  2008 .
She may be best known for being the first woman to dunk in an NCAA tournament game and the first woman to dunk twice in a college game—she set both milestones as a redshirt freshman on  कूच  19  ,   2006   .
She also became  तभी   the  second player to dunk in a WNBA game on June 22 , 2008 .
A versatile player , she is mainly  a   आगे  , but was listed on Tennessee 's roster as a forward  ,  center , and guard .
She  थी  a starter  on  the Lady Vols basketball team , winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships .
Parker  जीती  the 2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' Choice award as the  पसंदीदा  female athlete in the sports category  .
And she was a guest star on Figure It Out .
A food guide pyramid is a pyramid shaped guide of healthy foods divided into sections to show the  अनुशंसित  intake for each food group .
The first food pyramid was published in Sweden in 1974 .
The most widely known food pyramid was introduced by the  संयुक्त  States Department of Agriculture in the year 1992 , was  अद्यतनीकृत  in 2005 , and then replaced in 2011 .
Over  25   अन्य  countries and organisations have also published  खाना  pyramids .
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred  to  in Scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; April 2 , 1805August 4 ,  1875  ) was a Danish author and poet .
Although  a  prolific writer of plays , travelogues , novels , and  कविताएं  , Andersen is  बेहतरीन  remembered for his fairy tales , a literary genre he so mastered  कि  he himself has become as mythical as the tales he  लिखा  .
Andersen 's  लोकप्रियता  is not limited to children ; his stories—called , or `` fantastic tales '' —express themes that transcend age and nationality .
During his lifetime he  थी  acclaimed for having delighted  children  worldwide and was feted by royalty  .
Andersen 's fairy tales , which have been translated into more than  125  languages , have become culturally embedded in the West  's  collective consciousness , readily accessible to children , but presenting lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well .
They have inspired motion  तस्वीरें  , plays , ballets , and animated films .
Two figures locking eyes in Caravaggio 's The Fortune Teller
Eye contact occurs when  ``  two people look at each other 's eyes  at  the same time . ''
In human beings , eye contact is a form of nonverbal  संचार  and is thought to have a large influence  on  social behavior  .
Coined in the early to mid-1960s , the term has  आइये  in the West to often define the act as a meaningful and important sign  of   विश्वास  and social communication .
The customs  और  significance of eye contact vary  widely   between  cultures , with religious and social differences often altering its meaning greatly .
The study of eye contact is sometimes known as oculesics .
Bed bugs are parasitic insects of  the  cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood .
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of  जिससे  Cimex lectularius  ,  the common bed bug ,  is  the best known as it prefers to feed on human blood  हालांकि  other Cimex species are specialized to other animals , e.g. , bat  बग   ,  C. pipistrelli ( Europe ) , C.  pilosellus  ( western US ) ,  और  C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ) .
The name of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm houses and especially nearby or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep areas .
Bed bugs are mainly active at night , but  हैं  not exclusively nocturnal .
They usually feed  on  their hosts without being noticed .
A number of adverse health effects may result from bed bug bites , including skin rashes , psychological effects , and allergic symptoms .
निदान   involves  both finding bed bugs and the occurrence of compatible symptoms .
Bed bugs have been known  as  human parasites for thousands of  सालो  .
At a point in the early 1940s , they  यहूद  mostly eradicated  in  the developed world  ,  but have increased in prevalence  चूंकि  1995 .
Because infestation of human habitats has  महरूम  on the  बढ़ाएँ  , bed bug bites and  सम्बन्धित  conditions have been  on   the  rise as well .
The Book of Isaiah ( )  is  the first of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible , preceding Ezekiel , Jeremiah and the Book of the Twelve .
( The order of the subsequent books  differs  somewhat in the Christian Old  वसीयत   )  .
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a sinful Judah and for all  the  nations of the world that oppose God , while the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel and  a  new creation in God 's glorious future kingdom ; this section includes the Songs of the Suffering Servant , four separate passages  referring  to the nation of Israel , interpreted by Christians as prefiguring  the  coming of Jesus Christ .
Tradition ascribes  authorship  of the book to Isaiah son of Amoz , but now scholars  widely   सहमत  that the book is the work of three different authors - few scholars deny this  दृश्य  , and those  कि  do , do so for theological reasons .
The first , termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ) , contains the words of the 8th-century  bce   नबी  with 7th-century BCE expansions  ;  the second  ,  Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ) , is the work  of  a 6th-century BCE author writing near the end of the Babylonian captivity ; and the third  ,  the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ) , was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from exile , probably by multiple  लेखक  .
Oregon State  विश्वविद्यालयों  ( OSU  )  is a coeducational , public research university located  in  Corvallis , Oregon , United States .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों  offers undergraduate , graduate and  डॉक्टरेट  degrees and a multitude of research opportunities .
वहीँ  are more than  200  academic degree programs offered through the university .
OSU 's programs  in  microbiology , nuclear engineering , ecology , forestry , public health  ,  biochemistry ,  zoology  , oceanography , food science and  फार्मेसी  are recognized nationally as top tier programs .
The OSU 's  उदार  arts programs have also grown significantly and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution .
More than 200,000 people  have   attended  OSU  चूंकि  its founding .
The Carnegie Foundation classifies Oregon State University as  भाग  of its top tier of  शोध  institutions .
As of 2008 , OSU is one of only seventy-three land-grant universities .
The school is also recognized  as  a sea-grant  ,   space-grant  and sun-grant institution ,  बनाना  it one of only two  us  institutions to retain all  चार  designations and the only public university  to  do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar  designations  ) .
As one of the  दो  flagship universities of the Oregon University System ,  osu  receives more funding for research ,  annually  ,  than  all other public higher education institutions in Oregon combined .
Female ejaculation  is  the expulsion of fluid by human females from  the  paraurethral  नलिकाएं  through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm .
It is  भी  known colloquially as  gushing  or squirting ,  हालांकि  these are  माना  to be different phenomena in some research publications .
The exact  सोर्स  and nature of the fluid  continue  to be a topic of debate among medical professionals , which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot .
The Kanab  ambersnail  , scientific name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis  or  Oxyloma kanabense , is a critically endangered subspecies or species of small , air-breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Succineidae , the amber snails .
the   आम  name of the amber snails  is  based on the  शेल  , which is translucent and when empty usually  resembles  amber in  रंग  .
This species  is  endemic to the United States  ,  specifically the state of Arizona and Utah , where it was first collected in the early 20th century .
It has been listed as endangered on the United States  मछली  and Wildlife Service  सूची  of endangered species since 8 August 1991 .
This snail lives  in  wetlands , springs , and seeps , and only two of its natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes  ,  a meadow  निकट  Kanab , Utah , and Vasey  's  Paradise , a spring along the Colorado River within Grand Canyon National Park .
In its natural habitat it  is  rather polyphagous , feeding mainly on bacteria , plants and fungi , and reproduces during the  गर्मियाँ  .
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species due to a series of factors ( including influence ) , the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three springs  ऊपर  the historic high water level along the Colorado River  .
The Spanish language is the second most used language in the United States .
There are more Spanish speakers in the United States than there are speakers of  चाइनीज  , French , German , Italian , Hawaiian , and the Native American languages combined .
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by  the  U.S. Census Bureau , Spanish is  the  primary language spoken at home by almost  37  million people aged five or older  ,  a figure more than double that of 1990 .
वहीँ  are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language  ,  as well  as  six million Spanish language students  ,  composing the largest national Spanish-speaking community outside of Mexico and making Spanish the Romance language and  the   indo-european  language with largest number of native speakers in the world .
Roughly half of all U.S. Spanish speakers also speak English `` very well , '' based on  the  self-assessment Census question respondents .
The language came to the country since the 16th and 17th  सदियां  with the  आगमन  of Spanish colonists in areas that would later become the states of Florida , Texas , Colorado , New Mexico  ,  Arizona , Nevada , Utah , and California and of the Spanish  explorers  - who explored areas of 42 states- .
Also west of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French recovery of territory ) , after the  फ्रेंच   और  Indian War .
After of the incorporation of these states to the U.S. in first half of 19th century  ,  the  स्पेनी  language was later reinforced  by  the acquisition of Puerto Rico  in  1898 and by later waves of the Hispanic emigration , basically from  हिस्पैनिक  America , to the United States  शुरूआत  in the second half of 19th century until today  .

The Tokyo Mew Mew manga and anime series features a cast of characters designed by Mia Ikumi .
the   श्रेणी  takes place in Tokyo , Japan , where five adolescent girls  ,  called Mew Mews , are infused with the DNA of endangered species to combat aliens attempting to take over the  धरती  .
The manga series is followed by a short sequel series , Tokyo Mew Mew a la Mode , which introduces  a  new Mew Mew and a new threat .
The Mew Mews are led by  the  main character , Ichigo Momomiya , whose first  कार्य  is to gather  the  other four Mew Mews : Mint Aizawa , Lettuce Midorikawa , Pudding Fong , and Zakuro Fujiwara .
As the series progresses , Ichigo goes from having a crush on  masaya  Aoyama to becoming his girlfriend while trying to hide her secret double life from him .
The series antagonists include three aliens , Kish , Pie , and Tart , and their leader  ,   गहन  Blue .
Originally from  धरती  , the aliens  यहूद  forced to leave long ago due to  घातक  environmental changes .
They have returned to kill the humans , who  वे   महसूस  are destroying their planet , and reclaim the planet .
In a la Mode  ,  middle  स्कूल  student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew Mew and , in the absence of Ichigo ,  the  temporary leader of the Mew Mews .
A la Mode also introduces new set  of   antagonists  , the Saint  रोज़  Crusaders , a group of  इंसान  teenagers with various psychic abilities  साथ  a desire to create their  अपना  utopia .
Led  by   ड्यूक   ,  they make several attempts to kill Berry  ,  eventually turning the local populace against the Mew Mews .
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew  थी  a story called Tokyo  ब्लैक  Cat Girl  कि  featured a cat-girl battling alien invaders .
After the  स्टोरी  was transitioned to a more  upbeat  story of five female superheroes , the character designs were redone to have a lighter , more colorful feel .
The main series characters were praised for being a perfect fit for  the  overall story , as well as for their cute appearances .
The characters introduced in a la Mode  यहूद   भी   praised  for their visual appearances ,  लकिन  criticized as being repeats of  the   असली  series .
The  अक्षर  Duke was also criticized for having a design reminiscent  of  the white supremacy group , the  ku  Klux Klan .
Middle Triassic marginal marine sequence of siltstones (  नीचे  ) and  limestones  ( above ) , Virgin Formation , southwestern Utah , USA
Sedimentary rocks are types of rock  कि  are formed by the  deposition  of material at  the  Earth  's   सतह   और  within bodies of water .
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral and/or  सशुल्क  particles  (  detritus ) to settle and accumulate or minerals to precipitate from a solution .
अणु  that form a sedimentary rock by accumulating are called sediment .
Before being deposited , sediment was formed by weathering and erosion in a source area , and then transported to the place  of  deposition by water ,  हवा  , ice , mass movement or  ग्लेशियर  which are called agents of denudation .
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents of the Earth 's crust is extensive  ,  but the total contribution of sedimentary  रॉक्स  is estimated  to  be only 8 % of  the  total volume of the crust  .
Sedimentary rocks are only a thin veneer over a crust  consisting  mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks .
Sedimentary  रॉक्स  are deposited in layers as strata , forming a structure called bedding .
The study of sedimentary  रॉक्स  and rock strata provides information about the  subsurface   कि   is  useful for civil engineering , for example in the construction  of  roads , houses , tunnels , canals or other  constructions  .
Sedimentary rocks are also  महत्वपूर्ण   स्त्रोत   of  natural resources  जैसे  coal , fossil  fuels  , drinking water or ores .
The study of the sequence of sedimentary rock strata is the main source for  वैज्ञानिक  knowledge about the Earth  's  history , including palaeogeography , paleoclimatology and the history of life .
The scientific discipline that studies the properties and origin of  sedimentary  rocks is called sedimentology .
Sedimentology is both part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the Earth sciences , such as pedology , geomorphology , geochemistry or structural geology .
