Humans  हैं  born with over 270 bones  ,  some of which fuse together into a longitudinal axis , the  अक्षीय  skeleton  ,  to which the appendicular skeleton is attached .
Saint Patrick ( ; ; Modern ; ; c. 387 – 17 March  c.  460 or c. 492 ) was a Romano-British Christian missionary and bishop in Ireland .
ज्ञात  as the `` Apostle of Ireland  ''  , he is  the  primary patron  संत  of the island along with Saints Brigid and Columba .
Two authentic letters from him survive , from which come the only generally accepted details of his  जीवन  .
When he  थी  about 16 , he was captured from his home and taken as a  स्लेव  to Ireland , where he lived  लिये  six years  पहले   escaping  and returning to his family .
After becoming a  मौलवी  , he returned to northern and western Ireland as an ordained  बिशप  , but little is known about the places where he worked .
By the seventh century , he had  already  come to be revered as the patron saint of Ireland .
Most available details of his life are from subsequent hagiographies , and these are now not accepted  बगैर  detailed criticism .
The Annals of Ulster state that he arrived in Ireland in 432 , ministered in Ulster around 443 , and died in 457 or 461 .
The text , however , distinguishes between `` Old Patrick  ''  ( thought to mean  palladius  ) and `` Patrick , archapostle of the Scots , '' who died in 492 .
The actual dates of Patrick 's life can not be fixed with certainty but , on a widespread interpretation , he was active  as  a missionary in  आयरलैंड  during the second half of the 5th  सदी  .
He is generally credited with being the first bishop of Armagh , Primate of All Ireland .
Saint  पैट्रिक  's Day is observed  on  March 17 , the date of his death .
It is celebrated both inside  और  outside Ireland , as both a religious and , especially outside Ireland , secular  अवकाश  .
In the dioceses  of  Ireland , it is both a solemnity and a  पावन   दिन   of  obligation ; outside Ireland , it can be a celebration of  आयरलैंड  itself .
Line segments in  the   सुनहरी  ratio
A golden rectangle with  longer  side a and shorter side b , when placed adjacent to a square with sides of length  a  , will produce a similar golden rectangle with longer side a +  b  and shorter side a .
This illustrates the relationship .
In  गणित   और  the arts , two quantities are in the golden ratio if the ratio of the sum of the quantities to the larger quantity is  बराबर  to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller  एक  .
The figure on the right illustrates the geometric relationship .
Expressed algebraically:
where the Greek letter phi ( ) represents the golden ratio  .
Its value is:
The  सुनहरी  ratio is  भी   पुकारा  the golden section  (  Latin : sectio aurea ) or golden  औसत  .
Other names include extreme and mean  अनुपात  ,  medial  section , divine proportion , divine section ( Latin : sectio  divina  )  ,  golden proportion , golden cut , and golden number .
Many 20th century artists and architects have proportioned their works  to  approximate the golden ratio—especially in the form of the golden rectangle , in which the ratio of  the  longer side  to  the shorter is the golden ratio—believing this proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( see Applications and observations below ) .
Mathematicians  चूंकि  Euclid have studied the properties of the golden ratio , including its appearance in the dimensions of a regular  प्रस्तुतीकरण  and in a golden rectangle , which can be cut into a square and a smaller rectangle with the same aspect ratio .
The golden ratio has also  महरूम  used to analyze the proportions of natural objects as well as  man-made  systems such as financial markets , in some cases based on dubious fits to data .
North Myrtle Beach  is  a coastal resort city in Horry County , South Carolina  ,  United States .
It was created in 1968 from four existing municipalities  उत्तर  of  myrtle  Beach , and serves as one of the primary tourist towns along the Grand Strand  .
the  population was 13,752 at the 2010 census .
World War I (  wwi  ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on  28  July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called  the  World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the  प्रारंभ  of World War II in 1939 ,  और  the  पहला  World War or World War  i  thereafter  .
It involved all the world 's great  शक्तियां  , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France  और  Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the  ट्रिपल  Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but  ,  as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not  डालें   into  the war ) .
These alliances were both  reorganised  and expanded as  अधिक  nations  डाला  the war : Italy , Japan  और  the United States joined  the  Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers  .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel  ,  including 60  लाख  Europeans , were mobilised  in  one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were  मारे  , largely because  of  technological advancements that  led  to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding  सुधार  in protection or mobility .
It was the  fifth-  deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various political changes , such as revolutions in  अनेक  of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the  पुनरुत्थान  of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe .
More  तत्काल  , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne  of  Austria-Hungary , on 28 June  1914  by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip  in  Sarajevo triggered a  राजनयिक  crisis  जब  Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of  सर्बिया  .
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked .
Within weeks ,  the  major powers were  at  war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for  the  invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to  फ़्रांस  , providing a casus belli for Britain 's  घोषणा  of war against Germany .
बाद  the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle  of  attrition with a trench line that changed little until  1917  .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army  थी  successful against the Austro-Hungarians ,  लकिन  was stopped in its invasion of  ईस्ट  Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war  ,  opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916 .
in  Russia , the tsar 's government  collapsed  in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians  to  terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove  वापस   the  Germans in  a  series  of  successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble  साथ  revolutionaries , agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended  in  victory  लिये   the   allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on  the   बैटल   fronts  , as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four  प्रमुख  imperial powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of  territory  , while the  latter   दो  were dismantled entirely .
The  मैप  of central Europe was redrawn into  अनेक  smaller states .
The League of  राष्ट्र  was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
the  European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of  empires  , the repercussions  of  Germany 's defeat  और  problems with the  सन्धि  of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
Camden is a city in Camden County , New Jersey , United States .
It is the county seat , located  आरपार   the  Delaware River from Philadelphia  .
As of  the  2010 United States Census the city had a total population of 77,344 , representing a decline of 2,560  (  3.2 % )  इससे  the 79,904 residents  enumerated  during the 2000 Census  ,  which had in turn declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) from the 87,492 counted in the 1990 Census .
Camden ranked as the 12th-most populous municipality in the state in 2010 after having been ranked 10th in 2000 .
Camden was  originally  incorporated  as  a city on February 13 , 1828 , from portions of  the  now-defunct Newton Township , while  the  area was still part of Gloucester County .
On March  13   ,  1844 , Camden became part of the newly formed Camden County .
हालांकि  once a thriving center for  निर्माण   और  industry , Camden is perhaps best known  लिये  its struggles with urban dysfunction .
Three Camden mayors have been  jailed  for corruption , the most recent being Milton  मिलान  in 2000  .
Since 2005 the  स्कूल  system and police department have been operated by  the  state  of  New Jersey ; the takeover expired in 2012 .
In 2008  ,  Camden  था  the highest crime rate in the U.S. with 2,333 violent crimes per 100,000 people while the national average was 455 per 100,000 .
Camden public schools spent $ 23,770 per student ( $ 19,118  on   a   budgetary  per-pupil basis ) in the  2009–10  school year and  two-thirds  of the students graduate .
Two out of every five residents are below the national poverty line .
Amitriptyline  (  Tryptomer , Elavil , Tryptizol , Laroxyl , Saroten , Sarotex , Lentizol , Endep ) is  a  tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ) .
It is the most widely  प्रयुक्त  TCA and has  at  least equal efficacy against depression as the newer class of SSRIs according to a study from  जल्दी  2001 .
As  खूब   as  reducing depressive  लक्षण  , these  प्रकार  of tricyclics also ease  migraines  , tension  headaches  ,  चिंता  attacks and some schizophrenic symptoms .
It is also known to reduce aggression and violent  बर्ताव  .
A computer is a general purpose device that can be programmed to carry out a finite  नियत  of  गणित  or logical operations .
Since a sequence  of  operations can be readily changed , the  कंप्यूटर  can solve more than one kind  of  problem .
Conventionally , a computer consists of at least  एक   प्रसंस्करण  element ,  typically  a central processing unit ( CPU ) and some form of memory .
The processing element  carries  out arithmetic and logic operations , and a sequencing and control unit that can change the order of operations based on stored information .
Peripheral devices  allow  information to be retrieved from an external source , and the result of operations saved and retrieved .
The first electronic digital computers were developed between 1940 and 1945 in the United Kingdom and United States .
Originally they were the size of a  विशाल  room  ,  consuming as much power as  अनेक  hundred modern personal computers ( PCs ) .
In this era mechanical  एनालॉग  computers were used for military applications .
Modern computers based on  एकीकृत  circuits are millions to billions of times more capable than the early  मशीने  , and occupy a fraction of the space  .
Simple computers are small enough to  अनुरूप  into mobile devices , and mobile computers can be powered  by  small batteries .
Personal computers in their various forms are icons of the Information Age  और  are what most people think of as “computers.”
however  , the embedded computers found in many  डिवाइस  from MP3 players to fighter aircraft and  इससे  toys to industrial robots are the most  numerous  .
`` Barefoot and pregnant '' is a phrase most  commonly  associated  साथ  the controversial idea that women should not work outside the home and should have many children during their reproductive years .
It has several  अन्य  meanings as well .
it  is a figure of speech .
The phrase `` barefoot and pregnant '' was probably  पहला  used sometime before 1950 .
An article from 1949 states ,  ``  By early 1949 , TWA was—in the  शब्द  of its new president , Ralph S. Damon—both 'barefoot and  गर्भवती  . ' ''
Its usage may date as early as the 1910s  .
An article published in 1958 states the phrase was first used by  a  ``  dr.   hertzler  '' 40 years earlier .
`` Some forty  सालो  ago , Dr.  hertzler  advanced a hypothesis which young women of  आज  seem bent  on  proving correct. '
The only way to keep a woman happy  ,  ' he said ,  'is  to keep her barefoot and pregnant . ' ''
Oakhurst is a census-designated place and unincorporated community within Ocean Township , in  मॉनमाउथ  County , New Jersey , United States .
as  of the 2010 United States Census , the CDP 's population was 3,995 .
University of Phoenix  स्टेडियम  , opened August 1 , 2006  ,  is a multipurpose football stadium located in Glendale , Arizona .
it  is  the  home of the Arizona Cardinals of the  नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) and the  सालाना  Fiesta Bowl .
The stadium is located next door to the Jobing.com Arena and it  सुविधाएँ  the first fully retractable natural grass playing surface built in the United States on top of an AirField Systems drainage system .
an  opening on one side of the stadium allows the playing field to move to the exterior of  the  building , allowing  the  entire natural turf playing surface to be exposed to  daylight  .
The stadium has hosted Super Bowl XLII , and the 2011 BCS National Championship Game , a game that it hosts every four years , which set the venue 's entertainment attendance record of  78,603  on January  11  , 2011  .
It will again  मेजबान  Super Bowl XLIX in 2015  .
The University of Phoenix acquired the naming  अधिकारों  in September 2006 , shortly after the stadium had opened under the name Cardinals  स्टेडियम  .
The `` University of  फीनिक्स  `` name is applied  as  a corporate sponsor , and not as the home stadium of the University  (  which has no intercollegiate athletics program ) .
The stadium  रै  also hosted the WWE event WrestleMania XXVI with 72,219 fans in attendance .
The event was held in the stadium on March  28th  2010 .
Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain ( September 8  ,  1828  –  February 24  ,  1914 ) , born as Lawrence  जोशुआ  Chamberlain , was  an  American college professor from the State of Maine  ,   जो  volunteered  दौरान  the American  सिविल   युद्ध  to join the  संघ  Army .
Although having no earlier education in  सैन्य  strategies , he became a highly  आदरणीय  and decorated Union officer , reaching the rank of brigadier general ( and  brevet  major  सामान्य  ) .
For his gallantry at Gettysburg , he was awarded the Medal of Honor .
He was given the honor of commanding the Union troops at the surrender ceremony for the infantry of Robert E. Lee 's Army at Appomattox , Virginia .
बाद  the war , he entered  राजनीती  as a Republican and served four one-year terms of office as the 32nd Governor of Maine .
he  served on the faculty ,  और  as  अध्यक्ष   ,  of his alma mater , Bowdoin College .
An inning , or innings  ,  is a fixed-length segment of a  खेल  in any  of  a  किस्में  of sports – most notably cricket and baseball during which one team attempts to score while the other team attempts to prevent the first  इससे  scoring  .
In cricket , the term innings is both  एकवचन  and  बहुवचन  and is always spelled  और  pronounced with the terminal `` s '' .
In  बेसबॉल  and softball , the singular form is inning  और  only the plural takes an `` s ''  .
In many other sports  ,  the length of the game is dictated by a clock and teams swap  अप्रिय  and defensive roles dynamically by  लेने  possession of a ball  or  similar item .
In baseball and cricket , however , one team , said to be ``  बल्लेबाजी  '' , attempts to score `` runs '' —see run ( baseball  )   और  run ( cricket )  —while  the other team , said to be `` fielding '' , attempts to  prevent  the scoring of runs and get members of the batting team out .
The teams  स्विच  places after the fielding team has succeeded in getting a fixed number  of   खिलाड़ी  out , making a clock unnecessary .
in  cricket  ,  the term innings is also used to refer to the play of one particular player ( Smith had a poor innings , scoring only 12 ) .
by  extension , this term  can  be used in British English for almost any activity which takes a period of time  (  The  उदार  government had a good innings , but finally lost office in 1972 , or You 've had a fair innings , now it 's my turn , meaning `` you have spoken  लिये  long enough , now let me  बोलो  ''  )  .
It is also used in reference to  किसी  who has died  at  a  reasonably  old age or lived a rich and rewarding life ( Ah , well  .
John was 89 .
At least he had a good innings ) .
The baseball-derived parallel to this in American English is the term at bat .
According to the Oxford English Dictionary , the term innings has been used in reference to cricket since at least 1735 .
As cricket was a mature , highly organized sport in the 1600s in England , the term 's origin could well precede this first recorded usage .
The word inning meaning 'a gathering in ' is  पहला  recorded in 1522  ,  and  could  be related .
एडीनोसिन  deaminase  कमियां  , also called ADA  कमियां  or ADA-SCID , is an autosomal recessive metabolic disorder that causes immunodeficiency .
It occurs in fewer than one in 100,000  सजीव  births worldwide .
It accounts for about 15 % of all cases  of  severe combined immunodeficiency ( SCID ) .
It is  बहुत  rare ,  तुम  have a 3 % chance of getting this gene .
ADA deficiency may be present in infancy , childhood , adolescense , or adulthood .
Age of onset and severity is related to some 29 known genotypes associated with the disorder .
An example of urban  गरीबी  in this  slum  in Jakarta  ,  Indonesia
Poverty is the state of one who lacks a certain amount of material possessions or money .
Absolute poverty or destitution refers to the deprivation of basic human needs , which  commonly   शामिल  food , water , sanitation , clothing , shelter ,  स्वास्थ्य  care  और  education .
सापेक्ष   गरीबी  is defined  contextually  as economic inequality  in  the  स्थान  or society in which  लोगों   सजीव  .
For much of history , poverty was considered largely unavoidable as traditional modes of production were insufficient to give an entire population a comfortable standard  of   जीना  .
After  the   औद्योगिक  revolution , mass production in factories made wealth increasingly more inexpensive and accessible .
Of more importance is the modernization of agriculture , such as fertilizers ,  in  order  to  provide enough yield to feed the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The supply of basic needs can  be  restricted by constraints on government  सेवाएं  such as corruption , tax avoidance , debt and loan conditionalities and by the brain drain of health care and educational professionals .
Strategies of increasing income  to  make basic  needs   अधिक  affordable typically include welfare , economic freedoms  ,  and providing financial services .
Poverty reduction is  a  major goal and issue for many international organizations  ऐसे  as the United Nations and the  संसार  Bank  .
The World Bank estimated 1.29 billion people were living in absolute poverty in 2008 .
Of these , about 400 million people in  निरपेक्ष  poverty lived in India and  173  million people in China .
In USA  1  in 5 children lives  in  poverty .
in  terms of percentage of regional populations  ,  sub-Saharan  अफ़्रीकी  at 47 % had  the  highest incidence rate of absolute  गरीबी  in 2008 .
Between  1990  and  2010  , about 663 million people moved above the absolute poverty level .
Still , extreme poverty is a global challenge ;  it  is observed in all parts of the world , including the developed economies .
Mushroom poisoning ( also known as mycetism ) refers  to  harmful effects  इससे  ingestion  of  toxic substances present in a mushroom .
These symptoms can vary from slight gastrointestinal discomfort to death .
The toxins present are secondary metabolites produced in specific  biochemical  pathways in the fungal  कोशिकाएं  .
Mushroom  विषाक्तता  is  प्रायः   the  result of ingestion of wild mushrooms after misidentification of a toxic mushroom as an edible  प्रजाति  .
The most common reason for this  misidentification  is  बंद  resemblance in terms of colour and general morphology of the toxic mushrooms species with edible species .
Even very experienced wild  मशरूम  gatherers are upon rare occasion poisoned by eating toxic species  ,  despite being well aware  of  the risks , through carelessness .
To prevent mushroom poisoning , mushroom gatherers need to be very familiar with the mushrooms they intend to  collect  as well as with any similar-looking toxic species .
In addition , edibility of  मशरूम  may depend on methods of preparation for cooking .
Collectors also need to be well  जागरूक   कि  edibility or toxicity of some species varies with geographic location .
Human  ऊँचाई   is  the distance  इससे  the bottom of the feet to the top of the head in a human body , standing erect .
When populations share genetic background and environmental factors  ,  average height is  अक्सर  characteristic within the group .
Exceptional height variation ( around 20 % deviation from average ) within such a population  is  sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism , which are medical conditions caused by specific genes or endocrine abnormalities .
In regions of extreme poverty or prolonged warfare , environmental factors like chronic malnutrition during childhood or adolescence may account  लिये  delayed growth and/or ( in severe cases ) marked reductions in adult stature even  बगैर  the presence of any of these medical conditions .
Apollo 11 was the spaceflight  कि  landed the first humans , Americans Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin , on the Moon on July  20  , 1969 , at 20:18  utc  .
Armstrong became the first to step onto the lunar surface 6  घंटों  later on July 21 at 02:56 UTC  .
आर्मस्ट्रांग  spent about two and a half hours outside the  spacecraft  ,  एल्ड्रिन  slightly less ; and together they collected of lunar  सामग्री  for return to Earth .
A  तीसरा  member  of  the mission  ,   माइकल  Collins ,  piloted  the command spacecraft alone in lunar orbit until Armstrong and Aldrin returned to it  बस  under a day later for the trip back to Earth .
Launched  by  a Saturn V rocket from Kennedy Space Center in Merritt  द्वीप  , Florida on July 16 , Apollo 11 was the fifth manned mission of NASA 's Apollo program .
The Apollo  spacecraft  had three parts : a Command Module  साथ  a cabin for the three astronauts which was the only part which landed back  on  Earth ; a Service Module which  समर्थित  the Command Module with propulsion , electrical power , oxygen and water  ;  and a Lunar Module for landing on the Moon  .
After being sent to the Moon by the Saturn V 's upper stage , the astronauts separated the spacecraft from it and travelled for three days until they entered into lunar orbit .
Armstrong and Aldrin then moved  into  the Lunar Module and landed in  the  Sea of Tranquility .
They stayed a total of about 21 and a half hours on the  चंद्र  surface .
After lifting off in  the  upper part of the Lunar Module and rejoining Collins in  the   कमांड  Module , they returned to Earth and  उतरा  in the Pacific Ocean on July 24  .
Broadcast on live TV to a world-wide audience , Armstrong stepped onto the lunar surface and described the event as `` one small step for [ a ] man ,  एक  giant leap for  mankind  . ''
Apollo 11 effectively  ended  the Space Race and fulfilled a national goal proposed in 1961 by the late U.S. President John  F.  Kennedy in a speech before the United States Congress , `` before this decade is out , of landing a man  on  the  चंद्रमा   और  returning him safely to the Earth . ''
The FIFA  संसार  Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football  प्रतियोगिता  contested  by  the senior men 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global  शासी  body .
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930 , except in  1942  and 1946 when it was not  आयोजित   क्युकी  of the Second World War .
The current champions  हैं  Spain , who won the  2010  tournament .
The  वर्तमान  format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at  venues  within the host nation (  s  ) over a period of about a  माह   ;  this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
a  qualification phase , which currently takes place over the preceding three years , is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with  the  host nation ( s  )  .
The 19 World  कप  tournaments have been won by eight different national teams .
Brazil have won five times , and they  हैं  the only team to have played in every tournament .
The other World Cup winners are Italy , with four  शीर्षक  ; Germany , with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay , with two  शीर्षक  each ; and England ,  फ़्रांस  , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the  संसार   's  most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014 , Russia in 2018 , and  क़तर  in  2022  .
Genocide is a term coined in 1944 by  राफेल  Lemkin to describe the deliberate and systematic destruction , in whole or  in  part , of an  जातीय  , racial  ,  religious ,  or  national group .
It is defined in Article 2 of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as  ``  any of  the  following acts committed with  intent  to destroy , in whole or in part , a national , ethnical , racial or religious group , as such : killing members of the group ; causing serious bodily or mental harm to members of the group ;  deliberately  inflicting on the  समूह  conditions of  जीवन  ,  गणना  to  लाओ  about its physical destruction in whole or in part ; imposing measures  intended  to prevent births within the group ; [ and ] forcibly  transferring  children of the group  to   another  group . ''
Skulls of victims of the Rwandan Genocide
The preamble to the CPPCG not only states that `` genocide is a  अपराधों  under international  विधि  , contrary to the spirit and aims of the United Nations and condemned by the  civilized   संसार  '' ,  लकिन  also that `` at all periods of history genocide has inflicted great losses on humanity '' .
Determining what  ऐतिहासिक  events constitute a genocide  और  which are  merely  criminal or inhuman behavior is not a clear-cut matter .
In nearly every case where accusations  of  genocide  have  circulated , partisans of various sides have fiercely disputed the interpretation and details of the event , often to the point of promoting  wildly  different  संस्करण  of the facts .
An accusation of genocide is certainly not taken lightly and will almost always be controversial  .
the  following list of genocides and alleged genocides  चाहिए  be  समझा   in  this context and can not be regarded as the final word  on  these subjects  .
A timing belt is a non-slipping mechanical drive belt and  the  term may refer to either:
Toothed belt , a flexible belt with teeth moulded onto its inner surface
Timing belt ( camshaft ) , a  toothed  belt used to drive the camshaft ( s  )  within an internal combustion engine
The culture of the United States is primarily a Western culture , but is also influenced by Native American , African ,  एशियाई  , Polynesian , and Latin American cultures  .
अमरीकी  culture started its  गठन  over 10,000 years ago with the migration of Paleo-Indians from Asia into the  प्रदेश   कि  is today the continental  संयुक्त  States .
It has its own unique social and cultural characteristics  ऐसे  as dialect , music , arts , social  आदतें  , cuisine , and folklore .
The  संयुक्त  States of America is an ethnically and racially  विविध  country as a result of large-scale immigration from many different countries throughout its  इतिहास  .
Its chief early European influences came from English  ,  Scottish , Welsh and Irish settlers of colonial America during British rule .
British  संस्कृति  , due to colonial ties with Britain that spread the English language ,  विधिक  system and other cultural inheritances ,  था  a formative influence .
Other important influences came from other parts of western Europe , especially Germany , France , and Italy .
असली  elements also play a strong role , such as the invention of Jeffersonian democracy .
Thomas Jefferson 's Notes on the State of Virginia  थी  perhaps the first influential domestic cultural critique by an American and a reactionary piece to  the  prevailing European consensus that America  's   घरेलू  originality was degenerate .
Prevalent ideas and ideals that evolved domestically , such as national holidays , uniquely American  खेल  , military tradition , and innovations in the arts and entertainment give a strong sense of  नेशनल  pride among the population as a whole .
अमरीकी  culture includes both conservative and liberal elements , scientific and religious competitiveness , political structures , risk taking and free expression , materialist and moral elements  .
Despite  निश्चित  consistent ideological principles ( e.g . individualism , egalitarianism , and faith  in  freedom and democracy ) , American culture has a variety of expressions due to its  भौगोलिक  scale and demographic  विविधता  .
The flexibility of U.S. culture and its highly symbolic nature lead some researchers to categorize American culture as a mythic identity ; others see  it  as American exceptionalism .
It also includes elements that  विकसित  from Indigenous Americans , and other ethnic  cultures—most  prominently  the  culture of  अफ़्रीकी  Americans , cultures from  लैटिन  America , and Asian  अमरीकी  cultures .
Many American cultural elements , especially from popular culture , have spread across  the   ग्लोब  through modern mass media .
The United States has often been thought of  as  a melting pot , but  शुरूआत  in the late 1990s and early 2000s , it trends towards cultural diversity , pluralism  और  the image  of  a salad bowl instead .
Due to the extent of American culture , there are  अनेक  integrated but unique social subcultures within the United States .
The cultural  संबद्धों  an individual in  the  United  राज्य  may have commonly depend on social class , political orientation and a multitude of demographic  विशेषताएँ  such as  धार्मिक  background , occupation and ethnic group membership .
Samoan ( Gagana fa'a Sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — IPA : )  is  the language  of  the Samoan Islands , comprising the independent country of Samoa and the United States territory  of   अमरीकी  Samoa  .
It is an official language—alongside English —in both jurisdictions .
Samoan , a Polynesian language , is the first language for most of the Samoa Islands ' population of about 246,000 .
With many Samoan people living  in  other countries , the total number of speakers worldwide is estimated at 370,000 .
The language is notable for the phonological differences  between  formal and informal speech as well as a ceremonial  रूप  used in Samoan oratory .
A glucose tolerance test is a  चिकित्सा  test in which  ग्लूकोज  is given and blood samples taken afterward to determine how quickly it is cleared from the  रक्त  .
the  test is usually used to test  लिये  diabetes , insulin resistance , and sometimes reactive hypoglycemia and acromegaly , or rarer disorders  of  carbohydrate metabolism .
In the most commonly performed version of  the  test  ,   an  oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) ,  a  standard dose of  ग्लूकोज  is ingested by mouth and blood levels are  checked  two hours later  .
Many variations of the GTT have  महरूम  devised over the  सालो  for various purposes , with different standard doses of glucose , different routes of  प्रशासन  , different intervals and durations  of  sampling , and various substances  measured  in addition to blood glucose .
`` What About Me '' is  a  song written by Garry Frost and Frances Swan , first recorded by Australian  चट्टान  band Moving Pictures from their album Days of Innocence .
It was the band 's first number-one single in Australia spending six consecutive weeks on the top  ;   वहीँ  , it was  the  second-highest selling single  of  1982 .
The success of the song led them to America where it became a hit , reaching # 29 on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
The song stayed in the U.S. charts  लिये  such a long time that it managed to make Billboards top 100 Pop Singles of 1983 , at # 88 , a rare feat for a single with such a low  शिखर  position .
The  सोंग  made an unusual comeback in 1989  ,  peaking at # 46 .
On the left a chicken egg ,  the  egg most commonly  खाया  by humans , and on the right two quail eggs
Eggs are laid by females of many different species , including birds  ,  reptiles ,  amphibians  , and fish , and have been eaten by mankind for thousands of years .
Bird and reptile eggs consist of a protective eggshell ,  albumen  ( egg white ) , and vitellus ( egg yolk ) ,  contained  within  विभिन्न  thin membranes .
Popular choices for egg consumption are  मुर्गा  , duck , quail ,  roe  , and caviar , but the egg most  प्रायः  consumed by humans is  the  chicken egg , by a  चौड़ी  margin  .
अंडा  yolks and whole eggs store significant  amounts   of  protein and choline , and are  widely  used in cookery .
Due to their protein content , the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) categorizes eggs  as  Meats  भीतर  the Food  मार्गदर्शिका  Pyramid .
despite  the nutritional value of eggs  ,  there are some potential health issues arising from egg quality , storage , and individual allergies .
Chickens  और  other egg-laying creatures are widely kept throughout the world , and mass production of chicken eggs is a global industry .
In 2009 , an estimated 62.1 million  मीट्रिक  tons of eggs were produced worldwide from a total laying flock of approximately 6.4 billion hens .
There are issues of regional variation in demand and expectation ,  as  well as current debates concerning methods of mass production , with the European Union 's ban on battery  खेती  of  मुर्गियों  .
Major League Soccer ( MLS )  is  a professional soccer  लीग  representing the sport  's  highest  स्तर  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  and  कनाडा  .
Sanctioned by the  संयुक्त  States Soccer Federation ( U.S. Soccer ) , the  लीग  is composed of 19 teams — 16 in the U.S. and 3 in Canada .
Seasons  presently  run from March to December , with each team playing 34 games in the regular season .
Ten  टीमों  compete in the  postseason  MLS Cup Playoffs culminating in the championship game  ,  the MLS Cup .
Major League Soccer was founded in 1993 as part of the United States ' bid to host the 1994  फीफा   संसार  Cup .
The first  ऋतु  took place in 1996 beginning  साथ  ten  टीमों  .
Instead of operating as an association of independently owned teams , MLS is a single entity where each team is owned and controlled  by  the league 's investors .
The league 's closed membership makes it one of the  संसार  's few soccer leagues not using promotion and relegation .
the  legality of cannabis varies from country  to  country .
Possession of cannabis is illegal in  सबसे  countries and has been since the beginning of widespread cannabis  निषेध  in the late 1930s .
however  , many countries have decriminalized the possession  of  small quantities of cannabis , particularly in North America , South America and Europe .
Furthermore  ,  possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands , North  कोरियाई  and would be in  the  U.S. states of Colorado and Washington if  it  were not for federal  विधि  , which governs persons in all states .
The medicinal use  of  cannabis is legal in a number of countries  ,  including Canada , the Czech Republic and Israel .
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis , enforcement varies widely at the state level and some states have established medicinal marijuana  कार्यक्रम  in that contradict federal law ; two states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and  replaced  them  साथ   a   नियामक  regime , also  contrary  to federal statute .
Some countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as others  लकिन  , apart from the countries that offer  अभिगम  to medical marijuana , most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient  to  very severe .
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in regard to the cultivation , use , possession or transfer of cannabis for recreational use  .
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of small quantities of cannabis ,  बनाना  it punishable by confiscation and a fine , rather than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use  अनिवार्य  treatment programs for young or frequent users , with freedom from narcotic drugs as  the  goal and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal  उद्देश्य  .
There are  भी  changes in a more restrictive direction as in Canada  .
Drug tests to detect cannabis  हैं  increasingly common in many  देशों  and have resulted in jail sentences  और  people losing  उनके  jobs .
However , simple  कब्ज़ा  can carry long jail  वाक्य  in some countries , particularly  in  parts  of  East Asia and Southeast Asia  जहाँ  the sale of cannabis  may  lead to  a  sentence of life in prison or even execution .
In cardiovascular physiology ,  ejection  fraction ( EF ) represents  the  volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle .
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the  pulmonary  circulation or the  बाएँ  ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation .
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art that allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging  रै  become a worldwide utility enabling study of cardiac performance reproducibly and  inexpensively  .
Simplified , Ejection fraction is a  गणितीय  product allowed by cardiac imaging  .
As a mathematical term , Ejection Fraction is an extension of the work of Adolph Fick in  हृदय  output .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography , Computed Tomography  ,  Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA scanning have definitively allowed clinically relevant mathematics  regarding   ischemia  , Congenital Heart Disease  और  Heart Failure .
State Route 14 ( SR 14 ) is a north–south state highway in the U.S. state of California  ,  largely in the Mojave  मरुस्थल  .
The southern portion of the highway is signed as the Antelope Valley Freeway .
The route connects Interstate 5 , or Golden State Freeway , near Santa Clarita and with U.S. Route 395 near Inyokern .
Legislatively , the  रूट  extends south of I-5 to State Route 1 in the Pacific Palisades area of Los  एंजिल्स  , however the portion south of the junction with I-5 has  नहीं  been constructed .
the  southern  भाग  of  the  constructed route is a busy  commuter  freeway serving and connecting the communities of Santa Clarita , Palmdale and Lancaster with the rest of the Greater Los Angeles area .
the  northern portion , from Vincent (  दक्षिण  of Palmdale ) to Route 395 , is legislatively named the Aerospace  राजमार्ग  , as the highway serves Edwards Air  फ़ोर्स  Base , once one of the primary  लैंडिंग  strips for NASA 's Space Shuttle .
This section is  ग्रामीण  ,  following  the line  between  the hot  mojave  desert and the forming Sierra Nevada mountain range .
Most of Route 14 is loosely paralleled by a main  लकीर  of the Southern Pacific Railroad  ,   प्रयुक्त  for the  antelope  Valley Line of the Metrolink commuter rail system as  खूब  as a connection between Los Angeles and the California Central Valley via Tehachapi Pass .
Linked with US 395  ,  this road connects Los Angeles with such places as Mammoth Mountain , Mono Lake , Yosemite National Park and Reno , Nevada .
Route 14 was part of U.S. Route 6 prior to truncation in 1964 , when U.S. 6 was a coast-to-coast route from Long Beach to Provincetown , Massachusetts .
The non-freeway segment of SR 14 from Silver Queen Road north of  rosamond  to Mojave is known as Sierra  राजमार्ग  , as is the old routing between Interstate  5  and Silver Queen  सड़क  where SR 14 has been moved to a newer freeway alignment  .
Portions of Route 14 remain signed with names associated with US 6 , including Midland Trail , Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट  Highway and Grand Army of the Republic Highway .
This route is part of the California Freeway and Expressway  प्रणाली  .
Blindness is  the  condition of lacking visual perception due to physiological or neurological factors .
विभिन्न  scales have been developed to describe the extent of vision  घाटा  and define blindness .
Total blindness is the complete lack of form and visual light perception and is  clinically  recorded as NLP , an abbreviation for `` no light perception . ''
Blindness is frequently used  to  describe severe visual impairment  साथ  vision .
Those  वर्णित  as having only light perception have no more sight than the ability to tell  लाइट  from dark and the general direction of a light  सोर्स  .
To determine which people may need special assistance because of their visual disabilities  ,  various governmental  jurisdictions  have formulated more complex  परिभाषाएं  referred to as  विधिक  blindness .
In North America and most  of  Europe  ,  legal blindness is defined as visual acuity ( vision ) of 20/200 ( 6/60 ) or less in the better eye with best correction possible .
इस  means that a legally blind individual would have to stand from an object to see it—with corrective  lenses  —with the same degree of clarity  as  a normally sighted person could from  .
In many areas , people with average acuity who nonetheless have a visual field of less than  20  degrees ( the norm being 180 degrees ) are also classified as  होने  legally blind .
Approximately ten percent of those deemed legally blind , by any measure , have no vision .
The rest have some vision , from light perception alone  to   अपेक्षाकृत   शुभ  acuity .
Low vision is sometimes used to describe visual acuities from 20/70 to  20/200  .
By the 10th Revision  of  the WHO International Statistical  वर्गीकरण   of   रोगों  , Injuries and Causes of Death , low vision is defined as visual acuity  of  less than 20/60 ( 6/18 ) , but equal  to  or better than 20/200 ( 6/60 ) , or corresponding  विज़ुअल   फ़ील्ड  loss to less than 20 degrees , in the better eye  साथ  best possible correction .
Blindness is defined  as  visual acuity of less than 20/400  (  6/120 ) , or corresponding visual field loss to less than 10 degrees ,  in  the better eye with  बेहतरीन  possible correction .
Blind  लोगों  with undamaged eyes may still register light non-visually for the purpose of  circadian  entrainment to the  24-hour  light/dark cycle .
Light signals for this purpose travel through the retinohypothalamic tract and are  नहीं  affected  by   ऑप्टिक  nerve  क्षति  beyond where the retinohypothalamic tract exits .
Earl Simmons ( born December 18 , 1970 ) , better known by his stage names DMX and Dark Man X , is an American rapper and  कर्ता  .
In 1999 , DMX released his best-selling album  ...  And Then There Was X  ,  which featured the hit single  ``  Party Up ( Up in Here ) `` .
He has acted in films such as Belly , Romeo Must Die , Exit Wounds , Cradle 2 The Grave , and  पिछला  Hour .
In 2006 , he starred in  the  reality television series  ,  which was primarily aired on the  शर्त  cable  टेलीविज़न   संजाल  .
In 2003 , DMX published a book  of  his memoirs entitled , E.A.R.L . : The Autobiography of DMX .
DMX released a mixtape The Weigh  in  as a prelude/promotion towards his album Undisputed ( 2012 ) .
DMX has sold over 30 million records worldwide , making him one of the  best-selling  hip-hop artists of all time .
Professional certification , trade certification , or professional designation , often called simply certification or qualification , is a designation earned by a  व्यक्ति   to  assure qualification to perform a job or task .
Not all certifications that use  post-nominal  letters are an acknowledgement of educational achievement , or  an  agency appointed to safeguard  the  public interest .
Bugs Bunny is a funny animal  कार्टून  character , best remembered for his starring roles in the Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies series of theatrical  छोटी  films produced by Warner Bros. during the  सुनहरी  age of American animation .
His popularity during this era led to his becoming a corporate mascot of  warner  Bros. Entertainment .
Bugs is an  anthropomorphic  gray hare or rabbit who is famous for  उसके  flippant  ,  personality , a pronounced New York accent , his portrayal as a trickster ,  और  his catch phrase `` Eh ...
What 's up , doc ? ''
( usually  कहा  while chewing a carrot ) .
Bugs has appeared in more films than any other cartoon character and is the  नवीं  most portrayed film personality in the world .
According to his 1990 `` biography '' Bugs Bunny : 50 Years and Only One Grey  हरे  , Bugs  थी  born on July 27 , 1940 in Brooklyn , New York  in  a warren under Ebbets Field , home of the Brooklyn Dodgers  .
in  reality , he was brought to life by the animators and staff of Leon Schlesinger Productions ( later Warner Bros. Cartoons ) : including Tex Avery ,  जो   निर्देशित  Bugs ' early definitive short A Wild Hare ( 1940 )  ;  Robert McKimson , who created Bugs ' definitive character design ; and Mel Blanc , who originated the voice of Bugs .
The mucous membranes ( or  mucosae  or  mucosas  ; singular mucosa ) are linings of mostly endodermal origin  ,   covered  in epithelium , which are involved in absorption and secretion .
वे  line cavities that are exposed to  the  external environment and internal  अंगों  .
They are at several places contiguous with skin :  at  the nostrils , the lips of the mouth , the eyelids , the ears , the genital area , and  the  anus  .
The sticky , thick fluid secreted by the mucous membranes and glands is termed mucus .
The term mucous  झिल्ली  refers to where they are found in the  देह  and not every mucous membrane secretes mucus .
The glans clitoridis , glans penis ( head of the penis ) , along with  the  inside of the foreskin and the clitoral hood , are mucous membranes .
The urethra is also a mucous membrane .
The secreted mucus traps the pathogens  in  the body , preventing any further activities of diseases .
A  निपुण  sergeant is the military rank for a senior non-commissioned officer in some armed forces .
Cake is a form of bread or bread-like food .
In its modern  फ़ॉर्म  , it  is  typically a sweet baked dessert .
In its oldest forms , cakes were normally fried breads or cheesecakes , and normally had a disk shape .
determining  whether a given food  चाहिए  be classified as bread , cake , or pastry can be difficult .
Modern  केक  , especially layer  cakes  , normally contain  a  combination  of  flour , sugar ,  अंडे  , and  मक्खन  or oil  ,  with some varieties  भी  requiring liquid ( typically milk or water  )   और  leavening agents ( such as yeast or baking powder ) .
Flavorful ingredients like fruit purées , nuts , dried or candied fruit , or extracts are often added , and numerous substitutions for the  प्राथमिक  ingredients are possible .
Cakes are often filled with fruit  preserves  or dessert sauces  (   जैसे  pastry cream )  ,  iced with buttercream or other icings , and decorated with marzipan ,  piped  borders or candied fruit .
Cake is often the dessert of choice for meals  at  ceremonial occasions , particularly weddings , anniversaries ,  और  birthdays  .
There are countless cake  व्यंजनों  ; some are  bread-like  ,  कुछ  rich and elaborate , and many are centuries old .
Cake making is no longer a complicated procedure ; while at  एक  time considerable labor went into cake making (  विशेषकर  the whisking of egg  foams   )  , baking equipment and directions have been simplified  so  that  भी  the most amateur cook may bake a cake .
Tamara Faye LaValley Bakker Messner (  कूच  7 , 1942 – July 20 , 2007 ) was an American Christian singer  ,  evangelist , entrepreneur , author , talk show host , and  टेलीविज़न  personality .
She was married from 1961 to 1992 to televangelist , and later convicted felon , Jim  bakker   .
She co-hosted with  उसे  on The PTL Club (  1976–1987  ) .
She  थी  a participant in the 2004  ऋतु  of the reality show The  surreal  Life .
Cambria  is  a village in Columbia  काउंटी  , Wisconsin  ,  United States .
the   जनसांख्यिकी  was 767 at  the  2010 census .
It is part of the Madison Metropolitan Statistical Area .
Public  नीति  is the principled guide to action taken by the administrative executive branches of  the  state with regard to a class of issues in a manner consistent with law and institutional customs .
In general , the foundation is the pertinent  नेशनल  and substantial constitutional law and implementing legislation such  as  the US  संघीय  code .
Further substrates include both judicial interpretations  और  regulations  जिससे  are generally authorized by legislation .
Other scholars define it as a system of `` courses of action , regulatory measures , laws , and funding priorities concerning a given topic promulgated by a governmental entity or its  प्रतिनिधि  . ''
Public policy is commonly embodied `` in constitutions , legislative acts  ,  and judicial  निर्णय  . ''
In  the   संयुक्त  States , this  अवधारणा  refers not only  to  the  परिणाम  of policies , but more  broadly  to the decision-making and analysis of governmental decisions .
As  an   अकादमिक  discipline , public policy is studied by professors  और  students at public policy schools  of  major universities throughout the country .
The U.S. professional association of public policy practitioners , researchers , scholars , and students is the Association  लिये   पब्लिक  Policy Analysis and Management .
Digestion  is  the mechanical and  रासायनिक   विश्लेषण  of food into  छोटी  components that  हैं  more easily absorbed into a blood stream , for instance  .
Digestion  is   a  form  of  catabolism : a breakdown of large food molecules to smaller ones  .
When food enters the mouth , digestion of the food starts by  the   कार्रवाई  of mastication , a form of mechanical digestion , and the wetting contact  of  saliva .
Saliva , a liquid secreted  by  the salivary glands , contains salivary amylase , an enzyme which starts the digestion of starch in the food .
After undergoing mastication and starch digestion , the food will  be  in the form of a small , round slurry mass called  a  bolus .
It  होगा  then travel down the esophagus and into the stomach by the action of peristalsis .
Gastric juice in the stomach starts protein  पाचन  .
Gastric juice mainly contains hydrochloric acid and  pepsin  .
As these two chemicals may damage the stomach wall , mucus is secreted by the stomach , providing a slimy layer that acts as a shield against the damaging effects of the chemicals .
At  the  same time protein digestion is occurring , mechanical mixing occurs by peristalsis , which are waves of muscular contractions that move along the stomach wall .
This allows the mass of food to further mix with the digestive enzymes .
After some time ( typically an hour or two in humans , 4–6 hours in dogs , somewhat shorter duration in house cats ) , the resulting  मोटा  liquid  is  called chyme .
When the pyloric sphincter valve opens  ,  chyme enters the duodenum  जहाँ  it mixes  साथ   digestive  enzymes  इससे  the pancreas , and then passes through the small intestine , in which digestion continues  .
When the chyme is fully digested , it is absorbed into the blood .
95 % of absorption of nutrients occurs in the small intestine .
Water and minerals are reabsorbed back into the blood in  the  colon (  विशाल   आंत  ) where the pH is slightly acidic about 5.6 ~ 6.9  .
Some vitamins , such  as  biotin and vitamin K ( K2MK7 ) produced by bacteria in the colon are also absorbed into the blood in the colon .
Waste material is  eliminated  from the rectum during defecation .
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 )  थी  king of England from 21 April 1509 until his death .
He was lord , and later king , of Ireland ,  as   खूब  as continuing the nominal claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom  of  France .
Henry was the second monarch of the Tudor  राजवंश  , succeeding his  पिता  , Henry VII .
Besides his six marriages , Henry VIII  is   ज्ञात  for his role in the separation  of  the Church of  इंग्लैण्ड  from the Roman Catholic  गिरिजाघर  .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the Church of  इंग्लैण्ड  from papal authority  ,  the Dissolution of the Monasteries , and his own establishment as  the  Supreme Head of the  गिरिजाघर  of England .
Yet he remained a believer  in  core Catholic theological teachings , even after his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and Wales  साथ  the Laws  in  Wales  अधिनियमों   1535  and 1542 .
in  1513 , the new king allied with the Holy Roman  सम्राट  , Maximillian I  ,  and invaded France in 1513  साथ  a large ,  well-equipped  army , but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
Maximillian ,  लिये  his part , used the English invasion to his own ends , and this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French .
This foray  होता  prove the start of an obsession for Henry , who invaded  again  in 1544 .
इस  time , Henry  's  forces captured the  महत्वपूर्ण  city of Boulogne , but again the Holy Roman Emperor , Charles V , supported Henry only  as  long as he needed to and England  ,  strained by the enormous cost of the war , ransomed the  नगर  back for peace  .
His  contemporaries  considered Henry  in  his prime to be an attractive , educated  और  accomplished king , and he has  महरूम  described as `` one of the most  charismatic  rulers to sit on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling with absolute power , he also engaged himself as an author and composer .
His desire  to  provide  इंग्लैण्ड  with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he  believed  a daughter would be unable  to  consolidate the  ट्यूडर  dynasty  और  the fragile peace that existed following  the  Wars of the Roses – led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation .
Henry became morbidly obese  और  his health suffered , contributing  to   उसके  death in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised in his later  जीवन  as a lustful , egotistical , harsh  ,  and insecure king .
Bongos ( Spanish : bongó ) are an  afro-cuban   percussion  instrument .
The drums are of different size :  the  larger drum is  पुकारा   in  Spanish  the  hembra ( female )  और  the smaller the macho ( male ) .
They are membranophones , or instruments that create sound by a vibration of a  stretched  membrane .
Different religious groups  शामिल  different books in their Biblical canons , in varying orders , and sometimes divide or combine books , or incorporate additional material into canonical books .
Christian Bibles range from the  sixty-six  books of the Protestant canon to the eighty-one  किताबे   of  the Ethiopian  परंपरागत  Tewahedo Church canon  .
The  यहूदी  Bible , or Tanakh , contains twenty-four books divided into three parts ; the five books  of  the Torah (  ``   शिक्षण  '' or ``  विधि  '' ) , the Nevi'im ( `` prophets '' )  ,  and the Ketuvim (  ``  writings '' ) .
the  first part of Christian Bibles is the Old Testament  ,  which contains , at minimum , the twenty-four books of the Hebrew Bible divided into thirty-nine  किताबे  and ordered differently from the Hebrew Bible .
The Catholic Church  और  Eastern Christian churches  भी  hold certain deuterocanonical books and passages to be part of the Old Testament canon .
The second part is the New Testament , containing  twenty-seven  books ; the four  canonical  gospels , Acts of the Apostles  ,  twenty-one  epistles  or letters and the Book of Revelation .
The Eastern Orthodox , Oriental Orthodox and Eastern Catholic churches may have minor differences in their  सूचियाँ  of accepted books .
the  list given here for these  चर्च  is the most inclusive : if  at   तनिक   एक  Eastern church accepts the  किताब  it  is  included here .
The national  ध्वज  of the United States of America , often simply referred to as the  अमरीकी  flag ,  consists  of thirteen equal  आड़ा  stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white , with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small , white , five-pointed stars arranged  in  nine offset horizontal rows of six stars (  शीर्ष  and bottom  )  alternating with rows of five stars .
the  50 stars on the flag  represent  the 50 states of the United States of  अमेरिका   और   the  13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared  स्वतंत्रता  from  the  Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union .
nicknames  for the flag include the `` Stars and  धारियाँ  '' , `` Old Glory `` , and `` The Star-Spangled Banner . ''
Dred Scott v. Sandford , , also known as the Dred Scott Decision , was a landmark decision by the U.S.  परम्  Court .
It made two main rulings .
the  first ruling was that African-Americans were not citizens , and therefore had no standing  to  sue in federal court .
The second ruling was that the federal government had no power  to  regulate slavery in any territory acquired subsequent to the creation of the United States .
Given the first  सत्ताधारी   ,  most scholars and many contemporary political  आंकड़े  ( including the leadership of the then-new  रिपब्लिकन  Party ) considered that the second ruling was  नहीं  binding precedent  ,  but mere dictum .
The rationale  of  the  परम्  Court regarding the jurisdictional  सत्ताधारी  implied that people of African descent ( both slave and  फ़्री  ) were not protected by the Constitution and were not U.S. citizens .
Since passage of the 14th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution ,  दोनो   rulings  are  superseded  and no longer valid precedent  .
Nonetheless , the case retains historical significance as it is widely regarded as the worst decision ever made by the  परम्  Court .
The  राय  of the court  ,  written by Chief Justice Roger B. Taney , stirred debate .
The decision was 7–2 , and every Justice besides Taney wrote a separate concurrence or  dissent  .
For the first time since Marbury v. Madison , the Court held an Act  of  Congress to be unconstitutional .
Dred Scott , an African-American slave , had asked a United States Circuit Court to award him his freedom because he and his master had resided in a state ( Illinois ) and a territory ( Wisconsin Territory )  जहाँ  slavery had been banned .
Chief Justice Roger Taney , writing for the court , held that Scott , as a person of African ancestry , was not a  नागरिक  of the United States and  इसलिए  had no right to sue  in  federal court .
This holding was contrary to the practice of numerous states at the time , particularly Free states , where free blacks did in fact enjoy the rights of citizens , such as the right to vote  और  hold public office .
In what is sometimes considered mere obiter dictum , the Court went on to hold that Congress had no authority to prohibit slavery in federal territories because slaves are personal property and the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution protects property owners against deprivation of their  प्रॉपर्टी  without due process of law .
In reaching this decision ,  taney  had  hoped  to settle the growing controversy surrounding slavery in the United States , but it had the opposite effect .
The decision was fiercely debated across the country , as perhaps best exemplified by the Lincoln–Douglas  debates  of 1858 .
Abraham Lincoln , the  second-ever  Republican nominee for President , was able to win the presidential election in 1860 ; the  stopping  of the further expansion of slavery was a key Republican party plank .
The decision played an important role in the timing of state  secession  and the Civil War , although it is extreme to say the decision  ``  caused '' the war .
The decision is acknowledged  लिये   the  influential  भूमिका  it played  in  altering  the  national political landscape  :  it is credited with launching Abraham Lincoln’s national political career and ultimately allowing for his election .
Although the Supreme Court has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott case , the Court stated  in  the Slaughter-House Cases that at least one part of it had already been overruled by the Fourteenth  amendment  in 1868 , which begins by stating , `` All persons born or naturalized in the United  राज्य  , and subject to the  क्षेत्राधिकार  thereof , are citizens  of  the United States and of the State wherein  वे  reside . ''
To which  the  Court noted:
The first observation we have to make on this clause is , that it puts at rest  दोनो  the questions which we stated to have been the subject of differences of opinion .
It declares that persons may be citizens of the United States without regard to their citizenship  of  a particular State , and it  overturns   the  Dred Scott decision by making all persons  born   भीतर  the United States and  विषय   to  its jurisdiction citizens of the United States .
There are dozens of neighborhoods in Columbus , Ohio .
Some are hard  to  define  ,  as they encompass large areas developed at  अलग  times—often with sub-neighborhoods  भीतर  them .
Borders can also  बदलें  based on popular understanding of the area , as well as the whims of the residents .
This  आलेख  uses data from the Datasourcecolumbus Web site , Spotcrime.com , HelloColumbus.com , as well as the various Columbus Area Commissions to define the various  क्षेत्रों  .
Excerpts  और  border information are drawn directly from the main articles .
A biologist is a scientist who studies living organisms and their relationship to their environment .
Biologists involved in basic research attempt to discover underlying mechanisms that govern how organisms work .
Biologists involved in applied research attempt  to  develop or improve medical , industrial or agricultural  प्रक्रियाओं  .
martinus  Willem Beijerinck , a botanist and microbiologist
Base jumping from  a  cliff in a wingsuit .
BASE  कूद  , also sometimes written as B.A.S.E  .  jumping , is an activity where participants jump from fixed objects and use a parachute to break their fall .
`` BASE '' is an  एक्रोनिम  that stands for four categories of fixed objects from  जिससे  one can jump : buildings , antennas , spans ( bridges ) , and earth ( cliffs ) .
The British  shorthair  is a domesticated  बिल्ली  whose features make it a  लोकप्रिय  breed in cat shows .
It has been the most popular breed of cat registered by  the  UK 's  शासी  Council of the Cat Fancy ( GCCF ) since  2001  , when it overtook the Persian breed .
The USA Basketball Men 's Senior National Team , commonly known as the United States  मेन  's national basketball team , represents the United States of America in international men 's  बास्केट  .
The USA is the  सबसे  successful team in international competition  ,   जीतना  medals in  सब  seventeen Olympic tournaments it has  डाला  ,  coming  away with fourteen golds .
Two of its gold medal-winning squads were  inducted  to  the   naismith  Memorial  बास्केट  Hall of  कीर्ति  as teams in  अगस्त  2010—the 1960 team , which featured six  हॉल  of Famers ( 4 players , 2 coaches ) , and the 1992 `` Dream Team '' ,  featuring   14  Hall of Famers ( 11 players  ,  3 coaches ) .
The United States is  फिलहाल  ranked first in  the  FIBA World Rankings .
Traditionally composed of amateur players , a 1989 rule change  by  FIBA allowed USA Basketball to field teams with professional players .
The first such team , known as the `` Dream Team '' , won the gold medal  at  the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona  ,  Spain ,  playing  in the final against Croatia .
With the introduction of professionals , the team was able to  चिंगारी  a second run of dominance after capturing only a bronze medal in 1988 .
A team of  पेशेवर  players competed at  the  1994 FIBA World Championship , finishing first .
In 1996 , 2000 , 2008 , and  2012  the USA  again  captured gold medals .
Facing increased competition , the USA  विफल  to win a  पदक  at the  2002   fiba  World Championship , finishing  छठे  .
The 2004 Summer Olympic team lost three games on its way to a bronze medal , a record  कि   represented  more losses in a single year than  the   देश  's  ओलम्पिक  teams had suffered in all previous Olympiads combined .
Determined to put an end to these failures , USA Basketball initiated a long-term project aimed at creating better , more cohesive teams .
The USA won its first seven games at the  2006  FIBA World  चैंपियनशिप  in Japan before losing against Greece  in  the semi-finals , ending  the   प्रतियोगिता  with the bronze  पदक  .
The USA won gold two years later  ,  though , at the  2008  Summer Olympics with a dominant performance .
This success was  followed  up at the 2010 FIBA World Championship , where despite  क्षेत्ररक्षण   a  roster featuring no  खिलाड़ी  from the  2008  Olympic team , the  यूएसए  did not lose a single game en  रूट  to defeating  मेजबान  Turkey for the gold medal .
the  USA continued this streak of dominance by going undefeated and capturing gold once more at  the  2012 Summer Olympics .

The  सुपर  Bowl  रिंग  is an award in the National Football League given to  the  winners of the league 's annual World Championship game  ,  the Super Bowl .
Since only one Vince Lombardi Trophy is awarded to the team ( ownership ) itself , the Super Bowl ring offers a collectible memento for the actual  खिलाड़ी  and team members to keep for themselves to symbolize the victory .
