Agriculture is a major industry in the United  राज्य  and the country is a net exporter of  खाना  .
as  of  the  last census of agriculture in 2007 , there  यहूद  2.2 million  खेतो  , covering an  क्षेत्रफल  of , an average of per farm .
Although  agricultural  activity occurs in  सबसे  states ,  it  is particularly concentrated in the vast expanse of flat , arable land known as the Great  मैदान  , which encompasses the central region of the nation .
The Mpemba effect , named after Tanzanian student Erasto Mpemba , is the assertion that warmer water can freeze faster than colder water .
Although there is  anecdotal  support for the effect , there is no agreement on exactly what the effect is  और  under what circumstances it occurs .
There have been reports of similar phenomena since ancient times , although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated .
the  phenomenon seems contrary to  ऊष्मागतिकी  , but a  क्रमांक  of possible explanations for the effect have been proposed .
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise definition  of  `` freezing '' and control a vast number of starting parameters in order to confirm or explain the effect .
The  siamese  ( , ) is one of the  पहला  distinctly recognized breeds of  प्राच्य   बिल्ली  .
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known  as  Siam ) , where they are one of several native breeds and are called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ , a name meaning `` moon  डायमंड  '' ) .
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became one of  the  most popular breeds in Europe and North America .
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket  कड़ी  based in Bellevue , Washington , with 64  स्टोर्स  in the Puget  ध्वनि  region of Washington state and in the Portland , Oregon metropolitan area .
In economics , the money supply or money stock , is the total amount of monetary assets available in  an  economy at a specific time .
There are several  तरीके  to define `` money , '' but standard measures usually include currency in circulation and demand deposits ( depositors ' easily accessed assets on the books of financial institutions ) .
Money supply  आंकड़ा  are recorded and published ,  प्रायः  by the government  or  the central bank of the country .
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored changes in money supply because of its effects on the price level ,  महंगाई  , the exchange rate  और  the business cycle .
That relation between money and prices is historically associated with the quantity theory of money .
वहीँ  is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth and long-term price inflation , at least  लिये  rapid increases in the  राशि  of money in the  अर्थव्यवस्था   .
That is  ,  a country such  as  Zimbabwe which saw rapid increases in its money supply also saw rapid  increases  in prices ( hyperinflation  )  .
This is one reason for the  रिलायंस   on  monetary policy as a means of controlling inflation  .
The nature of this causal chain is the subject of contention  .
Some heterodox economists  argue  that the money  सप्लाई  is endogenous  (  determined by the workings of the economy , not by the central bank ) and that the  स्त्रोत  of inflation must be found in the distributional  ढांचा  of the economy .
In addition , those economists seeing the central bank  's  control over the money supply as feeble say that there are two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate .
First , in the aftermath  of  a recession , when  अनेक  resources are underutilized , an  बढ़ाएँ  in the money supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of inflation .
Second , if the velocity of money , i.e. , the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply , changes , an increase in the money supply could have either no effect , an  अतिरंजित  effect , or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP .
Logo  लिये  IMAX .
Warren Theatre IMAX cinema , Wichita , Kansas , USA , 601 seats .
A comparison between 35 mm and 15/70  mm  negative areas .
IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image  अधिकतम  ) is a motion picture film format and a set of cinema projection standards created by the  कनाडाई   कम्पनी  IMAX Corporation .
IMAX has the capacity to record and display images of far greater  आकार  and resolution than  conventional  film systems .
Since 2002 , some feature films have been converted ( or upgraded ) into IMAX  स्वरूप   लिये  display in IMAX theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX .
IMAX is the most  widely  used  प्रणाली  for  special-venue  film presentations .
,  वहीँ  are 697 IMAX  थिएटर  in 52  देशों  .
Today 's Special is a Canadian children 's  टेलीविज़न  show produced by Clive VanderBurgh at  tvontario  from 1981 to 1987 .
It also ran on Nickelodeon and the  आस्था  and Values Channel/Odyssey ( now the Hallmark Channel )  as  well as many  pbs  stations throughout the United States .
it  was set in a department store  ,  based on the flagship location of the  अभी  defunct Simpson 's in Toronto .
Many sequences for it were shot  at  the Queen Street West and Yonge Street store after hours .
Constitutionalism , in its most  सामान्य  meaning , is `` a complex of  विचार  , attitudes , and patterns of behavior  elaborating  the  principle  that  the  authority of government derives from and is limited by  a  body  of  fundamental  विधि  '' .
A political organization is constitutional to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of power control for the protection of the interests and liberties  of  the citizenry , including those that may be in the minority `` .
As described by political  वैज्ञानिक  and constitutional scholar David  fellman   :
An ice-cream headache  ,   भी  known as brain freeze , cold-stimulus headache , or its given scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( meaning `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ) , is a form of brief cranial pain or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops .
It is caused by having  कुछ  cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ) , and is believed to result from a nerve response causing rapid constriction and swelling of blood  बरतन  or a `` referring `` of  पीड़ा  from the roof of the mouth to the head .
The rate of intake for cold foods has  महरूम  studied as a contributing  फ़ैक्टर  .
There are people who can  नहीं  experience ``  दिमाग  freeze '' or similar symptoms .
The term ice-cream headache has been in use since  at  least 31 January 1937 , contained in a journal entry by Rebecca Timbres published in the 1939 book We did  n't  ask Utopia :  a   quaker  family in Soviet Russia .
The first published use of the term brain freeze , as it pertains to  cold-induced  headaches , was on 27 May 1991 .
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a Scots poem written by Robert Burns in 1788 and set to the tune of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ) .
it  is well known in many countries , especially in the English-speaking world ; its traditional use being  to  celebrate the start of the New Year at  the  stroke of midnight .
By extension , it is also sung at funerals , graduations and as a farewell or ending to  अन्य  occasions .
The international Boy Scout youth movement , in  अनेक   देशों  , uses it as a  बंद  to jamborees and other functions  .
The song 's Scots title  may  be translated into English literally as `` old long since '' , or more idiomatically , `` long long ago '' , `` days gone by '' or `` old times '' .
Consequently `` For  auld   लैंग  syne '' , as it appears in the first line  of  the chorus , might be loosely translated  as  `` for ( the sake of ) old times '' .
the  phrase `` Auld Lang Syne  ''  is also used  in  similar poems by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 )  ,  Allan  ramsay  ( 1686–1757 ) , and James Watson ( 1711 ) as  खूब  as older folk songs  predating  Burns .
Matthew Fitt  उपयोग  the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time ...
`` in his retelling of fairy tales in the Scots language  .
Ben Schulz , player of Leeroy Jenkins at BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins , sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and often elongated with numerous additional letters  ,  is an Internet  मीम   नामित  for a player character created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG  ,  World of Warcraft  .
The character became  लोकप्रिय  due to a video of the game that circulated around the Internet .
the  phenomenon has since spread beyond the boundaries of the gaming community into  अन्य  online and mainstream media .
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland , California , United States , in  the  early morning  घंटों  of New Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to  रिपोर्ट्स  of a fight on  a  crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit train returning  इससे  San Francisco , BART Police officers  detained  Oscar Grant and several other passengers  on  the platform at the Fruitvale BART Station .
Officer Johannes Mehserle and another officer were restraining Grant , who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest .
Officer Mehserle stood and  ,  according to witnesses , said : `` Get back , I 'm gon  na  tase him . ''
तब  Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant  एकबार  in the back ; Mehserle appeared stunned , put his  हैंड्स  to his head and exclaimed , `` Oh ,  my  God ! ''
During his court  गवाही  , Mehserle said that Grant then exclaimed , `` You shot me ! ''
ग्रान्ट  turned out to be unarmed ; he was  सुनाया  dead the next morning at  highland  Hospital in Oakland .
The events were captured on multiple digital video and cell phone  कैमरे  .
The footage was  disseminated  to media outlets and to various websites , where it was watched millions of times .
The following days saw both peaceful and violent  विरोध  .
The shooting has been variously  labeled  an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution .
On January  13  , Alameda  काउंटी  prosecutors charged Mehserle with murder for  the  shooting .
He resigned his position and pleaded  नहीं  guilty .
the  trial began on June 10 , 2010 .
Michael Rains , Mehserle 's  दण्ड  defense attorney , argued that Mehserle mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol , intending to  उपयोग  his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband .
Pretrial filings argue that his client  किया  not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los Angeles judge to instruct the jury  to  limit  इसके  deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal .
Oakland civil rights attorney John Burris filed a $  25  million wrongful death claim against BART on behalf of Grant  's  family .
On July 8 ,  2010  , the jury returned its verdict  :  Mehserle was found  अपराधी  of involuntary manslaughter and not guilty  of  second-degree  हत्या  and  voluntary  manslaughter .
आरंभिक  protests against the ruling were peacefully  व्यवस्थित  ; looting , arson  ,  destruction of property , and small riots broke out after dark .
Nearly 80 people were eventually arrested .
On Friday , July  9  ,  2010   ,  the U.S. Justice  विभाग   खोली  a civil rights case against Mehserle ; the federal government can prosecute him independently for the same act under  the   पृथक  sovereigns exception  to  double jeopardy .
The Department of Justice will be working with the U.S. Attorney 's office in San Francisco and the FBI .
On November  5  ,  2010  , Mehserle was sentenced to two years , minus  समय  served .
He served his time in the  लॉस  Angeles County Jail , occupying a private  कोशिका  away  इससे   अन्य  prisoners .
He was released  on  June 13 , 2011 and is now on parole  .
Major representatives of the Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem Renaissance was a cultural movement that spanned  the  1920s .
At  the  time , it was known as the `` New Negro Movement '' , named after the  1925  anthology by Alain Locke .
Though it was  केन्द्रित  in the Harlem neighborhood of New York  नगर  , many French-speaking black writers from African and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also influenced by the  हार्लेम   पुनर्जागरण  .
the  Harlem Renaissance is unofficially  पहचाना  to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s .
अनेक  of its ideas lived on  much  longer .
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '' ,  as  James Weldon Johnson  पसन्दीदा  to call the Harlem  पुनर्जागरण  , was  लगाई  between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity  :  A Journal  of   नीग्रो  Life hosted a party for black writers  जहाँ  many white  प्रकाशक  were in attendance ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ) .
African States between 500 BCE and 1500 CE
Obelisk at temple of Luxor , Egypt .
c. 1200 BCE  .
African knight of Baguirmi in full padded armour suit .
The history of Africa begins with the  प्रागितिहास  of Africa and the emergence  of  Homo sapiens in East Africa , continuing into the present  as  a patchwork of diverse and politically developing  स्वदेश  states .
Some early  प्रमाण  of agriculture  in  Africa dates from 16,000 BCE , and metallurgy from about 4000 BCE .
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt , and later in Nubia , the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa .
During the Middle Ages , Islam spread through the regions  .
Crossing the Maghreb and the Sahel , a major center  of  Muslim culture was  टिम्बकटू  .
Some notable pre-colonial  राज्य  and societies in Africa include the Nok culture , Mali  साम्राज्य  , Ashanti Empire , Kingdom of Mapungubwe , Kingdom of Sine , Kingdom of  saloum  , Kingdom of Baol , Kingdom of Zimbabwe  ,  Kingdom of Kongo , Ancient Carthage  ,  Numidia , Mauretania ,  the  Aksumite  साम्राज्य  , the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate .
From the  लेट  15th century , Europeans  और  Arabs took slaves from West ,  सेंट्रल  and  southeast  Africa overseas in the African slave  व्यापार  .
European colonization of Africa developed rapidly in the  हाथापाई  for Africa of the late 19th  और  early  20th   सदियां  .
Following  struggles  for independence in many parts of the continent ,  as  well as a weakened  यूरोपीय  after the Second World War ; decolonization took place .
Africa 's history has been challenging for  शोधकर्ताओं  in the field of African studies because of the scarcity  of  written sources in large parts  of  sub-Saharan Africa .
Scholarly techniques such as the recording of oral history , historical linguistics , archaeology and genetics have been crucial .
Curry Foley  थी  the first player in Major League Baseball history to hit for the cycle .
In baseball  ,   hitting  for the cycle is the accomplishment of  एक  batter hitting a single , a double , a triple , and a home run in the same game  .
Collecting the hits in that order is known as a `` natural  साईकिल  '' .
चक्र  are uncommon in Major League Baseball  (  MLB ) , and have occurred 294 times  चूंकि  the first by Curry Foley in 1882 .
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history ) ; it has been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball .
Based  on  2009 offensive levels , the probability  of  an average MLB player  hitting  for a cycle against an average team in a game is  लगभग  0.00590 % ; this corresponds to  परिचय  2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams .
In other baseball leagues , the cycle is achieved less frequently .
Through September 4 , 2008 , 62 players in Nippon Professional Baseball ( NPB  )  , the top-level baseball organization in Japan , have hit for the cycle , the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara .
Two players have hit for the cycle on  the  same day once in NPB history ; this has occurred twice  in   एमएलबी  history .
One NPB  खिलाड़ी  has also hit for the cycle in an NPB All-Star game .
No player has ever hit for the  साईकिल   in   the   एमएलबी  All-Star Game or the postseason .
The main slave routes in medieval Africa .
This article discusses systems ,  इतिहास   ,  and effects  of  slavery within Africa  .
See Arab slave trade , Atlantic slave trade ,  maafa  , and Slavery in contemporary Africa for other discussions .
`` Slave transport in Africa  ''  .
Europeans usually did not  डालें   the  interior regions .
Slavery  in  Africa  रै  existed throughout the continent for many centuries  ,  and  continues  in the current day  .
प्रणालियों  of servitude and slavery were common in many parts of the continent , as they were in much of the ancient world .
In most African societies  जहाँ  slavery was prevalent ,  the  enslaved people were  largely  treated as  indentured  servants and not treated as chattel slaves .
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began , many of the local slave systems changed  और  began supplying captives  लिये   स्लेव  markets outside of Africa .
Slavery in historical Africa  थी  practiced in many  अलग  forms and some  of  these do not clearly fit the definitions of slavery  elsewhere  in  the  world .
कर्ज़  slavery , enslavement of war captives  ,   सैन्य  slavery  ,  and criminal slavery were all practiced in various parts of Africa  .
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior  of  Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions , slavery was a small part of the economic life of many societies in Africa until the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab  और  Atlantic ) .
स्लेव  practices were again transformed  साथ  European colonization of Africa  और  the formal abolition of slavery  in  the early 1900s .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited  सूचना  about computer performance and running applications  ,  processes and CPU usage , commit  चार्ज  and memory information  ,  network activity and statistics , logged-in users , and system services ( and as  प्रायः  is the case  साथ  software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows , 3rd  पार्टी  software is available which fills the requirements  अधिक  thoroughly , e.g , `` Process  एक्सप्लोरर  '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and  ``   प्रणाली  Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities , processor affinity , forcibly terminate  प्रक्रियाओं  , and shut down , restart , hibernate or log  बंद  from Windows .
Windows Task Manager was  introduced  with Windows NT  4.0  .
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task List application , which had far fewer features .
The task list was capable of listing currently running processes and killing them , or creating a new process .
in  Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also present that allows access  to  Standby  ,  Hibernate  ,  Turn off , Restart , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x , Windows  95  , Windows  98  ) had a program known  as  tasks to display the programs currently running  .
This file was executed by running the taskman.exe file from  the  C : \Windows directory  .
The Troop is an American-Canadian live-action , single camera comedy  -adventure  television series about a trio of  teenagers   जो  fight and capture monsters and other supernatural phenomena  कि  invade the fictional  कस्बा  of Lakewood .
Created and executive produced by Max  burnett  , Greg Coolidge and Chris Morgan , the series premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18 , 2009 .
The second season premiered on June 25 , 2011 and Nickelodeon  रद्द   the  series midway  through  it 's second season .
The remaining episodes of season 2 were aired on Nicktoons except the last 3..
Sparsely populated  in   संबंध  to its area , the Democratic Republic  of  the Congo ( DRC ) is  घर  to a vast potential of natural resources and mineral wealth , its untapped deposits of raw minerals  हैं  estimated to be worth in  excess  of US $ 24 trillion , yet the economy  of  the DRC has declined  drastically  since the mid-1980s .
at  the time of its independence in 1960 , DRC was the second most  industrialized  country in Africa after South  अफ़्रीकी  ; it boasted a thriving mining sector and its agriculture sector was relatively  उत्पादक  .
If the viewer stares at this image for 20–60 seconds and stares at a white object , a negative afterimage will appear (  in   इस  case ,  it  will be cyan on magenta ) .
This can also be achieved by the  दर्शक  closing his/her eyes and tilting their head up  .
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an optical illusion that refers to an image continuing to appear in one 's vision after the exposure to the original image has  ceased  .
One of the most common  afterimages   is  the bright glow that seems to float before one 's eyes after  looking  into a  लाइट  source for a few seconds .
Closing the eye can help achieve a better sense of the color in its own aspect .
afterimages  come in two forms , negative ( inverted ) and positive ( retaining original  रंग  ) .
the  process behind positive afterimages is unknown , though thought  to  be related  to   neural  adaptation .
On  the  other hand , negative afterimages are a retinal phenomenon and are  खूब  understood .
Lost is an American serial  नाटक   टेलीविज़न  series that premiered on September 22 , 2004 on the American Broadcasting Company ( ABC ) .
The series was created by J. J. Abrams and Damon Lindelof , based upon  an  original pilot script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber  .
Six  सीज़न  of the show  aired  ,  in  addition to numerous clip shows to recap previous episodes .
एबीसी  announced that Lost would end after six  सीज़न  , having  उत्पादित  a total of  121  episodes .
The series follows the past , present , and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a plane  क्रैश  on a passenger jet , Oceanic  उड़ान  815 , flying from  सिडनी  to Los Angeles after it  क्रैश  on a tropical island  in  the South Pacific  .
The  श्रेणी  also includes stories of the lives of people already living on the island — they  शामिल  the `` Others `` , who initially antagonize the survivors , as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana .
Each  एपीसोड   typically   सुविधाएँ  action on the island as well as a secondary storyline from another point in a character 's life .
ऋतु  6 features a detailing of the  जीवनदान  of the survivors in a different reality , as if the flight had never crashed .
In  the  following list , the term `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the character or characters who are featured in the secondary storyline of each episode .
``  no   .
in series '' refers to the episode 's number in the  overall  series , whereas ``  no   .
in season '' refers to the  एपीसोड  's number in each particular season .
`` U.S. viewers ( million ) '' refers to the number of Americans in millions  जो  watched the episode live .
A total of 121 episodes of Lost were produced , the last of which aired  on  May 23 , 2010 .
All seasons  हैं  available on DVD in Regions  1–4  and on  blu-ray  in Regions A and B .
Flat feet  (  also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a formal reference to a medical condition in which the arch  of   the  foot collapses  ,  with the  संपूर्ण  sole of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground .
In some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general population ) the arch simply never develops in  एक   पैर  ( unilaterally ) or both  फीट  ( bilaterally ) .
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have shown no  प्रमाण  of later increased injury , or foot problems , due to flat feet , in a  जनसांख्यिकी  of people who reach military service age without prior  पैर  problems .
However , these studies can not be used to judge possible future damage from this condition when diagnosed at younger ages .
They also can not be applied to persons whose flat feet are associated with foot symptoms , or certain symptoms  in  other parts of the body ( such as the leg or back  )  possibly referable  to  the foot .
Generation X , commonly  abbreviated  to Gen X , is the generation born after  the  Western post-World  युद्ध  II baby boom .
Demographers , historians and commentators use beginning birth dates  इससे   the  early 1960s to the early 1980s .
The  पद  was popularized by Douglas Coupland 's 1991 novel Generation X  :  Tales for an Accelerated  संस्कृति  .
Before that , it had been used for various subcultures  or  countercultures after the 1950s .
Pressure ulcers , also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores , are  स्थानीयकृत  injuries to the skin  and/or  underlying tissue usually over a bony prominence , as a result of  दबाव  , or pressure in  संयोजन  with shear and/or friction .
Most commonly this will be  the  sacrum , coccyx , heels or the hips , but  अन्य  sites such as the elbows , knees , ankles or the back of the cranium can  be   प्रभावित  .
The cause of pressure  छाले  is pressure applied  to  soft  ऊतक  so that blood flow to  the  soft tissue is completely or partially  obstructed  .
shear  is also a  कारण  ; shear pulls on blood vessels  कि  feed  the   स्किन  .
Pressure ulcers most commonly develop in persons who are not  चलती   परिचय  or are confined to wheelchairs .
it  is widely believed that other factors can influence the tolerance of  स्किन  for pressure and  shear  thereby increasing the risk of  दबाव  ulcer development .
These factors are  protein-calorie   कुपोषण  , microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence )  ,  diseases that reduce  रक्त  flow to the skin  ,  such  as  arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the feeling in the skin , such  as  paralysis or neuropathy  .
The healing of pressure  छाले  may be slowed by the age  of  the person , medical conditions ( such as arteriosclerosis ,  मधुमेह  or infection ) , smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs .
Although often prevented and treatable if  मिला  early  ,   दबाव  ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in critically ill patients , frail elders , wheelchair users ( especially where spinal injury  is  involved ) and terminally ill patients .
प्राथमिक  prevention  is  to redistribute pressure  by  turning the patient  regularly  .
The benefit  of  turning to avoid further sores is well documented since at least the 19th century .
In addition to turning and re-positioning  the  patient in bed or  व्हीलचेयर  , eating a balanced diet with adequate  प्रोटीन   और  keeping the skin free from  एक्सपोज़र  to  मूत्र  and stool is  बहुत  important .
The prevalence of pressure ulcers in hospital settings is high , but improvements are being made .
According to the  2010  IPUP (  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   दबाव  Ulcer Prevalence Survey ) conducted  in  Canada , there  थी  a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers were most commonly  पहचाना  at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however , heel ulcers were the most common facility-acquired location in the survey .
Overboard is a 1987 American romantic comedy film starring Goldie Hawn  और  Kurt Russell .
It was directed by Garry Marshall , produced by Roddy McDowell , and loosely inspired  by  the 1974 Italian film Swept Away .
In turn , Overboard  थी  adapted into the 2006 South Korean  टेलीविज़न  series , Couple or Trouble .
ग्रीन  Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown County in the U.S. state of Wisconsin  ,  located at the head  of  Green Bay , a sub-basin  of   झील  Michigan , at the mouth of  the  Fox River .
It has  an  elevation of above sea level and is located north of Milwaukee .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 104,057  at  the 2010 census .
It is the third-largest city in  the  state of  विस्कॉन्सिन  , after Milwaukee  और   मैडिसन  .
It  is  also the third-largest city on the west  shore  of Lake Michigan , after Chicago and Milwaukee .
Green Bay is home to the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League , making it by far the smallest metropolitan area in the USA to host a major professional sports franchise .
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay  महानगर  Statistical Area , which covers Brown , Kewaunee , and Oconto Counties and had a combined population  of  282,599 at the 2000 census .
Green Bay is an  औद्योगिक  city with several  meatpacking   और   पेपर  plants  ,  and a port on Green Bay , an arm of Lake Michigan that locals call the Bay of Green Bay , to avoid conflating it  साथ  the eponymous city .
It is home to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville Public Museum ,  साथ  exhibitions of art , history , and science ; and  the  University of Wisconsin–Green Bay .
Luteinizing  हार्मोन  ( LH ,  भी  known as  lutropin  and sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone produced by gonadotroph cells in the anterior pituitary gland .
In females , an  अधि  rise of LH ( `` LH  surge  '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the corpus luteum .
In males  ,  where LH had also been called interstitial cell-stimulating hormone  (  ICSH ) , it stimulates Leydig cell production  of  testosterone .
It acts  synergistically  with FSH .
Selena Quintanilla-Pérez  (  April 16 ,  1971  – March 31 , 1995 ) , known simply as Selena , was an American  singer-songwriter  .
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s ''  और  `` Best  selling  Latin artist of the decade '' by Billboard for her fourteen top-ten singles in the Top Latin Songs chart , including  सात   number-one  hits .
Selena had the most successful singles of 1994 and 1995 , `` Amor Prohibido `` and `` No Me Queda Más `` .
She was called `` The Queen  of  Tejano  म्यूज़िक   ``  and the  मैक्सिकन  equivalent of Madonna .
Selena released her first album , Selena y Los Dinos ,  at   the  age  of  twelve .
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano  म्यूज़िक  Awards and landed a recording contract  साथ  EMI a few years later .
Her fame grew throughout  the  early 1990s  ,  especially in Spanish-speaking  देशों  , and  वो  had begun recording in English as well .
Selena was murdered  at  the age of 23  on  March 31 , 1995 by Yolanda Saldívar , the former president of her fan club .
On April 12 , 1995  ,  two weeks  बाद  her death , George W. Bush , governor of Texas at the time , declared her birthday ``  सेलिना  Day '' in Texas .
Warner Bros.  उत्पादित  Selena , a film based  on  her  जीवन  starring Jennifer Lopez , in 1997  .
Selena 's life was also the basis of the musical Selena Forever starring Veronica Vazquez as  सेलिना  .
In June 2006  सेलिना  was commemorated with a  life-sized  bronze  प्रतिमा  ( Mirador de la Flor in Corpus Christi , Texas  )  and a Selena museum opened there .
She has sold over 60 million albums worldwide , making her one of the best-selling  कलाकारों  of all time .
She is also the only  मादा  artist to have five albums  in  U.S . Billboard 200 at  the   वही  time  .
German Stahlhelm from World War II
Insignia of the Bolivian Army Colorados regiment , showing a Stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm  (  plural , Stahlhelme ) is German for `` steel helmet '' .
The  इम्पीरियल  German Army began to replace the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) with the Stahlhelm during World War I in 1916 .
The  पद  Stahlhelm refers  दोनो  to a generic steel helmet , and more specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design .
The Stahlhelm , with its distinctive  ``  coal scuttle  ``  shape , was an instantly recognizable icon  लिये  military  imagery  and became  a  common element of military propaganda on both sides  ,  just like the Pickelhaube before it  .
Its name was also used by the Stahlhelm  ,  a paramilitary nationalist organization established at the end of 1918 .
Glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence , the production and emission of light by  a  living organism
Chemiluminescence , is  the  emission of light (  संदीप्ति  ) without emission of heat
Phosphorescence , a specific type  of  photoluminescence related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence , production of luminescence in a material by the bombardment of ionizing radiation
Glow in the Dark Tour , a 2008 concert tour  by   kanye  West
Frankfurt Airport serves  as  a  हब  city for Lufthansa and receives flights from Star Alliance carriers .
Airline hubs are airports ranked  as  large , medium , small , and  non-hubs  as one of the FAA airport categories which  हैं  re-evaluated every year based on number of commercial passengers .
the   अधिक  common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an airport that an airline uses as a transfer point to get passengers to  उनके  intended destination .
It  is  part  of  a hub and spoke model , where travelers moving between airports not served by direct  फ़्लाइट  change planes en route to their destinations .
This is as opposed to the Point to Point model .
Many hubs of the airlines are also situated at airports  in  the cities of  the  respective head  कार्यालयों  .
Some airlines may use  तभी  a single hub , while other airlines use multiple hubs .
Hubs  हैं  used for both passenger flights as well as cargo flights .
Many airlines also use  फ़ोकस  cities , which function  much  the  वही  as hubs .
एयरलाइंस  may also use secondary hubs  ,  a non-technical  पद  for large focus cities .
A hub in the middle  of  a  रूट  is more effective than at either end  as  connecting traffic more easily fills the  प्लेन  - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route .
Hollow Lacedaemon  .
Site  of  the Menelaion , the shrine to Helen and Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age city that  stood  on the hill of Therapne on the left  बैंको  of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta .
Across the valley the successive ridges  of  Mount Taygetus  हैं  in evidence .
Sparta  (  Doric Greek : ;  अटारी  Greek : ) , or Lacedaemon , was a prominent city-state in ancient  यूनानियों  , situated on the banks of the Eurotas River in Laconia , in south-eastern Peloponnese .
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th century BC , when the invading Dorians subjugated the local , non-Dorian population .
Around 650 BC  ,  it rose to become the dominant  सैन्य  land-power in ancient  यूनानियों  .
Given  इसके  military pre-eminence , Sparta was recognized  as  the overall leader of the combined Greek forces  दौरान  the Greco-Persian Wars .
between  431  और  404  bc  , Sparta was the principal enemy of Athens  दौरान  the  peloponnesian  War  ,  from  जिससे  it emerged victorious , though  at  great cost .
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of Leuctra  in  371  bc  ended Sparta 's prominent role in Greece .
However , it maintained its political independence  जबतक  the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC .
It then underwent a long period of decline , especially in the Middle Ages , when many Spartans moved to live in Mystras .
Modern Sparta is  the  capital of the Greek regional unit of Laconia and  a  center for the processing of goods such as citrus  और  olives .
Sparta was unique in ancient Greece for its social system and  संविधान  ,  जिससे  completely focused on military training and  excellence  .
Its inhabitants were classified  as  Spartiates (  spartan  citizens , who enjoyed full rights ) , Mothakes ( non-Spartan free men raised  as  Spartans  )  , Perioikoi  (  freedmen ) , and  helots  ( state-owned serfs , enslaved non-Spartan local population ) .
Spartiates underwent  the  rigorous agoge training and education regimen , and Spartan phalanges  यहूद  widely considered to be among the best in battle .
Spartan women enjoyed considerably more  अधिकारों  and equality to men than elsewhere in the classical  संसार  .
Sparta was the subject of fascination in its  अपना  day , as well as in the West following the revival of  शास्त्रीय  learning .
This love or admiration of Sparta is known  as  Laconism or Laconophilia .
Fantasy football  is  an interactive competition in which users compete against each other as general managers of virtual teams .
the  players that an  व्यक्तिगत  is able to manage  हैं  professional American  फ़ुटबॉल  players in the  नेशनल  Football League .
The different actions people are  समर्थ  to make are  drafting  , trading , adding or dropping players , and changing rosters .
due  to the growth of the Internet , Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity  ,  particularly because Fantasy football providers such as ESPN , Yahoo , CBS , and the NFL itself are able to keep track of  आंकडे   entirely  online , eliminating the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players .
Most leagues have a single week championship in Week 16 of the NFL  ऋतु  .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections (  रेड  , orange , green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black  )  .
Actual recorded population  आंकड़े   हैं  in blue .
According to  the  highest estimate  ,  the world population may rise to 16 billion by  2100  ; according to the lowest estimate , it may decline  to  6 billion .
The  संसार   जनसांख्यिकी  is  the  total number of  जीना  humans on Earth .
As of today ,  it  is estimated to  क्रमांक  billion by the United  राज्य  Census Bureau ( USCB  )  .
the  USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a  पृथक  estimate by the United Nations  जनसांख्यिकी  Fund , it reached this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has  अनुभवी  continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the  ब्लैक  Death in 1350 , when it stood  at  around 370 million .
The  उच्चतम   दरों  of growth – global population  increases  above 1.8 %  प्रति  year – were seen briefly during the  1950s  , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963  ,  and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births  यहूद  highest in the late 1980s at  परिचय  138  लाख  ,  और  are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million  ,  while deaths number 56 million per  साल  ,  और  are expected to increase  to  80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates  भविष्यवाणी  further growth , stagnation , or even  overall  decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some  विश्लेषकों  have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth , citing the growing pressures on  the  environment , global food supplies ,  और   उर्जा  resources  .
Skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This  is  a table  of  muscles of the human anatomy .
There  हैं  approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the  ठेठ  human , and almost every muscle constitutes one  भाग  of  a  pair of identical bilateral muscles , found  on  both sides , resulting in  लगभग  320 pairs of  मांसपेशियां  , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently , e.g . regarding what is defined  as  different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
Examples range from 640 to  850  .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into  a  number of groups which include muscles relating to the head and neck , muscles of the torso  or  trunk  ,  muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
the  action refers to the  कार्रवाई  of each muscle from the standard anatomical position .
In other positions , other actions may be performed .
A gold bar is a quantity of refined metallic gold of any shape that is made by a bar producer meeting standard conditions of manufacture , labeling , and record keeping .
Larger gold bars that are produced by pouring the  molten  metal into molds are  पुकारा  ingots .
छोटी  bars may be manufactured by  minting   or  stamping from appropriately rolled gold  चादरें  .
The standard gold bar held as gold reserves by central banks and traded among  bullion  dealers is  the  400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold bar .
the  kilobar , which is  to  say 1000 grams  in  mass , is the bar that is more manageable and is used extensively for trading and investment .
The premium on these bars when traded is very low over the spot value  of  the gold making it ideal for small transfers between  बैंको  and traders .
Most kilobars are  चपटा  , although some investors ,  विशेषकर  in Europe , prefer the brick shape .
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning  iii  ( born May  19  , 1949 ) is a former American football  क्वार्टरबैक  in the National Football League  ,  playing for the New  ऑरलियन्स  Saints from  1971   to  1982  ,  then for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings .
He is the father of current Denver Broncos  क्वार्टरबैक  Peyton Manning , current New York Giants  starting  quarterback Eli Manning , and  पूर्व   ओले  Miss  receiver  Cooper Manning .
Advocacy is a political  प्रक्रम  by an individual or group which  aims  to  influence  public-policy and resource allocation decisions  भीतर  political , economic , and social systems and institutions .
Advocacy can  शामिल  many activities that a person  or  organization undertakes  सहित  media campaigns , public speaking , commissioning  और  publishing research or polls or the filing of an amicus brief .
Lobbying (  प्रायः   by  lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy  जहाँ  a direct approach is made to legislators on an issue which  plays  a significant role in modern politics .
शोध  is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in the U.S. and Canada are using social media  to  facilitate civic engagement and collective action .
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish  :  Bandera de México ) is  a  vertical  तिरंगा  of green , white , and  रेड  with  the  national  कोट  of arms charged in  the  center of the white stripe .
While  the  meaning of  the  colors has changed over time , these  तीन  colors were  अपनाया  by Mexico following independence from Spain during  the  country 's War of Independence , and subsequent First Mexican Empire .
the  current flag was adopted in 1968 , but the overall design has been used since 1821 , when the First National Flag was created .
The current law of national symbols  ,   विधि  on the National Arms , Flag , and Anthem ,  कि  governs the use of the  नेशनल  flag has been in place since 1984 .
Red , white , and green are the colors of the national liberation army in Mexico .
The central emblem is the Aztec pictogram for Tenochtitlan ( now Mexico City ) , the center of their empire .
It recalls the legend that inspired the Aztecs to settle on what was originally a lake-island .
The form of the coat of arms was most recently revised in 1968 .
A ribbon in the national colors is at the bottom  of  the  कोट  of arms  .
Throughout history , the flag has changed four  टाइम्स  , as the design of the coat of arms and the length-width ratios of the flag  have   महरूम  modified .
However , the coat of arms has had the same features throughout : an eagle ,  पकड़कर  a serpent in its talon , is perched on  शीर्ष  of a prickly pear cactus ; the cactus is situated on a rock that rises above  a  lake .
The coat of arms is  निकला  from an Aztec legend that their gods told them  to  build  a   नगर   जहाँ  they spot an eagle on a nopal  खाने  a serpent ,  जिससे  is now Mexico City .
The current national flag ,  the  Fourth National Flag , is also used as the Mexican naval ensign by  जहाजों  registered in Mexico .
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town , city  ,  region , or country in order to increase the number of visitors .
it  promotes the  विकास  and marketing of a destination ,  focusing  on convention sales , tourism marketing , and services .
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination  by  increasing visits from tourists and  कारोबार  travelers , which generates overnight lodging for a destination , visits to restaurants , and shopping revenues .
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most important tourism  विपणन  organizations in  उनके  respective tourist  गंतव्यों  , as  वे  are directly responsible for  विपणन  the  गंतव्य  brand through travel and  पर्यटन  ``  उत्पाद  awareness '' to  विज़िटर  .
DMOs produce billions of dollars in direct and indirect  आय  and  कर  for their destinations ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise .
Destination marketing organizations are often called travel , convention , visitors ,  or  tourism  bureaux   ,  welcome centers , information centers and more .
Regardless of the name , these organizations offer many services to the traveling public  .
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis )  is  one of the largest species of deer in the world , and one of the largest land mammals in North America and eastern Asia .
It  थी  long believed to be a subspecies of the European red deer ( Cervus elaphus ) ,  लकिन  evidence from a 2004  पढ़ाई  of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that  the  two are distinct species .
This animal should not be confused with the  larger  moose ( Alces alces ) , to which the name `` elk  ''  applies in Eurasia .
Apart  इससे  the moose , the only other member of the deer family to rival the elk in  आकार  is  the  south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor  )  .
नीलगाय  range  in  forest  और  forest-edge habitat  ,  feeding on grasses , plants  ,  leaves  ,  and bark .
Although native to North America  और  eastern Asia , they have adapted well to countries where they have been introduced , including Argentina  ,  Australia  ,  and New Zealand .
Their great adaptability  may  threaten endemic species  और  ecosystems into which they have been introduced .
Male  नीलगाय  have large antlers which are shed each year .
Males also engage in ritualized mating behaviors during the rut , including posturing , antler wrestling ( sparring ) , and bugling , a loud series of vocalizations which establishes dominance over other males  और  attracts females .
Elk  हैं  susceptible to a number of infectious diseases , some of  जिससे   can  be transmitted to livestock .
Efforts to  eliminate  infectious diseases from elk populations , largely through vaccination , have had mixed success .
Some cultures revere the elk as  a  spiritual force .
In parts of Asia , antlers  और   उनके  velvet are used in traditional medicines .
नीलगाय  are  hunted  as a game  प्रजाति  ; the meat is leaner and higher in protein than beef or chicken .
The George Washington University ( GW , GWU , or George Washington )  is  a comprehensive private , coeducational research university located  in  Washington , D.C. .
It awards certificates , Bachelor degrees , Masters degrees , and PhDs across several dozen disciplines .
the  university was chartered by  an  Act of Congress  on  February 9 , 1821 as The Columbian  कॉलेज  in the District of Columbia .
The  शेर   (  Panthera leo ) is one of the four big cats in the genus Panthera and a  सदस्य  of the family Felidae .
साथ  some males exceeding in weight , it is the second-largest  जीना  cat after the tiger .
जंगली  lions currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in Gir Forest National Park in India  )  while other types of lions have disappeared from North Africa and Southwest Asia  in  historic times .
Until  the  late Pleistocene , about 10,000 years ago , the lion  थी  the most widespread large land mammal after humans .
They were found  in  most of Africa , across Eurasia  इससे  western Europe to India , and in the Americas from  the  Yukon to Peru .
The lion is a vulnerable species , having seen a major population decline of 30–50 % over the past  दो  decades in its African range .
Lion populations are untenable outside designated reserves  और  national parks .
Although the cause of the decline is not fully understood ,  आवास  loss and conflicts with humans are currently the greatest causes of concern .
Within Africa , the West African lion population is particularly endangered .
Lions live for  10–14  years in the wild , while in captivity they can live longer than 20 years .
In the wild , males seldom live longer than 10 years , as injuries  sustained  from continual fighting with rival males greatly reduce their longevity .
They typically inhabit savanna and  घासभूमि  , although they may take to bush and forest .
शेर  are unusually social compared to  अन्य   बिल्लियों  .
A pride of lions  consists  of related females and offspring and a small number of adult males .
Groups of female lions typically hunt together , preying mostly on large ungulates .
Lions are apex and  keystone  predators , although they scavenge as opportunity allows .
While lions do  नहीं  typically hunt humans , some have  महरूम  known to do so .
Sleeping mainly during the day , lions are primarily nocturnal , although bordering on crepuscular in nature .
Highly  distinctive  , the male lion is easily recognised by its mane , and its face is one of the most widely recognised animal symbols in human culture .
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period , with carvings and paintings from the Lascaux and  chauvet  Caves , through virtually all ancient and medieval cultures where they  एकबार  occurred .
It has been extensively depicted in sculptures , in paintings , on national flags , and in contemporary films and literature .
Lions have been  रखा  in menageries since the time of the Roman Empire  ,  and have been a key species  sought   लिये  exhibition in zoos over the world  चूंकि  the late 18th century .
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in breeding programs for the endangered Asiatic subspecies .
In  the  history of video games , the seventh generation of consoles is the previous generation  ,  and includes consoles released since late by Nintendo , Microsoft , and Sony .
For home consoles , the seventh generation began on 22 November 2005  साथ  the release of Xbox 360 and continued with the release of PlayStation 3 on 11 November 2006  ,  and Wii on 19 November 2006 .
Each new console introduced  a  new type of breakthrough in  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions , the PlayStation 3 offered , in addition to FHD gaming , HD movie playback  via  a built-in  3d  Blu-ray Disc player , and the Wii focused on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks .
joining  Nintendo in the motion market , Sony released the PlayStation Move in September 2010  .
The PlayStation Move  सुविधाएँ  motion sensing gaming  ,  similar to that of  the  Wii .
microsoft  also joined Sony and Nintendo , with its Kinect .
Unlike the other two systems ( PlayStation 3  और  Wii ) , Kinect does not use any controllers of  कोई   sort  and  makes  the users the `` controller . ''
Having sold 8 million units in  इसके   पहला  60 days on the  मार्केट  , Kinect has claimed the Guinness World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device '' .
While the Xbox 360 offers wired controllers  as  a standalone product , all  प्लेस्टेशन  3 controllers can  be  used in wired and wireless configurations .
Starting with handheld consoles , the  सातवाँ  generation began on 21 November 2004 with the North American introduction of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar '' , alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles .
The Nintendo DS  (  NDS ) features a touch screen and  built-in  microphone ,  और   supports  wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards .
Additionally , the  संशोधित  version  of  the NDS , the DSi  ,  features two built in cameras , the ability to download games from the DSi store ,  और  a  वेब  browser .
The PlayStation Portable , or  psp  , released later the same year  on  12 December 2004 , followed a different pattern .
It became  the  first handheld  वीडियो  game console to  उपयोग  an optical disc format , Universal Media Disc ( UMD ) , as its primary  भंडार  media .
Sony also  दिया  the PSP robust multi-media  काबिलियत  , connectivity with the PlayStation 3  और  other PSPs , and Internet connectivity .
The Nintendo DS likewise has connectivity to  the  internet through the Nintendo  wi-fi  Connection and  निन्टेंडो   ds  Browser , as well as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii  consoles  .
Despite high sales numbers for  दोनो  consoles , PlayStation Portable sales have  consistently  lagged behind those of the  निन्टेंडो  DS ; nevertheless , the PlayStation Portable has the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system .
Sgt . Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club  बैंड   (  often shortened to Sgt . Pepper ) is the eighth studio album by English rock band the Beatles .
released  in June 1967 , the album included songs such as `` With a Little Help from My Friends `` , `` Lucy  in  the Sky with Diamonds ``  ,  and `` A Day in the Life `` .
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ) , Sgt . Pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock idiom of  the   समय  and incorporated balladry , psychedelic , music hall , and symphonic influences .
During the Sgt . Pepper sessions , the group improved upon the quality of their music 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques .
Producer George Martin 's innovative approach included the use of an orchestra .
Widely acclaimed and imitated , the album cover , designed by English pop  कलाकारों   पीटर  Blake and Jann Haworth , was inspired  by  a sketch by Paul McCartney that depicted the band posing in front  of  a collage  of  some of their favourite celebrities .
Sgt . Pepper was a worldwide  नाजुक  and commercial success , spending 27 weeks at the top of the UK Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200 .
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic rock style , the album was critically acclaimed upon release and won  चार  Grammy Awards in 1968 .
With an estimated 32 million copies sold , it is  एक  of  the  world 's best selling albums .
Sgt  .  Pepper is considered by many to be the  सबसे  influential and famous rock  एल्बम  ever , and has been named the greatest album  of  all time by both All  समय  Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone .
The temporal lobe is a region  of  the cerebral cortex that is located beneath the lateral fissure on both cerebral hemispheres  of  the mammalian brain .
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories , processing  संवेदी  input , comprehending language  ,  storing new memories , emotion , and deriving meaning .
The human lungs are the  अंगों  of  श्वसन  in humans .
Humans have two lungs , a right lung and a left lung .
The right lung consists  of  three lobes while the left lung is slightly smaller consisting of only two lobes ( the left lung has a `` cardiac notch '' allowing  स्पेस   लिये  the heart  भीतर  the  छाती  ) .
Together , the lungs contain approximately of airways  और  300 to 500 million alveoli  ,  having  a  total surface area of about (  )  in adults — roughly  the   वही  area as one side of a tennis court .
Furthermore , if  सब  of the capillaries that surround  the  alveoli were unwound and laid end to end , they  होता  extend for about  .
Each lung weighs  ,  therefore making the  संपूर्ण  organ about .
Human lungs
The trachea divides into two bronchi ( one for each side ) at the level of T4 .
This junction is also  ज्ञात  as the carina .
The conducting zone contains the trachea , the bronchi , the bronchioles , and the terminal bronchioles The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles ,  the  alveolar  नलिकाएं  , and the alveoli .
the   conducting  zone  और  the respiratory stuffers (  लकिन  not the alveoli  )  are made up of airways .
The conducting zone has no gas exchange  साथ  the blood , and is reinforced with cartilage in order to hold open the airways .
The conducting zone warms  the  air to and humidifies the air .
It also cleanses the air by removing particles via cilia located  on  the walls of all the passageways .
The lungs are surrounded by the rib cage .
The  respiratory  zone is the  साईट  of gas exchange with blood  .
The sympathetic nervous system via noradrenaline  एक्टिंग   on  the beta receptors causes bronchodilation .
The parasympathetic nervous system  via   acetylcholine  , which acts on  the  M-3  muscarinic  receptors , maintains the resting tone of  the  bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This action is related  ,  although considered  पृथक   इससे  bronchoconstriction .
Many other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli , including carbon  डाइऑक्साइड  and oxygen , are also involved in the regulation process .
The pleural cavity is  the  potential space  between  the parietal  pleura  , lining the inner wall of the  thoracic  cage , and the  visceral  pleura lining the lungs .
the  lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar tissue with respiratory bronchioles  ,  alveolar ducts and terminal bronchioles .
However , it often includes any form of lung tissue ,  भी  including bronchioles , bronchi , blood vessels and lung  interstitium   .
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila mixed with Cointreau or similar orange -flavoured liqueur and lime or lemon juice , often served  साथ  salt on the glass rim .
It is  the  most common  tequila-based  cocktail  in  the United States .
the   पेय  is  परोसा  shaken with ice  (  on the rocks ) , blended with ice ( frozen  मार्गरिटा  )  ,  or without ice ( straight up ) .
Two bottles of red Burgundy wine  इससे  Gevrey-Chambertin ,  côtes  de Nuits
Burgundy is a dark red color associated  साथ  the Burgundy wine of the same name , which in turn is named after the Burgundy region of France .
The color burgundy is similar to other  शेड्स  of dark red such as maroon .
जब  referring to the color  ,  `` burgundy '' is usually not capitalized .
The first recorded use of `` burgundy  ''  as a  रंग  name in English was  in  1881  .
Grave of  an  unknown  अंग्रेजों   सिपाही  , killed in  1943  during the Battle of Leros .
Because his identity is unknown  ,  he is missing in action .
