Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned under the Status of Missing to armed services personnel who are reported missing during active service .
They may have been killed ,  wounded  ,  become  a prisoner of  युद्ध  , or deserted .
If deceased ,  neither  their remains nor grave  can  be positively identified .
Becoming MIA has been an occupational risk for service personnel for as long as there has been warfare .
Chamber of Commerce Building in Center .
This building is the original jail , built along with the Historic Courthouse .
Both sit on the Town Square .
The  रिओ  Theater in Center
पहला  Baptist Church  at  117  कोरा  Street in Center is located next to the downtown section .
First Christian Church at 124 Cora Street in Center is one of the oldest congregations in the  जातियाँ  .
बीच  is  a  city in Shelby County , Texas  ,  United States .
The population  थी  5,193  at  the 2010 census .
It is the county seat of Shelby County .
It  is  named for its location near the  बीच   of  Shelby County , not for its location in Texas as it  is  located  निकट  the Louisiana border .
Intense red-eye effect in blue eyes with dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common appearance of red pupils in color photographs of eyes .
It  occurs   जब   using  a photographic flash  बहुत  close to the camera lens ( as with  सबसे  compact cameras ) , in ambient low light .
The effect appears in the eyes of humans and animals that have tapetum lucidum .
Theatrical followspot operators , positioned nearly coincidentally with  a  very bright light and somewhat distant from the actors , occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage .
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience because it is reliant on the  बहुत  small angle between the  followspot  operator  और  the light .
The University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,   सांता  Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC Santa Barbara or UCSB ) is a public research university and one of the  टेन  general campuses of the University of California system .
The main campus is located on a site in Goleta ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States , from Santa Barbara and northwest  of  Los Angeles .
Tracing its  जड़ें   वापस  to 1891 as an  स्वतंत्र  teachers ' college , UCSB joined  the  University of California system in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education campus in the system .
UCSB is  एक  of America 's Public Ivy universities , which recognizes  शीर्ष  public research universities in the United States .
The university is a comprehensive doctoral university and  is  organized into five colleges and schools offering 87  undergraduate  degrees and 55 graduate degrees .
The campus is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment with 18,977 undergraduate and 2,950 graduate students .
In 2012 , UCSB was ranked 41st  among  `` National Universities ''  और  10th among public universities  by   u.S.  News &  संसार  Report .
The university was  भी  ranked 35th worldwide by the Times Higher Education World University Rankings and 34th worldwide ( 6th worldwide for engineering ) by the Academic Ranking of World Universities in  2012.  < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 ''  >
uc  Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity '' research university and spent  $  191.2 million on research expenditures in  the  2007 fiscal year , 97th-largest in the United States .
UCSB houses twelve national research centers  ,  including the renowned Kavli  संस्थान  for Theoretical Physics .
UCSB faculty  शामिल  five Nobel Prize laureates , one Fields Medalist , 29 members of  the  National Academy of Sciences ,  27  members of the National Academy of Engineering  ,  and 31 members  of  the American Academy of Arts and Sciences .
UCSB was  the   no  . 3 host on the ARPAnet and was elected to the Association of  अमरीकी  Universities in 1995 .
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos compete  in  the NCAA Division I Big West Conference .
The Gauchos have won NCAA national championships in men 's soccer and men 's water polo .
Saint Joseph with the Infant Jesus by Guido Reni
Saint Joseph  's  Day , March  19  , the Feast of St. Joseph is in Western Christianity the principal feast day of Saint  जोसेफ  , Spouse  of  the Blessed Virgin Mary  .
He is  भी  the step-father of Jesus of Nazareth /Jesus Christ  .
It has the rank of a solemnity  in  the Roman Catholic Church ; Catholics who follow the Missal of 1962 celebrate it as  a  first class feast .
Previous to 1962 it was celebrated  as  a feast of the rank of  दोगुना  of the first class .
It is a feast or commemoration in  the  provinces  of  the Anglican Communion , and a feast or festival in the Lutheran  गिरिजाघर  .
Saint  जोसेफ  's  दिन   is  the Patronal Feast day for Poland  as  well as for Canada , persons named Joseph , Josephine , etc. , for  धार्मिक  institutes , schools and parishes bearing his name , and for carpenters  .
It is  भी  Father 's Day in some Catholic countries , mainly  स्पेन  , Portugal , and Italy  .
March 19 was dedicated to Saint Joseph in several Western calendars by the tenth century , and  इस  custom was established in Rome by 1479 .
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the entire Roman Rite by  उसके  Apostolic Constitution Quo Primum ( July 14  ,  1570 ) .
Since 1969 , Episcopal Conferences may , if they wish , transfer it to a  तिथि  outside Lent .
Between  1870   और  1955  ,  a feast was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph  as  Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of  the  Universal Church , the latter title having been  दिए  to him by Pope Pius IX  .
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after Easter with an octave , after Divino Afflatu of St. Pius X  (   देखिए  Reform of the Roman Breviary by Pope Pius X ) , it was moved to  the  preceding Wednesday .
the   feast  was also retitled The  solemnity  of Saint Joseph .
This celebration and its accompanying octave was abolished during the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955 .
It is still maintained  by  Catholics who follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals .
As the traditional holiday  of   the  Apostles Ss . Philip and James , May 1 , had faded from the  मेमोरी   of  most Catholics by the mid-twentieth century ,  कि  of Joseph the Worker was created  in  order to coincide with  the  celebration of international Labour  दिन  ( May Day ) in many countries .
The feast of Ss . Philip and  जेम्स  , which had been celebrated  on   कि  date since the sixth century , was moved from its traditional place .
In the new calendar published in 1969 , the feast , which at one time occupied the highest possible  रैंक  in the Church calendar , was reduced  to  an  वैकल्पिक  Memorial , the lowest rank for a saint 's day .
The Eastern Orthodox Church celebrates Saint Joseph on the  संडे  after Christmas .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an American singer , songwriter , record producer , actress , and philanthropist .
Under the guidance of  कोलंबिया  Records executive Tommy Mottola , Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and  शाखित  four consecutive number one singles on the  u.s  . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following  उसके  marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions  (  1991 ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) , and Merry  क्रिसमस   (   1994  ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 )  बना  music history when its second single `` One Sweet  दिन  `` , a duet with Boyz II Men ,  खर्च   a  record sixteen weeks on  शीर्ष  of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in  u.S.  chart history .
During the recording  of   the  album , Carey  began  to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became evident with the release of  तितली  ( 1997  )  , at which time Carey had  अलग  from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 , and signed a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records .
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ) ,  वो   suffered  a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized  लिये  severe exhaustion .
Following  the  film 's poor reception , she  थी  bought out of  उसके  recording contract for $ 50 million , which led to a decline in her career .
She signed a  multi-million   डालर  contract deal with Island Records in 2002 , and after an unsuccessful period  ,  returned to the top of  म्यूज़िक   चार्ट  with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong  साथ  `` became her  सबसे  successful single of the 2000s , and was  बाद  named `` Song of the Decade  ''   by  Billboard .
Carey once again  ventured  into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was  awarded  the  ``  Breakthrough Performance  पुरस्कार  '' at the Palm Springs  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career spanning over two decades , Carey has  बेची  more than 200 million records worldwide , making  उसके  one of the best-selling music  कलाकारों  of all time .
In 1998 ,  वो  was honored as the  संसार  's best-selling  रिकॉर्डिंग  artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards  .
Carey  थी  also named the  best-selling  female artist of the  मिलेनियम  in 2000 .
According to  the   रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry Association  of  America , she is the third best-selling female artist in the United States ,  साथ  63.5 million  certified  albums .
With the release of ``  टच  My Body ``  (  2008 ) , Carey gained her eighteenth number one single in the United States , more than any other solo artist .
in  2012 , Carey was ranked second on  vh1  's list of the  ``  100 Greatest Women in Music  ''   .
Aside from her commercial accomplishments , Carey has won five Grammy Awards , 17 World Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards  ,  and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to  as  the ``  songbird  supreme '' by the Guinness World Records , she is  famed  for her five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use  of   the  whistle register  .
A bumblebee is any member of the bee genus Bombus , in the family Apidae .
There are over 250 known species , existing primarily in the Northern Hemisphere although they also occur in South America .
They have  महरूम  introduced to New Zealand and the Australian state of Tasmania .
Bumblebees are social insects that are  characterised  by black and yellow body hairs  ,  often in bands .
However , some species have orange or red on their bodies , or may be entirely  ब्लैक  .
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the soft  प्रकृति  of the hair ( long , branched setae )  ,  called pile , that covers their entire body , making them appear and feel fuzzy .
They are best distinguished from similarly large ,  फजी  bees by the form of the female hind leg , which is  परिवर्धित  to form a corbicula :  a  shiny  concave  surface that is bare ,  लकिन  surrounded by a fringe of hairs used to transport pollen ( in similar bees ,  the  hind leg is completely hairy , and pollen grains are wedged into the hairs for transport )  .
Like their relatives the honey bees , bumblebees feed on nectar  और  gather pollen to feed their  यंग  .
A man openly carrying a handgun in a Burger King in Eagle ,  कोलोराडो   .
In the United States , open carry is shorthand terminology for ``  खुलकर  carrying a firearm in public '' , as distinguished from concealed carry , where firearms can not be seen by the casual observer .
The practice of open carry ,  जहाँ  gun owners openly carry firearms while they go about their daily business , has seen  an  increase in the U.S. in recent years .
This has been marked by a  क्रमांक  of organized events intended to increase the visibility of open carry and public awareness about the  अभ्यास  .
Proponents  of   खोलें  carry point to history and statistics , noting that criminals usually  छिपाते   उनके   हथियार  .
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org , GeorgiaCarry.org and some participants of the Free  राज्य  Project , open carry has seen a revival in recent years , but it is not yet clear if this represents  बस  a short-term trend  .
The gun rights community has been mixed in its response .
Alan  gottlieb  of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA  have  been cautious in expressing support , while special-interest  समूह  such as the  aforementioned  OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org , and certain national groups such  as  the Gun Owners of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice  .
खोलें  carry is strongly opposed by gun control groups such as the Brady Campaign and the Coalition to Stop  गन  Violence .
The Cattenom  नाभिकीय  Power Plant in France .
France produces around three quarters of its electricity by nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant in Germany .
Chancellor Angela  मार्केल  's coalition announced on May 30 , 2011 , that Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022 , in a policy reversal following  जापानी  's  फुकुशिमा  Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors are under construction in 15 countries .
Nuclear power stations operate in thirty countries .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear  विपत्ति  , it was reported that an average of  परिचय  10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year , although according to the World  नाभिकीय  Association , of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As of June 2011 , Germany and Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power  .
as   of   जून  2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark , Greece , Ireland ,  इटली   ,  Latvia , Liechtenstein , Luxembourg , Malaysia , Malta , New  जीलैंड  , Norway and Portugal  remain  opposed  to  nuclear power .
Color motion  चित्र   फिल्मी   refers  both to unexposed color photographic film in a format suitable for use in a motion picture camera  ,  and to finished motion picture film , ready for  उपयोग  in a projector , which  bears  images  in  color  .
The  पहला  color cinematography was by means of additive color systems such as the one patented in England by Edward  रेमंड  Turner in  1899  and tested in 1902  .
A simplified additive  प्रणाली  was developed by George Albert Smith and successfully commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor .
These early systems used black-and-white film  to  photograph and project two or more component images through different color filters .
Still  इससे  footage recorded by  एडवर्ड  Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology , there are two distinct processes :  eastman  Color Negative 2 chemistry ( camera negative  स्टॉक्स  , duplicating interpositive  और  internegative stocks ) and Eastman Color Positive 2 chemistry ( positive prints for direct projection  )  , usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
Fuji 's  उत्पाद  are compatible with ECN-2  और  ECP-2 .
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13 ,  1980  ) is an American singer-songwriter , record producer , and actress .
Ashanti is most famous  लिये  her eponymous debut album , which  प्रदर्शित  the hit song `` Foolish `` , and sold over 503,000 copies in its first week of release throughout the  u.S.  in April 2002 .
The album set a Soundscan record as the biggest opening week sales for a new female artist , outselling debuts by Alicia  कुंजियाँ  and Lauryn Hill .
In the same  सप्ताह  , she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two places  on  the Billboard Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '' , and `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with Fat  जो  ) .
Ashanti broke records again  by  having  तीन  top ten songs , `` Foolish , '' `` What 's Luv ? '' and `` Always on Time  ``  , on the Billboard Hot  100  charts in the same week , being the first woman to accomplish this feat and being second only  to  the Beatles .
In 2003 , the self-titled  डेब्यू  album won Ashanti her first Grammy Award for Best Contemporary R  &  B album .
As of April 1st 2013 , Ashanti has sold over 27.7 million records worldwide .
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the third top new R & B artist behind Alicia Keys and  बेयोंस  .
She also ended the decade at number 38 on the Top Artist of the Decade list  .
She is currently on the list of The Twenty Best Selling Music Singles Since 1990 for her single Foolish for selling 7.2 million copies to-date .
Ashanti has an estimated net worth of $ 40 million dollars [ USD ] .
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It Funny ( Murder Remix ) `` , which reached number one on  बिलबोर्ड  Hot  100   ,  which was also in the top 10 chart  at  the same  समय  as `` Foolish '' , `` Always on Time '' ( with Ja Rule )  ,  and `` What 's Luv '' ( with  मोटे  Joe ) .
Later that year  ,  she was acclaimed as the `` Princess Of Hip-Hop & R & B '' by  उसके  label and capped  बंद  her successful  डेब्यू  by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards .
Within seven years of Ashanti 's career , she has scored 16 top 40 hits on the Hot 100 .
Ashanti has endorsed numerous products including Gap , Herbal Essences and Mudd Jeans  .
ashanti  cites Whitney Houston  ,  Janet Jackson , Prince , Madonna  ,  Tupac Shakur , Mary J. Blige , Ella Fitzgerald , Smokey  रॉबिन्सन  , Donna Summer , and Blue Magic as her musical influences .
Praised  as  a gifted songwriter by her peers and critics  alike  , Ashanti has written/co-written the  बल्क  of all her  म्यूज़िक  .
She is currently working on her own  प्रकाशन  company entitled Written Entertainment .
She released her fourth studio album  हकदार  The Declaration on June 3 , 2008 and is  फिलहाल  in the  स्टुडियो  working  on  her fifth .
She also performed the charity  धुन  `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other female singers for  the   ``  Stand Up to  कर्कट  '' live television special which helped raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research .
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or AAF  )  was the military aviation arm of the United States of America  दौरान  and  तत्काल  after World War II , and the direct predecessor of the  संयुक्त  States Air Force .
the  AAF was a component of the United  राज्य  Army , which in 1942 was divided functionally by executive order into three autonomous forces : the  फौज  Ground Forces , the  सेवाएं  of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ) , and the AAF .
Each of these forces had a commanding general  जो  reported directly  to  the Chief of Staff of the United States Army  .
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation formerly distributed among the Army Air Corps , General  मुख्यालय  Air Force , and ground forces corps area commanders , and thus became the  पहला  air organization  of  the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel .
In practice , the AAF was virtually autonomous inside the Army .
The  शिखर  size of the AAF  थी  over 2.4 million men and women in service and nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944 , and 783 domestic bases in December 1943 .
By VE Day it had 1.25 million men stationed overseas and operated from more than 1,600 airfields worldwide .
The Air Corps became the  फौज  Air Forces in June 1941  to  provide the air arm a greater autonomy in which to  विस्तार  more efficiently , and  to  provide a structure for the additional command echelons  जरूरी  by a vastly  increased   फ़ोर्स  .
Although other nations already had separate air forces independent  of  the army  or  navy ( such as the British Royal Air Force and the German Luftwaffe ) , the AAF  remained   a   भाग  of the United  राज्य  Army until the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947 .
However , in its expansion and conduct  of  the war , the AAF became more than just an arm of the greater  संगठन  .
By the end of  संसार  War II the AAF had become virtually an independent service .
By regulation and executive order , the AAF was a subordinate agency of the War Department tasked only with organizing , training , and equipping combat units , limited in responsibility to the continental United  राज्य  , as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces .
In reality  ,   मुख्यालय  AAF controlled the conduct of  सब  aspects  of  the air war in every part of the world , determining air policy and issuing orders  बगैर  transmitting them through the Chief of Staff .
This `` contrast between theory and  फैक्ट  is ... fundamental to an understanding of the AAF . ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of information law that allows for the  पूरा   or  partial disclosure of previously unreleased information  और  documents  नियंत्रित   by   the  United States government .
The Act defines agency records subject  to   प्रकटीकरण  , outlines mandatory disclosure procedures and grants nine exemptions to the statute .
It was originally signed into law by President Lyndon B. Johnson , despite his misgivings , on July 4 , 1966 as  और  went into effect the  following  year .
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act should not be  उलझन  with the different and varying Freedom of Information Acts passed  by  the individual states  .
Many  of  those state acts may be similar but not identical to the federal act .
The European  संघ  ( EU ) is an economic and political union of 27 member states that are located primarily in Europe .
The  eu  operates through a system of supranational independent institutions  और  intergovernmental negotiated decisions by the member states .
Institutions of the  eu   शामिल   the  European Commission , the  परिषद   of  the European Union  ,  the European Council , the Court of Justice of the European  संघ  , the European Central  बैंको  , the Court of Auditors , and the European Parliament .
The European  पार्लियामेंट  is elected every five years by EU citizens .
The EU 's de facto capital is Brussels .
The EU traces its  origins  from  the   यूरोपीय  Coal  और  Steel Community ( ECSC ) and the European Economic Community ( EEC ) , formed by the Inner Six countries in  1951  and 1958 respectively .
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in size by the accession of new member states and in power  by  the addition of policy areas to its remit .
The Maastricht Treaty established the European Union under its current name  in  1993 .
The latest major amendment to  the  constitutional basis  of  the EU  ,   the  Treaty of Lisbon , came into force in 2009  .
The EU  रै  developed a  सिंगल   मार्केट  through a standardised system of laws that apply in  सब   सदस्य  states .
Within the Schengen Area (  जिससे  includes 22 EU and 4 non-EU  राज्य  ) passport controls  have  been abolished .
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people , goods , services , and capital , enact legislation in justice and home affairs , and maintain common policies on trade , agriculture , fisheries  और  regional development .
A monetary union , the eurozone , was established in 1999 and is composed of 17  सदस्य  states .
Through the Common Foreign and  सुरक्षा  Policy the EU has developed a role  in  external relations  और  defence  .
Permanent  राजनयिक  missions have been established around the world  .
The EU is represented at the United Nations  ,  the WTO , the G8 and the G-20 .
With a  संयुक्त  population of over 500 million inhabitants , or 7.3 % of the world population ,  the  EU , in 2012 , generated a nominal gross domestic  उत्पाद  ( GDP  )  of 16.584 trillion US dollars , representing approximately 20 % of the global GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity , and represents the largest nominal  जीडीपी  and GDP PPP in the world .
The EU was the recipient of the 2012 Nobel Peace Prize .
The Wales national rugby league team  represent  Wales  in  international  रग्बी  league football matches .
Currently the team is seventh in the RLIF World Rankings .
The team were run under the auspices of the Rugby Football League , but an independent body , Wales  रग्बी   लीग   ,  now  रनों   the   टोली  from Cardiff .
A total of  तीन  Welsh players have been entered into the Rugby League Hall Of Fame .
समान  to many other Welsh national sporting  टीमों  , Wales strip has been primarily red for many years , including now .
However in their last  संसार   कप  campaign in 2000 they did  पहनें  a shirt featuring the Welsh flag , adding a touch of green and  श्वेत  .
The team is known as `` The Dragons '' and so the teams  लोगो  on the shirt is  a  red dragon .
The team date back to 1907 , making them the third oldest national side  बाद  England and  नई  Zealand .
And it was a touring New Zealand side that Wales first played against in 1908 , winning 9-8 at  aberdare  .
Since then Wales have  regularly  played England , since  1935  France , as well as  सत्कार  the touring Australia and New Zealand teams ,  हालांकि  they rarely toured themselves ,  नहीं  playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975 .
For  twenty-six  years Wales competed against their two biggest rivals , England and France , in the European Nations Cup , winning the trophy four  टाइम्स  .
Wales have also competed in the World Cup  on   तीन  occasions  ,  the first time being in 1975 .
In 1995  और   2000  they had their most successful tournaments to date ,  surprisingly  making the Semi-Finals on both occasions before being beaten by England and Australia respectively .
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup  ,  being the second highest ranked side not to do so , having  खोया  to Scotland on points difference over two matches .
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new head coach and appointed Lee Briers as captain ,  having  played  लिये  Wales since  1998  .
In recent seasons Wales have taken  विशाल  strides under former player Iestyn  हैरिस  who has coached Wales to back to back European Cup successes , which culminated in a Four Nations appearance  in  2011 .
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the  myocardium  ( the heart muscle ) for any reason , usually leading to heart failure ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and  परिधीय  edema (  सूजन  of the legs )  .
People with cardiomyopathy  हैं  often at risk of dangerous forms of irregular  दिल  beat and sudden cardiac death .
the  most common form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy .
Fuck in its  शाब्दिक  meaning refers to the act of sexual  मैथुन  .
It is an English word that is  प्रायः  used as a profanity ,  either  to denote disdain or as  an  intensifier .
The origin  of  the word is obscure .
It is usually considered to be first attested  to  around 1475 , but it may be  considerably  older .
In modern usage , fuck  और  its derivatives  (  such as  कमीने  and  fucking  ) can be used in the position of a noun , a verb , an adjective or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the word , as well as a number of compounds incorporating it ,  ऐसे  as motherfucker .
Note : this article adopts the  u.S.  Department of Transportation 's definition of  a  passenger vehicle , to mean a car or truck , used for passengers , excluding buses and trains .
The United States is home to the largest passenger vehicle market of any country in the  संसार  .
Overall , there were an estimated 254.4 million registered passenger vehicles  in  the United States  according  to a 2007 DOT study .
This number , along with the average age of vehicles , has increased steadily since 1960 , indicating a  growing  number of vehicles per capita .
The Chinese car market , however  ,  is poised to  जल्द  exceed the  संयुक्त  States ; by  the  end of 2012 , there were over 240  लाख  cars  on  the road in China .
The United States is also home to three large vehicle  निर्माताओं  : General Motors , Ford Motor Company and Chrysler , which have  historically  been referred to as the `` Big Three . ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the top three ;  लकिन   is  number five , behind Toyota and  होंडा  .
The motor car has clearly become an integral part of American life , with vehicles outnumbering  licensed  drivers .
Clinical laboratory in a Hospital setting showing several automated analysers .
A medical laboratory or clinical laboratory is a laboratory where tests are done on clinical  नमूनों  in order to get information about the health of  a  patient as pertaining to the diagnosis , treatment  ,  and prevention  of  disease  .
In poker  ,  players  construct  hands of five cards according to predetermined rules , which vary according  to  which variant of poker is being played .
These  हैंड्स  are compared using a hand ranking system  कि  is  मानक  across all variants of poker , the player with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular  सौदे  in most variants of  पोकर   .
In some variants  ,  the lowest-ranking hand can win or tie  .
These hand rankings  हैं  also used in some other card  खेल  , and in poker  dice   .
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by including multiple cards of the same card rank , by  सब  five cards being from the  वही  suit , or  by  all five cards being of consecutive rank .
The relative ranking of the various hand categories is  आधारित   on   the  probability of being randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck .
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23  ,  1954 ) is an American virtuoso ; a singer , pianist , synthesizer , accordion , and dulcimer player , and songwriter .
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances , Hornsby draws frequently  इससे  classical  ,  jazz , bluegrass , folk , Motown , gospel , rock , blues , and jam band musical traditions with his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within .
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a number of occasions with industry awards  ,   सहित  the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 with Bruce Hornsby and the Range , the Best  ब्लूग्रास  Recording Grammy in 1990 , and the Best Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993 .
Hornsby has  भी  achieved recognition for his solo albums and performances , his  touring  band Bruce Hornsby  और  the Noisemakers , his bluegrass project with Ricky Skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician .
He also collaborated with  आभारी  Dead and was a member of the band from September 1990  to  March 1992 , playing at over one  सौ  shows  दौरान  that  काल  .
Sugarcane  वृक्षारोपण  in rural Cuba
Agriculture in Cuba has played an  महत्वपूर्ण  part in the economy for several hundred years .
Agriculture contributes less than  10  percent to the gross domestic  उत्पाद   (  GDP ) , but it employs roughly 20 percent of  the  working population .
About 30 percent of the  देश  's land is used for crop cultivation .
The inefficient agricultural industry in Cuba has led to the need to import large amounts of foods .
क्यूबा   अभी  imports about 80 % of the food it rations to the public .
The rationing  कार्यक्रम   खाते  for about  a  third of the  खाना  energy the average Cuban consumes .
Overall , however , Cuba is dependent on imports for only 16  %  of  इसके  food .

Mega Millions ( initially called The Big Game Mega Millions as the successor of The Big Game ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game .
the   पहला  ( The Big  खेल  )  आचमन  Millions drawing was in 2002 ( see  नीचे  ) .
The minimum  आचमन  Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000 , paid in 26 equal  वार्षिक  installments (  जबतक   the  cash option is chosen ) ;  प्रायः  , the  जैकपॉट  increases when there is no top-prize winner .
However  ,  despite no jackpot winner for the $ 12,000,000 December 18 , 2012 drawing  ,  the jackpot  remained  at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21 .
( See below for information on how the game 's  जैकपॉट  is funded . )
Reflecting common practice  among  American lotteries  ,  the jackpot  is  advertised  as  a nominal value of annual installments .
A cash value option ( the usual choice ) , when chosen  by   a  jackpot winner ( see  नीचे  ) , pays the approximate present value of the installments  .
Mega Millions currently  उपयोग  a  5/56  ( white balls ) plus 1/46  (  the Mega Ball ) double matrix  to  select its winning numbers .
Each game costs $  1  .
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions  (  California is the exception ) , there is an option  ,  called Megaplier  (  such games are $ 2 each ) where non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2 , 3 , or 4 .
The Megaplier  थी  made available to  सब  Mega Millions jurisdictions in January 2011 ;  it  began as a Texas -only option .
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays and Fridays , including holidays .
Mega Millions is administered  by  a consortium of its 12 original lotteries and the drawings  हैं  held at WSB-TV in  अटलांटा  , Georgia .
supervised by the Georgia Lottery .
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions , as well as in American lottery  इतिहास  , was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a cash  विकल्प  of $ 474,000,000 ) for the March 30 , 2012  आरेखण  in  जिससे  there were  तीन  jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois , Kansas , and  मेरीलैंड  .
सब  three tickets had been claimed as of April  18  , with each set of winners choosing the cash option .
is a Japanese manga series created by writer Tsugumi Ohba  और  manga artist Takeshi Obata .
The main character is Light Yagami , a high school student  जो  discovers a supernatural notebook , the `` Death Note '' , dropped on Earth by a  shinigami  ( a god of death )  नामित  Ryuk .
The  मौत  Note  अनुदान   इसके  user the ability  to  kill  anyone  whose name and face they know , by writing the name in the notebook while  picturing  their face .
The series centers around Light 's  attempt  to create and rule a world `` cleansed of evil ''  as  `` God '' using the notebook , and the efforts  of  a detective known as L to stop him .
Death Note was first serialized  in  108 chapters by Shueisha in the  जापानी  manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003  to  May 2006 .
The series was also  प्रकाशित  in tankōbon format in Japan starting in May 2004 and ending in October 2006 with a total of  तेरह  volumes .
The anime series aired in Japan  इससे  October 3 ,  2006  , to June  26  , 2007  .
Composed of  37  episodes , the anime was developed by Madhouse and directed by Tetsuro Araki .
a  light novel based on the series , written by Nisio Isin  ,  was released in Japan .
Additionally , various video  खेल   have  been  प्रकाशित  by Konami for Nintendo DS .
The series was adapted into live-action films released in Japan on June  17  , 2006  ,  November 3 , 2006 , and February 2 , 2008 .
Viz Media licensed  the  Death Note manga in North  अमेरिका  and has published all the twelve  आयतन  from the series , a 13th volume which serves as a `` reader 's guide '' , as well as the light novels  .
The episodes from the anime first appeared in  उत्तर  America as downloadable by IGN .
Viz  बाद  licensed the anime series and it aired on Bionix  in  Canada and on Cartoon Network in  the  United States .
The live-action films briefly played in certain North American theaters since 2008 .
However , none of the video games have thus far been published in North  अमेरिका  or Europe .
Death Note is one of  साप्ताहिक  Shōnen Jumps best-selling manga series of all time ,  साथ  sales over 26.5 million copies .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening  ``   )  , also known as All Hallows ' Eve , is a yearly celebration observed in a number  of  countries on October 31  ,  the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars  ,  All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals ,  और  festivals of  the  dead with possible pagan roots , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of  samhain  and has  solely  Christian roots .
Typical  त्यौहार  Halloween activities include trick-or-treating  (  also  ज्ञात  as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties , carving pumpkins into  jack-o'-lanterns  , lighting bonfires , apple bobbing , visiting haunted attractions , playing pranks , telling scary stories , and watching horror films .
New York City taxicabs during Midtown rush hour in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New York City , with  उनके  distinctive yellow paint , are  a  widely  पहचाना  icon of the city .
Taxicabs are operated by private companies  और  licensed by the New York  नगर  Taxi and Limousine Commission ( TLC )  .
it  also oversees  over  40,000 other for-hire vehicles , including `` black cars '' , commuter vans  और  ambulettes .
`` Medallion taxis , '' the familiar yellow cabs  ,  are the  तभी   वाहनों  in the  नगर  permitted to pick  up  passengers in response to  a  street hail .
Schematic cross section of part of leaf  ,  xylem shown  as  red circles at figure 8 .
Xylem is one of the two  प्रकार   of   हस्तांतरण  tissue in vascular plants ( phloem  is  the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek  शब्द  ξύλον ( xylon ) , meaning `` wood  ''  ;  the  best-known xylem tissue  is   लकडी  , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its basic function is to transport water , but it also transports some nutrients through the plant .
U.S. women  suffragists  demonstrating for the right to vote , February 1913  .
महिलाओं  's suffrage also known as woman  suffrage  is the right of women to vote and to run for office .
Limited voting rights were gained by women in  स्वीडन  , Finland and some western U.S. states in the late 19th century  .
International organizations were  formed  to  निर्देशांक  efforts , especially the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Council of Women ( 1888 ) and the International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ) .
in   1893  , New Zealand , then a self-governing British colony , granted adult women the right to vote  और  the self-governing British colony of South Australia did the same in 1895 , but also permitted women to run for office .
ऑस्ट्रेलिया  federated in 1901  ,  and women acquired the right to vote and stand in federal  चुनावों   इससे  1902 ,  हालांकि  uneven restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in national elections  यहूद   नहीं  completely removed until 1962 .
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of Finland , then part of the Russian Empire , which also produced the world 's first female members of parliament  in  the 1907 parliamentary elections .
Norway followed  ,  granting full women 's suffrage  in  1913 .
In most Western countries , women 's suffrage came after World I War I I , with some important late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971 .
Women 's suffrage has  generally  been recognized after  राजनैतिक  campaigns to obtain it were waged .
In many countries it was granted before universal suffrage .
महिलाओं  's suffrage is  explicitly  stated as a right under  the  Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women , adopted by the United Nations in 1979 .
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006  )  by Diane Setterfield is a gothic  सस्पेंस  novel , the author 's first published book  .
Jehovah 's Witnesses is  a  millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs distinct from mainstream  christianity  .Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : •  ईसाई  : • Denomination : The organization  रिपोर्ट्स  worldwide membership of over 7.78 million adherents involved in evangelism  ,  convention  उपस्थिति  of over 12 million ,  और  annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million  .
They are directed by the  शासी  Body of  यहोवा  's Witnesses , a group of elders in Brooklyn , New York , that establishes all doctrines  .
यहोवा  's Witnesses ' beliefs are based on their interpretations of the Bible and they  prefer  to use their own translation , the New  संसार  Translation of the Holy Scriptures .
They believe that the destruction  of  the present world system at Armageddon is imminent , and that the establishment of  परमेश्वर  's kingdom on earth is the  तभी  solution for all problems  faced  by mankind  .
The group emerged  इससे  the Bible Student movement —founded in the late  1870s  by Charles Taze Russell with the formation of  zion  's Watch Tower Tract Society —with significant organizational  और  doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin  रदरफोर्ड  .
The name Jehovah 's witnesses , based on Isaiah 43:10–12 , was  अपनाया  in 1931  to  distinguish themselves from other Bible Student groups and symbolize a break with the legacy of Russell 's  परंपराओं  .
Jehovah 's  गवाह  are best  ज्ञात  for their door-to-door preaching , distributing literature such as The Watchtower and Awake  !
, and refusing military service and blood transfusions .
They consider use of the name Jehovah vital for proper worship .
They reject Trinitarianism , inherent immortality of the soul , and  hellfire  , which they  consider  to be unscriptural doctrines .
They do not observe Christmas , Easter ,  जन्मदिन  , or other holidays and customs they consider  to  have pagan origins incompatible with Christianity  .
Adherents commonly refer to their  देह   of  beliefs as `` the truth ''  और  consider themselves to be  ``   in  the truth '' .
They consider secular society to be morally  भ्रष्ट  and  अंतर्गत  the influence of Satan , and most limit their social interaction with non-Witnesses .
Congregational disciplinary actions include  disfellowshipping  , their term for formal expulsion and shunning .
Baptized individuals who formally leave  हैं  considered disassociated and  हैं  also shunned .
Disfellowshipped  और  disassociated individuals may eventually be reinstated if deemed  repentant  .
The  धर्म  's position regarding conscientious objection to military service and refusal to salute national flags has  brought   it   into  conflict with some governments .
Consequently , Jehovah 's Witnesses have been persecuted and  उनके  activities are  बैन   or  restricted in some countries .
Persistent legal challenges by Jehovah 's Witnesses have influenced  विधान  related to civil rights in several countries .
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic  नाटक  film directed by Bernardo Bertolucci which portrays  a  recent American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young , betrothed Parisian woman .
It stars Marlon Brando , Maria Schneider , and Jean-Pierre Léaud .
The  फिल्मी  's raw portrayal of sexual violence and emotional turmoil led to international controversy and drew various levels of  सरकारी  censorship .
The MPAA gave the film an X rating upon release in the United States .
After revisions were made to the MPAA ratings code , it was classified as an NC-17 in 1997 .
MGM released a censored R-rated cut in 1981 .
The film has its  nc-17  rating for `` some explicit sexual content . ''
Windows  xp  is an operating system produced by Microsoft for use on personal computers , including home and business desktops  ,  laptops  और  media centers  .
पहला   released  to computer manufacturers on  अगस्त  24 , 2001  ,  it  is  the second most popular version of Windows  ,  based on  संस्थापित  user base .
The name `` XP '' is short for `` eXPerience '' , highlighting the enhanced user experience .
Windows  xp  , the successor to Windows 2000  और  Windows ME , was the first consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the  खिड़कियाँ  NT kernel .
Windows XP was released worldwide  लिये  retail sale on October 25 , 2001 , and over 400 million copies  यहूद  in use in January 2006 .
it  was succeeded by Windows Vista in January 2007 .
Direct OEM and retail sales of Windows XP  ceased  on June 30 , 2008 .
Microsoft continued to sell  खिड़कियाँ  XP through their  प्रणाली  Builders ( smaller OEMs who sell  समवेत  computers ) program until  जनवरी  31 , 2009 .
On April 10 ,  2012   ,  Microsoft reaffirmed that extended  support  for Windows XP  और  Office 2003 would end on April 8 , 2014 and suggested  कि  administrators begin preparing to migrate  to  a newer OS .
the  NT -based versions of  खिड़कियाँ   ,  which are programmed in C  ,  C++ , and assembly , are  ज्ञात  for their improved stability  और  efficiency  over  the 9x versions  of  Microsoft Windows .
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user interface , a change Microsoft promoted as  अधिक  user-friendly than previous versions of Windows .
In an  attempt  to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell `` that plagued the past versions of Windows , improved side-by-side assembly technology  in   खिड़कियाँ   xp   allows  side-by-side installation  ,  registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared software components in full isolation .
It is also the first version  of  Windows to use product activation to combat illegal copying .
During Windows XP 's development  ,  the  प्रोजेक्ट  was codenamed ``  whistler  '' , after Whistler , British Columbia , as many Microsoft employees  skied  at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort .
According  to  web analytics data generated by Net Applications , Windows XP was the most widely  प्रयुक्त  operating system until  अगस्त  2012 , when Windows 7 overtook it .
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99  %  , having decreased almost every month since at least November 2007 , the first month for which statistics  हैं  publicly available from Net Applications .
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an  अर्जेंटाइन  tango with  म्यूज़िक  and lyrics written in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera  क्रमशः  .
The name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase  अर्थ  `` by a head '' , which refers to a horse winning a race by the length of one head .
The lyrics speak of a compulsive horse-track gambler who compares his  व्यसन  for horses with his attraction to  महिलाओं  .
Alfredo Le Pera was a Brazilian from São  पाउलो   ,  a much Italian-influenced area  in  Brazil , and also the birthplace of Zequinha de Abreu , composer  of  Tico-Tico no Fubá .
Le Pera and Gardel died in an airplane crash in Medellín , (  कोलंबिया  )  ,  on June 24 , 1935 .
Por una Cabeza
The tango has since been performed by numerous tango orchestras .
Tango scenes with `` Por una  cabeza  '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ) , Scent of  a  Woman ( 1992  )  , Schindler 's List ( 1993 ) ,  सच्चा   झूठ  ( 1994 ) , Titanic ( 1996 ) , Bad Santa  (  Uncut Version , 2003 ) , All  the  King 's Men (  2006  ) , Planet 51 ( 2009 ) , episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010  )  ,  एपीसोड  9 of South Korean drama series Sweet Spy ( 2005–08 ) , the  शुरूआत  and ending  क्रेडिट  of the South Korean drama broadcast I 'm Sorry , I Love You ( 2004 ) , and the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007  )  .
In the movie Frida ( Salma  हायेक  , 2002  )   ,  Gardel is heard singing it on a radio  .
It is also quoted in David Del Tredici 's  ``  Good News  !
Nilda is Back '' ( from the song cycle Miz Inez Sez ) .
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) ,  the  tango is performed by the `` The  टैंगो  Project '' , who actually appear in  the  dancing scene starring  al  Pacino ( the recording used  is  available on  एक  of their  cd  albums ) .
John Williams arranged a version  of  the piece that  appears  on  the  album `` Cinema Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman .
Perlman and Williams ( conducting ) have also performed the piece together  in   सजीव  concerts .
In 2012 a dance version was released by the group `` Da Carrera '' featuring the original vocal recording by Carlos Gardel .
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is one of the body 's homeostatic  mechanisms  for maintaining blood pressure .
It provides a  ऋणात्मक  feedback loop in  जिससे  an elevated blood pressure reflexively causes heart rate to decrease therefore causing blood pressure to decrease ; likewise  ,  decreased  रक्त  pressure activates the baroreflex , causing heart rate  to  increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure .
The system relies  on  specialized neurons , known as baroreceptors , in the aortic arch , carotid  साइनस  , and elsewhere to monitor changes in  रक्त  pressure  और   रिले  them to the brainstem .
Subsequent changes in  रक्त   दबाव  are mediated by  the  autonomic nervous system .
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms a parallel negative feedback  लूप  in  an  endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin system .
The Loma Prieta earthquake , also known  as  the Quake of '89 and the  संसार  Series Earthquake , was a major  भूकंप  that  struck  the San Francisco Bay Area of California on October 17 , 1989 , at 5:04 pm local time .
caused  by a slip along the  सैन  Andreas Fault , the quake lasted 10–15 seconds and measured 6.9 on both the moment magnitude scale ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale .
The quake killed 63 people throughout northern California , injured  3,757  and left some 3,000–12,000  लोगों  homeless  .
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 World Series , featuring both of  the  Bay Area 's Major League Baseball teams , the  ओकलैंड  Athletics and the San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage ,  इस  was the first major earthquake in the United States to have its initial jolt broadcast live  on  television .
साहूकार  in the standard Staunton pattern
The  साहूकार   (  ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and  in  most circumstances the weakest  टुकड़ा  in the game of chess , historically representing infantry or , more particularly , armed peasants or pikemen .
In  शतरंज  , each player begins the game  साथ  eight pawns , one on each square of the rank immediately in front of the other pieces .
( In algebraic notation ,  the  white  प्यादे  start on a2 , b2 ,  c2  , ... , h2 , while black pawns start  on  a7 , b7 , c7 ,  ...  , h7  .   )
Individual pawns are referred to by the file on which they stand .
For example , one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn ''  or  `` Black 's b-pawn '' , or less commonly ( using descriptive notation  )  , `` White 's king 's bishop pawn ''  or  ``  ब्लैक  's queen 's knight pawn '' .
It  is  also common to refer to a rook  साहूकार  , meaning any  साहूकार  on the a- or h-file , a knight pawn ( on the b- or g-file  )  , a bishop pawn ( on the c- or f-file ) , a queen pawn ( on the d-file ) , a king pawn ( on the e-file )  ,  and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ) .
The  सैन्य  forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of  homosexual  ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals .
The armed  शक्तियां  of most  विकसित  countries have now removed policies excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ) .
Nations that permit gay people to serve openly in  the  military  शामिल  the 4 of the 5 members of the  un  Security Council ( United States , United Kingdom , France , and Russia )  ,  the Republic of China ( Taiwan  )  ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Israel , South Africa , Argentina , and  सब  NATO members excluding Turkey .
हाइड्रोजन  production is the family  of  industrial methods for generating hydrogen .
Currently  the   प्रबल   प्रौद्योगिकी  for direct production is steam reforming from hydrocarbons .
अनेक  other methods are known including electrolysis  और  thermolysis .
In 2006 ,  the  United  राज्य  was estimated to have a production capacity of 11 million tonnes of  हाइड्रोजन  .
5 million tonnes of hydrogen  यहूद  consumed on-site in oil refining , and in  the  production of ammonia ( Haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of  कार्बन  monoxide  )  .
0.4 million tonnes were an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali  प्रक्रम  .
Hydrogen production is an estimated $ 100 billion industry .
A basis point ( often denoted as bp , colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips ''  ,  also  ज्ञात  as  a  `` beep  ''   )  is  a  unit equal  to  one hundredth of a percentage point  ,  or one part per ten thousand , 1/10000 .
The same unit  is  also ( rarely ) called a permyriad , literally meaning 'for ( every ) myriad ( ten thousand ) ' , and in that context  is  written with which looks like a percent sign ( % ) with two extra zeroes at the end  (  like a  stylized  form of the four zeros in  the  denominator  ,  although it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % )  और  permille ( ‰ ) signs ) .
A basis point is defined  as:
1 basis point = 1 permyriad =  एक  one-hundredth percent
1 bp  =  1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100  bp  = 100
Basis points are used as a convenient unit of measurement in contexts where  प्रतिशत  differences of less than 1 % are discussed .
The most  आम   उदाहरण  is interest rates  ,   जहाँ  differences in interest rates of less than 1 % per year are usually meaningful to talk about .
For example , a difference of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 basis points ( e.g . a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 basis points  to  4.77 % )  .
Like percentage points ,  आधार  points avoid the ambiguity between relative and absolute discussions about interest rates by dealing only with the absolute  बदलें  in numeric value of a rate .
For example , if a  रपट  says there has been  a  ``  1  % increase '' from a 10 % interest rate , this could  refer  to  an  increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative , 1  %  of 10 % ) , or from 10  %  to 11 % ( absolute , 1 % plus 10 % ) .
If , however , the report says there  रै  been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10 % interest rate , then we  जान  that the  ब्याज   रेट  of 10 % has increased by  0.10  % ( the absolute change ) to a 10.1 % rate .
It is common practice in the financial industry to use basis points to denote a rate  बदलें  in a financial instrument , or the difference ( spread  )  between  दो  interest rates , including the yields of fixed-income securities .
Since  निश्चित  loans and bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to some index or underlying security , they will often be  कोटेड  as a  स्प्रेड  over ( or under ) the  अनुक्रमणिका  .
For example , a loan that  bears  interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 basis  अंक  over LIBOR , which is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 '' .
The term `` basis point '' has its origins in  व्यापार  the `` basis '' or the  स्प्रेड  between two interest rates .
चूंकि  the basis is usually small , these are quoted multiplied up  by  10000  ,  and hence a `` full point '' movement in the `` basis '' is a basis point .
Contrast with pips in FX forward markets .
The relationship between percentage changes and basis  अंक  can be summarized as follows  :  1 percentage point change = 100 basis points  ,  and  0.01  percentage points = 1 basis point .
So , a bond whose yield increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase  by  50 basis points ; or interest rates that have risen 1  प्रतिशत   पाइंट  are said to have increased by 100 basis points .
The  अंग्रेजों  Royal Family is the group of close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom .
The term is also commonly applied  to  the same group of people who are the relations of the  monarch  in her or his role as sovereign of any of the other Commonwealth realms , thus sometimes at variance with official national terms for the family .
Members of the Royal Family belong to , either by  जनम  or marriage , the House of Windsor , since 1917 , when George V changed the name of the royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha .
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were  at  war with Germany and given the British Royal Family 's  दमदार  German ancestry  ;  it was felt that its public image could be improved  by  choosing a more British house name .
The  नई  name chosen , Windsor  ,  had  बिल्कुल   no  connection other  than  as the  नाम   of  the  किला  which was and continues to be a royal residence .
Although in the United  किंगडम  there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a  सदस्य  of the Royal Family ,  और  different lists will include different people , those carrying  the   स्टाइल   उसके  or His Majesty ( HM ) , or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered members , which usually results in the application of  the  term to the monarch  ,  the consort of the  monarch  , the widowed consorts of previous monarchs , the children of the monarch and previous monarchs  ,  the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs , and the  spouses  and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons .
On 30 November 1917 ,  किंग  George V issued Letters Patent defining  जो  are  सदस्यों  of the Royal Family ; the text of  the  notice from the London Gazette is as follows:
In 1996 , Her Majesty The Queen modified these Letters Patent , as was evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
in  2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and a style borne by members of the Royal Family to  अतिरिक्त  persons  to  be born , evidenced by this Notice from the  लंदन  Gazette:
Members and relatives of  the  British Royal Family historically represented the monarch in various places throughout the British Empire , sometimes  लिये  extended periods as viceroys , or for specific ceremonies or events .
आज  , they often perform ceremonial and social duties throughout the United Kingdom and abroad on behalf of the United Kingdom .
Aside from  the   monarch  ,  उनके   तभी  constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve  ,  if eligible and when appointed by letters patent  ,  as a Counsellor of State ,  दो  or more  of   जिसको  exercise the authority  of  the Crown  (  within stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch .
in  the other  realms  of the Commonwealth royalty do not serve as Counsellors of State .
however   in  each such realm the monarch 's family members may act on behalf of , are funded by  ,  and represent the sovereign of that particular  राज्य   ,  and  नहीं   the  United Kingdom .
The Queen , her consort , her children and grandchildren , as well as all former sovereigns ' children and grandchildren hold places in the first sections of  the  official orders of precedence in England and Wales , Scotland  ,  and Northern Ireland .
Wives of  the  said  आनंद  their husbands ' precedence , and husbands of princesses are unofficially but habitually placed with their wives  as  well  .
However , the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and  एलेक्जेंड्रा  , who henceforth take  निजी  precedence over the Duchess  of  Cornwall , who is otherwise the  फ्रेम  's highest ranking woman after  the  Queen herself  .
वो  did not alter the relative precedence of  अन्य  born-princesses , such as the daughters of  उसके  younger sons .
Haiti ( ;  haitian  Creole Ayiti ) , officially the Republic of Haiti ( ; ) , is a Caribbean country .
It occupies the  पश्चिमी  , smaller portion of the island of Hispaniola , in the Greater Antillean archipelago , which  it  shares with the Dominican Republic .
Ayiti ( land of high mountains ) was the indigenous Taíno  or  Amerindian name for the island  .
The country 's highest point is Pic la Selle , at .
The total area of Haiti is and its capital is  port-au-prince  .
haitian  Creole  और  French are the official languages .
Haiti 's regional , historical , and ethno-linguistic position  is  unique for  अनेक   कारण  .
It  थी   the  first independent nation of Latin America and the Caribbean , the first black -led republic in the  संसार  , and the second republic in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of  a  successful slave revolution lasting  nearly   a  decade .
In 2012 , Haiti announced  इसके  intention to seek associate membership status in the African Union  .
Haiti is the most populous of the predominantly Francophone independent nations in the Americas  .
It is one of only two independent nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to designate French as an official language ; the other French-speaking areas  हैं   सब  overseas départements  ,  or collectivités  ,  of France .
Haiti is the most populous full member-state of  the  Caribbean Community  (  CARICOM ) .
It  is  the poorest country in the Americas  as  measured by the Human Development  अनुक्रमणिका  .
Political  हिंसा  has occurred regularly throughout its history , leading to government instability .
Most recently , in February 2004  ,  a  तख्तापलट  d'état originating in the north of the  देश   मजबूर   the  resignation and exile of President Jean-Bertrand  aristide  .
A provisional government took  कंट्रोल  with security provided by the United Nations  स्थिरीकरण   मिशन  in Haiti ( MINUSTAH  )  .
Michel  martelly  , the current president , was elected in the Haitian general election , 2011 .
The island has had a history of destructive  भूकंप  .
A 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck Haiti on 12 January 2010 and  तबाह  Port-au-Prince .
The highest reliable  मौत  count was estimated  at  220,000 .
haitian  government estimates  यहूद   उच्चतर  .
The Presidential palace , Parliament  और  many other important structures were destroyed , along with  अनगिनत  homes and  व्यवसायों  , leaving hundreds of  हज़ारों  of people homeless .
The country has  yet  to  रिकवर  from the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due  to  both the severity  of  the damage Haiti endured in 2010 ,  as  well as a government that was ineffective  खूब  before the earthquake .
United States  सहायता   संगठन  have  दान  $ 2 billion .
Combined with other international donations , these funds are intended to contribute to the rebuilding  of   the  country .
The Bloody Beetroots is  the  pseudonym  of  Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo , the Italian electro house and dance-punk music producer , DJ  और   फ़ोटोग्राफ़र  .
The Bloody Beetroots is  well-known  for the black  venom  mask he wears during performances .
In fact , the only identifying public feature of Rifo is the year `` 1977 '' tattooed across his chest , which  is  both the year that  the  producer and punk-rock was born .
`` The Bloody Beetroots  dj  set '' contains Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo and Tommy Tea .
A Motorola Advisor alphanumeric pager used in Brazil in the 1990s ,  संचालित  by Teletrim
a  pager is  a  wireless telecommunications  यंत्र  that receives  और  displays numeric or text messages ,  or  receives and announces voice messages .
One-way pagers can  तभी  receive messages , while response pagers and  two-way   pagers  can also acknowledge  ,  reply to , and originate  संदेश  using an internal transmitter .
Pagers operate as part of a paging system which includes  एक  or more fixed transmitters ( or in the case of response pagers and two-way  pagers  , one or more base  स्टेशन  ) ,  as  well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users .
These systems  can  range from a restaurant system with a single low-power transmitter , to a nationwide system with thousands of high-power base  स्टेशन  .
One of the first practical paging services was launched in  1950  for physicians in the New York City area .
Physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the service and carried a ( 6 oz ) pager that would receive  फोन  messages within  (  25  mi  )  of  a single transmitter tower .
The system was manufactured by  the  Reevesound Company and operated by Telanswerphone  .
In 1960  ,  John Francis Mitchell combined elements of Motorola 's Walkie Talkie  और  automobile radio technologies to create the first transistorized pager  ,  and from this point , paging technology continued to advance , and pager adoption continued to expand  ,  until the early 1990s .
However , by the mid-1990s , as cellular technologies became cheaper and more  widely  available , advanced services began to  displace  paging as a commercial product .
Today , pagers exist largely as niche products  ,  finding preferential use in  अनुप्रयोग   ऐसे  as hospitals , public safety , and retail locations where their simplicity  ,   ऊँची  reliability , and low cost represent significant advantages .
Reevesville  is  a town in Dorchester County ,  दक्षिण  Carolina , United States .
The population was 196 at the 2010 census .
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget , and used by the U.S. Census Bureau for statistical purposes only , Reevesville is included  भीतर  the Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area .
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; July 6 , 1907 – July 13 , 1954 ) was a Mexican  चित्रकार  , born in Coyoacán , who is  बेहतरीन  known for her self-portraits .
Kahlo 's life began and ended in Mexico City , in her home  ज्ञात  as the Blue  हाउस  .
She gave her birth date as July 7 , 1910 , but her birth certificate shows  जुलाई  6 , 1907 .
Kahlo had allegedly wanted  the  year of her birth to coincide with the year  of  the beginning of the Mexican revolution so that her life would  शुरू  with  the  birth of modern Mexico .
Her work has been celebrated in Mexico  as  emblematic of  नेशनल  and indigenous tradition , and by feminists for its uncompromising depiction of the female experience  और  form .
Mexican culture  और  Amerindian cultural tradition are important  in  her work , which  रै  been sometimes characterized as Naïve art  or  folk art .
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '' , and in 1938 André  ब्रेटन  , principal initiator of the surrealist movement , described Kahlo 's art as  a   ``  ribbon around a bomb '' .
Kahlo had a volatile marriage with the famous Mexican artist Diego  रिवेरा  .
She suffered lifelong health problems .
Many  of  her health problems were the result of a  ट्रैफ़िक  accident  वो  survived as a teenager .
Recovering  इससे  her injuries isolated her from other people and this isolation influenced her works  ,  many of which are self-portraits of one sort or another  .
Kahlo  सुझाया  , `` I  पेंट  myself because I am so often alone and because  i  am the subject I know  बेहतरीन  . ''
She also stated ,  ``  I was born a bitch .
I was born a painter . ''

theresienwiese  on the day before  oktoberfest  2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival  celebrating  beer held annually in Munich , Bavaria , Germany , running from late September to the first weekend in October .
It is one  of  the most famous  कार्यक्रम  in Germany and is the world 's largest fair , with more than 6 million people from around the world attending  the  event every year .
To the  स्थानीय  , it is not called Oktoberfest  ,  but  ``   die  Wiesn '' , after the colloquial name of  the  fairgrounds themselves .
The Oktoberfest is an important part of Bavarian culture  ,  having been held since 1810 .
Other cities across the world also hold Oktoberfest celebrations , modeled  बाद  the original Munich event .
The Munich Oktoberfest originally took  प्लेस  during the sixteen  दिनों   up  to  ,  and including , the first Sunday in October .
In 1994 , the  अनुसूची  was modified in response to German reunification so that if the first Sunday in October falls on the 1st or 2nd ,  तब  the festival would go  on  until October 3 ( German Unity Day ) .
Thus , the  पर्व  is now 17 days  जब  the first Sunday is  अक्तूबर  2 and 18 days when it  is  October 1 .
In 2010 , the festival lasted until the first Monday in October  ,  to mark the anniversary of the event .
The festival is held  in  an  क्षेत्रफल  named  the  Theresienwiese (  फ़ील्ड  , or meadow , of  therese  ) , often called Wiesn for short , located near Munich 's center .
Large quantities of Oktoberfest Beer  हैं  consumed , with almost 7 million liters served during the 16 day  पर्व  in 2007 .
Visitors may  भी  enjoy a wide variety of traditional  खाना  such as Hendl ( chicken ) , Schweinebraten ( roast pork  )  , Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock  )  , Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a  स्टिक  ) , Würstl ( sausages ) along with Brezeln ( Pretzel ) , Knödel (  आलू   or  bread dumplings ) , Käsespätzle ( cheese noodles ) , Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes  )  , Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as  obatzda  ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage  )  .
