Wheels  of  Gouda
Cheese is a generic term  लिये  a diverse group of milk-based food products .
Cheese is  उत्पादित  in wide-ranging flavors  ,  textures , and forms .
चीज  consists of proteins and fat from milk , usually the milk of cows , buffalo , goats , or  शीप  .
It is produced by coagulation of the milk protein casein .
Typically , the milk  is  acidified and  जोड  of the enzyme rennet causes coagulation .
The solids are  अलग  and  दबाया  into final  रूप  .
Some cheeses have molds on the rind  or  throughout .
Most cheeses melt at cooking temperature .
Hundreds of types of cheese from various countries are produced .
Their styles , textures  और  flavors depend on the origin of the milk ( including the animal 's  आहार  ) , whether they have  महरूम  pasteurized , the butterfat content , the bacteria  और  mold , the processing , and aging  .
Herbs , spices , or wood smoke may be used as flavoring agents  .
The yellow to red color of many cheeses , such as Red Leicester , is normally formed  इससे  adding annatto .
For a few cheeses , the milk is curdled by adding acids such as vinegar or lemon juice .
Most cheeses  हैं  acidified to a lesser degree by bacteria , which turn milk sugars into  लैक्टिक  acid , then the addition of rennet completes the curdling .
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet are available ;  सबसे  are produced by fermentation of the fungus Mucor miehei , but  अन्य  have been extracted from various  प्रजाति  of the  cynara  thistle family .
Cheese is  valued  for its portability , long life , and high content of fat , protein , calcium , and phosphorus .
Cheese is more compact  और  has a longer shelf  जीवन  than milk , although how long a cheese will keep may depend on the  प्रकार   of  cheese ; labels on packets  of  cheese often claim  कि  a cheese should be consumed within three to five days of opening .
Generally speaking , hard cheeses  पिछला  longer than soft cheeses , such as Brie or goat  's  milk cheese .
Cheesemakers near  a  dairy region may benefit  इससे  fresher , lower-priced milk , and lower shipping costs .
The long storage life of some cheese  ,  especially if it is encased in a protective  rind  , allows selling when markets are favorable .
अतिरिक्त   संघटक  may be added to some cheeses , such as black peppers , garlic , chives or cranberries .
A specialist seller of cheese is sometimes known as a cheesemonger .
To  become  an expert in this field ,  जैसे  wine or cooking , requires some formal education and years of tasting and hands-on experience .
This position is typically responsible for all aspects of the cheese inventory ; selecting the cheese menu , purchasing , receiving , storage , and ripening  .
Legal citation signals are  a  set of brief abbreviated phrases or words  प्रयुक्त  to clarify the authority or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition .
Signals  सहायता  a reader quickly discern meaning or usefulness of a particular reference  जब  the reference  itself  does not provide adequate information .
Most citation signals are placed in front of the citation to which they apply .
For  उदाहरण  ,  in  the paragraph When writing a legal argument , it is important  to  refer to primary sources .
To assist readers in locating these sources , it is desirable to use a standardized citation format .
See generally Harvard Law Review Association ,  the  Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation (  18th  ed  .  2005 ) .
Note , however , that some  न्यायालयों  may require any legal papers that are submitted to them to conform to  a  different citation format .
the signal  is  the phrase `` see generally , '' which indicates that the citation `` The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 )  ''  provides general background information on the topic .
Neil Alden Armstrong ( August 5 , 1930 – August 25  ,  2012 ) was an American astronaut and the first person to walk on the Moon .
He  थी  also an aerospace engineer , naval  एविएटर  , test pilot , and university professor .
पहले  becoming  an  astronaut , Armstrong was an officer in the U.S. Navy and served in the Korean War .
After the war ,  he  earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue University and served as  a  test pilot at the National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics High-Speed Flight Station , now known as the  ड्राइडेन  Flight Research  बीच  , where  he  logged over 900  फ़्लाइट  .
He later completed graduate studies at the University of Southern California  .
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in Space Soonest and X-20 Dyna-Soar  इंसान  spaceflight programs , Armstrong joined  the  NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962 .
He made his first space flight , as command  पायलट  of Gemini 8 , in 1966 , becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly  in  space  .
On this mission , he performed the first docking of two spacecraft , with  पायलट  David Scott .
Armstrong 's second and last spaceflight was as mission commander of the Apollo 11  चंद्रमा  landing , in July 1969 .
On this mission , Armstrong  और  Buzz Aldrin descended to the lunar surface  और  spent two and a half hours exploring , while Michael Collins remained in lunar orbit in  the  Command Module .
Along with Collins and Aldrin , Armstrong was awarded the Presidential Medal  of  Freedom by President Richard Nixon ; in 1978 , President Jimmy Carter presented Armstrong  the  Congressional Space Medal of Honor in 1978 ; he  और  his former crewmates received the  congressional  Gold Medal in  2009  .
Armstrong died in Cincinnati , Ohio  ,  on  अगस्त  25 , 2012 ,  at  the age of  82  , after complications from coronary  धमनी  bypass surgery .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 – October 4 , 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years  .
He set race records in  सब  three events in the Series  —  the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ) , the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ) , and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records  कि  still stand today .
He is considered  to  be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds  of  all time .
in  1999 ,  ईएसपीएन  ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete  of  the 20th century , the highest ranking racehorse on the  सूची   url_http  .
He ranked second behind  man  o ' War in The Blood-Horse  's  List of  the  Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century .
Secretariat was sired by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal , by Princequillo .
He was foaled at The  मर्ग  in Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War , Secretariat was  a   विशाल  chestnut colt and was given the same nickname , `` Big Red . ''
सचिवालय  's grandsire , Nasrullah , is also  the  great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by  पैनी  Chenery ,  he  was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron  turcotte  , along with  प्रशिक्षु   jockey  Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced in  chenery  's Meadow  stable  's blue and white checkered colors and his groom was  एडी  Sweat .
Secretariat stood approximately tall  ,  and weighed , with a 75-inch girth , in his racing prime .
Madrid ( , ) is the capital and largest city of Spain .
The population of the city is  roughly  3.3 million and the entire population of the Madrid metropolitan area is calculated to be  around  6.5 million  .
it  is the third-largest city in the European Union , after London and Berlin , and its  महानगर  area is the third-largest  in   the  European Union after London and Paris .
The  नगर  spans a total  of  .
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the country  और  the Community of Madrid ( which comprises the  नगर  of Madrid , its conurbation and extended suburbs and  गांवों  ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of  castile  and  león  and Castile-La Mancha .
As the capital city of  स्पेन   ,  seat of government , and residence of the Spanish monarch , Madrid is also the political , economic and cultural  केन्द्र  of Spain .
The current mayor  is  Ana Botella from the People 's Party ( PP ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the European Union and its influences in politics , education , entertainment , environment , media ,  फ़ैशन  , science , culture , and the arts all contribute to its status as one of the world 's major global cities .
Due to its  आर्थिक  output , high standard of living , and market size , Madrid is considered the major financial centre of Southern Europe and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts the head  कार्यालयों  of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies ,  ऐसे  as Telefónica , Iberia  or  Repsol  .
Madrid is the most  touristic  city of  स्पेन  , the  fourth-most  touristic of the continent , and the seventh most visited city in the world according to Forbes .
Is the 10th most livable city  in  the world according to Monocle magazine , in its  2010  index  .
Madrid also ranks among the 12 greenest  यूरोपीय  cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics .
Madrid houses the headquarters of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO ) ,  belonging  to the United Nations Organization ( UN  )   ,  the  segib  , the  संगठन  of Ibero-American States ( OEI ) , and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ) .
It also hosts major international institutions regulators of Spanish : the Standing Committee of the Association of Spanish Language Academies , headquarters of the  royal  Spanish Academy (  rae  ) , the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ) .
मैड्रिड  organizes fairs as FITUR , ARCO , SIMO TCI and the Cibeles Madrid Fashion  सप्ताह  .
जबकि  Madrid possesses a modern  अवसंरचना  , it has preserved the look and feel of  अनेक  of its historic neighbourhoods and streets .
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the  teatro  Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera  हाउस   ;  the Buen Retiro Park , founded in 1631 ; the  19th-century  National Library building ( founded in  1712  ) containing some of Spain 's  ऐतिहासिक  archives ; a large number  of  National museums , and the Golden Triangle of Art , located along the Paseo del Prado and comprising three art museums  :  Prado Museum ,  the  Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía , a museum  of  modern art , and the  thyssen-bornemisza  Museum , which completes the shortcomings of the other  दो  museums .
Cibeles Palace  और  Fountain have become the monument symbol of the city .
The path of the Via Appia and  of  the Via Appia Traiana .
Remains of the Appian Way in Rome , near Quarto Miglio
निकट  Rome .
The Appian Way (  लैटिन  and Italian : Via Appia ) was one of  the  earliest  और  strategically most important Roman roads of the ancient republic .
It connected Rome  to  Brindisi , Apulia ,  in   southeast  Italy .
Its importance is  indicated  by its  आम  name  ,  recorded by Statius :
appia  teritur  रेजिना  longarum viarum
`` the Appian way is the queen of the long roads ''
The road  is   नामित  after Appius Claudius Caecus , the Roman censor who began and completed the first section  as  a military road to the south in 312 BC during the Samnite Wars .
The Draupner wave , a single giant wave measured on New Year 's Day 1995 , finally confirmed  the  existence of  freak   लहरें  , which had previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as  freak  waves , monster waves , killer waves , extreme waves , and abnormal waves ) are relatively large and spontaneous ocean surface waves that occur far  आउट  at sea , and are a threat even to large ships and ocean liners .
In oceanography , they are more precisely  पारिभाषित  as waves whose height is more than twice the significant wave height (  swh  )  ,  which is itself defined as the mean of the  largest  third of waves  in  a wave record .
Therefore rogue waves  हैं  not necessarily the biggest waves found at sea  ;  they are , rather , surprisingly large waves for a given sea  राज्य  .
Rogue waves seem  नहीं  to have a single distinct cause , but occur where  शारीरिक  factors such as  ऊँची  winds and strong currents cause waves to merge to create a single exceptionally large wave .
electress  Sophia of Hanover ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the British throne is the ordered sequence of all those people eligible to succeed  to  the throne of the United Kingdom and the other 15  राष्ट्रमंडल  realms .
the  Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed succession on the Electress Sophia of Hanover and  उसके  descendants while excluding Roman Catholics .
The British government does not publish an official list of all those in line to succeed , but the work of genealogical authors  और  amateur researchers suggests that there are several thousand people potentially in line .
At a summit in Perth , Western Australia in 2011 , the heads of government  of  all 16 Commonwealth  realms  agreed to take steps to adopt absolute primogeniture  ,  end the exclusion of people married  to  Roman Catholics , and  मेक  other changes in the succession  नियम  .
The line of succession is also used to select the Counsellors of State  (  and a regent if the need arises ) under the provisions of the Regency Act 1937 .
For earlier versions of the line of succession , see History of the British line of succession .
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17 , 1920July 23 , 1966 ) was an American film and stage actor The New York Times’ obituary noted  उसके  portrayal of `` moody , sensitive young men ''  .
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber  in  George Stevens 's A  प्लेस  in the  सूर्य  , the anguished Catholic priest in Hitchcock  's  I Confess , the doomed regular soldier Robert E. Lee Prewitt in Fred Zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity , and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites  in  Edward  dmytryk  's The Young Lions .
Later , after a disfiguring car crash in 1956 , and alcohol and prescription drug abuse , he  became  erratic .
nevertheless  important roles were still his , including `` the  लापरवाह   ,  alcoholic , mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in John Huston 's The Misfits , the title role in Huston 's , and the concentration camp victim  in  Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at  nuremberg  . ''
Clift received four Academy Award  nominations  during his career , three  लिये  Best Actor and one  लिये  Best Supporting Actor .
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War  on  Terrorism ) is a term commonly applied to an international military campaign which started as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States .
This resulted in an international military campaign to eliminate al-Qaeda and other militant organizations .
The United Kingdom and many other NATO and  non-nato  nations participate  in  the  विरोध  .
The phrase 'War on Terror '  थी  first used by US President George W. Bush  on  20 September  2001  .
The Bush  प्रशासन  and the Western media  have  since used the term  to  signify a global military  ,  political , lawful , and  conceptual  struggle—targeting both  संगठन  designated as terrorist and regimes  अभियुक्त  of supporting  उन्हें  .
It was typically used with a particular focus on militant Islamists , al-Qaeda , and other jihadi groups .
Although the term is not officially used by the  प्रशासन  of US  अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency Operation ) , it is  स्टिल   commonly  used by  राजनेता  , in the media and by some aspects of government  officially  , such as  the  United States ' Global  युद्ध  on Terrorism Service Medal .

The  प्रमुख   कल्याणकारी  of World War II were nationalistic issues , unresolved issues , and resentments resulting from World War I and the interwar period in Europe ,  in  addition to the effects of the Great Depression in  the  1930s .
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak  of  war  हैं   generally  understood  to  be the 1939 invasion of  कैंडल  by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan .
These military aggressions were the result of  निर्णय  made by the authoritarian ruling Nazi elite in Germany and by  the   नेतृत्व  of the Kwantung  फौज  in  जापानी  .
World War II started after these aggressive actions were met with  an  official declaration of war and/or armed resistance .

The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile manufactured by  मित्सुबिशी  Motors between 1969 and 2012  .
The name was derived  इससे   the  French word galant , meaning  ``  chivalrous '' .
There have been nine distinct generations , and cumulative sales now exceed five million .
it  began as a  कॉम्पैक्ट   सेडान  , but over the course  of  its life has evolved into a larger mid-size car .
Initial production was  तभी  based in Japan , but since 1994  the  American  मार्केट  has been served by vehicles assembled at the former Diamond-Star Motors  (  DSM ) facility in Normal ,  इलिनोइस  .
Blood pressure  (  BP ) ,  sometimes  referred to as arterial blood pressure , is the pressure exerted by circulating blood upon the walls of blood vessels ,  और  is  एक  of the principal vital signs .
When used without further specification , `` blood pressure '' usually refers to the arterial pressure of the systemic circulation .
During each heartbeat , blood pressure varies between a maximum ( systolic )  और  a  न्यूनतम   (  diastolic )  दबाव  .
The blood pressure  in  the  परिसंचरण  is principally due to  the  pumping action of the heart .
Differences in mean blood pressure are responsible for blood flow from one location to another in the  परिसंचरण  .
The rate of mean blood flow depends  on  the resistance to flow presented by the blood vessels  .
Mean blood pressure decreases as the circulating blood moves away from the heart through arteries and  capillaries  due to viscous  नुकसान  of energy .
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole circulation , although most of the fall occurs along the small arteries and arterioles .
Gravity affects  रक्त  pressure via hydrostatic  शक्तियां  ( e.g. , during standing ) and valves in veins , breathing , and pumping from contraction  of  skeletal  मांसपेशियां  also influence blood pressure in veins .
Blood pressure without further specification usually refers to the systemic  arterial  pressure measured at a person 's upper  भुजा  and is a measure  of  the pressure in the brachial artery , the major artery in the upper arm .
A person’s blood pressure is usually expressed in terms of the  systolic  pressure over  diastolic  pressure and is measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg  )  , for  उदाहरण  120/80  .
A veto – Latin for `` I forbid '' – is the  शक्ति  (  प्रयुक्त  by an officer of the state , for example ) to unilaterally  रोकें  an official action ,  विशेषकर  the enactment  of  legislation  .
A veto  can  be absolute , as for instance in the United Nations Security Council , whose  स्थाई  members ( China , France , Russia ,  संयुक्त   किंगडम  , United States of America )  can   ब्लाक  any resolution .
Or it can be limited , as in the legislative process of the United States , where a two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation .
A veto only gives power to stop changes , not  to  adopt them ( except  लिये  the rare `` amendatory veto '' ) .
Thus a veto allows its holder to protect the status quo  .
The concept of a veto body originated with the Roman consuls and tribunes .
Either of the two consuls holding office in a given year could block a military or civil decision by the other  ;  any tribune had the power to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate .
Sulfur dioxide ( also sulphur dioxide ) is the chemical compound with  the  formula .
It  is  a toxic gas with a pungent , irritating smell , that is released by volcanoes and in various industrial  प्रक्रियाओं  .
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds ,  उनके  combustion generates  गंधक  dioxide unless the  गंधक  compounds  हैं  removed before burning the fuel .
Further oxidation of SO2 , usually in the presence of a catalyst such as NO2 , forms  h2so4  ,  और  thus acid rain .
गंधक  dioxide emissions are also a  precursor   to   अभिकण  in the atmosphere .
Both of  ये  impacts are cause for concern over the environmental impact of these fuels .
Myasthenia gravis  (   इससे  Greek μύς `` muscle '' , `` weakness '' , and `` serious '' ; abbreviated MG  )   is  an autoimmune neuromuscular  बीमारी  leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability .
It is an autoimmune  विकार  , in which weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that block acetylcholine receptors  at  the postsynaptic neuromuscular junction ,  inhibiting  the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions  .
Myasthenia is treated  medically  with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants , and , in selected cases ,  thymectomy   .
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases per million per year and rising as a result of increased awareness .
MG must be distinguished  इससे  congenital myasthenic syndromes that can present similar  लक्षण  but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments .

Glass substrate with ITO electrodes .
The shapes of these electrodes will determine the shapes that  होगा  appear when the LCD is turned ON .
लंबवत  ridges etched on the surface are smooth .
Twisted nematic liquid crystal .
कांच  substrate with common electrode film (  ito  ) with horizontal  ridges  to line up with the horizontal filter .
Polarizing filter film with a horizontal axis  to  block/pass light .
Reflective surface to send light back to viewer .
( In a backlit LCD  ,  this layer is replaced with a light source . )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD ) is a flat panel display , electronic visual display , or video display that uses the light  modulating  properties of liquid crystals .
द्रव   crystals  do not emit light  सीधे  .
LCDs are available to display arbitrary images (  as  in a general-purpose  कंप्यूटर  display ) or fixed images which can be displayed or hidden , such as preset words ,  अंक   ,  and 7-segment displays  as  in a digital clock .
They use  the  same basic technology , except  कि  arbitrary images are made up of a large number of small pixels , while other displays have  larger  elements .
LCDs are used in a wide range of applications  सहित  computer monitors , televisions , instrument panels  ,   वायुयान  cockpit displays , and signage .
They are common in consumer devices such as video players , gaming devices ,  घड़ियाँ  , watches ,  calculators  , and telephones , and have replaced  कैथोड  ray tube ( CRT )  प्रदर्शक  in  सबसे  applications .
They are available in a wider range of screen  आकार  than CRT and plasma displays , and since they do not use phosphors , they do  नहीं  suffer image burn-in .
LCDs are , however , susceptible to image persistence .
The LCD screen is more energy efficient and can be disposed of more safely than a CRT .
Its  कम  electrical power consumption enables  it  to be used in battery -powered electronic equipment .
It is an  electronically   modulated  optical device made up of any number of segments filled with liquid crystals and arrayed in front of a  लाइट  source ( backlight ) or  reflector  to  उपज  images in color or monochrome .
Liquid crystals were first discovered in 1888 .
By 2008 , worldwide sales of televisions  साथ  LCD screens exceeded  सालाना  sales of CRT units ; the CRT  became  obsolete for most purposes .
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is  a  luxury hotel , casino , and spa in Atlantic City  ,  New Jersey , United States .
It is owned by  मरीना  District Development , a joint  venture  between Boyd  गेमिंग  and a divesture trust established by MGM Resorts International .
The $ 1.1 billion casino hotel features 2,002 rooms and is the largest hotel in New Jersey .
The Borgata opened in July 2003 as a  लास  Vegas-style  megaresort  and is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic  नगर   .
A bottle of high potency B-complex vitamin supplement pills  .
A vitamin ( or ) is  an  organic compound required by an organism as a vital nutrient in limited amounts .
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is called a vitamin when  it  can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism  ,  and must be obtained from the diet .
Thus , the term is conditional both on the circumstances and on the particular organism .
For example , ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for humans , but  नहीं  for most other animals  ,   और  biotin and  विटामिन  D are required in the human diet  तभी  in certain  हालातों  .
By convention , the term vitamin includes neither  अन्य   अनिवार्य  nutrients  ,  such as dietary minerals , essential fatty acids ,  or  essential amino acids ( which are needed  in  larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the large number of  अन्य  nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required  कम  often .
तेरह  vitamins  हैं  universally recognized at  उपस्थित  .
Vitamins are classified  by  their biological and chemical activity ,  नहीं  their structure .
Thus , each `` vitamin '' refers to a number of  vitamer  compounds that all show the biological  कार्यकलाप  associated  साथ  a particular vitamin .
Such a set of chemicals is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` generic descriptor '' title  ,  such as `` vitamin A  ``   ,  which  शामिल  the compounds retinal , retinol , and four  ज्ञात  carotenoids .
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active form of  the  vitamin in the body , and are sometimes inter-convertible to one another , as well .
विटामिन  have diverse biochemical functions .
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of mineral metabolism  (   ऐसे  as vitamin D ) , or regulators of cell  और  tissue growth and  differentiation  ( such as some forms of vitamin  a  ) .
Others function as antioxidants  (  e.g. , vitamin E  और  sometimes vitamin C ) .
The largest number of  विटामिन   (  such as B complex vitamins ) function as precursors for enzyme cofactors , that help enzymes in their work as catalysts  in   चयापचय  .
in  this role , vitamins may be tightly bound to enzymes as part of prosthetic groups  :  For example , biotin is part of enzymes  शामिल  in making fatty  acids  .
Vitamins may also be  कम  tightly bound  to  enzyme catalysts as coenzymes , detachable molecules  कि  function to carry chemical groups or electrons between molecules .
For example , folic acid may carry methyl , formyl  ,  and methylene groups in the cell .
Although these roles  in  assisting enzyme-substrate reactions  हैं  vitamins ' best-known function  ,  the other vitamin functions are equally important  .
Until the  mid-1930s  , when  the   पहला  commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex  और  semi-synthetic vitamin  c  supplement tablets  यहूद  sold , vitamins were obtained solely through food  सेवन  , and changes in diet ( which , for example , could occur during a particular growing  ऋतु  ) usually greatly altered the types and  amounts  of vitamins ingested .
However , vitamins have been produced  as  commodity chemicals and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and food supplements and additives , since the middle  of  the 20th century .
World Muslim population by percentage ( Pew Research Center ,  2009  )
World Muslim population in millions
Islam  is  the world  's  second largest religion  बाद  Christianity  .
According to a 2010 study ,  islam  has 1.62 billion adherents ,  बनाना  up over  23   %  of the world population .
Islam  is  the predominant religion in the Middle East  ,  in Sahel , in the Horn of  अफ़्रीकी  and northern Africa , and in some parts of  एशिया   .
Large communities of  मुसलमान  are also found in China , the Balkans ,  और  Russia .
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe , for instance ,  islam  is  the  second largest religion after Christianity , where it  represents  6 % of the total population .
According to the Pew Research Center in 2010 there were 49 Muslim-majority countries .
Around  62  % of the world  's  Muslims live in South and Southeast Asia ,  साथ  over 1 billion adherents  .
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia , home to 12.7 % of the world 's Muslims , followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ) , India ( 10.9 % ) , and Bangladesh ( 9.2  %  )  .
About 20 % of Muslims live in Arab countries .
In the Middle East  ,  the non-Arab countries of Turkey and Iran are the largest Muslim-majority  देशों  ; in Africa , Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities .
A study conducted by the Pew Research Center in 2010 and released January 2011 found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world .
The study found more Muslims in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom than  in   लेबनान  and more in China than in Syria .
Rhode  द्वीप  (  or  ) , officially the  राज्य  of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations , is a  राज्य   in  the New England region of the United States .
Rhode Island is the smallest in area , the  आठवीं  least populous , but the second most densely populated of the 50  us  states behind New Jersey  .
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the west and  मैसाचुसेट्स   to  the north and east , and it shares a water  boundary  with New York 's Long Island  to  the southwest .
Rhode Island was the first of the 13  असली  colonies  to  declare  स्वतंत्रता  from British rule  ,  declaring itself independent on  may   4  , 1776 , two months before any other colony .
The State was also the last of the thirteen original colonies to ratify the United States Constitution .
rhode  Island  's  official  उपनाम  is `` The Ocean  राज्य  '' , a  सन्दर्भ  to the State 's  भूगोल  , since Rhode Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to about 14 % of its total area .
Its land area is  ,  but its  कुल  area is significantly larger .
Dubai ( ;  '  , ) is a city in the United Arab Emirates , located within the emirate of the same  नाम  .
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of  the  Persian Gulf on the Arabian Peninsula and is one of  the  seven  अमीरात  that make up the country .
It has the largest population  in   the  UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land territory by area  (  4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi .
Dubai and Abu Dhabi , the national capital , are the only two emirates  to  have veto power over critical matters  of  national importance in the country 's legislature .
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's northern coastline  और  heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a country or city-state and , in some cases , the UAE as a  पूरे   रै  been described  as   'dubai  ' .
the  earliest  जिक्र  of Dubai is in 1095 AD , and the earliest recorded settlement in  the  region dates from 1799 .
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally  स्थापित  in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum bin Butti Al-Maktoum when he  persuaded  around 800 members of his tribe of the Bani  yas  , living in what was then the Second Saudi State and now part of Saudi Arabia , to follow  उसे  to the Dubai Creek by  the  Abu  falasa  clan of the Bani Yas  .
It remained under the tribe 's  कंट्रोल  when the United Kingdom assumed protection of the Sheikhdom in 1892 and  joined  the nascent United Arab Emirates upon independence in 1971 as the country 's second emirate  .
Its strategic geographic  स्थान  made  the  town an important trading hub and by the beginning of the  20th  century , Dubai  थी  already an important regional  बंदरगाहों  .
Today , Dubai has emerged  as  a cosmopolitan  metropolis  that has grown steadily to become a  वैश्विक  city and a business and cultural hub  of   the  Middle East and the Persian Gulf region  .
Although Dubai 's economy was historically built on the  आयल  industry , the emirate 's  western-style   मॉडल   of  business drives its  अर्थव्यवस्था  with the main revenues now coming from tourism ,  रियल  estate , and financial services .
Dubai has recently attracted world attention through many innovative large construction projects and sports events .
The  नगर  has become symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings , such as the world 's tallest Burj Khalifa , in addition to ambitious development  प्रोजेक्ट  including man-made islands , hotels , and some of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world .
This increased attention has also highlighted labor and human rights  मुद्दे   concerning   the  city 's largely South Asian paid workforce  .
Dubai 's property market experienced a major deterioration in  2008–2009  as a result of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008 .
However  ,  Dubai  रै  made a steady and gradual recovery with  सहायता  coming from neighboring  अमीरात  .
The handful of new projects that are in the pipeline have been able to  सहायता  Dubai  रियल  estate make a comeback  .
As of 2012 , Dubai is the 22nd  सबसे  expensive city in the world , and the most expensive city in the Middle East , surpassing Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ) .
दुबई  has also been rated as one of the best places  to  live in the Middle  ईस्ट  , including by US American global consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011 .

Surface of the Atlantic ocean meeting the Earth 's planetary boundary layer  और  troposphere  .
Waves on an ocean coast .
इस  animation uses Earth science data  इससे  a variety of  सेंसर  on NASA Earth  observing  satellites to measure physical  oceanography  parameters such as  समंदर  currents , ocean winds ,  समुद्र  surface height and sea surface  तापमान  .
An ocean ( ; the World Ocean of  शास्त्रीय  antiquity ) is a body of saline water  कि  composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere .
In the context of Earth , it refers to one or all of the major divisions of  the  planet 's  संसार  Ocean – they are , in descending order of area , the Pacific , Atlantic , Indian ,  दक्षिणी  ( Antarctic ) ,  और  Arctic Oceans .
The word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably with `` ocean ''  ,  but strictly speaking a sea is a body of saline water ( possibly a division of the  संसार  Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land  .
Earth is the only planet known to have an ocean ( or any large amounts of  खोलें  liquid water  )  .
Approximately 72 % of the planet 's  सतह  ( ~3.6x108 km2  )  is covered  by  saline water that is customarily divided into several principal oceans and smaller seas , with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface .
In terms of the hydrosphere of the Earth , the  समंदर  contains 97 % of the  धरती  's water .
Oceanographers have stated that out of 97 % ,  तभी   5  % of the ocean as  a  whole on Earth has  महरूम  explored .
Because it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere  ,  the world  समंदर  is integral to all known life , forms part of the carbon  साईकिल  , and influences climate and weather patterns .
The total volume  is  approximately 1.3 billion cubic kilometres ( 310 million cu mi )  साथ  an average depth of .
it  is  the  habitat of 230,000 known species , although much  of  the ocean 's depths remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two million marine species exist .
The origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown , but oceans are  believed  to have formed  in  the Hadean  काल  and  may  have been the impetus for the emergence of life .
Extraterrestrial oceans may be  रचित  of a  चौड़ी  range of elements and compounds  .
the  only confirmed  विशाल  stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of Titan , although there is evidence for the  अस्तित्व  of  महासागर   elsewhere  in the  सौर  System .
जल्दी   in  their geologic histories , Mars and Venus are theorized to have had large water  महासागर  .
the  Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly a third of the surface of Mars was once covered  by  water , though the water on Mars is no longer  oceanic  , and  a  runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus .
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved  in  water lower its freezing point , so that water might exist in large quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice .
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath the surface of many dwarf planets and natural satellites ; notably , the ocean  of  Europa is believed  to  have over twice  the  water volume of Earth .
The  सौर  System 's gas giant  ग्रह  are also believed to possess liquid atmospheric layers of yet to  be  confirmed  रचनाएं  .
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons , including surface oceans of liquid water  भीतर   a  circumstellar habitable zone .
Ocean planets are a hypothetical type of planet with a surface completely covered with liquid .
Elvis Aaron Presley ( January 8 , 1935 – August 16 , 1977 ) was an  अमरीकी  singer and actor .
A cultural icon , he  is  commonly  ज्ञात  by the single name Elvis .
एक   of   the  most popular musicians of the 20th century  ,  he is often referred to as the `` King of Rock  और  Roll '' or  ``  the King '' .
Born in Tupelo , Mississippi , Presley moved to Memphis  ,  Tennessee , with his family at  the  age of 13 .
He began his career there in 1954 , working with Sun Records owner Sam Phillips ,  जो  wanted to bring the sound of African-American music to a wider audience .
Accompanied by  guitarist  Scotty Moore  और  bassist Bill  ब्लैक  , Presley was  the  most important popularizer of  rockabilly  , an uptempo , backbeat -driven fusion of  देश  and rhythm and blues .
RCA Victor acquired his contract in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom Parker , who went on to manage the singer for over two decades .
Presley  's  first RCA single  ,  `` Heartbreak Hotel  ``  , released in January 1956 , was a number-one hit .
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of rock and  फेंकें  with  a  series of network television appearances and chart-topping records .
His energized interpretations of songs ,  अनेक  from African-American sources , and  उसके  uninhibited  प्रदर्शन  style made him enormously popular—and controversial .
In November 1956 , he made  उसके   फिल्मी  debut in Love Me Tender .
Drafted into military service in  1958  , Presley relaunched his recording career two years later with some of his most commercially  कामयाब  work .
He staged few concerts  however  , and guided by Parker , proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making Hollywood movies and soundtrack albums , most  of  them critically derided  .
In  1968  , after seven years away from the stage  ,  he returned  to  live performance in a celebrated comeback television special  कि  led to an extended Las Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours .
In 1973 Presley staged the first concert broadcast globally  via  satellite , Aloha from  हवाई  .
Prescription drug abuse severely  deteriorated  his health , and he died suddenly in 1977 at the age of 42 .
Presley is regarded as one of the most important figures of 20th-century popular culture .
He had  a  versatile voice  और  unusually wide  कामयाबी  encompassing many genres , including country , pop  ballads  , gospel , and blues .
He is  the  best-selling solo artist in the history of popular  म्यूज़िक  .
Nominated for 14 competitive  grammys  , he won three , and received the Grammy  आजीवन  Achievement Award at age 36 .
He  रै  been  inducted  into multiple music halls of fame .
A glass of root beer with foam
Root beer is a carbonated , sweetened beverage , originally made using the root of a sassafras plant ( or the bark of a sassafras tree ) as the primary flavor .
Root beer , popularized in North America , comes in two forms : alcoholic and  नरम   पेय  .
The historical root beer was analogous to small beer in that the process provided  a  drink with a very low alcohol content .
हालांकि   जड़ें  are used as the source of many soft drinks throughout the world , often different  names  are used .
fluorescent  minerals emit visible light when exposed to  पराबैंगनी   लाइट
Fluorescence is  the  emission of light by a substance that has absorbed light or other electromagnetic radiation .
It is  a  form of luminescence .
In most  मामले  , the emitted light has a longer wavelength , and therefore lower  उर्जा   ,  than  the  absorbed radiation .
However , when  the  absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense , it  is  possible for one electron to absorb two photons ; this two-photon absorption can lead to emission of radiation having  a  shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation .
The emitted radiation may also be of the same wavelength  as  the  अवशोषित  radiation , termed `` resonance fluorescence '' .
The most  striking  examples of fluorescence  occur  when the absorbed  विकिरण  is in the ultraviolet region of the spectrum , and thus invisible to the human eye , and the emitted light is in the visible region  .
Fluorescence has many practical applications , including mineralogy , gemology , chemical sensors (  प्रतिदीप्ति  spectroscopy ) , fluorescent labelling , dyes , biological  डिटेक्टरों  , and , most commonly , fluorescent lamps .
Informal logic , intuitively , refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside of a formal setting .
however   ,  perhaps because of the  अनौपचारिक  in the title  ,   the  precise definition of informal logic is a matter of some dispute .
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define informal logic as  ``  a branch of logic whose task is  to   develop  non-formal standards  ,  criteria , procedures for the analysis , interpretation ,  मूल्यांकन  , criticism and construction of argumentation . ''
This  परिभाषा  reflects what had been implicit in their practice and what others were doing in their  अनौपचारिक  logic  ग्रन्थ  .
Informal logic is associated with ( informal  )  fallacies , critical thinking ,  the  Thinking Skills Movement and the interdisciplinary inquiry known  as  argumentation theory .
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the label ``  अनौपचारिक   लॉजिक  '' covers a `` collection of normative approaches to the study  of  reasoning in ordinary language  कि   remain  closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic .  ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60 , with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted  .
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960 , with the years of  the  Great Depression  (  1929–1939 ) highlighted .
the  Great Depression began in August of 1929  ,  when the United  राज्य  economy  पहला  went into an economic recession .
हालांकि  the country spent two months with declining GDP , it was not until the Wall Street Crash  of  October , 1929 that the effects of a  घटती  economy were felt , and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued .
The market crash marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment , poverty , low profits , deflation , plunging farm incomes , and lost opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement .
Although its causes are still uncertain and  विवादास्पद  , the net effect was a sudden and general loss of confidence in  the  economic future .
The usual explanations include numerous factors  ,  especially high consumer debt , ill-regulated markets that permitted overoptimistic loans by banks and investors , and the lack of high-growth new industries , all interacting to create a downward economic spiral of reduced spending , falling confidence , and lowered production .
Industries that  suffered  the most included construction , agriculture as dust-bowl conditions persisted in the  agricultural  heartland , shipping  ,  mining , and logging as well as durable goods like automobiles and appliances that  could  be postponed  .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था  reached bottom in the winter of 1932–33  ;  then came four years  of  very rapid growth until 1937 , when the Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment .
The Depression caused major political changes in America .
Three years into the depression , Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 presidential  चुनाव  to Franklin Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide .
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan  ,  the New Deal , instituted unprecedented programs for relief , recovery and reform , and brought about  a  major realignment of American politics .
The Depression also resulted in an increase of emigration of people to other countries for the  पहला  time in American history .
लिये  example ,  कुछ  immigrants went back  to   उनके  native countries , and some native US citizens went to Canada , Australia , and South Africa  .
It also resulted in the mass migration  of  people from badly hit areas in the Great Plains and  the  South to places such as California and the North , respectively ( see  okies  and the Great Migration of African Americans ) .
Racial tensions also increased  दौरान   इस  time .
By the 1940s  आव्रजन  had returned back  to  normal , and emigration declined  .
A well-known example of an emigrant was Frank McCourt , who went to Ireland , as recounted  in  his book Angela 's Ashes .
the  memory of the Depression also shaped modern theories of economics and resulted in many changes  in  how  the  government dealt with  आर्थिक  downturns , such  as   the  use  of  stimulus packages , Keynesian economics , and  सोशल  Security .
It also  तराशा  modern American literature , resulting in famous novels such as John Steinbeck 's ``  the  Grapes of Wrath `` and `` Of Mice and Men `` .
The Great Depression of the 1930s started with the stock market crash of October 1929 .
Turkey ( ) , officially the Republic of Turkey , is a transcontinental country , located mostly on Anatolia in Western Asia  और  on East Thrace in Southeastern Europe .
Turkey is  bordered  by  आठ  countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; Greece to the west  ;  Georgia to the northeast ; Armenia  ,  Iran and the  अज़रबैजानी  exclave of  nakhchivan  to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast .
the  Mediterranean Sea is to the south  ;  the  ईजियन   समुद्र  is  to  the  वेस्ट  ; and the Black Sea is to the  उत्तर  .
The  समुद्र  of Marmara , the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( which together form the Turkish Straits  )  demarcate the boundary  between   thrace  and Anatolia ;  वे  also  पृथक  Europe  और  Asia .
Turkey 's location at  the  crossroads of Europe and Asia makes it a country  of  significant geostrategic importance .
The country 's official language is Turkish ,  a  Turkic language , which is spoken  by  approximately  85  % of the population as mother tongue .
The most numerous ethnic  समूह   is  the Turks , who constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the population according to The World Factbook .
kurds  are the largest ethnic minority and , according to the same source , number around 18 % of the population  जबकि   अन्य  ethnic minorities are  अनुमानित  to be at 7–12 % .
The vast majority of the population is Muslim  .
The area now called  तुर्कों  has been inhabited since the Paleolithic , including various Ancient Anatolian civilizations and Thracian peoples .
बाद  Alexander the Great 's conquest , the area was Hellenized , which continued with the  रोमन  rule and the transition into the  बीज़ान्टिन  Empire .
The Seljuk Turks  began  migrating into the area in the  11th  century , starting the process of Turkification ,  जिससे   थी  greatly accelerated by the Seljuk  विजय  over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert  in  1071  .
The Seljuk  सल्तनत   of  Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion in 1243 , upon which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks .
Starting from the late 13th century , the Ottoman beylik united Anatolia and created an empire  encompassing  much of Southeastern Europe  ,  Western Asia  और  North Africa .
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following its defeat in World War I , parts of  it  were occupied by the victorious Allies .
A cadre of young military officers , led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and  उसके  colleagues , organized a successful  प्रतिरोध  to the Allies ; in 1923 they established the modern  गणतंत्र  of Turkey , with Atatürk as  इसके  first president .
तुर्कों  is a democratic  ,  secular , unitary ,  संवैधानिक   गणतंत्र  with a diverse  सांस्कृतिक  heritage .
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West  through  membership in organisations such as the Council of Europe , NATO , OECD , OSCE and the G-20 major economies .
Turkey began full  सदस्यता  negotiations with the  यूरोपीय  Union in  2005  , having  महरूम  an associate member of the European Economic Community since 1963 and having joined  the  EU Customs Union in 1995 .
Turkey has also fostered close cultural , political and economic relations with the Middle East , Caucasus , the Turkic  राज्य  of Central Asia and the African countries through membership in organisations such as the Turkic Council , Joint Administration  of  Turkic Arts and Culture , Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and  the  Economic Cooperation Organisation .
Turkey  's   growing   अर्थव्यवस्था   और  diplomatic  पहलों  have led to its recognition as  a  regional power .
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest economy by nominal GDP and the  16th  largest by purchasing power parity .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( , ( born November 13 , 1955  )  is an American  comedienne  , actress , singer-songwriter , political  activist  ,  लेखक  and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film  डेब्यू  in The Color Purple ( 1985 ) , playing Celie , a mistreated black woman in the Deep South .
She received  a  nomination for the Academy Award for  बेहतरीन  Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film .
In 1990 , she played Oda Mae Brown  ,  a wacky psychic helping a slain man  (   पैट्रिक  Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
इस  performance won her  a  second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting  अभिनेत्री  ; this made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history  of  the Academy  पुरस्कार  to win an acting  oscar—the  first being  हैटी  McDaniel who won for Gone  साथ  the Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 , The Player ,  बना  in America , How Stella Got Her Groove  वापस  , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for  उसके  roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation , as Terry  doolittle   in  Jumpin ' Jack Flash  ,  and as Carmen Tibideaux  in  Glee , as well as  the  voice of  shenzi  the hyena in The Lion King .
Goldberg has been nominated for  13  Emmy Awards for her work in television  .
She  थी  co-producer of the  लोकप्रिय  game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004 .
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk show  the   दृश्य  since 2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy ,  दो  Daytime Emmys , two Golden Globes , a Tony ( for production ,  नहीं  acting ) , and an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg has  a  British Academy Film Award , four  लोगों  's Choice Awards , and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame  .
She is one of the few entertainers who have won an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar , and Tony Award .
Augusta  is  a consolidated city in  the  U.S. state of Georgia  ,  located  at  the  पतन  line of the Savannah River , at the head of its navigable portion .
As of the 2010 census , the  augusta–  Richmond County population was 195,844 not  गिनती  the  unconsolidated  cities of Hephzibah and Blythe .
Augusta is the  प्रिंसिपल  city  of   the  Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical Area , which  as  of 2010 had an  अनुमानित  population of 556,877 , making it both the second-largest city and the second-largest  मैट्रो  area in the state after Atlanta .
It is the 116th-largest  नगर  in the United States .
Internationally , Augusta is best known for hosting The Masters Tournament  in  golf each spring .
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed compact disc which contains data .
The  नाम  is an acronym which stands for `` Compact Disc Read-only  मेमोरी  ``  .
Computers can read  cd-roms  , but can not write on them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software , including video  खेल  and  मल्टीमीडिया  applications , though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced  cds  , hold both computer data and audio  साथ  the  latter  capable of being played on a CD player , while data ( such as software or  डिजिटल  video ) is only  usable  on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
the  Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the  स्वरूप  of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for all CD formats , the Yellow Book , created by Sony and  फिलिप्स  , was the first extension of Compact  डिस्क  Digital Audio .
It adapted the format to hold any form of data .
the  Chicago Blackhawks  (  spelled as Black  चीलों  before 1986 ,  और  known colloquially as the Hawks ) are a professional ice hockey team based  in   शिकागो  , Illinois .
They are members of  the  Central Division of the Western Conference of  the  National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
They  have  won four  स्टेनली  Cup championships since their founding in 1926 , most recently in  2009–10  .
The Blackhawks are one of the Original Six NHL teams , along with the Detroit Red Wings , Montreal Canadiens , Toronto Maple Leafs , Boston Bruins and New  यॉर्क  Rangers .
Since the Blackhawks have played their home games at the United Center after having spent 65 years playing  at  Chicago Stadium .

the   बैंगनी  color is often associated with penance and detachment .
Similar Christian penitential practice is seen in other Catholic  देशों  , sometimes associated with  mortification  of the flesh .

lent  ( Latin :  quadragesima  ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of  अनेक   ईसाई  denominations ,  स्थायी  for a period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday .
In  the  general Latin-rite and most Western denominations Lent  is   लिया  to run  इससे  Ash Wednesday to  maundy  Thursday ( Holy Thursday ) morning or to Easter Eve .
In  the  Catholic  गिरिजाघर  , Lent lasts until Holy Thursday , while other denominations run until Easter Eve .
The traditional purpose of Lent is the preparation of the believer through prayer , penance , repentance , almsgiving , and self-denial  .
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of  पावन  Week , marking the death , burial and  क़यामत  of Jesus , which recalls the events of the  बाइबल  when Jesus is crucified on Good Friday  ,  which then culminates in the celebration on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ .
During Lent , many of the faithful commit to fasting or giving up certain types of luxuries as a form  of  penitence .
The  स्टेशन   of  the Cross , a devotional  commemoration  of Christ 's carrying the Cross and of his execution , are  प्रायः  observed .
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches remove flowers from their  altars  ,  जबकि  crucifixes , religious statues , and other elaborate religious symbols  हैं  often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event .
In certain pious Catholic  देशों  ,  कुछ  adherents mark the season with the traditional abstention from the consumption of meat  .
In some countries ,  ग्रैंड  religious processions and cultural customs are observed , and the faithful attempt to visit seven churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary .
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for forty days , in commemoration of the forty days  जिससे  , according to the Gospels of Matthew , Mark and Luke , Jesus spent fasting in the desert before the beginning of his public ministry , where he endured temptation by the Devil  .
However , different Christian denominations calculate the forty days  of  Lent  differently  .
In most  पश्चिमी  traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of Lent ; thus the period from Ash Wednesday until Easter  consists  of 40 days when the Sundays are excluded .
However in the Roman Catholic Church Lent is now taken to end on Holy Thursday rather  than  Easter Eve , and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays , or 44 days in total .
This event , along with its pious customs are observed by Catholics , Lutherans , Methodists , Presbyterians , and Anglicans .
Location of Chernobyl nuclear  शक्ति  plant
The abandoned city of Pripyat with Chernobyl plant  in  the distance
Abandoned housing blocks in Pripyat
The  chernobyl  disaster ( , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that  occurred  on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine (  तब  officially the Ukrainian SSR ) , which was  अंतर्गत  the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union  .
An explosion and fire released  विशाल  quantities of radioactive particles into the atmosphere , which spread over much of the  पश्चिमी  USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst  नाभिकीय  power plant accident in history , and is one of only two classified as a level 7 event on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain  the  contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over  500,000  workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles  .
the  official Soviet  casualty  count  of   31   मौतों  has been disputed , and long-term effects such as cancers  और  deformities are still being accounted for .
In grammar , a  विषय  complement is a predicative expression that  फ़ॉलो  a linking verb ( copula ) and that  complements  ( completes ) the subject of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it .
In the former case , a renaming noun phrase  ऐसे  as a noun or pronoun  is  called a predicative nominal .
An adjective following the copula and  describing  the subject is called a predicative adjective .
In either case the predicative complement in effect mirrors the subject .
Subject complements are used with a small class of verbs called linking verbs or copula , of which be  is  the most common  .
Since copula  हैं  stative verbs , subject complements are  नहीं  affected by any action of the verb .
Subject complements  हैं  typically not clause arguments , nor  हैं  they clause adjuncts .
Throughout the fifty-five year history  of  the Grammy Awards , many significant records  have   महरूम   नियत  .
This  पेज  only  शामिल  the competitive awards won by various artists .
This does not include the various special awards  कि  are presented by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement Awards , Trustees Awards , Technical  पुरस्कार  or Legend  पुरस्कार  .
The page however does include other non-performance related Grammys ( known as the  शिल्प  & Production Fields ) that may have  महरूम  presented to the artist ( s ) .
Marshall Bruce  mathers  III ( born October 17 , 1972 ) , better known by his stage name  एमिनेम  ( stylized as EMINƎM ) and by his alter ego Slim Shady , is an American rapper , record producer ,  songwriter  and actor .
Eminem , along with his solo career , is a member of his group D12 , and also  एक  half of the hip hop duo Bad Meets Evil , with Royce da 5'9 '' .
Eminem is one of  the  best-selling artists in the world and is the best-selling artist of the 2000s .
He has been listed and ranked  as  one of the  महानतम  artists of all time by many magazines  ,  including Rolling  स्टोन  magazine which ranked him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
The same magazine declared  उसे  The King of Hip Hop .
Including his work  साथ  D12 and Bad Meets Evil , Eminem has achieved ten  number-one  albums on the Billboard 200 .
He has sold more than  100  million records worldwide , including 42 million tracks and 49.1 million  एल्बम  in  the  United States .
As an underground rapper  एमिनेम  released  उसके  debut solo album , Infinite in 1996 .
The album was a critical and commercial failure .
He gained mainstream popularity in 1999 after  the  release  of  his major-label debut album The  पतला  Shady  lp  .
The LP also earned Eminem his first Grammy Award for Best Rap Album .
His next two records The Marshall Mathers LP , and The Eminem Show , also won Best  रैप  Album Grammy Awards , making  एमिनेम  the first artist to win Best  रैप  Album for three consecutive LPs .
This was followed by another studio release in 2004 titled Encore .
Eminem then went on hiatus after touring in 2005  .
He released  उसके  first album in five years titled  पतन   ,  on May 15 , 2009 .
In 2010 , Eminem released his seventh studio  एल्बम  Recovery .
Recovery  थी  an international success and was named the best selling album of 2010 worldwide ,  joining  The Eminem Show , which was the best seller of 2002 .
Eminem won Grammy Awards for both Relapse and Recovery , giving him a total of 13 Grammys in  उसके  career .
Eminem has opened other ventures , including his own record label Shady Records with his manager Paul Rosenberg .
He also has his own radio channel  ,  Shade 45  on   sirius  XM Radio .
Eminem began  an  acting career in 2002 , when he starred in the hip hop drama  फिल्मी  8 Mile .
He won the Academy  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Original Song , becoming the first  रैप  artist  कभी  to win the award .
He has also made cameo appearances in  the  Wash ( 2001 ) , Funny  लोगों  ( 2009 ) and the television series Entourage .
The acre is a  ईकाई  of area used in the imperial and U.S. customary systems .
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller than an American football field .
The acre  is  no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United States , Australia , Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010 , the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom , though is still used in real  एस्टेट  descriptions ) .
It is still used , to some extent , in  कनाडा  .
the  international symbol  of  the acre is ac , and is defined as 1/640 of a square mile .
The most commonly used acre today is the international acre .
In the United States both the international  एकड़   और  the slightly different US survey acre are in use  .
The most common use  of  the acre is to measure tracts  of  land .
एक  international acre is defined as 4046.8564224  वर्गाकार  metres .
During the Middle Ages , an acre was the amount of  जमीन  that could be  plowed  in one day with a yoke of oxen .
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of Mass led to many new  निष्कर्षों  in the 19th century .
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions and John Dalton 's atomic  सिद्धान्त  branched from the discoveries of  एंटोनी  Lavoisier .
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments revealed that combustion involved oxygen rather than what was previously thought to be phlogiston  .
The law  of   संरक्षण  of mass , or principle of mass conservation ,  राज्य  that for any system closed to all transfers of matter and energy  (  both of which have mass ) , the mass of  the  system must  remain  constant over time , as system mass can not change quantity if it is not added or removed .
Hence , the quantity of mass  is  `` conserved '' over time .
The law implies that mass can neither be created  nor  destroyed ,  हालांकि  it may be rearranged in space , or the entities associated with  it  may be changed in form , as for example when light or physical work  is   रूपांतरित  into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed .
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical reaction  ,  nuclear reaction , or radioactive  क्षय  in an isolated system ,  the  mass of the  reactants  or starting material must equal the  द्रव्यमान   of  the products .
The concept of mass conservation is widely used in many fields such as  रसायन  , mechanics , and fluid dynamics .
Historically  ,  mass conservation was discovered in chemical reactions by Antoine Lavoisier in the  लेट  18th  सदी  , and was of crucial importance  in   the  progress from  alchemy  to the modern  प्राकृतिक  science of chemistry .
The closely related concept of matter conservation was  मिला  to hold  शुभ  in chemistry to such high approximation that it failed only for  the  high energies treated  by  the later refinements of relativity theory , but otherwise remains useful and sufficiently accurate for most chemical calculations , even in modern practice .
In special relativity , needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between  प्रणालियों   is  involved , the difference  between  thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes  महत्वपूर्ण  , since conservation of mass is strictly and perfectly upheld only for so-called isolated systems , i.e . those completely  पृथक  from all exchanges with  the  environment .
In this circumstance , the mass-energy equivalence theorem states that mass conservation is equivalent to total energy conservation ,  जिससे  is the first law of thermodynamics  .
By contrast , for a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e. ,  एक  which is closed to exchanges of matter , but open to exchanges of non-material  उर्जा  , such as heat and work , with the surroundings  )  mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved .
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory , although the change is usually small , since relatively large amounts of such  उर्जा  ( by comparison with ordinary  अनुभव  ) carry only a small amount  of   द्रव्यमान  ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ) .
In special relativity , mass is not converted to energy , since energy in all  of  its forms always retains its equivalent amount of mass throughout any transformation or translocation  into   ,  or out of , a system .
However  ,  certain types of matter ( a different concept ) may be converted  to  energy  ,  so long as  the  mass of the system is unchanged in  the  process .
However , if such energy is removed from systems , they must lose the mass that is associated with it .
In general relativity , mass ( and energy ) conservation in expanding volumes  of   स्पेस  is a complex concept , subject to different definitions  ,  and neither mass nor  उर्जा  is as strictly and simply conserved as is the  मामला  in special relativity and in Minkowski space .
For a discussion ,  देखिए   द्रव्यमान   in  general  आपेक्षिकता   .
A pig is any of the  पशु  in the genus Sus , within the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates .
Pigs  शामिल  the domestic pig , its ancestor the wild boar  ,  and several other wild  रिश्तेदारों  .
Young and small pigs  हैं  known  as  piglets .
Pigs are omnivores and are highly social and  बुद्धिमान  animals .
8-inch ,  -inch  , and -inch  फ्लॉपी  disks
8-inch , -inch ( full height ) , and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch diskette  's  `` floppy '' magnetic material , removed from its housing
A floppy disk , or diskette , is  a  disk  भंडार  medium composed of  a  disk of thin and flexible magnetic storage medium , sealed  in  a rectangular plastic carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles .
They are read and written by a floppy disk drive ( FDD ) .
फ्लॉपी  disks , initially as media  और  later in and  3.5-inch  ( 90  mm  ) sizes , were a ubiquitous form of data storage and exchange from the mid-1970s well into  the  first decade of the 21st century .
by  2010 ,  कंप्यूटर  motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy  ड्राइव  support ; `` floppies could be used as an  बाह्य  USB drive , but `` , 8 `` , and non-standard drives could only be handled by old  उपकरण   .
While floppy disk drives still have  कुछ  limited uses ,  विशेषकर  with legacy industrial computer equipment  ,  they have been superseded by data storage methods with  much   वृहद  capacity , such as USB flash drives , portable  बाह्य  hard disk drives , optical discs  ,  memory cards , and computer networks .
An animated diagram of a cutter
In baseball , a cutter , or cut fastball , is a type of fastball which breaks slightly toward the pitcher 's glove side as it reaches home plate .
This pitch is somewhere between a slider and a fastball , as it is usually thrown faster than a slider  लकिन  with more motion than a typical fastball .
Some pitchers  उपयोग   a  cutter as  a  way to prevent hitters from expecting their regular fastballs .
A common technique  प्रयुक्त  to throw a cutter is  to  use a four-seam  fastball   पकड़  with the baseball set slightly  बंद  center in the hand .
When a batter is able to  hit  a cutter pitch , it often results in soft contact  और  an easy out , due to the  पिच  's movement keeping the ball  दूर  from the bat 's sweet spot .
The cutter is typically 2–5 mph slower than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball .
In 2010 , the average pitch  वर्गीकृत  as  a   कटर  by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher was 88.6 mph ; the average four-seamer was 92.1 mph .
`` What It Takes '' is a power ballad by American hard rock band Aerosmith .
It was written by Steven Tyler , Joe Perry , and  डेसमंड  Child .
It was released  in  1990 as the third  सिंगल  from Aerosmith 's critically and commercially successful 1989 album Pump .
In the video  the  Making of Pump , A & R man John Kalodner described the song as `` a masterpiece  ''  .
दौरान  live performances , Tyler  गाती  the first verse a cappella and belts out one of his  हस्ताक्षर  screams right before the chorus .
The album  संस्करण  of  the  song is followed by an untitled hidden track .

Odysseus ( or ; Greek : , )  ,  also  ज्ञात  by the Roman name Ulysses ( ; ) , was  a  legendary  यूनानी  king of Ithaca and  a  hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey .
Odysseus also plays a key role in Homer 's Iliad and other works in that same Epic  साईकिल  .
Husband  of  Penelope , father of Telemachus , and son of Laërtes ( or  sisyphus  ) and Anticlea , Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance , guile ,  और  versatility (  polytropos  ) , and is  hence  known by the epithet Odysseus the Cunning ( mētis , or `` cunning intelligence `` ) .
He is most famous for the ten  eventful   सालो  he took to return  घर  after the decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse  ploy  to capture the city of Troy .
Erie is a Statutory Town in Boulder and Weld counties in the U.S. state of Colorado .
the  population according to the 2010 census is 18,135 and was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 census .
The Town  of  Erie is located just west of I-25 for easy access to I-70 ,  डेनवर  International Airport and Colorado 's entire Front Range .
Erie  's  Planning Area spans 48 square miles , extending from the north side of  राज्य  Highway 52 south to State Highway 7 , and between US 287 on the west and  अंतरराज्यीय  25 to the east .
Erie is approximately 35 minutes from Denver International Airport , 25 minutes to Denver and 20 minutes from Boulder .
The  फलक  of  trustees  serves as the legislative and  शासी  body of the Town of Erie and is responsible for establishing Town policies and goals .
The Board has the authority  to  adopt laws , ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business of the Town , and by ordinance may enter  into  contracts or intergovernmental agreements to furnish , receive services  or  to provide for cooperative service delivery .
Appointed by and serving  at  the pleasure of the Board  of  Trustees , the Town Administrator  is  the chief operating  और  administrative officer of the Town and is responsible for  providing  professional leadership in the administration and execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board .
The  मिशन  of the Erie Police Department is to communicate and work with the community to maintain a safe environment , prevent crime and enforce the law , while protecting the  अधिकारों  of all .
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is owned and operated by  the  Town of Erie and is strategically located in the  denver-boulder  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  on Colorado Highway 7 , a little over three miles  वेस्ट   of  Interstate 25 .
The main runway is concrete paved  और  4,700 feet long .
The is a home video game  कंसोल  produced by Sony Computer Entertainment .
It is  the  successor to the PlayStation 2 ,  as  part of the PlayStation series .
The  प्लेस्टेशन  3 competes with Microsoft 's Xbox 360 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video  खेल  consoles .
It was first released on  नवम्बर  11 , 2006 , in  जापानी  , with international  बाज़ार  following shortly  thereafter  .
The console was first officially announced at E3 2005 .
Originally set for a spring  2006  release date , it was delayed  अनेक  times until finally  hitting  stores at the end of the year .
It  थी  the first and currently only console to use Blu-ray Disc as its primary storage medium .
Major features of  the  console include its unified online gaming service , the PlayStation Network , and its connectivity  साथ   the  PlayStation Portable and PlayStation Vita , In September 2009 the updated  प्लेस्टेशन  3  पतला  , was released .
इस  Slim is lighter and thinner than the original version , although it  lacks  PlayStation  2  backwards compatibility ( removed on later original models )  ,  but notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design .
as   of  November  4  , 2012 , 70 million PlayStation 3s have been sold worldwide .
Its successor , PlayStation 4  ,  is set for a Q4  2013  release .
Salvador Domingo  फेलिप  Jacinto Dalí i Domènech , 1st Marqués de Dalí de Pubol ( May 11 , 1904January 23 , 1989 ) , known as Salvador  dalí  ( )  ,  was a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in Figueres , Spain .
Dalí was a skilled draftsman , best known for the striking and bizarre images in his surrealist work .
His painterly skills are often attributed to the influence of Renaissance masters .
His best-known work ,  the   हठ  of Memory , was completed  in  1931 .
Dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included film  ,  sculpture , and photography , in collaboration with a range  of  artists in a variety of media .
Dalí attributed his  ``  love of everything  कि  is gilded and excessive , my passion for luxury and my love of oriental clothes  ''  to a self-styled `` Arab  lineage  ''  ,  claiming that his ancestors  यहूद  descended  इससे  the Moors .
Dalí was highly imaginative , and also enjoyed indulging  in  unusual and grandiose behavior .
उसके  eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions  sometimes  drew more attention than his  कलाकृति  , to the dismay  of  those who held his work in high esteem , and to the irritation  of  his critics .
