Sociology  is  the scientific study of human society  और  its origins , development , organizations , and institutions .
It is a social science which uses various methods of empirical investigation and critical analysis to  develop  a body of knowledge about human  सोशल  activity , structures , and functions .
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be applied  सीधे  to social policy and welfare , while others focus  primarily  on refining the theoretical understanding  of  social processes .
Subject matter ranges from  the  micro level of individual  एजेंसी  and interaction to the macro level of systems and the social structure .
The traditional focuses of  समाजशास्त्र  include social  स्तरीकरण  , social class , culture  ,  race and ethnicity  ,   लिंग   और   कामुकता  , social mobility ,  धर्म  , secularization , law , and deviance  .
as  all spheres of human activity are affected by  the  interplay  between  social structure and individual agency , sociology has  धीरे   विस्तारित  its  फ़ोकस  to further subjects  ,  such as health , medical , military  और  penal institutions , the Internet , environmental sociology ,  राजनैतिक  economy and the role of social activity in the development of  वैज्ञानिक   ज्ञान  .
The range  of  social scientific methods has also expanded .
सोशल  researchers draw upon a variety of qualitative and quantitative techniques .
The linguistic and cultural turns of the  mid-twentieth  century led to increasingly interpretative , hermeneutic , and philosophic approaches to the analysis of society .
Conversely , recent decades have seen the rise of new analytically , mathematically and computationally rigorous techniques , such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis  .
Sociology should  नहीं  be confused with various general social  अध्ययन   पाठ्यक्रम  which bear little relation to sociological theory or social science  शोध  methodology .
Thunder is the sound caused by lightning  .
depending  on the nature of the lightning and distance of the listener , thunder  can  range from a sharp  ,  loud crack to a  long  , low  rumble  ( brontide ) .
the   अचानक  increase in pressure and temperature from lightning  produces  rapid expansion of the air  surrounding  and within a bolt of lightning  .
in  turn  ,  this expansion of air creates a sonic  शॉक  wave , similar to a  सोनिक   बूम  , which produces the sound of  थंडर  , often referred to as a clap , crack , or peal of thunder .
the  distance of the lightning can  be  calculated by the listener based  on   the  time interval from when the  बिजली  is seen to when  the  sound is heard .
Palma ( , , ) , in full Palma de Mallorca  ,  is the major city and port on the island of Majorca  (  Mallorca ) and capital city of the  autonomous  community of the Balearic Islands in Spain .
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City  of  Majorca ) and Ciutat ( City ) were used before the War of the Spanish Succession and  हैं  still used by people in Majorca .
However , the official  नाम  was Mallorca , the same as the island .
It is situated on the south coast of the island on the Bay of Palma  .
As of the 2009 census ,  the   जनसांख्यिकी  of the city of Palma proper was 401,270 , and the population of the  संपूर्ण  urban area was 517,285  ,   रैंकिंग   as  the twelfth largest urban area  of  Spain .
Almost half of the total population of Majorca live in Palma .
The Cabrera Archipelago , though widely separated from Palma proper ,  is  administratively considered part of  the  municipality .
Its airport , Son Sant Joan , serves over 22 million passengers  प्रत्येक  year .
The  marivent  Palace was offered by the city to the then Prince  जुआन  Carlos I of Spain .
The royals have since spent their summer holidays in Palma .

Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a fictional character , a supervillain appearing  in  comic books published  by  DC Comics .
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman , and  as  a high-status supervillain , has also come into conflict with Batman and other superheroes in  the   dc  Universe  .
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster , the character first appeared in Action Comics # 23  (   अप्रैल  1940 ) .
Luthor is described as ``  a  power-mad , evil scientist '' of high intelligence and incredible  technological  prowess .
Luthor 's  लक्ष्य  typically center on killing Superman , the foremost obstacle to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal  लक्ष्य  .
Despite periodically wearing a  संचालित  exoskeleton , Luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual  पहचान   .
The character was originally depicted as a mad scientist who ,  in  the vein of pulp novels , wreaks havoc on the world with his futuristic weaponry .
In his earliest appearances , Luthor is shown with a full head of red hair  .
Despite this , the character later became hairless as the result of an artist 's mistake .
A  1960  story by Jerry  siegel  expanded upon  luthor  's origin and motivations , revealing him to be a childhood friend of Superman 's who lost  उसके  hair when a  आग  destroyed his  प्रयोगशाला  ; Luthor vowed revenge .
Following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths , the character  थी  re-imagined as a Machiavellian  उद्योगपति  and white-collar  दण्ड  , even briefly serving  as   अध्यक्ष  of the United States .
In recent years , various writers have revived Luthor  's  mad scientist persona from the 1940s .
The character was ranked as the 8th Greatest  विलेन   by  Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains of All Time list .
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic Book Villains of All Time ranked Luthor as # 4 .
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic book critic Peter Sanderson  ,  one of a few genre-crossing villains whose adventures  लो  place ``  in  a  संसार  in which the ordinary laws of nature are slightly suspended ''  ;  characters such as Professor Moriarty , Count Dracula , Hannibal Lecter , Doctor  यातना  , and Darth Vader ,  भी  fit this description .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday marking the birthday of  रेव  . Dr. Martin Luther King , Jr .
It is observed on  the  third Monday of January each year  ,   जिससे  is around the time of  किंग  's birthday , January 15 .
The floating holiday is similar to holidays set under  the  Uniform Monday Holiday Act , though  the  act  predated  the establishment of Martin Luther King , Jr. Day by 15 years  .
King was the chief  प्रवक्ता  for nonviolent activism in the civil rights movement , which successfully  protested  racial discrimination in federal and state law .
the  campaign for a federal holiday in King 's honor began soon after his assassination in 1968 .
रोनाल्ड  Reagan signed the holiday into  विधि  in 1983 , and  it   थी   पहला   observed  on January  20  , 1986 .
At first ,  कुछ  states resisted observing the holiday  as  such  ,  giving it alternative names  or  combining it with other  छुट्टियाँ  .
it  was officially observed in all 50 states for the first time in 2000 .
The camera phone solution allows instant sharing of pictures  .
As it 's automatic and instant , the  उपयोक्ता   करता   नहीं  have to use a cable or removable media to connect  to  a personal computer .
A  कैमरा  phone is a  मोबाईल  phone which is able to capture still photographs  (  and usually video ) .
चूंकि  early in the 21st century the majority of mobile phones in use are camera phones .
Most camera phones are simpler than separate digital cameras .
उनके  usual fixed focus lenses and  छोटी  sensors limit their performance in poor lighting .
lacking   a  physical shutter , most have a long shutter lag  .
Flash , where present , is usually weak .
Optical zoom and tripod screws are rare .
Some  भी  lack  a  USB connection , removable memory card , or other way of  transferring  their pictures more quickly than by the phone 's inherent communication feature .
कुछ  of the more  महंगी  camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages , which apply most  acutely  in low light conditions and in any case have not inhibited their widespread use .
Most model lines improve in these regards every year or two .
Some  ,  such as the Droid Incredible only have a menu choice to start an application program to activate the camera .
Others  ,   ऐसे  as the BlackBerry Storm 2 , Droid X , Motorola V980 and Nokia 5800 also  have  a separate camera button for quickness and convenience .
Windows Phones can be configured to operate as a camera  भी  if the phone is asleep .
Some camera phones are designed to resemble  पृथक  low-end digital compact cameras  in  appearance and  to  some extent in features and picture quality , and are branded as both mobile phones and cameras , including certain Sony phones .
The  प्रिंसिपल  advantages of  कैमरा  phones are cost and compactness ; indeed for a user who carries a mobile phone anyway , the additional size and cost are negligible .
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile applications to add  सामर्थ्य   ऐसे  as geotagging and image stitching .
A few high end phones can use their touch screen to direct their camera to  फ़ोकस  on a particular object in the field of view , giving even an inexperienced user a degree of focus control exceeded only  by  seasoned photographers using  हस्तचालित  focus .
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of Tomorrow ? '' is a 1986 comic book story featuring the DC Comics character of Superman .
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time , and soon to  be  retiring , Superman editor , Julius Schwartz , the story was  प्रकाशित  in two parts  ,  beginning in Superman  #  423 and ending in Action Comics # 583 , both published in September 1986 .
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan , in his final major contribution to the Superman titles , and was inked by George Pérez in the issue of Superman and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics .
The story was an imaginary tale which told the final  स्टोरी  of the Silver Age Superman and his long history , which was being rebooted following the events  of  Crisis on Infinite Earths  ,  before his modern introduction in the John Byrne  श्रेणी  ,  the   man  of Steel .
Moore wanted his plot  to  honor the long history of the character and to serve as a complete  निष्कर्ष  to his mythology .
The story is a  फ़्रेम  story set ten years after Superman was last seen , where Lois Lane recounts the tale of  the  end of Superman 's career to a reporter from the Daily Planet .
उसके  story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by his enemies , the public revelation of his  रहस्य  identity of Clark  केंट  and a number  of   मौतों  of those closest to him .
The  स्टोरी  has been cited as one of the best stories of  the  character of Superman  ,  and critics and  ऑडियंस   अक्सर  choose  it  as one of the most  यादगार   कॉमिक्स  ever published .
It is  प्रयुक्त  as an example of  कैसा  to close the long-time continuity of a comic book character .
The story  's  legacy has endured with similar  कहानियां  written as tributes to it .
the   शीर्षक  is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of Tomorrow  ,   और  was used in the title of another Superman .
the  Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a  mid-engined   ग्रैंड  touring car ,  designed  and developed  by  the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal production  car  in the world , with a  शीर्ष  speed of .
The original  संस्करण  has a  शीर्ष  speed of .
It was named Car of the Decade (  2000–2009  ) by the  बीबीसी  television programme Top Gear .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best Car Driven All Year award in 2005 .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti  नियत  the record for the fastest roadster in the world with the Veyron  ग्रैंड  Sport Vitesse , reaching on average a top speed of .
the  Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss , and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen  ,  with much of the engineering  कार्य   होने  conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A  क्रमांक  of special variants have been produced .
In December 2010 , Bugatti began offering prospective buyers the ability to customize exterior  और  interiors colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque  's  official website .
The institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme in the depictions of the Last Supper in Christian art , as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes  पेंटिंग   .
`` At the  पिछला  Supper , on the  रात्रि  he was betrayed , our Savior instituted the Eucharistic sacrifice of his Body  और  Blood . ''
(  catechism  of the Catholic Church 1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to  दोनो  the  जश्न  of  the  Mass ,  कि  is , the Eucharist liturgy , and the bread  और  wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed  in  substance ) into the body and  रक्त  of Jesus Christ , Lord and God , a  घोषणा  formulated by the Council of Trent with an  anathema  against anyone who denied  इस  .
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term used in the Roman Catholic Church to refer to the Eucharistic species ( the Body and Blood of Christ ) .

A short story is  a  brief work of  साहित्य  , usually written  in  narrative prose  .
उभरते  from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th century ,  the  short story has grown to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization .
At its most prototypical the short story features  a   छोटी  cast of named characters , and focuses on a self-contained incident with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood .
In so doing , short stories make  उपयोग   of  plot  ,  resonance , and other dynamic components to a far greater degree than  is  typical of an  किस्सा  , yet to a far lesser degree than a novel .
While the short story is largely  पृथक  from the novel , authors of both generally draw from a common pool of literary techniques .
Short stories have no set length .
In terms of word count  वहीँ  is no official  demarcation  between an anecdote  ,   a  short story , and a novel .
Rather  ,  the form  's  parameters are given by the rhetorical and practical context in which a given story is  उत्पादित  and considered , so that what constitutes a short story may differ between  जाति  , countries , eras , and commentators .
Like the novel , the short story  's  predominant shape reflects the  मांगे  of the available markets for publication , and the evolution of the form seems closely tied to the evolution  of  the publishing industry and the submission  दिशानिर्देश  of its constituent houses .
The short  स्टोरी  has been considered  दोनो  an apprenticeship form preceding  अधिक  lengthy works , and a crafted form in its own right , collected together in books of similar  लंबाई  , price  ,  and distribution as novels .
Short story writers may define  उनके  works as part of the artistic and personal expression of the form .
They may  भी  attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form  .
Area codes in Michigan
Area code  810  is  the  telephone area code serving eastern Michigan .
the  raccoon ( , Procyon lotor ) , sometimes spelled racoon , also known as the common raccoon , North American  raccoon  , northern raccoon and colloquially as coon , is a medium-sized mammal native to North America .
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid family , having a body  लंबाई  of and a body weight of .
Its  grayish  coat mostly consists of dense underfur which insulates against cold weather .
दो  of the raccoon 's most distinctive features are its extremely dexterous front paws and its facial mask , which are themes in  the  mythology of several  देशी  American  जनजातियों  .
Raccoons are noted for their intelligence , with studies showing that  वे  are able  to  remember the solution to tasks for up to three years .
The diet  of  the omnivorous raccoon  ,   जिससे  is usually nocturnal , consists of about 40  %  invertebrates , 33 % plant  भोजन  , and 27  %  vertebrates .
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous  और  mixed forests ,  लकिन  due to their adaptability  वे  have extended their range to mountainous areas , coastal marshes  ,  and urban areas , where some homeowners consider them to be pests .
As a result of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century , raccoons are now also distributed across the European mainland  ,  the Caucasus region and Japan .
Though previously thought to be solitary , there is now evidence that raccoons engage in gender-specific social  बर्ताव   .
Related females often share a common  क्षेत्रफल  , while  unrelated  males live together in groups of up to four animals to  maintain  their positions against foreign  males  during the mating season ,  और  other potential invaders .
Home  दायरा  sizes vary anywhere from  3  hectares ( 7 acres ) for females in  शहरों  to 50  km2  (  20  sq mi ) for males in prairies .
After a gestation period of  परिचय  65 days , two to five young , known as `` kits '' , are born in spring .
The kits are subsequently raised by their mother until dispersion in late fall .
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over 20 years , their average life expectancy in the wild is only 1.8 to 3.1 years .
In  अनेक  areas , hunting and vehicular injury are the  दो  most common causes of death .
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake , with an epicenter near the town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department ) , approximately west of Port-au-Prince , Haiti 's capital .
The earthquake occurred  at  16:53 local time  (  21:53 UTC )  on  Tuesday , 12  जनवरी  2010  .
By 24 January , at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or greater  था  been recorded  .
An estimated three million people were  प्रभावित  by the quake  .
The highest reliable death count was estimated  at  220,000 .
Haitian government estimates were higher .
The government of Haiti estimated that 250,000 residences  और  30,000 commercial buildings had collapsed or were severely damaged .
the  earthquake caused major damage in Port-au-Prince , Jacmel  और  other settlements in the region .
Many notable landmark buildings were significantly damaged or  नष्ट  , including the Presidential Palace , the National Assembly building , the Port-au-Prince Cathedral , and the main  कारावास  .
among  those killed were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph Serge Miot , and opposition leader Micha Gaillard .
The headquarters of the United  राष्ट्र  Stabilization Mission in Haiti  (   minustah  ) , located in the capital , collapsed ,  हत्या  many , including the Mission 's Chief  ,  Hédi Annabi .
Many countries responded to  appeals  for humanitarian aid , pledging funds and dispatching rescue and medical teams , engineers  और  support personnel .
Communication systems , air , land , and sea transport facilities , hospitals , and electrical networks had been damaged by the  भूकंप  , which hampered rescue and aid efforts ; confusion over who was in charge , air traffic congestion , and  समस्याएं  with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work .
Port-au-Prince  's  morgues were overwhelmed with tens of thousands of  लाशें  .
These had to be buried in mass graves .
As rescues tailed off , supplies , medical care and sanitation became priorities .
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals from  सहायता  workers and survivors , and looting and sporadic violence were observed .
on  22 January the United Nations noted that the emergency phase of the  राहत  operation  थी  drawing to a close , and on the following  दिन  the Haitian government  officially  called off  the  search for survivors .
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse , originally  appearing  in short stories by Walter R. Brooks , and later in an American television situation  कॉमेडी  produced by  filmways  that first aired in syndication from January 5 to July  2  ,  1961  , and then  on  CBS from  अक्तूबर  1 , 1961 to February 6 ,  1966  .
the   सितारों  of the  दिखाएँ  were Mister Ed , a palomino horse who could  ``  talk '' , played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who  गई  uncredited for the entire length of the series ) , and his owner  ,  an eccentric and enormously klutzy , yet friendly , architect  नामित  Wilbur Post ( Alan Young  )  .
Much of the program 's humor stemmed from the fact Mister Ed  होता  speak only to Wilbur , as  खूब  as  ed  's notoriety  as  a troublemaker .
Other running jokes centered on Wilbur 's  अक्षर  being a huge klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or  अन्य  .
According to  the  show  's   निर्माता   ,  Arthur Lubin , Young was chosen as the lead character because he `` just seemed like  the  sort of guy  a  horse would talk to  ''  .
Lubin , a friend of Mae West ,  scored  a coup by persuading the screen icon to guest star in one episode  .
In the United States  ,  reruns aired on Nick at  नाइट   इससे  March 3 , 1986 , to February 1 , 1993 .
Sister station TV Land also reran the show from 1996–98 and again from 2003-06 .
The series is currently broadcast  प्रत्येक  morning on This  tv  , along with Highway Patrol , and The Patty Duke Show .
It is  भी  currently broadcast on Hallmark Movie Channel .
As of January 1 ,  2011  ,  the  first two seasons  of  the show are available on Hulu .
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 Thessalonians  4:17   ,  when the `` dead in Christ  ''  and `` we who are alive and  remain  '' will  be   ``  caught up in the clouds '' to meet  ``  the Lord in the air  ''   .
The term  ``  Rapture '' is used  in  at least two senses .
In the pre-tribulation view , a group of  लोगों  will be left behind on earth after another  समूह  literally leaves `` to meet  the  Lord in the air . ''
This is now the most common use of the term , especially among fundamentalist Christians and in the United States .
The other  ,  older use of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the final resurrection generally , without a belief that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended  tribulation  period  बाद  the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
This  भेद  is important as some types of Christianity  never  refer to `` the Rapture '' in  धार्मिक   शिक्षा  , but might  उपयोग  the older and more general sense of the word  ``  rapture '' in referring to  कया  happens during the final resurrection .
There are many views among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return  (  including  whether   it  will occur in one event  or  two ) , and various views regarding the  गंतव्य  of the  aerial  gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4 .
Denominations such as Roman Catholics ,  परंपरागत   ईसाइयों  , Lutheran Christians , and Reformed Christians believe in  a  rapture only in the sense of a general final  क़यामत  , when Christ returns a single time .
They do not believe that a  समूह  of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation  काल  after the  कार्यक्रम  of  1  Thessalonians 4:17 .
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the  1830s  by  जॉन  Nelson Darby and the Plymouth Brethren , and popularized in the United States in the early 20th century by the  चौड़ी   परिसंचरण  of the Scofield Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February 6 , 1985 ) is an American professional basketball player with the Brooklyn Nets  .
the  Philistine  शहरों  of Gaza ,  ashdod  , Ashkelon , Ekron , and Gath
The Philistines ( ,  ,  , or ; , Plištim ) , Pleshet or Peleset , were  a  people  जो   as  part of the  समुद्र  Peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron  आयु   (  circa 1175  bc  )  ,   सबसे  probably from  the  Aegean region .
According to the  बाइबल  ,  वे  ruled the five city-states ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza , Ashkelon  ,  Ashdod , Ekron and Gath , from  wadi  Gaza in the south to the Yarqon River in the north , but with no fixed border to the east .
the  Bible paints them as the Kingdom of Israel 's most dangerous enemy .
originating  somewhere in the Aegean , their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC , rising to  a  peak of 30,000 in the 11th century BC , of  जिससे  the Aegean element  थी  not more than half the total , and perhaps much less .
Nothing  is  known for certain about the original language or languages of the Philistines , however they were not part of the Semitic Canaanite population .
वहीँ  is some limited evidence in favour of the assumption  कि  the Philistines were Indo-European-speakers either from Greece and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor .
Philistine-related words  मिला  in the Bible are not Semitic , and can in some cases , with reservations , be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots .
by  the beginning of the 1st Millennium  bce  they had adopted  the  general Canaanite language of the  प्रदेश  .
the  Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a multiple choice test ,  administered  by  the  United States  सैन्य  Entrance  प्रसंस्करण  Command , used to determine qualification  लिये  enlistment in the United States  हथियारबंद  forces .
It is often offered to American high school students when they  हैं  in the 10th ,  11th   और  12th grade , though anyone eligible for enlistment may take it .
Although the test is administered by the military  ,  it is not (  और  never has been ) a requirement that a test-taker  साथ  a qualifying score enlist in the armed  शक्तियां  .
In financial accounting , a balance sheet or statement of financial  स्थिति  is a summary of the financial  balances  of  a  sole proprietorship , a business partnership , a corporation  or   अन्य  business organization , such as an LLC or an LLP .
Assets , liabilities and ownership equity are listed as of a specific date , such as the end of its financial year .
a  balance sheet is often described as a `` snapshot of  a  company 's  वित्तीय  condition '' .
Of the four basic financial statements , the balance  चादर  is  the  only statement which applies to a single point  in  time of a business ' calendar year .
A standard company balance sheet has three parts  :  assets , liabilities and ownership equity .
the  main categories of assets are  प्रायः  listed first , and typically in order  of  liquidity .
Assets are followed by the  देनदारी  .
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is known as equity or the net assets or the net worth or capital of the company and according to the accounting equation  ,  net worth must equal assets minus liabilities .
another  way to look  at  the same equation is that assets equals liabilities plus owner 's equity .
Looking at the equation in this way shows how assets were financed : either by borrowing money ( liability ) or by using the owner 's money  (  owner 's equity ) .
Balance sheets are usually  प्रस्तुत  with assets in one section and  देनदारी  and  जाल  worth in the other section with the two sections `` balancing . ''
A  कारोबार  operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing the entire  बैंको  balance at the  समाप्त  of the period , plus any cash in hand .
However , many businesses  हैं  not paid immediately ;  वे  build  up  inventories of  goods  and  वे  acquire buildings and equipment .
in  other words : businesses have assets and so  वे  can not , even if they want to ,  तत्काल  turn these into cash at the end of each period .
प्रायः  , these  व्यवसायों   owe  money to suppliers and to tax authorities , and the proprietors do not withdraw all  उनके  original capital and profits  at  the end of each period .
In other  शब्द  businesses also have liabilities .
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire , commonly known as the .17 HMR , is a  rimfire  rifle cartridge developed by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002 .
It descended from the .22 Magnum by necking down  the  .22  मैग्नम  case to  लो  a  .17   कैलिबर  ( 4.5 mm ) bullet , and it is more costly  to  shoot than traditional .22 caliber  rimfire  cartridges .
Commonly loaded with a  17  grain ( 1.1 g ) bullet ,  it  can deliver  muzzle  velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s  )  .
The Schaumburg Flyers  यहूद  a professional baseball team based in Schaumburg , Illinois , in the United States .
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the North American  लीग  , which is not  संबद्ध  with Major League Baseball , however , the team folded in March 2011 ,  पहले  they began  खेल  in the NAL .
From the 1999 season to the 2010 season , the Flyers  निभाई  their home games  at  Alexian Field ,  निकट  the Elgin O'Hare Expressway .
The team formerly played in Thunder Bay , Ontario , where they were known as the Thunder  खाड़ी  Whiskey Jacks .
The team was  originally  a member of the Northern League  इससे  1993  to  2010 .
On July 27 , 2009 , the Flyers  निभाई  host to Battle of the Sexes II , which pitted the Flyers against the National  प्रो  Fastpitch Softball Champions ,  the  Chicago Bandits  .
निभाई  by  आधिकारिक  softball rules , the game was seen by an overflow  रिकार्ड  crowd of 8,918 , and was won by the Bandits 4-2 .
In 1999  ,  the  flyers  hired their first  मैनेजर  , Ron Kittle  .
Kittle is best known for his playing  दिनों  with the Chicago White Sox , and former Chicago Cubs and  श्वेत   sox   खिलाड़ी  Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach .
During  the  early years  of  the franchise , Kittle did a  श्रेणी  of TV commercials to promote the team , using the gimmick  ``  Ma Kittle . '' where he played  दोनो  himself and his `` Ma . ''
The ads were successful at sparking some initial interest in the team as the Flyers hoped to steal away  प्रशंसक  from the nearby Kane County Cougars .
The ad mimicked  the  highly successful Converse ads where Larry Johnson starred as both himself and `` Gramama . ''
At the end of the 2001 season , however  ,  Kittle resigned from his managerial position , and Jim Boynewicz was hired  to  replace  उसे  .
In 2004 , the Flyers made  it  to the Northern  लीग  Championship Series against the St. Paul Saints .
Despite leading the  five-game  series 2-1 , Schaumburg eventually lost the series .
In Game 5 , Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas allowed a game  जीतना   ग्रैंड  slam by St. Paul infielder Marc Mirizzi  in  the ninth inning .
The Flyers appeared in the Northern League Playoffs four times ( 1999  ,  2003 , 2004 , 2006  )  but never won the championship .
Some famous players  जो  played for the Flyers were former Oakland A 's outfielder  ozzie  Canseco and former Chicago Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith .
Rachel Hannah Weisz  (  / vice / ; born 7 March  1970  ) is  an  English film and theatre actress and  पूर्व  fashion model .
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall , Cambridge in the early 1990s , then started working  in  television , appearing in  इंस्पेक्टर  Morse ,  the   अंग्रेजों  mini-series Scarlet and Black , and the television film Advocates II .
She  बना  her  फिल्मी  début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ) , but her breakthrough role came in the film Chain Reaction (  1996  ) , leading to a high-profile role as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films  the   मम्मी  ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ) .
Other  notable  films  featuring  Weisz are Enemy at the Gates , About a Boy , Constantine , The Fountain and The Constant Gardener , for which  वो  received an Academy Award , a Golden  ग्लोब  and a Screen Actors ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle .
She has been labelled an `` English rose '' since her minor role in Stealing  सौंदर्य  ( 1996 ) .
वाइज़  also works in theatre .
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 revival of Noël Coward 's play Design for Living , which earned her  the  London Critics Circle Award for the most promising  newcomer  .
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999  donmar  Warehouse production of Tennessee Williams  '  Suddenly , Last Summer  ,  and their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire .
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in the latter play earned her the Critics ' Circle Theatre Award for Best Actress .
She has recently played Evanora in  oz  the Great and Powerful .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or  बस  the Civil War ( see naming )  ,  was  a  civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States  of  America ( the `` Confederacy ''  or  the `` South ''  )  .
The war had its origin  in  the issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers  किया  not intervene .
After four years of  खूनी  combat that  बाएँ  over 600,000 soldiers dead  और  destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the  confederacy  collapsed ,  गुलामी  was abolished ,  और  the difficult Reconstruction process  of   restoring  national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
in   the  1860 presidential election , Republicans , led  by  Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration  on  March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his  प्रशासन  would not initiate  सिविल   युद्ध   .
Eight  बाकी  slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
the  Confederates assumed that European  देशों  were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they  होता  intervene ;  none  did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by  संघ  troops  in  South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four more  स्लेव  states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled  the  border states and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
the  Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign  into  Maryland ( a  संघ  state ) ended  साथ   confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention  .
Lincoln  जारी   the  Emancipation  उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 ,  रॉबर्ट  E. Lee 's Confederate incursion  उत्तर   ended  at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all  संघ  armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William  T.  Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate  अवसंरचना  along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and  जनशक्ति  to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the  overland   अभियान  towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army  विफल  ,  अग्रणी  to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines ,  shipyards  , banks , transportation and food supplies all  foreshadowed   संसार  War I .
it  remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of  civilian   हताहत  .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old  ,  and 30 percent of all  दक्षिणी  white males aged  18–40  .
Potato bread is a form of bread in which potato replaces a  portion  of  the  regular wheat flour .
It is cooked in a variety of methods , including by  बेकिंग  it on a  hot  griddle or pan  ,  or  in  an oven .
It  may  be leavened or unleavened , and may have a variety of other ingredients baked into it .
The ratio of potato to  गेहूं  flour varies significantly from recipe to recipe , with some recipes having a majority  of  potato , and others having a majority of wheat flour .
Some recipes call for mashed potatoes , with others calling for  निर्जलित  potato flakes .
It is  उपलब्धियाँ  as a commercial product in many countries , with similar variations in ingredients , cooking method  ,  and other variables .
The Pacific Time Zone observes standard time  by  subtracting eight hours from Coordinated Universal Time  (  ) .
the  clock time  in  this zone is based on the mean solar time of the 120th  मध्याह्न   वेस्ट  of the Greenwich Observatory .
During daylight saving time  ,   इसके  time offset is  .
In the United States and  कनाडा  , this time zone is  generically  called Pacific Time ( PT ) .
specifically  , it is Pacific  मानक  Time ( PST ) when  observing  standard time ( winter ) , and Pacific Daylight Time ( PDT )  जब  observing daylight saving  समय  ( summer ) .
Most of  कनाडा  uses  daylight  saving time .
In Mexico the UTC−8 time  मण्डल  is known as  the  Northwest Zone , which is synchronized with the U.S. PDT daylight saving  अनुसूची  .
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone  is  Los Angeles in California from USA ; the city  's  metropolitan area is the largest  in  the zone .
The zone is one hour ahead of the Alaska Time Zone , one hour behind the Mountain Time Zone  और  three hours  पीछे   the  Eastern Time Zone .
Stereo 8 , commonly known as the eight-track cartridge , eight-track tape , or simply eight-track , is a  चुम्बकीय  tape sound recording technology .
It was popular in the United States from  the  mid-1960s through to the early 1980s , but was relatively unknown  in  many European countries .
it  was , however , very popular in the United Kingdom during this period .
Stereo 8  थी  created in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill Lear of Lear Jet Corporation , along with Ampex ,  घाट  Motor Company , General Motors , Motorola ,  और  RCA Victor Records ( RCA ) .
It was a further development of the similar Stereo-Pak  four-track   कार्ट्रिज  created by  अर्ल  `` Madman '' Muntz .
A later quadraphonic version of the format was announced by RCA in April 1970 and first known as Quad-8 , then later changed to just Q8 .
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC  ;  Egyptian : , alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or  )   ,  referred  to  as Ramesses the Great , was  the  third Egyptian pharaoh ( reigned 1279 BC – 1213 BC ) of the Nineteenth dynasty .
He is often regarded as the greatest , most celebrated , and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian Empire .
His successors and later  उन्होंने  called him the `` Great Ancestor  .  ''
रामेसेस  II led several military expeditions into the Levant ,  re-asserting  Egyptian control  over   canaan  .
He also led expeditions to the south , into Nubia , commemorated in inscriptions at  beit  el-Wali  और  Gerf Hussein .
At age fourteen , Ramesses was appointed Prince Regent by his  पिता  Seti I .
he  is  believed  to have taken the throne in his late teens and is known to have ruled Egypt from 1279 BC to 1213 BC  लिये  66 years and  2  months , according to both Manetho and Egypt 's contemporary historical records .
He was once said to have lived  to  be 99 years  बूढ़ा  ,  लकिन  it is more likely that he died in his 90th or 91st year .
If he became Pharaoh  in  1279 BC as most Egyptologists today believe , he would  have  assumed  the   सिंहासन  on May 31 , 1279  bc  ,  आधारित  on  उसके  known  accession  date of III Shemu day 27 .
Ramesses II celebrated  an  unprecedented 14 sed festivals (  the  first held after thirty years of a pharaoh 's reign , and then every three years ) during his reign—more than any other pharaoh .
On his death ,  he   थी  buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings ; his body was later moved to a royal cache where it was discovered  in  1881 , and is now on display in the Cairo Museum .
The early part of his reign was focused on building cities , temples and monuments .
He established  the  city of  pi-ramesses  in the Nile Delta as his new capital and main base for his campaigns in Syria .
This city was built on  the  remains of the city of  avaris  , the capital of the Hyksos when they took  over  , and was the location of the main Temple of Set .
He is also known as Ozymandias in the Greek sources ,  इससे  a transliteration into Greek of a part of Ramesses 's throne name , , `` Ra 's mighty truth , chosen of Ra '' .
The Texas Rangers are a professional baseball team located in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex , based in Arlington , Texas .
The Rangers franchise is currently a member of the Western Division of Major League Baseball 's American League  .
Since , the Rangers have played in Rangers Ballpark in Arlington in Arlington ,  टेक्सास  .
The team 's name is borrowed from the famous law enforcement agency of the  वही   नाम  .
The franchise  थी  established in 1961  by   the  name  of  the Washington Senators , an  विस्तार   टोली  awarded to Washington , D.C. , after the  नगर  's first  ballclub  , the original Washington Senators , moved to Minnesota and became the Twins .
After the season , the new Senators moved to Arlington , Texas , and debuted  as  the Rangers the following spring .
The Texas Rangers Baseball Club has made six appearances in the MLB postseason ,  सब  following division championships , in 1996 , 1998 , 1999 , 2010 , 2011 and 2012 .
In 2010 , the Rangers advanced past the Division Series for the  पहला  time , defeating the Tampa Bay Rays .
Texas then brought home their first American League Pennant after beating the New York Yankees in six games .
In the 2010 World Series , the franchise 's first ,  the  Rangers  गिरी  to the San Francisco Giants in five games .
Their lone victory made them the first Texas team to win a World Series  खेल  , the Houston Astros having been swept in their 2005 World Series  रूप  .
वे  repeated  as  American League  champions  the following year , then lost the 2011 World Series to the  st.  Louis Cardinals in seven games .
Gaius Julius Caesar ( , July 100 BC – 15 March 44  bc   )  was a Roman general , statesman , Consul and notable author of Latin prose .
He played a critical role in the  कार्यक्रम  that led to the demise of  the  Roman Republic and the rise of the Roman  साम्राज्य  .
In 60 BC , Caesar , Crassus and Pompey formed a political alliance that was to dominate Roman politics for several years  .
Their attempts to amass power through populist tactics were opposed  by  the conservative elite within the Roman  सीनेट  , among them Cato the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero .
Caesar 's conquest of Gaul , completed by 51  bc  , extended  रोम  's territory to the  अंग्रेज़ी  Channel and the Rhine .
Caesar became the first Roman general  to  cross both when he built a bridge across the  राइन  and conducted the first invasion of Britain .
These achievements granted him unmatched military power and threatened to eclipse the standing of Pompey  ,  who had realigned himself with the  सीनेट  after the death of Crassus in 53 BC .
With the Gallic Wars concluded , the Senate ordered Caesar to lay  bas  his military command and return to Rome .
Caesar  refused  , and  चिह्नित   उसके  defiance in 49 BC by crossing the  rubicon  with a legion , leaving his province and illegally  प्रवेश  Roman territory under arms .
Civil war resulted , from which  he  emerged as  the  unrivaled leader of Rome .
After assuming control  of  government , Caesar began a program of social  और  governmental reforms , including the creation of the Julian calendar .
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic and was eventually proclaimed `` dictator in  perpetuity   ''  .
But the underlying political conflicts had not been resolved  ,  and on the Ides of March ( 15 March  )  44 BC ,  सीज़र  was assassinated by a group of senators led  by  Marcus Junius Brutus .
A  नई  series of civil wars broke out , and the constitutional government of  the  Republic was never restored .
Caesar 's  अपनाया  heir Octavian , later known as Augustus , rose to sole power ,  और  the era of the  रोमन  Empire began .
Much of Caesar 's life  is  known from his own accounts of his military campaigns , and from other contemporary sources , mainly the letters and speeches of Cicero and the historical writings of Sallust .
the  later biographies of  सीज़र  by Suetonius and Plutarch are also major sources .
Caesar is deemed to be one  of   the  greatest military commanders of history  .
Linguistic map of Nigeria  ,  Cameroon , and Benin .
Sign in English , outside the University of Lagos
There are hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria .
The major languages are  योरूबा  , Hausa  ,  Igbo , Edo , Fulfulde , Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The official language of  सीरियल  , English , the former colonial language , was chosen  to  facilitate the cultural and linguistic unity of  the  country .
English , however ,  remains  an exclusive preserve of the country 's urban elite , and is not widely spoken in rural areas , which comprise three  quarters   of  the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity  is  a microcosm of Africa as a whole  ,   encompassing  three major African  भाषाएं  families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo  .
Nigeria also has several  as-yet  unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum , which may represent  a  relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families .
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot , ( UK ) bird  's  nest  ,  bishop 's lace  ,  and Queen Anne  's  lace  (  North America ) ) is a flowering plant in the family Apiaceae , native to temperate  regions  of Europe  ,  southwest Asia  और  naturalised to North America and Australia .
Domesticated  गाजर  are cultivars of  a  subspecies , Daucus carota subsp . sativus .
In the United States , the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed  by  the President of the United States and confirmed by the United States Senate  pursuant  to the  नियुक्ति  Clause in  आलेख  II of the United States Constitution .
in  addition to the Supreme Court of the  संयुक्त  States , whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter , acts of Congress have established 13 courts of  appeals  ( also called `` circuit courts ''  )  with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the  संयुक्त  States ,  और  94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be  categorized   as  a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court , Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals  ,  and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus far are  referred  to sometimes  as  `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the  न्यायिक  branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In addition  ,  judges of the Court of International Trade exercise judicial power  pursuant  to Article III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts ,  सहित  magistrate judges and  दिवालियापन  judges , are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however  ,  they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate  ,  and their power  गर्भाशयी  from Article I instead .
See Article I  और  Article III tribunals .
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2 , 1978 ) is a Canadian  सिंगर  , songwriter and  अभिनेत्री  .
She has  बेची  20 million albums worldwide and more 20  लाख  singles , bringing her total sales to over 40  लाख   रिकॉर्ड  around the world .
Furtado first gained fame  साथ  her debut album , Whoa , Nelly !
, which spawned two successful singles  ,  `` I 'm Like a Bird ``  और  `` Turn Off the Light `` . ``
I 'm  जैसे  A Bird  ''  won a 2001 Juno Award for Single of the Year and a 2002  ग्रैमी  Award for  बेहतरीन  Female Pop Vocal Performance .
In 2003 , Furtado  released  Folklore  ,  which produced three  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  singles— ``  powerless  ( Say What You Want )  ``  , `` Try `` and `` Força `` .
Three years later  वो   released  Loose , a worldwide commercial success .
The album spawned four number-one hits : `` Promiscuous `` , `` Maneater `` , `` Say It Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) `` .
After a three-year break  ,  she released her first full-length Spanish album , Mi Plan , and Furtado received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal Album .
In 2012 ,  फ़र्टाडो  's  चौथी  English-language studio album , The Spirit Indestructible was released .
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous awards  और  accolades , including 2 Grammy  पुरस्कार   ,  10 Juno Awards , 3 MuchMusic Video Awards and a star on  कनाडा  's Walk of  कीर्ति  .
Creatures of the Night is the tenth studio album by Kiss .
It is the band 's  पिछला  album for Casablanca  रिकॉर्ड  ,  the  only label the  समूह  had ever  अंकित  for at that point .
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca founder and  जल्दी  Kiss supporter Neil Bogart , who  था  died of cancer during the recording  सत्र  .
It is  भी  the band 's last album recorded  साथ  Ace Frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ) , and its first album with Vinnie Vincent as the initially uncredited lead  guitarist  ( Vincent  होता   बाद  be credited ,  लकिन  not featured pictorially  on  the cover  ,  of 1985 's reissue of the album ) .
Touch is  a  crucial means of receiving  सूचना  .
इस  photo shows tactile  markings  identifying stairs for visually impaired people .
The somatosensory system is a  विविध  sensory system  comprising  the receptors and  प्रसंस्करण   केंद्रों   to  produce the sensory modalities such as touch , temperature , proprioception ( body position )  ,  and nociception ( pain ) .
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia , skeletal muscles , bones and joints , internal organs , and the cardiovascular system .
While touch is considered  एक   of  the five traditional senses , the impression of touch is formed from several modalities  .
In medicine , the colloquial  पद  `` touch '' is usually  replaced   साथ  `` somatic senses '' to better  प्रतिबिंबित  the variety of mechanisms involved .
Somatic senses are sometimes referred to as  somesthetic  senses , with the understanding that somesthesis includes touch , proprioception and ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception .
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors : thermoreceptors , nociceptors , mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors .
Transmission of information from the receptors passes via sensory nerves through  tracts  in the spinal cord and into the brain .
Processing primarily  occurs  in the primary somatosensory area in the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex  .
The cortical homunculus was devised by Wilder Penfield .
At its simplest , the system  works   जब  activity in a sensory neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus such as  ऊष्मा  ; this signal eventually  गुजरता  to an area  in  the brain uniquely attributed to  कि  area on the body—this allows  the  processed stimulus to be felt at  the  correct location .
the  point-to-point mapping  of  the body surfaces  in  the brain  is   पुकारा  a homunculus and is essential in the creation of a body image .
इस  brain-surface  (  `` cortical  ''   )   मैप  is not immutable , however .
Dramatic shifts  can  occur in response to stroke or injury .
Magnolia is a large genus of about 210  flowering  plant species in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae .
it  is named after French botanist Pierre Magnol .
Magnolia is an ancient genus .
Appearing before bees did , the flowers evolved to encourage pollination  by  beetles .
To avoid damage from pollinating beetles , the carpels of Magnolia flowers are extremely tough .
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have  महरूम  found dating to 20  लाख  years ago , and of plants identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million  सालो  ago .
Another aspect of  magnolias  that is considered to represent an ancestral state is that the flower bud  is   enclosed  in a bract rather than in sepals ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated and called tepals rather than distinct sepals and petals .
Magnolia shares the  tepal  characteristic with several other flowering plants near the base of  the  flowering plant lineage  ऐसे  as Amborella  और  Nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently  निकला   पौधे  such as Lilium ) .
The natural range of Magnolia species is a disjunct distribution , with a main  केन्द्र  in east and southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern  उत्तर  America  ,  Central America , the West Indies  ,  and some species in South America .

`` White Christmas '' is  an  Irving Berlin  सोंग  reminiscing about an old-fashioned Christmas setting .
According to the Guinness Book of World Records , the version sung  by  Bing Crosby is the  best-selling  single of all time ,  साथ  estimated sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide .
Accounts vary as to when  और  where  बर्लिन  wrote the song .
One story is that  he  wrote it in 1940 , in warm La Quinta , California , while staying at the La Quinta Hotel , a frequent Hollywood retreat also favored by writer-producer Frank  capra  , although the Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there .
He often stayed up all night writing — he  बताई  his secretary , `` Grab your pen and take down  इस  song .
I just wrote the best song  i  've ever written  —  heck , I just  लिखा  the best song that anybody 's ever  लिखा  ! ''
cross-country  skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a form of ski touring  in   जिससे  participants propel themselves across snow-covered terrain using skis and poles .
The activity is popular in  अनेक  places with large snowfields , primarily Northern Europe , Canada , and Alaska  .
Cross-country skiing is part  of  the Nordic  स्कीइंग  sport family , which includes ski jumping , Nordic combined ( cross-country skiing and ski  कूद  ) , Biathlon ( skiing and  राइफल  marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ) .
Cross-country skiing is the modern style  of  skiing that  सबसे  resembles prehistoric skiing , particularly when done in the backcountry .
It is also related to Telemark skiing  .
A use tax  in  United States is  पूरक  to sales  कर  which  अर्थात्  , if you buy a Taxable product/services without paying any  बिक्री  tax to vendor , you  owe   उपयोग  tax .
You must self assess use tax and pay it directly to the state where the  उत्पाद  were consumed or services  यहूद  rendered .
Use tax typically  is  a tax on consumption but if  तुम  buy an item ( without paying sales tax ) and  स्टोर  it in your warehouse initially , use tax applies to that location where goods were stored .
Later on when the  फाइनल  consumption takes place at some other  स्थान  ,  तुम  are required to pay the differential of  कर  rate to the jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption .
This really means  कि  you  do  n't have to pay both Sales Tax as well as Use Tax on one transaction .
it  is only  एक  or the other that you are required to pay on purchase of taxable products/services .
if  vendor does n't charge any Sales tax on its invoice then it is the obligation of  the  buyer to self assess Use tax and  अदा  it to the appropriate Jurisdication .
Use Tax is  generally  charged at the same  कर  rate of Sales Tax but in some states the tax rate is  अलग  .
Use tax is also termed as `` Consumption  कर  '' or `` Consumer Use Tax '' .
a  use tax is a type  of  excise tax levied in the United  राज्य  by numerous state governments .
It is assessed upon tangible  निजी  property purchased by  a  resident of the assessing state for use , storage , or consumption in that state ( not  लिये  resale ) , regardless of where the purchase took place .
If  a  resident of a state makes  a  purchase within his home state , full sales tax is paid  at  the time of the transaction .
The use tax  applies  when a resident of the  assessing  state purchases an item that is not  विषय  to his home state 's sales tax .
Usually , this is due to out-of-state purchases , as  खूब  as ordering items through the mail , by phone , or  over  the  अंतरजाल  from other states .
The use tax  is  typically assessed at the  वही  rate as the sales tax that would have been owed ( if any ) had  the  same goods been purchased  in  the state of residence .
For example ,  a  resident of Massachusetts , with a 6.25 % `` sales and use tax '' on certain goods and  सेवाएं  , purchases non-exempt goods or services in New Hampshire for use ,  भंडार  or other  खपत  in Massachusetts .
Under New Hampshire law , the New Hampshire vendor collects no sales taxes on the goods , but the Massachusetts purchaser/user must  स्टिल  pay 6.25  %  of the sales price  सीधे  to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a  उपयोग  tax .
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect  बिक्री  tax for  ऐसे  goods at  समय  of purchase , whatever taxes were paid  by  the purchaser to that state can be deducted ( as a tax credit  )  from the 6.25 %  owed  for subsequent use , storage or  खपत  in Massachusetts  .
With few exceptions , no state 's vendors will charge the native  राज्य  's sales tax on  goods  shipped out of  राज्य  ,  अर्थ  all goods ordered from out-of-state are essentially free  of  sales tax .
The purchaser  is  therefore required to declare and  अदा  the use tax to his home state on these ordered goods .
the  assessing jurisdiction may make the use tax payable annually , but some states require a monthly payment .
For example , where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 % sales tax on property brought in for use  in  the state , Vermont law requires filing a tax return ( Form SU-452  और  payment ) by  the   20th  day of the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late fee  ,  a 5 % penalty per month  ,  to a maximum of 25 % , plus statutory interest  on  the unpaid tax and penalties .
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or  सरकारी   एजेंसियों  , purchases for resale in commerce ,  और  purchases via `` casual  बिक्री  '' by individuals not  in  the ordinary course of  कारोबार  .
Also note that  वहीँ  are thousands of tax  jurisdictions  in  the  U.S. and many have ever-changing lists of specific types of goods and services that are  नहीं  taxable .
As an illustration of  the  complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment  of  tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased  और  downloaded over the Internet for installation and use in Massachusetts  ,  regardless of where it  originates  .
However , the actual use of the same  तन्त्र  downloaded by  a  Massachusetts resident to a server  in  another state remains a non-taxed `` service '' .
In contrast , Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered over the Internet ( such as downloaded software or music ) , except  voip  which is specifically defined as taxable `` telecommunications services '' .
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered  thru  a  ठोस  medium '' ( i.e. , on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered online , except `` custom software for a particular customer '' which is  non-taxable  `` programming services '' even if delivered on a disk .
In most cases  ,  this  जटिलता   is  part of the underlying sales tax laws ; but while a brick-and-mortar store has to deal  साथ  only the sales tax laws of its own location ,  रिमोट  sellers have to  सौदे  with the use tax laws of many jurisdictions—up to every US state and locality that  प्रकृती  them , if the company has a presence or  ``  nexus '' in every state ( as large ``  brick-and-mortar  '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ) .
In medicine , pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an  बढ़ाएँ  of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery  ,  pulmonary vein , or pulmonary capillaries , together known as the lung vasculature , leading to shortness of breath  ,  dizziness , fainting , and other symptoms  ,  all of which are exacerbated by exertion .
pulmonary  hypertension can be  a  severe disease with a markedly decreased exercise tolerance and heart failure .
It  थी  first identified by Dr. Ernst von Romberg in 1891 .
According to the most recent classification , it can be one of  पाँच  different types : arterial , venous  ,  hypoxic ,  thromboembolic  or miscellaneous .

Sanuk , a division of Deckers Outdoor Corporation , is a  जूते  brand based in Southern California .
Sanuk , the Thai word for fun , was founded by Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   देशी  Jeff Kelley when he started making  चप्पल  out of indoor-outdoor carpet .
The first product  निर्मित  was green  carpeted   और  entitled the `` Fur Real '' after one shop owner asked if the novelty sandal was  ``  For Real . ''
The Fur Real  पहला  became a runaway hit through boutique stores and  नहीं  the intended  लहरे   दुकानें  .
the  novelty act was followed up  by  a sandal  लपेटा  in wire mesh , a leopard print version , and styles made out of a poncho material in  a  variety of colors .
Sanuk has grown to include style options for men , women and youth and is distributed across the  संयुक्त  States and in over 50 countries throughout  यूरोपीय   ,  Asia , South America  और  Australia .
Sanuk centers itself around a positive lifestyle advocating the  स्लोगन  , `` Smile , Pass it on ! `` .
In computer science , array programming languages ( also known as vector or  multidimensional  languages )  generalize  operations on scalars to apply transparently to  सदिश  ,  matrices  , and higher dimensional arrays .
Array programming  primitives   concisely  express broad ideas about data manipulation .
The level of conciseness can be dramatic  in   निश्चित  cases : it is not  uncommon  to find array programming  भाषा  one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of Java code .
APL , designed by Ken Iverson ,  थी  the first programming language to provide array programming capabilities .
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his  seminal  book `` A  प्रोग्रामिंग  Language  ''  and not to arrays per se . Iverson 's  योगदान  to rigor and clarity was probably more important than the simple extension of dimensions to functions .
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party , usually an individual , pays a  जीवन  insurance company a single premium that will later be distributed back to the insured party over  समय  .
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time , such as via fixed payments , until the death of  the  person or persons named in the contract or until a  फाइनल  date , whichever comes first .
However , the majority of modern annuity customers use  annuities  only to accumulate funds free of income and capital  gains  taxes and to later  लो  lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature .
President  बराक   ओबामा  .
Barack Obama with  उसके   पहला  Supreme Court nominee , Sonia Sotomayor .
Following is a list of all United States federal judges appointed by President Barack Obama during his presidency .
As of April 30 , 2013 , 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the United States Senate , namely two Justices to the Supreme Court  of  the United  राज्य  , 35 judges to the United States courts of appeals and  150  judges to the United States district courts .
25  further nominations are currently awaiting Senate action .
There are currently 16 vacancies  on  the  संयुक्त  States Courts of Appeals , 67 vacancies on the United States district  न्यायालयों  and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the end of  ओबामा  's second term .
Obama has not made any recess appointments to the federal courts .
Obama  रै   बना  two nominations to the United States Court of International Trade , an Article III tribunal .
Obama  भी  designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the United States Court of Federal Claims , an Article I court , to be Chief Judge of that court .
