The Rime of the Ancient Mariner ( originally The Rime of  the  Ancyent Marinere ) is the longest major poem  by  the English poet Samuel  टेलर   कॉलरिज  , written in 1797–98 and published in  1798  in the first edition of  गीतात्मक  Ballads .
Modern  संस्करण  use a later revised version printed in 1817 that  प्रदर्शित  a gloss .
साथ   साथ  other poems in Lyrical Ballads , it was a signal shift  to  modern poetry and the  शुरूआत   of   अंग्रेजों  Romantic literature .
A proxy auto-config ( PAC  )  file defines how web browsers and other user agents can automatically choose  the   उचित  proxy  सर्वर  ( access method ) for fetching a given  url  .
A PAC file contains a JavaScript function “FindProxyForURL (  url  , host )  ”   .
This  फलन  returns a string with one or more access method specifications  .
These specifications cause the user agent to use a particular proxy server or  to  connect directly .
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back when a proxy fails to respond .
The browser fetches this PAC file before requesting other URLs .
The URL of the PAC file is either configured manually or determined automatically by the  वेब  Proxy Autodiscovery  प्रोटोकॉल  .
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1 , 1996  )  , known mononymously as Zendaya  ,  is an  अमरीकी  actress , singer  और  dancer .
she stars on the Disney Channel sitcom Shake It Up as  रॉकी  Blue .
She has starred in two films and played one of the lead roles in the film Frenemies as Halley Brandon .
She voiced  फर्न   in  the Pixie Hollow Games .

She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode `` Walk The Prank  ''  and on A.N.T .  फार्म   as  Sequoia Jones in the episode ``  रचनात्मक  ConsultANT . ''
Zendaya is also a musician .
She  हस्ताक्षरित  a deal with Hollywood Records on August 8 , 2012 and  प्रारंभ  recording songs for her debut album on August 12  ,  2012 .
She  released  a single from an  स्वतंत्र  label  पुकारा  `` Swag  it  Out `` and another single with Bella Thorne called `` Watch Me , ''  जिससे  is featured on the Break It Down album .
On March 20 , 2012 , Zendaya and  बेला  Thorne  released  an album  साथ  called Shake It Up : Live 2 Dance  ,  each  have  their own song on it , along with  a  mash-up of both songs together as one .

iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a  मोबाईल  operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc . Originally released in 2007 for the iPhone and iPod Touch platforms , it has been extended to support other Apple devices such as the iPad and Apple TV .
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows  फोन  and Google 's Android , Apple  करता  not license iOS for installation on non-Apple hardware .
, Apple 's App Store contained more than 700,000 iOS applications , which have collectively been downloaded more  than  30 billion times .
It had a 21  %  share of  the  smartphone mobile operating system units shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012 , behind only Google  's  Android .
In June 2012 ,  it   accounted  for 65 % of mobile web data consumption ( including use on both the iPod  टच   और  the iPad  )  .
At the half of  2012   ,  there were 410 million devices activated .
According to the special media  इवेंट  held by Apple on September 12 , 2012 , 400 million devices have been sold through June 2012 .
The user interface of iOS is based on the concept of direct manipulation , using multi-touch gestures .
Interface control elements  consist  of sliders , switches , and buttons .
Interaction with the OS includes  इशारों  such as swipe , tap , pinch , and reverse pinch ,  सब  of  जिससे  have  विशिष्ट  definitions within the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of the  आईओएस   ऑपरेटिंग  system and its multi-touch interface .
आतंरिक  accelerometers  हैं  used by some applications to respond to shaking the device ( one common result is the undo command  )  or rotating  it  in three dimensions ( one common result is switching  इससे  portrait to landscape mode ) .
iOS is derived  इससे  OS X , with  जिससे  it shares the Darwin  न्यास  .
iOS  is  Apple 's mobile version of the OS X operating system  प्रयुक्त   on  Apple computers  .
In iOS , there are four abstraction layers : the Core  os  layer , the  कोर  Services layer , the Media layer , and the Cocoa Touch layer .
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the  यंत्र  's flash memory for the system partition  ,  using roughly 800 MB of that  विभाजन  ( varying  by  model ) for iOS itself  .
iOS currently runs on iPhone  ,  iPad , iPod touch and Apple TV .

a  spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic  यंत्र  whose intended design function is to 'spoil ' unfavorable air movement across  a  body of a vehicle in motion , usually described as turbulence or drag .
Spoilers on the front of a vehicle are often  पुकारा  air dams , because in  जोड  to  directing  air  प्रवाह  they also reduce the amount of air flowing underneath the vehicle which generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag .
Spoilers are often fitted to race and high-performance sports cars , although they have become common on passenger vehicles as well .
कुछ  spoilers are added to cars primarily for  स्टाइलिंग  purposes  और  have either little aerodynamic  लाभ  or  भी  make  the  aerodynamics worse .
Spoilers for cars are often incorrectly confused with ,  or  the term used interchangeably with  ,  wings .
ऑटोमोटिव  wings are devices  जिनकी  intended design is to generate downforce as air passes around them , not simply disrupt  मौजूदा  airflow patterns .
Mario , who serves as Nintendo 's mascot , is a fictional character created by game  पंक्तियां  Shigeru  miyamoto  and voiced  by  Charles Martinet .
This  is  a list of video games where  the  character Mario plays a part , either as  the  protagonist , antagonist , supporting character , as part of an ensemble cast , as a cameo  ,   or  in a game within  a  game .
it  does not include simple  सन्दर्भ  to the character ,  ऐसे  as the portraits of Mario found in The  लेजेंड  of Zelda  :  A Link to the Past .
the  year indicated is the year the game was first released , most commonly in Japan ; games were sometimes released  सालो  later in other regions of the world .
The  सूची  includes ports , remakes and compilations .
It does n't include any Virtual Console re-releases .
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I  am  A Man  of  Constant  विषाद  '' ) is a  परंपरागत  American folk song first recorded by Dick Burnett , a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky  .
The song was originally recorded  by  Burnett as `` Farewell Song '' printed in a Richard Burnett songbook  ,  circa 1913 .
An early version was recorded by Emry Arthur  in  1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ) .
Public interest in the song was renewed after the release of  the  2000 film O Brother , Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a central role in the film 's plot .
The song was also included in the film 's highly successful ,  multiple-platinum  selling soundtrack .
Josephson junction array chip developed by  the  National Bureau of Standards as a standard volt
The volt ( symbol : V  )  is the SI derived unit  लिये   इलेक्ट्रिक  potential ( voltage ) , electric potential difference , and electromotive force  .
The  वोल्ट  is named in  सम्मान  of the Italian physicist Alessandro Volta  (  1745–1827 ) , who invented the  वोल्टायिक  pile , possibly the first chemical battery .
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in  1987  , before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne , and his wife , Sophie ,  duchess  of Hohenberg , were shot dead in Sarajevo , by Gavrilo Princip , one of a group of six Bosnian  serb  assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of  the  assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so  वे   could  be  संयुक्त  into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia .
The assassins ' motives were  सतत  with the movement that later  became   ज्ञात  as Young Bosnia .
Serbian military officers stood  पीछे   the  attack .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević ,  उसके   righthand  man  प्रमुख  Vojislav Tankosić , and Masterspy Rade Malobabić .
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs and pistols and trained them .
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and agents that  rade  Malobabić used for  the  infiltration of weapons and operatives  into  Austria-Hungary .
The assassins  ,  the key members of the clandestine tunnel , and the key Serbian military conspirators who were still alive were arrested  ,  tried , convicted and punished .
those  who were arrested in Bosnia were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914 .
The other conspirators were arrested  और  tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators  .
Much of what is known about the assassinations comes from these two trials and related records .
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later .
मिशन  San Juan Capistrano was a Spanish mission in Southern California , located in present-day San Juan Capistrano .
It was founded on All Saints ' Day November 1  ,  1776 , by Spanish Catholics  of  the Franciscan Order .
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano , a 15th century theologian and `` warrior priest '' who resided in the Abruzzo  प्रदेश  of Italy , San Juan Capistrano has the  भेद  of being  घर  to the oldest building in California  स्टिल  in use  ,  a chapel  निर्मित  in  1782  .
Known alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' and `` Father Serra 's  गिरिजाघर  , '' it is the only extant structure  जहाँ  it has been documented that the padre Junipero Serra  मनाये  mass .
One of the best known of the Alta California missions ( and one  of  the few  मिशन  to have actually been founded twice—others  होने  Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission  la   purísima  Concepción ) .
The site was originally consecrated on  अक्तूबर  30 , 1775 , by Father Fermín Lasuén , but was quickly  abandoned  due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego .
The success of the settlement is evident  in  its  ऐतिहासिक  records .
Prior  to   the   आगमन  of the missionaries , some 550 natives were scattered throughout the  लोकल  area .
By 1790 , the number of converted Christians  था  grown to 700 , and just six years later nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` (  हाल  converts ) lived in  or  around the Mission compound .
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year alone , out of the total 4,639 souls converted between 1776 and 1847 .
More than 2,000  पूर्व  inhabitants (  ज़्यादातर  Juaneño Indians ) are buried  in  unmarked graves in the Mission 's cemetery ( campo santo ) .
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. John O'Sullivan , who recognized the property 's historic value and working  tirelessly  to conserve and rebuild its structures , are buried at the  प्रवेश  to the cemetery on the west side of the  प्रॉपर्टी  , and a statue raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt .
The surviving chapel also  serves   as   the  final resting place of three  पैड्रेस   जो  passed on while serving at the Mission : Fathers José Barona , Vicente Fustér , and Vicente  पास्कुआल  Oliva are all  entombed  beneath the sanctuary floor  .
the  Criolla or `` Mission grape , '' was first planted at San Juan  capistrano  in  1779  ; in 1783 ,  the  first  वाइन  produced in Alta California emerged from the Mission  's   वाइनरी  .
The Mission entered a  long  period of gradual decline after secularization in  1833   .
Numerous efforts were made over the years to restore the Mission to its former glory , but  none  met with great  कामयाबी  until the arrival  of  Father O'Sullivan in 1910 .
Restoration efforts continue , and `` Serra 's Chapel '' is still used for religious services .
About half-a-million visitors , including 80,000 school children , come to  the  Mission each year .
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church ''  (   जिससे  was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are  a  renowned architectural wonder , the Mission is  शायद  best known for the annual `` Return of the Swallows  ''  which is traditionally observed every March  19  ( Saint  जोसेफ  's  दिन  ) .
Mission San Juan Capistrano  रै  served as a favorite subject for many notable artists , and has been immortalized in  साहित्य  and on film numerous times , perhaps more than any other mission .
In 1984 , a modern church complex  थी  constructed just north and west of the Mission compound and is  अभी  known as Mission Basilica San Juan  capistrano  .
Today ,  the  mission compound serves  as  a museum ,  साथ  the Serra Chapel within the compound serving as a chapel for the  मिशन  parish .
Better Off Dead is a 1985  अमरीकी  teen romantic comedy film starring John Cusack  और  written and directed by Savage Steve Holland .
It tells the story of high school student Lane Myer who is suicidal after  उसके  girlfriend breaks up with him .
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana Superdome and commonly The Superdome ) is a sports and exhibition stadium , located in the Central Business District of New Orleans , Louisiana , USA  .
Plans were drawn up  in  1967 , by the New Orleans  modernist  architectural firm  of  Curtis and Davis .
Its steel frame covers a expanse .
Its dome is made of a Lamella multi-ringed frame and has a diameter of , making it the  largest  fixed  domed  structure in the world .
It is  घर  to the NFL 's New Orleans  संतो  , the NCAA 's Division I-A Tulane  ग्रीन  Wave football team ( the largest football stadium in Conference USA )  ,  the State Farm Bayou  क्लासिक   ,  the R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl  ,   the  Allstate Sugar Bowl and , every fourth year , the  bcs  National Championship Game .
Because of the size and location  in  one of the  प्रमुख  tourist destinations in the United States , the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of candidates being  माना  for major sporting events , such as the Super Bowl and the Final  चार  .
In 2005  ,  the Superdome gained international attention of a different type when  it  housed thousands of people  seeking  shelter from Hurricane Katrina .
The building suffered extensive damage as a result  of  the storm ,  और  was closed for many  महीने  afterward .
on  October 3 , 2011 ,  it  was announced that German automaker  mercedes-benz   खरीदा  naming rights to the stadium .
The new  नाम  took effect on October  23   ,  2011 .
it  is the third stadium that has naming rights from Mercedes-Benz ( and first in the United States ) , after  the  Mercedes-Benz Arena , the  स्टेडियम  of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart , in Stuttgart , Germany  और  the Mercedes-Benz  एरिना  in  शंघाई  , China .

Disney 's  एनिमल  Kingdom Lodge is an African-themed deluxe resort at  the  Walt Disney World Resort .
It opened  on  April 16 , 2001 .
The resort is owned and operated by Walt Disney Parks and Resorts .
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in the Animal Kingdom Resort Area , adjacent to  डिज़्नी  's Animal Kingdom .
It gives  अतिथि  the opportunity to view  चरने  wildlife outside their rooms and public areas in the resort within proximity of the animals , conveying the  अहसास  of being in an African savanna .
The People 's  पार्टी  , also known as the `` Populists  ''  ,  थी  a short-lived political party in the United States  स्थापित  in 1891 during the Populist movement ( United States , 19th  सदी  ) .
It was most important in 1892-96 , and then rapidly faded away .
Based among poor , white cotton farmers  in  the South ( especially North  कैरोलिना  , Alabama , and Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas  और  Nebraska ) , it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism and hostility to banks , railroads , and elites generally .
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions , and in 1896 the Democrats endorsed their presidential  nominee  , William Jennings Bryan .
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` are commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in  विपक्ष  to established interests and  मुख्यधारा  parties .
Linguistic map of Nigeria , Cameroon , and Benin .
Sign  in  English , outside the University of Lagos
There are  सैंकड़ों  of languages spoken in Nigeria .
The major languages are Yoruba , Hausa  ,  Igbo , Edo ,  fulfulde  , Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English  ,  the former colonial language , was chosen to facilitate the cultural  और   भाषाई  unity of the country .
अंग्रेज़ी  ,  however  , remains an exclusive  बचाना  of the country 's  शहरी  elite ,  और  is not widely spoken in rural areas , which comprise three quarters of the countries  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is  a  microcosm of Africa as a whole , encompassing three major African languages families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo  .
सीरियल  also has several  as-yet  unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum , which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families .
A series of events led to the attack on Pearl Harbor .
युद्ध   between   जापानी  and the United States  था  been a possibility  कि   प्रत्येक   स्वदेश  's military forces planned for since the 1920s , though real tension  किया  not begin until the  1931  invasion of Manchuria by Japan .
over  the next decade  ,  Japan expanded slowly into China , leading to all out war  between   the  two  in  1937  .
In 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an effort to embargo all imports  into   चीन  , including war supplies purchased from the U.S .
This  मूव  prompted the  संयुक्त  States to embargo all oil  निर्यात  , leading the Imperial Japanese Navy to estimate that it had less  than  two years of bunker oil remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies .
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area ''  to  add it to the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific .
The Philippine islands , at that time an American  territory  ,  यहूद  also a Japanese target .
The Japanese military concluded that an  आक्रमण   of   the   फिलीपीन   होता  provoke  an  American military response .
Rather than seize and fortify  the  islands , and wait for the inevitable US counterattack ,  जापानी  's military leaders instead decided on the  pre-emptive  Pearl Harbor attack , which they assumed would negate the American forces needed for the liberation and  reconquest  of  the  islands .
Planning for the attack had begun in very early 1941 , by Admiral Isoroku Yamamoto .
He finally won assent from the Naval High Command by , among other things , threatening to resign .
The attack was approved in the summer at an Imperial Conference and again at a second Conference in the fall .
Simultaneously over the year , pilots were trained , and ships  prepared  for its execution  .
Authority for the attack was granted at the second  इम्पीरियल  Conference if a diplomatic result satisfactory to Japan was  नहीं  reached .
बाद  final approval by Emperor Hirohito the order  to   आक्रमण  was issued at the  शुरूआत  of December .
A common office stapler
A  आम  school stapler
A  stapler  is a mechanical device that joins sheets of paper  or  similar material by driving a thin metal staple  through  the sheets and folding the ends .
Staplers are widely used in government , business , offices , homes and schools .
The word `` stapler  ''  can actually refer to a  क्रमांक  of different devices of varying uses .
In addition to joining paper sheets together  ,  staplers can  भी  be  प्रयुक्त  in a  सर्जिकल  setting to join tissue together with  सर्जिकल  staples to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way  as  stitches or sutures ) .
Typically , most staplers are used to join  अनेक  sheets of paper .
Paper staplers come in two distinct types : manual and electric .
हस्तचालित  staplers are normally hand-held , although models that are used while set on a desk or other surface are not uncommon .
Electric staplers exist in a variety of different designs and models .
Their  प्राथमिक  operating function is to join large numbers of paper sheets together in rapid succession .
Some electric staplers can join up to 20 sheets at a time .
Swallowing , known scientifically as deglutition , is the process in the human or animal body  कि  makes something pass from the  मुँह  , to the pharynx , and into the  ग्रासनाल  , while shutting the epiglottis .
If this fails and the object goes through the trachea , then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur .
In the  इंसान  body it is controlled by the swallowing reflex .
Thaddeus Stevens ( April  4  , 1792 – August 11  ,  1868 )  ,  of Pennsylvania , was a leader of the Radical  रिपब्लिकन  faction  of  the Republican Party and a fierce opponent of slavery .
He  थी  one of the most  influential  members in the history of Congress .
As chairman of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee , Stevens ,  a  witty , sarcastic  स्पीकर   और   flamboyant  party leader , dominated the House from 1861 until  उसके  death .
He wrote much of the financial legislation that paid for the American Civil War  .
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were  the  prime leaders of the Radical Republicans during  the  war and Reconstruction era .
scholarly   दृश्य  of Stevens have swung sharply since his death as interpretations of Reconstruction have changed .
Historians  of  the  dunning  School ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding harsh treatment of the white South and violating American traditions of republicanism , depicting  स्टीवंस  as a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates  .
This  अत्यधिक  negative characterization held sway into the  1950s  .
The rise  of  the neo-abolitionist school in the 1950s led to a strong positive  सराहना  of  स्टीवंस  ' work on civil  अधिकारों  for Freedmen  .
A recent biographer characterizes him as , `` The Great Commoner , savior of free public education in Pennsylvania , national Republican  नेता  in the struggles against slavery in the  संयुक्त  States and intrepid  mainstay  of the attempt  to  secure racial justice for the Freedmen during Reconstruction , the only member of the House of Representatives  कभी   to  have been known as the 'dictator ' of  कॉंग्रेस  . ''
Overview of the translation of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA and the  संश्लेषण  of proteins by a ribosome
In molecular biology and genetics , translation is the process through which cellular ribosomes manufacture proteins .
It is part of the process of gene  अभिव्यक्ति  .
in   अनुवाद  , messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by transcription is decoded by the ribosome to produce a  विशिष्ट   अमीनो  acid chain , or polypeptide , that will later fold into an active protein .
In bacteria , translation occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm , where the large and small subunits of the ribosome are located , and bind to the mRNA .
In eukaryotes , translation occurs across the membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis .
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the binding of tRNAs with complementary anticodon sequences to that of the mRNA .
The tRNAs carry specific  अमीनो  acids  कि  are chained together into a polypeptide as the mRNA passes through and  is   ``  read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent  to  that of a stock  टिकर  and ticker tape .
in  many instances , the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds  to   the  outer membrane  of  the  अशिष्ट  endoplasmic reticulum and releases the nascent protein  polypeptide  inside for later vesicle transport  और  secretion outside  of  the cell .
Many types of transcribed RNA , such as transfer RNA , ribosomal RNA , and small  नाभिकीय  RNA , do  नहीं  undergo translation  into  proteins  .
Translation  proceeds  in four phases : initiation , elongation  ,  translocation and termination  (  all describing the growth of the amino acid chain , or polypeptide that is the  उत्पाद   of  translation ) .
Amino acids are  brought  to ribosomes and assembled into  प्रोटीन   .
In  सक्रियण  , the correct amino acid is covalently bonded to  the  correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ) .
The amino  एसिड  is joined by its carboxyl group to the 3  '  OH of the tRNA by an ester bond .
When the tRNA has an amino acid  linked  to it , it is termed  ``  charged '' .
Initiation involves  the  small subunit of the ribosome binding to  the  5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation  कारकों  ( IF ) .
Termination of the polypeptide happens  जब  the A site of the ribosome faces a stop codon ( UAA , UAG ,  or  UGA ) .
No tRNA  can  recognize or bind to this  codon  .
Instead , the stop codon induces the  बाइंडिंग  of  a  release factor protein that prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex .
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these include anisomycin  ,  cycloheximide , chloramphenicol  ,  tetracycline , streptomycin , erythromycin , and puromycin , among others .
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic ribosomes , and  यूँ  antibiotics can specifically target bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells .
a  multimedia message  on  a  मोबाईल  phone .
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a standard  रास्ता  to send messages  कि  include multimedia content to and from mobile phones .
It extends the core SMS ( Short Message  सेवा  ) capability that allowed exchange of text messages only up to 160 characters  in  length .
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets , although it is also popular as a method of delivering news and entertainment content including videos , pictures , text pages and ringtones .
The  मानक  is developed  by  the Open Mobile Alliance ( OMA ) , although during development it was part of the  3gpp  and WAP groups .
smallpox  was an infectious disease unique to humans , caused by either of two virus variants , Variola major  और  Variola minor  .
The disease is also known by the Latin  names  Variola or Variola vera , derived from  varius   (  `` spotted '' ) or varus  (  ``  मुंहासे  '' ) .
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox  ''  or `` red plague '' ; the  पद  `` smallpox '' was  पहला  used in Britain in the 15th century to distinguish variola from  the  `` great pox '' ( syphilis )  .
The last  naturally  occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor  )  was diagnosed on 26 October 1977 .
Smallpox localized in small blood  बरतन  of  the  skin and  in  the  मुँह   और  throat  .
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash and , later , raised fluid-filled blisters .
V. major produces a more serious disease and has an overall mortality rate of 30–35 % .
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known  as   alastrim  , cottonpox , milkpox , whitepox , and Cuban itch ) which kills about 1  %  of its victims .
Long-term complications  of  V. major infection include  characteristic  scars , commonly on the face , which occur in 65–85 % of survivors .
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring , and limb deformities  due  to  गठिया  and osteomyelitis are  कम  common complications , seen in  परिचय  2–5 % of cases .
Smallpox is  believed  to have emerged in human populations about  10,000  BC .
The earliest physical evidence of it is probably the  pustular  rash on the mummified body of  pharaoh  Ramses V of Egypt .
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually during  the  closing years of the 18th century ( including five  reigning  monarchs ) , and was responsible for a third of all blindness  .
Of all those infected , 20–60 % —and over 80  %   of  infected children—died from the disease .
Smallpox was responsible for an estimated 300–500 million deaths during the 20th  सदी  .
As recently as 1967 , the World Health Organization ( WHO ) estimated that 15 million people contracted the disease and that two million died in that year .
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th centuries , the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979  .
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have  महरूम   eradicated  ,  the  other being rinderpest , which was declared eradicated in 2011 .
``  i  Want to Hold Your Hand '' is a song by the English rock band the Beatles  .
Written by John  लेनन  and Paul McCartney , and recorded in October 1963 , it was the  पहला  Beatles record  to  be made using four-track equipment .
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom , `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would ordinarily have gone straight to  the  top of the British record charts on  इसके  day of  रिलीज  ( 29 November 1963 ) had it not been blocked by the group 's first million seller  ``  She Loves You `` , the Beatles ' previous UK single ,  जिससे  was having a resurgent  वर्तनी  in the top position  following  intense media coverage of the group .
Taking two weeks to  dislodge  its predecessor , `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' stayed at number one for five weeks and remained in the UK top fifty for twenty-one weeks  in  total .
It was  भी  the group 's first American number  एक  , entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry .
By 1 February it held the  क्रमांक  one  स्पॉट  — for seven weeks — before being replaced by `` She Loves You '' ,  a   रिवर्स  scenario of what had occurred in Britain , and remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks  .
``  i  Want to Hold  अपना  Hand '' became the  बीटल्स  ' best-selling single worldwide .
A gasser was a  प्रकार  of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the United States in the late 1950s  और  continued until the  जल्दी   1970s  .
Gassers  यहूद  based on production models from  the  1930s to mid-1960s , which have been stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide better weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an independent front  बर्खास्तगी  ) , though a raised stock front suspension is common as well .
आम  weight reduction techniques include fiberglass body panels , stripped interiors and plexiglass windows  (  sometimes  रंग  tinted ) .
Because they were primarily built  लिये  racing ,  ये   गाड़ियाँ  typically had the engine swapped to a larger or more powerful one ,  the  existing stock engine modified ( often heavily ) or both .
It was very common to fit a Roots supercharger and mechanical  ईंधन  injection , such as one from Algon , Hilborn , or Crower .
With form being dictated by function , their appearance is often  बहुत   शीर्ष  heavy and ungainly , largely due to front ends being  उठाया  higher than stock , to assist in the  वज़न  transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ) .
Having their exhaust pipes exit through the  सामने  fender  खूब  is a common characteristic of gassers , as is  having   लाशें  painted in flamboyant metalflakes  ,  pearls , and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts .
The  नाम  arose because they  competed   in  a gasoline  -fueled  drag racing class , rather than  एक  using methanol or nitromethane .
The gasser is the  पूर्ववर्ती  of the modern Funny Car .
Twelve-lead EKG of a 26-year-old male
Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is  a  transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the  विद्युत  activity  of  the heart over a period of time , as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin and recorded by a  यंत्र  external to the body .
The recording produced by this noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram (  भी  ECG or EKG ) .
an  ECG is  प्रयुक्त   to  measure  the   रेट  and regularity of heartbeats , as well as  the  size and position of the chambers  ,  the presence of any damage to the  दिल  , and the effects of drugs  or  devices used to regulate the heart , such as a  pacemaker  .
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts , but may also be performed on animals , usually for diagnosis of heart  abnormalities  or research .
Donald John Trump  ,  Sr. (  born  June 14 , 1946 ) is an American business magnate , television personality  और  author .
He is  the  chairman and president of The Trump Organization and the founder of  ट्रम्प  Entertainment Resorts  .
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle , outspoken manner , and  भूमिका  on the NBC reality show The  प्रशिक्षु  have made  उसे  a well-known  हस्ती  who was No  .  14 on  the  2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list  .
Trump is the son of Fred Trump , a wealthy New York  नगर  real-estate developer .
He worked for his father 's firm , Elizabeth Trump & Son , while attending the Wharton  स्कूल  of the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Pennsylvania  ,  and in 1968 officially joined the company .
he  was given control of the company in 1971 and renamed it The  ट्रम्प  Organization .
In 2010 , Trump expressed an interest in becoming a candidate  लिये  president of the United States in the  2012  election  ,  though in May 2011 , he announced he would  नहीं  be a candidate  .
In December 2011 , Trump was suggested as a possible vice  अध्यक्षीय  selection by Michele Bachmann , if  वो  were to win the Republican nomination .
`` A Change Is Gon  na  Come  ''  is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke , written and first recorded  in  1963 and released  अंतर्गत  the RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964 .
Though only a modest hit for Cooke in comparison with his previous singles , the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement .
The song has gained in popularity and critical acclaim in the decades since its release ,  और  is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time .
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir  geothermal  Power Station in Iceland .
geothermal  energy is thermal energy generated and stored in the Earth .
Thermal  उर्जा  is the energy that determines the temperature of matter .
The Geothermal energy of  the  Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the planet ( 20  %  ) and from radioactive decay  of  minerals ( 80 % ) .
The  geothermal  gradient ,  जिससे  is the difference  in  temperature between the core of the planet and its surface , drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ) , meaning earth ,  और  θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning hot  .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy  is   निर्मित  by radioactive decay and temperatures  may  reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
Heat  conducts  from the core to  surrounding  cooler rock .
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt , creating magma  संवहन  upward since it is lighter than the solid rock .
The magma  heats  rock and water in the crust , sometimes  up  to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal  उर्जा  has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide , about 10,715  megawatts  ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity  is  installed for  ज़िला  heating , space heating , spas , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal power is cost effective , reliable , sustainable , and environmentally friendly , but has historically  महरूम  limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent technological advances  have  dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources , especially  लिये   अनुप्रयोग  such  as  home heating  ,  opening a  संभावित  for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth  ,  but these emissions are much lower per energy unit  than  those  of  fossil fuels .
as   a  result , geothermal power has the potential to help  mitigate  global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate  to  supply humanity 's energy needs , but only a very small  भिन्न  may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and  खोजी  for deep resources is very expensive .
Forecasts for the future  of  geothermal power depend on assumptions about technology , energy prices , subsidies  ,  and interest rates .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power  कार्यक्रम  show that customers would be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal .
But as a  परिणाम  of government assisted research  और  industry experience , the cost of generating  geothermal   शक्ति  has decreased  by  25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 , geothermal  उर्जा  cost between two and ten cents per kwh .
Ownership of property may be private ,  सामूहिक  , or common and the property may be objects ,  land/real  estate , or intellectual property .
Determining ownership  in  law involves determining who has certain rights and duties over the property  .
These rights and  कर्तव्य   ,   sometimes  called a 'bundle of rights ' , can be separated and  आयोजित   by   अलग  parties  .
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient philosophers , Plato and Aristotle , who held  अलग  opinions on the subject .
Plato ( 428/427 BC  –  348/347 BC ) thought private property created divisive inequalities  ,  while Aristotle ( 384 BC  –  322  bc  )  विचार  private property  सक्रिय  people to  प्राप्त  the full benefit of their labor .
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ tragedy of the commons ” problem , where people tend to degrade common property more than they do private property .
Given a short-sighted owner , however ,  a  private  प्रॉपर्टी   प्रणाली  can  मेक  these tragedies worse—for example  ,  a  निजी  owner of a piece of oil-rich  प्रॉपर्टी  , depending on his worldview ,  might   be  more interested in short-term  वित्तीय  gain than incremental use  साथ  an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g. , those of future generations , the disenfranchised ,  इत्यादि  . ) .
While Aristotle justified the existence of  निजी  ownership , he  बाएँ  open questions of ( 1 ) how to allocate property between what is private and common and ( 2 ) how to  allocate  the private property within society .
Over the millennia , and across cultures what can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely .
स्वामित्व  is the basis for many other  अवधारणाओं  that form the  मूलाधार  of ancient and modern societies such as money , trade , debt  ,  bankruptcy , the  criminality  of theft , and private vs. public property .
Ownership is the key  भवन  block in the development of  the  capitalist socio-economic system .
Adam Smith stated that one of the  पवित्र  laws of justice was to guard a  व्यक्ति  's property and possessions .
The process  और  mechanics of  स्वामित्व  are  fairly  complex : one can gain , transfer  और  lose  स्वामित्व  of property in a number of ways .
To acquire property one can purchase it  साथ  money , trade it  लिये  other  प्रॉपर्टी   ,  receive it as a gift , steal it , find it , make , it or homestead it .
एक  can transfer or lose ownership of property by  selling  it for  धन  , exchanging it for other property , giving it as a gift , being robbed of it , it , or having  it  stripped from one 's ownership through legal means such as eviction , foreclosure , seizure , or taking .
Ownership is  self-propagating  in that the owner of  कोई  property will also own the  आर्थिक  benefits of  कि  property  .
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a song recorded by Barbadian recording artist  रिहाना  , for her fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ) .
Featuring guest  vocals  from Canadian rapper Drake , the song was released as the second single from Loud on October 29 , 2010  through  Def Jam Recordings .
The R  &  B song was produced by  the  Norwegian production duo StarGate , and was written by the duo along with Ester Dean , Traci Hale , and Drake .
lyrically  , it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse and romance .
Music critics gave the  सोंग  positive reviews , citing it some of Rihanna 's best vocal  कार्य  to date  ;  there was a praise regarding its romantic nature , as well as its sexual tones .
`` What 's  my  Name ? '' was a  वाणिज्यिक  success and topped the US Billboard Hot 100 chart , giving Rihanna her third  number-one  single in 2010 , as well as her eighth overall on the chart .
The song  भी  topped the charts in Hungary and the United Kingdom and reached the top five in Canada , Ireland , New Zealand , Norway and Slovakia .
The song received a nomination at the 54th Grammy Awards  लिये  Best Rap/Sung Collaboration .
An accompanying music video , directed by Philip Andelman  ,  portrays a romantic encounter between Rihanna and  ड्रेक  in a grocery store along with romantic scenes between the pair and Rihanna walking through  मैनहटन  's Lower East Side .
`` What 's My Name ?  ''  was promoted with live performances across both sides of the Atlantic ,  सहित   शनिवार   रात्रि  Live in America and the series seven finale of  the  X Factor in the United Kingdom .
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the country 's media regulator , Ofcom , for the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit .
A mathematical constant is a special number , usually a real number ,  कि  is  ``  significantly interesting in some way '' .
Constants arise in many  अलग  areas of mathematics , with constants such as e ( mathematical constant ) | and pi| occurring in such diverse  contexts  as geometry , number theory and calculus .
What it means for a constant to arise ``  naturally   ''  , and what makes a constant `` interesting '' , is ultimately a matter of taste , and some mathematical constants are  notable  more for historical reasons than for their  मूलभूत  mathematical interest .
The  अधिक  popular constants have been studied throughout the ages and computed to many decimal places .
All mathematical constants are definable numbers and usually are also computable numbers  (  Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ) .
Elections to the United  राज्य  Senate  यहूद  held on November 2 , 2010 , for 37  of  the United States Senate 's 100 seats .
( A special election on January 19 , 2010 in Massachusetts was held earlier in the year . )
Thirty-four of the seats  यहूद   लिये   six-year  terms to  the  Senate 's `` class three '' , and three  यहूद   खास  elections for shorter terms .
Of the 37 elections , 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7  of  whom retired or were defeated in the  प्राथमिक  ) and 18  प्रदर्शित  incumbent Republicans ( eight of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ) .
After  the  previous elections ( in 2008 ) , the United  राज्य  Senate was composed of 58 Democrats , 40 Republicans , and 2 independents who  caucus  with the Democrats .
republicans  won four seats held by  retiring  Democrats and Republicans defeated two incumbent Democrats .
This was  the  largest number of  republicans  gains  चूंकि  the 1994 elections and  भी  the first time since that election that Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats .
This  थी  the fourth consecutive election of ``  क्लास  3 '' senators  जहाँ  Democrats have failed to  लाभ  seats and the third  लगातार  mid-term election held in a president 's first term where Republicans have  picked-up  seats .
Despite  ये  Republican wins ,  however  , the Democrats retained a majority of the  सीनेट   साथ  51 seats plus 2 independents who caucus  साथ  them , compared to the 47 Republicans .
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each  साल  as the  सूर्य  reaches its highest or lowest excursion relative to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere  .
As a result  ,  on the day of the solstice , the Sun  appears  to have  पहुँचे  its highest or lowest annual altitude in  the  sky  ऊपर  the horizon at local solar  नून  .
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( sun ) and  sistere  ( to stand still )  ,  because at the solstices , the Sun stands still in declination ; that is , the seasonal movement of the Sun 's path  (  as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction .
The solstices , together with the equinoxes , are connected with the seasons .
In many cultures the  solstices  mark either the beginning or the midpoint  of  winter and  गर्मियाँ  .
The term solstice can also be used in a broader sense , as the  तिथि  ( day ) when this occurs .
The day of the solstice is either the longest day of the year ( in summer ) or the shortest day of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics .
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29 , 1935 ) is an American rock and roll and country  म्यूज़िक  singer-songwriter and pianist  .
he  is known by the nickname `` The Killer  ''  and is  प्रायः  viewed  as  “rock & roll 's first great wild man” .
An early pioneer of  चट्टान  and roll music  ,  in 1956 Lewis  बना  his first recordings at Sun Records .
``  क्रेजी  Arms  ``  sold 300,000 copies in the South , but it was his  1957  hit `` Whole Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that shot  लुईस  to fame worldwide .
Lewis followed this in that same year when he recorded songs such as `` Great Balls of Fire ``  ,   ``  Breathless `` and `` High School Confidential `` .
Lewis  बेची  more records than Elvis Presley  at  this time .
however  , Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll career faltered in the  वेक  of his marriage to his young cousin .
He had little success in the charts  following   the  scandal and his popularity quickly faded .
His live performance fees plummeted from $ 10,000 per night to $ 250 .
In the meantime he was  संकल्पित  to gain back  कुछ  of his popularity .
During the early 60’s  he  did n't have much chart success with  few  exceptions such as `` What 'd I Say ``  .
His  सजीव  performances at this time were  increasingly  wild  और  energetic .
His album Live at the Star Club , Hamburg  इससे  1964 is often regarded by many music journalists and fans as one of the wildest  और  greatest rock and roll concert albums ever .
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years with  छोटी  success  ,  in 1968 Lewis made a transition into country music and had hits with songs such as `` Another Place , Another Time '' .
This reignited  उसके  career and throughout the late '60s and '70s he regularly topped the country-western  चार्ट  .
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make  प्रेम  Sweeter For You `` , `` There  जरूर  Be  अधिक  to Love Than  इस  `` , `` Would You Take Another  मौका  on Me ``  और  `` Me And Bobby McGee `` .
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock 'n ' roll past with songs such as a cover of the Big  bopper  's `` Chantilly Lace ``  और  `` Rockin ' My Life Away ``  .
In the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to audiences around the world and still releases new albums .
One such  एल्बम  , titled Last Man Standing , is his best selling to date at over  a  million  नक़ल   बेची  worldwide .
This was followed by  औसत  Old Man which has received some of the best sales of Lewis’s  करियर  .
लुईस  has had  a  dozen gold records in both rock and country , won several Grammy awards , including a Lifetime Achievement Award .
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of  कीर्ति  in 1986 , and his pioneering contribution to the genre has been recognized by  the  Rockabilly Hall of Fame .
In 1989 , his life was chronicled in the movie Great Balls of Fire , starring Dennis Quaid .
In 2003 , Rolling Stone Magazine listed his box set All Killer , No Filler : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of  सब  time  ``  .
In 2004 , they ranked him number 24 on their list of the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
Lewis is  the  last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar Quartet and  the  Class of '55 album , which also included Johnny Cash , Carl  perkins  , Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley .
Henry Louis  स्टीफंस  , untitled watercolor ( 1863 ) of  a   man  reading a newspaper with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery '' .
The Emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to all segments of the Executive branch (  सहित  the Army and Navy )  of  the United States by  अध्यक्ष  Abraham Lincoln on January 1  ,  1863 , during the American Civil War .
It was based on the president 's constitutional authority as commander in chief of  the  armed  शक्तियां  ; it was not a law passed by Congress .
It proclaimed all those enslaved  in  Confederate territory to be forever free , and ordered the Army ( and all segments of the Executive branch ) to treat as free all those enslaved in ten states that were still in rebellion , thus applying to 3.1 million of  the  4 million slaves in the U.S .
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still  अंतर्गत  rebellion , but as the army took control of Confederate regions ,  the  slaves  in  those  regions  were emancipated rather than returned  to  their masters .
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion  था  already been subdued were immediately emancipated , and over 3 million more were emancipated as the Union army advanced .
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave states that were not in rebellion , nor to most regions already controlled by the Union army ; emancipation  वहीँ  would come after separate state actions and/or the  दिसम्बर  1865 ratification  of  the  तेरहवीं  Amendment , which made slavery illegal everywhere  in  the U.S .
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners ,  किया   नहीं  itself outlaw slavery , and did not make the ex-slaves (  पुकारा   freedmen  ) citizens .
It made the eradication of slavery an explicit  युद्ध  goal , in addition to the goal of reuniting the Union .
On  सितंबर  22 , 1862 ,  lincoln  had issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the Confederate States of America that did not return to Union control by January 1 ,  1863  .
none  returned , and the order , signed and issued January 1 , 1863 , took effect except in locations where the Union  था  already mostly regained  कंट्रोल  .
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned  a  race war , angered  कुछ  Northern Democrats , energized anti-slavery forces  ,  and weakened forces in Europe that wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy  .
It also lifted the spirits of African  अमेरिकी  both in the Southern and Northern States , and led to many slaves escaping their masters  और  running behind Union lines  in  order to have their emancipation enforced .
Sucker Punch  is  a  2011  American fantasy action film directed by Zack Snyder and co-written by him and Steve Shibuya .
It is Snyder 's first film based on an original script .
The film stars Emily Browning  ,   abbie  Cornish , Jena Malone , Vanessa Hudgens , Jamie Chung ,  और  Carla Gugino .
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young woman who is committed to a mental institution , as she makes a plan to escape the hospital before suffering a lobotomy .
The film was released in both conventional and IMAX theatres in the United States at  मध्यरात्रि  on March 25  ,  2011 .
It  प्राप्त  generally negative reviews from critics  ,  but  थी  a moderate box office success .
Front and back of  canon  PowerShot A95 , a typical pocket-size digital camera
haselblad   503cw  with Ixpress V96C digital back , an example of  a  professional  डिजिटल  camera  प्रणाली
A digital camera ( or digicam )  is  a camera  कि  takes  वीडियो  or still photographs by recording images on an electronic image sensor .
Most cameras sold today are digital , and digital cameras are incorporated  into  many devices  ranging  from PDAs and mobile phones ( called camera phones ) to vehicles  .
Digital and  फिल्मी  cameras share an optical system , typically using a lens with a  परिवर्तनीय  diaphragm to focus  लाइट  onto an image pickup device .
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount of light to the imager , just as with film but the image pickup device is electronic rather than chemical  .
however  , unlike film cameras , digital cameras can display images on a screen immediately after being recorded  ,  and store and delete images from memory .
Many digital cameras can also record moving video with sound .
Some digital cameras  can  crop and stitch pictures and perform other elementary image editing .
The inside and front of a Dell  poweredge  web server , a  कंप्यूटर  designed for  रैक  mounting
Multiple web  सर्वर  may be used for a high traffic website , here four Sun Fire X4200 servers are installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer application ) that helps to deliver  वेब  content that can  be  accessed through the Internet .
The most common use of web servers is to host websites , but there are other uses such as gaming , data  भंडार  or running enterprise  अनुप्रयोग  .
The American Red Cross ( ARC ) , also known as the American National Red Cross , is a humanitarian  संगठन  that provides emergency assistance , disaster relief and education inside the United States .
It is  the  designated  u.S.  affiliate of  the  International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies .
Today , in addition to domestic disaster relief , the  अमरीकी  Red Cross offers  सेवाएं  in five other areas : community services  कि  help  the  needy ; communications services  और  comfort for military members and their family members ; the collection , processing and distribution of blood and  रक्त  products ; educational programs on preparedness  ,  health , and safety  ;  and international relief and development programs .
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of  the  United States Code , Section 3001 ,  the  American National Red Cross  is  governed by volunteers and supported by community donations , income from  स्वास्थ्य  and safety training and products , and income from  रक्त  products .
The American Red  क्रॉस  is headquartered in Washington ,  d.c  .
the  Chairman of  the  Board of Governors , serving her second three-year term , is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter .
the  current  अध्यक्ष  and  मुख्य  Executive Officer is Gail J. McGovern .

A rooster ( also called a cockerel or  मुर्गा  ) is a male gallinaceous bird .
it  usually  refers  to a male chicken ( Gallus gallus ) .
Immature male chickens less than one year old are  पुकारा   cockerels   .
The term ``  मुर्गा   ''  originates in the United States , and the term is widely used throughout North America ,  as  well as Australia and New Zealand .
In the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and Ireland the older term ``  cockerel  '' is more commonly used .
`` Cock '' is in general use as the name for a male  of  other species of bird , for example `` Cock sparrow '' .
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to sleep at  रात्रि  , and is done by both sexes .
The rooster is polygamous , but  can  not  गार्ड  several nests  of  eggs at once .
He guards the general area where his  मुर्गियां  are nesting , and will attack other roosters that enter his territory .
During the daytime , he usually sits on a high perch , usually 3–5 feet off the ground to serve as a  lookout  for his flock .
he  will sound a distinctive alarm call if predators are nearby .
The Pokémon Trading Card Game ( Pokémon  tcg  ) is a collectible card game based on the Pokémon video game series ,  पहला  published in October 1996 by Media Factory in Japan .
In the US , it was  initially  published by Wizards of the Coast , the company that produces , in December 1998 .
Nintendo took over publishing in June  2003   .
It is one of Nintendo 's last remaining strong links to its heritage as a playing card company .
जमीन  Rover is  a   अंग्रेजों  car manufacturer with its headquarters in Gaydon , Warwickshire , United Kingdom which specialises  in  four-wheel-drive vehicles .
It is part  of  the Jaguar Land Rover group , a subsidiary  of  Tata Motors of India .
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car brand in the world ( after Jeep ) .
The Land Rover name was originally used by the Rover  कम्पनी  for one specific vehicle model , named simply the Land Rover , launched by  रोवर   in  1948 .
Over the  following  years it developed into a  marque  encompassing a range  of  four-wheel-drive models , including the Defender , Discovery , Freelander , Range Rover , Range Rover  खेल  and Range Rover  evoque  .
Land Rovers are currently assembled in the  कम्पनी  's Halewood  और  Solihull  पौधे  ,  साथ  research and development taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres .
Land Rover sold 194,000 vehicles worldwide in 2009 .
Although the brand originates from the original 1948  मॉडल  ,  जमीन  Rover as a company has only existed since 1978 .
Prior to this , it was a product line of the Rover Company which  थी  subsequently absorbed into the  rover-triumph  division of the British Leyland Motor Corporation ( BL ) following  leyland   मोटर  Corporation  ’s  takeover  of  Rover in 1967 .
The  जारी  commercial success  of  the original Land Rover series models  ,  and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst  of  BL’s well documented business  परेशानियों  prompted the establishment of a separate Land Rover company but still under the BL  छतरियाँ  , remaining part of the subsequent  रोवर  Group in 1988 , under the ownership of British Aerospace after the  remains   of  British Leyland were broken up and privatised .
In 1994 Rover Group plc was acquired by BMW .
In 2000 , Rover Group was broken-up by BMW and Land Rover was sold to Ford Motor Company , becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group  .
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover brand from BMW for around £6  लाख  .
This reunited the  रोवर   और  Land Rover brands for the first time since 2000 when the Rover group was  टूटा  up by BMW .
In June  2008  , Ford sold both Land Rover and Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors  .
This sale also included  the   dormant   रोवर  brand
The cover of the first DVD compilation released by  aniplex  of  the  New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The ninth season of the  ब्लीच  anime series is named .
The series is based on Tite Kubo 's manga with same name .
the  episodes are  निर्देशित  by Noriyuki Abe and produced by TV Tokyo , Dentsu , and Studio  pierrot   .
The episodes '  प्लाट  focuses  on  the introduction  of  a new Soul Reaper captain , Shūsuke Amagai , and the mystery surrounding the Kasumiōji clan , one of the  परिवारों  that constitute the nobility of Soul Society .
The season began airing on  अप्रैल   23   ,  2008 in Japan on TV Tokyo and ended on October 7  ,  2008 .
The English  अनुकूलन  of the Bleach anime is  licensed  by Viz Media  ,  and this arc began airing  on  August 28 , 2010 on Cartoon  संजाल  's Adult Swim , and finished on January 29 , 2011 .
Five DVD compilations , each containing four episodes of the season  ,  have been  released  by Aniplex ; the first DVD compilation was  released  on November  26  , 2008 and the fifth on  कूच   25  , 2009  .
A DVD box will be published by Viz Media on December 13 , 2011 .
The episodes use three pieces of theme  म्यूज़िक  : one opening theme  और  two closing themes .
The opening theme is `` Chu-Bura  ``  by Kelun .
The first closing theme is `` Orange '' by Lil'B , used for episodes 168 to 179 , and the second closing theme is  ``  Gallop '' by pe'zmoku , used for the remainder of the episodes .
the  regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated  शक्तियां  of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United  राज्य  Constitution ,  it  is  इसलिए  exclusively the domain of the states to permit , prohibit , or otherwise regulate commercial sex , except  insofar  as Congress may regulate it  as  part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states , prostitution is considered a misdemeanor  in  the category  of  public order crime , a crime that disrupts the order of a community .
It was at one  समय   माना  to  be   a  vagrancy crime .
Currently , Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution , the terms of  जिससे  are  stipulated  in the Nevada Revised Statutes .
Only 8 counties  फिलहाल  contain active brothels .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains  the  Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area )  ,  Washoe County ( which contains Reno  )  , Carson City , Douglas County ,  और  Lincoln County .
The other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution , but some of these counties currently have no active  brothels  .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and living off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada  विधि  , as elsewhere in the country .
as  with other countries , prostitution in the United States can be divided into three broad  श्रेणी  : street prostitution , brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The East Coast  of  the United States ,  भी  known as the Eastern Seaboard or the  अटलांटिक  Seaboard and commonly shortened to East Coast , refers  to  the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic  समंदर  .
The states  जिससे  have shoreline on the East Coast are , from north to south , the U.S. states of Maine , New Hampshire , Massachusetts , Rhode Island , Connecticut , New York , New Jersey ,  डेलावेयर  , Maryland , Virginia , North Carolina , South Carolina , Georgia , and  फ्लोरिडा   .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 ,  1913   –  April  22  , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States , serving from 1969  to  1974 , when he became the only president to resign the office .
निक्सन  had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from  1953  to 1961 .
Nixon was  born  in Yorba Linda , California .
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School  of  Law in 1937  ,  returning to California to practice law .
He and  उसके  wife , Pat Nixon , moved  to  Washington to work for the  संघीय  government in 1942 .
He subsequently served  in  the United States Navy during World War II .
Nixon was elected in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the  सीनेट  in  1950   .
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his  प्रतिष्ठा  as a leading anti-communist , and elevated him to national prominence  .
He was the running mate of  ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower  ,  the Republican Party presidential nominee  in  the 1952 election .
Nixon served for  आठ   सालो  as  वाइस  president .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential  अभियान  in 1960 , narrowly losing to  जॉन  F. Kennedy , and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he ran again for the presidency and was elected  .
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War , he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of  चीन   in  1972 opened diplomatic relations  between  the two nations , and he  initiated  détente and the  anti-ballistic  Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same  साल  .
Domestically  ,  his administration generally embraced policies that transferred  शक्ति  from  वॉशिंगटन  to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives to fight  कर्कट  and illegal  दवाएँ  , imposed  मजदूरी  and price controls , enforced desegregation of some Southern schools , and established  the  Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with Apollo 11  ,  he scaled back manned space  खोजी  .
He was re-elected by a landslide  in  1972  .
निक्सन  's second term saw an  अरब  oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and  a  continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other  misconduct  by members of the  प्रशासन  .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support , and on August 9 ,  1974  ,  he  resigned in the face of almost certain  महाभियोग  and removal from office .
After his resignation , he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor , Gerald Ford .
In retirement  ,  Nixon 's work as  an  elder  statesman  , authoring several books and undertaking many foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate  उसके  public image .
He  suffered  a debilitating stroke on April 18 , 1994 , and died four  दिनों  later  at  the age of 81 .
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft , Lustral  )  is an antidepressant of  the  selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class .
It was introduced to  the  market by Pfizer in  1991  .
Sertraline is  primarily  prescribed for major depressive disorder in  वयस्क  outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive ,  दहशत  , and  सोशल  anxiety disorders in both adults and children .
In  2011  , it was the second-most  विहित   antidepressant  on the U.S. retail market , with 37,208,000 prescriptions .
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar  to  that of older tricyclic antidepressants , but  इसके  side effects are much less pronounced .
Differences with newer antidepressants are  subtler  and also mostly  confined  to side effects .
Evidence suggests that sertraline may work better than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of depression .
Treatment of panic disorder  साथ  sertraline  परिणाम   in  a significant decrease  of  the number  of  panic attacks and in improved quality of life .
For obsessive-compulsive disorder , sertraline  is  not as effective  as  cognitive behavioral therapy ; the best results have been  हासिल  by combining these two treatments .
Although approved for social phobia and posttraumatic stress disorder , sertraline leads to only modest improvement in these  शर्तें  .
Sertraline also  alleviates  the  लक्षण  of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment  .
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of  अन्य  SSRIs , with high rates of nausea , diarrhea  ,  insomnia , and sexual side effects ; however , it does  नहीं  cause  वज़न  gain , and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild .
In pregnant  महिलाओं  taking sertraline , the drug was present in significant concentrations  in  fetal blood , and was  भी   संबद्ध  with  a  higher rate of various birth defects .
Similarly to other antidepressants , the use of sertraline for  अवसाद  may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality  .
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film directed by Robert Townsend , who co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans .
Distributed  by  20th Century Fox , the film 's main cast  शामिल  Townsend , Michael Wright , Leon Robinson , Harry J.  lennix  , Tico Wells , Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers , and Diahann Carroll  .
The plot of the  फिल्मी  ( which is loosely based  on  the lives of several artists : The  dells  , The  temptations  , Four Tops , Wilson Pickett , James Brown , Frankie Lymon , Sam Cooke and others  )  follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats  .
the  film depicts the rise and  पतन  of a Motown inspired soul act through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist , Donald `` Duck '' Matthews  (  portrayed by Townsend ) , who serves as a narrator throughout the film .
However , a majority of the cinema  is  presented in  a  consecutive  समय  line as opposed to traditional flash backs .
The film includes a significant amount of original music conceived by various artists for the film 's soundtrack , including singles such  as   ``  A Heart Is a House for  प्रेम  `` , `` We Have n't Finished Yet '' , and `` Nothing But Love '' .
The film was released to most North American audiences  कूच  29 , 1991 however it was not  बना  available to audiences in  अन्य   महाद्वीपों  until 2002 when a DVD was  released  prior to another DVD release in 2006 for the film 's  15th  anniversary .
The movie received mixed reviews from  आलोचकों  .
Secretariat (  कूच  30 , 1970 – October 4 , 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years  .
He set race records in all three events  in  the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ) , the Preakness Stakes (  1:53  ) , and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today .
He is considered to be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th century , the highest  रैंकिंग  racehorse on the list URL_http .
He ranked  दूसरी  behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse  's  List  of   the   शीर्ष  100 U.S. Racehorses of the  20th  Century .
सचिवालय  was sired by Bold Ruler out  of  Somethingroyal , by Princequillo .
He was foaled at The Meadow  in  Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man  o  ' War , Secretariat was a large chestnut colt and was given the same nickname , `` Big Red . ''
Secretariat  's  grandsire , Nasrullah , is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977  ट्रिपल  Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny  chenery  , he was trained by Lucien Laurin  और  mainly ridden  by  Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races )  ,  and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He  raced  in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white checkered  रंगों  and  उसके   दूल्हे  was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat stood approximately tall , and weighed , with a 75-inch girth , in his racing prime .
A typical 12 V , 40 Ah Lead-acid car  बैटरी
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable battery that supplies electric energy to an automobile .
Usually this  refers   to  an SLI battery ( starting , lighting , ignition ) to  शक्ति  the starter motor ,  the  lights  ,  and the  प्रज्वलन  system of a vehicle’s engine .
Automotive SLI batteries  हैं  usually lead-acid type , and are made of six galvanic cells in series to  provide  a 12 volt system .
Each cell provides 2.1 volts for a total of 12.6 volt at full charge .
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or  tractors   ,  often equipped with diesel  इंजन  , may have two batteries in series for a 24 volt system , or may have parallel strings of batteries .
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead and separate plates of lead dioxide , which are submerged into an  electrolyte  solution  of  about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 %  जल  .
This causes a chemical reaction that releases electrons ,  allowing  them to flow through conductors to produce electricity .
As the battery discharges ,  the  acid of the electrolyte  प्रतिक्रियाएँ   साथ  the materials of the plates , changing their  सतह   to  lead sulfate  .
When the battery is recharged , the chemical  प्रतिक्रिया  is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms into lead dioxide and lead .
With the plates restored to their original  कंडीशन  , the process may now be repeated .
Battery recycling  of  automotive batteries  reduces  the need for resources required for manufacture of new batteries , diverts toxic lead from landfills , and prevents risk  of  improper disposal .
Full-time  नियुक्ति  is  नियुक्ति  in which a  व्यक्ति  works a minimum number of hours defined as such by his/her  नियोक्ता  .
Full-time employment  प्रायः  comes with benefits that are not typically offered to part-time , temporary , or flexible workers , such as annual leave ,  sickleave  , and health insurance .
Full-time jobs are  प्रायः  considered careers .
They generally pay more than part-time jobs , and usually carry more hours per week .
The Fair  मजदूर  Standards Act ( FLSA ) does not define full-time employment or  part-time  employment .
This is a matter generally to be  संकल्पित  by the employer ( US Department of Labor ) .
The definition by  नियोक्ता   can  vary  और  is generally published in a company 's Employee  हैंडबुक   .
Companies commonly require  इससे  30–35 or 40 hours per week  to   be  defined as  full-time  and therefore eligible for benefits .
Full-Time status varies between company and is  प्रायः  based on the shift  the  employee  जरूर  work during each work week .
The `` standard '' work week consists of five eight-hour days ,  commonly  served between  9:00am  to  5:00pm  totaling 40 hours .
While  a   four-day  week  generally  consists of four ten-hour days ; it  may  also consist of as little as nine hours for a  कुल  of a 36 hour work week .
Twelve-hour shifts are  प्रायः  three days per  सप्ताह  , unless the company has the intention of paying out  the  employee  ओवरटाइम  .
Overtime is legally paid out anytime an employee works more than 40 hours per week  .
The legal minimum for overtime starts at Base Pay + One-Half .
The increased payout is  माना  to compensate slightly for the increased fatigue which a person experiences on such long shifts .
Shifts can  भी  be very irregular , as  in  retail ,  लकिन  are  स्टिल  full-time if the required number  of  hours is reached .
There are some situations where a person who needs full-time work is dropped to part-time , which  is  sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker .
Seahorse is the title given to  54  species of marine fish in the genus  हिप्पोकैम्पस  .
`` Hippocampus ''  आता   इससे  the Ancient  यूनानी  hippos  अर्थ  ``  घोड़ा  '' and kampos meaning `` sea monster '' .
the  Controlled Substances Act  (  CSA ) was enacted into law by the  कॉंग्रेस  of the United States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse  रोकथाम  and Control Act of  1970  .
The CSA is the  संघीय  U.S. drug policy under  जिससे  the manufacture , importation , possession ,  उपयोग  and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ) , with varying qualifications for  a   पदार्थ  to be included in  प्रत्येक  .
दो  federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and  the   खाना  and Drug Administration , determine  जिससे   substances  are added to or removed  इससे   the   विभिन्न  schedules , though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and  सामन्था  Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000  ,  which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to  be  made on criteria including potential  लिये  abuse ( an undefined term  )  , currently accepted medical use in treatment  in  the United  राज्य  , and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  treaties .
Maya numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal (  आधार   -  twenty ) numeral system used  by  the  pre-columbian  Maya civilization .
The  numerals  are made up of three  प्रतीकों  ; zero ( shell shape  )  , one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ) .
For example , thirteen is written as three dots in a horizontal row above  दो  horizontal lines stacked  ऊपर  each other .
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27 , 1908 – January 22 ,  1973  ) , often referred to as LBJ , was the 36th  अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1963–1969 ) , a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice  अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only four people who served in all four elected federal offices of the United States : Representative , Senator , Vice President ,  और  President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas ,  परोसा  as a United  राज्य  Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961 ,  सहित   छह  years as United States Senate Majority Leader , two as  सीनेट  Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960 , Johnson was asked by  जॉन  F. Kennedy to  be  his running mate for the 1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy  on  November 22 , 1963 , completed Kennedy  's  term and  थी  elected President in his own right , winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly  समर्थित  by the Democratic Party and as President , he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld  सिविल  rights , public broadcasting , Medicare ,  medicaid  , environmental protection , aid to education , and his `` War on Poverty . ''
जॉनसन  was renowned for his domineering personality and the `` Johnson treatment , '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation .
meanwhile   ,  Johnson escalated American  भागीदारी  in the Vietnam War , from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968  ,  as  अमरीकी  casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar  गति  based especially on  विश्वविद्यालयों  campuses in the U.S. and  विदेश  .
Summer riots broke out in  सबसे  major  शहरों  after 1965 , and crime rates soared , as his opponents raised demands for `` law  और  order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions , and  बाद  Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary , he ended his bid for reelection .
रिपब्लिकन  Richard Nixon was elected to succeed him .
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the  शिखर   of  modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era .
जॉनसन  is ranked favorably by some historians because of his domestic policies  .
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a C-21 steroid hormone involved in the female menstrual  साईकिल  , pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species .
Progesterone belongs to  a  class of hormones called progestogens  ,  and is the major naturally  occurring  human progestogen  .
Big Bird is a protagonist of the children 's  टेलीविज़न  show Sesame Street .
Officially  performed  by Caroll Spinney since 1969 , he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) tall bright primrose-yellow bird .
He  can  roller skate , ice skate , dance , sing , write poetry , draw and even ride a unicycle .
But despite this wide array of  talents  , he is prone to frequent misunderstandings , on one occasion  भी   गायन  the alphabet as one big long word  (  from the song called `` ABC-DEF-GHI  ,  '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ) , pondering  कया  it could ever mean .
He lives in  a  large  घोंसला  behind the 123 Sesame Street brownstone and has  a  teddy bear named Radar .
