It provides web , social , and mobile analytics and other software solutions related to marketing intelligence .
The  कम्पनी  was founded in 1993 and now serves  अधिक  than 10,000 large and small firms. < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
The Second Crusade  (  1145–1149 ) was the  दूसरी  major crusade  शुभारम्भ  from  यूरोपीय  .
The Second Crusade was  प्रारंभ  in response  to   the  fall of  the  County of Edessa the  पिछला  year to the  शक्तियां  of Zengi  .
The  काउंटी  had  महरूम  founded during the First Crusade (  1096–1099  )  by  Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098 .
While it was the first Crusader state  to  be  संस्थापित  , it was  भी  the first to fall .
The  दूसरी  Crusade was announced by Pope Eugene III , and was the first of the crusades to be led by European kings , namely Louis  सात  of France and  कोनराड   iii  of Germany , with help from a number  of  other European nobles .
the  armies of the two kings marched separately across Europe .
After crossing Byzantine territory into Anatolia , both armies were separately defeated  by  the Seljuq Turks .
The main Western Christian source  ,   odo   of  Deuil , and  syriac  Christian sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus  secretly  hindered the  crusaders  ' progress , particularly in Anatolia  जहाँ  he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them .
लुई  and Conrad and the remnants of  उनके  armies reached Jerusalem and , in 1148 , participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus .
The crusade in  the  east was a failure for the  crusaders  and a great victory for the Muslims .
It would ultimately have a key influence on  the  fall  of  Jerusalem and give rise  to  the Third Crusade  at  the end of the 12th century .
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a combined force of 13,000 Flemish  ,  Frisian , Norman , English , Scottish , and German crusaders in 1147 .
Travelling from England , by  जलयान  , to  the  Holy Land ,  the  army  रोका  and helped  the  smaller  (   7,000  ) Portuguese army in the capture of Lisbon , expelling its Moorish occupants .
Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. (  )  , branded as Walmart , is an American multinational retail corporation that runs chains of  विशाल  discount department stores and warehouse stores .
the  company is the world 's third largest public corporation , according to the Fortune  वैश्विक  500 list in 2012 , the biggest private employer in the world with over two million employees , and is the largest retailer in the world .
Walmart remains a family-owned business , as the company is controlled by the Walton family , who own a 48 percent stake in Walmart .
it  is  भी  one of the  संसार  's most valuable companies .
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962 , incorporated on October 31 , 1969 ,  और  publicly traded on the  नई  York Stock Exchange in 1972 .
It is headquartered in Bentonville , Arkansas .
Walmart is also the largest grocery retailer in the United States .
In 2009 , it generated  51  percent of its US $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from grocery business .
It also owns and operates  the  Sam 's Club retail warehouses in North America .
By 1988 , Wal-Mart was the most profitable retailer in the US , and by November 1990 , it outsold K-mart .
By 1991 it outsold  सियर्स  in retail , making it America  's  largest retailer , a distinction it  स्टिल  holds .
walmart  has 8,500 stores  in  15 countries , under 55 different names  .
The company operates under the  walmart  name in the United States , including the 50 states and Puerto Rico  .
It operates in Mexico as Walmex , in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom as Asda , in Japan as Seiyu , and  in  India as  बेहतरीन  Price .
It  रै  wholly owned operations in Argentina , Brazil , and Canada .
Walmart 's investments outside  उत्तर  America have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom , South America  ,  and China are highly successful , whereas ventures in  जर्मनी  and South Korea were unsuccessful .
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 April 1952 – 6  फ़रवरी  2011  )  , was a  उत्तरी  Irish musician , most widely recognised as  a  singer and guitarist .
in  a career dating back to the  1960s  ,  मूर  played  साथ  artists including Phil Lynott and Brian Downey during his teens , leading him to memberships  साथ  the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions .
Moore shared the stage with such blues and rock luminaries as B.B . King , Albert King , Colosseum II , George Harrison and Greg Lake , as  खूब  as having a successful  सोलो  career  .
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high profile musicians , including  a  cameo appearance playing the lead guitar solo on `` She 's My Baby `` from Traveling Wilburys  आवाज़  . 3 .
An example  of  rack mounted servers
A web hosting service  is  a type of Internet hosting service  कि  allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the  संसार  Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by clients , as well as providing Internet connectivity ,  typically  in a  आंकड़ा  center .
Web hosts can also  provide  data center space and connectivity to the Internet for  अन्य  servers located in their data center , called  colocation  , also known as Housing in Latin America or France .
The scope of web hosting services varies  greatly  .
The most  मौलिक  is web page and small-scale file hosting , where files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol (  एफटीपी  ) or a Web interface .
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing .
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs  )  offer this service free to subscribers .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting from alternative service providers .
Personal web site hosting is typically free , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size and  प्रकार  of the website .
सिंगल  page hosting is generally  sufficient   लिये  personal web pages  .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that  provides   डेटाबेस  support and  अनुप्रयोग   विकास  platforms ( e.g .  पीएचपी  , Java , Ruby on Rails ,  coldfusion  , or  asp.net  ) .
These facilities allow customers to write  or  install scripts for applications like forums and content management .
Also , Secure Sockets  परत  ( SSL )  is  typically used for  e-commerce   .
The  मेजबान  may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web server and installing scripts , as well as other modules and service  अनुप्रयोग  like e-mail .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g . e-commerce  )  , which are commonly used by larger  कंपनियाँ  that outsource network infrastructure .
obstetrics  ( from the Latin obstare , `` to stand  by  '' ) is the medical  specialty  dealing with the  परवाह  of all  महिलाओं  's reproductive tracts and their children during pregnancy ( prenatal period ) , childbirth and the postnatal  काल   .
अनेक  obstetricians are also gynecologists , meaning they perform  in  both specialties .
In the United States , these physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs .
the  Wright brothers , Orville ( August 19  ,  1871 – January 30 ,  1948  ) and Wilbur ( April  16  ,  1867  – May 30 , 1912 ) ,  यहूद  two American brothers , inventors , and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and building the world 's first successful airplane and making the  पहला  controlled , powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight , on December  17  , 1903  .
From 1905 to 1907  ,  the brothers developed their flying machine  into  the first practical fixed-wing aircraft .
Although not the first to build and fly experimental aircraft , the Wright brothers were the  पहला   to   इफ़तेरा  aircraft controls that  बना  fixed-wing powered flight possible .
The brothers  '  fundamental breakthrough was their invention of three-axis control , which enabled the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively and  to  maintain its equilibrium .
This method became standard and remains standard on fixed-wing aircraft  of  all kinds .
From the beginning of their aeronautical work , the Wright brothers focused on developing a  विश्वसनीय  method of pilot control as the key to solving `` the flying problem '' .
This approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the time who put more emphasis on developing powerful engines .
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel , the Wrights also collected more accurate data than any before , enabling them to design and build wings and  propellers  that were more  कुशल  than any before .
Their first U.S. patent , 821,393 , did not claim invention of a flying machine ,  लकिन  rather , the invention of a system  of  aerodynamic control that manipulated a flying machine 's surfaces .
They gained the mechanical skills  अनिवार्य  for their success by working for years in their shop with printing presses , bicycles , motors , and other machinery .
Their work with bicycles in particular influenced their belief that an unstable vehicle like a flying  यंत्र  could be controlled and balanced with practice .
From 1900 until their first powered flights in late 1903 , they conducted extensive glider tests that  भी  developed their skills as pilots .
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became  an  important part of the team , building their  पहला  aircraft engine in close  सहयोग  with  the  brothers .
The Wright  भाइयो  ' status as inventors of the airplane has been subject to counter-claims by various parties .
Much controversy persists  over  the many competing claims of early aviators .
अमेरिका  's Next Top Model ,  साईकिल  12 is  the  twelfth  साईकिल  of America 's  अगला  Top Model and the sixth season to air on The CW network .
It premiered on March 4  ,  2009  .
The cycle 's catch phrase is `` Get In The Fold . ''
The cycle 's promotional  सोंग  is Lady Gaga 's `` The Fame '' .
The prizes for this cycle are:
A modeling contract  साथ  Elite Model Management .
A fashion spread and cover in Seventeen .
A 100,000 contract with CoverGirl cosmetics .
The first half of the cycle took place  in  New York City , moving  the   दिखाएँ   वापस   इससे  Los Angeles last season .
the  international destination for this cycle is São Paulo  ,  Brazil , the series first visit to South America .
the   क्रमांक  of girls was reduced to 13 , the first time since Cycle 9 , after  होने  maintained at  14  in the last two cycles  .
This was the last time  paulina  Porizkova participated as judge .
The winner was 20-year-old Teyona Anderson from Woodstown ,  नई  Jersey .
This season averaged 4.35 million viewers per episode .
Exxon Mobil Corporation , or ExxonMobil , is an American multinational oil and  गैस  corporation headquartered in Irving , Texas  ,  United States .
It is a direct descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's Standard Oil company , and was formed  on  November 30 , 1999 , by  the  merger of Exxon and Mobil .
It is affiliated with  इम्पीरियल   आयल  which operates in Canada .
ExxonMobil is the world  's   largest  company by revenue and in 2013  ,  became the largest  सरेआम  traded  कम्पनी  by market capitalization  in  the world .
The company is ranked # 5  globally  in Forbes Global 2000 list in  2013  .
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and , at then ( 2007 ) rates of production , are expected  to  last over 14 years .
साथ  37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting  a  combined daily refining capacity of  ,  Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in  the  world , a title that was also associated with Standard Oil since  इसके  incorporation in 1870 .
ExxonMobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors with daily  उत्पादन  of 3.921 million BOE  (  barrels of oil equivalent  )   .
in  2008 , this was  लगभग  3 % of world production ,  जिससे   is   कम  than several  of  the largest  state-owned  petroleum companies .
When  क्रमित  by oil and gas reserves it is 14th  in  the world with less than 1 % of the total .
A 2012 article in  the  Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil  रै   ``  grown into one of the planet’s most hated corporations , able to determine American foreign policy and the fate of entire nations '' .
In terms of its environmental record ,  exxonmobil  increasingly  drills  in terrains leased to them by dictatorships , such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea .
Lee Raymond  ,   the  corporation’s chief executive until 2005 , was `` notoriously sceptical about climate change  और  disliked government interference at any level '' .
The company was widely criticized for its slow  जवाब  to cleaning  इसके  1989 Valdez oil spill in Alaska .
This article  is   परिचय  the Globe Theatre of Shakespeare .
For the modern  पुनर्निर्माण  in London , see Shakespeare 's Globe .
For other uses , see Globe Theatre ( disambiguation  )  .
the  Globe Theatre was a theatre in London associated  साथ  William Shakespeare .
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare  's  playing company , the Lord Chamberlain 's Men , on land  स्वामित्व  by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son , Nicholas  brend  and grandson Sir Matthew Brend , and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613 .
A second Globe Theatre was built on the same site by  जून  1614 and closed in 1642 .
A  आधुनिक   पुनर्निर्माण  of the Globe , named  ``  Shakespeare 's Globe `` , opened in 1997 approximately from the site of  the   असली  theatre  .
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced  और  directed by Frank Capra , based on the short story `` The Greatest Gift `` , which Philip  वैन  Doren Stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945 .
The film is considered one  of  the most loved films in American cinema and has become traditional viewing during  the  Christmas season , alongside popular  क्लासिक   ऐसे  as Charles Dickens '  a  Christmas Carol .
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey  ,  a man  जो  has given up his  सपनो  in order to help others and  जिनकी  imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings about the intervention of his guardian angel , Clarence Odbody ( Henry  ट्रेवर्स  ) .
Clarence shows George all the lives  he  has touched  और  how different life in his  जातियाँ  of Bedford Falls would be had he never been  born  .
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff competition at the time of its release , the film has come to be regarded as a classic and is a staple of Christmas television around the world .
Theatrically , the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 million , approximately twice the production cost ,  a  figure it never came close to achieving in its initial release .
An appraisal  in  2006 reported : `` Although it was not the  पूरा  box office failure that today everyone believes ... it was initially a major disappointment and confirmed , at  तनिक  to  the  studios , that Capra was no longer  सक्षम  of turning  आउट   the  populist features that made his films the must-see , money-making events they once were  .  ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by  the  American Film Institute as one of the 100 best American films ever made , placing number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie list , and would also place number one on its list of the most inspirational American films of all time .
Data Warehouse Overview
In computing , a  आंकड़ा  warehouse or enterprise data warehouse ( DW ,  dwh  , or EDW ) is  a  database  प्रयुक्त  for reporting and data analysis .
It is a central repository of data which is created by integrating data from one or more disparate sources .
Data warehouses store current  as  well as  ऐतिहासिक  data and are used for creating trending reports for senior management reporting such as annual and quarterly comparisons .
The data stored in the  गोदाम  are uploaded from the operational systems ( such as marketing , sales etc. , shown in the figure to the right  )  .
The data may pass through an operational data store for  अतिरिक्त  operations before they are used in the DW for reporting  .
The typical ETL -based data  गोदाम  uses staging , data integration ,  और   अभिगम  layers to house its key functions .
The  स्टेजिंग  layer or staging database stores raw data extracted from each of  the  disparate source data systems .
the  integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming the data from the staging layer often storing this transformed data in an operational data store ( ODS ) database .
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database , often called the data  गोदाम  database ,  जहाँ  the data is arranged into hierarchical groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate  तथ्य  .
The combination of facts and dimensions  is  sometimes called a star schema .
The access layer helps users retrieve data .
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data source systems does not require ETL , staging databases  ,  or operational data store databases .
The integrated data source systems may  be  considered to be a part of  a   वितरित  operational data store layer .
Data federation methods or data  आभासीकरण   विधि  may be used to access the distributed integrated source data systems to  consolidate  and aggregate  आंकड़ा  directly into the data warehouse database tables .
Unlike the ETL-based data  गोदाम  , the integrated source  आंकड़ा  systems and the data warehouse are all integrated since there is  no  transformation of dimensional or reference data .
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the drill down from the  कुल  data  of  the data warehouse to the  transactional  data of the  एकीकृत  source data systems .
Data warehouses can be subdivided into data  marts  .
Data marts store subsets of data from a warehouse .
This definition  of  the data warehouse focuses  on   आंकड़ा  storage .
The main  सोर्स  of the data is cleaned , transformed , cataloged and made available for use  by  managers and other business professionals for data mining , online analytical processing , market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ) .
However , the means to  retrieve  and  analyze  data ,  to  extract , transform and load data , and to manage the data dictionary are also considered essential components  of  a data warehousing system .
अनेक  references to data warehousing use this broader context .
Thus , an expanded definition for data warehousing  शामिल  business  प्रज्ञा  tools ,  टूल्स  to extract , transform and load data into the  repository   ,  and tools to manage and retrieve metadata .
Portland stone quarry on the Isle of Portland  ,  England
An abandoned construction aggregate quarry near Adelaide ,  दक्षिण  Australia
A quarry is a type of open-pit  मेरा  from which rock or  खनिज  are extracted .
Quarries  हैं  generally used for extracting building materials , such as dimension stone , construction aggregate  ,  riprap , sand , and gravel .
They are  प्रायः  collocated with concrete and asphalt plants due to the requirement for large amounts of aggregate in those  सामग्री  .
Open  खानों  that produce  खनिज  are typically referred to as open pit mines .
The word quarry can include  भूमिगत  quarrying for  स्टोन  , such as  नहाना  stone .
Mormons ( ) are a  धार्मिक  and cultural group  सम्बन्धित  to Mormonism ,  the  principal branch of the Latter Day  संत  movement of Restorationist Christianity , which began with the visions of Joseph  स्मिथ  in upstate New York during the 1820s .
After Smith 's death in 1844 the Mormons followed  ब्रिघम  Young to what would  become  the Utah Territory .
Today Mormons are understood to be members of The  गिरिजाघर  of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) .
Some  mormons  are also either independent or non-practicing .
The center  of  Mormon cultural  influence  is in Utah , and North America has more Mormons than any other continent , though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States .
Mormons have developed a strong sense of communality that stems from their doctrine and history .
दौरान  the 19th century Mormon  converts  tended to gather to  a  central geographic location , and between 1852 and 1890 a minority of  mormons  openly practiced  बहुवचन  marriage  ,  a form of religious polygamy .
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and resources to serving in their church , and many young Mormons choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission .
Mormons have  a  health code that eschews alcoholic beverages , tobacco  ,  coffee , tea , and other addictive substances .
They tend to be very family-oriented , and have strong connections across  पीढियां  and with extended family , reflective of their belief that families can be sealed  साथ  beyond  मौत  and throughout eternity .
Mormons also have  a  strict law of chastity , requiring abstention from sexual relations outside of marriage and strict  वफ़ादारी  within marriage .
Mormons self-identify as Christian ,  हालांकि  some of  उनके  beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity .
Mormons  मानना  in the Bible , as well as  अन्य  books of scripture , such as the Book of Mormon .
वे  have a unique view of  cosmology  , and believe that all people are spirit-children of God .
mormons  believe that returning to God requires following  the  example of Jesus Christ ,  और  accepting his atonement through  ordinances  such as baptism .
They believe that  मसीह  's church  थी  restored  through  Joseph Smith , and is guided by living prophets and  रसूलों  .
Central to Mormon  आस्था  is the  विश्वास  that  परमेश्वर  speaks  to  his children  और   जवाब  their prayers .
In financial accounting , assets  हैं  economic resources .
Anything tangible  or  intangible that is capable of being owned or controlled to produce value  और  that is held to have positive economic value  is  considered an  एसेट  .
Simply stated , assets represent value of ownership that can be converted into cash ( although cash itself is also  माना  an asset ) .
the  balance sheet  of  a firm records the monetaryJ .
G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005.There are different methods of  assessing  the monetary value of the assets recorded on the Balance Sheet .
In some cases , the Historical Cost is used ;  ऐसे  that the value of the asset  जब  it was bought in the past is used as the monetary value .
In other instances ,  the  present fair market value of the asset  is  used  to  determine the value shown on the  संतुलन  sheet .
value of the assets owned by the firm .
It is money and other valuables belonging  to  an individual or business .
Two major asset classes are tangible  एसेट  and intangible assets .
Tangible assets contain  विभिन्न  subclasses , including current assets and fixed assets.J .
Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms ''  ,  Baron 's Financial  मार्गदर्शिका  , 2003 Current assets include inventory , while fixed assets  शामिल  such items as buildings and equipment .J . Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 ; and  J.  G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005 .
intangible   एसेट  are nonphysical resources and rights  कि  have a value to the firm because  वे  give the firm some kind  of  advantage in the market place .
Examples of  intangible  assets are goodwill , copyrights , trademarks  ,  patents and computer programs , and financial assets , including such items as accounts receivable , bonds and stocks .
A neuron  (  or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is  an  electrically excitable cell that processes and  transmits  information through electrical and chemical signals .
A chemical signal occurs  via   a   अन्तर्ग्रथन  ,  a  specialized connection with other  कोशिकाएं  .
Neurons connect to each other to form neural  संजाल  .
न्यूरॉन्स  are the core components of the nervous system , which includes the brain ,  स्पाइनल  cord ,  और  peripheral  ganglia  .
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch , sound , light  और  numerous other stimuli affecting cells of the sensory organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain .
Motor neurons receive signals from the brain  और  spinal cord , cause muscle contractions ,  और   affect  glands .
Interneurons connect neurons to other neurons within the same region of the brain or spinal cord .
A typical neuron possesses a  कोशिका  body (  प्रायः  called the soma ) , dendrites , and an axon .
Dendrites are thin structures that arise from the cell body , often extending for hundreds of micrometres and  branching   अनेक   टाइम्स   ,  giving  वृद्धि  to a complex `` dendritic tree '' .
An axon is a special cellular  एक्सटेंशन  that arises from the cell body at a site called the axon hillock and travels for a distance , as far as 1 meter in humans or  भी  more in other species .
the  cell body of a neuron frequently gives rise to multiple dendrites , but  never  to more than one axon , although the  axon  may branch hundreds of times before it  terminates  .
At the majority of synapses , signals are sent from the axon of one neuron to  a  dendrite  of  another .
There are , however , many exceptions to these rules  :  neurons  कि  lack dendrites , neurons  कि  have no axon , synapses that connect an axon to  another  axon  or  a  dendrite  to another  dendrite  , etc .
All neurons are electrically excitable , maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by means of metabolically driven ion pumps , which combine with ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration  मतभेद  of ions such as sodium , potassium , chloride , and calcium .
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the function of voltage-dependent ion channels .
If the voltage changes by a large enough amount , an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called  an  action potential is generated , which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon , and activates synaptic connections with other cells when it arrives .
Neurons do not undergo cell division .
In most cases , neurons are generated by special types of stem  कोशिकाएं   .
Astrocytes , a type of glial cell  ,  have  भी  been observed to  फेरे  into neurons by virtue  of  the stem cell characteristic  pluripotency  .
In humans  ,  neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in  दो   दिमाग  areas ,  the  hippocampus and olfactory bulb  ,  there is strong evidence for generation of substantial numbers of new neurons .
Super Bowl XLIII was an American football game between the American  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( AFC )  चैंपियन  Pittsburgh Steelers and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season  .
The Steelers defeated  the  Cardinals by the score of 27–23 .
The game was played  on  February 1 , 2009 , at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa , Florida .
साथ  this win , the Steelers  became  the first team to win six Super Bowls .
Pittsburgh  ,  who finished the  नियमित   ऋतु  with a 12–4 record , also won their  दूसरी  Super Bowl  in  four years after winning Super Bowl XL at the end of the 2005 season .
The Cardinals  डाला  the game seeking their first NFL title since 1947 , the longest championship drought in  the  league  .
the  club became an unexpected winner during  the   नियमित   ऋतु  ,  compiling  a 9–7 record , and the  playoffs  with the aid of head  कोच   केन  Whisenhunt , who was the Steelers ' offensive coordinator  in  Super Bowl XL , and the  re-emergence  of quarterback Kurt Warner  ,  who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team  ,  St. Louis Rams .
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime lead , aided by linebacker James Harrison 's Super Bowl record 100-yard interception return for  a  touchdown .
Trailing 20–7 at the  प्रारंभ  of  the  fourth quarter , Arizona scored 16 unanswered points , including wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception , to take the lead with 2:37 remaining  in  the game .
But the Steelers  marched  78 yards  to  score on wide receiver Santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left .
Holmes ,  जो  caught  नौ   गुजरता   लिये  131 yards and a touchdown , including four  receptions  for 73 yards on that final game-winning  ड्राइव  , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He became the sixth wide receiver to  जीत  the award ,  और  also was  the  third Pittsburgh receiver to win the award , following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward .
Despite the  वैश्विक  financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that are normally held before the game , the NBC television network broadcast  आकर्षित  an average U.S. audience of 98.7 million viewers , making it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point .
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum ,  प्रर्दशित  various properties across the range of frequencies and  wavelengths
the  electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum ''  of  an object has a different meaning , and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum  extends  from below the low frequencies used for  आधुनिक  radio communication  to   गामा  radiation at the short- wavelength  (  high-frequency ) end ,  thereby  covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down  to  a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is  the   आकार  of the universe itself , while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of  the  Planck length , although in principle the spectrum  is  infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum  हैं   प्रयुक्त  in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions , as ways to study and characterize matter .
In addition , radiation from  विभिन्न  parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
Marchantia , a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional  नाम  used to refer to all embryophytes ( land plants ) that do not have true vascular tissue and are therefore called ' non-vascular plants ' .
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport of water ; however since these do not  contain  lignin ,  वे  are not considered to be true vascular tissue .
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic  समूह  ; however the name is convenient and remains in use  as  a collective term for mosses , hornworts , and liverworts .
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia and sporangia ) ,  लकिन  they produce neither flowers nor seeds , reproducing  via  spores .
The term bryophyte comes from Greek  βρύον  , bryon , `` tree-moss  ,  oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant '' .
A bank is  a  financial institution and a financial intermediary that accepts deposits and channels those deposits into lending activities , either directly by  loaning  or indirectly through  पूंजी  markets .
A bank is the connection  between  customers that have capital deficits and customers with capital surpluses .
Due to their influence within a financial system and an economy , banks are generally highly regulated in most countries .
Most banks operate under a system known as fractional reserve banking where they hold only a  छोटी   आरक्षित  of the funds deposited and lend out  the  rest for profit  .
They are generally subject to minimum capital requirements  जिससे   हैं  based on an international set of capital standards , known as the Basel Accords .
The oldest bank still  in  existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena ,  headquartered  in Siena , Italy , which has  महरूम  operating continuously since 1472 .
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 ) and  sveriges  Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ) .
Banking in its  आधुनिक  sense evolved in  समृद्ध  cities of  पुनर्जागरण  Italy , such  as  Florence , Venice and Genoa .
In the history of banking , a  क्रमांक  of banking  dynasties  —among them notably  medici  ,  fugger  , Welser , Berenberg , Baring and Rothschild —have played a  सेंट्रल  role over many centuries .
The Xbox is a video game console  manufactured  by Microsoft .
It was released  on  November 15 , 2001 in North America , February 22 , 2002 in Japan , and March 14 , 2002 in Australia and Europe  .
It was Microsoft 's first foray  into  the  गेमिंग   कंसोल  market .
As part of the  sixth-generation  of gaming , the Xbox competed with Sony 's  प्लेस्टेशन  2 , Sega 's Dreamcast  (  which  रोका  American sales before the Xbox went on sale ) , and Nintendo 's GameCube .
The Xbox was the first console offered by an American  कम्पनी  after the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996 .
The integrated Xbox Live  सेवा  launched in November 2002 allowed players to play games online with a broadband connection .
It first competed with  dreamcast  's online service but  बाद  primarily competed with PlayStation 2 's online service .
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription ,  as  well as broadband-only connection  जिससे  was not completely adopted yet , Xbox Live was a success  due  to better servers , features such as a buddy list , and milestone titles like Halo  2  released in November 2004 , which is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years .
एक्सबॉक्स  's successor  ,  the Xbox 360  ,  was launched in November 2005 .
the  Xbox was discontinued in late 2005 in Japan where  बिक्री  were poor  .
It was discontinued in late 2006 in Europe and  जल्दी  2007 in North  अमेरिका  .
The last Xbox  खेल  in Europe was Tony Hawk 's Project 8 released in November  2006  , and the last game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008 .
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on March 2 , 2009 , stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken .
Xbox access to Xbox Live was stopped  on  April 15 , 2010 .
the  Gospel According to John  (  Greek τὸ  κατὰ  Ἰωάννην  εὐαγγέλιον  )  ,  commonly referred to as  the  Gospel of John or simply John and  प्रायः  referred to in New Testament  स्कॉलरशिप  as the Fourth Gospel ,  is  an account of the public ministry of Jesus .
It begins with the  गवाह  and  प्रतिज्ञान  by  जॉन  the Baptist and concludes with the death , burial ,  क़यामत  , and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus .
This account is fourth of  the  canonical gospels , after  the  synoptics Matthew , Mark and Luke  .
states  कि  the book derives from the testimony  of  the ' disciple whom Jesus loved . '
Along with Peter , the unnamed disciple is especially close to Jesus , and early-church tradition identified him as John  the  Apostle , one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles .
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three  surviving  Epistles of John such that commentators treat the four books together , yet , according to most modern scholars , John was not the author of any of these books  .
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more  और  more has placed John within  a  first-century Jewish context .
Raymond  E.   भूरा  did pioneering work to  ट्रेस   the  development of the  परंपरा  from which the gospel arose .
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the Gospel was written .
It is notable  कि  , in the gospel , the community still appears to  define  itself primarily against Judaism , rather than as part of a wider  ईसाई  church .
Though Christianity started as a movement within Judaism , gradually Christians and Jews became bitterly opposed .
John presents a  ``  higher '' Christology than the synoptics  ,  meaning that it describes Jesus as the  अवतार  of the divine Logos through whom all things were made , as the object of  veneration  , and more explicitly as God incarnate .
तभी  in John  करता   यीशु  talk at  लंबाई  about himself and his  दैवी   भूमिका  , often shared with the disciples only .
Against the synoptics , John  focuses  largely on different miracles ( including resurrecting Lazarus )  ,  given as signs meant to engender faith .
Synoptic elements  ऐसे  as parables and exorcisms are not found in John .
It presents a realized eschatology in which salvation is already present for the  आस्तिक  .
The Plagues of Egypt ( ) , also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues ,  यहूद  ten calamities that , according to the biblical  किताब  of Exodus ,  इसराईल  's God , Yahweh , inflicted upon Egypt to persuade Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery .
Pharaoh capitulated after the tenth plague , triggering the Exodus of the Jewish  लोगों  .
The plagues were designed to contrast the power of  yahweh  with the impotence of  मिश्र  's various gods .
Some commentators  have  associated several of the plagues with judgment on specific  देवताओं  associated with the Nile , fertility and  प्राकृतिक   phenomena  .
The plagues of Egypt are also  उल्लेखित  in the Quran ( 7,133–136  )  .
according  to the Book of Exodus , God proclaims that all the gods of Egypt will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the plague of hail and fire ( 1823 ) .
A role-playing game ( RPG  और  sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game in which players assume the roles of  वर्ण  in a fictional setting .
Players take responsibility for  एक्टिंग   आउट  these roles within a narrative , either through literal acting or through a process of structured decision-making or character development .
Actions taken within many games succeed or fail  according  to a formal  प्रणाली  of rules and guidelines .
There are several forms  of   आरपीजी  .
The  असली   रूप  , sometimes  पुकारा  the  tabletop  RPG ,  is  conducted through discussion ,  whereas  in live action role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions .
In both of these forms , an arranger called a game master ( GM ) usually decides on  the  rules and setting  to  be used and acts as referee  ,   जबकि   प्रत्येक  of  the  other players plays the role of a  सिंगल  character .
Several varieties of RPG also exist in electronic  मीडिया  , such as multi-player text-based MUDs and their graphics-based successors , massively  एकाधिक  online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ) .
Role-playing games also include  single-player  offline role-playing  वीडियो  games in which players control a character or team who undertake quests , and  may  include capabilities that  अग्रिम  using statistical  यांत्रिकी  .
ये  games often share settings and  नियम  with tabletop RPGs , but emphasize character advancement more than collaborative storytelling .
Despite this variety of forms , some game forms such as trading card games and  wargames  that are related to  role-playing  games may not be  शामिल  .
Role-playing  कार्यकलाप  may sometimes be present in such  खेल  , but  it  is not the  प्राथमिक  focus .
the  term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in teaching ,  प्रशिक्षण   ,  and academic research .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War ( ACW ) , also known  as  the War between the States or simply the Civil War (  देखिए  naming ) , was a civil  युद्ध  fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union ''  or  the `` North '' ) and several Southern  स्लेव  states  कि  declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of  अमेरिका  ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in  the  issue of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन  of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers did  नहीं  intervene  .
After four years  of  bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was  abolished  , and the difficult Reconstruction process of  restoring  national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
in  the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding  गुलामी  into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven  cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans  अस्वीकृत   secession  as illegal .
lincoln  's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil war  .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces  जब्त  numerous federal forts within territory  claimed  by the  confederacy  .
A Peace Conference failed  to  find a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so  निर्भर  on ``  किंग  Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none  पहचाना  the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861  ,  when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union  सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to  retake  the fort  ;  consequently , four more slave states joined  the  Confederacy  ,  bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in  1861–62  .
The autumn 1862 Confederate  अभियान  into Maryland ( a Union state )  ended  with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln  जारी  the Emancipation  उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by  गर्मियाँ  1862 the Union  नष्ट  the Confederate river  नेवी  , then much of their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg  विभाजित  the Confederacy in two  at  the Mississippi  नदी   .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at  the  Battle of Gettysburg  .
Western successes led to  ulysses  S. Grant command  of  all  संघ  armies in 1864 .
In the  पश्चिमी  Theater , William T. Sherman drove  ईस्ट  to capture Atlanta  और  marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union  marshaled  the resources and manpower  to  attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
the  defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox  अदालत  House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced  हथियार  were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food  आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed World War  i  .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths  of  an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates  the  death toll  at  ten percent of all Northern males 20–45  सालो  old , and 30 percent of all Southern white  males  aged 18–40 .
The definition of the world 's busiest airport has been specified by the  एयरपोर्ट  Council International in Geneva , Switzerland .
the  ACI  defines  and measures the following three types of airport traffic:
Passenger traffic : total passengers emplaned and deplaned  ,  passengers in transit counted once
Cargo traffic : loaded and unloaded  भाड़ा  and mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements : landings and take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) was a global  युद्ध  centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It  थी  predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its  occurrence  until the start of World War II in  1939  , and the  पहला  World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved  सब  the  संसार  's  ग्रेट  powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies  (  based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France and Russia )  और  the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter  into  the war )  .
These alliances were  दोनो  reorganised and expanded as more nations entered  the  war : Italy  ,  Japan and  the  United  राज्य  joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central  शक्तियां  .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the  largest  wars in history .
अधिक  than 9 million combatants were killed ,  largely  because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
it  was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently  paving  the way for various political changes , such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of  the  great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne  of  Austria-Hungary , on 28 June  1914  by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo  princip  in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of  सर्बिया  .
Several alliances formed over  the  previous decades were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers  यहूद  at war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around  the  world  .
On 28  जुलाई  , the Austro-Hungarians fired the  पहला  shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and  ध्वज  on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war  विरूद्ध  Germany .
After the German  कूच  on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition  साथ  a trench  लकीर  that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army  थी   कामयाब  against the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war ,  खोलने  up fronts in the Caucasus  ,  Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the  त्सार  's government collapsed  in   कूच  1917 and a subsequent revolution  in  November brought the Russians to terms with  the  Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives  और  American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to an  armistice  on 11  नवम्बर  1918 .
The war ended in victory for  the  Allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as  the  participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the  समाप्त  of the  युद्ध  , four major imperial powers—the German ,  रूसी  , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory , while the latter two  यहूद  dismantled entirely .
The map of central Europe was redrawn into several  छोटी  states .
The League of Nations  थी  formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
the  European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires ,  the  repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill , the  bp  oil disaster , the Gulf of Mexico oil spill ,  और   the  Macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo Prospect ,  माना  the largest accidental marine oil spill in the history of the petroleum industry , estimated to be between  8  % and 31 % larger  in  volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill .
Following the explosion and  डूब  of the  deepwater  Horizon oil rig , which claimed 11 lives , a sea-floor oil gusher flowed  unabated  for 87 days , until it was capped  on  15 July 2010  .
The total discharge  is  estimated at .
A  विशाल  response ensued to protect beaches , wetlands  और  estuaries from the spreading oil utilizing skimmer ships , floating booms , controlled burns and of  corexit  oil dispersant .
After  अनेक  failed efforts to contain the flow , the well was declared sealed on 19 September 2010 .
Some reports  indicate  the well site continues to  लीक  .
Due  to  the months-long spill , along with adverse effects from the response and cleanup activities , extensive damage to marine and wildlife habitats , fishing and tourism industries , and human health problems have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill , tar balls could  स्टिल  be found on the Mississippi coast  .
Numerous investigations explored  the  causes of the explosion and record-setting spill .
Notably , the U.S. government 's September 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the  खूब  , faulting mostly BP , but also well operator Transocean and contractor Halliburton .
Earlier in 2011 , a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series  of  cost-cutting  निर्णय  and an  अपर्याप्त  safety system  ,  but also concluded that the spill resulted from `` systemic '' root causes and  ``  absent significant  सुधार  in both industry practices and  सरकारी   नीतियों  , might  खूब  recur '' .
In November 2012 , BP and the  संयुक्त  States Department of Justice settled federal criminal charges with BP pleading guilty  to  11 counts of manslaughter , two misdemeanors , and a felony count  of  lying to Congress  .
BP also agreed to four years of government monitoring  of  its safety practices and ethics , and the Environmental Protection Agency announced that BP would be  temporarily  banned from new contracts with the US government .
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines and  अन्य  payments but further legal proceedings not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and  जुर्माना  under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment .
As of February 2013 ,  दण्ड  and civil  settlements   और  payments  to  a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' is a song by rock  बैंड  U2 .
It is the opening track from their 1987 album The Joshua Tree and was released as the album 's third single in August 1987  .
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a delay  प्रभाव  , played during the song 's introduction and again at the end  .
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is possible to identify a person 's religion and income based  on  the street on which they lived , particularly in Belfast .
दौरान  the  बैंड  's difficulties recording the song , producer Brian Eno considered  erasing  the song 's tapes to have  उन्हें  start from scratch .
`` Where the  गलियों   have  No Name  ''  was praised by critics  और  became a commercial success , peaking at number thirteen in the US , number fourteen in Canada , number ten in the Netherlands , and number four in  the  United Kingdom .
The song  रै  become one of the band 's most popular songs and has remained a staple of their live act since the song  debuted  in  1987  on The  जोशुआ  Tree Tour .
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for the filming of its music video , which won  a  Grammy Award for Best  प्रदर्शन  Music Video .Recently the song has been  प्रयुक्त  by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance  सोंग  in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas  जेफरी  `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9 , 1956 ) is  an  American actor , producer , writer , and director .
Hanks is known for his roles in Apollo 13 , Big , That Thing You Do !
, The Green  मील  , You 've Got Mail , Sleepless in Seattle , Charlie Wilson 's War , Catch Me If You Can , Forrest Gump , Cast Away , A League of Their Own , The Da Vinci Code , Angels & Demons , as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series , The Polar Express , and  the  Simpsons Movie .
He has earned  और  been nominated for numerous awards during his career ,  सहित  winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his  भूमिका  in Philadelphia and a Golden Globe , an  अकादमी  Award , a Screen  अभिनेताओं  Guild  पुरस्कार  , and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump ,  और  earning the  स्टेनली  Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004 .
Hanks is also known for his collaboration with film director  स्टीवन  Spielberg on Saving  निजी  Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers , which launched Hanks also as a successful director , producer and writer .
As of 2012 ,  हैंक्स  '  films  have grossed over $ 4.2 billion  at  the United States  बक्सा  office alone , and over $ 8.5 billion worldwide making  उसे  the highest all-time  बक्सा  office star .
The Cape is an American superhero drama  श्रेणी  .
it   premiered  on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement beginning with  a  two-hour pilot  एपीसोड  on Sunday , January 9 , 2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time .
An encore played on Monday , January 10 , with follow-up episodes continuing on Monday evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning  on  January 17 .
NBC subsequently cut the  कुल   क्रमांक  of episodes to be aired from 13 to 10 as a result of low ratings .
On  कूच  2 , 2011 , NBC announced that  the  series finale would only be aired on the network 's website .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or )  ,  officially designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the  नग्न  eye from Earth , and thus the only naked-eye comet that might  appear  twice in a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye  धूमकेतुओं  may be brighter and more spectacular , but will appear only once in thousands  of  years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been  observed  and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's  दिखावे  were made by Chinese , Babylonian , and medieval European chroniclers ,  लकिन  were not recognized as reappearances of  the  same object at the time .
The comet 's periodicity was first determined  in  1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley , after whom it is now named .
Halley 's  धूमकेतु   पिछला  appeared in the inner Solar System in 1986 and will next  appear  in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition , Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft , providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism  of  coma  और  tail formation .
These observations  समर्थित  a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's  ``  dirty snowball '' model ,  जिससे  correctly predicted that Halley would be  रचित  of a mixture of volatile  ices  –  ऐसे  as  जल  , carbon  डाइऑक्साइड  and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed  और  reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood  कि  Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials  ,  and that only a small portion of it is icy .
The following is a list  of  the most populous incorporated places of the United States of America .
As defined by the United States Census Bureau , an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
a  few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places .
Consolidated city-counties represent  a  distinct type of government that includes the entire population of a  काउंटी  , or  काउंटी  equivalent .
Some consolidated city-counties , however , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion (  or  `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place .
Note that  इस   सूची  refers  तभी  to the population of individual municipalities within  उनके  defined limits , which does not include other  municipalities  or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S. metropolitan area populations .
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported  102  English Pilgrims , including a core group of  separatists  , to New England .
Their story is one of travail and survival in  a  harsh New World environment  .
A New Zealand forward ( in white ) takes a shot on goal against Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World  कप  .
Forwards , also known as strikers , are  the  players on a team in association football who play nearest to the opposing team 's goal , and are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals .
This very advanced position and its limited defensive responsibilities mean forwards normally score more goals than other players  .
This position requires  प्रज्ञा   ,  speed , and power  ,  both of execution and of thought , to perform the role well  .
आधुनिक  team formations usually include one to three forwards ; two is the most common .
Coaches typically  फ़ील्ड  one striker who plays in an advanced position  (  the centre forward ) ,  और  another attacking forward who  plays   somewhat  deeper and assists in making goals as well as scoring ( the second striker ) .
it  should be noted that inside forwards develop from attacking midfield positions and hence are  naturally  midfielders .
Barcelona FC star Lionel Messi is  a  typical Attacking Midfielder seen as a forward due to his shot  सटीकता  .
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship  उपलब्धियाँ  to same-sex couples , and  to  certain opposite-sex couples in which at least one party is at least  18  years of age .
It affords the couple `` the same rights ,  protections  , and benefits , and ... the  वही  responsibilities  ,  obligations , and duties under law ... '' as married spouses .
Enacted in 1999 , the domestic partnership registry was the first of its kind in the United States created by  a  legislature without court intervention .
Initially , domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally just hospital-visitation  अधिकारों   और  the right to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a  मृतक  partner .
the  legislature has since expanded the scope of California domestic partnerships to  शामिल  all of the rights and  जिम्मेदारियों   आम  to  विवाह  .
As such , California domestic partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil unions offered in several other states .
Although the program  enjoys  broad  support  in California , it has been the source of some controversy .
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the expansion of  घरेलू  partnerships in court .
Conversely , advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything less than full marriage rights extended to  same-sex  partners is analogous to the `` separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era .
चिह्नित  A. Jackson ( born April 1 , 1965 ) is an American basketball coach , and former  खिलाड़ी  who is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors  of  the NBA .
a  point guard from  st.  John 's University , he  निभाई  for the  नई  York Knicks , Indiana Pacers , Los Angeles Clippers , Denver Nuggets , Toronto Raptors  ,  Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in  the  NBA  in  a career spanning from 1987 to 2004 .
Jackson has  भी  worked as  a  commentator for ESPN and ABC alongside his former coach Jeff Van  gundy  and play-by-play man Mike Breen .
He was previously an  एनबीए  analyst for The YES Network 's New Jersey Nets games .
South Africa has eleven official languages : Afrikaans , English , Ndebele , Northern Sotho ,  sotho  , Swazi , Tswana , Tsonga , Venda , Xhosa and Zulu .
Fewer than two percent  of  South Africans  बोलो  a first language other than an official one .
Most  दक्षिण  Africans  can  speak more than one language  .
Dutch and  अंग्रेज़ी  were the first  आधिकारिक   भाषाएं  of South Africa from 1910 to 1925 .
Afrikaans was added as a part of Dutch in 1925 .
डच  was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a republic in 1961  ,  and  डच  was dropped in 1983 , so between 1983  और  1994 , South  अफ़्रीकी  had two official languages :  अंग्रेज़ी  and Afrikaans .
The English  संस्करण   of  the South African  संविधान  refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu , isiXhosa ,  अफ्रीकी  , Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ) , Setswana ,  अंग्रेज़ी  , Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ) , Xitsonga  ,  Siswati , Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ) .
In South Africa , Southern Ndebele is known simply as Ndebele , as most speakers of Northern Ndebele live in Zimbabwe .
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho as Sesotho sa Leboa  ,  but the 1996 version referred to the  भाषा  as Sepedi .
Different government departments and official  लाशें  use  अलग  terms to denote Northern  sotho   .
The  प्रमुख  language of government is  अंग्रेज़ी  even if South Africans often take pride  in  using indigenous languages for any purpose .
Afrikaans also features prominently in commerce together with  अंग्रेज़ी   as  the languages with  the  highest  क्रमांक  of fluent speakers  हैं  Afrikaans and English .
In terms of linguistic classification , the official languages include two West-Germanic languages ( English and Afrikaans  )  and nine Bantu languages .
Four of these are Nguni languages ( Zulu , Xhosa , Swati and  ndebele  ) and three are Sotho–Tswana languages  (   उत्तरी  Sotho ,  दक्षिणी  Sotho and Tswana ) .
Tsonga is a Tswa–Ronga language .
South African Sign Language is a distinct though  incompletely  emerged national standard  भाषा  which also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects  .
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium  और  nitric acid , existing normally as a crystalline hydrate , most commonly as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate  ,  Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O .
the  New York Jets are a professional football team headquartered in Florham Park  ,  New Jersey , representing the New York metropolitan area .
The team is a member of the Eastern Division of  the  American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the  नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) .
In a  अद्वितीय  arrangement for the league , the Jets share MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford , New Jersey with  the  New York Giants .
The franchise is legally and corporately  पंजीकृत  as New York Jets , LLC  .
the  team was founded in 1959 as the Titans of New York , an original member of the American Football League ; later , the franchise  joined  the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger .
the  team began to play in 1960 at  the  Polo  grounds  .
Under new ownership , the current name was adopted in  1963  and  the  franchise was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex  in  1984 .
The Jets advanced  to  the playoffs for the first  समय  in  1968  and went on to compete in Super Bowl III where they defeated the  बाल्टीमोर   कोल्टस  , becoming the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL  संसार  Championship Game .
Since 1968 , the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen times , and in the  afc  Championship Game four times ,  सबसे  recently losing to the Pittsburgh  स्टीलर्स   in  2010 .
However , the Jets have never  लौटे  to the Super Bowl , making them one of three NFL teams to win their lone Super Bowl appearance , along with the New Orleans Saints  और  Tampa Bay Buccaneers .
The team 's  प्रशिक्षण  facility , Atlantic Health Jets Training Center , which opened in  2008  , is located in Florham Park .
The team currently holds  उनके   सालाना  training  शिविर  sessions  on  the campus of the State University of New York at Cortland in Cortland , New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex .
Psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms , also known as psychedelic  मशरूम  , are fungi  कि  contain psychoactive indole alkaloids .
There are  अनेक  colloquial terms for psilocybin  मशरूम  ,  the  most common being shrooms and magic mushrooms .
Biological genera  containing  psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe ,  conocybe  , Copelandia , Galerina , Gerronema , Gymnopilus , Hypholoma ,  inocybe  , Mycena , Panaeolus , Pluteus , and Psilocybe  .
There are  लगभग  190 species of psilocybin mushrooms and most of them fall in the genus  psilocybe  .
psilocybin  mushrooms have likely been used since prehistoric times and may have  महरूम  depicted in rock art .
अनेक  cultures  have  used these mushrooms in religious rites .
In modern Western society they are used recreationally  लिये  their psychedelic effects  .
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins School of  आयुर्विज्ञान  conclude that when used properly , psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans .
Alaska (  )  is a state  in  the United States , situated in the northwest  extremity  of the North American continent  ,  with the international boundary with Canada to the east , the Arctic Ocean  to  the  उत्तर  , and the Pacific  समंदर  to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest state  in  the United States by area , the 4th  तनिक  populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States .
लगभग  half  of  Alaska 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil , natural gas , and fishing industries ; it has  ये  resources in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from  रूस  on March 30 , 1867  ,  for $ 7.2  लाख  ( $ adjusted for inflation  )   at  approximately two cents per acre (  $  4.74/km2 ) .
the  land went through several administrative changes before becoming an  व्यवस्थित  ( or incorporated ) territory on  may  11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3 , 1959 .
The  नाम  `` Alaska ''  (  Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian  औपनिवेशिक   काल  , when it was used only for  the  peninsula and is  निकला  from the Aleut alaxsxaq  ,  meaning `` the mainland '' or  ,  more literally , `` the object towards which  the  action  of  the sea  is   निर्देशित  '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the `` great land '' , an  aleut  word derived from the same root .
The 101 French departments are divided into 342 arrondissements , which may be translated into English as districts .
The capital of an arrondissement/district is called a subprefecture .
When an arrondissement contains the  प्रीफ़ेक्चर  ( capital ) of the department , that  प्रीफ़ेक्चर  is the capital of the arrondissement , acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture .
Arrondissements are  further  divided into cantons and communes  .
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna  ,  literally `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular tract  जिससे  is  a  sex organ and has two main  कृत्यों  ; sexual  मैथुन  and childbirth .
In humans ,  इस  passage leads from the opening  of  the vulva to the uterus ( womb ) ,  लकिन  the vaginal tract ends at the cervix .
Unlike  मेन  , who have only one genital orifice , women have two , the urethra and the vagina .
The vaginal opening is much larger than the urethral opening , and both openings are protected by the labia .
the  inner mould of the vagina has a foldy texture which can create friction for the penis during intercourse .
दौरान  arousal , the vagina gets moist to facilitate the  प्रवेश  of the penis .
The Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is  rarely  used in English .
Colloquially , the word vagina is often used to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in  सामान्य  .
However , by its dictionary and anatomical definitions , vagina refers exclusively to the specific  आतंरिक  structure .
The Cincinnati Reds are  a   प्रमुख  League Baseball team  आधारित  in  सिनसिनाटी  , Ohio  .
They are members of the National League Central Division .
Established in 1881 as an independent club , the team became a  चार्टर  member of the  अमरीकी  Association in 1882 , and  joined  the National League in 1890 .
The club traditionally traces its origin to baseball 's first openly professional team in 1869  .
The Reds have won five World Series titles ,  एक   अमरीकी  Association pennant  ,  nine National League pennants and ten division titles .
The Reds played in the National League West between 1969  और  1993 and have been in the National League Central since 1994 .
Since 2003 , the Reds  have  played at Great American Ball Park , built next to their  घर   इससे  1970 to 2002 , Riverfront Stadium  .
bob  Castellini has owned the Cincinnati Reds since 2006  .
A prank stink bomb .
A stink bomb is a device designed to create an unpleasant  महकते  .
They range  in  effectiveness from simple  pranks  to military grade malodorants or  riot  control chemical agents .
The Guinness Book of  रिकॉर्ड  lists two smelliest substances .
One is `` US Government Standard Bathroom Malodor '' ; a mixture of eight chemicals with  a  stench resembling human feces , only much stronger , designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers  और   एयर  fresheners .
another  one , `` Who me ? `` , is a mixture  of  five  sulfur-containing  chemicals  और   खुश्बू  like rotting food and carcasses .
The adage `` A  चित्र  is worth a thousand  शब्द   ''  refers to the notion that a complex idea can be conveyed with  बस  a single still image .
It also aptly characterizes one of  the  main goals of visualization  ,  namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly  .
The  अभिव्यक्ति  `` Use a picture .
It 's worth  a  thousand words  .  '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper editor Arthur Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity .
1913 newspaper advertisement
A similar phrase , ``  एक  Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '' , appears in a 1913 newspaper advertisement for the Piqua Auto  सप्लाई  House of Piqua , Ohio .
An early use of  the  exact phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper advertisement  लिये  the San Antonio Light  जिससे  says :  एक  of the Nation 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is Worth  a  Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of  the  War  exemplifies  the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers .
It is believed by  कुछ  that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the  विज्ञापन  trade journal Printers ' Ink , promoting the use of images in advertisements  कि  appeared on the sides of streetcars .
The December 8 , 1921 issue carries an ad  हकदार  , `` One Look is Worth A Thousand Words  .  ''
Another ad by Barnard  appears  in the March 10 , 1927 issue with the phrase `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words  ,  '' where it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ) .
The Home Book of Proverbs , Maxims , and Familiar Phrases quotes Barnard as saying he  पुकारा  it `` a Chinese proverb , so that  लोगों  would take it seriously .  ''
Soon after , the  कहावत  would become popularly attributed to Confucius .
The discussion  of   ``  One Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` One Picture  लायक  Ten Thousand Words '' Wan yen I hua and 10.000 miles worth 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics where  the  concept of  अनेक  in different disciplines  और  cultures .
A picture is worth a  हजार   शब्द
Despite this modern origin of the popular phrase , the sentiment has been expressed  by  earlier writers .
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers and Sons in 1862 ) , `` A picture shows me at a glance what  it  takes dozens of pages of  a  book to expound . ''
Computer programmer  और  author Fred  ब्रूक्स  makes an opposite statement regarding  प्रोग्रामिंग   in  The Mythical Man-Month : `` Show  me  your flowcharts and  छिपाते  your tables  ,  and I  shall  continue to  be  mystified .
Show me  अपना  tables , and I won’t usually need your flowcharts ; they’ll be  स्पष्ट  . ''
The phrase  रै  also been  spoofed  by John McCarthy , the  प्रसिद्ध  computer scientist , to make the opposite point  :  ``  as  the Chinese say , 1001 words is worth more than a picture . ''
A season is a subdivision of the year , marked by changes in weather , ecology  ,   और  hours of daylight .
सीज़न  result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the  सूर्य   और  the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane  of  revolution .
In temperate and polar regions  ,  the seasons  हैं  marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface  ,  variations  of  which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to  migrate  , and plants to be dormant .
During  may  , June and July , the northern hemisphere  is  exposed  to  more direct sunlight because  the  hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is true of the southern hemisphere  in  November , December and January .
It is the tilt  of  the Earth that  कल्याणकारी  the Sun to be higher in the sky during the  गर्मियाँ   महीने  which increases  the  solar flux .
However  ,  due to seasonal lag  ,  June , July  और  August are the  hottest  months in the northern hemisphere  और   दिसम्बर  , January and February are the hottest months  in  the southern hemisphere .
In temperate and  subpolar  regions ,  generally  four calendar -based seasons ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal )  ,  summer  (  estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However  ,  ecologists mostly use a six  ऋतु   मॉडल  for temperate climate  regions  that includes pre-spring ( prevernal  )   और  late summer  (  serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four  .
Hot regions  have  two or three seasons ; the  बरसात   (  or wet , or monsoon ) season and the dry season , and in some tropical  क्षेत्रों  , a cool  or   mild  season .
In some parts of the world , special `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on important events such as a hurricane season  ,  tornado season or a  दावानल  season  .
The six ecological seasons
The four calendar seasons , depicted in an ancient  रोमन  mosaic from  ट्यूनीशिया
Dutch exports in 2006
At the time of writing  the  Netherlands is the 17th largest economy of the world .
(  see : List of countries by GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the top 10 of richest nations in the  संसार   (  see : List of countries by GDP ( PPP  )  per capita ) .
Between 1996 and 2000 annual economic growth ( GDP ) averaged over 4 % ,  खूब  above the European average .
Growth slowed considerably  in   2001-05  as part of the global  आर्थिक  slowdown .
2006 and 2007 however showed economic growth of 3.4  %  and 3.9 % .
The Dutch economy was hit  considerably  by the  जारी  global financial crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis  .
Several banks  गई  bankrupt , and a  क्रमांक  of others had to receive governmental  सहायता  .
In 2009 the economy declined with 3.5 % , followed  by  two years  of  mild growth  .
The Dutch economy is currently in  a  recession again  ,  with an economic decline of 0.5 % in 2012 .
Inflation is at 3.2 % in February 2013 .
Unemployment has been relatively low compared to other EU  राष्ट्र  for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has  hit  7.7 % .
The Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA rating at least until March 2013 according to the three major credit rating agencies  .
Historically , the Dutch introduced and invented  the  stock market by the merchandise trading through Dutch West India Company .
The Netherlands is a founding member of  the  European  संघ  , the OECD and the World Trade Organization .
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio album and  छठे  studio album by Tupac Shakur .
it  contains remixes of  previously  unreleased music recorded by Shakur before  उसके  death in 1996 .
Released in  the  United States on December 14 , 2004 ( December  12  in the United Kingdom ) , Loyal to the Game was produced by Eminem .
