The View is an American  बात  show broadcast on ABC that debuted in 1997 as part of the network 's daytime programming block .
Created by Barbara Walters and Bill Geddie , who both also  serve  as the show 's executive producers , the  कार्यक्रम  features a panel of women as co-hosts .
Along with Walters , the current panel includes Whoopi Goldberg , who serves as the moderator , Joy Behar , Elisabeth Hasselbeck , and  sherri  Shepherd .
International versions of  the  program  हैं  aired in several  देशों  .
As of the 2012–13 season  ,  its 16th ,  the  View is the fourth-longest running national daytime talk show in history  ,  behind The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 ) , the variously-named Live !
programs  (  25 ) , and  the   ओपरा  Winfrey Show ( 25 ) .
Prunus virginiana ,  commonly  called bitter-berry , chokecherry , Virginia bird cherry  और  western chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P. virginiana var . demissa ) , is a species of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus Padus ) native to North America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana  शामिल  most  of  the continent , except for the far north and far south .
Los Angeles International  विमानक्षेत्र  is the primary airport serving the Greater Los Angeles Area , the  second-most  populated metropolitan area in the United  राज्य  .
It is most often referred to by its IATA airport code LAX , with  the  letters  सुनाया  individually  .
lax  is located in southwestern Los Angeles along the Pacific  coast  in the neighborhood  of   westchester  , from the downtown core and  is  the primary airport of  लॉस  Angeles World Airports (  lawa  )  ,  an agency of the Los  एंजिल्स  city government formerly known as the Department of Airports .
In 2011 ,  lax  was the sixth busiest  विमानक्षेत्र   in  the world after  hartsfield-jackson  Atlanta International Airport  ,  Beijing Capital International  विमानक्षेत्र  , London Heathrow Airport , Chicago O'Hare International Airport , and Tokyo  haneda  International Airport with  61,862,052  passengers .
The airport holds the claim for `` the world 's busiest origin  और  destination ( O & D ) airport '' in 2011 that involves  non-connecting  passenger traffic .
It is  भी  the only airport to rank among the top five U.S. airports for both passenger and cargo traffic .
LAX  is   the  busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area , but other airports  सहित  Bob Hope Airport , John  वेन  Airport  ,  Long Beach Airport  ,  LA/Ontario International Airport , and Palm Springs International  विमानक्षेत्र   भी   serve  the region .
LAX is also the busiest  विमानक्षेत्र   in  California and the West Coast of the United States in terms of flight operations , passenger traffic and air cargo activity , leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim `` .
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March  24  , 1976 ) is an American football  क्वार्टरबैक  for the  डेनवर  Broncos of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He played for the Indianapolis  कोल्टस  for 14 seasons from 1998 to 2011 .
He is the  बेटे  of former NFL quarterback Archie Manning and an  elder  brother of New York Giants quarterback Eli  मैनिंग  .
Manning played  कॉलेज  football for the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Tennessee  ,  leading the Volunteers to the 1997 SEC Championship in his  वरिष्ठ  season .
However , No . 3 Tennessee lost to the No . 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17  in  the Orange Bowl  giving  Nebraska and Tom Osborne  उनके  3rd national championship in 4 years .
He was chosen by the Indianapolis Colts with the first overall pick in the  1998  NFL Draft .
From 1998 to 2010 , he led the Colts to eight  (  seven AFC South  और  one AFC East  )  division championships , two AFC championships , and to a  सुपर  Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ) .
He  रै   जीती  a  रिकार्ड  four league most valuable player awards  ,  was  the  most valuable player of Super Bowl XLI  ,  has been named to twelve Pro Bowls , has twelve 4,000-yard passing seasons , and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time  नेता  in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown  गुजरता  (  399  ) .
In 2009 , he was  नामित  the best player in the NFL and Fox Sports along with Sports Illustrated named  उसे  the NFL player of  the  decade of  the  2000s .
In May 2011 , he underwent neck surgery to  alleviate  neck pain and arm weakness he dealt with during the previous few seasons before signing a five-year , $ 90 million contract extension with the  कोल्टस  in July 2011 .
मैनिंग  had hoped to play in the 2011 season , but in September 2011 , he underwent a much more  गंभीर  second surgery : a level one  सर्वाइकल  fusion procedure .
Manning had never missed an NFL game in his career , but was forced to  मिस  the entire 2011 season .
He was released by  the  Colts on March 7 , 2012 , and after  an  almost two-week period where he  visited  with and worked out for several NFL teams , he signed with  the  Denver Broncos on March 20  ,  2012 .
Manning 's pre-snap routine  रै  earned him the nickname , `` The Sheriff '' and is one of the  सबसे  recognizable and parodied in the NFL .
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost  विशेष  use of the hurry-up offense led to Manning using an array of gestures and  मौखिक  commands to call the play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle .
The America Tower of the American General Center , the headquarters of Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes is one of the world 's largest oilfield services companies .
It operates in over 90 countries , providing the oil and gas industry with products  और  services for drilling , formation evaluation ,  पूर्णता  , production and reservoir consulting  .
बेकर   ह्यूजेस  has its headquarters in  the  America  मीनार  in  the  American General Center in Neartown , Houston  .
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when Baker International and Hughes Tool  कम्पनी  merged in 1987 .
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major offices in Liverpool , United Kingdom ;  सिंगापुर  ;  दुबई  ; a research and maintenance  सुविधा  in Celle , Germany ; Lafayette , Louisiana ; Houston , Texas ; Pescara ,  इटली  ; and Kuala Lumpur ,  मलेशिया  .
The company is administered broadly in two hemispheres : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( Europe , Africa , the Middle East , Asia Pacific and Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions  (  Canada , US Land , US Gulf , and Latin America ) .
Each of these regions is subdivided into markets .
The United States one-  cent  coin , commonly known as a penny , is a unit of currency equaling one one-hundredth  of   a  United States dollar .
The cent 's symbol is ¢ .
Its obverse has featured the profile of President Abraham Lincoln since 1909 , the centennial of his birth .
इससे  1959 ( the  sesquicentennial  of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008 , the reverse featured the Lincoln  मेमोरियल  .
Four different reverse  डिजाइन   in  2009 honored Lincoln 's  200th  birthday and a new , permanent reverse  –  the  संघ  Shield – was introduced in 2010 .
The coin is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter and 0.061 inches ( 1.55  mm  ) in thickness .
The U.S. Mint 's official  नाम  for a penny is `` '' and the U.S. Treasury 's official name is `` one cent piece '' .
The  colloquial  term penny derives from the British coin  of  the same name , the pre-decimal version of which had a similar value  .
In American English , pennies is the plural form , other plural forms pence and pee ( standard use  in   अंग्रेजों  English ) are not used .
As of  2012  , it costs the U.S. Mint 2.00 cents to make a cent because of the  लागत  of materials and production .
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components for distribution and fabrication , estimated at $ 13 million  in  FY 2011 .
It  भी  includes  मिंट  overhead  आबंटित  to the penny  ,   जिससे  was  $  17.7 million for 2011 .
Fixed costs  और  overhead would have to be absorbed by other circulating  सिक्के  without the penny .
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent coin in the  संयुक्त  States for the year of 2012 was $  58,000,000  .
This was a slight decrease from 2011 , the year before , which had a production loss of $  60,200,000  .
or more specifically , are ornamental varieties of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus carpio )  कि  are kept for decorative purposes in outdoor koi ponds or water gardens .
Koi varieties are  विशिष्ट  by coloration , patterning , and scalation .
Some of the major colors are white  ,  black  ,  red , yellow , blue , and cream .
The most popular category of koi is the Gosanke , which is made up of the Kohaku , Taisho Sanshoku , and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE )  is   an  American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government , about 5,000 employees of the District of Columbia , and a few hundred private sector employees  ,  mostly  in  and around federal facilities .
AFGE is the largest union for civilian , non- postal federal employees and the largest  संघ  for District of Columbia employees who report directly to the mayor  (  i.e. , outside of D.C. public schools ) .
It is affiliated with  the  AFL-CIO .

The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing levels of complexity , from the earliest algal mats , through bryophytes , lycopods , ferns to the complex gymnosperms  और  angiosperms of today .
While many of the groups which  appeared  earlier continue to thrive , especially in  the  environments in which they evolved , for a time each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors .
In the Ordovician period , around , the first land plants appeared .
These began to diversify in the late Silurian Period , around , and the  परिणाम  of  उनके  diversification are displayed in remarkable detail in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the  rhynie  chert .
This chert preserved early plants in cellular detail , petrified in volcanic  स्रोतों  .
By the middle of the Devonian Period , most of the features recognised in plants today are present , including roots , leaves and secondary wood ; and  ,  by late Devonian times , seeds had evolved .
Late Devonian plants  था  thereby reached a degree of sophistication that allowed them  to  form forests of tall trees .
Evolutionary innovation continued into the Carboniferous period and is still ongoing today  .
Most plant groups were relatively unscathed by the Permo-Triassic  extinction  event , although the structures of communities  बदला  .
This may have  नियत   the  scene for the appearance of the flowering plants in the Triassic ( ~ ) , and their later diversification in the Cretaceous and  paleogene  .
The latest  प्रमुख   समूह  of plants to evolve were the grasses , which became important in the mid-Paleogene  ,  from around .
The grasses  ,   as  well as many other groups , evolved new mechanisms of metabolism to survive  the   कम  and warm , dry conditions of the tropics over the last .
The winning Super Bowl team receives the Vince Lombardi Trophy .
The Super Bowl is an  सालाना  American football game that determines the champion of the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League (  एनएफएल  ) .
The contest is held in an American city that is chosen three to four years beforehand , usually in warm-weather or domed sites .
Since 1971 , the winner of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) Championship Game has faced the winner of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs .
Before the 1970 merger  between  the American Football League ( AFL ) and the National Football League ( NFL ) , the two leagues met in four such contests .
The first two  यहूद  known as the `` AFL-NFL World Championship Game . ''
Super  कटोरी  III in 1969 was  the  first such game that carried the `` Super Bowl '' moniker , the names `` Super Bowl  i   ``  and `` Super Bowl II `` were retroactively applied to the first two games .
The NFC /NFL leads in Super Bowl wins with 25 , while the AFC /AFL has won 22 .
अठारह  different franchises ,  सहित  teams that relocated to another city , have won the Super  कटोरी  .
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super Bowls with six championships ( record  6–2  ) , while both  the  Dallas Cowboys and San Francisco 49ers have five wins  प्रत्येक  ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ) .
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most  सुपर  Bowl appearances with eight , while the Buffalo Bills have the most consecutive appearances with  चार  losses in a row from 1990 to  1993  .
The  नई  England Patriots , Denver  broncos  and Minnesota Vikings have also lost a record four Super  प्याले  .
Buffalo and Minnesota  हैं  both 0–4 , Denver is 2–4 and New England is 3–4 .
The record for consecutive wins is two  और  is shared by seven franchises  :  the 1966-67 Green Bay Packers , the 1972-73  मियामी  Dolphins ,  the  1974-75 and 1978-79 Pittsburgh Steelers ( the only team to accomplish this feat twice ) , the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers , the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys , the 1997-98 Denver Broncos , and the 2003-04  नई   इंग्लैण्ड  Patriots .
The only team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the Baltimore Ravens , who in winning Super Bowl XLVII unseated and replaced the 49ers in that position .
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a Super Bowl , including franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns , Detroit Lions , Jacksonville Jaguars ,  और  Houston Texans  ,  though  दोनो  the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to  the  creation of the Super Bowl .
Martin County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas .
As of  the  2010 census , its population was 4,799 .
Its seat is  stanton   .
The county is named for Wylie Martin , an early settler .
Martin County is one  of  30 prohibition , or entirely dry , counties in the  राज्य   of   टेक्सास  .
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP , ALKP  )  ( ) is a hydrolase enzyme responsible for removing phosphate groups from many types  of  molecules ,  सहित  nucleotides  ,  proteins , and alkaloids .
The  प्रक्रम  of  निकालना  the phosphate group is called dephosphorylation .
As the name suggests , alkaline phosphatases are most effective in an alkaline environment .
It is sometimes used synonymously as basic phosphatase .
Triticale  (  ×  triticosecale   )  , ( ) is  a  hybrid of  गेहूं  ( Triticum ) and rye ( Secale ) first bred in laboratories during the late 19th century .
The grain was originally bred in  स्कॉटलैंड  and Sweden .
Commercially  उपलब्धियाँ  triticale is  लगभग  always a second generation hybrid , i.e. , a cross  between  two kinds  of  primary ( first cross ) triticales .
as  a rule , triticale combines the yield potential and grain quality of  गेहूं  with the disease and environmental tolerance ( including  मृदा  conditions ) of rye .
Only  recently  has it been  विकसित  into a commercially viable crop .
Depending on the cultivar , triticale can more or less resemble  either   of  its parents .
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder , although some triticale-based foods  can  be purchased at health food stores or are to be found in some breakfast cereals  .
When crossing wheat and rye , wheat is used as the  मादा  parent and rye as the male parent ( pollen donor )  .
The resulting hybrid is  बंध्य  , and must be treated  साथ  colchicine to induce polyploidy and thus the ability to reproduce itself .
The primary producers of  triticale  are Poland , Germany , France , Belarus and  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
In 2009 ,  according   to  the Food and Agriculture  संगठन  ( FAO ) , 15.0 million tons were harvested in 29 countries across the world .
The triticale  संकरण  are all amphidiploid , which means the plant is diploid for two genomes derived from different species .
In other words , triticale is an  allotetraploid  .
In earlier years , most work was done on  octoploid  triticale .
Different ploidy levels have been created and evaluated  over  time .
The tetraploids showed  छोटी  promise , but hexaploid triticale was successful enough to find commercial application .
The  cimmyt  triticale improvement program wanted to improve food production and nutrition  in  developing countries .
Triticale has potential in the production of bread and other food products , such as cookies , pasta , pizza dough and breakfast cereals .
the  protein  सामग्री  is higher than that of wheat , although  the  glutenin fraction is less .
The grain has also been stated to have  उच्चतर  levels of lysine than  गेहूं  .
Assuming increased acceptance , the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale , as the milling techniques employed for wheat are unsuited to triticale .
Sell  et  al . found triticale could be used as a feed grain , and later research found its starch was particularly readily digested .
as   a  feed grain ,  triticale  is already well established and of high economic importance .
it  has received attention as a potential energy crop , and research is currently being conducted on the use of  the  crop 's  बायोमास  in bioethanol production .
`` Puff , the  जादू  Dragon '' is a song written by Leonard Lipton and Peter Yarrow , and made popular by Yarrow 's group Peter , Paul and Mary in  a  1963 recording .
The song achieved great popularity .
A college football  नेशनल  championship in  the  highest level of  कॉलेजिएट  play  in  the United States , currently the National Collegiate Athletic  संघ   (  NCAA )  प्रभाग  I Football Bowl Subdivision (  fbs  ) , is a designation awarded annually by various third-party  संगठन  to their selection (  s  )  of  the best college football team ( s ) .
Division  i  FBS ( formerly Division I-A ) football is the only  ncaa  sport in which a yearly champion is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event .
Because the championship team is not determined by a NCAA championship or tournament event , it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship `` .
Since the NCAA , the sport 's  शासी  body , does not determine or declare a  नेशनल  champion in this field  ,  determination of such has often engendered controversy .
A championship team is independently declared by  विभिन्न  individuals and organizations ,  प्रायः  referred to as `` selectors ''  .
ये  choices  हैं  sometimes at odds with each other .
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed  an  annual championship team , it has documented the  चुनाव  of several selectors in the official NCAA Football  कटोरी  Subdivision Records .
In  जोड   ,  various third party analysts have independently  प्रकाशित  their own lists of what they have determined to  be  the most legitimate selections for each season .
These are also often at  हालात  with each other as  खूब  as individual school 's claims  on  national championships , which , for any particular season , may  or  may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere .
Currently ,  दो  widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press , which conducts a  पोल  of football sportswriters ,  और  the USA Today Coaches ' Poll  ,  a poll of  अमरीकी  Football Coaches Association active coaches that is contractually obligated to  नाम  the winner  of  the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion .
The Milwaukee Brewers are a professional baseball  टोली  based in Milwaukee ,  विस्कॉन्सिन  .
The team is a member of the  सेंट्रल  Division of Major League Baseball 's National League and plays its home games at Miller Park .
The team is so named because of the city 's association with the brewing industry .
The Washington Nationals are a professional baseball team based in Washington , D.C .
the  Nationals are a member of the East Division of the National League of Major League Baseball ( MLB )  .
The team 's home ballpark is Nationals Park  ,  located on South Capitol Street  in  Southeast D.C. , near the Anacostia River .
The park opened  in  2008 , replacing RFK Stadium , the team 's home from 2005  to  2007 .
The Nationals ' name derives  इससे  the former Washington baseball team that had  the  same name ( used interchangeably with Senators  )  .
Their nickname is `` the Nats  ''  —a shortened  संस्करण   कि  was also used by  the  old D.C.  टीमों  .
an  expansion franchise  ,  the club was founded in  as  the Montreal Expos , the first major league team in Canada .
They were  आधारित  in Montreal , Quebec ,  और  played their home games at Jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium  .
In , the Expos won  a  division championship , won their first-ever playoff series by defeating the Philadelphia Phillies , 3–2 , and  उन्नत  to the  नेशनल  League Championship Series ,  जहाँ  they would go on  to  lose to the Los Angeles Dodgers , 3–2 , in their only postseason  रूप  during the strike-shortened season .
The  expos  had their highest winning percentage in the strike-shortened season of , when the  टोली   था  the best record in baseball .
The team 's  subsequent   shedding  of players caused fan  ब्याज  to drop off .
After the 2001 season , MLB considered revoking the team 's franchise , along with either the Minnesota Twins or the Tampa Bay Devil Rays  .
After being purchased by MLB  in   2002  , the team was moved before the season to Washington and renamed  the  Nationals , the first relocation since the second Washington Senators  स्थानांतरित  to Arlington , Texas ,  और   became  the Texas  रेंजरों  in .
The Nationals are one  of  two MLB franchises , and the only one in the  नेशनल  League , that has never played in a World Series ( the Seattle Mariners are the other ) .
A contingent fee ( in the  संयुक्त  States ) or conditional fee ( in England and Wales ) is any fee for services provided where the fee is payable only if there is a favourable result .
In the  विधि  , it  is  defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's services only if  the  lawsuit is successful or  is  favorably settled out of court ... .
निर्भर  fees are usually calculated as a percentage of  the   क्लाएंट  's net recovery .  ''
In  the  English legal system , it is generally referred to as no  जीत  no fee .
A conditional fee agreement  between  a law firm and a client .
The usual form of this agreement is that the solicitor will take a law case on the understanding that if  खोया  , no payment is made .
However , if the case is won , the lawyer  होगा  be entitled to the normal fee based on hourly billing , plus a success  शुल्क  .
The success fee in England  जरूर  be as a percentage no greater than 100 % of the normal fee .
This  contrasts  with the  आकस्मिकता  fee  in  the US , which gives the successful attorney a percentage of the damages  awarded  in favor of his client .
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their civil rights since otherwise , to sue someone  लिये   a  tort , one must first be wealthy enough to pursue such  वाद  in the first place .
However , because of the high risk , few attorneys  होगा  take cases on a contingency basis unless they  महसूस  the case has good merit .
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer , contingent fees were allowed as of that year in  the  following countries : Australia , Brazil , Canada , the Dominican Republic  ,  France ,  यूनानियों  , Ireland , Japan , New Zealand , the United Kingdom and the United States .
They are also allowed in personal injury actions in Lithuania .
Recently  ,  they have  महरूम  allowed  in  Belgium as  खूब  .
A Convocation ( Latin 'calling together ' , translating the Greek ecclesia ) is a group of  लोगों  formally assembled for  a  special  purpose  .
Sons of Anarchy is a television drama series created by Kurt Sutter about the lives of a  close-knit  outlaw motorcycle club  ऑपरेटिंग  in Charming , a fictional town in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  's Central Valley .
The show centers on  समर्थक  Jackson `` Jax '' Teller ( Charlie Hunnam ) , the then-vice president of the club , who begins questioning  the  club and himself .
Sons of Anarchy premiered on September  3  , 2008  ,  on cable network FX .
the   तीसरा  season of  the   श्रेणी  attracted an  औसत  of 4.9 million  दर्शक  per week , making it FX  's  highest rated series ever  ,  surpassing FX 's other hits The Shield , Nip/Tuck , and Rescue Me .
On February 3 , 2012 , Sons  of  Anarchy was renewed for two additional seasons , a fifth and a sixth .
Those involved in the production of the series imply that a seventh and final season is creator Kurt Sutter 's  योजना  .
The  grímsvötn  sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn  =  `` waters '' , singular : ) and the volcano of the same name are in South-East  आइसलैंड  .
They are  in   the   हाइलैंड्स  of Iceland at the northwestern side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap .
The lakes are at , at an elevation of .
Beneath the lakes is the magma  कक्ष  of the  grímsvötn  volcano .
Grímsvötn is a  basaltic  volcano which has the  उच्चतम  eruption frequency  of  all the volcanoes  in  Iceland and has a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system .
The massive climate-impacting Laki  फिशर  eruption of 1783–1784 was a part of the same  फिशर  system .
Grímsvötn was erupting at the same time as Laki during 1783  ,  but continued to erupt until 1785 .
Because most of the  ज्वालामुखी  lies underneath Vatnajökull , most of its eruptions have been subglacial and the interaction of magma and meltwater from  the  ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity .
On 21  may  2011 at 19:25 UTC , an eruption  began  , with high plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes  ,  resulting in cancellation of 900 flights in Iceland , and in the United Kingdom ,  ग्रीनलैंड  , Germany , Ireland and Norway on  22–25  May .
Until 25  may  the eruption scale had been larger than that of the 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull .
The  फटना  stopped  at  02:40 UTC  on  25 May  2011   ,  although there was some explosive activity from the tephra vents affecting only the  क्षेत्रफल  around the crater .
Vetting  is  the process of performing a background check on someone  पहले  offering them employment , conferring an award , etc .
A  prospective  person or project may be vetted before  बनाना  a hiring decision .
In addition , in intelligence gathering , assets are vetted to determine their usefulness .
Former headquarters and current corporate offices
Caesars  entertainment  Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's Entertainment from 1995 to 2010  )   is   an  American  पब्लिक  gaming  निगम  that owns and operates over 50 casinos , hotels  ,   और  seven golf courses  अंतर्गत  several brands .
The company ,  आधारित  in Paradise , Nevada  ,  is the largest gaming company in the world ,  साथ  annual revenues of  $  8.9 billion ( 2010  )  .
caesars  is  a  public company , with a joint venture of Apollo Global Management  और   टेक्सास  Pacific Group ownig a large portion of the stack and Blackstone Group also holding a significant stake .
the  name  बदलें  from `` Harrah 's Entertainment Inc.  ''   to  `` Caesars Entertainment Corporation '' was made official  on  November 23 , 2010 .
Harrah  's  remains a key brand in the  कम्पनी  .
On November 5 , 2010 , Harrah 's announced an initial public offering of 31,250,000 shares but retracted this offering  on  November 19  .
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person who  is   नहीं  a  कनाडाई   नागरिक  but who has been granted permission to live and work in Canada without any time limit on his or her stay .
A permanent resident must  सजीव   in   कनाडा  for two years  आउट  of every five or risk losing that status .
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same rights  और   जिम्मेदारियों  as a Canadian citizen  ,  among others the right to work for any  एंटरप्राइज़  as well  as  for  the  federal or provincial government ( under restriction of access rights to certain regulated  व्यवसायों  ) .
The  प्रमुख  differences are that residents can not :
vote  in elections in Canada ;
run  लिये  elected office ;
hold Canadian passports ;
In addition , they may be allowed to join  कनाडा  's armed forces if the national interest  होता  not be prejudiced .
Permanent residents also risk deportation for serious crimes committed while resident in Canada .
Permanent residents may apply for Canadian citizenship after three years in Canada ; however this is not  अनिवार्य  .
Erica Kane is a  fictional  character from the American ABC Daytime soap opera All My Children  .
The character was portrayed by actress Susan Lucci  इससे  her  डेब्यू  on January 16 , 1970 until the last broadcast television episode aired on September 23 , 2011 .
On February 11 , 2013  ,  it was  घोषित  that Lucci will guest-star on the Prospect Park 's continuation of All My Children .
in   the  U.S. , Erica is  माना  to be the most popular  अक्षर  in  साबुन  opera history .
Regarding the North-American  मार्केट  , TV Guide calls her `` unequivocally the most famous soap opera  अक्षर  in the history of daytime TV '' , and included her in their 2013 list of The 60 Nastiest  खलनायक  of All Time .
A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue ) , and its percent annual change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI )  उपायों  changes in the price level  of  a market basket of consumer goods  और  services purchased by households .
The CPI in the  संयुक्त  States is defined by the Bureau of  मजदूर  Statistics as `` a  माप  of the average change over time in the prices paid  by  urban consumers for  a  market basket of  उपभोक्ता  goods and services . ''
The  cpi  is a statistical estimate constructed using the prices of a sample of representative items whose prices are collected periodically .
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for different categories and sub-categories  of  goods and services , being combined to produce the overall index with weights reflecting their  साझा  in the total of the consumer expenditures covered by the  अनुक्रमणिका  .
It is one of several price indices calculated  by  most national statistical agencies .
The annual percentage  बदलें  in  a  CPI is used as a  माप   of  inflation .
A CPI can be  प्रयुक्त  to index ( i.e. ,  समायोजन  for the effect of inflation ) the real value of wages , salaries , pensions , for regulating prices and for deflating monetary magnitudes to show changes in real values .
In most countries , the CPI is , along with the population census and the USA National Income and Product  खाते  , one of the most closely watched national economic statistics .
Knocking on wood , or to  टच  wood ,  refers  to the apotropaic tradition in western folklore of literally touching/knocking on wood ,  or  merely stating that  तुम  are  doing  or intend same , in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` after making a favourable observation , a boast , or declaration concerning one 's  अपना  death  .
Rocker arm
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of  ऑटोमोटिव  ,  समुद्री  , motorcycle and reciprocating aviation engines ,  the  rocker arm is an oscillating lever that conveys radial movement  इससे  the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it .
One end is raised and lowered by a rotating lobe of  the  camshaft ( either directly or via a tappet  (  lifter ) and pushrod ) while the other end acts on the  वाल्व   स्टेम  .
When the camshaft lobe  उठाता  the outside of the  भुजा  ,  the  inside presses down on the valve stem , opening the valve .
When the outside of the arm is  permitted  to return due to the camshafts rotation , the inside rises , allowing the valve spring to close the valve .
The drive  कैम  is driven by the camshaft .
This pushes the rocker arm up and down about the trunnion pin or rocker shaft  .
Friction may be reduced at the point of contact with the valve  स्टेम  by a roller cam follower  .
A similar arrangement transfers the motion via another roller cam follower to  a  second rocker arm .
This rotates about the rocker shaft , and  हस्तांतरण  the  गति  via a  tappet  to the poppet valve .
In this case this opens the intake valve to the cylinder head .
The effective  leverage  of the arm ( and thus the force it can exert on the valve stem ) is determined by the rocker arm  अनुपात  , the ratio of the distance from the rocker arm 's center  of  rotation to the tip divided by the distance from  the  center of rotation  to  the point acted on by the camshaft or  pushrod  .
Current automotive design favors rocker arm ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1 .
however  ,  in   the  past smaller positive ratios ( the valve lift is greater than the cam lift ) and even negative ratios ( valve lift smaller than the cam lift )  have  been used .
Many  pre-ww2   इंजन  use  1:1  ( neutral )  ratios  .
For car engines the rocker arms are generally steel stampings , providing a reasonable balance of strength  ,  weight  और  economical cost  .
Because the rocker arms are , in part ,  प्रत्यागमनी  weight , excessive mass especially at the lever ends limits the engine 's ability to reach  ऊँची  operating speeds .
``   the  Night  the  Lights Went Out in Georgia '' is a Southern Gothic song written by songwriter Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife  vicki  Lawrence  .
Reba McEntire later covered it in 1991 .
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western  studios  on Sunset in Hollywood and released less than two weeks later in November 1972 , the song centers around the older brother of the narrator , falsely convicted of and  चलाया  for a murder  ,  which the narrator herself has committed  .
In postal mail , a return address is an explicit inclusion of the address of the person sending the message .
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries )  साथ  a means to determine how to respond to the sender of the message if needed .
The return address  need  not include a sender 's name , but should  शामिल  address or P.O . box details in  the  same way as the delivery  पता  should .
In some countries , the return address is  conventionally  located in the  अपर  left  हाथ  corner of the  लिफाफा  , card , or label .
In the United Kingdom , the return address is usually placed on the reverse of  the  envelope ,  निकट  the top .
Businesses often use envelopes preprinted  साथ  a return address .
Many individuals have sheets  of  adhesive labels preprinted with their home address to affix to their correspondence .
Charities sometimes include  ऐसे  sheets in mailshots .
Rolls of Return Address Labels can  be  purchased from companies that sell personalized labels to provide individuals  an  easy way to peel and  स्टिक  return address labels to their envelopes  .
The return address is  नहीं  required on postal mail .
However , lack of a return address prevents the postal service from being able to return the item if it proves undeliverable ; such as  इससे  damage , postage due , or invalid destination .
Such mail may thus become dead letter mail .
Should the return  पता  be of a different state or country , the mail may be routed through that location for ease  of   वापसी  .
A nerve guidance conduit ( also referred to as an artificial nerve conduit or  कृत्रिम  nerve graft , as opposed to an autograft ) is an artificial means of guiding  axonal  regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one  of  several clinical treatments for nerve injuries .
When direct suturing of the two stumps of a severed nerve can not be accomplished without tension , the standard clinical treatment for peripheral nerve injuries is  autologous  nerve grafting .
Due  to  the limited availability of donor tissue and functional recovery in autologous nerve  कलम  , neural tissue engineering research has focused on the development of bioartificial nerve  मार्गदर्शन  conduits as an alternative treatment , especially for large defects .
Similar techniques are also being  छान  for nerve repair  in  the spinal cord but nerve regeneration in the central nervous system  मुद्राएँ  a greater  चुनौती  because its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their  देशी  environment .
The creation of  कृत्रिम  conduits is also known as entubulation because the nerve  ends  and intervening gap are enclosed within a tube composed of biological  or  synthetic  सामग्री  .
Whether the conduit is in the form of  a  biologic tube ,  सिंथेटिक  tube or tissue-engineered  conduit  , it should facilitate  neurotropic  and neurotrophic communication between the proximal and distal ends of the nerve gap , block external inhibitory factors , and provide a physical guidance for  axonal  regrowth .
The most  मौलिक   उद्देश्य  of a nerve guidance conduit  is  to combine physical  ,  chemical  ,  and biological cues under conditions that will foster tissue formation .
Materials that  have  been used  to  make biologic tubes include blood vessels and  skeletal  muscles , while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have  महरूम  made from silicone and polyglycolide respectively .
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a combination of many  तत्व  : scaffold structure ,  scaffold  material  ,  cellular therapies , neurotrophic factors and biomimetic materials .
The choice of which physical , chemical and biological cues to use is based on the properties of the nerve environment , which is critical in creating the most desirable environment for axon regeneration  .
The factors that control  सामग्री  selection include  biocompatibility  , biodegradability , mechanical integrity , controllability during nerve growth , implantation and sterilization .
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television series  उत्पादित  by RDF USA (  बाद  Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick Productions for truTV about the  day-to-day  operations of American Jewelry and Loan , a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road ,  between  8 Mile Road and the John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit , Michigan .
The series premiered on August 16 , 2010 , delivering two million viewers , setting a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere ever .
Amoxicillin  bp
Amoxicillin ( INN ) , formerly amoxycillin ( BAN )  ,  and abbreviated  amox  ,  is  a  moderate-spectrum  , bacteriolytic  ,  β-lactam antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms .
It is usually the drug of choice within the class because it is  बेहतर  absorbed , following oral administration , than other β-lactam antibiotics .
Amoxicillin is one of the most common antibiotics prescribed for children .
The drug became available in 1972 .
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing bacteria , which  हैं  resistant to a broad spectrum of β-lactam antibiotics , such as penicillin .
For this reason , it is often combined with clavulanic acid , a β-lactamase inhibitor .
This increases  प्रभावकारिता  by reducing its susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance .
Lyndon  baines  Johnson ( August 27 , 1908 – January 22 , 1973 ) , often referred to as  lbj  , was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ) , a position  he  assumed after his service  as  the 37th  वाइस  President of the United  राज्य  ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is  एक  of only four people who served  in  all  चार   निर्वाचित   संघीय  offices of the United States : Representative ,  सीनेटर  , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a  संयुक्त  States  प्रतिनिधि  from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961 , including six years  as  United States Senate Majority Leader , two as Senate Minority Leader and two as  सीनेट  Majority Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the  लोकतांत्रिक  nomination in 1960 , Johnson was asked  by  John F. Kennedy to be  उसके  running mate for the 1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of  जॉन  F. Kennedy on  नवम्बर  22 , 1963 , completed Kennedy 's term and was elected President  in  his own right ,  जीतना  by a large margin over  बैरी  Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party  और  as President , he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that  शामिल  laws  कि  upheld civil rights , public broadcasting , Medicare , Medicaid , environmental protection , aid  to  education , and his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering personality and  the  `` Johnson  उपचार  , '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation  .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War , from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968 , as American  हताहत  soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar movement based especially on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots  broke  out  in  most major  शहरों   बाद   1965  , and crime rates soared  ,  as his opponents raised demands for `` law and  अनुक्रम  '' policies  .
The Democratic Party split in multiple  feuding  factions , and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary , he  ended  his bid for reelection .
Republican Richard Nixon was elected to  सफल  him .
Historians argue that  जॉनसन  's presidency marked the peak  of  modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era  .
Johnson is ranked favorably by some historians because of his domestic  नीतियों  .
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con 2009 , from left : Kunal Nayyar , Simon  helberg  ,  kaley  Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory , created  और  executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady ,  premiered  on CBS on September  24  , 2007 .
The show centers  on  five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and  लियोनार्ड  Hofstadter , two  caltech  physicists ; Penny , a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across  the  hall  ;  and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz , and  astrophysicist  Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie  winkle  ( season 1  पुनरावर्ती  ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist colleague , and , at different times , a lover  of  both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) ,  a  microbiologist , Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife , and former part-time  वेट्रेस  alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest  ;  season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , who  joins  the group  बाद  being matched to Sheldon  on  a dating website ; and  कॉमिक  book store-owner , Stuart  खिलते  ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present  नियमित  )  ,  who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is  in  space .
the  show also features numerous supporting characters , each of whom plays  a  prominent role in a small group of episodes .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War ( ACW )  ,  also known as the War between  the  States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States  of  America ( the `` Confederacy '' or  the  `` South '' ) .
The war  था  its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
विदेशी  powers did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and  नष्ट  much of  the   दक्षिण  's infrastructure , the  confederacy  collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election ,  republicans  , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery  into  United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James  बुकानन  and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject calls for  secession  .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise , and both  पहलू  prepared for war .
the  Confederates assumed that European countries  यहूद  so  निर्भर  on `` King Cotton  ``   कि  they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter  ,  a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ;  नतीजतन  ,  चार  more  स्लेव  states joined the  confederacy  , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and  स्थापित  a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy  .
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in  1861–62  .
The autumn  1862  Confederate campaign  into  Maryland  (  a Union state )  ended  with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
lincoln   जारी  the Emancipation Proclamation , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the  वेस्ट  , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then  much  of their western armies  ,  and the Union  at  Vicksburg split  the  Confederacy in  दो  at the  मिसिसिपी  River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी  successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way  .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions ,  और  could afford to fight battles of attrition through the  overland  Campaign towards  रिचमंड  , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate  फौज  failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court  हाउस  on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil  युद्ध  was one of the earliest true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph  ,  steamships , and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively  .
The mobilization of civilian factories ,  खानों  , shipyards , banks , transportation and food supplies all  foreshadowed  World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American  इतिहास  , resulting in the deaths  of  an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number  of  civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of  सब  Northern males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
इंसान  evolution  refers  to the evolutionary process leading up to  the  appearance of modern humans .
While it began with the last common ancestor of all life , the topic usually covers only the evolutionary history of primates , in particular the genus Homo ,  और  the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or ``  ग्रेट  apes '' ) .
The study of human evolution  involves   अनेक  scientific disciplines , including physical  मानवशास्त्र  , primatology , archaeology , linguistics ,  विकासवादी  psychology , embryology  और  genetics .
According to genetic studies , primates diverged from other mammals about in the Late Cretaceous period , and the earliest fossils appear in the Paleocene , around .
The family  मानवनुमा  diverged from the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon  )   परिवार   15-20   लाख   सालो  ago  ,  and around , the Ponginae ( orangutans ) , diverged from the Hominidae family .
Bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line , and the earliest bipedal Hominin is considered to be either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin , with Ardipithecus ,  a  full bipedal , coming somewhat later  .
The gorilla and chimpanzee diverged  around  the same time , about 4-6 million years ago , and either Sahelanthropus or  orrorin  may be our last shared ancestor with them .
the  early bipedals eventually evolved into the australopithecines and later the genus Homo  .
The earliest documented members of the genus Homo  हैं  Homo habilis which evolved around ;  the  earliest species for which there  is  positive evidence of use of stone  टूल्स  .
The brains  of  these early hominins were about the same size as that of a chimpanzee .
During the next  लाख  years a process of encephalization began , and with the arrival of Homo erectus in  the  fossil record , cranial capacity had doubled to 850 cm3 .
Homo erectus  और  Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to  छोड़  Africa , and these species  स्प्रेड  through Africa , Asia  ,  and  यूरोपीय  between .
it  is believed that these species were the first to use fire and complex tools .
According to the Recent African Ancestry theory , modern humans evolved in Africa possibly from  होमो   heidelbergensis  , Homo rhodesiensis or Homo  antecessor  and migrated out of the continent some 50,000 to 100,000 years ago , replacing local populations of Homo erectus , Homo denisova , Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis .
Archaic Homo sapiens , the forerunner of  anatomically  modern humans , evolved  between  400,000 and 250,000 years ago .
Recent DNA evidence suggests that  अनेक  haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among all non-African populations , and Neanderthals and other hominids , such as  denisova  hominin may have contributed  up  to 6 %  of  their genome to present-day humans. <  संदर्भ  name= ''  10.1126/science.1209202  ''  >  Anatomically modern humans evolved from  archaic  Homo sapiens  in  the Middle Paleolithic  ,   परिचय  200,000 years ago .
The transition to behavioral modernity with  the  development of symbolic culture , language , and specialized lithic technology happened around 50,000  सालो  ago according to many anthropologists although some suggest a gradual change in behavior over a longer time  स्पैन  .
लिसा  Cuddy , M.D  .  , is a fictional character on the  फॉक्स  network medical drama House .
She is portrayed by Lisa Edelstein .
Cuddy was the Dean of Medicine and hospital administrator of  the  fictional Princeton-Plainsboro  शिक्षण  Hospital in New Jersey .
She also becomes House 's love interest through the years to start a relationship with  उसे  in season seven .
Cuddy quit her job after  the  events of season seven 's finale ``  चलती  On `` .
Track and field is a sport comprising various competitive athletic contests  आधारित  on running , jumping  ,   और  throwing .
The name of  the  sport derives from the competition venue : a stadium with an oval  कार्यशील  track  around  a grass field .
the  throwing and jumping events generally take place in the central enclosed area .
Track and field falls under the umbrella sport of athletics , which also includes road running ,  क्रॉस  country running ,  और  race walking  .
The two most prestigious  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  track and field competitions are held under the  ध्वज  of athletics : the athletics competition at  the   ओलम्पिक  Games and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics .
The International  संघ  of Athletics Federations  is  the international governing body for track and field .
Track and field events are generally individual sports with athletes challenging each other to decide a single victor .
The racing events are won  by   the  athlete with the fastest time , while the jumping and throwing events are won by the athlete who has achieved the greatest  अलहदा  or height in the contest .
The running events are categorised as  sprints  , middle and long-distance events , relays ,  और  hurdling .
Regular jumping events include long jump , triple jump , high jump and pole vault , while the most common throwing events are shot put , javelin , discus and hammer .
There are also `` combined events '' , such as heptathlon and decathlon , in which athletes compete  in  a number of the above  कार्यक्रम  .
Records  हैं  kept of the best performances in specific events , at world and national levels ,  सही   bas  to a personal level .
However , if athletes are deemed to have  violated  the event 's rules or regulations , they are disqualified from the competition and their marks are erased .
In North America , the term track and field may be used to refer to  एथलेटिक्स   in  general ,  बल्कि  than specifically track and field events  .
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February  1991  ) , codenamed  आपरेशन  Desert Storm ( 17 January 1991 – 28 February 1991 ) was  a  war  waged  by a U.N.-authorized Coalition  फ़ोर्स  from 34 nations  led  by  the  United States , against Iraq in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait .
The war is also known under other names , such as the Persian Gulf War , First Gulf War , Gulf War I , or the First Iraq War  ,   पहले   the  term ``  इराकी  War ''  became  identified instead with the 2003 Iraq  युद्ध  ( also referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ) .
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began  2  August 1990 was met with international condemnation , and brought immediate economic sanctions  विरूद्ध  Iraq by members  of   the  U.N. Security Council .
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed U.S. forces into Saudi Arabia , and urged other countries to send their own forces to  the  scene  .
An array of nations joined the Coalition .
The great majority of the Coalition 's military  शक्तियां  were from  the  U.S. , with Saudi Arabia , the United  किंगडम  and  मिश्र  as  अग्रणी  contributors ,  in  that order .
Saudi Arabia paid around US $ 36 billion of  the  US  $  60 billion  लागत  .
The war was marked by the beginning of live news on the front lines of the fight , with the primacy of the  u.S.  network CNN .
The war has also earned  the  nickname Video  खेल  War after the daily  ब्रॉडकास्ट  images on board the U.S. bombers during Operation Desert Storm .
The initial conflict to expel Iraqi troops from Kuwait began with an aerial bombardment on 17 January 1991 .
This was followed by a ground  उत्पीड़न  on  24  February .
This  थी  a  निर्णायक  victory for the Coalition forces ,  जो  liberated Kuwait and advanced into Iraqi territory .
The Coalition ceased their advance , and declared a cease-fire 100 hours after  the  ground campaign started .
Aerial and ground combat was confined to Iraq  ,   कुवैत  , and areas on  सऊदी  Arabia 's border .
Iraq launched Scud missiles against  गठबन्धन  military targets in Saudi Arabia  और  against Israel .
The nickel , in  अमरीकी  usage , is a five- cent coin issued by the United States Mint .
Composed of 75 % copper and 25 %  निकल  , the piece  रै  been struck since  1866  .
The silver  हाफ  dime , equal to five cents , had been issued since the  1790s  .
The American  सिविल  War  caused  economic  hardship  , driving  सुनहरा  and silver from circulation ; in response , in place of  low-value  coins , the  सरकारी  at first  जारी  paper currency .
In 1865  ,  Congress abolished the five-cent fractional currency  नोट  after Spencer M. Clark ,  सिर  of  the  Currency  ब्यूरो  ( today the Bureau of Engraving and Printing ) , placed  उसके  own portrait on the denomination .
After successful introduction of two-cent and three-cent pieces , without precious metal , Congress  भी  authorized a five-cent piece consisting of base metal ; the Mint began striking this  संस्करण   in  1866 .
The initial design of the Shield nickel was struck until 1883 , then replaced by the Liberty Head nickel .
The Buffalo nickel  थी  introduced in 1913 as part of a drive to increase the beauty of American coinage ; in  1938   ,  the Jefferson  निकल  followed  .
In 2004 and 2005 , special designs in honor of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark Expedition were issued .
In 2006 , the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nickel designer Felix Schlag 's  असली  reverse ( or `` tails '' side  )  , although a new obverse , by Jamie Franki , was substituted .
As of 2013 ,  it  costs more than eleven cents to produce a  निकल  ; the  मिंट  is exploring the possibility  of  reducing cost by using less expensive metals .
a  poster with  पुष्प  or clusters of flowers produced by twelve species of flowering plants from different families
A flower ,  sometimes  known as a bloom  or  blossom ,  is  the reproductive structure found in flowering plants ( plants of the division Magnoliophyta , also called angiosperms  )  .
The biological function of a flower is to effect reproduction  ,  usually by providing a mechanism for the union of sperm with eggs .
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of  शुक्राणु  and eggs from different individuals in a population ) or allow  selfing  ( fusion of sperm and egg from the same flower ) .
Some flowers produce diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy  )  .
Flowers contain sporangia and are the site where gametophytes develop .
पुष्प  give rise to fruit  और  seeds .
Many flowers have evolved to be attractive to animals , so  as  to cause them to  be  vectors for  the  transfer of pollen .
In addition to facilitating  the  reproduction  of  flowering plants , flowers have long been admired and used by  इंसानो  to beautify  उनके   पर्यावरण  , and also as objects of romance , ritual , religion , medicine and as a  सोर्स  of food .
The McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine , all-weather tactical fighter designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat .
It  is   माना  among the most successful modern fighters , with over 100 aerial combat victories with  no  losses in dogfights .
Following reviews of proposals  ,  the United States Air Force selected McDonnell Douglas '  डिज़ाइन  in 1967 to meet the  सेवा  's need for a  समर्पित  air superiority fighter .
The Eagle first flew in July 1972 , and entered service in 1976 .
Since the  1970s  , the Eagle has been exported to Israel , Japan , Saudi  अरब  , and other nations .
The F-15  थी  originally envisioned as a pure air  बड़प्पन  aircraft .
Its  डिज़ाइन  included  a  secondary ground-attack capability that  थी  largely unused .
The design proved flexible enough that an  all-weather  strike derivative , the F-15E Strike Eagle , was later developed , and entered service in 1989 .
The F-15 Eagle  is  expected to be in service with  the  U.S. Air  फ़ोर्स  past  2025  .
Mimio is a brand name of a line of technology products aimed at the education market .
The primary  उत्पाद  are  केन्द्रित  around computer whiteboard interactive  शिक्षण  devices .
mimiocapture  devices also  allow  users to  कैप्चर   सब  of the ink strokes that are written on the whiteboard .
When used in conjunction with a video projector it turns the  ordinary  whiteboard surface  into   a  fully interactive whiteboard .
The  उत्पाद  line was originally designed by  आभासी  Ink .
On October 4 , 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired the Mimio interactive whiteboard ( iWB ) product line  .
Rahab of Jericho
Rahab , ( ; ;  )  was ,  according  to the  किताब  of Joshua , a woman who lived in Jericho in the  promised  Land  और  assisted the Israelites in capturing the city .
Nearly all English translations of Joshua describe her as a harlot or prostitute .
The Organization of American States  (  Spanish : Organización de los  estados  Americanos , Portuguese :  organização  dos Estados Americanos , French :  संगठन  des États américains ) , or the OAS , is a regional international organization .
The OAS was founded on 30 April 1948 , and has its headquarters in Washington , D.C. , United States .
Its members  हैं  the 35 independent states of the Americas .
Since 26  may  2005 , the Secretary General of OAS has been José  मिगुएल  Insulza .
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo  कोलोन  ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo ; before  31  October 145120 May 1506  )  was an Italian explorer , navigator , and colonizer , born in the Republic of Genoa , in what is today northwestern Italy .
Under the auspices of the Catholic  monarchs   of  Spain , he completed four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean that led to general  यूरोपीय  awareness of the American continents .
Those voyages , and his efforts to establish permanent settlements on the island of Hispaniola , initiated the  स्पेनी  colonization of the New World .
In the context of emerging  पश्चिमी  imperialism  और   आर्थिक  competition between European kingdoms seeking wealth through the establishment of trade routes and colonies ,  कोलंबस   's  speculative proposal , to reach the East Indies  by  sailing westward ,  आखिरकार  received the support of the Spanish crown , which saw in it a promise , however remote , of gaining the upper hand  over  rival powers in the contest for the lucrative spice trade with Asia  .
During his first voyage in 1492 , instead of reaching Japan as he had intended , Columbus landed  in  the Bahamas archipelago  ,  at a locale he named San Salvador .
Over the course of three more voyages  ,  Columbus  visited  the Greater and Lesser Antilles , as well as the Caribbean coast of Venezuela and Central America , claiming them for the Spanish Empire .
Though Columbus was not  the  first European explorer to  पहुँचें  the Americas ( having been preceded by the  नॉर्स  expedition led by Leif Ericson  in  the 11th century ) , Columbus  's  voyages led to the first lasting European contact with the  americas  , inaugurating a period of European exploration ,  conquest  ,  और  colonization that lasted for several centuries .
They had , therefore , an enormous impact in  the  historical  विकास  of the modern Western world .
Columbus  खुद  saw his accomplishments primarily in the  लाइट  of the spreading of the Christian  धर्म  .
Never  admitting  that he had reached a continent previously unknown to Europeans , rather than the East Indies he had  नियत  out for  ,  Columbus called the inhabitants of the lands he visited  indios  (  स्पेनी  for ``  इंडियंस  `` ) .
Columbus 's  strained  relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial administrators in America led to his arrest and  dismissal  as governor of  the   settlements  on the island of Hispaniola in 1500  ,  and later to protracted litigation over the benefits which Columbus and his heirs claimed were owed  to  them  by  the crown .
Bred in Germany , the Boxer is a breed  of  stocky , medium-sized ,  short-haired  dogs .
The coat is smooth and  tight-fitting  ; colors are fawn or brindled , with or without white markings , which may cover the entire body .
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they  have  broad , short skulls ) , and have a square muzzle , mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ) , very strong jaws , and a powerful bite ideal  लिये  hanging on to large prey .
The Boxer  थी  bred from the Old English Bulldog and the now extinct Bullenbeisser , and is part of the Molosser group .
Boxers were first exhibited in a  श्वान   दिखाएँ  for St. Bernards in Munich in 1895 , the first Boxer club being founded the next  साल  .
Based on 2012 American Kennel Club statistics , Boxers held steady as the  सातवाँ  most popular breed of dog in the United States for the third  लगातार  year .
Serial ATA ( SATA  )  is a computer bus interface that connects host bus adapters to mass storage devices such as  मुश्किल  disk drives and optical drives .
Serial ATA replaces the older AT Attachment standard ( ATA ;  बाद  referred to as Parallel ATA  or  PATA ) , offering several advantages over the  पुरानी  interface : reduced cable size and cost ( seven conductors instead of 40 ) , native hot  swapping  , faster data transfer through higher signalling rates , and more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol .
SATA host adapters and devices  communicate  via a high-speed serial cable over two pairs  of  conductors .
In contrast ,  समानांतर  ATA ( the redesignation for the legacy ATA specifications  )   प्रयुक्त  a 16-bit  चौड़ी   आंकड़ा  bus with many additional support and control signals , all  ऑपरेटिंग  at much lower frequency .
To ensure backward compatibility  साथ  legacy ATA software and applications , SATA uses the same basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy  ata  devices .
SATA has replaced parallel ATA in consumer desktop and laptop computers , and has largely replaced PATA in new embedded applications  .
SATA  's  market share in the desktop PC market was 99 % in 2008 .
PATA remains widely used in industrial and embedded applications  कि   उपयोग  CompactFlash storage , even though the new CFast standard is based on SATA .
Serial  ata  industry compatibility specifications originate from The Serial ATA International Organization ( aka  .
SATA-IO , serialata.org ) .
the  SATA-IO group collaboratively creates , reviews  ,   ratifies  , and publishes the interoperability  विशेषताएँ   ,  the test cases , and plug-fests .
As with  अनेक  other industry compatibility standards ,  the  SATA content ownership is transferred to other industry bodies : primarily the INCITS T13 subcommittee ATA , the INCITS T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of T10  जिम्मेदार  for Serial Attached SCSI (  sas  ) .
The  पूरा  specification from SATA-IO .
The remainder of this article will try to use the terminology and  विशेषताएँ  of SATA-IO .
The history of the Internet began with the development of electronic computers in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over  the  ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California , Los Angeles ( UCLA ) , after the second piece of network equipment was  संस्थापित  at Stanford Research  संस्थान  ( SRI ) .
Packet switched  संजाल  such as ARPANET , Mark I at NPL in  the  UK , CYCLADES , Merit Network ,  tymnet  , and Telenet , were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s  using  a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for  internetworking  , in which multiple separate networks could be joined together into a network of networks .
In  1982  , the Internet protocol suite (  tcp/ip  ) was standardized , and consequently , the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks  ,  called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer  विज्ञान  Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations .
Commercial Internet service  प्रदाताओं  ( ISPs ) began to  emerge  in the late 1980s and early 1990s .
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990  .
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned , removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet  रै  had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce , including  the  rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail , instant messaging ,  आवाज़  over Internet Protocol ( VoIP )  ``  phone calls '' , two-way interactive video calls ,  और   the  World Wide Web with its discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and  ऑनलाइन  shopping sites .
The research and education community continues to develop and use advanced networks  ऐसे  as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and higher speeds over fiber optic networks  ऑपरेटिंग  at 1-Gbit/s , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet  's  takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms  :  it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way  दूरसंचार  networks in the year 1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , and more than 97  %  of the telecommunicated  सूचना  by 2007 .
Today  the  Internet  continues  to grow , driven by ever greater  amounts   of  online information , commerce , entertainment , and social networking .
The Gift is the second album by Scottish singer Susan Boyle  ,  which was released on 8 November 2010 .
Boyle hinted that the album  रै  a 1960s feel `` because that was  [  her ] era '' .
on 30 November 2011 , the album received a nomination in 54th Grammy Awards  लिये  Best Traditional Pop Vocal  एल्बम  .
`` This Is Just To  कह  '' ( 1934 ) is a famous imagist poem by William Carlos Williams .
Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian  डम्बल्डोर  is a major character and protagonist of J. K. Rowling 's  हैरी  Potter series .
For most of the series , he is the headmaster of the wizarding school Hogwarts .
As part of his backstory , it is revealed that he is the founder and leader of the Order of  the   फीनिक्स  , an organisation dedicated to fighting the main antagonist of the series , Lord Voldemort  .
Dumbledore is portrayed  by   रिचर्ड  Harris in the film adaptions  of  Harry Potter and the Philosopher  's  Stone and Harry Potter  और  the Chamber of Secrets .
After Harris ' death , Michael Gambon portrayed Dumbledore for all of the remaining films .
Rowling stated she chose the  नाम  Dumbledore , which is an Early Modern English word for `` bumblebee `` ,  क्युकी  of Dumbledore 's love of music :  वो  imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot '' .
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is  a  32-amino acid linear polypeptide hormone that is produced in humans primarily by the parafollicular cells ( also known as  c-cells  ) of the thyroid ,  और  in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body .
It acts to reduce blood calcium (  ca2+  ) , opposing the effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) .
Calcitonin has been found  in  fish , reptiles ,  पक्षियों  , and mammals  .
Its importance in humans has not been as well established as its importance in other animals , as its  फलन  is usually not significant in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis .
It belongs to calcitonin-like protein family .
A mousepad  साथ  a padded wrist rest .
A mousepad ( US  )  or mouse mat  (  UK ) is a surface for  रखकर  and moving  a  computer  चूहा  .
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse  सीधे  on a table by providing a surface to allow the tracking LED or ball ( in  पूर्व  models ) to measure movement accurately  और  without jitter  .
Some mousepads increase ergonomics  by  providing a padded wrist rest .

A small portion of the Riverfront Stadium site is now occupied by the Reds '  हॉल  of Fame and Museum and Main Street , which was extended when the new park was built .
