This is a comprehensive listing which highlights significant achievements and milestones based upon Billboard magazine  's  singles  चार्ट  , most notably the Billboard Hot 100 .
This list spans from the issue dated January 1 , 1955 to present .
the  Billboard Hot 100  began  with  the  issue dated August 4 , 1958 ,  और  is currently the standard popular music chart in the United States .
Prior to the creation  of  the Hot 100 , Billboard published four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '' , `` Most Played by Jockeys '' , `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and ``  the  Top 100 '' .
These charts , which ranged from  20  to 100  स्लॉट  , were phased out at different times between 1957 and 1958 .
Though technically  नहीं  part of the Hot 100  चार्ट  history , their data is included for computational purposes  ,  and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations .
All  वस्तुएं  listed below are from the Hot 100 era , unless otherwise noted  (  pre-Hot 100 charts ) .
v  is an American science fiction television series that ran for two  सीज़न  on ABC  ,  from  नवम्बर  3 , 2009 to March 15 , 2011 .
A remake of the 1983 miniseries  निर्मित  by Kenneth Johnson , the new  श्रेणी  chronicles the arrival on  धरती  of a technologically advanced alien species which ostensibly comes in peace  ,  but  दरअसल  has sinister motives .
V stars  मुरैना  Baccarin , Lourdes Benedicto , Morris Chestnut , Joel Gretsch , Logan Huffman , Charles  mesure  ,  एलिज़ाबेथ  Mitchell , Laura Vandervoort and Scott Wolf , and was executive produced by Scott Rosenbaum , Yves Simoneau , Scott  पीटर्स  , and Jace Hall .
The series was produced by  the  Scott Peters Company ,  hdfilms   और  Warner Bros. Television .
geocaching  is an outdoor recreational activity ,  in  which  the  participants use a  वैश्विक  Positioning  प्रणाली  ( GPS ) receiver or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and seek containers , called `` geocaches '' or `` caches  ''  , anywhere in the world .
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the geocacher enters the date they found  it  and signs it with their  स्थापित  code  नाम  .
After signing into the log , the cache must be placed back exactly where the person found it .
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers ( Tupperware or similar ) or ammunition boxes can  भी  contain items  लिये   व्यापार  , usually toys or trinkets of little value  .
Geocaching shares many aspects  साथ  benchmarking , trigpointing , orienteering , treasure-hunting , letterboxing , and waymarking .
Boogie Down Productions  थी  a hip hop group that was originally composed of KRS-One , D-Nice , and DJ Scott La Rock .
dj  Scott  la  Rock was murdered on August 27 , 1987 ,  महीने  after the  रिलीज  of BDP 's debut album  ,  Criminal Minded .
The name of the group , Boogie  bas  , derives from a nickname  लिये  the South Bronx section of The Bronx  ,  one of the five boroughs of New York City .
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and  उनके  debut LP Criminal Minded  contained  frank descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the late  1980s  thus setting the stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap .
A municipal bond is a bond issued by a local government , or their agencies .
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states , cities , counties , redevelopment agencies , special-purpose  जिले  , school districts , public utility districts , publicly owned airports and seaports , and  कोई  other governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below  the  state level  .
Municipal bonds may be general  दायित्वों  of the issuer or secured by specified revenues .
In the  संयुक्त  States ,  ब्याज  income  प्राप्त  by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the  आय  tax  of  the  राज्य  in which they are issued , although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax exempt .
Unlike  नई  issue stocks that are brought  to  market with price restrictions until  the  deal is sold , municipal bonds are free to  व्यापार  at any time once they are  खरीदा  by the investor .
Professional traders  regularly  trade and retrade the same  bonds  several times a  सप्ताह  .
``  Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve Winwood , Spencer Davis and Muff  winwood  , and originally performed by  the  Spencer Davis Group .
The basic  रिफ  of the song was  उधार  from the Homer Banks song  ``  ( Ai n't That ) A  लॉट  of Love '' , written by Banks  और  Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker .
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' was a UK  #  2 in the Autumn of 1966 and a US # 7 .
The song is ranked # 247 on the Rolling Stone magazine 's list of  the  500 Greatest Songs of All  समय  .
The version issued in the UK (  और  probably most of Europe ) is different from  कि  issued  in  the US on the United Artists label , being slower , and lacking the backing vocals and `` live sounding '' performance found on the US single .
( The US version  रै  more often been used on reissue  cds   ,  even those coming from  यूरोपीय  . )
The single features  the  sound of the Hammond B-3 organ  .
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb )  is  an online database of information related to films , television  कार्यक्रम  , and video games .
This  शामिल  actors , production crew personnel ,  और  fictional characters featured in these three visual entertainment media  .
It is one  of   the  most popular online entertainment destinations , with over 100 million unique users each month and a solid  और  rapidly growing mobile presence .
IMDb was launched on October 17 , 1990 , and in 1998 was acquired by Amazon.com .
As of April 27 , 2013 , IMDb had 2,503,783 titles ( includes episodes ) and 5,192,493 personalities in  इसके  database , as well as 43 million registered users .
The website has an  एलेक्सा  rank of 48  .
Fibre Channel Host Bus Adapter ( 64-bit PCI-X card )
SCSI  मेजबान  Bus Adapter ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware ,  a  host controller , host adapter , or  मेजबान   बस  adapter ( HBA ) connects a host system ( the computer ) to other network and storage devices .
The  शर्तें  are primarily used  to  refer to devices  लिये  connecting  scsi  , Fibre  चैनल   और  eSATA devices .
However , devices for connecting to IDE ,  ईथरनेट  , FireWire , USB and other systems may  भी  be called host  adapters  .
Recently ,  the  advent of iSCSI  और  Fibre Channel  over  Ethernet has brought  परिचय  Ethernet HBAs , which are  अलग  from Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines .
There are also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and Fibre Channel called Converged Network Adapters ( CNAs ) .
Cashmere Scarves
Modern men 's  cashmere  sweaters  लिये  sale .
Cashmere wool , usually simply known as cashmere , is a  रेशा  obtained from Cashmere goats and other types of goat .
The word cashmere derives from an  बूढ़ा  spelling of  काश्मीर  .
cashmere  is fine in texture , strong , light  ,  and soft .
Garments made from it provide excellent  इन्सुलेशन  .
In the  संयुक्त  States , under the U.S . Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 , as amended  ,  ( 15 Uction 68b ( a )  (  6 ) ) , states that a wool or textile product may not be labeled as  containing  cashmere unless:
such wool product is the fine ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers produced by a cashmere goat  (  Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the fiber of such wool product  करता  not exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3 percent  (  by weight ) of cashmere fibers with average diameters that exceed 30 microns .
The  औसत  fiber diameter may be subject to a coefficient  of  variation around the mean that shall not  exceed  24 percent .
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner and  licensor  of sofabed and leather specialty retail  स्टोर्स  in the United States , with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard  ,  in the  मिडवेस्ट  , on the West Coast and in the Southwest .
The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Woodbury , New York .
On July 19  ,  2010 , the company announced that it had  दायर  for bankruptcy as a consequence of `` substantial losses '' .
According to Furniture Today the company was number 48 among furniture retailers with US $ 114 million in sales for the  साल  ending August 29 , 2009 .
It subsequently emerged from Chapter 11 under the control of  इसके  major supplier , the Haining Mengnu Group .
Egg roll is a term used for many different foods around the world .
2__Egg_roll  __  Varieties of egg rolls are found in mainland China , many Chinese-speaking  regions  of Asia , and Chinese immigrant communities around the world .
Egg rolls as referred to in China .
In Guangdong and Hong Kong , egg roll usually refers to biscuit roll .
This is a type of biscuit .
The ingredient included egg , flour and sugar .
Egg roll also is a dish in Canton and Hong Kong  ,  this is  प्रायः  made with  सब्ज़ी  .
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and are not  as  commonly  खपत  in  the  north and  पश्चिमी  parts of China .
In American Chinese  भोजन  , an egg roll is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer .
It  is  usually stuffed with chicken  ,  pork or shrimp , cabbage , carrots , tomatoes , bean sprouts and  अन्य   सब्जियां  , and then deep fried .
This variety of the egg roll is very common and popular , across even  क्षेत्रीय  varieties of American Chinese food , and is often included as part of a `` combination platter '' .
In Montreal  ,   कनाडा  , open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish .
They can be either kosher certified or merely kosher style .
Pain and suffering is the legal term for the physical and emotional stress caused from an  चोट  ( see also pain and suffering ) .
Some damages that might be under this category would be  :  aches  ,   अस्थाई  and  स्थाई  limitations on activity , potential shortening of life , depression or scarring .
When filing a lawsuit as a  परिणाम  of an injury , it is common  लिये  someone  to  seek  धन  both in compensation for actual money that is lost and  लिये  the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury .
In a suit , pain and suffering  is  part of the ``  सामान्य   क्षतिपूर्ति  '' section of the claimant  's   अर्जी  , or , alternatively , it is an  तत्व  of `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks  परितोष   .
Apart from money damages awarded in trial ,  धन  damages  हैं  also given  informally  outside the judicial system  in  mediations  ,  arbitration (  दोनो  of which may be  अदालत  annexed or non litigated claims ) as well  as  in routine insurance settlements .
Individual claimants or those  represented  by lawyers often present demands to insurers to  settle  for  धन  .
These demand for bodily injury compensation monies often set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings .
मांगे  are usually written summaries of a claimant 's medical care and the facts which resulted  in  the injury .
Sample of a Medallion  हस्ताक्षर  guarantee  stampin
the United States and Canada , a medallion signature guarantee is a  खास  signature  गारंटी  for  the  transfer of securities  .
It is a guarantee by the  transferring  financial institution  कि  the signature is genuine and the financial institution accepts liability  लिये  any forgery .
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by  preventing  unauthorized transfers and possible investor losses .
They also limit the liability of the transfer agent who accepts the certificates .
Different institutions  have  different policies as to what type of identification they require to provide the guarantee and whether they charge a fee  लिये  such service  (  usually  नाममात्र  if any ) .
Most institutions will not guarantee a signature of someone who has not already been their customer .
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an  acknowledgment  by a notary public , in the sense  कि  a  ``  signature guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is authentic , and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting that  the  signer signed a document voluntarily .
Some banks may  no  longer provide this service ,  however  , many still do as well as other financial institutions such as a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions .
At their sole discretion  ,  these institutions may still  मनाही  to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees .
When US citizens are  विदेश  , some financial institutions may accept United  राज्य  Embassy Seals , in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp .
Pacific  इलेक्ट्रिक  Railway streetcars  stacked  at a junkyard on Terminal Island , Los Angeles County ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  कूच   1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also known  as   the  Great American streetcar scandal ) refers to allegations and convictions in relation to a program by General Motors  (  GM ) and other companies  जो  purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many American cities .
Between 1936 and 1950 , National City Lines and Pacific  नगर  Lines —with investment from GM , Firestone Tire , Standard Oil of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Phillips Petroleum ,  mack  Trucks , and the Federal Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction systems in 45  शहरों  including Baltimore , Newark , Los Angeles , New York City , Oakland and San Diego  और  converted them  into  bus operation .
Several of the companies involved were convicted  in  1949 of conspiracy  to  monopolize interstate commerce but  यहूद  acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies .
Some suggest that this program played a key role  in  the decline of public transit  in  cities across the United  राज्य   ;  notably Edwin J. Quinby , who first drew attention to the program in 1946 , and then Bradford C. Snell , an anti-trust attorney for the United States Senate whose controversial  1974   गवाही  to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national awareness .
Both Quinby and Snell argued  कि   the  deliberate destruction  of  streetcars was part of a larger strategy to push the  संयुक्त  States into  ऑटोमोबाइल  dependency .
Others say  कि  independent economic factors brought about changes in the transit system , including the Great Depression , the Public Utility Holding  कम्पनी  Act  of  1935 , labor unrest , market forces , rapidly increasing traffic congestion , urban sprawl ,  कराधान  policies that favored private vehicle ownership , and general enthusiasm  लिये  the automobile .
One writer on  the  subject has suggested that Snell and others fell into simplistic conspiracy theory thinking , bordering  on  paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly , GM waged a war on electric traction .
it  was indeed an all out assault , but by no means the single reason for  the  failure of rapid transit .
Also , it is  बस  as clear that actions and inactions by government contributed significantly  to  the elimination of electric traction . ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based urban transport systems  आधारित  on streetcars or trams , including Newark , Philadelphia , San Francisco ,  पिट्सबर्ग  , and Boston ; others are re-introducing them .
The story has been explored several times in  छपाई  , film and other media , notably in Who  framed  Roger  खरगोश  , Taken for  a  Ride and The End of Suburbia .
Corwin House  ,  Salem , Massachusetts , built ca . 1660 , First Period English
American  औपनिवेशिक  architecture includes several building design styles associated  साथ  the  औपनिवेशिक  period of the United States , including First Period English (  late-medieval  ) ,  फ्रेंच  Colonial , Spanish  औपनिवेशिक  , Dutch Colonial and Georgian .
These  शैलियाँ  are associated  साथ  the houses ,  चर्च   और  government buildings of the period from about 1600 through  the  19th century .
`` In the Mood '' is a big band era # 1 hit recorded by American bandleader Glenn  मिलर  .
It topped the charts in 1940 in  the  U.S. and one year later was featured in  the  movie Sun Valley Serenade .
In  1999  ,  नेशनल  Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939 Glenn Miller  रिकॉर्डिंग  on RCA Bluebird on  the  NPR 100 , the  सूची   of  `` The 100 most important American  musical   works  of the  20th  century '' .
NEPTUNE logo
The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s  पहला  regional-scale underwater ocean observatory that plugs directly into the Internet .
चूंकि  December 2009 , it  रै  allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world .
Along with  इसके  sister  प्रोजेक्ट  , VENUS , NEPTUNE offers a unique approach to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises  or  space-based satellites to carry  आउट  their research , while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated crawler .
A gramophone record , commonly known  as  a phonograph record (  in  American  अंग्रेज़ी  ) , vinyl  रिकार्ड  ( in reference to vinyl , the  सामग्री  most commonly used after about 1950 ) , or  colloquially   ,   ``   a  record '' , is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc  साथ  an inscribed  ,  modulated spiral groove .
The groove usually starts near the periphery and ends near the center of the  डिस्क  .
Phonograph records are  generally  described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch , 10-inch , 7-inch , etc . ) , the rotational speed at which they are played ( `` 33 rpm `` , `` 78 '' , `` 45 '' , etc . ) , their time capacity ( `` long playing '' ) , their reproductive accuracy , or  ``  fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '' , `` Orthophonic '' , `` full-range '' , etc . ) , and the number of channels of audio provided (  ``  mono `` , `` stereo  ``   ,  `` quadraphonic `` , etc . ) .
Phonograph records were  the  primary medium used for music reproduction for most of the 20th  सदी  , replacing  the  phonograph cylinder , with which it  था  co-existed , by the 1920s .
By  the   लेट  1980s , digital  मीडिया  had  gained  a larger market share ,  और  the vinyl record left the  मुख्यधारा  in 1991 .
They continue to  be  manufactured and sold in the  21st  century .
In 2008 , nearly 2.9 million units shipped , the most in any year since 1998  और  the format  रै  continued to slowly regain popularity .
They are especially used by DJs  और  audiophiles for many types of music .
as  of 2013 , vinyl records continue to be used for distribution .
Grassland  in  the Santa  रोजा  Plateau , California .

the  Konza tallgrass  प्रेयरी  in the Flint Hills of  northeastern  Kansas .
a  grassland in the Philippines .
An Inner Mongolian grassland  in  the People 's Republic of China
Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is dominated by  grasses  (  पोएसी  ) ,  however  sedge ( Cyperaceae ) and rush ( Juncaceae ) families can also be found .
Grasslands occur naturally on all continents except Antarctica .
In temperate latitudes , such as northwestern  यूरोपीय   और  the Great Plains and California in North America , native  grasslands   हैं  dominated by perennial bunch grass species , whereas in  warmer  climates annual species form a greater component of the vegetation .
Grasslands  हैं  found in most ecoregions of the Earth .
For example there are five terrestrial  ecoregion   classifications  ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands , savannas , and shrublands  बायोम  ( '  ecosystem  ' )  ,  which is one of eight terrestrial  ecozones  of the Earth 's surface .
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis , also called henna tree ) or Hina is a flowering plant , the  एकमात्र  species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae  .
The English  नाम   ``  henna '' comes from the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ /  सुनाया  ) or colloquially , loosely pronounced .
The name is also used for dye preparations derived from the plant , and for the  आर्ट  of temporary tattooing based on  those  dyes .
Henna has been used since antiquity to dye skin , hair ,  और  fingernails ,  as  well as fabrics including Silk , wool and leather .
Additionally , the name is misused for other skin and hair dyes , such as black  हिना  or neutral henna , which are not derived from the plant .
A thin film is  a  layer of material ranging from fractions of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in  मोटाई  .
Electronic semiconductor devices and optical coatings are the main applications  लाभकारी  from  thin-film  construction .
A familiar application of thin films is the household mirror , which typically has  a  thin  मेटल  coating on the back of a sheet of glass to form a reflective interface .
The process of  silvering  was once commonly used to produce mirrors .
a  very-thin-film  कोटिंग  ( less than  a   nanometer  thick ) is used to  उपज  two-way mirrors  .
The performance of  ऑप्टिकल   coatings  (  e.g  . antireflective , or AR , coatings ) are typically enhanced when the thin-film coating consists of multiple layers having varying thicknesses and refractive indices .
Similarly , a periodic structure of alternating thin  films   of  different materials may collectively  रूप  a so-called superlattice which  कारनामे  the phenomenon of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions .
Work is being done with ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for use as computer memory .
It  is  also being applied to pharmaceuticals ,  via  thin-film drug delivery .
Thin-films are used to produce thin-film batteries .
Thin films are also  प्रयुक्त   in  dye-sensitized solar cells .
Ceramic thin films are in wide use .
The relatively high hardness and inertness  of  ceramic materials make this type of thin coating of interest for protection  of  substrate  सामग्री  against corrosion , oxidation and wear .
In particular ,  the  use of  ऐसे  coatings on  कटिंग  tools can extend the life of these items by several orders of magnitude .
Research is  होने  done on a new class of thin-film inorganic oxide materials , called  amorphous  heavy-metal cation multicomponent oxides  ,  which could be used to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive , stable , and environmentally benign .
Gears of War is a military science fiction third-person shooter video game developed by Epic  खेल  and published by Microsoft Game Studios .
It  थी  initially  released  as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005  in  North America , Australia , and most of Europe and included  a   ``  Limited Collector  's  Edition '' with added content and an art book titled Destroyed  सौंदर्य  that detailed much of the  खेल  's back-story .
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity , a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction with People Can Fly and released a year later , featuring new content including additional  अभियान  levels , a new multiplayer game mode , and Games for Windows Live functionality .
The game focuses on the  सैनिकों  of Delta Squad as  वे  wield a desperate , last-ditch attempt to save the remaining human inhabitants  of   the  fictional planet Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable  subterranean  enemy known as the Locust Horde .
The player assumes  the  role of Marcus Fenix ( but can also play as Dominic Santiago ) , a former prisoner and war-hardened soldier .
The game is based on the use of cover and strategic fire for the player to advance through the scenarios ; a second player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to  assist   .
The game also features several online multiplayer game modes for up to eight players .
Gears of War sold over three million copies in  बस  ten weeks and was the fastest-selling video game of 2005 as well  as  the second-most played game over Xbox Live during .
It currently stands as the 5th best selling Xbox 360 game of  सब  time  .
The game has since sold over five million copies by September 2008 .
The game was  खूब  received by critics , who praised its gameplay and detailed visuals , and it  जीती  several `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006  .
the  success of the game has led to the development  of  the Gears of War franchise , including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and its follow-up , Gears  of  War  3  ,  जिससे  was released on September 20 ,  2011  , after having initially been set  to   have  been released on April 5 , 2011 , the date upon which Epic Games ' Cliff Bleszinski was a guest on Late  रात्रि  with  jimmy  Fallon .
Adaptations to  किताबे  , comics , as well as a feature  फिल्मी   हैं  to be expected .
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943 novel written by Betty Smith .
The story focuses  on  an Irish-American family in Williamsburg  ,  Brooklyn , New York City .
The novel is set in the first and second decades  of  the 20th century .
The book was  an  immense success .
The main metaphor of the book is the hardy Tree of Heaven , native  to   चीन  and  ताईवान  ,  अभी  considered invasive ,  और  common in the vacant lots of New York City .
World map with the intertropical zone highlighted in red .
Tropical climate zones of  the  Earth where all twelve months have mean temperatures  ऊपर   18  °C ( 64 °F  )  .
The tropics is a region of the Earth surrounding  the  Equator  .
It is limited in latitude by the Tropic of Cancer in  the  northern hemisphere  at  approximately N and the Tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond  to  the axial tilt of the Earth .
The tropics  हैं  also referred to as the tropical zone and the torrid zone ( see geographical zone  )   .
the  tropics  शामिल  all the areas on the  धरती  where the  सूर्य  reaches a point directly overhead at least once during  the  solar  साल  .
The tropics are distinguished  इससे  the other climatic  और  biomatic regions of Earth , the middle latitudes and the polar regions on either side of the equatorial zone .
For the  inxs  song , see What You Need ( song ) .
`` What You Need '' is an episode of the American television anthology series The Twilight  मण्डल  .
It is based on the short  स्टोरी   of  the same name  by  Lewis Padgett ( Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore ) .
PlayhouseSquare , in the Cleveland Theater  ज़िला  in downtown Cleveland , Ohio , is the second-largest theater complex in the  संयुक्त  States ,  दूसरी  only  to  New York City 's Lincoln Center  )  .
Constructed in a span of 19 months  in  the early 1920s , the theaters were subsequently closed down , but were revived  through  a grassroots effort .
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new  era  of downtown revitalization in Cleveland , and was called `` one of the top ten successes in Cleveland history  .  ''
The driver and passenger front airbags , after having been deployed , in  a  British Peugeot 306 car .
An airbag is a vehicle safety device .
It is an occupant restraint system consisting of a flexible fabric envelope or cushion designed to inflate  rapidly  during an automobile collision .
Its purpose is to cushion occupants during a crash and provide protection to their bodies when they strike interior objects such as the steering wheel or a  खिड़की  .
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag  मौड्यूल  in various  पक्ष  and frontal locations of the passenger  seating  positions , and sensors may deploy one or more  airbags   in  an impact zone at variable rates  आधारित  on the  प्रकार  , angle  और  severity  of  impact ;  the  airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to severe frontal  क्रैश  .
Airbags are normally designed with  the  intention of supplementing the protection of an occupant who  is  correctly restrained with a seatbelt .
Most designs are inflated through pyrotechnic means and  can  only  be  operated once  .
Newer side-impact airbag modules consist of compressed  एयर  cylinders that are triggered in the event of  a  side impact vehicle impact .
The first commercial designs were introduced in passenger  ऑटोमोबाइल  during the 1970s with  सीमित  success .
व्यापक  commercial adoption of  airbags  occurred in many markets during the  लेट  1980s and early 1990s with a driver airbag , and a front passenger airbag  as  well on some cars ;  और  many modern vehicles now include four or more units .
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to report financial information to the Internal Revenue  सेवा   (  IRS ) of  the  United States  .
They are used to report income , calculate taxes to  be  paid to the  संघीय  government  of  the United States , and  ज़ाहिर   अन्य  information as required by the Internal Revenue  कोड  ( IRC  )   .
वहीँ  are over 800  विभिन्न  forms and schedules .
The best-known of these  is  Form 1040 used by individuals .
In the United  राज्य  , driver 's licenses are issued by  प्रत्येक  individual state ( including Washington , D.C. and  territories  ) , rather than  the  federal government because of the political concept of federalism .
Drivers are normally required to obtain a license from their  राज्य  of residence and all states recognize  प्रत्येक  other 's licenses for temporary visitors subject to normal age  आवश्यकताएँ  .
A state may also suspend an individual 's  ड्राइविंग  privilege within its borders for traffic violations .
Many states share a common system of license classes ,  साथ  some  अपवाद  , and commercial license  वर्ग   हैं  standardized by federal regulation at 49 CFR  भाग  383 .
China has been  the  source of many inventions , including the Four Great Inventions : papermaking , the compass , gunpowder , and printing  (  both woodblock and movable type ) .
The list below contains these  और  other inventions .
The Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics  ,   hydraulics  , and mathematics applied  to  horology , metallurgy , astronomy , agriculture , engineering  ,  music theory , craftsmanship ,  nautics  , and warfare .
By  the  Warring States Period ( 403–221 BC ) , they had advanced metallurgic technology , including the blast  भट्टी  and cupola furnace , while  the   finery  forge and puddling process were  ज्ञात  by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 )  .
A sophisticated economic system in China gave birth to inventions  ऐसे  as  पेपर  money during the Song Dynasty ( 960–1279 ) .
the  invention of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array  of  inventions such as the fire lance , land mine , naval mine , hand cannon ,  exploding  cannonballs , multistage rocket , and rocket bombs with  aerodynamic  wings and explosive payloads .
With the  navigational  aid of the 11th-century compass and ability to steer at high sea  साथ  the 1st-century  sternpost  rudder , premodern Chinese sailors sailed as far as East  अफ़्रीकी  and Egypt  .
In water-powered clockworks ,  the   premodern  Chinese had used the escapement mechanism since the 8th century  और  the endless power-transmitting  कड़ी  drive in the 11th  सदी  .
They also made large mechanical puppet theaters driven by waterwheels and carriage  पहियों  and wine-serving automatons driven by  चप्पू   व्हील  boats .
The  contemporaneous  Peiligang and Pengtoushan cultures represent the oldest Neolithic cultures of China and were formed around  7000  BC .
Some of the  पहला  inventions of Neolithic , prehistoric China include  semilunar  and rectangular  स्टोन  knives ,  स्टोन  hoes  और  spades , the  cultivation  of millet , rice and the soybean , the refinement  of  sericulture , the building of  rammed  earth structures with lime -plastered house floors , the creation of the potter 's  व्हील  , the  सृष्टि  of pottery with cord-mat-basket designs , the creation  of  pottery tripods and pottery steamers  ,  and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of  भविष्यवाणी   .
Francesca Bray argues that  the  domestication of the ox and  भैंस  during the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c . 2000 BC )  काल  , the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops , full  प्रमाण  of Longshan cultivation of  dry-land  cereal crops which gave high yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated , '' suggest that the plow  थी  known at least by the Longshan culture period and explains the high agricultural production yields  जिससे  allowed the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c . 1050 BC ) .
With later inventions such as the multiple-tube  बीज  drill and  भारी  moldboard iron plow , China 's  agricultural  output could sustain a much larger  जनसांख्यिकी   .
For the purposes of this list , inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in China ,  और  as such does not include foreign technologies which the  चाइनीज  acquired through  सम्पर्क  , such  as  the windmill from the Middle East or the telescope from Early modern Europe .
It  भी  does not include technologies developed elsewhere and later invented separately by the  चाइनीज  , such as the  ओडोमीटर  and chain pump .
Scientific , mathematic or  प्राकृतिक  discoveries , changes in minor concepts of  डिज़ाइन  or style and artistic innovations can not be  regarded  as inventions and  do  not appear on  the  list .

Globalization ( or globalisation—see  स्पेलिंग  differences ) is  the  process of international integration arising from the interchange of world views , products ,  विचार  , and other aspects of culture .
Put in simple terms , globalization refers to processes that promote world-wide exchanges of national and cultural resources .
Advances in transportation and  दूरसंचार  infrastructure , including the rise of the Internet , are major factors  in  globalization , generating  further  interdependence of  आर्थिक  and cultural activities .
हालांकि  several scholars place the origins of globalization in modern times , others trace its history long before the European age of discovery and  voyages  to the New World .
कुछ  even trace the origins to the third millennium BCE .
Since the beginning of the 20th century ,  the  pace of globalization has intensified at a rapid rate , especially during the Post  ठंडा  War era .
The term globalization has been  in  increasing use since the mid-1980s and especially since the mid-1990s .
In 2000 , the International  मौद्रिक  Fund ( IMF )  पहचाना  four basic aspects of  वैश्वीकरण  : trade and transactions , capital and investment movements , migration and  गति   of  people  और  the dissemination of knowledge  .
Further , environmental challenges  ऐसे  as  जलवायु  change  ,  cross-boundary  जल  and air pollution , and over-fishing of the ocean are  linked  with globalization .
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by business and work organization ,  अर्थशास्त्र  , socio-cultural resources , and the  प्राकृतिक  environment .
the  Replacements is a 2000 American sports comedy film directed  by  Howard Deutch .
It stars Keanu Reeves , Gene  hackman   ,  and Brooke Langton .
An American Airlines  वायुयान  takes off from Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport .
This airport is the airline  's  largest hub .
American Airlines flies to 79 domestic destinations and 78 international destinations in 48 countries .

The list includes the city , country , the codes of the International Air  हस्तांतरण  Association ( IATA airport code ) and the International Civil Aviation  संगठन  ( ICAO  विमानक्षेत्र  code ) , and  the  airport 's  नाम  , with the airline 's hubs , focus cities and seasonal destinations marked .
The list also contains destinations  no  longer served by the  एयरलाइन  , which  हैं  marked as terminated destinations .
It does not include destinations served for American Airlines by  इसके  regional affiliates American Eagle Airlines  ,  Executive Airlines , and AmericanConnection .
``  day-o   (  The Banana Boat Song ) '' is  a  traditional Jamaican mento folk song , the best-known version of which was  सुंग  by Harry Belafonte and  an  alternate version  interspersed  with another Jamaican  folksong  , Hill and Gully Rider  ,  by Dame Shirley Bassey .
Despite the song 's mento influences , `` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song  )  ''  is   widely  known as an example of calypso music .
it  is a work song , from the point of view of dock workers working the night shift loading bananas onto ships .
Daylight has  आइये  , the shift is over and they want their work  to  be counted up so that they can go home .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war  केंद्रित  in  यूरोपीय  that  began  on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was  predominantly  called the World War  or  the  ग्रेट  War from its occurrence until the  प्रारंभ  of World War II  in  1939 , and  the  First World War or World  युद्ध  I thereafter .
it  involved all the world 's great powers , which were  समवेत  in two opposing alliances : the Allies (  आधारित  on the Triple Entente of  the  United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally  the  Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken  the  offensive  विरूद्ध  the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded  as  more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States  joined  the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars  in  history .
More than 9  लाख  combatants were killed ,  largely  because of  technological  advancements  कि  led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in  सुरक्षा  or mobility  .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world  इतिहास   ,  subsequently paving the  रास्ता  for various political changes  ,  such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes  of  the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign  नीतियों  of the great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to  the  throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to  the   किंगडम  of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the previous decades  यहूद  invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers were at war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as  तैयारी   लिये  the  आक्रमण  of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the  रास्ता  to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called  चमत्कार  of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a  स्थिर  battle of attrition with a trench line that  बदला  little until  1917  .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army  थी  successful against the  austro-hungarians  ,  लकिन  was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by  the  Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war , opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
बाद  a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back the Germans  in  a series of  कामयाब  offensives and American forces began entering  the  trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended in victory for the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as  उग्र  as on the battle fronts , as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war  .
by  the end of the  युद्ध  , four major imperial  powers—the  German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
the  successor states of the former two lost  a  great amount of territory ,  जबकि  the  latter  two were dismantled  entirely   .
The map of central  यूरोपीय  was redrawn  into   अनेक  smaller states .
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
the  European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires ,  the  repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing  to  World War II .
Nurse Jackie is an American  श्रेणी  that premiered on June 8  ,  2009  ,   on  Showtime , Movie Central and The  फिल्म   संजाल  .
The series stars Edie Falco as the title character Jackie Peyton , an emergency department nurse at All Saints ' Hospital in New York City .
For Jackie , `` Every  दिन  is a high wire act of juggling  मरीजों  , doctors , fellow nurses  और  her own  indiscretions  . ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians  (  often referred to simply as The Kardashians ) is an  अमरीकी   वास्तविकता  television series that premiered on October 14 , 2007 , on E ! .
It follows the  जीवनदान   of   the  Kardashian/Jenner family  ,   सहित  sisters Kourtney , Kim , and Khloé Kardashian .
The series ' success has led to the spin-offs Kourtney and Kim Take New York , Khloé  &  Lamar , Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami  ,  and Kourtney  और  Kim Take Miami .
Afghanistan ( ; ; ) , officially the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan , is a  landlocked  sovereign state forming part of  दक्षिण  Asia , Central Asia , and to some  extent  Western Asia .
it  has a population of  around  30 million inhabiting an area of approximately , making it  the  42nd most  populous  and 41st  largest  nation in the world .
It is  bordered  by Pakistan  in  the south and the east , Iran in the west , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the north , and China in the far northeast .
Afghanistan  रै  been an ancient focal point of the  रेशा  Road and human migration .
Archaeologists have  मिला  evidence of  इंसान  habitation from as far back as the Middle Paleolithic .
Urban civilization may have begun in the area as early as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE .
Sitting at an important geostrategic location that connects the Middle East culture with Central  एशिया  and the Indian subcontinent , the land has been  घर  to various peoples through the ages and  witnessed  many military campaigns , notably by Alexander the Great , Genghis Khan , and in modern era Western forces .
The land also served as a source from which the  greco-bactrians  ,  kushans  ,  hephthalites  , Saffarids , Ghaznavids ,  ghorids  , Khiljis , Timurids , Mughals , Durranis , and others have risen to form major empires  .
The political history of the modern state of  अफगानिस्तान  begins in 1709 , when the Hotaki dynasty was established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad Shah Durrani 's rise  to  power in 1747 .
In the  लेट  19th century , Afghanistan became a buffer state in the  ``  Great Game `` between the  अंग्रेजों  and Russian empires  .
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War , King Amanullah began  a  European  स्टाइल  modernization  of  the country but was stopped  by  the ultra-conservatives .
During the Cold War ,  बाद  the withdrawal of the British from neighboring India in 1947 , the United States and the Soviet Union began spreading influences in Afghanistan ,  जिससे  led to a bloody war between the US-backed mujahideen forces  और  the Soviet-backed Afghan government in which over a million Afghans  खोया  their lives .
This  थी  followed by the 1990s  सिविल  war , the rise  और  fall of the extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war .
In December 2001 , the United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the International Security Assistance  फ़ोर्स  ( ISAF ) to help maintain  सुरक्षा  in  अफगानिस्तान  and assist the Karzai administration .
Three decades of war made  अफगानिस्तान  one of the  संसार  's most dangerous countries , including  the  largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers .
While the international community is  पुनर्निर्माण  war-torn Afghanistan  ,  terrorist groups  ऐसे  as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi  islami   हैं  actively involved in a nationwide Taliban -led insurgency , which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks .
According to  the  United Nations , the  insurgents  were  जिम्मेदार  for 80 %  of  civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012 .
The American  सिविल  War ( ACW ) , also  ज्ञात  as the War between the States or simply the Civil War (  देखिए  naming )  ,  was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United  राज्य  ( the ``  संघ  '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states  कि  declared their secession and formed the Confederate  राज्य  of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or  the  `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन  of  गुलामी  into the western territories .
Foreign powers did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy  collapsed  , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction  प्रक्रम  of restoring  नेशनल  unity  और  guaranteeing rights to the  freed  slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans ,  led  by Abraham  lincoln  , opposed  expanding  slavery into United States '  territories  .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861  ,  seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the  आवक  Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's  inaugural   पता   घोषित  his  प्रशासन  would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject  काल्स  for secession .
confederate  forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन  failed to find a compromise , and both  पहलू  prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed  कि  European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none  किया  and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April  12  , 1861 , when Confederate  शक्तियां  fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union  सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops  to  retake the fort ; consequently  ,  four more  स्लेव  states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The  संघ  soon controlled the border states  और  established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
the  autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप   .
Lincoln issued  the  Emancipation  उदघोषणा  ,  जिससे   बना  ending  गुलामी  a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and the  संघ  at Vicksburg split the  confederacy  in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at  the  Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led  to  Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union  सेना  in  1864  .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta  और   marched   to  the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true  औद्योगिक   युद्धों  .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards ,  बैंको  , transportation and food supplies all  foreshadowed  World  युद्ध  I .
It remains the deadliest war  in  American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and  an  undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston  estimates  the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old , and  30  percent of all Southern white males aged  18–40  .
Cost of goods sold  (  COGS ) refer to the inventory  लागत  of those goods a business has sold during  a  particular  काल  .
Costs are  संबद्ध  with particular goods using one of several formulas ,  सहित  specific identification ,  first-in   first-out  ( FIFO )  ,  or average cost .
Costs  शामिल  all costs of purchase ,  लागत  of  परिवर्तन  and other costs incurred in bringing the inventories to their present location  और  condition .
Costs of goods made by the business include material , labor , and allocated overhead .
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as costs of inventory until the  inventory  is sold or  लिखा  down in value .
Freak Lunchbox candy store in Halifax , Nova  स्कोटिया
A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom , a candy store in the North America  ,  or a  lolly  shop in Australia )  बिकता  confectionery and is usually targeted  to  children .
Most confectionery stores are  भर  with  an  assortment of sweets far larger than a grocer or convenience store could  accommodate  .
They often offer a selection of old fashioned treats , and sweets from different countries .
Very often unchanged in layout since their inception  ,  confectioneries  हैं  known for their warming and nostalgic feel .
the  village of Pateley Bridge claims to have the oldest confectionery store in England .
