Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in West South Central United States .
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived from  the  Choctaw words  okla  and humma , meaning ``  रेड  people ''  ,  and it is known informally by its nickname  ,  The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory  on  November 16 , 1907 , Oklahoma  थी  the 46th state to enter the union .
Its residents  हैं  known as Oklahomans or ,  informally  `` Okies  ''  , and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City .
a  major producer of  प्राकृतिक   गैस  , oil , and agriculture , Oklahoma relies on an  आर्थिक   आधार  of aviation , energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the nation  ,  ranking among the top states in per capita income growth and gross  घरेलू  product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors , with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within their metropolitan statistical areas .
With small mountain  सीमाएँ  , prairie , mesas , and eastern forests , most of Oklahoma lies in  the  Great Plains and the U.S . Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather .
In addition to  having  a prevalence  of  English , German , Scottish  ,  Irish and Native American ancestry , more  than  25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence  of  three major American cultural regions and historically  परोसा  as a route for cattle  ड्राइव  , a  गंतव्य  for southern settlers , and a government-sanctioned territory for Native  अमेरिकी   .
Stacked and standing car tires
A tire ( or tyre ) is a ring-shaped  covering  that fits around a wheel 's rim to protect  it  and enable better vehicle performance .
Most tires , such as those for automobiles and bicycles , provide traction between the vehicle and the road while providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock  .
The materials of modern pneumatic tires are synthetic rubber , natural rubber , fabric and wire , along with carbon black and other chemical compounds .
They consist of  a  tread  और  a body .
the  tread provides traction while the body provides containment for a quantity of compressed air .
Before rubber was developed , the first  संस्करण  of tires were simply bands  of   मेटल  that fitted around wooden wheels to prevent wear and tear .
जल्दी  rubber tires were solid ( not pneumatic ) .
Today ,  the  majority of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures  ,   comprising  a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires  encased  in rubber and generally  भर  with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion .
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of vehicles , including cars  ,  bicycles , motorcycles ,  ट्रक  , earthmovers ,  और  aircraft .
मेटल  tires  हैं  still used on locomotives  और  railcars , and solid rubber ( or other polymer  )  tires are still used in various non-automotive applications ,  ऐसे  as some casters , carts , lawnmowers , and wheelbarrows  .
Dr. Joseph  वारेन  ( June 11 , 1741 – June 17 , 1775 ) was an American doctor  जो  played a leading role in American Patriot organizations in Boston  in   जल्दी  days of the American Revolution ,  आखिरकार  serving as president of the revolutionary  मैसाचुसेट्स  Provincial Congress .
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on April 18 , 1775 , to leave Boston and spread the alarm that the British garrison in Boston was setting out to raid  the  town of Concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams .
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of  lexington  and Concord , which are commonly considered to be the  खोलने  engagements of the American Revolutionary  युद्ध  .
Warren  था  been commissioned a Major General in the colony 's militia shortly  पहले  the June  17  , 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill .
Rather than exercising his rank , Warren served in the battle  as  a  निजी  soldier , and was killed in combat when British troops stormed the redoubt  atop   नस्ल  's Hill .
His death , immortalized  in   जॉन  Trumbull 's painting , The Death of General  वारेन  at the Battle of Bunker  's  Hill , June 17  ,  1775 , galvanized the rebel forces , and he has been memorialized in many place names in  the  United States .
STM image of self-assembled supramolecular chains of  the   सशुल्क  semiconductor Quinacridone on Graphite .
An organic semiconductor is an organic material with semiconductor properties , that is , with an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals .
Single molecules ,  छोटी   कड़ी  (  oligomers  ) and organic polymers can  be  semiconductive .
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) include the polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene  ,  anthracene , and rubrene .
polymeric   सशुल्क  semiconductors include poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ) , poly ( p-phenylene vinylene  )  , as well as polyacetylene and its  डेरिवेटिव  .
There  हैं  two major overlapping classes  of   सशुल्क  semiconductors .
These are organic charge-transfer complexes and various linear-backbone conductive  polymers  derived from polyacetylene .
Linear backbone organic semiconductors include  polyacetylene  itself and its derivatives polypyrrole  ,  and polyaniline .
At least locally , charge-transfer complexes often exhibit similar conduction  mechanisms   to  inorganic semiconductors .
Such  mechanisms  arise  इससे  the presence of  छेद  and electron conduction layers separated by  a   बैंड  gap .
While  ऐसे  classic mechanisms are important locally , as with inorganic amorphous semiconductors  ,  tunnelling , localized states , mobility gaps , and phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction , particularly in polyacetylenes .
Like inorganic semiconductors , organic semiconductors can  be  doped .
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping such as  polyaniline  ( Ormecon ) and are also known as organic metals .
Typical current carriers in organic semiconductors are holes and  electrons  in π-bonds  .
Almost all organic solids are insulators .
But when  उनके  constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems  ,  electrons can move via π-electron cloud overlaps , especially by hopping , tunnelling and related mechanisms .
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and  phthalocyanine  salt crystals are examples of this type of  सशुल्क  semiconductor  .
Mainly due to low mobility , even unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes  .
Such unpaired electrons can function as current carriers .
This type of semiconductor is also obtained by pairing an electron donor molecule with  an  electron  acceptor  molecule .
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm  .
It  is  also known colloquially as gushing or squirting , although  ये  are considered to be  अलग  phenomena in some research publications .
The exact  सोर्स   और  nature of the fluid continue to  be  a topic of debate among medical professionals , which is also  सम्बन्धित  to  संदेह  over the existence of the G-Spot  .
The FIFA Women  's  World Cup is an international association football competition contested  by  the senior women 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been awarded every four years since  the  inaugural  टूर्नामेंट  in 1991 .
Japan won the 2011 tournament in a penalty shootout .
The current format of the tournament involves 16 teams competing  लिये   the  title at venues within the  मेजबान  nation ( s ) over a period of about three weeks ; –  इस  phase is often called the World Cup Finals  .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place over the preceding three years , is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International competition in women 's football and  is  played amongst women 's national  फ़ुटबॉल  teams of the member states of FIFA , the sport  's  global governing body .
the  first Women  's  World Cup tournament ,  नामित  the Women 's World Championship  ,  was  आयोजित  in  1991  ,  sixty-one  years after the men 's first FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930 .
The  छह  World Cup tournaments have  महरूम  won by four different national teams .
The next World Cup will be hosted by Canada in 2015  .
Scorpions  is  a young adult novel written by Walter Dean Myers , first published in the United States by Harper  &  Row on June 20  ,   1988  .
Front page of a 17th century Hebrew Bible by Joseph Athias , now at Beth Hatefutsoth , Israel
'Son of man ' is the translation of various  यहूदी  and Greek phrases used in both the Hebrew  बाइबल  and  the  New Testament .
It has diverse meanings , ranging from a normal human being  to  a prophesied eternal , divine ruler .
The Hebrew expression `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e . ben-'adam ) appears one  सौ  and seven times in the Hebrew Bible .
This is the most common Hebrew  निर्माण  for the singular but is used mostly in Ezekiel ( 93 times ) and  14  times elsewhere .
In thirty two cases the phrase appears in intermediate plural form `` sons of men '' , i.e  .  human beings .
As generally interpreted by Jews , it denotes humankind generally .
In the Koine Greek of  the   नई  Testament , `` the  बेटे  of man  ''   is  invariably used as  ``  ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article .
the  use of the definite article in `` the son  of  man '' in the Christian gospels is  अनोखा  , and before its use there , no records of its  उपयोग  in any of the surviving Greek  दस्तावेज़  of antiquity exist .
Geza Vermes  रै  stated that `` the  बेटे  of man '' in the Christian gospels is  unrelated  to  यहूदी  Bible usages .
In Christian usage , unlike the Son of God title , which has been an essential element of Christian creeds since the Apostolic  आयु  , the proclamation of `` Jesus as the Son of  man  '' has never  महरूम   an  article of faith in Christianity .
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the New Testament has remained challenging and after 150 years of  बहस  no consensus on the issue has emerged  among  scholars .
Master  of  foxhounds leads  the  field from Powderham Castle in Devon , England , with the  hounds  in front .
Fox hunting is an activity  involving  the tracking , chase , and sometimes  हत्या  of  a  fox , traditionally a red fox , by trained foxhounds or other scent hounds , and a group of unarmed followers  led  by a master of foxhounds ,  जो  follow the hounds on foot or on horseback .
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the United Kingdom in the  16th   सदी  , but is practised  सब   over  the world  ,  including in Australia , Canada , France , Ireland , Italy and the United States  .
In Australia , the term also refers to the hunting of foxes with firearms similar to spotlighting or deer  शिकार  .
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g. , deer  शिकार  with bow and arrow ) ; in Britain and Ireland , `` hunting '' without qualification implies fox hunting ( or other forms of hunting with hounds- beagling  ,  stag hunting , mink hunting , drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here .
The  खेल  is controversial , particularly in the UK , where  it  was banned in Scotland in 2002 , and in England and Wales  in  November 2004 ( law enforced from February 2005 )  ,  though shooting foxes  as   vermin  remained legal .
Proponents  of  fox  शिकार  view it as an important part of rural culture and useful for reasons of conservation and pest control , while opponents argue that it is cruel and  अनावश्यक  .
Tobacco advertising is  the  advertising of tobacco products or use ( typically cigarette smoking ) by the tobacco industry through a variety  of  media including  प्रायोजन   ,  particularly of sporting events .
It is  अभी  one of the most highly regulated forms of marketing .
Some  or  all forms of tobacco  विज्ञापन  are banned in many countries .
Bally Technologies , Inc. is a manufacturer of slot machines and other gaming technology based in Las Vegas , Nevada .
the  company was founded in 1968 as  उन्नत  Patent Technology .
It eventually changed its name to Alliance Gaming and acquired , in 1996 , Bally Gaming International , a former division of Bally Manufacturing .
In 2006  ,  the entire company adopted the Bally name ,  a  trademark that originated  in  1932  by  the Bally Manufacturing Corporation .
Gustave Doré  's   engravings  illustrated the Divine Comedy ( 1861–1868 ) ;  यहाँ  , Dante is lost  in  Canto 1 of  the  Inferno .
Inferno (  इतालवी  for  ``  Hell `` ) is the first part of Dante Alighieri  's  14th-century  एपिक  poem Divine Comedy .
It  is   followed  by Purgatorio and Paradiso .
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through Hell , guided by the  रोमन  poet Virgil .
In the  कविता   ,  Hell is depicted  as  nine  वृत्त  of suffering located within  the  Earth .
Allegorically  ,  the Divine Comedy represents the  यात्रा  of the soul towards God , with the Inferno  describing  the recognition and rejection of sin .
Smirnoff is a brand of vodka owned and produced by the British company Diageo .
The Smirnoff brand began  साथ  a vodka distillery founded in Moscow  by  Pyotr  arsenievich  Smirnov  (  1831–1898 ) .
It is now distributed in  130  countries .
It is produced in several countries including India , Ireland , Italy ,  the  United Kingdom and the United States .
Smirnoff products  शामिल  vodka , flavoured vodka ,  और  malt beverages .
In March 2006  ,  Diageo North America claimed that Smirnoff vodka was the  best-selling  distilled spirit  ब्रांड  in  the  world .
Big Brown ( foaled April 10 , 2005 in  केंटकी  ) is a retired champion American Thoroughbred racehorse and winner of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes .
Bred by Dr. Gary  B.  Knapp 's Monticule Farms in Lexington , Kentucky , he won his first five race  starts  .
He was sired by Grade III winner Boundary  ,  a son of North American Champion sire Danzig , a son  of  Northern Dancer .
Big Brown 's  बांध  was Mien ,  भी  a granddaughter of Northern Dancer through her sire , Nureyev .
The  serenity  Prayer is the common name  लिये   an  originally untitled  दुआ  by the American theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ) .
It  रै  been adopted by Alcoholics Anonymous and other twelve-step programs .
The best-known form is  :   परमेश्वर  , grant me the serenity to accept the things I can not change,
The courage to change the things I can,
And wisdom to know the difference .
The Declaration and Resolves of  the  First Continental  कॉंग्रेस  ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights , or the Declaration  of  Rights )  ,  was a statement adopted by the First Continental Congress on  अक्तूबर  14 , 1774 , in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the British Parliament  .
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable Acts , listed a colonial bill of rights , and provided a detailed list of grievances .
It was  समान  to the Declaration of Rights and Grievances , passed by the Stamp Act Congress a decade earlier .
The Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress  's  plans : to enter into a boycott of British  व्यापार  ( the Continental Association ) until their grievances were redressed  ,   to  publish addresses to the people of Great Britain and British  अमेरिका  ,  और  to send a petition to the King .
Pulse pressure  is  the pressure that is felt when feeling  the  pulse .
Measured in millimeters of mercury  (  mmHg ) ,  the   दबाव  difference between the systolic and diastolic pressures is the pressure change to create the pulse ,  जिससे  is the pulse pressure .
if  resting blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80  millimeters  of mercury (  mmhg  ) ,  पल्स   दबाव  is 40 .
The Hills is a reality television series  जिससे  originally aired on MTV from May 31 ,  2006   जबतक   जुलाई  13 , 2010 .
The show uses a  वास्तविकता  television format  ,  following the personal  जीवनदान  of several young adults  जीना   in  Los Angeles , California , but tends towards a narrative format more commonly found in scripted genres such  as  soap operas .
The series originally followed the personal life of former Laguna Beach star Lauren Conrad  और  her friends ' new lives in Los Angeles .
After five seasons , Conrad  बाएँ  the series and was replaced by  another  former  लगुना  Beach star , Kristin Cavallari  ,  beginning in the second half of the fifth season .
The series concluded  at   the  end of the sixth  ऋतु  .
Entertainment Weekly  क्रमित  The Hills 82nd on their list  of  `` The 100 Best Shows of the Last 25 Years , ''  stating  that the series was a `` New Classic . ''
एओएल  TV called it TV 's Biggest Guilty Pleasure  .
The series premiered in syndication in the fall of 2009 alongside Laguna Beach : The Real Orange County .
In poker ,  ख़राब  beat  is  a  subjective  term for a hand in which a player with what appear to be  दमदार  cards nevertheless loses  .
it  most often occurs where one player bets the clearly stronger hand and their opponent makes a poor call that eventually `` hits  ''  and wins .
There is no consensus among poker players as to what exactly  constitutes  a bad  ताल  and often players will disagree about whether a particular hand  थी  a bad beat .
The goldfish  (  Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater fish in the family Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes  .
It was one of the earliest fish  to  be domesticated , and is one of the most  commonly  kept aquarium fish .
A relatively  छोटी  member of  the  carp family ( which also includes the koi carp and the crucian carp ) , the goldfish is a domesticated version  of  a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia .
it  was first domesticated in China more than a thousand years ago  ,  and  अनेक  distinct breeds  have  since been developed .
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size ,  देह  shape  ,  fin configuration and coloration ( various combinations  of  white  ,  yellow , orange , red , brown , and black are known ) .
Uncooked Rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade  ,   एकवचन  : roulade ) is a German meat roulade usually consisting of  बेकन  , onions , mustard and pickles wrapped in  thinly  sliced beef which is then cooked .
In some countries , the roulade is  भी  known as `` beef  ज़ैतून  '' .
Beef or veal  is  used as meat  हालांकि  some food scholars tend to believe that the original version was probably venison or pork , and pork is still popular in some areas .
The beef rouladen  as  we know them today have become popular over the  पिछला  century .
The cut is usually topside beef or silverside since this is the cheaper cut .
The more expensive  संस्करण  would be the round steak , also known as rump steak .
The meat is cut into large , thin slices .
The filling is  a  mixture of smoked and cooked pork belly  ,  chopped onions and chopped pickles ( gurken ) which is at  टाइम्स  varied by adding minced meat , sausage  मांस  , pine nuts and mustard .
The mixture  varies  from region to region .
Rouladen  हैं  traditionally served  लिये  dinner .
Red wine is often served with this dish  .
Typical eukaryotic cell .
Cellular respiration is the set  of  the metabolic reactions and processes that take place in the cells of organisms to convert biochemical  उर्जा  from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP )  ,  and then release waste products .
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic reactions , which  ब्रेक  large molecules into smaller ones , releasing energy in the  प्रक्रम  as weak so-called `` high-energy  ''  bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products .
Respiration is one  of  the key ways a cell gains useful energy to fuel cellular activity .
Cellular respiration is  माना  an exothermic redox  प्रतिक्रिया  .
the  overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs  in  the  देह  , most of which are redox reactions themselves .
Although technically , cellular respiration is a combustion reaction , it clearly does not resemble one when it  occurs  in a living cell .
इस  difference is because it occurs in many separate steps .
While  the  overall reaction is a combustion reaction  ,  no single reaction that comprises it is a combustion reaction .
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration include sugar , amino acids  और  fatty acids  ,  and a  आम  oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ) .
The energy stored in ATP ( its third  फास्फेट  group is weakly bonded  to  the rest  of  the molecule and is  cheaply  broken  allowing  stronger bonds  to  form  ,  thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive processes requiring energy , including biosynthesis , locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes  .
Countries by 2011 GDP  (   नाममात्र  ) according to the CIA World Factbook .
This article includes a list of countries in the world sorted by their gross domestic product  (  GDP ) , the market value of all final goods and  सेवाएं  from a nation in a given year .
The GDP dollar estimates presented here are calculated at market or government official exchange rates .
Several  economies  which are not considered to be  देशों   (  world , the EU , and some dependent territories ) are included  in   the  lists because they appear in the sources .
These economies  हैं  not ranked in the charts here ,  लकिन  are listed where applicable .
The figures presented here do not take into account  मतभेद  in the cost of living in different countries , and the results can vary greatly from one year to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency .
Such  fluctuations   may  change a country 's ranking from one year to the next , even  हालांकि  they often make little or no difference to the standard of living of its population .
Therefore these figures should be used with caution .
Some countries/regions may have citizens which are on average wealthy .
These countries/regions could appear in this list as having a small GDP .
This would be because the country/region listed has a small population , and therefore small total economy ; the GDP is calculated as the population times the wealth per capita .
Comparisons of national wealth are also frequently  बना   on  the basis of purchasing power parity ( PPP  )  , to adjust for differences in the cost of living in different  देशों  .
(  See List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) )
ppp  largely removes the exchange  रेट  problem  ,  but has its own  कमियां  ; it does not reflect the value of economic output in international trade , and it also requires  अधिक   estimation  than nominal  जीडीपी   .
On the whole , PPP per capita figures are more narrowly spread than nominal GDP per capita  आंकड़े  .
The first  सूची  includes data compiled by the United Nations Statistics Division for 2011 .
The second list largely includes data ( estimate ) compiled by the International Monetary Fund for 2012 .
The third list shows the World Bank 's mostly 2011 estimates , and the fourth  सूची  includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook .
Lapping is a machining process , in which two surfaces are rubbed together with  an  abrasive  between  them , by hand movement or by way of a machine .
This can take two forms .
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ) , typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a surface such as iron or glass  itself  (  भी  known as the `` lap '' or grinding tool )  साथ  an abrasive  ऐसे  as aluminum oxide , jeweller  's  rouge , optician 's rouge , emery , silicon carbide , diamond , etc. , in  between  them .
This produces microscopic  conchoidal  fractures as the abrasive rolls about between the two surfaces and removes material from both .
The other form of lapping involves a softer material such as pitch or a ceramic for the lap , which is `` charged ''  साथ  the abrasive .
The  गोद   is  then used to cut a harder material—the workpiece .
The abrasive embeds within the  softer  material which holds it and  permits  it to score  आरपार  and cut the harder material .
Taken to a finer limit , this will produce a polished surface such as with a polishing cloth on an automobile , or a polishing cloth or polishing pitch upon glass or steel  .
लिया  to the ultimate limit , with the aid of  सटीक  interferometry and  specialized  polishing machines or  skilled  hand polishing , lensmakers can  उपज  surfaces that are flat to  बेहतर  than 30 nanometers .
इस  is  एक   बीसवीं  of the wavelength of light from the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light  सोर्स  .
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing them together under  the  right conditions .
(  This is not the  वही  as the wringing effect of Johansson blocks ,  हालांकि  it is similar ) .
The term `` America 's Team ''  is  a popular nickname in the  संयुक्त  States that  refers  to the Dallas Cowboys in the National Football  लीग   .
The  उपनाम  originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film , where the narrator opens  साथ  the  following  introduction : The term is recognized and  प्रायः  used by media outlets , including ESPN , Yahoo ! , HBO Sports , and Sports Illustrated .
My Babysitter 's a  पिशाच  ( French : Ma gardienne est un vampire ) is a 2011 Canadian television series ,  आधारित  on the television  फिल्मी  of the same name .
In Canada  ,  the series premiered in French on  télétoon   on   फ़रवरी  28 , 2011 , in English on Teletoon on March 14 , 2011 , and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27 , 2011 .
The show was created by Fresh  tv  , creators of 6teen and Total Drama .
The  दिखाएँ  follows Ethan Morgan ( Matthew Knight ) , who , in  the  television  फिल्मी  , learns that his babysitter  सारा  ( Vanessa Morgan ) is  a  vampire .
In the film ,  he  learns he is able to have visions and his best friend Benny  वीयर  ( Atticus Mitchell  )  is a spellmaster .
The  श्रेणी  follows the three as they take on supernatural forces and have adventures , with occasional help  इससे  fellow vampires Rory ( Cameron Kennedy ) and Erica ( Kate Todd ) , while dealing with the  परेशानियों   of  regular high school  जीवन  .
A second  ऋतु  was confirmed to start production in September 2011 and  it  first premiered on Disney Channel on  जून  29 , 2012 ,  it  premiered on Teletoon September 6 , 2012 .
Télétoon started  featuring  season 2 sneak-peak episodes on October 28 , 2012 and premiered it on January 10 , 2013
Dodge B Series utility  circa  1950 , driven by Albert Namatjira
A pickup truck or pick-up , often simply referred to as a pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed  )  .
In North America , the  पद   पिकअप  is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built , integrated bed ,  as  well as for coupé utility vehicles , often  आधारित  on a personal car chassis , but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such  उपयोग  .
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup , such as ute in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand , or bakkie in South Africa .
Large pickup  ट्रक  are  somewhat  rare in Europe , where vans  और  light lorries are commonly used for similar  भूमिकाएँ  .
The President of  the  United  राज्य  of America ( POTUS ) is the head of state and head of  सरकारी  of the United States .
The president leads the executive branch of the federal  सरकारी  and  is  the  commander-in-chief  of the United States Armed Forces .
Article II of  the  U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the  निष्पादन  of federal law , alongside the  जिम्मेदारी  of appointing federal  कार्यपालिका  , diplomatic  ,  regulatory  ,   और  judicial officers , and concluding treaties with foreign powers , with the  सलाह  and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves , and to convene and adjourn either or both houses  of  Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power  of  the president and the federal government  have  grown substantially and each modern president  ,  despite possessing no formal legislative  शक्तियां  beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills , is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party  और  the  विदेशी  and domestic policy of the United States .
The president is frequently described as the most powerful person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term , and is one of only two nationally elected federal officers , the other being the Vice President of the United States  .
The Twenty-second Amendment , adopted in 1951 , prohibits anyone from ever being elected  to  the presidency for a third full term .
It also prohibits a person from being elected  to  the presidency more than once if that person previously had served as president ,  or  acting  अध्यक्ष  , for more than two years  of   another  person  's   पद  as president .
In all , 43 individuals have served 55 four-year terms .
On January 20 , 2009 , Barack Obama became the  44th  and  वर्तमान  president .
On November 6 , 2012 , he  थी  re-elected and is scheduled to  serve  until January  20  , 2017 .
Bottled  खनिज  water
Bottled  जल   is  drinking water ( e.g. , well water , distilled water ,  खनिज  water  ,   or  spring  जल  ) packaged in plastic or glass water bottles .
Bottled water may be carbonated or not .
Sizes range  इससे  small  सिंगल  serving bottles to  विशाल  carboys for water  coolers  .
Map of the major rivers , lakes , and reservoirs in India
मैप  showing rivers and  बाढ़  prone  क्षेत्रों  in  इण्डिया
Rivers of India play an important role in  the  lives of the  भारतीय  people .
The river systems provide irrigation , potable water , cheap transportation , electricity , and the livelihoods for a large number of people all over the country and to rural areas  .
This easily explains why nearly all the major cities  of  India are located by the  बैंको  of  नदियाँ  .
The rivers also have an important role in Hindu mythology and are  माना  holy  by  all Hindus in the country .
Seven major rivers along with  उनके  numerous tributaries  मेक  up the river  प्रणाली  of India .
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the  खाड़ी  of Bengal ; however , some  of  the rivers whose courses take them through the western part of the  देश  and towards the east of the state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea .
Parts of Ladakh ,  उत्तरी  parts of the Aravlli range and the arid parts  of  the Thar Desert have inland drainage .
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the  पाठ्यक्रम   of  the rivers of India along with their tributaries and  शाखाओं  in  1810-11  AD and presented  a  minute account of  it  .
the  shifting of the courses and bed over the centuries  is  very remarkable .
Many of the channels mentioned in that survey have now become dead , dried or even extinct .
सब  major rivers of India originate from  एक  of the three main watersheds :
The Himalaya and the Karakoram  सीमाएँ
Vindhya and Satpura  सीमाएँ  and Chotanagpur  पठार  in central India
Sahyadri or Western  ghats  in western India
The Bretton Woods system of monetary  प्रबन्धन   स्थापित  the rules for commercial and financial relations among the world 's  प्रमुख  industrial states in  the   mid-20th  century  .
the  Bretton Woods  प्रणाली  was the  पहला  example of a fully negotiated monetary order intended to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states .
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II was still raging , 730 delegates from all 44 Allied nations gathered at the Mount Washington Hotel in Bretton Woods , New Hampshire , United States , for the United Nations Monetary and Financial Conference .
The delegates deliberated during 1–22  जुलाई  1944 , and signed the  अनुबंध  on its final day .
Setting up a  प्रणाली  of rules , institutions , and procedures to regulate the international monetary system , the planners at Bretton  वुड्स   स्थापित  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Monetary Fund ( IMF  )  and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development ( IBRD ) , which today  is  part of the  संसार  Bank Group .
These organizations  became  operational in 1945 after a sufficient number of  देशों  had ratified the agreement .
The chief features of the Bretton Woods system were an obligation for  प्रत्येक  country to adopt a  मौद्रिक  policy that maintained the exchange rate by tying its currency to the  u.S.  dollar and the ability  of  the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments .
On 15 August 1971 , the United States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the US $ to gold .
This brought the Bretton  वुड्स  system to an end  और  saw the dollar become  fiat  currency .
This action , referred to as the Nixon  शॉक  , created the situation in which the United States dollar became  a   आरक्षित   करेंसी  used by many states .
At the same time , many fixed currencies ( such as GBP , for example ) , also became free  फ्लोटिंग  .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian company  कि  designs and manufactures motorcycles .
Headquartered in Bologna , Italy , Ducati is owned by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini .
A credit score is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis of a person 's credit files ,  to  represent the creditworthiness  of  that person .
A credit score is primarily based on credit  रपट  information typically sourced from credit bureaus .
Lenders , such as banks and credit card  कंपनियाँ  , use credit scores to evaluate the potential risk posed  by  lending money to consumers and to mitigate losses due to bad debt .
Lenders use credit scores to determine who qualifies for  a  loan , at what interest rate ,  और  what credit limits .
Lenders also use credit scores to determine which customers are likely  to   लाओ  in the most revenue .
The use of credit  or  identity scoring  prior  to authorizing access or granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system .
Credit scoring is not limited to banks .
Other organizations , such  as  mobile phone companies , insurance  कंपनियाँ  ,  जमींदार  , and government departments employ the same techniques  .
क्रेडिट  scoring also has a lot of overlap with data mining , which uses many similar techniques .
These techniques  combine  thousands of factors but they are more or less similar or the same .
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of their definitions : for  उदाहरण  , to extract the definition of the metre from  the  speed of  लाइट  ,  the  definition of  the  second must be known while  the  ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length , mass and time .
The International System of Units ( SI ) defines  सात  units of measure as a basic set from which all other  si  units are derived .
These SI base units and their  शारीरिक  quantities are:
metre for length ( US English : meter )
kilogram for  द्रव्यमान  ( note : not  the  gram )
second for time
ampere for electric current
kelvin  लिये  temperature
candela  for luminous intensity
mole  लिये  the amount of substance .
the  SI base quantities form a set of mutually independent dimensions as required  by  dimensional analysis commonly employed in science and technology .
However , in a given realization of these units they may well be interdependent , i.e  .  defined in terms of  प्रत्येक   अन्य  .
The names of SI units are written in lowercase characters ( the 'degree Celsius ' meets this  नियम  ,  as  'degree ' is the unit , and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ) .
The symbols of units are written in lowercase ( e.g  .  metre has the symbol m ) , except that symbols for  इकाई  named  बाद  persons are written with an initial capital letter ( e.g. , the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ) .
Many other units , such as  the  litre ( US English : liter ) , are formally not part of the SI , but are accepted for use with SI .
Monument Canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The Monument  )  is a part of  the  National Park Service near the  नगर  of Grand Junction ,  कोलोराडो  .
Spectacular canyons cut deep into sandstone and even  granite–gneiss–schist  rock formations , in some areas .
This is an  क्षेत्रफल  of desert land high on the Colorado Plateau , with pinion and  juniper  forests on the plateau .
The park hosts a wide range of wildlife , including red-tailed hawks and golden eagles , ravens  ,   jays  , desert bighorn sheep , and coyotes .
Activities include hiking ,  horseback  riding , road bicycling , and scenic drives ; a  आगंतुक  center on the west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop .
वहीँ  are magnificent views from trails  और  the Rim  चट्टान  Drive , which winds along the plateau .
Nearby are the Book Cliffs , and the largest flat-topped mountain in the world , the Grand Mesa .
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon , which runs the width of the park , and includes rock formations  ऐसे  as  स्वतंत्रता  Monument , the Kissing  युगल  , and Coke Ovens .
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square miles )  ,  much of which  रै  been recommended to Congress for designation as wilderness .
left to right : Utility Uniform , Blue Dress Uniform , Service Uniform , and Evening Dress uniforms
The Uniforms of  the  United States Marine Corps serve to distinguish Marines from members of other services .
Among current uniforms in the United States Armed Forces ,  the  Marines ' uniforms have been in service the longest .
The Marine Dress Blue uniform  रै  , with  few  changes , been worn in essentially its current form since the 19th century .
North American telephone area codes 419  और  567 serve the northwest  quadrant  of the U.S. state of Ohio .
The largest city served by these area codes is Toledo ( and its suburbs of Holland  ,  Maumee , Northwood , Oregon , Ottawa Hills , Perrysburg , Rossford , Sylvania , Swanton , Waterville , and Whitehouse ) .
Other cities served by these  क्षेत्रफल  codes include Ada  ,  Ashland , Bellevue , Bluffton , Bowling Green , Bryan  ,  Bucyrus , Celina  ,  Clyde , Crestline , Defiance , Delphos , Edison , Erastus , Findlay , Fostoria , Fremont ,  galion  ,  kenton  , Lima , Mansfield , Mount Gilead , Napoleon , Norwalk , Oak Harbor , Port Clinton ,  sandusky  , Shelby , St. Marys  ,  Tiffin , Upper Sandusky , Van Wert , Wapakoneta ,  wauseon  , Willard .
Other areas served include the Lake Erie Islands north  of  Port Clinton and west of Sandusky .
the  main area code , 419 , was created as one of the original  क्षेत्रफल  codes in October 1947 ; the overlay area code 567 was created on  जनवरी  1 ,  2002  .
Despite the presence of Toledo , the state  's  fourth-largest city , 419 was the  पिछला   of  Ohio 's original four area codes to have been split or overlaid .
मिकी  Leroy Gilley ( born March 9 , 1936 ) is an American country music singer  और  musician  .
Although he started out singing straight-up country and western material in  the  1970s , he moved  towards  a more pop  -friendly  sound in the 1980s , bringing him further success on not just the country charts , but the  पॉप  charts as well .
Among his biggest hits are `` Room Full of Roses  ,  '' `` Do n't  the  Girls All Get Prettier at Closing Time , '' and the remake of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me `` .
He is also the cousin of Jerry Lee Lewis  ,  Carl  mcvoy  , Jim Gilley and Jimmy Swaggart .
According to the Federal Aviation Administration ,  gilley   is  a licensed pilot  ,  who holds an instrument rating with commercial pilot privileges for multi-engine  airplanes  , as well as private  पायलट  privileges for single engine aircraft .
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11 ,  सितंबर  11th , or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in  नई  York City and the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners were  hijacked  by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into buildings  in  suicide attacks .
Two of  those  planes , American Airlines Flight 11 and  संयुक्त  Airlines Flight 175 , were crashed  into  the North and South towers , respectively , of the World Trade  बीच  complex  in  New York City  .
Within  दो  hours , both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or complete  पतन  of all other buildings in the WTC complex , as well as major damage to ten other large surrounding structures .
A third plane , American Airlines Flight 77 ,  थी  crashed into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the United  राज्य  Department of  रक्षा  ) , leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United Airlines Flight  93  , was targeted at the United States Capitol in Washington , D.C. , but crashed into a field near Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its passengers tried to overcome the  hijackers   .
In  कुल  , almost 3,000  लोगों  died in the attacks , including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes  .
Suspicion quickly fell on al-Qaeda .
Although the group 's leader , Osama bin  लादेन  , initially denied any involvement , in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks .
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S.  support  of Israel , the presence of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia , and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks .
The United States responded  to  the attacks by  शुभारंभ  the War on Terror and invading Afghanistan to depose  the  Taliban  ,  which had harbored  al-qaeda  .
Many countries  strengthened  their anti-terrorism  विधान  and expanded law enforcement powers  .
Having evaded capture for years , bin Laden  थी  located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011 .
The destruction of the Twin Towers and other properties caused serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets .
Cleanup of the  संसार  Trade Center site was completed in May 2002 , and the  प्रस्तुतीकरण   थी  repaired within a year .
Numerous memorials have been constructed , including the National September 11 Memorial & Museum  in  New  यॉर्क  , the Pentagon Memorial , and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania .
After a lengthy delay , the One World Trade  बीच  is expected to be completed at Ground Zero in  नई  York City in 2013 .
Finding Nemo is a 2003 American computer-animated comedy-drama adventure film written  और  directed by Andrew Stanton , released by  वॉल्ट   डिज़्नी   तस्वीरें  , and the fifth film  उत्पादित   by  Pixar Animation Studios .
It  tells  the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who , along with  a   राजसी  tang named Dory  (  Ellen DeGeneres ) , searches for his abducted  बेटे  Nemo ( Alexander Gould )  सब  the way to  सिडनी  Harbour .
साथ  the way , Marlin learns to take  risks  and let Nemo take care of himself .
It is Pixar 's first film  to  be released in cinemas in the northern hemisphere summer .
The film was re-released for the first time in 3D on September 14 , 2012 ,  और  it was released on Blu-ray on December 4 , 2012 .
A sequel , Finding Dory , is currently in development , set to be  released  on November 25 , 2015 .
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature , and was nominated in three more categories including Best Original Screenplay .
It was  the  second  highest-grossing  film of 2003 , earning a total of $ 921 million worldwide .
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time , with over 40 million  नक़ल  sold as of  2006  , and was the highest-grossing G-rated  फिल्मी  of all time  पहले  Pixar 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it .
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing film  of  all time , as well as the 3rd highest-grossing animated film .
In 2008 , the American Film Institute named it the tenth greatest  एनिमेटेड  film  कभी  made  दौरान  their Top 10 .
The sixth season of  अमेरिका  's Best Dance Crew , also known as America 's Best Dance Crew : Season of the Superstars , premiered on April 7 , 2011 and concluded on June 5  ,  2011 .
Auditions were held in four cities from January 21  through   फ़रवरी  5  :  Chicago , Houston , New York ,  और  Los Angeles .
इस  season takes  a  different route from past seasons .
The crews must perform to the music of one specific artist each week , including Rihanna , Lil Wayne , and other popular stars .
This season also features  खास   अतिथि  appearances by various music  हस्तियाँ  including Justin Bieber , The Black Eyed Peas , Katy Perry ,  kesha  , Nicki  minaj  , and Kanye West .
Dominic `` D-Trix '' Sandoval , a former member of Quest Crew , the winner of the third season of America 's Best Dance Crew , joins returning judges Lil Mama and  jc  Chasez as the newest judge .

In the United  राज्य  , Social Security refers to the Old-Age , Survivors  ,  and Disability  बीमे  ( OASDI ) federal program .
The original Social Security Act ( 1935 ) and the current version of the Act , as amended , encompass several social welfare and social insurance programs .
Social Security is primarily funded through dedicated payroll taxes called Federal Insurance  योगदान  Act tax ( FICA ) .
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal  old-age  and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund  ,  the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund , the Federal  हॉस्पिटल  Insurance Trust Fund , or the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund  जिससे  comprise the Social Security Trust Fund .
Upward redistribution of income is responsible for about 43 % of the projected Social Security shortfall over the next 75  सालो  .
According to economist Martin Feldstein , the combined spending for all social insurance programs in 2003 constituted 37 % of government expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic product .
Social Security is currently estimated to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or older out of poverty .
The Social Security Administration is headquartered  in   woodlawn  , Maryland , just west  of  Baltimore .
The alcohol by volume shown on  a  bottle of absinthe .
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV ,  abv  , or  alc/vol   )  is a  मानक  measure of how much alcohol ( ethanol ) is contained in  an  alcoholic beverage ( expressed as  a  percentage of total volume ) .
the  ABV standard  is  used worldwide .
In some countries ,  दारू  by volume is referred to as degrees  gay-lussac  ( after the French chemist Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac ) .
Laurel Hollow  is  a village in the Town of Oyster Bay  in  Nassau County , New York in  the  United States .
The population was 1,952 at the 2010 census  .
Charles John Huffam Dickens  (  ; 7 February 1812 – 9 June 1870 ) was an English writer and social critic .
He created some of the world 's most memorable fictional characters and is generally  regarded  as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period .
During his life , his works enjoyed unprecedented fame  ,   और  by  the  twentieth century his literary genius was broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars .
His novels and short stories continue to be  widely  popular .
Born in Portsmouth , England , Dickens left  स्कूल  to  कार्य  in a factory after his father was thrown into debtors  '  prison .
Although he had  छोटी  formal education , his early impoverishment  drove  him to succeed .
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years , wrote 15 novels  ,   5  novellas  और  hundreds of short stories and non-fiction articles , lectured and performed extensively  ,  was an  indefatigable  letter writer ,  और  campaigned vigorously for children 's rights , education , and  अन्य  social  reforms  .
Dickens sprang  to  fame with the 1836 serial publication of The Pickwick Papers .
Within a  few   सालो  he had become  an  international  साहित्यिक  celebrity , famous for his humour ,  व्यंग्य  , and keen observation of  अक्षर  and society .
His novels , most published in monthly or weekly instalments , pioneered the serial publication of  कथा  fiction , which became the dominant Victorian mode for novel  प्रकाशन  .
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's reaction , and he often modified his plot and character development based on such feedback .
For example , when his  बीवी  's chiropodist expressed  तकलीफ  at the way Miss Mowcher in David Copperfield seemed to reflect her disabilities , Dickens went  on  to improve the  अक्षर  with positive lineaments .
Fagin  in  Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; His caricature of  leigh  Hunt in  the  figure of Mr  skimpole  in Bleak House was likewise  toned  down on advice from some of his friends  ,   as  they read episodes .
in   the  same novel , both Lawrence Boythorne and Mooney the beadle are  drawn  from real life – Boythorne from Walter  जंगली   landor  and Mooney from 'Looney ' , a beadle at Salisbury Square .
His plots were carefully constructed , and Dickens  प्रायः  wove in elements from topical events into his narratives .
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to  have  each new monthly episode  पढ़ा  to them , opening up  और  inspiring a new class of readers .
Dickens was regarded as the literary colossus of his  आयु  .
His 1843 novella , A Christmas Carol , is  एक  of the most influential works ever written , and it remains  लोकप्रिय  and continues to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre .
His creative genius has  महरूम  praised by fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell —for its realism , comedy  ,  prose style , unique characterisations ,  और  social criticism .
On the other hand Oscar Wilde , Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a lack of psychological depth , loose writing  ,  and a  रग  of saccharine sentimentalism .
Martin Luther King and other civil rights leaders  in  front  of  the statue of Abraham Lincoln , August 28 , 1963
The civil rights  गति  was a series of worldwide political movements for  समता  before the law that peaked in the 1960s .
In many situations it took the form of campaigns of civil resistance aimed at achieving change  by  nonviolent forms  of  resistance .
in  some situations it was accompanied , or followed , by  सिविल  unrest  और  armed rebellion .
The process was long and tenuous in  अनेक   देशों  , and many of these movements  किया  not fully achieve their goals although , the  प्रयत्न  of these movements  किया  lead to improvements in the legal rights of previously oppressed groups of people .
The  प्रमुख  aim of the civil rights movement included  ,  and include , ensuring that  the  rights of all people are equally protected by the law , including the rights of minorities .
Civil rights movements ranging from the global LGBT  अधिकारों  movement to the  वैश्विक  Women  's  rights movement  to  various racial minority rights movements around the world continue .
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup , the world championship for men 's national  संघ  football teams .
it  took place in  दक्षिण  Africa from 11  जून  to 11 July 2010 .
the  bidding  प्रक्रम  for hosting the tournament finals was open only to  अफ़्रीकी  nations ; in 2004 , the international football federation , FIFA , selected South Africa over Egypt and  मोरक्को  to become the first African nation to host  the  finals .
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the country , with the  फाइनल  played at the Soccer City stadium in South Africa 's largest city , Johannesburg .
thirty-two  teams  यहूद  selected for participation via a worldwide qualification tournament that began in August 2007 .
In the first round of the tournament finals , the teams competed in round-robin  समूह  of four teams for points , with the top two teams in each  समूह  proceeding .
ये  sixteen teams advanced to the knockout  स्टेज  , where three rounds of play decided which teams would participate in the  फाइनल  .
In the final , Spain ,  the  European champions , defeated third-time  finalists  the Netherlands 1–0 after extra time , with  आन्द्रेस  Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain their first world title , becoming the eighth nation  to  win the tournament , and the first European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent .
Host  स्वदेश  South Africa , 2006 world champions Italy and 2006 runners-up France were all eliminated in  the  first  गोलाकार  of the tournament .
It  थी  the first  समय   कि  the hosts were eliminated in  the  first  गोलाकार  .
नई   जीलैंड  with their three draws were the only undefeated team in the tournament , but were also eliminated in the  पहला   गोलाकार  .
The  mcmuffin  is a  परिवार  of breakfast  सैंडविच  in various sizes and configurations , sold by the  fast-food  restaurant chain McDonald 's .
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast  सैंडविच  ; it  थी  invented  by  the late McDonald 's franchisee Herb  पीटरसन  in the late 1960s and was introduced nationwide  in  1972 .
John Lennon was an English musician  जो  gained worldwide fame as one of the founders of The Beatles , for  उसके   subsequent  solo career , and for his political activism and pacifism  .
He was shot by Mark  दाउद  Chapman at the entrance of the building where he lived , The Dakota , in New York City on 8 December 1980  .
लेनन  had just  लौटे  from Record Plant Studio with his wife , Yoko Ono .
Lennon was  सुनाया  dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt  हॉस्पिटल  Center , where it was stated that  nobody   could  have lived for more than a few minutes after sustaining such injuries .
Shortly after local news  स्टेशन  reported Lennon  's  death , crowds gathered at Roosevelt  हॉस्पिटल   और  in front of the Dakota .
Lennon was cremated on 10 December  1980  at the Ferncliff Cemetery in Hartsdale , New York ;  the  ashes were  दिए  to Ono  ,  who chose not to hold a  अंत्येष्टि   लिये  him .
The first report of Lennon 's death to a  u.S.  national audience was  घोषित  by Howard Cosell ,  on   एबीसी  's Monday Night Football  .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major United States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana .
The population of the city was  343,829  as of the 2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New  orleans–metairie–kenner  Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the  46th  largest in the United States .
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  , a larger trading area , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans , a city located on the Loire River in Centre , France , and is well known  लिये  its distinct French Creole architecture , as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage  .
New Orleans is also famous for  इसके  cuisine , music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz ) ,  और   इसके   सालाना  celebrations and festivals , most notably  mardi  Gras .
The city is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in America  .
New Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana , straddling the  मिसिसिपी  River .
The city and Orleans Parish ( ) are .
The city  और  parish are bounded by the  parishes  of St.  tammany  to the north ,  st.  Bernard to the east , Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain , part of which is included in the city limits , lies to the north and Lake Borgne lies to the east .
The United States presidential election of 1968  थी   the  46th quadrennial presidential election ,  आयोजित  on Tuesday , November 5 , 1968 .
The Republican nominee , former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the election over the  लोकतांत्रिक  nominee , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a campaign that  promised  to restore  विधि  and order to the nation 's cities , torn  by  riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the New Deal  गठबन्धन  that had dominated presidential politics  लिये  36  सालो  .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide , the  चुनाव  saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican  निर्वाचित  for  the  first time in twelve years .
It was a wrenching national experience , conducted during a year of violence that included the  हत्या  of civil  अधिकारों  leader Martin Luther King ,  jr.  , and subsequent race riots across  the  nation , the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy , widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses , and violent confrontations between  पुलिस  and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National  सम्मेलन  as the Democratic party split again and again .
the  election featured the strongest third party effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor  जार्ज  Wallace  ,   a  Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in  the  South to  समाप्त  school segregation , he  carried  the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the  उत्तर  .
This  थी  the last  चुनाव  in which New York had the  सबसे  votes in  the  electoral college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  gained the most electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since then .
This is  the  latest election  जहाँ  a presidential ticket won without  carrying  the vice presidential candidate 's home state .
Karak ( ; also known as Garak , Garrak , and Gorg ) is a village in Gamasiyab Rural District , in the Central District of Nahavand County , Hamadan Province , Iran .
At the 2006 census , its population was 294 , in 65 families .
Kurt 's signature
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994  )  was an American musician and artist , best known as the lead singer , guitarist  और  primary songwriter of the grunge  बैंड  Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in  1985  and established it as part of the Seattle music scene , having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record  लेबल  Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like  टीन  Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ) .
Following  the   कामयाबी  of Nevermind , Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X , and Cobain hailed as  ``  the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was  प्रायः  uncomfortable  और  frustrated , believing his message  और  artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public , with his personal issues often subject  to  media attention .
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years of his life , Cobain struggled with heroin addiction , illness and depression .
He also had difficulty coping  साथ  his fame and public image , and  the   पेशेवर  and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his wife , musician Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was found dead  at  his home in Seattle , the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
the  circumstances of  उसके  death at age 27 have become  a  topic of public fascination and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana  ,  with Cobain as a  songwriter  , has sold over 25 million albums in the  u.S.  ,  और  over 50 million  विश्वव्यापी  .
A millwright is a craftsman or tradesman engaged with the construction and maintenance of machinery .
More generally in the  अंग्रेज़ी   बोलना  world  ,  early millwrights were specialist carpenters who erected machines used in agriculture , food processing and processing lumber and paper .
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution , their skills were pressed into service building  the  earliest powered textile mills .
Modern millwrights work with steel  और  other materials in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of  अनेक  skilled trades in  अनुक्रम  to successfully fabricate  औद्योगिक  machinery  or  to  इकट्ठे  machines from pre-fabricated parts .
The modern millwright must also be able to read blueprints  और  other schematics  to  aid him in the construction of complex systems .
Millwrights  हैं  frequently unionized  ,  with around  45  % unionized in the US , although experienced millwrights often set themselves up as independent contractors .
The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 American  रोमांटिक  action thriller film loosely  आधारित  on the Philip K. Dick short story  ,  `` Adjustment Team `` .
The film was written and directed by George Nolfi and stars Matt Damon  और  Emily Blunt .
The cast also includes Anthony Mackie , John Slattery , Michael Kelly , and Terence Stamp .
The score was composed  by  Thomas Newman , with two songs by Richard Ashcroft ( `` Future 's Bright  ''  for the opening sequence ;  ``  Are You Ready ? '' for the closing credits ) .
Sodium azide is the inorganic compound  साथ  the formula NaN3 .
This colorless salt is the gas-forming component in many  car  airbag systems .
It is used for the preparation of other azide compounds .
It is an ionic substance , is highly  घुलनशील  in water ,  और  is very acutely toxic .
Double rainbow and  supernumerary  rainbows on the inside of the primary arc .
The shadow of the  फ़ोटोग्राफ़र  's head on the bottom marks the centre of the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ) .
A rainbow is an optical  और  meteorological phenomenon  कि  is  caused  by reflection of  लाइट  in water droplets in the Earth  's  atmosphere , resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky .
It takes the form of a multicoloured arc .
Rainbows caused by sunlight always  appear  in the  खण्ड  of sky  सीधे  opposite the sun .
In  a  `` primary rainbow '' , the arc shows red on the outer part and  बैंगनी  on the inner side .
This rainbow is caused by  लाइट  being refracted while  प्रवेश  a droplet of water , then reflected inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it .
In a double rainbow  ,  a second arc is seen outside  the  primary arc , and has the order of its colours  reversed  , red facing toward the other one , in both rainbows  .
इस  second rainbow is caused by light reflecting twice inside water droplets .
The Conservative  पार्टी  , officially the Conservative and Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory  पार्टी  or the Tories , is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and  अंग्रेजों  unionism .
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom , being the largest single party in the House of Commons with 303 MPs , the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors ,  और  the largest  अंग्रेजों  party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs .
it  governs in  गठबन्धन  with the  उदार  Democrats , with  पार्टी  leader David Cameron as Prime Minister .
The Conservative Party was founded in 1834 , and was one of two dominant parties in the 19th  सदी  , along with the Liberal Party .
It changed its name to the Conservative and Unionist Party in 1912 after merging with the Liberal Unionist Party , although that name is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply  the  Conservative Party .
In the 1920s , the Liberal vote greatly diminished  और   the  Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main  विरोधियों  .
Conservative  प्रधान  Ministers led governments  लिये  57 years of the 20th century , including Winston Churchill ( 1940–45 , 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 )  .
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and saw the  conservatives  become the  सबसे  eurosceptic of the three major parties  .
The party was returned  to  government in coalition , having failed  to   जीत  a majority ,  in  2010 under the more `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron .
in  the European Parliament , the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs , who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and Reformists (  ecr  ) parliamentary  समूह  , while the party itself is a member of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists  (   aecr  ) Europarty .
They are the third-largest party in the Scottish Parliament and second-largest in the Welsh Assembly .
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as part  of  the  ulster  Conservatives and Unionists arrangement  ,  with the UUP currently  participating  in the  five-party  Northern Ireland Executive  .
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose  फाइनल  , and perhaps most recognizable , line-up comprised Beyoncé Knowles , Kelly Rowland and  मिशेल  Williams .
Formed in 1990 in  ह्यूस्टन  , Texas , Destiny 's Child members began their musical endeavors as Girl 's Tyme comprising ,  among  others , Knowles , Rowland , LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett .
After years of limited success , they were signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child .
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition following the release of their best-selling second  एल्बम  , The Writing 's on the  वॉल  , which contained the number-one singles `` Bills  ,  Bills , Bills `` and  ``  Say My Name `` .
Despite  नाजुक  and commercial success , the group was plagued by  आतंरिक  conflict and legal turmoil , as Roberson and Luckett attempted to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles , citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland , his daughter and niece , respectively .
Both  roberson   और  Luckett were soon replaced with Williams and  farrah  Franklin ; however , in 2000 , Franklin was  बर्खास्त  , leaving  उन्हें  as a trio .
Their third album , Survivor , which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience , contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women `` , `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious `` .
In 2002 , they announced a hiatus  और  re-united two years later for the release of their fourth studio  एल्बम  , Destiny  fulfilled  ( 2004 )  .
Destiny  's  Child has sold more than 50 million records worldwide to date  .
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the greatest musical trios of all time , the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s , and placed the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008 .
the  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a  संयुक्त  States  संघीय  agency under the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills , unincorporated DeKalb County , Georgia , in Greater Atlanta .
It works to protect public health and  सुरक्षा  by providing information to enhance health decisions , and it promotes health  through  partnerships with state health departments and other organizations .
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control (  विशेषकर  infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens  और  other  सूक्ष्मजैविक  infections ) , environmental health , occupational  सुरक्षा  and health , health  प्रमोशन  , injury prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the  संयुक्त  States .
The CDC is the United States ' national public health institute and is a founding member of the International Association of National  पब्लिक  Health  संस्थान  .
Earthquake prediction ``  is  usually defined as the specification of  the  time , location , and magnitude of a future earthquake within stated limits '' , and  विशेषकर  of `` the next  दमदार  earthquake to occur in a region . ''
This can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting  ,  which  is  the probabilistic  मूल्यांकन  of general earthquake hazard , including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes , in  a  given area over periods of years or decades .
This can be further distinguished from real-time earthquake warning systems , which , upon detection of  a  severe earthquake , can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially  significant  shaking .
To be useful , an earthquake prediction must be precise enough to warrant the cost  of  increased  एहतियात  , including disruption  of   ordinary   क्रियाएँ  and commerce  ,  and timely enough that preparation can be made .
Predictions  जरूर  also be reliable , as false alarms and cancelled alarms are not only  economically  costly ,  लकिन   seriously  undermine confidence in , and thereby the effectiveness of ,  कोई  kind  of  warning .
With  over  7,000  भूकंप  around the world each year with a magnitude of 4.0 or greater , trivial success in earthquake prediction is  easily  obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of time , location , or magnitude .
However , such trivial `` successful predictions '' are not useful  .
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were predicted , or  at  least anticipated , but  no  claim of a successful prediction of a  प्रमुख  earthquake has survived close inquiry .
In the 1970s there  थी  intense  आशावाद   amongst  scientists that  कुछ  method of predicting earthquakes  might  be found , but by the 1990s  continuing  failure led many scientists to question whether it was even  संभावित  .
While many scientists still hold that , given enough resources  ,  prediction might be possible , many others maintain  कि  earthquake prediction is inherently  नामुमकिन  .
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13  ,  1993  )  is an American actress , singer , musician , songwriter and record producer .
रयान  is best known for starring as Bailey Pickett  in   the  Disney Channel Original Series  the   सुइट   जीवन  on Deck .
In 2008 ,  the  Suite Life on Deck ranked as TV 's top series among  बच्चे   6-11  and the No  .  2 scripted series  among  tweens 9-14 .
रयान  started acting in professional theatres at the age of seven ; in 2007 she appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the Firehouse and then was discovered  in  a nationwide search by Disney .
She is also known for appearing in the 2008 feature film The  longshots  as Edith .
In 2009  ,  she guest starred in an episode of Wizards of Waverly Place in Wizards on Deck with Hannah Montana as Bailey Pickett along with  उसके  other cast  mates  from The Suite Life on Deck .
Then , in  2010  ,  वो  starred  in  the film 16  बधाइयां  , which was the most watched cable program on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel  .
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the movie received  ऊँची  viewership in the adults demographic ( 18-34 ) .
Soon after that , Ryan starred in the  स्वतंत्र   नाट्य  film , What  if  ... , which premiered on August 20 , 2010 .
Ryan also starred in  the   नई   डिज़्नी  Channel Original movie , Radio  विद्रोही  , where she portrays the role of Tara Adams , a shy 17-year-old girl who adopts the radio personality , Radio Rebel .
released  February 17 , 2012 .
Ryan stars  in  the titular role in the Disney Channel Original Series , Jessie .
Stührling Tourbillon Movement (  )  .
in  horology , a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind ''  )  is an addition to the  यांत्रिकी   of  a watch escapement .
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet from an earlier idea by the English chronometer maker John Arnold , a tourbillon aims to counter  the  effects of gravity  by  mounting the  escapement  and balance  व्हील  in a  घूर्णन  cage , to negate the effect of gravity when the  timepiece  ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a  निश्चित  position .
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy , tourbillons are  स्टिल  included in some expensive modern watches as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity .
The mechanism is usually exposed on the watch 's face to show it off .
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft  installer  ) is a software component used for the installation , maintenance , and removal  of  software on modern Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  systems .
The installation information , and often  the  files themselves , are  packaged  in installation  पैकेज  , loosely relational  databases  structured as COM Structured Storages and commonly known  as  `` MSI files  ''  , from their default  संचिका  extension  .
Windows Installer contains significant changes from  इसके  predecessor , Setup API .
New features  शामिल   a   जीयूआई  framework and automatic generation of the uninstallation sequence .
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks such as older versions  of  InstallShield and NSIS .
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows Installer as the basis for installation frameworks , so that they synchronize correctly with other installers and keep the internal database of installed products consistent .
Important features such as rollback and versioning depend on a consistent internal database for reliable operation .
Furthermore , Windows Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by  performing  software  संस्थापना  by proxy for unprivileged users .
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages ,  originally  marketed as energy drinks , sold by Phusion Projects  of  Chicago , Illinois .
phusion  operates as  पेय  Four Brewing Company  .
Four Loko , the company 's most popular beverage , debuted in the United States market in 2005 .
It is now  बेची  in  48  states , and  in  Canada ,  the  Bahamas , Bolivia ,  होंडुरास  , and Europe .
The name `` Four '' is  निकला  from the original energy drink 's four main ingredients  :  alcohol , caffeine , taurine , and guarana .
Four branded products have been the object of legal , ethical , and health concerns related to the company allegedly marketing them to the underaged and the purported  खतरे   of  combining alcohol and caffeine .
After the beverage was banned  in  several states , a product reintroduction in December 2010 removed caffeine  ,  taurine  ,  and guarana as ingredients , and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an  उर्जा  drink .
The neck  of  a guitar showing the nut ( in the background , coloured white ) and first four metal frets .
A  fret  is  a  raised element on the neck of a stringed instrument .
Frets usually extend across the full width of the neck .
On  सबसे  modern western fretted instruments , frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard .
On some historical instruments  और  non-European  यंत्र  , frets are made of pieces of string tied around the neck .
Frets divide the neck into fixed segments at intervals related to a musical framework  .
On instruments such as guitars , each fret represents one semitone in the standard western system where one octave is divided into twelve semitones .
Fret is often used as a verb , meaning simply `` to press down  the  string behind a fret . ''
Fretting often refers to the frets and/or their system of placement .
There was consumption of alcohol both during and  बाद  prohibition .
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production , distribution and sale of alcoholic beverages in the United States and was  widely   समर्थित  by the American public when it went into effect in 1920 .
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that  दारू  was the major cause of most personal and  सोशल  problems and prohibition was seen as the solution to the nation 's poverty , crime , violence , and other ills .
Upon ratification of the amendment , the famous evangelist Billy  संडे  said that `` The slums will soon be  तभी  a memory .
We will turn our prisons into  कारखानों  and our jails into storehouses and corncribs . ''
( Compare Christianity and  दारू  . )
Since alcohol  थी  to  be  banned and since  it  was seen as the cause of most  ,  if not all , crime , some communities sold their jails .
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States  कॉंग्रेस  confidently asserted that ``  वहीँ  is as much chance  of  repealing the Eighteenth Amendment as there  is  for a hummingbird to fly to the planet Mars  साथ  the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
the  metre (  मीटर  in American English ) , ( SI unit  प्रतीक  : m ; SI dimension symbol : L ) , is the fundamental unit of length in the International System of  इकाई  ( SI ) .
Originally  intended  to  be  one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator  to  the North  ध्रुव  ( at sea level ) , its definition has been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology .
Since 1983 , it has  महरूम  defined as `` the length of the path travelled by light in vacuum during  a  time interval of 1/299,792,458  of  a second . ''
Geologists  exploring  Jurassic sedimentary rocks in Makhtesh Gadol , Negev Desert ,  इसराईल
Geologists explaining the importance  of  volcanic ash layers to students on field in Iceland
A geologist is a scientist  जो   अध्ययन  the solid and liquid matter that constitutes the Earth as well as the processes and history that has shaped it .
Geologists usually engage in studying geology .
Geologists , studying more  of  an applied science  than  a theoretical one , must approach Geology using physics , chemistry and  जीवविज्ञान   as  well as other sciences .
Geologists , compared to scientists engaged in other fields , are generally more exposed to  the   बाहरी  than  रहकर   in  laboratories ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab  .
Geologists are engaged in exploration for mining companies in search of metals , oils  ,  and other Earth resources .
They are also in the forefront of natural hazards and disasters  चेतावनी  and mitigation , studying earthquakes , volcanic activity , tsunamis , weather storms , and the like ;  उनके  studies are used to warn the general public  of  the occurrence of these events .
Currently , geologists are also engaged in  the  discussion of climate change , as they study the history and evidence for this  धरती  process .
