Modern  वैक्यूम  tubes  ,  mostly miniature style
In electronics , a vacuum tube , electron tube ( in North  अमेरिका  ) , thermionic valve , tube , or valve is a device controlling electric current through a vacuum in a sealed container .
The container is often thin transparent glass  in  a roughly cylindrical shape .
The simplest  वैक्यूम  tube , the diode  ,   is  essentially an  incandescent  light bulb with an  added  electrode inside .
जब  the  बल्ब  's filament is heated white-hot , electrons are `` boiled '' off its surface and into the vacuum inside the bulb .
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is  बना  more positive than the hot filament , a direct current  बहती  through the  वैक्यूम   to   the  electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ) .
As the current only flows in one direction , it makes  it  possible to convert an alternating current applied to the filament to direct current .
the  introduction of a third electrode , a grid between the filament and the plate , yields another function .
A voltage applied to the grid controls  the  current  बहती  from the filament to the plate .
यूँ  , it allows the device to be used as an electronic amplifier  .
Vacuum tubes are thus  प्रयुक्त  for rectification ,  प्रवर्धन  , switching , or  समान  processing or creation of electrical  सिग्नल  .
The vast majority of  आधुनिक  day tubes consist of a sealed container with  a  vacuum inside , and  essentially  rely on thermionic emission of electrons from  a  hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament .
Some exceptions to this are dealt with in the  खण्ड  about gas-filled tubes below .
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  technology  ,  which drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting , television , radar , sound reinforcement , sound recording and reproduction , large telephone networks , analog and  डिजिटल  computers , and industrial process control .
Although some applications had counterparts using  पहले  technologies such as the spark gap transmitter or mechanical computers , it was the invention of  the  vacuum tube with three electrodes ( called a triode )  और  its capability of electronic  प्रवर्धन  that made these technologies widespread and practical .
In most applications , solid-state devices such  as  transistors and other semiconductor devices have replaced tubes  .
Solid-state devices last longer and are  छोटी  , more efficient , more reliable , and cheaper than tubes .
tubes  can be fragile , sometimes generate  significant  unwanted heat , and can take many seconds—many minutes in critical applications—after powering on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance .
However , tubes still find uses where solid-state devices have not been developed , are impractical  ,  or where a tube has superior  प्रदर्शन  , as with some devices in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters .
Tubes  हैं  still produced for such applications .
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed by the electromagnetic pulse produced by  नाभिकीय  explosions and geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares .
Skittles is a brand of  fruit-flavoured  sweets , currently produced and marketed by  the  Wm . Wrigley Jr. Company , a division of Mars , Inc .
They  have  hard  शुगर  shells  जिससे  carry the letter S .
The inside is mainly sugar  ,  corn syrup  ,  and hydrogenated  ताड़  kernel oil along with fruit juice , citric acid , and natural and artificial  चटपटा  .
the  confectionery has been sold in a variety of  फ्लेवर  collections ,  ऐसे  as Tropical and Wild Berry .
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill , ( 30 November 1874 – 24 January 1965 ) was a British politician who was the Prime Minister of the United  किंगडम  from 1940 to 1945  और  again from 1951 to 1955 .
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century ,  चर्चिल   थी  also an officer in the  अंग्रेजों  Army , a historian , a writer , and an artist .
He is the only British  प्रधान   मंत्री  in history to have received the Nobel Prize in  साहित्य  , and was also the  पहला  person to be made an Honorary Citizen of  the  United States .
Churchill was born into  an  aristocratic family  as  the grandson of the 7th Duke of Marlborough .
His father , Lord Randolph Churchill , was a charismatic politician who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer ; his mother ,  jennie  Jerome , was an American socialite .
As a young army officer , he saw action in British India ,  the  Sudan , and the Second Boer War  .
He gained fame as a war  correspondent  and wrote books about  उसके  campaigns .
At the forefront of politics for fifty years , he  आयोजित  many political and cabinet positions .
Before the First World War , he served as President of the Board of  व्यापार  , Home Secretary , and First Lord of the Admiralty as part of the Asquith Liberal government .
During the war , he continued as First Lord of the Admiralty until the disastrous Gallipoli Campaign caused his departure from government  .
He then briefly  resumed  active  फौज  service on  the  Western Front as commander of the 6th Battalion of the Royal Scots  fusiliers  .
He returned to government  as  Minister of  munitions  , Secretary of State for  युद्ध  , and Secretary of State for Air .
After the War , Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative  (  Baldwin  )  government of 1924–29 , controversially  returning  the pound sterling in 1925 to the gold standard  at  its pre-war parity  ,  a move widely seen  as  creating deflationary pressure  on  the UK  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
Also controversial was his opposition to increased home rule for India and his resistance to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII .
आउट  of office and politically  ``  in the wilderness '' during the 1930s , Churchill took the lead in warning  परिचय  Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament .
On the outbreak of the Second World War ,  he  was again  नियुक्त  First Lord of the Admiralty .
Following the resignation of Neville Chamberlain on 10 May 1940 , Churchill became Prime Minister .
His  वफ़ादार  refusal to consider defeat  ,  surrender , or a compromise peace helped inspire  अंग्रेजों  resistance , especially during the difficult early days of the War when Britain stood alone among European countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler .
Churchill was particularly noted for  उसके  speeches and radio broadcasts , which helped inspire the British people .
He led Britain as Prime Minister until  विजय  over Nazi Germany had  महरूम  secured .
After the  रूढ़िवादी  Party lost  the   1945   चुनाव  , he  became  Leader of the Opposition  to  the Labour  (  Attlee ) government .
After winning the 1951  चुनाव  ,  he  again became Prime  मंत्री  , before retiring in 1955 .
Upon his death , Elizabeth II granted  उसे  the honour of a state funeral , which saw one of the largest assemblies of world statesmen in history .
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll , Churchill is widely regarded as  होने  among the most influential people in British history  .

The Ford Focus is a compact car (  c-segment  in  यूरोपीय  ) manufactured by the Ford Motor Company since 1998 .
Ford began sales of  the   फ़ोकस  to Europe in July 1998 and in North America during 1999 for the  2000  model year .
in   यूरोपीय  , South America , North America and South Africa ,  the  Focus replaced the various versions of the Ford  अनुरक्षण  sold in those markets  .
In Asia and Australasia , it replaced the Ford Laser .
As of the first half of 2012 , the Focus  surpassed   the  Toyota Corolla to become the world 's best  selling  automobile nameplate .
The Focus has  महरूम  considered one of the 50  महानतम  cars of the past fifty years by British magazine CAR .
An agar plate -- an example of a bacterial growth medium .
Specifically , it is a streak plate ; the orange lines and dots are formed by bacterial colonies .
A growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or  gel  designed to support the growth  of  microorganisms or cells , or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens .
There are different types of media for growing different types  of  cells .
There are two major types of  विकास  media :  those  used for cell culture , which use specific cell types derived from plants or animals , and microbiological culture , which are used for growing microorganisms  ,  such as  जीवाणु  or yeast .
The  सबसे  common growth  मीडिया  for microorganisms are  nutrient  broths and agar  प्लेटों  ; specialized  मीडिया   हैं  sometimes required for microorganism and cell culture growth .
Some organisms ,  termed  fastidious organisms  ,  require specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements .
Viruses , for example , are obligate intracellular parasites  और  require a growth medium containing living cells .
A talent agent , or booking agent , is  a  person who finds jobs for actors  ,  authors , film directors , musicians , models , producers , professional athletes , writers and other  लोगों  in various entertainment businesses .
An agent also defends , supports and promotes the interest of his/her clients .
Agents can not produce their own shows due to conflict of interest .
A talent  एजेंट  must be  परिचित  with their clients .
An agent has to know what kind of work the client can and can  नहीं  do in  अनुक्रम  to match them with various jobs .
Having  an  agent is not  जरूरी  ,  लकिन  does help the artist in getting jobs .
In many cases casting directors , or other businesses , go to talent  एजेंसियों  to find artists they are looking for .
The agent is paid a percentage of the  स्टार  's earnings ( typically 10 % ) .
Agents sometimes will be  referred  to as  ``  10  percenters  . ''
वहीँ  are different regulations that govern different types of agents that are established by artist 's unions and the legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates .
There  हैं  also professional organizations that license talent agencies .
Since the decline in viewership in theaters , from the 1950s to 1960s , this caused a monumental shift in how studios would produce films and thus reducing the cost of exclusive  और  expensive actors .
Actors and actresses were working for the studios but were not owned  by  one major studio entity and so were able to work on within their time and with  अन्य   studios  .
Because of this , agents were now  देखी  as a necessity instead of an option  .
Agents now became third parties that negotiated between studios and clients , this making their services imperative between each party .
Since talent agencies are working  साथ  lucrative contracts , all talent agencies must be licensed  अंतर्गत  special sections of the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Labor  कोड   ,  which calls an agent a  ``  person or corporation  जो  engages in the occupation of procuring , offering , promising , or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists . ''
Mars has two known moons , Phobos and  deimos  , which are thought to be captured asteroids .
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph Hall and are named after  the  characters Phobos ( panic/fear )  और  Deimos ( terror/dread ) who , in Greek mythology , accompanied their father Ares , god of war , into  बैटल  .
Ares was known  as  Mars to the Romans  .
It is possible that Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 meters and a dust ring between  phobos  and Deimos may be  उपस्थित  but none have been discovered  .
In law enforcement parlance , the term murder book refers to  the  case file of a murder investigation .
Typically , murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches , autopsy and forensic reports , transcripts of investigators ' notes  और  witness interviews  .
The murder book encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder investigation , from the time the murder is first reported through  the  arrest of a suspect .
Law enforcement agencies typically  गार्ड  murder books carefully ,  और  it is  असामान्य  for civilians to be given unfettered access to these kinds  of  records  ,  especially for unsolved cases .
A melon  baller
Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller that varies from around 1 centimeter to  3  centimeters ( about 3/8 inch to 1 inch ) .
They are generally used  in  fruit salad .
A  ksa  , or Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities , is a series of narrative statements that are required when applying to United States Federal government job openings .
KSAs are used to determine , along  साथ  resumes , who the best applicants are when several candidates qualify for a job .
The knowledge  ,  skills and  abilities  ( KSAs ) necessary for the successful performance  of  a position  हैं  contained on each job vacancy announcement .
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked  संघीय  agencies  to  stop  requiring  job applicants to fill out the questionnaires , to be phased  आउट  within a year .
KSAs are  ब्रैड  and focused essays about  एक  's career and educational background that presumably qualify one to perform the duties of the position being applied for .
A knowledge , skills , and  abilities  ( KSA ) is a concise essay about one 's talent and expertise and  सम्बन्धित  experiences ( work , education , volunteer ) and accomplishments .
A series of  ksa  statements are usually required when applying  लिये  most federal government and some state and  नगर  government jobs .
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of a prospective applicant in  शर्तें  of likely ability to  perform  the duties of the job .
Most government  भर्ती   officials  look for a short , crisp  और  clear KSA that emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous work .
KSA  कथन  are  भी  known as Evaluation Factors .
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '' ,  ``  Quality Ranking Factors '' , `` Knowledge , Abilities , skills and Other Characteristics '' , or `` Job  तत्व  '' .
The  नाम  can be just a name but often it influences content and length of the essay  .
Every agency has its own regulations but most of the  समय  the each KSA factor should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long .
The below definitions are defined by the U.S.  दफ्तर  of Personnel Management :
Knowledge ,  कौशल  , and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes required to perform a job and are generally demonstrated through  qualifying  service , education , or training .
ज्ञान  - Is a body of information applied directly to the  प्रदर्शन  of a function .
Skill - Is an observable competence to  perform  a learned psychomotor act .
Ability - Is  competence  to perform an observable behavior or a behavior that results in an observable  उत्पाद  .
The scoring of KSA essays is based on a scale of from one to 100 .
Job applicants must score above 70 to be considered for  the  position .
High scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible , providing examples  इससे   पिछला  employment or training that clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications .
जब  applying to federal government  स्थितियाँ  , a Federal Resume is usually required in addition to KSA statements .

Love Always is the  डेब्यू  album of American R & B duo K-Ci & JoJo , released on June 17 , 1997  ,  by MCA Records .
It was  अंकित  at various studios in New  यॉर्क  and the Los Angeles area in 1996 and 1997 .
It was  उत्पादित  by JoJo  और  several  अन्य  , including DeVante  झूले  , James Mtume , and Jeff  redd   .
The duo were originally a part  of  Jodeci  पहले  this album .
the  album peaked at sixth on the  us  Billboard 200 and also appeared on international charts .
The single ``  सब   my  Life  ``  charted number one in multiple countries , and all four of the album 's  singles  peaked above the top 25 in the US Hot  r  & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles .
Love Always was received favorably by critics , who praised the brothers ' singing ability and the production .
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry  संघ  of America ( RIAA ) and gold by Music Canada and IFPI Sweden .
As  of  June 1999 it had  बेची  2.9 million copies in the United States .
A variable-rate mortgage , adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ) , or tracker mortgage  is  a mortgage  ऋण  with the interest  रेट   on  the note periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets .
The loan may be offered at the lender 's standard  परिवर्तनीय  rate/ base rate .
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index , but where the lender offers no  विशिष्ट  link  to  the underlying market or  अनुक्रमणिका  the rate can be changed  at  the lender 's discretion .
The term ``  variable-rate  mortgage '' is most common outside the United States , whilst in the United States , `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most  आम  , and implies a  बंधक  regulated by the Federal government , with caps on charges .
In many countries , adjustable rate mortgages are the norm , and in  ऐसे  places , may simply be referred to as mortgages  .
Among the most common indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity Treasury ( CMT ) securities  ,  the Cost of  निधि  Index ( COFI ) , and the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) .
A few lenders use their own cost of funds as an index  ,  rather than using other indices  .
This is done  to  ensure a steady margin for  the  lender , whose own cost of funding will usually be related to the index .
Consequently ,  भुगतान  made by the borrower may change over time with the  बदलना  interest rate ( alternatively  ,   the  term of the loan may change ) .
This is distinct from the  ग्रैजुएट  payment mortgage ,  जिससे  offers changing payment amounts but a  फिक्स्ड  interest rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage , the fixed rate mortgage , the  ऋणात्मक  amortization mortgage  ,  and the balloon payment mortgage .
Adjustable  दरों  transfer  भाग   of  the interest rate risk from the lender to the  borrower  .
They can be used where unpredictable interest rates make fixed rate loans difficult  to  obtain .
The borrower benefits  if  the interest rate falls but loses if  the  interest rate increases .
the  borrower  लाभ  from reduced margins to the underlying cost of borrowing compared to fixed or capped rate mortgages .
The assassination of  रॉबर्ट  Francis ``  bobby  '' Kennedy , a United States Senator and  bhai  of assassinated President John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ,  took  place shortly after midnight on June 5 , 1968 , in Los Angeles , California ,  दौरान  the campaign season for the United States Presidential election  ,  1968 .
After winning  the  California and South Dakota primary elections  लिये  the Democratic nomination for  अध्यक्ष  of the United States , Kennedy was shot as he walked through  the  kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died  in  the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours  बाद  .
Sirhan Sirhan , a 24-year-old Palestinian / Jordanian immigrant , was convicted of Kennedy 's murder and is  सेवारत  a life sentence for the crime .
Sirhan 's lawyers  have  released statements claiming evidence that  he  was framed .
The shooting was  अंकित  on audio tape by a freelance newspaper reporter , and  the   aftermath  was captured on film .
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's Cathedral in New York for two  दिनों  before a funeral mass was held on June 8 .
His body was  interred  near his brother John at Arlington National Cemetery .
His death prompted the protection of presidential candidates by the United States Secret Service  .
Hubert Humphrey  गई  on to  जीत  the Democratic nomination for the presidency , but ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon .
as  with his brother Jack 's death , Bobby 's assassination and the circumstances surrounding it have spawned a variety of conspiracy theories .
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one of only  दो  sitting United States  सीनेटरों  to be  assassinated  ( the other being Huey Long ) .
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the period in the history  of  mainstream American comic books generally considered to last  इससे  the mid-1980s until present day .
In this period , comic book characters  generally  became darker and more psychologically complex ,  creators  became better-known and active in changing the industry , independent comics flourished ,  और  larger  प्रकाशन  houses became more commercialized .
An  वैकल्पिक  name for this period is the Dark Age  of  Comic Books , due to the popularity and artistic influence of grim titles , such  as  and Watchmen .
When Harry Met Sally ... is a 1989 American  रोमांटिक  comedy  फिल्मी  written by Nora Ephron and  निर्देशित  by Rob Reiner .
It stars Billy Crystal as  हैरी  and Meg Ryan as Sally .
The story follows the  शीर्षक  characters from  the  time they meet just before sharing a cross-country drive , through twelve years or so of  मौका  encounters in New York City .
The film raises the question `` Can  मेन  and women ever  बस  be friends ? '' and advances many ideas about relationships that became household concepts  ,  such as those  of  the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person '' .
The origins of the film came from Reiner 's return to single life after  a  divorce .
An interview  ephron   conducted  with  reiner  provided the basis for Harry .
Sally was based on Ephron and some  of  her  मित्रों  .
Crystal came on board  और  made his own contributions to the screenplay  ,   बनाना   हैरी  funnier .
Ephron supplied the structure of the  फिल्मी  with much of the dialogue based on the real-life friendship between  reiner   और   क्रिस्टल  .
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by Harry Connick , Jr. , with a  बिग  band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman .
Connick  जीती  his first Grammy  पुरस्कार  for Best Jazz Male Vocal Performance .
Columbia Pictures released the film using the `` platform ''  तकनीक  , which involved opening it in a few select cities , letting positive word of mouth generate interest , and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent  सप्ताह  .
When Harry Met Sally ... grossed a total of US $ 92 .8 million in North America .
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award ,  an  Oscar nomination , and a Writers Guild of America Award  नामांकन  for her screenplay .
The film is ranked  23rd  on AFI 's 100 Years ... 100 Laughs list of the  शीर्ष  comedy films in  अमरीकी  cinema and number 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 Funniest Movies  ''  .
In  जल्दी  2004 ,  the  film  थी  adapted for the stage  in  a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan .

Hamburger Helper  is  a line of packaged food products primarily consisting of  boxed  pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings  .
The contents of each box  हैं  combined with browned ground beef , water and milk to create  a  complete dish .
The  उत्पाद  line also features products with  अन्य  starches such as rice or potatoes instead of pasta .
It  is  made by General Mills .
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the sauce packets , some varieties of the product include  मैदान   बीफ  .
These include a frozen food line , which features some  of  the brand 's classic varieties in a complete meal kit form , with frozen ground beef and frozen sauce  packaged  separately from the  नूडल्स  in the same bag .
There is also an `` instant '' version of Hamburger Helper containing dehydrated meat ,  नूडल्स  and seasonings in a small pouch ,  requiring   तभी  water to be  added  .
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping  हाथ  '' , an anthropomorphic animated , four  fingered  left-hand glove , which appears in the product 's television commercials and on the packages .

It is  the  only dwarf  ग्रह  in the asteroid belt .

A dwarf  ग्रह  is a planetary-mass object that is neither  a  planet nor a satellite .
More explicitly , the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a celestial body in direct  कक्षा  of the Sun that is massive enough for its shape to be controlled by gravitation , but that  नापसंद  a planet has not cleared its orbital region of other objects .
The term dwarf  ग्रह  was adopted in 2006  as  part of a three-way categorization of bodies  orbiting  the Sun , brought about  by  an  बढ़ाएँ  in  discoveries  of trans-Neptunian objects that rivaled Pluto in size ,  और  finally precipitated by  the  discovery of an even more massive object , Eris .
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of their orbit  हैं  defined  as  planets , while those that  हैं  not massive enough to be rounded by their own gravity are defined as small Solar System bodies .
Dwarf planets come  in  between .
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster  of  planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it was said to  be  the  ``   सही  decision  ''  by Mike Brown  ,  who discovered and  अन्य  new dwarf planets , but has been rejected by Alan Stern , who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990 .
The IAU  फिलहाल  recognizes five dwarf planets  in  the Solar System : , Pluto , , , and .
however  , only two of these bodies , Ceres and  प्लूटो  , have been  observed  in enough detail  to  demonstrate  कि  they fit the definition .
Eris has been accepted as a dwarf planet because it is  अधिक  massive than  प्लूटो  .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with an absolute magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a diameter of ≥838  km  assuming  a  geometric  ऐल्बीडो  of ≤1 ) are  to  be named under the assumption that they are dwarf planets .
The only two such objects known at the time , Makemake and Haumea , went through  इस  naming procedure  और   यहूद  declared to  be  dwarf planets .
It is suspected that another hundred or so known objects in the Solar System are dwarf planets  .
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the entire region known as the Kuiper belt is explored , and that the number may exceed 10,000 when objects scattered outside the Kuiper belt are considered .
Individual astronomers recognize several of these , and in August 2011 Mike Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects , ranging from `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets . '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the five accepted by the IAU plus , , , and – as `` virtually certain '' , with  another  two dozen  अत्यधिक  likely , and there are probably a hundred or so  ऐसे  objects in total .
The  वर्गीकरण  of bodies in other planetary systems with the characteristics of dwarf planets has not been addressed .
A debit  कार्ड  ( also known as a  बैंको  card or check card ) is a plastic payment card that  provides  the cardholder electronic access to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution .
Some cards have  a  stored value with which a payment is made , while  सबसे  relay a message to the  cardholder   's  bank to withdraw funds from a payee 's designated bank account .
The card , where accepted , can be used instead of  नकदी  when  बनाना  purchases .
In some cases , the primary account number is assigned exclusively for  उपयोग  on the  अंतरजाल  and  वहीँ  is no physical card .
In many countries , the use of debit  ताश   रै  become so widespread that their volume has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques and , in some instances , cash transactions  .
The development of debit cards , unlike credit  ताश  and charge cards , has generally been country specific resulting in  a  number of different systems around the world , which were  प्रायः  incompatible .
Since the mid-2000s , a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be  प्रयुक्त  in other  देशों  and allowed their use for internet and phone purchases .
Unlike credit and charge cards , payments using a debit card are immediately transferred from  the  cardholder 's designated bank account , instead of them paying the  धन  back at a later date .
Debit cards usually also allow for instant withdrawal of cash , acting as  the  ATM card for withdrawing cash .
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities  to  customers ,  जहाँ   a  customer can withdraw cash along with their purchase .
francois  Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26 , 1914 - January 23  ,  2011 ) was an  अमरीकी  fitness , exercise , and nutritional expert and motivational speaker who is sometimes  पुकारा  `` the godfather of fitness '' and the `` first fitness  सुपरहीरो  . ''
He described himself as being a `` sugarholic '' and  a  `` junk food junkie '' until he was 15 .
he  also had behavioral problems , but `` turned his life around '' after listening to a public lecture by Paul Bragg , a well-known nutrition speaker .
During his career , he came to believe that the country 's overall  स्वास्थ्य  depended on the health of its population , writing that  ``  physical culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America . ''
Decades before health and fitness began being promoted by celebrities like Jane  फोंडा  and Richard Simmons , LaLanne was already  widely  recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet .
he  published numerous books on fitness and hosted a fitness television show between 1953 and 1985 .
As early as 1936 , at age 21 ,  he  opened one of the nation 's first fitness  gyms  in Oakland , California , which became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name  .
One of his  1950s  television exercise programs was  aimed  toward women ,  जिसको  he also encouraged to join his health clubs .
he  invented a number  of  exercise machines  ,  including leg-extension and pulley devices .
besides  producing his own series of videos , he coached the elderly and disabled not to forgo exercise , believing it would enable them to  बढ़ाएँ  their strength  .
LaLanne also gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder , as well as for his prodigious feats  of  strength .
Arnold Schwarzenegger once  stated  , `` That Jack LaLanne 's an animal !  ,  '' after LaLanne , at 54 , beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest .
On the occasion of LaLanne 's death , Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for being `` an apostle for fitness '' by inspiring  ``   अरबों  all over the world to live healthier lives , '' and , as governor of California , had earlier placed him on  उसके  Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness .
Steve Reeves credited LaLanne  as  his inspiration to build his muscular physique while keeping a slim waist .
He was inducted to the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Hall of Fame and has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Air forces of most of the countries use system similar to Armies .
However , the RAF and the air  शक्तियां  of many Commonwealth countries , or those formerly under a British influence , use a different set of ranks  loosely  based  on  naval  समतुल्यता  ; Lieutenant , Commander , Captain  और  Commodore are prefixed for air force use with Flight , Wing  ,  Group  और  Air , respectively ( the first three being the units that they used to command ) .
Penélope Cruz  sánchez  ( ; born April 28 , 1974  )  is a Spanish actress .
Signed by an agent at age 15 , she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the  following  year in Jamón  ,  jamón ( 1992 )  ,   to  critical acclaim .
Her subsequent roles  in  the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your  आँखें   (   1997  ) , The Hi-Lo Country ( 1999 ) , The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 )  और  Woman  on  Top ( 2000 ) .
Cruz achieved  मान्यता  for her lead roles in  the  2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow .
She has since built a successful career , appearing  in  films from a wide range of genres , including the comedy Waking Up in Reno (  2002  )  ,   the  thriller Gothika ( 2003 ) , the Christmas  फिल्म   नोएल  ( 2004  )  , and the action adventure Sahara (  2005  ) .
She has received critical  acclaim  for her roles in Volver ( 2006  )  and Nine ( 2009 ) receiving Golden Globe and Academy Award nominations for each .
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008 for Vicky Cristina Barcelona .
She was  the  first Spanish actress in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Cruz has  modeled  for companies such as  आम  , Ralph Lauren  और  L'Oréal .
Penélope and  उसके  younger sister Mónica Cruz have  designed  items for Mango .
She has donated both her time and money to charities .
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India ,  जहाँ  she spent one week working for Mother Teresa ; she donated her salary from ' to help fund the late nun  's  mission .
A wax sculpture of Cruz will be placed in  a  premier spot in the Grevin Wax Museum in  पेरिस  .
संचिका  Explorer , previously known as Windows Explorer , is a file  मैनेजर  application and also a navigation tool that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from  खिड़कियाँ  95 onwards .
It provides a graphical user interface for accessing the  संचिका  systems .
It is also the component of  the  operating system that presents many  उपयोक्ता  interface items on the  मॉनिटर  such as the taskbar and desktop .
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer  कार्यशील  ( for example , the File | Run command in  कार्य  Manager on NT-derived versions of  खिड़कियाँ  will  फलन  without it , as will commands  typed  in a command prompt window ) .
Located in the C : \Windows  निर्देशिका  , it is sometimes referred to as the Windows  शेल  , explorer.exe , or simply “Explorer” .
The  परवाह  Bears are characters created by American Greetings in 1981 for use on greeting cards .
The original artwork for  the  cards was painted by artist Elena Kucharik .
In 1983 , Kenner  turned  the Care Bears into plush teddy bears .
The Care Bears appeared in their own TV specials  पुकारा  The Care Bears in the Land  बगैर  Feelings ( 1983 ) and The Care Bears Battle the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ) .
They also had  उनके  own television series from 1985 to 1988 , in addition to three feature films : The Care Bears Movie ( 1985 ) , Care Bears Movie II : A New Generation ( 1986  )  ,  और  The Care  bears  Adventure in Wonderland  (  1987 ) .
Each Care Bear comes in  a  different color and  रै  a specialized insignia on its belly that represents its duty  और  personality .
This insignia was known as their `` tummy symbol .  ''
However , the movie Care Bears : Oopsy Does It ! renamed them `` belly badges  ''  .
Adding to the Care Bear family are the `` Care  भालू  Cousins '' , which feature a lion , rabbit , penguin ,  raccoon  , and other such animals created in the same style as the teddy bears .
In 2002 , the bears were reintroduced with new toys .
बना  by Play-Along Toys ,  the   नई  toys offered features  ऐसे  as illuminated bellies upon touch , aerobic bears  ,  and glow-in-the-dark  bears  .
As part of this comeback , the Bears have appeared in  दो  computer-animated movies : Care Bears : Journey to Joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) and The Care Bears '  बिग  Wish Movie (  2005  ) .
In 2007 , the franchise celebrated its 25th  वर्षगांठ   ;  another relaunch took  प्लेस  , as well as the release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It ! .
In mid-2011  ,  AG announced a revival  tv  animated series titled `` Care Bears : Welcome to Care-a-Lot  ``  .
The premiere of the series  utilizes  `` 30 years of caring '' .
It premiered on The Hub on June 2 , 2012 .
As of 2013 , Care Bears merchandise is still being marketed .
During 2008 and 2009 , Canada 's Cookie Jar Group and France 's MoonScoop Group attempted to acquire the franchise from AGC  ,  with no  apparent  success .
Interstate  70  (  i-70  ) is  an  Interstate Highway in the United States that runs from Interstate 15 near Cove  फोर्ट  , Utah , to a Park  और  Ride  निकट  Baltimore , Maryland .
It was the first Interstate Highway  प्रोजेक्ट  in the United States .
I-70 approximately traces the path of U.S. Route  40   (   और  also the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains .
West of the Rockies , the route of I-70 was derived from multiple sources .
I-70 is the fifth longest Interstate Highway  ,  after  i-90  , I-80 , I-40 , and I-10 .
The construction of  i-70  in Colorado and Utah is considered an engineering marvel  as  the route passes through the Eisenhower Tunnel , Glenwood Canyon ,  और  the San Rafael Swell .
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the highest point  साथ  the Interstate Highway system  साथ  an elevation of .
The sections of the interstate in Missouri and Kansas have laid claim to be the first interstate in the United States .
Though disputed , the Federal Highway Administration has claimed the section of I-70  through  Glenwood Canyon , completed in 1992 , was the  पिछला  piece of the Interstate Highway system , as originally  नियोजित  , to open to traffic  .
Photo of 1999 total eclipse
As seen from the Earth , a solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the Sun and Earth , and the  चंद्रमा  fully or partially blocks ( `` occults  ``   )  the Sun .
This can happen only at  नई  moon , when the Sun and the Moon are in conjunction as seen from Earth  in  an alignment referred  to  as syzygy .
In a total eclipse , the disk of the Sun is fully obscured by the Moon .
In partial and annular eclipses only part of the Sun is obscured .
If  the  Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit , a  छोटी  closer to the Earth , and in the same orbital plane , there would be total solar eclipses every  सिंगल  month .
However , the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted  )  at more than 5 degrees to  धरती  's orbit around the Sun  (  see ecliptic ) so  इसके   छाया  at new moon usually misses  धरती  .
Earth 's orbit is called the  ecliptic  plane as the Moon 's orbit must cross this  प्लेन  in order  लिये   an  eclipse ( both solar  as   खूब  as lunar )  to  occur .
In addition , the Moon 's actual  कक्षा  is elliptical , often taking it far enough away from Earth that its apparent size is not large enough to block the Sun totally .
The orbital planes  क्रॉस  each year  at  a line of nodes  resulting  in at least two , and up to five  ,  solar eclipses  occurring  each year  ;  no more than two  of  which can be total  eclipses  .
However , total solar eclipses are rare at any  particular  location because totality exists only along a narrow path on Earth 's surface  traced  by the Moon 's shadow or umbra .
An eclipse  is  a natural phenomenon .
Nevertheless , in some ancient and modern cultures , solar eclipses have been attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as  ख़राब  omens .
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people  जो  are unaware of its astronomical explanation , as the Sun seems  to  disappear during the day and the sky darkens in a matter of minutes .
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the  सूर्य  , observers should use special eye protection or indirect viewing techniques when  देखने  a  आंशिक  eclipse , or the partial phases of a total eclipse .
It is safe to view the total phase of a total solar eclipse with the unaided eye and without protection , however .
People referred to as eclipse chasers or  umbraphiles  will travel to remote locations to observe or  गवाह  predicted central solar eclipses .
A political party ( from , Genitive partis , `` part '' , `` portion '' ) is a political organization that typically seeks to influence , or entirely  कंट्रोल   ,   सरकारी  policy , usually by  nominating  candidates  साथ  aligned political views and trying to seat them in  राजनैतिक  office .
पार्टियों   participate  in electoral campaigns and educational outreach or protest  क्रियाएँ  .
Parties often espouse an ideology or vision  ,  expressed in a  पार्टी   कार्यक्रम  , bolstered by a written platform with specific goals  ,  forming a coalition among disparate interests .
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit  belonging  to the genus Mangifera , consisting of numerous tropical fruiting trees in  the  flowering plant family Anacardiaceae  .
the  mango is  देशी  to South Asia , from where it has  महरूम  distributed worldwide to become one of the most cultivated fruits  in  the tropics  .
While other Mangifera species ( e.g . horse mango ,  M.  foetida  )  are also grown  on  a more  स्थानीयकृत  basis , Mangifera indica – the 'common mango ' or 'Indian mango ' – is  the  only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions .
It  is  the national  फल  of India , Pakistan and Philippines .
In several  संस्कृतियों  , its fruit and  पत्ते  are ritually used as floral decorations at weddings , public celebrations and religious ceremonies .
Gill Arnette  byrd  , < ref name > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born February 20 , 1961 in San Francisco , California )  is  a former  पेशेवर  American football player .
He was a two time  प्रो  Bowl cornerback in 1991 and 1992  लिये  the San Diego Chargers after graduating from San  जोस  State University .
Byrd was inducted into the Chargers Hall of Fame  in  1998 .
he  was an All-City running back and defensive back at Lowell High School ( San Francisco ) , helping to lead the Cardinals to the city championship in his senior season of 1978 .
World map showing the Tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer , also referred  to  as  the  Northern  tropic   ,   is  the circle of latitude on the Earth that marks the most northerly position at which  the  Sun may appear directly overhead at its zenith .
This event occurs once  प्रति  year , at  the  time of the June solstice , when the Northern Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to  इसके  maximum extent .
It  फिलहाल  ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ north of the Equator .
Its Southern Hemisphere counterpart , marking the most southerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead ,  is  the Tropic of Capricorn .
These tropics are two of  the  five major degree measures  or   प्रमुख  circles of latitude that mark maps of the Earth , besides the Arctic and  अंटार्कटिक   वृत्त  and the Equator .
The positions of these circles of latitude ( other than the Equator ) are dictated by the tilt of the Earth 's axis of rotation relative to the plane of its orbit .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and is  फिलहाल  the dominant consumer video format in Asia ,  उत्तर  America , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video  specification   आवश्यकता  a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or  a  computer DVD  ड्राइव  with a software DVD  खिलाड़ी  ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part  2  compressed  वीडियो   और  audio of varying formats (  प्रायः   multi-channel  formats as described below ) .
Typically ,  the  data rate  लिये  DVD movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s , and the bit rate is usually adaptive .
It was first available for retail around 1997  .
the   dvd-video  specification was created by DVD Forum and can be obtained  इससे  DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of  $  5,000 .
The specification is not publicly available  ,  because  प्रत्येक  subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement .
Certain information in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential .
In computing and specifically Internet  ,  a leech is one who benefits , usually deliberately , from others ' information or effort but does not offer anything in return , or makes only token offerings in  an  attempt  to  avoid being called a leech .
In economics , this type  of   बर्ताव  is  पुकारा  `` free riding '' and is  संबद्ध   साथ   the   फ़्री  rider problem .
depending   on   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  , leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer  संसाधन  , but often instead to greedy use according to etiquette :  to   wit  , using  too  much of what  is  freely  दिए  without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that  provides  it .
The name derives from the leech , an animal  कि  sucks blood and then tries to leave unnoticed .
Other terms are used , such as `` freeloader '' , but leech  is  the most common .
The full eagle logo ,  प्रयुक्त   in  various versions from 1970 to 1993 .
The United States Postal Service ( USPS ) , also known as the Post Office and U.S. Mail , is an independent agency of the United States federal government responsible  लिये  providing postal service in the United States .
It is  एक  of the few government agencies explicitly authorized by the United  राज्य  Constitution .
The USPS traces  इसके  roots to 1775 during the Second Continental Congress , where Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन  was appointed the first postmaster general .
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was created in 1792 from Franklin 's operation and transformed into its current form in 1971 under  the  Postal Reorganization Act  .
The USPS employs over 574,000 workers and  operates  over 260,000 vehicles .
The USPS is the operator of the largest vehicle fleet in the world .
The USPS  is  legally obligated to serve all Americans , regardless of  भूगोल   ,  at uniform price and quality .
The USPS  रै   विशेष  access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal letterboxes in  the  United States  ,  but still competes against private  पैकेज  delivery services , such as UPS and FedEx .
The USPS has not directly received taxpayer-dollars since the early  1980s  with the minor exception of subsidies for  लागत  associated with the disabled and  विदेशी  voters .
Since the  2006  all-time peak mail volume , after which  कॉंग्रेस  passed the  डाक  Accountability and Enhancement Act `` , (  जिससे   mandated  $ 5.5 billion  प्रति  year to be  सशुल्क  into an account  to  pre-fund retiree health-care  ,   75  years into the future , a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ) , revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume , prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while  कटिंग  costs to reduce its budget  deficit  .
Washington , D.C. has been the capital of the United States since 1800 .
आठ  other  शहरों  have served  as  the meeting place for Congress and  हैं  therefore considered to  have  once been the capital of the United States .
In addition , each of the 50 U.S. states and the five principal territories of the United States maintains its own capital .
Princess cut diamond set in a ring
The Princess cut is the second most popular cut shape for diamonds , next to a round brilliant .
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on shape is similar to that of an  उलट  pyramid with four beveled sides  .
The princess cut is a  अपेक्षाकृत  new diamond cut , having been  निर्मित  in the  1960s  .
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative  to  the more popular round  शानदार  cut , in  जिससे  the top of diamond , called the crown , is cut with  a  round  face-up  shape and the bottom , called  the  pavilion , is  तराशा  similar to a  कोन  .
A princess cut  साथ   the   वही  width as the diameter of  a  round brilliant will weigh more as it has four  किनारे  which would otherwise have been cut off and rounded  to  form a round brilliant .
the  princess cut  is  sometimes referred to as a square modified brilliant .
However , while displaying the same high degree of brilliance , its faceting style  is  unique and completely different from that of a round  शानदार  .
the  Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut , having a step-modified `` Double-French  ''  or `` Cross '' cut crown and a series of unique , chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion which combine  to  give a distinct cross-shaped reflection when the stone is viewed directly through the table .
Effectively , the  राजकुमारी   काटें  combines the high degree of  लाइट  return  of  a round brilliant cut with a distinctive square or rectangular shape .
the  square princess cut diamond is  प्रायः  slightly cheaper than round brilliant  काटें  diamonds of the same carat weight because  it  retains about 80 % of the rough diamond , as opposed to the  गोलाकार  brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough .
The  क्षमता  to retain  अधिक  crystal weight makes this shape popular amongst diamond cutters .
Accredited Gem Appraisers (  आगा  ) and American Gem Society Laboratory (  agsl  ) and European Gem Laboratories-USA ( EGL-USA ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for  काटें  .
There is  no  universal definition of what measurements make an ideal princess cut diamond and many  डायमंड  manufacturers market ideal  ईंट  with differing facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut '' .
in  contrast  to   the  AGSL , AGA ,  और  EGL-USA the Gemological Institute  of  America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough industry consensus or empirical data to specify cut grading standards for Princess cut diamonds and to do so is at the risk of consumers who may be deceived by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent  काटें  grades .
The name ``  राजकुमारी  Cut '' was originally  प्रयुक्त   in  connection with another diamond cut , otherwise known as the `` Profile '' cut  ,  designed by Arpad Nagy , a London cutter ,  in  1961 .
The same name was  बाद   प्रयुक्त  and made popular  by  Ygal Perlman , Betzalel  ambar   ,  and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979 .
A similar cut with only 49 facets , as opposed  to  the original  58  facets of the princess  काटें  , was later branded the `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three years of optical research yielded a square stone with faceting  समान  to that of a round brilliant cut diamond .
A Comparison
The number of chevrons can affect the overall outlook  of  a princess cut diamond .
This can usually be determined by the wire diagram that is plotted in diamond grading reports .
By adding  अधिक  chevrons on the pavilion side of the diamond , the  व्यक्तिगत  facets of the diamond will now be broken down into smaller facets .
As a result , it can  दे  a princess cut diamond a `` crushed ice '' look .
Vice versa , when a princess  काटें  diamond has lesser chevrons , it tends to give the diamond a chunky outlook due to broader facets .
The domestic dog ( Canis  lupus   familiaris  ) is a  subspecies  of the gray  भेड़िया  ( Canis lupus ) , a member  of  the Canidae  परिवार  of the mammalian order  carnivora  .
The term `` domestic dog ''  is  generally used for both domesticated  और  feral varieties .
The dog  रै  been the first animal to be domesticated and  रै  been the most widely kept working , hunting  ,  and pet animal in  इंसान  history .
The word `` dog '' may  भी  mean the male of a canine  प्रजाति  , as opposed to the word `` bitch '' for the female of the species .
MtDNA  प्रमाण  shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000  सालो  ago but , , the oldest fossil specimens genetically linked  to  the modern dog 's lineage date to approximately 33,000-36,000 years  पहले  .
Dogs  '  value to early human hunter-gatherers led to them quickly becoming ubiquitous across world  संस्कृतियों  .
कुत्तो  perform many roles for people  ,  such as hunting , herding , pulling loads , protection , assisting police and military , companionship , and , more recently , aiding handicapped individuals .
This impact on human society has given them the nickname `` Man 's Best Friend '' in the Western  संसार  .
In  कुछ  cultures , dogs are also a source of meat .
In 2001 , there were estimated to be 400 million dogs in  the  world .
Most breeds of  कुत्तो  are at most a few hundred years  बूढ़ा  ,  having  been artificially selected for particular morphologies and behaviors by people for specific functional roles .
through   इस  selective breeding , the dog has developed into hundreds of varied breeds , and shows more behavioral and  morphological  variation than any other land mammal .
For example , height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the Irish Wolfhound ; color varies from white through grays ( usually called `` blue '' ) to black , and browns from light ( tan )  to  dark ( `` red '' or ``  चॉकलेट  '' ) in a wide  विभिन्नता  of patterns ; coats can be short or long ,  coarse-haired  to wool-like ,  सीधा  , curly  ,  or smooth .
It is common for most breeds to shed this coat .
Diagram of a transmission electron  सूक्ष्मदर्शी
A 1973 Siemens electron microscope , Musée des Arts et Métiers , Paris
An electron microscope ( EM )  is  a type of microscope that  उपयोग  an electron beam to illuminate a specimen and produce a magnified image .
An EM has greater resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the structure  of  smaller objects because electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons .
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary , non-confocal light microscopes are limited by diffraction to about  200  nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x .
The electron microscope uses electrostatic and electromagnetic lenses to control  the  electron beam and focus it  to  form an image .
These electron optical lenses are analogous to  the  glass lenses of a  लाइट  optical microscope .
Electron  microscopes  are used  to  investigate the ultrastructure of a wide range  of  biological and  अकार्बनिक  specimens including  microorganisms  , cells , large molecules , biopsy samples  ,   धातुओं  , and crystals .
Industrially , the electron  सूक्ष्मदर्शी  is often used for quality control and failure analysis .
आधुनिक  electron microscopes produce  इलेक्ट्रॉन  micrographs , using specialized digital cameras  or  frame grabbers to capture the image .
popeyes  Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of  fried  chicken fast food restaurants  संस्थापित   in  1972 in New Orleans , Louisiana .
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & Seafood  ,  It was acquired by  sandy  Springs , Georgia -based AFC Enterprises , originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company , in 1993 .
According to a company press release dated June 29 , 2007 , Popeyes is the  second-largest  `` quick-service chicken restaurant group , measured  by   क्रमांक  of units '' ,  साथ  more than 1,800 restaurants in more than  40  states and the District  of  Columbia , and over 22 countries worldwide including Turkey , Northern Cyprus  ,   बहरीन  , China , Hong Kong , Iraq , Indonesia , Jordan , Kuwait ,  संयुक्त  Arab Emirates ,  जापानी  , Malaysia , Saudi Arabia , South  कोरियाई  , Singapore , Canada ,  जमैका  , Guyana , Suriname , Mexico , Trinidad  ,  Puerto Rico  ,  Honduras  ,  Vietnam , Panama , Peru , and Costa Rica .
About thirty locations are company-owned , the rest franchised .
The leg press is a weight training exercise in which  the   व्यक्तिगत  pushes a  वज़न  or resistance away from them  using   उनके  legs .
The term leg press also refers to the  apparatus  used to perform  इस  exercise .
The leg press can be used to evaluate an athlete 's overall lower  देह  strength ( from knee joint to hip ) .
Using the diagonal sled-type leg press machine .
There are two main types  of  leg press:
The diagonal or vertical 'sled ' type  लेग   दबायें  .
Weight disks ( plates ) are attached directly to the sled , which is mounted on  rails  .
the  user sits below the sled and pushes it upward with their feet .
These machines normally include adjustable safety  कोष्ठक  that prevent the user from  होने  trapped under the weight .
The 'cable  '  type leg press , or 'seated leg press ' , commonly found on multigyms .
The user sits upright and pushes forward with their  फीट  onto a  थाली  that is attached to the weight stack by  अर्थात्  of a  long  steel cable .
Wendy Williams Hunter (  born  Wendy  जोन  Williams ; July 18 , 1964 ) is an American media personality , actress and author .
वो  hosts a syndicated television talk show , The Wendy  विलियम्स  Show .
Prior to television , Williams was  a  `` shock jockette `` on several radio  shows  .
Williams has gained notoriety  लिये  her on-air  spats  with  हस्तियाँ  .
She was the subject  of   the  2006 VH1 reality  tv  series  पुकारा  The  वेन्डी  Williams Experience which broadcast events surrounding her radio show .
She has written  an  autobiography  और  several other books , and has  निर्मित  a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams .
Patrick Henry  ``  Treason ''  वाक  before the  हाउस  of Burgesses in an 1851 painting by Peter  F.  Rothermel
`` Give me  स्वतंत्रता  , or give  me  death ! '' is a quotation attributed to Patrick Henry from  a  speech he made to the Virginia Convention .
On that  दिन   ,   at  St. John 's Church in Richmond , Virginia , and is credited with having swung the balance in convincing the Virginia House of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War  .
Among  the  delegates  to   the  convention were future US  राष्ट्रपतियों   थामस  Jefferson and George Washington .
Newfoundland  और  Labrador ( , locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada .
Situated in the country 's Atlantic region , it incorporates the island of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador  to  the northwest , with a combined area of .
In 2011 , the province 's population was 514,536 .
Approximately 92 percent  of  the  प्रांत  's  जनसांख्यिकी  lives on the Island of Newfoundland ( including its associated smaller islands ) , of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula  .
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous , with 97.6 % of residents reporting English (  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ; .
Historically , Newfoundland  थी  also home to unique varieties of  फ्रेंच  , and  आयरिश  , as well as the now-extinct Beothuk language  .
In Labrador  ,  local dialects of Innu-aimun and Inuktitut are also spoken .
Newfoundland and Labrador 's capital and largest city , St. John  's  , is Canada 's 20th-largest Census Metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  , and is  घर  to almost 40 percent of the province 's population .
St. John 's is the seat of government  ,  home to the  हाउस  of Assembly of Newfoundland  और   labrador  and the highest court in the jurisdiction , the  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador Court of Appeal .
A former colony and dominion of the United Kingdom , Newfoundland and Labrador became the tenth province  to  enter the Canadian Confederation on  कूच  31 , 1949 , as Newfoundland .
On December  6  , 2001 , an  amendment  was made to  the  Constitution of Canada to change the province 's official name to Newfoundland and Labrador .
In day-to-day conversation ,  however  , Canadians  generally  still refer to  the  province itself as  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and  to  the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador .
Theodore ``  t.r  . ''
Roosevelt , Jr. ( ; October 27 , 1858—January 6 , 1919 ) was the 26th President of the United States ( 1901–1909 ) .
He is  विख्यात  for his exuberant personality , range of interests and achievements , and his leadership of the Progressive Movement , as well as  उसके  `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity .
He was a leader  of  the Republican Party  और  founder of the first incarnation  of  the  short-lived  Progressive ( `` Bull  मूस  '' ) Party of 1912 .
Before becoming  अध्यक्ष  , he held offices at the city ,  राज्य  , and federal levels .
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist , explorer , hunter , author , and soldier are as much a  भाग  of his fame as any office he held as a politician .
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn  in  as President of the United States in 1901  ,   बनाना  him the youngest president  कभी  ; he beat out the youngest elected president , John  F.  Kennedy , by only one year .
Roosevelt was also the first of only three  बैठे  presidents  to  have won the Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy bear is named after him , despite his contempt for being called `` Teddy  ''  .
Born into a wealthy family in  नई  York City  ,  Roosevelt  थी  a sickly child who suffered from asthma and stayed at home studying natural history  .
To overcome his physical weakness , he embraced a strenuous life .
home-schooled  , he became an eager student of nature .
He attended Harvard University ,  जहाँ  he studied biology , boxed and developed an  ब्याज  in naval  अफेयर्स  .
In 1881 , one year out of Harvard , he was elected to the New York State Assembly , where he  became  a leader of the reform  गुट  of his Republican Party ( the  ``  GOP ''  )  .
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his  पेशेवर  reputation as a  गंभीर  historian ; he wrote numerous books on hunting , the  बाहरी  ,  और   वर्तमान  political issues , as well  as  frontier  इतिहास  .
in  1884 , his first wife  और  his mother died on  the   वही   दिन  .
He temporarily left politics and went to the frontier ,  बनने  a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas .
Returning to New York  नगर  , he ran for mayor  in  1886 , finishing third  साथ  60,000 votes .
He later gained fame by  लेने  vigorous charge of the  नगर  police .
At the national level , he was a leader in civil service reform .
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898 while Roosevelt was , effectively , running the Department of the Navy .
he  promptly resigned and formed the Rough Riders – a volunteer cavalry regiment that fought in Cuba .
the  war hero was elected  राज्यपाल  in 1898 and in 1900 was nominated for vice president .
He successfully energized  the  GOP base as a highly visible campaigner to reelect  अध्यक्ष  William McKinley on a platform of high tariffs , the gold standard  ,  imperialism , prosperity at home and victory abroad  .
In 1901 , President William McKinley was assassinated and Roosevelt became President .
He attempted to move the Republican Party ( GOP  )  toward Progressivism , including trust busting and increased regulation of businesses .
Roosevelt  became  the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon  the  death of his predecessor , winning the largest percentage  of  the popular vote since the uncontested election of 1820 .
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe his  घरेलू  agenda , emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies  .
As an outdoorsman and naturalist , he promoted the conservation movement .
on  the world stage , Roosevelt 's policies were characterized by his slogan  ,  `` Speak softly  और  carry a big  स्टिक  `` .
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or  अधिक  common ancestor  (  s ) ( other than a parent , child/descendant , sibling ,  child/descendant   of  a sibling , or sibling  of  a  parent/ancestor  ) .
However in common parlance , ``  cousin  ''  सामान्यतः  specifically means `` first cousin '' .
प्रणालियों  of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' are used in the English-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad sense ) and the ancestor they have  in  common .
Various governmental entities  have  established  प्रणालियों  for legal use that can more precisely  बताएँ  kinships with common ancestors existing any number  of  generations in the past , though common usage often  eliminates  the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply ``  दूर  cousins '' or `` relatives '' .
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC from September 16 , 1983 until May 8 , 1987 , and in first-run syndication from September 21 , 1987  जबतक  March 10  ,  1989 .
The series was created by Stu Silver .
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the  शीर्षक  role as a young boy who , after losing his parents , is adopted by his NFL -pro godfather  ,   portrayed  by Alex Karras , and his new socialite wife , played by Susan Clark .
The focus was largely on how this impulsively married couple had  to  adjust  to  their new lives and sudden parenthood , but it was  the  congenial  वेबस्टर  himself who drove much  of  the plot .
The series was produced by  जॉर्जियाई  Bay Ltd. , Emmanuel Lewis Entertainment Enterprises , Inc. (  1986-1989  ) and  सर्वोपरि  Television .
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes , Webster featured a young African-American boy adopted by a white  परिवार  .
Three types of cell division
Cell  प्रभाग  is the  प्रक्रम  by which a parent cell divides into two  or  more daughter cells .
Cell division usually occurs as part  of  a larger cell cycle .
In eukaryotes , there are  दो  distinct type of cell  प्रभाग  : a vegetative division , whereby each daughter cell is genetically identical  to  the parent cell ( mitosis ) , and a  reductive  cell  प्रभाग  , whereby the number of chromosomes in the daughter cells is reduced by half , to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ) .
Both of these cell division cycles  हैं   जरूरी  in sexually reproducing organisms at some point  in  their life cycle  ,  and both are believed to be  उपस्थित  in the last eukaryotic common ancestor Prokaryotes  भी  undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission , where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells .
सब  cell divisions , regardless of organism , are preceded  by  a single round of DNA replication .
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba  ,   एक  cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an entire new organism is created .
On a larger  स्केल  , mitotic cell division can create progeny from multicellular organisms , such as  पौधे  that grow from cuttings .
Cell division  भी  enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop from the one-celled zygote ,  जिससे  itself was  उत्पादित  by cell  प्रभाग   इससे   गैमीट  .
And after growth , cell division allows for continual construction and repair of the organism .
A human being 's body experiences about 10,000 trillion cell divisions in a lifetime .
Cell division  रै  been modeled by finite subdivision rules .
The primary concern  of  cell division  is   the  maintenance of the original  कोशिका  's genome  .
Before division can occur , the genomic information that is stored in  गुणसूत्रों  must be replicated , and the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between  कोशिकाएं  .
A great deal of cellular infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information consistent  between   ``   पीढियां   ''  .
Mountain ranges of Massachusetts ,  संयुक्त  States .
Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones , 23 February 1955 , Southampton , Hampshire , England ) is a British musician , singer and songwriter .
According  to  the Guinness Book of British Hit  singles  & Albums , `` Jones is an accomplished  singer-songwriter  who  थी  a regular chart visitor in the  mid-1980s  with his  ब्रांड  of synthpop .
Jones , who was equally popular in the U.S. , appeared at Live Aid ``  .
allmusic   पत्रकार  , Stephen Thomas  erlewine  adds , `` Jones was one of the defining figures of mid-1980s synthpop .
His music  मिलाया  the technology intensive sound  of  New Wave with the cheery optimism of hippies and late 1960s pop .
Jones racked up a string of hits in the mid and late 1980s , before he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s '' .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Isle of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a motorcycle racing event held on  the  Isle of Man and  थी  for many years the  सबसे  prestigious motorcycle race in the world .
the  event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 before being transferred to the United Kingdom after safety concerns and  चलाएं  by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season .
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of  the  TT Formula 1 Championship from  1977  to 1990 to preserve the  इवेंट  's racing status .
इससे  1989 the racing has been developed by the Isle of Man Department of Tourism as the Isle of Man TT Festival .
The race is run in a  time-trial   स्वरूप  on public roads closed for racing by the provisions of an Act of Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ) .
The first race was held on Tuesday 28 May 1907 and was  पुकारा  the International Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy .
The  इवेंट  was organised by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10  गोद   of  the St John 's Short Course of 15 miles 1,470 yards  लिये  road-legal  touring   मोटरसाइकिल  with exhaust silencers , saddles ,  pedals  and mud-guards .
The winner of the single-cylinder class , and overall winner of the first  इवेंट   in  1907 , was Charlie Collier riding  a  Matchless motorcycle  in  a time of 4 hours  ,  8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race speed of 38.21 mph .
The winner of  the  twin-cylinder class was Rem Fowler riding a Peugeot engined Norton in a  समय  of 4 hours 21 minutes and 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph .
The trophy  प्रस्तुत  to Charlie Collier as the winner of the 1907 Isle of  man  TT Race  ,  was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars .
It featured a stylised version of Olympic God Hermes by Giovanni  da  Bologna as a silver figurine astride a winged wheel .
The trophy was similar in design to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy  प्रस्तुत  to John Napier ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural winner of  the  Isle of Man Tourist Trophy car race  in  1905 now known as the RAC Tourist Trophy .
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is now presented annually to the winner of the Isle of Man Senior TT Motor-Cycle Race .
the  2007 Isle of Man TT was the Centenary event which ran between 26 May and 8 June 2007 and featured a special Re-enactment of the 1907  आइल  of Man TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald  हिल  in St John 's on  सोमवार  28 May 2007 .
The vintage parade of  100  classic motorcycles for  the  Centenary  re-enactment  on  the  original St John 's Short Course was flagged away by former World Motor-Cycle Champion  ज्यॉफ   ड्यूक   .
The first of the participants to be flagged away was the recently restored twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the first Isle  of  Man TT Race in  1907  .
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT  रेस  competitor Guy Martin riding a 1938 Triumph  बाघ  100 500 cc and other former TT competitors including Alan Cathcart , Sammy Miller  ,  Nick Jefferies and  मिक  Grant also completed  the   re-enactment  lap  .
