Unemployment ( or  joblessness  ) occurs when people are without work and actively seeking work .
The  बेरोजगारी  rate is  a  measure  of  the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed individuals by all individuals currently in the  मजदूर  force .
During periods of recession , an economy usually  अनुभवों  a relatively high unemployment rate .
According to  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Labour Organization report , more than 197 million people globally  हैं  out of work or 6 % of the world 's workforce were without a job in 2012  .
There remains considerable theoretical debate regarding the causes , consequences and solutions for unemployment .
Classical economics , New classical economics , and  the  Austrian School of economics argue that market mechanisms are reliable means of resolving unemployment .
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the labor market from the outside , such as unionization , minimum wage laws , taxes , and other regulations that they claim discourage  the  hiring of workers .
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical nature of unemployment and  अनुशंसा  government interventions in the economy that it  दावा  will reduce unemployment  दौरान  recessions .
इस  theory focuses on recurrent shocks that suddenly reduce  कुल  demand for  goods   और  services  और  thus reduce  माँग  for workers .
Keynesian models recommend government  interventions  designed to increase demand for workers ; these can include financial stimuli , publicly funded  जॉब  creation , and expansionist monetary policies .
In  जोड  to  ये  comprehensive  theories  of unemployment , there are a few  categorizations  of unemployment  कि   हैं  used to more precisely model the effects  of   बेरोजगारी  within the  आर्थिक  system .
The  प्रमुख  types of unemployment include structural unemployment which focuses on structural  समस्याएं  in the economy and inefficiencies inherent in labour  बाज़ार  , including a mismatch between the supply  और  demand of laborers with necessary skill sets .
Structural arguments emphasize causes and solutions related to disruptive technologies and globalization .
Discussions of  frictional  unemployment focus on voluntary decisions to work based on each individuals ' valuation of their own work and how that compares  to  current  मजदूरी  rates plus the time and effort required to find a job .
Causes and solutions for frictional  बेरोजगारी  often address job entry threshold and wage rates .
Behavioral economists highlight individual biases  in  decision making ,  और  often involve problems and solutions concerning  स्टिकी  wages and efficiency wages .
Collectivism is any philosophic , political , religious , economic ,  or  social outlook that  emphasizes  the interdependence of every human being in a society or  सभ्यता  .
Collectivism is a basic  सांस्कृतिक  element that exists as the reverse of individualism in human nature ( in the same way high context culture exists as the  रिवर्स  of low context culture ) .
collectivist  orientations stress the  महत्व  of cohesion within social groups ( such as an `` in-group '' , in what specific context it is defined )  और  in some cases , the priority  of  group goals  over   व्यक्तिगत  goals .
Collectivists often focus on community  ,  society , nation or country .
It has been used as an element  in   अनेक  different and diverse  प्रकार  of government and political , economic and educational philosophies throughout history and most human societies in practice contain elements of  दोनो  individualism and collectivism  .
Some examples of collectivist cultures include India and Japan .
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism and vertical collectivism .
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals  ,  and is thus usually based on  decentralization  and egalitarianism .
Vertical  collectivism  is based on hierarchical  structures  of power and on moral and cultural conformity , and is therefore based on centralization and hierarchy .
A cooperative enterprise would be an example of horizontal collectivism , whereas  a  military hierarchy would  be  an example  of  vertical collectivism .
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) is an immune mediated disease of the brain .
It usually occurs following a viral  संक्रमण  but may appear following  टीकाकरण  , bacterial or parasitic infection , or even appear spontaneously .
As it involves autoimmune demyelination  ,  it is similar  to  multiple sclerosis , and is considered part of the Multiple sclerosis borderline diseases .
The incidence rate is about 8 per 1,000,000  लोगों  per year .
Although it occurs in all ages , most reported cases are in children and adolescents , with the average age around 5 to 8 years old .
the  mortality rate may be as  ऊँची   as  5 % , full recovery is  देखी  in 50 to 75  %  of cases , while up to 70 to  90  % recover with some minor residual disability .
The average time to recover is one to six months .
ADEM produces multiple  जलन  lesions in the  दिमाग  and spinal cord , particularly in the white matter .
Usually these are found in  the  subcortical  और  central white matter and cortical gray-white junction  of  both cerebral  बांटती   ,  cerebellum , brainstem , and spinal cord , but periventricular white matter and gray matter of the cortex  ,  thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved .
When the patient suffers more than  एक  demyelinating  एपीसोड  , it is called recurrent disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ) .
The stomach is a muscular  ,  hollow ,  dilated  part  of  the digestion system which functions as  an  important organ of the digestive tract in some animals , including vertebrates , echinoderms , insects ( mid-gut ) , and molluscs .
It is involved in the second phase of digestion , following mastication ( chewing )  .
The stomach is located between the esophagus and the small intestine .
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes called protease and strong acids to aid in  खाना  digestion , (  भेजा  to it via esophageal peristalsis  )  through  चिकना  muscular contortions (  पुकारा  segmentation )  पहले  sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to  the  small intestines .
The  शब्द   पेट  is derived from  the  Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ) , ultimately from stoma ( )  ,  `` mouth ''  .
the  words gastro- and  gastric  ( meaning  सम्बन्धित  to the stomach ) are both derived from the Greek word gaster  (  ) .
1940 Pontiac Special  श्रेणी  25 Woodie
A woodie is a car body style , especially a station wagon , where the  पश्च  bodywork is constructed of wood framework  साथ  infill panels  of  wood or painted metal .
After the demise  of  actual wood construction , manufacturers used simulated woodgrain  चादर   vinyl—sometimes   augmented  with three-dimensional , simulated framework—to recall wood construction .
In 2008 , wood  निर्माण  was evoked abstractly on the Ford Flex with a  श्रेणी  of side and rear horizontal grooves .
A pearl is a hard  ऑब्जेक्ट  produced within the soft tissue  (  specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc .
Just like the shell of a  clam  , a pearl is made up of  कैल्सियम  carbonate in minute crystalline form , which has been deposited in concentric layers .
The ideal pearl is perfectly round and  चिकना  , but many other  आकार  of  मोती   (  baroque  मोती  ) occur .
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as gemstones and objects  of  beauty for many centuries ,  और  because of this ,  the  word pearl has become a metaphor for something very rare , fine , admirable , and valuable .
The most valuable pearls occur spontaneously in the wild , but they are  अत्यधिक  rare .
These  जंगली  pearls are referred to as natural pearls .
Cultured or farmed pearls  इससे  pearl oysters and freshwater mussels  मेक  up the majority  of  those that are currently sold .
नकल  pearls are also widely sold in inexpensive jewelry , but the quality of their iridescence is usually very poor , and often , artificial pearls are easily distinguished from genuine pearls .
मोती  have been harvested and cultivated primarily  लिये   उपयोग  in jewelry , but in the past they were also stitched onto lavish  कपडे  .
Pearls have also been crushed and used in cosmetics , medicines , and in paint formulations .
Whether wild or cultured ,  gem  quality  मोती  are almost always  nacreous  and , as is the interior of the shell that produces them .
However , almost all species of shelled molluscs are capable of producing pearls ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape .
Although these  may  also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also under U.S. Federal Trade Commission  नियम  , and are  formed  in the same way , most of them have no value , except as  curiosities  .
Bing ( known previously as Live Search , Windows Live Search  ,  and MSN  ढूंढें  ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine  ``  )  इससे  Microsoft .
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO  स्टीव  Ballmer on May 28 , 2009 at the All Things  डिजिटल  conference in San Diego for release on June 1 .
Notable changes include the listing of  ढूंढें  suggestions while queries are entered and  a  list of  सम्बन्धित  searches  (  called `` Explore  फलक  '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008 .
On July 29  ,  2009 , Microsoft and Yahoo ! announced a deal in which Bing would power Yahoo ! Search .
All Yahoo ! Search global customers and partners are expected to have made the transition by early 2012 .
In October 2011 , Bing announced  it  was working on new back-end search infrastructure  ,  with  the   लक्ष्य  of delivering faster and slightly more relevant search results for users .
Known as `` Tiger '' , the new index-serving technology has been incorporated into Bing globally , since August 2011 .
In May 2012 , Bing announced  another  redesign  of  its search engine that includes `` Sidebar '' , a social feature that searches  उपयोक्ता  ' social networks for information relevant to the search query .

In American football , each team has eleven  खिलाड़ी  on the  फ़ील्ड  at one time .
The specific role that a player takes on the field is called their position .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are  अनुमत  unlimited subsititutions , that  is  teams may change any number of players after any play .
इस  has resulted in the development of three `` platoons  ''  of players , the offense ( the team with the ball , who is trying to score  )  , the defense  (  the team  trying   to   prevent  the other team  इससे  scoring , and to take  the  ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations )  .
भीतर  those platoons , various  विशिष्ट  positions exist depending on what the  खिलाड़ी   's  main job  is  .
the  Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ;  ulster-scots  : Airish fowk ) are an ethnic group who originate in Ireland  ,  an island  in  northwestern Europe .
Ireland has been populated  लिये  around 9,000 years  (  according  to  archaeological studies , see  प्रागैतिहासिक  Ireland ) .
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in legends – they  हैं  claimed to be descended from groups such as the Nemedians , Fomorians , Fir  bolg  ,  tuatha  Dé Danann  और  the Milesians .
Lebor  gabála  Érenn , a book of Irish mythology tells that Milesians were Scythian descendants .
The main groups that interacted  साथ  the Irish in the Middle Ages include the Picts , Scots , and the Vikings .
Due to this contact , Icelanders are noted for having some Irish descent .
The  anglo-norman  invasion of the High Middle Ages , the  अंग्रेज़ी  plantations and the subsequent English rule of the country introduced the Normans and Flemish into Ireland .
Welsh , Picts ,  bretons  , and small parties of  gauls  and even Anglo-Saxons  हैं   ज्ञात  in Ireland from much earlier times .
There have  महरूम  many notable Irish  लोगों  throughout history .
The 6th century  आयरिश  monk  और   मिशनरी  Columbanus is regarded as one of  the  `` fathers of Europe '' , followed by Kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg  .
The scientist Robert Boyle is considered  the  `` father of chemistry  ``  .
Famous Irish explorers include Brendan  the  Navigator , Robert McClure , Ernest Shackleton and Tom Crean .
By  कुछ  accounts ,  the  first European child born in North  अमेरिका  had Irish descent on both sides ; and an Irishman was the  पहला  European  to  set  पैर  on American soil in Columbus  '   expedition  of 1492 .
There are descendants of Irish people living in many western countries  ,  particularly in English-speaking countries .
Historically , emigration has  महरूम  caused  by  politics , famine  और  economic  मुद्दे  .
An estimated 50 to  80  million people are descendants of Irish people  ,  primarily  in  the United Kingdom , the United States , Australia , Canada and Iceland ; there are also smaller  संख्याएँ  in Argentina  ,  Chile , Mexico , Jamaica , Barbados , South Africa , New Zealand , France , Germany and  ब्राज़ील  .
The largest number  of  descendants of Irish people live in the United States .
The  क्रमांक  of  लोगों  living  in   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  who are of Irish descent is higher , as a  प्रतिशत  of total population , than that of any other country .
Approximately forty percent  of  the settlement  जनसांख्यिकी  of Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland .
The very  पहला  inhabitants of Iceland were Irish .
the  Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that was carried  into   कक्षा   by  a Space Shuttle in 1990 and remains in operation  .
A aperture telescope in  कम  Earth orbit , Hubble  's  four main instruments  observe  in the near  पराबैंगनी  , visible , and near infrared .
the   दूरदर्शी  is named after  the  astronomer Edwin Hubble .
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of Earth 's atmosphere allows  it  to take extremely sharp images with almost no background  लाइट  .
Hubble  's  Deep Field have been some of the most detailed visible-light  बिंब   कभी  , allowing a deep view into space and time .
Many Hubble observations have led  to  breakthroughs in astrophysics , such as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe .
Although not the first space telescope ,  हबल  is one of the largest and most versatile ,  और  is well known as both  a  vital research tool and a public relations boon for astronomy .
The  hst  was built  by  the United States space agency  नासा  , with contributions from the European Space Agency , and is operated by the Space Telescope Science Institute .
The HST is one of NASA 's Great Observatories , along with the Compton Gamma Ray Observatory , the Chandra X-ray Observatory , and the Spitzer Space Telescope .
Space  telescopes   यहूद  proposed as early as 1923 .
Hubble was funded  in  the 1970s , with a proposed launch in 1983 , but  the  project was beset by technical delays , budget problems , and  the  Challenger  विपत्ति  .
When finally launched in 1990 , scientists found  कि  the  प्रमुख  mirror had been ground incorrectly ,  compromising  the telescope 's capabilities .
The telescope was restored to  इसके  intended quality by a servicing mission in 1993 .
Hubble is the only telescope designed to be serviced in space by astronauts .
Between 1993 and 2002 , four missions  repaired  , upgraded , and  replaced  systems on the telescope ; a  पांचवां  mission was canceled on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster .
However ,  बाद  spirited public  चर्चा  , NASA administrator Mike Griffin  स्वीकृत  one final servicing mission , completed  in  2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis .
The  दूरदर्शी  is now expected to  फलन  until at  तनिक  2013 .
Its scientific successor , the  जेम्स   webb  Space Telescope ( JWST ) ,  is  to be launched in  2018   or  possibly later .
Anti-inflammatory refers to the property of a substance or treatment that  reduces  inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory drugs make up about half of analgesics , remedying pain by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids , which affect the central nervous system .
The Tonight Show is a US late-night talk show that has aired on NBC since 1954 .
It is the longest  फिलहाल  running regularly scheduled entertainment program  in  the US and the third longest-running show on NBC after Meet the Press and Today .
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ) , Jack Paar ( 1957–1962 ) , Johnny Carson ( 1962–1992  )  , Jay Leno ( 1992–2009 , 2010–present ) ,  और  Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ) .
Several guest hosts also appeared , particularly during the Paar and Carson eras .
The longest-serving host to date  थी  Johnny Carson , who  hosted  The Tonight  दिखाएँ  Starring Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring  of   1992  .
The current host of the show is Jay Leno , who had previously hosted the show from 1992 to 2009 and began his second tenure on March 1 , 2010 .
On April  3  , 2013 , NBC announced Jimmy Fallon would become the new host of  the  Tonight Show .
The Tonight  दिखाएँ  with Jimmy Fallon  होगा  premiere February 24 , 2014 , the day after the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics .
SS Andrea Doria .
Pronounced was an ocean liner  लिये  the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione Italia ) home  ported  in Genoa , Italy , most famous for its sinking in 1956 , when 52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact ) .
Named  बाद  the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria , the ship had  a  gross register tonnage of 29,100  और  a capacity of about 1,200 passengers and 500 crew .
For a country attempting  to   rebuild  its economy and reputation after World War II ,  एंड्रिया  Doria was an icon of Italian  नेशनल   अभिमान  .
Of all Italy 's ships at the time , Andrea Doria was the largest , fastest and supposedly safest  .
Launched on 16  जून  1951 , the ship undertook its  maiden  voyage on 14 January 1953 .
On 25 July 1956 , while the Andrea  डोरिया  was approaching the coast  of  Nantucket , Massachusetts , bound for New  यॉर्क  City ,  the  eastbound of the Swedish American  लकीर  collided with it in what became one  of  history 's most infamous maritime disasters .
Struck  in  the side , the top-heavy Andrea  डोरिया  immediately started to list severely  to  starboard , which left  हाफ   of  its lifeboats unusable .
The consequent shortage  of   lifeboats  might have resulted in significant loss of life , but the efficiency of the ship 's technical design  अनुमत  it to stay afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming .
the  good behavior of the crew , improvements in communications and the rapid response of other ships averted  a  disaster similar in scale to that of the in  1912  .
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued and survived , while 46 people died  as  a consequence of the collision .
the  evacuated luxury liner  capsized  and sank the following morning .
This accident remains the worst maritime disaster to occur in United States waters since the sinking of the in 1915 .
The incident  और  its aftermath were heavily covered  by   the  news media .
While the rescue efforts were both successful and  commendable  , the cause of  the  collision with  the  Stockholm  और  the loss of  एंड्रिया  Doria generated much interest in the media and many  lawsuits  .
Largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between  the  two shipping companies during  hearings  immediately after the disaster , no determination of the  कारण  (  s   )  was ever formally published .
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the Italian liner ,  अधिक  recent discoveries have indicated that a misreading of  रडार  on the Swedish ship may have initiated the collision course , leading to errors on both ships .
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic passenger vessel to sink before aircraft  became  the preferred method of travel .
Dialysis tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable membrane tubing made  इससे  regenerated cellulose or cellophane .
It can be used for diffusion with solutes or osmosis if used with water only .
Osmosis is when water passes through a semi-permeable layer to reach equilibrium .
Diffusion , on the other hand , allows the movement of molecules from high concentration to  कम  concentration .
It will only allow  अणुओं  to pass through a semi-permeable membrane or layer if the  अणु  is small enough to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore .
इस  usually results  साथ  the effects of diffusion through a membrane  तभी  really affects small  अणुओं  , and almost never larger molecules .
Dialysis tubing is  प्रयुक्त  in clinical circumstances to ensure  a  filtered flow of molecules , preventing  the  flow of larger solute molecules .
Small molecules can be `` washed '' out of a solution which is pumped through the tubing  into  a  solvent  , usually  जल  , which  surrounds  it and in which they can be flushed away .
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes , a solution containing several types of molecules , usually  ग्लूकोज  and starch , is placed into a semi-permeable dialysis bag , such as a cellulose membrane with pores , and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band .
The sealed  डायलिसिस  bag is placed in a container of a  अलग  solution , or water .
Molecules small enough to pass through the tubing ( water , salts ,  monosaccharides  , and other small molecules ) tend to move into or out of the dialysis bag in the  दिशा  of decreasing concentration , therefore displaying diffusion .
Larger molecules ( such as proteins , or polysaccharides ) that have dimensions significantly greater than the pore diameter are retained inside the dialysis bag .
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to  )  will cross a semi-permeable membrane ,  जैसे  dialysis tubing , into a hypertonic solution ( a solution that has a higher solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) in an attempt to  पहुँचें  equilibrium , where  the  solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium .
Mercury laboratory thermometer
A thermometer ( from the Greek , thermos  ,  meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον ,  metron  , `` measure '' ) is a device that  उपायों  temperature or temperature  अनुपात  using a variety of different principles .
A thermometer has two important elements :  the  temperature sensor  (  e.g . the  बल्ब  on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) in which some physical change occurs with temperature , plus some means  of  converting this physical change into a numerical value ( e.g . the visible scale that  is  marked  on  a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) .
There  हैं  many types and  अनेक  uses for thermometers , as detailed below  in   भाग  of this article .
Snow  श्वेत  and the Seven Dwarfs  is  a 1937 American animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures .
Based on the German fairy  टेल  by the  भाइयो  Grimm  ,  it is the first full-length cel animated feature film and the  earliest  in the Walt Disney Animated Classics  श्रेणी  .
The story was adapted by storyboard artists Dorothy  ऐन   रिक्त  , Richard Creedon , Merrill De Maris , Otto Englander , Earl Hurd , Dick Rickard , Ted Sears and  webb   स्मिथ  .
David Hand was the supervising director , while William Cottrell ,  विल्फ्रेड  Jackson , Larry Morey , Perce Pearce , and Ben Sharpsteen directed the film 's individual sequences .
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21 , 1937 , followed by a nationwide release  on  February 4 , 1938 ,  और  with international earnings of $ 8 million during its initial release briefly  assumed  the record of highest grossing sound film at the time .
the  popularity of  the  film has led to it being re-released theatrically  अनेक   टाइम्स  , until its home video release in the  1990s  .
Adjusted for  महंगाई  , it is one of the top ten  performers  at the North American box office .
At the 11th Academy Awards  ,  Walt Disney  थी  awarded an honorary Oscar , and the film was nominated for Best Musical Score  .
It was added to  the  United States National Film Registry in 1989  और  is ranked in the American Film Institute 's  सूची  of the 100 greatest American  films   ,  who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008 .
Disney 's take on  the  fairy tale has  था  a big cultural impact , resulting in a popular theme park attraction , a video game , and a Broadway musical .
Childbirth , labour , delivery , birth , partus  ,  or parturition is the culmination of  a  pregnancy period with the expulsion of one or more newborn infants from a woman 's uterus .
The  प्रक्रम  of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening and dilation of the  ग्रीवा   ,  descent and birth of the infant , and birth of the placenta .
In many cases and with increasing frequency  ,  childbirth is achieved through induction  of  labor  or  caesarean section , which is the removal of the neonate through a surgical incision in  the   उदर  , rather than through vaginal birth .
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. from 1996 to 2006 ,  और  comprise nearly  32  %  of  births in the U.S. and Canada .
With respect to induced labor , more than 22 % of women undergo induction of  श्रमिक   in  the United States .
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be  नुकसानदेह  to  the  fetus and neonate as well  as  harmful or without benefit to the mother  ,  and have  स्थापित  strict guidelines for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks .
Viva  la   bam  was an MTV & Viva show which followed Bam Margera and his crew as they undertook challenges , performed stunts and traveled the world .
The show ran for 5 seasons between 2003 and 2005 .
Flushed Away is a 2006  british/american  computer animated action / adventure comedy film directed by David Bowers and Sam Fell .
It was made in the partnership between Aardman Animations and DreamWorks Animation , and is Aardman 's first completely computer-animated feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion .
The film stars the voice talents of Hugh Jackman , Kate Winslet , Andy Serkis , Bill Nighy , Ian McKellen , Shane Richie and Jean Reno  .
The  स्टोरी  was  by  Sam Fell , Peter Lord ,  लंड  Clement , and Ian La Frenais  ,   और  the screenplay was written by Dick Clement , Ian La Frenais , Christopher Lloyd ,  जो  Keenan , and William Davies .
The film was released  in  US on  3  November 2006  ,  and in UK on December 1 2006 , and was distributed by Paramount  तस्वीरें  , except for Switzerland , Spain , and the Netherlands , which were handled by Universal Pictures  .
The Atlanta Braves are a professional baseball team based  in   अटलांटा  .
The Braves are a member of the  पूर्वी  Division of Major League Baseball  's  National League .
The  braves  have played in Turner Field since  1997  .
The `` Braves '' name , which was first used in 1912 ,  originates  from a term for a Native American  योद्धा  .
They are nicknamed ``  the  Bravos '' , and often  referred  to as  ``  America  's  Team ``  in  reference to the  टोली  's  खेल  being broadcast on the nationally available TBS from the 1970s until 2007 , gaining a wide fanbase .
From 1991 to  2005  the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in baseball , winning  प्रभाग  titles an unprecedented 14 consecutive times in that period ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season  in  which there were no official division champions ) .
the  Braves won the NL West 1991–93 and the NL East 1995–2005 , and returned to  the  playoffs as the National League Wild Card in 2010 .
The Braves advanced to the  संसार  Series five times in the 1990s , winning the title in 1995 .
Since their debut in the National League  in  1876 , the franchise has won 16 divisional titles  ,  17 National  लीग   pennants  , as well as  तीन  World Series championships—in 1914 as  the  Boston Braves , in 1957  as   the  Milwaukee Braves , and in 1995 in Atlanta .
The Braves are the only MLB franchise to have won the World Series in  तीन  different home cities .
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other  होने  the Chicago Cubs ) and was founded in Boston , Massachusetts , in 1871 as the Boston Red Stockings ( not to be confused with the American League  's  Boston Red  sox  ) .
They are  माना  `` the  oldest  continuously playing team in  प्रमुख  North American sports . ''
There is an argument as to  जो  is actually older because although the Cubs are a full season `` older '' ( formed  as  the Chicago  श्वेत  Stockings in 1870 ) Chicago lost two seasons to the Great Chicago Fire , thus the Braves have  निभाई  more  लगातार  seasons .
After  विभिन्न  name changes  (  such as the Boston  beaneaters  ) , the team operated as the  बोस्टन  Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century .
In 1953 , the team moved to Milwaukee ,  विस्कॉन्सिन  and became the Milwaukee Braves ,  followed  by the move to Atlanta in 1966 .
The team 's tenure in  अटलांटा  is famous for Hank  आरोन  breaking Babe Ruth 's career home  चलाएं  record in 1974 , though  the  majority of Aaron 's home runs were  hit  while the team was  in  Milwaukee .
His record stood until 2007  ,   जब  San Francisco left fielder Barry Bonds broke the record  .
The leaves of  a  Beech tree
3D rendering  of  a μCT scan of  a  leaf piece , resolution circa 40  μm/  voxel  .
A leaf is an organ of a vascular plant , as  पारिभाषित  in botanical terms , and in  particular  in plant morphology .
Foliage is  a  mass noun that refers to leaves as a feature of plants .
Typically a leaf is a thin ,  flattened  organ borne above ground and specialized  लिये  photosynthesis , but many  प्रकार  of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are not flat ( for example many succulent leaves and conifers ) , some  हैं  not above ground ( such as bulb scales ) , and some are without major photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls , spines  ,  and cotyledons ) .
conversely  , many structures of non-vascular plants , or  भी  of some lichens  ,  which are not plants at all ( in the sense of being members of the kingdom Plantae ) , do look and function much like leaves  .
Furthermore , several structures  मिला  in vascular plants look like leaves but  हैं  not actually leaves ; they differ from leaves in their structures and origins .
Examples include  phyllodes  , cladodes , and phylloclades .
Title card for the 1937 Our Gang comedy Rushin ' Ballet .
Our Gang ( also  ज्ञात  as The Little Rascals or Hal Roach 's Rascals ) are  a  series of American comedy short  films  about a group of poor neighborhood children and their adventures .
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach , the series is noted for showing children behaving in a relatively natural way , as  रोच  and original director Robert F. McGowan worked to film the unaffected , raw nuances apparent in regular children rather than have them imitate adult acting styles .
in  addition , Our Gang notably put boys , girls , whites and blacks  साथ  in a group as  बराबरी   ,  something  कि  ``  broke  new ground , '' according to film historian Leonard Maltin .
Such a thing had never been done before in cinema but has since been repeated after the success  of  Our Gang .
The first production at the Roach studio in 1922 was  a  series of silent short subjects .
जब   रोच  changed distributors from Pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( MGM ) in 1927 , and converted the series to sound in 1929 , the series took off even  further  .
Production continued  at  the Roach studio until 1938 , when the series was  बेची  to MGM ,  जो  then continued producing the comedies until 1944  .
The Our Gang series includes a total of 220 shorts and one feature film , General  spanky  , featuring over forty-one child actors .
As MGM retained the rights to  the  Our Gang trademark following their purchase of the production rights , the  80   roach-produced  `` talkies  ''  were syndicated for television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both Roach  's  The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang package (  अभी  owned by Warner  भाईs.  Entertainment ) have since remained in syndication  ,  with periodic new productions based on the shorts surfacing  over  the years , including a  1994  Little Rascals feature film released  by  Universal Pictures .
zacharias  Janssen ( also Zacharias Jansen or Sacharias Jansen ) ( b.1580-88 , d.pre-1632 to 1638 )  थी  a Dutch spectacle-maker from  middelburg   संबद्ध  with the invention of the first optical telescope .
Janssen is sometimes also credited for inventing the first truly compound microscope  .
However , the origin  of  the microscope , just like the origin of the telescope , is a matter of debate .
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is  a  large freshwater lake in the Sierra Nevada of the United States .
at  a surface elevation of , it is located along the border between California  और  Nevada , west of  कार्सन  City .
Lake  tahoe  is the largest alpine lake in North America .
Its  गहराई  is , making  it  the United State 's second-deepest ( the deepest is  crater  Lake in Oregon , being deeper , at )  .
Additionally , Lake  tahoe  is listed  as  the 26th largest lake by volume in the world at  .
The  झील  was formed about 2 million years ago and is a part of the Lake Tahoe Basin  साथ  the modern lake being shaped during  the  ice ages .
It is known  लिये  the clarity  of  its water and the panorama of surrounding mountains on all sides .
The area surrounding  the   झील  is also referred to as Lake Tahoe  ,  or simply Tahoe .
Lake Tahoe is a  प्रमुख  tourist attraction  in  both Nevada and  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
It is home to a number  of  ski resorts  ,  summer outdoor  मनोरंजन  , and tourist attractions .
हिम   और  skiing are a significant part of the area 's economy and reputation .
Mountain and lake scenery  हैं   आकर्षण  throughout the  साल  .
The Nevada side also includes large casinos .
Highways provide year-round access from Reno , Carson City ,  और  Sacramento .

The Twenty-seventh  amendment  ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law  कि  increases or decreases the salary of members of the Congress from  लेने  effect until the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives .
It is the most recent amendment to the United States Constitution .
It was submitted  to  the states for ratification in 1789 and was adopted  in  1992 .
“First  वे  came ... ” is  a  famous  बयान  and provocative poem attributed to pastor Martin Niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) about the sloth of German intellectuals following the Nazis ' rise to power  और  the subsequent purging of their chosen targets , group after group .
There is some disagreement over the exact  wording  of the quotation and when it was created ; the content of the quotation may have been presented differently by Niemöller on  अलग  occasions .
