Four Thirds logo
The Four Thirds system is a standard created by  ओलम्पस  and Kodak for  डिजिटल  single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR  )  design and development.  <  ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 '  >
The  प्रणाली  provides a standard that  ,  with digital cameras and lenses available from multiple manufacturers , allows for the interchange of lenses and bodies from different manufacturers .
seems  to cover the standard .
Proponents describe it as an open standard  ,  but companies may only use it under a non-disclosure agreement .
Unlike older SLR systems , Four Thirds  रै  been  designed  from the ground up to be entirely digital .
Many lenses are extensively computerized , to the point that Olympus offers firmware updates for many of them .
Lens  डिज़ाइन  has been tailored to the requirements of digital sensors , most notably through  telecentric   डिजाइन  .
The size of the sensor is significantly smaller than for most  dslrs  and this implies that lenses , especially telephoto lenses , can be smaller .
लिये  example , a Four Thirds lens with a 300 mm focal length would cover about the same angle of view as a 600 mm focal length lens for the 35 mm film standard ,  और   is  correspondingly more compact .
Thus , the Four Thirds  प्रणाली  has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of about 2 ,  और  while this enables longer focal length for greater magnification , it  करता  n't aid the manufacture of wide angle lenses .
The image sensor format  ,  generally intermediate between those of larger SLRs and smaller compact cameras , generally gives levels  of  cost , performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes .
HVAC systems  उपयोग  ventilation air  नलिकाएं  installed  throughout  a building to supply conditioned air to a room  through  outlet vents  ,  called  diffusers  ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles .
HVAC ( heating , ventilation , and air conditioning ) is the technology of indoor and automotive environmental comfort  .
HVAC system  डिज़ाइन  is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering , based on the principles of thermodynamics ,  द्रव  mechanics ,  और  heat  ट्रांसफ़र  .
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or HVACR , or  ventilating  is dropped as in HACR ( such as the designation  of   hacr-rated  circuit  ब्रेकर्स  ) .
HVAC is important in the design of medium  to  large industrial and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine environments such as aquariums ,  जहाँ   सुरक्षित  and healthy building conditions are  regulated  with respect to temperature and humidity , using fresh air  इससे  outdoors .
Ventilation  on  the downdraught system , by impulsion , or the 'plenum ' principle , applied to schoolrooms  (   1899  )
Heating , ventilating , and air conditioning is based on inventions and  discoveries  made by Nikolay Lvov  ,  Michael Faraday ,  विलिस  Carrier , Reuben Trane , James Joule  ,   विलियम  Rankine , Sadi Carnot , and many others .
The invention of  the  components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial revolution , and new methods of modernization , higher efficiency , and  प्रणाली  control are constantly introduced  by  companies and inventors worldwide .
The three central functions of heating , ventilating ,  और  air-conditioning  हैं   interrelated  ,  विशेषकर  with the need to provide thermal comfort and acceptable indoor air quality within reasonable installation , operation , and maintenance costs .
HVAC systems can provide ventilation , reduce air infiltration  ,  and  maintain   दबाव  relationships between spaces .
The means of air delivery and removal from spaces is known as  रूम  air distribution .
The starting point in carrying out an estimate  दोनो  for  कूलिंग  and heating depends on  the   exterior  climate and interior specified conditions  .
However before taking up the heat load calculation , it is necessary to find fresh air requirements for each area in detail , as pressurization is an  महत्वपूर्ण  consideration .
In  आधुनिक  buildings the design  ,  installation , and control systems of these functions are integrated  into  one or more  hvac  systems  .
For very small  इमारतें  , contractors normally capacity engineer and select HVAC systems  और  equipment .
For larger buildings , building services designers and engineers , such as mechanical , architectural , or building services engineers analyze , design , and  बताएँ  the HVAC systems ,  और   specialty  mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them .
Building permits  और  code-compliance inspections  of  the installations are normally required for all sizes of buildings .
The HVAC industry  is  a worldwide enterprise , with roles including operation and maintenance , system design and construction , equipment manufacturing and sales , and in education and  शोध  .
The  hvac   उद्योग   थी  historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC  उपकरण  ,  लकिन  regulating and standards organizations such as HARDI , ASHRAE , SMACNA , ACCA , Uniform Mechanical Code , International Mechanical Code , and  amca  have been established  to  support the industry and encourage high standards and achievement .
Royal  नेवी  Commander James Bond ,  cmg  ,  rnvr  , is a fictional character created by British journalist and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953 .
he  is the protagonist of the James Bond series of novels  ,  films , comics and video games .
Fleming wrote twelve Bond novels and  दो   छोटी  story collections before his death , although the last two books— The Man with the Golden Gun and  octopussy  and The Living Daylights —were published posthumously .
The Bond character is a Secret Service agent , code number 007 , residing in London but active  internationally  .
Bond was a  कम्पोजिट  character who was based on a number of commandos  जिसको  Fleming  knew  during his service  in  the Naval Intelligence Division during World War II , to whom Fleming added his own style and a number of his  अपना  tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated from American  ornithologist  James Bond .
Bond has a number of character traits which run  throughout  the books , including  an  enjoyment of cars  ,  a love of food and drink , and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day .
Since  फ्लेमिंग  's death in 1964  ,  there  have  been other authorised writers of Bond material , including  जॉन  Gardner , who wrote fourteen  novels  and two novelizations and Raymond Benson , who wrote six novels , three  novelizations   और  three short stories  .
There have also been three authors who wrote one book  प्रत्येक   ,  Kingsley Amis ( writing as Robert Markham ) , Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver .
Additionally a series  of  novels based on Bond 's youth— Young Bond —was written by Charlie  higson  .
As  spin-offs  from  the  literary works , there was a television adaptation of the first novel , Casino Royale , in which Bond was played as an  अमरीकी  agent  .
A comic strip series also ran in the Daily Express  समाचारपत्र  .
There have also been twenty-five Bond films ;  सात  actors have played Bond in these films .
`` Nature Boy ''  is  a song by Eden Ahbez  ,  published in 1947 .
the   सोंग  tells  a  fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy ... who  wandered  very far '' only  to  learn that `` the greatest thing ... was just  to  love and be loved in return '' .
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording of the song  थी  a major hit  और  `` Nature Boy '' has since become a pop and jazz standard , with dozens of major  कलाकारों  interpreting the song .
Louisiana (  or  ; ,  ;  Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a state located in the southern  प्रदेश  of the United States of America .
louisiana  is the 31st most extensive and the 25th most populous of the 50 United States .
Its capital is Baton Rouge and  largest  city is New Orleans .
Louisiana is the only state in the U.S. with political subdivisions termed parishes  ,  which are local government 's equivalent to counties .
The largest  मोहल्ला   by  population  is  East Baton Rouge Parish , and the largest by land area is Cameron Parish .
Much of  the  state  's  lands were  formed  from sediment washed down the Mississippi River , leaving enormous deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp .
These  contain  a rich southern biota ; typical  उदाहरण  include birds such as ibis and egrets .
There are also many species of tree frogs , and fish such as sturgeon and paddlefish .
In more elevated  क्षेत्रों  , fire  is  a natural process in the landscape , and has produced extensive areas of longleaf pine forest  और  wet savannas  .
These support an exceptionally large  क्रमांक  of plant species , including many species of  orchids  and carnivorous plants .
कुछ  Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural , multilingual heritage , being so strongly influenced by an admixture of 18th-century French  ,  Spanish , Native American ( Indian ) and African cultures that they are considered to be somewhat  असाधारण  in the U.S .
Before the American purchase of the territory , the current Louisiana State had been both a Spanish and French colony .
In addition , the pattern  of  development included importing numerous African  स्लेव  in the 18th century , with many from the same region of  वेस्ट  Africa , thus concentrating their culture .
In the post-Civil War environment ,  anglo-americans  increased the pressure for Anglicization , and in 1915 , English was made the  तभी  official language of the state .
Women  's  rights are the rights  और  entitlements claimed for women and girls of many societies worldwide .
In some places these rights are  institutionalized  or supported by  विधि  , local custom , and behaviour , whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions of  इंसान  rights through claims of  an  inherent historical and traditional bias against the exercise of  अधिकारों  by women  और  girls in favour of men and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's  अधिकारों  include , though are not limited  to  , the right  :  to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ;  to  hold public office  ;  to work ; to fair  मजदूरी  or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
The laws of science  or  scientific laws are  कथन  that describe , predict , and perhaps explain why , a range of phenomena  व्यवहार  as they appear to in nature .
The term `` law '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate , accurate , broad or narrow theories , in all natural scientific  disciplines  ( physics , chemistry , biology ,  भूविज्ञान   ,  astronomy etc .  )  .
an  analogous term for a scientific law is  a  principle .
Scientific laws:
summarize a large collection of facts determined by experiment into a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation  ,   or  at least stated in a single  वाक्य   ,  so that it can be used to predict the outcome of an  प्रयोग  , given the  आरंभिक  , boundary , and other  शारीरिक   शर्तें  of  the  processes which take place,
are strongly supported by empirical evidence - they are scientific knowledge that experiments have repeatedly verified ( and never falsified ) .
Their accuracy does not  बदलें  when new theories are worked out , but rather the scope of  अनुप्रयोग  , since the  समीकरण   (  if any  )  representing the law does not change  .
As with other scientific knowledge , they do  नहीं  have absolute  certainty  like mathematical theorems or identities , and it is  सदा  possible for a law to be overturned by future observations .
are  प्रायः  quoted as a  आधारभूत  controlling influence rather  than  a  वर्णन  of observed facts .
I.e .  ``  the laws of motion require  कि  ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates , which are proposed during the scientific process before  और  during validation by experiment and observation .
ये  are not laws since they have not been verified to the same degree and may not be sufficiently  सामान्य  , although they  may   सीसे  to  the  formulation of laws .
A law is a more solidified and formal statement , distilled from repeated experiment .
Although the  अवधारणाओं  of a law or principle in nature  is  borderline to philosophy , and presents the  गहराई   to  which mathematics can describe nature , scientific laws are considered from a scientific perspective and follow the scientific  विधि  ; they `` serve  उनके  purpose ''  बल्कि  than ``  questioning  reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ) .
For example  ,  whether a law `` refers to reality  ''  is a philosophical  समस्या  , rather than scientific .
Fundamentally ,  सब  scientific laws follow from physics , laws which occur in other sciences ultimately follow from physical laws  .
Often , from mathematically fundamental viewpoints , universal constants emerge from scientific laws  .
The launch  of  the PlayStation  3  into the Japanese market on 10 November 2006 marked  the  second major seventh  पीढी  entertainment system to be released .
The system  थी  released  सात  days later  on  17 November in the United States .
Introduction into other  संसार   बाज़ार  was delayed by a shortage of diodes for  उपयोग  in the Blu-ray  डिस्क  player ;  the  device was launched in European and other world markets in the first half of 2007 .
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams and Grainger ) is a fictional character from the CBS soap operas The Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful , portrayed  by  Tracey E. Bregman .
She made her  डेब्यू  during the episode  airing  on January 21 , 1983 .
In 1992 , Bregman began making sporadic appearances on The Bold and the Beautiful , later resulting in the character migrating there fully in 1995 .
following  a guest appearance in 2000 , Bregman returned to The Young and the Restless on August 24 , 2001 , remaining on  पुनरावर्ती  status .
In 2013 , it was announced that Bregman had been placed on contract .
Much of Lauren 's history has revolved around her romances with Paul Williams ,  स्कॉट   grainger  , Sr. , and Michael Baldwin among many others causing a fierce rivalry with Traci Abbott Connolly .
Lauren is also famous for  उसके  long , violent  फंसने  with Sheila Carter .
The 2010  एनबीए  Finals was the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) championship series  लिये  the 2009–10 season .
The best-of-seven  playoff  was contested between  the  Los Angeles Lakers , champions of the Western Conference and defending NBA champions , and the Boston Celtics , champions of the Eastern  सम्मेलन  .
the  Lakers defeated the Celtics  ,  four games to three , to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship .
The 64th edition of the  चैंपियनशिप  series was played between June 3 and June 17 , was broadcast on ABC , and  थी  watched by an average  of  18.1 million people .
The  सेल्टिक्स  earned their berth into  the  playoffs by winning the Atlantic  प्रभाग  .
The Lakers won the Pacific Division to earn their berth  .
The Celtics reached  the  NBA Finals by defeating the Miami Heat in  the  best-of-seven  पूर्वी  Conference First Round , the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference  semifinals  , and defending Eastern conference  चैंपियन  Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals .
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the best-of-seven Western Conference First Round  ,  the Utah Jazz in  the  best-of-seven Western Conference Semifinals , and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western  सम्मेलन  Finals .
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the Major League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven  खेल  format , with the Lakers possessing home-court advantage as a reward for  finishing  with  बेहतर  regular season record than the Celtics .
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant , Pau Gasol , and Ron Artest  brought  the Lakers close to  विजय  in Game 1 .
A record breaking performance from  रे  Allen 's eight three-point baskets ensured the Celtics a Game  2  triumph  .
Derek Fisher ’s 11  अंक  in the  चौथी  quarter helped the Lakers win Game 3 .
The Celtics won  खेल  4 ; it did n't hurt that they  netted  an excellent performance in  baskets  by the team’s  reserves  , while Paul Pierce led the team  to  a Game 5 win with 27 points on  57  % shooting  इससे  the floor .
The Lakers avoided elimination by winning a decisive Game 6 with 24 points contributed by  उनके   बेंच  .
Although they trailed  the  Celtics by 13 points early in the third quarter , the Lakers rallied and won  उनके   दूसरी   लगातार   चैंपियनशिप  by taking over an exciting Game 7 aided by  लेट  contributions  on  offense by Pau Gasol  और  Artest and rebounding .
ब्रायंट  was named Most Valuable Player of the Finals for his second consecutive trophy .
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full seven games since and only the fourth since the NBA Finals returned to a 2–3–2 format  in   .
The Laker franchise has 16 NBA Championships ( Five in Minneapolis , 11 in  लॉस  Angeles )  trailing  the Celtics '  सत्रह  championships .
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series  ''   स्वरूप  in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington Capitols 4  खेल  to 2 ; in 1953 Minneapolis defeated the New York Knicks 4 games to 1 ; in 1954 Minneapolis defeated  the  Syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; and in 1955  syracuse  Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3 .
The NBA would return to the  2–2–1–1–1  National Hockey League seven game series format until 1985  .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine  in  the family Piperaceae , cultivated for its fruit , which is usually dried and used as a spice and  seasoning  .
The  फल   ,  known as a  peppercorn  when dried , is  लगभग  in diameter , dark red when fully mature , and , like all drupes , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the  मैदान  pepper derived from them , may be described simply as pepper , or more  precisely  as black pepper  (  cooked and dried unripe fruit ) , green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper (  सूखी  ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is  देशी   to  south India , and is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical  regions  .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's  largest  producer and exporter of pepper , producing  34  % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper has been used since antiquity for both its flavour  और  as a medicine .
Black  pepper  is the world 's most traded spice .
It is one  of  the most common spices added to European cuisine  और  its descendants .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine , not to  be  confused with the capsaicin that  देता  fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in the modern  संसार  , often paired  साथ  salt .
In cardiovascular physiology , ejection fraction  (  EF ) represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of  the  ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle .
It can  be  applied to either  the  right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary  वाल्व  into the pulmonary circulation  or  the left ventricle which  ejects  via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation .
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art  कि   allows  meaningful mathematical expression defining EF .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become  a  worldwide  यूटिलिटी  enabling study of cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively .
Simplified , Ejection fraction is a mathematical product allowed by cardiac imaging .
As a mathematical term , Ejection Fraction is an extension of the work of Adolph Fick in cardiac output .
Dedicated technology  ऐसे  as Echocardiography , Computed Tomography , Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA scanning have definitively allowed  clinically  relevant  गणित  regarding Ischemia , Congenital Heart  बीमारी  and Heart  विफलता  .
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of the  अभियोजन  in countries with either the common law adversarial system , or the civil law  inquisitorial  system .
The prosecution is the legal party responsible for presenting the case in a criminal trial against an individual accused  of  breaking the law .
Strawberry shortcake most  commonly  means a  मिठाई  in the shortcake family of cakes .
Strawberry shortcake may also refer to:
Strawberry  shortcake   ,  a character and franchise created by American Greetings
The shortened title  of  Strawberry  on  the Shortcake , a Japanese romance movie .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 –  circa|  8 June 632 ) ,  भी  transliterated as Muhammad ( ) , was a  धार्मिक  , political , and  सैन्य  leader  इससे  Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam .
He  is  believed by  मुसलमान  and Bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God .
Muhammad is almost universally considered by Muslims as  the  last prophet sent by  परमेश्वर  for mankind .
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the founder of  islam  .
Muslims consider  उसे  to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus , and other prophets .
Born in  परिचय  570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca , he was orphaned at an  जल्दी   आयु  and brought up  अंतर्गत  the care of his uncle Abu  तालिब  .
He later worked mostly as a merchant , as well as a shepherd  ,  and was first  शादीशुदा  by age 25 .
Being in the  आदत   of  periodically retreating to a cave in the  surrounding  mountains  लिये  several nights of seclusion and prayer , he later reported that it was there , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from  परमेश्वर  .
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly , proclaiming that `` God is One  ``  , that complete `` surrender '' to Him  (  lit .
islām  )  is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to  परमेश्वर   ,  and that he himself was a prophet and  मेसेंजर   of  God , in the same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few followers early on , and was met with hostility from some Meccan tribes ; he and his  अनुसरणकर्ता  were treated harshly .
To escape persecution , Muhammad sent some  of  his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This event , the Hijra , marks the beginning of the Islamic  पंचांग   ,  which is  भी  known as the Hijri Calendar .
In Medina , Muhammad united the  जनजातियों  under the Constitution of Medina .
After eight years of fighting with  the  Meccan tribes , his followers , who by then had grown to 10,000  ,  took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca  .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then  भेजा  his followers out to destroy  सब  of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
In 632 , a few months after returning to Medina from The Farewell Pilgrimage , Muhammad fell  बीमार  and died .
By the time of his death , most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam , and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The revelations ( or Ayah , lit  .
``  लक्षण  [ of God ]  ''  ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form  the  verses of the Quran , regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and  around   जिससे  the religion is based .
Besides the Quran ,  मुहम्मद  's life ( sira  )   और  traditions ( sunnah ) are also  upheld  by Muslims  as  the sources of sharia law .
They discuss  मुहम्मद  and other prophets of Islam  साथ  reverence , adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times  यहूद   largely  negative , appraisals in modern history have  महरूम  far less so .
The  ग्रेट  Books  (  second edition )
Great  किताबे  of the Western World is a series of books originally  प्रकाशित  in  the  United States in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica Inc. to present the Great Books in a single package of 54 volumes .
The series is now in its second edition and contains 60  आयतन  .
The original editors  of  the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a  किताब   जरूर  be relevant  to  contemporary issues , and not only important in its historical  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  ; it must reward rereading ; and it must be a part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas ,  ''  relevant to  at  least 25  of  the 102 great ideas identified  by  the editors .
Books  यहूद  not chosen on the basis of ethnic or  सांस्कृतिक  inclusiveness , historical influence , or the editors ' agreement with the views expressed .
`` Cocaine ''  is  a song written and recorded by JJ Cale in 1976 , but also known as a cover version recorded by Eric Clapton  .
Allmusic calls the latter `` among  [  Clapton  's  ] most enduringly popular hits '' and notes that `` even for an artist like Clapton with a huge body of high-quality  कार्य  , 'Cocaine ' ranks among his best . ''
Glyn Johns , who had previously worked with The Who , Led Zeppelin and The Rolling Stones , produced the Clapton recording , which was released on Clapton 's 1977 album Slowhand and  as  a single in  1980  .
The live version of  ``  Cocaine '' , from the Just One Night album recorded in Tokyo , charted on the Billboard Hot 100 as  the  B-side of `` Tulsa Time `` , which was a No . 30  hit   in  1980.  ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of Cale 's songs  अंकित  by Clapton , including  ``  After Midnight `` and ``  travelin  ' Light ''  .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the  जापानी   इम्पीरियल  General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning  )  and the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a  आश्चर्य  military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning  of  December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From  the  standpoint of  the  defenders , the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The  आक्रमण  was intended as a  निवारक  action in order to keep  the  U.S.  प्रशांत  Fleet from  दखल  with military actions the Empire of Japan was  नियोजन   in  Southeast Asia  विरूद्ध  overseas territories of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The  आधार  was attacked  by  353 Japanese fighters , bombers and torpedo planes in two waves , launched from six aircraft carriers .
All eight U.S. Navy battleships were damaged , with four being sunk  .
Two  of  these were  बाद  raised , and  साथ  the  बाकी   चार  repaired  ,   छह  battleships returned to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank or damaged  तीन  cruisers , three destroyers , an anti-aircraft training ship , and one minelayer  .
188 U.S. aircraft were destroyed ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as  the  power station , shipyard , maintenance , and fuel and torpedo storage facilities , as well as the submarine  पियर  and headquarters  भवन  ( also home of the intelligence section )  यहूद  not attacked  .
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost  ,  and 65  servicemen  killed or wounded .
One Japanese sailor was captured .
The attack came as a profound shock  to  the American people and led directly  to  the American  प्रविष्टि  into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters  .
The following day ( December  8  ) , the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for non-interventionism , which had been strong , disappeared .
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality Patrol )  थी  replaced by active alliance .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to declare war on the U.S.  on  December 11  ,   जिससे  was reciprocated by the  u.S.  the same day  .
There were  numerous  historical precedents for unannounced military action by  जापानी  .
However  ,  the lack of any formal warning , particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing , led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December  7  , 1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
Project Runway Season 2 was the second season of Bravo 's successful Project Runway , a reality competition for fashion designers  .
Season 2 began airing on December 7  ,  2005 .
Following a nationwide search  पहले  in the year , sixteen designers were chosen as semi-finalists and brought to New York City in June , 2005 .
After the first challenge ,  पुकारा  `` Road To The Runway  ''  , fourteen went on to compete as finalists .
The winning designer , Chloe Dao , received  $  100,000 in seed money to  सहायता  launch her own line , a 2007  शनि  Sky roadster ,  a  spread in ELLE magazine , and  a  mentorship with the Banana Republic Design Team .
जीतना  alongside Dao was her model ,  अनुग्रह  Kelsey , who received the ELLE  पत्रिका  spread .
Michael Kors and Nina Garcia returned as judges for the second season .
The fourth judging seat rotated each week , based on the challenge .
Tim  gunn   ,  fashion chair  at  Parsons The New  स्कूल   लिये  Design , returned as a mentor for  the  designers .
Kara Janx later appeared in Project Runway :  सब  Stars in  2012  , where she finished 7th out of 13 .
Andrae Gonzalo , in the same year , competed in  the  second season of the All Stars edition placing 10th out of 13 .
an  example of a Heraclius mule
In numismatics ,  a  mule is  a  coin or medal  minted  with obverse and  रिवर्स  designs not  सामान्यतः  seen  on  the same piece .
These  can  be intentional or produced by error .
This type of error is highly sought after , and examples can fetch steep prices  इससे  collectors .
The earliest mules  हैं  found among  प्राचीन  Greek and Roman  सिक्के  .
Opinion is  विभाजित  between those who  सोचो   कि  they are accidental , the result of an incorrect combination of a new die with one that had officially been withdrawn from use , or the work  of   coiners  working with dies stolen from an official mint , perhaps at a time when one of them should have been destroyed .
The name derives from the mule , the hybrid offspring of a horse and a donkey ,  due  to such a coin having two sides intended for different coins , much as a mule has parents of two different species .
This page documents the tornadoes and tornado outbreaks of 2010 .
The majority of tornadoes form in the U.S. ,  लकिन  they can occur almost anywhere under  the  right conditions .
A lesser number occur outside the U.S. , most notably in parts of neighboring southern Canada during the  उत्तरी  Hemisphere 's summer season , but are also known in South America , Europe , Asia , and Australia .
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United States in 2010 ( of which at least 1,266 were confirmed ) , with 45 confirmed fatalities .
elsewhere  in the  संसार  , 11 people were  मारे  in tornadoes , six  in  Argentina ,  तीन  in the  बहामा  , one in Bangladesh , and one in  जर्मनी  .
The year was near  औसत  for tornadoes despite  an  extremely quiet early spring period , however such changed after a huge  upswing   starting  in late April and a busy late spring and summer period .
The autumn  महीने  were slightly above average .
A lymphocyte is a type of white blood cell in the vertebrate immune system .
Under the microscope , lymphocytes  can  be divided into large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes .
विशाल  granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells ( NK cells ) .
Small  lymphocytes  consist of T cells and B  कोशिकाएं  .
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's task automation framework  ,  consisting of a  command-line  shell and associated scripting language built  on  .NET Framework .
PowerShell provides full access to COM and WMI , enabling administrators to perform administrative tasks on both local and remote Windows systems .
In PowerShell ,  प्रशासनिक  tasks are generally performed by  cmdlets   (  pronounced command-lets ) , which are specialized .NET classes implementing a particular operation .
सेट   of  cmdlets may be combined together in scripts ,  executables  ( which are standalone applications )  ,   or  by instantiating regular .NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ) .
These work by  accessing  data in different data  स्टोर्स  , like the filesystem or registry , which are made available to the  powershell  runtime via Windows PowerShell providers .
खिड़कियाँ  PowerShell also provides a hosting API with which the Windows PowerShell runtime can be embedded inside other applications .
These applications can then  उपयोग  Windows PowerShell functionality to implement certain operations ,  सहित  those exposed via the  आलेखीय  interface  .
This capability  रै  been used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 to expose its management functionality as PowerShell cmdlets and providers and implement the graphical management tools as  powershell   होस्ट  which  invoke  the  जरुरी  cmdlets .
Other Microsoft applications including Microsoft SQL  सर्वर   2008  also  expose   उनके  management interface via PowerShell cmdlets .
With  powershell  , graphical interface-based management applications on Windows are layered on  शीर्ष  of Windows PowerShell .
A PowerShell scripting interface for Windows  उत्पाद  is mandated by the Common Engineering Criteria  .
Windows PowerShell includes its own extensive , console-based help , similar  to  man pages in Unix shells , via the Get-Help cmdlet .
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring Julie Andrews , Dick  वैन  Dyke , David Tomlinson  ,  and Glynis Johns , produced by Walt Disney , and  आधारित  on the Mary Poppins books series by P. L. Travers .
The film  थी  directed by Robert Stevenson and written by Bill  वाल्श  and Don DaGradi , with songs by the Sherman Brothers .
It was shot  at   वॉल्ट  Disney Studios in Burbank ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins and the film also won Oscars for Best Film Editing , Original Music Score , Best Song for `` Chim  chim  Cher-ee '' and Best Visual Effects , and  प्राप्त  a total  of  13 nominations .
A story arc is an extended or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media such as television , comic books , comic strips , boardgames  ,  video games , and in some cases ,  films  .
On a television program , for example , the story would  unfold  over many episodes .
In television , the use of the story arc is much more common in dramas than in comedies ,  विशेषकर  in soap operas .
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs  than  newspaper comics  ,  as most web comics  have  readable archives online that a newcomer to the strip can read in  अनुक्रम  to understand what is going on .
Although  स्टोरी  arcs have existed for decades , the term `` story arc  ''  was coined in 1988 in relation to the television series Wiseguy , and  थी  quickly adapted for other uses .
Many American comic book series are now  लिखा  in four or six-issue arcs , within a continuing series .
Short story arcs are easier to package as trade paperbacks for resale , and  अधिक  accessible to the casual reader than the never-ending continuity that once characterised comics .
Black Friday is  the   दिन  following Thanksgiving Day in the United States  ,  often regarded  as  the beginning of the  क्रिसमस  shopping season .
In recent years , most major retailers have opened extremely early and offered promotional sales to kick off the holiday shopping season , similar to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations .
ब्लैक  Friday is not an official public  अवकाश  as such ,  लकिन  many non-retail employees  और  schools have both Thanksgiving and the  दिन  after off  ,  followed by a weekend  ,  thereby increasing the number  of  potential shoppers .
it  has routinely  महरूम   the  busiest shopping day of the year since 2005 , although news reports , which at that time were  inaccurate  , have described it as the busiest shopping day of the year for a much longer period of time .
The day 's name  originated  in Philadelphia , where it originally was  प्रयुक्त  to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic which  होता  occur on the day after Thanksgiving .
Use of the term started before 1961 and began to see  broader  use outside Philadelphia around 1975 .
Later an alternative explanation began to be offered : that `` Black Friday '' indicates the point at which retailers begin to turn a profit , or  हैं  `` '' .
लिये  many years ,  it  was common for retailers to open at 6:00  a.m.  ,  लकिन  in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00 .
This was taken to a new extreme in 2011 , when several  रिटेलर  ( including Target , Kohl 's , Macy 's , Best Buy  ,  and Bealls )  खोली  at midnight for the first time .
In 2012 , Walmart and several other retailers announced that they  होता  open most of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except  in  states where opening on Thanksgiving is prohibited due  to  blue laws , such as Massachusetts where  वे  still opened around midnight ) , prompting calls for a walkout  among  some workers .
Black Friday shopping is known for attracting  आक्रामक  crowds  ,  with annual reports of assaults ,  shootings   ,   और  throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product  पहले   आपूर्तियाँ  run out  .
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American movie drama written  ,  produced  ,  and directed by Tyler Perry .
The screenplay  focuses  on two families , one wealthy and the other working class , whose lives are intertwined in both love and business .
The  फिल्म  is the second  of   चार  in which Perry  's  signature character  ,  Madea , does not  मेक  an appearance .
It is also the second Perry-directed film ( alongside Daddy 's Little  लड़कियों  ) that is not based on any of the filmmaker 's stage  plays  .
Net 10 , Net 15 , Net 30 and Net 60 ( also Net 10 days , et al ) are forms  of  trade credit which specify that the net amount ( the total outstanding on the invoice ) is expected to be paid in full and received by the seller within  10  , 15 ,  30  or 60 days after the  goods  are dispatched or service is completed .
जाल  30 or Net 60 terms are  प्रायः  coupled with a credit for early payment .
The word net in this sense means `` total after all discounts . ''
It originally derives from  the  Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( elegant , trim )  ,  and more recently from the French net ( sharp , neat , clean ) .
Roadtown ,  tortola
the  British West Indies were the islands in and around  the  Caribbean that were part of the British Empire .
In 1912 ,  the  British West Indies were divided into  आठ  colonies : The  बहामा  , Barbados , British Guiana , British Honduras , Jamaica ( with its dependencies the Turks and Caicos  आइलैंड्स  and the Cayman Islands ) , Trinidad and  टोबैगो  ,  the  Windward Islands and  the  Leeward Islands .
Between 1958 and 1962 ,  सब  of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands , the Bahamas , British Honduras and British Guiana were organised into the West Indies Federation .
It was hoped that the Federation would become independent as a single nation , but it had limited powers , many practical problems ,  और  a lack  of  popular support .
Consequently , the West Indies Federation was dissolved .
Most of the territories , including  सब  the larger ones , are now independent as  पृथक  countries , with membership to many international forums such as the Organization of  अमरीकी  States  ,  the Association  of  Caribbean States , the World Trade Organization , the United Nations , the Caribbean Community , the Commonwealth of Nations and the Caribbean Development Bank among others .
The remainder are British overseas territories .
All the former  राष्ट्र   of  the British West Indies , except the Commonwealth of Dominica , Guyana and Trinidad and  टोबैगो  , are Commonwealth Realms .
The term  is   स्टिल  used for British Overseas Territories in the Caribbean ,  ऐसे  as the Cayman Islands .
The remaining British West Indies
`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written by Bob Thiele ( as `` George Douglas ''  )  and George David  वेइस  .
It was first recorded by Louis Armstrong and released as  a  single in 1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the music world ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ) .
Armstrong 's recording was inducted in the Grammy Hall of Fame in 1999 .
The  प्रकाशन  for this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music Group , Carlin  म्यूज़िक  Corp. , and Bug Music , Inc .
Inauguration Day 2009 on the west steps of the U.S. Capitol .
President George W. Bush  और  First Lady Laura Bush lead the inaugural  परेड  down Pennsylvania  एवेन्यू  to the  श्वेत  House , 2005
The  उद्घाटन   of  the  अध्यक्ष  of the United States is a ceremonial event  अंकन  the commencement  of  a new four-year term of a president of the United States .
The day a  अध्यक्षीय   उद्घाटन  occurs is  ज्ञात  as `` Inauguration Day '' and  occurs  on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ) .
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment , the date was March 4 ,  the  day of the year on which the Constitution of the United  राज्य  first took  प्रभाव  in 1789 ; the last inauguration to take place on the older date  थी  Franklin D. Roosevelt 's  पहला  one on March 4 , 1933 . )
The most recent public presidential inauguration ceremony , the swearing in of President Barack Obama to begin his second four-year term in office , took  प्लेस  on  सोमवार  , January 21  ,   2013  .
The only inauguration element mandated by the United States Constitution is  कि  the president make an oath or affirmation before that person can `` enter on the Execution '' of the office  of  the presidency .
However , over the years , various traditions have arisen that have expanded the inauguration from a simple oath-taking ceremony to a day-long  इवेंट  , including parades , speeches , and balls  .
From the presidency of Andrew Jackson through that of Jimmy Carter , the primary Inauguration  दिन  ceremony took place on the Capitol 's East Portico .
Since the 1981 inauguration of Ronald Reagan , the ceremony has been held at  the  Capitol 's West Front .
The inaugurations of William Howard Taft in 1909 and Reagan in 1985 were moved indoors at the Capitol due to cold weather .
The War of 1812 and World War II caused two inaugurations to be held at other locations in Washington , D.C .
When  जार्ज  Washington was inaugurated , the oath was administered by Robert Livingston , Chancellor of New  यॉर्क  State  ,  in 1789 ,  और  by William Cushing ,  संबद्ध  Justice of the Supreme Court  ,  in 1793 .
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in President John Adams , no chief justice has  छूटी  an Inauguration Day .
जब  Inauguration Day  रै  fallen on a Sunday , the chief justice has  administered  the oath to the president on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly  .
When a new president takes over mid-term due to  the   मौत  or resignation of a president ,  the  oath of office is administered but formal , public inauguration  कार्यक्रम  have not been held .
Stefani  जोआन  Angelina Germanotta ( ; born March 28 , 1986 ) , known by her stage name Lady Gaga , is an American singer , songwriter , record producer , dancer  ,  activist , businesswoman  ,  fashion designer , actress and philanthropist .
Born and raised in  नई  York City ,  वो  primarily studied at the Convent of the Sacred Heart and briefly attended New York University 's Tisch School of the Arts before withdrawing to focus on her musical career .
She soon  began   performing  in the rock music  झाँकी  of  मैनहटन  's  निम्नतर  East Side .
By the end of 2007 , record executive and producer Vincent Herbert signed her to his label Streamline Records , an imprint of Interscope Records .
Initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records , her vocal abilities captured the attention of  रिकॉर्डिंग  artist Akon ,  जो  also signed her to  kon  Live Distribution , his own label under Interscope .
Lady  गागा  came to prominence as a recording artist following the release of her debut album , The Fame ( 2008 ) , which was a critical and  वाणिज्यिक  success  कि  topped charts around the  संसार  and included the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face `` .
After embarking on the The Fame Ball  दौरे  , she followed the  एल्बम  with The Fame Monster ( 2009 ) , which spawned the worldwide hit singles `` Bad Romance `` , `` Telephone ``  ,  and `` Alejandro ``  .
The Fame Monsters success allowed her to embark on  the  eighteen-month long Monster Ball Tour , which later became one of the highest-grossing  कॉन्सर्ट  tours of all time .
Her most recent album , Born This Way ( 2011 ) , topped the charts of  सबसे  major markets and generated more international chart-topping singles , including `` Born This Way `` , `` Judas `` , and `` The Edge of Glory `` .
Influenced by Britney Spears , David Bowie , Michael Jackson ,  मैडोना  , and  महारानी  , Lady Gaga is recognized for her flamboyant , diverse and outré contributions to the music industry through her fashion , performances and music videos .
As of October 2011 , she has sold  an  estimated 23 million albums and 64 million singles worldwide and her singles are  कुछ  of the best-selling worldwide .
Her achievements include five Grammy Awards and 13  एमटीवी  Video Music Awards .
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ) , ranked fourth in VH1 's list of  100  Greatest Women in Music , is the sixth best  selling  digital singles artist in US according to RIAA , is regularly placed on lists composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most influential  लोगों  in the world by Time magazine .
Besides her  musical  career , she involves herself with humanitarian  कल्याणकारी  and LGBT activism  .

A picture of the 1924 Baseball team
The Florida Gators baseball team represents the University of Florida  in  the sport of baseball  .
The Florida Gators  compete  in Division I of the  नेशनल  Collegiate Athletics Association  (  NCAA ) , and the Eastern Division of the Southeastern Conference ( SEC ) .
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan Stadium on the university 's Gainesville , Florida campus , and are currently led by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan .
In the  ninety-eight  season history of the Gators baseball program , the team has won  बारह  SEC championships and has appeared in  आठ  College World  श्रेणी  tournaments .

A political campaign is an organized effort which  seeks   to  influence the decision making process  भीतर  a  विशिष्ट  group .
In democracies , political campaigns often refer to electoral campaigns , wherein representatives are chosen or referendums are decided .
In modern  राजनीती  , the most high profile  राजनैतिक   अभियान   हैं  focused on candidates for head of state  or   सिर  of government ,  प्रायः  a President or Prime Minister .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton and her daughter , Harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12 , 1815 – October 26 , 1902 ) was an American social activist , abolitionist , and leading figure  of  the early women 's rights movement .
Her Declaration of Sentiments , presented at the first women  's  rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls , New York , is often credited with  initiating  the first  व्यवस्थित  women 's rights and women 's suffrage movements in the United States .
Before  stanton   narrowed  her political focus almost exclusively to women 's rights , she was an  क्रियाशील  abolitionist together  साथ  her husband , Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin , Gerrit Smith .
Unlike many  of  those involved in the women 's  अधिकारों  movement , Stanton addressed various issues pertaining  to  women  परे  voting rights .
Her concerns included women 's parental and custody rights , property rights , employment and income rights , divorce , the economic health of the family , and birth control  .
वो  was also an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century temperance movement .
After the American  सिविल  War , Stanton 's commitment to female  suffrage  caused a schism in the women 's rights movement when  वो  , together with Susan B. Anthony , declined to support passage of the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments to the United States Constitution .
She opposed giving added legal protection and voting rights to  अफ़्रीकी  American men while women , black and white , were denied those same rights .
उसके  position on this issue , together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and  महिलाओं  's issues beyond voting rights , led to the  गठन  of two separate women 's  अधिकारों  organizations that were  आखिरकार  rejoined  ,  with Stanton  as  president of the joint organization , approximately twenty years after her  ब्रेक  from the original women 's suffrage movement .
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both The Woman 's Bible and her autobiography  ,  along with many articles and pamphlets concerning female suffrage  और  women 's  अधिकारों   .
My Fair  महिला  is a musical based upon George Bernard Shaw 's Pygmalion and with book and  गीत  by Alan Jay Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe .
The story concerns Eliza Doolittle , a  काकनी   पुष्प  girl who takes speech lessons from professor Henry Higgins ,  a  phoneticist , so that she may pass as a well-born lady .
The musical 's 1956 Broadway production was a hit , setting what was then the record  लिये  the longest run of any major musical theatre  उत्पादन  in history .
It was  followed   by  a hit London production , a popular film  संस्करण  , and numerous revivals .
It has been called `` the perfect musical '' .
Deregulation is the  अधिनियम  or  प्रक्रम  of removing or reducing state regulations .
It is therefore opposite of regulation , which refers to the process of the government regulating  निश्चित  activities .
The Boston Bruins Radio Network is a 25-station ( 17  a.M.  , 8 F.M . plus 2 F.M . translators ) CBS Radio network which carries live game broadcasts of the Boston Bruins .
The network 's flagship station is  wbz-fm  /98.5- Boston , Massachusetts  .
Dave Goucher  announces  play-by-play .
Bob Beers provides color commentary .
This article is about the short story .
For the poem by  सारा  Teasdale , see There Will Come Soft Rains  .
`` There Will Come Soft Rains '' is a short story by science fiction author Ray Bradbury which  थी  first published  in  the May 6 , 1950 issue of Collier 's .
Later that same year  the  story was included in Bradbury 's The Martian Chronicles ( 1950 ) .
With over 1.2  अरब  people , Han Chinese is the largest  जातीय  group in the world .
Pashtun people of the  pashtunistan  region , which  sits  in an area between south of the Hindu Kush  in  Afghanistan and the Indus River in Pakistan .
They number around 50 million .
The Korowai people of  पापुआ  numbered just around 3,000 people  ,  and were uncontacted  जबतक  the 1970s .
नस्ल  or ethnic group is a socially defined category based on common culture or nationality .
Ethnicity can , but does not have to , include common ancestry , appearance , cuisine , dressing style , heritage , history , language or dialect , religion , symbols , traditions , or other cultural factor .
जातीय  identity is constantly reinforced through common  विशेषताएँ  which set the group apart from other groups .
The  19.9  MW Gemasolar solar plant in  स्पेन  features 15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day  .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from  the  sun , has been  harnessed  by humans since  प्राचीन  times using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity  ,  solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis , which can  मेक  considerable  योगदान  to solving some of the  सबसे  urgent  उर्जा  problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending on the  रास्ता  they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active  सौर  techniques include the use  of  photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
passive  solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or  लाइट  dispersing properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Energy Agency said that  ``  the development of affordable , inexhaustible and clean solar  उर्जा  technologies will have huge longer-term  लाभ  .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible  और  mostly import-independent resource  ,  enhance sustainability , reduce pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change ,  और  keep  चट्टान  fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These advantages  हैं  global .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered learning investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved from a western variety of the  यूनानी  alphabet called the Cumaean alphabet , which was adopted and modified by the Etruscans who ruled early Rome .
The  etruscan  alphabet  थी  in turn adopted and further modified by the ancient Romans to write the  लैटिन  language .
During  the  Middle Ages , the Latin alphabet was adapted to Romance languages , direct  वंशजों  of  लैटिन   ,  as well  as  to Celtic , Germanic ,  बाल्टिक  , and some Slavic languages .
With the age of  उपनिवेशवाद   और   ईसाई  evangelism ,  the  Latin script was spread overseas , and applied to indigenous American ,  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई   ,  Austronesian , Austroasiatic , and African languages  .
More recently , linguists have  भी  tended to prefer the  लैटिन  script or the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Phonetic Alphabet ( itself largely based on Latin script ) when transcribing or creating written standards  लिये  non-European languages ,  ऐसे  as the African reference  वर्णमाला  .
The term Latin alphabet may refer  to  either the alphabet used  to  write Latin ( as described in this article ) , or other alphabets based  on  the  लैटिन  script ,  जिससे  is the basic set of letters common to the various alphabets descended from the classical  लैटिन  one , such as the English  वर्णमाला  .
These Latin-derived alphabets may discard letters , like the Rotokas alphabet , or add new letters , like the Danish and Norwegian  वर्णमाला  .
Letter shapes have changed over the centuries , including  the  creation for Medieval Latin of lower case forms which did not exist  in  the  शास्त्रीय  period .
The assassination of United  राज्य  President Abraham Lincoln took place on Good  शुक्रवार  , April 14 , 1865 , as the American Civil War was drawing to a  बंद  .
the  assassination occurred five days after the commander of the Confederate  फौज  of Northern Virginia , General Robert E. Lee , surrendered  to  Lieutenant General Ulysses S.  ग्रान्ट  and the Union Army  of  the Potomac .
Lincoln was the first American president  to   be  assassinated , though an unsuccessful attempt  था  been made on Andrew Jackson 30 years before in 1835  .
The assassination was planned and carried out by the well-known stage actor John Wilkes Booth , as part of  a  larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the  confederate  cause .
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and  दाउद  Herold  ,  who were assigned to kill  सचिव  of State William H. Seward , and  जार्ज  Atzerodt who was to kill Vice President Andrew  जॉनसन  .
By simultaneously eliminating the top three people in the administration , Booth and his co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity of the United States government .
Lincoln was shot while watching the play Our American Cousin with his wife Mary Todd Lincoln at Ford 's Theatre in Washington  ,  D.C. on the night  of  April 14 , 1865 .
He died  जल्दी  the next morning .
The rest of  the  conspirators ' plot  विफल  ; Powell only managed to wound Seward , while Atzerodt ,  जॉनसन  's would-be assassin , lost his nerve and fled Washington .
add-on  might mean:
Plug-in ( computing ) , a piece  of  software which enhances another software application and usually can  नहीं  be run independently
Browser extension , which modifies the interface and/or behavior of web browsers
Add-on ( Mozilla )  ,  a piece of software that enhances and customizes Mozilla-based  अनुप्रयोग
Add-ons for  फायरफॉक्स  (  addons.mozilla.org   )   ,  the official Mozilla  न्यास  web site which serves as a repository of add-ons for Mozilla-based applications
Peripheral , an optional computer hardware component that significantly supplements or enhances the functionality of the original unit
Video game accessory  ,   a  piece of hardware used in conjunction with a video game console for playing video games
Club  स्तर   seating  is a special section of seating in modern sports  स्टेडियम  .
The Club Level is usually located towards the middle of the stage of seating sections ,  ऊपर  the  निम्नतर   डेक   लकिन  below the upper deck .
वे  are usually right next to the Luxury Boxes , either right above , right below , or sandwiched between two levels of Luxury Boxes .
Club Level seating is considered as higher class than sitting  anywhere  else in the arena , but lower class compared to the Luxury Boxes .
नापसंद  the  लक्ज़री  Boxes , most club levels do not wrap entirely around the arena .
कुछ  club levels stop at a certain point , giving way to an  विस्तार  of  the  Mezzanine , while others give way to lower class Luxury Boxes (  ऐसे  as `` Party Suites '' ) .
A notable exception to this is  अमीरात  Stadium in London , which has a complete tier of club seating  .
Club Levels allow fans multiple levels of entertainment  .
क्लबों  Level seating is open to the elements , as opposed to  the   entirely  enclosed luxury boxes , which gives more of an outdoors impression at roofless and open-roof stadiums  और   arenas  .
क्लबों   स्तर  seating is normally bought on a contract  आधार  to allow for maximum profit on  the   भाग  of the stadium .
The Club Level provides  प्रशंसक  with special access to  an  indoor part of the arena exclusive to fans with special tickets .
These areas are air conditioned and allow access to special restaurants , merchandise stands , and lounge areas of  the  stadium that are not otherwise available .
Concession stands and  विक्रेता  on the Club Level  भी  often offer different menus than in other stands to give  अधिक  of a special feel to the  क्लबों  .
These areas are closed off to the rest of the stadium  ,  and  वे  usually can only be accessed  through  the exclusive , private club  entrances   .
Sophia Loren (  ;  born Sofia Villani Scicolone ; 20 September 1934 ) is an Italian actress .
Loren is widely recognized as Italy 's most renowned and honored  अभिनेत्री  .
She was the first actress of the talkie era to win an  अकादमी  Award for a non-English-speaking performance , for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio De Sica 's Two Women .
Her other awards include a Grammy  पुरस्कार  , five  खास  Golden  ग्लोब्स  , a BAFTA Award and a Laurel Award .
In 1995 she received the  सेसिल  B. DeMille Award for lifetime achievements , one  of  many such awards .
Her films include : Houseboat ( 1958 ) , El Cid ( 1961 ) , Yesterday , Today and Tomorrow ( 1963 ) , Marriage  italian-style  ( 1964 ) , and  a  Special Day ( 1977 ) .
In later  सालो  she has  appeared  in American blockbusters such as  grumpier  Old Men ( 1995 ) , and Nine ( 2009 ) .
In 1994 she starred in Robert Altman  's   prêt-à-porter  , which earned her a Golden Globe nomination the same year .
She has also achieved critical and commercial success in TV movies such as Courage ( 1986 ) .
Deaths for self-inflicted injuries per 100,000 inhabitants in 2004 .
Incidence of suicide is underreported due to both religious and social pressures , and possibly completely unreported in some areas .
Nevertheless , from reported cases  ,  certain trends are apparent  .
Since the data is skewed , comparing suicide rates between nations is statistically unsound .
The trends themselves are not the cause , but may be indicative of a  रूट  cause .
The Oprah Winfrey  नेतृत्व  Academy for Girls - South Africa is a female boarding school founded in January 2007 and located in Henley on Klip near Meyerton , south of  जोहान्सबर्ग  , South Africa  .
The academy was founded by Oprah  विनफ्रे  with the goal of providing educational and leadership opportunities for academically gifted girls from impoverished backgrounds .

digicel  is a mobile phone  संजाल  provider operating in 31 markets across the Caribbean , Central  अमेरिका  , and Oceania regions .
The company is owned by Irishman Denis O'Brien , is incorporated in Bermuda , and based in  जमैका  .
It has about  13  million wireless users .
As of 2012 , Digicel 's markets comprise : Anguilla , Antigua  और  Barbuda , Aruba  ,  Barbados , Bermuda , Bonaire , the British  वर्जिन  Islands , the Cayman Islands , Curacao , Dominica ,  el  Salvador , Fiji , French Guiana , Grenada  ,  Guadeloupe , Guyana , Haiti , Jamaica , Martinique , Nauru  ,   पनामा  , Papua New Guinea , Samoa , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Saint Lucia ,  संत  Vincent and the  grenadines  , Suriname , Tonga , Trinidad & Tobago , Turks and Caicos ,  और  Vanuatu .
