Hospital Emergency Codes are used in hospitals worldwide to alert staff to various  emergencies  .
The use  of   कोड  is intended to convey essential information quickly  और  with minimal misunderstanding to  स्टाफ  , while preventing stress and panic among visitors to the hospital  .
These codes may be posted on placards throughout the hospital , or printed on employee identification badges for ready reference .
Back of a hospital  id  badge showing disaster  कोड  .
Hospital emergency codes may denote different events at  अलग  hospitals , including nearby ones .
Because many physicians work at more than one facility , this  may  lead to  भ्रम  in emergencies  ,  so uniform systems have been proposed .
The route of  the  Eifel aqueduct , with its average slope  .
The Eifel Aqueduct was one of  the  longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire .
The aqueduct , constructed in AD 80 , carried water some from the hilly Eifel region of what is now Germany to the ancient city  of  Colonia  claudia  Ara  agrippinensium  ( present-day  कोलोन  ) .
If the auxiliary spurs  to  additional springs are  शामिल  , the length was .
The construction was almost entirely below ground , and the flow of  the  water was produced entirely by gravity .
A few bridges , including one up to in length ,  यहूद   needed  to pass over valleys .
Unlike some of the other famous Roman aqueducts , the Eifel aqueduct  थी  specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from  क्षति  and freezing .
In chemistry , a disulfide bond ( Br.E . disulphide bond ) is a covalent bond , usually derived by the coupling of two thiol groups  .
The linkage is also called an SS-bond or disulfide bridge .
The overall connectivity is therefore R-S-S-R .
The terminology  is   widely  used in biochemistry .
In formal  शर्तें  , the connection is a persulfide , in  सादृश्य  to its congener , peroxide ( R-O-O-R ) , but this terminology is obscure and is no longer used ( except in reference to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H  यौगिकों  ) .
औपचारिक  depiction of disulfide bond  गठन  as an oxidation .
Westminster Abbey is used for  the  coronation of British monarchs
Religion in the United  किंगडम  and in the countries that preceded it , has been dominated  ,  for over 1,400 years , by  विभिन्न  forms of Christianity .
According  to  some surveys  ,  a majority of citizens still identify with Christianity  ,  although regular church attendance has fallen dramatically since the middle of the 20th  सदी  , and immigration and demographic change  have  contributed to the growth of  अन्य  faiths .
धार्मिक  affiliations of UK citizens are recorded  by   नियमित  surveys , the four major ones being the UK Census , the Labour Force Survey  ,   the  British Social  attitudes   सर्वेक्षण  and the European Social Survey .
according  to the  2001   uk  census , Christianity  is   the  major religion , followed  by  Islam , Hinduism , Sikhism , Judaism and Buddhism in terms  of  number of adherents .
इस  , and the relatively large number of individuals with  नाममात्र  or no religious affiliations has led commentators  to  variously describe  the  United Kingdom as a multi-faith , secularised , or post-Christian society .
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries from 1707 , and consequently most of the largest religious groups do not have UK-wide organisational structures .
While some  समूह  have separate structures for the individual countries of the United Kingdom  ,  others  may  have a single structure covering England and Wales  or  Great Britain .
Similarly , due to the relatively recent creation of Northern Ireland in 1921 , most major religious groups in Northern Ireland are organised  on  an  all-ireland  basis  .
The 1967 Newark  दंगे  were a  प्रमुख  civil  disturbance  that occurred in the city of Newark , New Jersey between July 12 and July 17 ,  1967  .
The six days of rioting , looting , and destruction left 26 dead and hundreds injured .
In United States college athletics , redshirt is a delay or suspension  of  an  खिलाड़ी  's  भागीदारी  in order  to  lengthen his or her period of eligibility .
Typically , a student 's athletic eligibility in a given sport is four seasons , a number  निकला  from the four years of academic classes that are normally  जरूरी  to obtain a bachelor 's degree  at  an  अमरीकी  college or  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
However , a student athlete  may  be offered  the  opportunity to redshirt for up to two years , which allows the athlete to spread those four years of eligibility  over   पाँच  , or sometimes six years .
In a redshirt year , a student athlete may attend classes  at  the college or university , practice with an athletic team , and dress for play but he or she may not compete  दौरान  the game .
Using this mechanism ,  a  student athlete has up to five  अकादमिक  years  to  use  the  four years of eligibility , thus becoming a fifth-year senior .
The term is used as a verb ,  संज्ञा   ,  and  क्रियाशील  .
लिये  example , a coach may  चुनें  to redshirt a player who is then referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt .
The opposite  of  this is a ``  सच्चा  freshman . ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
it  was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the start  of  World War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's  ग्रेट  powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,  France  और  Russia ) and the Central  शक्तियां  ( originally  the  Triple Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary  था  taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy  किया  not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States  joined  the  allies  , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central  शक्तियां  .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel  ,  including 60 million Europeans  ,  were mobilised in one of the largest  युद्धों   in  history .
अधिक  than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world  इतिहास  , subsequently paving the way for  विभिन्न  political changes , such  as  revolutions in many of the nations involved .
एक  of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great  शक्तियां  of Europe .
More  तत्काल  , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in  साराजेवो  triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked .
Within weeks , the  प्रमुख  powers  यहूद  at war and ,  via  their colonies , the conflict soon  स्प्रेड  around the world .
On 28 July ,  the  Austro-Hungarians  fired  the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the  जर्मनी  march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of  the  Marne —the Western Front settled into a static  बैटल  of attrition with  a  trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was successful against  the  Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its invasion of East  prussia  by the Germans .
in  November the Ottoman Empire joined the  युद्ध  , opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy  और  Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and  रोमानिया   in  1916 .
In Russia , the tsar  's  government collapsed in March  1917   और  a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians  to  terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918  जर्मनी  offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back the  germans  in  a   श्रेणी  of successful offensives and American  शक्तियां  began entering the trenches  .
Germany , which  था  its own trouble with revolutionaries ,  सहमत  to an armistice  on  11 November 1918 .
The war ended in victory for the Allies .
Events on the  घर  fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four  प्रमुख  imperial powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory , while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller states .
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War  ii  .
Map of countries that declared themselves to be socialist states under  the  Marxist–Leninist or Maoist definition - that is to say , `` Communist states '' - between 1979 and 1983 .
इस  period marked the greatest territorial extent of Communist states .
A communist state is a  राज्य  where the means of production are collectively owned by the society  .
It has a form of government characterized by  single-party  rule or dominant-party rule of a communist party ( referred  as  Dictatorship of the Proletariat by its proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state .
Technically , `` communist  राज्य  '' is a  contradictio  in terminis as a communist  समाज  as defined by both  माक्र्सवादी  and anarcho-communists  is   in  principle stateless .
From this perspective , the term Marxist-Leninist state is more  उचित  .
historically  , a `` communist state  ''  referred to a  प्रणाली  where public ownership of all or most means of production by the Communist  पार्टी  -run state is deemed necessary to further the interests of the working class ; today  ,  a communist state can also , for instance , refer  to  contemporary China and Vietnam  ,   जहाँ  a Communist Party-run state exists alongside a mixed economy  .
According to Marxist–Leninists , the state is a tool in the hands of the ruling class , which in a socialist society is the working class ,  so  a socialist state is , according  to   leninists  ,  a  state of the working class .
In practice , communist states do  नहीं  actually refer to themselves as  ऐसे  .
They do this  नहीं  to disguise the fact  कि  the ruling  पार्टी  is communist , but rather because they do not  consider  themselves to  be  a communist society at  उपस्थित  .
Instead , they constitutionally identify themselves as socialist states or  मजदूर  ' states .
The primary goal of  ये  states , which also explains their official name , is to guide their respective countries in the process of building socialism ,  ultimately  leading to communism  .
Communist states may have several legal political parties , but  the  communist party is  प्रायः  granted a special or dominant role in government , often  by  statute or under the constitution .
Consequently , the institutions of the  राज्य  and of the communist party become  intimately  entwined , such as in the development of parallel  संस्थानों   .
In the 20th century , most  कम्युनिस्ट  states adopted planned economies .
However , there were exceptions :  the  Soviet Union during the 1920s and late 1980s and Yugoslavia after  संसार  War II allowed limited markets and a degree  of  worker self-management , while China , Vietnam and Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s .
In the  21st  century , China and Vietnam have allowed a  मिश्रित  economy to develop .
The fundamental concepts of  कम्युनिस्ट  states often diverge from the original socio-economic ideologies from  जिससे  they develop .
as   a  result , many adherents of these ideologies often oppose the political systems commonly associated with these states .
लिये  example , dissenting communists such as  trotskyists  were often opposed to the communist states of the 20th century , claiming either that they had nothing to do  साथ   ``  real '' communism or  कि  the ideology of such states had reached a point of irrevocable corruption .
माइकल  Fred  फेल्प्स  II ( born June 30 ,  1985  ) is a retired American swimmer and the most decorated Olympian of all time , with a total of 22  medals   .
Phelps also holds the all-time records for  ओलम्पिक  gold medals ( 18 , double the second highest record holders ) ,  ओलम्पिक  gold  medals  in individual events  (  11  )  , and Olympic medals in individual events for a male ( 13 )  .
In winning eight gold medals  at  the 2008 Beijing Games ,  फेल्प्स  took the record for the most first-place finishes at any single Olympic Games .
Five of those  victories  were  in  individual events , tying  the  single Games  रिकार्ड  .
In the 2012 Summer Olympics in London , Phelps won four golds and two silver medals , making him the most successful athlete of the Games for the third Olympics in a row .
फेल्प्स   is   the   long  course world recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly , 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter individual medley as well as the former long course world recordholder in the 200-meter  फ्रीस्टाइल  and 200-meter individual medley .
He has won a total of 71 medals in major international long-course competition  ,  57 gold  ,  11 silver , and three bronze spanning the Olympics , the  संसार  , and the Pan Pacific Championships .
Phelps 's international titles  और  record-breaking performances have earned him  the   संसार  Swimmer of the Year Award  सात  times and American Swimmer of the Year  पुरस्कार  nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in  2012  .
His  unprecedented  Olympic success in 2008 earned Phelps Sports Illustrated magazine 's Sportsman of the Year award .
After the 2008  गर्मियाँ  Olympics , Phelps started the Michael Phelps Foundation , which focuses on growing the sport of swimming  और   promoting  healthier lifestyles .
He expects  to   do  further work with his foundation after the 2012 Olympics , which he has said will be his last .
Lenovo Group  सीमित  ( ) is a Chinese multinational computer hardware and electronics company with its headquarters in Beijing , China and Morrisville , North Carolina and  इसके  registered  दफ्तर   in  Hong Kong , China .
Its products include personal  कंप्यूटर   ,  tablet computers , mobile phones , workstations  ,  servers , electronic storage devices , IT management software and  smart  televisions .
Lenovo is the world 's second-largest  pc  vendor by 2012  ईकाई  sales  .
It  बाज़ार  the ThinkPad line of  कोपी  computers  और  the ThinkCentre line of desktops .
Lenovo  रै  operations in more than 60 countries and sells its products in around 160 countries .
Lenovo was founded in Beijing in 1984 and incorporated  in  Hong Kong in 1988 under its  पिछला  name , Legend .
Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the  हैंग  Seng China-Affiliated  corporations  Index .
Slug is a common name for an apparently shell-less terrestrial  gastropod  mollusk .
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of  the  common name of any gastropod mollusc  कि  has no  शेल  , has  a  very reduced shell , or has only a small internal shell .
(  This is in contrast to the  आम  name `` snail `` , which  is  applied to gastropods that have  a  coiled shell that  is  large enough that the soft parts of the animal can  retract  fully into it . )
Slugs exist on  जमीन  and in the sea , and there is even one genus of freshwater  slugs   ,  Acochlidium .
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however  लागू  primarily to land slugs , whereas slugs from the sea or from freshwater are usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs ''  .
Land gastropods with a shell  कि  is not quite vestigial , but is too small to  retract  into ( like many in the family Urocyclidae )  ,  are known  as  semislugs .
The various taxonomic families of slugs form part of several  काफी  different evolutionary lineages which also include snails .
यूँ  ,  लिये  example ,  the  various families of land slugs are not very closely related to  एक  another , despite  a  superficial similarity in the overall body  रूप  .
The shell-less condition has arisen  अनेक  times independently during the evolutionary past  ,  and thus the category `` slug  ''  is emphatically a polyphyletic one .
slugs  , like all other  gastropods  , undergo torsion ( a 180° twisting of the internal  अंगों  ) during development .
Internally ,  स्लग  anatomy clearly shows the effects of this  रोटेशन  , but externally the bodies of land slugs appear to be more or less symmetrical , except for  the  positioning of the pneumostome  ,  which  is  on one side  of   the  animal , normally the right hand side .
The soft , slimy bodies of slugs are prone to desiccation , so land-living slugs are confined to moist environments and must retreat to damp hiding places when  the  weather is dry .
the  subsequent information  in  this article applies to land slugs  .
is a  लैटिन   शब्द  that means `` thus  ''  or , in writing , `` it was thus in the source material ''  .
Sic may also refer to:
Sic , Cluj ,  a  commune in Romania
SIC  ,  the regional  कोड  for Sicily
Sic ( noise artist ) , styled as [ sic ] , stage name of Jennifer Morris  ,  a Canadian noise artist
Sic ( band ) is a modern Hardcore/Thrash metal band from Torshavn , the capital of the Faroe Islands
`` ( sic ) '' , a song by American  बैंड  Slipknot on the album Slipknot
sic  , the initial of Marco Simoncelli .
SIC as an acronym may  स्टैंड  for:
SiC , Silicon carbide ,  a  semiconducting material , also used to make metalworking tools
SIC ( cyclecar ) ( Società Italiana Cyclecars )
Standard Industrial Classification , a 20th-century  u.S.  system for classifying  उद्योग
अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Standard Industrial Classification a UN system for economic activities

San Isidro Club , an Argentine rugby union club

Second-in-command in the field  of  aviation
Sistema Interconectado  सेंट्रल  power grid in Chile
Sociedade Independente  de  Comunicação ( SIC ) , a  टेलीविज़न  channel in  पुर्तगाल
Sea Isle City , New  जर्सी  , a coastal town in the United States
segmented   पूर्णांक  Counter mode , a mode of operation in cryptography
Sepang International Circuit , a high-end racetrack that hosts the Malaysian round of Formula 1
Shanghai International  सर्किट  ,  a   मोटर  racing venue in  शंघाई  , China
Simplified instructional computer , a hypothetical computer used in systems programming
SIC ( Sons Idées Couleurs ) ,  an  early  twentieth-century  art magazine produced by French author Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College , a two year Junior College in Harrisburg , Illinois , United States
Specific inductive  क्षमता  , abbreviated to SIC , which is more commonly  ज्ञात  as the relative permittivity or the dielectric constant
st  Ignatius '  कॉलेज   ,  Riverview , a Jesuit school in Sydney , Australia
Imperial Standard of Napoleon I
Napoleon Bonaparte ( , ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military and political leader who rose to prominence during the latter stages of the  फ्रेंच  Revolution and its associated wars in Europe .
as  Napoleon I , he was Emperor of  the  French from 1804  to  1815  .
His  विधिक  reform , the Napoleonic Code , has been a  प्रमुख  influence on many civil law jurisdictions  विश्वव्यापी   ,  but he is best remembered for his  भूमिका  in the wars led against France by a series of coalitions , the  so-called  Napoleonic Wars  .
He established hegemony over most of continental Europe and sought  to  spread the  आदर्शों   of  the French Revolution , while consolidating an imperial monarchy which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime .
Due to his success in these wars ,  प्रायः   विरूद्ध  numerically superior enemies , he is generally regarded as one of the greatest military  कमांडरों  of all time , and his campaigns are studied at military academies worldwide .
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of  प्रतिष्ठित  Italian ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century .
He trained  as  an artillery officer in mainland France .
He rose to prominence under the French First Republic and led successful campaigns against the First and Second Coalitions arrayed  विरूद्ध  France .
he  led a successful invasion of the Italian peninsula .
In 1799 ,  he   मंचन  a coup d'état  और  installed himself as First Consul ; five  सालो  later  the  French Senate proclaimed him emperor , following a plebiscite in his favour .
In the first decade of the 19th  सदी  , the French Empire under Napoleon engaged in a series of conflicts—the Napoleonic Wars —that  शामिल   प्रत्येक  major European power .
After a streak of victories , France  secured  a dominant position in continental Europe , and Napoleon maintained the French sphere of influence through the  गठन  of extensive alliances and the appointment of friends and family members  to  rule other European countries  as   फ्रेंच  client states .
the  Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of Russia marked turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes .
His Grande Armée was badly damaged in the campaign and never fully recovered .
In 1813 , the Sixth Coalition defeated his  शक्तियां  at Leipzig  ;   the   following  year the Coalition invaded France , forced Napoleon to abdicate and exiled  उसे  to the island of Elba .
Less than a year later , he escaped Elba and returned to power , but was defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in June  1815   .
Napoleon spent  the  last six years of his life in confinement by the British on the island  of  Saint Helena .
An autopsy concluded he  died  of  पेट  cancer , but there has been some debate about the cause of his death , as some scholars have speculated that he was a victim of arsenic  विषाक्तता  .
This is a chronological listing  of   the  United States Senators from Pennsylvania .
संयुक्त  States Senators  हैं   popularly  elected , for a six-year term , beginning  जनवरी  3 .
Elections are  आयोजित  the first Tuesday after  नवम्बर  1 .
Before 1914 , they  यहूद  chosen by the  पेन्सिलवेनिया   सामान्य   सभा   ,   और  before 1935 ,  उनके  terms began March 4 .
The South Africa national  रग्बी  union team  (  known as the Springboks ) represents South Africa in rugby union .
They compete in the annual  रग्बी  Championship , along with southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina , Australia and New  जीलैंड  .
वे  have won this  चैंपियनशिप  on three occasions in sixteen years  .
They are currently ranked second in the world by  the  International Rugby Board , and were named 2008 World Team of the Year at the Laureus World Sports Awards  .
Although South  अफ़्रीकी  was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup competition , the Springboks did not compete in  the  first two World Cups in 1987  और  1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa .
The team made its World  कप  debut in 1995  ,  when the newly democratic South Africa hosted the tournament .
The Springboks then defeated the All Blacks 15–12 in the  फाइनल  , which is now remembered as one of the greatest moments in South Africa 's sporting history , and  a  watershed moment in  the   post-apartheid  nation-building process  .
South Africa regained their title as champions 12  सालो  later , when  वे  defeated  इंग्लैण्ड  15–6 in the 2007 final .
As a result of the 2007 World Cup tournament the Springboks  यहूद  promoted to first place in the IRB World Rankings , a position  वे  held until July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot .
The  springboks  play in  ग्रीन  and gold jerseys , and their emblems are the  springbok  and the Protea .
the  side has been playing international rugby since 1891  ,  when a British  isles  side toured the nation , playing  दक्षिण  Africa in  उनके  first Test on 30 July .
दक्षिण  Africa was coached by Jake White , who led the Boks to the  2007  World Cup title , announcing his resignation effectively from the  समाप्त  of 2007  .
His replacement  's  ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011 , following a 11–9 defeat to Australia in  the   रग्बी  World Cup quarter-final , who then stated he would not  be  signing a new deal .
The previous captain was John Smit , who before he retired in  2011  played hooker for most of his career , although he has also been a prop , mainly in 2008 and 2009 .
Due to Smit being unavailable for the November 2010 Tests after  सर्जरी  , lock Victor  matfield  took Smit 's place as captain for that tour .
The current captain is Jean de Villiers .
the  Battle  of  Gettysburg ( , with an sound ) , was  लड़ा  July 1–3  ,  1863 , in and around the town  of  Gettysburg , Pennsylvania  .
It was the battle with the largest  क्रमांक  of casualties in the American Civil War and is often described  as  the war 's turning point .
Union Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade 's Army of the  potomac  defeated attacks by Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee 's  फौज   of  Northern Virginia  ,  ending Lee  's  invasion of the North .
After  उसके  success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863 , Lee led  उसके  army through the Shenandoah Valley to begin his second invasion of the North—the  gettysburg  Campaign .
With his army in high spirits , Lee  intended  to shift  the  focus of the summer campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up their prosecution of  the  war by penetrating as far as Harrisburg , Pennsylvania , or even Philadelphia .
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln , Maj. Gen. Joseph  वेश्या  moved his army in  pursuit   ,  but was relieved just three days  पहले  the battle and replaced by Meade .
Elements of the  दो  armies initially collided at Gettysburg on July 1 , 1863 , as Lee  तत्काल  concentrated his forces there  ,  his objective being to engage  the  Union army  और  destroy it .
Low ridges to the northwest  of  town  यहूद  defended initially by  a  Union cavalry division under  ब्रिगेडियर  . Gen. John Buford , and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry .
However  ,  two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the northwest and north , collapsing the hastily developed Union lines , sending the  defenders  retreating through the streets of town to the  पहाड़ियाँ  just to the  दक्षिण  .
On the second day of battle , most of both armies had assembled  .
The Union line was laid out in a  रक्षात्मक  formation resembling  a  fishhook .
In the late afternoon of  जुलाई   2  ,  ली   शुभारम्भ   a  heavy assault on the Union left flank , and fierce fighting raged at Little Round Top , the Wheatfield , Devil 's Den , and the Peach  बाग़   .
On the Union right , demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on Culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill .
सब  across the battlefield , despite significant  नुकसान  , the Union defenders held their lines .
On the third day of battle  ,  July 3  ,  fighting resumed  on  Culp 's Hill , and cavalry battles raged  to  the east and south , but the main event was a dramatic infantry  उत्पीड़न  by 12,500 Confederates against the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge ,  ज्ञात  as Pickett 's  चार्ज  .
The charge was repulsed by Union rifle and artillery fire , at great losses to the Confederate army .
Lee led his army on a  torturous  retreat back to Virginia .
Between 46,000  और  51,000 soldiers from both armies were casualties in the three-day battle .
That November , President Lincoln  प्रयुक्त  the dedication ceremony for  the  Gettysburg  नेशनल  Cemetery to honor the fallen Union soldiers and redefine the purpose of the war in his  ऐतिहासिक  Gettysburg Address .
An academic discipline , or field  of  study , is a branch of knowledge that is taught  और  researched at the college or university level .
Disciplines are defined ( in part ) , and recognized by the academic journals in which research is published , and the learned societies and academic departments or faculties to which their practitioners belong .
However , there exists no formal criteria for when educational programs and scholarly journals form an academic discipline .
A huge difference exists between , on the one hand , well established disciplines that exist in almost  सब  universities all  over  the  संसार  , have a long history , and have a  खूब  established  नियत  of journals and  सम्मेलनों  , and , on the other hand , suggestions for new fields  समर्थित  only by few universities and publications .
फ़ील्ड  of study usually have several sub-disciplines or branches , and the distinguishing lines between these are often both arbitrary and ambiguous .
PHP is  a  server-side scripting  भाषा   designed  for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language .
PHP is now installed on more than 244 million websites and 2.1 million web servers  .
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995 , the reference implementation of PHP is now produced  by  The PHP Group .
While PHP originally stood for Personal Home Page , it now stands for PHP : Hypertext Preprocessor , a recursive acronym .
PHP  कोड  is interpreted by a  वेब  server with a PHP processor module which generates the resulting web  पेज  : PHP commands can  be  embedded directly into an HTML source document rather than calling an external file to process data .
It has also evolved to include  a  command-line interface capability and can be used in standalone graphical applications .
PHP is free software released under the PHP License , which is incompatible with the  ग्नू  General  पब्लिक  License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP .
PHP can  be  deployed on most  वेब  servers and also as a standalone shell on almost every operating system and platform , free of charge  .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29  ,  1917 – November 22 , 1963 )  ,  often referred to by his initials JFK  ,  was the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as commander of  the  Motor Torpedo  नौकाएँ  PT-109  और  PT-59 during World War II in  the  South Pacific  ,  Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional  ज़िला  in the U.S. House  of  Representatives from 1947  to  1953 as  a  Democrat .
Thereafter , he served in the U.S. Senate from 1953 until 1960 .
कैनेडी  defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is  the  youngest to have been elected to the office , the second-youngest President ( after Theodore Roosevelt ) , and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
a  Catholic , Kennedy is the only non- Protestant president , and is the only president  to  have won  a  Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the  खाड़ी  of  सूअर   आक्रमण  , the  क्यूबन  Missile Crisis , the building of the Berlin Wall , the Space Race , the African-American Civil Rights Movement , and early stages of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number of military advisers , special operation forces , and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic Hamlet Program which was implemented  by  the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment , and segregation  of  rural South Vietnamese from the northern and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22  ,  1963 in Dallas , Texas .
ली  Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime , but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby two days later , before a  विचारण  could take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However  ,  the United States House Select Committee on  assassinations  ( HSCA )  concluded   कि  those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However , ABC News in their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded  ओसवाल्ड  acted  अलोन  .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber  कार्यक्रम   led  to  a   congressional  investigation  कि  lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the 1960s information concerning  कैनेडी  's private life has come to light .
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become  बेहतर  known , especially since  the  1990s .
Although initially  रखा  secret from the  सामान्य   पब्लिक  ,  रिपोर्ट्स  of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press  .
Kennedy ranks highly in public opinion ratings of U.S. presidents .
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. King and written by  किंग  ,  जेरी  Leiber , and  माइक  Stoller , inspired by  the  spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me , '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3 .
There have been over 400 recorded versions of the song .
a  political cartoon from an 1894  पक  magazine by illustrator S.D . Ehrhart , shows  a  farm woman labeled `` Democratic Party '' sheltering from a  बवंडर  of political change .
A  रूपक  is a figure of  वाक  that describes a subject by asserting that  it  is , on some  पाइंट   of  comparison  ,  the same as another otherwise unrelated object .
Metaphor  is  a type of analogy and is  closely  related to other rhetorical  आंकड़े  of speech that achieve  उनके  effects via association , comparison or resemblance  सहित  allegory , hyperbole , and  simile  .
In simpler terms  ,  a metaphor compares two objects or things without using the words `` like '' or `` as '' .
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in English literature is the All the world  's  a stage  monologue  from As You  जैसे  It :
All the world 's  a  stage,
और  all the men and women merely players ;
They have their exits and their entrances ;  —  William Shakespeare , As You Like  it  , 2/7
This quote is a metaphor because the world  is  not literally  a  stage .
by  figuratively asserting that the world is a stage , Shakespeare uses the points of comparison between the world and a stage to convey an understanding about the mechanics of the world and  the  lives of the  लोगों  within it  .
Mount Fuji , from the Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji , color woodcut by Katsushika Hokusai
Rembrandt van Rijn ,  self-portrait  , etching , c.1630
Francisco Goya , There is No One To Help Them , Disasters of War series , aquatint  c.1810
Felix Vallotton , La raison  probante  ( The Cogent Reason ) , woodcut from the series Intimités ,  1898
Printmaking is the process of making artworks by printing , normally on paper .
Printmaking normally covers only the  प्रक्रम  of creating prints with  an  element of originality , rather than  बस  being a photographic reproduction  of  a painting .
Except in the case of  monotyping  , the process is  सक्षम   of  producing multiples  of  the same piece  ,  which is called a print .
Each print produced is not considered  a  ``  नक़ल   ''  but rather is considered  an   ``  original '' .
इस  is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic  to  the printmaking process , and also because the imagery of a print is typically not simply a reproduction of another work but rather is  प्रायः  a unique image designed  इससे  the start  to  be expressed in a particular printmaking technique .
A print  may  be known as  an  impression .
Printmaking ( other  than  monotyping ) is  नहीं  chosen  तभी  for  इसके  ability to produce multiple impressions , but rather for the unique qualities  कि  each of the printmaking processes lends itself to .
Prints are created by transferring ink from a matrix or through a prepared screen to a sheet of paper or other material  .
Common types of matrices include : metal plates ,  प्रायः  copper or zinc , or polymer plates for engraving  or  etching ; stone , aluminum , or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum  लिये  linocuts .
Screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics  हैं  used for  the  screenprinting process .
Other types  of  matrix substrates and related processes are discussed below .
Multiple impressions printed from the same matrix form an edition .
Since  the  late 19th  सदी  , artists have generally signed individual impressions from an edition and often number the impressions to form a limited edition .
prints  may also  be  printed in book  रूप  , such as illustrated books or artist 's books .
Il Divo is an English multinational operatic pop vocal group created by  म्यूज़िक  manager , executive , and reality TV star Simon Cowell .
Formed  in  the United Kingdom , they are also signed to Cowell 's record label , Syco Music .
Il Divo  is   a  group of four male singers : French pop singer Sébastien Izambard , Spanish  baritone   कार्लोस  Marín , American tenor David Miller , and Swiss  टेनर  Urs Bühler  .
To date , they have sold more than  26  million albums worldwide  .
Su-15 , one  of  the principal Soviet Air Defence  interceptors  in the 1970s and 1980s
An interceptor aircraft ( or  बस  interceptor  )  is a type of  सेनानी   वायुयान  designed specifically to prevent missions of enemy aircraft , particularly bombers  और  reconnaissance aircraft , and  नष्ट  them , relying usually on great speed and powerful armament .
Being used since the First World War  ,  after the late 1960s ,  interceptors  became less important due to shifting  इससे  bombers to intercontinental ballistic missiles ( ICBMs ) for nuclear warfare .
a  Vietnamese American ( ) is an American of Vietnamese descent  .
They make up  परिचय  half of all overseas Vietnamese ( Người Việt Hải Ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest Asian American group .
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the  संयुक्त   राज्य  started after 1975 , after the end  of  the Vietnam War .
Early immigrants were refugee boat people fleeing persecution or  गरीबी  .
Forced to flee  इससे   उनके  homeland and often thrust into poor urban neighborhoods , these  newcomers  have nevertheless managed to establish strong communities in a short amount of time .
More than sixty percent  of  Vietnamese Americans reside in the states of California , Texas , Washington ,  फ्लोरिडा  , and Virginia .
सामने   पेज  of the U.S. Armed  शक्तियां  newspaper , Stars and Stripes ,  2  May 1945
Adolf Hitler committed suicide  by   gunshot  on 30 April 1945 in his Führerbunker in Berlin .
His wife Eva ( née Braun ) committed suicide with him by ingesting cyanide .
That afternoon , in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions , their remains were carried up the stairs through the bunker 's emergency exit  ,   doused  in petrol and  नियत  alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker .
The Soviet archives record that their burnt remains were recovered and interred in successive locations until 1970 when they were again exhumed , cremated and the ashes scattered .
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ;  एक  that he died by poison  तभी  and another that he died by a self-inflicted gunshot , while biting down on a cyanide capsule .
समकालीन  historians  have  rejected these accounts  as  being either Soviet propaganda or an attempted compromise in order to reconcile the different conclusions .
One eye-witness  अंकित  that  the   देह  showed signs  of  having been shot through the mouth , but this  रै  been proven unlikely  .
There is also controversy regarding the authenticity of skull and jaw  fragments  which were recovered .
In 2009 , DNA tests  यहूद  performed  on  a skull Soviet officials had long believed  to  be Hitler  's  .
The  परीक्षण  revealed  कि  the skull was actually that  of  a woman less than 40 years old .
Location of Missouri
The alcohol laws of Missouri  हैं  among the least restrictive and most lax and permissive in the United  राज्य  .
Missouri  is  known throughout the  मिडवेस्ट  for its largely laissez-faire approach to alcohol regulation , in sharp contrast to the  बहुत  strict alcohol laws of some of its neighbors , like Kansas and Oklahoma .
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF ,  commonly  known as flesh-eating disease or  flesh-eating  bacteria syndrome ,  is  a rare  संक्रमण  of the deeper layers  of  skin and subcutaneous tissues ,  easily  spreading  आरपार  the fascial plane within the subcutaneous  ऊतक  .
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing  ,  having  वृहद  risk of developing in the immunocompromised due to conditions like diabetes , cancer , etc .
It is a severe disease of sudden  onset  and  is  usually  treated  immediately with high doses of intravenous antibiotics .
Type I describes a polymicrobial infection , whereas Type II describes a monomicrobial infection .
Many  प्रकार   of  bacteria can  कारण  necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g. , Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ) , Staphylococcus  aureus   ,  Clostridium perfringens , Bacteroides fragilis , Aeromonas hydrophila ) .
Such infections are more likely to occur in people with compromised immune systems .
Historically , Group A streptococcus made up most cases of  प्रकार  II infections .
However , since as early as 2001 , another  गंभीर  form  of  monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis has  महरूम  observed with increasing frequency ,  caused  by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ) .
Some  प्रकाशित  case reports  have  implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and NF ,  हालांकि  the  प्रमाण  of the link was said to be  कमजोर  because of a small number of case patients and it  थी  unclear whether the drugs just masked  the  symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se .
World War II ( WWII or WW2 ) , also known as the Second World War , was a global  युद्ध  that lasted from 1939 to 1945 .
It involved the  विशाल  majority of the world 's nations —including all of  the  great powers  —eventually   forming  two opposing military alliances : the  allies  and the  अक्ष  .
It was the most  फैली  war  in  history , with more than 100  लाख  people serving in military units from over 30 different countries  .
In a state of `` total war `` , the major participants placed their entire economic , industrial , and scientific  सामर्थ्य  at the service of the war effort , erasing the distinction between  civilian  and military resources .
Marked  by  mass deaths of civilians , including the Holocaust and the only use of nuclear weapons in  warfare  , it resulted in  50  million to  over  75 million  fatalities   .
These deaths make World War  ii  by far the deadliest  विरोध  in human history .
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with the Republic of China in 1937 , but  the  world war is generally said to have  begun  on 1 September 1939 with  the  invasion of  कैंडल  by Germany and subsequent declarations of war  on  Germany by France and Britain .
इससे  late  1939  to early 1941 , in a  श्रेणी  of campaigns and treaties , Germany formed the Axis alliance with Italy  ,  conquering or subduing much of continental Europe .
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact , Germany and the Soviet Union partitioned  और  annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours ,  सहित  Poland .
The United Kingdom and the other members  of  the British Commonwealth were  the  only major Allied forces continuing the fight against the Axis , with battles taking place in North Africa as well as the long-running Battle of  the  Atlantic .
in  June 1941 , the European Axis launched an invasion  of  the Soviet Union  ,  giving a start to the largest land theatre of war in history , which tied down the major part of the Axis ' military  शक्तियां  for  the  rest of the war .
In December 1941 , Japan joined the Axis , attacked the United States and  यूरोपीय  territories in the Pacific Ocean , and quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific .
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942 , after Japan lost a series of naval battles and European Axis troops were defeated in North Africa and , decisively , at  stalingrad  .
In 1943  ,   साथ  a series of German defeats  in  Eastern Europe  ,  the Allied invasion of Italy , and American victories in the Pacific , the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts .
In 1944 , the Western Allies invaded France , while the Soviet Union regained all of its territorial losses and invaded Germany and its allies .
During 1944 and 1945 the United States defeated the Japanese Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands .
The war in Europe ended with  the  capture  of  Berlin by  सोवियत  and Polish troops  और  the subsequent German unconditional surrender on 8 May  1945  .
Following  the  Potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 July 1945  ,  the United States dropped atomic bombs on the Japanese cities of  हिरोशिमा  on 6  अगस्त  , and Nagasaki on 9 August .
With an  आक्रमण  of the Japanese archipelago imminent , and the Soviet Union having declared war on Japan by invading Manchuria , Japan surrendered on  15  August 1945 , ending the war  in  Asia and cementing the total  विजय  of the Allies over the Axis .
World War II altered the political alignment  और  social structure of the world .
The United Nations ( UN  )  was established to foster international  सहयोग  and prevent future conflicts .
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States , the Soviet Union , China  ,  the United Kingdom , and France—became the permanent members of the United Nations Security Council  .
the  Soviet Union and the  संयुक्त  States  उभरा  as rival superpowers , setting the stage for the Cold War , which  lasted  for the next 46 years .
Meanwhile ,  the  influence of European great powers started to decline , while the decolonisation of Asia and Africa began .
Most countries whose industries had been damaged moved  towards  economic  रिकवरी  .
Political integration , especially in Europe , emerged as an effort to stabilise postwar relations and fight more effectively in the Cold War .
A limited liability company ( LLC  )  is a flexible form of enterprise that blends elements of partnership and corporate structures .
नोट  than an LLC is  नहीं  a corporation , and  कॉलिंग   an  LLC a  निगम  is technically incorrect .
An LLC is a  विधिक   रूप  of company  कि  provides limited liability to its owners in  the  vast majority of United States jurisdictions .
LLCs do not need  to  be organized for profit .
Five K-Cups
The inside of a used K-Cup , with the  शीर्ष  foil and the used coffee grounds removed .
This shows the filter inside the K-Cup .
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or other single cup brewing  प्रणालियों  to brew a cup of coffee , tea , or hot chocolate .
Each K-Cup is a  प्लास्टिक  container with a coffee filter inside .
मैदान  coffee beans are packed in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight with a combination plastic and foil lid  .
When  the  K-Cup is  लगाई  in a Keurig brewer , the brewer punctures the foil lid  और  the bottom of the K-Cup and forces hot water under pressure through the K-Cup  और  into a  मग  .
keurig  licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain  कॉफी  Roasters , Diedrich/ Gloria  जीन्स  , Timothy 's World Coffee , Van Houtte , Caribou Coffee , Celestial Seasonings ,  bigelow  Tea Company , Twinings , Tully 's , Coffee People and Newman  's  Own .
Keurig 's  patents  on the original K-Cup design expired in September  2012  .
Keurig holds at least one additional , still-active US patent and another patent  अनुप्रयोग  , detailing improvements that  have  subsequently been  incorporated  in their K-Cup  डिज़ाइन  .

A modern  seiko  quartz wristwatch using the chronograph function ( movement 7T92 ) .
Citizen Atessa Eco-Drive ATV53-3023 analog-digital chronograph with 4 area  रेडियो  Controlled reception (  उत्तर  America , Europe , China ,  जापानी  ) .
A chronograph is a specific type of watch that is used as a stopwatch combined with a display watch .
A  मौलिक  chronograph has  an  independent  स्वीप  second hand ; it can be started  ,  stopped , and returned  to   शून्य  by successive pressure on the stem .
लुई  Moinet invented  the  chronograph in 1816
Conventional PCI  (  PCI is  an  initialism formed  इससे  Peripheral Component Interconnect , part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer  बस   लिये  attaching  हार्डवेयर  devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions found on  a  processor bus , but  in  a standardized format that is independent of any particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus  appear  to  the  processor to be connected directly to the  प्रोसेसर  bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor  's   पता  space .
Attached devices can  लो  either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself , called a planar device in the PCI specification  ,  or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus  थी  first implemented in  ibm  PC compatibles , where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus  as  the bus configuration .
It has subsequently been adopted  लिये  other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being  replaced  by PCI Express , but , most  motherboards   हैं  still made with one or  अधिक  PCI slots , which are sufficient for many uses .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the  बस  ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ) , electrical characteristics , bus  समय  , and protocols .
The specification can be purchased from the PCI Special Interest Group (  pci-sig  ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include  :  network cards ,  ध्वनि  cards , modems , extra ports such as USB  or  serial , TV tuner  ताश  and disk controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew  the  capabilities of PCI ;  the  preferred interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI  वीडियो  cards  remain  available for use with old PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots .
Many devices  previously  provided on PCI expansion  ताश   हैं  now commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions  .
माइकल  Whitaker Smith  (  born October 7  ,  1957 ) is an  अमरीकी   समकालीन  Christian musician , who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts .
His biggest success in mainstream music was in 1991 when ``  प्लेस  in this World '' hit No . 6 on the Billboard Hot 100 .
स्मिथ  is  a  three-time Grammy Award winner , and  रै   अर्जित  40 Dove Awards .
Over the course of  उसके  career , he  बेची  more than 13 million albums and recorded 29 No . 1 Hit  गीतों  , fourteen gold albums , and five platinum albums .
Smith is an American Music Award recipient ; he was also named one of People magazine  's  `` Most Beautiful  लोगों  '' .
An American poster from the World War II -era that was used to  inform  people about what  वे  should do if they suspect sabotage  .
तोड़फोड़  is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another entity through subversion , obstruction , disruption  ,  or  विनाश  .
In a workplace setting , sabotage is the conscious withdrawal of efficiency generally directed at causing some change in  कार्यस्थल  conditions .
One who engages in sabotage is a saboteur .
As a  नियम  , saboteurs try to conceal  उनके  identities because of the consequences of their actions .
For  उदाहरण  , whereas an environmental pressure group might be  प्रसन्न  to  be  identified with  an  act of sabotage , it would not want the individual identities of the perpetrators known .
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a  निजी  , independent college  साथ  an Evangelical Christian basis that focuses on teaching classical liberal arts and government , located in Purcellville , Virginia , United States .
Patrick  हेनरी  is known for its conservative evangelical  ईसाई  focus .
As  of  April 17 , 2007 , the  कॉलेज  was accredited by the  transnational   संघ  of Christian Colleges and Schools , a national  faith-related  accrediting organization recognized  by  the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation .
The school was founded with the help of the Home School Legal Defense Association , and now  serves  as the headquarters for the organization , with which it is still closely connected .
The history of television comprises the work of numerous engineers and inventors in several countries over many decades  .
The earliest proposal was in 1908 ,  in   a  paper by A . A. Campbell-Swinton and postulated the  उपयोग  of cathode rays .
The first practical demonstrations of television , however , were developed using electromechanical methods to scan , transmit , and reproduce an image .
As  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  camera and display tubes were perfected ,  electromechanical  television gave way  to  all-electronic systems in nearly all applications .

A cinema in Australia
A typical multiplex ( AMC Promenade 16  in  Woodland Hills , Los Angeles , U.S.  )
A movie theater ( also called a cinema , movie house , film house , film theater or picture house ) is  a  venue , usually a building ,  लिये  viewing films .
Most but not all movie theaters are commercial operations catering to the  सामान्य  public , who attend by purchasing a ticket .
The movie is projected with a movie projector onto  a  large projection screen at the front of the auditorium .
Most movie theaters  हैं  now equipped for digital cinema projection , removing the need to create and transport a physical film print  .
Southern California Norton Owner 's Club on California State Route 41 , near Creston .
A motorcycle club is a group of individuals whose  प्राथमिक  interest and activities involve motorcycles .
Lyme disease , Lyme  borreliosis  is an infectious disease caused by at least three species of bacteria belonging to the genus  borrelia  .
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of Lyme disease in North  अमेरिका  , whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii cause most European  मामले  .
The disease is  नामित  after the towns of Lyme and Old Lyme , Connecticut , USA  ,  where a number of cases were identified in  1975  .
Although Allen Steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978 , the  कारण  of the disease remained a mystery until 1981 , when B. burgdorferi was identified by  विली  Burgdorfer .
Lyme disease is the  सबसे  common tick-borne disease in the Northern Hemisphere .
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the bite of infected ticks  belonging  to  a  few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks ''  )  .
Early symptoms may include fever , headache , fatigue , depression , and  a  characteristic circular skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ) .
Left untreated , later symptoms may involve  the  joints , heart , and central nervous system .
In most cases , the infection and its symptoms are eliminated by antibiotics ,  विशेषकर  if the illness is treated early .
Delayed or inadequate treatment can lead to more serious symptoms , which can be disabling and difficult to treat .
Penises of minke whales on display at the  आइसलैंडिक   phallological  Museum
Penis  (  plural penises or penes )  is   a  general term for the organs with which male and hermaphrodite animals introduce sperm into receptive females  दौरान   copulation   .
Such organs occur in many animals , both vertebrate and invertebrate , but males do not bear  a  penis in every animal species , and  in  those species in which the male does  भालू  a  so-called  penis , the penes in the various species are not necessarily homologous .
For example , the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to the penis of a male insect or barnacle .
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs ,  लकिन  not to all ; for example the intromittent organ of most cephalopoda is  the   hectocotylus  ,  a  specialised arm , and male spiders use their pedipalps .
In most species of  पशु  in which there is an organ that might  reasonably  be described as a penis  ,  it has no major function  अन्य  than intromission , or at least conveying the sperm to the female , but in the  placental  mammals the penis  bears   the  distal part  of  the urethra , which discharges both urine during urination and semen  दौरान  copulation as the occasion requires .
कलाकारों  and repertoire (  a  & R ) is the division of a record label or music publishing company that is responsible for talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of  रिकॉर्डिंग  artists and/or songwriters .
it  also acts as a liaison between artists and  the  record label or publishing company ; every activity involving artists to the point  of  album release is generally considered under the purview of , and responsibility of , A &  r  .
a  furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and U.S. customary  इकाई  equal to one-eighth of a mile  ,  equivalent to  220  yards , 660 feet , 40 rods , or 10  जंजीरों  .
the  exact value of the furlong varies slightly among English-speaking  देशों  .
Five furlongs are approximately 1 kilometre ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ) .
Since the original definition of the metre was  one-quarter  of one ten-millionth of the circumference of the Earth ( along the great circle coincident with the meridian of longitude  गुजर  through Paris )  ,  the circumference  of  the Earth is about  40,000  km or  परिचय  200,000 furlongs .
CR2032 lithium button cell battery
लिथियम  9 volt ,  aa  ,  &  AAA sizes
Lithium batteries are  डिस्पोजेबल  ( primary ) batteries that have lithium metal or lithium  यौगिकों  as an anode .
They  स्टैंड  apart from other  बैटरी  in their high charge density ( long life ) and high cost per unit .
Depending on the design and  रासायनिक  compounds used , lithium cells can produce voltages  इससे  1.5 V ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or alkaline battery  )  to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are  widely  used  in  products such as  पोर्टेबल  consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  devices  .
Raymond  ``  Ray '' Charles Jack LaMontagne ( ; born  जून  18 , 1973 ) is  an  American singer-songwriter  .
LaMontagne has released four studio albums , Trouble , Till the Sun Turns Black , Gossip in the Grain and God Willin '  &  the  क्रीक  Do n't Rise .
He was born in New Hampshire and was inspired to create music after hearing an album  by  Stephen Stills .
Critics have compared LaMontagne 's music to that of The Band , Van Morrison , Nick Drake , and Tim Buckley .
he  lives in Massachusetts with his wife and two children .
