Model ships  और  castle
A scale model is  a  physical model , a representation  or  copy of an object that is larger or smaller than the actual size  of  the object , which seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object .
Very often  the  scale model is used as a guide to making the object in full size .
Scale models are built or collected for many reasons .
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the  zune  product family released on September 15 , 2009  by  Microsoft .
It was a direct competitor with the Apple iPod and iPhone series of mobile devices .
It  थी  initially  released  in 16 and  32  GB capacities .
A 64  gb  version  थी  released  on   अप्रैल  9 ,  2010  .
it  utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and included Wi-Fi for synchronization , access to the Zune Marketplace  और  Web browsing .
The Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 chip , allowing it to play 720p video through the optional HDMI Zune dock on a  high-definition  television .
Otherwise , content would be scaled down to 480x272 pixels on  the  player 's OLED touchscreen .
Old Sparky , the electric chair  प्रयुक्त  at Sing Sing  थाना
Execution by electrocution , usually performed using an electric chair , is an execution method  originating  in the United  राज्य  in which  the   condemned  person is strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted  through  electrodes placed on the body .
This execution method was created by employees of  थामस  Edison during the War of Currents , and has been used only  in  the United States and  ,   लिये  a period of several decades ,  in  the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation , last in  1976  ) .
Historically ,  एकबार  the condemned person was attached to the chair , various cycles  (  differing  in  voltage and  अवधि  ) of alternating current would  be  passed through the individual 's body , in order to  कारण  fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ) .
The first  धक्का  of electric current was designed to  कारण  immediate unconsciousness and brain death ;  the  second one was designed  to  cause fatal damage to the vital organs .
Death was  अक्सर  caused by electrical overstimulation of the heart .
हालांकि  in the United States the electric chair has become a  प्रतीक  of the death penalty , its use is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection , which is widely believed to be a more humane  विधि  of execution .
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method  of   निष्पादन  ,  आज  it is only maintained as  a  secondary method that may be chosen over  lethal  injection at the request of  the  prisoner .
As  of  2010 ,  electrocution  is an optional form of execution in  अलबामा  , Florida , South  कैरोलिना  and Virginia .
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal injection as an alternative method .
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee , the  इलेक्ट्रिक   कुर्सी  has been retired except for those whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31 , 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31  ,  1998  )  and who chose electrocution .
In both states  ,  inmates who do not choose  electrocution  or inmates who committed their crimes after the designated date are killed by  lethal   इंजेक्शन  .
The electric chair is an alternate form of execution approved for potential use in Arkansas and Oklahoma if  अन्य  forms  of  execution are found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution .
It is the sole method of execution in Vermont , where treason is the  तभी  capital crime .
On February 8 , 2008 ,  the  Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by electric chair was a  ``  cruel and unusual punishment '' under the state 's constitution .
This  brought   executions  of this type to  an   समाप्त  in Nebraska , the only remaining state to  retain  electrocution as its  एकमात्र  method  of  execution for murder .
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General Assembly , the state legislature of the American State of Maryland , and is composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts .
the   हाउस  of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State  हाउस  ( state capitol ) on State Circle in Annapolis ,  जिससे  is the state  पूंजी  .
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and the offices of the Governor and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland .
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis ,  in  the nearby Casper R. Taylor , Jr. House Office Building .
The Liberation of Paris (  भी  known  as  the Battle for Paris ) took place during World War II  इससे  19  अगस्त  1944 until the surrender of the occupying German garrison on 25 August .
The  मुक्ति  of Paris started with an uprising by the French Resistance against the German garrison .
On 24 August , the French Forces of the Interior ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur , FFI ) received reinforcements from the  फ़्री  French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton .
The capital region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the  हस्ताक्षर  of the Second Compiègne Armistice in June 1940 , when  the  German Army occupied northern and westernmost France , and when the  कठपुतली  regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France .
This battle marked the  मुक्ति   of  Paris and the exile of the Vichy government to Sigmaringen in Germany .
however  , there was still much heavy fighting to be done before France was liberated , including the campaign  in  southern France during August-September (  in  Provence and extending into the southwestern region of the Vosges Mountains ) , along  the  German-held seaports of  पश्चिमी  France ( such as  at  Brest and Dunkirk ) , in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France , and in northeastern France , such as along  the  Rhine and  moder  Rivers  .
The German Army and SS fought doggedly in these areas for the remainder  of  1944 and into 1945 .
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is  a  song written by  डेव  Mason of the English  चट्टान  band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album  ,  Traffic .
The song was also a hit single for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969 , #  69  , recharted in 1972 , US # 33 ) , Mongo Santamaría ( 1969  ,  # 95 )  और  Grand  दुर्गंध  Railroad ( 1971 , US # 54 ) .
It has also been  अंकित  by  तीन  Dog Night ( 1969  )  , The 5th  आयाम  ( 1970 ) , Lou Rawls , Freddie King , Paul Weller , Lulu ,  chairmen  of the Board ( 1970 ) , Rare Earth , The Electric Concept Orchestra , Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ) , The Ohio Players ( 1971 ) , Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ) , Maceo Parker , Gladys Knight & the Pips ,  फैली  Panic and The Black Crowes .
A Steel  ढोल  version by Trinidad Oil  कम्पनी  was reissued  on  the dancefloor jazz compilation Blue Juice 2 .
It was also featured in  the  2000 film Duets  ,  sung  by  Huey Lewis .
Both the original and the Joe Cocker cover were featured in the movie Flight , starring Denzel Washington  .
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor , voice actor , singer , songwriter and musician  ,  best known for his starring role as Ned Bigby on the  निकलोडियन  sitcom Ned 's Declassified School  अस्तित्व  Guide and  लिये  his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules , as the  सीसे   अक्षर   नोलन  Byrd .
Werkheiser also played Peter  parkes  in the fourth and final  ऋतु  of the ABC Family show Greek .
Sample  दृश्य  of an electronic health record based on images
Sample view of an electronic health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an  evolving  concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations .
It is  a  record in digital format that is theoretically  सक्षम  of being  साझा   आरपार  different health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur by way  of  network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may  शामिल  a range of  आंकड़ा  ,  सहित  demographics , medical history , medication and allergies , immunization status ,  प्रयोगशाला  test results , radiology images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing  सूचना  .
Loan origination is the process  by  which a borrower applies for a new loan , and a lender  प्रक्रियाओं  that application .
Origination generally includes all the steps from taking a loan application up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ) .
Loan servicing covers everything after disbursing the funds  जबतक  the loan is fully paid  बंद  .
Loan origination is a specialized version of new account opening for financial services organizations .
Certain people and  संगठन  specialize  in  loan origination .
Mortgage brokers and other  बंधक  originator companies serve as a prominent example .
There are many different types of  लोन  .
For more information on loan types ,  देखिए  the loan and consumer lending articles .
Steps involved in originating a loan vary by loan type , various kinds of loan risk , regulator , lender  नीति  ,  और  other factors .
Top left : The Tennessee Valley Authority , part of the New Deal , being signed into law in 1933  .
Top right : Franklin Delano Roosevelt , who was responsible for initiatives  और  programs collectively known  as  the New Deal .
Bottom : A public mural  इससे  one of the artists employed by the New Deal .
The New Deal was a series of economic  कार्यक्रम  enacted in the United States between 1933 and  1936  .
They involved presidential executive orders or  कानून  passed by Congress  दौरान  the  पहला   पद  of President Franklin D. Roosevelt .
the   कार्यक्रम  were in  जवाब  to the Great Depression , and focused on what historians  कॉल   the   ``  3 Rs ''  :   राहत  , Recovery , and Reform .
That is  राहत  for the unemployed and poor  ;   रिकवरी  of the economy to normal  स्तर  ; and Reform of the financial system  to  prevent a repeat depression .
The New Deal produced a political realignment , making the Democratic Party the  बहुमत  ( as  खूब  as the party that held the White House for seven out  of   नौ  Presidential terms from 1933 to  1969  ) , with its base in  उदार  ideas  ,  the white South  ,  traditional  डेमोक्रेट  , big city  मशीने  , and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities .
The Republicans were split , with conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and growth , and liberals accepting some  of  it and promising to make it more efficient .
The  realignment  crystallized into the New Deal Coalition that dominated most presidential elections into the  1960s  , while the opposition Conservative Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
by   1936  the term  ``  liberal '' typically was used for supporters of the New Deal , and `` conservative `` for its opponents  .
From 1934 to 1938 , Roosevelt was assisted in his  endeavours  by a  “pro-spender”  majority  in  Congress ( drawn  इससे   two-party  , competitive , non-machine , Progressive  ,  and Left party districts ) .
As noted  by  Alexander Hicks  ,  “Roosevelt , backed by rare , non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern Democrat representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat senators — spelled Second New  सौदे  reform.”
अनेक  historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New  सौदे  '' (  1935–38  ) ,  साथ  the second one more liberal and more controversial .
The `` First New  सौदे  '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with diverse groups , from banking and railroads to industry and farming , all of which demanded help for economic survival .
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration , for instance , provided  $  500 million for relief operations by states and cities , while  the  short-lived CWA  (  Civil Works Administration ) gave localities money to operate  make-work  projects in 1933-34 .
The `` Second  नई  Deal `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions , the Works Progress  प्रशासन  ( WPA ) relief  कार्यक्रम  ( which  बना  the federal government by far the largest single employer  in  the nation ) , the Social Security Act , and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers .
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States Housing Authority  और  Farm Security  प्रशासन  , both in 1937 , and  the  Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 ,  जिससे  set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of workers .
The economic downturn of 1937–38 , and the bitter split between the  afl  and CIO labor unions led to major Republican  gains   in  Congress in 1938 .
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined in the informal Conservative  गठबन्धन  .
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA  और  CCC and blocked major liberal proposals .
Roosevelt himself turned his attention  to  the war effort , and  जीती  reelection in 1940 and 1944 .
The Supreme Court declared  the  National  रिकवरी  Administration ( NRA ) and the first version of the Agricultural  समायोजन  Act ( AAA ) unconstitutional  ,  however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld .
As the first Republican president elected after FDR ,  ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the New Deal largely intact , even expanding  it  in some areas .
In the 1960s ,  lyndon  B. Johnson 's  ग्रेट  Society used the New  सौदे  as inspiration for a dramatic expansion of liberal programs ,  जिससे  Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained .
After 1974 , however , the call for deregulation of  the  economy gained bipartisan support .
The  नई  Deal regulation  of  banking ( Glass–Steagall Act )  थी  suspended in the 1990s .
Many New Deal programs remain active  ,  with some still operating under the original names , including the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ) , the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ) , the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA )  ,  and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ) .
The largest programs  स्टिल  in existence today are the Social Security System  और  the Securities and Exchange  आयोग  (  सेक  ) .
A woman ( ) , pl :  महिलाओं  (  )  is a female human .
The term woman is usually reserved for an adult , with the term girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent .
However , the term woman  is   भी  sometimes used to identify a female human , regardless of  आयु   ,   as   in  phrases such as `` Women 's rights `` .
Women are  typically  capable of  giving   जनम  , though older women who have gone through menopause and  कुछ  intersex women  can  not .
`` I Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is  a  song performed by American rock band Aerosmith  लिये  the 1998 film Armageddon .
Written by Diane Warren , the song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100  (  the first #  1  for the band after  28  years  साथ  ) .
The song  ठहरे  at number one for four weeks from September 5 to September 26 , 1998 .
The song also stayed at number  1  for several weeks in several other  देशों  .
in  the UK , the song peaked at number four , becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the UK ,  जहाँ  it was the 17th best-selling single of 1998 , and has  बेची   over   a  million copies .
Although not used by the majority of the world  's  countries , daylight saving  समय  is common in the Western world .
daylight  saving time ( DST ) —also  गर्मियाँ  time  in  British English —  is  the practice of advancing clocks during the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings  have  less .
Typically clocks  हैं  adjusted forward one hour near the start of spring and are adjusted backward  in  autumn .
The modern idea of daylight saving was first proposed in  1895  by  जार्ज  Vernon Hudson  और  it was first  implemented  during the First  संसार  War .
Many countries  have  used it at various times since then .
Much of the United  राज्य  used DST in the 1950s and 1960s , and DST  उपयोग  expanded following the  1970s  energy crisis and has been widely used in  उत्तर  America and Europe since then .
The practice  रै  been both praised and criticized .
Adding daylight  to  evenings benefits retailing , sports , and other  क्रियाएँ  that exploit sunlight after working  घंटों   ,  but can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun .
Although an early goal of  dst  was  to  reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of electricity ) , modern heating and cooling usage patterns differ greatly , and research about how DST currently affects energy  उपयोग  is limited or contradictory  .
DST clock shifts present  अन्य  challenges .
वे   complicate  timekeeping  ,  and can disrupt meetings , travel , billing  ,   रिकार्ड  keeping  ,  medical devices , heavy equipment , and sleep patterns .
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically , but this can be limited and error-prone , particularly when DST dates are changed .
Floorplan  of   the  Château de Montargis
Montargis  is  a commune in the  loiret  department in north-central France on the  loing  river  .
The town is located about south of Paris and east of Orléans in the Gâtinais .
Montargis is the second largest city  in   the  Loiret , after  orléans  .
It is near a large forest , and contains light industry and farming , including saffron .
Due to its numerous canals and bridges , Montargis sometimes bills itself as the ``  वेनिस  of the Gâtinais . ''
Though quite modern  ,  it retains a medieval charm in its downtown area .
In computer storage , a logical unit number , or LUN , is a number used to identify a logical unit , which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocols which  encapsulate  SCSI ,  ऐसे  as  fibre  Channel or iSCSI .
A LUN may  be  used with any device which  supports  read/write operations , such as a tape drive , but is most often used to refer to a logical  डिस्क  as created on a SAN .
Though not  technically  correct , the term `` LUN '' is often also  प्रयुक्त  to  refer  to the logical disk itself .
the  Gospel According  to  Mark ( , , to euangelion kata Markon ) , commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or simply Mark , is the second book  of  the New Testament .
इस  canonical  खाता  of the life  of  Jesus of Nazareth  is  one of the three synoptic gospels .
It was thought to  be  an epitome , which accounts for its place as the second  इन्जील  in  the  Bible .
However , most contemporary scholars now regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ) .
That Mark was used as a source for the other synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and Gospel of Luke is widely held by many , although not all , New Testament scholars .
The  इन्जील  of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus from his baptism by John the Baptist  to  his death  और  resurrection .
It focuses particularly on the last week of his life ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem .
Its swift narrative portrays Jesus as a heroic man of action , an exorcist , healer and  चमत्कार  worker .
An important theme of  चिह्नित  is the Messianic Secret .
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals , tries unsuccessfully  to  keep his messianic  पहचान  secret , and conceals his message with parables .
Meanwhile , the disciples fail to understand both the  implication  of the miracles of Jesus and the meaning of the things he predicts about his arrest , death and resurrection .
Most  विद्वानों  believe that the original text  of  the gospel ends at Mark 16:8  साथ  the  डिस्कवरी  of Jesus  '  empty tomb and that  the  following account of his resurrection appearances is a  बाद  addition .
According to  परंपरा  and some early church writers ,  the  author is Mark the Evangelist , the companion of the apostle  पीटर  .
The gospel , however , appears  to  rely on several underlying sources ,  varying   in  form and in theology , which tells  विरूद्ध  the tradition that the gospel was  आधारित   on   पीटर  's preaching .
The text  is  a compilation which may include eye-witness  खाते  as well as known apostolic preachings , and pre-existing written records  कि  do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators .
Some of the stories in the  इन्जील  may have been transmitted orally before being written down  .
विभिन्न  elements within the gospel  सुझाएँ  that the author wrote in Syria or Palestine for a non-Jewish Christian community .
The  रब  of the Rings is an epic high fantasy  अनोखा  written by English philologist and University of Oxford professor J.  R.  R.  tolkien  .
The story began  as  a sequel to  tolkien  's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit , but eventually developed into  a  much larger work .
It was written in stages between 1937 and  1949  , much of it during World War II .
It is the second best-selling novel ever written , with over 150 million copies sold .
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist , the Dark Lord Sauron , who had in an earlier  आयु  created the One Ring to rule the other Rings of Power as  the  ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer  और  rule all of Middle-earth .
From quiet beginnings in the Shire , a Hobbit land  नहीं  unlike the English countryside , the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth , following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its  वर्ण  , notably  the  hobbits Frodo Baggins ,  samwise  `` Sam '' Gamgee , Meriadoc `` Merry  ''  Brandybuck and  peregrin  `` Pippin '' Took  ,  but also the hobbits ' chief  allies  and travelling companions : Aragorn ,  a  Human Ranger  ;  Boromir , a man from Gondor ; Gimli , a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas , an Elven prince ; and Gandalf ,  a  Wizard .
The work was initially intended by  tolkien  to be one volume of a two-volume set , with the  अन्य  being The Silmarillion , but this idea was dismissed by his publisher .
It  थी  decided for economic reasons  to  publish The Lord of the Rings as three volumes over the course of a year from 29 July 1954  to  20  अक्तूबर   1955  , thus creating the now familiar  रब  of the Rings trilogy .
The three volumes were entitled The  फेलोशिप  of the Ring , The Two Towers , and The Return of the King .
Structurally , the novel is divided internally into six books , two per volume , with several appendices of background material included at the end of the third  आवाज़  .
The Lord  of   the  Rings has since  महरूम  reprinted numerous times and  अनूदित   into  many languages .
Tolkien  's  work has been the subject of extensive analysis of its themes and origins .
Although  a  major work in itself , the story was only the last movement of a larger epic Tolkien had worked on since 1917 ,  in   a  process he described as  mythopoeia  .
Influences  on  this earlier work , and on the story of The  रब  of the Rings , include philology ,  mythology  ,  धर्म  and the author 's  distaste  for the effects of industrialization , as well as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's  अनुभवों  in  संसार  War  i  .
The Lord of the  बजती  in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on modern fantasy ; the impact of Tolkien 's works is such that the use of  the  words `` Tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been  अंकित  in the Oxford English Dictionary .
The  enduring  popularity of The Lord of the Rings has led to numerous  सन्दर्भ  in popular culture , the founding of many societies by fans of Tolkien 's works , and the publication of many books about Tolkien  और  his works .
the  Lord of the  बजती  has inspired , and continues  to  inspire , artwork , music , films and television , video games , and subsequent literature .
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of  the  Rings have been made for radio , theatre , and film  .
The following is an episode list for the Nickelodeon sitcom Drake & Josh .
The series debuted on January 11 , 2004 .
a  TV film  मैरी  Christmas , Drake & Josh was made apart  इससे  the regular series on December 5 , 2008 .
There are a total of  60  episodes were produced spanning four seasons .
Drake Bell , Josh Peck , and Miranda Cosgrove  यहूद  the only actors to appear in all  60  episodes .
The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp at the  टोली  's headquarters and practice facility in Santa Clara , California in August  2010  .
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the  एक्सेप्शन   of  quarterback Alex Smith , who is in  a  black jersey ; the defense in white .
In the National Football League  ,  training camp refers to the time before the season  commences  .
During this time , teams will sometimes congregate at an outside location ,  प्रायः  a university , to conduct training camp for at least the  पहला  few weeks .
This is similar to baseball 's spring training .
Training  शिविर  is used in several different ways .
New players and coaches use it to acclimate themselves to new teammates and  प्रणालियों   .
लिये  younger players , it serves as a period of evaluation ; for veterans , it is time to round back into form .
Training camp is divided into several different components .
The  पहला  is scrimmages .
These are pseudo-games where teams  चलाएं  nearly full games ' worth of plays  .
Sometimes , two practice  सत्र  are held on the same day .
This concept is referred to as two-a-days .
Other parts  of  training camp include drills , meetings with coaches  और  other players at one 's position ,  वज़न  training  ,  and pre-season games  .
The latter  हाफ  of training camp leads  सीधे  into  the  exhibition season  .
With NFL training camps starting in late-July , the biggest concern has been dehydration .
In 2001 , Minnesota Vikings  खिलाड़ी  Korey Stringer died of a medical condition based from dehydration and heatstroke .
The death of Stringer prompted the NFL to change their training policies .
At each practice  ,  every team must have the team doctor and trainers on the field ; additionally , an ambulance must be present during practices .
With NFL  प्रशिक्षण  camps beginning in late  जुलाई  , severe weather can affect practice and exhibition  खेल  .
In 2002 , a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended due to lightning  निकट   क्लीवलैंड  Browns Stadium , and severe storms  have  been known to disrupt training camps .
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an early look at the players ;  प्रवेश  to practices is often free or substantially less expensive than a game ticket , making training camp trips a popular  विकल्प  for fans who can not attend many  खेल  due to  वित्तीय  or other reasons .
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at camp sites along with offering activities and events to make training  शिविर  a more  fan-friendly   अनुभव  .
In computing , a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to store , retrieve and update  a  set of files  .
The term could refer to the abstract  आंकड़ा  structures used to define files , or to the actual software or firmware components that implement the abstract ideas .
Some file systems are used on local data storage devices  ;  others provide file access via a network protocol ( e.g .  nfs  , SMB , or 9P clients  )  .
Some file systems  हैं  ``  आभासी  '' , in that the `` files '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g . procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store .
The file system manages access  to  both the content of files and the metadata about those files .
it  is responsible for arranging storage space  ;  reliability , efficiency , and tuning with regard to the physical storage medium are important design considerations .
William Howard Taft  (  September 15 , 1857 – March 8 , 1930 ) was the 27th President  of  the United States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief Justice of  the  United States ( 1921–1930 ) .
he  is the only person to have served in both of these offices .
Before becoming President , Taft , a Republican , was selected to serve  on   the  Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887  .
In 1890 , Taft  थी  appointed Solicitor General of the  संयुक्त  States and  in  1891 a judge on the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit .
In 1900 , President William McKinley appointed Taft Governor-General of the Philippines  .
In 1904 , President Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an effort to groom Taft , then his close political ally , into his handpicked  अध्यक्षीय  successor .
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving , assuming on some occasions the role of  एक्टिंग   सचिव  of  राज्य  , while declining  दोहराया  offers from Roosevelt  to  serve on the Supreme Court .
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt , Taft won an easy victory in his 1908 bid for the presidency  .
In  उसके  only term , Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting , civil service reform , strengthening the Interstate  कॉमर्स  Commission , improving  the  performance of the postal service , and passage of the Sixteenth  amendment  .
Abroad , Taft sought to further the economic development of  राष्ट्र  in Latin America and  एशिया  through `` Dollar Diplomacy `` , and showed  decisiveness  and restraint  in  response to revolution in Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious  to  the political ramifications of his decisions , often alienated his own key constituencies , and was overwhelmingly defeated in his bid for a second term in  the  presidential election of 1912 .
In surveys of presidential scholars  ,  Taft is usually ranked near the middle of lists of  सब  American Presidents .
After leaving office ,  taft  spent his time  in   academia  , arbitration , and  the  search for world peace through his  self-founded  League to Enforce Peace  .
In 1921 , after the First World War ,  अध्यक्ष   वारेन  G. Harding appointed Taft Chief Justice of the United States .
Taft served in this capacity until  shortly  before his death in 1930 .
the  Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic  फिल्मी  produced and directed by Cecil  B.   demille  that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus , in which the Hebrew-born  मूसा  , an adopted Egyptian  प्रिंस  , becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew  स्लेव  .
It starred  चार्ल्टन  Heston in the lead role , Yul Brynner as his adoptive brother , Pharaoh Rameses II , Anne Baxter as Nefretiri  ,   एडवर्ड  G. Robinson  as  Dathan ,  yvonne  De Carlo as Sephora ,  डेबरा  Paget as Lilia , and John Derek as Joshua  .
The supporting  डाल  includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh Seti I , Nina Foch as Bithiah , Martha Scott as Yoshebel , Judith Anderson as Memnet , Vincent Price as  baka  , and John Carradine as Aaron .
The film was released by Paramount Pictures in VistaVision  on  October 5 , 1956 .
The Ten Commandments  ,   जिससे  DeMille narrated , was the last film that he directed .
He was set to  सीधा  the 1958  रीमेक  of his 1938 film The  buccaneer  , but his final  बीमारी  forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his  son-in-law   ,  actor Anthony Quinn .
DeMille had also planned to film the life of Lord Baden Powell , the founder of the Scout movement  ,  with David Niven ; this project was never realized .
The Ten  आयतें  is a partial remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film .
कुछ  of the  डाल  and crew of the 1956 version worked on the original .
It has since been remade  as   a  television miniseries broadcast in April 2006 .
The Ten  आयतें  is  एक  of the most financially successful films ever made  ,  grossing over $ 65 million  at   the  U.S. box office .
Adjusting for inflation  ,  this makes it the sixth highest-grossing film domestically , with an adjusted total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012 .
The box office website `` The Numbers '' lists the domestic gross at $ 80  लाख  .
In 1999 , The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being `` culturally  ,  historically , or  aesthetically  significant  ''  .
In June  2008  ,  the  American Film Institute revealed its `` Ten Top  टेन  `` —the best ten films in ten American film  genres—after  polling over 1,500 people from the creative community .
The Ten Commandments was listed as the tenth best film in the epic genre .
The film received seven Academy Award nominations including Best Picture , and won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects .
Charlton Heston was nominated  लिये   a  Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture Actor in the drama category .
Yul Brynner  जीती  the National Board of Review Award for Best  कर्ता  for his role as Rameses , along  साथ  his other  भूमिकाएँ   in  The King and I and Anastasia .
Louisville ( , or ) is a major city and the  largest   नगर   in  the U.S. state of Kentucky and the county seat of Jefferson County .
Since 2003 , the city 's borders have been with those  of  the county  क्युकी  of a city-county merger .
The city  's   कुल  consolidated population  at  the 2010 census was 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance total , 602,011 , excludes semi-autonomous  कस्बों  and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ) .
As of 2010 , the Louisville metropolitan area ( MSA  )   था  a population of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally .
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County  और  12 surrounding counties  ,  eight in Kentucky and  चार  in Southern Indiana (  देखिए  Geography below )  .
the  Louisville Combined Statistical Area , having a population of 1,451,564 , includes the MSA , Hardin County and Larue County in Kentucky , and Scott County , Indiana .
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century , Louisville today is best known as the location of the Kentucky Derby , the first  of   तीन  annual  thoroughbred  horse  दौड़  making up the Triple Crown .
A typical  प्रायोगिक  setup for an  aldol  reaction .
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C )  the  temperature of which is being monitored by a thermocouple ( the wire on the left ) .
A cooling bath  ,  in  प्रयोगशाला  chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry ) practice  ,  is a liquid mixture which is  प्रयुक्त  to maintain low temperatures , typically between 13 °C and −196 °C .
ये  low temperatures are  प्रयुक्त  to collect liquids after distillation , to remove solvents using a rotary evaporator , or to perform a chemical reaction below room temperature ( see : kinetic  कंट्रोल   )  .
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a  ठंडा  fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen , water , or even air  )  — but most  commonly  the term refers to  (  b ) a mixture of 3 components  :   (  1 ) a cooling agent ( such as dry ice  or  water ice  )  ; ( b ) a liquid  'कैरीr  ' ( such  as  liquid water , ethylene  ग्लाइकोल  ,  एसीटोन  , etc .  )   ,  which transfers heat between the  नहाना  and the vessel  ;   ;  and ( c ) an additive  to  depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid  प्रणाली  .
( A familiar example of this is the use of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice cream .
The  phase-change  of ice into liquid  जल  requires energy , 'pulling '  ऊष्मा  from the system .
Adding salt lowers the  अस्थायी   at  which this happens ,  अर्थ  more energy has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice .
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull '  अधिक  heat from its environment to become liquid . )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or excessive food  सेवन  to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health .
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa are the most common specific forms in  the  United Kingdom .
Other types of eating disorders include binge eating disorder and eating disorder not  वरना   निर्दिष्ट  .
Bulimia nervosa is a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging .
Purging can include self-induce vomiting , over-exercising , and the usage of diuretics , enemas , and laxatives .
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the point of  self-starvation  and excessive weight loss .
Though primarily thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10 million being affected in the U.K. ) , eating disorders affect males as  खूब  .
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people with eating  विकार  are males (  गोर्गान   ,  1999 ) .
(  an  estimated 1 million U.K. males being affected ) .
Although  खाने   विकार  are increasing all  over  the world among both men and women , there is evidence to suggest that it is women in the Western world who are at the highest risk of developing them  और  the degree of westernization increases the risk .
Nearly half of  सब  Americans personally know someone with an eating disorder .
the  skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously since  लेप्टिन  was discovered , and  the  skill to observe the functions of the  दिमाग  as well .
Interactions between motivational , homeostatic and self-regulatory control processes are involved  in   खाने  behaviour , which is a key component  in  eating disorders .
The precise cause of  खाने  disorders is not entirely understood , but there  is   प्रमाण  that it  may  be linked to other medical conditions  और  situations .
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting diverse populations .
One study showed that girls  साथ  ADHD have a greater chance of getting an eating disorder than  those  not affected by  adhd  .
Another study suggested that women with PTSD , especially due to sexually related  आघात  , are more likely to develop anorexia nervosa .
One study showed that foster girls are more likely to develop bulimia nervosa .
Some think that  पीर  pressure and idealized body-types seen in the media are also a significant  फ़ैक्टर  .
Some research show that for certain people there  हैं  genetic reasons why they may  be  prone to developing  an  eating disorder .
Recent studies  have  found evidence a correlation between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders .
in   जोड  , anxiety disorders and personality disorders are common occurrences with clients of eating disorders .
While proper treatment  can  be highly  प्रभावी  for many  कष्ट  from specific types of eating disorders ,  the  consequences of eating disorders can be severe , including death ( whether from direct medical effects of disturbed eating  आदतें  or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ) .
Slavery in the  संयुक्त  States existed from the  जल्दी  years  of  the colonial period ; it  थी  firmly established by the time  the  United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776 .
However , by 1804 , all states north of the  मेसन   और  Dixon Line had either abolished slavery outright or passed  कानून  for the gradual abolition of slavery .
In 1787 Congress prohibited slavery in the Northwest Territory  .
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton industry after 1800 , and expanded into the Southwest .
The nation was polarized into  स्लेव  and free states  साथ  the Mason-Dixon Line , which separated  पेन्सिलवेनिया  and  मेरीलैंड  .
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  slave trade in 1808 , but the domestic trade , with sales to the Deep South , expanded dramatically , and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade .
Before the  1840s  , the South  थी  vigorously defending slavery and its expansion into the territories .
In the  उत्तर  some abolitionists  denounced  it as  गुनाहगार  ,  और  numerous anti-slavery forces rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free men .
After failed compromises  और  Abraham Lincoln 's election , in 1861 eleven slave states  broke  away to  रूप   the   confederate   राज्य   of  America , leading to the American Civil War .
The federal government in 1862 made abolition of slavery a war goal .
In  जनवरी  1863 President Lincoln freed  स्लेव  in the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation .
बाद  the  युद्ध  , the Thirteenth Amendment ,  प्रभावी  December 1865  ,   abolished  slavery throughout the entire United States , including the Border  राज्य  and the Indian territories .
From the 16th to  the  19th  सदियां  , an estimated 12 million Africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas .
See  गुलामी  in the Americas .
The great majority went to the sugar  बागानों  of the West Indies or Brazil ,  जहाँ  mortality was high .
About 645,000 were brought to what is now the United States .
By the 1860 United  राज्य  Census , the slave population in the American South had grown to four million .
Of  सब   1,515,605  families in the 15 slave states , nearly 400,000 held slaves ( roughly one in  चार  ) , amounting to 8 % of all American families .
While some  स्लेव  worked as house servants  और   शहरी  artisans , the great majority  worked  on plantations or large farms ,  cultivating  lucrative cash crops , such as rice , tobacco , sugar and , after 1800 , chiefly cotton .
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South , where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton .
In small operations , they worked with their owners .
In large plantations they were directed by white paid overseers .
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human  होने  , and of his/her descendants ) , a racial element was fundamental : slaves were blacks of African descent and owned , almost universally , by whites of European descent .
In  the  17th century , Virginia  ,  followed by other southern colonies , enacted law that children of slave mothers were born into slavery  .
Slaves could  लाभ  freedom only by running  दूर  ( which was difficult and illegal to do ) , or by manumission by owners  ,  which  थी  regulated by states , and became increasingly  मुश्किल   or  prohibited .
In the earliest era of chattel slavery , the colonies also organized work by a  प्रणाली  of bonded labor known as indentured servitude .
This  typically  lasted for several years for both poor Europeans and Africans alike , to  अदा  off the costs of transport to the colonies .
They contracted for such arrangements because of poor economies  in  their home countries .
between  1680 and 1700 , as fewer  europeans  migrated to  the  colonies , planters began to import more Africans as slaves .
Recognizing the importance  of  slavery , the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted  a  new slave code in 1705 ; it combined  a  variety of legislation  और  added new provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law .
Schematic cross  खण्ड  of part of leaf , xylem shown as red circles at figure 8 .
Xylem is one  of  the two  प्रकार  of transport tissue in vascular  पौधे  ( phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the  यूनानी  word ξύλον ( xylon  )  , meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue  is  wood , though it is  मिला  throughout  the  plant  .
Its basic function is to transport water , but it also transports  कुछ  nutrients through the  संयंत्र   .
This clock representation shows some of the major units  of  geological time and definitive events of Earth history .
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil record of life on Earth ; its upper boundary is now regarded  as  4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ) .
Other subdivisions  प्रतिबिंबित  the evolution of life ; the Archean and Proterozoic are both eons , the Palaeozoic , Mesozoic and Cenozoic  हैं  eras of the  phanerozoic  eon .
The two million  साल  Quaternary period , the time of recognizable humans , is  too  small to be visible at this scale .
The geologic time  स्केल  is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy  to  time , and is used  by  geologists , paleontologists , and other earth scientists to describe the timing and relationships  between  events that have occurred  throughout  Earth 's  इतिहास  .
The table of geologic time spans presented  यहाँ  agrees with  the  dates and nomenclature  नियत  forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the International Commission on  स्तरिकी  .
Evidence from radiometric  डेटिंग  indicates that the  धरती  is about 4.54 billion years old .
the  geology or deep time of Earth 's past has been organized into various units according to events which took  प्लेस  in each  काल  .
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the composition of strata which correspond  to  them , indicating major  geological  or paleontological events , such as mass extinctions .
For example ,  the  boundary between the Cretaceous period and the Paleogene period is defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event ,  जिससे  marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups  of  life .
Older time spans which predate the reliable fossil record ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are defined  by   निरपेक्ष  age .
The TI-82 is a  graphing  calculator made by Texas  यंत्र  .
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down , more user friendly version of  the  TI-85  ,   और  as a replacement for the TI-81 .
It was the direct predecessor  of  the TI-83 .
It shares with the TI-85 a 6 MHz Zilog Z80 microprocessor .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features a 96x64  पिक्सेल  display ,  और  the core feature set  of  the TI-81 with  अनेक   नई  features .
The cast of characters of The King of Fighters XI .
the  King of Fighters fighting  खेल  series , produced by SNK Playmore , includes  a  wide cast of characters , some  of  which are taken from other SNK games .
The story takes place in a fictional universe  in   जिससे  an annual series of 3-on-3 or  4-on-4  fighting tournaments  हैं  held .
The first game in the series  introduces  the initial main character of the series , Kyo Kusanagi ,  a  young Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial artists  having  pyrokinetic  abilities  .
Kyo fights  विरूद्ध  the Kusanagi clan 's  दुश्मनों  , his rival Iori Yagami , and the god Orochi and its human followers , among others .
the   पहला  four  खेल  in the series  revolve  about these fights  ,  while The  किंग  of Fighters '99 introduces a new story arc , revolving around K ' , a young man  जो   seeks  to destroy the mysterious NESTS organization because they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of his  पास्ट  memories , so that they could force him to  be   a  fighter under their control .
In The King of Fighters 2003 , a new  अक्षर   नामित  Ash Crimson enters the tournament , to  चोरी  the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi  in  the past for an unknown reason .
A new group of  antagonists  ,  ज्ञात  as Those From the Past , also appears  in  the series ;  वे  want to obtain Orochi 's power for the  purpose  of giving it to their unknown master .
The plot and the characters  आए  from the Yamata no Orochi legend .
There  हैं  also several  वर्ण  in the games that  हैं  parodies or homages  to  several popular  दुश्मनी  ,  manga  , and films .
Merchandise based on the characters has also been released , including action figures and keychains .
The characters have garnered  तारीफ़  from several video game  publications   लिये  the quality of their designs and  movesets  .
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in some of the characters , but added that  the   रोस्टर   is  greatly diverse .
Whale Wars is a weekly American  documentary-style  reality television series that  premiered  on November 7 , 2008 on the Animal Planet cable channel .
The program follows Paul Watson , founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society , as he  और  the crew aboard  उनके  various vessels harass Japanese whalers off  the  coast of Antarctica .
On January  5   ,  2013 , Animal Planet  नवीनीकृत  the series for a  छठे  season .
The Harpy Eagle (  harpia  harpyja ) is a Neotropical species  of  eagle .
it  is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan Eagle which  is  sometimes known as the New Guinea Harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle .
It is  the  largest and most powerful raptor  मिला  in the Americas , and  among  the largest extant  प्रजाति   of  eagles in the world .
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in  the  upper  (  emergent ) canopy layer  .
Destruction  of  its natural habitat has seen it vanish from many parts of its former range , and it is nearly extirpated in  सेंट्रल  America .
Biological classification , or scientific classification in biology , is a method of scientific taxonomy used to group  और  categorize organisms into groups such  as  genus  or  species .
ये  groups  हैं  known as taxa ( singular : taxon ) .
आधुनिक  biological classification has its  रूट  in the work of Carolus  लीनियस  , who grouped species according to shared physical characteristics .
These groupings have since been revised to improve consistency with the Darwinian principle of common descent .
With  the  introduction of the cladistic method in the late 20th century , phylogenetic taxonomy in which organisms are grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness , ignoring morphological similarity , has become common  in  some areas of  जीवविज्ञान  .
Molecular phylogenetics , which uses DNA sequences as data , has also driven  अनेक  recent revisions and is likely to continue doing so .
Biological classification  belongs  to the science of biological systematics .
Lennon 's signature
John Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980  )  was an English musician , singer and songwriter  जो  rose to worldwide fame as a founder member of the Beatles , one of the most commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of  लोकप्रिय  music .
With Paul McCartney , he formed one of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of  the  20th century .
Born and raised in Liverpool , as a teenager Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze  ;  his first band , the Quarrymen  ,  evolved into the Beatles  in  1960 .
As the group  disintegrated  towards the end of the decade ,  लेनन  embarked on a solo career that produced the critically acclaimed albums John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band and Imagine , and iconic songs such as `` Give  सलाम  a Chance `` and ``  imagine  `` .
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969 , he changed his name to John Ono Lennon  .
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975  to  devote time to  उठाने  his infant son Sean ,  लकिन  re-emerged with Ono  in  1980 with the new album Double Fantasy .
he  was murdered three weeks after its release .
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature and acerbic wit in his music , writing , drawings , on film and in interviews .
विवादास्पद  through  उसके  political and peace activism , he moved  to  New York City in 1971 ,  जहाँ  his criticism of the Vietnam War resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's administration to deport him , while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement .
As  of  2012 ,  लेनन  's solo album sales in  the  United States exceed 14 million  इकाई  , and as writer , co-writer or performer , he is responsible for 25 number-one  singles  on the US Hot  100  chart .
In  2002  , a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest Britons voted him eighth , and in 2008 , Rolling Stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of all time .
He  थी  posthumously  inducted  into  the  Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994 .
Statue of Rip van Winkle in Irvington  ,  New York , not far from `` Sunnyside `` , the home  of  Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short story by American author Washington Irving published in 1819 , as well as the name of the  स्टोरी  's  fictional  protagonist .
Written while Irving was living in Birmingham , England , it was part of a  संग्रहण   हकदार  The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon .
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill Mountains , Irving later admitted , `` When I wrote the story , I had  never  been on the Catskills . ''
Throughout the fifty-five year history of the Grammy Awards  ,  many significant  रिकॉर्ड  have been set .
This page only includes the competitive awards won  by  various  कलाकारों  .
This does not include the  विभिन्न  special awards that  हैं  presented by the National Academy of Recording  कला   और  Sciences such as Lifetime  उपलब्धि  Awards , Trustees Awards , Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however does include other non-performance related Grammys ( known  as  the Craft & Production Fields ) that may  have   महरूम  presented to the artist ( s ) .
Pee-wee Herman is a comic fictional character created and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens  .
He is best known for his two television series and film series during the 1980s  .
The childlike Pee-wee  herman   अक्षर  developed as a stage act that quickly led to an HBO special in 1981 .
As the stage performance gained further popularity , Reubens took the character to motion picture with Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985 , toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children .
This paved the way for Pee-wee 's Playhouse , an Emmy Award winning children  's  series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991 .
Another film , Big Top  pee-wee  , was released in 1988 .
Due to negative  मीडिया  attention following a scandal  in  1991 , Reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s , and then gradually resurrected  it  during the following  दशक  .
It was at that time  कि  Reubens addressed plans to write a new  pee-wee  film , Pee-wee 's Playhouse : The Movie .
In June 2007  ,  Reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first  समय  since 1991 at Spike TV 's Guys ' Choice Awards  .
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers  on  the lives of a  समूह  of teenage  मित्रों  living in the fictional suburban town of Point Place  ,  Wisconsin , from May  17  , 1976 , to December 31 , 1979 .
It debuted on the Fox television network , first airing on August 23 , 1998 , running for eight consecutive seasons ,  और   concluding  with the 200th episode on May 18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast members were Topher Grace , Mila Kunis , Ashton Kutcher , Danny Masterson , Laura  prepon  , and  wilmer  Valderrama .
The main adult  डाल  members were Debra  jo  Rupp , Kurtwood Smith , Don Stark and , during the first three seasons , Tanya Roberts  .
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state located in the Midwestern United States .
It  is  named after the  कान्सास  River  जिससे  flows through it , which in turn was named after the Kansa Native American tribe , which inhabited the  क्षेत्रफल  .
The tribe 's name  (  natively kką : ze  )  is often said to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` people of the south wind , '' although this was probably not  the  term 's original meaning .
Residents of Kansas are called `` Kansans . ''
For thousands of years  कया  is now Kansas was home to numerous and diverse  देशी   अमरीकी  tribes .
Tribes in the Eastern part of the state generally lived in  गांवों  along the river valleys .
जनजातियों  in the Western part of the state were semi- nomadic and  hunted  large herds  of   बाइसन  .
Kansas was first settled by European  अमेरिकी   in  the 1830s  ,  but the pace of settlement accelerated in the 1850s , in the midst of political wars over the  गुलामी  issue .
जब  officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854 , abolitionist Free-Staters from New England and pro-slavery settlers  इससे  neighboring  मिसौरी  rushed to the territory to determine  if  Kansas would become a free state or a  स्लेव  state .
Thus , the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in its early days as  ये  forces collided , and was known as Bleeding  कान्सास  .
The abolitionists eventually prevailed and on January 29 ,  1861  , Kansas entered the  संघ  as a free state .
After the Civil  युद्ध  , the population of Kansas grew rapidly , when  लहरें  of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland .
Today , Kansas is one of  the  most productive agricultural states , producing high yields  of   गेहूं  , sorghum and  sunflowers  .
Kansas is the  15th  most extensive and the 33rd  सबसे  populous  of  the 50 United States .
Psychology is an academic and applied discipline  कि  involves the scientific  पढ़ाई  of mental  कृत्यों  and  व्यवहार  .
Psychology has the immediate goal of  समझना  individuals and groups by  दोनो  establishing general  सिद्धान्त  and  researching  specific cases  ,   और   by  many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society .
In this field , a professional or researcher is called a psychologist and can be classified as a social , behavioral , or cognitive scientist .
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental functions in individual and social behavior  ,   जबकि  also exploring  the  physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors .
Psychologists explore concepts such as  बोध  , cognition , attention , emotion , phenomenology ,  प्रेरणा  , brain functioning  ,  personality , behavior , and  interpersonal  relationships .
Psychologists of diverse stripes also consider the unconscious  दिमाग  .
Psychologists  employ  empirical  विधि  to infer causal and  correlational  relationships between psychosocial variables .
In addition ,  or  in opposition , to employing empirical  और  deductive methods , some—especially clinical and  counseling  psychologists—at times rely upon symbolic interpretation and other inductive techniques .
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '' , with psychological findings linking to  शोध   और  perspectives from the social sciences , natural sciences , medicine ,  और  the humanities , such as philosophy .
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment  और  treatment of mental health problems , it is also directed towards understanding  और  solving problems in  अनेक  different spheres of human activity .
The majority of psychologists  हैं  involved in some kind of therapeutic role , practicing  in  clinical , counseling , or school settings .
Many do scientific research on a wide  दायरा  of topics  सम्बन्धित  to mental  प्रक्रियाओं  and behavior , and typically work in university psychology departments or teach in  अन्य  academic settings ( e.g. , medical schools  ,  hospitals ) .
Some are employed in industrial and organizational  जमावट   ,  or in  अन्य  areas such as human development and aging , sports , health , and  the   मीडिया  , as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law  .
Thomas Jefferson ( April  13  ,  1743  ( April 2 ,  1743  O.S. ) – July  4  , 1826 ) was an American Founding Father , the principal author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ) .
At the beginning of the American Revolution , he  परोसा  in the Continental Congress ,  representing  Virginia and then served as a  wartime  Governor of Virginia ( 1779–1781 )  .
Just after the war ended ,  इससे  mid-1784 Jefferson served as a diplomat , stationed in Paris .
In May 1785 , he became the  संयुक्त  States  मंत्री  to France .
Jefferson was the first United States  सचिव  of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President  जार्ज  Washington .
With his close friend  जेम्स   मैडिसन  he organized the Democratic-Republican Party , and subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet .
निर्वाचित  Vice President in 1796 ,  जब  he came  in  second to John Adams of the  federalists  , Jefferson  opposed  Adams  और  with  मैडिसन  secretly wrote the Kentucky and  वर्जिनिया  Resolutions , which attempted to nullify the Alien  और  Sedition Acts .
Elected president in what Jefferson called  the  Revolution  of  1800 , he oversaw the purchase  of  the vast Louisiana Territory from France ( 1803  )  , and sent  the  Lewis and Clark Expedition (  1804–1806  ) to explore the new west .
His second  पद  was beset with troubles at home , such as the failed treason  विचारण  of his former Vice President Aaron Burr .
With escalating trouble with Britain who was  चुनौतीपूर्ण  American neutrality and threatening shipping  at  sea , he tried economic warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade  .
In 1803 , President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the Louisiana Territory west of the Mississippi River ,  in  order to open lands for eventual American settlers  .
A  नेता  in the Enlightenment , Jefferson was a polymath  जो  spoke five languages fluently and was deeply interested in science , invention  ,  architecture ,  धर्म  and philosophy , interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency .
He designed  उसके  own large mansion on a 5,000 acre  वृक्षारोपण  near Charlottesville , Virginia  ,  which he  नामित  Monticello .
जबकि  not a notable orator , Jefferson was a skilled writer and corresponded with many influential  लोगों  in America and Europe throughout  उसके  adult life .
Though Jefferson  स्वामित्व  many slaves , he opposed the institution all his life and consequently treated and took care of them very well and  अपेक्षित  them to work no more than free farmers .
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over  the  controversy of whether Jefferson was the father  of  one or more children belonging  to  Sally Hemings , a slave at Monticello . ''
Historians are also in  असहमति  with  कैसा  much Jefferson was committed  to   the  anti-slavery cause  .
In 1807 , President Jefferson signed into law a bill that banned the importation of slaves into the United States .
After Martha Jefferson , his  बीवी  of eleven years , died in 1782 , Jefferson  remained  a widower for the rest of his life  ;   उनके  marriage produced six children , of whom two survived to adulthood .
Though  जेफरसन  has been criticized by many modern day scholars over the issue of slavery , he remains rated as one  of  the greatest U.S. presidents .
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest  सोंग  written  by  Steven Van Zandt , produced by Van Zandt  और  Arthur Baker and recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South African policy of  रंगभेद  .
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved  होता  refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun  नगर  , a resort which was located in Bantustan  of   bophuthatswana  , one of a number of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states  निर्मित   by  the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population .
