Bill Russell won 11 championships with the Boston  सेल्टिक्स  .
This is a list of NBA players with most  championships   जीती  as a player .
The National Basketball Association ( NBA ) is a major professional basketball league  in  North  अमेरिका  .
It was  संस्थापित  in 1946  as  the Basketball Association of America ( BAA ) .
The league adopted its current name at the start of  the  when it merged  साथ  the  नेशनल  Basketball League ( NBL ) .
The NBA Finals is the championship series for the NBA and the conclusion of the sport 's postseason .
The winning team of the series receives  the  Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy  .
Players from  the  winning team usually receive championship rings from the team honoring their contribution .
however  , in some rare occasion  ,  the teams opted to gave other commemorative items , such  as  wrist watches , instead of rings .
The number of championships won by NBA superstars is often used as a measurement of  उनके  greatness .
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the  रिकार्ड  for the most NBA championships won with 11 titles during his 13-year  playing  career .
He won  उसके  first  चैंपियनशिप  with the Boston Celtics in his rookie year .
Afterwards , he went  on  to win 10 championships in the next 12 years , including eight consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966 .
He won the last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach .
Russell 's teammate , Sam  जोन्स  , won 10 championships from  1959  to 1969 , the  दूसरी  most in NBA history .
Four Celtics players , Tom Heinsohn ,  K.  C. Jones , Satch  सैंडर्स  and John Havlicek , won  आठ  championships each .
Two other Celtics , Jim Loscutoff and Frank Ramsey  ,  won seven championships each .
Four players , Bob Cousy , Kareem Abdul-Jabbar , Michael Jordan  और  Scottie Pippen , won six championships each .
Jordan and Pippen are members of the  शिकागो  Bulls team who won three consecutive championships  twice  in the 1990s .
रॉबर्ट  Horry and  जॉन  Salley are the  तभी  players to have won the championships with three different  टीमों  .
Horry  जीती  seven championships with the Houston Rockets  ,  the Los Angeles Lakers and the  सैन   अंतोनियो   स्पर्स  , while Salley won four championships with the Detroit Pistons , the Bulls and the Lakers .
Frank Saul and Steve Kerr are the only players to win two championships with two different teams in consecutive seasons .
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s , while Kerr won consecutive championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement results  to  the true  मान  , precision to the repeatability , or reproducibility of the measurement
In the  फ़ील्ड  of science , engineering  ,  industry , and statistics  ,  the accuracy of a measurement system is the  उपाधि  of closeness  of  measurements of a quantity to that quantity 's actual ( true  )  value .
The precision of  a  measurement system , also called reproducibility or repeatability , is the degree to  जिससे  repeated measurements under unchanged conditions show the same results .
Although the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be  synonymous  in colloquial use , they are deliberately contrasted in the context of the  वैज्ञानिक  method .
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise , precise but not accurate , neither , or both .
For example  ,  if an experiment contains  a  systematic  गलती  , then increasing the sample size generally increases precision but does not  improve  accuracy .
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate string of results from the  flawed  experiment  .
Eliminating the systematic error improves accuracy but does not change precision .
A measurement system is designated valid  if  it  is  both accurate and precise .
Related terms include bias ( non- random or directed  प्रभाव  caused by a factor or  कारकों  unrelated to  the  independent variable ) and error ( random  variability  ) .
The terminology is also applied to indirect measurements—that is , values obtained by a computational procedure from observed data .
In  जोड  to accuracy and precision , measurements may  भी  have a measurement resolution ,  जिससे  is the smallest change in  the  underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement .
In the case of full reproducibility  ,  such as when rounding  a  number to a representable floating point number , the word precision  रै  a meaning not related to reproducibility .
For example , in the IEEE  754-2008  standard it means the number of bits in the significand ,  so  it is used as a measure  लिये  the relative accuracy with which  an  arbitrary number can  be   represented  .
Fuck in its literal meaning refers to the act of sexual intercourse .
It is an English word that is often used as a profanity ,  either  to  denote  disdain or as an intensifier .
The origin of the word is obscure .
It is usually considered  to   be   पहला  attested to around 1475 , but it may be considerably older .
in  modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the position of a  संज्ञा  , a verb ,  an  adjective or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the word , as well as a number of compounds incorporating it , such  as  motherfucker .
Animated , color-coded  मैप  showing the  विभिन्न  continents and regions .
Depending on the convention and  मॉडल  ,  कुछ  continents may be consolidated or subdivided  :  for example , Eurasia is most often subdivided into Europe and Asia (  रेड  shades ) , while North and  दक्षिण  America are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ) .
a  continent is one of several  बहुत  large landmasses on Earth .
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria , with up to seven regions commonly  regarded  as continents—they are ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia , Africa , North America , South America , Antarctica , Europe , and Australia .
in  geology , continents are described by means of tectonic plates .
थाली  tectonics is the process and study of the movement , collision and division of continents , earlier known as continental drift .
Biker Boyz is a 2003  फिल्मी  about a  समूह  of underground motorcycle drag racers .
It stars Laurence Fishburne , Djimon Hounsou , Derek Luke  ,  Meagan Good  ,  and Larenz Tate and is written and directed  by  Reggie Rock Bythewood .
It also features Lisa  bonet  , Orlando Jones ,  बच्चा  Rock and  वैनेसा  Bell Calloway .
For  the  Steel Panther song , see Feel the Steel .
Community property is  a  marital property regime  कि  originated in  सिविल  law jurisdictions and is now also found in some common law jurisdictions  .
The  राज्य  of  the  United States that recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system , which itself  थी  inherited from Spanish law ( a Roman -derived civil  विधि  system ) and ultimately from the  visigoths  .
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted  the  ganancial community system of acquests  और  gains , which replaced the traditional French community of movables and acquests in its civil law system .
Map of the United States with community property states highlighted in red  .
In addition to the highlighted states , Alaska is a separate property state that permits  युगल  to opt into a community property arrangement .
in  a community property jurisdiction ,  सबसे  property acquired during the marriage ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the community , or communio bonorum—is owned jointly  by  both  spouses  and is divided upon  तलाक  , annulment or death  .
Joint  स्वामित्व  is automatically presumed by law in the  अनुपस्थिति  of specific evidence that would point to a  contrary  conclusion for a particular piece of  प्रॉपर्टी   .
Division of community  प्रॉपर्टी  may take place by item  ,  by  splitting  all  वस्तुएं  or by value .
In some jurisdictions  ,  such as  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , a 50/50 division of community property is strictly mandated by statute , meaning that the focus then shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community or separate property .
In other jurisdictions , such as Texas , a divorce court may decree an `` equitable distribution `` of community property , which may result in an unequal division of such .
In  non-community  property states property may be divided by equitable distribution .
generally  speaking , the property that each partner brings into  the  marriage or receives by gift ,  bequest   or  devise during marriage  is  called separate property ( i.e. , not community property ) .
See division of property  .
Division of community debts may not be  the  same as division of community property .
For example , in California , community property is  जरूरी  to be  विभाजित  `` equally ''  जबकि  community  कर्ज़  is required  to  be divided `` equitably ''  .
Property that is owned by  एक  spouse before  the  marriage is the separate property of that spouse , unless the property is `` transmuted  ''  into community property .
The rules for this  vary   इससे  jurisdiction to jurisdiction  .
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to the  भीड  at The Mall shortly after the  विवाह  .
The wedding of Prince William , Duke of Cambridge , and Catherine Middleton took place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London .
The groom ,  प्रिंस  William , Duke of Cambridge , is the eldest son of Charles , Prince  of  Wales , and is second  in  the line of succession  to   the  British Throne and the thrones  of  fifteen other Commonwealth realms .
The bride , Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the eldest of three children of Michael  और  Carole Middleton of Bucklebury , Berkshire .
The Dean of Westminster , John Hall , presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury , Rowan Williams , conducted  the  marriage ; Richard  chartres  , the Bishop of London , preached the sermon  ;  and a reading was given by the  बहू  's  bhai  , James .
William 's best man was his brother , Prince Harry , while the bride 's sister ,  पिप्पा  , was maid of honour .
The ceremony was attended by the bride  's  and groom  's  families , as well as many  विदेशी  royals , diplomats , and the couple  's  chosen personal guests  .
After the ceremony , the couple made the traditional appearance on the balcony of Buckingham  राजमहल  .
As Prince William was not the  वारिस  apparent to  the  throne , the wedding was not a  पूरा  state occasion and many details  यहूद  left to the couple  to  decide , such  as  much of the guest  सूची  of about 1,900 .
Prince  विलियम  and Kate Middleton met in 2001 .
Their engagement on 20 October 2010  थी  announced on 16 November 2010 .
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much media attention ,  होने   compared  in  अनेक  ways with the 1981 marriage of  विलियम  's  अभिभावक  .
The occasion  थी   a  public holiday  in  the United Kingdom and featured many  ceremonial  aspects ,  सहित   उपयोग  of the state carriages  और   भूमिकाएँ  for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry .
Events were  आयोजित  around  the  Commonwealth to mark the wedding ;  संगठनों  and hotels held  कार्यक्रम  across Canada , over 5,000 street parties were held throughout the United  किंगडम  , and one million people lined  the  route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace .
The ceremony was  viewed   सजीव  by tens of  लाखो  more around the world ,  सहित  72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel  .
In  the  United Kingdom , television audiences peaked at 26.3 million  दर्शक  ,  साथ  a total  of  36.7 million  watching  part of  the  coverage  .
वैनेसा  Joy Lachey ( née Minnillo ; born November 9 , 1980 ) is  an  American television personality ,  टेलीविज़न  host , fashion model , and  अभिनेत्री  .
minnillo  was also named Miss Teen USA in 1998 .
वो  has been a New York -based correspondent for Entertainment  tonight  and hosted Total Request Live  on  MTV .
A hand  (  med . / lat  .   :  manus , pl  .  manūs ) is a prehensile , multi- fingered extremity located at the  समाप्त  of an arm or forelimb of primates and humans ,  chimpanzees  , monkeys , and lemurs  .
a  few other vertebrates such as the koala ( which has two opposable thumbs on  प्रत्येक  `` hand '' and fingerprints remarkably similar to human fingerprints ) are often described  as  having either `` hands ''  or  `` paws '' on their front limbs  .
Hands are  the  main  structures   लिये  physically manipulating  the  environment , used for both gross motor skills ( such as grasping a large object ) and fine motor skills (  ऐसे  as picking up a small pebble ) .
The fingertips  contain  some of the densest  क्षेत्रों  of nerve endings on  the  body , are the  richest  source of tactile feedback , and have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands  .
Like other paired  अंगों   (  eyes , feet , legs ) , each hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain  गोलार्ध  , so that handedness , or the preferred hand  चुनाव  for single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil , reflects individual brain functioning .
Some evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of  अंक  on the forelimb more  generally  — for example , in the context  of  whether the three digits of the  बर्ड  hand involved the same homologous loss of  दो  digits as in the dinosaur hand .
The human hand has 27 bones , not including  the  sesamoid bones which number  varies  between people .
14 of which  हैं  the phalanges ( proximal , intermediate and distal ) of the fingers .
The metacarpals are the bones that connects the fingers  और  the wrist .
Each human hand has 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones .
Too Cool was a professional wrestling tag team and  पूर्व  faction most notably active in World Wrestling Federation/Entertainment between 1998 and 2001 and for a short time in 2004 .
Basic digital alarm clock without a radio .
The mark in the top-left of the  प्रदर्शक  indicates that the time is 4:00pm  ,  not 4:00am  .
A  1969  radio alarm clock ( Sony Digimatic 8FC-59W ) with an early  mechanical-digital  display .
A digital clock is a type of clock that displays the time digitally , i.e . in numerals or other symbols ,  as  opposed to an analog clock , where the time is indicated by the positions  of  rotating hands .
Digital clocks are  प्रायः  associated with electronic drives , but the `` digital '' description  refers  only to the  प्रदर्शक  , not to the drive mechanism .
(   दोनो  analog and digital clocks can  be  driven either mechanically or electronically ,  लकिन  ``  घटीयंत्र   ''  mechanisms with digital displays are  विरल  . )
The biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light Time Level '' )  on  the television tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf , Germany .
Family  guy  creator Seth  macfarlane  also provides the voices  of  Peter Griffin  ,  Stewie Griffin ,  ब्रायन  Griffin , and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is  an  American animated sitcom that features five main voice actors , and  numerous  regular cast and recurring guest stars .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex Borstein , Seth Green , Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the first  ऋतु  ) and Mike Henry and now ,  the  new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton ,  आदम  West , John G. Brennan , Nicole Sullivan and  जेनिफर   tilly  , and repeat guest stars include  फिलिस  Diller , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many  डाल  members  provide   आवाज़ें  for multiple characters .
The voice  अभिनेताओं  , in portraying the various character personalities on the show , draw inspiration from celebrities and  पॉप  culture .
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one actor , after members of the show left  the  series or  था  conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for  an  Annie Award for voicing Meg  griffin   in  the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an  एनी  Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production , though no  अन्य  cast member has won an award for  उनके  work on the series .
the   पाँच  sets of the board game Monopoly depicted here show the evolution of the game 's  कलाकृति  and designs in the United States from 1935–2005 .
The history  of   the  board  खेल  Monopoly can be traced back to the early 20th century .
The earliest known design was by the American , Elizabeth Magie  ,  patented in  1904  but  मौजूदा  as early  as  1902 .
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle , namely the Georgist concept of a single land value  कर  .
A  श्रेणी  of board games were developed from 1906 through the 1930s that involved the buying and selling of land and the development of that land .
By 1934 , a board game had been created  much  like the version of Monopoly sold by Parker Brothers and  इसके  related  कंपनियाँ  through the rest of the 20th century , and into the 21st .
अनेक  people , mostly in the  midwestern  United States and near the East  coast  , contributed to the game 's design and evolution .
By the  1970s  , the idea that the game had been  निर्मित  solely by Charles Darrow  था  become popular folklore ; it was printed in  the  game 's  निर्देश  for many years , in a  1974  book devoted to Monopoly , and was  cited  in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007 .
Even a guide to family games published for Reader 's Digest in 2003 only gave  क्रेडिट  to Darrow and Elizabeth Magie , erroneously stating that Magie 's original game was created in the  1800s  , and not acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation  of  the game , and the  eventual  publication by Parker Brothers .
Also in the 1970s , Professor Ralph Anspach , who had himself published a board game intended to illustrate  the  principles of both monopolies and  विश्वास   busting  , fought Parker Brothers and its then parent company , General  मिलों  , over the trademarks  of   the  Monopoly board game  .
Through the research of Anspach and  अन्य  , much of the early history of the game  थी  `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady , author of the 1974 book The Monopoly Book  :   रणनीति  and Tactics of the World 's Most Popular Game over the  वास्तविक  history of the game on Barry Farber 's New  यॉर्क  City talk show in 1975 .
क्युकी  of the lengthy court process , including appeals , the legal status of Parker Brothers ' trademarks on the game was not settled until 1985 .
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of Parker Brothers , as do its specific design elements .
At the conclusion of the court case , the game 's logo and graphic design elements  became  part of  a  larger Monopoly  ब्रांड  , licensed by Parker Brothers ' parent companies onto a variety  of  items through the present day .
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's early history in the 1970s and 1980s , and several books and journal articles on the subject , Hasbro ( Parker Brothers ' current parent company ) did not acknowledge any of the game  's  history before Charles Darrow on its  आधिकारिक  Monopoly website as recently as June 2012 .
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge  anyone  other than Darrow  in  materials  प्रकाशित   or  sponsored  by  them , at least as  recently  as 2006 .
International tournaments , first held in the early 1970s , continue to the present ,  साथ  the next world championship likely scheduled for 2013 .
Starting in  1985  , a new  पीढी   of  spin-off board games and card games appeared on both sides of  the  Atlantic Ocean .
In 1989 , the first of many video game and  कंप्यूटर  game editions was published .
Since 1994 , many official variants of the game , based on locations other than Atlantic City , New Jersey ( the official U.S. setting ) or London ( the official Commonwealth setting  ,  excepting Canada ) , have been published by Hasbro or its licensees .
In 2008 , Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the  मानक  U.S . Edition of the game to match the UK  संस्करण  , although the U.S. standard edition maintains the Atlantic City property names  .
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the ``  mr  . Monopoly  ''  character a 3-D computer-generated look , which has since been  अपनाया  by licensees USAopoly , Winning  चालें  and Winning Solutions .
And  हास्ब्रो  has also been including the Speed  die  ,  introduced   in   2006  's Monopoly : The Mega Edition  by  Winning Moves Games , in versions produced directly  by  Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship  संस्करण  ) .
In baseball  ,  a sacrifice fly is a batted  बॉल  that satisfies  चार  criteria:
There are  कम   than  two outs when the ball is hit .
The ball is hit to the  आउटफील्ड  ( fair or foul ) , or to infield foul territory .
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running  in  the outfield , or foul territory ) catches the ball on the fly (  alternatively  if the batter would have been out if not  लिये  an error or if the outfielder drops the  बॉल  and another runner is put out )  .
A runner who is already on base scores on the play .
It is called a  ``  sacrifice  ''  fly because the batter presumably intends to cause a teammate to score a  चलाएं  , while sacrificing his own ability to do so .
Minnesota (  )  is a U.S. state located in the Midwestern United  राज्य  .
Minnesota was carved out of the eastern half of the Minnesota Territory and admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11  ,  1858 .
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '' , the state 's name comes from  a  Dakota word for `` sky-tinted water '' .
Those waters ,  साथ  with forests , parks , and wilderness areas , offer residents and tourists a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities .
Minnesota is the 12th most extensive and the 21st most populous of the U.S. states .
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area  (  known as the `` Twin Cities '' )  ,  the center  of  transportation , business , industry , education , government and home to an internationally known arts community .
The remainder of the state consists of western prairies now given over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast , now cleared , farmed and settled ; and the less populated North Woods , used for  खनन  , forestry  ,  and recreation .
Minnesota  is  known for its  अपेक्षाकृत  mixed social and political orientations , and has a high rate of civic participation and voter turnout  .
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest states , and has a highly  साक्षर  population .
The large majority of  निवासियों  are of Scandinavian  और  German descent .
The state is known as a center of  scandinavian  American culture .
Ethnic diversity has increased in recent decades  .
Substantial influxes of Asian , African ,  और  Latin American  आप्रवासियों  have joined the descendants of European settlers and  the  original Native American inhabitants .
Grants are non-repayable  निधि  by  एक  party ( grant  makers   )  , often a government  विभाग  , corporation , foundation or trust , to a , often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity , educational institution , business or an individual .
In order to receive a grant , some  रूप  of `` Grant Writing '' often referred to as either a proposal or  an  application is usually required .
Most  अनुदान  are made to fund a specific  प्रोजेक्ट  and  आवश्यकता  some level  of  compliance and  रिपोर्टिंग  .
The grant writing process involves an applicant submitting a  प्रस्ताव  ( or submission ) to a potential funder , either on the applicant 's own initiative or in response to a Request for Proposal from the funder .
Other grants can be given to individuals , such as victims of natural disasters or  individuals  who seek to open  a  small business .
Sometimes grant makers require grant seekers to have some  रूप  of tax-exempt status , be a registered  nonprofit   संगठन   or  a local government .
For example , tiered funding for a  फ्रीवे  are very large  अनुदान  negotiated at government  नीति  level .
However smaller grants may be provided by a government agency ( e.g . municipal government ) .
Project-related funding involving governments , business , communities , and individuals is often arranged by  अनुप्रयोग  either in  लिखने  or online .
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope , 59Co . 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with  the  most stable being 60Co with a half-life of 5.2714 years  ,  57Co with a half-life of 271.79 days  ,  56Co with a half-life of  77.27   दिनों  , and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days .
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives that are less than 18 hours and the majority of these have half-lives that are less than 1 second .
This element also has 11 meta states , all of which have half-lives less than 15 minutes .
The isotopes of cobalt range in atomic weight from 47Co to 75Co .
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic  द्रव्यमान   ईकाई  values less than that of  the  most abundant stable  समस्थानिक  , 59Co , is electron capture and the primary mode of decay for those of greater  than  59 atomic mass units is beta decay .
The primary decay products before 59Co are iron isotopes and the primary products after are nickel isotopes .
Standard atomic mass : 58.933195 ( 5 ) u
Who Moved My Cheese ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in  अपना  Work  और  in Your Life , published in 1998 , is a motivational book by Spencer Johnson written in the style  of  a parable or business fable .
It describes change in one 's work and  जीवन  , and four typical reactions  to  said change by  दो  mice  और  two ``  littlepeople  '' ,  दौरान  their hunt for cheese .
A New York Times business bestseller since release  ,  Who Moved  my  Cheese ?
remained on the list for almost five years and spent over 200 weeks on Publishers Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list  .
It  रै  sold more than 26 million copies  विश्वव्यापी  in 37 languages and remains to be one of the best-selling business  किताबे  .
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( – September 11 , 1971 )  led  the Soviet Union during part of the Cold War .
He served as First Secretary of  the  Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964 , and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers , or Premier , from 1958 to 1964 .
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial  de-stalinization  of the Soviet Union , for backing the progress of the early Soviet space program ,  और   लिये  several relatively  उदार  reforms in areas  of  domestic policy .
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him from power in 1964 , replacing him with  लियोनिद  Brezhnev as  पहला  Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier .
Khrushchev was born in the Russian  गाँव  of Kalinovka in 1894 , close  to   the  present-day border between Russia and Ukraine .
He was employed as  a  metalworker in his youth , and  दौरान  the Russian Civil War was a political commissar .
With the help of  lazar  Kaganovich , he worked his  रास्ता  up the Soviet hierarchy .
He supported Joseph Stalin 's purges  ,  and approved thousands of arrests .
In 1939 , Stalin sent him  to  govern Ukraine , and he continued the purges there .
During what was  ज्ञात  in the Soviet Union as the Great Patriotic War ( Eastern Front of World War II ) ,  khrushchev  was  again  a commissar , serving as an intermediary  between  Stalin and his generals .
Khrushchev was present at the bloody defense of Stalingrad ,  a  fact  he  took great  अभिमान  in throughout his life .
After the war , he returned to Ukraine before being recalled  to  Moscow as one of Stalin  's  close  advisers  .
In the power struggle triggered by  स्टालिन  's death  in  1953 , Khrushchev , after several  सालो  , emerged  विजयी  .
On February  25  , 1956 , at the 20th Party  कॉंग्रेस  , he delivered  the  `` Secret Speech , '' denouncing Stalin 's purges  और  ushering in a less repressive  era  in  the  Soviet Union .
His domestic policies , aimed at  bettering  the lives of ordinary  नागरिकों  , were often ineffective , especially in the area of agriculture .
Hoping eventually to rely on missiles for national defense , Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces .
Despite the cuts , Khrushchev 's rule saw the tensest years  of  the Cold War , culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis .
Some of  khrushchev  's policies were seen  as   erratic  , particularly by his emerging rivals , who quietly rose in strength  और  deposed him in October 1964 .
he  did not suffer  the  deadly fate of some previous losers of Soviet power struggles , but was pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow and a  dacha  in the countryside .
His lengthy memoirs were smuggled to the West and published  in   भाग  in 1970 .
Khrushchev died in 1971 of heart disease .
Upper gastrointestinal ( GI  )  bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal tract  .
The anatomic cut-off  लिये   अपर  GI  bleeding   is  the ligament of Treitz , which connects the fourth  portion  of the duodenum to the  diaphragm  near the  splenic  flexure of the  कोलन   .
Upper GI bleeds are considered medical emergencies , and require admission to hospital  लिये  urgent diagnosis and management .
Due to advances in  medications  and endoscopy  ,  upper GI hemorrhage is now usually  treated  without surgery .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections ( red , orange , green  )  and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black )  .
Actual  अंकित  population figures are in blue .
According to the  उच्चतम  estimate , the world population  may  rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is the total number of living humans on Earth  .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion by the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
the  USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12  ,  2012 .
according  to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund , it reached this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has  अनुभवी  continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350 , when it stood at around  370  million .
The highest rates of growth  –  global population increases  ऊपर  1.8  %  per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
the  growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , and  था  declined to 1.1 %  by   2011   .
Total annual births were highest in  the  late 1980s at about 138 million , and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million , while  मौतों  number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a  जारी  increase in  जनसांख्यिकी  in the near future ( but a steady  मनाही   in  the population growth rate ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth , stagnation , or even overall decline in the  वैश्विक  population by 2150  .
कुछ  analysts have  questioned  the sustainability of further world population growth , citing the  growing  pressures on the environment , global food supplies ,  और  energy resources .
Philips Lumileds Lighting Company is the manufacturer of a wide range  of  high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ) .
It is a now  a  fully owned division of Philips  lighting   .
Knuckle mnemonic  लिये  the number of days in each month of the  gregorian  Calendar .
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day month  .
A mnemonic (  ,  with a silent `` m '' ) , or mnemonic device , is any learning technique that aids information  स्तंभन  .
mnemonics  aim to translate information into a form that the human brain can retain better than its  असली  form .
Even the process of applying this conversion might already aid the transfer of information to long-term memory .
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in  auditory   रूप  , such as short poems , acronyms , or memorable phrases , but mnemonics can also be for other types of  सूचना  and in visual or kinesthetic forms .
उनके   उपयोग  is based on the observation that the human  दिमाग  more easily remembers spatial ,  निजी  , surprising , physical  ,  sexual , humorous , or otherwise 'relatable ' information , rather than more  अमूर्त   or  impersonal forms  of  information .
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός (  mnēmonikos  ) , meaning `` of  मेमोरी  ''  और  is related to Mnemosyne ( `` remembrance  ''  ) ,  the  name of the goddess  of  memory in  यूनानी  mythology .
Both  of  these  शब्द  are derived from μνήμη ( mnēmē ) , `` remembrance , memory '' .
Mnemonics in antiquity were most  प्रायः  considered in the context of what  is  today known as the Art  of  memory .
Ancient Greeks and Romans distinguished between two types of memory : the  'natural  ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory .
The former is inborn , and is the one that everyone uses automatically and without thinking .
The  कृत्रिम   मेमोरी  in contrast has to be trained  और  developed through the learning and practicing  of  a variety of mnemonic techniques .
Mnemonic systems are special techniques or strategies consciously used to improve memory , it helps employ information already stored in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task .
President  बुश  signing the  no  Child Left Behind Act at Hamilton H.S . in Hamilton  ,  Ohio  .
The No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 (  nclb   )  is a United States Act  of  Congress that is a reauthorization of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act , which included Title I , the government 's flagship aid program  लिये  disadvantaged students .
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based on the premise that setting high standards and establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education  .
The Act requires states  to  develop assessments  in  basic skills .
States must give these assessments to all students at select grade levels in order to receive  संघीय  school funding .
The Act does not assert a national achievement standard ; standards are set by each individual state .
NCLB expanded the federal role in public education  through  annual testing , annual academic progress , report cards , teacher qualifications , and funding changes .
The bill passed in the U.S. Congress with bipartisan  support  .

a   पिकअप  truck or pick-up , often simply referred to as a pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
In North America , the term pickup is used for light trucks with a  हल्का  duty chassis and factory built , integrated bed  ,   as  well as for coupé utility vehicles , often based on a personal car chassis , but also  प्रायः  on a special dedicated chassi  लिये   ऐसे   उपयोग  .
कुछ  countries have their own  शर्तें   समान  to pickup , such as ute  in  Australia and New Zealand ,  or  bakkie in South Africa .
Large pickup trucks are somewhat rare in Europe , where vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles .
This  15th-century  depiction of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred medieval horse with arched neck , refined head and  सुरुचिपूर्ण  gait .
Horses  in  the Middle Ages  differed  in  आकार  , build and  नस्ल  from the modern horse , and were , on average , smaller .
They were also more central to society than their modern counterparts , being essential for war , agriculture , and transport .
Consequently ,  विशिष्ट  types of horse  विकसित  , many of which have no modern equivalent .
While an understanding  of  modern horse breeds and equestrianism is  vital  for any analysis of the medieval  घोड़ा  , researchers  भी  need to consider documentary ( both written and pictorial )  और  archaeological  प्रमाण  .
Horses in  the  Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by breed , but rather  by  use  .
इस  led them to be described ,  लिये  example ,  as  `` chargers  ``  ( war horses ) , `` palfreys `` ( riding horses  )  , cart horses or packhorses .
Reference is also given to their place of origin , such as `` Spanish horses , '' but whether this referred to one breed  or   अनेक  is unknown .
Another difficulty arising during any study of  मध्यकालीन  documents or literature is the flexibility of the medieval languages , where several words can be used for one thing ( or , conversely , several objects are referred to  by  one word ) .
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger '  हैं  used interchangeably (  भी  within one document ) , and  जहाँ  one epic may speak disparagingly of  a  rouncey , another praises its skill and swiftness .
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment , often introduced from other cultures , allowed for significant changes in  दोनो  warfare and agriculture .
In particular , improved designs for the solid-treed saddle as well  as  the arrival of the stirrup , horseshoe and horse collar were significant advances in medieval society .
Consequently ,  the  assumptions and theories developed by historians  हैं  not definitive , and debate still rages on many  मुद्दे   ,  such as the breeding or size of the horse , and  a  number of sources  जरूर   be  consulted in order  to  understand the breadth  of  the  विषय  .
The Music Man is a musical with book , music  ,  and lyrics by Meredith Willson  ,  based  on  a story by Willson and Franklin  लेसी  .
The plot concerns con man Harold  हिल  , who poses as a boys ' band  आयोजक  and leader  और  sells  बैंड  instruments and uniforms to naive townsfolk before skipping town with the cash .
In  नदी   नगर  , Iowa , prim librarian and piano teacher Marian  paroo  sees through him  ,  but  जब  Hill helps her younger brother overcome his  भय  of social interactions due to his lisp ,  marian  begins to fall in love with Harold .
Harold , in turn  गिरना  for  marian  , risks being caught to win her .
In 1957 , the show became a  hit  on Broadway , winning five Tony Awards , including Best Musical , and running for 1,375  प्रदर्शन  .
The cast album won the  पहला  Grammy Award for `` Best Original Cast Album  ''  and was number one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks .
The show 's success led to revivals and a  लोकप्रिय  1962 film adaptation  और  a  2003  television remake .
It frequently is produced by both professional and amateur theater companies .
Surveyor 's  व्हील
A surveyor 's wheel , also called a  clickwheel   ,  hodometer  ,  waywiser , trundle wheel , measuring wheel ,  or  perambulator is a device for measuring distance .
Largest non-polar deserts
बालू  dunes in the Rub ' al Khali ( ``  खाली  quarter '' ) of Saudi Arabia  .
Makhtesh Ramon ,  negev  desert ,  इसराईल
A desert is a landscape or region of land that is very dry because of low rainfall  amounts  (  वर्षण  ) , often has little coverage by plants , and in which streams dry up unless they are supplied by water from outside areas .
Deserts can also be described as  क्षेत्रों  where more water is lost by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation  .
Desert plants must have special adaptations to survive with this little water .
रेगिस्तान  generally receive less than 25 cm of rain ( precipitation ) each year .
Semideserts or steppes are regions which receive between and .
In the Köppen climate classification system , deserts are classed as BWh ( hot desert ) or BWk  (  temperate desert ) .
In the Thornthwaite climate classification system , deserts would be classified as arid megathermal climates .
संसार  War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November  1918  .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the start of World  युद्ध  II in 1939 , and the  पहला  World War or World  युद्ध  I  thereafter   .
It  शामिल  all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances  :  the Allies ( based  on  the Triple Entente of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary  और  Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had  लिया  the  अप्रिय  against the agreement ,  इटली  did not  डालें  into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war :  इटली  , Japan and the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately ,  अधिक  than  70  million military personnel , including 60 million  europeans  , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were  मारे  , largely because  of  technological advancements that led to enormous increases in  the  lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or  गतिशीलता  .
It was the fifth-  deadliest  conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various political changes , such as revolutions  in  many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of  यूरोपीय  .
More immediately  ,  the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand  of   ऑस्ट्रिया  , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary  ,  on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a  राजनयिक  crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over  the  previous decades were invoked  .
Within weeks , the major powers were at war and , via their colonies ,  the  conflict soon spread around the  संसार  .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of  सर्बिया  .
While the Russians mobilised , the  germans  invaded neutral Belgium and  ध्वज  on the  रास्ता   to  France , providing a  casus  belli for Britain 's declaration of war against  जर्मनी  .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a  halt—the  so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled  into  a static battle of  अपघर्षण  with a  गर्त  line that changed  छोटी  until  1917   .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was  कामयाब  against the Austro-Hungarians  ,  but was stopped  in  its invasion of East Prussia by the  germans  .
In November the Ottoman Empire  joined  the  युद्ध  , opening up  fronts  in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
इटली  and Bulgaria went to war in  1915  and Romania in 1916 .
in  Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and  a  subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western  सामने  , the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries  ,  agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended in victory for the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts ,  as  the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight  a   कुल  war .
By the end of the  युद्ध  , four  प्रमुख   इम्पीरियल  powers—the German , Russian ,  austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great  राशि  of territory , while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The  मैप  of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller  राज्य  .
The League of Nations was  formed  in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European  राष्ट्रवाद  spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat  और   समस्याएं  with  the  Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be  कारकों  contributing to World War II .
``  लड़कियों  Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979 song originally written by Robert Hazard and made famous by singer  cyndi  Lauper .
It was the first major single released by Lauper as a solo artist and the lead-off single from her debut album She 's So  असामान्य  .
Lauper’s version gained recognition  as  a feminist anthem  और  promoted by an award-winning video .
It has been covered on either an album or in live  कॉन्सर्ट  by over 30 other artists  .
The  सिंगल  was Lauper 's breakthrough hit , reaching # 2 on  the  Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984 .
It  remains  one of Lauper 's signature songs and was a widely popular  सोंग  during the  era  of its  रिलीज  , the 1980s .
The `` Rolling  स्टोन  &  एमटीवी  : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '' , `` Rolling Stone : `` The 100 Top Music  वीडियो  '' ''  और  the `` VH1 : 100 Greatest Videos '' lists ranked the song  at  # 22 , # 39 and # 45 , respectively .
The song received a Grammy Award nomination for Record of the Year  और  Best  मादा  Pop Vocal Performance .
View of defibrillator electrode position and placement .
Defibrillation is a common treatment for  life-threatening  cardiac dysrhythmias  ,  ventricular  fibrillation  , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle , terminates the dysrhythmia , and  allows  normal sinus  लय  to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be external , transvenous , or implanted , depending on the type of device used or needed .
Some external  इकाई  , known as automated external  defibrillators  (  aeds  ) , automate the  निदान  of treatable rhythms , meaning that lay responders or  bystanders  are  समर्थ   to  use them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
The  केटो  Institute is  an  American libertarian think tank headquartered in Washington  ,  D.C .
It was founded  as  the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray Rothbard , Ed Crane and Charles Koch , chairman of the board and chief executive officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries , Inc. .
In July 1976 , the name was changed  to  the Cato Institute .
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think  टैंक  Index , Cato is the 6th most influential US based think tank ,  रैंकिंग  3rd in Economic Policy  और  2nd in Social Policy  .
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the understanding of public  नीतियों  based on the principles of limited  सरकारी  , free  बाज़ार  , individual liberty , and peace .
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate , advocate , promote , and disseminate applicable policy proposals that create free , open , and civil societies in the United States and  throughout  the world . ''
Cato scholars were critical of George W. Bush 's Republican administration  (  2001–2009 ) on several issues  ,   सहित  the Iraq War ,  सिविल  liberties , education , agriculture ,  उर्जा  policy  ,  and excessive  सरकारी  spending .
On other issues , they supported Bush administration initiatives , most notably health care , Social Security , global warming , tax policy , and  आव्रजन   .
During the  2008  U.S. presidential election  ,  Cato scholars criticized both major-party candidates , John McCain and Barack Obama .
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since his  उद्घाटन  , such as fiscal stimulus , healthcare reform ,  विदेशी  policy ,  और  the War  on   दवाएँ  , while supporting his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask  ,  Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy .
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker .
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count Dracula , the novel tells the story of Dracula 's attempt to  relocate  from Transylvania to England , and the battle between Dracula  और  a small group of men and women led  by  Professor Abraham Van Helsing .
Dracula has been assigned to  अनेक  literary genres  सहित  vampire literature , horror fiction , the gothic novel and invasion literature .
The novel touches on themes such as the  भूमिका  of women in Victorian culture , sexual conventions , immigration , colonialism ,  और  post-colonialism .
Although Stoker did not invent the vampire , he defined its modern form , and the novel has spawned numerous theatrical , film and television interpretations .
Quidditch is a competitive sport in the  wizarding  world of the Harry Potter universe , and is from the series of children 's novels and movies .
It is an extremely  अशिष्ट  but very popular  semi-contact  sport , played by wizards and witches .
Matches are played between two teams  of  seven players riding  उड़ती  broomsticks  ,   using  four balls  और   छह  elevated ring-shaped goals , three on each side of the Quidditch pitch ( field ) .
In  the  Harry Potter universe , Quidditch holds a fervent following similar to the position that association football holds as a globally popular sport .
The sport  is  monumental throughout the  wizarding   संसार  .
Harry plays an important position  लिये  his house team at Hogwarts : he is  the  seeker and becomes the captain in his sixth year  वहीँ  .
क्षेत्रीय  and international competitions are mentioned throughout the series .
In Goblet of Fire  ,  Quidditch at Hogwarts is cancelled for the Tri-Wizard Tournament , but Harry  और  the Weasleys attend the  quidditch  World Cup .
in  addition  ,  Harry uses  उसके   quidditch   कौशल  to capture a golden egg from a dragon called  the  Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of  the  Tri-Wizard Tournament )  ,   to  capture a flying key in  पारस  's Stone , and on two key occasions in Deathly Hallows  —  getting hold of Ravenclaw 's  diadem  , and during the final fight with Voldemort — the `` unerring skill of  the  Seeker  ''  is useful to  उसे  in snatching the Elder Wand  आउट   of  the air  .
Harry Potter  रै  owned two  broomsticks  , the Nimbus  2000  and the Firebolt , both of which are destroyed by the series ' end .
The game has been adopted in the real world in the form of Muggle Quidditch .
The United States Congress is the bicameral  विधानमंडल  of the federal government of the United States consisting of two houses :  the  lower house known as the House of Representatives and the  अपर   हाउस  known as the Senate .
Congress meets in the Capitol in Washington , D.C .
Both representatives and senators are chosen through direct election .
Congress has a total of 535 voting members : 435 members in the House of Representatives and  100  members in the Senate .
Members of the House of Representatives serve two-year terms representing the people of a district .
Congressional  जिले  are apportioned to states by population using the United States Census results , each state in the  संघ  having at least one representative in the House of Representatives .
Regardless of population , each of the 50 states has two senators ; the 100 senators each serve a six-year term  .
the  terms are staggered so every two years approximately one-third of the Senate is up for  चुनाव  .
Each staggered  समूह  of one-third of the senators are called 'classes ' .
No state of the United States  रै   दो  senators from the  वही  class  .
Most incumbents seek re-election , and  उनके  historical likelihood  of  winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent .
In August 2012  ,  a Gallup poll reported that Congress’s  स्वीकृति  rating amongst Americans was at  10  % , matching a  38-year  low reached in November 2011 .
`` A Little More Country  than  That '' is the title of a song written  by  Joey + Rory 's Rory Lee  feek  , Wynn Varble , and Don Poythress , and recorded by American country artist Easton Corbin .
It was released in August 2009 as Corbin 's debut  सिंगल  and is included on his self-titled debut album .
In April 2010 , the song reached  क्रमांक  One  on   the   देश  music charts , making Corbin  the  first male solo artist in seven years to send a debut single  to  Number One .
It has been  certified  Gold by the RIAA  .
The BlackBerry is a line of wireless handheld devices  और  services designed and marketed by Research In Motion Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry .
The first BlackBerry device , an email pager , was released in 1999 ; the most recent BlackBerry devices , the Z10 and Q10 , were announced on January 30 , 2013  .
The user interface varies by model ; most feature a physical QWERTY keyboard , while newer  पीढियां  have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard .
A BlackBerry can shoot video , take photos , play music  ,  and perform online functions  ऐसे  as web-browsing and emailing .
They can also send  और  receive  धक्का  email and instant  संदेश  while maintaining a high level of security through on-device message encryption , and are designed to function as personal digital assistants .
BlackBerry devices  support  a large variety of instant messaging features  ,  with the most popular being the  मालिकाना  BlackBerry Messenger service .
the  BlackBerry PlayBook is a tablet computer offered by the company .
The 100 millionth  ब्लैकबेरी  smartphone was shipped in June quarter of 2010 and the 200 millionth smartphone was shipped  in  September quarter of 2012 .
BlackBerry accounts  लिये  3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011 , making its manufacturer the sixth most popular device  मेकर  ( 25 % of  मोबाईल  device  बिक्री  are  स्मार्टफ़ोन  ) .
the  consumer  ब्लैकबेरी  Internet Service is available in 91 countries worldwide on over 500 mobile service operators using various mobile technologies .
As of September 2012 , there were eighty million subscribers worldwide to BlackBerry .
In 2011 the  caribbean  and Latin America had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry smartphones worldwide  ,  with up to about  45  per cent in  the   प्रदेश  having a RIM device .
BlackBerry ,  iphone  , Android , and Windows Phone are  माना  the  चार  major smartphone brands .
BlackBerry is widely  referred   to  as `` CrackBerry '' in the United States ,  जिससे  alludes to its excessive use by its  स्वामी  and is a  सन्दर्भ  to the addictiveness of  क्रैक  cocaine .
उपयोग  of the term CrackBerry became so widespread that in November 2006  वेबस्टर  's New World College Dictionary named ``  crackberry  ''  the  `` New Word of the Year . ''
An example of a demand curve shifting .
The shift from D1 To D2 means an increase in demand with consequences for the other variables
In economics , the demand curve is the graph depicting  the  relationship between the  दाम  of a certain commodity and the amount of it that consumers are  willing  and able to purchase at that given price .
It is a graphic representation of a demand schedule .
the  demand curve for all consumers together follows from the demand  वक्र  of every individual consumer : the individual demands at each  दाम  are added together  .
Demand curves are used to  अनुमान  behaviors in competitive markets ,  और  are often combined with supply curves to estimate the equilibrium price ( the price at which sellers together are willing to sell the same amount as  खरीदार  together are willing  to  buy , also known  as  market  clearing  price ) and the equilibrium quantity ( the amount of that good or service that  होगा  be  उत्पादित  and bought without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of that market  .
In a monopolistic market , the demand  वक्र  facing the monopolist is simply the market demand curve .
Historia
by Nikolaos Gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia , meaning `` inquiry , knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an umbrella term that relates to  पास्ट  events as well as the  डिस्कवरी  , collection ,  संगठन   ,  and presentation of information about these events .
The  पद  includes cosmic ,  भूगर्भिक  , and organic history , but is often generically  implied  to mean human history .
Scholars who write about history are called historians .
History  can  also refer to the academic discipline which uses a narrative to examine and analyse a sequence  of  past events , and  objectively  determine the  पैटर्न  of cause and effect that determine them  .
Historians sometimes debate the nature of history and its usefulness by  discussing  the study  of  the discipline as  an  end in itself and as a way of providing `` perspective '' on the  समस्याएं  of  the  present .
Stories common to a  particular  culture , but not supported by external sources ( such as the tales surrounding  किंग  Arthur ) are usually classified as  सांस्कृतिक  heritage or legends , because they do not support the `` disinterested investigation '' required of the discipline of history .
Events occurring prior to  लिखा   रिकार्ड  are considered prehistory .
हिरोडोटस  , a 5th century B.C . Greek historian is considered within the Western tradition to be the `` father of history '' ,  और  ,  साथ  with his contemporary Thucydides , helped form the foundations for the modern study  of  human history .
Their work continues to be read  आज  and the divide between  the  culture-focused Herodotus and the military-focused  thucydides  remains a point of contention or approach in  आधुनिक  historical writing .
In the Eastern tradition , a state chronicle the Spring and Autumn Annals was known to be compiled from as early as 722 BCE  हालांकि  only 2nd  सदी  BCE texts survived .
Ancient influences  have  helped spawn variant interpretations of the nature of  इतिहास  which have evolved over the centuries and continue to change today .
The modern study of history is wide-ranging , and includes the study of specific regions and the study of certain topical or thematical elements of historical investigation .
Often  इतिहास  is taught as part of primary  और  secondary  शिक्षा  , and  the  academic study of  इतिहास  is a major discipline in  विश्वविद्यालयों  studies .
मैल्कम  X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little  और   भी  known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ) , was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist .
to  his admirers , he was a courageous advocate for  the  rights of blacks ,  a  man who indicted  श्वेत  America in the harshest terms for  इसके  crimes against black Americans  .
Detractors accused him of preaching racism , black supremacy ,  और  violence .
He has been called one of the greatest and most influential African Americans in history .
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists , it was rumored—when he was young , and at least one of his uncles was lynched .
When he was 13 , his  माँ  was placed in a mental hospital , and he was placed in a series  of  foster homes .
In 1946  ,  at age 20 , he went to prison for breaking and entering .
In prison , Malcolm X became a member  of  the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952 , he quickly rose to become one of its leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led  उसे  to leave the Nation in March 1964 .
After a  काल  of travel in  अफ़्रीकी  and  the  Middle East , he returned to the United States , where he founded Muslim Mosque , Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity .
In February 1965 , less than a year  बाद   leaving  the  स्वदेश  of Islam , he was assassinated by three members of the group .
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time .
As a spokesman  लिये  the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black  और  white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
बाद  breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with it ,  ``  I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now  .
I was  a   प्रेत  then ... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim , he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with  सिविल  rights leaders  ,   he  continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense  .
Henry Merritt `` Hank  ''  Paulson , Jr. ( born  कूच  28 , 1946 ) is an American  बैंकर  who  परोसा  as the  74th  United States Secretary of the Treasury .
He  था  served as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Goldman Sachs , and is now chairman of the Paulson Institute  ,  which he founded in 2011 to promote sustainable economic growth and a cleaner environment  around  the world , with an initial focus on the United States and China  .
A virtual machine (  vm  ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying hardware , which  is  presented  to  the application layer of the system .
आभासी  machines may be based on  विशेषताएँ   of  a hypothetical computer or emulate the computer architecture and functions  of  a real world computer  .
Spiders  (   अनुक्रम  Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that  have  eight legs and chelicerae with fangs that inject  venom   .
वे  are the largest order  of  arachnids and  रैंक  seventh  in  total species diversity among all other groups of organisms .
Spiders are found worldwide on every continent except for Antarctica , and have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air  और  sea colonization .
as  of 2008 , at least 43,678 spider species , and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however , there has  महरूम  confusion within the scientific  जातियाँ  as to how all these families should  be  classified  ,  as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders  differ  from other arthropods in that the usual body segments  हैं  fused into two  tagmata  , the cephalothorax and abdomen , and joined by a small , cylindrical pedicel .
Unlike  कीट  , spiders do not have antennae .
In all  मगर  the most primitive group  ,   the  Mesothelae , spiders have the most centralized nervous systems of all  arthropods  , as all their ganglia are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax  .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen  .
Spider webs vary widely in size , shape and the amount of sticky thread used .
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms , and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse  than  orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about , but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets .
True spiders have  महरूम  found in Carboniferous rocks from , and are very similar to the most primitive surviving order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups of  आधुनिक  spiders , Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae  ,  first appeared in the Triassic period , before .
A herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was described in 2008 , but all other known species are predators , mostly preying on insects and on other spiders , although a  few   विशाल  species also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide range of  रणनीति  to capture prey : trapping  it  in sticky webs , lassoing  it  with sticky bolas , mimicking the prey to avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but the active hunters have  अधि  vision , and hunters of the  genus  Portia show signs of intelligence  in   उनके  choice of tactics and ability to  develop  new ones  .
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take  solids  , and they liquidize their food by flooding it with digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps , as  वे   do  not have true jaws .
Male spiders  पहचानो  themselves by a variety of complex courtship rituals to avoid  होने   खाया  by the females .
Males of  सबसे  species survive a few matings , limited mainly by their short life spans .
Females  बुनते  silk egg-cases , each of  जिससे  may contain hundreds  of  eggs .
Females of many species  परवाह  for their young ,  लिये  example by carrying them around or by sharing food with them .
A minority of species are social , building communal webs that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals .
Social  बर्ताव  ranges  इससे   precarious  toleration , as  in  the widow spiders , to co-operative hunting  और  food-sharing .
Although most spiders live for at most two years , tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can  सजीव  up to 25 years in captivity .
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans , scientists are  अभी  researching the use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides .
Spider  रेशा  provides a combination of  lightness  , strength and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials , and spider silk genes have been inserted into mammals and plants to see  if  these can be used as silk factories .
As a result of their wide range  of  behaviors , spiders have become common symbols in art  और  mythology symbolizing various combinations of  सब्र  , cruelty and creative powers  .
डोना  Marie Pinciotti (  born  February 13 , 1960 ) is a fictional character  और  one of the  दो  female leads in the  फॉक्स  sitcom That '70s Show , appearing in all eight seasons .
Portrayed by Laura Prepon , Donna is the love interest to Eric  forman  .
US county household median income 2009 .
मध्य  US household income  ,  2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly used by the United States government and private institutions .
Each  household  is measured by the income of every resident over the age of  15  .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment insurance ,  विकलांगता  payments , child support payments received , regular rental receipts , as well as any personal business , investment , or other kinds of income received routinely .
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been  increasing  almost every year from 1945 to 1999 , it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
U.S. median household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to  $  50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in  the  United States , meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before  सरकारी  benefits  ,  doubled from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011 , including 2.8  लाख  children .
the  residents of the household do not have to be related to  the  head of the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household  's  income .
as  households tend to share a  समान  economic context  ,  the use of household income remains among the most  widely  accepted measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly  लिया   into  account in such measures may distort  कोई  analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income categories , and may render  सीधा  comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible .
A registered  एजेंट  , also known as a resident agent or statutory agent , in United  राज्य  business law , is  a  business  or  individual designated to receive service of process ( SOP ) when a business entity is a party in a legal action such as a lawsuit  or  summons .
The  पंजीकृत  agent 's address may  भी  be where the  राज्य  will send the paperwork for the yearly renewal of the  कारोबार  entity 's charter .
The registered agent for a business entity may  be  an individual member of the company , or ( more often ) a third party , such as the organization 's  वकील  or a service company .
Failure to properly maintain a registered agent can affect a company  negatively   .
Office for  आपात   प्रबन्धन   .
Office of  युद्ध  Information war poster 1941 - 1945
`` Life , Liberty  ,  and the pursuit  of  Happiness '' is a well-known phrase in the United  राज्य  Declaration of Independence .
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with  जिससे  all human  beings  are endowed by  उनके  creator for  उनके  protection of which they institute governments .
Fencing , is typically divided  into  Olympic fencing , Classical fencing and historical fencing , .
The sport of fencing ( commonly called olympic fencing or  प्रतिस्पर्धी   तलवारबाजी  ) is divided into three weapon categories  :  foil , sabre and  épée  .
Classical fencing uses the same three weapons , but approaches fencing as a martial  आर्ट  .
Competitive Fencing is one of  पाँच  sports which has been featured at every one of the modern Olympic Games , the  अन्य  four being Athletics , Cycling , Swimming  ,  and Gymnastics .
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ) , also  पुकारा  simply the quadriceps , quadriceps extensor , quads , is a large muscle group that includes the four prevailing  मांसपेशियां  on  the  front of the thigh .
It is the great extensor muscle of  the  knee , forming  a  large fleshy mass  जिससे  covers the front and sides of the femur .
The proper  लैटिन  plural form of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites .
In modern English usage , quadriceps is used in both singular and plural .
the  singular form quadricep , produced  by  hypercorrection , is frequently used .
RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April 1912 after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton , UK  to  New York City , US .
the  sinking of Titanic  caused  the deaths of 1,502 people in one of  the   deadliest  peacetime  मेरीटाइम  disasters in modern  इतिहास  .
The RMS Titanic was the largest ship afloat at the time of her maiden voyage .
She was the  दूसरी  of three Olympic class ocean liners operated by the White Star Line , and she was built by the Harland and Wolff shipyard in Belfast  साथ  Thomas Andrews , who perished with the ship , as her naval architect .
On her maiden voyage , she carried 2,224 passengers and crew .
Under the command of Edward Smith , her passengers included some  of  the wealthiest people in the world , as  खूब  as hundreds of emigrants from Great Britain  और  Ireland , Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe  seeking  a  नई  life in North America .
The ship was designed to be the last word in comfort and luxury , with an on-board gymnasium , swimming pool , libraries  ,  high-class restaurants and opulent cabins .
She also had  a  powerful wireless telegraph provided for the convenience of passengers as well as for operational  उपयोग  .
Though she had advanced safety features such as watertight compartments and remotely activated watertight  द्वार  , she lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all  of  those aboard .
Because  of  outdated maritime safety regulations , she carried only enough lifeboats for  1,178  people—slightly more than half of the number travelling on the maiden voyage , and one-third her total passenger and crew capacity .
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912 , Titanic called at  cherbourg  in France and Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in Ireland before heading westwards  towards  New York .
On 14 April 1912 , four days into  the  crossing and about 375 miles ( 600 km ) south  of  Newfoundland  ,  she hit an iceberg  at  11:40 pm ship 's time .
The glancing collision caused Titanics hull plates  to  buckle inwards along her starboard side and opened  पाँच  of her sixteen watertight compartments to the sea ; the  जलयान  gradually filled with water .
Meanwhile , passengers and some crew members were evacuated in lifeboats , many of which were launched only partly  loaded  .
A disproportionate number of men were left aboard because  of  a `` women and children first `` protocol followed by some of the  अधिकारियों  loading the lifeboats .
By 2:20 AM , she broke apart and foundered , with well over one thousand  लोगों  still aboard .
Just  अंतर्गत  two hours after the Titanic foundered , the Cunard liner  rms  Carpathia arrived on the scene of  the  sinking , where she brought  सवार  an estimated  705  survivors .
The disaster was greeted with  विश्वव्यापी  shock and outrage at the huge loss of life and the regulatory and operational failures that had led to it .
पब्लिक  inquiries in Britain and the United States led to major improvements  in  maritime safety .
One of their most important legacies  थी  the  स्थापना  in  1914   of  the International  सम्मेलन  for the Safety of Life at Sea ( SOLAS ) , which still governs maritime safety today .
Additionally , several new wireless regulations were passed around  the  world in an effort to learn from the many missteps in wireless communications -- -which could have saved many more passengers .
Many of the survivors lost all of their money and possessions and were left destitute ;  अनेक  families , particularly those of crew members from Southampton , lost their primary bread-winners .
They were  helped  by an  outpouring  of public sympathy and charitable donations .
Some of the male survivors  यहूद  accused of cowardice for leaving the ship while people were still on board ; the White Star Line 's chairman ,  J.  Bruce Ismay , faced social ostracism for the rest of his life .
the  wreck of the Titanic remains on the seabed , split in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of .
Since its discovery  in   1985  , thousands  of  artefacts have been  बरामद  and put  on  display at museums  around  the world .
Titanic has become one of the most famous ships in history , her  मेमोरी  kept alive by numerous books , folk songs ,  films  , exhibits ,  और  memorials .
The human leg is the entire lower  extremity  or limb of the human body , including the foot , thigh and even the hip or gluteal region ; however , the precise definition in human anatomy refers  तभी  to the section of  the  lower limb extending from the knee to  the  ankle .
Legs are used for standing , walking  ,  jumping , running , kicking , and similar activities , and constitute a significant portion  of  a person 's mass .
This article is about the demographic features of the population of Turkey , including population density , ethnicity , education level , health of the populace , economic status , religious  संबद्धों  and other  पहलुओं  of the population .
As  of  2010 , the population of Turkey is estimated to be 73.7 million with  a   विकास  rate of 1.21 % per annum  (   2009  figure ) .
The population is relatively young with  26.6  % falling in the 0-14 age  कोष्ठक  .
According to the OECD/World  बैंको  population statistics in  तुर्कों  the population growth from 1990 to 2008 was 16 million  or  29 % .
