the  original cast (  l  to r )  :  Laraine Newman , John  belushi  , Jane Curtin , Gilda Radner , Dan Aykroyd , Garrett Morris , and Chevy Chase
Ruins from the 1906 San Francisco earthquake ,  remembered  as one of the  worst   प्राकृतिक  disasters in United States history
A disaster is a  प्राकृतिक  or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an event  of  substantial extent causing significant physical damage or  विनाश  ,  घाटा  of life ,  or   drastic  change to the environment .
A disaster can be ostensively defined as any tragic event stemming from events such as earthquakes  ,  floods , catastrophic accidents ,  फ़ायर  , or explosions .
It is a phenomenon that can cause  क्षति   to  life and property and destroy the economic , social and cultural life of people .
In contemporary academia , disasters are  देखी  as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk .
These risks are the product of a combination of both hazard/s  और  vulnerability .
Hazards that  स्ट्राइक  in areas with low vulnerability will never become disasters , as is  the  case in uninhabited regions .
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster  हिट्स  – more than 95 percent of  सब  deaths caused by disasters occur in developing countries , and losses due to natural disasters are 20 times greater  (  as a percentage of GDP  )   in  developing  देशों  than in industrialized countries .
In computing  ,  booting ( also  ज्ञात  as booting  up  ) is the initial set of operations that a computer system performs when electrical  शक्ति  to  the  CPU is switched on .
The process begins when a computer is turned on for the first time or is re-energized after being turned off , and ends when the computer is ready to perform its normal operations .
On  आधुनिक  general purpose computers , this can take  tens  of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test  ,  locating and initializing peripheral devices  ,   और   तब  finding , loading and starting an operating system .
Many computer systems also allow these  परिचालन  to be initiated  by  a  तन्त्र  command without  साइकिलिंग  power , in what is known as a soft reboot , though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot .
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the main operating system or runtime environment for the computer after  पूर्णता  of the self-tests .
The computer term boot is short for bootstrap  or  bootstrap load and derives from the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps .
The usage calls attention to the  आवश्यकता  that , if most software is loaded onto a computer by other software already running on the computer , some mechanism must exist to load  आरंभिक  software onto the computer .
Early computers used  a  variety of ad-hoc methods to get a small program into memory to solve this problem .
The invention of integrated circuit read-only memory  (  ROM ) of  विभिन्न  types solved  इस  paradox by allowing computers to be shipped with a start up program that could not be erased .
Growth in the capacity of ROM has allowed ever more elaborate start up  प्रक्रियाओं  to be implemented .
On general purpose computers ,  the  boot process begins with the execution of an initial  कार्यक्रम  stored in boot ROMs or read in  another  fashion .
In some older computers , the initial program might have been the application to run , if no operating  प्रणाली  was used , or the operating system .
In  अन्य  computers , the initial program is a  बूट  loader  कि  may then load into  random-access  memory ( RAM ) , from nonvolatile secondary storage  (  such  as  a  मुश्किल  disk drive )  or  , in some older computers , from a medium  ऐसे  as punched cards , punched tape , or magnetic tape in older  कंप्यूटर  , the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and then  चलाएँ  it .
If the boot loader is limited in its size and capabilities , it may  ,  instead , load  a  larger  और  more  सक्षम  secondary boot loader , which would then load the operating system or runtime environment .
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot  अनुक्रम  to begin functioning and when turned on  may  simply run operational  कार्यक्रम  that are stored in ROM .
Firebird is an open source SQL relational database management system that runs on Linux , Windows , and a variety of Unix  .
The  डेटाबेस   forked  from Borland 's open source edition of InterBase in 2000 , but since  firebird  1.5 the code  रै  been largely rewritten .
Outsourcing is the contracting out of an internal business process  to  a third-party  संगठन  .
the  practice of contracting a business process out to a third party rather  than   स्टॉफ  it  internally  is common  in  the modern economy .
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in the  संयुक्त  States near the turn of the  21st  century .
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring employees  और  assets from one firm to another , but not always .
The definition of outsourcing includes both foreign and  घरेलू  contracting , and sometimes includes offshoring , which means relocating  a  business function  to  another country .
Financial savings from lower international labor  दरों  is a big motivation for outsourcing/offshoring .
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing , which entails bringing processes  संभाला   by  third-party firms in-house , and is sometimes accomplished  via  vertical  संयोजन  .
However , a  कारोबार  can provide a contract service to another business without necessarily insourcing that business process .
इंसान  immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that  कल्याणकारी  acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (  एड्स  ) , a condition  in  humans in  जिससे  progressive failure of the immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive .
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood , semen ,  vaginal  fluid ,  pre-ejaculate  , or breast milk .
Within these  bodily  fluids , HIV is present as both free virus particles and virus within infected immune cells .
HIV infects vital cells in the human immune system such as helper T cells (  specifically  CD4 + T cells ) , macrophages , and dendritic cells .
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of  mechanisms  including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells , direct viral killing of infected cells  ,  and killing of infected CD4+  t  cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes  कि   recognize  infected cells .
When CD4+ T cell  संख्याएँ  decline below a critical level , cell-mediated immunity is  खोया   ,  and the  देह  becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic  infections  .
The firepole in a fire  स्टेशन  in  टोरंटो
A fireman  's  pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole  )  is a wooden  ध्रुव  or  a  metal  ट्यूब  or pipe installed between floors  in   आग  stations , allowing firefighters responding  to  an alarm to quickly descend to the ground floor faster than by using a  मानक  staircase .
The  यंत्र  was invented in the 1870s  by  David Kenyon , in Chicago , Illinois , although it  is  often incorrectly credited to the Boston Fire Department  .
Mary Poppins is the title character of a series of children 's books written by P. L. Travers .
Throughout the  मरियम  Poppins  श्रेणी  , which  lasted  from 1934 to 1988 , Mary Shepard was the illustrator  और  acted as a second author .
The books centre on a magical English nanny , Mary Poppins .
She is blown by the East  हवा  to Number Seventeen Cherry Tree Lane , London , and into the Banks ' household to care for their children .
Encounters with chimney sweeps , shopkeepers and various adventures follow  जबतक  Mary Poppins abruptly leaves , i.e.  ,  `` pops-out  ''  .
The  adventures  take place over a total  of  eight books .
However , only the first three books feature Mary Poppins arriving and leaving .
The later five books recount previously  unrecorded  adventures from  उसके  original three visits .
As P. L. Travers explains in her introduction to Mary Poppins in the Park , `` She can not forever arrive  और  depart . ''
The books were adapted in 1964 into a musical Disney film starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke  .
in  2004 , Disney Theatrical  उत्पादित  a  स्टेज  musical adaptation in the West End theatre .
The stage musical  थी  transferred to Broadway in 2006 where it ran until its closing on March 3 , 2013 .
It has been highly successful , as was the 1964 film .
The Last Song is a 2010 American  coming  of age  टीन  romantic drama film developed alongside  निकोलस  Sparks '  अनोखा  by the same name .
The film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson in her feature film directorial debut and  co-written  by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie .
The  पिछला   सोंग  stars Miley Cyrus , Liam Hemsworth  ,  and Greg Kinnear and follows a troubled teenager as she reconnects with her estranged father and falls in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town .
The film is distributed by Touchstone Pictures .
Sparks was approached to write both the film 's screenplay and the novel .
स्पार्क्स   समाप्त  the screenplay in  जनवरी  2009 , prior to the completion of the novel , making The Last  सोंग  his first script to be  optioned   लिये   फिल्मी  .
The setting , originally  in  North  कैरोलिना  like the novel , moved to  जॉर्जिया  after the states  था   campaigned  for months to host production .
Upon beginning production in Tybee Island , Georgia and nearby Savannah ,  the  Last Song became the first movie to  be  both shot and set in Tybee  द्वीप  .
Filming lasted from June 15 to August 18 , 2009 with much of it occurring on the island 's beach and pier .
The Last  सोंग  was originally scheduled for  चौड़ी  release on January 8 , 2010 , but was postponed to March 31 , 2010 .
Written Simlish
Simlish  is   a  fictional language featured in EA Games  '  Sim series of games  .
it  debuted in SimCopter ,  और  has been especially prominent in The Sims , The Sims 2 and The Sims 3 .
The Sims  विकास  team created the unique Simlish language  by  experimenting with fractured Ukrainian , French , Latin  ,  Finnish , English , Fijian , Cebuano  ,  and Tagalog .
Simlish can also be heard in SimCity 4 , SimCity Societies and SimCity 2013 , but far less frequently .
Civilized Creatures in Spore can also  be  taught to  बोलो  Simlish .
It  is  also featured to an  extent  in Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's SimGolf .
Designer Will Wright was conscious  of  the need for dialogue in the game , but thought  कि  using  a  real  भाषा  would make it sound too repetitive  और  would also be  too  costly to hire translators for  संसार  languages  .
initially  , inspired by the Native American code talkers of World War II , Sims creator Will Wright and language expert Marc Gimbel suggested experimenting  साथ  the  navajo   भाषा  to create  simlish  .
However , they ultimately decided that Simlish worked best as a ``  भाषा  '' made up of gibberish words that could n't be  अनूदित   ,  so that its meaning would be left open to the imagination of the player .
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense language '' turned out to be the right development choice , as people were capable of imagining it more realistically than  a  computer could simulate a real one .
The actual sound of Simlish  थी  created improvisationally by voice actors Stephen Kearin and Gerri Lawlor .
An example of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on blade roots of a  v2500  IAE aircraft engine .
Step 1 : The UT probe is placed on the  रूट  of the blades to be inspected with the help of  a  special borescope tool ( video probe )  .
Step  2  : Instrument settings are input .
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over the blade root .
in  this case , an indication ( peak in  the  data ) through the red line ( or gate )  indicates  a good blade  ;  an indication to the left of that  दायरा  indicates a crack .
Principle of ultrasonic testing .
LEFT : A probe sends a sound wave into a test material .
There are two  indications  , one from the initial pulse of the probe , and the second due to the back wall echo .
RIGHT : A defect creates a third indication and simultaneously reduces  the  amplitude of the back wall indication .
The depth of the defect is determined by the ratio D/E
in  ultrasonic testing ( UT ) , very short ultrasonic pulse-waves with center frequencies ranging from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize materials .
A common example is  अल्ट्रासोनिक  thickness measurement  ,  which tests the  मोटाई  of the test object , for example , to monitor pipework corrosion .
Ultrasonic testing  is  often performed on steel and other metals and alloys , though it can also be used on concrete , wood and composites , albeit with less resolution .
it  is a form of non-destructive testing used in many industries including aerospace , automotive and other transportation  सेक्टर   .
The vas deferens ( plural  :  vasa deferentia )  ,  also called ductus deferens (  लैटिन  : `` carrying-away vessel '' ; plural : ductus deferentes ) , is part of the male anatomy of many vertebrates  ;  they transport sperm from  the  epididymis  in  anticipation of ejaculation .
Vascular ischemia of the toes with  characteristic  cyanosis .
In medicine ,  ischemia  , also spelled as ischaemia  or  ischæmia , ( ; from Greek language ισχαιμία , ischaimía ; isch-  रूट  denoting  a  restriction or thinning or  to  make  or  grow thin/lean , haema blood ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues , causing a shortage  of  oxygen and glucose needed for cellular  चयापचय  (  to  keep tissue alive ) .
Ischemia is generally caused by problems with blood vessels , with resultant damage to or dysfunction  of  tissue .
It also means local anemia in a given part of  a   देह  sometimes resulting from congestion ( such as vasoconstriction , thrombosis or embolism ) .
Down  सिंड्रोम  ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome  ,  also known as trisomy 21 , is  a  genetic disorder caused by the presence of all or  भाग  of a third  नक़ल  of chromosome 21 .
Down syndrome is the most common  chromosome  abnormality in humans .
It is typically associated with a delay in cognitive ability ( mental retardation , or MR ) and physical growth  ,  and  a  particular set of facial characteristics .
The average IQ of young adults with Down syndrome is around 50  ,  whereas young adults without the  कंडीशन  typically  have  an IQ of 100 .
(  mr  has historically been  पारिभाषित  as an IQ below 70 . )
A large proportion of individuals with Down syndrome have a severe degree of intellectual disability .
bas  syndrome is named after John Langdon  bas  , the British physician who described the syndrome in 1866 .
The condition was clinically described earlier by Jean Etienne Dominique Esquirol in 1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844  .
Down syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by Dr. Jérôme Lejeune in 1959 .
Down syndrome can be  पहचाना   in  a baby at birth or before birth by prenatal screening .
pregnancies   साथ  this diagnosis are often terminated .
The CDC estimates that about one of  प्रत्येक  691 babies born in  the  United  राज्य  each year  is   born  with Down syndrome  .
Many children with Down syndrome are educated in regular school classes while others require specialised educational facilities .
कुछ  children  ग्रैजुएट  from high school , and , in the US , there are increasing opportunities  लिये  participating in post-secondary education .
Education and proper care has been shown to improve quality of life significantly .
Many adults  साथ  Down Syndrome are  समर्थ  to work at paid employment in the community , while others require a more sheltered  कार्य  environment .
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes , or night sweats if they happen at night ) are a symptom  जिससे  may have several other causes , but which is  प्रायः  caused by the  बदलना  hormone levels that are characteristic of menopause .
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L . 78-346 , 58 Stat . 284m  )  , known informally as the G.I . Bill , was a  विधि   कि  provided a range of benefits for returning World War II  दिग्गजों  (  commonly   referred  to as  g.i.s  ) .
Benefits included low-cost mortgages , low-interest loans to start a business or farm , cash payments of tuition and living expenses  to  attend college , high school or vocational education , as well as one year of unemployment compensation .
It was available to every veteran who had been on active duty during the  युद्ध  years for  at  least ninety  दिनों  and had not been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required .
by  the end of the program in 1956 , roughly 2.2 million veterans had  प्रयुक्त  the G.I . Bill education benefits in order to attend colleges or universities , and an additional  6.6  million  प्रयुक्त  these benefits for some kind  of   प्रशिक्षण  program .
Since the original 1944 law  ,  the term has come to  शामिल  other veteran benefit programs created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as  खूब  as peacetime service .
Historians and economists consider  the  G.I . Bill a major political success—especially in contrast to the treatments of World War I veterans—and a major  योगदान  to America 's stock  of  human capital that sped long-term economic growth .
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred  in  the United States in the 1970s  as  a result of the June 17 , 1972 break-in at  the   लोकतांत्रिक  National Committee headquarters at the Watergate office complex in Washington , D.C. , and  the  Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement .
The scandal eventually led  to  the resignation of Richard Nixon , the President of the United States ,  on  August 9 , 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President .
The scandal also resulted in the  indictment  , trial , conviction , and incarceration of forty-three  व्यक्तियों  , dozens of whom were Nixon 's top administration officials .
The affair began with the  गिरफ़्तार  of five men for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC  )  headquarters at the Watergate complex on June 17 , 1972 .
The  संघीय  Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on  the  burglars to  a   slush  fund used by the Committee for the Re-Election of the President , the official organization of Nixon 's campaign .
In July 1973 , as evidence mounted against the president  's  staff , including testimony provided by former staff members in an investigation  conducted   by  the  सीनेट  Watergate Committee , it was revealed that President Nixon had a tape-recording system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations .
Recordings  इससे   ये  tapes implicated the president , revealing he had attempted to cover up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that had taken place during his administration , both before and after the break-in .
After a protracted series of bitter court battles , the U.S. Supreme Court unanimously ruled  कि  the president had to hand over the tapes to government investigators ; he  ultimately  complied .
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of Representatives and a strong possibility  of  a conviction in the Senate , Nixon resigned the presidency on August  9  , 1974 .
His successor , Gerald Ford ,  तब   जारी  a pardon to him .
Elizabeth  imogene  Webber ( formerly Lansing and Spencer ) is  a   fictional  character on the ABC Daytime soap  ओपेरा  General  हॉस्पिटल  .
Elizabeth is the granddaughter of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John Beradino ) , one of the originating core characters of the series .
Rebecca  herbst  originated the character on  अगस्त  1 , 1997 and has been the only contract actress to play the role .
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings , Lucky Spencer  और  Elizabeth Webber and Jason  मॉर्गन  and Elizabeth Webber .
The United States presidency of Ronald Reagan , also known as the Reagan administration ,  थी  a Republican administration headed  by  Ronald  reagan  from January 20 , 1981 , to January 20 , 1989 .
Domestically , the  प्रशासन  favored reducing government programs and introduced the largest across-the-board tax cuts in American history .
The economic policies enacted in  1981  , known as `` Reaganomics `` , were an example of supply-side  अर्थशास्त्र  .
Reagan aimed to encourage entrepreneurship and limit the growth of social spending , as well as the reduction of regulation and  महंगाई  .
Economic growth saw a strong recovery in  the  1980s , helping Reagan to win a landslide re-election .
The national debt  increased  significantly , however .
Regarding foreign policy , the administration was steadfastly anti-communist , calling the  सोवियत  Union an ``  दुष्ट  empire `` and ending 1970s détente .
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by his predecessor , including an invasion of Grenada , the first major overseas action by U.S. troops since the end of the  वियतनाम  War .
The ``  reagan  Doctrine  ``  controversially granted aid to paramilitary forces seeking to overthrow communist governments , particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan .
Reagan also promoted new technologies such as missile  रक्षा  systems in order to confront the Soviets and their allies  .
In diplomacy , Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret  थैचर  , and he  मिले  with Soviet  सामान्य  Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev four times , aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution '' , or the Age of Reagan in recognition of the political realignment both within and beyond the U.S. in  एहसान  of his  ब्रांड  of conservatism and his faith in  फ़्री  markets .
the  Reagan administration worked toward the collapse of Soviet Communism  ,  and it did collapse just as he left office .
Victory in the Cold War  led  to a unipolar  संसार  with the U.S. as the world  's   एकमात्र   महाशक्ति  .
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several Reagan  aides  during his second term , Reagan himself left office  साथ  a 63 percent approval rating , one of the higher approval ratings of departing presidents .
After years of unstinting praise  इससे  the right , and unrelenting criticism from the left , historian David Henry finds that by 2009 a consensus had emerged among scholars  कि  Reagan  revived  conservatism and turned the nation to the right by demonstrating a ``  pragmatic  conservatism '' that promoted ideology  भीतर  the  constraints  imposed  by  the divided political system .
furthermore  , says  हेनरी  , the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the presidency and American self-confidence  ,  and contributed critically to ending the Cold War .
Crude death rate by country ( 2006 ) .
मृत्यु  rate is a measure of the number of  मौतों   (  in general , or due to a specific cause ) in  a  population  .
Scaled to the size of that population , per unit of time  .
मृत्यु  rate is typically expressed in units of deaths per 1000 individuals per year ; thus ,  a  mortality rate of 9.5  (  out  of  1000  )  in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population  ,  or 0.95 % out of the total  .
It  is  distinct from morbidity rate , which refers to the number of individuals in poor health during a given time period ( the prevalence  रेट  ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate )  .
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the number of deaths among a set of diagnosed  हॉस्पिटल  cases for a disease or injury , rather than for the general population of a country or ethnic group .
इस  disease mortality statistic  is  more precisely referred to as  ``  case fatality rate `` ( CFR ) .
One distinguishes:
The crude death rate , the total number of deaths per year per 1000 people .
the crude death rate for the whole  संसार  is about 8.37 per 1000 per year according to the  वर्तमान  CIA World Factbook .
The perinatal mortality rate ,  the  sum of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths (  stillbirths  ) per 1000 births .
The maternal  मृत्यु  ratio , the  क्रमांक  of maternal deaths per 100,000 live births in same time period .
The maternal mortality rate , the number of maternal deaths per 1,000 women of  reproductive  age in the population ( generally defined as 15–44 years of age ) .
The  शिशु  mortality rate , the number of deaths of children less than 1 year old per 1000 live births  .
The  चाइल्ड  mortality rate , the number  of  deaths of children less than 5 years old per 1000 live births .
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional comparison to the  संख्याएँ  of  मौतों  that would have been expected if the population had been  of   a  standard composition in  शर्तें  of age , gender ,  इत्यादि  .
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR )  -  This refers to the total number of deaths per  साल  per 1000 people of a given age ( e.g . age 62 last birthday ) .
in  regard to the or  विफलता  of medical  उपचार  or procedures , one would also distinguish:
The early mortality  रेट   ,  the total  क्रमांक  of deaths  in  the early stages of an ongoing  उपचार  , or in the period immediately following  an  treatment .
the  late mortality rate  ,  the total number  of  deaths in the late stages of an ongoing treatment , or a significant length of time after an acute treatment .
Note that the  crude  death rate as defined above and applied to a whole population can give a misleading impression .
The  crude  death rate depends on the age ( and gender ) specific mortality  दरों  and the age ( and gender  )   वितरण  of  the  population .
The number of deaths per 1000 people  can  be higher for developed nations than in less-developed  देशों   ,   despite  life expectancy being higher in developed countries  due  to standards of health being better  .
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely different population age distribution , with a much higher  proportion  of older people , due to both lower recent birth  दरों   और  lower mortality rates .
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a life table which shows the mortality rate separately for each age .
A life table is  जरुरी  to give a good  अनुमान  of  जीवन  expectancy .
An otoacoustic emission ( OAE )  is  a  ध्वनि  which is generated  इससे  within the inner ear .
Having been predicted by  थामस  Gold in 1948 , its  अस्तित्व  was first demonstrated experimentally by David Kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have since  महरूम  shown to arise by a  क्रमांक  of different cellular mechanisms within the inner  कान  .
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the inner ear  रै  been damaged , so OAEs are often used in  the  laboratory and the clinic as a measure of inner ear health  .
Broadly speaking , there are two types of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( SOAEs ) , which can occur without external stimulation , and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ) , which require an evoking stimulus .
Hurricane Tomas was  the  nineteenth named storm and twelfth hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season  .
Tomas developed from a tropical wave east of the Windward Islands on October 29 .
Quickly  intensifying  into a hurricane ,  it  moved through the Windward Islands and passed very near Saint Lucia .
After  reaching  Category 2 status on the  saffir-simpson   स्केल  , Tomas quickly weakened to a tropical storm in the central Caribbean Sea  ,  due  to  strong wind  shear  and dry air .
Tomas later regained hurricane status as it reorganized near the Windward passage .
Throughout the  hurricane  's path , 71 people are known to have been killed , 14 of whom  यहूद  in Saint Lucia .
Monetary losses throughout the Windward Islands were estimated at US $ 588 million , mainly in Saint Lucia .
In the wake of the storm in Haiti , flooding intensified an ongoing cholera outbreak indirectly  causing  more fatalities  .
According to a report released  in   दिसम्बर  2010 , 55 people were killed in Cuba and Hispanola , though the distribution of these fatalities are unknown  .
Overall  क्षति  from the storm was at least $ 741 million .
Victoria Jackson ( born August  2  ,  1959  ) is an American comedian , actress , satirist ,  सिंगर  and internet blogger  बेहतरीन  known as a cast member of the NBC television sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live  (  SNL  )  from 1986 to 1992 .
She  रै  received attention as a vocal critic of President Barack Obama , and  is  an active participant in the Tea Party movement .
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by heavy reliance  on  techniques like fragmentation , paradox , and questionable  narrators   ,   और   is  often ( though not exclusively  )  defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era .
Postmodern works  हैं  seen as a reaction against Enlightenment thinking and Modernist approaches to literature .
postmodern  literature , like postmodernism  as  a whole , tends to resist definition  or  classification as  a  `` movement ''  .
बेशक  , the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory , particularly reader-response  और  deconstructionist approaches , and the subversions of the implicit  अनुबंध  between author , text and reader by which its  works  are often characterised , have led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes ' Don  quixote  ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy  होने  retrospectively  inducted  into the fold .
While there is little consensus on the  precise  characteristics , scope , and importance of postmodern literature , as is often the  मामला  with artistic movements , postmodern  साहित्य  is commonly defined in relation to a precursor .
For example , a postmodern literary work tends not to conclude with  the  neatly tied-up ending as is often found in modernist literature , but often parodies it .
Postmodern authors  tend  to celebrate chance over craft , and further employ metafiction to undermine the writer  's  authority .
Another characteristic  of  postmodern literature  is  the questioning of distinctions between high and low culture through the use of pastiche ,  the  combination of subjects and genres not previously deemed fit for literature .
Enigma is an electronic musical project founded in Germany by Michael Cretu , David Fairstein and Frank  पीटरसन  in 1990 .
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the Enigma project while working in Germany , but based his recording  स्टुडियो  A.R.T . Studios in Ibiza , Spain , from  the  early 1990s until May 2009 , where he has recorded all of Enigma 's studio releases to date  .
Cretu is both the composer and the producer of the project .
His  पूर्व  wife , pop singer Sandra , often provided vocals on Enigma tracks  .
Jens Gad co-arranged  और  played guitar  on  three of the Enigma albums .
Peter Cornelius also contributed to Enigma during the 1990s .
Seven studio albums have been produced under the name of  the   प्रोजेक्ट  .
Scooby-Doo is an American animated cartoon franchise , comprising several animated television series produced from 1969 to the present day .
The original  श्रेणी  , Scooby-Doo , Where Are You !
, was created for Hanna-Barbera Productions by writers Joe Ruby and Ken Spears in 1969 .
इस  Saturday morning cartoon  श्रेणी  featured four teenagers— Fred Jones , Daphne Blake , Velma Dinkley , and Norville `` Shaggy '' Rogers — and their talking brown Great Dane dog named Scooby-Doo  ,  who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural  जीव  through a series of  हरकतों  and missteps .
Following the success of the original series , Hanna-Barbera and  इसके  successor Warner Bros . Animation  have  produced numerous follow-up and spin-off animated series and several related works , including television specials  और  telefilms , a line of direct-to-video films , and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films .
Some versions of Scooby-Doo feature different variations  on  the show 's supernatural theme  ,  and include characters  ऐसे  as Scooby 's cousin Scooby-Dum and  भतीजे  Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters .
Scooby-Doo was originally broadcast on CBS from  1969  to 1976 , when it moved to ABC .
ABC aired the show until canceling it in 1986 , and presented  a  spin-off featuring the characters as children , A Pup Named Scooby-Doo  ,  from 1988 until  1991  .
Two new Scooby-Doo series , What 's New , Scooby-Doo ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a  सुराग  ! ] ] , aired as part of Kids  wb  on The WB network  और  its  successor  , The CW network , from 2002 until 2008 .
The most recent  scooby-doo  series , Scooby-Doo !
Mystery  incorporated  , aired on Cartoon Network from 2010 to 2013 .
Repeats of  the  various Scooby-Doo series are  ब्रॉडकास्ट  frequently on Cartoon Network and  boomerang  in the United  राज्य  and other countries .
Call of  ड्यूटी  is a first-person and third-person shooter computer/ video game franchise .
The series began on the PC , and later expanded to consoles and handhelds .
Several spin-off games have also been released .
The earlier games in the series  हैं  set primarily in World War II  ,  this includes : Call of Duty , Call of Duty 2 , and Call of Duty 3 .
Beginning with Modern Warfare , which  is   नियत   in  modern  टाइम्स   ,  the series has shifted focus away from World War II .
Call of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare ( released  नवम्बर  2007 ) was  followed  by Call  of  Duty : World at War and Call of Duty : Modern  warfare  2  .
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the Cold War , while Modern Warfare 3 (  released  November 2011 ) takes place in the near-future setting .
Black Ops 2 ( Released November 13  ,  2012 ) takes place in the year 2025 .
The  कॉल  of Duty games are published and owned  by  Activision with Aspyr Media publishing it for Apple OS X .
While the studio Infinity Ward primarily still develops them ,  treyarch  has also developed several of the titles with the release of the  studios  ' games interlaced with each other  .
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter Interactive ,  चिंगारी  Unlimited , Amaze Entertainment ,  n-space  , Rebellion Developments , Ideaworks Game Studio , Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games .
The  खेल  use a  किस्में  of engines , including  the  id Tech 3 ,  the  Treyarch NGL , and  the  IW 5.0 .
Other  उत्पाद  in the  मताधिकार  include a line  of  action figures designed by Plan-B Toys , a card game created by Upper  डेक  , and a comic book mini-series published by WildStorm .
As of November 11 , 2011 , the  कॉल  Of Duty series have sold over 100 million  नक़ल  .
As of March  31  , 2012 there are 40 million monthly active players  आरपार   सब  of the Call of Duty  शीर्षक  , with 10 million Call of  ड्यूटी  : Elite users and 2 million paying annual members .
Over 1.6 billion hours of online gameplay have  महरूम   logged  Modern Warfare 3 since its 2011 release .
The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed  on  the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person ,  whether  such property is transferred via a will , according  to   the  state laws of intestacy or otherwise made  as  an  घटना   of  the death of the owner , such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust , or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries .
The estate tax is one part of the  एकीकृत  Gift and Estate Tax system in the United States .
the  other part of the system , the gift tax , imposes a tax on transfers of property during a person 's life ; the gift tax prevents avoidance  of  the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate .
In addition to the federal government , many states also impose an estate tax ,  साथ  the state version called either an estate tax  or  an inheritance tax .
Opponents of the estate tax call it the `` death tax ''  .
If an  एसेट  is left to a spouse or  a  Federally recognized charity , the tax usually does not apply .
In addition , up to $  5,250,000  can be given by an individual , before and/or upon their death  ,  without incurring federal gift  or   एस्टेट  taxes .
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is  an  English actor and musician , known as  the  lead  सिंगर  and rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush .
Following Bush 's separation in 2002 , which lasted  लिये  eight years , he was the lead singer and guitarist for Institute , and later  began   a  solo career .
When performing solo , Gavin plays songs from his extensive musical libraries .
Rossdale has been ranked in the Top 100 Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75  )  .
Raffaello  sanzio  da Urbino ( April 6 or March 28  ,  1483 – April 6 , 1520 ) , better known simply as Raphael , was an Italian painter  और  architect of the High  पुनर्जागरण   .
His work is admired for  इसके  clarity of form and ease of composition and for its visual achievement of the Neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur .
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci , he forms the  परंपरागत  trinity of great masters of that period .
राफेल  was enormously productive , running an unusually large workshop , and  despite  his death at 37 , a large body of his work remains .
अनेक  of his works are  मिला  in  the  Vatican Palace , where the frescoed Raphael Rooms  यहूद  the central  ,  and the largest , work of his  करियर  .
The  बेहतरीन  known work is The School of Athens in the Vatican Stanza della Segnatura .
After his early  सालो  in Rome much of his work was self-designed , but for the most part executed by the workshop from his drawings  ,  with considerable loss of quality .
He was extremely influential in his lifetime , though outside Rome his work was mostly known from his collaborative printmaking .
After his death , the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th centuries , when Raphael 's more serene  और  harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest models .
His career  जलप्रपात  naturally into three phases and three  शैलियाँ  , first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria , then a period of about four years (  इससे  1504–1508 ) absorbing the  कलाकारी  traditions of Florence , followed by his last  hectic  and triumphant twelve  सालो  in Rome , working for two Popes and their close  शरीक  .
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born October 28 , 1967 ) is an  अमरीकी  actress .
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the romantic comedy Pretty Woman ( 1990 ) , which grossed $ 464 million worldwide .
After receiving Golden  ग्लोब  Awards and Academy Award nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman  ,  she won the Academy Award for Best  अभिनेत्री   लिये  her performance in Erin  brockovich  ( 2000 ) .
Her films The Pelican Brief (  1993  ) , My Best  dost  's Wedding ( 1997 ) , Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ) , Notting Hill  (  1999 ) , Runaway Bride ( 1999 ) ,  समंदर  's Eleven ( 2001 ) , Ocean  's  Twelve ( 2004 ) , Charlie Wilson 's War (  2007  ) , Valentine 's  दिन  ( 2010 ) , Eat Pray Love (  2010  ) ,  और  Mirror Mirror ( 2012 ) have collectively  brought  box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion , making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box  दफ्तर  receipts .
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid  अभिनेत्रियों  in the world , topping The Hollywood Reporters annual `` power  सूची  '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006 .
उसके  fee for  1990   's  Pretty Woman was $  300,000  ; in 2003 , she was paid an unprecedented $ 25 million for her role in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ) .
As of 2010 , Roberts 's net worth was estimated to be $ 140 million .
Roberts  रै   महरूम   नामित  one of People magazine 's `` 50 Most  खूबसूरत  People in the World '' eleven times , tied with Halle  बेरी  .
In 2011 , she was named one of the `` 100 Hottest Women of  all-time  '' by Men 's Health  .
In  2001  , Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the  11th  most powerful woman in the United States .
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg (  born  May 14 , 1984  )   is  an American computer programmer and Internet entrepreneur  .
He is best known as one of five co-founders of the social networking website Facebook .
As of April 2013 ,  zuckerberg  is the chairman and chief executive of Facebook , Inc. and in 2013 his personal wealth was estimated to be  us  $ 13 .3 billion .
Together with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin  ,  Andrew  mccollum  , Dustin Moskovitz and  क्रिस  Hughes , Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms .
The group then introduced Facebook onto other  campuses  nationwide and moved to Palo Alto , California , United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards .
In 2007 , at the age of twenty-three years  ,  Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of Facebook and the number of Facebook users worldwide reached a total of one billion in  2012  .
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by others in the group , who claimed  a  share of the company based upon  उनके  involvement during the development phase of Facebook .
Since 2010 , Zuckerberg has  महरूम  named among  the  100 wealthiest and most influential  लोगों  in the world by Time magazine as  a  part of its Person of the Year accolade .
Zuckerberg was  निभाई  by actor Jesse Eisenberg in the 2010 Hollywood film The  सोशल  Network  in  which the rise  of  Facebook is portrayed .
The  mayflower  was the ship that in 1620  transported  102  अंग्रेज़ी  Pilgrims , including a  कोर  group of Separatists , to New England .
Their story is one of travail and survival in a  हर्ष  New World environment .
framedthe
Committee of  तरीके  and Means is the chief tax -writing committee of the  संयुक्त  States House of Representatives  .
Members of the Ways and Means Committee  हैं  not allowed to serve on any other House Committees unless  वे  apply for a waiver from their party 's congressional leadership .
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation , tariffs and other revenue-raising measures , as  खूब  as a number of  अन्य  programs including:
Social  सुरक्षा
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
Enforcement of child support laws
Temporary  सहायता  for Needy Families , a federal welfare  कार्यक्रम
Foster care and  अपनाना  programs
The U.S.  संविधान  requires that all bills regarding taxation must originate in the  हाउस   of  Representatives .
Since  हाउस  procedure is that all  बिल्स  regarding taxation must go through this committee , the  कमेटी  is very influential , as is its Senate counterpart , the U.S. Senate Committee on Finance .
The Ways and Means Committee  in  the 111th Congress was  chaired  by Charlie Rangel , who had  लिया  a leave of absence  as  chairman until House ethics violations were resolved .
However , his  छोड़  of absence as chairman was ruled to be a resignation .
Pete Stark resigned as  एक्टिंग  chairman , so Sander Levin held that position until  the  start of the 112th Congress .
Dave Camp became the committee chair for the 112th Congress , after the Republicans won control of the House in the 2010 election .
The blue whale  (  Balaenoptera musculus )  is  a marine mammal belonging to the suborder  of  baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ) .
At  in  length and or more in weight , it is the largest known animal to have ever existed .
Long and slender , the blue whale 's body  can  be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter  underneath  .
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the  उत्तर  Atlantic and North Pacific ,  B.  m. intermedia of the Southern Ocean and B. m. brevicauda  (  also known  as  the pygmy  ब्लू  whale ) found in the  भारतीय  Ocean and South Pacific Ocean  .
B. m. indica , found in the Indian Ocean ,  may  be another subspecies .
As with other baleen whales , its diet consists almost exclusively  of  small  crustaceans  known as  krill   .
Blue whales were abundant in nearly all the oceans on Earth  जबतक  the  शुरूआत  of the twentieth century .
लिये  over a century ,  वे  were hunted almost to extinction by whalers until protected by the international community in 1966 .
A 2002 report  अनुमानित  there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales  विश्वव्यापी  , located in at least five groups .
More recent research into the Pygmy subspecies suggests this may  be  an underestimate .
Before whaling , the largest population was in the Antarctic , numbering approximately 239,000 ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ) .
There  remain  only much  छोटी  ( around 2,000 ) concentrations in each of the eastern North Pacific , Antarctic , and Indian Ocean groups .
There are two more groups in the North Atlantic , and at  तनिक  two in the Southern Hemisphere .
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var . scolymus ) is a variety of a species of thistle  cultivated  as a food .
The edible matter is buds that  रूप  within the flower heads before the flowers come into bloom .
the  buds go  दूर  or change to  a  coarse , barely edible form when the flower blooms .
The uncultivated or  जंगली  variety  of  the  प्रजाति  is called a cardoon .
It  is  a perennial plant native to the Mediterranean region .
The United States one  hundred-dollar  bill (  $  100 ) is  a  denomination of United States currency .
U.S. statesman , inventor , and diplomat Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन  is currently featured on the obverse  of  the bill .
On the reverse of the  banknote  is an image of Independence Hall .
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has been printed since July 13 , 1969 , when  the  denominations of $ 500 ,  $  1,000 , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were retired .
The Bureau  of  Engraving  और  Printing says the average life of a $ 100 bill in circulation is 90 months ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to  पहनें  and  आंसू  .
The bills are also commonly referred to as ``  benjamins  ''  ,  in reference to the use of Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on the denomination , or ``  c-notes  '' , based on the  रोमन  numeral for 100 .
The bill is  एक  of two denominations printed today  कि  does not feature a  अध्यक्ष  of the United States ; the other is the $ 10 bill  ,  featuring  सिकंदर  Hamilton .
The  समय  on the clock  of  Independence  हॉल  on the reverse , according to the U.S.  ब्यूरो  of Engraving and  मुद्रण  , shows approximately 4:10 .
One hundred  hundred-dollar  bills are delivered  by  Federal Reserve Banks in  mustard-colored  straps ( $ 10,000 ) .
The Series 2009 $ 100  विधेयक  redesign was unveiled on April 21 , 2010 , and  थी  to be issued to the public on February 11 , 2011 , but production was shut down in December 2010 because as  अनेक  as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw  .
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a blank space on the bill when pulled out  .
In their replacement , and continuing the high demand of this  denomination   ,  the Series 2006A was launched retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ) .
On April  24  , 2013 , the Federal  आरक्षित  announced the new $ 100 bill would enter circulation on October 8 , 2013  .
किंग  David in robes of a Byzantine emperor .
Miniature from the Paris Psalter .
David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong  's  : Daveed ) according to the  यहूदी  Bible , was the second king of the United Kingdom of Israel , and according to the  नई  Testament Gospels of Matthew and  ल्यूक  , an ancestor of Jesus .
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE , his reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE , and his reign over the United  किंगडम  of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE .
The  किताबे   of   सैमुएल  , 1 Kings , and 1 Chronicles are the  तभी  sources of information on David , although the Tel Dan  stele  ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ) , read as `` House of David '' ,  जिससे  most scholars take as confirmation of the existence in the mid-9th century BCE of  a  Judean royal dynasty  पुकारा  the House  of   दाउद  .
He  is  depicted  as  a righteous king , although not without faults , as well as  an  acclaimed warrior , musician , and poet , traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms  contained   in  the Book  of  Psalms .
David is  सेंट्रल  to Jewish , Christian , and Islamic doctrine and culture .
Biblical tradition maintains that a direct descendant of David will be the  मसीहा  .
In Islam he is considered to be a prophet and the king of a nation .
Kathmandu ( ; )  is  the capital and largest urban agglomerate of  नेपाल   .
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu Metropolitan City at its core , and its sister  शहरों  Patan , Kirtipur , Thimi , and Bhaktapur .
It also  शामिल  the recently recognized urban areas of Shankhapur , Karyabinayak , and Champapur .
banepa  , Dhulikhel , and Panauti are satellite urban areas of Kathmandu located just outside the Kathmandu valley .
Kathmandu is also known informally as  ``  KTM '' or  the  `` tri-city  ''  .
According to a census  conducted   in  2011 , Kathmandu metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; and the agglomerate has a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants .
The metropolitan  नगर  area is and has a population density of 19,250 per km2  .
the  city stands at an elevation of approximately in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley  of  central Nepal  .
It is surrounded  by  four  प्रमुख  mountains : Shivapuri , Phulchoki , Nagarjun , and Chandragiri .
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu , Lalitpur , and Bhaktapur ) , has the highest population density in the country , and  is  home to  परिचय  a twelfth of Nepal 's population  .
During Rana and Shah  eras  , the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the Kathmandu Valley ; it was what people who lived outside the valley called it .
दौरान  this period , British historians  पुकारा  the valley itself `` Nepal Proper '' .
Today , Kathmandu  is  not only  the   पूंजी  of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal , but also the headquarters of the  सेंट्रल   विकास  Region of Nepal  .
The  सेंट्रल  Region comprises three zones  :  Bagmati , Narayani , and Janakpur .
Kathmandu is located in the Bagmati Zone .
Kathmandu is the gateway to tourism in Nepal .
It is also the nerve center of the country 's economy .
It has the  सबसे  advanced infrastructure of any urban area in Nepal , and its economy is focused on tourism , which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in  1995–96   .
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter during a period of political  अशांति  , but since then has improved  .  )
The city has  a  rich history , spanning nearly 2000 years , as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley  .
Religious and cultural festivities form a major part of the lives of people residing  in  Kathmandu .
Most of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and  अनेक  others  follow  Buddhism .
There are people of other  धार्मिक  beliefs as well , giving Kathmandu  a   कॉस्मोपॉलिटन  culture .
Nepali is the most commonly  बोला  language  in  the city .
Nepal Bhasa is the indigenous language  बोला  by the Newar people  .
Hindi is widely understood and English is understood by Kathmandu 's educated residents .
The city 's literacy rate is 98 % .
Kathmandu 's sister cities (  ललितपुर  Patan )  और  Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage , tourism industry ,  और   अर्थव्यवस्था  ; therefore UNESCO 's  संसार  Heritage Site lists all three cities ' monuments and attractions together under one heading , `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site `` .
Field hockey , usually referred to simply as hockey  ,  is a team  खेल  of the hockey family which is played between two teams of eleven players with hockey sticks and a hard  ,  solid plastic ball  .
At the turn of the 21st century  ,   the  game is played globally , with particular popularity  throughout  Europe , Asia , Oceania , and South America – in addition to being  the  national sport of Pakistan and India  .
The  पद   ``  field hockey '' is used primarily in  कनाडा  , the United States , and other regions of the world where the sport  of  ice hockey is more popular .
दौरान   खेल  , goal keepers are the only  खिलाड़ी  who  हैं  allowed to touch the ball with any part of their body ( with the exception of a player 's hand considered 'part of the stick ' ) , with this only applying within the shooting circle ( also  ज्ञात  as the  d  ,  or  shooting arc , or just the circle ) , while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick .
The team that scores  the  most goals by the end of  the  match wins .
If the score is tied at the  समाप्त  of the game ,  either  a draw is declared or  the  game goes into extra time and/or a penalty shootout , depending on  the  competition 's format .
The governing body  of  hockey is the International Hockey Federation ( FIH )  ,  with men and women being represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games  ,  Commonwealth  खेल  , Hockey World Cup , Champions Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup , with many countries running extensive junior  ,  senior , and masters ' club competitions .
the  FIH is also responsible for organising the Hockey Rules Board and developing the rules for the sport .
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor hockey , which differs in a number of respects while  मूर्त  the primary  सिद्धान्त   of  hockey .
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side variant , with a field which is reduced to approximately 40m × 20m .
With many of the rules remaining the same , including obstruction and feet , there are several key variations - Players  may  not raise the  बॉल  unless shooting on goal , players may not hit the  बॉल  ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ) , and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the  बॉल  will rebound off .
Ethan `` Cane  ''  Ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from the American CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless .
He is portrayed by  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई   कर्ता  Daniel Goddard , who originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the World  turns  but was recommended for a role on The Young and the  बेचैन  instead .
The role was to be  portrayed  as an American  ,  but Goddard 's Australian descent influenced the character 's  पृष्ठभूमि  .
Former head  लेखक  Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the episode airing on January 12 , 2007 as an Australian bartender in search of his family , a  डेब्यू   कि  received  a  mixed response  .
Latham created Cane as  the  son of Phillip  चांसलर  II  (  Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill Foster Abbott  (  Jess Walton ) but the character 's background was rewritten by Maria Arena Bell in 2009 , reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ) .
हालांकि  characterized as `` mysterious '' , Cane is `` loyal and  समर्पित   ''  , while Goddard described the  अक्षर  as a `` typical Australian , working-class kind of  guy  '' .
He was the first member of the  एटकिन्सन  family to appear on the  श्रेणी  , followed by his  अभिभावक  and  एकसमान  twin brother .
Soon after  उसके  debut , he became a leading character , a  निर्णय  praised by viewers and critics .
The character has been involved with Amber Moore  (  Adrienne Frantz ) , Chloe Mitchell ( Elizabeth Hendrickson ) and most  notably  Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ) , a romance that garnered significant  प्रशंसक  attention .
in  2009 , Cane and Lily were married ; Global  bc  would later  कॉल   लिली  the love of Cane 's life .
The pair had two children , Charlie and Mattie Ashby .
In  2011  , the actor was fired , and Cane was shot to death onscreen .
However ,  गोडार्ड  was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return ,  revealing  that Cane 's identical twin brother was in  फैक्ट  the man who died .
This sacrificed his  विवाह  to Lily  ,  but the couple were remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012 .
Goddard  रै  been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News said that he portrays the character  honestly  , and is `` always dependable  ,  on fire and exciting ''  .
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp II  (  born June  9  , 1963 )  is   an   अमरीकी  actor , film  निर्माता  , and musician .
He has won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild award for Best Actor .
Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s  टेलीविज़न  series 21 Jump Street ,  बनने  a teen idol .
Dissatisfied with that status , Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the  शीर्षक  character of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office  कामयाबी  in films such as Sleepy  खोखला  (  1999  ) ,  चार्ली  and the Chocolate Factory ( 2005 ) , Alice in Wonderland (  2010   )   ,   rango  ( 2011 ) and the Pirates  of  the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ) .
He has collaborated with director and friend Tim Burton in eight films ; the most  हाल  being Dark Shadows (  2012   )   .
डेप  has gained acclaim for  उसके  portrayals of such people  as  Ed Wood in Ed Wood , Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco , Hunter S. Thompson  in  Fear and  loathing  in Las Vegas , George Jung in Blow , and the bank robber John Dillinger in Michael Mann 's Public Enemies .
Films  featuring  Depp have  grossed  over $ 3.1 billion at the United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide .
He has been nominated for top awards  अनेक  times , winning the Best Actor Awards from the Golden –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy for Sweeney Todd : The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse  of   the  Black Pearl .
he  also has garnered a  sex  symbol status in American cinema , being twice named as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009 .
He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness Book of World  रिकॉर्ड  as the highest paid actor ,  साथ  $ 75 million .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or  w3  , commonly known as the web )  ,  is a system of interlinked hypertext documents  पहुँचा  via the  अंतरजाल  .
With  a  web browser , one can  दृश्य  web pages  कि  may contain text , images , videos  ,  and other multimedia , and navigate between them via  hyperlinks  .
Using concepts from his  पहले  hypertext systems like ENQUIRE , British engineer , computer scientist and at that time  कर्मचारी  of the CERN , Sir Tim Berners-Lee , now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide  वेब  .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland  ,  Berners-Lee  और  Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext ``  to   कड़ी  and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse  at  will '' ,  और  they publicly introduced  the  project in  दिसम्बर  of the same year .
Mark  ट्रैविस  John  सांचेज़  (  born  November 11  ,  1986 ) is an American football  क्वार्टरबैक  for the New York Jets of the National Football League (  एनएफएल  ) .
He was drafted in  the  first round of the  2009  NFL Draft as the fifth overall selection by the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall .
He played college football at the University of  दक्षिणी  California ( USC ) .
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined and athletic family .
In the eighth grade , he began to play football and  सीख  the intricacies of  the  quarterback position , training with his father  ,  Nick .
A well-regarded prospect , Sanchez committed  to  Southern California following his successful high school career in which  he  led his team to a championship title during his  फाइनल  season .
at  USC , Sanchez  थी  relegated as the backup quarterback during his  पहला  three  सालो  though  he  rose to prominence due to his brief appearances  on  the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty .
Sanchez  भी  became popular within the community due to his Mexican-American  विरासत  .
Named the starter in 2008 , Sanchez led USC to a 12–1 record and  जीती  the Rose Bowl against Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense .
हालांकि  many  माना  him too inexperienced ,  सांचेज़   घोषित  his intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft .
He  थी  selected by the  jets  after  वे  traded up with  the  Cleveland Browns , and was named the starting  क्वार्टरबैक  prior to the start of the  ऋतु  .
Despite a subpar performance , Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC Championship Game , a losing effort to the Indianapolis Colts , becoming the fourth rookie quarterback in NFL history to win  उसके  first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games .
In his second season , Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC Championship Game  जहाँ  they narrowly lost  to  the Pittsburgh Steelers , 24–19 .
With the  जीत  over the New  इंग्लैण्ड  Patriots the week prior , Sanchez tied  चार  other quarterbacks for the second most post-season  सड़क  victories by a quarterback  in  NFL history .
in  leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships  ,  Sanchez joined quarterback Ben Roethlisberger as the only two quarterbacks in NFL history to reach the conference championship in their first two seasons in the league  .
The next two seasons would be a  स्लोप  for both the team and Sanchez as they failed to reach the playoffs .
Fans and media critics called for a struggling Sanchez  to  be benched .
He  आखिरकार   थी  replaced towards  the  end of the 2012 season  साथ  Greg McElroy .
Paul Avery ( April 2  ,  1934December 10 , 2000 ) was an  अमरीकी  police reporter ,  बेहतरीन  known for his stories on the infamous  सीरियल  killer known as the Zodiac , and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping .
A small submersible AC sump pump with a garden  नली  connector
A sump pump is a pump used to remove water that  रै   संचित  in a water  collecting  sump basin , commonly found in  the  basement of homes .
The water may enter  via  the perimeter drains of a basement waterproofing system , funneling into the basin  or  because of rain or natural ground water ,  if  the  तहखाने  is below the water table level .
Sump pumps  हैं  used  जहाँ  basement flooding happens  regularly  and to remedy dampness where the water table is above the foundation of  a  home .
Sump pumps send  जल  away from a house to any place where it is no longer  समस्यापूर्ण  , such as a municipal storm drain or  a  dry  खूब  .
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary sewer in older installations .
Once considered acceptable , this practice may now violate the plumbing code or municipal bylaws , because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system .
Municipalities  urge  homeowners to disconnect and reroute sump pump discharge away from sanitary sewers  .
Fines may be imposed for  noncompliance  .
Many homeowners have inherited their sump pump  configurations  and do not realize that the pump discharges  to  the sewer .
If the discharge is fed to a laundry sink in the basement , it 's likely going to the sewer .
Usually hardwired into a home 's electrical system , sump pumps  may  have a battery backup .
The home 's  pressurized  water supply powers some pumps , eliminating the need for  विद्युत  at the expense of using potable water , potentially making them  अधिक  expensive to operate than electrical  पंपों  and creating  an  additional water disposal problem .
Since  a  sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped , a backup  प्रणाली  is important for cases when the main power is out for prolonged periods of time , as during a severe storm .
There are generally two types of sump pumps — pedestal and submersible .
The  pedestal  pump 's motor is mounted  ऊपर   the  sump ,  जहाँ   it   is  more easily serviced , but is  भी  more conspicuous .
The pump impeller is  चलित   by  a long , vertical extension shaft and the impeller is in a scroll housing in the base of the pump .
The submersible pump is entirely mounted inside  the  sump , and is  विशेषकर  sealed to prevent electrical short circuits .
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial applications to control water table -related problems in surface soil .
An artesian  aquifer  or periodic high water table situation can cause the ground  to  become unstable due to water saturation .
As long as the pump  कृत्यों  , the surface soil will remain stable .
These sumps  हैं  typically ten feet  in  depth or  अधिक  ; lined with corrugated metal pipe that contains perforations or  नाली  holes throughout  .
They may include electronic control systems with visual and audible alarms and are usually covered  to  prevent debris and animals from falling in  .
Bleeding Kansas , Bloody Kansas or the Border War , was a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` Border Ruffian `` elements , that took place in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861  .
At the heart of the conflict was the question of whether Kansas would enter the Union as a free state or slave state .
As  ऐसे  , Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between Northerners and Southerners over the issue of slavery in the  संयुक्त  States .
the  term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the New York Tribune ; the events it encompasses directly presaged  the  American Civil War .
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces .
The events later  ज्ञात  as Bleeding Kansas were set into motion by  the  Kansas–Nebraska Act  of  1854 , which nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the  अवधारणा  of popular sovereignty  .
An ostensibly  लोकतांत्रिक  idea , popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it would be a free  or  slave state ; however , this resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides  .
At one point , Kansas had two separate  सरकारें  , each with its own constitution  ,  although only one was federally recognized .
On January 29 , 1861 , Kansas was admitted to the Union as a free state , less than  तीन  months before the Battle of Fort Sumter which began the Civil War .
बेंजीन  is an organic chemical compound  साथ  the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6 .
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon atoms joined in a ring , with 1 hydrogen atom attached  to  each carbon atom .
Because its molecules contain only carbon  और  hydrogen  अणु   ,   बेंजीन  is classed as a  हाइड्रोकार्बन  .
Benzene is a natural constituent of  crude  oil , and is one  of  the most basic petrochemicals .
Benzene is an aromatic hydrocarbon and  the  second [  n  ] - annulene  (  [ 6 ] -annulene ) ,  a   चक्रीय  hydrocarbon with a continuous pi bond .
it  is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H . Benzene is a colorless and highly flammable liquid with  a  sweet smell .
It is mainly used as a  precursor  to heavy chemicals , such as ethylbenzene and cumene , which are produced on a billion  किलोग्राम  scale .
Because it has a high octane number ,  it  is  an  important component of gasoline , composing a few percent of its mass .
Most non-industrial applications have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity .
Giovanni Virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14  कूच  1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an Italian astronomer and science historian .
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's Wii game  कंसोल  to run software that has not been authorized by Nintendo  .
It achieves this by  defeating  the Wii 's copy protection and code signing measures .
In more general terms  ,  Wii Homebrew refers to the use of the Wii 's hardware , accessories and software for purposes outside those intended by the  निर्माता  .
Original  प्रयत्न  focused on using the Wii Remote as a pointing device on  अन्य  operating systems , or running web-based games in the built-in web browser .
Subsequent developments in  खेल  exploits , such as the `` Twilight hack `` , `` Bannerbomb '' and its later incarnation `` LetterBomb '' , `` Smash Stack '' ,  ``  Indiana  pwns  '' , `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '' , `` bathaxx '' , and `` Return of the Jodi '' , made installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible .
Hadley ( right ) discussing the 2006 Israel-Lebanon crisis with Bush and Rice .
Stephen John Hadley (  born  February 13 , 1947 ) was the 21st U.S. Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs  (  commonly referred as National Security Advisor ) , serving under President George W. Bush .
Take identical growing plants  और  give fertilizer to half of them .
If there are differences between the fertilized plant group and the unfertilized  ``  control '' group , these  मतभेद  may be due to the fertilizer .
a  scientific  कंट्रोल  is an experiment  or  observation designed  to  minimize the effects of  परिवर्तनीय  other than the single  स्वतंत्र  variable  .
This  increases  the reliability of the results , often through a  तुलना   between   कंट्रोल  measurements and the other measurements .
वैज्ञानिक  controls  हैं  a part of  the  scientific method .
For example , during drug testing , scientists will try to control two groups to keep them  as  identical as possible , then allow one group to try the drug .
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to  तभी  half the plants in a garden : the plants that receive no fertilizer are the control group ,  क्युकी  they establish  the  baseline level  of  growth that the fertilizer-treated plants  होगा  be compared against  .
Without a control  समूह  , the experiment can not determine whether the  fertilizer-treated  plants grow more than they would have if untreated  .
Ideally , all  परिवर्तनीय  in  an  experiment will be controlled (  accounted  for by the control measurements ) and none  होगा  be uncontrolled .
In such an experiment , if all the controls work as expected , it is possible to conclude that the experiment is working  as  intended and that the results of the experiment are due to the  प्रभाव  of the variable being tested .
That is ,  वैज्ञानिक  controls  allow  an investigator to make a claim like `` Two situations were identical until  फ़ैक्टर  X occurred .
Since factor X is the only difference between  the  two situations , the  नई  outcome was caused by  फ़ैक्टर  X . ''
