Oahu ( ) or  oahu  ,  ज्ञात  as `` The Gathering Place '' , is the third largest of the Hawaiian Islands and the most populous  of  the  आइलैंड्स   in   the  U.S. state of Hawaii .
The state capital , Honolulu , is on Oahu 's southeast coast .
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe  खाड़ी  and off the eastern ( windward ) coast , it has a total land area of , making it the 20th largest island in the United States .
In the greatest dimension , this volcanic island is long and across .
The length of the shoreline is .
The island is the  परिणाम  of two separate shield volcanoes : Waianae and Koolau , with a broad `` valley '' or saddle ( the central Oahu Plain ) between them .
The highest point is Mt . Ka'ala in the Waianae Range  ,  rising to above sea level .
The  आधार  currency of the United States is  the  U.S. dollar , and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1 , $ 2  ,  $ 5 , $ 10 , $ 20 , $ 50 , and $  100  .
At one time , however , U.S. currency included five larger denominations .
टीप  in the denominations  of  $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 ,  और  $ 10,000 were printed for general use , and a  $  100,000 note was printed for certain  आतंरिक  transactions .
British  होंडुरास  was  a  British colony  in   सेंट्रल   अमेरिका  .
In 1981 , the colony  gained  full independence , and is now the independent nation of Belize .
पहला  colonised by Spaniards in the 17th century  ,  the territory on the east coast of Central America  ,  south of Mexico , became a British crown colony in  1862  .
In 1964 , it became a self-governing colony .
Belize  became   fully  independent from the  संयुक्त  Kingdom in 1981 .
Belize was the last  महाद्वीपीय  possession of the United Kingdom in the  americas  .
Spelt , also known as dinkel wheat , or hulled wheat , is an ancient species of wheat from the fifth millennium BC .
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from  the  Bronze Age to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict crop in Central Europe and northern Spain and has found a new  मार्केट   as  a health food .
Spelt is sometimes considered a subspecies of the closely related species common wheat ( T. aestivum ) , in which case its botanical name is considered to  be  Triticum aestivum subsp . spelta .
It is a hexaploid  गेहूं  , which means  it  has six sets of  गुणसूत्रों  .
Sherlock Holmes (  or  ) is a fictional detective created by author and physician Sir Arthur Conan Doyle .
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities  किनारा  on the fantastic ,  holmes  is famous for his astute logical reasoning , his  क्षमता  to adopt almost any  भेस  , and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases .
holmes  , who first appeared in publication in 1887 , was  प्रदर्शित  in four novels and 56 short stories  .
The first novel , A Study  in  Scarlet , appeared in Beeton 's Christmas Annual in 1887 and the  दूसरी  , The Sign of the Four , in  lippincott  's  मासिक  Magazine in 1890 .
The character grew tremendously in popularity with  the  first series of short stories in  the  Strand Magazine  ,  beginning with A Scandal in Bohemia in 1891 ; further series of short stories and  दो   novels  published in serial  रूप   appeared  between then and 1927 .
The stories cover a period from around 1880 up to  1914  .
All but four stories are  narrated  by Holmes 's friend and biographer , Dr.  जॉन  H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` and `` The Lion 's Mane `` ) and two  अन्य  are  लिखा  in the  तीसरा  person ( `` The Mazarin Stone `` and  ``  His  पिछला  Bow `` ) .
in  two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual ``  और  `` The Gloria Scott `` ) , Holmes tells Watson the main story from his memories , while Watson becomes the narrator of the frame story .
The first and fourth novels , A Study in Scarlet and The Valley of Fear , each include a long interval of omniscient narration  recounting  events unknown to either Holmes or Watson .
The United States House of Representatives is one of the two houses of  the  United States Congress ( a  bicameral  legislature ) .
It is  अक्सर  referred to  as  the  हाउस  .
The other house is the Senate .
the  composition and powers of the House are established in Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major  शक्ति  of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire  देश   हालांकि  its bills  जरूर  also be passed by the  सीनेट  and further agreed  to  by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority  in  each chamber ) .
the  House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills , to impeach officials , and to  elect  the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College .
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is entitled to at least one representative .
The most populous state ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , currently  रै  53  प्रतिनिधि  .
The total number of voting representatives is  फिक्स्ड  by law at 435 .
प्रत्येक   प्रतिनिधि  serves for a two-year term .
The Speaker of the United States House of  प्रतिनिधि  , who presides  over  the chamber , is elected by the members of the  हाउस  , and is therefore traditionally the leader of the  हाउस  Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House meets in the south wing of the  संयुक्त  States Capitol  .
jell-o  is a brand name belonging to U.S.-based Kraft  भोजन  for a number  of  gelatin  desserts  , including fruit gels , puddings and no-bake cream pies .
The brand 's popularity has led to it being used as a generic term  लिये  gelatin dessert across the U.S. and Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park located in West Mifflin , Pennsylvania , a suburb of Pittsburgh .
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` trolley park '' attraction  at  the end of  the   mellon  family 's Monongahela Street Railway .
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew McSwigan and thus began the Kennywood Entertainment company  कि  has remained a closely held family business for over 100 years .
इस  traditional amusement park still has structures and rides dating back  to  its opening and the early 1900s .
Along with Rye Playland Park , it is one of only two amusement parks listed in the National Register of Historic Places .
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment Company , which until December 2007 was a closely held family business owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families .
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace Entertainment , a subsidiary of Parques  reunidos  , an international amusement park company based  in  Madrid , Spain .
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover Investments , an investment fund based in  the  UK .
A Social Security card issued by the Railroad Retirement Board in 1943 to a now deceased person .
In the United States , a Social Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number issued to U.S. citizens , permanent residents  ,   और  temporary ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social  सुरक्षा  Act , codified as  .
The number is issued to an individual by the Social  सुरक्षा  Administration , an independent agency of the United States government  .
Its primary purpose is to track individuals for Social Security  उद्देश्य  .
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying  on  Form SS-5 , `` Application for A Social Security Number Card  ''  .
Minimalism  describes  movements in various forms of art  और  design , especially  विज़ुअल  art and music  ,  where the work is set out to expose the essence  or  identity  of  a subject through eliminating all non-essential  फ़ॉर्म  , features or concepts .
Minimalism is any design or  स्टाइल  in which the simplest and fewest elements are used to create  the  maximum effect .
As a specific  गति  in the arts it is identified with developments in post–World War II Western Art ,  सबसे  strongly with American visual arts in the  1960s  and early 1970s .
Prominent artists  संबद्ध  with this movement include Donald Judd , John McCracken ,  agnes  Martin , Dan Flavin , Robert Morris , Anne Truitt ,  और  Frank Stella .
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism , and is  प्रायः  interpreted as  a  reaction against Abstract expressionism and a bridge to Postminimal art practices .
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in music which features repetition and  iteration  ,  as  in the compositions of  la  Monte Young , Terry Riley ,  स्टीव   reich  , Philip Glass ,  और  John Adams .
Minimalist compositions are sometimes known as systems music .
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything that is spare or stripped to  इसके  essentials .
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett , the films of Robert Bresson , the  कहानियां  of Raymond  carver   ,  and even  the  automobile designs of Colin Chapman .
The word was first used in English in the early 20th century  to  describe the Mensheviks .
In chemistry and physics , Dalton 's law ( also called Dalton 's law of  आंशिक  pressures ) states that the total pressure exerted by  the  mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to  the  sum of  the  partial pressures of individual gases .
This empirical law was observed by  जॉन  Dalton in  1801  and is related to the ideal gas laws .
Mathematically , the pressure of a mixture of gases can be defined  as  the  संकलन
or
where represent the partial pressure of each component .
it  is assumed  कि  the gases do not react with each other
where  is  the mole fraction of the i-th  घटक   in  the total mixture of n components .
The relationship below provides a way to determine the volume based concentration of any individual gaseous component
where is the concentration of the i-th component  expressed  in ppm .
Dalton 's law  is  not exactly followed by real gases .
Those deviations are considerably large at high pressures .
In such conditions , the volume occupied by the molecules can become significant compared to the  फ़्री  space between them .
In particular , the  छोटी  average distances between molecules  उठाता  the intensity of intermolecular forces between gas molecules enough to  substantially  change the  दबाव  exerted  by  them .
Neither of those effects  हैं   माना  by the ideal gas model .
This is a list of the largest United States colleges and universities by enrollment for colleges and universities in the United States .
What this list includes:
Colleges and universities within the United States
University systems if the system is run under a single administration
Enrollment is the sum of the headcount of undergraduate and graduate students
Enrollment is counted by the Integrated Post-secondary Education System within the U.S. Department of Education .
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount , indicating the number of unique students who attended the  विश्वविद्यालयों  during the year .
What this list does not include:
कोई  indication of how many of the enrolled students are full  or  part  समय  ( e.g. , some universities may have a high enrollment , but have most students enrolled in only  a  single class )
For  अन्य  lists that measure university enrollment  ,  see the See Also section below .
`` Right Round  ''  is a song performed by American rapper Flo Rida , released  as  the lead single from his second studio album , R.O.O.T.S . ( 2009 ) .
The song features guest vocals from Kesha  .
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was digitally released on 10 February by Poe Boy Entertainment and Atlantic  रिकॉर्ड  .
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's net ball referee enthusiasm  ,  while adapting the chorus of the 1984 Dead or Alive song `` You Spin Me Round ( Like  a  Record ) `` in its  आँकड़ा  .
According to one of the song 's  लेखक  , the chorus refers to oral sex .
kesha  contributed guest  vocals  to the song ,  लकिन  in the United States , during the run atop the chart , Kesha  थी  uncredited .
The song received mostly negative reviews from  आलोचकों  , who claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic .
However , it was a commercial success ,  reaching  the top ten  of  the charts in nineteen countries worldwide .
In the United States , it became Flo Rida 's  दूसरी  number-one single and broke the record for first-week sales when it was released to digital retailers .
The single 's accompanying music video was directed by Malcolm Jones  और  nominated for an MTV Video Music Award .
The  सोंग  has been used  in  several  फिल्मों  ,  ऐसे  as The Hangover  ,  The Ugly Truth and  the  Telugu  फिल्म  Pilla Zamindar .
In  the  movie Pitch Perfect , the song is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers  .
The  मुख्य  Justice of the United States is the head of the United States federal  अदालत  system ( the judicial branch of the federal government  of  the United  राज्य  )  और  the chief judge of  the  Supreme Court of the United States .
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are  the  Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of  the  United States .
From 1789 until  1866  , the office was known as the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court .
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer in the  देश  , and acts as  a  chief  प्रशासनिक  officer for the federal courts  और  as head of the Judicial Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts .
The Chief Justice also serves as  a  spokesperson for  the  judicial branch .
The  मुख्य  Justice leads the business of the Supreme Court .
He presides over oral arguments before the court .
When  the  court renders an opinion , the Chief Justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the  अदालत  's opinion .
The  मुख्य  Justice also has significant agenda-setting power over the court 's meetings .
In the case of an impeachment  of  a President of the United States , which has occurred twice , the Chief Justice presides over the  विचारण  in the Senate .
In modern tradition , the Chief Justice has the ceremonial duty of administering the oath of office of the President of the United States .
the   पहला   मुख्य  Justice was John Jay .
The 17th and current  मुख्य  Justice is John G. Roberts ,  jr  .
Caribou  निकट  Prudhoe Bay , 1973
prudhoe  Bay Oil Field is a large oil field on  अलास्का  's North Slope .
It is the largest oil field in both the United States and in North America , covering and originally containing approximately  of  oil .
The amount of recoverable oil in the field is more than double that of the next largest field in the United States ,  the  East Texas oil field .
The field is operated  by  BP ; partners are ExxonMobil and ConocoPhillips Alaska  .
Labor unions are legally recognized as representatives of workers in many industries in the  संयुक्त  States .
Their activity today centers on collective bargaining over wages , benefits , and working conditions for their membership , and on representing their members in disputes with management over violations  of  contract provisions .
Larger unions also typically engage in lobbying activities and electioneering at the state and  संघीय  level .
Most unions in America are aligned with one  of  two larger umbrella organizations : the AFL-CIO created in 1955 , and the Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
Both advocate policies and legislation on behalf of workers in the United States and Canada , and take an  क्रियाशील  role  in  politics .
the  AFL-CIO is especially concerned with global trade issues .
In 2010 , the percentage of  मजदूर  belonging to a union in  the  United States ( or total labor union `` density '' ) was 11.4 % , compared to 18.4 % in Germany , 27.5 % in Canada , and 70 % in Finland .
संघ  membership in the private sector has fallen under 7 % — levels not  देखी  since 1932 .
Unions allege that employer-incited  विपक्ष  has contributed to this decline in membership  .
The most  prominent  unions are among public  सेक्टर  employees such as teachers and police .
Members of  संघ  are disproportionately older , male and residents of the Northeast  ,  the  मिडवेस्ट  , and  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Union workers average 10-30 % higher  अदा  than non-union in America after controlling for individual ,  जॉब  , and labor market characteristics .
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s , American  संघ  remain a prominent political factor , both through mobilization of their own memberships and through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant rights , trade  नीति  ,  स्वास्थ्य  care , and living wage campaigns .
To fight alleged employer  anti-union  programs  ,  unions are currently advocating new `` card check `` federal legislation that would require employers to bargain with a union if more than 50 % of workers signed forms , or `` cards , '' stating they wish to be represented by that union  .
The current procedure  involves  waiting 45 to 90 days for a federally supervised secret-ballot employee  referendum  on the subject .
The economist Joseph Stiglitz  रै   asserted  that ,  ``  Strong unions  have  helped to reduce  असमानता   ,   whereas  weaker unions have made it easier for  ceos  , sometimes working with market forces that they have helped shape  ,  to increase it . ''
The decline in  unionization  since WWII in the United States has  महरूम  associated with a pronounced rise in income and wealth inequality .
A Christian Lacroix fashion boutique
A boutique is a small shopping  आउटलेट  , especially one that specializes in elite and fashionable items such  as  clothing and jewelry .
The word is  फ्रेंच  for  ``  shop '' , via Latin from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ) ,  ``  storehouse '' .
The term entered into everyday English use in the late 1960s when , for a brief period , London was the centre of the fashion trade .
carnaby  Street  और  the Kings Road  यहूद  the  फ़ोकस  of much media attention as home to the most fashionable  boutiques  of the era .
Now the East of London  रै  been regenerated  और  more  boutiques  pop up in fashionable areas , such as Tower Bridge Road .
it  can also refer to a specialised firm such as a boutique investment bank or boutique law firm .
The word  is  often  प्रयुक्त  to  describe  a  प्रॉपर्टी  in the independent section of the hotel market ( such as The Rockwell in London ) in order to distinguish  themselves  from larger chains ( such  as  Hilton Hotels ) .
In such cases the establishments aim to convey the idea that the operation is elite and highly specialised .
In the strictest sense of the word , boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but  अधिक  generally speaking ,  कुछ  chains can be referred  to   as  boutiques if they specialize in particular styles .
Recently , the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or produced in intentionally small  संख्याएँ  at very high prices .
This may be referred to as boutique manufacturing  .
For example ,  पहले  the release of the  वी  , a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` boutique video-game company '' , producing games for niche audiences , rather than trying to compete directly  साथ   microsoft  and  सोनी  .
In  the   परंपरागत  luxury-  देखें  industry Scalfaro  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  is considered as the precursor in manufacturing and sale of bespoke watches .
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique manufacturing site , which allows producing small  श्रेणी  or even unique timepieces .
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and other truly one-of-a-kind  वस्तुएं  ,  अन्य  simply produce t-shirts , stickers , and other fashion accessories in artificially  छोटी  runs and sell them at unusually high prices  .
In the early  1990s  Selena started manufacturing  उसके  own line of women 's clothing .
Opening  दो  boutiques labeled  as  `` Selena Etc . Boutique & Salon '' One located in Corpus Christi and one located in San Antonio , Texas .
One was due to open in Monterrey , Mexico , in  1995  but due to her death it was not opened .
Around 1999 the  सैन  Antonio location closed and the Corpus Christi  स्थान  was closed in 2009 .
In late 1990s  कुछ  European retail traders  विकसित   the  idea  of  tailoring a shop towards a  जीवनशैली  theme , in the form of `` concept  स्टोर्स  '' , which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments .
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in  मिलान  , Italy followed  by  Colette in Paris  और  Quartier 206 in Berlin .
Several well-known American  जंजीरों  such as Urban Outfitters , D-A-S-H , and The  गैप  ,  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  chain Billabong and , though  कम  common , Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000 .
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or  नेवी  Federal  )  is a credit  संघ  headquartered  in  Vienna  ,  Virginia , chartered and regulated under  the  authority of the National Credit Union  प्रशासन  ( NCUA ) of the U.S.  संघीय  government .
Navy Federal  is  the largest natural member ( or retail ) credit union in the world , both in asset size and  in  membership .
As of September 2012 , Navy Federal had over  $  50 billion USD  in  assets , and over 4 million members .
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13 , 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ) , known  by   उसके   स्टेज  name Stevie Wonder , is an American singer ,  songwriter   ,  and multi-instrumentalist  ,  a child prodigy who developed into  एक  of the most creative musical figures of the late 20th century .
Blind since shortly after birth , Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla label at the age of eleven , and continues to perform and record for  motown  to this day  .
Among Wonder 's best known  works   हैं  singles such as `` Superstition `` , ``  सर  Duke `` , `` You  हैं  the Sunshine of  my  Life `` and `` I Just Called to Say I Love You  ``  .
Well known albums also include Talking Book , Innervisions and Songs in the Key of Life .
He has recorded more than thirty U.S. top ten hits and received twenty-two Grammy Awards , the most ever awarded to a male solo artist .
अचरज  is also noted for his  कार्य  as an activist for political causes , including his 1980 campaign to make  मार्टिन  Luther  किंग  , Jr. 's  जन्मदिवस   a  holiday in the United States .
In 2009 , Wonder was named a  संयुक्त  Nations Messenger of Peace .
In 2008  ,  Billboard magazine released a list  of  the Hot 100 All-Time Top Artists  to  celebrate the US singles chart 's fiftieth anniversary , with Wonder  at  number five .
By  लोकप्रिय  vote , Stevie was inducted into The SoulMusic Hall of Fame at SoulMusic.com in December 2012 .
Psychosis ( from  the   यूनानी   ψυχή  `` psyche '' , for mind/soul ,  और  -ωσις `` -osis '' , for abnormal condition or derangement ) refers to  an  abnormal  कंडीशन  of the mind , and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving  a  `` loss of contact with reality `` .
People suffering from psychosis are described  as  psychotic .
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of  मनोरोग   विकार  , during which hallucinations and delusions , gross excitement or stupor and impaired insight may occur .
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can  औसत  anything from relatively normal aberrant experiences through to the complex and catatonic  expressions  of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder  .
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases , from both external substances and internal physiologic illness , can produce symptoms of  मनस्ताप  .
This led many professionals to say that psychosis is not  विशिष्ट  enough as  a   निदान  term .
Despite this , `` psychosis ''  is  generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( negative signs ) and more commonly to diverse types of  मति  or delusional beliefs ( e.g . grandiosity , delusions of persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting  बहुत  obvious  लक्षण  may  be  described as `` frankly psychotic '' , whereas one exhibiting very subtle signs could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk  सिंड्रोम  '' .
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive symptoms of psychosis , especially those of schizophrenia .
This is thought to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience of environmental  stimuli  .
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled trials of these drugs , however , show either no significant difference between drug and placebo  ,  or a very small effect size , suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis  is  much  अधिक  complex than an overactive  dopamine  system .
People experiencing  मनस्ताप  may exhibit some personality changes and thought disorder .
Depending on its severity , this may be accompanied by unusual or bizarre behavior , as well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities .
General  grievous  is a fictional character in the Star Wars universe .
a  recurring antagonist ,  he  is the Supreme Commander  of  the Confederacy of Independent Systems , a political faction of planetary systems waging war on the Galactic Republic .
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat  by   गिनती  Dooku , he is a ruthless and powerful warrior devoted to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars .
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi body count would prompt the galaxy to give him the nickname the Knightslayer .
Though  the   बदनाम  Jedi slayer was the  होने   in  the galaxy during the Clone Wars who  था   मारे  the most Jedi  in  single  कॉम्बैट   ,  he did  नहीं  hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would lose  .
Statistics play an important role in summarizing baseball performance and evaluating  खिलाड़ी  in the sport .
Since the  प्रवाह  of a baseball game has  प्राकृतिक  breaks to it , and normally  खिलाड़ी  act individually rather than performing  in  clusters  ,  the sport lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics .
Statistics  have  been kept for professional baseball since the  सृष्टि  of  the  National League and American League ,  अभी  part of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major League Baseball  ,  from leagues such as the National Association of Professional Base Ball  खिलाड़ी  and the Negro Leagues .
Dorothea Lange 's Migrant Mother depicts destitute pea pickers in California , centering on Florence Owens Thompson ,  आयु  32 , a  माँ  of seven children , in Nipomo , California , March 1936 .
USA annual real GDP from 1910–60 , with the years of the Great Depression (  1929–1939  ) highlighted .
The unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960  ,  with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression was a  कठोर  worldwide economic depression in the decade preceding World War  ii  .
The  समय  of the Great Depression varied across nations , but in most countries it started  in  1930 and lasted until  the  late 1930s or middle 1940s .
it  was the longest , most widespread , and deepest depression of the 20th century .
In the  21st  century , the Great Depression is commonly used as an example of how far the world 's  अर्थव्यवस्था  can decline .
The depression originated in the  u.S.  , after the fall in stock prices that began around September 4 , 1929 , and became  विश्वव्यापी  news with the stock market crash of  अक्तूबर  29  ,   1929  ( known as Black  मंगलवार  ) .
The  ग्रेट  Depression had devastating effects in countries rich and poor .
Personal income , tax revenue , profits and prices dropped , while international trade plunged by more than 50 % .
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25 % , and in some countries rose as high as 33 % .
Cities all around the world were  hit  hard , especially  those  dependent on heavy industry .
Construction was virtually halted in many countries .
Farming and rural areas suffered as crop prices fell by approximately 60 % .
Facing  plummeting  demand with few alternate sources of jobs , areas dependent on primary  सेक्टर  industries such as cash cropping ,  खनन  and logging suffered the most  .
Some economies started to recover by the mid-1930s .
In many countries , the negative effects  of  the Great Depression lasted until the end  of  World War  ii  .
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ) ,  भी  known as a premature  ventricular  complex , ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ) , ventricular premature beat (  vpb  ) , or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ) , is a  अपेक्षाकृत  common event where the heartbeat  is  initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles  बल्कि  than by  the  sinoatrial node  ,  the normal heartbeat initiator .
The electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a PVC to  be  easily distinguished from a normal heart beat .
A PVC may be perceived as a `` skipped beat `` or felt as palpitations in the chest .
In a normal heartbeat ,  the  ventricles contract after the atria have helped to fill  उन्हें  by contracting ; in  इस  way the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both  to  the lungs and  to   the  rest  of  the body .
In a PVC , the  ventricles  contract  पहला  and  पहले  the  atria  have optimally  भर  the ventricles with  रक्त   ,  which means  कि   परिसंचरण  is inefficient .
However , single beat PVC arrhythmias do not usually pose a  खतरे  and can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals .
William Gary Busey (  born  June 29 , 1944 ) , better known as Gary  busey  , is an American film and  स्टेज  actor , and artist .
He has appeared in  a  variety of films , including Lethal Weapon , Point Break , and Under Siege  ,  as well as guest appearances on Gunsmoke , Walker , Texas Ranger , Law & Order , and Entourage .
He  थी  nominated for an Academy  पुरस्कार  for Best Actor in  1978  for his role in The  दोस्त  Holly  स्टोरी  .
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement  (  ACTA  )   ,  is a multinational treaty for the purpose of establishing international standards for intellectual  प्रॉपर्टी  rights enforcement .
The agreement aims to establish an international  विधिक  framework for  लक्ष्यीकरण  counterfeit goods , generic medicines and copyright infringement on the Internet , and  होता  create a new governing body outside existing forums ,  ऐसे  as the  संसार   व्यापार  Organization ,  the  World Intellectual Property Organization , or the United Nations .
The agreement was signed in  अक्तूबर  2011 by Australia , Canada , Japan , Morocco , New Zealand , Singapore , South Korea ,  और  the United States .
In 2012 , Mexico , the European Union and 22 countries which are member states of the European Union signed as well .
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved  )  the agreement , which would come into force in countries that ratified it after ratification by  छह  countries .
Supporters  have  described the agreement as a response to ``  the  increase in global trade  of  counterfeit goods  और  pirated copyright protected works '' .
Trades Unions representing workers in the music  ,  film and  tv  industries and large intellectual property-based organizations such as the Motion Picture Association of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America were active in the  सन्धि  's development .
Opponents say  the  convention adversely  affects  fundamental rights including freedom of expression and privacy .
ACTA has also been  criticised  by Doctors Without Borders for endangering  अभिगम  to medicines  in  developing countries .
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups , developing countries and the general public  इससे  the agreement 's negotiation process and it  रै  been described as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic  frontier   न्यास  and the Entertainment Consumers Association .
The  हस्ताक्षर  of the EU and many of its member states resulted in the resignation in protest of the European Parliament 's appointed chief  अन्वेषक  , rapporteur Kader Arif , as well as widespread protests  आरपार  Europe .
in  2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur , British MEP David  मार्टिन  , recommended against the treaty , stating :  ``  The intended benefits of this  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  agreement are  दूर  outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties '' .
On 4 July 2012 , the  यूरोपीय  Parliament rejected the agreement in plenary session ,  साथ  478 voting against the treaty , 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining .
FAW semi-trailer truck in China
Tractor with  पक्ष  dump trailer semi-trailer
A tractor  साथ   an  auto-transport semi-trailer .
Semi-trailer truck with sleeper behind the  टैक्सी  .
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated  गाडी  that  consists  of a towing  इंजन   ,  known as a tractor in  the  United States and truck in many  अन्य  places , attached to one  or  more semi-trailers to carry freight .
It is also known  as  a transport in Canada , prime mover in Australia ,  सेमी  , tractor-trailer , truck and trailer  ,   ट्रांसफ़र  truck ,  18-wheeler  , mack truck , big rig in  the  United States  ,  or artic  ,  short for  articulated   लारी  , in Britain  और  Ireland  .
A semi-trailer  करता  not trail completely behind the towing vehicle , but is attached at a point that is just forward  of  the rear-most axle of the  towing  unit .
This is done so that a fraction of the weight of the trailer  is  carried by the prime mover .
This arrangement means that both tractor  और  semi-trailer will  have  a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer .
The Pittsburgh Steelers  हैं  a professional football team based in Pittsburgh  ,  Pennsylvania .
The team currently belongs to the North  प्रभाग  of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Founded in  ,  the Steelers are the oldest franchise in  the  AFC .
Pittsburgh  रै  won  अधिक  Super Bowl titles ( six ) , won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in ( fifteen ) and hosted more ( eleven )  सम्मेलन  championship  खेल  than any other AFC or  nfc  team .
The Steelers share the record for most Super Bowl appearances with the Dallas  cowboys  ( eight ) .
The Steelers won their most recent championship , Super Bowl XLIII , on February 1 , 2009 .
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8 , 1933 , by Art Rooney , taking its original name from the  बेसबॉल  team of the same  नाम  , as was common practice for NFL  टीमों   to  do at the time .
The  स्वामित्व  of the  स्टीलर्स  has remained within the Rooney family since its founding .
The current owner is Art 's  बेटे  , Dan Rooney , who has given  much  control of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II .
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams , the Steelers enjoy a large , widespread fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation .
The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz Field  on  Pittsburgh 's  उत्तर  Side in the  उत्तर  Shore neighborhood , which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh  पैंथर्स  .
Built in 2001 , the stadium replaced Three Rivers Stadium which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons .
Prior to  तीन  Rivers  ,  the Steelers had played their games in  pitt  Stadium and Forbes Field  .
Three different kinds of wheat and rye  आटा
Flour is a powder which is made by  पीस  cereal grains , or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ) .
It is the  प्रमुख   संघटक  of bread , which is a staple food for many cultures ,  बनाना  the availability of adequate supplies of flour a major economic  और  political issue  at   विभिन्न  times throughout history .
Wheat flour  is   एक  of the most important foods in European , North American , Middle Eastern , Indian and North  अफ़्रीकी  cultures , and is the defining ingredient in most of their styles  of  breads and pastries .
While wheat is the most common base for flour , corn flour has been important in Mesoamerican cuisine since ancient times , and remains a staple throughout  the  Americas .
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of central Europe , and rice can  भी  be used in flour , though  इस  is relatively  uncommon  .
Heart rate is the number of heartbeats per unit of time , typically expressed  as  beats  प्रति  minute ( bpm ) .
Heart rate can vary as the body  's  need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide changes ,  ऐसे  as during physical exercise , sleep , illness , or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system stimulants such as  amphetamines  increase heart rate .
Central nervous  प्रणाली  depressants or sedatives  decreases  the heart rate ( apart from some particularly strange ones with equally strange effects , such  as  ketamine which can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such  as  tachycardia ) .
There are many ways in which the heart rate  speeds  up or slows down .
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the brain , many  of   जिससे  are those that  हैं  'forced'/'enticed ' out by the  ingestion  and processing of drugs .
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume , one of the physiological ways to deliver more oxygen  to  an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the  अंग  more often .
Normal resting heart rates range from 60-100 bpm .
Bradycardia is defined as a  resting  heart rate below 60 bpm .
However ,  दिल  rates from  50  to 60  bpm  are common among healthy people and do not necessarily require special attention .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm , though persistent rest rates between 80-100 bpm , mainly if they are present during sleep , may be signs  of  hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ) .
Catherine II 's carved , painted and gilded Coronation Coach ( Hermitage Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle  लिये  people , usually horse-drawn ; litters  (  palanquins ) and sedan chairs are excluded , since they are wheelless vehicles .
The carriage is especially designed for  निजी   यात्री  use and for comfort or elegance , though some are also used to transport goods .
It may be light  ,   smart  and fast or heavy , large and comfortable  .
Carriages normally  have  suspension using leaf springs , elliptical springs ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping .
A  पब्लिक  passenger vehicle would not  प्रायः  be called a carriage  –  terms for such include stagecoach , charabanc and omnibus .
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) cart share important parts of the  इतिहास   of  the carriage , as is the fast  (  two-wheeled ) chariot .
The 2004 Indian  समंदर  earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake that  occurred  at 00:58:53 UTC on Sunday , 26 December 2004 , with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra , Indonesia .
The quake itself is known by the scientific community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake .
the  resulting tsunami was  दिए  various names , including the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami , South Asian  सुनामी  , Indonesian tsunami , and the Boxing Day tsunami .
The earthquake was caused by subduction and triggered a series of devastating tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean  ,  killing over 230,000 people in fourteen countries , and inundating coastal communities with  लहरें  up  to  high .
It was  एक  of the deadliest natural disasters in recorded history .
Indonesia was  the  hardest-hit country , followed by Sri Lanka , India , and Thailand .
साथ  a magnitude of Mw 9.1–9.3 , it  is  the  तीसरा  largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph .
The earthquake had  the  longest duration of faulting ever observed , between  8.3  and 10 minutes .
It caused the entire planet to vibrate as much as  और  triggered other earthquakes as far away as Alaska .
Its epicentre was between Simeulue and mainland Indonesia  .
the  plight of the affected people and countries prompted a worldwide humanitarian response .
In all , the worldwide community donated more  than  $ 14 billion ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid .
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland .
Geothermal energy is thermal energy generated and stored in the Earth .
थर्मल  energy is the energy that determines the temperature of matter .
the  Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive  क्षय  of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its surface , drives a continuous conduction of  थर्मल  energy in the form  of  heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη  (  ge ) , meaning earth , and θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning  hot  .
At the core of the Earth  ,  thermal energy is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
Heat conducts from  the  core to surrounding cooler rock .
The high temperature and  दबाव  cause some rock to melt  ,   बनाना  magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid  चट्टान  .
The magma heats rock and water in  the  crust , sometimes  up  to 370 °C ( 700 °F  )   .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used for bathing  चूंकि  Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide  ,  about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in  24  countries  .
An additional 28 gigawatts of  सीधा  geothermal  हीटिंग  capacity is installed  लिये  district heating ,  स्पेस  heating , spas , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal power is cost effective , reliable , sustainable , and environmentally friendly  ,  but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent  technological  advances have dramatically expanded the range and size  of  viable resources , especially for applications such as home heating , opening a potential for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases  फंस  deep within the earth ,  लकिन   ये  emissions are much lower per energy unit than those of  चट्टान  fuels .
As a result , geothermal power has  the  potential to help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply  मानवता  's energy needs , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and exploration for  गहन  resources is very expensive .
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions about technology , energy prices  ,  subsidies , and interest rates .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green  शक्ति  Program show that  ग्राहक  would be willing to pay a little more for a renewable  उर्जा  source like geothermal .
But as a result of government assisted research  और   उद्योग   अनुभव  , the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 , geothermal energy cost between two and ten cents per kwh .
The term cubic foot  is  an Imperial  और  US customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume , used in  the  United States and the United  किंगडम  .
It  is  defined as the volume of a cube with sides of one foot (  0.3048  m ) in length .
To calculate  घन  feet multiply length X width  x  height  .
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern  वियतनामी  pronunciation : , Southern Vietnamese  उच्चारण  : ) ;  19  May  1890  – 2 September  1969  ) , born  nguyễn  Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất Thành  और  Nguyễn Ái Quốc , was a Vietnamese communist revolutionary leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955  )  and president ( 1945–1969  )  of the Democratic Republic  of   वियतनाम  ( North Vietnam ) .
He  थी  a key figure  in  the foundation  of  the Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945 , as  खूब  as  the  People’s Army of Vietnam  (  PAVN ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC  )  during the Vietnam War .
He led the Việt Minh independence movement  इससे  1941 onward , establishing the communist -ruled Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ .
He officially stepped down from power in 1955 due to health  समस्याएं  , but remained a highly visible figurehead and inspiration for those Vietnamese fighting for his  cause—a  united ,  कम्युनिस्ट  Vietnam—until his death  .
After  the  war ,  साइगॉन  , capital of the Republic of  वियतनाम  , was renamed Hồ Chí Minh City .
All Roads Lead Home is a feature film released on September 26 , 2008 .
Directed by Dennis  fallon  , it stars Peter Boyle , Patton Oswalt , Jason London , Vivien Cardone  ,   वैनेसा  Branch , Peter Coyote  ,   स्टीफन  Milton , and Allan Kayser .
The movie was filmed in and around Kansas City , Missouri .
The movie made its World Premiere January 27 at the  सांता  Barbara  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   फिल्मी  Festival .
The film has also recently been  in  several film festivals , and has received bad reviews .
पीटर  Boyle died before the  फिल्म  's release .
It was the last movie he appeared in  .
Sales taxes in the United States are taxes placed on  the  sale or lease  of  goods and services in the United States  .
While no national general sales tax exists ,  the   संघीय  government levies several national selective sales taxes on the sale  or  lease of  particular  goods and services .
Furthermore , forty-five states , the District of Columbia , and Guam impose general sales taxes  कि  apply to the sale  or  lease of most goods and some  सेवाएं   ,  and states also may  लेवी  selective  बिक्री  taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services .
States may also delegate to  लोकल  governments the authority to impose additional  सामान्य  or selective sales taxes .
Sales tax is calculated by multiplying the purchase  दाम  by the applicable  कर  rate .
Tax rates vary widely by  क्षेत्राधिकार  and range from less than 1 % to  over   10  % .
Sales tax is collected by the seller at the time of sale .
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who  रै  not paid sales tax on a taxable purchase .
Unlike  the  value added tax , a sales tax is imposed only once , at the retail level .
However , in cases where  वस्तुएं   हैं  sold at retail more than once , such as used cars ,  the  sales tax can be charged on the  वही  item indefinitely .
The definition of retail sales and what  goods  and services are taxable vary among the states .
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous categories of goods and services that are exempt from sales tax , or taxed at reduced rates .
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale is uniformly exempt from sales tax .
Most jurisdictions  exempt  food sold in grocery  स्टोर्स   ,  prescription medications , and  अनेक  agricultural supplies .
Sales taxes  ,  including those imposed by local governments , are generally administered at the state level .
States imposing sales tax require retail sellers to collect tax from customers , file returns , and remit the tax to the state .
Procedural rules vary  widely  .
Sellers generally must collect tax from in-state purchasers  जबतक  the purchaser provides an exemption certificate .
Most states  allow  or require electronic remittance .
A central processing unit  (  CPU ) , also referred to as a central processor unit ,  is  the hardware within  a  computer that  carries  out  the  instructions  of  a computer  कार्यक्रम   by  performing the basic arithmetical , logical , and input/output operations of the system .
The  पद  has  महरूम  in use in the computer industry at least since the early 1960s .
the  form , design , and implementation of CPUs have changed over the course of their history , but their fundamental  आपरेशन  remains much the same  .
A computer can have more than one CPU ; this is called multiprocessing .
Some integrated  circuits  ( ICs ) can contain multiple CPUs on a single chip  ;  those ICs are called multi-core processors .
Two typical components of a CPU are the  गणित  logic unit ( ALU ) , which performs arithmetic and logical  परिचालन  , and the control unit ( CU ) , which extracts instructions from memory and decodes and executes them , calling  on  the ALU when necessary .
Not all computational systems rely on a central  प्रसंस्करण  unit .
An array  प्रोसेसर  or vector processor has multiple  समानांतर  computing elements , with no  एक   ईकाई  considered the ``  बीच  '' .
In the distributed  कम्प्यूटिंग  model , problems are solved by a distributed interconnected set of  processors  .
RFID chip next  to  a grain of rice .
This chip contains  a  radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification  क्रमांक  when queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer products , and implanted in  पालतु   ,  for identification purposes .
Radio-frequency  पहचान  ( RFID  )  is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data , for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached  to   वस्तुएँ  .
The  टैग  contain electronically stored  सूचना  .
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a  few  meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction )  .
Others use a  लोकल  power source  ऐसे  as a  बैटरी  , or  else  have no  बैटरी  but collect energy from the interrogating EM field ,  और   तब  act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e.  ,  electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery  संचालित  tags may operate at hundreds of meters .
Unlike a  बार  code , the tag  करता   नहीं  necessarily need to be within line of sight of the  रीडर   ,  and may be embedded  in  the tracked object .
RFID tags are used in many industries .
an  RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to track its progress  through  the assembly line .
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses .
Livestock and pets may have tags  injected  , allowing positive identification of the animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing ,  possessions  , or even implanted within people , the possibility of reading personally-linked  सूचना  without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Overtime is the amount of time someone works  परे  normal working hours .
Normal hours may be determined in several ways:
by custom ( what is considered healthy  or  reasonable by society ) ,
by practices of a given trade or profession,
by legislation,
by  अनुबंध  between employers  और  workers or their representatives .
Most  राष्ट्र  have overtime  मजदूर  laws designed to dissuade or prevent employers from forcing their employees  to  work excessively long hours .
These  कानून  may take into account  अन्य  considerations than the humanitarian , such as preserving the health of workers so that they may  continue  to be productive  ,  or  increasing  the overall level of employment in the economy .
One common approach  to  regulating overtime is to require employers  to  pay workers at a higher hourly rate for overtime  कार्य  .
Companies may choose to  अदा  workers higher overtime pay even if not obliged to do  so  by  विधि   ,  particularly  if  they believe that they face a  पिछड़ा  bending  सप्लाई  curve of labour .
ओवरटाइम   अदा  rates can cause workers to work longer hours than they would at a flat hourly rate .
Overtime laws , attitudes toward overtime and hours  of  work vary greatly from country to country and between different economic sectors  .
Visualization of links between pages on a  विक  using a force-directed layout .
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a class of algorithms for drawing graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way .
Their purpose is  to  position the nodes  of  a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few  क्रासिंग  edges as possible , by assigning forces among the set of edges  और  the set of nodes , based on their relative positions , and then using these forces either to simulate  the  motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize  उनके  energy .
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem  ,  force-directed algorithms , being physical simulations , usually require no special knowledge about  आलेख  theory such as planarity .
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for  महंगाई  ) is the amount of goods or services that can  be   खरीदा  with  a  unit of  करेंसी  .
For example , if you had taken one dollar to a store in the 1950s , you would have been able to buy a greater number of items than you would today , indicating that you  होता   have  had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s  .
Currency can be either a commodity money ,  जैसे  gold or silver , or fiat currency ,  or  free-floating market-valued currency  जैसे   us  dollars .
As Adam Smith noted , having money gives one the ability to `` command  ''  others ' labor , so purchasing power to some extent  is  power over  अन्य  people , to the extent that  वे  are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency .
If one 's monetary income  stays  the same , but the price level increases , the purchasing power of that income falls .
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's money income since  it  may rise  तेज़  than the price level .
A higher  रियल  income  अर्थात्  a higher purchasing power since real income refers to  the  income adjusted for inflation .
For a price index ,  इसके  value in the base year is usually normalized to a value of 100 .
The purchasing power of a unit  of  currency , say a dollar , in a  दिए  year , expressed in dollars of the base year , is 100/P , where P is the price index in that year .
So , by definition the purchasing power of a dollar decreases as the price level rises .
The  खरीदना  power in today 's money  of  an  राशि  C  of  money ,  t  years into the future , can be computed with the formula for the present value :
where in this case i is an assumed future annual inflation rate .
Education in South Korea is viewed as  होने  crucial for success  और  competition is consequently very heated and fierce .
A central administration oversees the process  लिये  the  शिक्षा  of children from kindergarten to the  तीसरा  and final year  of  high  स्कूल  .
Mathematics , science , Korean , English , and social  अध्ययन  are generally considered to  be  the most  महत्वपूर्ण  subjects .
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised  ,  by the generally academic elitist South Korean populace , as education and therefore many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics .
South Korea was the first country in the world to provide  high-speed  internet access to all primary , junior , and high schools .
Although South Korean students often rank  अत्यधिक  on international comparative  आकलन  when  compared  to students of most Western education systems ,  the  South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning  और  memorisation  .
the  South Korean education  प्रणाली  is rather notably strict and overly structured as  compared  to its counterparts in most Western societies .
Also , the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such  as  academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ) , which too emphasise on  passive  memorisation , as opposed to conceptual understanding , in students are criticised as a major social problem .
the   my  Lai Massacre ( , ; , , or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of  between  347 and 504 unarmed civilians in South Vietnam on March 16 , 1968 , by United States Army soldiers of `` Charlie  ''  Company of 1st Battalion , 20th Infantry Regiment , 11th Brigade of the Americal Division .
Victims included women , men , children  ,   और  infants .
Some of the women were  gang-raped  and their bodies were later found to  be  mutilated and  अनेक  women were  allegedly  raped prior  to  the killings .
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially  चार्ज  with criminal offenses for their actions at Mỹ Lai , only Second Lieutenant William Calley , a platoon leader in Charlie Company , was convicted .
Found guilty of killing 22  ग्रामीणों  , he  थी  originally given a life sentence , but  तभी  served three and a half years under house arrest .
The massacre took place in  the  hamlets of My Lai  और  My Khe  of  Son My village .
The event is also known as the Son My Massacre , especially in the Vietnamese state media .
The U.S. military codeword for the `` Viet Cong  stronghold  '' was  ``  Pinkville '' .
The incident prompted global outrage when it became public knowledge in 1969  .
The massacre also increased domestic opposition to the U.S. involvement in the Vietnam War .
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried  to   halt  the massacre and protect the wounded were initially  denounced  by several U.S . Congressmen as traitors .
They received  नफ़रत  mail and death threats  और   मिला   mutilated  animals on their doorsteps .
The three were later widely praised and decorated by the Army for their heroic actions .
The hijackers in the September  11  attacks were 19 men affiliated  साथ  al-Qaeda , and 15 of the 19 were citizens  of  Saudi Arabia .
Others were from Egypt , Lebanon , and the UAE .
The  hijackers  were organized into four teams  ,  each led by a pilot-trained hijacker with  चार  `` muscle hijackers '' who were  प्रशिक्षित  to help subdue  the   पायलटों  , passengers , and  क्रू  .
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States were Khalid  al-mihdhar  and Nawaf  al-hazmi  , who settled in  the  San Diego area in January 2000 .
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots , Mohamed Atta  ,  Marwan al-Shehhi , and Ziad Jarrah early in the summer of 2000 to undertake  उड़ान  training in south Florida .
The fourth hijacker-pilot , Hani Hanjour ,  arrived   in   सैन  Diego in December 2000 .
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the spring and early summer of 2001 , just months before the September 11 attacks .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn  ʿabd  Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim (  )  ( circa| 570  –  circa| 8 June 632  )  , also transliterated as Muhammad ( ) , was a religious , political ,  और  military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam .
He is believed by Muslims and Bahá'ís to be  a  messenger and prophet  of  God .
Muhammad is almost universally considered  by  Muslims as the  पिछला  prophet  भेजा  by God for mankind  .
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the  संस्थापक  of Islam  .
Muslims consider  उसे  to be the restorer  of  an unaltered original monotheistic  आस्था  of Adam  ,  Noah , Abraham  ,  Moses , Jesus , and other prophets  .
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca , he was  अनाथ  at an early  आयु  and brought up under the care of his uncle  abu  Talib .
He  बाद  worked mostly as a merchant  ,  as well as a shepherd , and  थी  first married by age 25 .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer , he later  reported  that it was there , at  आयु  40 , that he received his first revelation  इससे  God .
Three  सालो  after this event Muhammad started preaching  ये  revelations publicly , proclaiming that `` God is One  ``  , that complete `` surrender  ''  to Him (  lit  .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God , and that he himself was a prophet and  मेसेंजर  of  परमेश्वर   ,   in  the same vein as other Islamic prophets .
मुहम्मद  gained few followers early on , and was met with hostility from some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly .
To escape  persecution  , Muhammad sent some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in  the  year 622 .
This event  ,  the Hijra , marks the beginning of  the  Islamic calendar , which is also known  as  the Hijri Calendar .
In  मदीना  ,  मुहम्मद  united the tribes under the Constitution  of  Medina .
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes , his followers  ,  who by then had grown to 10,000 , took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his followers out to destroy all  of  the remaining  pagan  temples in Eastern Arabia .
in  632 , a few  महीने   बाद  returning to Medina from The Farewell  यात्राएं  , Muhammad fell ill and died .
By the time of his death ,  सबसे   of  the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam , and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The revelations ( or Ayah , lit .
``  लक्षण  [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported  receiving  until his death – form the verses of the Quran , regarded by Muslims as  the  `` Word of God '' and  around  which the religion is based .
Besides the  कुरान  , Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law .
वे  discuss Muhammad  और  other  नबियों  of Islam with reverence , adding the phrase  सलाम  be  upon  him whenever their names are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times  यहूद  largely negative , appraisals in modern history  have  been far less  so  .
This is a list of  टेबल  of the  सत्यापित   oldest  people in the world in ordinal rank , such as oldest person or oldest  man  .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his  or  her claim has been validated  by  an international  देह   कि  specifically  सौदे  in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is  कि  of Jeanne Calment  of  France ( 1875–1997 )  ,  who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She  मिले  Vincent van Gogh  जब  she was 12 or 13 .
इस  led to news media attention in 1985 , after Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age  ,  beyond  कोई   उचित  question , in the  रिकॉर्ड  of her native city , Arles ,  फ़्रांस  .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan  रै  been  उत्पादित  than for  कोई  other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura , who currently lives in Japan and is age as  of  .
Since the  मौत  of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States  ,  on 17 December 2012 , Kimura , born 19 April 1897 , is the oldest  जीना  person in the world whose age can be documented .
He has also been the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011 .
Since  the  death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 , the oldest living woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa , also  इससे  Japan , born on 5  कूच  1898  .
This is a timeline of the African-American Civil  अधिकारों  Movement .
The Civil Rights movement  थी  a  स्वतंत्रता  struggle by African Americans in  the  1950s and 1960s to  लाभ  equality .
The goals of  the  movement were freedom from discrimination , equal opportunity in employment , education and housing  ,  the right to  vote  and equal access to public  सुविधाएं  .
Heavy metal ( often  referred  to as metal ) is a genre of rock  म्यूज़िक  that developed in the late 1960s  और  early 1970s ,  largely  in the United Kingdom and in the United States .
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock , the bands that created heavy metal developed a thick , massive  ध्वनि  , characterized by  अत्यधिक  amplified distortion , extended guitar solos , emphatic beats , and  overall  loudness .
Heavy metal  गीत  and  प्रदर्शन  styles  हैं  generally associated with masculinity and machismo .
the   पहला   भारी  metal bands  ऐसे  as Led Zeppelin , Deep Purple and  ब्लैक   sabbath  attracted large audiences , though they  यहूद  often derided by critics ,  a  status  आम  throughout the history of the genre .
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur  the  genre 's evolution by discarding much of  इसके  blues influence  ;  Motörhead introduced a punk rock  sensibility  and an increasing  जोर  on speed .
Bands in the New Wave of British Heavy Metal such  as  Iron Maiden  followed  in a similar  रग  .
Before the end of the  दशक  ,  भारी  metal fans became known as ``  metalheads  `` or `` headbangers `` .
During  the   1980s  , glam metal became a commercial force with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison .
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme , aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the mainstream  साथ  bands such as Metallica , Megadeth , Slayer , and Anthrax , while other styles of  the  most extreme subgenres of metal like  मौत   मेटल   और  black metal remain subcultural phenomena .
Since the mid-1990s , popular styles such as nu metal , which often incorporates elements of grunge and hip hop ; and metalcore , which  मिश्रणों   चरम  metal with hardcore punk , have further expanded the definition of the genre  .
The far-right  (  also known as the extreme right ) refers to the highest degree of rightism in right-wing politics .
Far right  राजनीती  involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society , and supports supremacy of certain individuals or groups deemed to be innately superior or  अस्तबलों  who are to  be  more  valued  than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable .
The far right  's  advocacy of supremacism  is  based on what its  adherents  perceive as innate characteristics of people that can not be changed .
This stands as a point of difference with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours , such as  आलस्य   or   decadence  , as the  प्राथमिक   स्त्रोत  of social inequalities .
The centre right—unlike the far right—claims that people can end their behavioural  हीनता  through  बदलना  their habits and choices .
the   असली  far right , which  उभरा  in France after the French Revolution ,  refused  to accept  the   फ्रेंच  Republic and supported a counter-revolution to restore  the  French monarchy and aristocracy .
The far right is  commonly  associated with persons or groups who hold extreme  राष्ट्रवादी  , xenophobic , racist ,  धार्मिक  fundamentalist or reactionary views .
The most extreme-right movements have pursued  दमन  and genocide  विरूद्ध  groups of people on the basis of their alleged inferiority .
थामस  Hobbes  of  Malmesbury ( 5 April  1588  –  4  December 1679 ) , in some older texts Thomas Hobbs of Malmsbury , was  an  English philosopher , best known today for his work on political philosophy .
His 1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for most  of  Western political philosophy from the perspective of social contract theory .
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign , but  he  also  विकसित  some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which led to the later distinction between  सिविल  society and  the  state ) ; the  दृश्य  that all legitimate political power must be `` representative '' and based on the consent of  the  people  ;  and a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people  फ़्री  to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid  .
He was one of the founders of  आधुनिक  political philosophy .
His understanding of humans as being  पदार्थ  and motion , obeying the same physical laws as other matter and motion ,  remains  influential ; and his  खाता  of human nature as self-interested cooperation , and of political communities as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of  the  major topics of political philosophy .
In addition to  राजनैतिक  philosophy , Hobbes also contributed to a diverse array of other fields , including history , geometry , the physics of gases , theology , ethics , and general philosophy .
Emotional intelligence (  ei  )  is  the ability to identify , assess , and control the emotions of oneself , of others , and of groups .
It can be  विभाजित  into ability EI and trait EI .
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships with traditional intelligence , whereas trait EI is usually  measured  using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships with personality .
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real intelligence  और  whether it has incremental validity over IQ and the Big Five personality traits .
आनुवंशिकता  is the passing of traits to offspring from its parents or ancestor .
This is  the  process by which an offspring cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the characteristics of  इसके  parent cell or organism .
Through heredity , variations exhibited  by  individuals can accumulate and cause some species to evolve .
The study of  आनुवंशिकता  in biology is  पुकारा  genetics , which includes  the   फ़ील्ड  of epigenetics .
For United States individual  आय  tax , adjusted gross income ( AGI ) is total gross income minus specific reductions .
Taxable income is adjusted gross income minus allowances for personal exemptions and itemized deductions .
For  सबसे   व्यक्तिगत  tax purposes , AGI is more relevant than gross income .
Gross income  is  sales price of goods or property , minus cost of the property sold , plus other income .
It includes wages , interest , dividends , business  आय  , rental income , and all other types of income .
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a business or rental activity and 21 other specific items .
Several deductions  (   e.g   .  medical expenses and miscellaneous itemized deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI .
Certain phase outs  ,  including those of lower tax  दरों  and itemized deductions , are based on levels of AGI  .
Many states base state income tax on AGI with  निश्चित   deductions  .
`` Lazy Eye '' is the  तीसरा   सिंगल  from Silversun Pickups ' debut album Carnavas .
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David Letterman , The Tonight Show with Jay Leno , Later With Jools  हॉलैंड  , and Last Call with Carson Daly .
The song is a playable track on Rock Band 2 and Guitar Hero : World Tour .
An alternate version of the song , with a length of 7:27 , was played on XMU before the shorter version was played on FM  और  other XM channels .
This version was featured on their demo CD ( which  प्रदर्शित  early versions of four tracks ) .
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of  a  telephone number ; in the North American Numbering Plan countries (  देश  code 1 ) , it is the  पहला  three digits of a seven-digit phone number .
in  other countries both the prefix  और  the number may  have  different lengths .
It  shows   जिससे  exchange the remaining numbers  refer  to .
A full telephone number is usually made  up  of country code  (   जरूरी  for international calls  तभी  ) , area code ( required for calls between telephone areas ) , prefix , and subscriber number .
Some places restrict certain prefixes to fax numbers or cell phones only ; in other  स्थान  such dedicated prefixes are not  प्रयुक्त  .
As telephone technology advanced  ,  the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in  लंदन  , UK , was once the GULliver exchange , but now 44207485xxxx is just considered one of  अनेक  number blocks  परोसा  by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another .
metformin  ( BP , pronounced , ; originally sold as Glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic  ड्रग  in the biguanide  क्लास  .
It is the  first-line  drug  of  choice for the treatment of type 2 diabetes , in particular , in overweight and obese people and those with  सामान्य  kidney function .
इसके   उपयोग  in gestational diabetes has been limited by safety concerns .
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic  ovary  syndrome ,  और  has been investigated for other diseases where insulin resistance may be an important factor .
Metformin works by suppressing  ग्लूकोज  production by  the  liver .
metformin  is the only antidiabetic drug that has been conclusively shown to prevent the cardiovascular complications  of  diabetes .
it   helps  reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels , and is not  संबद्ध  with  वज़न  gain .
, metformin is one of only two oral  antidiabetics  in the World Health Organization  मॉडल  List of Essential Medicines ( the other being glibenclamide ) .
When prescribed  appropriately  , metformin causes few adverse effects ( the  सबसे  common is gastrointestinal upset ) and is associated  साथ  a low risk of hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious concern in overdose and when it is prescribed to people  साथ  contraindications , but otherwise , there is no significant risk .
First synthesized and found to reduce blood  शुगर  in the 1920s  ,  metformin was forgotten for the next two decades as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs  .
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce  रक्त  sugar levels in people ,  और   in  1957 , French physician Jean Sterne  प्रकाशित  the first clinical trial  of  metformin as  a  treatment for diabetes .
It was  introduced  to the United Kingdom in 1958 , Canada in 1972 , and the United  राज्य   in  1995 .
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States alone , more than 48 million prescriptions  यहूद  filled in 2010 for its  जेनेरिक  formulations .
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into  the  granite face of Mount Rushmore near  keystone   ,  South Dakota , in the United States .
Sculpted by Danish-American  gutzon  Borglum and his son , Lincoln  borglum  , Mount Rushmore features sculptures  of  the heads of four United States presidents  :   जार्ज  Washington , Thomas Jefferson , Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln .
The entire  मेमोरियल  covers and is above sea level .
The tallest  पहाड़  in the region is Harney Peak (  )  .
South  डकोटा  historian Doane Robinson is credited  साथ  conceiving the idea of carving the likenesses of famous people into the  ब्लैक  Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in  the  region .
Robinson 's initial  विचार  was to sculpt  the  Needles ; however , Gutzon Borglum rejected the Needles site because of the poor  विशेषता  of the granite and strong opposition from  पर्यावरणविद  and Native American groups  .
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location , which also has the advantage  of  facing southeast for maximum sun exposure .
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like  लुईस  and Clark  ,  Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the  मूर्तिकला  should have a more national focus , and chose the four  राष्ट्रपतियों  whose likenesses would be carved  into  the mountain .
After  securing  federal  funding  , construction on the memorial began  in  1927 , and  the  presidents ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939 .
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941  ,  his son Lincoln Borglum took over construction .
Although the initial concept called for each president to be depicted from head  to  waist , lack of funding  मजबूर  construction to end in  लेट  October 1941 .
The U.S.  नेशनल   पार्क  Service took control of the  मेमोरियल  in 1933  ,  while it was still under construction , and has  प्रबंधित  the memorial to the present day .
It attracts nearly three million  लोगों  annually .
Charvet dress shirt from the 1930s , Norsk Folkemuseum , Oslo .
a  shirt , dress shirt , button-front , button-front shirt  ,  or button-up shirt  is  a garment with a collar  ,  a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem  ,  and sleeves with cuffs .
Shirts are predominantly used by  मेन  , since women usually wear  blouses  .
The front opening is fastened using buttons or studs ,  और  the  cuffs  close with buttons or cuff links .
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth , and are often accompanied by a  जैकेट  and tie , for example  साथ  a suit or formalwear , but shirts are also worn  अधिक  casually .
in  British English , dress shirt means specifically the more  औपचारिक  evening garment worn with black- or white- tie , also discussed below .
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts  और  detachable collars attached with collar  studs  .
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of  कमीज़  which has a collar fastened down by buttons  )  is sometimes  प्रयुक्त  in error to apply to all shirts ( with or without buttoned down collars ) , being used as a synonym for `` button-up ''  or  `` button-front '' .
Administrative Professionals Day  (  also  ज्ञात  as  secretaries  Day or Admin Day  )  is  an   unofficial  secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries , administrative assistants , receptionists  ,  and other administrative support professionals .
In North America  ,  it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full  सप्ताह  of April ( April  24  in 2013 ) .
In France it is  मनाये  on the third Thursday in April (  अप्रैल  18 in 2013 ) .
In Australia it is  मनाये  on the first Friday in May
