Nicolas Poussin  (  ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the classical French Baroque style , although he spent most of his  working  life in  रोम   .
His work is  characterized  by clarity , logic  ,  and order , and favors  लकीर  over color .
Until the 20th century  he  remained a  प्रमुख  inspiration for  ऐसे  classically oriented artists as Jacques-Louis David , Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne .
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading  collectors  there  और  elsewhere , except for a short period when Cardinal Richelieu ordered him back to  फ़्रांस  to  serve  as First Painter to the King .
Most  of  his works are  इतिहास  paintings  of  religious or mythological subjects that very  प्रायः  have a large landscape element .
जैकी  Keith Whitley ( July 1 , 1954Stambler , Irwin , and Grelun Landon ( 2000 ) . - Country Music : The Encyclopedia . - New  यॉर्क  : St.  मार्टिन  's Press .  -  p.533 . - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin , Richard ( 2003 )  .  -  देश  Music : A Biographical Dictionary .  -  New York : Routledge  -  p.427 . - ISBN  978-0-415-93802-0.—larkin  , Colin ( 1995 ) . - The  गिनीज  Encyclopedia of Popular Music . - New York : Stockton  दबायें  - P.4462 .  -   isbn  978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton , Scott (  2003  ) . - The Tombstone Tourist :  संगीतकारों  . - New York : Pocket Books .  -   p.395  . - ISBN 978-0-7434-6330-0.—Hicks , Jack . - ``  सिंगर  Keith Whitley 's Memory Alive Through Songs , Love in Home Town '' . - The Kentucky Post . - September 25 , 1991.— '' Country Music  स्टार  Keith Whitley Dead at 33 '' . - Lexington Herald-Leader . -  may   10  , 1989.——Hurst , Jack . - `` Whitley  's  Last Days '' . - Chicago Tribune . - May 14 , 1989.— ''  दारू  Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley ''  .  -  संयुक्त  Press International .  -  ( c/o The San Francisco  वृत्तान्त  ) . - May 10 , 1989 . — May 9 ,  1989  ) , known professionally as Keith Whitley  ,  was an  अमरीकी   देश  music singer .
Whitley 's brief career in mainstream country music lasted from 1984 until his death in 1989 ,  लकिन  he continues  to  influence  an  entire generation of singers  और  songwriters .
he  charted 19  singles  on the Billboard country  चार्ट  , including  पाँच  consecutive Number  ones   :  `` Do n't Close Your Eyes `` , `` When You Say Nothing at All  ``  , `` I 'm No  अजनबी  to the  बरसात  `` ,  ``  I Wonder Do You  सोचो  of Me `` and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the  पिछला   दो  posthumously ) .
Statute of Grand Duchy of Lithuania  ,  written  in  Polish
A statute is a formal written enactment of a legislative authority  कि  governs a state , city ,  or  county .
Typically , statutes command or prohibit something , or declare policy .
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies from case law , decided by courts , and regulations issued by government agencies .
Statutes are sometimes referred to as legislation or `` black letter law . ''
as   a  source of law , statutes are considered primary  प्राधिकार  ( as opposed to secondary authority ) .
Ideally all statutes must be  in  harmony with the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ) .
This word is used in contradistinction to the common law .
Statutes acquire their force from the time of their passage  ,  however unless otherwise provided .
Statutes are of several kinds ; namely , Public or private .
Declaratory or  remedial  .
Temporary  or  perpetual .
A temporary statute is one which is limited in its duration at the  समय  of its enactment .
It continues in force until the time of its limitation  रै  expired , unless sooner repealed  .
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of which there is no  सीमित  time , although it may not be expressly declared to be so .
If , however , a statute which  किया  not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by  another  which is temporary only ,  the   पूर्व  will also be temporary and dependent upon the  अस्तित्व  of the latter .
Before a statute becomes law in some countries , it must be agreed upon by the highest executive in the government , and finally published as part of a code .
In many countries , statutes are organized in topical arrangements (  or   ``  codified '' ) within  publications  called codes , such as the United States Code .
In  अनेक  nations statutory law is distinguished from and  अधीनस्थ  to  संवैधानिक  law .
The external iliac arteries are two  प्रमुख  arteries which bifurcate off  the  common iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint  of  the pelvis .
They proceed anterior and inferior along the medial border of the psoas major  मांसपेशियां  .
वे  exit the pelvic  girdle  posterior and inferior to the inguinal  स्नायु   परिचय  one third laterally from the insertion point of the inguinal ligament on the  जननांग  tubercle at which point they are referred to  as  the femoral arteries .
The external  iliac  artery is usually the artery used to attach the renal  धमनी   to  the recipient of  a  kidney  प्रत्यारोपण  .
Steam  is  a  डिजिटल  distribution , digital rights management  ,  multiplayer and communications  मंच  developed by Valve Corporation .
It is used to distribute games  और  related media online , from small independent developers to larger software houses  ;   in  October 2012 , Valve expanded the service to include  non-gaming  software .
Steam  provides  the user  साथ  installation and automatic management of software across multiple  कंप्यूटर  , community features such as  मित्रों   सूचियाँ  and groups , cloud saving , and in-game voice and chat functionality .
The software provides a freely available application programming interface , Steamworks  ,  that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of Steam 's functions within their software products , including copy protection , networking and matchmaking , in-game achievements and micro-transactions , and support for user-created content  through  Steam Workshop .
Though initially developed  लिये  use on Microsoft Windows  ,   the  client has expanded to include OS  x  and Linux versions ,  और  clients with limited functionality on  the  PlayStation 3 console and for both iOS and  एंड्रॉइड  mobile devices .
In addition to being  a  central hub for  गेमिंग  software ,  वाल्व  has created a version of Steam with altered functionality to be used in schools for educational software , including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons .
,  there are nearly 2000 games available through Steam , and 54 million active user accounts .
As of January 2013 , Steam has seen over 6.6 million concurrent players .
भाप  has an estimated  50–70  % share of the digital distribution market for video games .
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank and rod from the Walschaerts valve gear of  a  steam locomotive .
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16 , 1926 ) is an American comedian , actor , singer ,  फिल्मी  producer , screenwriter  और  film director .
He is known for his slapstick humor  in  film , television  ,  stage and radio .
He was originally paired up with Dean Martin in 1946 , forming the famed comedy team of Martin and Lewis  .
In addition to the duo 's  लोकप्रिय  nightclub work , they starred in a successful series of comedy  films  for Paramount Pictures .
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as national chairman for  the  Muscular Dystrophy Association ( MDA ) .
Lewis has  जीती  several awards for lifetime achievements from The American Comedy Awards , Los Angeles Film Critics  संघ   ,  and Venice Film Festival , and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame  .
In 2005 , he received the Governors Award of the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences Board of Governors , which  is   the  highest Emmy Award presented .
On February 22 ,  2009  ,  the  Academy of Motion Picture  कला  and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award .
The Rhine (  ;  ; ) is a European  नदी  that runs  इससे  the Swiss canton of Grisons in  the  southeastern Swiss  ऐल्प्स  through Germany and eventually flows into  the  North Sea coast in the Netherlands  और  is the  बारहवीं   longest  river in  यूरोपीय  , at about , with an average discharge of more  than  .
the  Rhine and the Danube formed  सबसे  of the northern inland frontier of the Roman Empire and  ,  since those days  ,  the Rhine has been a vital and  navigable  waterway carrying trade and goods  गहन  inland .
It has also served as  a  defensive feature and has been the basis  लिये  regional and international borders .
the  many castles and prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine testify to its importance  as  a waterway .
River traffic could be stopped at these locations , usually for the purpose of collecting tolls , by  the  state that controlled that portion of  the   नदी  .
Sri ( Sinhala )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री , IAST ; Śrī ) , also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin , used in the Indian subcontinent as polite form of address equivalent to the English ``  mr.  '' in written  और  spoken language  ,  or as a title of  veneration  for deities ( usually  अनूदित   as  `` Holy '' ) .
Design of complex structures like the International Space Station needs in-depth understanding of Structural Analysis .
Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design , construction , and maintenance  of  the physical and naturally built  पर्यावरण  , including works like roads  ,  bridges , canals , dams , and  इमारतें  .
सिविल  engineering  is  the  oldest  engineering discipline after military engineering ,  और  it was  पारिभाषित  to distinguish non-military engineering from military engineering .
It is traditionally  टूटा  into several sub-disciplines including  पर्यावरणीय  engineering , geotechnical engineering , geophysics , geodesy , control engineering , structural engineering  ,  biomechanics , nanotechnology , transportation engineering , earth science  ,   वायुमंडलीय  sciences , forensic engineering , municipal or urban  अभियान्त्रिकी   ,  water  संसाधन  engineering  ,  materials engineering , coastal engineering , surveying , and construction engineering  .
Civil engineering takes place  on  all levels : in the public sector  इससे  municipal through  to  national  सरकारें  , and in the private sector  इससे  individual homeowners through to international companies .

Katherine  dunham  ( June  22  , 1909 – May 21 , 2006  )  was an American dancer , choreographer , author , educator , and social activist  .
Dunham had one of the most successful dance careers in American and European theater of the 20th century , and directed her own  नृत्य  company for  अनेक   सालो  .
She has been called the `` matriarch and queen mother of black  नृत्य  '' .
दौरान  her heyday in the 1940s and  1950s  , Dunham was renowned throughout Europe and Latin America and was widely popular in the United States , where the Washington Post called  उसके  `` dancer Katherine the Great '' .
For  लगभग  thirty years she maintained the  कैथरीन   dunham  Dance Company , the only self-supported American black dance troupe at that time , and over her long career she choreographed more  than  ninety individual dances .
Dunham was an  innovator  in African-American modern dance as  खूब  as a leader in the field of dance anthropology , or ethnochoreology .
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses  ,  commonly called peat moss  due  to its prevalence in wet habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires .
Sphagnum accumulations can store water , since both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside  उनके  cells ; plants may hold from 16-26 times as much water  as  their dry weight  depending  on the species .
The empty cells help retain water in drier conditions .
Hence ,  as  sphagnum moss grows , it can  धीरे  spread  into  drier conditions , forming  larger  peatlands , both raised  bogs  and blanket bogs .
These peat accumulations then  provide  habitat for a wide array of peatland plants , including sedges and ericaceous shrubs , as well as orchids and carnivorous plants .
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay readily because of the phenolic compounds embedded in the moss  's  cell walls .
In addition , bogs , like all wetlands , develop anaerobic soil conditions , which  produces  slower anaerobic decay rather than aerobic microbial action .
Peat moss  can  also acidify its  परिवेश  by  लेने  up cations , such as calcium and magnesium , and releasing hydrogen ions .
Under the right conditions , peat can accumulate to a depth of many meters .
Different species of  sphagnum  have different tolerance limits for flooding and pH , so any one peatland  may  have a  क्रमांक   of  different Sphagnum species .
व्यक्तिगत  peat moss plants consist of a main stem , with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles usually consisting of two  or  three spreading branches  और  two to four hanging branches .
the   शीर्ष  of the  संयंत्र  , or capitulum , has compact  क्लस्टर  of  यंग  branches .
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various shapes , named stem leaves  ;  the shape varies according to  प्रजाति   .
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small , green ,  जीना  cells ( chlorophyllose cells ) , and large  ,   साफ  , structural , dead cells ( hyaline cells )  .
The latter have the large water-holding capacity .
The earliest version of the Network Card , issued manually rather than through an APTIS machine .
The first APTIS version of the Network Card  .
This was used from the start  of  the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until well  into   the  1990s , as  स्टॉक्स  had to be used up despite the introduction of the new-look orange-banded version in  1991  .
The introduction of the weekday minimum fare condition in  2002  resulted in a minor  बदलें  : the red ``  r  '' shows that this is the `` Revised  ''  version of the railcard .
इस  version is still in use as of 2007 .
the  Network Railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by British Rail , upon the creation of their Network SouthEast area around London , England .
The card is  intended  to encourage leisure travel by rail by offering discounts for adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares .
The range of discounts available , and the price of  the  card ,  have  varied since that time , but the card has always been valid for a  साल  's unlimited use .
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent , by completing an application form - no photographic identification or other documentation is needed to buy  or  use the card  .
It  is  one of a number of concessionary fare schemes available on  the  British railway system .
The United Nations ( UN ; French  :  Organisation des Nations Unies ,  onu   )  is the world 's  largest   ,   foremost  , and most prominent international organization .
The stated aims of the United  राष्ट्र  include promoting  और  facilitating cooperation in international law  ,   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   सुरक्षा  , economic  विकास  , social progress , human  अधिकारों  , civil rights , civil liberties ,  राजनैतिक  freedoms , democracy , and the achievement of lasting world peace .
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the League of Nations , to stop wars between countries , and to provide a platform for dialogue .
it  contains multiple subsidiary organizations to  carry  out its missions .
At its founding , the UN had 51 member states ; as of 2011 ,  वहीँ   हैं  193 .
From its offices around the world , the UN and its specialized  एजेंसियों  decide on substantive and administrative issues in regular meetings  आयोजित  throughout the year .
The organization has six principal organs  :  the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the  सुरक्षा  Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security  )  ; the  आर्थिक  and Social Council ( for assisting in promoting international  आर्थिक  and social cooperation and development ) ; the Secretariat  (  for providing  अध्ययन  , information  ,  and facilities needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice ( the primary  न्यायिक   अंग  ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ) .
Other prominent  un  System  एजेंसियों  include the World Health Organization ( WHO ) , the World Food Programme ( WFP )  और  United  राष्ट्र  Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ) .
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the office of Secretary-General which has been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea since 2007 .
The United Nations Headquarters resides in international territory in New York  नगर   ,  with further  प्रमुख   कार्यालयों  at  जेनेवा  , Nairobi , and Vienna .
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary contributions from its  सदस्य  states , and has  छह  official languages : Arabic , Chinese  ,  English , French , Russian , and Spanish .
South  बीच  , also nicknamed SoBe  ,   is  a  पड़ोस  in the city  of  Miami Beach ,  फ्लोरिडा  , United  राज्य  , located due east of Miami city proper between Biscayne Bay and the  अटलांटिक  Ocean .
The area encompasses all of the barrier islands of  मियामी   बीच  south of Indian Creek .
This area was the first  खण्ड   of  Miami  बीच  to be developed , starting in  the   1910s  , thanks to the development efforts of Carl  G.  Fisher , the Lummus Brothers , and John S. Collins , the  latter  whose construction  of  the Collins Bridge provided the  पहला  vital land link between mainland Miami and the beaches .
The area has gone through  numerous  artificial and natural changes over  the  years , including a booming regional  अर्थव्यवस्था  , increased  पर्यटन  , and the 1926 hurricane , which destroyed much of the  क्षेत्रफल  .
As of 2010 , about 39,186 residents live in South Beach .
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November 8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party nominated  लाज़िम  Vice-President Richard Nixon , while the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party  मनोनीत  John F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The  लाज़िम  President , Republican  ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower , was not eligible  लिये  re-election  बाद   सेवारत  the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes , or 0.17 % of the popular vote , giving him a victory  of  303 to 219 in the Electoral College ,  the  closest since 1916 .
This was the first election in which all fifty of the current United States participated .
A number of factors explain why  the  election was so close .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which hurt the  लाज़िम  Republican , and he had the advantage of 17 million more  पंजीकृत  Democrats than  republicans  .
Furthermore  ,   the  new votes that Kennedy gained among Catholics  लगभग  neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's .
In the  समाप्त  , Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried  छोटी   वज़न  , and he  wasted  energy by campaigning in all  50  states instead of concentrating on the swing  राज्य  .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded campaign organization to win  the   नामांकन  , secure endorsements , and , with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the South  और  used television  effectively  .
This election is notable as being the first  समय  in U.S. history that two sitting U.S . Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and  vice-president  , a  घटना  that has been  दोहराया  once  ,  by  बराक  Obama and  जो  Biden in 2008 ( in both cases ,  the  president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
A poster for a c. 1884 American production of Macbeth , starring Thomas W. Keene .
Depicted , counter clockwise from top-left , are : Macbeth and Banquo meet the witches ; just after the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth .
Macbeth is a play written by William Shakespeare .
It is considered one of his darkest  और  most powerful tragedies .
Set in Scotland , the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political effects produced when its protagonist , the Scottish  रब  Macbeth  ,  chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power  .
He commits regicide to become king and then furthers his moral descent with a reign of murderous terror to stay in power  ,   आखिरकार  plunging the country into civil war .
In the  समाप्त  , he loses everything  कि  gives meaning and purpose to his life before losing his life itself  .
The play is believed to have been  लिखा  between 1603 and 1607  ,   और   is  most  commonly  dated 1606  .
the  earliest account  of  a performance of what was probably Shakespeare 's play is April 1611 , when Simon Forman  अंकित  seeing such a  खेल  at the Globe Theatre .
It was  पहला  published in the Folio of 1623 , possibly from a prompt book .
It was most likely written during the  शासनकाल  of James I , who had been James VI of Scotland before he succeeded to the English throne in 1603 .
James  थी  a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company , and of all the plays Shakespeare wrote during James’s reign , Macbeth most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship  साथ  the sovereign .
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy , and tells the story of a  वीर  Scottish general named  मैकबेथ  who receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one  दिन  he will become King of Scotland .
Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by  उसके   बीवी  , Macbeth murders King Duncan and takes the throne for himself .
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia , and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more and more murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion .
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and Lady Macbeth into realms of arrogance , madness , and death .
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland  ,  Macduff , and Duncan in  holinshed  's Chronicles (  1587   )  , a history of England , Scotland and Ireland familiar to Shakespeare and his contemporaries , although the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real  मैकबेथ  .
in  the backstage world of theatre , some believe that the  खेल  is  शापित  , and will not mention  इसके  title aloud , referring to it  बजाय  as `` the  स्कॉटिश  play `` .
Over the course of many  सदियां  ,  the  play has  आकर्षित  some of the most renowned actors to the roles of  मैकबेथ  and Lady Macbeth .
It  रै  been  adapted  to film , television , opera ,  novels  , comic books , and other media .
The Milton Hershey School is a private philanthropic ( pre-K  through  12 ) boarding school in Hershey  ,  Pennsylvania .
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School , the institution was founded  और   वित्तपोषित  by chocolate industrialist Milton Snavely Hershey and his wife , Catherine Sweeney Hershey .
The school  थी  originally established for impoverished , healthy , Caucasian , male orphans , while today it serves students of various backgrounds  .
The Milton  hershey  School Trust , which funds the  स्कूल  , owns  controlling  interest in The Hershey Company and owns the  hershey  Entertainment and Resorts  कम्पनी  ( HERCO  )  which oversees many of the area  होटल  along with a theme park called Hersheypark .
With over six billion dollars in assets ,  the  Milton Hershey School is one of the  wealthiest  schools in the world  .
The school is overseen by a Board of Managers .
The school currently serves 1,818 students , and plans to  grow  to 2,100 students by 2013 .
A member of CORE  :  Coalition for Residential  शिक्षा  , it is the largest residential education program in the US .
