The Controlled  substances  Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United States as Title II of the Comprehensive  ड्रग   गाली  Prevention and  कंट्रोल  Act of 1970 .
The CSA is  the  federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture , importation , possession ,  उपयोग   और  distribution  of  certain substances is  regulated  .
The Act  भी  served as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on  narcotic  Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ) , with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each .
Two federal  एजेंसियों  , the  ड्रग  Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug  प्रशासन  ,  determine  which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute  passed  by Congress created the initial  लिस्टिंग   ,   और  Congress has  sometimes  scheduled other substances through legislation such  as  the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000 , which  लगाई  gamma  hydroxybutyrate  in  अनुसूची  I  .  Classification decisions are  जरूरी  to be made on  मापदण्ड  including potential  लिये  abuse ( an undefined term ) ,  फिलहाल   स्वीकृत  medical  उपयोग  in  उपचार  in the United States  ,  and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  treaties .
Second-language acquisition or  second-language  learning is  the  process by which people learn a second language .
Second-language acquisition ( often abbreviated to SLA )  भी  refers to the scientific discipline devoted to studying that process .
Second language refers to  कोई  language learned in addition to a person 's first language ; although the concept is named second-language acquisition , it can also incorporate the learning  of  third , fourth ,  or   subsequent  languages  .
Second-language acquisition refers to what  learners  do ; it does not refer  to  practices in language  शिक्षण  .
The academic discipline of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of applied linguistics  .
It is broad-based and relatively new .
As well as the various branches  of  linguistics , second-language acquisition is also closely related to  मनोविज्ञान  , cognitive  मनोविज्ञान  , and education .
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself , the terms second-language acquisition research , second-language studies , and second-language acquisition studies are  भी  used .
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary field , and because of this it is difficult  to  identify a precise starting date .
However , it does appear to have developed a great deal since the mid-1960s  .
The term acquisition was originally used to emphasize the subconscious nature of  the  learning process , but in  हाल  years learning and acquisition  have  become largely synonymous .
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage language learning ,  लकिन  it does not usually incorporate bilingualism  .
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a language  ,  not the  प्रक्रम  itself , and see the  पद  as referring to  native-like   fluency  .
Writers in  फ़ील्ड  such as education and psychology , however , often use bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism .
Second-language  अधिग्रहण  is also not to be contrasted with the  अधिग्रहण  of a foreign language ; rather , the learning of second languages and the learning of  विदेशी  languages involve the same fundamental processes in different situations..
There has been much debate about exactly how language is learned , and many issues are still unresolved .
There are many theories of second-language acquisition , but none are accepted  as  a complete explanation by all SLA researchers .
due  to  the  interdisciplinary nature of  the  field of second-language acquisition , this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future .
फोर्ब्स  list of billionaires is an annual ranking of the world 's wealthiest people , compiled and published by Forbes , an American national  कारोबार  magazine .
The total net  लायक  of each  व्यक्तिगत  on the list  is  estimated , in  संयुक्त   राज्य  dollars , based on their assets and accounting for debt .
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a single day , due to daily fluctuations among exchange rates  और  stock valuations .
The United States Secret Service is a U.S. federal law enforcement agency that is part of the United States Department of  मातृभूमि  Security  .
The  sworn  members are divided among the Special Agents and the Uniformed Division .
Until  कूच  1 , 2003 , the Service was part of the United States Department of the Treasury .
The  u.S.  Secret Service  रै  two distinct areas of responsibility:
Financial Crimes , covering missions such as  रोकथाम  and investigation of counterfeiting  of   u.S.  currency and U.S.  राजकोष  securities ,  और  investigation of major fraud .
Protection , which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders and their families , such as the President ,  पास्ट  presidents , vice presidents , presidential candidates , visiting heads of state , and foreign embassies ( per an  अनुबंध  with the U.S. State  विभाग  's  ब्यूरो  of Diplomatic Security ( DS  )  Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ) , etc . )
The Secret Service 's initial  जिम्मेदारी  was to  investigate  counterfeiting  of  U.S. currency ,  जिससे  was rampant  following  the U.S. Civil War  .
The agency then evolved into the United States ' first domestic intelligence and counterintelligence agency .
Many of the agency  's  missions  यहूद   बाद  taken over by subsequent agencies  ऐसे  as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI )  ,  Bureau of Alcohol  ,  Tobacco  ,  Firearms and Explosives ( ATF  )  , Immigration and Customs Enforcement (  बर्फ  ) , and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS  )  .
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is  a  song written  by  Kris  kristofferson  and Fred Foster , originally performed by Roger Miller .
Others performed the song later , including Kristofferson himself  ,   और   janis  Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with  the  song in 1971 after her death ,  बनाना  the song the second posthumous number-one single in U.S. chart history after  ``  ( Sittin '  on  ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding .
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 –  अप्रैल   12  , 1945 ) ,  भी  known by his initials ,  fdr  , was the 32nd President of the United States  (  1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century , leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only  अमरीकी  president elected to more than  दो  terms , he built  a  New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932 ,  as  his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the  bouncy  popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme , FDR  पराजित  incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932  ,  at the depth of the Great Depression .
सक्रिय  by his personal victory over polio , FDR 's unfailing  आशावाद  and  सक्रियता  contributed to  a  renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely with  अंग्रेजों  Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin  in  leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days  in  office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and  जारी  a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal  —a  variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery (  आर्थिक  growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937 , but  तब   relapsed  into a  गहन  recession .
The  bipartisan  Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his  पैकिंग   the   परम्  Court or passing any considerable legislation ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World  युद्ध   ii  .
Most of the regulations on business  यहूद   ended  about 1975–85 , except for the regulation of Wall Street  by  the Securities and Exchange Commission , which still exists .
Along with several smaller programs , major  surviving  programs  शामिल  the  संघीय  Deposit Insurance Corporation , which was created in 1933 , and  सोशल  Security , which  कॉंग्रेस  passed  in  1935 .
As World  युद्ध  II loomed  बाद  1938 , with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic and  वित्तीय  support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral  .
His goal  थी  to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy ``  जिससे  would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with Congressional approval , provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries  लड़  against Nazi Germany with Britain .
साथ  very strong national support , he  बना  war on  जापानी  and Germany after  the  Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor  on  December 7 , 1941 ,  कॉलिंग  it a  ``  date which will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort .
As  an  active military leader , Roosevelt implemented an overall war  रणनीति  on two fronts  कि  ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers  और  the development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt  ordered  the internment of  100,000  Japanese  अमरीकी  civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief programs largely ended ,  और  the industrial economy  grew  rapidly to new heights  as   लाखो  of people moved  to  new jobs in  युद्ध  centers , and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service  .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the twelve years of his  प्रेसिडेंसी   ,  but also for decades afterward .
He  orchestrated  the realignment of voters that  निर्मित  the  पांचवां  Party System .
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions , big city machines , white ethnics , African  अमेरिकी  and rural white  southerners  .
He also influenced the later creation of the United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top  तीन  U.S. Presidents , along  साथ  Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
a  liberal Democrat , Roosevelt defined his ideological position  as  `` a little left of center . ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly  abbreviated  as MS , Mara , and MS-13 ) is a transnational criminal gang that originated in Los Angeles and has spread to other parts of the  संयुक्त  States , Canada , Mexico , and Central America  .
The majority of the gang  is   ethnically  composed of Central  अमेरिकी   और  active  in  urban and suburban areas .
In  the  U.S. , the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern California ; the Washington , D.C. metropolitan areas of Fairfax County , Virginia  ,  Montgomery County , Maryland , and Prince George 's  काउंटी  , Maryland ; Long Island , New York ; the Boston , Massachusetts area ; Charlotte , North Carolina ; and Houston , Texas .
There is also a presence of MS-13 in Toronto , Ontario , Canada .
Members of MS distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the body and also often the face , as well as the use of their own sign language .
They are notorious for their use of violence  और  a subcultural moral code  कि  predominantly consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions .
This cruelty of the distinguished  सदस्यों  of the  ``  Maras '' or `` Mareros ''  अर्जित  them a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los  zetas   in  an ongoing drug war south of the United States border .
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and  आव्रजन   और  Customs  प्रवर्तन  , who have initiated wide-scale raids against known and suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the country .
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on the Fox network  in   the  United States on September 13 , 2005 .
The show is based on forensic  मानवशास्त्र  and forensic archaeology , with each episode focusing on an FBI case file concerning the mystery  पीछे  human remains brought by FBI Special  एजेंट  Seeley Booth ( David  boreanaz  ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan (  एमिली  Deschanel ) .
The rest of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin , T. J. Thyne  ,  Eric Millegan , Tamara Taylor  ,  Jonathan Adams , and John Francis Daley .
Created by Hart Hanson , the  श्रेणी  is very loosely based on the life and writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs , who also produces the show .
Its title character , Temperance Brennan , is named after the protagonist of Reichs ' crime novel series .
Conversely , Dr. Brennan writes successful  रहस्य  novels based around a  fictional  ( in the Bones universe ) forensic anthropologist named Kathy Reichs .
Bones is a  संयुक्त  production by Josephson Entertainment , Far Field Productions and 20th Century Fox Television .
The series has completed airing  इसके  eighth season and has been renewed for  a  ninth season .
Super Bowl XXV  थी   an  American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion New York Giants to decide the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season .
The Giants defeated the Bills by the score of 20–19 , winning their second ever Super Bowl  .
It  is  the only  सुपर  Bowl decided  by   एक   पाइंट  .
The  खेल   थी   आयोजित  at Tampa Stadium in Tampa , Florida , on January 27 , 1991  ,  during the  ऊँचाई  of the Gulf  युद्ध  .
It was thus played under  much  patriotic  fervor  .
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` by Whitney  ह्यूस्टन  during the pregame  ceremonies  .
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making their first Super Bowl appearance after finishing the regular season with a 13-3 record , and leading  the  league in total points scored with 428 .
in  advancing to their second Super  कटोरी  , the Giants also posted a 13-3 regular season record , but with a ball-control offense and a defense that allowed  a  league low 211 points .
the  game is best remembered for Bills placekicker  स्कॉट  Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide right of the uprights , leading to a Giants victory  ,  and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills .
The Giants set a Super Bowl record holding possession  of  the ball for 40 minutes and  33  seconds .
New York also  overcame  a 12-3 second-quarter  deficit  ,  और  made a 75-yard touchdown drive that consumed a Super Bowl record 9:29 off the clock .
Giants running back Ottis Anderson , who carried the ball 21 times  लिये  102 yards and one  touchdown  ,  थी  named Super Bowl MVP .
He  थी  the first awardee to receive the newly named `` Pete Rozelle Trophy '' (  नामित  for the former commissioner ) .
Anderson also recorded one reception for seven yards .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19  ,  1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little and  भी  known as  el-hajj  Malik El-Shabazz ( )  ,  was an African-American Muslim  मंत्री  and human rights activist .
To  उसके  admirers , he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks , a man who indicted white America in the  harshest  terms for its crimes against black Americans .
Detractors accused him of preaching racism , black supremacy , and violence .
He has been called one of the greatest and  सबसे  influential African  अमेरिकी   in  history .
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists , it was rumored—when he was young , and at least one of his  uncles  was lynched .
जब  he was 13 ,  उसके  mother was placed in a  दिमागी  hospital , and he was placed in a series of foster homes .
In  1946  , at age 20 , he  गई  to  थाना  for breaking and entering .
In prison , Malcolm X became a member of the  स्वदेश  of Islam ; after his parole  in  1952 , he  जल्दी  rose to become one  of  its leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment with  स्वदेश  of Islam head Elijah Muhammad  led  him  to   छोड़  the Nation in March 1964 .
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East , he returned  to  the United  राज्य  ,  जहाँ  he founded Muslim Mosque , Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity .
in  February 1965 , less than  a  year after leaving the Nation of Islam , he was assassinated  by  three members of the group  .
Malcolm X 's  expressed  beliefs changed  substantially  over  समय   .
As  a  spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white Americans  —in  contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After breaking with  the  Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association  साथ  it , `` I did  अनेक  things as a [ Black ] Muslim that  i  'm sorry for now .
I was  a  zombie then ... pointed in a certain direction  और  told  to  march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim  ,  he disavowed racism and expressed  willingness  to work with civil rights leaders , he continued to  emphasize  Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
The third season of 90210 , an American television series , premiered on Monday September 13 , 2010  .
The CW officially renewed the show for a third season on  फ़रवरी  16 , 2010 .
With the reveal of the  संजाल  fall 2010 schedule , they announced their decision to move  90210  to Monday  नाइट्स  at 8:00 pm , as a  lead-in   to  Gossip Girl .
It premiered on September 13 , 2010 and was met with generally positive reviews from critics .
The season  चयन  up at  the  end of  गर्मियाँ  and focuses on the students senior year of high school .
it  follows  adrianna  's rise to fame , a new relationship between  चांदी   और  Navid and a confused Teddy who decides to reveal  to  his family and friends he is gay .
It also deals with the  aftermath  of Naomi Clark 's assault .
Regular cast  सदस्यों  for the season  शामिल   shenae  Grimes , Tristan Wilds , AnnaLynne McCord , Ryan Eggold  ,  Jessica Stroup , Michael Steger , Jessica Lowndes , Matt Lanter  ,  Gillian Zinser , Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin .
Rebecca Sinclair continued her role as executive producer  लिये  the season .
The season premiered to 1.96 million viewers and a 0.9  दरजा  in the adults 18–49 demographic  .
Christmas-themed episode `` Holiday Madness '' , hit season  highs  in all  कुंजी  demos with 2.1 in The CW 's target demo of women 18–34  ,  a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1  in  adults 18–49 .
It was also the most watched episode in over a year with 2.2 million viewers tuning  in  .
The season finale aired on May 16 , 2011 .
The season averaged 1.75 million live viewers and a 0.9 adults 18–49 rating .
It was released on DVD in the  संयुक्त  States on August 30 , 2011 .
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21  अप्रैल  1926 )  is  the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states , known as  the  Commonwealth realms , and their territories and  dependencies  , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of  the  Church of England and , in some of her realms  ,  carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full  शीर्षक  .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan  और  Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992 ,  the  number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics .
At present ,  in  addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen  of   जमैका  , Barbados , the Bahamas  ,  Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint  लूसिया  , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda and Saint  किट्स  and Nevis .
उसके  reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch  ;  only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth was born  in  London and  शिक्षित  privately at home .
Her  पिता  acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII , from which time she was the heir  presumptive  .
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World War , in  जिससे  she served  in  the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 , she married Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh , with whom she has four children  :  Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
Her coronation service took  प्लेस  in 1953  और  was  the  first to be  televised  .
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a state visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms  ,  such as devolution in the United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution .
Times of personal significance have included the births  और  marriages of her children , the births of her grandchildren , the investiture of the Prince of Wales  ,   और  the celebration of milestones such as her Silver  ,  Golden  ,  and Diamond Jubilees  in  1977 , 2002 ,  और  2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern Ireland , the Falklands War  ,   युद्धों  with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan .
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death  of  her  पिता  at 56 , the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle  ,  Lord Mountbatten , the breakdown of  उसके  children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ) , the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales  ,  and the deaths of her mother and sister in  2002  .
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments  ,  but support for the monarchy and  उसके  personal popularity remain  ऊँची  .
The 2010 United  राज्य  Senate  चुनाव  in Florida took place on  नवम्बर  2 , 2010 along with other elections to the United States  सीनेट  in other states  as  well as all elections to the United States  हाउस  of Representatives and various state and local elections .
Republican Marco Rubio , former Speaker of the Florida House of Representatives , defeated  स्वतंत्र  Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek  in  a three-way race .
One term Senator Mel Martinez was  निर्वाचित  in a very close race against Democrat Betty Castor in  2004  with  49  % of the vote .
मार्टिनेज  announced on December 2 , 2008  कि   he   होता   नहीं  seek re-election to the Senate , and would  इस्तीफा  prior to the end of his term .
In August 2009 , Governor Charlie Crist announced that he would appoint his  पूर्व   मुख्य  of Staff , George LeMieux , a Republican , to  the  Senate seat being vacated by  मार्टिनेज   .
Governor Crist publicly announced he was running for the seat in mid-2009 .
At the time he received many Republican endorsements , such as the  नेशनल  Republican Senatorial  कमेटी  , Martinez , and the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain .
His support of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 hurt his popularity among conservatives ,  और  candidate  मार्को  Rubio surged .
in  April 2010 Crist announced he would drop out of  the  Republican primary and run as an independent .
The National Republican Senatorial Committee withdrew its endorsement of Crist and demanded a refund of its campaign  निधि  that it provided for  the  Crist campaign .
Congressman Kendrick Meek was the  पहला  Democrat to declare his intention to run .
Alexander Snitker was the first member of the Libertarian Party on the ballot for senator in Florida 's history .
Satellite view of Doha
Doha  (  , ' or ' , literally : `` the big tree '' ) is the capital  नगर  of  the  state of  क़तर  .
Located on the coast of the Persian Gulf ,
it had a population of 998,651 in  2008  , and is  भी  one of the municipalities of Qatar .
Doha  is  Qatar 's largest city , with over 60 % of the nation 's population residing in Doha or its surrounding  उपनगरों  , and is also the economic centre of the country .
Doha also serves as  the  seat of government of Qatar , which is  शासित  by Sheikh Hamad  बिन  Khalifa Al Thani .
Doha is home to the Education City ,  an  area devoted to research and education .
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level meeting  of  the Doha Development Round of World Trade Organization  negotiations  .
The city of  दोहा  held  the  2006 Asian Games , which was the  largest   एशियाई  Games ever  आयोजित  .
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games  और  most of  the  games at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup .
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate  negotiations  ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and will  मेजबान  a large number of  the  venues  लिये  the 2022  फीफा  World Cup .
The World  पेट्रोलियम  Council held the 20th  संसार  Petroleum Conference in Doha in December 2011 .
Paranasal sinuses are a group of four paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses ) , above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ) , between the eyes (  ethmoid  sinuses ) , and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ) .
the   साइनस  are  नामित   लिये  the facial  हड्डियों   in  which they are located .
Lean manufacturing , lean enterprise ,  or  lean production , often simply , `` Lean , '' is a production practice that considers the expenditure of resources for any  लक्ष्य  other than the creation of value for the end customer to be wasteful , and thus a  निशाना   लिये  elimination .
Working from the perspective of the customer who  consumes  a  उत्पाद  or service , `` value '' is  पारिभाषित  as any action  or  process that a customer would be willing  to  pay for .
Essentially ,  झुकना  is centered on preserving value with less work .
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy derived  ज़्यादातर   इससे  the  टोयोटा  Production System ( TPS ) ( hence the term Toyotism is also prevalent ) and identified  as   ``  Lean  ''   तभी  in the 1990s .
TPS  is  renowned for its focus on reduction of the original Toyota seven wastes to improve overall customer value , but there are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved .
The steady growth of Toyota , from a small company to the world 's largest automaker , has focused  ध्यान  on how it has achieved this success .
iCarly logo
iCarly  is  an  अमरीकी  sitcom that airs on Nickelodeon , which premiered  on  September 8 , 2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far such as `` iDo '' , `` iHire  an  Idiot '' , ``  ipity  the Nevel '' , `` iDate Sam &  फ्रेडी  '' , etc . as specials , despite their being  नियमित  episodes .
Every episode title begins with  a   निम्नतर  case i which represents the internet , as in ``  icarly  '' .
The show was nominated for an Emmy award for Outstanding Children 's Program in 2009  .
The  श्रेणी  starring Miranda Cosgrove as Carly Shay , a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet star .
The series ended on November 23  ,  2012 with  the  one-hour special episode `` iGoodbye '' .
a  total of 7 seasons and 109 episodes were broadcast .
The largest audience of the series  थी  11.2 million viewers  ,  with the special episode `` iSaved Your Life '' premiered in January 2010 .
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend Sam (  jennette  McCurdy )  अधिनियम  funny at a school talent show  ऑडिशन  , tech-savvy  फ्रेडी  ( Nathan  kress  )  टेपों  it and posts  it   ऑनलाइन  without telling  उन्हें  .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter , the online audience clamors  लिये  more and the iCarly webcast is born .
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence , Carly , Sam , and Freddie find out that they have also become online celebrities as their show –  जिससे  features talent contests , recipes , problem-solving , and random dancing – garners international accolades .
Carly lives in Seattle , Washington with her 26-year-old brother and guardian Spencer ( Jerry  trainor  ) and produces the show in  a  makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment .
Their mother has  never  been seen or mentioned , but their father , Steven Shay ( David Chisum ) , is a U.S.  एयर  Force officer temporarily  stationed  on a submarine , and is often mentioned  लकिन  is only seen in person during  the   श्रेणी  finale episode  ,  `` iGoodbye '' .
westlife  were an Irish boy band which formed  in  1998 and disbanded in 2012 .
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and managed by Louis Walsh , the group 's final line-up consisted  of  Nicky Byrne , Kian  egan  , Mark Feehily and Shane Filan .
ब्रायन  McFadden was a member from 1998  जबतक  his departure in  2004  .
Westlife sold over 50 million records worldwide , a total that included studio albums , singles , video releases , and compilation albums .
The group  संचित  14 number-one singles in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom ( the third-highest in  uk  history ) ,  tying  with Cliff Richard and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley  .
They achieved a total of 26 top ten singles  over  their 14-year career .
By 2010 , Westlife was listed  in   the   गिनीज  World Records , as the UK 's top-selling album  समूह  of  the  21st century .
They also won The Record  of  the Year  (  the only music award based on public votes in the UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012 ,  the   आधिकारिक  Charts Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling  singles  artists in British music history  .
Despite their European and Asian success , Westlife never  प्रबंधित   to  break into the U.S. market , achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again `` .
In October 2011 ,  westlife  announced their intention to split in 2012  ,  following their  महानतम  Hits Tour and the release of their Greatest Hits album .
The boyband 's final concerts were held on 22 and 23 June 2012 at Croke Park Stadium in Dublin .
The first  विदाई   कॉन्सर्ट  , offering 85,000 tickets , sold out in a record-breaking 5 minutes and the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide  .
Vitamin  a  is a group of  nutritionally  unsaturated hydrocarbons , which include retinol  ,  retinal , retinoic acid and several provitamin A carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the most important .
Vitamin A has multiple functions , it is important for growth and development , for the maintenance of the immune system and good vision .
विटामिन  A is needed by the retina of the eye  in  the form of retinal , which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule  ,  that is necessary for both low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color  दृष्टि  .
विटामिन   a  also functions  in  a very different  भूमिका  as an  irreversibly  oxidized form of retinol  ज्ञात  as retinoic acid , which is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial and other cells  .
In foods of animal origin , the major  रूप  of vitamin A is an ester , primarily retinyl palmitate , which is converted to retinol  (  chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine .
The retinol form functions as a storage  रूप   of  the  विटामिन  , and can be converted to and from its visually active aldehyde  रूप  ,  retinal  .
The associated acid ( retinoic acid )  ,  a metabolite that can be irreversibly synthesized from vitamin A , has only partial vitamin A activity  ,  and does not function in the retina for the visual cycle .
Retinoic acid is used for growth and cellular differentiation .
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to which an isoprenoid chain is attached , called a  retinyl  group .
Both structural features are essential  लिये  vitamin activity .
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as  दो  connected retinyl groups , which are used in the body to contribute  to  vitamin A levels .
Alpha-carotene and  gamma-carotene  also have a single retinyl group  ,  which give  उन्हें  some vitamin activity .
None of the other carotenes have  विटामिन  activity .
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and has vitamin  कार्यकलाप  in humans .
Vitamin A can be found in two principal forms in foods :
Retinol , the form of vitamin A absorbed when eating animal food  स्त्रोत   ,   is  a yellow , fat-soluble substance .
Since the pure  दारू  form is unstable ,  the  vitamin is found in tissues in  a  form of retinyl ester .
it  is also commercially produced and administered as esters such as retinyl acetate or palmitate .
The carotenes alpha-carotene , beta-carotene , gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone  बजती  ) , but no other carotenoids , function as provitamin A in herbivores  और   सर्वाहारी  animals , which possess the enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol .
In general , carnivores are  ग़रीब  converters of ionine-containing carotenoids , and pure  carnivores  such as cats and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and can not convert any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being  फ़ॉर्म  of vitamin A for  ये  species ) .
Selena Marie Gomez  (  born July 22 , 1992 ) is an  अमरीकी  singer and actress .
She made her debut as a child actress in Barney & Friends .
In 2007 , Gomez came to prominence as a starring cast member in the television  श्रेणी  Wizards  of  Waverly Place .
She signed to Hollywood Records the following year , and became the founder and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene .
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ) , A Year Without Rain ( 2010  )  , and When  the  Sun Goes  bas  ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of  अमेरिका  ( RIAA )  और  have spawned  platinum-certified  singles `` Naturally ``  ,  `` Who Says  ``   ,  and `` Love You like a Love  सोंग   ``  .
After the release of television films and their accompanying soundtracks ,  गोमेज़  made her theatrical film debut in Ramona and Beezus in 2010 and starred  in  Monte Carlo in 2011 .
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place and the  अंतराल  of Selena Gomez & the Scene  in  2012 , she focused on her film career , serving  as  a voice actress  in  Hotel Transylvania and starring  in   वसन्त  Breakers the following year .
Her  डेब्यू  solo album is tentatively scheduled  to  be released in summer 2013 , and  is  preceded  by  its lead single `` Come  &  Get It `` .
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry , Gomez is involved in  परोपकारी  activities through  दान  work and various  सोशल  and environmental causes .
Tracie Monique  स्पेंसर   (  born July 12 , 1976 ) is an American R & B and pop singer-songwriter  ,  actress , and model .
Sacramento is the capital city of  the  U.S. state of California and the seat of government of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River  और  the  अमरीकी  River in the northern portion of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   's  expansive Central Valley  .
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891 ,  it  is the sixth-largest city in California and the 35th largest city in the United States .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic  बीच  of the Sacramento metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area  is  the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area , San  फ्रांसिस्को  Bay Area , and the San Diego metropolitan area , as well as the 25th largest in the United  राज्य  .
Sacramento was cited  by  Time  पत्रिका  as  अमेरिका  's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of  the  Swiss immigrant John Sutter ,  sr.   ,  his son John Sutter , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly  धन्यवाद   to  the protection of Sutter  's  Fort , which  थी  established by Sutter  in  1839 .
During the California Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major distribution point , a commercial and agricultural center , and  a  terminus  लिये  wagon trains , stagecoaches , riverboats , the telegraph  ,  the Pony Express , and the  पहला  Transcontinental Railroad  .
California State University  ,  Sacramento , more commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State , is the largest local university .
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system .
Drexel University Sacramento is located in Downtown , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of Law is located  in  the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California , Davis is located in nearby Davis , west of the capital .
The UC  डेविस  Medical Center , a world-renowned research hospital  ,  is located in the city of Sacramento .
Memorial Day is a United States federal holiday which occurs every  साल  on the final Monday of May .
Memorial  दिन  is a  दिन  of remembering the men and women who died while serving in the United States Armed Forces .
Formerly known as Decoration  दिन  , it originated after  the  American Civil  युद्ध  to commemorate the  संघ  and Confederate soldiers who died  in  the Civil War .
By the 20th century Memorial Day had been extended to honor all Americans  जो  have died in all  युद्धों  .
It typically marks the start  of  the summer vacation season  ,  while Labor Day marks its end .
Many people visit cemeteries and memorials , particularly to honor those who have died in military service .
Many volunteers place an American flag on each grave in national cemeteries .
By the early 20th century , Memorial Day was an  अवसर  for more general expressions of memory , as people visited the  क़ब्रों  of their deceased relatives in church  कब्रिस्तान   ,  whether they had served in the military or not .
it  also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to shopping , family gatherings , fireworks , trips to  the  beach ,  और  national media  कार्यक्रम  .
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries are held on a Sunday in late spring or early summer in some rural areas of the American South , notably in the mountains .
In cases involving a  परिवार  graveyard where remote ancestors as well as those who were deceased more recently are buried , this may take  on  the character of an extended family  पुनर्मिलन  to which some people  सफर  hundreds of miles .
People gather on the designated day and put flowers on graves and  नवीनीकृत  contacts with kinfolk and others .
There often is a religious service and a `` dinner on the ground , '' the  परंपरागत  term for a potluck meal in which people used to spread the dishes out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass .
it  is believed that this practice began  पहले  the American Civil War and thus may reflect the real origin of the `` memorial  दिन  '' idea .
Memorial Day is not to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering  the   मेन   और  women who died while  सेवारत  , while Veterans Day celebrates the  सेवा  of all  u.S.  military veterans ,  जीना   or  dead .
Mt . Zion Church state history  मार्कर  near Philadelphia , Mississippi .
Freedom Summer  (  also known  as  the Mississippi Summer Project ) was  a  campaign in the United States launched in  जून  1964 to attempt to register as many African American voters as  संभावित  in Mississippi , which had  historically  excluded most  अश्वेतों  from voting .
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools , Freedom Houses , and community centers in small towns  throughout  Mississippi to aid the local black population .
The project was  व्यवस्थित   by  the Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ) , a coalition of the  मिसिसिपी  branches of the four major civil rights organizations ( SNCC , CORE , NAACP and SCLC ) .
Most of the impetus , leadership , and  financing  for the Summer Project came from the SNCC .
Robert Parris Moses , SNCC field secretary and co-director of COFO , directed the summer project .
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music genre that originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep South  ``  of the United States around the end of the 19th century from spirituals , work songs , field hollers , shouts and chants , and rhymed simple  कथा  ballads .
The blues form , ubiquitous  in  jazz , rhythm and blues  ,  and rock and roll is  characterized   by  specific chord progressions ,  of  which the twelve-bar blues chord progression is the most common .
the  blue notes that , for expressive purposes are  सुंग   or  played flattened or gradually bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in relation to the pitch of the major scale , are also an important part of the sound .
The blues genre is based on the blues form but possesses  अन्य  characteristics such  as  specific lyrics ,  बास  lines , and instruments .
Blues can be subdivided into several  subgenres  ranging from country to urban blues that  यहूद   अधिक  or less popular  दौरान  different periods of the 20th century .
Best known are the Delta ,  piedmont  , Jump , and Chicago blues styles .
World  युद्ध  II marked the transition from acoustic to electric  ब्लूज़  and the progressive opening of blues music to a wider audience , especially white listeners .
In the 1960s and  1970s  , a hybrid form called blues-rock evolved .
The term `` the  ब्लूज़  '' refers to the `` blue  शैतानों  '' , meaning melancholy  और  sadness ; an early use of the term in this sense is found in George Colman 's one-act farce Blue Devils ( 1798 )  .
Though the use of  the  phrase in African-American music may be older , it has been attested  to  since 1912 , when Hart Wand 's `` Dallas Blues `` became the first  स्वत्वाधिकार  blues composition .
In lyrics the  phrase  is often used to describe a depressed mood .
A quarter dollar , commonly shortened to quarter , is a coin worth 1⁄4 of a United States dollar or 25 cents .
The quarter  रै  been produced since 1796 .
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination , as  opposed  to 20¢ which is more common in other parts of the world , originated with the practice of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ) .
At  एक  time `` two bits `` , i.e . two wedges , each wedge an  आठवीं  , thus a quarter of the Spanish real , was a common nickname for a quarter  .
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican holiday  मनाये  throughout  मैक्सिको  and around the world in other cultures .
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family and  मित्रों  to pray for and  याद  friends and family members who  have   died  .
It is  विशेषकर  celebrated in  मैक्सिको  , where it  is  a national holiday ,  और  all banks are closed .
The celebration takes  प्लेस  on November 1 and 2  ,  in connection with the Catholic holidays of All Saints ' Day and All Souls ' Day .
Traditions connected with  the  holiday include  भवन  private altars honoring the  मृतक  using sugar skulls , marigolds , and the favorite foods and beverages of the departed and visiting graves with these as gifts .
They also leave possessions of the  मृतक  .
Scholars trace the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to indigenous observances dating back hundreds of years and to an Aztec festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl .
the  holiday has spread throughout the world :  in  Brazil , Dia de Finados is a  पब्लिक  holiday that  अनेक   brazilians  celebrate by visiting cemeteries and churches .
In Spain , there are festivals and parades , and , at the end of the day , people gather at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones .
Similar  observances  occur elsewhere in Europe , and similarly themed celebrations appear in many Asian and African cultures .
ANITA Mk  viii  .
the  ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched simultaneously in late  1961  as the  संसार  's first all- electronic desktop calculators  .
Designed and built by the Bell Punch Co .
in Britain , and marketed through  इसके  Sumlock Comptometer division ,  वे  used vacuum tubes and cold-cathode switching tubes in their logic circuits and nixie tubes for their numerical displays .
They were the first of a  श्रेणी  of desktop and hand-held electronic calculators that the company was to develop  और  sell under the ANITA name into the  mid-1970s  .
George Washington ( – ,  1799  ) was the first President of the United States ( 1789–1797  )  ,  the  commander-in-chief  of  the Continental  फौज  during the  अमरीकी   क्रांतिकारी  War , and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States .
He presided over the convention  कि  drafted the Constitution ,  जिससे  replaced the  आलेख  of Confederation and established the  स्थिति  of President .
Washington  थी  elected President as the unanimous choice of the 69 electors in 1788 ,  और  he served two terms in office .
He oversaw the creation of a strong ,  well-financed  national government that maintained neutrality in the wars raging in Europe , suppressed rebellion ,  और  won acceptance among Americans of all types .
His  नेतृत्व  style established many forms and rituals of  सरकारी  that  have  been used since , such  as   using  a cabinet system and  delivering  an inaugural address .
Further , the peaceful transition from his presidency to the presidency of John Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st  सदी  .
Washington was hailed as `` father of  उसके  country `` even during his lifetime .
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of Colonial Virginia ; his wealthy planter family owned tobacco plantations and slaves  .
After both his father and older brother died when he was young , Washington became personally and professionally attached to the powerful William Fairfax , who promoted his career as a surveyor and soldier .
Washington quickly became a senior officer in the  औपनिवेशिक  forces during the first stages of the French and Indian War .
Chosen by the  दूसरी  Continental Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the Continental Army in the American Revolution , Washington managed to force the British  आउट  of Boston in  1776  , but was defeated and  लगभग  captured later that year when he lost New York City .
After crossing the Delaware River in the  मुर्दे  of winter , he defeated the British  in   दो   लड़ाइयों  , retook New Jersey and restored  आवेग   to  the Patriot cause .
Because of his strategy  ,  Revolutionary forces  captured  two major British armies at Saratoga in 1777 and Yorktown  in  1781 .
इतिहासकारों  laud Washington for  उसके   चयन  and supervision of his generals , encouragement of  मनोबल  and ability to hold together the army ,  समन्वय  with the state governors and state militia units , relations with Congress and attention to supplies ,  लोजिस्टिक्स  , and training .
In battle ,  however  , Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered by  अंग्रेजों  generals with larger armies .
बाद  victory had been finalized in 1783 , Washington resigned  as  Commander-in-chief rather than seize power , proving his opposition to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism  .
Dissatisfied with the weaknesses of the  आलेख  of Confederation , in 1787 Washington presided over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the  संयुक्त  States Constitution  .
Elected  unanimously  as  the  first President of the United States in 1789 , he attempted to bring rival factions together to unify the nation  .
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to pay off  सब  state and national  कर्ज़  , to implement an  प्रभावी  tax system and  to  create a national bank ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ) .
Washington proclaimed the United  राज्य  neutral in the wars raging in  यूरोपीय   बाद   1793  .
He avoided war with Great Britain and guaranteed a decade of  सलाम  and profitable trade by securing the Jay Treaty in  1795   ,  despite  तीव्र  opposition from the  jeffersonians  .
Although never officially joining the Federalist Party  ,  he supported its programs .
Washington 's Farewell Address was an influential primer  on  republican virtue and  a  warning against partisanship  ,   sectionalism  , and involvement in foreign wars .
He  रिटायर्ड  from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his home , Mount Vernon ,  और  his domestic life where he managed  a  variety of enterprises .
He freed all his slaves by his final will .
Washington had a  दृष्टि  of a great and powerful nation that would be  निर्मित  on republican lines using federal power .
He sought to use the  नेशनल  government to preserve liberty , improve infrastructure , open  the  western  lands  , promote commerce , found a permanent capital , reduce regional tensions and promote a spirit of American nationalism .
at   उसके  death , Washington was eulogized as `` first in war , first in peace , and first in the hearts of his countrymen '' by Henry Lee .
the  Federalists made him  the  symbol of their party but for many years , the Jeffersonians continued to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument .
As the leader of the first successful revolution against  a  colonial empire in world  इतिहास  , Washington became an international icon for liberation and nationalism  ,  especially in France and Latin America .
Fiscal Year 2012 U.S. Federal Spending  –  Cash or Budget Basis .
Fiscal Year 2012 U.S. Federal Receipts .
The Budget of the United States Government often begins as the President 's proposal to the U.S.  कॉंग्रेस  which recommends funding levels for the next fiscal year , beginning October 1 .
However , Congress is the body required by law to pass a budget annually and  to  submit the budget passed by both houses to the President for signature .
Congressional decisions are governed by rules and legislation regarding the federal budget process .
Budget committees set spending limits for the  हाउस  and Senate committees and for Appropriations subcommittees , which then approve individual appropriations bills to allocate funding  to   विभिन्न  federal  कार्यक्रम  .
If Congress  fails  to  pass  an annual budget ( as has been the case since 2009 ) , a series of Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop gap  ''  measures .
After Congress approves an appropriations bill  ,  it is sent to the President , who may sign  it  into law , or may veto  it  ( as he would a budget when passed  by  the Congress ) .
a  vetoed bill is sent  वापस   to  Congress , which can pass it into law with a two-thirds majority in each chamber .
Congress may also combine all or some appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation bill .
In  जोड  , the president may request and the  कॉंग्रेस  may pass supplemental appropriations bills or emergency supplemental appropriations bills .
Several government agencies  provide  budget data and analysis .
These include the Government Accountability  दफ्तर  (  gao  ) , Congressional Budget Office , the Office of Management and Budget ( OMB ) and the U.S. Treasury Department .
These agencies have reported that the federal government is facing a series of  महत्वपूर्ण  financing challenges .
In the short-run , tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession and tax policy choices , while  expenditures  have expanded for wars , unemployment insurance and other safety net spending .
In  the  long-run , expenditures related to healthcare programs such as Medicare and Medicaid are projected to grow faster than the economy overall as the population matures .
New Guinea ( also , Tok Pisin : Niugini , Dutch : Nieuw Guinea , and ; historically : Papua )  is  the world 's second largest island , after Greenland , covering a land area of 786,000 km2 .
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean , it lies geographically to  the  east of the Malay Archipelago ,  साथ  which it is sometimes included  as  part of a  वृहद  Indo-Australian Archipelago .
Geologically it is a part of the same tectonic  थाली  as Australia .
When world sea levels were  कम  , the  दो  shared shorelines  (  which now  झूठ   100  to 140 metres below sea level ) , combining with lands now inundated into the tectonic continent of  sahul  , also known as Greater Australia .
The two landmasses became  अलग  when the area now known as the Torres Strait flooded after the end of the last glacial period .
Anthropologically , New Guinea is considered part  of  Melanesia .
Politically , the western half of the island comprises two Indonesian provinces : Papua and West Papua .
The  पूर्वी  half forms the mainland of the  देश  of Papua New Guinea .
The island has a  जनसांख्यिकी  of about 7.5 million , with a very low population density of  तभी  8 inh/km2 .
New Guinea is differentiated from its drier , flatter , and less fertile southern counterpart , Australia ,  by  its much  उच्चतर  rainfall and its active volcanic geology , with its highest point , Puncak Jaya ,  reaching  an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ) .
Yet the two  जमीन  masses share a similar animal fauna , with marsupials ,  सहित  wallabies and possums , and the egg-laying monotreme , the spiny anteater ,  or   एकिडना  .
Other than bats and some two dozen indigenous  कृंतक  genera , there are no  pre-human   स्वदेशी  placental  स्तनधारियों  .
Pigs , several additional species  of  rats , and the ancestor of the New Guinea Singing Dog were introduced with  इंसान   colonization  .
The human presence on the island dates back at  तनिक  40,000 years to the oldest human migrations out of Africa .
Research indicates that the  हाइलैंड्स   यहूद  an early and independent center of agriculture , with evidence of irrigation going back at least  10,000   सालो  .
Because of the time depth of its  inhabitation  and its highly fractured landscape  ,  an unusually high number of languages are spoken on the island , with some 1,000 languages ( a figure higher  than  that of  सबसे  continents ) having  महरूम  catalogued out of an estimated world-wide  pre-columbian  total of  6,000  human dialects .
Most are classified as Papuan languages , a generally accepted  भौगोलिक   पद   जिससे  a minority of authors  थाम  to be a genetic one .
A number of  ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई   भाषाएं  are spoken on the coast  और  on offshore islands .
In the  16th  century Spanish  explorers  discovered the island and called  it  Nueva Guinea .
In recent history western New Guinea was included in the Dutch East Indies colony .
The Germans annexed the northern coast of  the  eastern half of the island as German New Guinea in their pre–World War I effort to establish themselves as a colonial  शक्ति  , whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly  claimed  by Britain .
Following the  सन्धि  of  versailles  , the German  portion  was awarded to Australia ( which was already governing the British claim , named the  territory  of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate .
The eastern half of the island was granted independence from Australia as Papua New Guinea in 1975 .
the  western half gained independence from the Dutch in 1961 , but became part of Indonesia soon  afterwards  in controversial circumstances .
`` The Van Buren Boys ''  is   the  148th episode of the sitcom Seinfeld  ,  and name of a fictional New York  गली  gang .
Their sign is crossing  the  hands , with  एक  hand with all the fingers 'up ' and spread  आउट  .
The other hand has all but the thumb and pointer finger up , for a total of eight ( 8 ) .
The gang  is   नामित  for  the  8th President of the United States , Martin Van  buren  ( who was  the  first president  इससे  New York  )  .
This was the 14th episode for the 8th  ऋतु  .
It aired on February 6 , 1997 .
Bevo sign
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt beverage , or  निकट   बियर  , brewed in the United States  by  the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century .
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success  दौरान  the time of prohibition ,  जब  beer , wine and distilled liquors , were made illegal for thirteen years .
The Anheuser-Busch company started brewing Bevo when alcoholic beverages were prohibited in 1916 by the United States armed forces .
Production rose greatly with  नेशनल  prohibition in 1919 , and Bevo was  by  far the most popular  of  the many ``  खाद्यान्न  beverages '' or `` near beers '' of the time .
at  the  शिखर  of its popularity in the early 1920s , more than five million cases of Bevo were sold annually  .
Renard with a mug  of  Bevo , depicted in terra cotta on the  आंतरिक  walls of the Bevo building , St. Louis
लेबल्स  on the bottles billed it as `` Bevo the Beverage '' .
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from the word `` beverage ''  और  the Slavic language word for beer `` pivo ''  ,  and was  सुनाया  ``  bee-vo  '' .
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` Renard  the  Fox `` ( based on the protagonist of a medieval French  folk-tale  ) ,  और  promotional mugs with  इस  character were manufactured .
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a  श्रेणी  of boat-bodied cars in its  st.  Louis shops called the `` Bevo Boats '' which were used for promotion  .
Seven are believed to have been  निर्मित  on Pierce-Arrow 8-cylinder chassis while one surviving example  थी  based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8 .
बिलबोर्ड  advertising Bevo in Trenton , New Jersey , 1917
A contemporary advertisement read `` Cooling and invigorating , Bevo the  पेय  .
Order by the  मामला  from your grocer , druggist , or dealer  .  ''
The paper label  on  the back of the bottle read ``  the  All-Year-Round Soft  पेय   .
Appetizing - Healthful - Nutritious - Refreshing .
Milk or water may contain bacteria .
bevo  never  करता   .  ''
Bevo became part  of  the  लोकप्रिय  culture of the time  ,  and is mentioned in various popular songs and Vaudeville skits of the era .
This led to secondary slang uses of the word ; for  उदाहरण   ,  in American military slang a young and inexperienced officer was called a  ``  Bevo '' .
The University  of  Texas named its mascot `` Bevo ''  ,  a name which  रै  stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included  a  paean to the drink , ``  तुम  Ca n't Stay  up  on Bevo '' , in his 1917  फौज   revue  , Yip Yip  yaphank  .
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg beer  और  liquor as well as `` homebrew `` , cut into Bevo  's  marketshare .
With sales flattening to 100,000 cases  by  1929 , Anheuser-Busch  रोका  production  .
The Bevo Mill ,  st.  Louis  ,  in 2008
The Bevo  भवन  , with the Renard character prominently displayed at the corners , still operates  as  a bottling  सुविधा  at their main  ब्रेवरी  in St. Louis , Missouri .
The landmark  bevo  Mill , constructed by August Anheuser Busch , Sr.  in  1917 .
It was closed in 2009  ,   लकिन  it reopened in  अक्तूबर  2009 under new owners .
Bevo is also mentioned in the  छोटी   स्टोरी  `` The Killers `` by  अर्नेस्ट  Hemingway  ;  as well as in Babbitt  by  Sinclair Lewis .
Mylanta is  an   over  the counter medication used for the treatment of acid reflux , heartburn ,  और  gastroesophageal reflux disease  (  also known as GERD ) .
Foremilk and Hindmilk samples of human breast  मिल्क
A  कांच   of  pasteurized  गाय  milk
Milk is a white liquid produced by  the  mammary glands of mammals .
It is the  प्राथमिक  source of nutrition  लिये  young mammals before they are able to digest other types of food .
Early-  lactation  milk contains colostrum , which carries  the  mother 's antibodies to the baby and can reduce the risk  of  many diseases in  the  baby .
It also contains many other nutrients .
As  an  agricultural product ,  मिल्क  is extracted from  स्तनधारियों  and  प्रयुक्त  as food for humans .
Worldwide , dairy farms  उत्पादित   परिचय  730 million tonnes of milk in  2011  .
India is the world 's largest producer and consumer  of  milk , yet neither  निर्यात   nor  imports milk .
New  जीलैंड  , the European Union 's 27  सदस्य  states , Australia , and the  संयुक्त  States are the world 's largest exporters of milk  और  milk products .
China and Russia are the world 's largest importers of milk and milk products .
Throughout the world , there are more than 6 billion consumers of milk and milk products  .
Over 750 million people  सजीव  within dairy farming households .
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition and food security particularly in developing countries .
Improvements in livestock and dairy technology offer  significant  promise in reducing poverty and malnutrition in the  संसार  .
Motorcycle  स्पीडवे   ,  usually referred to as speedway , is a motorcycle sport  involving  four  और  sometimes up to  छह  riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an  ओवल  circuit .
Speedway motorcycles use  तभी  one gear and have no brakes and racing  takes  place on  a  flat oval track usually  consisting  of dirt  or   loosely   packed   shale  .
Competitors use this surface to slide their  मशीने   बगलों  , powersliding or broadsiding  into  the bends  .
On the straight sections of the track the motorcycles reach speeds of up .
The  सटीक  origins of the sport  हैं  unknown but  वहीँ  is evidence of a type of speedway racing  होने  practised  in  the USA before  the  First World War and in Australia in the late 1910s and  जल्दी  1920s .
There are now both domestic and international  प्रतियोगिताओं  in a number of countries including the Speedway World Cup whilst the highest overall scoring individual in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion .
स्पीडवे  is popular  in  central and northern Europe and to a lesser extent in Australia and  उत्तर  America .
A variant of track racing , speedway is administered internationally by the Fédération  internationale  de Motocyclisme ( FIM  )  .
Domestic speedway events are regulated by FIM affiliated national motor  खेल  federations  .
Vitamin D is a  समूह  of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible for intestinal absorption  of  calcium and phosphate .
In humans , the most  महत्वपूर्ण  related compounds of  विटामिन  D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin  d2  ) are unique as they constitute what we know as vitamin  d  and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The body can also  synthesize   विटामिन  D ( from cholesterol )  जब  sun exposure is adequate ( hence its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a  विटामिन  , it is not  दरअसल   an  essential  dietary  vitamin in the  सख्त  sense , as  it   can  be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed  to   धूप   .
( Cats and dogs can  नहीं  synthesize vitamin D efficiently and must receive it in their diet . )
An organic  रासायनिक  compound ( or related set  of  compounds ) is only scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized  in  sufficient quantities by an  सजीव  , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins , vitamin D  थी  discovered in an effort to find the  dietary  substance that was lacking in a  बीमारी  , namely , rickets , the childhood form of  osteomalacia   .
Additionally , like  अन्य  compounds called vitamins , in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid disease  due   to  deficiency .
Measures of  सीरम  levels reflect endogenous synthesis  इससे  exposure to sunlight as well as intake  इससे   the  diet , and it is believed  कि  synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates  कि  the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that  रोकता  toxicity  लकिन  , because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from sunlight , no recommendations are issued by the  संस्थान  of Medicine  ,  USA , for the amount  of   सूर्य  exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements  .
तदनुसार  , the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs and that all  of  a person  's  vitamin D is from their  आहार   ,  although that will  rarely   occur  in practice .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated  25  ( OH ) D ; and which  is  the specific vitamin  d  metabolite that is measured in serum to  determine  a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol , the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in  the  blood , regulating the concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and  promoting  the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted  to  calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes , such as the proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol  भी  affects neuromuscular function and inflammation  .
Beyond its use to  prevent   osteomalacia   or  rickets  ,  the evidence for other  स्वास्थ्य  effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent .
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women .
The Duramax is a General Motors diesel engine family  लिये  light- and medium  ड्यूटी  trucks , designed by Isuzu .
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by DMAX  ,  a joint venture between GM and  isuzu  in Moraine , Ohio .
This engine was initially installed in 2001 model year Chevy and GMC trucks and has been an option since  तब  in pickups , vans , and medium-duty trucks .
In 2006 ,  उत्पादन  at Moraine was reportedly limited to  लगभग  200,000 engines per  साल  .
On May 9 , 2007  ,   dmax  announced the production of the 1,000,000th Duramax V-8 diesel at its Moraine facility .

is also a traditional written abbreviation for Baltimore ,  मेरीलैंड  .

Balto ( 1919 – March 14 , 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled dog who led his  टोली  on the final leg of the 1925 serum run to Nome , in  जिससे  diphtheria antitoxin was transported  इससे  Anchorage , Alaska , to Nenana  ,  Alaska , by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease .
The run is commemorated by the annual Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race .
Balto was named after the Sami explorer Samuel Balto .
Balto  died  at the age of 14  .

The Nissan  उच्चिष्ट  is  a  mid-size  /  entry-level luxury car manufactured by Nissan , marketed as the `` four-door sports car '' .
The origins of the Maxima  began  in July 1976 as the Datsun 810 , an upscale six-cylinder version of the Bluebird , and was  spun  into its own line in 1981 , having been  बना  continuously since then .
The ``  उच्चिष्ट  '' name was applied gradually , beginning  in   1981  .
Most pre-2004 Maximas were built in Oppama ,  जापानी   ,  until the current North  अमरीकी  Maximas started being assembled in Smyrna , Tennessee .
The  ``  Maxima '' has  भी  been applied to Cefiros  और  Laurels in various  बाज़ार  .
Propolis  as  hive sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that honey bees collect from tree buds , sap flows , or other botanical sources .
It is used as a sealant for  अनावश्यक  open spaces in the hive  .
Propolis is used for small gaps ( approximately or less ) , while larger spaces are usually filled  साथ  beeswax .
Its color varies depending on its botanical source , the most common being  अंधेरा  brown .
Propolis is sticky at  और   ऊपर  room temperature , .
at   निम्नतर  temperatures , it becomes hard and very brittle .
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26 , 1948 ) is  an  American singer ,  songwriter  ,  और  multi-instrumentalist , best known as  the   frontman  and lead singer of the Boston -based rock band Aerosmith , in which he also plays the harmonica , and occasional piano and percussion .
He is known as  the  `` Demon of  screamin  ' '' due to his  ऊँची  screams and his wide vocal range .
He is also known for his on-stage acrobatics .
During his high-energy performances , he  प्रायः  dresses  in  bright  ,  colorful outfits with his trademark  स्कार्फ  hanging from his microphone stand .
In the 1970s , Tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith , which released such milestone hard rock albums as Toys in the Attic and Rocks .
in  the late 1970s and early 1980s  ,   टायलर  had a heavy drug and alcohol  व्यसन  ,  और  the band 's popularity waned .
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986  और  subsequently maintained sobriety for over 20 years , but had a relapse with prescription painkillers in the  लेट   2000s  ,  लिये  which he successfully received treatment in 2009 .
बाद  Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in  the  late 1980s and early 1990s with the albums Permanent Vacation , Pump , and Get a Grip , Tyler became a household name and has remained a  प्रासंगिक  rock icon .
As a result , he has since embarked on several solo endeavors including guest appearances on other artists ' music , film  और  TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ) ,  authoring  a bestselling book ,  और  solo work ( including a Top 40 hit single in  2011  ) .
However , he has continued to  रिकार्ड  music and perform with Aerosmith , after  अधिक  than 43 years  in  the band .
The band 's latest album , Music from Another Dimension !
, was released on  नवम्बर  6 , 2012 .
Tyler is included among Rolling Stones 100 Greatest Singers .
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit Parader 's Top 100 Metal Vocalists  of  All Time .
In 2001 he  थी  inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame with Aerosmith , and he was the  प्रस्तुतकर्ता  when AC/DC was inducted into  the  Hall of Fame in 2003 .
In 2013 , Tyler  और  his songwriting partner Joe Perry will  be  recipients of the ASCAP Founders Award and will also be  inducted  into the Songwriters Hall of Fame .
The liver produces urea in the urea cycle as a waste product of the digestion of protein .
Normal  इंसान  adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of urea nitrogen per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood .
Individual laboratories may have different reference  सीमाएँ  , and this is because  the  procedure may vary .
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2  ,  1940 ) is a former American football  कोच  and college and professional  फ़ुटबॉल  player who  थी  the head  कोच  of the NFL 's Detroit Lions  इससे  1988 to 1996  .
His 67  विन्स  and 71  नुकसान   हैं  each the most for a head coach in  टोली  history  .
The Jews ( ISO  259-3  Israeli pronunciation ) , also known as the Jewish people , are a nation and an ethnoreligious group , originating in  the  Israelites or Hebrews of  the  Ancient Near  ईस्ट  .
The Jewish ethnicity  ,  nationality , and religion are strongly interrelated , as Judaism is  the  traditional faith of the Jewish nation .
Converts to Judaism , whose status as Jews within the Jewish ethnos is equal to those born into it , have been absorbed into the Jewish people  throughout  the millennia .
In Jewish tradition , Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical patriarchs Abraham , Isaac and Jacob in the second  मिलेनियम  BCE .
The modern State of Israel  थी   स्थापित  as a Jewish nation-state  ,  and defines itself as such in its Basic Laws .
Its  विधि  of Return grants the right  of  citizenship to any Jew who  निवेदन   it  .
Israel is the only country where Jews are a majority of the population .
Jews also enjoyed political autonomy  twice  before  in  ancient history .
The first of  ये  periods lasted from 1350 to 586 BCE  ,  and encompassed the periods of the Judges , the United Monarchy , and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel and Judah  ,  ending with the destruction of the First Temple .
The second was the period of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning from 140 to 37 BCE .
Since the destruction of the First Temple , most Jews have lived  in  diaspora .
a  minority  in  every country in which  वे  live  (  except Israel )  ,  they have frequently experienced persecution throughout  इतिहास   ,  resulting in a population  कि   रै  fluctuated  दोनो   in  numbers and distribution over the centuries .
The world  यहूदी  population reached  a  peak of 15  लाख  prior to the Second World War ,  लकिन  six million Jews were killed in the  holocaust  .
चूंकि  then the population has risen  again  and , was estimated at 13.4 million by  the  North American Jewish Data Bank , or less than 0.2 % of the total world population ( roughly one in every  514  people ) .
According to  इस  report  ,  about 42.5 % of all Jews reside  in  Israel ( 5.7 million )  ,  and 39.3 % in the United States ( 5.3 million ) , with most of the remainder living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ) .
These numbers  शामिल  all those who consider themselves  यहूदियों  , whether or not they are affiliated with  a   यहूदी  organization .
The total world Jewish population , however , is difficult to measure .
In addition to  मुद्दे  with census methodology , there are halakhic disputes regarding who is a Jew and  धर्मनिरपेक्ष  , political , and ancestral identification factors that may affect the figure  considerably  .
