The Feast of Corpus Christi ( Latin for Body of Christ ) , also known as Corpus Domini , is a Latin Rite  liturgical  solemnity celebrating the tradition and belief  in  the  देह  and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist , which was observed on Holy Thursday in  the  somber atmosphere of the nearness of Good Friday  .
In the present Roman Missal , the feast is designated the solemnity of  the   सबसे  Holy Body and Blood of Christ .
It is also celebrated in some Anglican , Lutheran , and Old Catholic Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence .
the  feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after  ट्रिनिटी  Sunday or  ,  ``  जहाँ   the  Solemnity of the Most Holy Body  और  Blood of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation , it is assigned to  the   संडे  after the Most Holy Trinity as its proper  दिन  '' .
At the end of Holy Mass , there  is  often a procession of the Blessed  sacrament  , generally displayed in  a  monstrance .
The procession is followed by  सुनाकर  of the Blessed Sacrament .
a  notable Eucharistic procession is that  presided  over by the Pope each year in Rome , where it begins at the Archbasilica of St.  जॉन  Lateran and makes  इसके   रास्ता  to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major , where it  concludes  with Benediction .
c-reactive  protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood , the levels of which rise in response to inflammation ( i.e .  c-reactive  protein is an acute-phase protein ) .
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine  expressed   on  the surface of dead or  मरना   कोशिकाएं  ( and some types of bacteria ) in order to activate  the  complement system  via  the C1Q complex .
CRP is synthesized by the liver in response to factors released by macrophages and fat cells ( adipocytes  )  .
It is a member of the pentraxin family of  प्रोटीन  .
It is not related to C-peptide or protein C .
C-reactive protein was the first pattern recognition receptor ( PRR ) to be identified  .
The start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is  typically  dated to 1492 ,  जब  a  स्पेनी  expedition headed by Christopher Columbus sailed for  इण्डिया  to open trade but inadvertently discovered the Americas .
European conquest , large-scale exploration and colonization soon followed .
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied  साथ  many internal wars and was slowly recovering  इससे  the many deaths that the bubonic plague caused , the rapid  विस्तार  at which it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s .
The  पहला  expeditions occurred along the Caribbean  coasts  on the islands of Hispaniola  ,  Puerto Rico and Cuba , and  बाद  1500 extended into the interiors of both  उत्तर  and South America .
In 1497 , sailing from the north on behalf of England , John Cabot landed on the North American  coast  , and a year later , Columbus 's third voyage reached the South American coast .
फ़्रांस  founded colonies in much of eastern North America , on  a  number of  caribbean  islands  ,  and  in  South America .
Portugal colonized Brazil .
Eventually , the entire Western Hemisphere came under the control of European governments ,  अग्रणी   to  profound changes to its landscape , population  ,  and plant and animal life .
In the  19th  century alone over 50  लाख  people left Europe for the Americas .
The post-1492 era is known as the period of the Columbian Exchange .
Keith Richards  (  born 18 December 1943 ) is  an  English musician , singer-songwriter  और  founder member of the English rock band the Rolling Stones  .
Rolling Stone magazine said Richards had created `` rock 's greatest single  देह   of  riffs '' , ranking him 4th on  इसके  list of 100 best guitarists  .
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with the Rolling Stones ' lead vocalist Mick Jagger are listed among Rolling  स्टोन  magazine 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time `` .
रिचर्ड्स  ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from  अनेक  drug busts during the late 1960s and 1970s and his candour regarding his addiction to and eventual  abstinence  from  हेरोइन  .
Testosterone is a steroid hormone from  the  androgen group and is found in mammals , reptiles , birds , and other vertebrates .
In mammals , testosterone is primarily secreted in the testicles of males and the ovaries of females , although small amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands .
It is the principal  पुरूष  sex hormone and an anabolic steroid .
In  मेन  ,  टेस्टोस्टेरोन  plays a key  भूमिका  in the development of male reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate as  खूब  as promoting  द्वितीयक  sexual characteristics such  as  increased muscle , bone mass , and the  विकास  of body hair .
In addition , testosterone is  अनिवार्य  for health and  well-being  as well as the prevention  of   ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस  .
On average , in adult human males , the plasma concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great  as  the concentration in adult human females  '  plasma , but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males is greater , the daily production is about 20 times greater in men .
Females also are more sensitive to the hormone .
Testosterone is observed in most vertebrates .
मछली  make a slightly  अलग  form called 11-ketotestosterone .
Its counterpart in insects is ecdysone .
These ubiquitous steroids suggest that sex hormones  have  an ancient evolutionary  इतिहास  .
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` natural '' but relatively homogeneous groupings are evident in  a   सांख्यिकीय  population .
It is often used in marketing research .
In  इस  technique , the total  जनसांख्यिकी  is divided into these groups ( or clusters ) and a simple random sample of the groups is selected .
Then the required information is collected  इससे  a simple random sample of the elements within each  चयनित   समूह  .
This may be done for every element in these groups or  a  subsample of elements may be selected within each of these groups .
A common  प्रेरणा  for cluster sampling is  to  reduce the total number of interviews and costs given the desired accuracy .
Assuming a fixed sample size , the technique gives  अधिक  accurate results when most of the variation in the population is within the groups , not between them .
Jamestown is a town in  guilford  County , North Carolina , United States , and is a suburb of the nearby cities of Greensboro and  ऊँची  Point .
The population was 3,382 at the 2010 census .
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie Hershlag ; ; June 9  ,  1981 ) is an actress and model with  डुअल  American and Israeli citizenship .
Her first role was as an orphan taken in by a hitman in the 1994 action film , but mainstream success came when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the  स्टार  Wars prequel trilogy  (  released in 1999 , 2002 and 2005 ) .
In 1999  ,  she enrolled at Harvard  विश्वविद्यालयों  to study psychology while still  working  as an actress .
She completed her bachelor 's  उपाधि  in 2003 .
In 2001  ,  Portman opened in New York City 's Public Theater production of Anton Chekhov 's The Seagull .
In 2005 , Portman received a nomination  लिये  the Academy Award for Best  supporting  Actress and won the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress  -  Motion Picture for the drama Closer .
She won a Constellation Award for Best Female  प्रदर्शन  and  a  Saturn Award  लिये  Best  अभिनेत्री  for her starring role in V for Vendetta (  2006  ) .
She played leading  भूमिकाएँ  in the historical dramas Goya 's Ghosts  (  2006  )  and The Other Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ) .
In  may  2008  ,  she served as the youngest member of the 61st Annual Cannes  फिल्मी  Festival jury .
पोर्टमैन  's directorial debut , Eve  ,  opened the 65th Venice International Film Festival 's shorts competition in 2008 .
Portman directed a segment of the collective film New York , I Love You .
In 2011 , Portman won the Academy Award ,  the  Golden Globe Award , the BAFTA Award , the  स्क्रीन  Actors Guild Award , and the Independent  स्पिरिट  Award for her lead performance as Nina Sayers in Black  swan  .
Copper is a chemical element with the symbol Cu ( from )  और   परमाणु  number  29  .
It is a ductile metal with very high thermal and electrical conductivity .
Pure copper is soft and malleable ; a  freshly  exposed surface has  a   reddish-orange  color .
It is used as a conductor of heat and electricity , a building material , and a constituent of  विभिन्न  metal  alloys  .
The metal and its alloys have been used for thousands of years .
In  the  Roman era , copper was principally mined on Cyprus , hence the  उत्पत्ति  of the name of the metal as сyprium ( metal of Cyprus )  ,  later shortened to  сuprum  .
Its compounds are commonly encountered as  तांबे  (  ii  )  लवण  ,  जिससे  often impart blue or green colors to minerals  ऐसे  as azurite and turquoise and  have  been widely  प्रयुक्त  historically as pigments  .
Architectural structures built with copper corrode to give green verdigris (  or  patina  )  .
Decorative art prominently features copper  ,  both by itself and as part  of  pigments .
Copper is essential to  सब  living organisms as a trace  dietary  mineral because it is a key  constituent  of the  respiratory  enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase .
in  molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent  of  the blood pigment hemocyanin , which is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish  और  other vertebrates .
The main areas where copper is  मिला  in vertebrates are liver , muscle and bone  .
In sufficient concentration , copper compounds are poisonous to higher organisms and are used as bacteriostatic substances , fungicides  ,   और  wood preservatives .
The major professional  खेल  leagues  ,  or simply major  लीग   ,  in the United States and Canada are the  उच्चतम  professional competitions of team sports in the  दो   देशों  .
हालांकि  individual sports such as golf , tennis , and auto racing are also  बहुत  popular , the  पद  is usually limited to team sports .
The  पद  `` major league '' was first used in 1921  in   सन्दर्भ  to Major League Baseball ( MLB ) , the top level of professional American baseball .
Today , the major northern North America professional team sports leagues are Major League Baseball  (  MLB  )  , the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) , the National Football League ( NFL ) ,  और  the National Hockey  लीग  (  एनएचएल  ) .
Other notable leagues include Major  लीग  Soccer ( MLS ) , the Canadian Football League ( CFL ) , the Arena Football League , Major League Lacrosse , the National Lacrosse League and the Women 's National  बास्केट   संघ  .
The NFL , MLB , NBA  ,  and NHL are commonly  referred  to as the Big Four .
Each of these  is  the richest professional club competition  in   इसके  sport worldwide .
The best players can become cultural  प्रतीक  in  दोनो  countries  और  elsewhere in the world , because the leagues enjoy a significant place in popular culture in the US and Canada .
The NFL  रै  32 teams , and the others have  30  each .
the  vast majority of  प्रमुख  league teams are concentrated in the most populous metropolitan  क्षेत्रों  of the United States .
Baseball ,  फ़ुटबॉल  , hockey , and soccer have had professional leagues  लिये   over  100 years ; early  लीग   ऐसे  as the  नेशनल  Association , Ohio League , and National Hockey Association formed the basis of the modern MLB , NFL and NHL respectively .
Soccer was first  professionalized  in 1894 , but leagues suffered greatly from  कमी   of  sustainability  और  seldom lasted more  than  a decade .
Soccer 's greatest successes were in the form of the American Soccer League (  1921-1933  ) , the  असली  North American Soccer League (  1968-1984  ) , the  नेशनल  Professional Soccer League  (  1984-2001 ) and , currently , Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ) .
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the NBA  विकसित  from the National Basketball League and its splinter group the Basketball Association of America , taking on its current form in 1949 .
Every major  लीग  averages 15,000  प्रशंसक  in  उपस्थिति   प्रति  game or higher as of 2011 .
Meridian Altitude is  an  astronomical navigation method of calculating an observer 's latitude .
Earned  मान  management ( EVM ) , or Earned value project/performance management ( EVPM ) is  a  project management technique for measuring project performance and progress in an objective manner .
Because EVM has the ability to  combine  measurements of :
scope
schedule
और  cost,
in a  सिंगल  integrated system , Earned Value Management is able to provide  सटीक  forecasts  of  project performance problems , which is  an   महत्वपूर्ण  contribution for project management .
Early EVM research showed that  the  areas of planning  और  control are significantly impacted by  इसके  use ; and similarly , using  the   methodology  improves both scope  परिभाषा  as well  as   the  analysis of overall project performance .
More recent research studies have shown that the principles of EVM are positive predictors of project success .
लोकप्रियता  of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond government contracting , in which sector its importance continues to  वृद्धि  ( e.g. , recent new DFAR rules ) , in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes .
Colorful spring garden flowers
Spring is one of the four conventional temperate seasons , following winter and preceding summer .
There  हैं  various technical definitions  of  spring ,  लकिन   लोकल  usage of the term varies according to local climate , cultures and  कस्टम   .
When it is spring in  the  northern hemisphere , it will be autumn in the  दक्षिणी  hemisphere .
At the spring equinox , days are close to 12 hours long with day  लंबाई  increasing as  the  season progresses .
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season , and also to ideas of rebirth , rejuvenation  ,  renewal ,  क़यामत  , and regrowth , with festivals such as  कार्निवल   ,  Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time .
Jamestown was  a  settlement in the Colony of Virginia , the first permanent  अंग्रेज़ी  settlement in the  americas  .
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on May 14 , 1607 ( O.S . , May 24 , 1607 N.S . ) , it followed several earlier failed attempts , including the Lost Colony of Roanoke .
Jamestown served as the capital of the colony for  83  years , from 1616 until 1699 .
The settlement was located within the territory of  a  political entity  ज्ञात  as Tsenacommacah , the state of the Powhatan Confederacy , with around  14,000  native inhabitants , and specifically was in part  of  the subdivision known as the Paspahegh  जनजाति  .
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing , feasting and tobacco ceremonies , and they provided crucial provisions and support for the survival of the colonists , who  यहूद  not agriculturally inclined , although relations with the newcomers also  soured  fairly early on , leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in  warfare   भीतर  3 years  .
Within a year  of  Jamestown 's founding , the Virginia Company brought Polish and Dutch colonists to  सहायता  improve the settlement .
in   1619  ,  the  first documented Africans were brought to Jamestown , though the modern conception of slavery in the  भविष्य  United States did not begin in Virginia until 1660 .
When the colony was subdivided into the original  आठ  shires  of  Virginia in 1634 , the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire .
The London Company 's second settlement , Bermuda , claims to be the site of the  oldest   कस्बा  in the English New World , as St. George 's , Bermuda  थी  officially established ( as New London ) in 1612 , whereas  जेम्स  Fort , in Virginia , was not  to   be  converted into James towne until 1619 , and further did not survive into the present day .
In 1699 , the capital was  relocated   इससे  Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg , after which Jamestown  ceased  to  मौजूद  as a settlement  ,  existing today only as an archaeological site .
Today ,  jamestown  is one of three locations comprising the Historic Triangle of Colonial Virginia , along with Williamsburg and Yorktown , with two primary heritage sites .
Historic Jamestowne , the archaeological site on Jamestown Island  ,  is a cooperative effort by  jamestown  National Historic Site ( part of Colonial National Historical Park )  ,  and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown Settlement , a living history interpretive site , is operated by the Jamestown Yorktown Foundation in  संयोजन  with the Commonwealth of  वर्जिनिया   .
James Christopher Frey ( born  सितंबर   12  , 1969 )  is  an American writer .
His books A Million Little Pieces  (  2003 ) and My  dost  Leonard ( 2005  )   ,   as   खूब   as  Bright Shiny Morning  (  2008 ) , were bestsellers .
He was the subject  of   a  scandal when investigators discovered that prison  समय  and the extent of certain injuries were exaggerated in A Million Little Pieces , a  अधिकारीगण  autobiographical account of the author 's struggle  साथ  addiction .
Deere & Company , most commonly known  by  its name John Deere , is  an  American corporation based in Moline , Illinois , and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in  the  world .
In 2012 , it was listed as 97th  in  the Fortune 500 America 's  रैंकिंग  and  190th  in the Fortune 500 Global ranking .
Deere and Company agricultural products ,  बेची  under the John Deere name , include tractors  ,  combine harvesters  ,  cotton harvesters , balers ,  planters  / seeders , sprayers  ,  and UTVs .
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment and  वानिकी   उपकरण   ,  as well as a supplier of diesel engines and drivetrains ( axles , transmissions , gearboxes ) used in heavy equipment .
Additionally , John Deere manufactures equipment used in lawn , grounds , and turf care ,  ऐसे  as walk-behind lawn  mowers  , zero-turn lawn mowers  ,  lawn tractors , and snowthrowers .
To support the core businesses , John Deere also provides financial services and other related activities  .
The company 's slogan is `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' and has a picture of a leaping deer as a logo , a word play pun on `` nothing runs like a deer '' .
Carl Westby  coined   the  phrase `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere ''  लिये  a marketing campaign to sell snowmobiles .
The  कम्पनी  's products are also identifiable by its distinctive shade  of  green  पेंट  , usually augmented by  पीला  trim .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 )  is  a denomination  of  United States currency .
The  पहला  U.S. Secretary  of  the Treasury  (  1789–95 ) , Alexander Hamilton , is currently featured on  the  obverse of the bill , while the U.S. Treasury Building is  प्रदर्शित  on the  रिवर्स  .
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other is  बेंजामिन  Franklin , on the $ 100  विधेयक   .
Hamilton  is  one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the continental United States , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland  (  $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender )  ;  George  meade  , Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note  )  ; and Robert  मॉरिस  , England ( $  1,000  1862/63 Legal Tender ; $  10  1878/80  चांदी   प्रमाणपत्र  ) .
in  addition , Kamehameha I , appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter . )
All $ 10  बिल्स  issued today are Federal Reserve Notes .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life  of  a $ 10 bill in  परिसंचरण  is 18 months before it is replaced due  to  wear .
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in  पीला  straps .
The  सोर्स   of  the face  on  the $ 10 bill is  जॉन  Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The $ 10  विधेयक   is  the only U.S. paper currency in circulation  in  which the portrait faces to the left  (  the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow  विल्सन  facing to the left ,  लकिन  was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
Andy Samuel Griffith ( June 1  ,  1926  –  July 3 , 2012 ) was an American actor , television producer , Grammy Award -winning Southern-gospel singer , and writer .
He was a Tony Award  nominee  for two roles , and gained prominence in the starring role in director Elia Kazan  's  film A Face in the Crowd ( 1957 ) before he became better known for his television roles , playing the lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock  .
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin , (  née  Raines ; born July 20 , 1964 ) is  an  Australian -based , American -born naturalist , author , the widow of  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई   naturalist  Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah , Queensland , Australia .
She co-starred with  उसके  husband on The Crocodile Hunter , their unconventional television nature documentary  श्रेणी  along with its spin-off series , Croc Files and The Crocodile Hunter  डायरीज़  .
She has  जिया  in Australia since 1992 , when she  शादीशुदा  Steve Irwin .
Andreas Cellarius  's  illustration of the Copernican system , from the Harmonia Macrocosmica ( 1660 ) .
heliocentrism  , or heliocentricism , is the astronomical model in which  the  Earth and planets  revolve  around a relatively stationary Sun at  the  center of the Solar System .
The word comes from the  यूनानी  ( helios `` sun '' and kentron `` center '' ) .
Historically , heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism , which placed the  धरती  at  the  center .
the  notion that the Earth revolves around the Sun had been proposed as early as the 3rd century BC by Aristarchus of Samos , but Aristarchus 's heliocentrism  आकर्षित  little attention until Copernicus revived  और  elaborated it .
Lucio Russo , however , argues that this is a misleading impression resulting  इससे  the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era .
Using indirect evidence he argues that a heliocentric view was expounded  in  Hipparchus 's work on gravity .
It was not until the 16th century that  a  fully predictive mathematical model of a heliocentric system was presented , by the Renaissance mathematician , astronomer , and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland , leading to the Copernican Revolution .
in  the following century , Johannes Kepler  elaborated  upon and expanded this model to include elliptical  orbits  ,  और  supporting observations  बना  using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei .
With the  observations  of  विलियम  Herschel , Friedrich Bessel , and others , astronomers realized that the sun was not the  बीच  of the universe and by the 1920s Edwin Hubble had  दिखाया  that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way )  कि  was only one of many billions .
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah Jones Shankar ; March 30 , 1979  )  is an American singer-songwriter  ,  pianist , and actress .
वो  is the daughter of Indian sitar player Ravi  शंकर  and Sue  जोन्स  .
She is also Anoushka Shankar 's half-sister .
in  2002 ,  वो  launched her solo  म्यूज़िक   करियर  with the release of the commercially successful and critically acclaimed album Come  दूर  with Me , a fusion of  देश  music and pop  साथ  elements of jazz  जिससे  was certified diamond album , selling over 26 million copies .
The record earned Jones five Grammy Awards , including the Album of the Year , Record of  the  Year , and Best  नई  Artist .
Her subsequent studio albums ,  feels  Like Home , released  in  2004 , Not Too Late , released in 2007 , the  वही  year she made her film debut  in  My Blueberry Nights , and her 2009 release  the  Fall  सब  gained Platinum status , selling  over  a million copies and were generally well received by critics .
Jones ' fifth studio album , Little Broken Hearts , was released on April 27 , 2012 .
Jones has won nine Grammy Awards and was 60th on Billboard magazine 's artists of the 2000–2009 decade chart .
throughout  her career , Jones has won numerous awards and has sold more than 50 million  एल्बम  worldwide .
Billboard named  उसके  the  शीर्ष  jazz artist of the 2000–2009 decade .
Not  to  be confused with Dimension of a physical quantity  .
For other uses , see  आयाम  ( disambiguation ) .
From left to right , the square ,  the  cube ,  और  the tesseract .
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional lines  ,  the cube by 2-dimensional areas , and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes .
A projection of the cube is given since it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen .
The same applies to the tesseract  ,  which additionally can only be shown  as   a  projection even in three-dimensional  स्पेस  .
A diagram showing the first  चार  spatial dimensions  .
In physics and mathematics , the dimension of a space or object is informally defined as the minimum number  of  coordinates needed to specify any point within it .
यूँ  a  लकीर  has a dimension of one because only one coordinate is needed to specify a point on it ( for example , the point at 5 on a number line  )  .
A  सतह  such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of two because two coordinates are needed to specify a point on it ( for example , to locate a point on the surface  of  a  गोला  you need both its latitude and its longitude )  .
The inside of a cube , a cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional because three coordinates are needed to locate a point within these spaces .
In physical terms , dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and its position in time ( perceived as a scalar  आयाम  along the t-axis ) , as  खूब   as  the spatial constitution of  वस्तुएँ  within—structures that correlate with both particle and field conceptions , interact according to relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description  .
These , or other axes , may be referenced to uniquely identify a point or structure in its attitude and relationship to other  वस्तुएँ  and occurrences .
Physical theories that incorporate time , such as general  आपेक्षिकता  , are said to work in 4-dimensional `` spacetime `` , (  पारिभाषित  as a Minkowski space )  .
Modern theories tend  to  be `` higher-dimensional ''  सहित  quantum field and string theories .
The state-space of quantum mechanics is an infinite-dimensional function space .
The concept of dimension is  नहीं  restricted to physical objects .
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences for many reasons , frequently as  विन्यास  spaces such as in Lagrangian or  हेमिल्टोनीय  mechanics ; these are  अमूर्त  spaces , independent of the physical space  we  live  in  .
Fontana ( )  is  a city of 200,762 residents in San  bernardino  County , California .
Founded in 1913 , it remained essentially rural until World War II , when entrepreneur Henry J. Kaiser built a large steel mill  in   the  area .
It is now  a  regional  हब  of the trucking industry , with Interstate 10 and  राज्य  Route 210 transecting the  नगर  from east to west ,  और  Interstate 15  गुजर  diagonally through its northwestern quadrant .
It  is   घर  to the largest  of  the San Bernardino County system libraries , a renovated historic theater , a municipal park  ,  and  the  Auto Club  स्पीडवे  on the site of the Kaiser Steel Mill .
Fontana  भी  hosts the Fontana Days Half Marathon and 5K run .
This race is  the   तीव्रतम  half-marathon course in the world .
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that Fontana 's population was 200,762 in 2012 , making it the second most  populous  city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state .
Cowboys Stadium is a stadium with a retractable roof in Arlington , Texas  .
It  serves  as  the  home of the National Football League 's Dallas Cowboys .
It replaced  the  partially covered Texas Stadium , which opened in 1971  ,  and served  as  the Cowboys  '  home through the 2008 season .
It was completed on  may  27 , 2009 .
the  stadium seats 85,000 , making it the third largest stadium in the  एनएफएल  by seating capacity  .
The maximum capacity of the stadium , including standing room , is 105,000 .
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are behind seats in each end zone  और  on a series of six elevated platforms connected by stairways .
It has the world 's largest column-free interior and  the   चौथी  largest high definition video screen , which hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line .
The facility can  भी  be  प्रयुक्त  for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( professional football ) such as concerts , basketball  खेल  , boxing matches  ,  college football and  ऊँची  school football contests , soccer  मिलान  , and motocross races .
Canadian historians until  the  1980s  tended  to focus on economic history , including labour history .
In part this is  क्युकी  Canada has had far fewer political or military conflicts than other societies .
This  थी  especially  सच्चा   in  the first half of the twentieth century when economic history was overwhelmingly dominant .
अनेक  of the most prominent English Canadian historians from this period were economic historians , such as Harold Innis , Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M. Lower
विद्वानों   of  Canadian history were  वारिस   to  the traditions that developed in Europe and the United States , but frameworks that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
the  heavily Marxist influenced  आर्थिक   इतिहास  that dominates Europe has little relevance  to  most of Canadian history .
A focus on class , urban areas , and industry  fails  to address Canada 's rural and resource based economy .
Similarly , the monetarist school  कि  is dominant in the United States also  रै  been difficult to transfer north of the border .
The study  of  economic history in Canada became  अत्यधिक  focused on economic geography , and for many years the dominant school of thought has been  the   स्टेपल्स  thesis  .
This school of thought bases the study of the Canadian economy on the study of natural resources .
This approach has since also become used outside  of  Canada in Australia and in  अनेक   विकासशील   राष्ट्र  .
Before the  आगमन  of Europeans , the First Nations of what would become Canada had a large  और  vibrant trade network .
Furs , tools , decorative items , and other  goods  were often transported thousands of kilometres  ,  mostly by canoe throughout the many rivers and lakes of the region .
The early European  इतिहास  of the Canadian economy is usually studied  through  the  स्टेपल्स  thesis which argues the Canadian economy developed through  the  exploitation of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe .
Carbon-14 , 14C  ,  or radiocarbon , is a radioactive isotope of carbon with a nucleus containing  6  protons and 8 neutrons .
Its presence  in  organic materials is the  आधार  of the radiocarbon dating method pioneered by Willard Libby  और  colleagues ( 1949 )  to  date archaeological , geological and hydrogeological samples .
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 February 1940 , by Martin Kamen and  sam  Ruben at the University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley ,  हालांकि  its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934 .
There are three naturally occurring isotopes  of  carbon  on  Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12 , 1 % is carbon-13 , and carbon-14 occurs in trace  amounts  , i.e. , making up about 1 part per trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the  माहौल  .
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years .
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through  बीटा  decay .
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on Earth  is  cosmic ray action upon nitrogen in the atmosphere , and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide .
However , open-air  नाभिकीय   परीक्षण  between 1955–1980 contributed  to  this pool .
The different isotopes  of   कार्बन  do not differ appreciably in their chemical properties .
This is  प्रयुक्त  in chemical and biological research , in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms  can  be used to replace nonradioactive carbon , in order to  ट्रेस  chemical and biochemical reactions involving carbon atoms from any given  सशुल्क  compound .
Lightning is a highly visible form of energy transfer
Lightning  हमलों  are electrical discharges on a massive scale between the  माहौल  and an earth-bound object .
They mostly originate in  thunderclouds  and terminate on the ground , called Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning .
However , they may also be initiated from a very tall grounded object and reach into  the   बादल   .
Although `` a lightning strike '' is commonly used to describe all lightning , it is  बल्कि  erroneous and  a  misnomer ,  as  only about 25 % of  सब  lightning events worldwide are CG , the large bulk of lightning events are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ) , where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere .
The scientific name for the complete process of a single lightning event is a and  it  is a very complex , multiple stepped interaction , which is not completely understood .
Most CG flashes  तभी  `` strike '' one physical location , referred to as  a  termination .
The primary conducting channel , the bright coursing light you may see and call  a  `` strike '' , is only about 1 inch in diameter , although to our eyes it looks much larger .
They are miles  long  , upwards of tens of miles  .
And the entire flash , lasts only a few fractions of a second , most  of  which is  नहीं  visible to human eyes .
Thunder is always produced by lightning .
Just like lightning  ,  that deceives our eyes , usually looking larger or closer than it really is ,  the  earth 's atmosphere and our brain 's perception of the outside world , ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not .
Lightning can  नहीं   happen  in a vacuum devoid of ions , nor  can   थंडर  occur without molecules to vibrate .
Thunder is a physical absolute for every single flash of lightning .
Contrary to popular belief , a lightning strike itself is usually not  जिम्मेदार  for multiple deaths or injuries from a  सिंगल  event .
it  would be impossible given the  प्राकृतिक  tendencies  of  a flash , unless people or animals were stacked on top of each other , or  वे  were somehow arranged vertically and part of the flash channel .
When  बिजली  ignites an available fuel source and  an  explosion occurs , it is the shock wave or fire causing  the  injuries , not the strike itself .
Ground Currents  ,   भी  called step potential , of  an  earth termination is  कया  truly causes most injuries or death  to  humans and animals  .
The near  instantaneous  rush of  सतह  charges ,  induced  by the overhead  thundercloud  itself , race to the  स्ट्राइक  point from hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge .
This current , caused  दौरान  each stroke , takes the path of least  प्रतिरोध  , which may be ion rich human or animal legs , over poorly conducting  धरती  .
This is why it is best to crouch , with feet close together , if ever caught  in  the open during a  अंधड़  .
Unfortunately , most reports do not draw a distinction  between  the real cause of injury or death , be it the strike itself ,  a  resulting explosion or  आग  ,  or  usually responsible step potential .
Peter F. Kilmartin ( born 1962 ) is  the  current Attorney General of Rhode Island .
Kilmartin is  भी  a retired police  कप्तान  and a former  सदस्य   of   the  Rhode Island  हाउस  of  प्रतिनिधि  .
A couple following their marriage in the  manti   यूटा  Temple .
Sealing  is   an  ordinance ( ritual ) performed  in  Latter Day Saints temples by  a  person holding the sealing authority .
The purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar relationships ,  बनाना   संभावित  the existence of family relationships throughout eternity  .
LDS teachings place great importance on the specific authority required to perform these sealings .
Church doctrine teaches that this authority ,  पुकारा  the Priesthood , corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in .
Sealings are typically performed as marriages or as sealing of children to parents .
They were  performed  prior to the death of  जोसेफ  Smith , Jr. ( the main founder of the  latter  Day Saint movement ) , and are currently performed  in  The Church of Jesus  मसीह  of Latter-day Saints .
Although some other denominations , such as the Community of  मसीह  , view sealing as an  centuries  of Smith 's practice of plural marriage , some do still perform them .
The 2000s , pronounced `` two thousands '' ,  थी  a decade that began on January 1 , 2000 , and ended  on  December 31 , 2009 .
Globalization , which had accelerated after the early 1990s fall of communism , continued to be a force in the 2000s .
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to  वैश्वीकरण   दौरान  the decade , making it possible for people to interact with other people , express ideas , introduce others  to   अलग  cultures and backgrounds , use goods and services , sell and buy online  ,  research and learn about  बाते  , along with experiencing the world without having to leave home .
The institutions , linkages and technologies  कि  emerged or were redefined earlier would subsequently in this decade benefit many countries , in particular China and India .
However , in other parts of the world such progress failed  to  address ongoing struggles with modernity , most notably characterized  by  the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups .
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States , United Kingdom , Spain , Canada and other nations invading Afghanistan , as well  as  implementing various anti-terrorist measures at home and abroad in what was known as the War on Terror .
the   यूरोपीय   संघ   देखी  further integration and expansion throughout much of Europe .
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable environmental consequences , raised demand for  घटाते  energy  संसाधन  , and  थी  still shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during  the   वैश्विक  Financial Crisis of the  लेट  2000s .
The Gunfight at the O.K .  corral  was  a  gunfight that took place  at   परिचय  3:00 p.m. on Wednesday , October 26 , 1881 , in Tombstone , Arizona Territory , and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight  in  the history of the American Old West .
The  gunfight   ,  believed to have lasted only about thirty seconds , was fought between the outlaw Cowboys Billy Claiborne , Ike and Billy Clanton , and Tom and Frank McLaury ,  और  the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp and his  भाइयो  Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and temporary lawman  व्याट  , aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil .
Ike Clanton and Billy  claiborne  ran from the fight unharmed , but Ike  's  brother Billy  clanton  was killed , along with both McLaurys .
Lawmen Virgil and Morgan Earp and Doc Holliday were wounded .
Only Wyatt Earp came through the fight unharmed .
The fight has come to represent a time in American history when  the  frontier was open  दायरा   लिये  outlaws opposed by law enforcement that was spread thin over vast  territories  , leaving some areas unprotected .
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake  प्रकाशित  what has since been determined to be a largely fictionalized biography , Wyatt Earp  :  Frontier Marshal , two years after Earp 's death .
Lake  retold  his story in  a   1946  book that director John Ford developed  into  the movie  my  Darling Clementine .
बाद  the movie Gunfight at the O.K . Corral was released in 1957 , the  गोलीबारी  came to be known by that name .
Since then  ,  the conflict has been portrayed with varying degrees of accuracy in numerous  पश्चिमी   films  and books .
Despite its  नाम  , the gunfight  दरअसल  occurred in a narrow lot  छह  doors west of  the  rear entrance to the O.K . Corral on Fremont Street , and also in the street .
The two opposing  पार्टियों  were initially only about apart .
परिचय  thirty  गोलियाँ  were fired in thirty seconds .
Ike  clanton  filed murder charges against  the  Earps and Doc Holliday  लकिन  they were eventually exonerated by a local judge after a 30-day preliminary hearing and then again by a local grand jury .
On December 28 , 1881 , Virgil Earp was  maimed  in an assassination attempt by the outlaw  cowboys  , and on March 18  ,  1882 , they assassinated  मॉर्गन  Earp .
The suspects furnished solid alibis , and newly appointed Deputy U.S . Marshal  व्याट   earp  took matters into  उसके  own hands during the Earp Vendetta Ride , ironically pursued by county Sheriff Johnny Behan with warrants for the  earp  's arrest .
HDMI  (  High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring  uncompressed  video data  और   compressed/uncompressed  digital audio data from a HDMI-compliant device ( `` the source device  ''  ) to a compatible computer monitor , video projector , digital television , or digital audio device .
HDMI is a digital replacement for  मौजूदा  analog video  मानकों  .
There are  a  number of  hdmi-standard  cable  कनेक्टर्स  available , each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or  pc  video format , including standard ,  उन्नत  , high definition , and  3d  video signals ; up to  8  channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a CEC ( Consumer Electronics Control ) connection ; and an  ईथरनेट  data connection  .
HDMI implements  the  EIA/CEA-861 standards , which define video formats and waveforms ,  हस्तांतरण  of compressed , uncompressed ,  और  LPCM audio , auxiliary data , and implementations of the VESA EDID .
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each other when necessary and allows  the  user  to  operate multiple devices with one  रिमोट  control handset .
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with the CEA-861 signals used  by  digital visual interface ( DVI ) ,  no  signal conversion is necessary , nor  is  there a loss of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used .
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection  ,  HDMI  is  independent of the various digital television standards used by individual devices , such as  atsc  and DVB , as these are encapsulations of compressed MPEG video streams ( which can  be  decoded  और  output as an uncompressed video stream on  hdmi  ) .
Production of consumer HDMI products started in late 2003 .
In  यूरोपीय   either  DVI-HDCP or HDMI  is  included in the HD ready in-store  labeling  specification for TV sets for HDTV , formulated by  eicta   साथ  SES Astra in 2005 .
HDMI began to appear on consumer HDTV  camcorders  and digital still cameras in 2006 .
As of January 8 , 2013 , which is ten years  बाद  the release  of  the  पहला  HDMI specification , over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard .
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ; also  ज्ञात  in the series as Bree Hodge and Bree Weston ) is a fictional character and one of the four  protagonists  on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives .
She is  निभाई  by actress Marcia Cross , who has received multiple awards and nominations for her portrayal , including an Emmy Award nomination , three Golden Globe Award nominations , and two  स्क्रीन  Actors Guild Awards .
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely praised by critics and  प्रशंसक  .
Cross originally auditioned for the role of Mary Alice Young , but series creator Marc Cherry thought she was better suited  लिये  the role of Bree .
Dana Delany , who eventually was cast as Katherine  mayfair  , was originally chosen for the role but turned it down , saying it was too similar to her role in Pasadena .
ब्री  's main struggle throughout  the  series has been her attempts to maintain a perfect life despite various obstacles such as widowhood , divorce , and alcoholism hindering her .
She has been married three  टाइम्स  ; to Rex Van de Kamp ( Steven Culp ) , Orson Hodge ( Kyle MacLachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ) .

The population was 3,167 at the 2010 census .

The Hangover  भाग  II is a 2011 American comedy film  उत्पादित  by Legendary Pictures and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures .
It is the sequel  to  2009 's The Hangover and the second film in The Hangover franchise  .
Todd Phillips  निर्देशित  the film in addition to co-authoring the script  साथ  Craig  mazin  , and Scot Armstrong .
The film stars Bradley Cooper , Ed  helms  , Zach Galifianakis , Ken Jeong , Jeffrey Tambor , Justin Bartha and Paul Giamatti .
The Hangover Part II tells the  स्टोरी   of  Phil , Stu , Alan , and Doug as they travel to Thailand for Stu 's wedding .
After the bachelor  पार्टी  in Las Vegas , Stu takes no chances  और  opts for a  सुरक्षित  , subdued pre-wedding brunch .
However , things do  नहीं  go  as  planned , resulting in another bad hangover with no memories of the  पिछला  night .
Development of The Hangover Part II began in April 2009 , two months before The Hangover was released  .
The principal actors were cast in March 2010 to reprise their roles from the  पहला  film .
Production began in October 2010 , in Ontario ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , before moving on location in Thailand .
The film was released on May 26 , 2011 and , despite  receiving  mostly negative reviews from critics , it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy  दौरान  its theatrical run .
A third film is set for on May 24 , 2013  .

The English Renaissance was a cultural and  कलाकारी   गति  in England dating from the late 15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century .
It is associated with the pan-European  पुनर्जागरण  that is usually regarded as beginning in  इटली  in  the  late 14th century .
Like most of northern Europe , England saw little of these developments until more than a century later .
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken , as a convenience , to be 1485 , when the Battle of Bosworth Field ended the Wars of the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty .
Renaissance style and ideas , however , were slow  in  penetrating England  ,  and the Elizabethan era in the second half of the 16th century is usually regarded as the height of the English Renaissance .
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer Warren `` Betty '' Ford (  अप्रैल  8 , 1918 – July 8 , 2011 ) , was First  महिला  of the United States from  1974  to 1977 during the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford .
As First Lady , she was active in social policy and created precedents as a politically active presidential wife .
Throughout her husband 's term in office  ,  she maintained high approval ratings despite opposition from  कुछ  conservative Republicans who objected to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues .
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness following her 1974 mastectomy and was a  passionate  supporter of , and activist for ,  the  Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ) .
Pro-choice on abortion and  a  leader in the Women 's  गति  , she gained fame as one of the most candid first ladies in history  ,  commenting on every hot-button issue of the time , including feminism , equal pay , the  era  ,  sex  , drugs , abortion , and gun control .
She also  उठाया  awareness of addiction  जब  she announced her long-running battle with alcoholism in the 1970s .
Following her White House years , she continued to lobby for  the  ERA and remained active in the feminist movement .
She was the founder , and served as the first  कुर्सी  of the board of directors , of the Betty Ford Center  लिये  substance abuse and addiction and is a recipient of the  congressional  Gold Medal ( co-presentation with her husband , Gerald R. Ford , October 21 , 1998 ) and the  अध्यक्षीय  Medal  of  Freedom ( alone , presented 1991 , by George H. W. Bush ) .
platelet  endothelial cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also known as cluster of differentiation 31 (  cd31  ) is a protein that in human is encoded  by  the PECAM1 gene  मिला  on chromosome 17 .
pecam-1  plays  a  key role in removing  aged  neutrophils from the body .

The  मिस  Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the representative for the state  फ्लोरिडा  in the Miss USA pageant .
While Florida has been successful in  शर्तें  of runners-up , finalists and semi-finalists , the state  रै  never won the Miss USA  pageant  , although Cheryl Patton became Miss  यूएसए  after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe .
Florida 's best  परिणाम  were during the mid-1960s to mid-1970s .
Their most recent  फाइनलिस्ट  was Lissette Garcia who placed  in  the top 16 in 2011 .
Two former Miss Florida Teen USA titleholders have won this competition ,  और  three titleholders have also competed at Miss America .
The  वर्तमान   titleholder  is Michelle Aguirre of Hialeah .
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of  the  history of the part of Britain that became known as England , lasting from  the  end of Roman occupation and establishment of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a general term  referring  to the Germanic peoples who came to Britain during the 5th  और  6th centuries  ,  including Angles  ,  Saxons , Frisii , and Jutes .
the  term also refers  to  the language spoken at the time in England , which is now called Old English , and to the culture of the era ,  जिससे  has long attracted popular and scholarly attention .
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy , the kingdoms of Northumbria , Mercia  ,  East Anglia , Essex  ,  Kent , Sussex , and Wessex .
In terms of religion  the  kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism during the early period , but  परिवर्तित  to Christianity during the 7th century .
Paganism had a final stronghold in a period of Mercian hegemony  दौरान  the 640s , ending with  the  death of Penda of Mercia  in  655 .
Facing the threat of Viking invasions  ,  the House of Wessex became  प्रबल  during the 9th century , under the rule of Alfred the Great .
During the 10th century , the individual kingdoms  एकीकृत  under the rule of Wessex into the Kingdom of England , which stood opposed to the Danelaw , the Viking kingdoms  स्थापित  from  the  9th century in the north and east of England .
The Kingdom  of  England fell in the Viking invasion from Denmark in 1013 and was ruled by  the  House of  डेनमार्क  until  1042  , when the  anglo-saxon  House of Wessex was restored .
The  पिछला  Anglo-Saxon king , Harold Godwinson , was killed in 1066 at the Battle  of   हास्टिंग्स  .

Smoked salmon is a preparation of salmon , typically a fillet that has been cured and  hot  or cold smoked .
Due  to  its  मध्यम  high price , smoked salmon  is  considered a delicacy .
Although the term lox is sometimes  लागू   to  smoked salmon ,  वे  are different products .
View of defibrillator electrode position and placement .
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical  उर्जा  to the  प्रभावित   दिल  with a device called  a  defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle , terminates the dysrhythmia , and allows normal sinus  लय  to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators  can  be external , transvenous ,  or   implanted  , depending on the type  of  device used or needed .
कुछ  external units , known as automated external  defibrillators  ( AEDs  )  , automate the diagnosis of  treatable  rhythms , meaning that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August 19 , 1883  –  January 10 , 1971 )  थी  a French fashion designer and founder of the Chanel brand .
She was the only fashion designer to appear on Time magazine  's  list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th  सदी  .
Along with Paul Poiret , Chanel was credited with liberating women  इससे  the constraints of the  ``  corseted silhouette '' and  popularizing  the  स्वीकृति  of a sportive , casual chic as the feminine standard in the post-  संसार  War I era .
A prolific fashion creator , Chanel 's influence extended beyond  couture  clothing .
Her design aesthetic was realized in jewelry , handbags , and fragrance .
Her signature scent , Chanel No  .  5 , has become an iconic product .
चैनल  was known for her lifelong  determination  , ambition and  उर्जा  which she applied to her professional and social  जीवन  .
She achieved both success as  a  businesswoman and social prominence thanks to the connections she  बना  through her work .
These  शामिल  many artists and craftspeople to whom she became a patron .
However , Chanel 's highly competitive ,  opportunistic  personality led her to make questionable life  चुनाव  which have generated controversy around her reputation , particularly her behaviour  दौरान  the German occupation of France in World War  ii  .
Allied Mills flour mill on the banks of the Manchester Ship Canal
A  gristmill  ( also : grist mill , corn mill or flour mill  )  grinds grain into flour .
The term can refer to both the grinding mechanism and the building that holds  it  .
Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and  rumania  ; ) is a  देश  located at  the  intersection of Central and Southeastern  यूरोपीय  , bordering on the Black Sea .
Romania shares a border  साथ   हंगेरियाई   और  Serbia to the west , Ukraine and Moldova to the northeast and  ईस्ट  , and Bulgaria to the  दक्षिण  .
At , Romania is the eighth largest country of the European Union  by  area , and has the seventh largest population of the  यूरोपीय  Union with more than 19 million people  .
Its capital and biggest city is Bucharest ,  the  11th largest city in the EU .
The United  principalities  emerged when the territories of Moldavia and Wallachia were united under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859  .
In 1866 Prince Karl of  hohenzollern-sigmaringen   थी  called to  the  throne as the  सत्ताधारी  Prince of the Romanian Principate  और  in 1881 he  थी  finally crowned as King Carol I the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania .
Independence from  the  Ottoman  साम्राज्य  was declared on 9 May 1877 , and was internationally recognized the following year .
At the end of World War I , Transylvania , Bukovina and Bessarabia united with the Kingdom of Romania .
World War II gave  कारण  to the rise of a military dictatorship in Romania under fascist General Ion Antonescu  ,  who chose to fight on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944 .
After his removal , Romania switched sides in 1944 and  joined  the Allies .
by  the end of  the  war , some formerly Romanian northeastern  territories  were occupied by the Soviet Union ,  साथ  Red  फौज   इकाई  stationed on Romanian soil .
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's Republic ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of the  वॉरसॉ  Pact .
in  1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General Secretary of the  रोमानियाई  Communist  पार्टी  , and the harsh austerity measures , political repression , and cult of personality he implemented led  to  the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc .
Eventually his authoritarian government  थी  toppled in December  1989  during the Romanian Revolution of 1989 .
With the fall of the Iron Curtain ,  रोमानिया   began  its  परिवर्तन  towards democracy and a capitalist market economy .
बाद  a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards decline , extensive reforms fostered economic recovery .
as  of 2010  ,  Romania is an upper-middle-income country with a  ऊँची  human development index  .
Romania joined NATO on 29 March 2004 ,  और  the European Union on 1 January 2007 .
it  is also  a  member of the : Latin Union , Francophonie , OSCE , WTO , BSEC , United  राष्ट्र  ,  इत्यादि  .
Today , Romania is a unitary semi-presidential republic , in which the executive branch  consists  of the President and the Government .
`` Ancient '' redirects here .
For other uses , see Antiquity ( disambiguation ) .
The  टाइम्स   पहले  writing belong either to protohistory  or  to prehistory .
khafre  's  पिरामिड  ( 4th dynasty ) and Great Sphinx of  गीज़ा  ( c.  2500  BC or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the study of the written past from the beginning of  अंकित  human history to  the  Early Middle Ages .
The span of  अंकित  history is roughly 5,000 years , with Cuneiform script  ,  the oldest  खोजा   रूप  of coherent writing , from  the  protoliterate period around the 30th century BC .
इस  is the beginning of history  ,  as opposed to prehistory , according to the definition used by most historians .
The term classical antiquity is often used to refer to history in the Old  संसार  from the beginning of recorded Greek  इतिहास  in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ) .
This  roughly  coincides with the  परंपरागत  date of the founding of Rome in 753 BC , the beginning of the history of ancient Rome , and the beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece .
Although the ending  तिथि  of ancient history is disputed , some Western scholars use  the  fall of the Western Roman Empire in 476  ad   ,  the closure of the Platonic Academy in 529 AD , the death of the  सम्राट  Justinian I , the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history .
In India , the period includes  the  early period of the  मध्य  Kingdoms , and , in  चीन  , the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included .
Methylcobalamin ( shown  )  is a form of vitamin B12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as  अंधेरा   रेड  crystals that  freely  form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water  .
Vitamin B12  ,  vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 , also called cobalamin ,  is  a water-soluble vitamin with a key role in the normal functioning of the brain  और   बेचैन  system , and for the formation of  रक्त  .
It is  एक   of  the eight B vitamins .
It is  सामान्यतः  involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body ,  विशेषकर  affecting DNA synthesis and regulation , but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither fungi , plants , nor animals are capable of producing  विटामिन  B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea have the  एंजाइमों  required  लिये  its synthesis , although many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis .
the  vitamin is the largest  और  most structurally  जटिल  vitamin and can be produced industrially only through  बैक्टीरियल  fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12 consists of a class  of  chemically related compounds (  vitamers  )  ,  all of which have vitamin activity .
It contains the biochemically  विरल  element cobalt .
Biosynthesis of the  मौलिक  structure of the vitamin  is  accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually  उपज  hydroxocobalamin ) , but conversion between different forms of  the  vitamin can be accomplished in  the   इंसान   देह  .
A common semi-synthetic  रूप  of the vitamin , cyanocobalamin , does not occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements ,  और   as  a food additive , because of its stability and lower production  लागत  .
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin ,  leaving  behind  the  cyanide , albeit  in   minimal  concentration .
More recently  ,  hydroxocobalamin ,  methylcobalamin  , and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products  और  food  पूरक  .
The extra utility of  ये  is currently  debated  .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from  इसके   संबंध  to the disease  घातक  anemia , which is an  असंक्राम्य   बीमारी  in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor  हैं  destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is  निर्णायक  for the normal absorption of B12 , so a lack of intrinsic factor , as seen in pernicious anemia  ,  causes a vitamin B12  कमियां  .
Many other  subtler  kinds of vitamin  b12  deficiency and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated .
The Roman Empire ( ) was  the  post- Republican period  of  the ancient Roman civilization , characterised by an  निरंकुश   रूप  of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which preceded it , had been destabilized through a series of civil wars  .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius  सीज़र  's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of  actium  ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached  इसके  greatest expanse during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117  ad  ) .
In the  3rd   सदी  , the Empire  underwent  a crisis that threatened its  अस्तित्व  , but was reunified and stabilized  अंतर्गत  the emperors Aurelian  और  Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th  सदी   ,  during which time a system of dual rule was  विकसित  in the Latin West and Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the  वेस्ट  in the 5th century  ,  the eastern half continued as what would later  be  known as the  बीज़ान्टिन  Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long  सहनशीलता  , the institutions and culture of Rome had  a  profound and lasting influence on the development of language , religion  ,  architecture , philosophy , law ,  और  forms of government in  the  territory it governed ,  विशेषकर  Europe , and by means  of  European expansionism  throughout  the modern world .
Total body surface area ( TBSA ) is an assessment measure of burns of  the  skin .
In adults , the `` rule of nines '' is used to determine the total percentage of area burned for each major section of the body  .
In some cases , the burns may cover more than one body part , or may  नहीं  fully  कवर  such a part ; in these  मामले  , burns are measured by using the  casualty  's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the  देह  .
For children and infants , the Lund-Browder chart is used to assess the burned body surface area .
Different percentages are  प्रयुक्त   क्युकी  the ratio of  the  combined surface area of the head and neck to the surface area of the limbs  is  typically larger in children than  कि  of an  वयस्क  .
Typical values for common groups of humans follow .
(  due  to rounding ,  मान   may  not add to 100 % . )
