Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino ( born June  26  ,  1975  ) , better known by  उसके  stage name  kj-52  , is a Christian rapper from Tampa , Florida .
The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his  बूढ़ा  rap alias , `` King J. Mac  ,   ''  a name which he later described in one  of  his podcasts as `` horribly cheesy . ''
`` 52 '' , which is pronounced ``  पाँच  two '' , not `` fifty-two '' , is a  सन्दर्भ  to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude with five loaves and two fish ,  जिससे  is  भी  sung about in his song  ``  Push Up '' from The Yearbook and in the `` KJ Five Two  ''  on  it  's Pronounced 'Five Two .
He  थी  awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the Year for `` Never Look Away  ''  and Rap/Hip Hop Album of the Year at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007 .
On July 28 , 2009 , KJ-52 released `` End of My Rope '' , which is the  पहला  single for  उसके  album Five-Two Television  .
His song `` Dear Slim '' is based on Eminem  's  song `` Stan `` and is a sort of personal  संदेश  from KJ-52 to Eminem .
the  degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used , among other things , to represent degrees of arc ( e.g . in geographic coordinate systems ) , hours ( in the medical field ) , or degrees of temperature .
the   प्रतीक  consists of a small raised circle , historically a zero glyph .
in  Unicode it is encoded at .
This is a list of roots , suffixes , and prefixes used in medical terminology , their meanings , and their etymology .
There are a few rules when using medical roots  .
Firstly , prefixes and suffixes , primarily in Greek , but also in  लैटिन  , have a droppable -o- .
As a general rule  ,  this -o- almost  सदा   अधिनियमों  as a joint-stem to connect two consonantal roots , e.g . arthr-  +  -o- +  logy  = arthrology .
But generally , the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g .  arthr-  + itis = arthritis , instead of  arthr-o-itis  .
Secondly , medical roots  generally  go together according to language : Greek  prefixes  go with Greek suffixes  और  Latin prefixes with Latin suffixes .
Although international  वैज्ञानिक  vocabulary is not stringent about segregating combining forms of  अलग  languages  ,  it is  advisable   जब  coining new words not to mix different lingual roots .
Stomach cancer , or gastric cancer , refers to cancer  arising   इससे  any  भाग  of the stomach .
Stomach cancer causes about 800,000 deaths worldwide per year .
Prognosis is  ग़रीब  ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) because most patients present with advanced disease .
Sara Lynn  इवांस  (  born  February 5 , 1971 ) is an American country singer and  songwriter  .
For her entire career , she has been signed  to  RCA Records Nashville .
इवांस  ' debut ,  तीन  Chords and the Truth , did not produce a Top 40 hit on  the  Hot Country Songs charts .
She followed this up  साथ  No Place That Far  (  1998 ) , Born to Fly ( 2000 ) , Restless ( 2003 ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005 ) .
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the Recording Industry Association of America  (  RIAA ) ,  जबकि  the other three albums all were certified platinum .
These discs  शामिल  the number 1  singles  ``  no  Place That Far `` ,  ``  Born to Fly `` , `` Suds in the  बाल्टी  `` and `` A  रियल  Fine  प्लेस  to Start `` ,  प्लस  the top 10 hits `` I Could Not Ask for More `` ( a cover  of   the  Edwin  मैक्केन  song ) , `` I  रखना  Looking `` , `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' `` .
Her 2007 Greatest Hits included the top 15 hits `` You 'll  सदा  Be  my  Baby `` and `` As If `` .
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her fifth number 1 hit , `` A Little Bit Stronger `` , which was co-written by Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum .
Evans has  भी  won one award each from Billboard , the Academy of Country Music  ,  Country Music Association , Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award .
The world 's principal religions and spiritual traditions may be classified into a small  क्रमांक  of major groups , although this is by no means a  वर्दी  practice .
This theory began in the 18th century with the goal of recognizing the relative levels of civility in societies .
Berliners watching a C-54 land  at  Tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
the  Berlin blockade ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was one of the first major international crises of the Cold War .
During the multinational occupation of post–World War II Germany , the Soviet Union blocked the Western Allies ' railway , road  ,  and canal access to the sectors of Berlin under Allied control .
Their aim was to  फ़ोर्स  the western powers to allow the  सोवियत  zone to  प्रारंभ  supplying Berlin with food and  ईंधन  , thereby giving the Soviets practical  कंट्रोल  over the entire city .
in  response , the Western Allies organized the Berlin airlift to carry supplies to the people in West Berlin .
aircrews  from the United States Air Force  ,  the British  royal   एयर  Force  ,  the Royal Australian Air Force , the Royal Canadian Air Force , the Royal  नई  Zealand Air Force , and the South African Air Force flew over 200,000  फ़्लाइट  in one year , providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as fuel  और   खाना  to  the  Berliners .
By the spring of 1949  ,  the  प्रयत्न  was clearly succeeding and , by April , the airlift was  delivering  more cargo than had previously  महरूम  transported into the city by  रेल   .
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought  शर्मिंदगी  to the Soviets  जो  had refused to believe it could make a difference .
The blockade was lifted in May 1949  और  resulted  in  the creation of  दो  separate German states .
The Federal Republic of Germany ( West  जर्मनी  ) and the  जर्मनी  Democratic Republic  (  East Germany ) split up Berlin .
In remembrance of the  एयरलिफ्ट  , three  एयरपोर्ट  in the former western  zones  of  the  city served  as  the primary gateways  to  Germany for another fifty years .
The euro sign  ;   logotype  and handwritten .
The euro sign is  the  currency sign used for the euro , the official currency of  the  Eurozone in the European  संघ  ( EU ) .
the  design was presented to the public by the European Commission on 12 December 1996 .
The international three-letter code ( according to ISO standard ISO 4217 ) for the euro is EUR .
In  युनिकोड  it is encoded at  .
In English , the sign precedes the  मान  .
In some styleguides , but not others ,  the  euro sign is unspaced .
Mate ( , ; sometimes also  spelled  maté ) , also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón  (  ) , is  a  traditional South American infused drink , particularly in Argentina , Uruguay , Paraguay and the southern states of Brazil  और  to a  lesser  degree in south of Chile ,  the  Bolivian Chaco , Syria and Lebanon .
It is prepared from steeping dried  पत्ते  of yerba mate (  llex  paraguariensis , known  in  Portuguese  as  erva-mate ) in hot water .
Mate  is  served with a metal straw from a  साझा  hollow calabash  करेले  .
The straw  is  called a  bombilla  in some Latin American countries , a  bomba  in Portuguese , and a bombija or , more generally ,  a  masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic  .
The straw is traditionally made of silver .
Modern , commercially available straws are typically made of nickel silver , called Alpaca ; stainless steel , or hollow-stemmed cane .
The gourd  is  known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil , it has the specific name of cuia , or also cabaça ( the name for Indigenous-influenced  calabash  gourds  in  other regions of Brazil , still  प्रयुक्त  for general food and drink in remote regions ) .
Even if the water is supplied from a modern thermos  ,  the  infusion  is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias .
As with other brewed herbs , yerba mate leaves are dried , chopped ,  और  ground into a powdery mixture called yerba  .
The bombilla acts as both a straw and a sieve .
the  submerged end is flared , with small  छेद   or  slots that  allow  the brewed liquid in , but block the  चंकी  matter that makes up much of the mixture  .
A modern  bombilla  design  उपयोग  a straight tube with holes , or  वसन्त   स्लीव  to act as a  sieve  .
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have been on the market in Argentina , Paraguay and Uruguay for many years under  ऐसे  trade names as `` Taragüí  vitality  '' in Argentina , `` Pajarito '' and ``  kurupí  ''  in  Paraguay , and  in  Brazil  अंतर्गत  the  नाम  `` Mate Leão '' .
This is considered a completely different drink  .
It is never drunk from cuias or called chimarrão , nor is it associated with the gaucho/gaúcho culture .
The automotive  उद्योग  is a term that covers a wide range of  कंपनियाँ  and organisations  शामिल   in  the  डिज़ाइन  , development , manufacture , marketing , and selling of motor vehicles , towed  वाहनों  , motorcycles and mopeds .
It is one of the  संसार  's most  महत्वपूर्ण  economic sectors by revenue .
The term automotive industry usually does not include  उद्योग  dedicated to the maintenance of automobiles following delivery to the end-user  ,  such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations .
the  term automotive  थी  created from Greek  autos   (  self  )  , and Latin motivus ( of motion ) to  represent  any form of self-powered vehicle .
This  पद   थी  proposed  by  SAE member Elmer Sperry  .
David  माइकल  `` Dave '' Bautista  ,   jr.  ( born January 18 , 1969 ) , is an  अमरीकी  mixed martial artist , bodybuilder , actor , and former  पेशेवर  wrestler best known for his time in World Wrestling  entertainment  competing under the ring name Batista .
In WWE , he became a six-time world champion , winning the  संसार  Heavyweight Championship four times , and the  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  Championship two times .
He is the longest-reigning World Heavyweight Champion in WWE history .
In addition to these championships , Batista has won  the  World Tag Team Championship three times  (  twice with Ric Flair and once with John Cena ) and the  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  Tag Team  चैंपियनशिप  once ( with Rey Mysterio ) .
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went on to headline WrestleMania 21 , one of the top five highest-grossing pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history .
After  trying  out at World Championship  कुश्ती  's Power  संयंत्र  , Batista signed a contract with the WWF in 2000 and  थी  sent to its developmental territory , Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW ) , where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship .
In August 2012 , Bautista signed a contract with Classic Entertainment & Sports to fight in mixed martial arts .
He won his MMA debut  on  October 6 , 2012 , defeating Vince Lucero via TKO in the first round .
Henry T. Thomas Sampson , Jr. ( born in Jackson , Mississippi in  1934  ) is an African-American inventor  .
He  ग्रैजुएट  from  ऊँची  school in  1951  from Lanier  ऊँची  School in Jackson ,  मिसिसिपी  .
He then  attended  Morehouse College for a couple  of  years before transferring to Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों  where he  became  a member of the Omega  psi  Phi fraternity .
He received a Bachelor 's degree in science from Purdue University in 1956 .
He graduated with an MS degree in engineering from the University of California , Los Angeles in  1961  .
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear  अभियान्त्रिकी  from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in 1965 , and his PhD in 1967  .
He is the first African American to earn a Ph.D.in Nuclear Engineering in the United States .
Some of his  accomplishments  include being  a   सदस्य  of the  संयुक्त  States Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and  कमाई  an Atomic Energy Commission honor  between  1964 and 1967 .
बाद  he was awarded the Black Image Award from Aerospace Corporation  in  1982 .
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering , Applied Science Award , and prize for education , by the Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983 .
In June 2007 , Sampson  थी  married to Laura Howzell Young in St.  थामस  , U.S. Virgin Islands .
Young-Sampson is a professor in the College of Education at California State  विश्वविद्यालयों  San  bernardino  .
Robert  लेन  Gibbs ( born March 29 , 1971 ) is a senior campaign adviser for US President Barack  ओबामा  .
Previously , he was  the  28th White House  दबायें  Secretary .
Gibbs was the  संचार  director for then- U.S . Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign .
Gibbs  ,  who has worked with Obama  चूंकि  2004 , was press secretary  of  John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in Senate campaigns , having  परोसा  as communications director for the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee and for  चार  individual Senate campaigns , including those of  ओबामा  in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998 .
Gibbs  थी  also the press secretary of Representative Bob Etheridge .
On November 22 , 2008 , Gibbs was announced as the press secretary of the  ओबामा  administration .
He assumed  the  role of press secretary on January  20  , 2009 , and gave his first official briefing  on  January 22 .
On January 5 ,  2011  , Gibbs  घोषित  that he would leave the White House to become an outside adviser to the administration .
He left on  फ़रवरी  11 , 2011 .
On February  12  ,  2013  , it was announced that Gibbs had been hired as a contributor for cable-news  चैनल  MSNBC .
His first appearance was  on  the same night prior to the 2013 State Of The Union Address .
Armando Pérez (  born   जनवरी  15 , 1981 ) , better known  by  his stage name Pitbull , is an American rapper , songwriter  ,  and record producer .
His first recorded performance  थी  from the Lil Jon album Kings of Crunk in 2002 .
In  2004  , he  released   उसके  debut album titled M.I.A.M.I . ( short for Money Is A Major Issue ) under TVT  रिकॉर्ड  .
चूंकि  then , he has released three other albums  अंतर्गत   the  label : El Mariel in 2006 , The Boatlift  in  2007 , and  ग्रह  Pit  in   2011   .
He released Rebelution in 2009 , which included singles ``  i  Know You Want Me ( Calle Ocho )  ``  and `` Krazy ``  .
The latter peaked at  no  . 30 on the Hot 100 and No . 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts while `` I Know You Want Me  ''  peaked at No . 2 on the  hot   100  and peaked within the top ten spots of charts in the UK , Canada , Italy , and the Netherlands  .
The song reached No . 1 in France and the European Hot 100 on the week ending August 29 , 2009 according to Billboard magazine  .
He later signed with Polo Grounds Music through Sony Music and created his own label Mr. 305 Inc .
Another single from Rebelution was `` Hotel Room Service `` , which peaked at No . 8 on the Hot 100 .
Rebelution went on to sell  over  7.5 million worldwide digital singles and albums  संयुक्त  .
Nevertheless , he dropped a smash called  ``  Give Me Everything '' which reached # 1 worldwide  ,  and featured artists Ne-yo , Nayer , and Afrojack .
He has also  performed  as a featured artist  in  the remixes of many other hit songs , like Tik Tok , Scream & Shout , Lo Hecho  esta  Hecho , Bad , Papi ,  ईंट  , How Low , Tonight ( I 'm Lovin ' You ) , Video Phone , Over To You Now  और  Bumpy Ride .
Pérez is also the host  of  his own  spanish-language   कार्यक्रम  on the cable channel Mun2 titled La Esquina ( Spanish for The  कोने  ) .
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' Combs  co-founded  Bad Boy Latino , a subsidiary  of  Combs ' Bad Boy Records  लेबल  .
It primarily focuses on Latin hip hop , Latin soul , Latin pop and other Tropical music , and has offices in  नई  York and Miami , Florida .
साथ  with co-founding it , Pérez currently heads the A & R  प्रभाग  of the label .
Pérez has become a product endorser , representing alongside Drake , Rihanna , and  trey  Songz the “So Kodak” campaign for the Kodak brand and embarking on a partnership  साथ  the soft drink giant Dr  pepper   as  part of the campaign “ Vida 23 ” for which he  अंकित  the song specifically featured  on  his album Armando .
Pitbull also announced he has become the spokesperson for Voli Vodka , in which he holds a majority equity stake , and Budweiser has chosen Pitbull  to  promote its Bud Light line of beer .
The commercials currently highlight Pitbull dancing and gyrating on stage holding up a bottle of Bud Light  .
Pitbull has also purchased an equity stake in Miami Subs Pizza and Grill .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ) , also known as All Hallows ' Eve , is a yearly celebration  observed  in a number of countries on October 31 , the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating  the  triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All Hallows ' Eve is a  christianised  feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals , and festivals of the  मुर्दे   साथ  possible pagan roots ,  विशेषकर   the  Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties , carving pumpkins  into  jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , apple bobbing , visiting haunted attractions  ,  playing pranks , telling scary stories , and watching horror films .
Freedom of speech is the political right  to  communicate one  's  opinions and ideas using one 's body and property to  anyone  who is willing to receive them .
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously , but includes any act of  seeking  , receiving and imparting information or ideas , regardless of the medium used .
In practice ,  the  right to freedom of speech  is  not absolute in any country  और  the right is  commonly   विषय  to limitations , as  साथ  libel  ,  slander , obscenity , sedition ( including , for  उदाहरण  inciting ethnic hatred  )  , copyright violation  ,  revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right  to  freedom of expression is recognized  as   a  human right under Article 19 of  the  Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international human rights law  in  the International Covenant on Civil  और  Political Rights (  iccpr  ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ;  इस  right shall include freedom to seek  ,  receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in writing or in print , in the form of art , or through any other media of his choice ''  .
Article 19 goes on to  कह  that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities ``  और  may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when necessary `` [ f  ]  or  आदर  of the rights or reputation of others ''  or  `` [  f  ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of  पब्लिक   स्वास्थ्य  or  नैतिकता  '' .
स्वतंत्रता   of   वाक  may be  legally  curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense  ,  such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
Sydney Harbour from  the  air , showing the Opera House , the CBD , Circular  quay   ,  the Bridge , the Parramatta River , North  सिडनी  and Kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge across Sydney Harbour that carries rail , vehicular , bicycle and pedestrian traffic between  the  Sydney central business district (  सीबीडी  ) and the  उत्तर  Shore .
The dramatic view of  the  bridge , the harbour ,  और  the nearby Sydney Opera House  is   an   iconic  image of Sydney , New  दक्षिण  Wales , and Australia  .
The bridge is  nicknamed  `` The Coathanger '' because of its arch-based design .
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C . Bradfield of  the  NSW Department of Public Works , the bridge was designed and built by British firm Dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in  1932  .
The bridge 's design was influenced by the Hell Gate Bridge in New York .
It was the world 's widest long-span bridge , at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) wide , until construction of the new Port Mann  सेतु  in Vancouver .
It is also the fifth longest  spanning-arch   सेतु  in  the  world , and  it  is the tallest steel arch bridge , measuring from top to  जल   स्तर   .
Until 1967 the Harbour Bridge was Sydney 's tallest structure .
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands , in the northern Pacific Ocean .
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world , the Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation of the  हवाई  – Emperor seamount chain , an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi  )  long chain of volcanoes , four of which are active , two of which are dormant , and more than 123 of which are extinct  ,  many having  चूंकि  been ground beneath  the  waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls .
The chain extends  इससे  south of the island of Hawaii to  the  edge  of  the Aleutian Trench , near the eastern edge of Russia .
जबकि  most volcanoes  हैं  created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries , the Hawaii  हॉटस्पॉट  is located far from nearby plate  सीमाएँ  ; the classic hotspot  सिद्धान्त  , first proposed in 1963 by John Tuzo Wilson ,  proposes  that a single , fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that then , cut off from their  सोर्स  by the movement of the Pacific Plate  ,  become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over  लाखो  of years .
According to this theory , the nearly  60°  bend separating the  सम्राट   और  Hawaiian segments of  the  chain was caused by a sudden shift in the movement of the Pacific Plate  .
In 2003 , fresh investigations  of  this  irregularity  led to  the  proposal of a mobile hotspot theory , suggesting that hotspots  हैं   मोबाईल  , not fixed  ,  and that the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the  हॉटस्पॉट  's motion rather than  the  plate 's .
Ancient Hawaiians were the first  to  recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the volcanoes  to  the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands .
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes  और  their constant battle  साथ  the sea was  a  major element in Hawaiian mythology , embodied in Pele , the deity  of  volcanoes .
After the arrival of Europeans on the island ,  in  1880-1881 James Dwight Dana directed the  पहला  formal geological  पढ़ाई   of  the hotspot 's volcanics , confirming  the  relationship long observed by the  natives  .
1912 marked  the  founding of the Hawaiian  ज्वालामुखी  Observatory by volcanologist Thomas  jaggar  , initiating continuous scientific  अवलोकन  of the islands .
In  the  1970s , a mapping project was initiated to gain more information  परिचय  the complex geology of Hawaii 's  seafloor  .
The hotspot  रै  since been tomographically  imaged  , showing it to be wide and up to  गहन  , and olivine and garnet -based  अध्ययन   have  shown its magma chamber  is  approximately .
in  its at least  85  million years of activity the hotspot  रै  produced an estimated of rock  .
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time , causing the  राशि  of time each individual volcano is active  to  decrease ,  इससे   18  million years for the 76 million year old Detroit  seamount   ,  to just under 900,000 for  the  one million year-old Kohala ; on the other hand , eruptive volume has increased from per year to about .
Overall , this has caused a  ट्रेंड   towards  more active  लकिन  quickly-silenced , closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes  on  the near  पक्ष  of the  हॉटस्पॉट  overlap each other ( forming such superstructures as Hawaii island and  the  ancient Maui Nui ) , the  oldest  of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart .

Petitions  हैं  being signed to bring the show for a fifth season .
the   दिखाएँ  airs on Treehouse  tv  Canada  और  Nick Jr. (  formerly  Noggin ) .

It was marketed with the tagline ``  विद्रोही  .

Osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ ) is a severe bone disease that affects the maxilla and the mandible .
Various forms of ONJ have  महरूम  described over the last 160 years , and  a  number of causes have been suggested in the literature .
Osteonecrosis of the jaws associated with bisphosphonate therapy , required by some cancer treatment regimens , has been identified and defined as a  pathological  entity since 2003 .
The possible risk from lower oral doses of bisphosphonates , taken by patients to prevent or treat  ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस  , remains uncertain  .
Various treatment options have been  छान  , however severe cases of ONJ still require surgical removal of the affected bone .
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible sites of  दंत  infection are  जरूरी  to help prevent the  कंडीशन  , especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered .
The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball  टोली  based in Boston , Massachusetts , and a member of Major League Baseball 's American League Eastern Division .
Founded in as one of the American League 's eight charter franchises , the Red Sox 's home ballpark has been Fenway Park since .
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner , John I. Taylor  ,  around , following previous Boston teams that had  महरूम  known as the `` Red Stockings `` .
They have played in 11 World Series  ,  winning 7  .
Boston was  a  dominant  टोली  in the new league , defeating the Pittsburgh Pirates in the first World  श्रेणी  in and winning four more championships by .
However , they then  गई  into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history , called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth  to  the rival  यांकीज़  two years after  उनके  world championship in 1918 , an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in .
However  ,  the team 's  इतिहास  during that period was hardly one of futility , but was rather punctuated with some of  the  most memorable moments in World Series history ,  सहित  Enos  वध  's `` mad dash `` in , the `` Impossible Dream `` of , Carlton Fisk 's home run in , and Bill Buckner  's  error in .
रेड  Sox history  रै  also been marked by the team 's intense rivalry with the New York Yankees , arguably the fiercest and most  ऐतिहासिक  in North American professional sports .
The Boston Red Sox are owned by Fenway Sports Group , who also own Liverpool Football  क्लबों  of the Premier League in England .
the  Red Sox are consistently one of the top MLB teams in average road attendance , while the small capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance .
From May 15 , 2003 to April 10 , 2013 , the Red Sox sold out every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular season ) for a major professional sports record that lasted almost a decade  .
Mince pie filled with mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture of chopped dried fruit  ,  distilled  आत्माओं  and spices , and sometimes beef suet , beef , or venison  .
originally  , mincemeat always contained meat .
Many modern recipes contain beef suet , though vegetable shortening is sometimes used in its place .
Variants  of  mincemeat are found in Australia , Brittany , Canada , northern Europe , Ireland ,  दक्षिण  Africa , the United  किंगडम  and  the   संयुक्त  States .
In some countries the  पद  mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat  .
Diana , Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1  जुलाई  1961 – 31 August 1997 )  थी  the first wife of Charles , Prince of Wales , the eldest son and heir apparent of  महारानी  Elizabeth  ii  .
She was well known for her  fund-raising  work for  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  charities and as an eminent celebrity of  the  late 20th century .
Her  विवाह  to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981 was  आयोजित  at St Paul 's Cathedral and seen  by  a global television  दर्शक  of over 750 million .
While married she bore the titles Princess of Wales , Duchess of  कॉर्नवॉल  , Duchess of Rothesay , Countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew .
the  marriage produced two sons , the  princes   विलियम  and Harry , who became second and third in line to the British throne .
Diana  थी  born into an aristocratic English family with  royal  ancestry .
She  थी  the  चौथी  child of John Spencer , 8th Earl Spencer and his wife  frances  , daughter of Maurice Roche , 4th  सामन्त  Fermoy .
She became a public figure with the announcement of her  सगाई  .
She also received recognition for her charity work and for her support of  the  International Campaign to Ban Landmines .
From 1989  ,  she was  the  president of the Great  ormond  Street Hospital for children , in addition to dozens of  अन्य   धर्मार्थ  .
Diana remained the object of worldwide media scrutiny during and after her marriage , which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996  .
मीडिया  attention and public mourning were considerable following  उसके  death in a car crash in Paris  on  31 August 1997 .
अर्जेंटीना  , officially the Argentine Republic (  )  , is  the  second largest country  in  both  दक्षिण  America and the Latin America region .
The  देश  is a federation  of  23 provinces and the autonomous city of Buenos Aires ,  इसके  capital and largest  नगर  .
It is the eighth -largest country  in  the world by land area and the largest  among  Spanish-speaking nations by geographical  क्षेत्रफल  of  2,780,400  km2 and is the fourth by population , with over 41 million people .
अर्जेंटीना  is a founding member of  the  United Nations , Mercosur  ,  the Union of South American Nations , the Organization of  ibero-american  States , the World Bank Group and the World Trade Organization , and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies .
Argentina is located in South America , bordered by Chile  to  the west  और  south , Bolivia and  पैराग्वे  to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast .
अर्जेंटीना  claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica , the Falkland Islands ( ) and South Georgia and the South  सैंडविच  Islands .
Argentina is the successor state  of   the  Viceroyalty of the Río de  la  Plata  ,  an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire .
Argentina declared independence  दौरान  the Argentine War of Independence , which  थी   followed  by the Argentine Civil Wars during most of the 19th century .
The country faced several military coups and political instability during the  20th  century ,  साथ  with periodic  आर्थिक  crisis that continue to this day .
A recognized Southern Cone power , and middle power , Argentina is Latin America 's third-largest economy , with a `` very  ऊँची  '' rating on the Human  विकास  index .
Within Latin America , Argentina  रै   the  fifth highest nominal GDP  प्रति  capita and the highest in purchasing  शक्ति  terms .
The Legatum Institute have argued that  the  country  रै  a `` foundation for future growth due to its market size , levels of foreign direct investment , and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods  ''  , and it is  classed  by investors as middle emerging economy .
Argentina is the Latin American country with the most Nobel Prizes , for a total of five , all  प्राप्त  during the second half of the twentieth century .
The country  रै  three Nobel prizes in science and two of peace .
The most important aspects of science and technology in Argentina are concerned with medicine , nuclear physics , biotechnology , nanotechnology , space and rocket technology and several fields related to the country  's  Main Economic Activities .
The country also has the mega  प्रदर्शनी  center of science , technology , industry and art that are Latin America  's  largest .
Hickory  is  a city in Catawba County , with  भाग  also in Burke County and Caldwell County .
The  नगर  's 2010 estimated population is 40,010 .
Hickory is the  प्रिंसिपल  city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA ,  in  which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497 .
polyethylene  terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ) , commonly abbreviated PET , PETE , or the obsolete PETP or PET-P , is a thermoplastic polymer resin of the polyester family and is used in synthetic fibers ; beverage , food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering  resins  often in combination with glass fiber .
The term polyethylene terephthalate  is  a source of  भ्रम  because this substance , PET , does not contain polyethylene .
Thus  ,  the  वैकल्पिक  form , poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) , is often used in scholarly journals for the sake of accuracy  और  clarity .
Depending on its processing and thermal history  ,  polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an amorphous ( transparent ) and as a semi-crystalline polymer .
The semicrystalline material might  appear  transparent ( particle size  <  500 nm ) or  अपारदर्शी  and white ( particle size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size .
Its  मोनोमर   (  bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid and  एथिलीन  glycol with water as a byproduct , or by transesterification reaction between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct .
Polymerization  is  through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers  (  done immediately after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct .
The majority of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers  (  in excess of 60 % ) , with  बोतल  production accounting for around 30 % of global demand .
In the context of textile applications , PET is referred to by its common name , `` polyester , '' whereas  the  acronym `` PET '' is generally used in relation  to  packaging .
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer production and is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second , respectively .
पालतु  consists of polymerized units of the monomer ethylene terephthalate , with  repeating  C10H8O4 units .
PET is commonly recycled , and has the number  ``  1 '' as its recycling symbol .
Louisiana was admitted to  the  Union on  अप्रैल   30   ,  1812 , and elects  सीनेटरों  to Classes 2 and  क्लास  3 .
Its current senators  हैं  Democrat Mary Landrieu and Republican David Vitter .
Black pudding ,  रक्त  pudding  or  blood sausage is  a  type of sausage made by cooking blood or dried blood with a filler  जबतक  it is thick  पर्याप्त   to  congeal when cooled .
The dish exists in various cultures from Asia to Europe and  the  Americas .
Pig , cattle ,  शीप  , duck , and goat blood can be used depending on different countries  .
In Europe and the Americas , typical fillers include meat , fat , suet ,  ब्रैड  ,  cornmeal  , sweet potato , onion , chestnuts , barley , and  oatmeal  .
In Spain , Portugal  और  Asia , potato  is  often replaced by  राइस  .
Stakeholder may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ) , a person , group , organization , member or system who  affects  or can be  प्रभावित  by an  संगठन  's actions
Stakeholder , an entity that can be affected by the results of  कि  in which  वे  are said to be stakeholders , i.e. , that  in   जिससे  they have a stake .
Project stakeholder , a person , group or organization with  an   ब्याज  in a project
Stakeholder theory , a theory that identifies and models the groups which are stakeholders of a corporation or project
Stakeholder analysis , the process of identifying those  प्रभावित  by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ) , a third party  जो  temporarily holds  धन  or property  जबकि  its owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9 , 1925 - September 1 , 2003 ) was an  अमरीकी  theatre and film director .
Smight was born in Minneapolis , Minnesota and went to  स्कूल  with future  कर्ता  Peter Graves .
उसके  film credits include The Traveling Executioner , Rabbit  ,  Run , Loving Couples  ,  Midway , Harper , Airport 1975 , Damnation Alley and the Emmy Award -winning  एडी  , as well as many episodes  of  television series such  as  The Twilight Zone and The Alfred  हिचकॉक  Hour .
He  भी  directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th  cousin  and composed the music for the  फिल्मी   adaption  of Roll of Thunder Hear My  क्राई  .
Smight died from cancer in Los Angeles , California  .
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 February 1907 O.S  .   27  January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and  आविष्कारक  .
He formulated the Periodic Law , created his own version of the periodic table of  तत्व  , and used it to correct the properties of some already discovered elements and  भी  to predict the  गुण  of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ) , officially the City of Modesto , is the county seat and largest city of Stanislaus County , California , United States .
With a population of approximately 201,165 at the 2010 census , Modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the state of California .
The Modesto Census County Division , which includes  the  cities of Ceres and Riverbank , has a population of 312,842 as of 2010 .
Modesto is  स्तिथ  in the central valley area of Northern California , 90 miles north of Fresno ,  92  miles east of San Francisco , 68 miles south of the state capital of Sacramento , 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park , and 24  मील  south of Stockton .
Modesto , a 29-time Tree City USA honoree , is surrounded by rich  farmland  , lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production .
Led by milk , almonds  ,  chickens  ,   अखरोट  , and corn silage ,  the  county grossed nearly $ 3.1  अरब  in agricultural production in 2011 .
Modesto was immortalized in  the  1973 George Lucas film American Graffiti .
The award winning film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia that included the TV show Happy Days and the other  spin-offs  .
Ron Howard , Harrison Ford and Richard Dreyfuss starred in the film .
The soundtrack  थी  a huge success .
Director  जार्ज   लुकास  is a native of Modesto  ,  graduating from Downey  ऊँची  School in 1962  .
The  gallup-healthways  Well-Being Index for 2011 , which  साक्षात्कार  1,000 participants daily and asks  individuals  to assess their jobs , finances , physical health , emotional state of mind and communities , ranked Modesto 126 out of  the  190 cities  surveyed  .
In December 2009 , Forbes ranked  modesto  48th out of 100  among  `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck Cities '' .
In this ranking , Modesto ranked 8th  in  housing affordability and travel time but  भी  ranked 86th in job forecast growth and 99th in foreclosures .
Independence Day , commonly known  as  the Fourth of July ,  is  a federal holiday in the United States commemorating the adoption  of  the Declaration of Independence on July 4 , 1776 , declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain .
Independence  दिन  is  commonly  associated with  आतिशबाजी  , parades , barbecues , carnivals , fairs , picnics , concerts , baseball games , family reunions , and political speeches and ceremonies , in addition to various other public and private events celebrating the  इतिहास  , government , and traditions of the United  राज्य  .
Independence Day is the national day of the United States .
A gender symbol denotes the sex of  an  organism or characterizes an agent by gender .
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ and female ♀ are  निकला  from astrological symbols , denoting the classical planets Mars  और  Venus , respectively .
These symbols have been in use since the Renaissance also denoting elements in alchemy  ,  specifically the metals iron and copper .
They were first used to denote the effective gender of plants ( i.e . sex of individual in a given crossbreed , since most plants are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus  लीनियस  in 1751 .
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a  अस्थाई  right to hold land or property in which a lessee or a tenant holds rights of  रियल  property by some form of title from  a  lessor or landlord .
Although a tenant does hold rights to real property , a leasehold estate is typically  माना  personal property .
Leasehold  is  a form  of  land tenure or property tenure where one party buys the right to occupy land or a building for a given length of time .
As lease is a legal estate , leasehold estate can be bought and sold on the open market .
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright  और  thereafter held for  an  indeterminate length of time  ,  and also differs from a tenancy where  a  property is let ( rented ) on a  आवधिक  basis such as weekly or  मासिक  .
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in decades or centuries  ;  a 99 year lease is quite common ) the  leaseholder  has the right to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed  किराया  to the  मालिक  .
Terms of the agreement are contained in a lease , which has elements of contract  और  property law intertwined .
The  पद  estate  लिये  years may occasionally  be  used .
This refers to a leasehold estate for any specific period of time ( the word ``  सालो  '' is misleading ) .
An estate for years is not automatically renewed .
Colloquially  ,   ``   पट्टे  '' and `` leasing `` are  प्रायः  a formalization of a longer , specific period as compared with a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will , terminable or renewable at the end of a short period .
Olivia ( also known  as  Welcome to the World of the Pig Olivia ) is a British-American children  's  animated television series produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books .
It is seen on  उपनाम  Jr. in the US , Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in  the  UK and Ireland , and Disney Junior  in  Latin America and Brazil , Treehouse TV in Canada .
The show has won a silver Parents ' Choice Award for its positive story lines and characters .
Location of Panama  between   प्रशांत  ( bottom ) and Caribbean ( top ) ,  साथ  canal at top center
The Panama Canal  (  ) is a ship canal in Panama  कि  connects the Atlantic Ocean ( via the Caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean .
The canal cuts across the Isthmus  of  Panama  और  is a key conduit for international maritime trade .
There are locks at each end to lift ships  up  to Gatun Lake ( above sea-level  )  .
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the  राशि  of  कार्य  required for the canal .
the  current locks are wide .
a  third , wider lane of locks  is   होने  built  .
France  began   कार्य  on the canal in 1881 , but had to stop because of engineering problems and high  मृत्यु   due  to disease .
The  संयुक्त  States ( US ) later took over  the  project and took a decade to complete the canal  in  1914 , enabling ships  to  avoid the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip of  दक्षिण  America ( via  the  Drake Passage ) or to navigate  the  Strait of Magellan .
One of the largest and most difficult  अभियान्त्रिकी  projects ever  undertaken  , the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible for ships to  सफर  between the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half  the   समय  previously required .
The shorter , faster , safer route  to  the US West Coast and to nations in and along the Pacific Ocean allowed those places to  become  more integrated with the  संसार  economy .
During this time , ownership of the territory that is now the  पनामा  Canal was first Colombian , then  फ्रेंच  , and then American ; the United States  समाप्त   the  construction .
The canal  थी   लिया  over in 1999 by the Panamanian government , as  long  planned .
सालाना   ट्रैफ़िक  has risen  इससे  about  1,000  ships when the canal opened in 1914 ,  to   14,702  vessels in 2008 , the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons .
By 2008 , more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the canal , many of them  much  larger  than  the original planners  could  have envisioned ; the largest ships that can  पारगमन  the canal today are called Panamax .
The American Society of Civil Engineers has named the Panama Canal one of the  सात   चमत्कार  of the modern world .
Benjamin Franklin ( April 17 , 1790 ) was one of the Founding Fathers  of  the United  राज्य  .
A noted polymath , Franklin was a leading author , printer , political  theorist  , politician , postmaster , scientist , musician  ,  inventor , satirist , civic  activist  , statesman , and diplomat .
As a scientist  ,  he was a major figure in the American  आत्मज्ञान   और  the history of physics for  उसके  discoveries and theories regarding electricity .
He invented the  बिजली  rod  ,  bifocals , the Franklin  स्टोव  , a carriage odometer , and the glass 'armonica ' .
He facilitated many civic organizations , including a fire department and a university .
Franklin earned the title of `` The First American '' for his early  और  indefatigable campaigning for colonial unity ; as an author and spokesman  in  London for several colonies , then  as  the first United States Ambassador to France , he exemplified the emerging American nation .
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift , hard work , education , community  स्पिरिट  , self-governing  संस्थानों  , and opposition to authoritarianism both political and religious  ,  with the scientific and tolerant values of the Enlightenment .
In the words of historian Henry Steele  commager  , `` In  a  Franklin could be merged  the  virtues of Puritanism without its defects ,  the  illumination of the  आत्मज्ञान   बगैर  its heat . ''
To Walter Isaacson , this makes Franklin ``  the  most accomplished American of his age and the most influential  in  inventing the  प्रकार  of society America would become  .  ''
Franklin , always proud of his  working   क्लास  roots , became a successful newspaper editor and printer  in  Philadelphia , the leading city in the  colonies   .
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of whom published the Pennsylvania Chronicle  ,  a newspaper that was  ज्ञात  for  इसके  revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies .
He became  धनवान  publishing Poor Richard 's Almanack and The Pennsylvania Gazette .
Franklin gained international renown as a scientist for  उसके  famous experiments in electricity and  लिये  his many inventions , especially the lightning  लाठी  .
He played a major role in establishing the University of Pennsylvania and was elected  the  first president  of  the American Philosophical Society  .
फ्रैंकलिन   became  a national hero in America when he  पथप्रदर्शन  the effort to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act .
An accomplished diplomat , he was widely  admired  among the French as American minister to Paris and was a major figure in the development of positive Franco-American relations .
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies , which enabled  उसे  to set up  the  first national communications network .
He was active in community affairs , colonial and state politics , as well as national and international affairs .
From 1785 to 1788  ,  he served as governor of  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Toward the  समाप्त  of  उसके  life , he  freed  his  स्लेव  and  became  one of the most prominent abolitionists .
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement , and status as one of America 's  सबसे  influential Founding Fathers , have seen Franklin honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names of many towns , counties , educational institutions , namesakes , and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death , countless cultural references .
Criminal Minds is an  अमरीकी  police procedural television  कार्यक्रम  that premiered September 22 , 2005  ,  on CBS .
The series follows a team of profilers from the FBI 's Behavioral  विश्लेषण  Unit ( BAU ) based in Quantico , Virginia .
the  BAU is part of  the  FBI National Center for the  विश्लेषण  of Violent Crime .
The  दिखाएँ  differs from many procedural dramas by  focusing  on profiling the criminal , rather than the  अपराधों  itself .
The  दिखाएँ  is produced by The Mark Gordon  कम्पनी  in association with  सीबीएस  Television Studios ( originally Paramount Network Television then CBS Paramount Network Television ) and ABC Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ) .
CBS announced in October 2009 that Legacy Interactive would develop  a  video game based on the show .
The game would require players to examine crime scenes for  clues  to help solve murder mysteries .
The interactive puzzle game was released in 2012 ,  लकिन  did not feature any of the voices of the  दिखाएँ  's  डाल  , nor was the cast involved with the project .
On  कूच  14 , 2012  ,  CBS renewed Criminal Minds for an eighth season , which premiered on September 26 , 2012 .
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana , written by vocalist and  guitarist  Kurt Cobain .
The song was released as the first single from the group 's  तीसरा  and final studio  एल्बम  , In Utero  ,  in 1993 .
It was one of two  गीतों  from the album mixed by  स्कॉट  Litt in order to augment the original production by producer Steve Albini .
जबकि  Nirvana  's   लेबल  DGC Records did not release a physical  सिंगल  for sale in the United States , `` Heart-Shaped Box '' received much American radio airplay , reaching number one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart .
the  international  रिलीज  of  the  single reached number five on the UK Singles Chart .
The  सोंग   's  music video  ,  directed by Anton Corbijn , garnered critical plaudits .
The orbital speed of a body , generally a planet ,  a  natural satellite , an artificial satellite , or a multiple star , is the speed at which  it  orbits around  the  barycenter of a  प्रणाली  , usually around a more massive body .
it  can be used to refer to either the mean orbital  गति  , the average speed as it  completes  an orbit , or instantaneous orbital speed , the speed at a particular point in its orbit  .
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed from  the  distance to the  सेंट्रल  body at that  स्थिति  ,  और  the specific orbital energy , which is independent  of  position : the  गतिज  energy is the total energy minus the  संभावित  energy .
Brown Palace Interior and Atrium
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating hotel  in  Denver , Colorado  और  is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever built .
It is now operated by Quorum Hotels and  रिसॉर्ट  .
It was built in 1892 , one year later than the  ऑक्सफोर्ड  Hotel .
It was named for  इसके  original owner , Henry C. Brown ,  और  was designed  साथ  its odd triangular shape by architect Frank Edbrooke .
The hotel is located at 321 17th St , Denver , CO between 17th Street , Broadway and Tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza .
the  main entrance door  is  on Tremont Street .
dvd-video  is a consumer video  स्वरूप  used to  स्टोर   डिजिटल  video on DVD discs , and is currently the dominant consumer video format  in  Asia , North America , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel  स्वरुप  as described below ) .
Typically , the data rate for DVD movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s , and the bit rate is usually adaptive .
It was first available for retail around 1997 .
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD  फ़ोरम  and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not publicly available , because every subscriber must sign a  non-disclosure  agreement .
Certain information in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential .
The nautical mile (  प्रतीक  M , NM or nmi  )  is a unit of length that is about one minute of arc of latitude measured along any meridian , or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator .
By international agreement it has been set at 1,852 metres  exactly  ( about 6,076 feet ) .
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for use in the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   प्रणाली  of Units by  the  BIPM ) used especially by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries , and also in  ध्रुवीय  exploration .
It is commonly used in international law and treaties , especially regarding the limits of territorial waters .
it   विकसित  from the sea mile and the related geographical  मील  .
The nautical mile remains in use  by  sea and air navigators worldwide because of its convenience when  working   साथ  charts .
Most nautical charts use  the   मर्केटर  projection whose scale varies  by  about a factor of six from the equator to 80° latitude , so charts covering large areas can not use a single linear scale  .
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a  मिनट  of latitude on a chart , so a distance measured with a chart divider can  be  roughly  परिवर्तित  to nautical  मील  using the chart 's latitude scale .
Shippensburg is a borough in Cumberland  और  Franklin counties in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania .
Settled in 1730 , Shippensburg lies in the Cumberland Valley  ,  41 miles ( 66 km ) west-southwest  of  Harrisburg , and is part of  the  Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area .
In 1900 , 3,228 people lived there ; in  1910  , 3,457 ; and in 1940 , 5,244 people lived there .
The population was 5,492 at the 2010 census .
Shippensburg was incorporated as a borough on  जनवरी   21  , 1819 .
In the past , there were furniture factories , engine and pump works , and other industrial  works  located within the town .
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company , the oldest and largest manufacturer of decorations and party goods , which  बिकता  its  distinctive  honeycomb paper  सजावट  worldwide .
It is also the location  of  Pague and Fegan , the oldest continuously operated  हार्डवेयर  store in Pennsylvania .
In May 2012 , Volvo Construction Equipment began a $ 100 million expansion project to bring  इसके  American headquarters to Shippensburg .
Shippensburg is also home to Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania , one of 14 universities of the Pennsylvania State System  of   उच्चतर  Education .
वार्षिक  the last full  सप्ताह  of July , the Shippensburg Community Fair  is  held .
Begun in 1958 ,  the   मेला  bills itself as Pennsylvania 's  largest   bi-county  fair .
The fair includes agricultural exhibits , a craft show  ,  food vendors , and carnival rides amongst  अन्य  things .
Every summer on the last Saturday of August  ,  Shippensburg holds the  मकई  Festival , an event that brings regional artisans and vendors to operate  स्टैंड  downtown .
The downtown is closed to traffic for at least 5 blocks for most of the day .
औसत  attendance at  the  festival is estimated at 60,000 - 70,000  प्रत्येक  year .
Black hairy tongue ( BHT ,  भी  termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition  of  the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate with black or  भूरा  discoloration , giving a black and hairy appearance .
The appearance  may   be   alarming  , but it is a harmless condition  .
Predisposing factors include smoking  ,  xerostomia ( dry mouth ) , soft diet , poor oral hygiene and certain medications .
Management is by  improving  oral hygiene  ,   विशेषकर  scraping or brushing the tongue .
The IEEE 1394 interface is a serial bus interface standard for high-speed communications and isochronous real-time  आंकड़ा  transfer .
It  थी  developed in the late 1980s and  जल्दी  1990s by Apple , who  पुकारा  it  firewire   .
The 1394 interface is comparable to USB , and often those two technologies  हैं  considered together ,  हालांकि  USB has more market share .
Apple first included FireWire in  कुछ  of its 1999  मॉडल  , and most Apple computers since the year 2000 have included FireWire ports , though , as of 2013 , nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ) .
The interface is also known by the brand i.LINK ( Sony ) , and Lynx (  टेक्सास  Instruments ) .
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI  in  many applications  ,  because of lower implementation costs and a simplified , more adaptable cabling system .
The 1394 standard also defines a backplane interface ,  हालांकि  this is not as widely used .
IEEE 1394 is  the  High-Definition Audio-Video Network Alliance ( HANA ) standard connection interface for A/V ( audio/visual ) component communication and control .
FireWire is also  उपलब्धियाँ  in wireless  ,  fiber optic , and coaxial  संस्करण  using the isochronous protocols .
Stephen  ``  Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3 , 1954 – August 27 , 1990 ) was an American guitarist , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
Often  referred  to by his initials SRV , Vaughan is  बेहतरीन  known as a founding  सदस्य  and leader of Double Trouble .
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist Tommy Shannon , they  ignited  the blues revival of the 1980s .
With a  करियर  spanning  सात  years , Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold .
He was born and raised in Dallas , Texas , and for a short period of time lived in Graham , Texas  .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan , Vaughan started playing the guitar  at  age seven  और   formed  several bands that occasionally  performed  in local nightclubs .
At age 17 ,  he   dropped  out of high school and moved to Austin to  further  pursue his musical career , joining groups such as Krackerjack , the  nightcrawlers  , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed Triple Threat Revue , a band that eventually evolved  into  Double Trouble and  regularly  performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland , catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to  खेल  on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance ,  जबकि  Browne offered  the  band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album .
In March 1983 , Vaughan and Double  ट्रबल  were signed to  एपिक  Records by veteran record producer John Hammond Sr.  और  released their debut album , Texas  बाढ़  in June  of  that year  .
After successful touring , the group released the albums , Could n't Stand  the  Weather ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ) , the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had progressed successfully , Vaughan checked  into  a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta  ,  Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol  आदत  and returned to touring with the band .
In June 1989 , In Step was released and earned them  a  Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance .
On August  27   ,  1990 , Vaughan was killed in  a  helicopter crash following a performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's uniquely  eclectic  yet intense  स्टाइल  was derived from  a  variety of musical genres .
he  was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King , Freddie  किंग  , Otis Rush , and Muddy Waters , and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar playing reflected  the  classic blues and pentatonic scales .
He has received wide critical recognition for  उसके  guitar playing , ranking at # 6  on   रोलिंग  Stones list of ``  100  Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously  inducted   into  the Blues  हॉल  of Fame in 2000 and a memorial  प्रतिमा  was  erected  in Austin 's Auditorium  shores  park .
Stevie  रे  Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to  आइये  from the state of Texas .
GigE redirects here .
For the camera protocol ,  देखिए  GigE vision .
In computer networking , gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or  1  GigE ) is a term describing various technologies for transmitting Ethernet frames at a  रेट  of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ) , as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard .
It came into use beginning in 1999 , gradually supplanting Fast  ईथरनेट  in wired local networks , where it performed considerably  तेज़  .
The cables and  उपकरण  are very  समान  to previous standards and  यहूद  very common and economical by 2010 .
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs are allowed by the specification , but full-duplex usage  साथ  switches is much more common .

The main components of a stamp:
1  .  Image
2  .  Perforations
3 . Denomination
4 . Country name
A postage stamp is a small piece of paper  कि  is  खरीदा  and displayed on an item of mail  as  evidence of payment of postage .
Typically ,  stamps  are  बना  from special  पेपर  , with a national designation and denomination ( price ) on the face , and a gum adhesive on the  रिवर्स  side .
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other authorized vendor and are  प्रयुक्त  to pay for the costs involved in moving  मेल  as well  as  other business necessities such as insurance and registration .
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a small rectangle of varying proportions , though triangles  or   अन्य  shapes are  occasionally  used .
The  स्टैम्प  is affixed to an envelope or other postal cover ( i.e. , packet , box , mailing cylinder ) that the customer wishes to send .
The item is then processed by the postal system , where a postmark , sometimes known as a cancellation mark , is usually applied over the  स्टैम्प   और  cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used  ,  which prevents  इसके  reuse .
The postmark indicates the date and point of origin of the mailing .
The mailed item is then delivered to the address  कि  the customer  रै  applied to the envelope or cover .
postage  stamps have facilitated the delivery of mail since the 1840s .
Before this time , ink and hand-stamps ( hence  the  word 'stamp ' ) , usually made  इससे  wood or cork , were often used to  फ़्रैंक  the mail and confirm the payment of postage .
The first  चिपकने  postage stamp  ,  commonly referred to as the Penny  ब्लैक  , was issued in the United Kingdom in 1840 .
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform  और  improve the postal system in the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland , which in the early  19th  century was in disarray and rife with corruption .
There are varying accounts of the inventor or inventors of the stamp .
Before the introduction of postage stamps , mail  in  the UK was  सशुल्क  for by  the  recipient , a system that was associated with  an  irresolvable problem : the costs of  delivering   मेल  were not recoverable by the postal  सेवा  when  प्राप्तकर्ता  were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items  ,  and senders had no  प्रोत्साहन  to restrict the number  ,  size , or weight of items sent ,  whether  or not they would ultimately be paid for .
The postage stamp resolved this issue  in  a simple and  सुरुचिपूर्ण  manner , with the additional benefit of room for an element of beauty to be introduced .
Later  सम्बन्धित  inventions include postal stationery such as prepaid-postage envelopes , post cards , lettercards , aerogrammes and wrappers , postage meters , and , more recently , specialty boxes  और  envelopes provided free to  the  customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing .
the  postage stamp afforded convenience  लिये  both the mailer and postal officials , more efficiently recovered costs for the  डाक  service , and ultimately  resulted  in a better , faster postal system .
With  the  conveniences stamps offered  ,  their use  resulted  in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries .
Postage stamps during this era were the most  लोकप्रिय  way of paying for mail , but by the end of the 20th century were rapidly being  आत  by the  उपयोग  of metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses . )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over  the  last decade of the 20th century and  the  first  दशक  of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone communications  और   the  development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail ''  via  the Internet ) and bill paying systems had  .
As postage stamps with their engraved imagery  began  to appear on a widespread basis , historians and collectors began to take notice .
The study of postage stamps and their use is referred to as philately .
Stamp collecting can be both a  शौक  and a form of  ऐतिहासिक  study and reference , as government-issued postage stamps and  उनके  mailing systems  have  always been involved with the history of nations .
The University of Alabama at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a public  विश्वविद्यालयों  in Birmingham in the  u.S.  state of  अलबामा  .
Developing from an extension center established in 1936 , the institution became  an  autonomous institution in 1969  और   is  today one of three institutions in the University of Alabama  प्रणाली  .
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions leading  to  bachelor 's , master 's , doctoral , and professional degrees  in  the social and behavioral sciences , the liberal arts , business , education , engineering  ,  and health-related fields such as medicine , dentistry , optometry , nursing , and public health .
The  स्कूल  is highly  प्रसिद्ध  for its medical research and natural sciences programs .
the  UAB Health System , one of  the  largest academic medical centers in the United States , is affiliated with the university .
UAB Hospital  प्रायोजकों  residency  कार्यक्रम  in various medical specialties , including internal medicine , neurology , surgery , radiology  ,  and anesthesiology .
UAB Hospital is the only ACS verified Level I trauma center in Alabama , as rated by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program .
UAB is the state 's largest employer , with more than 18,000 faculty and staff and over  53,000  jobs at the university and  in  the health system .
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area and 1  in   33  jobs in  the   राज्य  of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB .
The university 's overall annual economic impact was estimated  to  be $ 4.6 billion in 2010 .
In the fall of 2012  ,  the University  of  Alabama at  बर्मिंघम  enrolled 17,999 students from more than 110 countries , including 1,605  freshmen  .
There are plans to commence with an `` aggressive '' growth in enrollment at UAB .
The current UAB President is Dr.  रे   L.  Watts .
Tofu , also called bean curd , is a food made by coagulating soy juice and then pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks .
It  is  a component in many East Asian and Southeast Asian  व्यंजन  .
There are many  अलग  varieties of  टोफू  , including fresh tofu and tofu  कि   रै  been processed in some way .
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be used in savory and sweet dishes .
It is often seasoned or marinated to suit the  डिश  .
Tofu originated in  प्राचीन   चीन   कुछ  2,000 years ago  .
Chinese  लेजेंड  ascribes its invention to prince Liu An ( Chinese : 劉安 Liú Ān  ,  179–122 BC ) .
Tofu and its production technique were  introduced  into Korea and then Japan during the  nara  period .
It spread into other parts of East Asia as  खूब   .
This spread likely coincided with  the  spread of Buddhism because  it  is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism  .
Li Shizhen in  the  Ming  राजवंश  described a method of making  टोफू  in  bencao  Gangmu .
टोफू  has a low calorie count  ,  relatively large amounts  of  protein , and little fat .
It is high in iron and depending on the coagulant used in  निर्माण  , may also be high in calcium and/or magnesium .
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee ,  ज्ञात  for being the  one-time   पालतु  of American recording artist Michael Jackson , who bought the primate from a Texas  शोध  facility in the early 1980s .
The animal was a frequent travel companion to the singer ,  जिनकी  attachment to the animal led to media mockery and , among other factors  ,  to a public perception of Jackson  as  an eccentric .
During the Bad World Tour , for example , Jackson brought Bubbles with him to Japan , where they both drank tea with  the  mayor of Osaka .
Bubbles was initially kept at the Jackson family 's home in Encino , Los Angeles , but was moved to Neverland Ranch in 1988  .
There , he slept in a crib in Jackson 's bedroom , used the singer  's  toilet , and ate candy in the Neverland movie theater .
In 2003 the public learned that ,  जैसे  all captive chimpanzees , Bubbles had matured into  a  large and aggressive adult chimp unsuitable as a companion animal .
He was sent to a California animal trainer , where he was reported  to  have attempted suicide .
When the trainer  shut  down his operation in 2004 , Bubbles was moved to the Center for Great  apes  , a sanctuary in Wauchula , Florida , where he has lived since 2005 .
चिंतन  are an English rock band from Teignmouth , Devon , which formed in 1994 .
the  band consists  of  school  मित्रों  Matthew  bellamy  ( lead vocals , lead guitar , piano , keyboards ,  keytar  ) , Christopher Wolstenholme ( bass , vocals , keyboards , rhythm guitar  ,   हार्मोनिका  ) and Dominic Howard ( drums , percussion ,  synthesisers  , sampling ) .
Since the release of their 2006 album Black Holes and Revelations  ,  keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band .
Muse are known for their energetic and extravagant live performances and their fusion of many music genres , including space rock  ,  progressive rock ,  वैकल्पिक  rock , heavy metal , classical music and electronica .
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ) , Origin of Symmetry  (  2001  )  , Absolution ( 2003 )  ,  Black  छेद  and Revelations ( 2006 ) , The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The  2nd  Law (  2012  ) .
They have also issued  तीन   सजीव  albums , Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ) , which is also a compilation of B-sides , Absolution Tour ( 2005 ) , and HAARP ( 2008 ) , which documents the band  's  performances  at  Wembley Stadium in 2007 .
Black Holes and Revelations earned the band a Mercury Prize nomination and a third place  समाप्त  in the NME Albums of the Year list for 2006 .
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history , including  पाँच  MTV  यूरोपीय  Music Awards  ,  six Q  पुरस्कार  , eight NME Awards , two Brit Awards —winning  ``  Best  अंग्रेजों  Live  अधिनियम  ''  twice  , an MTV Video Music Award ,  चार  Kerrang !
Awards and an American Music Award .
They were also nominated for five Grammy Awards , of which they won Best Rock Album , for their fifth studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ) .
Muse have sold over 15 million albums worldwide  .
Bloemfontein ( , ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' )  is  the capital city of the Free State Province of South Africa ; and , as the judicial capital of the  स्वदेश  , one of South Africa 's three national capitals  –  the other two being Cape  कस्बा  , the legislative  पूंजी  , and Pretoria , the  प्रशासनिक  capital .
Bloemfontein is  popularly   और  poetically known as `` the city of roses `` , owing to  the  abundance of these flowers and the annual rose festival held there .
The city 's Sesotho  नाम  is Mangaung , meaning  ``  place of cheetahs `` and  it   रै  been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000 .
Bloemfontein  is   situated  on dry grassland at  ,  at an altitude of above sea level .
The  नगर  is home to 369,568 residents ,  जबकि   the  Mangaung Local  नगरपालिका  has a population of 645,455 .
Where Do We Come From ?
What Are We ?
Where Are We Going ?
One of Post-Impressionist Paul Gauguin 's most famous  paintings  .
the  meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the  significance  of life or  अस्तित्व  in  सामान्य  .
It can also be expressed in different forms , such as `` Why are we here ?  ``  , ``  कया  is life all about ? `` ,  और  `` What is the  purpose  of existence ? ''
It has been the subject of much philosophical , scientific , and  theological  speculation throughout history .
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from many different cultural and ideological backgrounds .
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence , social ties , consciousness , and happiness , and borders on many other issues  ,  such as symbolic meaning  ,  ontology , value , purpose , ethics  ,  good and evil , free  होगा  ,  the  existence of one or multiple Gods  ,   conceptions  of God  ,  the soul , and the afterlife .
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related  अनुभवजन्य  facts about the universe , exploring  the  context  और  parameters concerning the 'how  '  of life .
Science also studies and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of well-being and  a  related  धारणा  of morality .
An alternative , humanistic approach poses  the  question `` What is  the   अर्थ  of my life ? ''
The  मान  of the question pertaining to the purpose of life may  coincide  with the achievement  of  ultimate  वास्तविकता  , or a feeling of oneness , or even a feeling of sacredness .
Family Guy  निर्माता  Seth MacFarlane also provides the  आवाज़ें   of  Peter Griffin , Stewie Griffin , Brian Griffin  ,  and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is an American animated  sitcom  that features five main voice actors , and  numerous  regular cast and recurring guest stars .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex Borstein , Seth Green , Mila Kunis  (  who replaced Lacey Chabert after  the  first season ) and Mike Henry and now , the new actor  beau  Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West , John G.  ब्रेनन  , Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly ,  और  repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller , Charles Durning , Rush  limbaugh  , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast  सदस्यों  provide voices for multiple characters .
The voice actors  ,  in portraying the various character personalities on the show , draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one actor , after members of the  दिखाएँ  left  the  series  or  had conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode ``  मुश्किल   विधिक  ``  और  MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production , though no other cast member has  जीती  an award  लिये  their work on  the  series .
