`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : `` The Princess on the Pea '' ) is  a   साहित्यिक  fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen about a young woman whose royal identity is established  by  a test of  उसके  physical sensitivity  .
The tale was first published with three others by  andersen  in an inexpensive booklet  on  8 May  1835  in Copenhagen by C.A . Reitzel .
Andersen  था  heard the story as a child , and it likely has its source in folk  सामग्री  , possibly originating from Sweden as it is unknown in the Danish oral tradition .
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of 1835 were well received by Danish critics , who disliked their casual  ,  chatty style , and their lack of morals .
In 1959 `` The  राजकुमारी  and the  मटर  '' was adapted to the musical stage in a production called Once Upon a Mattress starring Carol Burnett .
German Americans ( ) are citizens of  the  United  राज्य  who were either born in Germany or are of  जर्मनी  ancestry .
They comprise  परिचय  50 million people , making them  the  largest ancestry group ahead of Irish Americans ,  अफ़्रीकी  Americans and English Americans .
They comprise about 1/3 of the German diaspora  सब  over the world .
None of the German states had New World colonies .
Not until the 1670s did the first significant  समूह   of  German  आप्रवासियों  arrive in the British colonies , settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania .
Immigration continued  in  very large numbers during the 19th century , with some eight million arrivals from Germany .
They were pulled by the attractions of land and religious freedom , and  धकेल   आउट  of  यूरोपीय  by shortages of land and religious  or  political oppression .
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom  ,  others for economic opportunities greater than those in Europe , and others simply for the chance to start  भैस  in the New World .
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought out the most productive land , where their intensive farming techniques would pay  बंद  .
After 1840 , many came to cities , where  ``  Germania '' —German-speaking districts—soon emerged .
German Americans established the  पहला   kindergartens  in the United States , introduced the Christmas  पेड़  tradition  ,  and originated popular American foods  ऐसे   as   hot  dogs and  hamburgers  .
German American celebrations  हैं  held throughout the  देश  , one of the most well-known being  the  German-American  steuben   परेड  in New York City , held every third Saturday in September .
There are  भी  major annual events  in  Chicago ,  सिनसिनाटी  , Milwaukee , Pittsburgh , St. Louis and other cities .
Like many other immigrants that came  to  the United States , an overwhelming number of people of German or partial German descent have essentially become Americanized .
The Preamble to the  संयुक्त  States Constitution is a brief introductory statement of the Constitution  's  fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
It states in general terms , and courts  have  referred to it as reliable evidence of ,  the  Founding Fathers  '  intentions  regarding  the Constitution 's meaning  और  what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , `` we the people '' suggests that the new government  originates  from the people of the United  राज्य  and it sets into motion a question as it  pertains   to  that vast population concerning the individual rights and equality among  सब  people ; this can be seen most broadly in the  divide  between republicanism and social  लोकतंत्र  .
The history of  the  Internet began with the development of electronic computers  in  the 1950s  .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock  's   प्रयोगशाला  at University of California , Los Angeles (  ucla  ) , after the second piece of network  उपकरण  was installed at Stanford  शोध  Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I  at  NPL in the UK , CYCLADES , Merit Network , Tymnet , and  telenet  , were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking , in which multiple separate  संजाल  could be joined together into  a   संजाल  of  संजाल  .
In 1982 , the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized , and  नतीजतन  , the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP  संजाल  , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the  arpanet  was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer  विज्ञान  Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET  provided  access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and  शिक्षा  organizations .
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in  the  late 1980s and early 1990s .
The ARPANET was decommissioned in  1990  .
The Internet was  commercialized  in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned , removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic .
चूंकि  the mid-1990s , the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce , including the  वृद्धि  of near-instant communication by electronic mail , instant  messaging  ,  आवाज़  over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '' , two-way interactive video calls  ,   और  the World Wide Web  साथ   इसके  discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and  ऑनलाइन  shopping sites .
The research and  शिक्षा  community continues to develop and use advanced networks such as  nsf  's very high speed Backbone Network Service (  vbns  ) , Internet2 , and  नेशनल  LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and higher speeds over fiber optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s , 10-Gbit/s , or  अधिक  .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms :  it  only communicated  1  % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , and more than  97   %  of the  telecommunicated  information by 2007 .
Today the Internet continues to grow , driven by ever greater amounts of online information , commerce , entertainment , and social networking .
दक्षिणपश्चिम  Airlines Co. ( )  is  a major U.S. airline and the  संसार  's largest low-cost carrier , headquartered in Dallas , Texas .
It was established in 1967 and adopted its current  नाम  in 1971 .
The airline has  अधिक   than   46,000  employees and operates  अधिक  than  3,400  flights per day .
As of June 5 , 2011 , it  carries  the most domestic passengers of any U.S. airline .
As of April  2013  , Southwest Airlines has scheduled service to 84 destinations in 41 states and Puerto Rico .
Southwest Airlines has solely operated Boeing 737s , except for a few years in the  1970s  and 1980s , when it operated Boeing 727s .
As of  अगस्त   2012  , Southwest is the largest operator of the 737 worldwide with over 550 in service , each operating an average of six flights per day .
In May 2011 , the airline acquired AirTran Airways , with integration of the carriers expected  to  be complete by 2014 .
On March 1 , 2012 , the  कम्पनी  was issued a single operating certificate , technically becoming  एक  airline .
Rolling Rock is a 4.6  %  abv pale lager launched in  1939  by the Latrobe Brewing  कम्पनी  .
Although founded as a local beer in Western Pennsylvania ,  it  was  marketed   aggressively  and  आखिरकार  became a national product .
The brand  थी  sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis , Missouri , in mid 2006 , which transferred brewing  परिचालन  to New  जर्सी  .
Benedict XVI ( , , ; born Joseph Aloisius Ratzinger on 16 April 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the Catholic Church  .
He served as Pope from 2005 to 2013 .
In that  स्थिति  , he was both the leader of the Catholic Church and Sovereign of the Vatican City  राज्य  .
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave , celebrated his Papal  उद्घाटन  Mass on 24 April 2005 ,  और  took possession of his cathedral , the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran , on 7 May 2005  .
Ordained  as   a  priest  in  1951 in his native Bavaria , Ratzinger established  खुद  as a highly regarded university theologian by  the  late  1950s  and was appointed a full professor  in  1958 .
After  a  long career as an academic , serving as a  प्राध्यापक  of theology at several German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg , where he served as Vice President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of Munich and Freising and cardinal by Pope Paul VI in 1977 , an unusual promotion for someone with  छोटी  pastoral experience .
In 1981 , he settled in Rome when he became Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the  आस्था  , one of the most important dicasteries of  the  Roman Curia .
From 2002 until his election as pope , he was also Dean  of  the College of Cardinals , and as such , the primus inter pares among the  कार्डिनल्स  .
Prior to becoming pope , he was `` a major  फिगर  on the Vatican stage  लिये   a  quarter of a century ''  as  `` one of the most respected  ,  influential and controversial members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an  influence  `` second to  none   जब  it came to  सेटिंग  church priorities  और   दिशानिर्देश  '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants .
He  थी  originally a liberal theologian , but adopted conservative views after 1968 .
His prolific  कृतियाँ  defend traditional Catholic doctrine  और  values  .
During his papacy , Benedict XVI advocated a return to fundamental Christian values to counter the increased  secularisation  of many Western countries .
He views relativism 's denial of  उद्देश्य  truth ,  और   the  denial of moral truths in particular , as the central  प्रॉब्लम  of the 21st century  .
He  सिखाया  the importance of both the Catholic Church and  an  understanding of God 's redemptive love .
Pope Benedict  भी  revived a number  of  traditions including elevating the Tridentine Mass to a more prominent position .
He renewed  the  relationship between the Catholic Church and art , viewing  the  use of beauty as a path to the sacred , promoted the use of Latin , and reintroduced traditional papal garments , for which reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics '' .
He  रै  been described as `` the  प्रमुख   बौद्धिक  force in  the  Church '' since the mid-1980s .
Several of Pope Benedict 's students from his academic career are also prominent churchmen today and  confidantes  of him , notably Christoph Schönborn .
On 11 February 2013  ,  Pope Benedict announced his resignation in a speech in Latin before the  कार्डिनल्स  , citing a `` lack of strength of  दिमाग  and body '' due to his advanced age .
His resignation became effective on 28 February 2013 .
he  is the first pope to  इस्तीफा   चूंकि  Pope  ग्रेगरी  XII in 1415 ,  और  the  पहला  to do  so   on  his own initiative since Pope Celestine V in 1294 .
As pope emeritus , Benedict retains  the  style of His Holiness , and the  शीर्षक  of Pope , and will continue  to  dress  in  the papal colour of white .
he  was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13 March 2013 , and  he  moved into the  newly  renovated Mater Ecclesiae monastery for his retirement on 2 May 2013..

Used by military to  जाँचें  stereoscopic pairs of aerial photographs .

Kaiser-Panorama consisted of a multi-station viewing apparatus and  सेट  of stereo slides .

Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for creating or enhancing the illusion of depth  in  an image by means of stereopsis  लिये  binocular  दृष्टि  .
The word stereoscopy derives from the Greek ``  στερεός  '' ( stereos ) , `` firm , solid '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ) , `` to look '' ,  ``  to see '' .
Most stereoscopic methods present two offset images separately to the left and right eye of the  दर्शक  .
These two-dimensional images are then combined in the brain to give the perception  of  3D depth .
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that display  an  image in  तीन  full dimensions , allowing the observer to increase information about  the  3-dimensional  वस्तुएँ  being displayed by head and eye movements .
John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S . October 19 , 1735 ) – July 4 ,  1826  ) was the second president of the  संयुक्त  States (  1797–1801   )  , having earlier served as the first vice president  of  the United States .
An American Founding Father , he was a  statesman  , diplomat ,  और  a leading  एडवोकेट  of American independence from Great  ब्रिटेन  .
खूब  educated , he  थी  an Enlightenment political theorist  जो  promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically  परिचय  his  प्रायः   seminal   विचार  , both  in  published works and in letters to his wife and key  adviser  Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to prominence in the early stages of  the  American Revolution .
A  वकील  and public figure in Boston , as a delegate from Massachusetts to  the  Continental Congress , he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
he  assisted Thomas  जेफरसन  in drafting the Declaration  of  Independence in 1776  ,  and was  इसके  primary  एडवोकेट  in the  कॉंग्रेस   .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe , he helped negotiate the eventual  सलाम  treaty with Great Britain , and was responsible for obtaining vital  सरकारी   लोन  from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and historian ,  एडम्स  largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780 ,  जिससे  together with his earlier Thoughts on Government , influenced American political thought .
One of his greatest roles was as a  न्यायधीश  of character :  in  1775 , he nominated  जार्ज  Washington to be commander-in-chief , and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States .
Adams '  क्रांतिकारी  credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans , as well as the dominant faction in his  अपना  Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
एडम्स  signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and built  up  the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War  ``  ) with France , 1798–1800 .
the  major accomplishment of his presidency was  उसके  peaceful resolution of the conflict in the face of  हैमिल्टन  's opposition .
In 1800 , Adams was defeated for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and  रिटायर्ड  to Massachusetts .
He later resumed his friendship with Jefferson .
He  और  his wife  ,  Abigail Adams  ,  founded  an  accomplished family line  of  politicians , diplomats ,  और  historians now referred to as the Adams political  परिवार  .
Adams was the father of John Quincy Adams , the sixth President  of  the United States .
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern times  ,  though his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders  .
Adams was the first U.S. president to  reside  in the building that eventually became known as the White House .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States currency .
the  first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95  )  , Alexander Hamilton , is  फिलहाल   प्रदर्शित  on  the  obverse of the bill , while the U.S. Treasury  भवन  is featured on the reverse .
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other is Benjamin Franklin , on the $ 100  विधेयक  .
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the  उपस्थित  ) who was not  born  in the continental United States , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert  gallatin  , Switzerland ( $  500   1862/63  Legal Tender ) ; George Meade , Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91  राजकोष  Note )  ;  and Robert  मॉरिस  , England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal  टेंडर   ;  $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In addition , Kamehameha I , appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter . )
All $ 10 bills issued today  हैं  Federal Reserve Notes .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a  $  10 bill in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
Approximately 6 % of  सब   us  banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are delivered by  संघीय  Reserve Banks in yellow straps .
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of New York City  हॉल  .
The  $   10  bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces  to  the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left  ,  but  थी  used only for intra-government transactions ) .

A jetboat is a boat propelled by a jet of water ejected from the back of the craft .
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses  a  propeller in the water below or behind the boat , a jetboat draws the water from under the boat into  a  pump inside the boat , then expels it through a nozzle at  the  stern .
Jetboats were originally  designed  by Sir William Hamilton  (  who developed a waterjet  in  1954 ) for operation in the fast-flowing and shallow rivers of New Zealand , specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters .
पिछला  attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes , generally due to the inefficient design of the units  और   the  fact that they offered few advantages over conventional propellers .
Unlike these previous waterjet  developments  , such as Campini 's and the Hanley Hydrojet , Hamilton had a specific need for a  नोदन   प्रणाली  to  operate  in very-shallow water , and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution .
From this , the popularity of the jet  ईकाई  and jetboat  increased  rapidly  .
Through  further   developments  , it  थी   मिला  the waterjet offered several other advantages over propellers for a wide  दायरा  of vessel types , and as  ऐसे  , waterjets are used widely today for many high-speed vessels , including passenger ferries , rescue craft , patrol  नौकाएँ  and  offshore  supply vessels .
Jetboats are highly maneuverable , and many can , from full speed ,  be  reversed and brought to a stop within little more than their own length , in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop '' .
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is  a  high-speed maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is  काटें  , the steering is turned sharply and the throttle opened again , causing the boat to spin quickly around with a large spray of water .
There is no engineering  सीमा  to the size of jetboats , though the validity of their use depends a lot on the type of application  .
Classic prop-drives are  generally   अधिक  efficient and economical at low speeds , up to  परिचय  , but as boat speed increases beyond this , the extra hull resistance  उत्पन्न  by struts , rudders , shafts ( etc . ) means waterjets are more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ) .
Also , in situations with  बहुत  large propellers turning at slow speeds ( such as tug boats  )  ,  the  equivalent size waterjet would  be   too  big to be practical .
For these reasons , the vast majority of waterjet  इकाई   हैं  installed  in  high-speed vessels and in particular situations where shallow draught  ,  maneuverability , and  लोड  flexibility are main concerns .
The biggest jet-driven vessels are  मिला  in  सैन्य   उपयोग  or the high-speed  passenger/car   फैरी  industry .
South Africa 's s ( approximately long ) are the biggest jet-propelled vessels  so  far .
Even these German-built vessels  हैं  capable of performing ``  क्रैश  stops '' .
Uveitis is broadly defined as inflammation of the uvea .
The uvea consists of  the  middle , pigmented , vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris ,  ciliary  body ,  और   choroid  .
Uveitis requires an urgent referral and  thorough  examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist  साथ  with urgent treatment to control the inflammation .
Eric `` E  .  ''
Murphy is a fictional character on  the   comedy-drama  television series Entourage .
He  is  played by Kevin Connolly .
The Shining is a 1980 psychological horror film produced and directed by Stanley  kubrick  , co-written with novelist Diane Johnson , and starring  जोकर  Nicholson , Shelley  duvall  , Scatman Crothers , and Danny Lloyd .
The film is based on the Stephen King novel  the  Shining .
A writer , Jack Torrance , takes a job as an  off-season  caretaker at an  पृथक  hotel .
His young son possesses psychic abilities and is able to see  बाते  from the past and future , such  as  the ghosts who inhabit the hotel .
Soon after settling in  ,  the family is trapped in  the  hotel by a snowstorm , and Jack gradually becomes  बहकावे  by a supernatural presence ; he descends  into  madness and attempts  to  murder his wife and son .
Unlike previous Kubrick films , which developed an audience gradually by building on word-of-mouth , The  जगमगाता  was released as a mass-market film , opening at first in just two cities on Memorial  दिन  , then nationwide a month  बाद  .
Although initial response to the film was mixed , later critical assessment was more  अनुकूल  and it is now viewed  as  a classic of the horror genre .
Film director  मार्टिन  Scorsese , writing in The  रोज़   जानवर  , ranked it as one of  the  11  scariest   हॉरर  movies of all time .
Film critics , film students , and Kubrick 's producer , Jan Harlan , have remarked on the enormous influence the film has had on popular culture .
The initial European release of The  जगमगाता  was 25 minutes shorter than the American version , achieved by removing most of the scenes taking place outside the  environs  of the hotel .
Patio Cola Bottle
Patio Diet  कोला  was a brand of diet soda introduced by Pepsi in 1963 .
It was  निर्मित  in response to Diet Rite Cola  ,  which was the first  आहार  cola on the market .
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake was Patio Diet Cola 's spokesperson .
In 1964 , Patio released orange , grape , and root beer  जायका  .
This flavor line was not meant to compete with brands like Orange Crush ,  लकिन  rather fill out the line .
Patio sodas were available in the cold-bottle market : grocery and mom-and-pop stores .
Advertising for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the time , bottlers were regionally franchised ,  और  related advertising was necessarily local .
In 1964 , Patio diet cola became Diet Pepsi .
The newly branded diet soda was advertised alongside Pepsi with the tagline `` Pepsi either way '' , which  replaced  the slogan  ``  Dances with flavor '' .
The short life span of Patio  आहार   कोला  makes it a great addition for  बोतल  collectors .
Most of the remaining Patio line of flavors were phased out by  the  early 1970s , while a few survived until the mid 70s
Infrastructure  is  basic physical and organizational structures needed for the operation of a society or enterprise , or the services and facilities necessary for an economy to function .
It can be  generally   पारिभाषित  as the set of  interconnected  structural elements that provide framework supporting  an  entire structure of development  .
It is  an  important term for judging a country or region 's development  .
The term typically refers to the technical  structures  that support a society , such as roads , bridges , water supply , sewers , electrical grids , telecommunications , and so forth  ,  and  can  be defined as `` the  शारीरिक  components of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to  enable  , sustain , or  बढ़ाएँ  societal living conditions . ''
Viewed functionally , infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and services , and also the distribution of finished products to markets , as well as basic social services such as schools and hospitals ; for example , roads enable the transport of raw materials to a factory .
in   सैन्य   parlance   ,  the  पद  refers to the buildings and permanent installations necessary for the support , redeployment , and operation of military forces .
To make it simple , infrastructure is  anything  that is  needed   रोज  , an everyday item .
a  graphical representation  of  the ideal human karyotype
Mitochondrial  डीएनए  .
Human genetic variation is the  जेनेटिक  differences both within  और  among populations .
There may be multiple variants of any given  जीन  in the human  जनसांख्यिकी  ( genes ) , leading  to  polymorphism .
Many genes are not polymorphic , meaning that only  a  single  allele  is  उपस्थित   in  the population : the gene is then said to be fixed .
No two humans are genetically identical  .
Even monozygotic twins  ,  who develop from one zygote , have infrequent genetic  मतभेद  due to mutations occurring  दौरान  development  और  gene copy number variation .
Differences  between  individuals , even closely related individuals , are the key to techniques such as genetic fingerprinting .
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different human populations , with populations that are more geographically and ancestrally  रिमोट  tending to differ more .
Causes of differences between individuals include the exchange of genes during meiosis and various mutational events .
There are at least two reasons why genetic variation exists between populations .
Natural selection may confer an  अनुकूली  advantage to individuals in a specific environment  if  an allele provides a competitive  लाभ  .
Alleles under selection are  संभावित  to occur only in those geographic regions where they  confer  an advantage .
The second main  कारण  of genetic variation  is  due to the  ऊँची  degree of neutrality  of  most mutations .
Most mutations do not appear to have any selective effect  एक  way or the other on the organism .
The main cause is genetic drift , this is the effect  of  random changes in the gene pool .
in  humans , founder effect and past small population  आकार  ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have had an important  influence  in neutral differences between populations .
The theory that humans recently migrated out of Africa supports this .
The study  of  human genetic variation has both evolutionary significance  और  medical  अनुप्रयोग  .
It  can  help scientists understand ancient human  जनसांख्यिकी  migrations as well as how different human  समूह  are biologically related to one another .
For medicine , study of human genetic variation may be important because  कुछ  disease-causing alleles occur more often in people from specific  भौगोलिक  regions .
New findings show that each human has on average  60  new mutations compared to their parents .
Apart from  mutations  , many genes that may have aided  इंसानो  in ancient  टाइम्स  plague humans today .
For example  ,  it is suspected that genes  कि  allow humans to more efficiently process food are  those  that make people susceptible to obesity and diabetes today .
चाय  Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the National Mall at  the  Taxpayer March on Washington on September 12 ,  2009  .
the  Tea Party movement is an American political movement that  अधिवक्ताओं  strict adherence to the United States Constitution , reducing U.S. government  बिता  and taxes , and reduction of the U.S.  नेशनल  debt and  संघीय  budget deficit  .
The movement has been called  partly  conservative , partly libertarian  ,  and partly populist .
The movement has sponsored protests and supported political candidates since 2009 .
the  name  of  the movement is derived from the Boston Tea Party of 1773 , an iconic event in American history .
Anti-tax  प्रदर्शनकारियों  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  have often referred to the original Boston Tea Party for inspiration .
References to the Boston Tea Party  यहूद  part of Tax Day  विरोध  held throughout the 1990s and earlier .
By 2001  ,  a custom had developed among some conservative activists of  mailing  tea  बैग  to legislators  और  other officials as a symbolic act .
The currencies of Puerto Rico closely follow the historic development of Puerto Rico .
As a colony of Spain and the United States ,  प्यूर्टो  Rico was  granted  the use of both foreign and provincial currencies .
Following the Spanish colonization in 1502  ,  Puerto Rico became an important port , with its  अपना  supply  of  gold .
However , as the  खनिज   reserves  ran empty within the century , the archipelago 's economy  suffered  .
The Spanish Crown issued the Situado Mexicano , which meant that a semi-regular shipment of gold from the Viceroyalty of New Spain would be sent to the island , as a way to  provide  economic support .
between  1636  और  1637 , Philip  iv  of Spain imposed a tax which had to be paid using a  आय  stamp .
Inspired by this ,  प्यूर्टो  Rico began producing banknotes in 1766 , becoming  the  first colony to print 8-  रियल  banknotes  in  the Spanish Empire and  जिससे  in the Spanish government 's approval of subsequent issues .
The situado was discontinued during  the  19th century , creating  an  economic  संकट  , as a result  of  Mexico gaining its  स्वतंत्रता  from  स्पेन  .
Salvador Meléndez Bruna  ,  the colonial governor in office , ordered the issue of provincial banknotes , creating the Puerto Rican peso .
however  , printing of these banknotes ceased after  1815  .
दौरान  the following decades , foreign coins became the  फैली  currency .
In the 1860s and 1870s , banknotes  reemerged  .
On February  1  , 1890 ,  the  Banco Español de Puerto Rico was inaugurated and began issuing  banknotes   .
The bank designed four series and placed three in circulation under Spanish rule .
In 1895 ,  a  Royal Decree ordered the  उत्पादन  of provincial peso coins .
On August 13 , 1898 , the Spanish-American War ended with Spain ceding Puerto Rico to the United States .
The Banco Español  de   प्यूर्टो  Rico was renamed Bank of Porto Rico and issued  बिल्स  equivalent  to   the  United States dollar , creating the Puerto Rican dollar .
In 1902 , the First National Bank of Porto Rico issued banknotes in a parallel manner .
Two more series were issued until 1913 .
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated into the United States  '  economic and monetary system , the Puerto Rican  डॉलर  were redeemed for those issued by the United States Treasury .
the  peso and  डालर  have been followed by other contemporary issues ,  सहित  commemorative banknotes , private currency ,  और  a quarter  सिक्का  designed with Fort San Felipe del Morro in the  फेस  .
Pepsi ( stylized in  लोअरकेस  as pepsi , formerly stylized in  अपरकेस   as  PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink that is produced and manufactured by  पेप्सिको   .
निर्मित  and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink ,  it   थी  renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28 , 1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .
The Book  of  Ezekiel is the third of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew  बाइबल  , following the books of Isaiah and Jeremiah and preceding the Book of the Twelve .
( The order is somewhat  अलग  in the Christian Old Testament ) .
It derives its name from  ,   और  records the visions of , the 6th century  bc  priest and  नबी  Ezekiel  .
According to the book , the prophet , exiled in Babylon , experienced a series of seven visions during the 22 years from 593 to 571 BC  ,   a  period which spans the final destruction of Jerusalem in 586 .
The visions , and the book  ,  are structured around three themes :  (  1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the nations  (  chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ) .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major United States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the  राज्य  of Louisiana .
The population of the city was 343,829  as  of  the  2010 U.S. Census .
The New  ऑरलियन्स  metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in  2010  and was the 46th largest in the  संयुक्त  States .
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined Statistical Area , a larger trading  क्षेत्रफल  , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
the  city is named after Orléans , a city located on the  loire  River in Centre , France ,  और  is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture , as well as its cross-cultural  और  multilingual heritage .
New Orleans  is  also famous for its cuisine , music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz ) ,  और  its annual celebrations and festivals , most notably Mardi  ग्रा  .
The city is often referred to as  the  `` most unique  ''  in  अमेरिका  .
नई  Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana , straddling the Mississippi River  .
The city  और   ऑरलियन्स  Parish ( ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by  the  parishes of St. Tammany to the north  ,  St. Bernard to the east , Plaquemines to  the  south  और   जेफरसन  to the south  और  west .
झील   pontchartrain  , part of which is included in  the  city limits , lies to the north and Lake  borgne  lies to the east .
The National Birth Control  लीग  was a birth  कंट्रोल  organization in the United States .
It was founded in March 1915 by Mary Dennett  ,  Clara Gruening Stillman and Jessie Ashley .
इसके  main purpose was to overturn the laws which banned contraceptives from the U.S. mails .
Campaigns were mounted in New York ,  लकिन  in  1919  the  लीग  was disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League .
Cancer , known medically as  a  malignant neoplasm , is  a  broad group of various diseases , all involving unregulated  कोशिका  growth  .
In cancer ,  कोशिकाएं  divide and grow uncontrollably , forming malignant tumors , and invade  आसपास  parts  of  the  देह  .
The cancer may also spread to more distant parts of the  देह  through the lymphatic system or bloodstream .
Not all tumors are cancerous .
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably , do not invade neighboring tissues , and do not spread  throughout  the body .
There are over 200  अलग  known cancers that afflict humans .
Determining  कया  causes cancer is complex .
Many things are known  to   बढ़ाएँ  the risk of cancer , including tobacco use  ,  certain infections , radiation , lack of physical activity , obesity , and  पर्यावरणीय  pollutants .
These can directly  क्षति  genes or combine with  मौजूदा  genetic faults within cells to cause the disease .
Approximately  पाँच   to  ten percent of cancers  हैं  entirely hereditary .
Cancer can be detected in a number of ways , including the presence of  निश्चित   लक्षण   और  symptoms , screening tests , or medical imaging .
Once  a  possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed  by  microscopic examination of a tissue sample .
Cancer is usually treated  साथ  chemotherapy , radiation therapy and surgery .
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the  प्रकार  and location of the cancer and the extent  of  disease at the start of treatment .
While cancer can  affect  people of all ages , and a few types of cancer are more common in children , the  रिस्क  of developing  कर्कट  generally increases with age .
In 2007 , cancer caused  परिचय  13 % of all human  मौतों  worldwide ( 7.9 million  )  .
दरों  are rising as more people live to an old age and as  द्रव्यमान  lifestyle changes occur in the  विकासशील  world .
Spring ski touring on  hardangervidda  , Norway
Skiing is a recreational activity and competitive sport in which  the   भागीदार  attaches long runners or  skis  to boots or shoes on the feet and uses them to travel on top of snow .
aside  from recreation and competition , skiing has  महरूम  used for military purposes  और  even  यात्राएं  in areas that  अनुभव  heavy  हिमपात  .
Many types of competitive skiing events are recognized by the International Olympic Committee , and the International Ski Federation .
जॉन  Maynard Keynes , 1st Baron Keynes , CB  ,  FBA ( ; 5  जून  1883 – 21 April 1946 ) was a British economist whose ideas have fundamentally affected the theory and practice of modern macroeconomics , and informed the economic policies of governments .
He built on and greatly refined earlier work on the causes of business cycles , and is widely considered to be one  of  the founders  of  modern macroeconomics and the most influential  अर्थशास्त्री   of  the 20th century .
His ideas are the basis for the school of thought known  as  Keynesian economics , as well as its various offshoots .
In many ways , subsequent  developments  in 20th century  अर्थशास्त्र  can be viewed  as  either building on Keynes ' ideas or reacting against  उन्हें  .
In the 1930s , Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic thinking , overturning the older ideas of neoclassical economics that held that free markets would  ,  in the short  to  medium term  ,  automatically provide full  नियुक्ति  , as long as  मजदूर  were  लचीली  in their wage demands .
keynes  instead argued that aggregate demand determined the  overall  level of economic activity , and that inadequate aggregate demand could lead to prolonged periods  of  high unemployment .
he  advocated  the  use of fiscal and monetary  उपायों  to  mitigate  the adverse effects of economic  recessions   और  depressions .
Following the  outbreak  of  the  Second World War , Keynes 's ideas concerning economic policy  यहूद  adopted by leading Western economies  .
In 1942 , Keynes was awarded a hereditary  peerage  as Baron Keynes  of  Tilton in the County of Sussex .
Keynes died in 1946 , but during the 1950s and 1960s the success of Keynesian economics resulted in almost all capitalist governments adopting its policy recommendations .
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s , partly as a result of problems that began to afflict  the  Anglo-American  economies  from the start of the decade , and partly because of  critiques  from Milton Friedman and other economists who were pessimistic about the ability of governments to regulate the business cycle with fiscal policy .
however  , the advent  of  the global financial crisis  in  2007  caused  a resurgence in  keynesian  thought .
Keynesian economics provided the  सैद्धांतिक  underpinning for  आर्थिक  policies undertaken in  जवाब  to the crisis by  राष्ट्रपतियों  George W.  बुश  and Barack Obama of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , Prime Minister Gordon  भूरा  of the United Kingdom , and other heads of governments .
in  1999 , Time magazine included Keynes in their  सूची   of  the 100 most important and influential people  of  the 20th century , commenting that : `` His  कट्टरपंथी  idea that governments  चाहिए  spend money they do n't  have  may have saved capitalism . ''
In addition to being  an  economist , Keynes was also a civil  नौकर  ,  a  director of the  अंग्रेजों  Eugenics Society , a director of the Bank of England , a patron  of  the  कला  and an art collector , a part of the Bloomsbury Group of intellectuals ,  an  advisor to several charitable trusts , a writer , a philosopher , a private investor ,  और  a farmer .
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel Sofer emulated the 1675 Ten Commandments at the Amsterdam  esnoga  synagogue .
The Ten Commandments  ,  also known as the Decalogue , are a set of biblical laws relating to ethics and worship , which play a fundamental role in Judaism ,  islam  and Christianity .
They include instructions to worship only God , to keep the sabbath  पावन  and prohibitions against  idolatry  , blasphemy ,  हत्या  , theft , deception and adultery .
Different groups follow  थोड़ा  different traditions for  interpreting  and numbering them .
The Ten Commandments appear twice in the Hebrew Bible , in the books of Exodus and Deuteronomy .
According to  the   स्टोरी  in Exodus , God inscribed them on two stone tablets , which he gave to Moses on Mount Sinai .
Modern scholarship has found likely influences in Hittite and Mesopotamian laws and treaties , but is  विभाजित  over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them  .
The discography of the  अंग्रेज़ी  alternative rock band The Smiths consists of four studio albums , one extended play ( EP ) , one live album , ten compilation albums , twenty singles , one video album and fourteen music videos on the Rough Trade , Sire and WEA record labels .
The band was formed in  1982  in Manchester by vocalist Morrissey , guitarist  जॉनी  Marr  ,  bass player Andy Rourke and drummer  माइक  Joyce .
Despite being championed by  बीबीसी  Radio 1 disc jockey John Peel , the  बैंड  's debut single ,  ``  Hand in Glove `` ( May 1983 ) , failed to chart .
Its follow-up , `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 )  ,  met with critical acclaim and reached  क्रमांक  twenty-five on the UK Singles Chart .
the  Smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream success in 1984 , as they reached number twelve in the UK with the `` What Difference Does It Make ? `` single and reached number two on the UK Albums Chart with their debut album , The Smiths ( 1984 ) .
उनके  next three singles all reached the top twenty of  the  charts  in  the UK , helping to consolidate their previous chart success .
The next  स्टुडियो  album , Meat  is  Murder ( 1985 )  ,  reached the top of the British charts ; however ,  the  only single to  be  released from  the  album , `` That Joke Is n't Funny Anymore `` ( 1985 ) , failed  to  break the UK Top 40 .
Returning to form , The Smiths  '  next  छह  singles all reached the higher than number thirty  in  the UK and their third album , The Queen Is  मुर्दे  ( 1986 ) ,  पहुँचे  number two in  the  UK .
Despite the band  's  chart success , Marr left the group in August 1987 due to a strained relationship with  morrissey  .
Failing to find a replacement , The Smiths disbanded by the time  उनके  final  स्टुडियो  album , Strangeways , Here We Come , was released in September that year .
Strangeways , Here We Come reached number two in the UK  और  became the band 's  highest-charting  release in the United  राज्य  when it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200 .
In early 1992 , WEA acquired the entire  वापस  catalogue of  the   smiths  and produced two compilations – Best ... I and ... Best II – the first of which reached the top of the UK Albums Chart .
WEA released two  further  singles compilations  in  1995 and 2001 , with a further compilation , The Sound of The Smiths ,  released  in November 2008 .
Gone with the Wind is a novel written by Margaret Mitchell , first published in 1936 .
It is often placed in  the  literary sub-genre of  the   ऐतिहासिक  romance novel .
However ,  it  has been argued the novel is a `` near miss '' and does  नहीं  contain all of the elements of the romance genre , making it simply a historical novel  .
The story is set in Clayton County , Georgia ,  और  Atlanta during the American Civil War and Reconstruction .
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara , the spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner , who must use every means at her disposal to  आइये  out of the poverty she finds  herself  in  बाद  Sherman 's `` March to the Sea '' .
मार्गरेट  Mitchell began writing Gone with the Wind in  1926  to pass the time while recovering from an auto-crash injury that refused to heal  .
In April 1935  ,  Harold Latham of  macmillan  , an editor who was  looking   लिये  new  fiction  , read what she had written and saw that it could be  a  best-seller .
After Latham  सहमत  to  प्रकाशित  the book , Mitchell worked for another six months checking the historical references , and rewrote the opening chapter  अनेक  times .
Mitchell and her husband John Marsh  ,  a copy editor by trade ,  संपादित  the final version of the novel .
Mitchell wrote the book 's final moments first , and  तब  wrote the events that led up to it .
As to what became of her lovers , Rhett and Scarlett , after the novel ended , Mitchell did not know , and said ,  ``  For all I know , Rhett  may  have found someone else who was less difficult . ''
Mitchell received the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction for the book in 1937 .
The  किताब   थी  adapted into  a  1939 American film  .
Gone with the Wind is the only novel by Mitchell published during  उसके  lifetime .
Endodontics ( from the Greek  endo  `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth '' ) is one of the dental specialties recognized by  the  American Dental Association , Royal College of Dentists  of   कनाडा  , and Royal Australasian  कॉलेज  of Dental Surgeons , and deals  साथ  the tooth pulp and  the  tissues  surrounding  the root of a tooth .
Endodontists perform  a  variety of procedures  सहित  endodontic therapy ( commonly known as `` root canal therapy '' ) , endodontic retreatment , surgery , treating cracked teeth , and treating dental trauma .
Root canal therapy is one  of  the most common  प्रक्रियाओं  .
If the pulp ( containing nerves , arterioles , venules ,  lymphatic  tissue ,  और  fibrous tissue ) becomes diseased or injured , endodontic treatment is  जरूरी  to save the tooth .
Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) is a  point-to-point  serial  प्रोटोकॉल   कि  moves data to  और  from computer storage devices such as hard drives and tape drives .
sas  replaces the older Parallel SCSI ( pronounced `` scuzzy '' ) bus  प्रौद्योगिकी  that first appeared in the  mid-1980s   .
SAS , like its predecessor  ,  uses the standard SCSI  कमांड  set .
SAS offers  पिछड़ा   संगतता  with second-generation SATA drives .
SATA  3   gbit/s  drives may be connected to SAS backplanes , but SAS drives can not connect to SATA backplanes .
The T10 technical committee of  the  International Committee for Information Technology Standards ( INCITS ) develops and maintains  the  SAS protocol ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the  प्रौद्योगिकी  .

Status  as  a natural-born  नागरिक  of the United States is one of the eligibility requirements established in the  संयुक्त  States Constitution for election to the office of President or Vice President .
इस  requirement was intended to protect the nation from foreign influence .
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born citizen , and various opinions have  महरूम  offered over time regarding its precise  अर्थ  .
A 2011 Congressional Research Service report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several  निर्णय  of the United States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing with the question of eligibility for citizenship by birth , but the Supreme  अदालत  has never directly addressed the  सवाल  of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen .
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22 , 1971 ) is a  पूर्व  American football player .
He played quarterback for three National  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) teams  :  the St. Louis Rams , the New York Giants , and the Arizona Cardinals .
he  was originally signed by the Green Bay Packers as an undrafted  फ़्री  agent in 1994 after playing college  फ़ुटबॉल  at Northern Iowa  .
warner   होता  go on to be considered  the  best undrafted player of all time ,  following  a 12-year career regarded as one of the greatest stories in NFL  इतिहास  .
Warner first attained stardom while playing for  the   st.  Louis Rams from 1998 to 2003  ,  where  he  won two NFL MVP awards in 1999 and 2001 as well as the Super Bowl MVP award  in  Super Bowl XXXIV .
He led the 2008  एरिज़ोना  Cardinals to Super Bowl XLIII  (  the franchise 's  पहला   सुपर  Bowl berth ) , and owns the three highest single-game passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history .
Warner currently holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 )  ,  and the third-highest career completion percentage in NFL history  साथ  65.5 % .
In 13 career  playoff  games , Warner ranks first all-time in completion percentage ( 66.5  %  ) , yards per attempt ( 8.55 ) , and  दूसरी  in passer rating ( 102.8 ) .
He also holds  the  highest completion percentage for a single game during the regular season  ,  at 92.3 percent (  24/26  ) , on September 20 , 2009 , against the Jacksonville Jaguars .
He announced his retirement on January 29 , 2010. < ref name='CNN 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ;  born  May 26 , 1953 ) is the  जूनियर  United States Senator  इससे  North Carolina , in office since January 2009 .
Previously she served in the North Carolina Senate from 1999 to 2009 .
She is a member of  the   लोकतांत्रिक  Party and is viewed as a moderate member of her party .
When  hagan  defeated Republican incumbent Elizabeth Dole in the 2008 United States  सीनेट  election , she became the first woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election .
the  Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( usually  ज्ञात  colloquially as the  heisman  Trophy or the Heisman ) , is awarded annually to the player deemed the most outstanding player in collegiate football .
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club trophy  और  renamed in  1936  following  the  death  of  the Club 's athletic director , John  heisman  ( former Brown University and University of Pennsylvania player ; head football  कोच   at  Oberlin College ,  auburn  University , Clemson University , Rice University , and the University of Pennsylvania ; and football , basketball , and baseball head coach  और  athletic director at Georgia Tech ) .
The award is presented by the Heisman Trophy Trust in early December before the postseason bowl games .
It is the oldest of several overall  पुरस्कार  in college  फ़ुटबॉल   ,  including the Maxwell Award , Walter  शिविर   पुरस्कार  ,  और  the AP Player of the Year .
The Heisman and  the  AP Player  of   the  Year  हैं  the only awards to honor the most outstanding player , while  the  Maxwell Award and Walter Camp Award recognize the best player , and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes  the  most valuable  खिलाड़ी   .
The  संयुक्त  Nations Command ( UNC  )  is the unified command structure for the multinational military  शक्तियां  supporting the Republic of Korea  (  South Korea or ROK )  दौरान  and after  the  Korean War .
After troops of the Democratic People  's  Republic of Korea  (  North  कोरियाई  or DPRK ) invaded South Korea on June 25 , 1950 , the United Nations Security Council adopted Resolution 82 calling  on  North Korea to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel .
On June 27 , 1950 ,  it   अपनाया  Resolution 83 , recommending that  सदस्यों  of the United Nations provide  सहायता  to the Republic of  कोरियाई  `` to repel the armed attack and to restore  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  peace and  सुरक्षा  to the area '' .
Security Council Resolution 84 , adopted on July 7 , 1950 , recommended that members providing military forces and  अन्य   सहायता  to South Korea `` make such forces and other assistance available to a unified command under the United States of America '' .
Although the  रिज़ॉल्यूशन  suggested the forces under the UNC were `` United Nations forces '' , and United Nations itself could be considered a belligerent , in practice the United Nations exercised no control over the combat forces ,  जिससे  were controlled by the United States .
Most observers concluded that the forces under the UNC were not in  विधि   संयुक्त  Nations troops , and the acts of  the  UNC were not the acts of  the  United Nations .
The UNC can be regarded as an alliance of national armies , operating under the collective right of self-defense .
On August 29  ,  1950  ,  the  अंग्रेजों  Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry Brigade arrived at Busan to join the UNC  ,  which  जबतक  then included only ROK and U.S. forces .
The 27th Brigade moved into the Naktong River line west of Daegu .
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia , Belgian United Nations Command , Canada , Colombia , Ethiopia , France ,  यूनानियों  , Luxembourg ,  the  Netherlands , New Zealand , the Philippines , Thailand and Turkey .
The Union of South Africa provided air units which  लड़ा  alongside the air forces of other member nations .
Denmark , India  ,   नार्वे  , and Sweden provided medical units .
Italy provided a hospital , even though it was not a UN member .
the  United Nations Command and the Chinese-North Korean Command signed  the  Korean Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953 , ending the heavy fighting .
The armistice agreement established the  सैन्य   armistice  Commission ( MAC ) , consisting of representatives of  the  two signatories , to supervise the implementation of the armistice  शर्तें  .
the  North Korean-Chinese MAC has been replaced by Panmumjon  प्रतिनिधि   अंतर्गत  exclusive North Korean management .
Regular meetings have been stopped , although duty officers of Joint Security Area , commonly known as the Truce Village of Panmunjom , from each  पक्ष  meet regularly .
Lincoln Heights is an American family drama television series about Eddie Sutton , a Mission Vista police officer who moves his family back to  उसके  old neighborhood , Lincoln Heights , to start a new  जीवन  and to help out his old neighborhood .
it  is a dangerous place to raise a family , and through the many trials the family goes through , they soon learn that settling in is not as easy as it  seems  .
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with every day life as a street cop in Los Angeles  ,  his kids try to fit in at their new  स्कूलों  and with their  नई  neighbors .
the  show premiered January 8 , 2007 on the ABC Family network with 13 episodes ordered for the first season .
It was approved for a second season , which premiered September 4 , 2007 .
Vanessa Hudgens ' song , Say OK had  महरूम  used in a commercial to promote the second season .
To promote the third season , they showed clips  of  Cassie and Charles 's relationship to the song , Crush by the American Idol 's seventh season runner-up , David Archuleta  .
To promote season 4 , they 're using  the  song  ,  Avalanche by  मारी  Digby .
The show 's theme  सोंग  was written and performed by  bassist  Stanley Clarke and singer-songwriter Blaire Reinhard .
On January 29  ,  2010 ,  एबीसी  Family announced the cancellation of the series after four seasons  .
A Christian denomination  is  an identifiable religious body under a common name , structure , and doctrine within Christianity .
In the Orthodox tradition , churches  हैं  divided  प्रायः  along  जातीय  and linguistic lines ,  into  separate churches and traditions .
Technically , divisions between one group and another are defined by doctrine and church authority .
Issues such as the nature of Jesus , the authority of apostolic  उत्तराधिकार  , eschatology , and papal primacy separate one denomination from another .
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1 billion members , over half of all Christians worldwide , making it the largest denomination for  कोई  religion worldwide  (  although the church does not view itself  as  a denomination  ,   लकिन  as the  असली  pre-denominational church  )  .
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of Christians worldwide , and together the Catholics , Protestants , Anglicans , and other closely related denominations comprise Western Christianity .
The Eastern Orthodox Church , Oriental Orthodox Churches and the Assyrian Church of the East are considered Eastern Christian denominations .
Western Christian denominations prevail in Western Europe and its former colonies .
Eastern Christian denominations are represented mostly in Eastern Europe , the Middle  ईस्ट  and North Africa  .
Christians have various doctrines about the Church ,  the   देह  of faithful that they believe was established by Jesus Christ , and how the  दैवी  church  corresponds  to Christian denominations .
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider  प्रत्येक  of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One Holy Catholic and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of the other .
protestants  separated from the Catholic  गिरिजाघर  because of theologies and practices that they considered to be in violation of their interpretation .
Generally , members of the various denominations acknowledge each other as Christians , at least to the extent that they have mutually recognized baptisms and acknowledge historically orthodox views including  the   देवत्व  of Jesus and doctrines of sin and salvation , even though doctrinal and ecclesiological  बाधाएं  hinder full communion  between  churches .
Since the reforms surrounding  वेटिकन  II , the Catholic  गिरिजाघर  has referred to Protestant communities as `` denominations '' , while reserving the term `` church '' for apostolic churches , including the Eastern  परंपरागत   (  see subsistit in and branch theory ) .
There are however some non-denominational Christians who do not follow any particular  शाखा  .
The panda  (  Ailuropoda melanoleuca , lit .
``  black and white cat-foot '' ) , also known as the giant panda to distinguish it from the unrelated red panda , is a bear native to central-western and south western China .
It is easily recognized by the large , distinctive black patches around its eyes , over the ears , and across its round body .
Though  it  belongs to the order  carnivora  ,  the  panda  's  diet  is  99 % bamboo .
Pandas in the wild will  occasionally  eat other grasses ,  जंगली  tubers , or even meat in the form of birds  ,  rodents or carrion .
in  captivity , they may receive honey , eggs , fish  ,  yams , shrub leaves  ,  oranges , or bananas  साथ  with specially prepared food .
The giant panda lives in  a   few  mountain ranges in central China , mainly in Sichuan province , but also  in   the  Shaanxi and Gansu provinces .
As a result of farming , deforestation and other development , the panda has been driven out of the lowland areas where it  एकबार   जिया  .
The panda is a conservation reliant endangered species .
A 2007 report  shows  239 pandas living in captivity inside China  और  another 27 outside the country .
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate shows that there are about 1,590 individuals living in the wild , while a 2006 study via DNA analysis estimated that this figure could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000 .
Some  रिपोर्ट्स  also show that the number of pandas in  the  wild is on the rise .
However , the IUCN does not believe there is enough certainty yet  to  reclassify the species from Endangered to Vulnerable .
While the dragon has often served as China 's national emblem , internationally the panda appears at least as  commonly  .
As  ऐसे  , it is becoming widely used within China in international contexts , for example the five Fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics .
The Kite  धावक  is a 2007 American drama film directed by Marc Forster based on the novel of the same name by Khaled Hosseini .
It tells the story of Amir , a well-to-do boy from the Wazir Akbar Khan district of Kabul , who is tormented by the guilt of abandoning his friend Hassan , the son of his father 's Hazara servant .
The story is set  विरूद्ध  a backdrop of tumultuous events , from  the   पतन  of the monarchy in Afghanistan through the Soviet  सैन्य  intervention , the mass exodus of Afghan refugees to Pakistan and the United States , and the Taliban regime .
Though most of the film is set in  अफगानिस्तान  , these parts were mostly shot in Kashgar ,  चीन  , due to the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the time .
The majority of the film 's dialogue is in Dari , with the remainder spoken  in  English .
The child actors are native speakers , but several adult actors  था  to learn Dari .
Filming wrapped up on December 21 ,  2006  , and  the  film was expected to be released on November 2 , 2007 .
However  ,  after concern for  the  safety of the  यंग   अभिनेताओं  in the film due to fears of violent reprisals to the sexual nature of some scenes in which  वे  appear , its release date was pushed back six weeks to December 14 , 2007 .
The Kite Runner was released on DVD on March 25 , 2008 .
A HD DVD release was announced for the same date , but was canceled following the format 's demise .
The film was nominated for  the  Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign  भाषा   फिल्मी  in 2007 .
The film 's score by Alberto Iglesias was nominated for Best Original Score  at  the Golden Globes and the  अकादमी  Awards .
The legality of cannabis varies from country  to  country  .
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries and has  महरूम  since the beginning of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s  .
However , many countries have decriminalized the possession of small quantities of cannabis , particularly in North  अमेरिका  , South America  और  Europe .
Furthermore , possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands , North Korea and  होता  be in the U.S. states of Colorado and Washington if it were not for federal law , which governs persons in all states .
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in  a  number of countries , including Canada , the Czech Republic and Israel .
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis , enforcement varies widely at the state level and some states have established medicinal marijuana programs in that contradict federal law ; two states ( Colorado and  वॉशिंगटन  ) have repealed  उनके  laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them  साथ  a regulatory regime , also contrary to federal statute .
कुछ  countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as others but , apart from the  देशों  that offer access  to  medical  मारिजुआना  , most countries have  विभिन्न  penalties ranging  इससे  lenient to very severe .
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in  लिहाज़  to the cultivation , use , possession or transfer of cannabis for recreational use .
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of small quantities of cannabis , making it punishable by  confiscation   और  a fine , rather than imprisonment .
कुछ  jurisdictions/  ड्रग  courts use mandatory treatment programs for young  or  frequent users ,  साथ  freedom from narcotic drugs as the goal and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes .
There  हैं  also changes in a more restrictive direction as in Canada .
Drug  परीक्षण  to detect cannabis are increasingly common in many countries and have resulted in jail sentences and  लोगों  losing  उनके  jobs .
However , simple possession can carry long jail sentences in some countries , particularly in parts  of  East Asia and  southeast  Asia where the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or  भी  execution .
Loxahatchee is a community located in Palm Beach County , Florida , United States .
It is located in the areas north of Wellington and west and northwest  of  Royal Palm Beach , Florida  और  approximately west of West Palm Beach .
loxahatchee  is  भी  the name of the Post Office that serves  इस  area , which is under  the  zip code of 33470 .
The name Loxahatchee  अर्थात्  `` turtle river . ''
Loxahatchee is located within the Indian Trails Improvement District  और  the Loxahatchee Groves Water  कंट्रोल  District .
Lion Country Safari , a  drive-through  safari park , is located  in  Loxahatchee .
In 2006 , the state of Florida approved incorporation of part of Loxahatchee  as  the Town of Loxahatchee Groves to become the 38th municipality in Palm Beach County .
The main reason for  incorporating  was to better  protect   the  area from encroaching growth and to preserve the rural character  of  the neighborhood .
Perhaps the most rural area within a close proximity to West Palm Beach , with lot sizes range from 1-20 acres  .
Along with The Acreage  ,  it is notable for loose land restrictions and the native and exotic animal presence is quite notable .
seminole  Ridge High  स्कूल  serves the area .
The Canadian  नागरिकता  Test is a test , administered  by  Citizenship and Immigration Canada ( CIC ) , that is required for all applicants for Canadian citizenship who are aged  between  18 and  54  and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship .
The test  is  available in  दोनो   फ्रेंच  and English ,  the  official  भाषाएं  of Canada .
पुनर्जागरण  Cruises , originally founded in 1989 owned by Fearnley  &  Eger Rederi  in  Oslo - Norway  ,  later purchased by Edward Rudner  (  founder of Alamo Car Rental ) as the company faltered  दौरान  the Gulf War .
They operated  year-round  cruise itineraries to the Mediterranean ,  the  Greek Isles , Tahiti and  the  South Pacific , Northern Europe and Scandinavia  .
The company ceased operations on 25 September 2001 and accommodated up to 220,000  अतिथि  in 2000 .
While the company had been in poor financial health for quite some time , the economic decline resulting from  the  September 11th terrorist attacks are credited with the demise of this cruise line .
The fleet is listed under List of cruise ships .
It was headquartered in Fort Lauderdale  ,  Florida .
Epithelium  is  one  of  the four basic types of animal tissue , along with connective tissue , muscle tissue and nervous tissue .
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of structures throughout the body , and also form many glands .
Functions of epithelial cells include secretion , selective absorption , protection , transcellular transport and detection of sensation .
in  Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on ''  or  `` upon '' , and `` θηλή '' (  ``  thēlē  ''  ) means `` nipple  ''  .
Epithelial layers are  avascular  , so they must receive nourishment  via  diffusion of substances from the underlying  संयोजी  tissue , through the basement membrane .
epithelia  can also be organized into clusters of cells that function as exocrine and endocrine glands .
Kent E. Hovind ( born  जनवरी  15 , 1953 ) is an American young  धरती   creationist  .
Hovind has spoken  on  creation science and has aimed to convince  श्रोता  to reject theories of evolution ,  भूभौतिकी   ,  and cosmology  in  favor of his interpretation  of   the  Genesis  सृष्टि  narrative from the Bible .
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and some of his ideas have  भी  been criticized by young Earth creationist organizations such as Answers  in  Genesis .
Hovind established  the  Creation Science  इंजीलवाद  in 1991 , and frequently spoke on young Earth creationism at seminars at private schools and churches , debates , and on radio and television broadcasts .
Since January  2007  , Hovind has  महरूम  serving a  ten-year  prison sentence after being  convicted  of 58 federal counts , including 12 tax offenses , one count of obstructing federal agents , and 45 counts  of  structuring cash transactions .
He is incarcerated at  the  Federal Correctional Institution at Berlin , New Hampshire .
Bride with Bindi decorated forehead
A bindi ( , from Sanskrit bindu , meaning `` a drop  ,  small particle , dot '' ) ,  or  a pottu/bottu (  in   तमिल  , Telugu  ,  and Malayalam ) is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia ( particularly India , Bangladesh , Nepal , Sri Lanka and Mauritius  )  and Southeast Asia .
Traditionally it is a bright dot of red color applied in  the  center  of  the forehead close to the eyebrows , but it can also consist of a sign or  टुकड़ा  of jewelry worn at this location .
The New York gubernatorial election of 2010 was held on Tuesday , November 2 , 2010 , to elect the Governor  of  New York , to serve a four-year term that  began  in January 2011 .
Incumbent Democratic Governor David Paterson , elected  as  Lieutenant Governor in  2006  as  the  running mate of former Governor  एलियट  Spitzer , chose not to run for a full-term .
On November 2 , New York Attorney General and Democrat Andrew  cuomo  defeated Republican Carl Paladino  .
Green Party candidate Howie  हॉकिन्स  received  over   57,000  votes , allowing the  नई  York Green Party to be listed on the ballot for the next  4  years .
The  प्रमुख  cast of Dragon Ball at the end  of   the  manga .
The Dragon Ball manga  और  anime series features an extensive cast of characters created by Akira Toriyama .
The series takes place in a fictional universe , the same as  toriyama  's previous series Dr. Slump , and follows  the  adventures of martial artist Son Goku from childhood  to  adulthood as he searches for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls , used  to  summon a  wish-granting  dragon .
During the course of the story , he encounters allies such as Bulma , Yamcha , Kuririn and Trunks ,  विरोधियों  such as Tenshinhan , Piccolo and Vegeta , and enemies such as Freeza and Cell .
While  अनेक  of  the  characters are humans with superhuman strength and/or supernatural  abilities  , the cast also includes anthropomorphic  पशु  and later , extraterrestrial  lifeforms   .
The series also includes depictions of the afterlife , with several characters being gods that  govern   the  universe .

The Comanche  हैं  a Plains Indian tribe whose  ऐतिहासिक  territory , known as Comancheria , consisted of present day eastern New Mexico , southern Colorado  ,  northeastern Arizona , southern Kansas , all of Oklahoma , and most of northwest Texas .
The Comanche people are enrolled  in  the federally  पहचाना  Comanche Nation  ,  in Oklahoma  .
Historically , the Comanches were  hunter-gatherers   साथ  a horse culture .
There may have been as many as 45,000 Comanches in the late 18th century .
Today , the Comanche Nation Comanche tribal enrollment numbers 15,191 with approximately 7,763  सदस्यों   residing  in the Lawton – Fort  sill  and surrounding  क्षेत्रों   of  Southwest Oklahoma .
The  comanche  Nation  homecoming  Powwow is held annually  in  Walters , Oklahoma in mid-July .
The Comanche spoke the Comanche language ,  a  Numic language of the Uto-Aztecan family , sometimes classified as a Shoshone dialect ; however , only about 1 % of Comanches speak it today .
Ethan Frome is a novel published in  1911  by the Pulitzer  पुरस्कार  -winning American author Edith Wharton .
It is set in the fictitious town of Starkfield , Massachusetts .
The novel was adapted into a film , Ethan Frome , in 1993 .
Times Square Studios ( TSS ) is an American television studio located in  the  Times  वर्गाकार  neighborhood of the Manhattan borough of New  यॉर्क  City , New York .
The studio is best known as the production home of ABC News ' Good Morning America ( GMA ) , a morning news and talk program  और   खण्ड  for GMA on ABC News Now .
The Las Vegas Strip World of Coca-Cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink  बेची  in stores , restaurants , and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea .
It is  उत्पादित  by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta , Georgia ,  और  is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered  ट्रेडमार्क   of  The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March  27  , 1944 ) .
Originally intended  as  a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the  संसार  soft-drink market  throughout   the  20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world .
The bottlers  ,  who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company , produce finished product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell  ,   वितरित  and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers  शामिल  Coca-Cola Enterprises  ,  which is the largest single  coca-cola  bottler in North America  और  western Europe .
the  Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda fountains to major  रेस्तरां  and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has ,  on   अवसर  , introduced other cola  पेय  under the Coke  ब्रांड  name .
The  सबसे  common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free  coca-cola  , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero ,  coca-cola  Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on  interbrand  's  बेहतरीन  global  ब्रांड  2011 , Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand .
Types of bar-lines
In musical  संकेतन  , a bar ( or  माप  ) is a segment of time defined by a given number of beats , each of which are assigned a particular note value .
Dividing music into bars provides regular reference points to pin  पाइंट  locations within a piece of music .
It also makes written music  easier  to follow , since each bar of  स्टाफ  symbols can be read and played as a batch .
Typically , a piece consists of several bars of the same length , and  in  modern musical notation the number of beats in each bar is specified  at  the beginning of the score by the  शीर्ष  number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ) , while the  नीचे   क्रमांक  indicates  the  note  मान  of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note  मान  in the 3/4 example ) .
The word bar is more common in  अंग्रेजों  English , and the word measure is more common  in  American English ,  हालांकि  musicians generally understand both usages .
In American English , although the  शब्द  bar and measure are often used  interchangeably  the correct use of the  शब्द  'bar ' refers  तभी  to the vertical line itself , while the word 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between bars .
In international usage , it is equally correct to speak  of  bar numbers and measure numbers , e.g .  ‘bars  9–16’ or ‘mm  .  9–16’ .
Along the same lines , it is wise to  आरक्षित  the abbreviated form ‘bb .
3–4’ etc  .  for beats only ; bars should be  referred  to by name in full .
The first metrically complete measure within a piece of music is called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ .
When the piece begins  साथ  an  anacrusis  ( an incomplete  माप  at the head of a piece  of  music ) ,  ‘bar  1’ or ‘m  .  1’ is the following measure .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar  सौर  plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply  शक्ति  24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from the sun , has  महरूम  harnessed by humans  चूंकि  ancient times using a range of  ever-evolving   technologies   .
Solar  उर्जा  technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and  कृत्रिम  photosynthesis , which  can  make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the  संसार   अभी  faces  .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending  on  the way they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques include the use of  photovoltaic  panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International  उर्जा  Agency said that `` the  विकास  of affordable , inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase  countries’  energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible  और   ज़्यादातर  import-independent resource ,  बढ़ाएँ  sustainability ,  reduce  pollution , lower the costs  of  mitigating  जलवायु  change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
ये  advantages are global  .
hence  the additional costs  of  the incentives for early deployment should be considered  सीखना   निवेश  ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
प्राथमिक  care may  be  provided in community health centres .
Primary care is the health care given  by  a health care provider .
Typically this provider acts  as  the principal point of consultation for patients within a health  परवाह  system  और  coordinates other specialists that the patient may need .
Such a professional can be a primary care physician , such as a general practitioner or family physician , or depending on  the  locality ,  स्वास्थ्य  system organization , and patient 's discretion , they may see a pharmacist , a physician assistant  ,  a  नर्स  practitioner , a nurse (  ऐसे  as in the United Kingdom ) , a clinical officer  (  such as in  भाग  of Africa ) ,  or   an  Ayurvedic or other traditional medicine professional  (  such as in parts of Asia  )  .
Depending on the nature of the health condition , patients may  तब  be referred  लिये  secondary or  tertiary   परवाह  .
`` Ocean Avenue '' is a song recorded by American pop punk group Yellowcard .
It was released  in  February 2004 as the second single from  समंदर   एवेन्यू   और  the third track .
It is known for bringing them into the mainstream ,  as  it received numerous spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay .
समंदर  Avenue is a  गली   in  Jacksonville , Florida , the band 's stomping grounds near their high school , Douglas Anderson School of the Arts ,  और  another street  उल्लेखित  in the song , Cherry Street .
The name of Ocean  एवेन्यू  in Jacksonville is  दरअसल  Beach  boulevard  .
वे  left their original base behind when they moved to Los Angeles .
The song was featured on the Much Music compilation album Big Shiny Tunes 9 .
A psychiatrist is a physician who  specializes  in psychiatry .
A psychiatrist  specializes  in the  उपचार  of mental disorders .
Psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine , conduct physical examinations ,  अनुक्रम  and interpret laboratory tests ,  उपयोग   मनोचिकित्सा  and may order brain imaging studies such as computed  टोमोग्राफी  ( CT/CAT Scan )  ,  magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) , and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning  .
Within  the  framework of the World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of health as a state of  पूरा  physical , mental and social  well-being  , and  नहीं  merely the absence of disease  or  infirmity ,  reproductive  health , or  यौन  health/hygiene , addresses the reproductive processes , functions and  प्रणाली  at all stages of life .
Reproductive health , therefore , implies that people are able to have  a  responsible , satisfying and  safer  sex life and that they have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if , when  और  how often to do so .
One interpretation of this implies that men and women ought to be informed of and to have access to safe , effective , affordable and acceptable methods of birth control ; also access to appropriate  स्वास्थ्य  care services of sexual  ,  reproductive medicine and implementation of health  शिक्षा  programs to stress the importance of women to go safely  through  pregnancy and childbirth could provide  युगल  with the best chance  of  having a healthy infant .
On the other hand  individuals  do face inequalities in reproductive health services .
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic  औकात   ,  education level , age , ethnicity , religion ,  और  resources available in their environment .
It is possible  लिये  example , that  कम   आय  individuals lack the resources for appropriate health services and the knowledge to  जान  what is appropriate for maintaining reproductive health .
According to the WHO , `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health accounts for 20 % of the global burden of ill-health for women , and 14 % for men . ''
Reproductive health is a part of Sexual and reproductive health and rights .
