Core 2 is  a  brand encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single- , dual- , and quad-core  microprocessors   आधारित  on the Core microarchitecture .
The single- and dual-core models are single- die ,  whereas  the quad-core models comprise two dies , each containing two cores , packaged  in  a multi-chip module .
the  introduction of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range market , and reunified  लैपटॉप  and desktop  cpu   लाइनों  , which previously had been divided into the Pentium 4 , Pentium D , and Pentium M brands .
The Core 2 brand was  introduced   on  27 July 2006 , comprising the  सोलो  ( single-core ) , Duo ( dual-core ) , Quad (  quad-core   )  , and in 2007 , the Extreme ( dual- or  quad-core  CPUs for enthusiasts )  subbrands  .
Intel Core 2 processors  साथ  vPro technology ( designed for businesses ) include the dual-core and quad-core branches .
The Super Bowl is the annual  चैंपियनशिप  game of the National Football League  (  NFL ) , the highest level of professional American football in the United States , culminating a season that begins in  the  late  गर्मियाँ  of the previous calendar year .
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to identify  प्रत्येक  game , rather than the year in which it is held .
लिये   उदाहरण  , Super Bowl  i  was played on January 15 , 1967 ,  following  the 1966 regular season  ,  while Super Bowl XLVII was played on February 3 , 2013 , following the 2012 season .
The game was created as  भाग  of a merger agreement between the NFL and its then-rival league , the  अमरीकी  Football League ( AFL ) .
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion teams would play in an AFL–NFL World Championship  खेल  until the merger was to officially begin in  1970  .
After the merger , each league was redesignated as a `` conference `` , and the game was then played between  the  conference champions .
Currently , the National Football Conference ( NFC ) leads the series with 25 wins to 22  विन्स  for the American  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference  (  AFC ) .
The day on which the  सुपर  Bowl is played , now considered by some a  de  facto American national holiday , is called `` Super Bowl Sunday ``  .
It is the second-largest day for U.S. food consumption , after Thanksgiving  दिन   .
In addition ,  the   सुपर  Bowl has frequently been the most watched American television broadcast of the year .
Super Bowl XLV , played in 2011 , became the most-watched American television program in history , drawing an average audience  of  111 million viewers and taking over the spot held by  the  previous year 's Super  कटोरी  , which itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for  twenty-eight  years by the final  एपीसोड  of M*A*S*H  .
The Super  कटोरी  is also among the most watched sporting events in the world  ,  almost all being North  अमरीकी   ऑडियंस  , and is second to association  फ़ुटबॉल  ’s UEFA Champions League final as the  सबसे  watched  सालाना  sporting event worldwide .
Because of its high viewership  ,  commercial airtime during the Super Bowl broadcast is the most expensive of the year .
due  to the high cost of investing in advertising on  the  Super Bowl , companies regularly develop their  सबसे  expensive advertisements for this broadcast .
As a result ,  watching  and discussing the  ब्रॉडकास्ट  's commercials has become a significant aspect of the  इवेंट   .
In addition , many popular singers and  संगीतकारों   have  performed during the event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the exposure .
Fiona is a feminine given name .
The name Fiona was invented , and first used , by the Scottish poet James Macpherson (  1736–96  ) , author of the Ossian poems , which he claimed  यहूद  translations from ancient  गैलिक  sources ( sources , when  challenged  ,  he  never produced ) .
The name was subsequently used as a pseudonym by William Sharp (  1855–1905  ) , who authored several romantic works under  the  name `` Fiona Macleod  ''  .
The name  रै  since become popular in  इंग्लैण्ड  , Scotland and Ireland .
The name is  माना  to  be  a Latinised  रूप  of the Gaelic word fionn , meaning `` white '' , `` fair '' .
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as  an  Anglicisation  of  the Irish-language name Fíona  ,  although these names are otherwise  unrelated  (  as  Fíona  is  derived from an element  अर्थ  `` vine '' ) .
There is also a modern tendency to equate the authentic Scottish Gaelic feminine name Fionnghal with Fiona .
the  name Fiona is rising in popularity particularly in German -speaking countries  .
Fiona  थी  the  49th  most popular name for baby girls born in 2008 in Germany .
Fiona was tied for third place in the ranking of most popular names for baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein  in   2008   .
The name  थी  the 347th most  लोकप्रिय  name for girls born in the United States in 2008 , where it  रै  ranked among the top 1,000 most popular names for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999 .
The name Fiona has been particularly popular for girls of Asian or Pacific Islander descent in New York City , where Fiona ranked as the ninth most popular name for girls from  those  groups in 2007 .
अनेक  languages  हैं  used , or historically have been used in  the  United States .
The most commonly used language is English .
There are also many  भाषाएं  indigenous to  उत्तर  America  or  to  u.S.  states or holdings in the  प्रशांत  region .
Languages brought to  the  country by colonists or immigrants from  यूरोपीय  , Asia , or other parts of the world make up  a  large  portion  of the languages currently used ; several languages , including creoles and sign languages , have also developed in the United States .
लगभग  337 languages are spoken or signed by the population , of which 176 are indigenous to the area .
fifty-two  languages formerly spoken in the  देश  's territory are now extinct .
The variety of English spoken in the United States is known as American English .
English is  the  de facto national language of the  संयुक्त  States , with 80 % of the population claiming  it  as a mother tongue  ,   और  some 95 % claiming to speak it `` well ''  or  `` very well '' .
However , no official language exists at the federal level .
There have been several proposals to make English the national language in amendments to immigration reform bills , but none of these bills has become law with the amendment  बरकरार  .
The situation is quite varied  at   the  state and territorial levels , with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in a de jure capacity  ,  others adopting English alone , others officially adopting English as well as local languages  ,  and still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism .
Spanish is the  दूसरी  most common language  in  the country , and is spoken by over 12 % of the population .
The United States holds the world 's  पांचवां  largest Spanish-speaking population , outnumbered only by Mexico , Spain , Colombia , and Argentina .
Throughout the Southwestern United States , long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist  साथ  large numbers of more recent Hispanophone immigrants  .
Although  अनेक  new Latin American immigrants are  कम  than fluent in  अंग्रेज़ी  , nearly all second-generation  हिस्पैनिक   अमेरिकी  speak English fluently , while only about half still speak Spanish .
According to the 2000 US census , people of German ancestry make up the largest single ethnic group in the United States , and the German language ranks fifth .
Italian , Polish , and French are still widely spoken among populations descending from immigrants from  those  countries in the early 20th century , but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations  die   .
Russian is also spoken by immigrant populations .
Tagalog and  वियतनामी  have over one million speakers each in the United States , almost entirely within recent  अप्रवासी  populations .
Both languages ,  साथ  with the varieties of the Chinese language ,  जापानी  , and Korean , are now used in elections in Alaska , California , Hawaii , Illinois ,  नई  York  ,   टेक्सास  , and Washington .
देशी  American languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the country , but these populations  हैं  decreasing , and the languages are almost never widely used outside of reservations .
Hawaiian , although having few native speakers , is an official language along with English  at  the state level in Hawaii .
The state government of Louisiana offers services and documents in French , as  करता  New Mexico  in  Spanish .
Besides English , Spanish ,  फ्रेंच  , German , Navajo and other  देशी  American languages ,  सब  other languages are usually learned from immigrant ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned  through  some form of education .
1990 's Pontiac  ग्रैंड  Am  सेडान  fender  और  quarter panel
On  an  automobile , a quarter panel  (  or rear wing as it is known in  अंग्रेजों  English ) is usually  माना  the body panel which goes between the  पश्च  door and the trunk and typically wraps around the wheel  खूब  ; however , the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ) , between the door and the hood , is sometimes incorrectly referred  to  as a quarter panel .
The quarter panel  is  typically made of Sheet metal , but is sometimes made of fiberglass or  fiber-reinforced  plastic ; although , this varies with different makes and models .
A quarter panel is typically a welded  on  component of  the  uni-body structure or Monocoque .
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter  फलक  typically requires it to be cut off the vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes  बंधुआ  ) to  the  Vehicle .
Due to this high amount  of   specialized   मजदूर  , a quarter panel may often be repaired rather  than  replaced by hammering out the damage , and a body  फिलर   sometimes   referred  to as bondo to be applied to finalize the  असली  surface  .
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated , in print only , Shrops  )  is a county in the West Midlands region of England .
It borders Wales to the west , Cheshire to the north  ,  Staffordshire to the east , Worcestershire to  the  south-east and Herefordshire  to  the south .
a   एकात्मक  authority ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April 2009 , taking over from the previous county  परिषद  and 5 district councils , and covers  सबसे  of the county .
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has been a separate unitary  प्राधिकार  since 1998  लकिन  continues to be included in the  ceremonial  county .
the   काउंटी  's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county town of Shrewsbury , which is culturally  और   historically  important and is located  in  the centre of  the  county  ;  Telford , a  नई  town in the east which was constructed around a number of older  कस्बों  , most notably Wellington , Dawley  और  Madeley , which is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the  north-west  , Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford , and  ludlow  in the south .
The county has many further market towns , including Whitchurch in the  उत्तर  , Newport  बस  to the north-east of Telford , and Market Drayton in the north-east of the  काउंटी  .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is  a  UNESCO World Heritage Site , covering Ironbridge  ,   coalbrookdale  and a part  of  Madeley  .
There  हैं   ,  additionally , other notable historic industrial sites located around the county , such as at Shrewsbury , Broseley , Snailbeach and Highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal .
The  shropshire  Hills  क्षेत्रफल  of  बकाया  Natural Beauty covers  परिचय  a quarter of the county , mainly  in  the south .
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely  आबादी  counties  ,  with the population  घनत्व  of the Shropshire Council  क्षेत्रफल  being just 91/km2 (  337/sq  mi  )  .
The Wrekin is one of the most famous natural landmarks in the county , though the highest hills are  the   clee   पहाड़ियाँ  , Stiperstones  और  the Long Mynd  .
Wenlock Edge is another significant geographical and geological landmark .
In the low-lying northwest of the  काउंटी   (  and overlapping the border with Wales ) is the Fenn 's , Whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve , one of the most important and best  preserved  bogs in Britain .
The River Severn , Great Britain 's longest river , runs through the  काउंटी  ,  exiting  into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley .
Shropshire is landlocked , and with an area of , is England 's  largest  inland county .
The county flower is the round-leaved sundew .
For Eurostat purposes ,  the  county ( less the unitary district  of  Telford and Wrekin )  is  a NUTS 3  प्रदेश  ( code UKG22 ) .
the  two Shropshire  एकात्मक  areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county  )  , together with the authorities covering the ceremonial county of  staffordshire   ,  comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region  .
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con 2009 , from left :  कुणाल  Nayyar , Simon Helberg , Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American  sitcom   the  Big Bang Theory , created and  कार्यपालिका  produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter ,  दो  Caltech physicists  ;  Penny , a waitress  और  aspiring actress who lives across the hall  ;  and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz  ,  and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring  भूमिकाएँ  : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) ,  a   physicist  colleague , and , at different times , a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette  rostenkowski-wolowitz  ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , a microbiologist , Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife , and  पूर्व  part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , who joins the  समूह  after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons  2–5  recurring  ;  season 6-present regular  )  , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend  जब  Howard is in space .
The show  भी  features numerous supporting characters , each of  जिसको  plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes .
The A-Team is an American action-adventure television series , running from  1983  to 1987 ,  परिचय  a fictional group of ex– United States Army Special Forces personnel who work as  सैनिको  of fortune , while on the run  इससे   the  Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit `` .
a   विशेषता  film based on the series was released by 20th Century Fox on June 11 , 2010 .
A comic book series , A-Team :  shotgun  Wedding  ,  began March  9  , 2010 .
Diana Prince is  a  fictional character appearing regularly in stories published by DC Comics .
She debuted in Sensation Comics # 1 ( January 1942  )  and serves as the civilian and secret identity of the superhero Wonder Woman  .
The character was created by Charles Moulton and Harry G. Peter  .
Wat Phra Kaew , Bangkok ,  थाईलैंड
There  is  no official state religion in the Thai constitution , which guarantees  धार्मिक  freedom for all Thai citizens , though the king  is  required by law to  be  Buddhist .
According to  the  last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais are Buddhists of the Theravada tradition .
Muslims are the second largest religious group in Thailand at 4.6 % .
Thailand 's southernmost provinces  -  Pattani , Yala  ,   narathiwat  and  भाग  of Songkhla Chumphon  have  dominant Muslim populations , consisting of both ethnic Thai and  मलय  .
The southern tip of Thailand is mostly ethnic Malays .
Christians , mainly Catholics ,  represent  0.7 % of the population .
A  छोटी  but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus also live in the country 's cities , and are heavily engaged in  खुदरा  commerce .
There is also a small Jewish community in Thailand , dating back to the 17th century .
Since 2001  ,  Muslim activists , generally described  by   the   थाई  government as terrorists or separatists  ,  have rallied against the central  सरकारी  because of alleged  भ्रष्टाचार  and ethnic bias  on  the part of officials .
Thailand 's Department of Religion , currently under the  मंत्रालय  of Culture , is formally responsible for the registration of religious groups in Thailand URL_http which hold properties through legally established foundations .
It has oversight ,  साथ  with the Immigration Police , over the  कार्य  permits of missionaries  जो  are `` expatriate  धार्मिक  workers ''  of  all  धर्मों  .
A value added tax ( VAT ) is a form of consumption tax .
From the perspective of the buyer , it is a tax on  the   खरीदें  price .
From that of the seller  ,  it is a tax only on the value added to a  उत्पाद  , material , or service , from an accounting point of view  ,  by this stage of its manufacture or distribution .
The manufacturer remits to the  सरकारी  the difference between these  दो  amounts , and retains the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the inputs  .
The value added  to   a  product by or  साथ  a business is the sale price charged to  इसके  customer , minus the cost of  सामग्री  and other taxable inputs .
A VAT is like a sales tax in that ultimately only the end consumer  is  taxed .
it  differs from the  बिक्री  tax in that , with the latter , the tax is collected and remitted to the government only once ,  at  the point of purchase by  the  end consumer .
With the VAT , collections  ,  remittances to the government , and credits for taxes already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products .
A referee calling a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking  is  the name  of  two infractions in the sport of  बर्फ  hockey that may occur when  a  player intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or her stick above the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of  a  hockey goal .
This can result in a stoppage of play  or   in  a penalty  .
in  the rules of the National  हॉकी  League , high-sticking is defined as a  दंड  in Rule 60 and as a non-penalty foul in  नियम  80 .
A stoppage  in  play results if a high  स्टिक   आता  in contact with the puck and the team who  छुआ  it regains control of  the  puck .
However , play usually continues if a  खिलाड़ी  touches the puck with  a  high stick and the opposing team gains control  of  the puck .
If the puck goes into the opposing net  बाद  coming into contact with a high stick , the goal is disallowed .
The level at which a stick is considered too  ऊँची  for a goal is the crossbar of the net .
however  , if a player knocks the puck into his own  जाल  with  a  high  स्टिक  , the goal is allowed .
A penalty is assessed if a  खिलाड़ी  strikes another player with a high stick .
The player is given a minor penalty unless his high stick caused an injury , in which  मामला  the referee has the option to assess a double-minor , major or match penalty .
It is the referee 's discretion  जिससे  penalty to  assess  : the rule calls for a double minor for an accidental injury , or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ) .
Injury is usually decided by the high stick causing bleeding  ,  but the presence of blood  करता  not automatically mean an  अतिरिक्त  penalty is awarded .
Some referees have been known to award an extra penalty without  the  presence of blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty .
Typical modern memory card reader , compatible with many common formats
A memory card reader is a device ,  typically  having a  usb  interface , for accessing the data on a memory card such as  a  CompactFlash (  cf   )  , Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ) .
Most card readers also offer write capability , and together with the card , this can function as a pen drive  .
Some printers and personal computers  have   a   built-in   कार्ड  reader  .
A multi card reader is used for  संचार  with more than one type  of  flash memory card .
मल्टी  card readers do not have built-in memory capacity , but are able to accept multiple types and styles of memory cards .
The number of compatible memory cards varies from reader to reader and can include  अधिक  than 20 different types .
The number of different memory cards that a multi card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1 , with x being a figure  of  merit indicating the number of  मेमोरी  cards accepted , such as  35-in-1  .
वहीँ  are three categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity  of  the card slots : single card reader ( e.g . 1x SD-only ) , multi  कार्ड  reader ( e.g .  9-in-1  ) and series card reader ( e.g . 4x SD only ) .
Some kinds of memory cards with their own USB functions do not need the card reader , such  as  the Intelligent  स्टिक  memory card , which can plug directly into a USB slot .
The USB device class  प्रयुक्त  is 0x08  .
Bullying is detrimental to students '  well-being  and development  .
Bullying is the use of force or coercion to abuse  or   intimidate  others .
The behavior can be habitual and involve an imbalance of social  or  physical power .
It can include verbal harassment or threat , physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards  particular  victims , perhaps on grounds of race , religion , gender  ,  sexuality , or ability  .
If bullying is done by a group , it is  पुकारा  mobbing .
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as  a  `` target '' .
Bullying can be defined in many different ways .
The UK currently has no legal definition  of  bullying , while  कुछ  U.S. states have laws against  it  .
Bullying consists  of  three basic types of abuse – emotional , verbal , and physical  .
It typically involves subtle methods of  coercion  such as intimidation .
Bullying ranges from  सरल  one-on-one bullying to more complex bullying in  जिससे  the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing  to  assist the primary bully  in  his or  उसके  bullying activities .
Bullying in school and the workplace is also referred to as  पीर  abuse  .
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed bullying in the context of rankism .
A bullying culture can develop in any  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  in which human beings interact with each other .
This includes school , church  ,  family , the workplace  ,  home , and neighborhoods .
Happy slapping  in  the Instituto Regional Federico Errázuriz , Santa Cruz , Chile
Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4 , 2007 , in Austin , Texas  ,  after the  8-year-old   introduced  Mrs. Bush during announcement of the future  खोलने  of the Texas  क्षेत्रीय  Office of  the  National Center for Missing and Exploited Children .
Rae Leigh  थी  the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a result of an AMBER Alert when she was 8 weeks  बूढ़ा   in  November 1998  .
An AMBER  चेतावनी   or   a  Child Abduction Emergency ( SAME code  :  CAE ) is a child abduction alert  प्रणाली  originating in  1996  , now employed in 9 countries .
AMBER is officially a backronym for  अमेरिका  's Missing : Broadcasting Emergency Response , named for  एम्बर  Hagerman ,  a  9-year-old  abducted  and  murdered  in Arlington , Texas in 1996 .
Alternate regional alert names were once used ;  in  Georgia  ,  `` Levi 's Call '' ( named after Levi Frady )  ;  in Hawaii , `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; and  अरकंसास  , ``  मॉर्गन  Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations  ,  Internet radio , satellite radio , television stations , and cable TV by the Emergency Alert System and NOAA Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber  चेतावनियाँ  '' ) .
The  चेतावनियाँ  are also issued via e-mail , electronic traffic-condition signs , the LED billboards which are located outside of newer Walgreens locations , along with the LED/LCD signs of billboard companies such as  साफ   चैनल  Outdoor ,  सीबीएस  Outdoor and Lamar , or through wireless device SMS  टेक्स्ट  messages .
AMBER Alert has also  teamed  up with Google and Facebook to relay information regarding an AMBER Alert to  an   कभी  growing demographic .
Those interested in subscribing  to  receive AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS messages can visit Wireless Amber Alerts , which are offered by law as free messages .
In some states , the display scrollboards  in  front of lottery terminals are also used .
the  decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each  पुलिस  organization ( in many cases , the state police or  राजमार्ग  patrol ) which investigates each of  the  abductions .
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name  और  description of the abductee , a description of the suspected abductor , and a description and  अनुज्ञा  plate number of the abductor 's vehicle  ,  if available .
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born  जुलाई  23 ,  1973  ) is an American woman with whom United States President Bill  क्लिंटन  admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its  परखना  ( which included Clinton  's  impeachment ) became known  as  the Lewinsky scandal .
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed fantasy  novels  by American author  P.  C. Cast and her daughter  kristin  Cast .
It follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird , a sixteen-year-old girl who has just become a ``  fledgling  vampyre '' and is required to attend the House of Night boarding school in  तुलसा   ,  Oklahoma .
The series  रै   महरूम   on  the New York Times Best Seller list for 63 weeks and there are over seven million copies in  छपाई  in North America alone .
The sixth novel , Tempted ,  जिससे  went on sale on October 27 , 2009 with a first printing of a million copies , entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at  #  1 .
In  जनवरी   ,  2010 ,  gezeichnet  ,  a  German translation of Marked  ,  reached the # 1 spot  on  the  der  Spiegel bestseller list .
The  श्रेणी  has so far sold more than ten million books in  39  countries .
Burned was released  on  April 27 , 2010  ,  and like Tempted , it entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
Awakened , released in January , 2011 ,  भी  entered the list at # 1 .
The series , which is published by St Martin 's Press is  नियोजित  to include twelve books .
In  2008  , plans for a film  अनुकूलन   यहूद  also announced .
The tenth book in the series , Hidden , was released on October 16 , 2012 .
The second book in the novellas ( which give backgrounds on supporting characters ) , Lenobia 's  प्रण  , was released January  31  ,  2012  .
Book eleven is currently called Revealed , and the Casts have announced that two more novellas , Neferet’s Curse , planned to be  released  February 19 ,  2013  , and a prequel novel about Kalona , are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books .
In Greek mythology , the Trojan War was waged against the city of Troy  by  the Achaeans ( Greeks  )  after Paris of  ट्रॉय  took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of  स्पार्टा  .
The war is one of the most  महत्वपूर्ण  events in Greek mythology and has been narrated through many works of Greek literature , most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey .
The Iliad relates a part  of  the last year of  the  siege of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus  's  journey home .
Other parts of the war are contained in a  साईकिल  of epic poems , which have  बच  through fragments .
एपीसोड  from the war provided material for Greek tragedy and other works of  यूनानी  literature ,  और  for  रोमन  poets including Virgil and Ovid .
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena , Hera  ,  and  aphrodite  , after Eris ,  the  goddess of strife and discord , gave them a golden apple , sometimes known as the  ठहराना  of Discord , marked  ``  for the fairest '' .
Zeus sent the goddesses  to  Paris , who  judged  that Aphrodite  ,  as the ``  fairest   ''   ,  should receive  the  apple .
in  exchange , Aphrodite made Helen , the most beautiful of all women and wife of  menelaus  , fall in love with Paris , who took her to Troy .
Agamemnon , king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus , led an expedition of Achaean troops to Troy and besieged the city  लिये  ten years because of Paris ' insult .
After the deaths of many heroes , including the Achaeans  achilles  and Ajax ,  और  the Trojans Hector and Paris  ,  the city fell to the ruse of the Trojan Horse .
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except  लिये  some of the women and children whom they kept  or  sold as slaves ) and desecrated the  मंदिरों   ,  thus earning the gods  '  wrath .
Few of the Achaeans returned safely to their homes  और  many founded colonies in distant shores .
The Romans later traced their  उत्पत्ति  to Aeneas ,  एक  of the  ट्रोजन्स  , who was said to  have  led the  surviving  Trojans  to  modern-day Italy .
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan  युद्ध  was a historical  इवेंट  that had taken place in the 13th  or  12th century BC , and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles  .
By  आधुनिक   टाइम्स  ,  दोनो  the war and the city were  widely  believed to be non-historical .
In 1868 , however ,  the  German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met  फ़्रैंक  Calvert , who convinced Schliemann that Troy was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ;  इस  claim is now accepted by most scholars .
Whether there is any historical reality behind the  trojan  War is an  खोलें  question .
Many scholars believe that there is  a  historical core to the tale , though this may simply mean that the Homeric stories  हैं  a fusion of various tales of sieges and  रिझाने  by Mycenaean  यूनानियों  during the Bronze Age .
Those who believe that the stories  of  the Trojan War are derived from a  विशिष्ट  historical conflict usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC ,  प्रायः  preferring the dates  दिए  by Eratosthenes  ,   1194–1184  BC , which roughly  corresponds  with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy  viia  .
Anarchists have employed certain symbols  लिये  their cause ,  सहित  most prominently the circle-A and the black flag , although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of  प्रतीकों  to political movement .
Since the revival of anarchism  around  the start of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization movement , anarchist  सांस्कृतिक  symbols are widely present  .
The greater palatine  कनाल  ( or pterygopalatine canal  )  is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine artery , vein  ,  and  तंत्रिका  between the pterygopalatine fossa and  the  oral cavity .
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and  गर्मियाँ  from the European  केन्द्र  for Medium-Range Weather  forecasts
The climate  of  Antarctica is the coldest on the whole of Earth .
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring  तापमान  ever recorded on the ground on Earth  :  −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station .
It is also extremely dry ( technically a desert ) , averaging 166 mm (  6.5  in ) of precipitation per year .
Even so , on most parts  of  the continent the snow rarely melts and  is   आखिरकार  compressed to become the  glacial   बर्फ  that makes up the ice sheet .
Weather fronts rarely penetrate far into the continent .
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( Köppen EF )  साथ  very cold , generally extremely dry weather throughout the year  और  no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32  °f  ) .
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET  )  with a short summer averaging above freezing  ,  and much higher precipitation .
Current head coach Mike Tomlin , during  the  2007 season
The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise has had 16 head coaches throughout its history .
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in , the name was changed to the Steelers prior to  the  season to celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel .
Joe Bach  परोसा  two separate terms as head coach and Walt Kiesling served three separate terms .
During the and seasons , due to the amount of players who fought in World  युद्ध  II , the Steelers combined their team with Philadelphia and Chicago ,  क्रमशः  .
During these seasons , Steelers ' coach  वॉल्ट  Kiesling shared coaching duties with  चिकनी  Neale and Phil Handler , who have not been included within this list .
Struggling for much of the franchise 's early years , the team 's first  ऋतु  with more wins than losses was coached by Jock  sutherland  in  .
In , under Sutherland , the Steelers played  उनके  first playoff game against the Philadelphia Eagles .
Ten of the 16  सिर  coaches  खर्च  their entire professional coaching careers with the franchise , including John  mcnally  ,  वॉल्ट  Kiesling and Chuck Noll , who have also been voted into  the   प्रो  Football Hall of Fame .
One of only  चार  men to coach the same team for 23 years ,  चक  Noll retired in .
Noll is  भी  the  तभी  coach in National Football League history to  जीत  four Super Bowls .
Bill Cowher , Noll 's replacement , coached the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory  ,  in 2005 .
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII ,  जबकि  head coached by Mike Tomlin , the team 's current head coach .
In criminal law , fraud is  जानबूझकर  deception made for personal gain or to damage another  व्यक्तिगत   ;  the related adjective is fraudulent , and verb is defraud  .
धोखाधड़ी  is a crime and a civil  विधि  violation , though the  विशिष्ट  criminal law definition varies by legal jurisdiction .
Defrauding people  or   entities  of money  or  valuables  is  a common purpose of fraud .
A hoax also  involves  deception , but without the intention of gain or of damaging or depriving the victim .
धोखाधड़ी   is  a defense in a civil action  लिये  breach of contract or specific performance of a contract .
Fraud is a basis for equitable jurisdiction .
passover  , or Pesach ( from  :  in  यहूदी  , Yiddish ) ,  tiberian  : , Modern Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah , Pesakh , Yiddish :  peysekh  , Paysakh , Paysokh ) is an important  biblically  -derived Jewish festival .
Historically ,  साथ   साथ  Shavuot ( `` Pentecost ''  )  and Sukkot ( `` Tabernacles ''  )  , Passover is one of the three pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of  यहूदा  made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem .
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to Mount Gerizim , but only men participate in public worship  .
Passover commences on  the  15th  of  the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts for either seven  दिनों   (  in Israel )  or  eight  दिनों  ( in the diaspora ) .
In Judaism , a day commences at dusk and  lasts  until the following dusk , thus the first day of Passover  तभी  begins  बाद  dusk of the 14th of Nisan and ends  at  dusk of the 15th day of  the  month of Nisan .
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the Passover Seder when the 15th of Nisan has begun .
In the Northern Hemisphere Passover takes place  in  spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [  the  ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ) .
It is one of the most widely observed Jewish holidays .
The  यहूदी  people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of  उनके  liberation over 3,300 years ago by God from slavery  in  ancient Egypt that was  शासित  by the Pharaohs  ,  and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses .
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as described in the Hebrew Bible especially in the Book of Exodus  ,  in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus , the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape  इससे  their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his Israelite slaves  ;  the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born .
The Israelites were instructed to mark the doorposts of their homes with the blood of a slaughtered spring lamb and , upon seeing this , the spirit of the  रब  knew to pass over the first-born in these homes , hence the name of the holiday .
There is some debate over where the term is actually derived from .
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites  ,  it is said that they left in such a hurry that they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ) .
in  commemoration , for the duration of Passover no leavened bread is eaten  ,  for which reason it  is  called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread '' .
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened bread ) is eaten during Passover and it is a symbol of the holiday .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ) , officially designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known of the short-period  धूमकेतुओं  and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years  .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from Earth , and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear  twice  in  a  human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and more spectacular , but  होगा   appear  only once in thousands of years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been observed  और  recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were  बना  by Chinese , Babylonian , and  मध्यकालीन  European chroniclers , but were not recognized as reappearances of  the  same  ऑब्जेक्ट  at the time .
The  धूमकेतु  's periodicity was  पहला  determined in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley , after whom it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar  प्रणाली  in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition , Halley became the first comet to be observed  in  detail by spacecraft , providing the first  observational  data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's  ``  dirty snowball '' model , which correctly predicted that Halley would  be  composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water  ,  carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
the  missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured  ये  ideas ; for  उदाहरण  it is now  समझा  that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion  of  it  is  icy .
Anti-communism is opposition to communism .
Organized  anti-communism   विकसित   in  reaction  to  the rise of communism , especially after the 1917 October Revolution in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War  .
Most anti-communists reject the concept of historical materialism , which is a central idea in Marxism .
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that capitalism will be  followed  by socialism and communism , just as feudalism was  followed  by  पूंजीवाद   .
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist  अर्जी  that the socialist state will `` wither away '' when it becomes unnecessary in a true communist society .
anti-communists  argue that the repression in  the  early years of Bolshevik rule , while not as extreme as that during Joseph  स्टालिन  's rule ,  थी  still severe by reasonable standards , citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret  पुलिस  , which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions ,  और  the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov  विद्रोह  .
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as totalitarianism , seeing similarity between  the   क्रियाएँ  of communist and fascist governments .
Historian Robert Conquest has  argued  that Communism was responsible for tens of millions of deaths during the  20th  century .
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have come to power have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition .
ये  opponents claim that most Communist countries have shown no signs  of  advancing from Marx 's socialist  स्टेज  of economy to an ideal communist stage .
Rather , Communist governments have been accused of creating a  नई  ruling  क्लास  ( a Nomenklatura ) , with powers and  privileges  greater  than  those previously enjoyed by the upper  वर्ग  in the non- communist regimes .
Gil Heron  (  9 April 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer .
He was the first black player to play for Scottish club  सेल्टिक  , and was the father of poet and musician Gil  scott-heron   .
He died in Detroit of a heart attack on 27 November 2008 .
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK )  (  Glycine max )  is  a species of legume native to East Asia , widely grown for its edible bean which has numerous uses .
The plant is classed as an  oilseed  rather  than   a  pulse  by  the  un  Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ) .
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant  और  cheap source of protein for  एनिमल  feeds and  अनेक  prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is  another  product of processing the soybean crop .
लिये  example , soybean products such as  textured  vegetable protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in many meat and dairy analogues .
Soybeans produce significantly more protein  प्रति  acre than most other uses of land .
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans include soy milk , and from the latter tofu and  टोफू  skin .
Fermented  भोजन  include soy sauce , fermented bean paste , natto , and tempeh , among others  .
The oil is used in many industrial applications .
the  main producers of  सोया  are the United States ( 35 % ) , Brazil ( 27 % ) ,  अर्जेंटीना  ( 19 % ) , China (  6  % ) and India ( 4 % ) .
The beans  contain  significant amounts of phytic acid , alpha-linolenic  एसिड  ,  और  isoflavones  .
Harrison Ford (  born  July 13 ,  1942  ) is an American film actor and producer .
He is famous for his  प्रदर्शन  as Han Solo in the original Star Wars trilogy and the title character  of   the  Indiana Jones film series .
Ford is also known for his roles as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner , John Book in Witness and Jack Ryan in Patriot  खेल  and Clear and Present  खतरे  .
His career  रै   spanned  six decades and includes roles in several Hollywood blockbusters , including Presumed Innocent ,  the  Fugitive , Air Force One  ,  and What Lies Beneath .
At one  पाइंट  ,  चार  of the top six box-office hits of all time included one of his roles .
Five of his films have been inducted into the National Film Registry .
In 1997 , Ford was ranked No . 1 in Empire `` The Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time  ''  list .
, the United  राज्य  domestic box office grosses of Ford 's  films  total over US $ 3.5 billion , with worldwide grosses surpassing  $  6 billion , making Ford the third highest grossing  u.S.  domestic box-office star .
Ford is the husband  of  actress Calista Flockhart .
a  tube  of  ChapStick
ChapStick is a brand name  लिये  lip balm  manufactured  by Pfizer Consumer Healthcare and used in many countries  विश्वव्यापी  .
it  is  intended  to help treat and prevent chapped lips ; hence the name .
Many varieties also  शामिल   सनस्क्रीन  in order to prevent sunburn .
Due to its popularity  ,  the term has become a  genericized  trademark .
It popularly refers to any  लिप  balm contained in  a  lipstick-style tube and applied in the same manner as lipstick .
However ,  the  term is still a  पंजीकृत  trademark , with rights exclusively owned by Pfizer  .
in  Sweden and in the United Kingdom , the product 's main competitor is Lypsyl , made by Novartis Consumer Health  ,  which is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick .
George Berkeley (  ;  12  कूच  168514 January 1753  )  , also  ज्ञात  as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ) , was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later  referred  to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ) .
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead contends that familiar  वस्तुएँ  like tables and chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers , and as  a  result can not exist without being perceived .
Thus , as Berkeley famously put it , for physical objects `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ) .
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction  ,  an important premise in his argument for immaterialism .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his  पहला  major work , ,  in  which he discussed the limitations of human vision and advanced the  सिद्धान्त  that the proper objects of sight are not material objects  ,  but light and colour .
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles  of  Human Knowledge in 1710 which , after its  ग़रीब  reception ,  he  rewrote in dialogue form and published under  the  title Three Dialogues between Hylas and Philonous in 1713 .
in  this book , Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of mind '  )  ,  जबकि  Hylas (  यूनानी  : 'matter  '  ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents ,  in  particular John Locke .
Berkeley argued against Sir  इसहाक़  Newton  's  doctrine of absolute space , time and motion in  de  Motu ( on Motion ) , published  1721  .
उसके  arguments were a precursor  to  the views of  mach  and Einstein .
In 1732 , he published  alciphron  ,  a  Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers ,  और  in 1734 , he published The Analyst , an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal  कलन   ,  which was influential in the development of mathematics .
उसके  last major philosophical work  ,  Siris ( 1744 )  ,  begins by advocating the medicinal use of tar water , and then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including science  ,  philosophy , and theology .
Interest  in  Berkeley 's work increased after World War II , because he tackled many  of  the issues of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century such  as  the problems of perception , the difference between primary  और  secondary qualities , and the importance of language .
Qingdao ( ) ,  historically  known as Tsingtao , is a major city in  पूर्वी  Shandong province , Eastern China , with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ) .
Its built up area , made of  6  urban districts and 4 county-level cities , is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants  in  2010 .
It borders Yantai to the northeast , Weifang to the  वेस्ट  and Rizhao to the southwest  .
Qīng (  )  in Chinese means ``  ग्रीन  '' or `` lush '' , while dǎo ( ) means `` island '' .
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level .
Lying  आरपार  the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea , Qingdao is a major seaport , naval base  ,  and industrial  केन्द्र   .
It is also the site of the Tsingtao Brewery .
The world 's  longest  sea bridge , the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge , links the main urban area of Qingdao with Huangdao  ज़िला  , straddling the Jiaozhou  खाड़ी  sea areas .
Qingdao is named China 's most livable city .
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ) ,  or  is a group of phylogenetically related large  वाइरस  ( designated usually MimiN ) .
in  colloquial speech , APMV is  अधिक  commonly referred to as just `` mimivirus '' .
Until October 2011 , when a larger virus Megavirus  chilensis  was described  ,  it had the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses .
Mimivirus has a  विशाल  and complex genome compared with most other viruses .
Mimivirus , short for `` mimicking microbe '' , is so called to reflect its large  आकार  and apparent Gram-staining properties  .
The Mexican  युद्ध  of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed conflict between  the  people of Mexico  और  the Spanish  औपनिवेशिक  authorities which started on September 16 , 1810 .
The movement , which became known as the Mexican War of Independence , was led by Mexican-born Spaniards ,  mestizos  and Amerindians who sought independence  इससे  Spain .
It started as an idealistic peasants '  विद्रोह  against their colonial masters ,  लकिन  ended as an unlikely alliance between Mexican ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents .
Crohn 's disease , also known  as  Crohn syndrome and  क्षेत्रीय  enteritis , is a  प्रकार  of inflammatory bowel disease that may affect  कोई  part of the gastrointestinal tract  इससे  mouth to anus , causing a wide variety of symptoms .
It primarily causes abdominal pain , diarrhea (  जिससे  may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ) , vomiting ( can be continuous ) ,  or  weight loss , but may also cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes  ,  arthritis  ,  inflammation of the eye , tiredness , and lack of concentration .
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental , immunological and bacterial  कारकों  in genetically susceptible individuals .
इस  results in a  दीर्घकालिक  inflammatory disorder  ,  in which the body 's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract  संभवतः   निर्देशित  at  सूक्ष्मजैविक  antigens .
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an autoimmune disease in the past ; recent investigators have described it as an immune deficiency state .
There is  a  genetic association with Crohn 's disease , primarily with  विसंगतियाँ  of the NOD2 gene and its  प्रोटीन  , which senses bacterial cell walls .
Siblings  of  affected individuals are  at  higher risk .
Males and females are equally  प्रभावित  .
Smokers are two times more likely to develop Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers .
Crohn 's disease affects  between  400,000  और  600,000 people in North America  .
Prevalence estimates for Northern Europe have ranged from 27–48  प्रति  100,000 .
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties  ,  with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies , although the disease can occur  at  any age .
There is no known pharmaceutical or surgical cure for Crohn 's  बीमारी  .
Treatment options are  प्रतिबंधित   to  controlling symptoms  ,   maintaining  remission , and preventing  पतन  .
the  disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn , who , in 1932 , together with two other colleagues at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York , described a series of  मरीजों  with inflammation of the terminal ileum , the area most  commonly  affected by the  बीमारी  .

The list directly includes the  tallest  buildings and structures for each  देश   ,  and where  उचित  , it also points to more detailed country-specific lists .
Rough and Ready is a census-designated place in  नेवाडा  County  ,  California , United  राज्य  .
It is located west of Grass Valley , California , approximately 62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento .
The population was 963 at the 2010 census .
YouTube is a  video-sharing  website , created by three former PayPal employees in February 2005 , on which users can upload , view and share videos .
the  company is based in San Bruno , California , and  उपयोग   adobe  Flash Video and HTML5 technology to display a  चौड़ी  variety of user-generated video content , including movie clips , TV clips , and  म्यूज़िक  videos , as well as amateur content such as video blogging , short original videos , and educational videos .
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals  ,  although media corporations including CBS  ,  the BBC  ,   vevo  , Hulu , and other organizations offer some of their material via the site , as part of the YouTube partnership program .
Unregistered users  can  watch videos , while registered users can upload an unlimited number of videos .
Videos considered to contain potentially offensive content are available only to registered users at least 18 years old .
In November 2006 ,  youtube  ,  llc  was bought by Google for US $ 1.65 billion , and operates as a subsidiary of  google  .
Sister Act is a musical written by  cheri  Steinkellner and Bill Steinkellner with additional book material by Douglas  कार्टर  Beane ,  साथ  lyrics  by  Glenn Slater  और  music by  एलन  Menken .
It is based on the hit 1992 film comedy  of  the same name .
The 2009 West End production was produced by Stage Entertainment , Whoopi Goldberg , and Michael Reno for  सिस   अधिनियमों  LLC .
Goldberg is also a producer of the 2011 Broadway adaptation .
Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application  प्रोग्रामिंग  interfaces ( APIs ) for handling tasks related to multimedia , especially  खेल  programming and video , on Microsoft platforms .
Originally ,  the  names  of  these APIs all began with Direct  ,  such as Direct3D , DirectDraw , DirectMusic , DirectPlay , DirectSound , and so forth .
The name DirectX  थी   coined  as shorthand term  लिये  all of these APIs ( the X standing in for the particular API names ) and soon became the name of the collection .
When Microsoft later  नियत  out  to  develop a gaming console , the X was used as the basis of the name Xbox to indicate that the console was based on DirectX technology .
The X  आरंभिक  has been  carried  forward in the naming of  api  designed for the Xbox such as XInput and the Cross-platform  ऑडियो  Creation  औजार  ( XACT ) , while the DirectX pattern  रै  been continued for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite .
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development  of  video games for Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  , Microsoft Xbox , Microsoft Xbox 360 and some Sega Dreamcast games .
Direct3D is also used  by   अन्य  software  अनुप्रयोग  for visualization and graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM engineering .
As Direct3D is  the   सबसे  widely publicized component of DirectX , it is common to see the  names  `` DirectX '' and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably .
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in  redistributable   शब्दकोष   रूप  , along with accompanying documentation and headers for use in coding .
Originally , the runtimes  यहूद  only installed  by  games or explicitly by the user .
Windows 95 did not launch with DirectX , but DirectX was included with Windows 95 OEM  सेवा  Release  2  .
Windows 98 and  खिड़कियाँ  NT 4.0 both shipped with  डाइरेक्टएक्स  , as has every version of Windows released since .
the  SDK is available as a free download .
While the  runtimes  are proprietary , closed-source software ,  सोर्स  code is provided  लिये  most of the SDK  नमूने  .
starting  with the release of Windows 8 Developer  पूर्वावलोकन  , DirectX SDK has been integrated  into  Windows SDK .
Direct3D 9Ex , Direct3D 10  ,  and  direct3d   11  are only available for  खिड़कियाँ  Vista and newer because each of these new  संस्करण  was built to  निर्भर  upon the  नई  Windows Display Driver Model that was introduced for Windows Vista  .
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video memory  मैनेजर  supporting virtualization of graphics  हार्डवेयर  for various applications and services like the Desktop Window Manager .
Quetzaltenango , also commonly known  by  its indigenous name , Xelajú ,  or  more commonly , Xela , is the second largest city of Guatemala .
It is both the capital of Quetzaltenango Department and the municipal seat of Quetzaltenango municipality .
It has an estimated population of 224,703 .
The population is about 61 % indigenous  or  Amerindian , 34  %  Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European .
quetzaltenango  is  स्तिथ  in a mountain valley at an elevation  of  2,330 meters ( 7,655  ft  ) above sea level  at  its lowest part .
it  may reach  ऊपर  2,400 meters within the city .
The Municipality of Quetzaltenango consists of an area of .
Municipalities  abutting  the municipality  of  Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá  ,  Cantel , Almolonga , Zunil  ,   el   palmar  , Concepción Chiquirichapa  ,  San Mateo , La Esperanza , Olintepeque ,  और  San Andrés Xecul .
All these municipalities are part of the Department of Quetzaltenango , except San Andrés Xecul which is a part of the  विभाग  of Totonicapán .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from Mesopotamia , is amongst  the  earliest  surviving  works of literature .
the  literary  इतिहास  of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about  'bilgamesh  ' (  sumerian  for Gilgamesh ) ,  किंग  of Uruk  .
Four of  ये  were used  as  source material for a combined epic in Akkadian .
This first combined epic , known as the ``  बूढ़ा   babylonian  '' version , dates to the  18th  century BC and is  titled  after its incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a few fragments of it have survived .
the  later  ``   मानक  Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru  (  `` He who Saw the Deep '' )  .
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this longer , twelve-tablet version have been recovered .
Some of the best copies were discovered in the library  तबाह   of  the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers  on  a friendship between Gilgamesh  और  Enkidu .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the  देवताओं  as  gilgamesh  's equal to distract him  इससे  oppressing the people of Uruk .
Together  ,  they journey to the Cedar Mountain to defeat Humbaba , its monstrous guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven , which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish Gilgamesh for spurning her advances .
As a punishment  लिये  these actions , the gods sentence Enkidu to death .
The second half of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death , and  उसके  quest for immortality .
In order to learn the secret  of  eternal life ,  gilgamesh  undertakes a long and perilous journey  .
He learns that `` The life that you are seeking you will never  ढूँढें  .
When the gods created man they allotted to him death , but life they retained in their own keeping . ''
This  उद्धरण   थी  originally  attributed  to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version  of   the  epic , and then attributed to  the  immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in  the  Akkadian version of  the  epic .
Nevertheless  ,  Gilgamesh 's fame  जिया  on after his death , because of his great building projects , and his account of what Utnapishtim told  उसे  happened during the flood  .
The story has been translated into  अनेक  different languages  ,  and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in  works  of popular fiction .
There are numerous debates over who created the first video game , with the answer depending largely on how video games are  पारिभाषित  .
The evolution of video games represents a  उलझे  web  of  several different industries , including scientific , computer , arcade , and consumer electronics  .
The `` video '' in `` video game `` traditionally refers  to   a  raster display device .
साथ  the popular catch phrase use of  the  term `` video game  ''  , the term now implies all display types , formats , and platforms .
Historians have also sought to bypass the  समस्या  by instead using the more specific  ``  digital games '' descriptive .
इस  term leaves out the earlier analog-based computer games .

Unless otherwise stated , numbers indicate worldwide units sold , ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list  the  same amount .
The exception are the  ones  specifying shipments ,  जिससे  have lower precedence than others listing sales .
Franchise sales include expansion packs even  हालांकि  they are not considered full video games .
For  best-selling  individual video  खेल  , see List of best-selling video  खेल  .

This does not necessarily apply for series that are not  वीडियो  game-based  .
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards ( September 1 , 1933 –  सितंबर  13 , 2006 ) was an American politician and the 45th Governor of Texas .
वो  first  आए  to national attention as  the  state treasurer of Texas , when she delivered the keynote address at  the  1988 Democratic National Convention .
रिचर्ड्स  served  as  the 45th Governor of Texas  इससे  1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by  जार्ज  W. Bush .
Ann Richards was the second female governor of Texas .
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a security feature included in modern operating systems .
It is known to be  उपलब्धियाँ  in Linux , Mac OS X , iOS , Microsoft Windows  और  Android operating  प्रणालियों  and is intended to prevent an application or service from executing  कोड  from a non-executable memory region .
This helps prevent certain exploits that store code via a buffer overflow , for example .
dep  runs in two modes : hardware-enforced DEP for CPUs that can mark memory pages as nonexecutable , and software-enforced DEP with limited protection for CPUs that do not have hardware  support  .
Software-enforced  dep  does not protect against execution of code in data  पृष्ठों  ,  लकिन  instead counters SEH overwrite ,  another  type of attack  .
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ) , on Windows in 2004 with Windows XP Service Pack 2 , while Apple introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in  2006  .
Example illustration of  दो  common futanari variants
, is  the   जापानी  word for hermaphroditism , which  is  also used in a broader sense for androgyny .
Beyond Japan the term  is  used  to  describe a commonly pornographic genre of computer games , comics and animations  ,  which includes characters that show both primary sexual characteristics .
But in today 's language it  refers  almost exclusively  लिये  characters  जो  have an overall feminine appearance .
In that case the  पद  is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ) , which is occasionally also used as term for the works itself .
Early CAPTCHAs such as these , generated by the EZ-Gimpy program , were used  on  Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA , rather than attempting to create a distorted background and high levels of warping on the text , might  फ़ोकस  on making segmentation difficult by adding an angled line .
Another way to  मेक  segmentation  मुश्किल  is to crowd  प्रतीकों  together , as in Yahoo ! 's current CAPTCHA format  .
Some CAPTCHAs try to utilize the ability of people to see three-dimensional objects .
On this image , symbols  हैं  drawn with lines  of  different thickness to make an effect  of  extrusion .
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test  प्रयुक्त  in computing as an attempt to ensure that the response is generated by a human being .
The process usually  involves  a computer asking a user to complete a simple test which the  कंप्यूटर  is able to  ग्रेड  .
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate but difficult for a computer to solve , but again easy for a human .
If a correct solution is  प्राप्त  , it can be presumed to have been entered by a human .
A  आम  type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or digits from a distorted image that appears on the screen .
Such tests are commonly  प्रयुक्त  to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites , since  a  normal human can easily read  a  CAPTCHA , while the bot can not  प्रक्रम  the image letters  और  therefore , can not answer properly , or at all .
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated  ,  many of them have become  मुश्किल  even for a human to read , so picture CAPTCHAs were created in which a  इंसान  is shown a simple test to show  a  picture of a certain animal ( given few  एनिमल  pictures )  ,  which is simple for a human being to process  ,  and therefore easy to pick ,  जबकि  a bot can not process and solve the question because although it can analyze the  चित्र  , it can not easily guess the animal  .
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was  coined  in 2000 by Luis von Ahn , Manuel Blum  ,  Nicholas  J.  Hopper , and John Langford ( all  of  Carnegie Mellon University ) .
It is an acronym based on the word  ``  capture '' and standing for `` Completely  स्वचालित   पब्लिक  Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart ''  .
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the term on 15 October  2004  , but the trademark application was  abandoned  on 21 April 2008  .
A CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a  रिवर्स  Turing test , because it is administered by a  यंत्र  and targeted at  a  human ,  in  contrast to the standard Turing test that is  typically  administered by a human  और  targeted at a  यंत्र  .
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly  ज्ञात  in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer , explorer , conservationist , filmmaker  ,  innovator , scientist , photographer , author and researcher who studied  the  sea and all forms of life  in  water .
He co-developed the  aqua-lung  , pioneered marine conservation and was a member of the Académie française .
KFC ( Kentucky Fried  मुर्गा  ) is a fast  खाना  restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville , Kentucky , United States , which specializes in fried chicken  .
An ``  अमरीकी  icon '' , it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as  measured  by sales  )  after McDonald 's , with over 18,000 outlets in 120 countries and territories .
The company is a subsidiary of Yum  !
Brands ,  a  restaurant company which also owns Pizza Hut and Taco Bell .
KFC was founded by Harland Sanders , who began selling fried chicken from his  roadside  restaurant in Corbin , Kentucky during the Great Depression .
Sanders was one of  the  first people to see the potential of the restaurant franchising concept , with the first  ``  Kentucky Fried Chicken '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952 .
The franchise popularized chicken in the fast  खाना  industry , thereby diversifying the market and challenging the dominance of the hamburger .
Marketing himself as `` Colonel Sanders '' , he became a  legendary  figure  of  American  सांस्कृतिक  history , and  उसके  image is still prominently used in KFC branding  .
The company 's rapid expansion  देखी  it grow too large for Sanders to manage , and in 1964  he   बेची  the company to  a  group of investors led  by  John Y . Brown , Jr. and Jack Massey .
KFC was one of the  पहला  fast food chains to expand internationally , opening outlets in England , Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s .
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s , KFC experienced mixed fortunes domestically , as it went through a series  of  corporate owners  जो  had little or no experience  in  the restaurant business .
In the early 1970s , KFC was sold to the spirits firm Heublein  ,  who were taken over  by  the R.J. Reynolds food and tobacco conglomerate , who sold  the  chain to PepsiCo .
The chain continued to expand overseas however  ,  and in 1987 KFC became the first Western restaurant chain to  खोलें   in  China .
The chain has since expanded rapidly in China , and the country is now the company 's most profitable market .
PepsiCo  spun  off its restaurants division as Tricon Global Restaurants , which later changed its name to Yum !
ब्रांड्स   .
KFC primarily sells fried chicken  टुकड़े  and variations such  as   मुर्गा  sandwiches and wraps , salads and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw , desserts and soft drinks , often supplied by PepsiCo .
Its  सबसे  famous product is pressure fried chicken pieces , seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of  11   herbs  and spices .
The exact nature of these ingredients is unknown , and represents  a  notable trade secret  .
Larger  portions   of  fried chicken are served in a distinctive cardboard `` bucket '' ,  जिससे  has become a  हस्ताक्षर  of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman .
KFC is famous  लिये  the slogan `` finger lickin ' good '' , which has since been replaced by `` Nobody  करता  chicken like KFC '' and `` So good ''  .
Cnidaria ( with  a   मूक  c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 species of animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments .
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes , specialized cells  कि  they use mainly for  capturing  prey .
Their bodies consist of mesoglea  ,  a non-living jelly-like substance , sandwiched between  दो  layers  of  epithelium that are mostly  एक  cell thick  .
वे  have two basic body forms :  तैराकी  medusae and sessile polyps , both of which are radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes  .
Both forms  have  a single orifice and body cavity that are used for digestion and respiration .
Many cnidarian species produce colonies that are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids , or both .
Cnidarians ' activities  हैं  coordinated by a decentralized nerve net  और  simple receptors .
Several free-swimming Cubozoa and Scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts , and some have simple eyes .
Not all cnidarians reproduce sexually .
Many have complex  lifecycles  with asexual  polyp  stages and sexual medusae  ,   लकिन  some omit either the  polyp   or  the medusa stage .
Cnidarians were for a long time grouped  साथ  Ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata , but increasing  जागरूकता  of their  मतभेद  caused them to be placed in separate  phyla   .
Cnidarians are classified into four main  समूह  : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones , corals , sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish )  ;  Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa , a diverse group that includes  सब  the  freshwater  cnidarians as well as many marine  फ़ॉर्म  , and has both  स्थानबद्ध  members such as Hydra and colonial swimmers such as the Portuguese Man  o  ' War .
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right rather than a sub-group of Scyphozoa , and there is  बहस  about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex  पशु  ) .
Most cnidarians prey on  जीवों  ranging in size from plankton to animals several times larger than themselves , but  अनेक  obtain much of their nutrition from  endosymbiotic  algae , and a  few  are parasites .
Many are preyed upon by other animals including starfish , sea slugs , fish and turtles .
Coral reefs , whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae , support  कुछ  of the world 's most productive ecosystems , and  protect   वनस्पति   in  tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides .
While corals are almost entirely restricted to warm , shallow marine waters , other cnidarians  सजीव  in the depths , in polar seas and in freshwater .
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rocks formed about ,  और  other fossils show that corals may have been present shortly before and diversified a few million  सालो  later .
Fossils of cnidarians that do not build mineralized structures are  बहुत  rare .
Scientists currently think that cnidarians , ctenophores and bilaterians  हैं  more closely related to calcareous sponges than these are to other sponges , and that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians ,  और  the most closely related to bilaterians .
Recent analyses have  concluded  that cnidarians , although  माना   अधिक  `` primitive '' than bilaterians , have a wider range of genes .
