the  Aztec people were certain ethnic groups of  सेंट्रल  Mexico , particularly those groups who spoke the Nahuatl language  और  who  वर्चस्व  large parts of Mesoamerica from the  14th  to  16th  centuries .
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people from Aztlan `` , a mythological place for  the  Nahuatl-speaking culture of the time , and later adopted as the word to  define  the Mexica people .
Often the term ``  एज़टेक   ''  refers exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan ( now the location of Mexico  नगर  )  ,  situated on an island in Lake Texcoco , who referred  to  themselves as Mexica  tenochca   or  Cōlhuah Mexica .
sometimes  the term also includes the inhabitants of  tenochtitlan  's two principal allied  city-states  , the Acolhuas of Texcoco and the Tepanecs of Tlacopan , who together with the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is  प्रायः  known as  ``   the  Aztec Empire '' .
In other contexts , Aztec may refer to all the various city states and their peoples ,  जो   साझा  large parts of  उनके  ethnic history and  सांस्कृतिक   traits  with the Mexica , Acolhua and Tepanecs , and who often also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca .
In this meaning it  is  possible to talk about an Aztec civilization including all the particular cultural patterns common for most of the peoples inhabiting Central Mexico in the  लेट  postclassic  काल  .
From the 13th century , the  घाटी  of Mexico was the  दिल  of Aztec civilization : here  the  capital  of  the Aztec Triple Alliance , the city of Tenochtitlan , was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco .
The Triple Alliance formed a  उपनदी  empire expanding its political hegemony far  परे  the Valley of Mexico , conquering other city states  throughout  Mesoamerica .
At its pinnacle , Aztec culture had rich  और  complex mythological and religious traditions , as well as  reaching  remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments .
In 1521  hernán   cortés  , along with a large number of Nahuatl  बोलना  indigenous allies , conquered Tenochtitlan and defeated the Aztec Triple Alliance under the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II .
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of Mexico  नगर  on the site of the ruined Aztec  पूंजी  , from where they proceeded with the process of colonizing Central America .
Aztec culture and history is primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico  नगर  ; from indigenous bark paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors such as Hernán Cortés and Bernal  díaz   डेल  Castillo ; and especially from 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec  संस्कृति  and history written by Spanish clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language , such as the famous  florentine  Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants .
Anderson Hays Cooper ( born June 3 , 1967 ) is  an  American journalist ,  लेखक   ,  and television personality .
He is the primary anchor of the CNN news show Anderson Cooper 360° .
The program is normally broadcast live from a New York City studio ; however , Cooper often  प्रसारण  live on location for breaking news stories  .
As of September 2011 , he  भी   serves  as  मेजबान  of his own eponymous syndicated daytime talk  दिखाएँ  , Anderson Live , which will be cancelled  at   the  end of the second season .
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped curve ) where each band  रै  a width of 1 standard deviation – See also : 68-95-99.7  नियम
Cumulative probability of a normal distribution with expected value 0 and standard deviation 1 .
in   आंकडे  and probability theory , standard  विचलन  ( represented by the symbol sigma , σ ) shows  कैसा  much variation or dispersion  exists  from the average ( mean  )  , or expected value .
a  low  मानक  deviation indicates that  the  data points tend to  be  very close to the mean ; high standard deviation indicates that the data points  हैं  spread out over a large range of values .
The standard deviation  of  a random variable , statistical population , data set , or probability distribution is the square root of its variance .
It is algebraically  simpler  though  practically  less robust than the average absolute deviation .
A useful property of standard deviation is that , unlike variance , it is expressed  in  the  वही  units as the data .
Note , however , that for measurements with percentage as unit , the  मानक  deviation will have percentage points as unit .
In addition to expressing the variability of a population ,  मानक  deviation is commonly used to measure confidence in statistical  conclusions  .
For example , the margin of error in polling  आंकड़ा  is determined by calculating the expected standard deviation in the  परिणाम  if the  वही  poll were to  be  conducted multiple times .
The  reported   हाशिया  of error is typically about twice  the  standard deviation ­–  the  radius  of   a  95 percent confidence interval .
In science , researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data , and  तभी  effects that fall far outside the range of  मानक  deviation are considered statistically  significant  – normal random error or variation in the  माप  is in  इस  way distinguished from causal variation .
Standard deviation is also important in finance , where the standard deviation on the rate of return on  an  investment is a measure of the volatility of the  निवेश  .
When only a sample of data from a population is available , the  मानक  deviation  of  the population can be estimated by  a  modified quantity called the `` sample standard deviation '' .
When the sample is the entire population , its unmodified standard deviation is called the `` population standard deviation  ''  .
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( Ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a  रूट  vegetable , secondarily as a leaf vegetable .
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown  और  economically important root  फसलों   in  the  andean   प्रदेश  of  दक्षिण  America  ,  second only to the potato .
It is known there with the common name of papa lisa , but also by the regional names melloco  (  Ecuador  )  , olluco ( Peru ) , chugua  (  Colombia ) or ruba (  वेनेजुएला   )   ,  among others .
The leaf and the tuber  हैं  edible , similar to spinach and the potato , respectively .
They are known to contain high levels of protein , calcium , and  केरोटीन  .
Papalisa  यहूद  used by the Incas prior to arrival of Europeans in South America .
Ulluco tubers are marketed as `` Earth Gems  ''  in New Zealand , by Halfords Exotic Produce .
Ulluco tubers in New Zealand
An April 24 ,  1851  poster  चेतावनी   the  `` colored  लोगों  of Boston '' about policemen acting as slave catchers .
The Fugitive Slave  विधि   or  Fugitive Slave Act was passed by  the  United States Congress  on  September 18 , 1850 , as part of the Compromise of 1850 between Southern slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers  .
This was one of the most controversial acts of the  1850  compromise and heightened Northern fears of a `` slave power conspiracy '' .
It declared that all runaway  स्लेव  were , upon capture , to be returned to  उनके  masters .
Abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law '' for the dogs  कि  were used to  track  down runaway slaves .
Frank  जोसेफ  Pallone , Jr. ( born October  30  , 1951 ) is  the  U.S. Representative for , serving since 1993 .
He is a member of the Democratic Party .
he  previously represented the 3rd district from 1988 to 1993 .
Trin-i-tee 5:7 is a gospel duo from New Orleans , Louisiana in the United States .
The  समूह  was marketed as a  इन्जील  alternative  to  R & B girl groups such as Destiny 's Child and TLC  .
Trin-i-tee 5:7 has sold over  2.5  million albums .
In 1998 , the group released their first album entitled Trin-i-tee 5:7 which  डेब्यू  at # 1 on the Top Gospel charts .
the  album  प्रदर्शित  the songs `` God 's Grace ''  और  the cover song `` Oh !
Mary Do n't You Weep  ''  .
The album later became certified gold  .
In 1999 , Terri Brown left the group and was later replaced by singer  एड्रियन  Anderson .
During that year , the group recorded and released their second album ,  आध्यात्मिक  Love .
The  एल्बम  became the  समूह  's second # 1 album on the Top Gospel charts .
The  एल्बम   contained  the singles `` Put Your Hands '' and `` My Body  ''  .
In 2002 , the group released  उनके  third album The  चुंबन  which  debuted  at # 2 on the Top Gospel charts  .
In 2007  ,  the group left GospoCentric Records and signed  a  record deal with Spirit Rising Music .
In late 2007 , Trin-i-tee 5:7 released their fifth album T57 , which  प्रदर्शित  the top ten gospel  सिंगल  `` Listen '' .
T57 charted #  2  on the Top Gospel Albums ,  #  5 on the Top Christian charts , and # 12 on the Top R & B charts .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य  federal earned income  कर   क्रेडिट  or earned income credit ( EITC or  eic   )  is a refundable tax credit for low- and medium-income individuals and couples , primarily for those who have qualifying children  .
When the credit  exceeds  the amount of taxes  owed  , it results in a tax refund to those  जो  claim  the  credit .
This  क्रेडिट  is provided to offset the burden of social security taxes and also to promote  an  incentive to work .
in  order for a person or couple to claim one or more persons as their qualifying child  (  ren ) , the  आयु  , relationship , and shared residency requirements must  be  met , as  खूब   as  some  अन्य  requirements .
U.S. tax forms 1040EZ , 1040A ,  or  1040 can be used to claim EIC without  qualifying  children .
To claim the credit with qualifying children , 1040A or 1040 must be used , as well as attaching Schedule EIC .
EIC  phases  in slowly , has  a  medium-length plateau , and then phases out more slowly than it  phased  in .
Since the credit phases  आउट   at  21 % ( for two children  और  for three or more qualilfying children ) or  16  %  (  for one qualifying child ) , it is always preferable to have one more dollar of actual salary or wages  (  although technically , since  the  EIC table moves by fifty dollar increments , it 's always preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ) .
For tax year 2011 , the maximum EIC for a single person or couple filing without qualifying children was $ 464 .
The maximum EIC with one qualifying child was $  3,094  , with two children was $ 5,112 , and  साथ  three or more  qualifying  children was $  5,751   .
ये  amounts are indexed annually for inflation .
The earned income tax credit has  महरूम  part of political debates in the United States regarding whether raising the minimum wage or increasing EIC will better address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs .
The following is a list of halftime shows  आयोजित  at the National Football  लीग  's championship  खेल  , the Super Bowl .
While halftime shows are  a  tradition during  फ़ुटबॉल  games at all levels of competition  ,  the Super Bowl halftime show represents a fundamental link to  पॉप  culture , which helps broaden the television  दर्शक   और   देशभर  interest .
In most years since the mid-1980s , the halftime show of the Super Bowl  रै  featured popular recording artists and other well-known celebrities .
it  has measurably increased television viewers during and after the halftime show .
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched events in American television annually with over 100 million viewers  in  the United States alone .
Musical genres over the years have represented a broad range of music types , including pop ,  चट्टान  , classic rock , country ,  हिप  hop , rap  ,  blues , and soul .
In some years , short skits or drama scenes are acted out on a stage .
The performance group Up with People has  performed   at   the  most Super Bowl halftime shows , starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s .
According to Nielsen ratings , Super  कटोरी  XLVI halftime show headlined by Madonna in 2012  remains   the  most-watched halftime  दिखाएँ  in history , with 114 million  दर्शक  or about 3 million  अधिक   than   the  actual  खेल   .
Beyonce  's  2013 halftime show performance was the second most viewed show in history .
it  is listed on the Guinness World Records as  the  largest TV audience for a Super Bowl  half-time  performance .
International Men 's  दिन  ( IMD )  is   an  annual international event celebrated on 19th November .
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad and Tobago , the day and its events find support from a variety of  individuals  and groups in Australia , the Caribbean , North America ,  एशिया  , Europe and Africa .
बोलना  on behalf of UNESCO , Director of Women and Culture of Peace  ingeborg  Breines said of IMD  ,  `` This is an excellent idea and would give some gender balance . ''
वो  added  कि  UNESCO was looking forward to cooperating with the organizers .
The objectives  of  celebrating an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Men 's Day include focusing on men 's and boys  '   स्वास्थ्य  , improving gender relations , promoting gender equality , and highlighting positive male role models .
It is an occasion to highlight discrimination against men and boys and  to  celebrate their achievements and contributions , in particular for their  योगदान  to community , family ,  विवाह  , and child care  .
The broader and  परम  aim of the event is to promote basic humanitarian  मान  .
International Men 's Day  is  celebrated in over 60 countries , including Trinidad and Tobago ,  जमैका  , Australia  ,  India , China , United States , Romania , Singapore  ,  Malta ,  संयुक्त  Kingdom ,  दक्षिण  Africa , Tanzania , Zimbabwe , Botswana , Seychelles , Burundi , Hungary , Ireland , Isle of Man , Ghana , Canada , Denmark , Norway , Austria , Bosnia  और  Herzegovina ,  युक्त  , France , Italy , Pakistan , Cuba , Antigua  और  Barbuda , St. Kitts and Nevis , St.  लूसिया  , Grenada and Cayman Islands , on 19 November , and global support for  the  celebration is broad .
Valley Village  parkvalley
Village is a district in the San Fernando Valley region  of  Los Angeles , California .
The median age of its population , at 36 , is `` old for the city of Los Angeles . '' and its  औसत  household size of two people is low , compared to other parts of the city  .
Developmental psychology is the scientific study of changes that occur in  इंसान  beings over the course of their  जीवन  span .
Originally concerned with infants and children , the field has expanded to include adolescence , adult development , aging , and the entire life span .
This field examines change across  a  broad range of topics including motor skills and  अन्य   psycho-physiological  processes ; cognitive development involving areas such  as  problem solving , moral  समझना  , and  conceptual  understanding ; language  अधिग्रहण  ; social , personality , and emotional  विकास  ; and self-concept and identity formation .
Developmental psychology includes issues such as the extent to which  विकास  occurs through the gradual accumulation of knowledge versus stage-like development ,  or  the  extent  to  जिससे  children are born with innate mental structures versus learning through experience .
Many researchers are interested in the interaction between personal characteristics , the individual 's behavior , and environmental factors including social context  ,  and their impact on development ; others take a more narrowly-focused approach .
Developmental psychology informs several  लागू  fields , including : educational psychology , child psychopathology , and forensic developmental psychology .
developmental  psychology complements several other basic research fields in psychology including social  मनोविज्ञान  , cognitive psychology , ecological psychology , and comparative psychology .
Joseph Michael `` Joey  ''  Stivic is a fictional character who first appeared on  the  1970s American  sitcom  All in the Family  .
Joey Stivic was the son and  तभी  child of Mike Stivic ( played by Rob Reiner ) and  ग्लोरिया  Stivic ( played by Sally Struthers ) , and the grandson  of  Archie Bunker ( Carroll O'Connor ) and Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ) .
the   अक्षर  first appeared as  a  newborn baby in a two-part episode of  सब   in  the Family which  aired  in December 1975 .
After many appearances on All in  the  Family until Reiner and Struthers  बाएँ  the series in 1978 (  by  that time , Joey had been  निभाई  most often by alternating twins Jason and Justin Draeger ) , the Joey Stivic character next appeared on the  सब  in the Family spin-off  श्रेणी  ( some call it  a  continuation of the  असली  ) Archie Bunker  's  Place in a guest appearance in the November 1979 episode `` Thanksgiving Reunion . ''
In this instance , the character was played by child actor Dick Billingsley and was appropriately pre-school age .
With Gloria now separated from Mike , she returned to Archie Bunker 's  प्लेस  with Joey in the February 1982  एपीसोड  `` Gloria Comes Home . ''
In this episode , Joey was played by Christopher Johnston .
Joey Stivic was  a  regular character on the All in the Family spin-off  श्रेणी  Gloria in 1982 and 1983 .
On this series , in which the now-divorced  ग्लोरिया  Bunker character  था  moved to Upstate New York in order to work as an assistant veterinarian ,  the  part of Joey Stivic was played by ten-year-old actor Christian Jacobs .
After Gloria  थी  canceled in 1983 , Joey Stivic disappeared from  प्रधान   समय  television for 11 years , until the character made one last appearance on 704  hauser  ,  a  short-lived 1994 series about a black family who had moved  into  the old Bunker home , years after  बंकर  had sold  it  .
In this appearance , the Joey Stivic character was played by Casey Siemaszko , an actor born in 1961  (  14 years before Joey Stivic 's fictional birth ) .
In 1976  the  Ideal Toy Company released a 14-inch `` Joey Stivic doll ''  (  called `` Archie Bunker 's Grandson '' ) which was billed as the `` first anatomically correct male  गुड़िया  . ''
The doll inspired  mild  controversy at the time , and is a collectors  '  item today .
The 2011 Rose Bowl was the 97th edition of the annual  कटोरी  game played on January 1 , 2011 , as part of the  2010  college football season .
Played in Pasadena , California ,  the  TCU Horned Frogs of the Mountain West Conference defeated  the  Wisconsin Badgers  of  the Big Ten Conference  by  a  स्कोर  of  21  – 19 .
The Pasadena Tournament of Roses  संघ   थी   the  organizer of the game .
vizio  Inc.  थी  the corporate sponsor and the game was officially named `` The Rose Bowl  खेल  presented by Vizio '' .
This game marked the first time a team  इससे  a non-Automatic Qualifying Conference played in , and  जीती  , the  रोज़  Bowl in its 97 years .
The contest was broadcast on cable television station ESPN with a radio broadcast on ESPN Radio and XM Satellite Radio and ESPN3 streaming video over the internet .
Coverage began at 1:30 PM ( PST ) with kickoff  at  2:10 PM ( PST ) .
इस  marked the first time that the game was  नहीं  broadcast  nationally  `` over-the-air '' ( terrestrial television ) since the games prior to the 1952 Rose Bowl , which was the first nationally televised college football game .
The Rose Bowl Game , themed Building Dreams , Friendships , & Memories , was a contractual  sell-out  , with 64,500 tickets allocated to the participating teams  और  conferences .
टिकट  prices  लिये  all seats in the Rose Bowl are listed  at  $ 145 .
The remaining tickets went to the Tournament of Roses members , sponsors , City of Pasadena residents , and the general public .
The Rose Bowl stadium capacity is listed at approximately 91,000  .
The Declaration of Independence is  a  statement adopted  by  the Continental Congress on July 4 , 1776 , which announced that the thirteen  अमरीकी  colonies ,  तब  at war with Great Britain , regarded themselves as independent states , and no longer a part of the British Empire .
Instead they now formed a new nation—the United States of America .
John  एडम्स  was a leader in pushing for independence , which was  unanimously  approved on  जुलाई  2 .
A committee had already drafted the formal declaration , to be ready when  कॉंग्रेस  voted on independence .
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to  लिखें  the original draft of the document , which congress would edit to produce the  फाइनल  version .
The Declaration was ultimately a formal explanation of  क्यों  Congress  था  voted on July 2 to declare independence from Great Britain , more than a year after the  outbreak  of  the  American Revolutionary War  .
The  नेशनल  birthday  ,  the Independence Day is celebrated on July  4  , although Adams wanted July 2 .
After ratifying the text on July 4 ,  कॉंग्रेस  issued the Declaration of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside that was widely distributed and read to the  पब्लिक   .
The  सबसे  famous version of the Declaration  ,  a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the  घोषणा  of Independence , is displayed at  the  National Archives in Washington , D.C .
हालांकि  the wording of the Declaration was approved on July 4 , the date of its signing was August 2 .
The original July 4 United States Declaration of Independence manuscript was lost  जबकि  all other copies have been derived from this original document  .
The sources and interpretation of  the  Declaration have been the subject of much  scholarly  inquiry .
the  Declaration justified the independence of  the  United States  by  listing colonial grievances against  किंग  George III  ,  and by asserting certain natural and legal rights , including a right  of  revolution .
Having served its original purpose in announcing independence , the text of the Declaration was initially ignored after the American Revolution .
Since then , it has  आइये   to  be considered  a  major statement on human  अधिकारों  , particularly its second sentence:
We hold  ये  truths to be self-evident , that all  मेन  are created equal , that they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable  अधिकारों   ,  that among  ये  are Life , Liberty and  the  pursuit  of  Happiness .
This has been called `` one of the best-known  वाक्य  in the English language '' , containing `` the most potent and consequential words in American history  .  ''
The passage came to represent  a   moral  standard to which the United States should strive .
This view  थी  notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln , who considered the  घोषणा  to be the foundation of  उसके  political philosophy  ,  and argued  कि  the Declaration  is   a  statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be  interpreted  .
It has inspired work for  the  rights of marginalized people throughout the world .
Chitty Chitty Bang Bang is a  1968  British musical film loosely based on Ian Fleming  's   अनोखा   .
The film 's script is by Roald  dahl  and Ken Hughes  और  its songs by the Sherman Brothers .
It stars Dick Van Dyke as Caractacus Potts and Sally Ann Howes as Truly  scrumptious  .
The film was directed by Ken Hughes and produced by Albert R. Broccoli ( co-producer of the James Bond  श्रेणी  of  films  , also based on Fleming 's novels ) .
John Stears supervised the special effects .
Irwin Kostal supervised and conducted the music , while the musical numbers were staged  by  Marc Breaux and Dee Dee Wood .
a  region is arid when it  is  characterized by a severe lack of  उपलब्धियाँ  water ,  to  the extent of hindering or preventing the growth and  विकास  of plant and animal  जीवन  .
Environments subject to arid climates tend  to  lack vegetation and are called xeric or desertic .
सबसे  `` arid '' climates surround the equator ; these places include most  of  Africa and parts of South America and  सेंट्रल   अमेरिका  .
Cancer (  ♋  ) is  an   astrological  sign , which is associated with the constellation Cancer .
it  spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac , between 90  और  125.25 degree of celestial longitude , which the Sun transits this  क्षेत्रफल  on average between June  22  to July 22 each year .
And  अंतर्गत  the sidereal zodiac , it is currently from July 21 to August 9 .
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential election ,  आयोजित   on  Tuesday  ,  November 8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party nominated incumbent Vice-President Richard Nixon , while the Democratic Party nominated John F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President , Republican Dwight  D.  Eisenhower , was  नहीं  eligible for re-election after serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes , or 0.17 % of  the  popular vote , giving him a victory of 303 to 219  in   the  Electoral College , the closest since 1916 .
This was the first election in which all fifty of the current United States participated .
A number of  कारकों  explain why the election was so close .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which hurt the incumbent  रिपब्लिकन  ,  और  he had the advantage of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans .
Furthermore , the new votes that Kennedy gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants .
Kennedy  's  campaigning skills decisively outmatched  निक्सन  's .
In the end ,  निक्सन   's  emphasis on his experience carried little weight , and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of  concentrating  on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination , secure endorsements , and , with the aid of the last of  the  big-city  bosses  , to get out  the  vote in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon B.  जॉनसन  to  थाम  the South  और  used  टेलीविज़न  effectively .
This election is notable  as  being the first  समय  in U.S. history that two sitting  u.s  .  सीनेटरों  (  कैनेडी  and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president , a phenomenon that has been repeated once  ,  by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in  दोनो  cases , the president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
Sherwood is a city in Washington County  ,  Oregon , United States .
Located in  the  southeast corner of the county , it is a residential community in the Tualatin Valley southwest of Portland .
The population was 11,791 at the 2000 census  .
According to the 2010 census ,  the  population was 18,205 residents .
Indirectly named for  the  Sherwood Forest in England ,  it  was first incorporated in 1893 as a town .
The USA PATRIOT Act of 2001 is an Act of the U.S. Congress that was signed into law by President George W. Bush on October 26 , 2001 .
The title of the act  is   a  ten letter acronym ( USA PATRIOT ) that  स्टैंड  for Uniting ( and ) Strengthening America (  by  )  providing  Appropriate  टूल्स  Required ( to  )   इंटरफेस   (  and  )  Obstruct Terrorism Act of  2001  .
The act ,  as  a response to the terrorist attacks of September 11th , significantly  घटाया  restrictions in law enforcement  एजेंसियों  ' gathering of intelligence within the United States ; expanded the Secretary of the Treasury’s authority to regulate financial transactions , particularly those involving foreign  individuals  and entities ; and broadened the discretion of law enforcement and immigration authorities in detaining and deporting immigrants suspected of terrorism-related acts .
The act also expanded the definition of terrorism to include domestic terrorism , thus enlarging the number of activities to which the USA PATRIOT Act’s expanded law enforcement powers can be applied .
On  may  26  ,  2011 , President Barack Obama used an  autopen  to sign the PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of 2011 , a four-year extension of  तीन  key  प्रावधानों  in the USA PATRIOT Act while he was  in  France : roving  wiretaps  ,  खोज  of business records ( the `` library records provision  ``  ) , and conducting surveillance of `` lone wolves '' — individuals  suspected  of terrorist-related activities not linked to terrorist groups .
Republican leaders questioned if the use of  the  Autopen met the constitutional  आवश्यकताएँ  for  हस्ताक्षर  a bill into  विधि  .
a  house  in  Queen Anne style at 223  एवेन्यू  A .
snohomish  is a city in  snohomish  County , Washington , United States .
The population was 9,098 at  the   2010  census .
The mayor of Snohomish is Karen Guzak , and the City Manager  is  Larry Bauman .
Snohomish prides itself for its historical downtown , and was once known for its many antique shops when  it  was known as the `` Antique Capital of the Northwest . ''
The historic business and residential center of the town constitutes  the  Snohomish  ऐतिहासिक  District , which is listed  on  the National Register of Historic Places .
Many houses bear plaques with the year the house was  निर्मित  and the name of the family or individual who originally occupied it .
Once every year  ,  the city gives  टुर  of the historic houses ; one of them , the  blackman  House , is a year-round  संग्रहालय  .
a  general aviation airfield ,  घनघोर  Airfield , is less than one mile southwest of Downtown Snohomish  .
Dave Matthews Band ( DMB ) is an American rock band that was formed  in  Charlottesville  ,  Virginia , United States , in 1991 .
The founding members were singer-songwriter and  guitarist  Dave Matthews ,  bassist  Stefan Lessard  ,  drummer /backing vocalist Carter Beauford  और  saxophonist LeRoi Moore .
Boyd Tinsley was added to the  बैंड  as a violinist  जल्द   बाद   the  band was formed .
Moore died suddenly in August 2008 due to complications from injuries sustained in an ATV accident .
GRAMMY Award -winner Jeff Coffin of Béla Fleck and the Flecktones has since filled Moore 's spot as  the  band 's saxophonist .
Rashawn Ross and Tim Reynolds have also become  full-time  touring members of the band .
The band 's 2009 album Big Whiskey  और  the GrooGrux King ( the  पहला   एल्बम  since Moore 's death ) debuted at  क्रमांक  one  on  the Billboard 200 , earning the band their fifth  लगातार  number-one debut— making them the second band behind Metallica to do so .
Their most recent album , Away from the World , was released in  2012  , and also debuted at number one on the Billboard chart .
as  of 2010  ,  the Dave Matthews Band has sold over 30 million records worldwide .
The band is known for their annual summer-long tours of the United States and Europe  ,  featuring lengthy improvisational  renditions  of their songs , accompanied by an  विस्तृत  video and lighting show .
This portion  of  the tour has become  a  stamp of DMB and has grown with the band since Fenton Williams began working with them  in   the  early 1990s .
After twenty consecutive years of  touring  the band announced  कि  it would take the summer of 2011 off .
Dave Matthews Band has won one GRAMMY  पुरस्कार  , and was awarded the NAACP Chairman 's Award .
According to  जूलियन  Bond , `` they sell  आउट  the  largest  arenas  on   धरती  , but frequently give their music away . ''
Transcendental Wild Oats : A Chapter from an Unwritten Romance is a prose satire written by Louisa May Alcott , about her family 's involvement with the Transcendentalist community Fruitlands in the early 1840s .
the  work was first  प्रकाशित  in a New York newspaper in 1873 , and reprinted in 1874 , 1876 , and 1915 and  बाद   .
In her account , Alcott provides the real people involved with thin pseudonymous disguises .
Her father Amos Bronson Alcott is `` Abel Lamb , '' while his partner  और  community co-founder Charles Lane is `` Timon Lion ; '' Abigail May Alcott , Louisa  's  mother and  bronson  's wife  ,  is `` Sister  आशा  . ''
Alcott depicts her father as  वर्चस्व  by his more forceful partner , and both men as  लापरवाह  and impractical dreamers .
The men of  the  community spend their time in pointless debates while  सिस्टर  Hope works from dawn to  संध्या  to maintain their existence .
A crisis arises at harvest time , when the grain crop is threatened by  an  approaching storm .
In Alcott  's  words , `` About the time the  अनाज  was ready to  हाउस  , some call of the Oversoul wafted all the men away . ''
Sister Hope organizes the only  उपलब्धियाँ  help ,  तीन  little  लड़कियों  and a boy , and manages to save the  क्रॉप  .
The  छोटी  community collapses as soon as the weather  turns  cold , when it becomes clear that their provisions are too  meager  to last  the  coming winter .
Timon Lion and his son abscond to join the Shakers — though Timon is unhappy to learn that life among  उन्हें  is  ``   सब   कार्य  and no play . ''
Abel is crushed by  the  failure  of  the  एंटरप्राइज़  ; after days of despair  he   begins  to eat again only when he realizes that his family needs him .
Sister Hope finds a way for them to subsist  और  persevere .
Alcott 's view of male arrogance and female exploitation in this piece is paralleled  in  her novel , published  in  the same  साल  as `` Transcendental Wild Oats  .  ''
`` Transcendental Wild Oats '' has been reprinted in several modern editions .
Mount of  the  Holy Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot mountain in the Sawatch Range , part of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado .
It is located in the Holy Cross Wilderness near the ghost town of Holy Cross City and in Eagle  काउंटी   .
It was named for the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the northeast face  .
Under USDA  वन  Service administration ,  the  mountain was proclaimed ``  पावन   क्रॉस  National Monument '' by Herbert Hoover on May 11 , 1929 .
The monument was transferred to the National Park Service in 1933 .
In 1950 , it was returned to  the  Forest Service and lost its National Monument status—the number of visitors to  the  mountain and the  आसपास  `` Pilgrim 's Hut '' had waned , and the  व्यय  of full-time staff could not be justified .
This mountain has been the subject of  चित्रकार  , photographers and even a poem  by  Henry Wadsworth Longfellow , ( The Cross of  हिम  ) .
The first publicly available photograph was published in National Geographic  पत्रिका  .
थामस  Moran depicted the  पहाड़  in an oil  पेंटिंग  , which now is part of the collection of  the  Museum of the American  वेस्ट  , part of the Autry National Center in Los Angeles , California .
It is still much  photographed  but it is not  as  well known  आज  as  it  was in the past  .
आसपास  features include Bowl of Tears Lake , directly under the east  फेस  of the peak , Tuhare Lakes , in a cirque that lies south of a significant subpeak , and several other lakes .
Notable locations within include the Dotsero volcano ( near  अंतरराज्यीय  70 ) , Vail and Aspen .
US 24 runs  निकट  the peak through Gilman  .
Photochrom  छपाई  of Mount of  the  Holy Cross  c.  1900 .
This image is a reversed view of  the  mountain compared to how it actually  appears   .
the  first  अंकित  ascent  of  Holy Cross was  in  1873 , by F. V. Hayden and photographer W. H. Jackson during one  of  Hayden 's geographical surveys .
However , the  शिखर  may well have been ascended previously by miners or American Indians .
The first winter ascent of the peak was made in 1943 by Russel Keene and Howard Freedman of the 10th Mountain  प्रभाग  , then  stationed  at Camp Hale .
Holy Cross can be climbed by at least  चार  different routes , with the easiest and most common route being the North Ridge  ,  which involves of vertical gain over and is rated YDS Class 2 for moderate  scrambling  .
The Cross Couloir route forms the vertical  portion  of the famous cross  विशेषता  , and provides  an  advanced snow climb or extreme ski descent  .
Mount of the Holy  क्रॉस  has a history of endangering the lives of many hikers .
Primarily , the hikers who require rescue are unfamiliar with  the  risks of entering wilderness areas and do not bring adequate equipment and supplies to respond to emergency conditions .
Although the  समिट  on Mount of the Holy Cross is frequently  पहुँचे  on a long day  hike  , unprepared hikers are frequently stranded or lost due to changing environmental conditions and confusion regarding the surrounding landscape , especially on the descent of  उत्तर  Ridge .
Thorough research and reasonable planning should prevent most tragedies .
Mount of the Holy cross  is  accessible from Tigiwon Road ,  दक्षिण  of Minturn , Colorado .
The Half Moon Pass Trail is the standard route to the summit of Mount of  the  Holy Cross via  the  North Ridge .
Following the Fall Creek Trail to an ascent of Notch Mountain Trail provides the best view of the Holy Cross snow feature from Notch Mountain Ridge .
The GSM logo is  प्रयुक्त  to  पहचानो  compatible  handsets   और  equipment
जीएसएम  ( Global System for Mobile Communications , originally ' ) , is a standard  नियत  developed by the European Telecommunications Standards  संस्थान  ( ETSI  )  to describe protocols for second  पीढी  (  2g  ) digital cellular networks  प्रयुक्त  by mobile  फोन  .
It became the de facto global standard for mobile communications with over 80 % market share .
The  जीएसएम  standard was developed as a replacement for first generation ( 1G ) analog cellular networks , and originally described a digital , circuit switched network optimized for full duplex voice telephony  .
This was expanded over time to include data communications ,  पहला   by  circuit switched transport , then packet data transport via GPRS ( General Packet Radio Services ) and EDGE (  उन्नत  Data rates for GSM Evolution or EGPRS ) .
further  improvements were  बना  when the 3GPP developed third generation ( 3G ) UMTS standards followed by fourth generation  (  4G ) LTE Advanced standards .
`` GSM '' is a trademark owned  by  the GSM Association .
President Franklin D. Roosevelt  लक्षण  the Lend-Lease bill to give  सहायता  to Britain and China ( 1941 )
The Lend Lease act  थी  an act where the United States had supported its allies .
Lend-Lease (  )  was the law that started a program  अंतर्गत   जिससे  the United States of America  supplied  the United Kingdom , the USSR , Republic of China , Free  फ़्रांस  , and other  अलाइड  nations  साथ  materiel between 1941 and 1945 .
It was signed into law on March 11  ,  1941 , a year  और   a  half  बाद  the outbreak of World War II in Europe in September 1939 .
This was nine months before the U.S. entered the war  in  December  1941   .
Formally titled An Act to Further Promote the Defense of  the  United States , the Act effectively ended the United States ' pretense of neutrality .
A total of $ 50 .1 billion ( equivalent to  $  today ) worth  of  supplies were shipped : $ 31.4 billion to Britain , $ 11.3 billion  to  the Soviet Union , $ 3.2 billion to France , $ 1.6 billion to China , and smaller sums to other Allies .
Reverse Lend-Lease comprised  सेवाएं  such as rent on air bases that went to the U.S. , and totaled $ 7.8 billion ; of this ,  $  6.8 billion came from the British and the Commonwealth .
The terms of the agreement provided that the materiel was to be  प्रयुक्त  until time for  उनके  return or  विनाश  .
Supplies after the  termination  date were sold to Britain at a  विशाल  discount for £1 .075 billion using  long-term  loans from the United States .
Canada operated a similar program that sent $ 4.7 billion in  आपूर्तियाँ  to the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union .
The United States did not charge  लिये  aid supplied  अंतर्गत  this legislation  .
This program was a decisive step away from  non-interventionist  policy  ,   जिससे  had dominated United States foreign relations since the end  of  World War I , towards international involvement .
The Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ) , also called sunroot ,  sunchoke  , earth  ठहराना  or  topinambour  , is  a  species  of  sunflower native to eastern North America  ,  and found from eastern Canada and Maine west to North Dakota ,  और  south to northern Florida and Texas .
It is also cultivated  widely  across the  शीतोष्ण  zone for its tuber , which is used as a root vegetable  .
Castillo San Felipe del Morro also known  as  Fort San Felipe del  morro  or Morro  किला  , is  a  16th-century citadel located in San Juan  ,  Puerto Rico .
Stonehenge is a  प्रागैतिहासिक  monument in Wiltshire , England , about west of Amesbury  और  north of Salisbury .
One  of  the most famous sites in the world , Stonehenge  is   the  remains of a ring of standing stones set within earthworks .
it  is in the middle of the most dense complex of Neolithic and Bronze  आयु  monuments in England ,  सहित  several hundred burial mounds .
Archaeologists believe it was  निर्मित  anywhere from 3000 BC to 2000 BC .
Radiocarbon dating  in  2008 suggested that the first  पत्थरों  were raised between 2400 and 2200 BC , whilst another theory suggests that bluestones may have been raised at the site as  जल्दी  as 3000  bc  .
The surrounding circular earth bank and ditch , which constitute the  earliest  phase of the monument , have been dated to about  3100  BC .
The site and its surroundings were added  to  the UNESCO 's  सूची   of   संसार  Heritage  साइट  in 1986 in a  co-listing  with Avebury Henge .
It is a national legally protected Scheduled Ancient Monument .
Stonehenge is owned by the Crown and managed by English Heritage , while the surrounding land is owned by the National Trust .
Archaeological evidence found by the Stonehenge Riverside  प्रोजेक्ट  in 2008 indicates that Stonehenge could have been a burial ground from its earliest beginnings .
The dating of cremated remains found on the  साईट  indicate that  जमा   contain  human bone from as early as 3000 BC , when the ditch and bank were first dug .
Such deposits continued at Stonehenge for at least another 500 years .
The  साईट  is a place of religious significance and pilgrimage  in  Neo-Druidry .
the  NCAA Women 's Division I Championship is an  सालाना  college basketball  टूर्नामेंट  for women .
Held each April , the Women 's Championship was inaugurated in the 1981–82 season .
the  NCAA tournament was preceded by the AIAW Women 's Basketball Tournament , which was held annually from 1972 to 1982 .
Basketball was one of twelve women 's sports added to the NCAA  चैंपियनशिप  program for the 1981-82  स्कूल  year ,  as  the NCAA engaged in battle with the Association for Intercollegiate Athletics for Women for sole governance of  महिलाओं  's  कॉलेजिएट   खेल  .
The AIAW continued to conduct its established championship program in the  वही  twelve ( and  अन्य  ) sports ; however ,  बाद  a year of dual  महिलाओं  's championships , the NCAA prevailed , while the AIAW disbanded .
Attendance and interest in the  महिलाओं  's Division I  चैंपियनशिप  have grown over the years , especially since 2003 , when the final championship game was moved to the Tuesday following the Monday men 's championship game  .
The women 's championship game is now the final overall game of the college basketball season .
पहले  that  ,  the Women 's Final Four was usually played on the Friday before the Men 's Final Four or the hours  पहले  the men played on the final Saturday of  the  tournament .
The final was usually played  the  Sunday afternoon following the Men 's Final Four .
The tournament bracket is made up of champions from each  प्रभाग  I conference , which receive  स्वचालित  bids .
The remaining slots are  at-large  bids , with teams chosen by an NCAA  चयन  committee .
The selection process and tournament seedings are based on several factors , including team  rankings  , win-loss records and Ratings Percentage  अनुक्रमणिका  ( RPI ) data .
नापसंद  the men 's tournament , there are only 32 at-large bids (  as  of the next tournament in 2014 ) , and no play-in game .
the   महिलाओं   's  tournament , like the men 's , is staged in a single elimination format , and is part of  the   मीडिया  and  पब्लिक  frenzy known colloquially as March Madness or The Big Dance .
All 63 games have been broadcast on television since 2003 on ESPN  और  ESPN2 .
Similar to the pre-2011 men 's  टूर्नामेंट  coverage on CBS , local teams are shown on  प्रत्येक  channel when available , with `` whip-around '' coverage designed  to   शोकेस  the most competitive contests in the rest of the country .
The Rosetta Stone in the British Museum
The Rosetta Stone is an  प्राचीन  Egyptian granodiorite stele inscribed with a decree  जारी  at Memphis in  196  BC on behalf  of  King Ptolemy V .
The decree appears in three scripts : the upper text  is   प्राचीन  Egyptian hieroglyphs  ,  the middle portion Demotic  स्क्रिप्ट  , and the lowest Ancient Greek .
Because it presents essentially the same text in all three scripts ( with some minor differences between them ) , it provided the  कुंजी  to the modern understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs .
Originally displayed within a temple , the stone was probably moved during the early Christian or  मध्यकालीन  period and  आखिरकार  used as building material in the construction of  फोर्ट   जुलिएन  near the town of Rashid ( Rosetta ) in the Nile Delta .
It was  rediscovered  there in 1799  by  a soldier , Pierre-François Bouchard , of the French expedition to Egypt .
As the  पहला  Ancient Egyptian bilingual text recovered in modern times ,  the  Rosetta  स्टोन  aroused widespread public  ब्याज  with its potential to decipher this hitherto untranslated ancient language .
Lithographic  नक़ल  and plaster casts began  circulating  among European museums and scholars .
Meanwhile , British troops  पराजित  the French  in  Egypt in  1801  , and  the  original stone came into British  कब्ज़ा  under the Capitulation of Alexandria .
Transported to London ,  it  has been on public display at the British Museum since 1802 .
It  is  the most-visited object in the British Museum .
Ever since its rediscovery , the stone has been the focus of nationalist rivalries , including its transfer from French to British possession during the Napoleonic Wars  ,  a long-running dispute over the relative value of Young 's and Champollion 's contributions to  the  decipherment , and since 2003 , demands for the  स्टोन   's  return to Egypt .
Study of the decree was already under way as the first full  अनुवाद  of the Greek text appeared in 1803 .
It was 20 years , however , before the transliteration  of   the  Egyptian scripts was announced by Jean-François Champollion in Paris in 1822 ; it took longer still before scholars were able to read Ancient Egyptian inscriptions and literature confidently .
Major advances  in  the decoding were : recognition that the stone offered three versions of the same text ( 1799 ) ; that the demotic text  प्रयुक्त  phonetic characters to spell foreign  names  ( 1802 ) ; that the hieroglyphic text did so as well , and  था  pervasive  similarities  to the demotic ( Thomas Young , 1814 ) ; and that , in  जोड   to  being used for foreign names  ,  phonetic characters were also used to spell native Egyptian words ( Champollion , 1822–1824 ) .
Two other fragmentary copies of the same decree were discovered later , and several  समान  Egyptian bilingual or trilingual  inscriptions  are now known  ,  including two slightly earlier  ptolemaic  decrees ( the Decree of Canopus in 238 BC , and the Memphis decree  of  Ptolemy IV , ca .  218  BC ) .
the  Rosetta Stone is therefore no longer  अद्वितीय  , but it was the essential key to modern understanding of Ancient Egyptian  साहित्य   और  civilization .
the  term Rosetta Stone is now used in other  contexts  as the name for the essential clue  to  a new field of knowledge .
Poison dart frog (  भी  dart-poison frog ,  ज़हर  frog or formerly poison arrow frog ) is the common name of a  समूह  of frogs in the family Dendrobatidae which are  देशी  to Central and South America .
These species are diurnal and often have brightly colored bodies .
Although all wild  dendrobatids  are at least somewhat toxic , levels of toxicity vary considerably from one species to the next  और  from one population to another .
Many  प्रजाति  are threatened .
These amphibians are often called `` dart frogs  ''  due to the Amerindians ' indigenous use of  उनके  to poison the tips of blowdarts .
However , of over 175 species , only four have been documented as being used for this purpose  (  curare plants are more commonly used ) , all of which come from the Phyllobates genus , which is characterized by the relatively  विशाल  size and high  स्तर  of toxicity of its members .
Cajeta is a Mexican confection of thickened syrup usually made of sweetened  caramelised  milk .
According to chef Rick Bayless , the name for cajeta came from the Spanish phrase al  punto  de cajeta , which means `` a liquid thickened to the point at which a spoon drawn  through  the liquid reveals the bottom of the pot in  जिससे  it  is  being cooked '' .
Another hypothesis is that it takes its name  इससे  the small wooden boxes in which it was traditionally packed .
Mexican cajeta is considered a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state of Guanajuato , although  it  is also produced with the traditional method in several towns of the state of Jalisco ,  ऐसे  as Mazamitla , Sayula , and  atotonilco  el Alto .
Cajeta is made by simmering goat 's  मिल्क  , or occasionally a sweetened liquid ,  stirring   अक्सर  , until it becomes very viscous due to evaporation of water , and caramelized .
While goat milk is the most usual base , other liquids or juices may be used .
In Celaya , and eventually the rest of Mexico , the confection of half goat 's milk and half cow 's milk became known by the name cajeta , but  elsewhere  , the milk candy became known as leche quemada , dulce  de  leche  ,  etc .
It has cousins in the many  भारतीय  milk-based sweets like  प्रभा  and the milk fudge burfi , and in the opera fudge of the U.S. Cajeta is eaten on its own as a sweet , as a spread or  भरना  for breads and  pastries  , such as churros ,  और  as a topping  लिये  ice cream .
Certain liquors are added to special recipes called cajeta envinada .
In addition , cajeta envinada especial is enriched with raisins  ,  almonds , pecans or  nuts   .
Often it is  प्रयुक्त  as a topping for crêpes  ,  as a sweet sauce boiled and softened down with milk to soak the crepes  ,  resulting in a  स्वादिष्ट  dessert .
In Mexico many brands make cajeta but the most common brand is Coronado .
It is also very common to place cajeta between obleas to make a  परंपरागत  Mexican dessert  .
Prince William , Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) , is the elder son of Charles ,  प्रिंस  of Wales , and Diana , Princess of Wales , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and  प्रिंस  Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in the line  of  succession , behind  उसके  father , to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms  :  the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand ,  जमैका  , Barbados , The Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint  लूसिया  , Saint  विंसेंट  and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua  और  Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at four schools in  the  United Kingdom and obtained a degree from  the   विश्वविद्यालयों  of St Andrews .
he  spent parts of a gap year  in  Chile , Belize , Tanzania , and Kenya  जहाँ  he has lived and holidayed several times .
Prince William has also taken Kiswahili studies at universities in Kenya and  तंजानिया  .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with  उसके  brother Prince Harry —and , two  सालो  later , earned his wings by completing pilot training  at  Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
In 2009 , he transferred to the Royal  एयर  Force , was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying  प्रशिक्षण  in order  to  become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force  .
In 2010 , he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training and  गई   on  to RAF Valley on No . 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea  किंग  search and rescue helicopter  .
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend , Catherine Middleton , on 29  अप्रैल  2011 at Westminster Abbey .
Hours prior to his wedding , Prince William was created  ड्यूक   of  Cambridge , Earl of Strathearn , and Baron Carrickfergus .
Mali is a multilingual country .
The languages spoken there reflect ancient settlement patterns , migrations , and its long history .
Ethnologue counts 50 languages .
Of these , French is the official language and Bambara is the most widely spoken .
altogether  13 of the indigenous languages of Mali have the legal  औकात  of national  भाषा  .
Sign in French , at  a  monument in Bamako  .

9 – 12 February  (  Vietnam )
Rogers Building ,  the  headquarters  of  Rogers Communications
Rogers Communications  inc.  is a diversified public Canadian communications and  मीडिया  company .
It is particularly in the field of wireless  संचार   ,  cable television  ,   टेलीफोन  , and Internet connectivity  साथ  significant additional  दूरसंचार  and mass media assets .
The company is headquartered in the Rogers Building in Toronto , Ontario .
The company claims the  विरासत  of the Rogers Vacuum Tube Company , founded  in  1925 by Edward Rogers  ,  which started the CFRB radio station in Toronto , which was later acquired by outside interests .
The present  एंटरप्राइज़  dates to 1960 ,  जब  Rogers ' son ,  टेड  Rogers , founded Rogers Radio Broadcasting Ltd .
That company acquired CHFI that year , as well as Aldred-Rogers  प्रसारण  ,  a  partnership with Joel Aldred which helped launch CFTO in 1961 .
Rogers later bought out Aldred and started the current  केबल   और  wireless operations , known as  रोजर्स  Cablesystems Ltd .
The  मुख्य  competitor to the company is Bell Canada , which has a similarly extensive portfolio of  रेडियो  and television media assets , as well as wireless , television  वितरण  , and telephone services , particularly in Eastern and Central Canada ;  the  two companies are often seen as having a duopoly on communications services in their regions  .
However , the company  भी  competes nationally with Telus for wireless services , and primarily indirectly with Shaw Communications for television service  .
The company also competes with a number of other media companies in the broadcasting industry .
the  Internet is a global system  of  interconnected computer networks that use the standard Internet protocol suite (  tcp/ip  ) to serve billions of users worldwide .
It is a network of networks that consists  of  millions of private , public , academic , business , and government networks , of local to global scope , that are linked by a broad array of electronic  ,  wireless and optical networking technologies .
The Internet carries an extensive range of information resources and  सेवाएं  , such as the inter-linked hypertext  दस्तावेज़  of the World Wide Web ( WWW  )  and the infrastructure to support email .
Most traditional  संचार  media including telephone , music , film , and television are being  reshaped  or redefined by the Internet , giving birth to new services such as voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) and  अंतरजाल  Protocol television ( IPTV ) .
Newspaper , book and other print publishing are  adapting  to Web site technology , or are reshaped into blogging and web feeds .
The Internet has  सक्रिय  and accelerated new  फ़ॉर्म  of human interactions through instant messaging , Internet forums , and social networking .
Online shopping has boomed both for major retail  आउटलेट  and small  शिल्पकार  and traders .
Business-to-business and financial  सेवाएं  on  the  Internet affect supply chains across entire industries .
The origins of the Internet reach back to research commissioned by the United States government in the 1960s to build robust , fault-tolerant communication via computer networks .
The funding of a new U.S. backbone by the National Science Foundation  in  the 1980s , as well  as  private  funding  for other commercial backbones , led to worldwide participation in the development of new networking technologies , and the merger of many networks .
The commercialization  of   कया  was by  the  1990s an international network resulted in its popularization and incorporation into virtually every aspect of modern human  जीवन  .
, more than 2.4 billion people—over a third of the world 's human population —have used the services of  the  Internet ; approximately  100  times more people than were using  it  in 1995 , when it was mostly  प्रयुक्त  by tech-savvy middle and upper class people in the United States  और  several  अन्य  countries .
the  Internet has no centralized governance in either technological implementation or policies for access and usage ; each constituent network sets its own policies .
Only the overreaching definitions of the two principal name spaces in the Internet , the Internet Protocol address space and the Domain Name System , are directed by a maintainer organization , the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers ( ICANN ) .
the  technical underpinning and  मानकीकरण  of the  कोर   प्रोटोकॉल  ( IPv4 and IPv6 ) is an activity of the Internet Engineering Task Force ( IETF  )  , a non-profit organization  of  loosely affiliated  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  participants that anyone  may  associate with by contributing technical expertise .
The 2006 Winter Olympics , officially known as the XX Olympic Winter Games , was a winter multi-sport event which was celebrated in Turin , Italy from February  10  , 2006 ,  through  February 26 , 2006 .
This marked the second time  इटली  hosted the Olympic Winter Games , the first  होने  the  सात  Olympic Winter Games in Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956 .
Italy  भी  hosted  the  Games of the XVII Olympiad in Rome in 1960 .
Turin was selected as the host city  लिये  the 2006 games in 1999 .
The official logo displayed the name `` Torino '' , the Italian name of the city ; the city is known as `` Turin '' in both English and the local traditional language  ,  Piedmontese  .
The Olympic mascots of Torino 2006 were Neve ( `` snow '' in Italian ) , a female snowball , and Gliz ,  a  male ice cube .
The official motto  of   the  XX Olympic Winter Games was ``  जुनून  lives here '' .

It was also released as a single , and was number  एक   लिये  three weeks  in  both the United States and the United Kingdom .

During an interview with Playboy in 1984 , Paul McCartney stated that the title was ``  आउट  of desperation '' .

Siegfried Bing ( 26 February 1838 –  6  September 1905 ) , who usually gave his name as S. Bing , and was thus often referenced erroneously  as  `` Samuel Bing '' ( Samuel Otto Bing , 1850–1905 , was  उसके  brother ) was a German art dealer who lived in Paris as an  वयस्क  , and who helped introduce  जापानी  art and artworks to the West and was a factor in the development of the Art Nouveau style during  the  late  उन्नीसवीं  century .

Kennewick is  a  city in Benton County  in  the southeastern part of the U.S. state of Washington , near the Hanford nuclear site .
It is the most  populous  of the three cities collectively referred to as the Tri-Cities (  the  others being Pasco and Richland ) .
Kennewick is located  साथ  the southwest bank of the Columbia River , opposite Pasco and just south  of  the confluence of the Columbia and Yakima rivers .
The population was 73,917 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
April 1 , 2012 estimates from the Washington State Office of  वित्तीय  Management put the city 's population at 75,160  .
The nearest commercial airport is the Tri-Cities Airport in Pasco , a regional commercial and private airport .
Forbes magazine named Kennewick the  #  2 area in the United States for job growth  ,  while nearby Yakima was named # 1 .
The article cites the  क्रमांक  of scientists employed by the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory and  क्षेत्रफल   farmland  for this outlook .
The prothrombin time ( PT )  और   इसके  derived measures of prothrombin  अनुपात  ( PR ) and international normalized ratio ( INR ) are measures of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation .
This test is also called `` ProTime INR '' and `` PT/INR  ''  .
They are used to determine the clotting tendency of blood , in the measure of warfarin dosage  ,  liver damage , and vitamin K status .
PT measures factors I ( fibrinogen ) , II ( prothrombin  )  ,  v  , VII , and  x  .
It is used in conjunction  साथ   the  activated partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT  )   जिससे  measures the intrinsic  pathway  .
`` I 'm in the Mood for Love ''  is  a popular song .
The music was  लिखा  by  jimmy  McHugh , the lyrics  by  Dorothy  फ़ील्ड  .
The  सोंग  was published in 1935 .
It was introduced by Frances Langford in the movie Every Night at Eight released that year .
The song was featured in the 1936 Our Gang (  छोटी  Rascals ) short , The  पिंच  Singer , sung by Carl `` Alfalfa '' Switzer , and in the 1936 film Palm Springs  .
It is often known to be Switzer 's signature song .
James Moody 's saxophone solo on a 1952 recording of this song inspired the song `` Moody 's Mood  लिये  Love `` .
Hip hop artist Prince Paul sampled the song as the basis for the track `` Mood for Love '' on his album A Prince Among Thieves (  1999   )  , with Don Newkirk singing its original lyrics .
The song 's  शीर्षक  inspired the English title of Wong Kar Wai  's  movie In the  मनोदशा  for Love .
Cross-cultural psychology  is  the scientific study of  इंसान  behavior and mental processes , including both their variability and invariance , under diverse cultural conditions .
Through expanding  शोध  methodologies to recognize cultural variance in  बर्ताव  , language , and  अर्थ   it  seeks  to  extend and develop psychology .
Since psychology as an academic discipline was developed largely in North  अमेरिका  , some  psychologists  became concerned that  constructs  accepted as  सार्वभौमिक  were not as invariant as previously assumed , especially since many attempts to  replicate  notable experiments in  अन्य  cultures had varying success .
Since there are  सवाल  as  to  whether theories dealing with  सेंट्रल  themes , such as affect , cognition  ,  conceptions of the self , and issues such as psychopathology , anxiety , and depression , may lack  बाह्य   वैध  when ``  exported  '' to other cultural contexts , cross-cultural  मनोविज्ञान  re-examines them using methodologies designed to factor in cultural differences so as to account for cultural variance .
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural psychological research and claim that serious shortcomings in the theoretical and methodological bases used impede rather than help the scientific search for universal principles in psychology , cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the  पढ़ाई  of how differences ( variance ) occur , rather than searching for universals in the  स्टाइल  of physics or chemistry .
In 1972 the International Association of Cross-Cultural Psychology ( IACCP  )  was established  .
This branch of psychology has continued to expand as there has been an increasing popularity of incorporating culture and diversity into studies .
Cross-cultural psychology  is   differentiated  from Cultural psychology .
The latter is the branch of psychology that holds that  इंसान  behavior is significantly influenced by cultural differences , meaning that psychological phenomena can only be compared with each other across cultures to  a  very limited extent .
in  contrast , cross-cultural psychology includes a search for possible universals in behavior and mental  प्रक्रियाओं   .
Walter J. Lonner , writing for Eye on Psi Chi , has  stated  that `` cross-cultural psychology can be thought of as a type research methodology ,  बल्कि  than an entirely separate field within psychology  (  2000 ) .  ''
`` Judas '' is  a  song by American recording artist Lady Gaga , from her second studio album Born This  रास्ता  (  2011  ) .
It was  released  by Interscope  रिकॉर्ड  on April 15 , 2011 , four days ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne , `` Judas '' is a dance and electro house song about a woman  in  love with a man who betrayed her .
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the past , and its core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape  .
Gaga has further  समझाया  that the song was also about honoring one 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the  लाइट  .
The artwork  लिये   the  single was designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word  .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the song was generally well  प्राप्त  by critics , who likened the song  to  `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have  महरूम  the album 's lead single .
The song  रै  a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks  ,  including `` Poker  फेस  `` ,  ``   lovegame  `` , ``  ख़राब  Romance  ''   ,  and `` Alejandro `` .
It contains three distinct hooks and a house -influenced break down .
Gaga  समझाया  that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk about her as beyond redemption  ,  regarding the traditional views of what a woman should  be   .
`` Judas ''  initially  had a strong sales opening , but was less successful commercially in  तुलना  to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music markets , and also reached the top of the charts  in  South Korea .
A  म्यूज़िक  video for the  सोंग  was filmed in April 2011 , co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann  गिब्सन  and co-starring Norman Reedus .
It has a Biblical storyline where Reedus played Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene .
The video portrays them as modern day missionaries going to Jerusalem .
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus , and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to  मौत  .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga  लिये  the alleged use of religious imagery and her role in the video .
however  , critics generally praised the  वीडियो   ,  not finding any offensive content .
The video was nominated for two awards  at  the 2011 MTV  वीडियो  Music Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a  क्रमांक  of television shows , including The  ग्राहम  Norton Show , Saturday Night Live  ,  Good Morning Americas `` Summer  कॉन्सर्ट  Series '' , the French X Factor as well as on  the  Ellen DeGeneres Show .
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a  मानक  for video compression , and is currently one of the most commonly used formats for the recording  ,  compression , and distribution of high definition video .
The final drafting work on the first version of the standard  थी  completed in May 2003  .
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -based codec standard developed by the ITU-T Video Coding Experts Group ( VCEG ) together  साथ  the  iso/iec   jtc1  Moving Picture Experts  समूह  ( MPEG ) .
The project partnership effort is known as the Joint  वीडियो  Team ( JVT ) .
The ITU-T H.264 standard and the  iso/iec  MPEG-4  avc  standard ( formally  ,  ISO/IEC 14496-10  –  MPEG-4 Part 10 , Advanced Video Coding ) are jointly maintained so  कि  they have identical technical content  .
H.264 is perhaps best known as being one of the codec standards for  blu-ray  Discs ; all Blu-ray  डिस्क  players must be able to decode H.264 .
It is also widely used by streaming internet sources , such as  वीडियो  from Vimeo ,  youtube  , and the iTunes Store , web software such as the Adobe Flash  खिलाड़ी  and Microsoft Silverlight , and also various HDTV broadcasts over terrestrial ( ATSC , ISDB-T  ,  DVB-T or DVB-T2 ) , cable ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S  और  DVB-S2 ) .
Non-binding arbitration is a  प्रकार  of arbitration in which the arbitrator makes a determination of the rights of the parties to the dispute , but this determination  is  not binding upon them , and no enforceable arbitration award is issued  .
The `` award '' is in effect an advisory  राय  of the arbitrator 's view of the respective merits of  the   पार्टियों  cases .
Non-binding arbitration is  प्रयुक्त  in connection with attempts to  पहुँचें  a  negotiated  settlement .
The role of an arbitrator in non-binding  मध्यस्थता   is  , on the surface , similar to  कि  of  a  mediator in a mediation .
However , the principal distinction is that whereas a mediator will try to help the parties find a middle ground to  सुलह  at , the arbitrator remains totally removed from  the  settlement process and will  तभी  give a determination of liability and , if appropriate , an indication of the quantum of damages payable .
subsequent  to a non-binding  मध्यस्थता  , the parties remain free to pursue their claims  either  through the courts , or by way of a binding  मध्यस्थता  ,  हालांकि  in practice a settlement is the most common outcome .
The award and reasoning  in  a non-binding arbitration is almost invariably inadmissible in any  subsequent  action in the courts or in another arbitration tribunal .
Non-binding arbitration is  utilised  mostly in the United States and Canada  .
It is largely unknown in Europe , although in the United  किंगडम  there is a practice of parties who are seeking a settlement  to  jointly  instruct   a  Queen 's Counsel  लिये  an opinion on  the  merits and likely quantum of  a  claim , and then to negotiate on the basis of the views expressed in that opinion .
Augustine  ज्वालामुखी  is a Lava Dome Complex on Augustine Island in southwestern Cook Inlet in the Kenai Peninsula Borough of southcentral coastal Alaska , southwest of Anchorage .
The Alaska  ज्वालामुखी  Observatory currently rates Mount Augustine as Level of Concern Color  कोड  Green for aviation and the Volcano Alert Level is at Normal .
Augustine Island has a land area of  ,  while West Island  ,  just off  अगस्टाइन  's western shores , has .
The island is made up mainly of past eruption deposits  .
Scientists have been able to discern that past dome collapse has resulted in large  avalanches  .
A map of Belize .
The country of Belize has roughly 386 km  of  coastline , and has  अनेक  coral reefs  ,  cays , and islands in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of these form the Belize Barrier Reef , the longest in the western hemisphere stemming approximately .
The reef and its islands have been  a  UNESCO World Heritage Site  चूंकि  1996 .
The following is a  सूची  of  oceanic  islands of Belize  ,  arranged according to region  लकिन  all of  जिससे  are in the Caribbean Sea .
सबसे  of the islands variate in spelling between `` cay '' and `` caye '' , and also use  the  Spanish `` cayo  ''  .
River islands have not been listed .
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a  discontinued  commercial packet writing application for the Microsoft Windows operating system that allows optical disc data storage devices to be used in a manner similar to floppy disks .
DLA is a packet writing  प्रौद्योगिकी  for CD and DVD media that uses the UDF file system .
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista and newer , although a patch exists to fix this  समस्या  under Windows  विस्टा  .
Roxio Burn was introduced on April 30 , 2009 .
As a replacement  लिये  DLA ,  it   remedies  compatibility issues Internet Explorer 8 .
Alpha Rex Emmanuel Humbard ( August 13 , 1919 – September 21 , 2007 ) was a well-known American television evangelist whose Cathedral of Tomorrow show was  दिखाया   on  over 600 stations  at   the  peak  of  its popularity .
