It is based on the 2001 novel The  अंधेरा  Fields by Alan Glynn with the screenplay by Leslie Dixon .
Alaska ( ) is a  राज्य  in the United  राज्य  , situated in the northwest extremity  of  the North American continent , with the international boundary  साथ   कनाडा  to the east , the Arctic Ocean to the north , and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area , the 4th least populous and the  तनिक   densely  populated of the 50  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
लगभग  half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents  सजीव  within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil  ,  natural gas ,  और  fishing industries ; it  रै  these resources in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from  रूस  on March  30  , 1867 , for  $  7.2 million ( $  समायोजित  for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes  पहले  becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period , when it was used only for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq , meaning `` the mainland ''  or  , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is  भी  known as Alyeska , the `` great land '' , an Aleut word derived from the same  रूट  .
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan  विश्वविद्यालयों  ( NMMU ) is a South African tertiary education institution with its main administration in the coastal city  of  Port Elizabeth .
A  विलय   of  three institutions founded NMMU in January 2005 but  इसके  history dates back to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School .
The University draws international students from all over the world .
There are over 3000 international students and include students from the United States , France , China  ,  Germany , Belgium , Denmark , Finland , Netherlands , Norway , Sweden , United Kingdom and  अनेक   अन्य  countries .
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering professional and vocational  प्रशिक्षण  .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों   रै  six campuses - five in Port Elizabeth and one in George .
The main campus is the South Campus .
Students  at  NMMU can  पढ़ाई  towards diplomas and degrees up to and including doctoral level qualifications .
a  number of courses include workplace experience as part of the curriculum .
CoverGirl  is  an American cosmetics brand founded in Maryland , by the Noxzema Chemical Company ( later called  noxell  ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989 .
The Noxell Company advertised this  कॉस्मेटिक्स  line by allowing `` cover girls '' , fashion models who appear  on  the front cover of women 's magazines , to wear its products .
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual customer service by providing a wide variety of cosmetics available at reasonable  कीमतें  .
On the Origin of Species , published on 24 November 1859 , is a work of  वैज्ञानिक   साहित्य  by Charles Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology .
Its full title was  on   the  Origin of Species by Means of Natural Selection , or the Preservation of Favoured Races in the Struggle for Life .
For the sixth edition of 1872 , the  छोटी  title was changed to The Origin of Species .
Darwin 's  किताब  introduced the scientific theory that populations evolve over the course of generations through a process of natural selection .
It presented  a  body of evidence that the diversity of life arose by  आम  descent through a branching  पैटर्न  of evolution .
Darwin included  प्रमाण  that he had gathered on  the  Beagle  expedition  in the 1830s and his subsequent findings from research , correspondence , and experimentation .
Various evolutionary ideas  था  already been proposed to explain new findings in biology .
There was growing  support  for  ऐसे   विचार  among dissident anatomists and the  सामान्य  public , but during the first half of the 19th century the English scientific establishment was closely tied to the Church of England ,  जबकि  science  थी  part of natural  धर्मशास्त्र  .
Ideas  परिचय  the  transmutation  of species were controversial as they  विरोधी   साथ  the beliefs that species were unchanging parts of a designed hierarchy and that humans were unique , unrelated to other animals .
The political and theological implications were  पडती  debated , but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream .
The book was written for non-specialist readers and attracted widespread interest upon its publication .
As Darwin was an eminent scientist  ,  his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he presented generated scientific , philosophical , and religious discussion .
The debate over  the  book contributed to  the  campaign by T.H . Huxley and his fellow members of the X Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism .
Within two decades  वहीँ   थी  widespread scientific agreement that evolution , with a branching pattern of common descent , had occurred  ,  but scientists were slow to give natural selection  the  significance that  डार्विन  thought appropriate .
दौरान  the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the 1880s to the 1930s ,  विभिन्न  other mechanisms of evolution were given more credit .
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s  और  1940s , Darwin 's concept of evolutionary adaptation through natural selection became central to  आधुनिक  evolutionary theory , now  the  unifying concept  of  the life sciences .
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' Stengel ( ; July 30 , 1890 – September 29  ,  1975 ) , nicknamed `` The Old  perfessor  '' , was an American  प्रमुख  League Baseball outfielder  और  manager .
He was elected  to  the Baseball Hall  of  Fame in .
Stengel was born in Kansas City , Missouri  ,  and originally nicknamed `` Dutch '' , a common nickname at that time for Americans of German ancestry .
After his major league  करियर  began , he acquired the nickname `` Casey '' , which originally came from the initials of his hometown ( `` K. C.  ''  ) ,  जिससे  evolved into `` Casey '' , influenced by the wide  लोकप्रियता  of the poem Casey at the Bat  .
In the 1950s , sportswriters dubbed him with yet another  उपनाम  , `` The  बूढ़ा   प्राध्यापक  ''  (   or  `` Perfessor '' ) , for his sharp wit and his ability to  बात  at length on anything baseball -related  .
Although his baseball career  spanned  a number of teams and cities  ,  he is primarily  संबद्ध  with clubs in New York City .
Between playing and  मैनेजिंग  , he  is  the only man to have worn  चार  of New York 's major league clubs ' uniforms .
He was the  पहला   of  four men ( through the season ) to manage both the New York Yankees and New  यॉर्क  Mets ; Yogi Berra , Dallas Green  ,  and Joe Torre are the others .
Like Torre , he also managed the Braves and the Dodgers .
He ended his baseball career as the beloved manager for the  तब   विस्तार  New  यॉर्क  Mets , which won over the hearts of New  यॉर्क  partly due to the unique character of their veteran leader .
June ( ) is the  छठे  month of the year in the Julian and Gregorian calendars and one of the four months with a length of 30 days  .
Ovid provides two  etymologies  for June 's name in his poem concerning  the  months entitled the Fasti .
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno , wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek goddess Hera ; the second is that the name comes from the Latin word iuniores , meaning ``  younger   ones  , '' as opposed to maiores ( ``  बड़ो  '' ) for which the  preceding  month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ) .
See : Months in various  पंचांग  also called the season of the June is the month with  the  longest daylight hours  of  the year in the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध  and the shortest daylight hours  of  the year in the Southern Hemisphere .
June in the Northern  गोलार्ध  is the seasonal equivalent to December in the  दक्षिणी  Hemisphere and vice versa .
In the Northern hemisphere  ,  the beginning of the meteorological summer is 1  जून  .
In the Southern hemisphere  ,  the beginning of the meteorological winter is 1 June  .
At the start of June , the sun rises in the constellation of Taurus ; at the end of June , the sun  उदय  in the constellation  of  Gemini .
However , due  to  the precession of the equinoxes , June begins with the sun in the astrological sign of  मिथुन  , and ends  साथ  the sun  in  the astrological sign of Cancer .
June is known  लिये  the large number of  विवाह  that  occur  over the course of the month .
According to one etymology  ,  June is named after Juno ( Hera ) .
Juno was  the  goddess  of  marriage and a married couple 's household , so some consider it good luck to be married in this month .
According to another etymology  provided  by the Roman poet  ओविड  , June is named for the  iuniores  , latin  लिये  `` young people '' (  fasti  VI.88 ) and that the month of  may  is named  लिये  the maiores , Latin  लिये  `` elders '' .
In Iceland , folklore says  कि  if you bathe naked in the morning  ओस  on the morning of June 24 ,  तुम  are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer .
A constitution  is  a set of fundamental principles or established precedents according to which a state  or  other organization is governed .
These rules together make up , i.e . constitute , what the entity is .
When these principles are written down into a  सिंगल  document or set of legal documents , those documents may be said to embody a written constitution ; if they are written down in a  सिंगल  comprehensive document , it  is  said to embody a codified constitution .
Constitutions concern  अलग  levels of organizations , from sovereign states to  कंपनियाँ  and unincorporated associations .
A treaty which establishes an international organization is also its constitution , in that it would define how that organization is constituted .
Within states , whether sovereign or federated  ,  a  संविधान  defines the principles upon which the state is based ,  the  procedure in  जिससे  laws are made and by whom .
Some constitutions ,  विशेषकर  codified constitutions , also act as limiters of state power , by establishing lines  जिससे  a state 's rulers can not cross , such as fundamental  अधिकारों  .
George Washington at Constitutional Convention of 1787  ,  signing of U.S. Constitution .
The Constitution of India is the  longest  written constitution of any sovereign country in the world , containing 448 articles , 12 schedules and 100 amendments , with 117,369 words  in  its English  भाषा  version , while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution , at 7 articles and 27 amendments .
Ron  diftler  ( left ) , NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training session in the Space Environment  सिमुलेशन   प्रयोगशाला  at NASA  's  Johnson Space Center .
Engineering management is a specialized form  of  management that is  चिंतित  with the application of engineering  सिद्धान्त  to  कारोबार  practice .
Engineering management is  a  career that  brings  together the technological problem-solving savvy of  अभियान्त्रिकी  and  the  organizational  ,  administrative , and planning abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion .
Example areas of engineering are product development , manufacturing ,  निर्माण  , design engineering , industrial engineering , technology , production , or any other field that  employs  personnel who perform an engineering function .
Successful  अभियान्त्रिकी  managers typically require  प्रशिक्षण   और  experience in  कारोबार  and engineering .
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support  by  their technical team , and non-commercial managers tend to lack commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy  .
Largely , engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by non-entrepreneurial thinking ,  यूँ  require the necessary people skills to coach , mentor and motivate technical professionals  .
अभियान्त्रिकी  professionals joining  निर्माण  companies  sometimes  become engineering managers by default after a period of time .
They  हैं  required to learn how  to  manage once they are on  the  job , though this is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities .
in  an insurance policy ,  the  deductible is the amount of expenses that must be paid out  of  pocket before an insurer will  अदा  any expenses .
In general usage , the term deductible may  be  used to  describe  one of several types of clauses  (  see below  )  that are used by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments .
Deductibles are typically used to deter the large number of trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the  लागत  of  .
By restricting its coverage  to   कार्यक्रम  that  हैं  significant enough to incur large  लागत  , the insurance firm expects to pay out slightly smaller amounts much less frequently , incurring much higher savings .
as   a  result , insurance premiums are typically cheaper when they involve higher deductibles .
Deductibles are normally provided as clauses in an insurance policy that  dictate  how much of an insurance-covered  व्यय   is  borne by the policyholder .
They are normally quoted as a fixed quantity and is a part of most  नीतियों  covering losses to the policy holder .
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses that exceed this amount ( subject to the maximum  योग  claimable indicated in the contract ) .
Depending on the policy , the  deductible  may apply per covered incident  ,  or per year .
For policies where incidences are not easy to delimit ( for example health insurance ) , the deductible is typically applied  प्रति  year .
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer based on the cause  of  the claim .
For example , a  सिंगल  housing insurance policy may contain multiple deductible amounts for loss or damage arising from theft , fire , natural calamities , evacuation  इत्यादि  .
There are also deductible reimbursement programs that reimburse a deductible in  the  event of an  स्वचालित  , home  ,  boat/yacht or  स्वास्थ्य  insurance claim .
An  चालान  or bill is a commercial document issued by  a  seller to a buyer , indicating the products , quantities , and agreed prices for products or  सेवाएं  the seller has provided the buyer .
An  चालान  indicates the  बिक्री  transaction only .
Payment terms are independent of the  चालान  and are negotiated by the buyer and the seller .
Payment terms are usually  शामिल  on the invoice .
The buyer could have already paid for the products or services listed on the invoice .
Buyer can also have  a  maximum  क्रमांक  of days in which to pay for these goods and is sometimes offered a discount if paid before the due date .
In the rental industry , an invoice must include a specific reference to the duration of the time being billed , so in  जोड   to  quantity , price  और  discount the invoicing amount is also based on duration  .
Generally each line of a rental invoice will refer to the actual  घंटों  , days ,  सप्ताह  , months , etc. ,  होने  billed .
From the point of view of a seller , an invoice is a sales invoice .
From the point of view of a buyer , an invoice is a purchase invoice .
The document indicates the buyer and seller , but the  पद  invoice indicates money is owed or owing .
In English ,  the  context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify its meaning , such as  ``   we  sent them an invoice  ''  ( they owe us money ) or `` We received  an  invoice from them '' ( we  owe  them money )  .
The right main bronchus  (  or right primary bronchus , or  सही   प्रिंसिपल  bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system .
It is wider , shorter , and more vertical in direction than  the  left .
it  is about 2.5 cm long  ,  and enters the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic  vertebra  .
The azygos vein arches over it from behind ; and the right pulmonary artery lies at first below  और  then in front of  it  .
About  2  cm from its commencement it gives off a branch to the upper  पालि  of the right  फेफड़ों  .
This is termed the eparterial branch  of  the bronchus , because  it  arises above the right pulmonary artery .
The  bronchus  now passes below the artery , and is known as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into two branches for the middle  और  lower lobes .
If  a  foreign body in the airway passes through the trachea , it will most likely enter the right main bronchus instead of the left , due to the straighter alignment of the right bronchus to the trachea .
Squash is a  racquet  sport  निभाई  by two ( singles ) or four  खिलाड़ी  ( doubles ) in a four-walled court with a small , hollow rubber  बॉल  .
The players must alternate in striking the  बॉल   साथ  their racquet and  hit  the ball onto the playable surfaces of the four walls of the  अदालत  .
The game was formerly  पुकारा  squash  racquets  , a reference to the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the game ( compared with the fatter ball used  in  its parent game racquets or rackets ) .
Squash is recognized by the IOC and supporters are lobbying for its incorporation in a future  ओलम्पिक  program .
in  2003 ,  फोर्ब्स  rated squash as the number one healthiest sport to play .
अवशेष   आयल  is oil found in  कम  concentrations naturally or in exhausted oil fields .
Often mixed with water , it can not be recovered by conventional techniques .
However  ,  it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( CO2 EOR  )  which involves injecting carbon dioxide into the well reducing viscosity and  बढ़ाना  flow of the oil .
The technique is not new  लकिन  has not been used extensively on residual oil  zones  , low-grade deposits of  पेट्रोलियम  such as the  38  square miles  in  the Permian Basin  of  Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr  .
The technique is limited  by   उपलब्धता  of carbon dioxide .
It does not result  in   sequestration  of the carbon dioxide but the gas is recycled as much as possible .
United States reserves of residual oil are estimated to be 100 billion barrels  .
Artist 's rendering of the fire , by John R. Chapin , originally printed in Harper 's Weekly ; the view faces northeast across  the  Randolph Street  सेतु  .
The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration that burned from Sunday ,  अक्तूबर  8 , to early Tuesday , October 10 , 1871  ,  killing  सैंकड़ों  and destroying about in Chicago , Illinois .
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century , the rebuilding that began helped develop Chicago as one of the most populous and economically important American cities .
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) was king of England from 21 April 1509 until his death .
He  थी  lord  ,  and  बाद   किंग  , of Ireland , as well as continuing the nominal  अर्जी  by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France .
Henry was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty , succeeding  उसके  father , Henry VII .
besides  his six marriages ,  हेनरी  VIII  is  known for his role in the separation of the  गिरिजाघर  of England from the Roman Catholic Church  .
Henry 's struggles with Rome  led  to the separation of the Church of England from papal  प्राधिकार  ,  the  Dissolution  of  the Monasteries , and his own establishment as the Supreme Head  of  the Church of England .
Yet  he  remained  a  believer in core Catholic theological teachings , even after his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and  वेल्स  with the Laws in Wales Acts 1535  और  1542 .
In  1513  , the new king allied  साथ  the Holy  रोमन  Emperor , Maximillian I ,  और  invaded  फ़्रांस  in 1513 with a large , well-equipped army , but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
maximillian  , for his  भाग  ,  प्रयुक्त  the English invasion to his own ends , and this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French  .
This foray would prove  the  start of  an   obsession  for Henry  ,  who  invaded  again in 1544  .
इस  time , Henry  's  forces captured the important city of Boulogne , but again the Holy Roman Emperor , Charles  v   ,  supported  हेनरी  only as long as he needed to and England , strained by the enormous cost of the war , ransomed the city back for peace .
His contemporaries  माना  Henry in his prime to be an attractive  ,  educated and accomplished king , and he has been described as  ``  one  of   the  most charismatic rulers to sit on  the   अंग्रेज़ी  throne '' .
Besides ruling with absolute power , he also engaged himself as an author and composer .
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to  consolidate  the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars  of  the Roses  –  led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and  the  English Reformation .
Henry became morbidly obese and  उसके  health suffered ,  contributing  to his  मौत  in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised  in   उसके  later life as a lustful , egotistical , harsh , and insecure king .
La Reina del Sur  (  The Queen of the South ) is  a   spanish-language  telenovela produced by the United States television network Telemundo , in conjunction with the Antena 3 network  और  RTI Producciones  .
Based on a novel of the same name by Spanish author  arturo  Pérez-Reverte  ,  the drama depicts the rise of  टेरेसा  Mendoza ( Kate del Castillo ) , a young woman from Mexico who becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain .
Patricio Wills , the president of Telemundo Television Studios , was the executive producer .
Though La Reina del Sur was nominated for Novela of the Year , Favorite  सीसे  Actress , and  बेहतरीन  Bad Luck Video , it won  no  awards .
With  a  $ 10 million budget , La Reina del Sur was the most expensive telenovela ever produced by  telemundo  .
The program 's premiere on February 28 , 2011 , was the network 's highest rated premiere for  a  telenovela to date .
The  कार्यक्रम  frequently dominated its time slot ,  भी  over English language programming on other major U.S. networks .
La  reina  del Sur completed  इसके  63 episode  चलाएं  on Telemundo  और  its 13 episode run on Antena 3 simultaneously  on  May 30 , 2011 .
The final episode was the highest rated broadcast in  telemundo  's  19-year  history ( 4.2 million viewers  )  , and beat all of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number one  स्लॉट  in the 18-49 adult demographic .
The program  's  success spurred Telemundo to launch its first campaign to gain the series an Emmy Award nomination .
A one-night special featuring several cast members aired on May 31 , 2011 , and marked the Telemundo debut of noted Latina television personality Cristina Saralegui  .
La  reina  del Sur is broadcast in  अनेक   अन्य  markets , including Serbia , Colombia , Chile  ,   साइप्रस  , Nicaragua , Costa Rica , Mexico , Albania , Hungary , Slovenia , Croatia , Romania , ( among others )  .

A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and  संगठन  to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide  स्पेस  on a server owned  or  leased  लिये  use by clients , as well as providing Internet connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can  भी  provide data  बीच  space and  कनेक्टिविटी  to the Internet for other servers located in their data  बीच  , called  colocation  , also  ज्ञात  as Housing in Latin America or  फ़्रांस  .
The  पैमाना  of web hosting services varies  greatly  .
The most basic is web  पेज  and small-scale file hosting , where files can be  अपलोड  via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP )  or  a Web interface .
the  files are usually delivered  to  the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing  .
अनेक  Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer this service free to  सदस्य  .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web  पेज  hosting from alternative service providers .
Personal web site hosting is typically  फ़्री   ,  advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size and type of  the  website .
Single page  होस्टिंग  is generally sufficient for personal web pages .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides database support and application development platforms ( e.g . PHP  ,  Java , Ruby on Rails , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
ये  facilities  allow  customers to write or install scripts for applications like forums and content management .
Also , Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for  e-commerce  .
The host may also provide an  इंटरफ़ेस  or control panel for managing the Web server and installing scripts  ,  as  खूब  as other modules and service applications like e-mail .
Some  होस्ट  specialize in certain software or services ( e.g  .  e-commerce ) , which are commonly  प्रयुक्त  by larger companies that  outsource  network infrastructure .
मैडेन  NFL ( known as John Madden Football before 1993 ) is an American football video game series developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for  ea  Sports .
The game series  is  named after Pro Football Hall of  famer  John Madden , a  well-known  former Super Bowl –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders  और  color commentator .
The series is the best selling EA Sports series .
The games have consistently been a best seller  ,  and has even spawned TV shows where players compete .
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player statistics , and voice commentary  कि  allows players to hear the  खेल  as if it were a real TV broadcast .
The Madden NFL series has been nicknamed the NFL 's 33rd Franchise .
the  series was originally conceived by Electronic Arts founder Trip Hawkins , who then approached Madden in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise .
Due  to  Madden 's insistence that  the  game be as realistic  as  possible , the first version  of  John Madden Football was  नहीं   released  until 1988 .
The second version of the game was released in  1990  , with annual versions since  तब  .
The series ' name was changed  to   मैडेन  NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use NFL teams and players .
despite  Madden 's retirement  as  a broadcaster  in  2009 , he continues to lend his name and provide expertise for the game .
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born July  10  , 1957 ) is an American  antiwar  activist  जिनकी  son , U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan , was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War .
She attracted national and international media attention in  अगस्त   2005  for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift camp outside  अध्यक्ष  George W. Bush 's Texas ranch —a stand that drew  दोनो   passionate  support  और  angry criticism .
Sheehan ran unsuccessfully for Congress in 2008 .
She is a vocal critic of President Barack Obama 's foreign policy .
Her memoir , Peace Mom : A Mother 's Journey Through Heartache to Activism , was  प्रकाशित   in  2006 .
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the  सलाम  and  स्वतंत्रता  Party .
Wyclef Jeanelle Jean ( ;  ;  born  अक्तूबर   17  , 1969 ) Wyclef  dumped   इससे  Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME , Aug 21 , 2010 .
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he was running for President of  हैती  , Wyclef Jean was still  लिस्टिंग  his age as only 37  सालो   बूढ़ा   .
But  बाद  declaring himself a presidential candidate , the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided  to  come clean and confirm that he was really 40 . '' is  a  three-time Grammy Award -winning Haitian-American rapper  ,  singer-songwriter , musician , record producer , and politician  .
At age nine , Jean moved to the United States with his family and has spent much  of  his life in the country .
he  first received fame as a member of the acclaimed New Jersey hip hop group the Fugees  .
On August 5 , 2010 , Jean  दायर  for candidacy in the 2010 Haitian presidential election , although  the  Electoral Commission subsequently  शासित  him ineligible to stand as he had not met the requirement to  have  been resident in Haiti for  पाँच  years .
Wyclef Jean to appeal against Haiti election ruling –  बीबीसी  News  ,   अगस्त  22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand as the Haitian constitution requires candidates to have lived  in  the country for five years prior to  an  election .
the  40-year-old singer lives in the US  .
Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief , highly publicized in 2010 throughout Haiti and the United States , were channeled through his charitable organization  ,  Yéle Haiti .
The charity , which performed a variety of charitable works in Haiti between 2005  और  2010 , effectively closed  in   2012  .
in  law , a set-off is a  statutory  defense  to  the whole or to a  portion  of a plaintiff 's claim  .
It had no  अस्तित्व  under the English  आम  law , being created by 2 Geo . II  c.  22  लिये  the  राहत  of insolvent debtors , although set-off was recognized in equity .
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite character , and did not apply to cases  in  which damages  यहूद  claimed , nor to equitable claims or demands .
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX .  r.  3 ) a defendant in  an  action may set  बंद  or  नियत  up any right  or  claim by way of counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff , and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect  as  a statement  of  claim in a cross-action .
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby  a  person ( `` Party A '' ) who owed money to another (  ``  Party B '' ) could be sent to debtors  थाना  , despite the fact  कि  Party B also owed money  to  Party A .
The law thus  allows  both  पार्टियों  to defer payment until their respective claims have been heard in  अदालत  .
Upon judgment , both claims are extinguished  और  replaced by a single  जाल  sum owing ( e.g . If Party A owes  पार्टी  B 100 and  पार्टी  B owes Party  a  105 , the  दो  sums are set  बंद  and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from  पार्टी  B to Party A ) .
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual agreement so  कि  , where a party defaults , the mutual amounts owing are automatically set off  और  extinguished  .
In certain  jurisdictions  ( including the UK ) , set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company .
This means that , for each party which is both a creditor and debtor  of  the insolvent company , mutual debts are set-off  विरूद्ध  each other , and then  either   the  bankrupt 's creditor can claim the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be  सशुल्क  , depending on which side owed the  सबसे  .
This has been criticized as an undeclared security interest that violates the  principle  of  परी  passu .
The alternative , where  a   creditor  has  to  pay all its debts , but receive only a limited portion of the leftover moneys that other unsecured creditors get , poses  the  danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies .
The right to set off is particularly  महत्वपूर्ण  when reporting a bank 's exposures to regulatory authorities .
The situation where a bank has to  रपट  that it has lent  a  large sum to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed , because there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to  the  loss of the bank  's  or its depositors ' money ) is thus replaced ( where the bank has taken security over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value  of  the security taken .
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February  11  , 1969 ) is an American actress , film director , and producer .
Aniston gained worldwide recognition in the 1990s for  portraying  Rachel Green on the television sitcom Friends ,  a  role which earned her an Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award  .
Aniston has  भी  enjoyed a successful Hollywood film career .
She gained critical acclaim for her performances in the independent films She  's  the One ( 1996 ) , Office Space ( 1999 ) , The Good Girl  (  2002 )  और  Friends with Money ( 2006 )  .
She has had her greatest commercial successes with the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003 ) , The Break-Up ( 2006 ) , Marley & Me ( 2008 ) , Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible  bosses   (  2011 ) .
Aniston received a  स्टार  on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on February 22 , 2012 .

A White tiger at Tobu Zoo  ,  in Saitama , Japan .
The white tiger is a recessive mutant of  the  Bengal tiger , which was reported in the wild from time to time in Assam , Bengal , Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa .
Conventional PCI  (  PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect , part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to  बस  PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the  कृत्यों  found on a processor bus , but in a standardized  स्वरूप  that is  स्वतंत्र  of any particular processor .
Devices connected  to  the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly to the processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor 's  पता  space .
Attached devices can  लो  either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto  the  motherboard itself ,  पुकारा  a planar device in  the  PCI specification  ,  or an expansion  कार्ड  that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus  थी   पहला  implemented in  ibm  PC compatibles ,  जहाँ  it displaced the combination of ISA plus one  vesa  Local  बस  as the bus configuration .
It has subsequently been adopted for other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express , but , most motherboards are still made with  एक  or more PCI slots , which are  sufficient  for many uses .
The PCI specification  कवर  the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ) , electrical  विशेषताएँ  , bus timing , and  प्रोटोकॉल  .
The specification can be purchased from the PCI Special Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network cards , sound cards , modems , extra ports such as USB or serial , TV tuner  ताश  and disk controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA  ताश  , until  growing  bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities of  पीसीआई  ; the preferred interface for video cards became  अगप  , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards remain available  लिये  use with  बूढ़ा  PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots .
अनेक  devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are  अभी  commonly integrated onto motherboards or  उपलब्धियाँ  in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions .
Caffeine is a bitter , white crystalline xanthine alkaloid that acts as a stimulant drug .
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds ,  पत्ते  , and fruit of  कुछ  plants  ,  where it acts as a natural pesticide that paralyzes and kills  निश्चित  insects feeding on the plants , as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators .
It  is  most commonly consumed by humans in infusions extracted from the seed of the  कॉफी  plant and the leaves of the tea bush , as well as  इससे   विभिन्न   भोजन  and  पेय  containing products derived from the kola nut .
Other sources include yerba maté , guarana  जामुन  , guayusa , and the yaupon holly .
In humans , caffeine acts as a central nervous system  उत्तेजक  ,  temporarily  warding off drowsiness  और  restoring alertness .
It  is  the world 's most widely consumed psychoactive drug ,  लकिन  unlike many other psychoactive substances , it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the  संसार  .
Beverages containing caffeine , such as  कॉफी  , tea , soft drinks ,  और  energy drinks ,  आनंद  great popularity .
In North  अमेरिका  , 90 % of adults consume caffeine daily .
Part of the reason caffeine is classified  by   the  Food and Drug Administration as  ग्रा  ( generally  पहचाना  as safe ) is that toxic  doses  ( over 10 grams  )  are much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ) .
Ordinary consumption can have low  स्वास्थ्य  risks  ,  even when carried on for years – there may be a  modest  protective effect against some diseases ,  सहित   parkinsons  Disease , and  निश्चित  types of cancer .
Caffeine can have both positive and negative effects on anxiety disorders .
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine ,  विशेषकर   दौरान  the evening hours , but others show little disturbance and the effect of caffeine on sleep is highly variable .
Evidence  of  a risk to  गर्भावस्था  is equivocal , but some authorities have concluded that prudent  सलाह  is for pregnant women to limit consumption to the  समतुल्य  of two cups of coffee  प्रति  day or  कम  .
The American Congress of Obstetricians and Gynecologists (  acog  ) concluded in 2010 that caffeine  खपत  is  सुरक्षित  up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women .
Caffeine has pressor and mild  diuretic  effects when administered to people who are not used to it , but regular users develop a tolerance to this effect , and studies have  generally  failed to support the common notion that ordinary consumption contributes significantly to dehydration  .
With heavy use , tolerance develops  rapidly  to autonomic effects such as elevated heart rate and muscle twitching , but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine .
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically significant physical and mental dependence remains a subject of controversy in the medical literature .

A longboard is a longer variant of a  स्केटबोर्ड  .
It  is  commonly used for cruising , downhill racing , slalom racing , sliding , and/or  हस्तांतरण  .
स्त्रोत  outside of Wikipedia give differing estimates:
The CIA  's  World Factbook gives the world population as 7,021,836,029 ( July 2012 est . ) and the distribution of religions as Christian 100  %  ( of which Roman Catholic 18.85 % ,  प्रोटोस्टेंट  8.15 % , Orthodox  4.96  %  ,  Anglican 1.26 % ) , Muslim 22.74 %  ,  Hindu 13.8 % , Buddhist 6.77 % , Sikh 0.35 % , Jewish 0.22  %  ,  baha'i  0.11 % , other religions 10.95 % , non-religious 9.66 % , atheists 2.01 % .
( 2010  est  . ) .
The Coast Ranges of California span  इससे  Humboldt County , California south  to  Santa Barbara County .
The other three coastal California  पहाड़  ranges are the Transverse Ranges  ,  Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains .
Physiographically , they are a section of the larger Pacific Border province , which in turn are  भाग  of the larger Pacific Mountain System  physiographic  division .
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast Ranges Biosphere Reserve `` in its Man and the Biosphere Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983  .

An automobile , autocar , motor car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle used for  transporting  passengers , which also carries its own  इंजन  or motor .
Most definitions of the term specify that automobiles are designed  to  run primarily on roads ,  to  have seating for one to eight people , to typically have four wheels , and to be constructed principally for the transport  of  people rather than goods  .
The term motorcar has also been used in the context of electrified rail systems to denote a car which  कृत्यों   as   a  small locomotive but also provides space for passengers and baggage .
These  लोकोमोटिव   गाड़ियाँ  were often used on suburban routes by both interurban and intercity railroad systems .
It was estimated  in  2010 that the number of automobiles had risen  to  over  1  billion vehicles , up from the 500 million of 1986 .
The numbers are increasing rapidly , especially  in  China and India .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29 , 1917  –  November 22 , 1963 ) , often referred to  by   उसके  initials  jfk  , was the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961  जबतक  his death in  1963  .
After military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 during World War II  in  the South Pacific  ,  Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as  a  Democrat .
Thereafter , he served in the U.S. Senate from  1953   जबतक  1960  .
Kennedy defeated Vice President  और   रिपब्लिकन  candidate Richard Nixon in the  1960  U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to have been elected to the office , the second-youngest President ( after Theodore Roosevelt )  ,  and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only non- Protestant  अध्यक्ष  , and is  the  only president to have won  a  Pulitzer Prize .
Events during  उसके  presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion  ,  the Cuban Missile Crisis  ,  the building  of  the Berlin Wall  ,  the  स्पेस  Race , the African-American Civil  अधिकारों  Movement ,  और  early stages of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy  increased  the number  of  military advisers ,  खास  operation forces , and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread  of  communism in South East Asia .
The  कैनेडी  administration  अपनाया  the policy of  the  Strategic  हैमलेट  Program which was implemented  by  the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain  मजबूर  relocation , village internment , and segregation of rural South Vietnamese from the northern and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22 , 1963 in Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey  ओसवाल्ड  was  चार्ज  with the crime , but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby two days later  ,  before a trial could take place .
The FBI  और  the Warren Commission officially  concluded  that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However ,  the  United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations  यहूद  flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
however  ,  एबीसी  News in their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination :  परे  Conspiracy , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
कैनेडी  's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation that lasted from  1963  to 1970 .
Since the 1960s information concerning Kennedy  's  private life has come to light .
विवरण  of Kennedy  's  health  समस्याएं   in  which he struggled  have  become better known ,  विशेषकर   चूंकि   the  1990s .
Although initially kept secret from the general  पब्लिक  , reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks highly in public opinion ratings of U.S. presidents .
A Siemens MXL fire alarm control panel ( top ) and graphic annunciator ( bottom ) for Potomac Hall , at James Madison University .
A Vigilant VM-1 fire alarm control  ईकाई  ( FACU )  /  autonomous control unit ( ACU ) with integrated voice evacuation and fire fighter  टेलीफोन  system .
Manufactured  by  Edwards , A UTC F & S Company
A Fire Alarm Control Panel ( FACP ) , or Fire Alarm Control Unit  (  FACU ) , is the controlling component of  a   आग  Alarm System .
The panel  receives   सूचना  from environmental sensors  designed  to detect changes associated with fire , monitors  उनके   operational  integrity  और  provides for automatic  कंट्रोल  of  उपकरण  , and transmission of information necessary to prepare the  सुविधा  for fire based on a predetermined sequence .
The panel may  भी  supply electrical energy  to  operate any associated  सेंसर  ,  कंट्रोल  , transmitter , or  रिले  .
वहीँ  are four basic types of panels : coded panels , conventional panels , addressable panels , and multiplex systems .
This is a list  of  the first music videos broadcast on MTV 's  पहला  day ,  अगस्त  1 , 1981 .
MTV 's  पहला  day on the air was rebroadcast on VH1 Classic in 2006 and  अपलोड  onto YouTube in 2010 ( although only the first four  घंटों  were authentic ;  the  rest were edited VH1  rebroadcasts  ) .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also  ज्ञात  as  katunayake  International Airport and Colombo International Airport ) is one of the two international airports serving the city of Colombo ,  the  other  is   ratmalana  International Airport  .
mattala  Rajapaksa International Airport located in southern  नगर  of Hambantota is the other international airport in Sri Lanka .
Bandaranaike  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport is located in Katunayake , 22 miles (  35  km ) north of  कोलोन  .
It is administered by Airport and Aviation Services ( Sri Lanka ) Ltd .
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines , the national carrier of Sri Lanka , and Mihin Lanka ,  the  budget airline of Sri Lanka .
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror film directed by Darren Aronofsky and starring Natalie Portman , Vincent Cassel ,  और  Mila Kunis .
The plot  घूमती  around a production of Tchaikovsky 's Swan  झील  ballet by a prestigious New York City company .
The production  requires  a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile White Swan , for which the committed dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a perfect fit , as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan , which are qualities embodied by the new arrival  लिली  ( Kunis ) .
Nina is overwhelmed  by  a feeling of  immense  pressure when she finds herself competing for the part , causing her to lose her tenuous  पकड़  on reality  और  descend into a living nightmare .
aronofsky  conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a production of Swan Lake with an  unrealized  screenplay  परिचय  understudies and the notion of being haunted by a double , similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers .
Aronofsky cites Fyodor Dostoyevsky 's ``  the  Double `` as another inspiration for the film .
the  director also considered Black Swan a companion piece to his 2008 film The Wrestler , with both films involving demanding performances for different  kinds  of art .
He and Portman first discussed the project in 2000 , and after a brief  अनुलग्नक  to Universal Studios , Black Swan was produced in New York City in 2009 by  फॉक्स  Searchlight Pictures .
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet  लिये  several months prior to  फिल्मांकन  , and notable figures  इससे  the ballet world helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation .
The film premiered as the opening film for the 67th Venice International Film Festival  on  September 1 , 2010 .
It  था  a limited release in the  संयुक्त  States  starting  December 3 , 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17 .
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release , particularly for Portman 's performance and  aronofsky  's  दिशा  , and was a significant box  दफ्तर  success  ,  grossing $ 329 million worldwide  .
the  film received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best Actress award for the film , as well as many other  बेहतरीन  Actress awards in several guilds and festivals , while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director  .
In  जोड  , the film itself received a nomination for Best Picture .
The  world’s  first ice-calorimeter , used in  the  winter of  1782-83  , by Antoine Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon Laplace , to determine the heat involved in various chemical changes ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat .
These experiments mark the foundation of thermochemistry .
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor , meaning heat ) is an object used for calorimetry , or the  प्रक्रम  of measuring the heat of  रासायनिक  reactions or physical changes as well as heat capacity .
Differential  स्कैनिंग   calorimeters  , isothermal microcalorimeters , titration calorimeters and accelerated rate calorimeters are among the most common types .
A simple calorimeter  बस  consists of a thermometer attached to a metal container full of water suspended above a combustion chamber .
To find the enthalpy change per mole of a substance A in a reaction between two substances A and B , the  substances  are added to a calorimeter and the initial and final temperatures (  पहले  the reaction started  और  after it has finished ) are noted .
Multiplying the temperature change by  the   द्रव्यमान  and specific heat capacities of the substances gives  a  value for the energy  दिए  off or absorbed during the reaction .
Dividing the  उर्जा  change by  कैसा  many moles  of  A were present gives its enthalpy change of reaction .
This method is used primarily in academic teaching as it describes the theory of calorimetry .
It does not account for the heat loss through the container or the heat capacity of the  थर्मामीटर  and container itself .
In addition , the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects  transferred  their heat to the calorimeter and into the liquid , and the heat absorbed by  the  calorimeter and the liquid is equal to the heat  दिए  off by the metals .
a  pair of green flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri , thongs , jandals , or a variety of other names throughout  the  world ) are a type  of  open-toed sandal typically worn in  कैज़ुअल  situations , such as outside  or  at the beach  .
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on  the  foot by a Y-shaped  डोरी  that passes between the first and second toes and around either side of the foot  .
They may also be held  to  the foot with a single strap over the front of the foot rather than a  थोंग  .
The name ``  flip-flop  '' originated because of the sound that  is  made by slapping between  the  sole of  the   पैर  and the floor when walking .
This  स्टाइल  of footwear has been worn by  the  people of many cultures throughout the world , originating as early  as  the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 B.C .
The  आधुनिक  flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri , which  became  popular after World War II when soldiers  returning  to the United States brought them back .
वे  became popular in casual settings during the 1960s , 1990s , and 2000s  ,  and some varieties have even found their way  into  more formal attire  ,  despite criticism .
The use of flip-flops can  परिणाम  in many pains and  चोटों  , including ankle sprains and broken bones .
Some individuals  जो  walk for long periods report pain in the feet , ankles , and lower legs .
The lack of  support  provided by flip-flops often results in over-pronation injuries , caused by the foot slipping inwards further  than  normal .
This can lead to flat feet  और  tendonitis .
Other injuries that may result are due to the footwear 's open-toed nature , such as stubbed toes , cuts , and bruises  .
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles , as  खूब  as those that have a strap that is not canvas and that comes back almost to the  टखने  .
The owners of Hanjin Osaka , seen here transiting the Panama Canal in 2008 , declared general average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room on  .
The law of general average is  a  legal principle of maritime law according to which all  पार्टियों  in a sea venture proportionally share any losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of  the  ship  or   कार्गो  to  सहेजें  the whole in an emergency .
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea , crew members often have  अनमोल  little time in which to determine precisely whose cargo they are jettisoning  .
Thus , to  avoid  quarrelling that could waste valuable time , there arose the  निष्पक्ष  practice  whereby  all  the  merchants whose cargo  उतरा  safely would be called on  to  contribute a portion ,  आधारित   upon  a share or percentage , to the merchant or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril  .
जबकि  general average traces its origins in ancient maritime law , still it remains part of  the  admiralty law of most countries  .
The first codification of general average was the York Antwerp Rules of 1890 .
American companies accepted it in 1949  .
General average requires three elements which are clearly stated by Mr. Justice Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
``  1st .
A common  खतरे  : a danger in which vessel , cargo and crew all participate ; a danger imminent and apparently 'inevitable , ' except by voluntarily  रूष्ट  the loss  of   a  portion of the whole to save the remainder . ''
`` 2nd . There must be a voluntary  jettison  ,  jactus  , or casting away , of some portion of the joint concern  लिये  the purpose of avoiding this imminent peril , periculi  imminentis  evitandi causa , or , in other words ,  a  transfer  of  the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole . ''
`` 3rd .
This attempt to avoid  the  imminent common peril must be successful ''  .
Example Polish call for vaccination against Diphtheria and Tetanus .
A vaccination schedule is a series of vaccinations , including the timing  of  all doses , which may be either  अनुशंसित  or compulsory , depending on the country of residence .
A vaccine is an  antigenic  preparation used to produce  क्रियाशील  immunity to a disease  ,  in  अनुक्रम  to prevent or reduce  the  effects  of  infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen .
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness , either  to  produce sufficient initial immune response or to boost response that fades  over  time .
For example , tetanus vaccine boosters are often recommended every 10 years .
टीका  schedules are developed by governmental agencies or physicians groups to achieve maximum effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for a locality while minimizing the number  of  health care system interactions  .
Over the past two decades , the recommended vaccination schedule has grown rapidly and become more complicated as many new vaccines have been developed .
Some vaccines are recommended only in certain areas ( countries ,  subnational   क्षेत्रों  , or at-risk populations )  जहाँ  a disease is common  .
लिये  instance , yellow fever vaccination is on the routine vaccine schedule of French Guiana , is recommended in certain regions of Brazil but in  the  United States is  तभी   दिए   to  travelers heading to  देशों  with a history of the disease  .
In developing countries , vaccine recommendations  भी  take into account the level of health care access , the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by  the  World Health Organization  दिखाएँ  a developed country using a schedule  जिससे  extends over the first five years of a child  's  life and uses vaccines which cost over $ 700 including administration costs while a developing  देश  uses a schedule  providing  vaccines  in  the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25 .
इस  difference is due to the lower cost of health care , the lower cost of many vaccines  provided  to developing nations , and that more expensive vaccines , often for less  आम   रोगों  , are  नहीं  utilized .
In 1900 , the smallpox vaccine was the only one administered to  children  .
By the early 1950s , children routinely received four  टीके  , for protection against ( diphtheria , pertussis  ,  tetanus , polio , and smallpox ) , and as  अनेक   as  five shots by  दो  years of age .
Since the mid-1980s , many vaccines have been added to the schedule .
,  the   us  Centers for  बीमारी  Control and Prevention  (  CDC ) now recommends vaccination  विरूद्ध  at least fourteen diseases .
By two years of age , U.S. children receive as many as 24 vaccine injections , and might receive up to five shots during one visit to the doctor .
The use  of  combination vaccine products means that , , the United Kingdom 's immunization  कार्यक्रम  consists of 10 injections by the age of two , rather  than  25 if vaccination for  प्रत्येक  disease was given as a separate injection .
Two revellers dance in the streets .
The form of dancing is called `` wining '' ( winding ) pronounced wine-ing
