the  Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an annual event held on the  सोमवार   और  Tuesday before Ash Wednesday  ,  and is well known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations .
कार्निवल  in Trinidad and Tobago is the most significant event on the islands ' cultural and tourism calendar , with numerous cultural events  कार्यशील  in the lead up to the  गली  parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday .
It is said that if the islanders are not celebrating it  ,  then they are preparing for it , while reminiscing  परिचय  the past year 's festival .
the  heart of the musical celebration has been calypso  ;  recently soca has replaced  कैलिप्सो  as the most celebrated type of music .
Costumes  ,  stickfighting  और  limbo competitions are also important components of the festival .
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and Tobago is also celebrated in  शहरों  worldwide .
These including Toronto 's Caribana , Miami 's Miami Carnival , Houston Carifest , London 's Notting Hill Carnival as well as New York  नगर  's Labor Day  कार्निवल  to name a few .
Carnival  थी  created when West African slaves mimicked their French  स्वामी  who where  ज्ञात  for their lavish costumes balls .
Forbidden to partake in these festivities and confined to their quarters , slaves combined elements from their own cultures to their master 's fete .
Hence the creation of characters such as  jab  Jab or Jab Molassie ( Devils ) , Midnight  लुटेरों  ,  imps  , Lagahroo  ,  Soucouyant , La Diablesse and Demons .
With the abolition of slavery in 1838 , freed Africans  took  their version of Carnival to the streets  through  expression of drums , riddim sections  जैसे  tamboo bamboo and as  प्रत्येक  new immigrant population  डाला  Trinidad , Carnival evolved into what we know today .
The  नगर  of  शिकागो  , Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral election on Tuesday ,  फ़रवरी  22 , 2011 .
Incumbent Mayor  रिचर्ड  M. Daley  ,   a  member of the Democratic Party who had been in office since 1989 , did not seek a seventh term as mayor .
Candidates needed to collect 12,500 petition signatures by November 22 , 2010 to qualify for a  प्लेस  on the ballot .
April 5 , 2011 was scheduled to be  a  runoff election date if no candidate  प्राप्त   an  absolute majority .
Rahm  emanuel  won the race for mayor with more than  55  % of the vote .
He  थी  inaugurated on May 16 , 2011 .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a song by American indie  पॉप   बैंड  Foster the People .
it  was released as the  समूह  's  डेब्यू  single in September 2010  ,  and the following year was included on their EP Foster the People  और  their debut album Torches .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' became the group 's breakthrough hit and was one of the most popular  गीतों   of  2011 .
The song was written and recorded  by  frontman Mark Foster while he was working as a  वाणिज्यिक  jingle writer .
चिहृ  with the upbeat musical composition , the lyrics describe the homicidal thoughts of a troubled youth .
The track received considerable attention after it was posted online in 2010 as a free download  ,  and it helped  the  group garner a multi-album record deal with Columbia Records imprint Startime International .
`` Pumped Up Kicks ''  proved  to be a sleeper hit ;  in  2011 , after receiving significant airplay  on  modern rock stations , the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations .
The song spent eight consecutive weeks  at  number three on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot  100  chart in the United States , making it the first Billboard Alternative Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009 .
the  song was widely praised by critics , and it has been licensed for use in a wide range of popular  मीडिया  since its  रिलीज  .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a Grammy Award nomination for Best Pop Duo/Group  प्रदर्शन  .
The State Fair of West Virginia is an annual  राज्य  fair for West  वर्जिनिया  .
it  is held annually in mid-August on the State Fairgrounds in Fairlea , near Lewisburg , West Virginia in the southeastern part of the state .
The State Fairgrounds consists of a large open field for carnivals and exhibitions , a horse track , grandstands , and several exhibition buildings .
Free parking is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds  और   ,  until 2006 , free camping was  भी  available in a large field with running-water toilets and showers , but no hookups .
Campers are now charged a  छोटी  fee .
The  श्वेत  House , the president 's official residence and  बीच  of  the  administration
अंतर्गत  the United States Constitution , the President of the United  राज्य  is the head of state and head of government  of  the United States .
As  मुख्य  of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole , the presidency is the  उच्चतम  political office in the United States by influence and recognition .
The president is  भी  the commander-in-chief of  the  United States Armed Forces .
The  अध्यक्ष  is indirectly elected to a  four-year  term by an Electoral College ( or by the  हाउस  of Representatives should the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority  of  votes to any person ) .
चूंकि   the   अनुसमर्थन  of the  twenty-second  Amendment to  the  United States Constitution in 1951 , no person may be elected President  अधिक  than twice , and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than  एकबार  .
Upon the death , resignation , or removal from office of an incumbent President , the  वाइस  President assumes  the  office .
The President  जरूर   be  at least 35 years of age and  a  `` natural born '' citizen of  the  United States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office  as  president following the ratification of the United States Constitution , which took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For American leaders before this ratification , see President of the Continental Congress .
The list does not include any Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the  संयुक्त  States Constitution .
वहीँ  have been 43 people sworn  into  office , and 44 presidencies , as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted  क्रमबद्धता   as  both the  22nd   और  24th president .
Of the individuals elected  as  president , four died  in  office of natural causes (  विलियम  Henry  हैरिसन   ,  Zachary  टेलर  , Warren  G.  Harding , and Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A. Garfield , William McKinley , and  जॉन  F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first president , was inaugurated in 1789 after  a  unanimous vote of  the  Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in  1841   ,  and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years , but died shortly  into   उसके  fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president  to  serve more than  दो  terms , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry Truman , was passed to limit the number of  टाइम्स  an individual can be elected president .
Andrew Jackson , the  सातवाँ  president , was the first to be elected by men  of  all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding  थी  the first elected after women gained  मतदान  rights in 1920 .
History records four presidents  –  John Q Adams , Rutherford B. Hayes , Benjamin Harrison  और  George W. Bush  –   जो   खोया  the popular vote but assumed  दफ्तर  .
John F. Kennedy has  महरूम  the only president of Roman  कैथोलिक  faith , and the current  अध्यक्ष  , Barack  ओबामा   ,  is the first president of African descent  .
`` Lombardi Trophy ''  redirects  here .
For the  पुरस्कार   awarded   annually  to the best college  फ़ुटबॉल  lineman or linebacker , see Lombardi Award .
The Vince  लोम्बार्डी   ट्रॉफी  is the trophy awarded each year to the winning team of the National Football League 's championship game , the Super Bowl .
The  ट्रॉफी  is named in honor of legendary NFL coach Vince  लोम्बार्डी  .
This is a list of tables of the  सत्यापित  oldest people in the world in ordinal rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified  '  if his or her claim has been  validated   by  an international body  कि  specifically deals in longevity research ,  ऐसे  as  the  Gerontology Research  समूह  ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented  इंसान  lifespan is that of Jeanne Calment of  फ़्रांस  ( 1875–1997 ) , who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She met Vincent van Gogh when she was 12 or 13 .
इस  led to news media attention in 1985 , after  calment  turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age , beyond any reasonable question , in the records of her native city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her case serves as  an  archetype in the methodology for  verifying  the  आयु  of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura , who currently  जीवनदान  in Japan and is age as of .
चूंकि  the death  of  115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States , on 17  दिसम्बर  2012  ,  Kimura , born 19  अप्रैल  1897  ,  is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be  प्रलेखित  .
He has also been  the  oldest living  man   चूंकि  the  मौत  of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old  koto  Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 , the oldest living woman has been -year-old  misao  Okawa , also  इससे  Japan , born on 5 March 1898 .
the  People 's Court is an American arbitration-based reality court show ,  फिलहाल  presided over  by  retired Florida State Circuit Court Judge Marilyn Milian  ,  in which small claims disputes are handled .
The People 's Court is the first  अदालत  show to use binding arbitration , introducing the format into the genre in  1981   .
The system has been duplicated by most of the show 's successors in  the  judicial genre .
Moreover  ,  The People 's Court is the first popular , long-running reality in the judicial genre .
It was  preceded  only by a few short-lived realities in the genre  ;   ये  short-lived predecessors were only loosely related to  न्यायिक  proceedings ,  मगर  for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life  courtrooms  holding legal proceedings .
Prior to The People 's Court , the vast majority of TV courtroom shows used actors , and recreated or fictional cases ( as did radio before that ) .
Among examples of  ये  types of court shows include Famous Jury Trials and Your Witness .
The  लोगों  's Court  रै  had two contrasting lives .
The  दिखाएँ  's first life was presided over solely by former Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner .
His tenure lasted from  the  show 's debut on September 14 , 1981 , until May 21 , 1993 , when the  दिखाएँ  was cancelled  due  to low ratings .
इस  left the show with a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons .
The show was taped in Los Angeles during its first life .
After being cancelled , reruns aired until September  9  , 1994 .
on  September 8 , 1997 , after being out of production for four years , The People 's Court was revived for a second life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program  .
पूर्व  lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter , which he maintained for 2 seasons from the 1997–98  ऋतु  through the 1998–99 season ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ) .
By the 1999–00 season , husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over Judge  जुडी  ) and former New York State Supreme Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch .
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he was replaced towards the end of the 2000–01  ऋतु  ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's  17th  ) .
Beginning in spring 2001  ,  Florida judge Marilyn Milian took over The  लोगों  's Court and has presided over the show ever  चूंकि  .
Once Milian  completes  the 2012–13 season , she will have served as  longest  arbiter over the series with 12 and a half seasons .
As of the present  ,  however , her years on the program  टाई  Wapner at 12 seasons .
In the 2009-10 television season , The  लोगों  's Courts 2nd/present life outlasted its first when it reached 13 seasons .
While the show taped in  नई  York City for the first 15  सीज़न  of its second life ,  it  now tapes in Stamford  ,  Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season .
On September 3 , 2012 ,  the  People 's Court 's 2nd/present life entered its 16th season ( 28th overall season ) .
With  28  total  सीज़न  , The People 's Court ranks as the 2nd longest-running  courtroom  program behind the ongoing Divorce Court at 33  सीज़न   (  from its 3 combined lives ) .
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : Wo'tééneihí ' ) is a state in the Western United States .
It became the 45th state admitted to the Union on January 4 , 1896 .
Utah is the 13th-largest  ,  the 34th-most populous , and  the  10th-least-densely populated  of  the 50 United States .
Approximately 80 %  of  Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front , centering on Salt Lake City , leaving vast expanses of the state nearly uninhabited and making the population the sixth most urbanized  in  the U.S.  यूटा  is bordered  by  Colorado  on  the east , Wyoming on the northeast , Idaho on the north , Arizona on the south , and Nevada  on  the west .
it  also  छू  a corner of New Mexico on the southeast .
Utah is  the  most religiously homogeneous state in the Union  .
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of  latter-day  Saints or LDS (  mormons  ) , which greatly influences Utah culture and daily  जीवन  .
The  संसार   मुख्यालय  of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital .
The state is a center of transportation , education  ,  information technology and research , government services , mining , and a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation .
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates , Utah is the fifth fastest-growing  राज्य  in the United States as of 2012 .
St.  जार्ज  , was the fastest–growing metropolitan area in the United States  इससे  2000 to 2005 .
A 2012 Gallup national survey found Utah overall to be the `` best  राज्य  to live in '' based on 13 forward-looking measurements including various economic , lifestyle ,  और  health-related outlook metrics .
Coldwater is a small town in  टेट  County , Mississippi .
It is in the Memphis Metropolitan Area  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 1,674 at the 2000 census .
The hard palate  is  a thin horizontal bony plate  of  the skull  ,  located in the roof of the mouth .
it  spans the arch formed by the upper teeth .
It is formed by the palatine process of the maxilla and  आड़ा  plate of palatine bone .
It forms a partition between the nasal passages  और  the mouth .
Also on the anterior  portion  of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which are the irregular ridges in the mucous membrane that help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx .
This partition is continued deeper into the  मुँह   by  a fleshy extension called the soft palate  .
Complete set of scrolls  ,  constituting the entire Tanakh  .
The Tanakh ( , or ; also Tenakh , Tenak , Tanach ) is a name used  in  Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh  is  also known as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra  .
The name  is  an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters  of   the  Masoretic Text  's  three  परंपरागत  subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching  ''  , also known  as   the  Five Books of Moses  )   ,  Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh  .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) , meaning `` that which is read '' , is an  वैकल्पिक  Hebrew term  लिये  the Tanakh  .
The books of  the  Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition passed on  by  each generation , called the Oral Torah  .
Sobriety checkpoint in Germany
Driving  अंतर्गत  the influence ( DUI ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) , drunken driving , drunk driving , drink driving , operating under the influence , drinking and driving , or impaired driving is the crime  of  driving a motor vehicle with blood  स्तर  of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '' , or `` BAC  ''  ) .
Similar regulations  कवर  driving or operating certain types of machinery while affected by drinking alcohol or taking other drugs , including , but not limited to  नुस्खा  drugs .
This is a criminal offense in most nations .
Convictions do not necessarily involve actual driving of the vehicle  .
In most jurisdictions a measurement such as a  रक्त  alcohol content ( BAC ) in excess of a specific threshold level , such as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the  ठोकर  , with no need to prove impairment or being under the  influence  of alcohol .
In some jurisdictions  ,  there is an aggravated category of the  ठोकर  at a higher level e.g . 0.12 % .
In most countries , anyone who  is  convicted of injuring or  हत्या   किसी  while under the influence of alcohol or  दवाएँ  can be heavily fined , as in France , in  जोड  to being given  a  lengthy  थाना  sentence .
Some jobs have  उनके  own rules  और  BAC limits , for example commercial  पायलट   ,  and the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit for  ट्रैन   क्रू  .
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; for example , the state of California has a 0.08 % BAC limit , which is lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a commercial driver 's license .
The California BAC limit is 0.01 % for those  younger  than 21 years of age and those on probation for  a  previous DUI  conviction  .
Some  विशाल  corporations have their  अपना  rules ; Union Pacific Railroad has their own BAC limit of 0.02 % that , if violated during a random test  or  a for-cause test — for example  ,  after a  ट्रैफ़िक  accident  —   can  result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire .
अनेक  states in  the  U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted truth  in  sentencing laws  कि  enforce  सख्त  guidelines on sentencing , differing from previous practice where prison time was reduced  or   निलंबित  after sentencing had been issued .
Some jurisdictions have judicial guidelines requiring a mandatory minimum sentence .
Penalties for  dui  charges range from  महंगी  fees to forfetiruree of your license plates  और  in some serious  हालातों  , your vehicle .
A drunk driving  सिम्युलेटर  in Montréal , Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called  ,  depending on the jurisdiction , driving under the influence [ of  दारू  or other drugs  ]  ( DUI ) , driving under  तीव्र  influence ( DUII ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) ,  ऑपरेटिंग  under the influence (  oui  ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ) ,  ऑपरेटिंग  a motor vehicle while  intoxicated  ( OMVI ) , driving  अंतर्गत  the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs , driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ]  .
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling , boating , piloting aircraft , use of  motile  farm equipment  ऐसे  as tractors and combines , riding horses or driving a horse-drawn vehicle ,  or  bicycling , possibly  साथ  different BAC level than driving .
In some jurisdictions there are separate charges depending on the vehicle used , such as BWI ( bicycling while intoxicated ) , which may carry a lighter sentence .
In  the  United States , local  विधि  enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for driving under the influence of  दारू  in 1996 , compared to 1.9 million  ऐसे  arrests during  the  peak  साल  in 1983 .
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI offenders were in  थाना   or  jail , down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from  270,100  in 1986 .
Officers from US Customs and Border Protection boarding a ship
Law enforcement in the  संयुक्त  States is one of three major components of the criminal justice system  of  the United States , along with courts and corrections .
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between  the  different  समूह  that make up the criminal justice system based on their crime deterrence purpose , each component operates independently from  एक  another .
However , the judiciary is vested with the power to make legal determinations regarding the conduct  of  the  अन्य  two components .
Apart from maintaining order and service functions , the  purpose  of policing is the investigation of suspected criminal activity  और  the referral of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts .
Law  प्रवर्तन  , to varying degrees at different levels of government and in different agencies  ,  is also commonly charged with the  जिम्मेदारियों  of deterring criminal activity and of preventing the successful commission of crimes in progress ; the  सेवा   और  enforcement of warrants , writs and other orders of the courts .
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in providing first response to emergencies and other  खतरे  to public safety ; the protection of certain public facilities and infrastructure  ;  the  मेंटेनेंस  of public order ; the protection of  पब्लिक  officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ) .
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June  28  , 1968 ) , best known under the stage name Chayanne ,  is  a Puerto Rican Latin pop singer and actor .
As a solo  कलाकार  , Chayanne has released  21  solo albums and sold over 15 million albums worldwide .
`` World  युद्ध  Hulk '' is a comic book crossover storyline  कि  ran through a self titled limited  श्रेणी  and various other titles published by Marvel Comics in 2007  ,  featuring the Hulk .
The series consists  of  five main issues  titled  World War Hulk , with Greg Pak as writer and John Romita , Jr. as penciller  ,  and three other limited series : World War Hulk : Front  लकीर  , World War Hulk :  गामा  Corps , and  संसार  War Hulk : X-Men .
It also ran through several  अन्य  Marvel comics series .
The  प्लाट  is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into space by the  illuminati  and a life model decoy of Nick Fury , the  हल्क   's  subsequent exile seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati .
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; May 26 , 1907 – June 11 , 1979 ) , better known by his stage name John Wayne , was an American film actor , director  और  producer .
An Academy Award -winner , Wayne was among the top box office draws for three decades , and was named the all-time top money-making star .
An enduring American icon , he epitomized rugged masculinity and  is  famous for his demeanor , including his distinctive  शांत  voice , walk , and height .
Wayne was born in Winterset , Iowa but his family relocated to the greater Los Angeles area  जब  he was four years old .
He found work at local film studios when he lost his football scholarship to USC  as  a result of a bodysurfing accident .
Initially working for the Fox Film Corporation ,  he  mostly appeared in small bit parts .
His first leading role came in the widescreen epic The Big Trail ( 1930 ) , which led to leading  भूमिकाएँ  in numerous films throughout the  1930s  , many of them in the western genre .
His career  रोज़  to  further  heights in  1939  , with John Ford 's  stagecoach  making him  an  instant superstar .
Wayne would go on to star in 142 pictures , primarily typecast  in  Western films  .
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ) , which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster  निभाई  by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers (  1956  ) , in which he  plays  a Civil War veteran who seeks out his abducted niece ; Rio Bravo ( 1959 ) , playing a Sheriff with Dean Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 ) , playing a humorous U.S .  मार्शल  who sets out to avenge a man 's death  in  the role that won Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ) , his final  स्क्रीन  performance in which  he  plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer .
Wayne moved to  नारंगी  County , California in the 1960s , and was a prominent Republican in Hollywood ,  supporting   anti-communist  positions .
he  died of stomach cancer  in  1979 .
In June 1999 , the American Film Institute named Wayne 13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time .
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 January 1642 ) , was an Italian physicist , mathematician ,  astronomer  , and philosopher who played a major role in the Scientific  क्रान्ति  .
His achievements  शामिल  improvements to the telescope and consequent astronomical observations and support for Copernicanism .
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational  खगोलशास्त्र  `` , the `` father of modern physics `` , the `` father of science '' , and `` the Father of Modern Science '' .
His contributions to observational astronomy include the telescopic confirmation of the phases of Venus , the discovery of the four  largest  satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour  )  , and the observation and analysis of sunspots .
Galileo also worked in applied science and technology , inventing an improved military compass and other  यंत्र  .
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial  भीतर  his lifetime , when most subscribed to either geocentrism or  the  Tychonic system .
He met  साथ  opposition from astronomers ,  जो   doubted  heliocentrism due to the absence of an observed  तारकीय  parallax .
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in 1615 , and they concluded that it could be supported as  तभी  a possibility , not an established fact .
Galileo later defended his views  in  Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems , which appeared to attack Pope Urban VIII and thus alienated him and the Jesuits , who had both supported Galileo up until this point .
He was tried by the Inquisition , found `` vehemently suspect of heresy '' , forced to recant  ,  and spent the rest of  उसके  life  अंतर्गत  house arrest .
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he wrote  एक  of his finest works , Two New Sciences , in which he summarised the work he had done some forty years earlier , on the two  sciences  now called kinematics and strength of materials .

Demonstration of a flexible OLED device
An OLED ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode  (  LED ) in which the emissive electroluminescent  परत  is a film of organic compound which emits light in response to an electric current .
इस  layer of organic semiconductor is situated between two electrodes .
Generally , at  तनिक  one of these electrodes is transparent  .
OLEDs are used to create  डिजिटल  displays in devices such as television screens , computer monitors , portable systems such as  मोबाईल  phones , handheld games consoles and PDAs .
A major area of research  is  the development of white OLED devices for use in solid-state lighting applications .
There are two main families of  oleds  : those based  on  small  अणुओं  and those employing polymers .
Adding  मोबाईल  ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting  electrochemical  cell or LEC , which has a slightly different mode of  आपरेशन  .
OLED displays can use either passive-matrix  (  PMOLED ) or active-matrix addressing schemes .
Active-matrix OLEDs ( AMOLED ) require a thin-film transistor  backplane  to  स्विच  each individual pixel  on   or  off , but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes .
An OLED display works without a backlight .
Thus , it can display deep black levels  और  can be thinner and lighter than  a   द्रव  crystal display ( LCD  )  .
In low ambient light conditions such as a dark room an OLED  स्क्रीन  can achieve a higher contrast  अनुपात  than an LCD , whether the  एलसीडी  uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight .
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal , Canada , showing its French facade ( English reverse ) and the French term lait de poule ( literally , `` hen 's milk ''  )
Eggnog , or egg nog , is a sweetened dairy -based beverage traditionally made with milk and/or cream , sugar  ,  and whipped  अंडे  (  जिससे  gives it a frothy texture )  .
Brandy  ,  rum  ,  whisky , bourbon ,  वोदका  , or a combination of  liquors  are often added  .
The finished  सेवारत  is often garnished with  a  sprinkling of ground cinnamon or nutmeg .
It was also known as the egg milk  पंच  .
Eggnog is  a  popular drink throughout the  संयुक्त  States and Canada  ,  and  is  usually  संबद्ध  with Christmas .
Eggnog may  be  added as a flavoring to food or drinks such as coffee and  चाय  .
Eggnog as a custard can also be used as an ice cream base .
A pasty ( , ) , ( sometimes  ज्ञात  in Britain as a Cornish pasty , and in the United  राज्य  as a pastie or  अंग्रेजों  pasty )  is  a baked pastry , a traditional variety of which is particularly associated with  कॉर्नवॉल  , the  westernmost  county in England .
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of meat and vegetables , without meat in vegetarian versions , on a flat pastry circle and folding it to wrap the filling ,  crimping  the edge to  रूप  a seal .
After baking , the result  is  a raised semicircular comestible .
The traditional Cornish pasty , which has Protected Geographical  indication  ( PGI ) status in  यूरोपीय  , is  भर  with beef , sliced or diced potato , swede ( also known as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in  कॉर्नवॉल  as turnip ) and onion , seasoned with salt  और  pepper , and is baked .
Today , the  pasty  is the food most associated with Cornwall , it is  regarded  as the national dish , and it  खाते   लिये  6 % of  the  Cornish food economy .
Pasties with many  अलग  fillings are made  ;  some shops specialise in selling  सब  sorts of pasties .
The origins of the pasty  हैं  unclear , though there are many references to them throughout historical documents and fiction .
The pasty  is  now popular world-wide due to the  स्प्रेड  of Cornish miners , and variations can be found in Australia , the United States , Mexico and elsewhere  .
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is one of three major parts of the autonomic nervous system : the  अन्य  being the enteric and parasympathetic systems .
Its  सामान्य  action is to mobilize the body 's nervous system  fight-or-flight  response .
It is , however , constantly active at a basic level to maintain homeostasis .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices , such as mobile phones , digital cameras , GPS navigation devices  ,   और  tablet  कंप्यूटर  .
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD Card  संघ  ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of  उत्पाद  categories and more than 8,000 models .
The Secure Digital format includes four card families available in three different form factors .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity  (  SDSC ) , the High-Capacity ( SDHC ) , the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ) , and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The three form factors are the original  आकार  , the `` mini ''  आकार  , and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ) .
वहीँ  are  अनेक  combinations of  रूप  factors and device families .
Electrically passive adapters allow the use  of  a smaller  कार्ड  in a host device built  to  hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards , but this article explains several factors that can  prevent  the use of a newer  sd  card:
A  नए  card may offer greater capacity than the host device can handle .
A newer card may use a file system the host device can not navigate .
Use of an SDIO card  requires  the host  यंत्र  be  designed  for the input/output functions the card provides .
The organization of the card was changed starting with the SDHC family .
Some vendors produced SDSC cards  ऊपर  1 GB before the SDA had standardized a  विधि  of doing  so  .
the  SDA  उपयोग  several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with  इसके  specifications and assure users of compatibility .
