Daniel Lawrence Whitney ( born February 17 , 1963 ) best known by his stage name and character Larry the Cable Guy , is an American stand-up comedian , actor , country music artist , voice actor , and former radio personality  .
He was one of  the  members of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour , a comedy troupe which included Bill Engvall  ,  Ron  श्वेत  , and Jeff Foxworthy (  साथ  whom he has starred on Blue Collar TV ) .
Whitney has released seven comedy albums , of which  तीन  have been certified gold by the RIAA for shipments of  500,000  copies .
In addition , he  रै  starred in three Blue Collar Comedy Tour-related  फिल्मों  ,  as  well as in the films Larry the Cable Guy : Health Inspector , Delta Farce , and Witless Protection , as well as  voicing  Mater in the Cars franchise .
Whitney 's catchphrase  :  `` Git-R-Done ! '' is also the  शीर्षक  of his book .
On January 26 , 2010 , the TV channel History announced that  it  was ordering a series starring Whitney called Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy , in  जिससे  he would explore the country and immerse himself in different lifestyles ,  कार्य  , and  शौक  .
The first episode of the series aired on February 8 , 2011 .
विटामिन  D  is  a group of  fat-soluble  secosteroids responsible  लिये  intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate .
In humans , the most important related compounds of vitamin D are  विटामिन  D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin  d3  ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) are unique as they constitute what we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The body can also  synthesize  vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun exposure  is  adequate ( hence its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although  विटामिन  D is  commonly  called a vitamin , it is not actually an essential  dietary  vitamin in the strict sense , as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight .
(  Cats and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D efficiently and must receive  it  in their diet . )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism ,  और  must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins , vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find  the   dietary  substance that was lacking in a disease , namely , rickets , the childhood form of  osteomalacia  .
Additionally , like other compounds called vitamins , in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid  बीमारी  due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous  संश्लेषण  from exposure to sunlight as well as intake from the diet , and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally  to  the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The  प्रमाण   indicates  that the  संश्लेषण  of vitamin D from sun exposure works in  a  feedback loop that prevents toxicity but  ,  because of uncertainty  परिचय  the cancer risk from sunlight ,  no  recommendations are issued  by  the Institute of Medicine , USA , for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly ,  the  Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that  no  synthesis occurs and that  सब   of  a  व्यक्ति  's vitamin D is from their diet  ,  although that will rarely occur  in  practice .
In the  जिगर  vitamin D is converted  to  calcidiol  ,  which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin  d—abbreviated  25 ( OH ) D ; and  जिससे  is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is  परिवर्तित  by  the  kidneys to calcitriol  ,  the biologically active form of  विटामिन  D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood  ,  regulating  the  concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to  calcitriol  outside of the  गुर्दे  for other purposes , such as the proliferation , differentiation  और  apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also  affects  neuromuscular function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to  prevent  osteomalacia or rickets ,  the  evidence for other health effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent .
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women .
Standard form of the periodic table .
The colors  represent  different categories of elements explained below .
The periodic  तालिका  is a  table  display of the chemical elements ,  व्यवस्थित  on the basis of their atomic numbers , electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties .
Elements are presented  in  order of increasing atomic number (  क्रमांक  of protons ) .
the  standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body of  तत्व  , positioned above a smaller  दोगुना  row of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed into  चार   आयताकार  blocks : the s-block to the left , the p-block to  the   सही  , the d-block in the middle , and the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are called  अवधि  ; the  कालम  of the s- , d- , and  p-blocks  are called groups ,  साथ  some of these having names such as the  हैलोजन्स   or  the  प्रतिष्ठित  gases .
Since  ,  by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can  be  used to derive relationships between the properties of  the  elements and predict the properties of  नई  , yet to be discovered or  synthesized   ,  elements .
As a result , a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides  a  useful  फ्रेमवर्क  for analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables are widely used in chemistry and  अन्य   sciences  .
Although precursors exist , Dmitri Mendeleev is generally  credited   साथ  the publication  ,   in  1869 , of the first widely recognized periodic table .
He developed his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that would be expected to fill gaps in this table .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when  the  elements in question  यहूद   subsequently  discovered .
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined  साथ  the discovery or synthesis of  further  new elements and the development of new theoretical models to explain  रासायनिक  behavior .
All elements from atomic numbers 1 (  हाइड्रोजन  ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The elements from  1  to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally , although some are found only in trace amounts and were initially discovered by  संश्लेषण  in laboratories .
The elements after 98 have only been synthesized in laboratories .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued , with the question of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions  होने  a matter  of   जारी  debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been produced in laboratories .
Minimum wage by U.S. state and U.S. territory ( American Samoa , Guam , Puerto Rico  ,  Virgin Islands ) ,  as  of Jan. 1 ,  2013  .
In the United States , workers are generally entitled to be paid no less than the statutory minimum wage .
The  संघीय  government mandates a nationwide minimum wage level of $ 7.25 per hour ,  जबकि  some states and municipalities have set minimum wage levels higher than the federal  स्तर  , with the highest state minimum wage being $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013 .
Among those paid by the hour in 2012 , 1.6  लाख   यहूद  reported as earning exactly  the  prevailing federal minimum wage  .
About 2.0  लाख  were reported as earning wages below  the  minimum .
Together , these 3.6 million workers with wages at or below the minimum made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers .
A selection of Bourbons  और  Tennessee  whiskeys  offered  at  a liquor store  in  Decatur , Georgia
Evan Williams bourbon whiskey
bourbon  whiskey is a type of American whiskey – a barrel-aged distilled spirit made  primarily  from corn .
the   नाम   of  the spirit derives from its  ऐतिहासिक  association  साथ  an area known as Old Bourbon , around what is now Bourbon County , Kentucky  (  which , in turn , was  नामित  after the French House of  bourbon  royal family ) .
It has been produced since the 18th century .
While it may be made anywhere in the United States , it is strongly associated with the American South  in  general , and Kentucky in particular .
The  mona  Lisa ( La  gioconda  or La  joconde  ) is a half-length portrait of a woman by the Italian  कलाकार  Leonardo da Vinci , which has been acclaimed as `` the best known , the most visited , the most written about  ,  the  सबसे  sung about , the most parodied work  of  art in the world .  ''
The painting , thought  to  be a portrait of Lisa Gherardini , the  बीवी  of Francesco del  giocondo  , is in oil on a poplar  फलक  , and is believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506 .
It was acquired by King Francis I of France and is now the  प्रॉपर्टी  of the  फ्रेंच   गणतंत्र  , on permanent display at the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797 .
The ambiguity of the subject  's  expression  ,  which is frequently described as enigmatic  ,  the monumentality of the composition , the subtle modeling of  फ़ॉर्म  and the atmospheric  illusionism  were novel qualities that have contributed to  the  continuing fascination and study of the work .
Robert  एलन  Palmer ( 19 January 1949 – 26 September 2003 ) , was an English singer-songwriter and musician .
He was known for his  distinctive  voice and the eclectic mix  of  musical  शैलियाँ  on his albums ,  combining  soul  ,  jazz , rock , pop  ,  reggae and blues  .
He found success both in his solo career and in the  musical  act The Power Station , and  था  Top 10 songs in both the UK and the US .
His iconic music videos by Terence  डोनोवन  for the hits `` Addicted to Love `` and  ``  Simply Irresistible ``  प्रदर्शित  identically dressed dancing women with  पाले  faces , dark eye makeup and bright  रेड  lipstick ,  जिससे  resembled the  महिलाओं  in the art of Patrick Nagel , an artist popular in the 1980s .
Sharp-suited , his involvement in the music industry commenced in  the   1960s  , covered  पाँच  decades and included a spell with Vinegar Joe .
Palmer received a number of awards throughout his career , including two Grammy Awards for Best Male Rock  गायन  Performance , an MTV Video Music Award , and was  twice  nominated for the Brit Award  लिये  Best British Male .
Computed tomography angiography ( CTA )  is  a computed tomography technique used to visualize arterial and  venous  vessels throughout the body .
इस   सीमाएँ  from arteries serving the brain to those bringing blood to the lungs , kidneys , arms and legs  .
The Champs-Élysées decorated with flags for Bastille  दिन
Horseman of  the  French Republican Guard during the 2007 military  परेड   on  the Champs-Élysées .
Prise de la Bastille by Jean-Pierre-Louis-Laurent Houel
Bastille Day is the name given  in  English-speaking countries to the French National Day , which is  मनाये  on the 14th of July each year .
In France  ,   it  is formally  पुकारा  La Fête  nationale  ( ; The National Celebration ) and commonly Le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ) .
It  commemorates  the 1790 Fête de la Fédération , held on the first anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14 July 1789 ; the anniversary of the storming of the Bastille fortress-prison was seen as a symbol of the uprising of the modern nation , and of the reconciliation  of  all  the  French inside the constitutional monarchy  जिससे  preceded the First Republic , during the  फ्रेंच  Revolution .
Festivities and official ceremonies are held all over France .
The oldest and largest regular military parade in Europe is held on the morning of 14 July , on the Champs-Élysées avenue in  पेरिस  in front of the President of the Republic , French officials and foreign  अतिथि  .
The United States of America ( USA or U.S.A. ) , commonly  पुकारा   the  United States  (   us  or U.S.  )  or America , is a federal republic consisting of fifty states  और  a federal district .
The lower forty-eight contiguous states  और  the federal district  of  Washington , D.C. are in central North America between Canada and Mexico .
The state of Alaska is west of Canada and east of Russia across the Bering Strait , and  the  state of Hawaii is in the mid-North  प्रशांत  .
The  देश   भी  has five populated and nine  unpopulated  territories in the Pacific and the  caribbean  .
at  3.79 million square miles ( 9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315 million people  ,  the United States is  the  third- or fourth-largest country by total  क्षेत्रफल  and the third-largest  by  both land area and population  .
It is one of the world 's most ethnically diverse and multicultural nations , the product of large-scale immigration from many countries .
The geography and climate of the U.S. is also extremely diverse  ,   साथ  deserts  ,  plains , forests , and mountains that are home to a wide variety of species .
Paleoindians migrated from Asia to what is now the United  राज्य   मेनलैंड  around 15,000 years ago  .
After 1500 , Old World diseases introduced by Europeans  greatly  reduced their populations .
European colonization began around 1600 and came mostly from England .
The United States emerged from  तेरह  British colonies located along  the  Atlantic seaboard .
Disputes between Great  ब्रिटेन  and the American colonies led to the  अमरीकी  Revolution  .
On July 4 , 1776 , delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously issued the Declaration of Independence , which established the United States of America .
The American Revolutionary War ,  जिससे  ended with the recognition of independence of the United States from the Kingdom of Great  ब्रिटेन  , was the first successful war of independence against a European colonial empire .
The current Constitution  थी  adopted on September 17 ,  1787  ; twenty-seven Amendments have since been added to the Constitution .
the  first ten amendments , collectively named the Bill of Rights , were ratified in 1791 and guarantee many  आधारभूत  civil rights and freedoms .
Driven by the doctrine of manifest destiny ,  the   संयुक्त  States embarked  on  a vigorous expansion across North America throughout the  19th  century .
This involved displacing native tribes , acquiring new territories ,  और  gradually admitting new states .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War ended legalized slavery in the United States .
by  the end of the nineteenth century ,  the  United  राज्य  extended into the  प्रशांत  Ocean , and its economy was the world 's largest .
The Spanish–American War  और  confirmed  the  country 's status as  a   वैश्विक  military  शक्ति  .
The  संयुक्त  States emerged from as a global superpower ,  the  first country with nuclear weapons , and a permanent member of the United Nations  सुरक्षा  Council .
The end of the Cold War and the dissolution of the Soviet Union left the United States as the sole superpower .
The United States is a developed country and has the world 's largest national economy ,  साथ  an estimated 2012 GDP of $ 15.6 trillion 19 % of global GDP  at  purchasing-power parity  ,  as of  2011   .
The  प्रति   capita   जीडीपी  of the  u.S.  was the  संसार  's sixth-highest  as  of 2010  ,  although America 's  माल  inequality was also ranked highest among OECD countries by the World Bank .
The economy is fueled by an abundance of natural resources  ,  a well-developed infrastructure , and  ऊँची  productivity ; and while its economy is considered post-industrial it continues  to  be one of the world 's largest  निर्माताओं  .
The  देश  accounts for 39  %  of global military spending  ,   और  is  a  leading economic ,  राजनैतिक  , and cultural force in  the  world , as well as  a   नेता  in scientific research and technological innovation .
The NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination tournament  निभाई  each spring in the  संयुक्त  States , currently featuring 68 college basketball teams ,  to   determine  the  नेशनल  championship of the major college basketball teams .
the  tournament , organized  by   the   नेशनल  Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA )  ,  was created during 1939 by the National Association of Basketball Coaches , and was the idea of Ohio State University coach Harold Olsen .
Played mostly during March  ,  it is known informally as March Madness or the Big  नृत्य   ,  and has become one of the most famous  सालाना  sporting events  in  the United States .
The NCAA has credited  bob  Walsh of the Seattle Organizing Committee for starting the March Madness celebration during 1984 .
The tournament teams include champions from 31 Division  i  conferences ( which receive automatic bids ) , and 37 teams which are awarded at-large berths .
These `` at-large  ''  teams are chosen by an NCAA selection committee , as detailed below .
The 64 teams are divided into four regions and organized into a  सिंगल  elimination ``  कोष्ठक  '' , which predetermines , when a team wins a game , which team it will face next .
Each team  is  `` seeded  ''  , or ranked , within its region .
After an initial four games between eight lower-ranked teams , the  टूर्नामेंट  occurs during the course of three weekends , at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States .
Lower-ranked teams are placed in the bracket against higher ranked teams .
Each weekend eliminates  three-fourths  of the teams , from a round  of  64 , to a `` Sweet Sixteen '' , and for the  पिछला  weekend of  the  Tournament a Final  चार  ; the Final Four is usually played during the first weekend of April .
These  चार  teams , one from each region , then compete in  एक  location  लिये  the  नेशनल  championship .
The tournament has been at least partially televised since 1969  .
Presently , the  खेल  are reported by CBS ,  tbs  , TNT , and  trutv  by the trade-name NCAA March Madness .
चूंकि  2011  ,  all games are available for  देखने  nationwide .
As television coverage has grown , so too has the tournament 's popularity .
Presently , millions of Americans `` fill out  a  bracket '' , predicting winners of all 67 games .
With 11 national titles  ,  UCLA has the record for the most NCAA  मेन  's Division I Basketball Championships ; John Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles .
The University of Kentucky is second  ,  with 8 national titles , while Indiana University and the University  of  North Carolina are  tied  for third with 5 national titles .
Duke University ranks fifth with 4 national titles .
a  sample of synthetic motor oil
Synthetic oil is a lubricant consisting of chemical compounds that  हैं  artificially made ( synthesized ) .
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically modified petroleum components rather than whole crude oil , but can also be synthesized  इससे  other  कच्चा  materials .
Synthetic oil is used  as  a substitute for  स्नेहक  refined from petroleum when operating  in  extremes of  तापमान  , because ,  in   सामान्य  , it  provides  superior mechanical and chemical  गुण  than those  मिला  in traditional mineral oils .
वायुयान  jet engines  ,  for example , require the use of synthetic oils ,  whereas  aircraft piston engines do not .
Jackass is an  अमरीकी  reality series , originally shown  on  MTV from 2000 to 2002 , featuring people performing various dangerous , crude self-injuring stunts  और  pranks .
The show served as a launchpad for the television and acting  करियर  of Bam Margera , Steve-O  ,  and also Johnny Knoxville , who previously  था  only a few minor acting roles .
Since 2002 , three Jackass films have been produced and released by MTV corporate sibling Paramount Pictures , continuing the franchise after its  चलाएं  on television .
The show sparked several spin-offs including Viva  la  Bam , Wildboyz , Homewrecker , Dr. Steve-O and Blastazoid .
the  show placed # 68 on Entertainment Weekly `` New TV Classics '' list .
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born November 3 , 1952 ) is an American actress , comedienne  ,  writer , television producer , director  ,  and  2012  presidential nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party .
barr  began her career in stand-up comedy  at  clubs before gaining fame for  उसके  role in the  sitcom  Roseanne .
The show  थी  a hit and lasted  नौ   सीज़न  , from 1988 to 1997 .
She won both an Emmy and a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress  लिये  her work on the show .
Barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class  घरेलू  goddess '' persona in the eight years preceding her sitcom and wanted to do a  यथार्थवादी  show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism .
The granddaughter of immigrants from Europe and Russia , Barr was the oldest of four children in a working-class Jewish Salt Lake  नगर  family ; she was also active in the LDS Church .
In  1974  ,  वो  married Bill Pentland , with whom she had three children , before divorcing in  1990  and marrying  हास्य  Tom Arnold for four  सालो  .
Controversy arose  जब  she sang `` The Star-Spangled Banner ``  off-key  at a 1990 nationally  aired  baseball game , followed by grabbing her crotch and spitting .
After her sitcom ended , she launched  उसके  own talk show , The Roseanne Show , which aired from 1998  to  2000 .
In 2005  ,  she returned  to  stand-up comedy with a world tour .
In 2011 , she starred in an unscripted TV show , Roseanne 's Nuts , that lasted from  जुलाई   to  September of  कि  year  ,  about her  जीवन  on a Hawaiian farm  .
In early 2012 , Barr announced her candidacy for the Presidential nomination of the Green Party .
barr  lost the nomination to Jill Stein .
She then sought the presidential nomination of the Peace and Freedom Party , which she won on  अगस्त  4 , 2012 .
barr  received  61,971  votes in the  सामान्य  election ,  रखकर   छठे  overall  .
Francesco Albani  's   17th  century Baptism of  मसीह  is a typical depiction with  the  sky opening and the  पावन  Spirit descending as a dove .
The baptism of Jesus marks the beginning of his public ministry .
This event is  अंकित  in the canonical gospels  of  Matthew ,  चिह्नित  and  ल्यूक  .
John 's gospel does  नहीं  describe Jesus ' baptism , but John the Baptist  करता   गवाही   of  the other things in .
In the  नई  Testament , John the  बैपटिस्ट  preached the baptism  of  repentance for the remission of sins ( ) , and declared himself a forerunner of he that would baptize `` with the Holy Ghost  और  with fire '' ( ) .
In so doing he was preparing the way for Jesus .
Jesus  आए  to the Jordan River where he was baptized by John  .
The baptismal scene includes the heavens opening  ,  a dove-like descent of the Holy Spirit , and a voice from heaven saying , `` This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .  ''
Most modern scholars view the fact that Jesus  थी  baptized by John as  an  historical event  to  which a high  उपाधि  of certainty can be assigned .
Along with the  crucifixion  of  यीशु  most scholars view it  as  one of the two historically certain facts about him , and often use it as the starting points for the study of  the  historical  यीशु  .
The baptism  is  one of the five  प्रमुख  milestones in  the  gospel narrative of the life of  यीशु  , the others being the Transfiguration , Crucifixion  ,  Resurrection , and Ascension .
Most Christian denominations view  the  baptism of Jesus as an important event and a basis for the  ईसाई  rite of baptism ( see also )  .
In Eastern Christianity ,  यीशु  ' baptism is commemorated on 6 January , the feast of Epiphany .
In the  रोमन  Catholic Church , the Anglican Communion , the  लूथरन  Churches and some other Western denominations , it  is  recalled on a day within the following week ,  the  feast of the baptism of the Lord .
In Roman Catholicism , the baptism of Jesus is one of the Luminous  रहस्यों  sometimes added to the Rosary .
It is a Trinitarian feast in the Eastern Orthodox Churches .
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of vitamin B12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 ,  भी  called cobalamin , is  a   water-soluble  vitamin with a key role in the normal functioning of the brain  और  nervous system , and for the formation of blood .
it  is one  of  the eight B vitamins .
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body  ,  especially affecting DNA synthesis and regulation , but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither fungi , plants ,  nor  animals are capable of producing vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis , although many foods are a natural source of  b12  because of bacterial  symbiosis  .
The vitamin is  the  largest and most  structurally  complicated vitamin and can be  उत्पादित  industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12  consists  of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ) ,  सब  of which have vitamin activity .
It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt .
Biosynthesis of the basic  ढांचा  of the  विटामिन  is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin  )  ,  लकिन  conversion between different forms of the  विटामिन  can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of  the  vitamin , cyanocobalamin , does not occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements , and  as  a food additive , because of its stability  और  lower production cost .
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin  और  adenosylcobalamin  ,  leaving behind the  साइनाइड   ,  albeit in minimal concentration  .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin ,  methylcobalamin  , and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological  उत्पाद  and food supplements .
The extra utility of these is  फिलहाल  debated .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible  लिये  secreting  मूलभूत  factor  हैं   नष्ट  .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12 ,  so  a lack of intrinsic factor , as seen in  घातक   रक्ताल्पता  , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated .
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 war film  उत्पादित  , directed and co-written by Stanley Kubrick .
It is an adaptation  of   गुस्ताव  Hasford 's 1979 novel The  short-timers  and stars Matthew Modine , Vincent D'Onofrio , R. Lee Ermey , Arliss Howard , and Adam Baldwin .
The film follows a platoon of U.S. Marines  through  their training and the experiences of two of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War .
the  film 's title refers to the full metal jacket bullet used by infantry riflemen .
The film received critical acclaim .
It received an Academy Award nomination for Best Adapted Screenplay for Kubrick , Michael Herr and Gustav Hasford .
in  2001  ,  the American Film Institute  लगाई  Full Metal Jacket at #  95  in their ``  एएफआई  's 100 Years  ...  100 Thrills `` poll .
TMZ is a celebrity news website that debuted on November 8 , 2005 .
It was a collaboration between  एओएल  and Telepictures Productions  ,  a division of Warner Bros.  ,  until Time Warner  divested  AOL in 2009 .
However , it remained affiliated with AOL News and has the  एओएल  News logo affixed in the upper right  कोने  .
The name TMZ  स्टैंड  for the historic `` studio  मण्डल   ``  or 30-mile zone radius from the intersection of West Beverly Boulevard and North La Cienega  boulevard  in Los Angeles .
TMZ 's managing  एडिटर  is  घनघोर  Levin , a lawyer-turned-journalist who was previously a legal expert for  the  Los Angeles television station KCBS-TV .
The site claims that it does not pay for stories or interviews ; however ,  levin  has  admitted  that TMZ does `` sometimes  अदा  sources for leads on stories '' .
Levin has stated that `` everything is researched and vetted for accuracy .  ''
A companion TV series , TMZ on TV ,  debuted  on September 10  ,  2007 .
Scream 3 is a 2000 American slasher  फिल्मी   निर्मित  by Kevin Williamson ,  निर्देशित  by Wes Craven and written by Ehren Kruger , starring Neve Campbell , Courteney Cox Arquette and David Arquette .
it  was released  on  February 4 ,  2000  as the third installment in the Scream  फिल्मी   श्रेणी  .
The events of the story are set three years after those of  चीख  2 and follows Sidney Prescott ( Campbell ) who has gone into self-imposed isolation following the events of the previous two films but is drawn to Hollywood  बाद  a  नई  Ghostface begins killing  the  cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 '' .
Scream 3 combines the violence of the slasher genre with comedy and ``  whodunit  `` mystery while  satirizing  the cliché of  फिल्मी  trilogies .
Unlike the previous Scream films , there was an  increased  emphasis on  comedic  elements  और  the violence and horror  थी  reduced in response to increased public scrutiny about violence in media following the Columbine High School massacre .
The film was the  concluding  chapter of  the  Scream series until  it   थी  revived with a sequel , Scream  4  , in 2011 .
Williamson provided a five-page outline for  दो  sequels to  चीख  when auctioning his original script , hoping to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise .
Williamson 's commitments to other projects meant he was unable  to  develop a complete script for Scream 3 and writing duties were undertaken by Ehren Kruger who discarded much of  विलियमसन  's  टीप  .
Craven and Marco Beltrami returned to  सीधा  and score the film respectively as they had  साथ  the previous  दो  series entries  .
Production was troubled with script rewrites , with pages sometimes only ready on the day of filming , and scheduling difficulties with the main cast .
Scream 3 performed  दोनो  financially and  critically  worse than its  preceding  films , earning over  $  161 million and with many critics claiming that the film had become what Scream originally  ``  spoofed `` .
Despite negative criticism the  फिल्मी  did receive praise with reviewers calling it the perfect end to the Scream trilogy .
As of 2012 , the film is currently the number 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in North America , following Scream at number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2  .
The film 's soundtrack was well-received , spending fourteen  सप्ताह  on the Billboard 200 and reaching a high of # 32 .
Shoulder impingement syndrome , also  पुकारा  painful arc syndrome , supraspinatus syndrome , swimmer 's shoulder , and thrower 's shoulder , is  a  clinical syndrome which occurs when the tendons of the rotator cuff  मांसपेशियां  become irritated and inflamed  as   वे  pass through the  subacromial  space , the passage beneath the acromion .
This can  परिणाम  in  पीड़ा  , weakness and loss of movement at the shoulder .
JLA was a monthly comic book published by DC Comics from January 1997  to   अप्रैल  2006 featuring  the  Justice League .
The colonial history of the United States covers the history of European settlements from the start of colonization of America until their incorporation into the United States .
In the late 16th century , England , France  ,  Spain and the Netherlands launched major colonization programs in eastern  उत्तर  America .
Small early attempts—such  as  the English Lost Colony of Roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the death rate of the first arrivals was very  ऊँची  .
Nevertheless successful colonies were  स्थापित  .
यूरोपीय  settlers came from a variety of social and religious groups .
No aristocrats settled permanently  ,  but a number of adventurers ,  सैनिको  , farmers , and tradesmen arrived .
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland , the Swedes and Finns of New Sweden , the English Quakers of Pennsylvania , the English Puritans  of  New England , the English  settlers  of  jamestown  , and the `` worthy poor '' of Georgia , came to the new  महाद्वीप  and built colonies with distinctive social , religious , political  और  economic styles .
occasionally  one colony took  कंट्रोल  of another ( during wars between their European parents ) .
Only in Nova Scotia ( now part of Canada ) did the conquerors expel the previous colonists .
Instead they all lived side by  पक्ष  in peace .
There were no major civil wars among the 13 colonies , and the two chief armed rebellions ( in Virginia in 1676 and  in  New York in 1689–91 ) were short-lived failures .
Wars  between  the French and the British—the  फ्रेंच  and Indian Wars and Father Rale 's War —were recurrent , and involved French-support for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers .
By 1760 France was  पराजित  and the British seized  इसके   colonies  .
The four distinct regions were : New England  ,  the Middle Colonies , the Chesapeake Bay Colonies (  अपर  South ) and the Lower South .
Some  इतिहासकारों  add a fifth region , the  frontier  , which  थी  never separately organized .
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650 , the majority of the Native Americans living in the eastern United States had been decimated by new diseases  ,  introduced to them decades before by explorers  और  sailors  .
See timeline of Colonial America for list of historical events .
Gloria Laura Vanderbilt  (  born February 20 , 1924 ) is an American artist , author , actress , heiress ,  और  socialite most noted as  an  early developer of designer blue jeans  .
She  is  a member of the prominent Vanderbilt  परिवार  of New York and the mother of CNN 's Anderson Cooper .
Greece  (  Romanization of Greek| ) , officially  the  Hellenic  गणतंत्र  ( ' ) , is a  देश  in  southeast  Europe .
according  to the  2011  census , Greece 's population is around 11  लाख  .
Athens is the nation 's capital  और  largest city , its urban area also including Piraeus .
Greece is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe , Asia , the Middle East  ,  and  अफ़्रीकी  , and has land borders with Albania , the Republic of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north , and Turkey to the northeast .
The Aegean Sea lies to the  ईस्ट  of mainland  यूनानियों  , the Ionian Sea to the west  ,  and the Mediterranean  समुद्र  to the south .
Greece  रै  the 11th  longest  coastline in the world at in length , featuring a vast number of islands ( approximately 1,400 , of which 227 are inhabited )  ,  including Crete , the Dodecanese , the Cyclades , and the Ionian Islands among others .
Eighty percent of  यूनानियों  consists of mountains , of which Mount Olympus is the highest  at  .
Modern Greece traces its roots to the civilization of Ancient Greece  ,  generally considered the cradle of Western civilization .
As such , it is the birthplace of democracy , Western philosophy , the Olympic Games , Western literature and historiography , political science , major scientific  और   गणितीय   सिद्धान्त  , and Western drama , including both tragedy and comedy .
This legacy is partly reflected  in  the seventeen UNESCO World  विरासत  Sites located in Greece , ranking it 7th in Europe and 13th in the world .
The modern Greek state was established in 1830  ,  following the Greek War  of  Independence .
Greece is  a  founding  सदस्य  of the United Nations , has been a member of  कया  is now the European Union  चूंकि  1981 ( and the eurozone since 2001  )  , and has been  a  member of  नाटो  since 1952 .
यूनानियों   is  a developed country with an advanced , high-income economy and very high standards of  जीना  , including  the   संसार  's 21st highest  विशेषता  of life as of 2010 .
Greece  's   अर्थव्यवस्था  is also the largest in the Balkans , where Greece is an important regional investor .
A prime meridian is a meridian , i.e . a line of longitude , at which longitude is defined to be 0° .
A prime meridian and its opposite in a 360°-system , the 180th meridian ( at  180°  longitude ) , form a great circle .
This great circle divides the  गोला  , e.g . the Earth , into two  बांटती  .
If one uses directions of East and West  इससे  a defined  प्रधान   मध्याह्न  , then they  can  be called Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere .
Gerardus Mercator in his  एटलस  Cosmographicae (  1595  ) uses a prime  मध्याह्न  somewhere close to 25°W , passing  बस  to the west of Santa  मरिया  Island in the  अटलांटिक  .
His 180th meridian runs along the Strait of Anián ( Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is  ultimately  arbitrary , unlike an equator , which is determined by the axis of rotation—and  विभिन्न  conventions have been used  or  advocated  in  different regions and throughout history .
Minka Dumont Kelly ( born Minka Dumont  dufay  ;  जून  24 , 1980  )  is an American actress .
She is perhaps best known for  उसके  roles in Charlie 's Angels , Friday Night Lights , and  the  Roommate .
R.O.B . ( Robotic Operating Buddy ) , released in Japan as the , is an  accessory   लिये  the Nintendo Entertainment  प्रणाली   (   एनईएस  ) .
It  थी  released in July 1985 in Japan and later that year in North America .
It had a short product lifespan ,  साथ  support for only two games which comprised the ``  रोबोट  Series '' ; Gyromite and  stack-up  .
R.O.B . was released with the intention of  portraying  the Nintendo Entertainment System  as  something  अनोखा   in   अनुक्रम  to alleviate retail fears following the video game crash of 1983 .
R.O.B . was available in the  डीलक्स  Set , a configuration for the console that included  ,  among other things , R.O.B .  और  Gyromite .
Stack-Up was purchased separately and included its  अपना  physical game pieces .
The Walking Liberty half dollar was a silver 50-cent piece  or  half  डालर  coin issued by the United States Mint from 1916 to 1947 ; it was designed by Adolph A. Weinman .
in  1915 , the new Mint Director , Robert W.  woolley   ,   आए   to  believe that he was not  तभी  allowed but required by  विधि  to replace coin designs that had been in use for 25 years .
He therefore began the process  of   replacing  the Barber coinage :  dimes  , quarters  और   हाफ  dollars , all  bearing  similar designs by long-time Mint Engraver Charles E. Barber , and first struck in 1892 .
Woolley had the Commission of Fine Arts conduct a competition ,  as  a result of which Weinman was selected to design the dime and half dollar .
Weinman 's design of Liberty  striding  towards the Sun for the half dollar proved difficult to perfect , and Treasury Secretary William G.  mcadoo  , whose department included the  मिंट  ,  माना  having Barber create his own design .
Mint officials were successful in getting Weinman 's design into production , although it never struck very well ,  जिससे  may have been a factor in its replacement by the Franklin half  डालर  beginning in 1948 .
Nevertheless , art historian Cornelius Vermeule considered the piece to be among the most beautiful US coins .
Since 1986 , a modification of Weinman 's obverse design has been used for the American Silver Eagle .
The  टोयोटा  4Runner is a  mid-size  sport utility vehicle ( SUV ) produced by the Japanese manufacturer Toyota and sold  throughout  the world from  1984  to present .
In Japan it  थी  known as the Toyota Hilux Surf .
The original 4Runner was a  कॉम्पैक्ट  SUV  और  little more  than  a Toyota pickup truck with  a  fiberglass shell over the bed ,  लकिन  the model has since undergone significant independent development  into  a cross between a compact and  a  mid-size SUV  .
All 4Runners have been built at Toyota 's Tahara plant in Tahara , Aichi ,  जापानी  , or at Hino Motors  '  Hamura , Japan plant  ,  and in Brazil  .
Its  mid-size  crossover SUV  बंटवारा   is  the Toyota Highlander .
This article deals with  आयुर्विज्ञान  as practiced by trained professionals from  प्राचीन  times to the present .
the  ancient  उन्होंने  had a system  of  medicine that was very advanced for its time and influenced later medical traditions .
The Egyptians and Babylonians both  introduced  the concepts  of   निदान  , prognosis , and medical examination .
The Greeks went even further , and advanced as well medical ethics .
The Hippocratic Oath , still taken by doctors today , was written in Greece in the 5th century  bce  .
In the medieval era , surgical practices inherited from the ancient masters  यहूद  improved and then  systematized  in  rogerius  's The  अभ्यास  of Surgery .
Universities began systematic training of physicians around the years 1220 in Italy .
During the Renaissance , understanding of anatomy improved , and the microscope was invented .
The germ theory of disease in the  19th  century led to cures for many  संक्रामक  diseases .
Military doctors advanced the methods of  आघात  treatment and surgery .
Public health  उपायों  were  विकसित  especially in the 19th century as the rapid growth of  शहरों   जरूरी  systematic  sanitary  measures .
Advanced research  centers  opened in the early 20th century , often connected with major hospitals .
The  mid-20th  century was characterized by new  biological  treatments , such as antibiotics .
These advancements , along with developments in chemistry , genetics , and lab technology (  ऐसे  as  the  x-ray ) led  to   आधुनिक  medicine  .
Medicine was heavily professionalized in the 20th century , and new careers opened to women as  नर्स  ( from the  1870s  ) and as physicians ( especially after  1970  ) .
The 21st century is characterized by very advanced research involving numerous fields of science .
The Hippocratic Corpus , is a collection of early medical  works  from ancient Greece strongly associated with the ancient Greek physician Hippocrates and his  शिक्षाओं  .
Potassium is a chemical element with  प्रतीक  K ( from Neo-Latin kalium ) and atomic number 19 .
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white alkali metal  कि  oxidizes rapidly in air and is very reactive with water  ,   generating  sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame .
Because potassium  और  sodium are chemically very similar , their  लवण  were not at first differentiated .
The existence of multiple elements in their salts was suspected from 1702 , and this was proven in 1807 when potassium and sodium were individually isolated from different salts  by  electrolysis .
Potassium in nature occurs only  in  ionic  लवण  .
As such  ,  it is found  dissolved  in seawater ( which is 0.04 % potassium by weight  )  , and  is  part of many minerals .
Most  औद्योगिक   रासायनिक  applications of  पोटैशियम  employ the relatively high solubility in water  of  potassium compounds ,  ऐसे  as potassium soaps .
Potassium metal has  तभी  a few special applications , being  replaced  in most chemical reactions  साथ  sodium metal .
Potassium ions are necessary for the function of all living cells .
Potassium ion  diffusion  is a key mechanism in nerve transmission , and potassium depletion in animals , including humans , results in various cardiac dysfunctions .
Potassium accumulates in plant cells , and thus fresh fruits and vegetables  हैं  a good dietary  सोर्स   of  it .
Conversely ,  सबसे  plants except specialist halophytes are intolerant of salt , and sodium  is  present in them only  in   कम  concentration .
This resulted in potassium first being isolated from potash , the ashes of plants , giving the element its name  .
For the same  कारण  , heavy crop production rapidly depletes  soils  of potassium , and agricultural fertilizers consume  95  %  of  global potassium chemical  उत्पादन   .
the  Singapore dollar or dollar ( sign  :  $ ; code  :  SGD ) is the official currency of Singapore .
It is  सामान्यतः   abbreviated  with  the  dollar sign $ , or alternatively S $ to distinguish it from  अन्य  dollar -denominated currencies .
It is divided into 100 cents .
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei Currency and Monetary Board still maintain the historic exchangeability of their two currencies , the Singaporean dollar and the Brunei  डालर   ,  respectively .
The dollar is accepted as `` customary tender  ''  in Brunei according to the Currency Interchangeability Agreement .
Likewise , the Brunei dollar is customarily accepted in Singapore
James Samuel Coleman  (  May 12 , 1926 – March 25 ,  1995  ) was an American sociologist  ,  theorist and empirical researcher ,  आधारित  chiefly at the University of Chicago  .
He was elected president of the American Sociological Association .
Coleman studied the sociology of education , public policy , and  थी  one of the earliest users  of  the term `` social capital `` .
His Foundations of Social Theory influenced sociological  सिद्धान्त  .
His The Adolescent  समाज  ( 1961 ) and `` Coleman Report '' ( Equality of Educational Opportunity , 1966 ) were two of the most heavily cited books in educational  समाजशास्त्र  .
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform educational theory , reshape  नेशनल  education policies  ,  and influenced public and scholarly opinion regarding the role of schooling in determining equality and productivity in the United States .
Superman (  इससे  DC comics )  थी  the first superhero created , art by  जिम  Lee .
A superhero ( sometimes rendered  super-hero  or super  नायिका  ) is a type  of  stock character possessing ``  असाधारण  or superhuman powers '' and  समर्पित  to protecting the public .
Since the debut of the prototypical superhero Superman in 1938 , stories of superheroes—ranging  इससे  brief episodic  adventures  to continuing years-long sagas—have dominated American  कॉमिक  books and crossed over into other media .
The  शब्द  itself dates to at least 1917 .
A female  सुपरहीरो  is sometimes called  a  superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or super heroine ) .
`` SUPER  नायक  '' is a trademark co-owned by DC  कॉमिक्स  and Marvel Comics  .
By  सबसे  definitions , characters do not strictly require actual superhuman powers to be deemed superheroes , although terms such as costumed  अपराधों  fighters or masked vigilantes are  sometimes  used to refer  to   those  such as Batman and Green Arrow without such powers who  share  other common superhero traits .
Such characters were generally referred to as `` mystery men '' in the so-called Golden Age  of  Comic Books to distinguish them from characters with super-powers .
Normally , superheroes use their powers  to  counter day-to-day crime while also  combating  threats  विरूद्ध  humanity by supervillains , their criminal counterparts .
Often , one of these supervillains will be the superhero 's archenemy .
As well , some longrunning superheroes  ,  such as Superman , Batman , Spider-Man and Iron Man each has a rogues gallery of enemies .
As  खूब  , superheroes sometimes  होगा  combat such irregular  खतरे  as aliens , magical/ fantasy entities , American war  दुश्मनों  such as  नात्सीवाद  or communism , and  godlike  or demonic creatures .
The following is a historical  सूची  of actors and primary  अक्षर  roles which appear on the American  साबुन  opera One Life to Live .
The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont and  अभिनीत  Tim Robbins and Morgan  फ्रीमैन  .
Adapted from the  स्टीफन  King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption , the film tells the story  of  Andy Dufresne , a banker who spends nearly  दो  decades in Shawshank State Prison for the  हत्या  of his wife and her lover despite his  दावा  of innocence .
दौरान  his time at  the  prison , he  befriends  a  fellow  inmate , Ellis Boyd `` Red '' Redding , and finds himself protected by the guards after the warden begins using him in his money laundering operation .
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget , the film received favorable  समीक्षाएँ  from critics  ,   अनेक  award nominations , and has since enjoyed a remarkable life on cable television , VHS , DVD , and Blu-ray .
It was included in the American Film Institute 's 100 Years ... 100 Movies  10th  Anniversary Edition .
IT management is the discipline whereby  सब  of the technology resources of a  कड़  are managed in accordance with its needs and priorities  .
These resources may include tangible  निवेश  like  कंप्यूटर  hardware , software  ,  data , networks and data centre facilities , as well as the staffs who are hired to maintain them .
Managing this responsibility within a company entails many of  the  basic management functions , like budgeting , staffing , and organizing and controlling , along with other aspects that are unique to technology , like change management , software design , network planning , tech support etc .
The Penitentiary of New  मैक्सिको  Prison Riot , which took place on February 2 and 3  ,  1980  ,  in the state 's maximum security prison south of  सांता   fe  , was one  of  the most violent prison riots in the history of the American correctional system  :  33 inmates died and more  than  200 inmates were treated for injuries .
None of the 12 officers taken hostage were killed , but seven were treated for injuries caused by beatings and rapes .
This was the third  प्रमुख  riot at  the  NM State Penitentiary  ,  the first occurring on 19 July 1922 and the second on 15 June 1953 .
Author Roger Morris suggests the  मौत  toll may  have  been higher , as a number of bodies were incinerated or dismembered during the  कोर्स  of the mayhem .

The Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a North American bird in the genus Cardinalis ; it is also known colloquially as the  redbird  or common cardinal .
It can be found in southern Canada , through the eastern United States from Maine to Texas  और  south through Mexico .
it  is found in  वुडलैंड्स  , gardens , shrublands , and swamps .
the  Northern Cardinal is a mid-sized songbird with a body length of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ) .
It has a  distinctive  crest on the head and a mask on the face which is black in the male and gray  in  the female  .
the  male is a vibrant red , while  the  female  is  a dull  red-brown  shade .
the  Northern Cardinal is mainly granivorous , but also feeds on insects and fruit .
The male behaves territorially ,  अंकन  out his territory with song .
During courtship , the male feeds seed to the  मादा  beak-to-beak  .
A clutch  of  three to four eggs is laid , and two to four clutches are produced each year .
It was once prized as a pet , but  इसके  sale as cage birds is now banned  in  the  संयुक्त  States by the Migratory Bird Treaty Act of 1918 .
Surface runoff , also called nonpoint source pollution , from a farm  फ़ील्ड   in  Iowa during a rain storm .
Topsoil as well as farm fertilizers and other potential pollutants run off  unprotected  farm fields when heavy rains occur .
Topsoil is  the  upper , outermost layer of soil , usually the top to .
It has the highest concentration of  सशुल्क  matter  और  microorganisms and  is   जहाँ  most of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs .
Musical  cryptogram  : `` Aschbeg ''  नियत  in Schoenberg 's Sechs kleine Klavierstücke , Op . 19 , no . 1  ,  m. 5 .
Note that the notes do not come in spelling order but  हैं  all adjacent (  नहीं   अलग  by other notes )  .
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke , Op . 19  (  or Six Little Piano Pieces ) is a set of pieces for solo piano  लिखा  by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg , published in 1913 .
मैक्एफ़ी   ,  Inc. ( ) is an American global computer  सुरक्षा  software company headquartered in Santa Clara , California , and the world 's largest dedicated  सुरक्षा  technology company .
As of February 28 , 2011 , McAfee is a  wholly  owned subsidiary of Intel .

Saint  रीता  of  cascia  ( Born Margherita Lotti  1381  - May 22 , 1457 ) was an Italian Augustinian nun , widow and  संत  venerated in the Roman Catholic Church .
Rita  थी  married at an early age .
The marriage lasted for 18 years , during which she is remembered for her Christian values as a model wife and mother who  बना  efforts to convert her husband from  उसके  abusive behavior .
Upon the murder of her husband by another feuding family , she sought to dissuade her sons from revenge .
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of religious sisters , where she was known for practicing mortification of the flesh , along with  the  apparent  efficacy  of her prayers  .
St. Rita  is  venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession , and is often portrayed with a bleeding wound on her  माथे  , which the Roman Catholic Church claims  to  have been a partial stigmata .
The Roman Catholic Church , under the pontificate of Pope  leo  XIII officially canonized  रीता  on  may  24 , 1900 ,  जबकि  her feast day  is  celebrated every May 22 .
in   अनेक  pious Catholic countries , Rita is known to be a patroness for abused wives and mourning  महिलाओं  .
North America is a continent wholly within  the  Northern Hemisphere and almost wholly within the Western  गोलार्ध  .
It is also considered  a  northern  उपमहाद्वीप  of the Americas .
It is bordered to the north by the Arctic Ocean , to the east by the Atlantic Ocean , to the west  और  south by  the  Pacific Ocean  ,  and to the southeast  by   दक्षिण  America and the Caribbean Sea .
North America covers an area of about 24,709,000  वर्गाकार  kilometers ( 9,540,000 square miles ) , about 4.8  %  of the planet 's surface or about 16.5 % of its land area .
As of July 2008 ,  इसके  population was  अनुमानित  at  nearly  529 million  लोगों  across 23 independent states , representing about 7.5 % of the human population .
North  अमेरिका  is the third-largest continent in area , following Asia and Africa  ,  and the fourth in population  बाद  Asia , Africa ,  और  Europe .
The  पहला  people to  सजीव  in North America were  paleoindians  who began to arrive during the  पिछला  glacial period by crossing the  बेरिंग  land  सेतु  .
They differentiated  into  a number of diverse cultures and communities across the continent .
The largest and most advanced  pre-columbian  civilizations in North America were the Aztecs in what is now Mexico and the Mayans in Central America .
European colonists  began  to arrive  starting  in the 16th and 17th centuries , wiping out large  संख्याएँ  of the native populations and beginning an  era  of European dominance .
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January  28  , 1985 ) , better known by his stage name J. Cole , is an American hip-hop recording artist and record producer from Fayetteville ,  उत्तर  Carolina .
in  2009 , he  became  the first artist to sign to Jay-Z 's Roc Nation label .
His long-awaited debut album , entitled Cole World : The Sideline Story , was released on September  27  , 2011 .
The album debuted at number one on the US  बिलबोर्ड   200  , Top  r   &   b  Albums and Top Rap Albums chart , selling more  than  218,000 in its first week .
He received a nomination for Best New Artist at the 54th Grammy Awards .
The two main characters of the series  ,  Ratchet (  सही  ) and Clank ( left  )  .
ratchet  & Clank is a  श्रेणी  of platform video games .
The franchise was created and developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles , such as PlayStation 2 and  प्लेस्टेशन  3 with the exclusion of Size Matters and Secret Agent Clank , which were developed by High  प्रभाव  Games for the PlayStation Portable .
Every game in  the  series has been released for every console , as the  ip  is owned by Sony Computer Entertainment .
An animated  विशेषता  film adaptation produced by Rainmaker Entertainment  और  Blockade Entertainment is  अनुसूचित   लिये  a theatrical release sometime  in  2015 .
The games take place in a science  fiction  setting and follow the adventures of Ratchet ( an animalistic human-like character known as a Lombax  ,  who  is  a mechanic  )  and Clank ( a  diminutive  , sentient robot ) as they travel through  the  universe , saving it from evil forces  on  a regular basis .
The  श्रेणी  is noted for the inclusion of many exotic and  अद्वितीय  , over the top weapons  और  devices , a concept  कि  Insomniac Games also  विस्तारित  into  उनके  other games  .
A will or testament is  a  legal  घोषणा   by  which a person  ,  the testator , names one or  अधिक  persons to manage his/her estate and provides for the transfer of his property at  मौत  .
For the devolution of property  नहीं  disposed of by  होगा  , see inheritance and intestacy .
In the strictest sense  ,  a `` will '' has historically been limited to real property  जबकि  `` testament '' applies  तभी  to dispositions of personal property ( thus giving rise to the popular title of the document as `` Last Will and  वसीयत  '' ) , though this distinction is seldom observed today .
A will may also create a testamentary trust that is effective only after the death of the testator .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply power  24  hours a  दिन   .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat  इससे  the sun ,  रै  been harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis , which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most  तात्कालिक  energy  समस्याएं  the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending  on  the  रास्ता  they  कैप्चर  , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques include  the  use of photovoltaic panels and  सौर  thermal  collectors  to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials  साथ  favorable thermal mass or light  dispersing  properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the  विकास  of affordable , inexhaustible and  साफ  solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits .
it  will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource , enhance sustainability , reduce pollution , lower the costs of  mitigating  climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise  .
These advantages are global  .
Hence  the  additional costs of the incentives for early  deployment  should be considered learning investments ;  वे   जरूर  be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
सर  Thomas More ( ; 7 February 14786 July 1535 ) , known  to  Roman Catholics as Saint Thomas More since 1935 , was an English lawyer , social philosopher , author , statesman , and noted Renaissance humanist .
He was an important councillor to Henry  viii  of England and was Lord Chancellor from October 1529 to 16  may  1532 .
He  थी  canonized  by  Pope Pius XI in 1935 as one of the early  शहीदो  of the schism that separated the Church of England  इससे  Rome in the  16th  century .
In 2000 , Pope John Paul II declared him patron of Catholic statesmen and politicians .
More was an opponent of the Protestant Reformation , in particular of Martin Luther and William Tyndale .
however  , since 1980 , he is also commemorated by the Church of England as  a  reformation martyr .
अधिक  coined the  शब्द  `` utopia `` – a name he gave to the ideal and imaginary island nation  ,  the political system of  जिससे   he  described in Utopia , published in 1516 .
He opposed the King 's separation from the Roman Catholic  गिरिजाघर  and refused to accept him as Supreme Head of the Church of England , a title which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534 .
He was imprisoned in 1534 for his refusal to take the oath required by the First Succession Act , because the act disparaged Papal Authority and Henry’s marriage to  कैथरीन  of  aragon  .
In 1535  ,  he was tried for  देशद्रोह  , convicted  on  perjured testimony , and beheaded .
More also helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at straws '' to mean  ``  desperately  trying  even useless things ''  ,  in his Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation .
intellectuals  and statesmen across Europe were stunned by More 's execution .
Erasmus saluted him as one `` whose soul  थी  more pure than any snow , whose genius  थी  such that England  never  had and never again will have its like '' .
वहीँ  was a more controversial side to More 's  जीवन  ,  क्युकी  he advocated the persecution and execution of Protestants who refused to  recant  their faith  .
However , the judgement of history has been largely willing to forgive this in light of the times  he  lived in and his martyrdom in the Roman Catholic cause .
Two centuries later  जोनाथन  Swift said More  थी  `` the person of the greatest virtue this kingdom ever produced '' , a sentiment  साथ  which Samuel Johnson agreed .
Historian Hugh Trevor-Roper said  in  1977 that More was `` the first great Englishman whom we  महसूस  that we know , the most saintly of humanists  ,  the most human of saints , the universal man of our cool northern renaissance . ''
Captain Nemo  ,  also  ज्ञात  as Prince  dakkar  , is a fictional character invented by the French science fiction author  जूल्स  Verne .
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels ,  बीस  Thousand Leagues Under the Sea ( 1870 ) and The Mysterious Island ( 1874 ) , and makes a cameo appearance in Verne 's play Journey Through the Impossible ( 1882 ) .
Nemo , one of the most famous antiheroes  in  fiction , is a mysterious figure .
The son of  an  Indian Raja , he is a scientific genius who roams  the   गहराइयों  of the sea in his submarine , the Nautilus , which was built  on   a   उजाड़  island .
Nemo tries to  प्रोजेक्ट  a stern , controlled confidence , but he is driven by a thirst for vengeance and a hatred of  साम्राज्यवाद   (   विशेषकर  the British Empire ) .
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of his crew members and even by the  मौतों   of  enemy sailors .
Nemo has appeared  in  various adaptations of Verne 's novels , including films ,  जहाँ  he has been portrayed by a number of different  अभिनेताओं  .
he  has furthermore been adopted by other authors for  समावेश  in their  novels  ,  सबसे  notably in Alan Moore 's The  लीग  of Extraordinary Gentlemen and Philip  जोस  Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas  fogg  .
