Acoustic coupler modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator  )  is a device that modulates an analog carrier signal to encode digital  सूचना  , and also demodulates such  a  carrier signal to decode the transmitted information .
The goal is to produce a signal that can be transmitted easily and decoded to reproduce the  असली  digital data .
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting  एनालॉग  signals , from light emitting diodes to radio .
The most familiar example is a  आवाज़  band modem that turns the  डिजिटल  data of a personal computer into  modulated  electrical signals in the voice frequency range of a telephone channel .
These signals can be transmitted over telephone lines and demodulated by  another   मॉडेम  at  the  receiver side to  रिकवर  the digital data .
Modems are generally  वर्गीकृत  by the amount of data they can send in a given unit of  समय   ,  usually expressed in bits per second (  bit/s  , or bps ) , or bytes per  दूसरी  ( B/s ) .
Modems  can  alternatively be classified by their symbol rate , measured in baud .
The baud unit denotes symbols per second , or the number of times per second  the  modem  भेजना  a new signal  .
For example , the ITU V.21 standard used audio frequency  शिफ़्ट  keying with two possible frequencies corresponding to two distinct symbols  (  or one bit per symbol ) , to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud .
By contrast , the original ITU V.22 standard , which was able to transmit and receive four  पृथक  symbols (  दो  bits per symbol ) , handled 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 symbols per second ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying .
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted  by  the Continental Congress on July 4 , 1776 , which announced that the thirteen American colonies  ,  then at war with Great Britain , regarded themselves as independent states , and no longer a part of  the   अंग्रेजों  Empire .
Instead they now formed  a  new nation—the United States  of  America .
John Adams was a leader in pushing for independence , which was unanimously approved on July 2 .
A committee had already drafted the formal declaration , to be ready  जब  congress voted on  स्वतंत्रता  .
Adams persuaded the committee  to  select Thomas Jefferson  to  compose the original draft of the document , which congress would edit to produce the final version .
The Declaration was ultimately a  औपचारिक  explanation of  क्यों  Congress  था  voted on July 2 to declare independence from Great Britain , more than a year after the outbreak  of  the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the Independence Day is celebrated on July 4  ,  although Adams wanted July 2 .
After  ratifying  the text on July 4 , Congress issued  the  Declaration  of  Independence in several forms .
It was  initially  published as the printed Dunlap broadside that was widely distributed and read to the public .
The most famous version of the  घोषणा  , a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the Declaration of Independence , is displayed at the National Archives in Washington , D.C .
Although the wording of the Declaration was  स्वीकृत  on July 4 , the date of  इसके  signing was August 2 .
The original July 4 United States Declaration of Independence manuscript  थी  lost while  सब  other copies  have  been  निकला  from this original document .
the  sources and interpretation of the Declaration have been the subject of much scholarly inquiry .
The Declaration justified the independence of the United  राज्य  by  लिस्टिंग  colonial grievances against King George III , and by asserting  निश्चित  natural and legal rights , including a  सही  of revolution .
Having served its original purpose in announcing independence , the text of the Declaration was  initially  ignored after the American Revolution .
Since then , it has come to be considered a major statement on human  अधिकारों  , particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident , that all  मेन  are created  बराबर  , that they  हैं  endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights , that among these are Life , Liberty and  the   pursuit  of Happiness .
इस  has been called `` one of the best-known sentences in the English language '' , containing `` the most potent and consequential words in American history . ''
The passage came to represent a moral standard  to  which  the  United States should strive .
This view was notably promoted by  अब्राहम  Lincoln , who  माना  the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy ,  और  argued that the  घोषणा  is a statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be interpreted .
It has inspired work  लिये  the rights of marginalized people throughout the world .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था  of Greenland can be characterized as small , mixed and vulnerable .
The present economy consists  of  a big public sector and comprehensive foreign trade , which has resulted in an economy with periods of strong growth , considerable inflation , unemployment problems and extreme dependence on  पूंजी  inflow from Denmark and use  of  outside , mainly Danish , skilled labor .
GDP per capita is similar to the average European economies but the economy is critically  निर्भर   upon  substantial support from the Danish government , which supplies about half the revenues of the home  नियम  government who  in  turn employ about 8,000 Greenlanders out of a labor force  of  40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ) .
Unemployment nonetheless  remains  high , with the rest of the economy dependent upon demand for exports of shrimp and fish .
Hydrogen is  a  chemical element with symbol H  और  atomic number 1 .
With  an  atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ) , hydrogen is the lightest element and its monatomic form (  h1  ) is the most abundant chemical substance , constituting roughly 75 %  of  the Universe 's baryonic mass .
Non- remnant stars are mainly composed of hydrogen in its plasma  राज्य  .
At standard temperature and pressure , hydrogen is a colorless , odorless , tasteless , non-toxic , nonmetallic  ,  highly combustible diatomic gas with  the  molecular formula H2  .
Most of the hydrogen on Earth is in molecules  ऐसे   as  water and organic compounds because hydrogen readily forms covalent compounds with most  non-metallic  elements .
Hydrogen plays a particularly important role in acid-base chemistry with many reactions exchanging protons between soluble molecules .
In ionic compounds , it can take a negative charge ( an anion known  as  a hydride and written as H− ) , or as  a  positively  चार्ज  species H+ .
The latter  cation  is written as though composed of a bare proton  ,  but in reality , hydrogen cations in ionic compounds always occur as more complex species .
The most common isotope of hydrogen is protium ( name rarely used , symbol 1H ) with a single proton and  no   neutrons   .
As the simplest atom known , the  हाइड्रोजन  atom has been of theoretical use  .
For  उदाहरण  ,  as  the only neutral atom with an  analytic   समाधान  to  the  Schrödinger equation , the study of the energetics and bonding of the hydrogen  अणु  played a key role in the development of quantum mechanics .
Hydrogen gas was first artificially produced in the early  16th   सदी  , via the mixing of metals with acids .
in  1766–81 , Henry Cavendish was the first to  recognize  that  हाइड्रोजन  gas was a discrete substance , and that it produces water when burned , a property which later gave it its name : in Greek , hydrogen means ``  water-former  '' .
Industrial production is mainly from the steam reforming of natural gas , and less often from more energy-intensive hydrogen production methods like the electrolysis of water .
Most hydrogen is employed near its production site , with the two largest uses being fossil fuel  प्रसंस्करण  ( e.g. , hydrocracking )  और  ammonia production , mostly for the fertilizer market .
Hydrogen is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle many metals , complicating the design of pipelines and storage tanks .
Unstoppable is  a  2010 American  कार्रवाई  thriller film directed by Tony  स्कॉट  ,  लिखा  by Mark Bomback , and starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine .
The film , loosely  आधारित   on  the real-life  csx  8888 incident  ,  tells the story of  a  runaway  भाड़ा  train , and the two men ( Washington and  पाइन  ) who manage to stop it .
It  थी  Scott 's  फाइनल   विशेषता  film before his  मौत  in 2012 .
The  फिल्मी  was released in the United States and Canada on  नवम्बर  12 , 2010 , and  in  the United Kingdom on November 24 , 2010 .
It received mostly favorable reviews from film critics ; it garnered a ``  certified  Fresh  ''  rating on Rotten Tomatoes based  upon  aggregated reviews  और  a rating of `` Generally favorable reviews '' at Metacritic .
The film was nominated for an  अकादमी  Award for Best Sound Editing at the 83rd Academy Awards , but  खोया  to Inception .
In photography , bracketing is the general technique of taking several shots of the  वही   विषय  using different camera settings .
bracketing  is useful and often recommended in situations that make it difficult to obtain a satisfactory image  साथ  a single shot , especially when a small variation in exposure parameters has a  comparatively  large effect on the resulting image .
Autobracketing is automatic bracketing by using a setting on the camera to take  अनेक  bracketed shots ( in contrast to the photographer altering the settings by  हाथ  between each shot ) .
Given the time it takes to  accomplish  multiple shots , it is typically  ,  but not always , used  लिये  static subjects .
insulated  glazing  (  IG ) , more  commonly  known as double glazing ( or double-pane , and increasingly triple glazing/pane ) are double or triple glass window panes separated by an air or other gas filled space to reduce heat transfer across a part of  the  building envelope .
Insulated Glass Units are manufactured with glass in range of thickness from 3 mm to 10 mm  or  more in special  अनुप्रयोग  .
Laminated or tempered glass may also be  प्रयुक्त  as part of the  निर्माण  .
Most  इकाई  are manufactured with the same thickness of glass used on both panes but  खास  applications such as  ध्वनिक  attenuation  or  security may  आवश्यकता  wide ranges of  thicknesses   to  be incorporated in  the  same unit .
A sectioned diagram  of  a fixed Insulated Glazed Unit ( IGU ) , indicating the numbering convention used in  इस  article .
Surface # 1 is facing outside , Surface # 2 is the  अंदर  surface of the exterior pane , Surface # 3 is the outside surface  of  the interior pane , and Surface  #  4 is the inside surface of interior pane .
the   खिड़की  frame is labelled  #  5 , a spacer is  indicated   as  # 6 , seals are shown in red ( # 7 ) , the internal reveal  is  on the right hand side (  #  8  )  and the exterior windowsill on the  बाएँ  ( # 9 )
To reduce shear  प्रभाव  on the sealed unit ( a major cause of premature failure ) , manufacturers use  a   नियम  of thumb that permits a difference of 1 mm between the thickness of the panes of glass used in the unit and  स्टिल  maintain the warranty for the unit .
For example , a unit  may  be ordered with a 4 mm pane on the exterior and a 3 mm pane on the interior .
These  विसंगतियाँ  are allowed for architectural and  लागत  reasons .
अन्य  combinations  can  be specified and produced but the manufacturer may reserve the right to  सीमा  the term of the warranty or  इंकार  to warranty the unit altogether .
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned unit are named according to the following convention :  सतह  #  1  ( facing outside  )   ,   सतह  # 2 ( inside of outside pane ) , Surface # 3 ( outside of inside pane ) and Surface # 4 (  अंदर  surface of inside pane  )  .
Applying the corresponding nomenclature for triple paned units results  in  surfaces # 1 through # 6 .
The performance of  insulating  glazing can be modified through the use of the following:
A  ठेठ  installation of insulated glazing windows with uPVC window frames .
Selenium is a chemical element with symbol Se and atomic number 34 .
It is a nonmetal with properties that are intermediate between those of  इसके  periodic  तालिका  column-adjacent chalcogen  तत्व   गंधक   और  tellurium .
It rarely occurs  in  its elemental state in nature , or as pure  अयस्क  compounds .
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη  selene  meaning `` Moon '' ) was discovered  in  1817 by Jöns Jacob Berzelius , who noted the similarity of the new element to the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ) .
Selenium is found impurely in metal sulfide ores , where it  partially   replaces  the  गंधक  .
Commercially , selenium is produced  as  a byproduct in  the   शोधन  of these ores , most often during copper production .
Minerals that are pure  selenide  or selenate  यौगिकों   हैं  known , but are rare .
The chief commercial uses for selenium today are  in  glassmaking and  in  pigments .
Selenium is a semiconductor and is used in photocells .
Uses in electronics , once important , have been mostly supplanted by silicon semiconductor devices .
Selenium  continues   to   be  used in a few types of DC power surge protectors and one type of fluorescent quantum dot .
Selenium salts are toxic in large amounts , but trace amounts are necessary for cellular function in many organisms , including all animals .
Selenium is a component of the antioxidant enzymes glutathione peroxidase and  thioredoxin  reductase ( which  indirectly  reduce certain oxidized molecules in animals  और  some plants ) .
It is also  मिला  in  तीन  deiodinase enzymes , which convert one thyroid hormone to another .
Selenium requirements  in  plants differ by species , with some plants  requiring  relatively large  amounts  , and others apparently requiring none .
The United States presidential election of 2008 was  the  56th quadrennial presidential election .
It was held on Tuesday , November 4 , 2008 .
Democrat Barack Obama , then the junior Senator  इससे  Illinois , defeated Republican  जॉन   मैक्केन  , the senior Senator from Arizona .
As the campaign progressed  ,  the War  in  Iraq and outgoing Republican President George  W.  Bush had become increasingly unpopular  ,  and the major-party candidates ran on a platform of change and reform  .
Domestic policy and the economy  आखिरकार  emerged  as  the main themes in the last few months of the election campaign  बाद  the onset of the worst recession since the 1930s .
Obama  होता  go on to win a decisive victory over McCain in both the electoral and popular vote  .
Obama received the most votes for a presidential candidate in American history , and  जीती   the  popular and electoral  vote  by the largest margin in 12 years , as well as the largest percentage of the popular vote for a Democrat in  nearly  a half-century .
This was the first U.S. presidential election in which an  अफ़्रीकी  American was elected  ,  having also been the first in which an African American won the nomination of either major party  .
This  चुनाव  was also notable for being the first time in U.S. history that both major party candidates were sitting U.S . Senators , only the third time ( after 1920 and 1960 ) that any sitting U.S .  सीनेटर  was elected president ,  और  only the second time that the winning President  और  Vice President ( Obama  और  Biden ) were both sitting  u.s  . Senators .
This was  भी  the first election since 1952 in which neither  of  the major parties ' nominees  थी   the  incumbent  अध्यक्ष  or Vice President .
The Sovereign Prince or Princess of Monaco is the reigning monarch and head  of  state of  the  Principality of Monaco .
All princes or princesses have officially taken  the   नाम  of the House of Grimaldi ,  लकिन  have belonged to various other houses ( Goyon de Matignon , Polignac ) in male line .
the  reigning Prince is Albert II  .
Visualization of fragmentation  और  then of defragmentation
In the maintenance of file systems , defragmentation is a process  कि  reduces the amount of fragmentation .
it  does this by  physically  organizing the contents  of  the mass storage device used to store files into the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ) .
It also attempts to create larger regions of free  स्पेस   using  compaction to impede the return of fragmentation .
कुछ  defragmentation  उपयोगिताएँ  try to keep smaller files within a single directory  साथ  , as they are often accessed in  अनुक्रम  .
Defragmentation  is  advantageous and relevant to file systems on electromechanical disk drives .
The movement of the hard drive  's  read/write heads over  अलग  areas of the disk  जब  accessing fragmented files is slower , compared to accessing  the  entire contents of a non-fragmented file  sequentially  without moving the  read/write  heads to  तलाश  other fragments .
A  service-level  agreement ( SLA ) is a  भाग  of a service contract where a service is formally  पारिभाषित  .
In practice , the term  sla   is  sometimes used to refer to the contracted delivery time ( of the  सेवा  or performance ) .
As an example , internet service providers will commonly include service level agreements  भीतर  the terms of their contracts with customers to define the level ( s ) of service being sold in plain language terms .
in  this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in terms of mean time between  असफलताओं  ( MTBF ) , mean time to repair or mean time to recovery ( MTTR ) ; various data  दरों  ; throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details .
Union Station is a former shopping mall in Union City , Georgia , in southwest metro Atlanta adjacent to Interstate  85  .
After new ownership and renovations in 2006  ,  the name was changed from Shannon Southpark Mall in 2007 to Union Station Mall .
A previous renovation was  किया  in the late  1990s  .
The mall has been closed since November 2010 .
This map shows the contiguous United States and , in insets at the lower  बाएँ  , the two  राज्य  that are not contiguous .
The contiguous United States are the 48 adjoining U.S. states  on  the continent of North America that are south of Canada and north of Mexico , plus the District of Columbia  .
The term  excludes   the  states of Alaska and  हवाई  , and all off-shore U.S. territories and possessions , such as Puerto Rico .
Together , the 48 contiguous states and D.C.  occupy  a  संयुक्त  area of , which is 1.58 % of  the  total surface  क्षेत्रफल   of   the  Earth .
Of  इस  , is land , composing 83.65 % of U.S.  जमीन  area .
Officially ,  is  water area , composing 62.66 % of the nation 's water  क्षेत्रफल  .
The 2010 census population was 306,675,006  ,  composing  99.33  % of  the  nation 's population , and  a  density of  103.639  inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2  )  , compared to 87.264/sq mi (  33.692/km2  ) for the  स्वदेश  as a whole .
`` Why '' is the  शीर्षक  of a song recorded by American country band Rascal Flatts .
It is the third single from their sixth studio album  ,  Unstoppable .
It was released to radio stations on September 29 , 2009 and  debuted   at  #  44   on  the U.S . Billboard US Billboard  hot  Country Songs chart for the week of October  10  , 2009 .
it  was written by Rob Mathes and Allen Shamblin .
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness , medical need and efficiency of health care services procedures and facilities according to  स्थापित  criteria or guidelines and under the provisions of an applicable health benefits plan .
Typically it includes new activities or decisions based upon the analysis of a case .
Utilization management describes proactive procedures , including discharge planning , concurrent planning , pre-certification and clinical case appeals .
It also covers proactive processes , such as concurrent clinical reviews and peer reviews , as well as appeals introduced by the provider  ,  payer or  रोगी  .
As pre-certification and concurrent review  of  cases grew , utilization management spun out of utilization  पुनर्विलोकन  .
While not synonymous , health care professionals tend to use the terms as interchangeable .
The difference is utilization management  is   और  intends to manage health care cases efficiently and cost effectively before and during health care administration .
Utilization review is more considering whether health care was appropriately applied  बाद  it was administered  .
There are four basic  तकनीकों  in utilization management:
Demand Management
Utilization Review
Case Management
Disease Management
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age  अनोखा  by S. E. Hinton  ,  first published in 1967 by Viking Press .
Hinton  थी   15  when she started writing the novel , but did most of  the  work when she was sixteen and a junior in high school .
Hinton was 18 when the book  थी  published .
The book follows two  प्रतिद्वंद्वी  groups , the Greasers and the Socs  (  pronounced by the author as  ,  short for Socials  )  , who are divided  by  their socioeconomic status .
the  book takes  प्लेस  in Tulsa , Oklahoma , in 1965 ,  लकिन   it  is  never  stated in the book .
A film adaptation  थी  produced in 1983 , and  a  little-known short-lived television series appeared in 1990 , picking up  जहाँ  the movie left off .
The United States  हाउस  of Representatives is one of the two  घरों  of the United States Congress  (  a bicameral legislature ) .
It is frequently referred to as  the  House .
The other house is the Senate .
The composition and powers of the House  हैं  established in Article One of the United States Constitution  .
The major power of the House is to pass  संघीय  legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by  the   u.S.   अध्यक्ष  before becoming law ( unless  दोनो  the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with  a  two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the  शक्ति  to initiate revenue bills , to impeach officials , and to elect the U.S. President in case  वहीँ  is no majority in the  चुनावी  College .
Each U.S.  राज्य  is represented in the House in  proportion  to its population but  is  entitled to at least one representative .
The  सबसे  populous state , California , currently has  53  representatives .
The total number of voting  प्रतिनिधि  is fixed by law at 435 .
Each representative serves for a two-year term .
The Speaker of the United States House of  प्रतिनिधि  , who presides over  the  chamber , is elected by the members of the House , and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic  caucus   or   the  House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House  meets  in the south wing of the United States Capitol .
A supply  कड़ी  is actually a complex and dynamic supply and demand network .
(  cf . Wieland/Wallenburg , 2011 )
a  supply chain is a system of organizations ,  लोगों  ,  क्रियाएँ  , information , and  संसाधन  involved in  चलती  a product or service from supplier to customer .
Supply chain activities transform natural resources , raw materials , and components into  a  finished product that is delivered to the end customer .
In sophisticated supply chain  प्रणालियों  , used products may re-enter the supply  कड़ी  at any point where residual value is recyclable .
Supply chains link value  जंजीरों  .
`` Purple Haze '' is a song written and recorded by Jimi Hendrix  in   1967   ,  released as the second single by The  जिमि  Hendrix  अनुभव  in both the United Kingdom and the United States .
It later appeared on the American  संस्करण   of  the band 's 1967 album Are You Experienced .
`` Purple Haze '' has become one of the `` archetypical psychedelic drug songs of  the  sixties  ''  .
`` Purple Haze 's ''  गिटार  virtuosic techniques would be emulated by many metal guitarists .
A close  up  picture of  a  rhinoceros skin .
Skin is  the  soft outer covering of vertebrates .
Other animal coverings such as the arthropod exoskeleton have different developmental origin  ,  structure and chemical composition .
The adjective cutaneous means `` of the  स्किन  ''  (  from Latin cutis , skin ) .
In mammals  ,   the   स्किन  is the largest  अंग  of the  integumentary  system made up of multiple layers of ectodermal tissue  ,  and guards the  underlying   मांसपेशियां  , bones , ligaments and internal organs .
Skin of a  अलग  nature exists  in  amphibians , reptiles , and birds .
सब  mammals have some hair on their skin , even marine  स्तनधारियों  which appear to be hairless .
The skin interfaces with the environment and is the first line of defense from  बाह्य  factors .
For example , the skin plays a key role in protecting the body against pathogens and excessive water loss .
Its other functions are insulation , temperature  विनियमन  , sensation , and the production of vitamin D folates .
Severely damaged skin may heal by forming scar tissue .
This is sometimes discoloured and depigmented .
The  मोटाई  of skin also varies from location to location on an organism .
In humans for  उदाहरण  , the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids  is  the thinnest skin  in  the body at  0.5  mm thick , and is one of the first areas to show signs of aging such  as  `` crows feet  ''  and wrinkles .
the  skin on the palms and the soles of the feet is 4 mm  मोटा  and the thickest skin in the body .
Fur is dense  बाल  .
Primarily , fur augments the insulation  the  skin provides but can also serve as a secondary sexual characteristic or as camouflage .
On  कुछ  animals , the skin is very hard  और  thick , and can be processed to create leather .
Reptiles and  मछली  have  मुश्किल  protective scales on their skin for protection , and birds have hard feathers , all made of tough β- keratins .
उभयचर   स्किन  is not a strong barrier to passage of chemicals and is often subject to osmosis and diffusive forces .
For example , a frog sitting in an anesthetic solution would be sedated quickly , as the chemical diffuses through its skin .
Thomas Scott
The Rev . Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is principally known for  उसके  best-selling work A Commentary On The Whole  बाइबल  and The  फ़ोर्स   of  Truth , and as one of the  संस्थापकों  of the Church Missionary Society .
Daniel Radcliffe , who portrays Harry  कुम्हार  , has been the icon of  the  film series since the release of the first film in 2001 .
Some of the most renowned actors of the United Kingdom and Ireland  have  voiced or portrayed characters appearing  in  the Harry Potter film series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling .
Daniel Radcliffe , Rupert Grint and Emma Watson have played  हैरी  Potter  ,  Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger in all the  films  .
When they were cast only Radcliffe had  previously  acted in a film .
Complementing  उन्हें  on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham  कार्टर  , Jim Broadbent , John Cleese , Robbie Coltrane ,  warwick  Davis , Ralph Fiennes , Michael Gambon , Brendan Gleeson , Richard Griffiths , Richard Harris  ,  John Hurt , Jason Isaacs , Miriam Margolyes , Helen McCrory , Gary Oldman , Alan Rickman , Fiona Shaw ,  मैगी   स्मिथ  ,  टिमोथी  Spall , Imelda Staunton , David Thewlis , Emma Thompson , and Julie  walters  , among others .
Thirteen actors have appeared as the same character in all eight films of the franchise .
Some well-known British actors who have not appeared in the series  ,  are asked in jest why they have not been  डाल  .
When David Yates was  directing   the  fifth  फिल्मी  , Bill Nighy , who had  previously  collaborated with Yates on three of his television projects  ,  said that he joked with Yates  कि  maybe now he would n't be the only actor in England who had n't been in Harry Potter  .
`` But nobody called  ''  ,  nighy  added .
But in 2009  ,  Yates cast Nighy as Minister of Magic Rufus Scrimgeour in Deathly Hallows .
Nighy said , `` I am no longer the only English actor not to be in  हैरी  Potter and I am very pleased .  ''
Jude Law  रै  quipped ,  ``  Nobody 's  पूछा  me .
I was a bit too old for Harry '' .
When a reporter compared  potions  professor Horace  slughorn  's obsession with famous names to the series ' connection to `` every notable British actor , '' Jim Broadbent ,  जो  plays Slughorn said , `` Well , not every  कर्ता  gets invited .
I  जान  some who are still waiting . ''
With the exception of Chris Columbus , each  निदेशक  has had  a   कैमियो  appearance in his respective film  :  Alfonso Cuarón  appears  as a wizard holding a candle during a scene at The Three Broomsticks  in  Prisoner of Azkaban ; Mike Newell is heard briefly as the radio presenter in Frank Bryce 's house in  प्याला  of Fire ; and David  येट्स  features as a wizard within a magical  चलती  portrait in Order of the Phoenix .
Producer David Heyman also  makes  a cameo appearance  as  a wizard featured  भीतर   a  magical moving portrait in the  तीसरा  film , Prisoner of Azkaban .
J. K. Rowling  दिया  a speech during the world  प्रीमियर  of the  फाइनल  film in the series— Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 —on 7 July  2011  in London , England .
She announced that she could  never  have dreamt of the talented actors and actresses who have appeared in all the Harry Potter movies .
Rowling also announced that there are seven Harry Potter film series cast members , who  वो   refers  to as `` The Big Seven '' , they are Daniel Radcliffe ,  रुपर्ट  Grint , Emma Watson , Tom Felton , Matthew Lewis  ,  Evanna Lynch and Bonnie Wright .

Key
( v ) indicates the  कर्ता  or actress lent only his or her voice  लिये  his or  उसके  film character
(  y ) indicates the actor or  अभिनेत्री  portrayed the role in a flashback scene  or  when the character was young  .

A light grey cell ( such as the one in the `` Charity Burbage '' row  in  the `` Philosopher 's Stone '' column ) indicates the character was not in the film adaptation  .
A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual principles , ' based on the approved  साहित्य  ) outlining a course of action for recovery from , compulsion  ,  or other behavioral problems .
Originally proposed  by  Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism , the Twelve  कदम  were first published in the book Alcoholics Anonymous : The Story of How More Than One Hundred Men Have Recovered  इससे   alcoholism  in 1939 .
The method was then adapted and became the  न्यास  of other twelve-step programs .
As summarized by the American Psychological Association , the process involves the following:
admitting that one can  नहीं  control  एक  's addiction or compulsion ;
recognizing a higher  शक्ति  that can give  शक्ति  ;
examining past errors with the help of a sponsor ( experienced member ) ;
making amends for these errors ;
learning  to  live a new life with a new code of behavior ;
helping  अन्य  who suffer from the same addictions or compulsions .
गवाह  impeachment , in the law  of  evidence of the United States  ,  is the process of calling into question the credibility of an individual who is testifying in a trial .
The Federal Rules of Evidence contain the rules  शासी  impeachment in federal courts .
Party leaders  और  whips of  the  United States House of Representatives are elected by their respective parties in a closed-door caucus by secret ballot and  हैं  also known as  मंजिल  leaders .
The U.S. House of Representatives does  नहीं  officially use the term  ``  Minority Leader '' although the media frequently do .
The House instead  उपयोग  the  शर्तें  `` Republican Leader '' or `` Democratic Leader '' depending on which party holds a minority of seats .
The current House Majority Leader is Republican Eric Cantor  ,  while the current House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi .
The current House Majority Whip is  रिपब्लिकन  Kevin  मैकार्थी   ,  while the current House Minority Whip is Democrat Steny  hoyer   .
following  the outbreak of World War I in 1914 , the German Army opened the Western Front  by  first  आक्रमणकारी  Luxembourg and Belgium  ,  then gaining military control of important industrial regions in France .
The tide of the  अग्रिम  was dramatically  turned  with the Battle of the  marne  .
Following the race to the sea , both sides dug in along a meandering line of  fortified   trenches   ,  stretching  इससे  the North  समुद्र  to the Swiss frontier with France .
This line remained essentially unchanged for most of the war .
Between 1915  और  1917 there were several major offensives along this front .
The  हमले  employed massive artillery bombardments and massed infantry advances .
However ,  a  combination of entrenchments , machine gun  nests  , barbed wire , and artillery repeatedly inflicted severe casualties on the attackers and counterattacking defenders  .
As a result ,  no  significant advances were made .
Among the most costly of  ये  offensives were  the   बैटल  of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead , the Battle of the Somme with more than [ an estimated ] million casualties , and the Battle of Passchendaele with roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties .
In an effort to break the deadlock , this front saw the introduction  of  new military technology , including poison  गैस  , aircraft and tanks .
But  it  was only after the adoption of improved tactics that some degree of mobility was restored .
The German Spring Offensive of 1918 was made possible  by  the  सन्धि  of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end  of  the conflict on the Eastern Front .
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics , the German armies  उन्नत  nearly to the west , which marked the deepest  अग्रिम  by either side since 1914 and very nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough .
In spite of the  generally  stagnant nature of this  सामने  , this  थिएटर  would prove decisive .
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies  दौरान  the  दूसरी   हाफ  of 1918  persuaded  the German commanders that defeat was inevitable , and the government was forced to sue  लिये  conditions of  an  armistice .
The terms of peace were agreed upon with the signing of the Treaty of  versailles  in 1919 .

These characters were regularly rotated , often disappearing for long periods during the series .
The following list of characters has been sorted alphabetically , by first name .
Some of the characters had no last name  और  most were commonly referred to by their first name so this appeared to be  the   सबसे  logical method .
in  the case of Chef Paolo , who had no known first name  ,  they have been listed by  शीर्षक  .
the  First Lady of the United States ( FLOTUS ) is the hostess of the White  हाउस  .
Because this  स्थिति  is traditionally filled by the wife of the President  of  the United States , the title is most often applied to the wife of a sitting president .
The current First Lady  is  Michelle Obama .
After her husband  बराक   ओबामा  was  re-elected  on November 6 ,  2012  , she is scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Septic shock is a medical condition as a  परिणाम  of severe infection and sepsis  ,  though the  microbe  may be systemic or localized to a particular  साईट  .
It can cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly known  as  multiple organ failure ) and death .
Its most common victims are children , immunocompromised individuals , and the elderly , as their  प्रतिरक्षा  systems can not deal with the infection as effectively as those of healthy adults .
Frequently , patients  कष्ट  from septic shock are cared  लिये  in intensive care units .
The mortality rate from septic shock is approximately 25–50 % .
Kevin Brereton ( born February 20 , 1972 )  ,   बेहतर  known by his stage name k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ) ,  is  a Canadian rapper , singer , songwriter and record producer .
His given name may also be cited as  kheaven  , a spelling he later adopted .
The alias `` k-os '' , spelled with a lower case `` k '' , was intended to be  कम  aggressive than the pseudonyms of other rappers whose names were  सब  upper  मामला  , such as KRS-One .
It is an acronym for `` Knowledge of Self  ,  '' although  in  a later interview he said that it  originally  stood for `` Kevin 's Original  ध्वनि  . '' k-os  '  music incorporates a wide variety of music genres , including rap , funk , rock , and reggae  .
The  गीत  frequently focus on promoting a ``  धनात्मक  message '' while at times expressing criticism of mainstream hip hop culture 's obsession  साथ  money , fame and glorification of violence  .
A  संगीतकार  as well as  a  producer , k-os has written and produced nearly every part of all four of his albums .
k-os usually performs with a  सजीव  band , something that is uncommon  in   the  hip hop genre .
He sometimes  plays  guitar and keyboard both during  सजीव   प्रदर्शन  and in the studio .
k-os received his first musical exposure with the single `` Musical Essence '' , released in 1993 .
After the release of his second  सिंगल  `` Rise Like  the  Sun '' in 1996 , he withdrew from the industry because he was dissatisfied with his musical style .
He  reappeared   briefly  in 1999 and released his debut album Exit in 2002 .
The album received positive reviews but sold relatively  few  copies .
He released his second album Joyful  विद्रोह  in 2004 , which received platinum status  in  Canada  .
A third album , , was released in 2006  और  also went platinum .
His fourth album , Yes !
, was released in 2009  .
His fifth album BLack on BLonde was released in 2013 .
The  आधिकारिक   2007  edition of the UCC .
Even the confidential rough  मसौदा  of the UCC were saved and published  as  a 10-volume set  .
The  वर्दी  Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ) ,  पहला   प्रकाशित  in 1952 , is one of a number of uniform acts that have been promulgated in conjunction with efforts to harmonize the law of sales and other commercial transactions in  सब   50  states within the United States of America .
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing routes with one or more stops at  a  belay  स्टेशन  .
Each  खण्ड   of  actual climbing between stops at  the  belay stations is called a pitch .
The leader ascends  the  pitch ,  रखकर  gear and stopping to anchor themselves to the belay station .
The reason for the stops can be determined by choice , convention or necessity .
लिये  example:
The rope is too  छोटी  to do the entire route in one  पिच  (  necessity  ) .
The leader has run out  of  protective gear ( necessity  )   .
There is  a  convenient  protectable  ledge , or fixed bolts  लगाई  by previous  चढना  , at the location for a belay station ( convention ) .
the  leader chooses to rest or  एक्सचेंज   लीड  before the next section of the climb  (  choice ) .
The general purpose of  ये  stops  is  to allow  the  second to ascend to the point of the lead climber while collecting the protective gear from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent .
At the belay station , the protective gear is collected  ,  possibly exchanged to a new leader , and the leader of the  अगला  pitch  ascends  the route .
A diagram showing an I Formation  on  offense and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American football  ,  each team has eleven  खिलाड़ी  on the field at one time .
The specific role that a  खिलाड़ी   takes  on the field is called their position .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions , that is teams may change any number of players after any  खेल  .
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players ,  the  offense ( the team with the ball , who is trying to score ) , the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from  स्कोरिंग  , and to take the ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons  ,   विभिन्न  specific positions exist depending on what the player 's main job is .
The  नियंत्रित  Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted  into  law by the Congress of  the   संयुक्त  States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The  अधिनियम   भी  served as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs .
The  विधान  created five Schedules ( classifications ) , with  varying  qualifications for a substance to be included in each  .
Two federal agencies , the Drug  प्रवर्तन   प्रशासन  and the Food and  ड्रग  Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the  विभिन्न  schedules ,  हालांकि  the statute passed by Congress created  the  initial listing , and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha  reid  Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000  ,  which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently  स्वीकृत  medical use in treatment in  the  United States , and international treaties .
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New  जर्सी  Transit park-and-ride station in Wayne , New Jersey  साथ  the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to New York  नगर  and various other points in the area as well as Montclair-Boonton  लकीर   ट्रैन  service to New York , Hoboken  ,  and intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University .
It is  स्तिथ  off of the southbound lanes of New Jersey Route  23   on  West Belt Road , near the interchange where Route 23 , Interstate 80 , and U.S. Route 46 meet , across from the Willowbrook  मॉल  .
The station opened in January 2008  और  has 1,000 parking spaces .
New Jersey Transit  intends  for this combined rail and bus station to become an `` interceptor station , '' that will  सहायता   relieve  the habitual congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange , where the three major highways meet .
In addition , the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at  कया  was then Route  23  Park & Ride , a bus depot on Route 23 North that has since been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride , and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ;  the  now-Mother 's site had  सीमित  parking while NJT was  having  trouble with overfull parking  क्षेत्रों  at Willowbrook .
The Wayne Township bus garage is located on the opposite side of  रूट  23 .
There has been a proposal to build a parking deck  साथ  another thousand spots and develop the land at the station .
In  जोड  to Montclair-Boonton trains  ,  the Transit Center is served by the following New Jersey Transit bus lines:
75  to  Newark Penn Station  और  Butler
194 to Port Authority  बस  Terminal  और  Butler/Newfoundland
198 to Port Authority Bus Terminal and William Paterson University
324 to Port Authority and Wayne Route 23
748 to Willowbrook  मॉल  and Paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly  पुकारा   the  at symbol , ampersat  ,  apetail or  वाणिज्यिक  at in English—and less commonly a wide range of other terms  .
The fact that there is no single word in English for the  प्रतीक  has prompted some writers  to  use the French arobase or Spanish and Portuguese arroba—or to coin new words such as asperand , ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency .
Originally an  हिसाब  and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g . 7 widgets  @  $ 2 = $ 14 ) , it was not included on the keyboard of the earliest commercially successful typewriters , but was on at least one 1889 model and the very successful Underwood models from the `` Underwood  no  . 5 '' in 1900 onward .
It is now universally included  on  computer keyboards .
In recent years , its meaning  रै  grown  to  include the sense of being `` located at , '' `` and , '' or `` directed  at  '' , especially in email addresses and social media  ,   विशेषकर  Twitter .
The mark is encoded at .
The Catcher in the Rye  is  a  1951   अनोखा   by  J. D. Salinger .
Originally published for adults , it has since become popular  साथ  adolescent readers  लिये  its themes of teenage angst and alienation .
It has been translated into almost all of the world 's major languages .
Around 250,000 copies are sold each year with total sales of more than 65 million  किताबे  .
The novel 's protagonist and antihero , Holden Caulfield , has become an icon for teenage rebellion .
The novel was included  on  Times 2005 list of the 100 best English-language novels written since 1923 , and it was named by Modern Library and its readers as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century .
It has been frequently challenged in the United States and other countries for its liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality .
it  also deals with complex issues of  पहचान  , belonging , connection , and alienation .
skeletal  muscles homo sapiens
This is a table  of  muscles of the human anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one part of  a  pair  of  identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides , resulting in approximately  320  pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the  सटीक  number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles  differently  , e.g . regarding what is defined as different  भाग  of a single muscle or as several muscles .
Examples range from 640 to 850 .
The muscles  of  the human  देह  can be categorized into a number of groups which include  मांसपेशियां   relating   to  the head  और  neck , muscles of  the  torso or trunk , muscles  of  the  अपर  limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs  .
The action refers to the action of each  मांसपेशी  from the standard anatomical position  .
In other positions , other actions may be  performed  .
Bad Girls Club  (  BGC ) is an American reality television series  निर्मित  by Jonathan Murray for the Oxygen television station .
The show centers on  सात  feisty  और  mischievous women with different backgrounds and personalities , who have a number  of  psychological and behavioral  समस्याएं  .
They are  introduced  to the show off their pernicious behavior and accomplish specific goals  .
The cast , deemed `` bad girls '' , enjoy a luxurious lifestyle in a fine mansion for three  महीने  ,  दौरान  which they must obey specified rules .
उनके  lives inside –  और  outside – of the house are chronicled and recorded by the production team  .
The Bad Girls Club is broadcast in five countries (  संयुक्त  States , Netherlands  ,   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ,  हंगेरियाई  , and Sweden  )  .
it  has received negative reviews from critics , who believe the show  promotes  violence by adolescent viewers .
Furthermore , several cast members made controversial remarks which outraged many viewers .
The format of the show has  बदला  from  जल्दी   सीज़न  .
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a rule , she is evicted from the show and , if it is  जल्दी  in the season , replaced by a new `` bad girl '' .
There have been nine complete seasons of The Bad  लड़कियों  Club , with the tenth season currently airing .
The fourth season had the  उच्चतम  ratings in the show  's  history , becoming its ``  भेदन  season '' .
There have been three spin-offs of The Bad Girls Club .
One of  उन्हें  , Love Games : Bad Girls Need Love Too , where past cast members seek true love , has gained high ratings .
Oxygen has also released a mobile game , comic  स्ट्रिप   और  merchandise to promote the  दिखाएँ  .
Of the  92  contestants , Kerry Harvick ( of season one ) was a successful country singer before the  दिखाएँ  .
Tanisha Thomas ( of  ऋतु  two )  बाद  hosted Oxygen  's  OxygenLive !
and the subsequent seasons of  प्रेम  Games : Bad Girls  need  Love Too .
Thomas , who has been dubbed  the  `` godmother '' to all contestants , has her own television documentary  हकदार  Tanisha Gets Married .
As of Season 8 she 's been the host of the reunion specials  .
The Iowa Senate is the upper house of the Iowa General Assembly .
There are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate , representing 50 single-member districts across  the  state with populations  of  approximately 60,927 per constituency , .
Each Senate district is composed of two  हाउस   जिले  .
The Senate meets at the Iowa  राज्य  Capitol in Des Moines .
Unlike  the  lower house , the Iowa House of Representatives , Senators  serve  four-year terms , with half of the Senate staggered for re-election every two years .
There  हैं  no term limits for the Senate .
Mechanical repair
Maintenance , repair , and operations ( MRO ) or maintenance  ,  repair ,  और  overhaul involves fixing any sort of mechanical , plumbing or electrical device should  it  become out  of  order or broken ( known as repair  ,  unscheduled or  casualty  maintenance ) .
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in working order (  ज्ञात  as scheduled maintenance ) or prevent trouble from  arising  ( preventive maintenance  )  .
MRO may be defined as , `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or restoring an item in or to a state in which it  can  perform its required function .
The actions include the combination of all technical and corresponding administrative , managerial , and supervision actions . ''
MRO operations can be  categorised  by whether the product remains the  प्रॉपर्टी  of the customer ,  i.e  . a service is being  offered  ,  or  whether the product is bought by the reprocessing organisation and sold to any customer wishing to make the purchase ( Guadette , 2002 ) .
In the former case it may  be  a backshop operation within a larger organisation or smaller operation  .
The former of these represents a closed loop supply chain and  प्रायः  has the scope of maintenance , repair or of the product .
The latter of the  categorisations  is an open loop supply chain and is typified  by  refurbishment and remanufacture .
the  main characteristic of the closed loop system  is  that the demand for a product is matched with the supply  of  a used product .
Neglecting asset write-offs and exceptional activities the total population of the product  between  the customer and the  सेवा  provider remains constant .
Prince William  ,  Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 )  ,  is the elder son of Charles , Prince of Wales , and Diana , Princess of Wales , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in the line of succession  ,  behind his father , to the thrones  of  sixteen  स्वतंत्र  sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , Jamaica , Barbados , The Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon  आइलैंड्स   ,  Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines ,  बेलीज़  , Antigua and Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at four  स्कूलों  in the United Kingdom and obtained a degree  इससे  the University  of  St Andrews  .
he  spent parts of a gap year in Chile , Belize , Tanzania , and Kenya  जहाँ  he has lived and holidayed several times .
Prince William has also taken Kiswahili studies at  विश्वविद्यालयों  in Kenya and Tanzania .
He was commissioned as a  लेफ्टिनेंट   in   the  Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with his brother Prince Harry —and , two years later  ,  earned his  विंग्स   by  completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
in  2009 , he transferred to the Royal Air Force , was promoted  to  Flight  लेफ्टिनेंट  and underwent helicopter flying training in  अनुक्रम  to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force  .
In 2010 , he completed his general  और  special-to-type helicopter training and went on to RAF  घाटी  on No . 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter .
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend  ,  Catherine Middleton , on  29  April 2011 at Westminster  ऐबी  .
घंटों  prior to his wedding , Prince William was created Duke  of  Cambridge , Earl of Strathearn ,  और  Baron Carrickfergus .
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born  जुलाई  28 , 1990 ) , better known by his stage name Soulja  लड़के  Tell 'Em , or simply Soulja Boy , is an American rapper , record producer ,  कर्ता  , and entrepreneur .
In September 2007 , his  सिंगल  `` Crank That ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached number one on the Billboard  hot   100  .
The single was initially self-published  on  the internet ,  और   it  later became a number-one hit in  the  United States  लिये  seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007 .
On August  17  Way was listed at # 18 on the Forbes  सूची  of Hip-Hop Cash Kings of 2010 earning $ 7 million for that  साल  .
Way has currently  released  three studio albums and one independent album : his debut studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA .
However , his next two albums , iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way  (   2010  ) did not match the commercial success of his  डेब्यू  , the latter  तभी  selling 100,000 copies , despite the success of several singles across  दोनो  albums , such as `` Kiss Me Thru the  फोन  `` and `` Turn My Swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ) .
इस  was mainly due to negotiation problems with  interscope  Records which meant a limited amount of  रिकॉर्ड  were made  उपलब्धियाँ  to the public .
As of 2011 , Way has confirmed he  is  working on his fourth studio album , entitled USA  ड्रे  ,  जिससे   होगा  be released in 2013 .
The electron transport chain in the mitochondrion is the  साईट  of oxidative  phosphorylation  in eukaryotes  .
The NADH and succinate generated in the citric acid cycle  हैं  oxidized , providing energy to  शक्ति  ATP synthase .
Photosynthetic electron  हस्तांतरण  chain of the thylakoid membrane .
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an  इलेक्ट्रॉन  donor ( such as NADH ) and an electron acceptor (  ऐसे  as O2 ) with the transfer of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane  .
The resulting electrochemical proton gradient is used to generate chemical energy  in  the form of adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) .
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms used for extracting energy from sunlight in photosynthesis and also from redox reactions , such as the oxidation of  sugars  ( respiration ) .
In chloroplasts , light drives  the  conversion of water to oxygen and NADP+ to NADPH with transfer of  H+  ions across chloroplast membranes .
In  mitochondria  , it is the conversion of oxygen to water , NADH to NAD+ and succinate to fumarate that are required to generate the proton gradient  .
Electron transport chains are major sites of premature electron leakage to oxygen , generating  superoxide  and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress .
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked  as  Conzip , Ryzolt , Ultracet  ,  Ultram in the USA  ,  Ralivia , Zytram XL Durella { CR-100/200 mg } in Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain .
The drug has a wide range  of  applications , including  उपचार  of rheumatoid arthritis , restless legs  सिंड्रोम  , motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia .
It  थी  launched and marketed as Tramal  by   the  German pharmaceutical company  grünenthal  GmbH in 1977 .
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor  agonist  that also induces serotonin release and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine .
Tramadol is metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol  ,  a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist .
Tramadol and its major  metabolite  ( s ) are  विशिष्ट  from other more potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors .
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff (  ;  born April 29 ,  1938  ) is an American former stockbroker , investment advisor , financier , and  श्वेत   कॉलर  criminal .
He is the former non-executive  अध्यक्ष  of the NASDAQ stock market , and  the   admitted  operator of a Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest  वित्तीय  fraud in U.S. history  .
Madoff founded the  वॉल  Street firm Bernard L.  madoff  Investment Securities LLC in 1960 , and was its chairman until his arrest on  दिसम्बर  11 , 2008 .
The firm was one of the top market maker businesses on Wall Street , which  bypassed  ``  विशेषज्ञ  '' firms by directly executing orders over the counter  इससे  retail brokers .
He employed at the firm his brother Peter  as  Senior Managing Director and Chief Compliance Officer ; Peter has since been sentenced to 10 years in prison  .
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the  कड़  's  नियम  and compliance officer and  attorney  , and  उसके  sons Andrew and Mark ( Mark committed suicide by hanging exactly two years after his father 's arrest ) .
On December 10 , 2008 , Madoff 's sons told authorities that their father had confessed to them that the asset management unit of his firm was a massive Ponzi scheme , and quoted him as describing it as `` one big  झूठ  . ''
The  following  day , FBI agents arrested Madoff and charged him with one  गिनती   of  securities fraud .
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had  previously  conducted investigations into Madoff 's business practices , but did not uncover the massive fraud .
In March 2009 ,  madoff  pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies and admitted to  turning  his wealth management business into a massive Ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands  of  investors of billions of dollars .
Madoff said he began the Ponzi scheme in the  जल्दी  1990s .
However , federal investigators believe the fraud began as early as the 1970s , and those  चार्ज  with recovering  the  missing money believe the investment operation may  never  have been legitimate .
The amount missing from client accounts , including fabricated gains , was almost  $  65 billion .
The court-appointed trustee estimated actual losses to  निवेशकों  of $ 18 billion .
On June 29 ,  2009  , he was sentenced to 150 years in prison , the maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known  as  Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday  observed  in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries , administrative  assistants  , receptionists , and other administrative support professionals .
In North  अमेरिका  ,  it  is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full week of  अप्रैल  ( April 24 in 2013 ) .
In France it is celebrated on  the  third Thursday  in  April (  अप्रैल  18 in 2013 ) .
In Australia it  is  celebrated on the first Friday in May
A  quasi-judicial  body is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board , generally of a public administrative agency , which has powers and procedures resembling those of  a  court of  विधि  or judge , and which is obligated to objectively determine facts and draw conclusions  इससे  them so as to provide the basis of an official action  .
Such actions are able to remedy a situation or impose legal penalties , and may  affect  the  विधिक  rights ,  कर्तव्य  or privileges of specific parties .
Monument  of  Tycho Brahe  और  Johannes Kepler  in  Prague
Tycho Brahe  (  14 December 154624 October 1601 ) ,  born  Tyge Ottesen Brahe , was a Danish nobleman known for his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations .
He was born in Scania  ,  then part of Denmark , now part of modern-day Sweden .
Tycho was  खूब  known in his lifetime as an  astronomer  and alchemist .
In his De nova stella ( On  the  new star ) of 1573 , he refuted the Aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm .
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars , '' ( stellae novae , now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572  ,  lacked the parallax expected in sub-lunar phenomena , and were  इसलिए  not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously  believed  ,  लकिन  were above the atmosphere and moon .
Using similar  माप  he  दिखाया  that comets were also not atmospheric  phenomena  , as previously thought , and must pass through the supposedly `` immutable '' celestial spheres .
As an astronomer , Tycho worked to combine what he  देखी  as the geometrical benefits of the Copernican  प्रणाली  with the philosophical benefits of the Ptolemaic system into his own  मॉडल  of the universe , the Tychonic system .
Furthermore , he was the last of the major naked eye  खगोलशास्त्रियों  , working without telescopes for his observations .
Tycho Brahe  थी  granted an estate on the island of Hven and the funding to build the Uraniborg , an early research institute , where he built large astronomical instruments and took many careful measurements , and later Stjerneborg , underground  ,   जब   he  discovered that his instruments in the former were not sufficiently steady .
On the island ( on which he demonstrated  निरंकुश  character and behavior toward the residents  )   he  founded manufactories such as paper-making to  provide  material for printing his results .
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597 , he was invited by the Bohemian  किंग  and Holy Roman emperor Rudolph II to Prague , where he became the official imperial astronomer .
He  निर्मित  the new  वेधशाला  at Benátky  nad   jizerou  .
Here  ,  from 1600 until his death in  1601   ,  he was assisted by Johannes Kepler who later used Tycho 's astronomical data to develop Kepler 's laws of planetary  गति  .
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a district of Seoul ,  दक्षिण  Korea , which was separated from  yeongdeungpo  District on April 1 , 1980 .
Located in the southwestern part of the city , where besides Yangcheon District and  geumcheon   ज़िला  Guro  ज़िला   रै  an important position as a transport link  जिससे  contains railroads , land routes from the rest of Seoul to the south of the country .
The Gyeongbu and Gyeongin railway lines connect Seoul to Busan  और  Incheon .
in  addition , Seoul Metropolitan Subway lines 1 , 2 , and 7 , and major  राजमार्गों  intersect in  guro  District .
the  name  guro  originates from the legend that nine ( ) old men ( Korean :  ro  ) enjoyed longevity in the  ज़िला  .
A digital industrial complex  is  located in Guro District .
the  Guro Digital Industrial Complex , which played  a  leading industrial role mainly with textile  निर्माण  , dressmaking and other labour-intensive industries in 1967 , has been rapidly changed into  an  IT  औद्योगिक  complex .
This complex played  a  pivotal role in the economic growth of the South Korea 's development  era  , referred to as the  ``  Miracle on the Han River `` , and also contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s .
Twenty-one percent of the  कुल  area of Guro District is a restricted zone to be used as a greenbelt with the only arboretum in Seoul .
The  मण्डल  is changing into a lively district as large labour-intensive  कारखानों  are moving from the area and  the  council is developing what it terms its four  zones   .
An `` e-government `` system  आधारित  on this hosted the international e-participation forum on February 7–9 , 2007 , with the participation of more than thirty-seven countries .
The forum was  शुभारम्भ  with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux , France  )  , Kevin Foy  (  Chapel  हिल  , US ) ,  apirak  Kosayothin ( Bangkok , Thailand ) , Uvais Mohamed Emthiyas ( Colombo , Sri Lanka ) , and world experts such as Dr William H. Dutton ( Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Oxford ,  uk  ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere , Finland )  participated  in  the  forum  .
The Guro Declaration , adopted during the forum , aims to set up a portal site for e-government  विकास  and to establish a concrete project in order to bridge the  डिजिटल  divide among  the  world 's cities  .
This practice has been recognised for providing a new important step in the development of e-democracy .
The e-participation forum was a key factor for  guro  to play the leading role in bridging the  डिजिटल  divide among cities , to provide I.T . enterprises  स्तिथ  in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to launch into the international market , to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy .
The international e-participation forum on February 7–9 , 2007
a  wonton  (  also spelled wantan , wanton , or wuntun in transcription from Cantonese ; Mandarin : húndùn ) is a  प्रकार   of  dumpling commonly found in a number of Chinese  व्यंजन   .
Many people were involved in the invention of radio as we now know it .
Several possible methods of wireless communication were considered , including  आगमनात्मक  and capacitive induction and transmission through the ground , however the method used for radio today exclusively involves the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves  .
After early speculation on the subject , experimental work on the connection between electricity and magnetism began around 1820 with the work of Hans Christian Ørsted and  जारी  with the work of André-Marie Ampère , Joseph Henry , and Michael Faraday .
These investigations culminated in the  पूरा  theory of electromagnetism  विकसित  by James Clerk Maxwell .
This theory described the theoretical basis of the propagation of electromagnetic waves .
After Maxwell 's theory was published many people experimented with wireless communication , some  intentionally  using Maxwell 's theory some not .
It  is  considered likely  कि  the first intentional transmission of a signal by means of electromagnetic waves was performed  by  David Edward Hughes around 1880  ,  although this was  माना  to  be   प्रेरण  at the time .
The  पहला  systematic  और  unequivocal transmission of EM waves was performed by Heinrich Rudolf Hertz and  वर्णित  in  papers  published in 1887 and 1890 .
Hertz famously considered these  परिणाम  as  होने  of little practical value  .
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components and theory involved with the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves .
Others , notably Guglielmo Marconi  ,  were concerned with practical improvements and the commercial application of radio to wireless  telegraphy  .
Later on Reginald A. Fessenden became the first to send an audio signal by  अर्थात्  of electromagnetic waves .
Scurvy is  a   बीमारी  resulting from a deficiency of vitamin C , which is required for the synthesis  of  collagen in humans .
The chemical name for vitamin C , ascorbic acid ,  is  derived from the  लैटिन  name of scurvy , scorbutus , which  भी  provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of , characterized by or having to do with  स्कर्वी  '' )  .
Scurvy often presents itself initially as symptoms of  malaise  and lethargy , followed by formation of spots on the skin , spongy gums , and bleeding from the mucous membranes .
Spots  हैं  most abundant on the thighs and legs , and a person with the ailment looks pale , feels depressed , and is partially immobilized  .
as  scurvy advances , there can be open  ,  suppurating wounds , loss of teeth , jaundice ,  ज्वर  , neuropathy and  मौत  .
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors , pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable  फल  and vegetables could  be  stored ( subsisting instead only on cured and  salted  meats and dried grains ) and by soldiers similarly  वंचित  of these foods for extended periods .
It was described by Hippocrates ( c.  460  BC–c . 380 BC ) , and herbal cures for scurvy have been known in many native cultures since prehistory  .
स्कर्वी  was one of the limiting factors of marine travel , often killing  विशाल  numbers of  the  passengers and crew on long-distance voyages .
This became a  significant  issue in  यूरोपीय  from the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in  the  15th century , continuing  to  play a significant role  through  World War I in the 20th  सदी  .
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a nutritional deficiency , until the isolation of vitamin C and direct evidence of its link to scurvy in 1932 , numerous theories and treatments were proposed , often on little or no experimental data .
This inconsistency is attributed to  the  lack of vitamin C  as  a distinct concept , an inability  to  reliably link different foods (  notably  present in fresh citrus , watercress , and organ meat ) to  स्कर्वी   .
An additional concept required to understand scurvy  थी  the degradation of vitamin C by exposure to air and copper and other transition metal salts such as those of iron , thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time .
Treatment  by  fresh  खाना  , particularly citrus fruit , was periodically implemented ,  as  it had  महरूम  since antiquity .
However until the 1930s , treatment was inconsistent , with many ineffective treatments  प्रयुक्त  into  the  20th century .
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy , James Lind who first proved it could be treated with citrus fruit in experiments he  वर्णित  in his 1753 book , A Treatise of the Scurvy , though his advice was not implemented by the Royal Navy for several decades .
In infants , scurvy  is  sometimes referred to as Barlow 's disease , named after Sir Thomas  barlow  ,  a  British physician  जो  described it .
However , Barlow  's  disease may also refer to mitral  वाल्व  prolapse .
Other eponyms for scurvy include  moeller  's disease and Cheadle 's disease .
स्कर्वी  does not occur in most  पशु  because they can  synthesize  their  अपना  vitamin C .
However , humans and other higher primates  (  the simians - monkeys and  apes   -  and  tarsiers  ) , guinea pigs , most or all bats  ,   और  some species of birds and fish  कमी  an enzyme  (   l-gulonolactone  oxidase )  जरुरी  for such synthesis  और  must obtain vitamin C through their  आहार  .
Vitamin  c  is widespread  in  plant tissues , with particularly high concentrations occurring in  citrus  fruits ( oranges  ,  lemons , limes ,  grapefruits  ) , tomatoes , potatoes , cabbages , and green peppers .
Iron is a chemical element  साथ   the  symbol Fe ( from ) and atomic number 26  .
It is a metal in the first transition series .
It  is  the most common element ( by mass )  forming  the planet Earth as a whole  ,  forming much of Earth  's  outer and inner core .
It  is  the fourth  सबसे  common element in the Earth 's crust .
आयरन   's  very  आम  presence in rocky planets like Earth  is  due to its  abundant  production as a result  of  fusion in high-mass stars , where the production of  nickel-56   (  which decays to the most  आम  isotope  of  iron ) is the  पिछला  nuclear  संलयन  reaction that is  ऊष्माक्षेपी  .
This causes radioactive nickel  to  become the last element to  be  produced before collapse of a supernova leads to the explosive events that scatter this  precursor  radionuclide of iron abundantly into space  .
Like  अन्य  group  8  elements , iron exists in a wide range of oxidation states , −2 to +6 , although +2 and +3 are the most common .
elemental  iron occurs in  meteoroids  and other low oxygen  environments  , but is reactive to oxygen and water .
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray , but oxidize in normal air to give hydrated iron oxides , commonly known as rust .
Unlike many other metals which  रूप  passivating oxide layers , iron oxides occupy more volume than iron metal , and thus  आयरन  oxides flake off and expose fresh surfaces for  संक्षारण  .
Iron metal has been used since ancient  टाइम्स   ,  though copper  alloys  ,  जिससे  have lower melting temperatures , were  प्रयुक्त  first in history .
Pure iron is soft ( softer than aluminium  )   ,  but is unobtainable by smelting .
The material is significantly hardened and strengthened by impurities from the smelting process , such as carbon .
A  निश्चित  proportion of carbon ( between  0.002  % and 2.1 % ) produces  स्टील  , which may be  up  to 1000 times harder than pure iron .
Crude iron metal is produced in blast furnaces , where ore is reduced by coke to pig iron , which has a high carbon content .
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon content to the correct proportion to make steel .
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by far the most common metals in industrial use , due to their great range of desirable  गुण  and the abundance  of  iron .
Iron chemical compounds , which include ferrous and ferric compounds , have  अनेक  uses .
Iron  ऑक्साइड  mixed with aluminium powder can be ignited to create a thermite reaction , used in welding and purifying ores .
It forms binary compounds with the halogens and the chalcogens .
Among its organometallic compounds is ferrocene , the first sandwich compound discovered .
Iron plays an important role in biology , forming complexes with molecular  ऑक्सीजन  in hemoglobin and myoglobin ; these two compounds are common  ऑक्सीजन  transport proteins in vertebrates .
Iron  is  also the metal  प्रयुक्त  at the active site of many important redox enzymes dealing  साथ  cellular respiration and oxidation and reduction in plants and animals  .
The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association ( BCBSA ) is  a  federation of 38 separate health insurance organizations and companies in the United States .
संयुक्त  , they directly or indirectly provide health insurance to over 99 million Americans .
the  history of Blue  क्रॉस  dates back to 1929 ,  जबकि  the history of Blue Shield dates to 1939 .
The Blue Cross  संघ  dates back to 1960  ,  while its Blue  शील्ड  counterpart was created  in  1948 .
The two organizations merged in 1982 , forming the current association .
A potato  चिप  ( known as a chip in American , Australian , New Zealand , Canadian , Singaporean , Hong Kong , South African and Jamaican English ; as  a  crisp in  अंग्रेजों   अंग्रेज़ी  and Hiberno-English , and as either a chip or wafer  in  Indian English  )  is a thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy .
Potato chips are commonly served as  an  appetizer , side dish , or snack .
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional varieties are manufactured using various flavorings and ingredients including seasonings , herbs  ,   मसाले  , cheeses  ,   और  artificial additives .
`` Crisps '' , however , may also refer to many different types of savory snack products sold in the United Kingdom and Ireland , some made from potato , but may also be made from maize , tapioca or other cereals .
an  example of these  kinds  of savory snacks is  दानव  Munch .
Potato chips are a predominant part of the snack food market in English-speaking countries and numerous other Western nations .
The  वैश्विक  potato chip market generated  कुल  revenues of US $  16.4  billion in 2005 .
This accounted for 35.5 % of the total savory snacks market in  कि  year ( US  $   46.1  billion ) .
Henry Clay , Sr.  (  April 12 , 1777 – June 29 , 1852 ) was a lawyer , politician and skilled orator who represented Kentucky in both the Senate and in the House of Representatives  .
He served three different terms as Speaker of the United States House of Representatives and was also Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829 .
He lost his campaigns for president in 1824 , 1832 and 1844 .
Clay was a dominant figure in both the First and Second Party systems .
As  a  leading war  हॉक  in 1812  ,  he  favored  war with Britain and  निभाई  a significant role in leading the nation to war in  the  War of 1812 .
In 1824 he ran for president and lost , but threw his electoral votes to John Quincy Adams , who made him secretary of state as the Jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt bargain . ''
He ran  और   खोया  again in 1832  और  1844 as  the  candidate  of   the  Whig Party , which he founded and usually dominated .
Clay was the  foremost  proponent of the American System , fighting for an increase in tariffs to foster industry  in  the United States , the use of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure , and a  दमदार   नेशनल  bank  .
He opposed the annexation of Texas , fearing it would  इंजेक्ट  the slavery issue into politics .
Clay also opposed the Mexican-American War and the ``  manifest  Destiny `` policy  of   डेमोक्रेट  , which cost him votes in the close 1844 election .
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator ,  ''  Clay brokered important compromises during the Nullification Crisis  और  on the slavery issue .
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio , '' along with his colleagues Daniel Webster and John C. Calhoun , he was instrumental in formulating the Missouri Compromise of 1820  और  the Compromise of 1850  .
He was viewed as the primary representative of Western interests in this group , and was given the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star . ''
A  वृक्षारोपण  owner ,  मिट्टी  held slaves during his lifetime but freed  उन्हें  in his Will .
Abraham Lincoln  ,  the Whig leader in Illinois  ,   थी  a great admirer  of  Clay  ,  saying he was `` my ideal of a great man . ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly supported  मिट्टी  's economic programs .
In 1957 , a Senate Committee selected  मिट्टी  as one of the five  महानतम   u.s  . Senators , along  साथ   डेनियल   वेबस्टर   ,   जॉन  C. Calhoun ,  रॉबर्ट  La Follette , and Robert Taft .
BJ  's  Wholesale Club , Inc. ,  commonly  referred to simply  as  BJ 's , is a membership-only warehouse club  कड़ी  operating on the United States East Coast  ,  as  खूब  as in the state of Ohio  .
The company is ranked  #  232  on  Fortune magazine 's 2010 listing of America 's 500 largest public corporations .
The Wizard of Oz , known during his reign as The Great and Powerful Oz , is  the  epithet  of  Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs , a fictional character in the Land of Oz ,  निर्मित  by American author L. Frank Baum .
The character was further popularized by the classic 1939 movie , wherein his full name is not mentioned .
Kristinia Jamie DeBarge ( ; born March 8 , 1990 ) is an American singer , songwriter , dancer and actress .
She first  appeared  on national television in 2003 as a contestant on the American Idol spin-off , American Juniors  .
In 2009 , DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records department Sodapop , releasing her debut album Exposed in July of the same year .
The first single , ``  अलविदा  `` , reached the top 20 in the  us  and Canada  .
The lead  सिंगल  ( `` Cry Wolf '' ) from her untitled sophomore album was released on September 27 , 2012 .
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa  in  NCAA Division I FBS  कॉलेज  football .
The team is coached by Norm Chow .
it   थी  part of the Western Athletic Conference  जबतक  July 2012  ,  when the team joined the Mountain  वेस्ट  Conference .
