Marvin  gaye  ( April 2 , 1939April 1  ,  1984 )  ,  born  मारविन  Pentz Gay ,  jr.  , was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How  मीठी  It Is ( To Be Loved By You  )  `` and `` I Heard  it  Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell ,  बाद  earning the titles  ``  Prince of Motown '' and ``  प्रिंस   of  Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded  the  concept  एल्बम  What 's  going  On and Let 's Get It On and became among the  पहला  artists in Motown to break away from the reins of its  उत्पादन  company .
gaye  's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax  निर्वासन  in the early 1980s , Gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album .
चूंकि  his death in 1984 , Gaye has been posthumously honored  by  many institutions , including  the   ग्रैमी  Lifetime Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of  कीर्ति  .

The Chernobyl disaster  (  , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in  युक्त  ( then officially  the   यूक्रेनी  SSR ) , which was under the  सीधा  jurisdiction  of  the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive  अणु  into the atmosphere  ,  which spread over much  of  the western  ussr  and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in  इतिहास  , and  is  one of only  दो  classified as a level 7 event on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other  होने  the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over 500,000 workers and cost  an  estimated  18  billion rubles .
The  आधिकारिक  Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been  विवादित  , and long-term  प्रभाव  such  as  cancers  और  deformities are  स्टिल  being accounted for .

Mrs. Claus is the wife of Santa Claus , the Christmas gift-bringer in North American and European Christmas  परंपरा  .
She is known  लिये  making  कुकीज़  with the elves and preparing toys with her husband Santa Claus  .
Her first name is a mystery  ,  though she has been referred to as Mary , Jessica , Layla , Annette  ,  Heidi , or Martha .
HijackThis ( also  hijackthis  or HJT ) is an open source enumerating tool for Microsoft Windows originally created by Merijn Bellekom , and later sold to Trend Micro .
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking methods ,  बल्कि  than relying on a database of known spyware .
It scans  a  user  's  computer quickly , and  प्रदर्शक  browser hijacking locations , showing what entries are there  .
HijackThis is used primarily for diagnosis of browser hijacking  ,  as uninformed use of its removal facilities can cause significant software damage to a computer .
HijackThis does not remove or detect spyware ; it lists most common locations where browser hijacking activity can occur .
Browser hijacking can cause  मैलवेयर  to  be  installed on a computer .
On February  16  , 2012 , Trend  सूक्ष्म  released the HijackThis source code as open source and it  is  now available on the SourceForge  साईट  .
Saddle Creek Records is  an  American record label based in Omaha , Nebraska .
Started as a college class project on entrepreneurship , the label was founded  by  Mike Mogis and Justin Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack  रिकॉर्ड   )  .
Mogis soon turned over his role in the company to Robb  nansel  .
The  लेबल  is named after Saddle Creek Road , a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha , and the beginnings of a scene whose members  शामिल  Conor Oberst ( then  a  solo artist , currently of Bright Eyes  ,  Conor Oberst and  the  Mystic Valley Band , Desaparecidos and Monsters of  लोक  ) ,  टिम  Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia , currently of Cursive and The  शुभ  Life ) , and others .
Collectively , they  यहूद  known unofficially as the `` Creekers '' .
Saddle Creek first appeared in print on a show flyer , offering to `` Spend an evening with Saddle Creek  ''  ( later to be the title of the label 's DVD . )
Saddle Creek became an incorporated entity as a  परिणाम  of a class  प्रोजेक्ट  on entrepreneurship .
Distribution is handled by the Alternative Distribution Alliance , which is under the Warner Music Group  छतरियाँ  .
Saddle Creek  रिकॉर्ड  continues to be the flagship label of  a  style of music called `` The Omaha Sound `` , characterized by a slight country twang .
This is increasingly inaccurate  ,  though , with  the  rise of  अधिक  electronic sounds such as  those  favored by The Faint and  टूटा  Spindles .
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member bands is somewhat explained by their history ; a number of the  असली  members  of  the label attended grade school together .
A ``  सिस्टर  label '' , of sorts  ,  to Saddle Creek is Team  प्रेम   ,  started by  conor  Oberst in 2004 .
The label opened arms to their  पहला  bands not based in Omaha in 2001 with  रिलीज   by  Now It 's Overhead and Sorry About Dresden .
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed , including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley , Eric Bachmann  (  formerly leader of Archers of Loaf and Crooked Fingers from North Carolina ) , Georgie James ( Washington D.C. ) , Two Gallants ( San Francisco ) , and most recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ) .
In 2005 , Spend an Evening with Saddle Creek  ,  a  वृत्तचित्र  detailing the first ten years of the  रिकार्ड  label 's history , was released .
The DVD features  extensive  interviews with the Saddle Creek bands , archival footage , and rare  सजीव  performances .
on  June 8 , 2007 , the label opened their own music venue named Slowdown (  बाद  the group Slowdown Virginia ) ,  स्तिथ  in downtown Omaha , Nebraska  .
The following is a list of episodes for the television show Full House .
In total , there  यहूद  192 episodes  फिल्माया  for the  दिखाएँ  over the course of its eight seasons , from 1987 to 1995 .
Full  हाउस   is  a  हालात  comedy which chronicles a widowed father 's struggles of  उठाने  his  तीन  young daughters and the lives that they have touched .
The  patriarch  of the  परिवार  , Danny ( Bob Saget ) ,  आमंत्रण   उसके  brother-in-law Jesse ( John Stamos ) and his best friend Joey ( Dave Coulier ) , to help raise  उसके  children ( Candace Cameron , Jodie Sweetin  ,   और  Mary  kate/ashley  Olsen )  ,  after his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver .
After episodes 88 and 89  ,   जेसी  marries Becky ( Lori Loughlin ) , and they move  into  the attic .
Then , after episodes 104 and 105 , Becky and Jesse have twin boys named Nicky  और  Alex (  डेनियल   और  Kevin Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit )  .
The series ends with episode 192 , `` Michelle Rides Again Part 2 '' , when Michelle loses  उसके   मेमोरी  and the  परिवार  tries to restore it .
Notice of Stamp Act of 1765 in Newspaper
American newspapers reacted to the  स्टैम्प   अधिनियम  with anger and predictions of the demise of  पत्रकारिता  .
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in  अमरीकी  Colonies Act 1765  ;  5 George III , c. 12 )  imposed  a direct tax by the British Parliament specifically on the colonies of British America  ,   और  it required that many printed materials in  the  colonies be produced on  stamped  paper produced in London , carrying an embossed revenue stamp .
These printed materials were legal documents , magazines ,  अखबारों   और  many other types of paper used throughout the colonies .
Like previous taxes , the stamp tax had to be paid in valid British currency , not in colonial paper money .
The purpose of the  कर  was to help pay for troops stationed in North America after the British victory in the  सात  Years ' War .
The British government felt that the colonies  यहूद  the primary beneficiaries of this military presence , and  चाहिए   अदा  at least a portion  of  the expense .
The  स्टैम्प  Act met great resistance in the colonies .
The colonies sent no representatives to Parliament , and therefore had no influence  over  what  कर  were raised , how they were  levied  , or how they would be spent  .
अनेक   colonists  considered it  a  violation of their  अधिकारों  as Englishmen to be taxed without their consent —consent that only the  औपनिवेशिक  legislatures could grant .
Colonial assemblies sent petitions and protests .
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City  ,  reflecting the first significant joint colonial  जवाब  to  कोई  British measure , also petitioned Parliament and the King .
Local protest groups , led by colonial merchants and landowners  ,  established connections  through  correspondence  कि  created a loose coalition that  विस्तारित  from New England  to  Georgia .
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the Sons of  स्वतंत्रता  often turned violent and destructive as  the  masses became involved .
Very soon all stamp  कर  distributors were intimidated into resigning their commissions  ,  and the  कर  was never effectively collected .
Opposition to the Stamp Act was not limited to the  colonies  .
British merchants and manufacturers ,  जिनकी   निर्यात  to the colonies were threatened by colonial economic problems exacerbated by  the  tax , also pressured Parliament .
The Act was  repealed   on  March 18 ,  1766  as  a  matter of expedience ,  लकिन  Parliament affirmed its power to legislate for the  colonies  “in all cases whatsoever” by  भी  passing the Declaratory Act .
There followed a series of new taxes and regulations , likewise opposed by  the  colonists .
The episode played a major role in defining the  grievances  and enabling the organized colonial resistance that led to the American Revolution in 1775  .
PT-105 underway  .
PT boats  यहूद  a variety of torpedo-armed fast attack craft used  by   the  United States Navy in World War II to  आक्रमण  larger surface ships .
`` PT ''  is  the US hull classification symbol for `` Patrol Torpedo '' .
the  PT boat squadrons were nicknamed `` the mosquito fleet '' .
The Japanese called them `` Devil Boats '' .
The original pre– World War I torpedo boats were designed with ``  विस्थापन   ''  hulls .
They displaced up to 300  टन  and the top speed was .
The PT boats  प्रयुक्त  in World War II were built using  the  planing -type hull  रूप  developed  लिये  racing boats  .
They were  much  smaller ( 30–75 tons ) and faster ( 35–40 knots )  .
Both types were designed to strike at larger  warships  with torpedoes , using relatively high speed to get close , and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire .
They  यहूद   much  less expensive than large warships .
PT boats were much faster , smaller ,  और  cheaper than conventional ( displacement hull ) vessels .
During  संसार  War II , American PT boats engaged enemy destroyers and numerous other surface craft , ranging from small boats to large supply ships .
PT boats also operated as gunboats against  दुश्मन  small craft , such as  कराया  barges used by the Japanese forces for inter-island transport .
Good Friday is  a   धार्मिक  holiday observed primarily by Christians commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and  उसके  death at Calvary .
The holiday is observed during Holy Week as part of  the  Paschal Triduum on the Friday  preceding   ईस्टर  Sunday , and may coincide  साथ   the  Jewish observance of Passover .
It is also known as Holy Friday , Great Friday , Black Friday , or Easter Friday , though the latter properly refers to the Friday in  ईस्टर  week .
Based  on  the  विवरण  of the Canonical gospels , the Crucifixion of Jesus was most likely to have been on a Friday ( the day before the Sabbath ) ( ) .
The estimated year  of  the  crucifixion  is AD 33 , by two  अलग  groups , and originally as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the  biblical  and Julian calendars and the  crescent  of the moon .
A third  विधि  , using a completely different astronomical approach  आधारित  on a lunar  crucifixion  darkness and eclipse model ( consistent  साथ  Apostle Peter 's reference to a ``  चंद्रमा  of  रक्त  '' in Acts 2:20  )  , points to Friday , 3 April AD 33  .
The Great Basin is the largest area of endorheic watersheds in North America .
It is noted for  दोनो  its arid conditions and its Basin and  दायरा  topography that varies from the  उत्तर  American low point at Badwater  जलाशय  to the highest point of the contiguous United States , less than away at the summit  of  Mount Whitney .
The region spans several physiographic divisions , biomes / ecoregions , and deserts .
Raster  may  refer to:
Raster  ग्राफिक्स  , graphical techniques using arrays of pixel values
रास्टर  graphics editor , a computer program
Raster scan  ,  the pattern of image readout , transmission , storage , and reconstruction in  टेलीविज़न  and  कंप्यूटर  images
rasterisation  , or rasterization , conversion of a vector image to a  रास्टर  image
Raster image processor , or RIP  ,   a  component of a printing system that performs rasterisation
Raster interrupt  ,  a computer interrupt signal
Raster  to  vector , an image conversion process
Raster bar , an effect used in computer demos
raster-noton  , a record label
Rastrum , a device  प्रयुक्त  in  मध्यकालीन  music manuscripts to draw staff lines
रास्टर  Document Object , a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish hero and later turned king in the epic poem named after him , one of the oldest surviving pieces of  साहित्य  in the English language .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of Pearl Harbor )  थी  a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against  the   संयुक्त  States naval base at  पर्ल  Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan )  .
From the  standpoint  of the defenders ,  the  attack commenced  at  7:48  a.m.  Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from  दखल  with military actions the  साम्राज्य  of Japan was  नियोजन  in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United  किंगडम  , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters , bombers and torpedo planes in two waves , launched from six aircraft carriers .
All eight U.S. Navy battleships were  क्षतिग्रस्त  , with four being sunk .
Two of these were later raised , and with the remaining four repaired , six battleships returned to service later in the war .
The  जापानी  also sank or damaged  तीन  cruisers , three destroyers , an anti-aircraft training  जलयान  , and one minelayer .
188  u.S.  aircraft were destroyed ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as the power station , shipyard , maintenance  ,  and fuel and torpedo storage facilities , as well as the submarine piers and  मुख्यालय  building  (  also  घर  of the intelligence section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses were light :  29  aircraft and five midget submarines lost , and 65 servicemen killed or wounded .
One  जापानी  sailor was captured .
The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the American entry into World  युद्ध  II  in   दोनो  the Pacific and European theaters .
The following day (  दिसम्बर  8 ) , the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for non-interventionism , which  था  been  दमदार  , disappeared .
clandestine  support of Britain ( for example  the  Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance  .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy  to  declare war on the U.S. on December  11  , which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day .
There were numerous historical precedents for unannounced military action by Japan .
However , the lack of  कोई  formal warning , particularly while negotiations were  स्टिल  apparently ongoing , led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim  दिसम्बर  7 , 1941 , `` a  तिथि   जिससे  will  सजीव  in infamy ``  .
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 )  is  a north–south United States highway that runs for  in  the Mountain - Northern  मैदान  states of the United States .
The southern terminus  of  the route  is  at the United States-Mexico border in El  पासो  , Texas , connecting with Mexican Federal Highway 45 .
The northern terminus is at the United States-Canada border in Fortuna , North  डकोटा   ,  where the route continues north  as   saskatchewan   राजमार्ग  35 .
In both the United States and Saskatchewan , Canada the  रूट   is  known as the CanAm Highway .
Sections of US 85 are considered part of the Theodore Roosevelt Expressway  .
The United States  अध्यक्षीय  election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November 5 , 1968  .
The Republican nominee  ,  former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the election over the Democratic  nominee  , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran  on  a campaign that promised to restore law and order to the nation 's cities  ,  torn by riots and crime .
विश्लेषकों  have argued the election of 1968  is  a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the  नई   सौदे  Coalition that had dominated  अध्यक्षीय  politics for 36 years .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide , the election saw the incumbent president forced  आउट  of the race  और  a Republican elected for the  पहला  time in twelve years .
it  was a wrenching national experience , conducted  दौरान   a  year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King , Jr.  ,  and subsequent race riots across the nation , the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy ,  फैली  opposition to the Vietnam War  आरपार  university campuses , and  हिंसक  confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the  1968  Democratic National Convention as the Democratic  पार्टी  split again and again .
The election featured the strongest third party effort since 1912 by  पूर्व  Alabama Governor George  वालेस  , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South  to  end school  पृथक्करण  , he  carried  the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This was the  पिछला  election in which New York had the  सबसे  votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census , California gained the most electoral  मत  and has remained the most populous state  चूंकि  then  .
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the vice presidential  प्रत्याशी  's home state .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System  मॉनिटर  application included  साथ  the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications , processes and CPU  उपयोग  , commit charge and memory information  ,  network activity and statistics , logged-in users  ,  and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft  लिये  Windows , 3rd party software is available  जिससे  fills the requirements more thoroughly , e.g , `` Process Explorer  ''  , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities , processor affinity , forcibly terminate processes , and shut  bas  , restart , hibernate or log off from Windows .
Windows Task Manager was introduced with Windows NT 4.0 .
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task List application  ,  which had far fewer features .
The task list was  सक्षम  of listing  फिलहाल  running processes and  हत्या  them , or  बनाना  a new process .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also  उपस्थित  that allows access to Standby , Hibernate , Turn  बंद  , Restart , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x , Windows 95 , Windows 98 ) had a program known as tasks  to  display the programs currently running .
This file was executed  by  running the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory .
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted  logographic  Chinese characters ( hanzi  )  that are used in the modern  जापानी  writing system along with hiragana ( ひらがな , ) , katakana ( カタカナ , ) , Hindu-Arabic  numerals  , and  the  occasional use of the Latin alphabet .
The Japanese term kanji  (  ) for the Chinese characters literally means `` Han characters ''  और  is written  using  the same characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ) .
John R Williams ( May 4 , 1782 – October 20 , 1854 ) was an American soldier , merchant , and  राजनेता  who is most well known for serving as the first mayor of Detroit , Michigan .
In total , he served as Detroit 's mayor for  पाँच  other terms .
He  भी  was a brigadier general in the United  राज्य  Army during the Black Hawk War .
a  simple dry magnetic portable compass .
a   स्मार्टफोन  that can be used as a compass because of the magnetometer inside .
An iPhone that can be used as a geological compass because of the 3-axis teslameter and 3-axis accelerometer  अंदर  it
A military compass that was  प्रयुक्त   दौरान  World War I .
A compass is a navigational instrument that shows directions in a frame of reference that is stationary relative to the surface of the earth .
the   फ़्रेम  of reference defines the four cardinal directions ( or points ) – north , south , east , and west .
Intermediate directions  हैं  also defined .
Usually , a diagram called a compass rose , which shows the directions ( with their names usually abbreviated to initials ) , is marked on the compass .
When the compass is in use  ,  the rose is aligned with the real directions in  the  frame of reference  ,  so , for example , the `` N '' mark on the  रोज़  really points to the north  .
Frequently ,  in  addition to the  रोज़  or sometimes instead of it , angle  markings  in degrees are shown on the compass .
North corresponds to zero degrees , and  the   कोण  increase clockwise , so east is  90  degrees , south is 180 , and west is 270 .
These numbers allow the compass to show azimuths or bearings , which are commonly stated in this notation .
The magnetic compass was first invented as a device for divination as early as  the  Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since about 206 BC ) .
The compass was used in Song Dynasty China by the  सैन्य  for navigational orienteering by 1040-1044 , and was used for maritime navigation by 1111  to  1117 .
The use of a compass is  अंकित  in  पश्चिमी   यूरोपीय  between 1187  और  1202 , and in Persia in 1232  .
The dry compass was invented in Europe around 1300  .
इस  was supplanted in the early 20th  सदी   by  the liquid-filled magnetic compass .
The Inca  साम्राज्य  or  inka   साम्राज्य  ( Quechua : Tawantinsuyu ) was the largest  साम्राज्य  in pre-Columbian America .
The administrative ,  राजनैतिक  and military center of  the  empire was located in Cusco in modern-day  पेरू  .
The Inca civilization arose from the highlands of Peru sometime in the early 13th century .
From 1438 to 1533 , the  incas  used a variety of  विधि  , from conquest to peaceful assimilation , to incorporate  a  large portion of western South America , centered on the Andean mountain ranges , including , besides Peru , large parts of modern Ecuador , western  और  south  सेंट्रल  Bolivia  ,  northwest Argentina , north and central  चिली  , and southern  कोलंबिया   into  a  राज्य  comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia .
The official language of the empire was Quechua , although hundreds of local languages and  dialects  of Quechua  यहूद   बोला  .
The Inca referred to their empire as Tawantinsuyu which  can  be translated  as  The Four Regions or The Four United Provinces .
There  यहूद  many local forms of worship  ,  most of them concerning local sacred `` Huacas `` , but the Inca leadership encouraged the worship of  inti  —the sun god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults such as that of Pachamama .
The Incas  माना  their  किंग  , the Sapa Inca , to  be  the `` child of the sun . ''
The kidneys are organs that serve several essential regulatory roles in most animals , including vertebrates and some invertebrates .
They are  अनिवार्य  in the urinary  प्रणाली   और  also serve homeostatic functions such as the regulation of electrolytes , maintenance of acid–base balance ,  और  regulation of blood pressure ( via maintaining salt and water balance )  .
They serve the body  as  a natural filter  of   the  blood , and remove wastes which are diverted to the urinary bladder .
in  producing urine , the kidneys excrete  wastes   ऐसे  as urea and ammonium ,  और  they are also responsible for the reabsorption of water , glucose , and amino acids .
The kidneys also  उपज  hormones including calcitriol , erythropoietin , and the enzyme renin .
स्तिथ  at  the  rear of the abdominal cavity  in  the retroperitoneum , the kidneys receive blood from the paired renal  धमनियों  , and drain into the paired renal veins .
Each kidney excretes urine into a ureter ,  itself  a paired structure that empties into the urinary bladder .
Renal physiology is  the  study of kidney function , while  nephrology  is the medical specialty concerned with kidney diseases  .
Diseases of the kidney are diverse ,  लकिन  individuals with kidney disease frequently display characteristic  नैदानिक  features .
Common clinical conditions involving the  गुर्दा   शामिल  the nephritic and nephrotic  syndromes  , renal cysts , acute kidney injury , chronic kidney disease ,  urinary  tract infection , nephrolithiasis , and urinary  ट्रैक्ट  obstruction .
Various cancers of the kidney exist ; the most common adult  renal  cancer is renal cell carcinoma  .
Cancers , cysts , and some other renal conditions can be managed with  हटाना  of the  गुर्दा  , or  nephrectomy  .
When renal function , measured  by  glomerular filtration rate ,  is  persistently poor , dialysis and  गुर्दा   प्रत्यारोपण  may be treatment options .
Although they are not severely harmful  ,   गुर्दा  stones can be painful and a nuisance .
The  हटाना  of kidney stones involves ultrasound treatment  to  break up the stones into smaller pieces , which are then passed through the urinary tract .
One  आम  symptom of kidney stones  is  a sharp pain in the medial/lateral  खण्ड  of the lower back .
Lockton Companies Inc. is the world 's largest privately  आयोजित  insurance  brokerage  firm , providing insurance , risk management and employee benefits solutions  .
In addition to its Kansas City  ,  Missouri  मुख्यालय  , Lockton operates 60 locations  in  17 countries .
Lockton is currently home to more than 4,450 Associates  विश्वव्यापी  .
The company was  संस्थापित  by  जोकर  Lockton in 1966 and has since become the world’s  9th  largest insurance  brokerage  firm .
lockton  serves a wide array of industries with services that include risk management  ,  casualty , surety , professional indemnity and more  .
For  46  years , Lockton  posted  extraordinary organic growth , with global revenues reaching $ 915 million in fiscal 2012 .
Lockton Benefits  समूह  : Lockton’s Employee  benefit’s  team  works  closely with insurance carriers and administrators to create comprehensive and integrated benefits strategies for clients .
The Lockton Benefits Group provides  सेवाएं  including compliance , executive benefits , health  और  welfare  ,  health risk solutions , retirement and more .
Lockton Affinity : Lockton Affinity , an  संबद्ध  of  lockton  Companies  ,  meets the insurance needs of affinity groups , franchises  ,  professional organizations , and associations of all sizes .
Lockton Affinity offers a variety of insurance product options and programs .
Products include : General Liability , Professional  देयता  , Property  ,  Workers Compensation , Directors & Officers Liability , Commercial Auto , Specialty Coverage , Excess , Health Plans and more .
Lockton International : Lockton International operates offices in the UK and Ireland , as well as  कार्यालयों  throughout Asia and Latin America .
In Europe , Lockton International is a partner in  eos  RISQ , Europe’s leading insurance broking and risk management consultancy .
EOS RISQ is an equity-based European partnership of major independent insurance brokers with over 3,500 employees based in more than 30 countries in Europe .
lockton  International provides specialized  समाधान  for personal lines ,  sme’s  and major multi-national clients .
White chocolate is a chocolate derivative .
It commonly consists of cocoa  मक्खन  , sugar  ,  milk solids and salt , and is characterized by a pale yellow or ivory appearance .
the  melting point of cocoa butter , its primary cocoa bean component , is high enough to keep white chocolate solid at room temperature  .
Donald  लिओन  `` Don '' Blankenship ( born March 14 , 1950 )  थी  Chairman and CEO of Massey Energy Co. ,  the  sixth largest coal company ( by 2008 production ) in the United States .
He served in  those   भूमिकाएँ  from November 30 , 2000 , until December 31 , 2010 .
Blankenship is an active financial backer of the Republican  पार्टी  and participant  in  local and state politics ,  विशेषकर  in his home state of West Virginia .
He has  अक्सर  spoken out  सरेआम  about politics , the environment , unions , and  कोयले  production .
U.S. Securities  और  Exchange  आयोग  filings show Blankenship was paid $ 17.8 million in 2009 , the highest in the coal industry .
His 2009  अदा  represents a $ 6.8 million raise over 2008 and almost double  उसके  compensation package in 2007 .
Blankenship also received a deferred compensation package valued at $ 27.2 million in 2009 .
On December 3 , 2010 , Blankenship announced that he was  retiring  as CEO at  the  end of the year , and would be succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips Jr .

Bow Wow Sauce , a sauce developed in the Cotswolds region of England
