`` Bow Wow Blues ( My Mama Treat Me like a Dog ) '' , a song composed in the 1920s by Cliff Friend & Nat Osborne
लापरवाही  ( Lat . negligentia , from neglegere , to neglect , literally `` not to pick up something '' ) is a  विफलता  to exercise the care that a reasonably prudent person would exercise in  जैसे  circumstances .
The area of tort law known as negligence involves  नुक़सान  caused by carelessness , not intentional harm .
According  to   jay   M.  Feinman of the Rutgers University School of Law ;
``  The core idea of negligence is that people should exercise reasonable care when they act by taking account of the potential harm that  वे  might foreseeably cause harm to other  लोगों  . ''
``  those who go personally or bring property where they know that they or it may come into collision with the persons or property of others  have  by  विधि  a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to  avoid  such a collision . ''
फ्लेचर  v Rylands ( [ 1866 ] LR 1  ex  265 )
Through civil litigation , if an injured person proves that another person acted negligently  to  cause their injury , they can recover damages to compensate for their harm .
proving  a case for negligence can potentially entitle the injured plaintiff to compensation for harm to their body , property , mental well-being , financial status , or  अंतरंग   संबंध  .
however  , because negligence cases are very fact-specific , this general definition does not fully explain the concept  of   जब   the  law will require one person to compensate another for losses caused by accidental injury .
Further , the law of negligence  at  common  विधि   is  only one aspect of the law  of  liability .
Although resulting damages must be proven  in  order to recover compensation in a negligence action , the nature and extent  of   those  damages are not  the  primary focus  of  negligence cases .
A melanocytic nevus ( also known as ``  nevocytic  nevus '' ) is a type of lesion that contains nevus  कोशिकाएं  ( a type of melanocyte ) .
Some  स्त्रोत  equate the term  mole  with `` melanocytic nevus '' .
Other  स्त्रोत  reserve  the   पद  `` mole ''  लिये  other purposes .
the  majority of moles appear during the first two decades of a person’s life , while about one in every 100 babies is born with moles  .
acquired  moles are a form of benign neoplasm , while congenital moles , or congenital nevi , are considered a minor malformation or hamartoma and  may  be at a higher risk for melanoma .
A mole  can  be  either  subdermal (  अंतर्गत  the skin )  or  a pigmented growth on the skin , formed mostly  of  a type of cell known as a melanocyte .
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting agent , melanin , is responsible for their dark color .
Moles are a member of the  परिवार  of skin lesions known  as  nevi .
The  व्यापक   metabolic  panel , or chemical screen , (  cmp  ; CPT code 80053 ) is  a  panel of 14 blood tests which serves as an initial broad medical screening tool .
The CMP  provides  a rough check of  गुर्दा  function , liver function , and  electrolyte  and  द्रव  balance  ,  but it is  दूर   इससे  perfect .
Abnormal values from a CBC  may  be  a  result of false positives and thus  the  CBC may need to be repeated for a patient ( or replaced with a more  विशिष्ट  test ) .
the  CMP is an expanded version of the basic metabolic panel ( BMP ) , which does  नहीं   शामिल  liver tests .
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as part of  a  routine  शारीरिक  examination , or may be used to monitor a patient with a chronic disease  ,  such as diabetes mellitus or  hypertension  .
Previous names  लिये  the panel of tests have been Chem 12 , Chemistry panel , Chemistry screen  ,  SMA 12 , SMA 20 and SMAC (  sequential  Multiple Analysis - Computer  )  .
The tests  हैं  performed on machines based on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957 .
Natural gas extraction by countries in cubic meters per year  .
Natural gas is a  naturally  occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture consisting primarily of methane , but commonly including varying amounts of other hydrocarbons , carbon dioxide , nitrogen , and hydrogen sulfide .
Natural gas is an energy  सोर्स  often used for heating , cooking , and electricity generation .
It is also used as fuel for vehicles and as  a  chemical feedstock in the  manufacture  of plastics and  अन्य  commercially important organic  रसायन  .
Natural gas is found in deep  भूमिगत  natural rock formations or associated with other hydrocarbon reservoirs in coal  beds  and as methane clathrates .
Petroleum is also another resource  मिला  in proximity to and with natural gas .
Most natural gas was created over time by two mechanisms :  biogenic   और  thermogenic .
Biogenic gas is created  by  methanogenic organisms in marshes , bogs , landfills , and shallow sediments .
Deeper in the earth  ,   at  greater temperature and pressure , thermogenic gas is created  इससे  buried organic material .
पहले   प्राकृतिक   गैस  can  be  used as a fuel , it must undergo processing to remove impurities , including water , to meet the specifications of  marketable  natural gas .
The by-products of processing include ethane , propane ,  butanes  ,  pentanes  , and higher  आणविक  weight  hydrocarbons  , hydrogen sulfide ( which may  be   परिवर्तित  into pure sulfur )  ,  carbon dioxide , water vapor , and sometimes helium and nitrogen  .
Natural gas is often informally referred to simply as gas , especially  जब  compared to other energy  स्त्रोत  such as oil  or  coal .
This  पेज  is about the Imagination Movers band .
For  सूचना  about the TV show starring the band , see Imagination Movers ( TV series ) .
कल्पना  Movers is  a  band formed in New Orleans , Louisiana , in 2003 .
The  लाइनअप  includes Rich Collins , Scott  durbin   ,  Dave Poche ,  और  Scott  ``  Smitty '' Smith .
Members of the group were longtime friends and neighbors  .
The group started as a television/music concept  जिससे  was pitched  to  local PBS affiliates in New Orleans .
WLAE-TV was  the  first to take an interest in the group and later  introduced  them  to  Beth Courtney , the President & Chief Executive Officer at Louisiana Public Broadcasting .
जल्द  after , LPB began airing one-minute videos produced by the Imagination Movers themselves .
The Movers built a sizable regional following by setting educational songs for kids to melodies  और  rhythms that adults appreciate as well .
They sold more than 100,000 copies of their self-produced CDs and DVDs .
उनके  three indie CDs :  ``  Good Ideas , '' `` Calling All Movers , ''  और  `` Eight Feet '' along with their grass  जड़ें  DVD `` Stir It Up '' have , combined ,  जीती  fourteen national awards , from such groups as the National Association  of  Parenting Publications  (   nappa  )  और   अभिभावक  ' Choice .
In early 2005 , Disney took notice , and initiated negotiations  to  add the Movers to the company 's roster .
These were  बाधित  in August when the flood protection  designed  and built by the Army Corps  of  Engineers to protect New Orleans failed .
The  resulting  floodwater  claimed  the band 's office , as well  as  the homes  of  Collins , Durbin and Poche – but the deal was signed in the spring of 2006 .
In 2008 , Walt Disney Records  introduced  the Imagination Movers ' music to the nation  साथ  the release of the Movers ' first nationally-released CD , `` Juice Box Heroes . ''
In September  2008  , a 30-minute show featuring the group began airing on the Disney Channel 's preschool programming block known as Playhouse Disney ,  और  currently  airs  on Playhouse Disney 's  बदलना  , Disney Junior .
The Movers write and perform all the songs on  उनके  show .
Moreover , the Imagination Movers have  प्राप्त  critical kudos for  उनके  live concert performances .
In October  2009  , the Imagination Movers started  the  `` Live from the Idea Warehouse Concert Tour  2009   ''  .
Traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their live performances include lots of their favorite songs and  नाचना   ,  as well as video appearances of Warehouse  चूहा  .
Beginning in early-February 2011 and  wrapping  up in late May 2011 , the Imagination Movers  प्रस्तुत  their `` In a Big Warehouse Concert Tour , '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ cities across North America  .
From March to October 2012 , the Imagination Movers toured North America on their post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour .
The show maintained several elements of the original TV concept , such as an on-stage  ``  idea emergency '' and several sets from their  पुरानी   कैटलॉग  ; however ,  साथ  the departure of Wendy Calio  वापस  to her native Hawaii , the character `` Nina  ''  , along with her  musical  numbers , is not present .
The tour promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/DVD release , `` Rock-O-Matic '' , which features all new music from the band .
The album itself is produced independently of  डिज़्नी   और  has a  notably  more mature , contemporary rock-and-roll sound , though still very appropriate for  children  .
Several performance dates were moved  to  later in  2012  to benefit from the increased exposure of the Imagination Movers TV show  अभी  playing daily on Disney Junior  .
The platypus (  ornithorhynchus  anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern Australia ,  सहित  Tasmania  .
Together with the four species of echidna , it is one of the five extant species of monotremes , the only mammals that lay eggs  बजाय  of giving birth .
It is the sole living representative of its  परिवार  ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus )  ,  though a number of related species have been found in  the   चट्टान  record .
the  unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed , beaver -tailed  ,  otter -footed mammal  मनोरथ  European naturalists when they  पहला  encountered it , with some considering it  an  elaborate fraud .
It is  एक  of the few venomous mammals , the  पुरूष   platypus  having a spur on the  हिन्द  foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain  to  humans .
The unique features of the platypus make it an  महत्वपूर्ण  subject in the study of evolutionary  जीवविज्ञान  and a recognisable and iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on  the  reverse of its 20-cent coin  .
The platypus is the animal  emblem  of the state of New South Wales .
Until the early 20th century ,  it  was  hunted  for its fur  ,  but it is now protected throughout its range .
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution , it is not under any immediate threat .
The Chupacabra or Chupacabras ( , from  chupar  `` to  चूस  '' and cabra `` goat '' ,  वस्तुतः  `` goat sucker '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of  the  Americas .
It is  संबद्ध  more recently with sightings  of  an  allegedly  unknown animal in Puerto Rico ( where these sightings  यहूद  first reported ) , Mexico , and the United States  ,  especially in the latter 's Latin American communities .
The name comes from the animal 's reported habit of attacking and drinking the blood  of  livestock , especially goats .
Physical descriptions of the creature vary .
eyewitness   sightings  have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico , and have since been  reported  as far  उत्तर  as Maine  ,  and as far south as Chile , and even being spotted outside the Americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines  .
It is supposedly a heavy creature ,  the  size of a small  भालू  , with a row of spines reaching  इससे  the neck to the base of the  टेल  .
Sighting  रिपोर्ट्स   of  the Chupacabra  have  been disregarded as uncorroborated or  lacking  evidence , while most reports in northern Mexico and the southern United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange  .
Biologists and wildlife  प्रबन्धन   officials  view the chupacabra as a contemporary legend .
the  North American Free  व्यापार  Agreement ( NAFTA  )  is an agreement signed  by  Canada ,  मैक्सिको  ,  और  the United States , creating a trilateral trade bloc in North America .
The agreement came into force on  जनवरी  1 , 1994 .
It superseded the Canada–United States Free Trade Agreement  between  the U.S. ,  कनाडा  , and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the North American Agreement on Environmental Cooperation ( NAAEC ) and the North American Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ) .
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind that expresses satisfaction with the thermal environment and is assessed by  subjective  evaluation ( ANSI  /  ASHRAE  मानक  55  )   .
Maintaining this standard of  थर्मल  comfort for occupants of buildings or other enclosures is one of the important goals  of  HVAC ( heating , ventilation , and air  कंडीशनिंग  ) design engineers  .
The Predicted Mean Vote ( PMV ) model stands among the most recognized  थर्मल  comfort models  .
It was developed using principles of heat balance and experimental data collected in a controlled climate  कक्ष  under steady state conditions .
Because the PMV model was derived from data collected  in  a controlled climate , it is not suitable for  अनुप्रयोग  in naturally ventilated spaces which often  have  high levels of air movement .
This shortcoming motivated the development of a family of empirical statistical models of thermal comfort in  naturally  ventilated spaces known as  अनुकूली  models .
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting with  उनके  environment , and controlling their thermal comfort by means of clothing or window-opening and closing .
This is  in  contrast to thermal  सुकून  in sealed buildings , in which occupants experience the environment passively .
Thermal comfort is affected by heat conduction , convection , radiation , and evaporative heat loss .
Thermal comfort is maintained  जब  the heat generated by  इंसान  metabolism is allowed to dissipate , thus  maintaining  thermal equilibrium with the surroundings .
It has  महरूम  long recognized that the  सनसनी  of feeling hot or cold is not just dependent on air temperature alone .
Thermal comfort calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard  55  can be freely performed with the CBE  थर्मल  Comfort Tool  लिये   ashrae-55  .
Durante  degli  Alighieri , simply  referred  to as  दांते  ( , ; ; c. 1265–1321 ) , was a major Italian  कवि  of the Middle Ages .
His Divine  कॉमेडी  , originally  पुकारा   '  and later called ' by Boccaccio , is widely considered the greatest literary work composed  in  the Italian language and a masterpiece of world literature .
In Italy he  is   ज्ञात  as ' ( `` the Supreme Poet ''  )  or just  '  .
He ,  petrarch  and Boccaccio  हैं  also known as `` the three  स्रोतों  '' or  ``  the three crowns ''  .
Dante is also called the `` Father of the Italian language  ''   .
Headquarters (  कोबे  , Japan )
(  )  is a tire and rubber company based in Japan  .
it   is  part of the Sumitomo Group .
The company traces  इसके  origins to 1909 , when the Sumitomo Group made an investment in Dunlop Japan , the newly formed Japanese  subsidiary  of the British company Dunlop Rubber .
Over the  सालो  Sumitomo  और  Dunlop developed a close  कारोबार  relationship , and in 1963 the Sumitomo Group  acquired  control of Dunlop Japan and renamed  it  Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd .
In 1985 , when Dunlop Rubber  थी  taken over by BTR  पीएलसी  , the company acquired the automobile tire assets of Dunlop , including the right to use the Dunlop brand  on  automobile tires .
The acquisition did not include the US and Australian businesses , which were separately owned , but in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of  the  US from  इसके  management .
in  1997 , Sumitomo formed a joint venture with  goodyear  Tire and Rubber Company , by which Goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture tires for each other 's markets , including Dunlop branded tires .
as  part of  the   अनुबंध  , Goodyear acquired 75 % interests in Dunlop Tyres , the UK company which Sumitomo had formed , and in Dunlop Tire Corporation .
Goodyear and Sumitomo also made investments in  प्रत्येक  other .
Today , the company makes a wide range of rubber  आधारित  products , including  ऑटोमोबाइल  tires , golf balls and tennis  गेंदें  .
microsoft  Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware  एकीकृत  development environments ( IDE ) developed by Microsoft that are lightweight versions of the Microsoft Visual Studio product line .
Express  संस्करण   यहूद   conceived   शुरूआत  with Visual Studio  2005  .
The idea of Express editions is to provide streamlined  ,  easy-to-use and  easy-to-learn  IDEs  लिये  users other than professional software developers , such as hobbyists and students .
The  ऐल्प्स  are  एक  of the great mountain range systems  of  Europe stretching approximately across eight Alpine countries from Austria and Slovenia in the east , Switzerland ,  liechtenstein  , Germany , France to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south .
The mountains were formed over hundreds of millions of years as the African and Eurasian tectonic plates collided .
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in marine sedimentary rocks rising by thrusting and folding into high mountain peaks such as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn .
Mont Blanc spans the French–Italian border , and at is the highest mountain  in  the Alps .
The Alpine region area contains many peaks higher than , known as the  ``  four-thousanders `` .
The  ऊँचाई  and size of the range affects the climate in Europe ;  in  the mountains precipitation levels vary  greatly   और  climatic  शर्तें  consist of distinct zones .
Wildlife such as ibex live in  the  higher peaks to elevations of , and plants such as Edelweiss grow in rocky areas in lower  elevations  as well as in higher elevations .
Evidence of human habitation in the Alps  goes  back to the  paleolithic  era  .
A mummified man  ,  determined to be  5,000  years old ,  थी  discovered on a glacier at the Austrian–Italian border in  1991   .
By the 6th century  bc  , the Celtic La Tène culture was well established .
Hannibal  may  have crossed the  ऐल्प्स  with a herd of elephants , and the Romans had settlements in the region .
In 1800 Napoleon crossed one of the mountain passes with an army of 40,000 .
the  18th and 19th  सदियां  saw an influx of naturalists , writers , and artists , in  particular  the Romantics ,  followed  by the golden age of alpinism as  mountaineers  began to  ascend  the peaks .
In World War II the Third Reich invaded the Alpine countries , with the  एक्सेप्शन  of Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; Adolf Hitler kept a  आधार  of operation in the Bavarian  ऐल्प्स  throughout the war .
The Alpine region has a strong cultural identity .
The traditional culture  of  farming , cheesemaking , and woodworking still exists in Alpine villages , although the tourist industry began to grow early in the 20th century and expanded greatly after World War II  to  become the dominant industry by the end of the century  .
The Winter Olympic Games have been  hosted  in the Swiss , French , Italian , Austrian  और  German Alps .
At present the region  is  home to 14 million people and has 120  लाख  annual visitors .
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née  pewterschmidt  ) is a character from the animated television series  परिवार   guy  .
She is voiced by  लेखक  Alex Borstein and first  appeared  on television , along  साथ  the rest of the family in  the  15-minute  छोटी  on December 20 , 1998 .
Lois was created and designed by series creator Seth MacFarlane .
MacFarlane was asked to pitch  a  pilot to the Fox Broadcasting Company based on Larry and Steve , a  छोटी  made by MacFarlane which  प्रदर्शित   a  middle-aged character named Larry and an intellectual dog , Steve .
After the pilot was given the green  लाइट  ,  the  Griffin family appeared on the episode `` Death Has a Shadow `` .
Lois is  the  mother of the Griffin family .
साथ  her husband Peter  ,  she has had three children : Meg , Chris , and Stewie .
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother , despite her admitting to being a drug user , a recovering meth addict kleptomaniac .
लोइस  has also had several affairs , one of which  allegedly   resulted  in  the  conception of Meg .
She  रै  appeared in other media relating to Family Guy—including a  वीडियो  game , commercials and books—and inspired an entire line of merchandise .
Lois 's distinctive New  यॉर्क  accent originated from a character in a stage  दिखाएँ  that  एलेक्स  Borstein had performed in , which was largely inspired by a relative who grew up on Long Island , New York .
Family transmission  of  Basque language  (  Basque as initial language  )
Percentage of students  पंजीकृत  in  बास्क  language schools (  2000–2005  ) .
Location of the Basque-language provinces within Spain and  फ़्रांस
Basque ( endonym : , ) is the ancestral language of the Basque people , who inhabit the Basque Country , a region spanning an area in northeastern Spain and southwestern France .
It is spoken by 27 % of Basques in all territories ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ) .
of   ये  , 663,035 live in the Spanish part of the Basque country and the remaining 51,100 live in the French part .
In  अकादमिक  discussions of the distribution of  बास्क  in Spain and France , it is customary to refer to three ancient provinces in France and  चार  Spanish provinces  .
Native  अध्यक्षों  are concentrated in a contiguous area including parts of the Spanish autonomous communities of the Basque Country and Navarre and in the western half of the French département of  pyrénées-atlantiques  .
The Basque Autonomous Community  is  an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic  बास्क  Country incorporating  the  traditional Spanish provinces of Biscay , Gipuzkoa , and Álava , which retain their existence  as  politico-administrative  विभाजन  .
These provinces and many areas of Navarre  हैं  heavily populated by  जातीय  Basques , but Basque was , at least until the 1990s  ,  not spoken as  a  native language  in  most of Álava , western parts of  biscay  and central and southern areas of  नावारा  , either because it had been replaced by  स्पेनी  along the centuries , in some areas , or  क्युकी  it had never been spoken there , in other areas .
In southwestern France , the ancient Basque-populated provinces were Labourd ,  निम्नतर  Navarre  ,  and Soule .
They and other regions  यहूद   संचित  into a single département in 1790 under the name Basses-Pyrénées ,  a  name which persisted until  1970  .
A standardized  रूप  of the Basque language , called Euskara Batua , was developed by the Basque Language Academy  in  the late 1960s .
euskara  Batua was created so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by all Basque speakers—in  औपचारिक  situations ( education , mass media , literature ) ,  और  this is its main use today .
the  role of this standard Basque language  depends  on the linguistic educational model of each region and each school .
In most areas of  the  Spanish Basque Country , the  शैक्षणिक  Model D , where all subjects are taught in Basque , except `` Spanish  भाषा  and literature '' ( which is taught in  स्पेनी  )  is  now the predominant model .
In France , the Basque language school Seaska and the association for a bilingual ( Basque and French ) schooling Ikasbi  मिलें  a wide range of Basque  भाषा  educational needs up to the Sixth Form , while often struggling  to  surmount  वित्तीय  and administrative constraints .
Apart from this standardized  संस्करण  , there are five main Basque dialects : Bizkaian , Gipuzkoan , and Upper Navarrese in Spain , and  navarrese–lapurdian  and Zuberoan ( in France ) .
Although they take their names from the mentioned historic provinces , the dialect boundaries are not congruent with province boundaries .
The President , Directors and Company , of the  बैंको  of the United States , commonly known as the First Bank of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , was a  सेंट्रल  bank , chartered  लिये  a  पद  of twenty years , by the United States Congress on February  25  , 1791  .
Establishment  of  the Bank  थी  included in a three-part expansion of federal fiscal and monetary power ( along with a federal mint and excise taxes ) championed  by  Alexander Hamilton , first Secretary of the  राजकोष  .
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to stabilize and improve the nation 's credit  ,  and to improve handling  of  the financial business of the United States government under the newly  enacted  Constitution .
officially  proposed to the  पहला  session of the First  कॉंग्रेस   in  1790 , Hamilton 's  बैंको  faced widespread resistance  इससे  opponents of  increased  federal power .
Secretary of  राज्य   थामस  Jefferson and James Madison led the opposition  ,  which claimed that the bank was unconstitutional , and that it benefited merchants and  निवेशकों  at the expense of the  बहुमत  of the population .
The First Bank building  is  now a National Historic  लैंडमार्क  located in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania within Independence National Historical Park .
James Wesley Marsters ( born  अगस्त   20  , 1962 ) is an American actor and musician .
Marsters  पहला  came to the attention of the  सामान्य  public playing the popular character Spike , a platinum-blond yobbish English vampire in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off series , Angel , from 1997 to 2004 .
Since  तब  ,  he  has gone on to play other science fiction roles , such as the alien  supervillain  Brainiac on  the  Superman -inspired series Smallville , the omnisexual  समय   मुसाफ़िर  Captain John Hart in British science-fiction show Torchwood and terrorist Barnabas Greeley  in  Sci  fi   's  Caprica .
Marsters appeared  in   a  supporting role in the 2007  फिल्म  P.S .
I Love You and as the  प्रमुख  antagonist , Piccolo , in the 2009 fantasy adventure film Dragonball Evolution .
He appeared  as  a recurring character in the first season of the revival of Hawaii 5-0 .
In molecular biology , human  chorionic  gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized  अंडा  after conception .
Later  दौरान  pregnancy it is made by the  विकासशील  placenta , and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast .
कुछ  cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore ,  elevated  levels measured when the patient is not pregnant can  सीसे  to a cancer diagnosis .
However ,  it  is not known whether this production is a contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as luteinizing hormone ( LH )  ,  is  उत्पादित  in the pituitary gland of males  और  females of all ages .
,  the FDA  रै  prohibited the  बिक्री  of ``  होम्योपैथिक  '' and over the counter hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent  और  illegal .
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter , known by her stage name Beyoncé ( ; born September 4 , 1981 ) ,  is  an  अमरीकी  singer , songwriter , dancer , and actress .
Born and raised in Houston , Texas , she performed in singing and  नाचना  competitions as a child before forming in 1990 a group with Kelly  rowland  and LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child  .
Once signed to Columbia Records , the girls subsequently became one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time .
The group was plagued by internal conflict and legal turmoil and Knowles suffered  इससे  depression that lasted  लिये  a number  of  years .
During the group  's  hiatus , Knowles released her debut solo album Dangerously  in  Love ( 2003 ) , which earned her  पाँच   ग्रैमी  Awards and  रै  sold a total of 4.9 million copies in the US alone  .
It spawned Billboard  क्रमांक  one singles `` Crazy in Love ,  ''  considered by VH1 to be the `` Greatest Song Of the 00 's ,  ''  and `` Baby Boy . ''
Following the disbandment of  नियति  's Child in 2005 , Knowles 's second solo album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the top five singles ``  déjà  Vu `` , `` Irreplaceable `` , and `` Beautiful  झूठा  `` .
Her performance in Dreamgirls ( 2006 ) earned her two Golden Globe nominations .
Knowles ' work playing Etta James in that film inspired her subsequent album I Am ...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits `` If I Were a  लड़के  `` ,  ``  Single Ladies (  put  a Ring on It  )  `` , `` Halo `` , and `` Sweet Dreams `` .
The album also helped Knowles  earn  six Grammys in 2010 , breaking the record for most Grammy Awards won by  a  female artist in one night .
उसके  fourth album 4 ( 2011  )  deviated towards  परंपरागत  R  &  B and became  उसके   चौथी  consecutive number one album on the Billboard 200  .
In January 2012 , Knowles gave birth to daughter Blue Ivy Carter , her first child with husband Jay-Z .
Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in  the  US and 118  लाख  records worldwide ( as well as a further 50 million records  साथ  Destiny 's Child ) , and is one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
The Recording Industry Association of America  (  RIAA ) recognized Knowles as  the  Top Certified Artist of the 2000s .
In 2009 , Billboard named her the Top Radio  गीतों  Artist of the decade and ranked her the Top  मादा  Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade .
बेयोंस  Knowles is the most nominated woman in Grammy Award history , receiving 17 awards ; other accolades include 12 MTV Video Music Awards  ,  7 Billboard Awards including a Millennium Award , and a star  on  the Hollywood Walk of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child .
`` Angry All the Time '' is the title of a song written by Bruce Robison and first recorded on his 1998  एल्बम  Wrapped .
It was  बाद  covered by Tim McGraw with guest vocalist Faith Hill .
released  in  जुलाई  2001 , McGraw 's version was the second single from McGraw  's  Set  इस  Circus Down  एल्बम  .
The song reached Number  एक  on the Billboard  hot  Country  singles  & Tracks ( now Hot  देश  Songs  )  charts .
Dear John is a  2010  American romantic drama - war film  अभिनीत  Amanda Seyfried and Channing Tatum .
It was released theatrically in North America on February 5 , 2010 .
The film was directed by Lasse Hallström , and it is an adaptation of Nicholas Sparks 's novel of the same  नाम  .
It follows the life of a soldier ( Channing Tatum ) after  he  falls in love with a  यंग  woman ( Amanda Seyfried ) .
They decide to exchange letters to each other after  he  is deployed to  the  war .
The movie  थी  filmed in 2009 in Charleston ,  दक्षिण  Carolina .
Despite receiving negative reviews , the film made a strong box office performance , knocking  बंद  Avatar after seven weekends in first  प्लेस  and grossing a total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide .
The  फिल्मी  was released  on  May 25 , 2010 on DVD and Blu-ray .
These are  सूचियाँ  of the  व्यस्ततम  airports in the  संयुक्त  States .
Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport is the busiest single airport in the United States .
however  , all of the New  यॉर्क  City metropolitan area 's airports combine to create the largest  विमानक्षेत्र  system in  the   संयुक्त  States , second  in  the world in terms of passenger  ट्रैफ़िक  , and first in the world in terms of total flight operations .
Dora the Explorer is an American animated television series created  by   क्रिस  Gifford , Valerie Walsh , and Eric Weiner .
Dora the Explorer became a regular series in 2000 .
The  दिखाएँ  is carried on the Nickelodeon cable television network , including  the  associated Nick Jr. channel .
It aired on CBS until September  2006  .
A Spanish-dubbed version first aired  as  part of a Nick en español block on NBC Universal -owned Telemundo through September 2006 ; since April  2008  , this version of the program has been carried on Univision as part of the Planeta U block .
Santa Fe ( ; (  tewa  : Ogha Po'oge , ) ) is  the  capital of the U.S. state of New  मैक्सिको   .
It is the fourth-largest city in the state and is the  सीट  of .
Santa Fe ( meaning “holy faith” in Spanish ) had a population  of  67,947 in the 2010 census .
It is the principal city of a Metropolitan Statistical Area which encompasses all of Santa Fe County and  is  part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area .
The city’s full name when founded was La Villa Real de la Santa  fé  de San Francisco de Asís (  “the  Royal Town  of  the Holy Faith of  st.  Francis of Assisi” ) .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi , formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink that is produced and  manufactured  by PepsiCo .
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink , it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola  on   अगस्त  28  ,  1898 , then  to  Pepsi in 1961 .
1765 Broadside
the  Sons of Liberty was a group consisting of American patriots that originated in the pre-independence North American British colonies .
The group  थी  formed  to  protect the rights of  the  colonists and to take to the streets against the taxes by  the  British government .
They are best known for undertaking the Boston Tea Party in 1773 ,  जिससे  led to the Intolerable Acts  (  an intense crackdown by  the  British government ) , and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots .
Osaka castle
is  a city  in  the Kansai  प्रदेश  of Japan 's main island  of  Honshu ,  a  designated city under the Local Autonomy Law ,  the  capital  नगर  of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest part of the Keihanshin metropolis , which comprises three major cities of Japan , Kyoto , Osaka and Kobe .
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River  on  Osaka  खाड़ी  , Osaka is Japan 's third largest city  by  population after Tokyo ( special wards ) and Yokohama .
Keihanshin is the second largest metropolitan area in Japan by population and one  of  the largest metropolitan  क्षेत्रों  highly ranked in the world , with nearly 19 million people , and  by  GDP  the  second largest area in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world .
Historically the commercial center of Japan , Osaka functions as one  of  the command centers for the Japanese economy .
The ratio between daytime and night time population is 141 % , the  उच्चतम  in Japan , highlighting its status as an economic center .
Its nighttime population is 2.6 million , the  तीसरा  in the country , but in daytime the population surges to 3.7 million  ,  second  तभी  after  टोकियो  (  combining  the special  wards  of Tokyo , which is  नहीं   a  single incorporated city , for statistical purposes ; see the  टोकियो  article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ) .
Osaka used to be referred to as the  in  feudal Edo period because it was the centre of trading for rice , creating the first modern futures  एक्सचेंज  market in the world .
The Little Mermaid is a 1989 American animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
Based on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen , The Little Mermaid tells the story of a beautiful mermaid who dreams of becoming human .
Written , directed  ,  and produced by Ron Clements and John Musker , with  म्यूज़िक   by  Alan Menken and Howard Ashman ,  the  film features the voices Jodi Benson , Christopher Daniel Barnes , Pat Carroll , Samuel E. Wright , Jason Marin ,  केनेथ  Mars , Buddy  hacket   ,  and Rene Auberjonois .
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series , The Little Mermaid was released to theaters  on  November  14  , 1989  to  largely positive reviews , garnering $ 84 million at the box office during its initial release , and $ 211 million in total lifetime gross .
बाद   the  success of the 1988 Disney / Amblin  फिल्मी   जो  Framed Roger Rabbit , The  छोटी  Mermaid is given credit for breathing life back into the art of Disney animated feature films after a string of critical or  वाणिज्यिक  failures produced by Disney that dated back to the early 1970s .
it  also marked the start of  the  era known as the Disney Renaissance .
A stage adaptation of the film with a book  by  Doug Wright and additional songs by Alan Menken and new lyricist Glenn Slater opened  in   डेनवर  in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10 , 2008 .
alt=Close-up photo of a metal spoon filled with a viscous , clear purple fluid
Purple drank is a slang term for a recreational drug popular in the hip hop community in the southern United States , originating in Houston  ,  Texas  .
Its main ingredient is prescription -strength cough syrup containing codeine and promethazine .
खांसी  syrup is typically mixed with ingredients such as Sprite soft  पेय   or  Mountain Dew and pieces of Jolly Rancher candy .
The purplish hue of  जामुनी   पिया  comes from dyes  in  the cough syrup .
There are numerous slang terms for purple  पिया  , including sizzurp , lean , syrup , drank , barre , purple jelly  ,   टेक्सास  tea , and Tsikuni .
First/given , middle , and last/family/surname diagram  साथ  J. S. Bach as example .
J. S. Bach shared his given name with six immediate family members  और  many extended family members .
He shared his family name with most family members .
A given name , in Western contexts often referred to as a first name , is a personal name that  specifies  and differentiates between members  of  a group of individuals , especially in a family , all of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ) .
A given name is purposefully given , usually by a child 's parents at or near birth , in contrast  to  an inherited one such as a family name .
A given name is  sometimes  legally changed through a  नाम  change .
Given names are often used in a familiar and friendly manner in informal situations .
In more formal situations the surname is  प्रयुक्त  instead , unless it is necessary to distinguish between people  साथ  the same surname  .
The idiom `` on a first-name basis ''  (  or `` on first-name terms '' ) alludes to the familiarity of  संबोधित  another by a given name .
The western style of  having  both a  परिवार  name ( surname ) and a given name is far from universal  .
In many countries it  is  common for ordinary people  to  have only  एक  name ( a mononym ) .
Hydrochloric acid is a clear , colourless solution of hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water  .
It  is  a  अत्यधिक  corrosive ,  दमदार  mineral acid with many industrial uses  .
Hydrochloric  एसिड  is found naturally in gastric acid .
historically  called muriatic acid , and spirits  of  salt , hydrochloric acid  थी  produced from vitriol  (  sulfuric acid ) and common salt .
It first appeared during the Renaissance , and then it was used by chemists such as Glauber , Priestley and Davy in their scientific research .
With major production starting  in  the Industrial Revolution , hydrochloric acid is used in  the  chemical  उद्योग  as a chemical reagent in the large-scale production of  विनाइल  chloride  लिये  PVC  प्लास्टिक  , and MDI / TDI for  polyurethane  .
It  रै  numerous  smaller-scale  applications , including household cleaning ,  उत्पादन  of gelatin and other food additives , descaling , and  चमड़े  processing .
About 20 million tonnes of hydrochloric acid are produced annually .
Wheat ( Triticum spp  .  )  is   a  cereal grain , originally  इससे  the Levant region  of  the Near East and Ethiopian  हाइलैंड्स  , but now cultivated worldwide .
In 2010 , world production of wheat was 651 million  टन  , making it the third  most-produced  cereal after maize ( 844  लाख  tons ) and rice ( 672 million tons )  .
Wheat was the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; world production in that year was 682 million tons , after maize ( 817  लाख  tons  )  ,  और   साथ  rice as a  बंद  third  (  679 million tons ) .
This grain is grown on more land area than any other commercial food .
World trade in  गेहूं  is greater than for all other crops combined .
Globally , wheat  is  the leading source of  सब्ज़ी   प्रोटीन  in human food ,  having  a  उच्चतर   प्रोटीन  content than soybeans or the other major cereals , maize ( corn ) or rice .
In terms of total production  tonnages  used for food , it is currently second to rice as the main human  खाना  crop and ahead of maize , after allowing  लिये  maize 's  अधिक  extensive use in animal feeds .
Wheat was a key factor enabling the emergence of  city-based  societies at the start of civilization because it was  एक  of the first crops that could be  easily  cultivated on a large scale , and had the additional advantage of yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage  of  food .
Wheat contributed to the emergence  of  city-states in the Fertile Crescent , including the Babylonian and Assyrian empires .
Wheat grain is a staple food used to make  आटा  for leavened  ,  flat and  steamed  breads , biscuits , cookies  ,  cakes , breakfast cereal , pasta , noodles , couscous  और  for  fermentation  to make beer ,  अन्य  alcoholic beverages ,  or  biofuel .
गेहूं  is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop for  पशुधन  , and  इसके  straw can be used as a construction material for roofing thatch .
The whole grain can be milled to leave just the endosperm for white flour .
The by-products of this are bran and germ  .
The  पूरे  grain is a concentrated source  of  vitamins  ,   खनिज  , and protein , while the refined grain is  ज़्यादातर  starch  .
Printing
To publish is  to  make content  उपलब्धियाँ  to the general  पब्लिक  .
While specific use of the term may  vary  among countries , it  is  usually applied  to  text , images , or other audio-visual content on any  परंपरागत   मीडियम  , including paper ( newspapers , magazines , catalogs , etc . ) .
The word publication means the act of publishing , and also refers to any printed copies .
Melissa &  जॉय  is an ABC Family original television series starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence .
It first aired  on  ABC Family on August 17 , 2010 .
The series follows local politician Mel Burke (  मेलिसा  Joan Hart ) and  जो   longo  ( Joey  लॉरेंस  ) , whom Mel hires to look after her niece and nephew after a Ponzi scheme  पत्ते  him broke  .
the   श्रेणी  was  नवीनीकृत  by ABC Family for a second season of fifteen episodes , which began airing on May 30 , 2012 and ended on August 29 , 2012 .
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable  tv  's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock across target audiences 18–34 , 18–49 and  12–34  demographics .
On August 17 , 2012  ,   एबीसी  Family renewed Melissa &  जॉय   लिये  a third season , set to premiere in spring 2013 .
The Dharma wheel , often used to  represent   the  Noble Eightfold Path
The Noble Eightfold Path ( , ) is one of  the  principal  शिक्षाओं   of  the Buddha , who described it as the way leading to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and  the  achievement of self-awakening .
It  is  used to develop insight into the true nature of phenomena ( or reality ) and  to   eradicate  greed , hatred , and delusion .
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the Buddha 's Four Noble Truths ; the first element of the Noble Eightfold Path is , in turn , an  समझना  of the Four  प्रतिष्ठित  Truths .
It is  भी  known as the Middle Path or Middle Way .
All eight elements of the Path begin with the word `` right '' ,  जिससे  translates the word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ) .
These denote completion  ,  togetherness , and coherence , and can also suggest the senses of `` perfect ''  or  `` ideal '' .
'Samma '  is  also translated as `` wholesome '' ,  ``  wise '' and `` skillful '' .
In Buddhist symbolism , the  प्रतिष्ठित  Eightfold Path is often represented  by   अर्थात्  of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ) , whose eight spokes represent the eight elements of the  पाथ  .
The  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  for Song of the Year is an honor presented  at  the Grammy Awards , a ceremony that was established in 1958 and originally called the Gramophone  पुरस्कार  .
Awards  in  several categories are distributed annually by  the  National Academy of  रिकॉर्डिंग  Arts and Sciences of the United States to ``  सम्मान  artistic achievement , technical proficiency and  overall  excellence in the recording industry  ,  without regard to album sales or chart position . ''
Economics is the social science that  analyzes  the production  ,  distribution , and consumption of goods and services .
The term  अर्थशास्त्र  comes  इससे  the Ancient Greek ( ' , `` management of a household , administration ''  )  from ( ' , `` house '' ) + ( ' , `` custom  ''  or `` law '' ) , hence `` rules of the  हाउस  ( hold ) '' .
Political economy was the earlier name for the subject , but economists in the  लेट  19th century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter term for  ``  economic science '' that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation and as similar  in  form to ``  गणित  `` , `` ethics ''  ,  and so forth .
A  फ़ोकस  of the subject is how  आर्थिक  agents behave or interact and how economies work .
Consistent with this , a primary textbook distinction is between microeconomics  और  macroeconomics .
Microeconomics examines the behavior  of  basic elements in the economy  ,  including  व्यक्तिगत  agents ( such as households and firms  or  as buyers and  विक्रेता  ) and markets ,  और  their interactions .
Macroeconomics analyzes the entire economy and issues affecting it , including unemployment , inflation , economic growth , and monetary and fiscal  नीति  .
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing ``  कया  is '' ) and normative economics (  वकालत  `` what  ought  to be '' ) ; between economic  सिद्धान्त  and  लागू   अर्थशास्त्र  ; between rational and behavioral economics  ;  and between mainstream economics ( more ``  परंपरागत   ''  and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus '' ) and heterodox economics  (  more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' )  .
Economic analysis may be applied throughout society , as  in  business , finance  ,  health care , and government , but also to such diverse subjects as crime  ,  education  ,  the family , law , politics , religion , social institutions , war , and science .
At the turn of the 21st century , the expanding domain of economics in the social sciences has been described as economic  साम्राज्यवाद  .
An increasing number  of  economists have  पुकारा  for increased emphasis on environmental  स्थिरता  ; this area of research is known as Ecological economics .
This is a list of Schedule IV drugs  अंतर्गत  the  नियंत्रित  Substances Act for  the  United States .
जरूरी   निष्कर्षों  for drugs to be placed  in  this schedule:
The drug or  अन्य  substance has a low potential for abuse relative  to  the drugs or other substances in schedule III .
The drug or other substance has a currently accepted medical  उपयोग  in treatment in the United  राज्य  .
Abuse of the drug or other substance may lead to limited  शारीरिक  dependence or psychological dependence  सापेक्ष  to the drugs or other substances  in  schedule III .
The complete  सूची  of Schedule IV drugs are as follows  .
The  प्रशासनिक  Controlled Substances Code Number  लिये   प्रत्येक  drug  is  included .
US county household median income 2009 .
Median US household income , 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly used  by  the United States government and private institutions .
Each household is  measured   by  the income  of  every  निवासी  over the age of 15 .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment insurance ,  विकलांगता   भुगतान  , child support payments  प्राप्त  ,  नियमित  rental receipts , as well as any personal business , investment , or other kinds of income received routinely .
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real  ''  )  household  income had been increasing  लगभग  every year from 1945 to 1999 , it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
u.S.  median  household  income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502  in  2011 .
Extreme poverty  in  the United States  ,  meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before government benefits , doubled from  1996  to 1.5  लाख  households in 2011 ,  सहित  2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head of the household for their earnings  to  be considered part of the household 's income .
As households tend to share a similar economic  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  ,  the  use of household income remains among the most widely accepted measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into  खाता  in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations  भीतर  or among the household income categories , and may render direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible .
The lapse rate is defined as the rate of decrease with height for an atmospheric variable .
The variable involved is temperature  जबतक  specified otherwise .
The terminology arises from  the   शब्द  lapse in  the  sense of a  घटी  or decline .
While most often applied to Earth 's  माहौल  the concept can be  विस्तारित  to any gravitationally  समर्थित   बॉल  of gas .
Blue Mountain State is an American comedy series that premiered on Spike  on  January 11  ,  2010 .
The series  निर्माता  include  क्रिस  Romano and Eric Falconer , and it is produced by Lionsgate Television .
The series is about a  fictional  university , Blue Mountain State , and its football team ,  ``  The Mountain Goats . ''
It portrays certain aspects of  अमरीकी  university life , including football , sex , binge drinking , drugs , wild partying , and hazing  .
in  February  2012   ,  it was reported that Blue Mountain State would not be renewed for a fourth season .
In March 2013 , Ed Marinaro stated that he is working on  a  Blue Mountain State film .
Apple Inc. , formerly Apple Computer , Inc. , is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino , California that designs , develops , and sells consumer electronics , computer software and personal computers .
Its  best-known  hardware products are the Mac line of computers ,  the  iPod music player , the iPhone  स्मार्टफोन  , and the iPad tablet computer .
Its software includes the OS X and iOS operating systems , the iTunes media browser , the Safari  वेब  browser ,  और  the iLife and iWork creativity and production suites .
The company was founded on April 1 , 1976 , and incorporated as Apple Computer , Inc. on January  3  , 1977 .
The word `` Computer '' was removed from  इसके  name on January 9 , 2007 , reflecting its shifted focus towards consumer electronics after the introduction of  the  iPhone .
Apple is the world  's  second-largest information technology company by revenue after Samsung  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  , and the world 's third-largest mobile phone maker  बाद  Samsung  और   नोकिया  .
Fortune  पत्रिका  named Apple  the  most admired company in the United States  in  2008 ,  और  in  the  world  इससे  2008 to 2012 .
however  , the company has received criticism for its  ठेकेदारों  ' labor practices , and for Apple 's own environmental and business practices .
, Apple maintains 394 retail  स्टोर्स  in fourteen countries as well as the online Apple Store and iTunes Store .
It is the second-largest publicly traded corporation in the world by market capitalization , with an estimated value of US $ 414 billion as of January 2013 .
, the company had 72,800 permanent full-time employees and 3,300 temporary full-time employees worldwide .
Its worldwide annual revenue  in  2012 totalled $ 156 billion .
Section 8 housing in the South Bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ) , often simply known as Section  8  , as repeatedly amended , authorizes the payment of rental housing assistance to private landlords on  निमित्त   of  approximately 3.1 million low-income households  .
It operates through several programs , the largest of which , the Housing Choice Voucher program , pays a large portion of the rents and utilities of about 2.1 million  households   .
The US Department  of  Housing and Urban Development manages the Section 8 programs .
The Housing Choice Voucher Program  provides   ``  tenant-based '' rental assistance , so a tenant can move from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another .
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the purchase of a home , with over $ 17 billion going towards such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ) .
The maximum allowed voucher is  $  2200 a month .
Section 8 also authorizes a  किस्में  of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs , under which the owner  reserves  some or all of  the  units in a building for low-income tenants , in return for a Federal government guarantee to make up the difference between the tenant 's contribution and  the  rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the government .
A tenant who  पत्ते  a subsidized project  होगा  lose access to the project-based subsidy .
The United States  विभाग  of Housing and Urban Development and United States Department of Veterans Affairs have a special  खण्ड  8 program called VASH ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing )  ,  or HUD-VASH , which  देता  out a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans .
